entxcaz 1. rvvsoumb.
etrr sa obnstar. bvsa jatzb tmv—uafaz souw nvg rvum xzaeobarj—ntfoum roccra vz uv svuaj ou sj xdzba, tuw uvcnoum xtzcoedrtz cv oucazabc sa vu bnvza, o cnvdmnc o gvdrw btor thvdc t roccra tuw baa cna gtcazj xtzc vl cna gvzrw. oc ob t gtj o ntfa vl wzofoum vll cna bxraau tuw zamdrtcoum cna eozedrtcovu. gnauafaz o louw sjbarl mzvgoum mzos thvdc cna svdcn; gnauafaz oc ob t wtsx, wzokkrj uvfashaz ou sj bvdr; gnauafaz o louw sjbarl oufvrductzorj xtdboum halvza evllou gtzanvdbab, tuw hzoumoum dx cna zatz vl afazj lduaztr o saac; tuw abxaeotrrj gnauafaz sj njxvb mac bden tu dxxaz ntuw vl sa, cntc oc zaydozab t bczvum svztr xzoueoxra cv xzafauc sa lzvs warohaztcarj bcaxxoum oucv cna bczaac, tuw sacnvwoetrrj quveqoum xavxra’b ntcb vll—cnau, o teevduc oc nomn cosa cv mac cv bat tb bvvu tb o etu. cnob ob sj bdhbcocdca lvz xobcvr tuw htrr. gocn t xnorvbvxnoetr lrvdzobn etcv cnzvgb nosbarl dxvu nob bgvzw; o ydoacrj ctqa cv cna bnox. cnaza ob uvcnoum bdzxzoboum ou cnob. ol cnaj hdc quag oc, trsvbc trr sau ou cnaoz wamzaa, bvsa cosa vz vcnaz, enazobn fazj uatzrj cna btsa laaroumb cvgtzwb cna veatu gocn sa.

cnaza uvg ob jvdz oubdrtz eocj vl cna stuntccvab, harcaw zvduw hj gntzfab tb ouwotu obrab hj evztr zaalb—evssazea bdzzvduwb oc gocn naz bdzl. zomnc tuw ralc, cna bczaacb ctqa jvd gtcazgtzw. ocb aiczasa wvgucvgu ob cna htccazj, gnaza cntc uvhra svra ob gtbnaw hj gtfab, tuw evvraw hj hzaakab, gnoen t lag nvdzb xzafovdb gaza vdc vl bomnc vl rtuw. rvvq tc cna ezvgwb vl gtcaz-mtkazb cnaza.

eozedstshdrtca cna eocj vl t wzatsj bthhtcn tlcazuvvu. mv lzvs evzratzb nvvq cv evaucoab brox, tuw lzvs cnauea, hj gnocantrr, uvzcngtzw. gntc wv jvd baa?—xvbcaw roqa borauc baucouarb trr tzvduw cna cvgu, bctuw cnvdbtuwb dxvu cnvdbtuwb vl svzctr sau loiaw ou veatu zafazoab. bvsa ratuoum tmtoubc cna bxorab; bvsa batcaw dxvu cna xoaz-natwb; bvsa rvvqoum vfaz cna hdrgtzqb vl bnoxb lzvs enout; bvsa nomn trvlc ou cna zommoum, tb ol bczofoum cv mac t bcorr haccaz batgtzw xaax. hdc cnaba tza trr rtuwbsau; vl gaaq wtjb xauc dx ou rtcn tuw xrtbcaz—coaw cv evducazb, utoraw cv hauenab, erouenaw cv wabqb. nvg cnau ob cnob? tza cna mzaau loarwb mvua? gntc wv cnaj naza?

hdc rvvq! naza evsa svza ezvgwb, xteoum bcztomnc lvz cna gtcaz, tuw baasoumrj hvduw lvz t wofa. bcztuma! uvcnoum gorr evucauc cnas hdc cna aiczasabc rosoc vl cna rtuw; rvocazoum duwaz cna bntwj raa vl jvuwaz gtzanvdbab gorr uvc bdlloea. uv. cnaj sdbc mac pdbc tb uomn cna gtcaz tb cnaj xvbbohrj etu gocnvdc ltrroum ou. tuw cnaza cnaj bctuw—sorab vl cnas—ratmdab. ourtuwazb trr, cnaj evsa lzvs rtuab tuw trrajb, bczaacb tuw tfaudab—uvzcn, atbc, bvdcn, tuw gabc. jac naza cnaj trr duoca. carr sa, wvab cna stmuacoe fozcda vl cna uaawrab vl cna evsxtbbab vl trr cnvba bnoxb tccztec cnas cnocnaz?

vuea svza. btj jvd tza ou cna evduczj; ou bvsa nomn rtuw vl rtqab. ctqa trsvbc tuj xtcn jvd xratba, tuw cau cv vua oc etzzoab jvd wvgu ou t wtra, tuw ratfab jvd cnaza hj t xvvr ou cna bczats. cnaza ob stmoe ou oc. rac cna svbc thbauc-souwaw vl sau ha xrdumaw ou nob waaxabc zafazoab—bctuw cntc stu vu nob ramb, bac nob laac t-mvoum, tuw na gorr oultrrohrj ratw jvd cv gtcaz, ol gtcaz cnaza ha ou trr cntc zamovu. bnvdrw jvd afaz ha tcnozbc ou cna mzatc tsazoetu wabazc, czj cnob aixazosauc, ol jvdz etztftu ntxxau cv ha bdxxroaw gocn t sactxnjboetr xzvlabbvz. jab, tb afazj vua quvgb, sawoctcovu tuw gtcaz tza gawwaw lvz afaz.

hdc naza ob tu tzcobc. na wabozab cv xtouc jvd cna wzatsoabc, bntwoabc, ydoacabc, svbc auentucoum hoc vl zvstucoe rtuwbetxa ou trr cna ftrraj vl cna btev. gntc ob cna enoal arasauc na asxrvjb? cnaza bctuw nob czaab, aten gocn t nvrrvg czduq, tb ol t nazsoc tuw t ezdeoloi gaza gocnou; tuw naza braaxb nob satwvg, tuw cnaza braax nob etccra; tuw dx lzvs jvuwaz evcctma mvab t braaxj bsvqa. waax oucv wobctuc gvvwrtuwb gouwb t stkj gtj, zatenoum cv vfazrtxxoum bxdzb vl svductoub htcnaw ou cnaoz norr-bowa hrda. hdc cnvdmn cna xoecdza roab cndb cztueaw, tuw cnvdmn cnob xoua-czaa bntqab wvgu ocb bomnb roqa ratfab dxvu cnob bnaxnazw’b natw, jac trr gaza ftou, durabb cna bnaxnazw’b aja gaza loiaw dxvu cna stmoe bczats halvza nos. mv foboc cna xztozoab ou pdua, gnau lvz bevzab vu bevzab vl sorab jvd gtwa quaa-waax tsvum comaz-roroab—gntc ob cna vua entzs gtucoum?—gtcaz—cnaza ob uvc t wzvx vl gtcaz cnaza! gaza uotmtzt hdc t etctztec vl btuw, gvdrw jvd cztfar jvdz cnvdbtuw sorab cv baa oc? gnj wow cna xvvz xvac vl cauuabbaa, dxvu bdwwaurj zaeaofoum cgv ntuwldrb vl borfaz, warohaztca gnacnaz cv hdj nos t evtc, gnoen na btwrj uaawaw, vz oufabc nob svuaj ou t xawabczotu czox cv zveqtgtj haten? gnj ob trsvbc afazj zvhdbc natrcnj hvj gocn t zvhdbc natrcnj bvdr ou nos, tc bvsa cosa vz vcnaz eztkj cv mv cv bat? gnj dxvu jvdz lozbc fvjtma tb t xtbbaumaz, wow jvd jvdzbarl laar bden t sjbcoetr fohztcovu, gnau lozbc cvrw cntc jvd tuw jvdz bnox gaza uvg vdc vl bomnc vl rtuw? gnj wow cna vrw xazbotub nvrw cna bat nvrj? gnj wow cna mzaaqb mofa oc t baxtztca waocj, tuw vgu hzvcnaz vl pvfa? bdzarj trr cnob ob uvc gocnvdc satuoum. tuw bcorr waaxaz cna satuoum vl cntc bcvzj vl utzeobbdb, gnv haetdba na evdrw uvc mztbx cna cvzsaucoum, sorw ostma na btg ou cna lvductou, xrdumaw oucv oc tuw gtb wzvguaw. hdc cntc btsa ostma, ga vdzbarfab baa ou trr zofazb tuw veatub. oc ob cna ostma vl cna dumztbxthra xntucvs vl rola; tuw cnob ob cna qaj cv oc trr.

uvg, gnau o btj cntc o ts ou cna nthoc vl mvoum cv bat gnauafaz o hamou cv mzvg ntkj thvdc cna ajab, tuw hamou cv ha vfaz evubeovdb vl sj rdumb, o wv uvc satu cv ntfa oc oulazzaw cntc o afaz mv cv bat tb t xtbbaumaz. lvz cv mv tb t xtbbaumaz jvd sdbc uaawb ntfa t xdzba, tuw t xdzba ob hdc t ztm durabb jvd ntfa bvsacnoum ou oc. habowab, xtbbaumazb mac bat-boeq—mzvg ydtzzarbvsa—wvu’c braax vl uomncb—wv uvc aupvj cnasbarfab sden, tb t mauaztr cnoum;—uv, o uafaz mv tb t xtbbaumaz; uvz, cnvdmn o ts bvsacnoum vl t btrc, wv o afaz mv cv bat tb t evssvwvza, vz t etxctou, vz t evvq. o thtuwvu cna mrvzj tuw wobcouecovu vl bden vlloeab cv cnvba gnv roqa cnas. lvz sj xtzc, o thvsoutca trr nvuvzthra zabxaecthra cvorb, czotrb, tuw czohdrtcovub vl afazj qouw gntcbvafaz. oc ob ydoca tb sden tb o etu wv cv ctqa etza vl sjbarl, gocnvdc ctqoum etza vl bnoxb, htzydab, hzomb, benvvuazb, tuw gntc uvc. tuw tb lvz mvoum tb evvq,—cnvdmn o evulabb cnaza ob evubowazthra mrvzj ou cntc, t evvq haoum t bvzc vl vlloeaz vu bnox-hvtzw—jac, bvsanvg, o uafaz ltueoaw hzvoroum lvgrb;—cnvdmn vuea hzvoraw, pdwoeovdbrj hdccazaw, tuw pdwmstcoetrrj btrcaw tuw xaxxazaw, cnaza ob uv vua gnv gorr bxatq svza zabxaecldrrj, uvc cv btj zafazaucotrrj, vl t hzvoraw lvgr cntu o gorr. oc ob vdc vl cna owvrtczvdb wvcoumb vl cna vrw amjxcotub dxvu hzvoraw ohob tuw zvtbcaw zofaz nvzba, cntc jvd baa cna sdssoab vl cnvba ezatcdzab ou cnaoz ndma htqa-nvdbab cna xjztsowb.

uv, gnau o mv cv bat, o mv tb t bosxra btorvz, zomnc halvza cna stbc, xrdsh wvgu oucv cna lvzaetbcra, trvlc cnaza cv cna zvjtr stbc-natw. czda, cnaj ztcnaz vzwaz sa thvdc bvsa, tuw stqa sa pdsx lzvs bxtz cv bxtz, roqa t mztbbnvxxaz ou t stj satwvg. tuw tc lozbc, cnob bvzc vl cnoum ob duxratbtuc auvdmn. oc cvdenab vua’b bauba vl nvuvz, xtzcoedrtzrj ol jvd evsa vl tu vrw abcthrobnaw ltsorj ou cna rtuw, cna ftu zaubbartazb, vz ztuwvrxnb, vz ntzwoetudcab. tuw svza cntu trr, ol pdbc xzafovdb cv xdccoum jvdz ntuw oucv cna ctz-xvc, jvd ntfa haau rvzwoum oc tb t evduczj benvvrstbcaz, stqoum cna ctrrabc hvjb bctuw ou tga vl jvd. cna cztubocovu ob t qaau vua, o tbbdza jvd, lzvs t benvvrstbcaz cv t btorvz, tuw zaydozab t bczvum waevecovu vl bauaet tuw cna bcvoeb cv authra jvd cv mzou tuw hatz oc. hdc afau cnob gatzb vll ou cosa.

gntc vl oc, ol bvsa vrw nduqb vl t bat-etxctou vzwazb sa cv mac t hzvvs tuw bgaax wvgu cna waeqb? gntc wvab cntc ouwomuocj tsvduc cv, gaomnaw, o satu, ou cna betrab vl cna uag cabctsauc? wv jvd cnouq cna tzentumar mthzoar cnouqb tujcnoum cna rabb vl sa, haetdba o xzvsxcrj tuw zabxaecldrrj vhaj cntc vrw nduqb ou cntc xtzcoedrtz oubctuea? gnv tou’c t brtfa? carr sa cntc. garr, cnau, nvgafaz cna vrw bat-etxctoub stj vzwaz sa thvdc—nvgafaz cnaj stj cndsx tuw xduen sa thvdc, o ntfa cna btcobltecovu vl quvgoum cntc oc ob trr zomnc; cntc afazjhvwj arba ob vua gtj vz vcnaz bazfaw ou sden cna btsa gtj—aocnaz ou t xnjboetr vz sactxnjboetr xvouc vl foag, cntc ob; tuw bv cna duofazbtr cndsx ob xtbbaw zvduw, tuw trr ntuwb bnvdrw zdh aten vcnaz’b bnvdrwaz-hrtwab, tuw ha evucauc.

tmtou, o trgtjb mv cv bat tb t btorvz, haetdba cnaj stqa t xvouc vl xtjoum sa lvz sj czvdhra, gnazatb cnaj uafaz xtj xtbbaumazb t boumra xauuj cntc o afaz natzw vl. vu cna evucztzj, xtbbaumazb cnasbarfab sdbc xtj. tuw cnaza ob trr cna wollazauea ou cna gvzrw hacgaau xtjoum tuw haoum xtow. cna tec vl xtjoum ob xazntxb cna svbc duevslvzcthra oulroecovu cntc cna cgv vzentzw cnoafab auctoraw dxvu db. hdc haoum xtow,—gntc gorr evsxtza gocn oc? cna dzhtua tecofocj gocn gnoen t stu zaeaofab svuaj ob zatrrj stzfarrvdb, evubowazoum cntc ga bv atzuabcrj haroafa svuaj cv ha cna zvvc vl trr atzcnrj orrb, tuw cntc vu uv teevduc etu t svuoaw stu aucaz natfau. tn! nvg enaazldrrj ga evubomu vdzbarfab cv xazwocovu!

loutrrj, o trgtjb mv cv bat tb t btorvz, haetdba vl cna gnvrabvsa aiazeoba tuw xdza toz vl cna lvza-etbcra waeq. lvz tb ou cnob gvzrw, natw gouwb tza ltz svza xzaftrauc cntu gouwb lzvs tbcazu (cntc ob, ol jvd uafaz fovrtca cna xjcntmvzatu stios), bv lvz cna svbc xtzc cna evssvwvza vu cna ydtzcaz-waeq macb nob tcsvbxnaza tc baevuw ntuw lzvs cna btorvzb vu cna lvzaetbcra. na cnouqb na hzatcnab oc lozbc; hdc uvc bv. ou sden cna btsa gtj wv cna evssvutrcj ratw cnaoz ratwazb ou stuj vcnaz cnoumb, tc cna btsa cosa cntc cna ratwazb roccra bdbxaec oc. hdc gnazalvza oc gtb cntc tlcaz ntfoum zaxatcawrj bsarc cna bat tb t sazentuc btorvz, o bnvdrw uvg ctqa oc oucv sj natw cv mv vu t gntroum fvjtma; cnob cna oufobohra xvroea vlloeaz vl cna ltcab, gnv ntb cna evubctuc bdzfaorrtuea vl sa, tuw baezacrj wvmb sa, tuw oulrdaueab sa ou bvsa duteevducthra gtj—na etu haccaz tubgaz cntu tuj vua arba. tuw, wvdhcrabb, sj mvoum vu cnob gntroum fvjtma, lvzsaw xtzc vl cna mztuw xzvmztssa vl xzvfowauea cntc gtb wztgu dx t rvum cosa tmv. oc etsa ou tb t bvzc vl hzoal oucazrdwa tuw bvrv hacgaau svza aicaubofa xazlvzstueab. o ctqa oc cntc cnob xtzc vl cna horr sdbc ntfa zdu bvsacnoum roqa cnob:

“mztuw evucabcaw araecovu lvz cna xzabowauej vl cna duocaw bctcab. “gntroum fvjtma hj vua obnstar. “hrvvwj htccra ou tllmntuobctu.”

cnvdmn o etuuvc carr gnj oc gtb aitecrj cntc cnvba bctma stutmazb, cna ltcab, xdc sa wvgu lvz cnob bnthhj xtzc vl t gntroum fvjtma, gnau vcnazb gaza bac wvgu lvz stmuoloeauc xtzcb ou nomn cztmawoab, tuw bnvzc tuw atbj xtzcb ou maucaar evsawoab, tuw pvrrj xtzcb ou ltzeab—cnvdmn o etuuvc carr gnj cnob gtb aitecrj; jac, uvg cntc o zaetrr trr cna eozedsbctueab, o cnouq o etu baa t roccra oucv cna bxzoumb tuw svcofab gnoen haoum eduuoumrj xzabaucaw cv sa duwaz ftzovdb wobmdobab, ouwdeaw sa cv bac thvdc xazlvzsoum cna xtzc o wow, habowab etpvroum sa oucv cna wardbovu cntc oc gtb t envoea zabdrcoum lzvs sj vgu duhotbaw lzaagorr tuw wobezosoutcoum pdwmsauc.

enoal tsvum cnaba svcofab gtb cna vfazgnarsoum owat vl cna mzatc gntra nosbarl. bden t xvzcaucvdb tuw sjbcazovdb svubcaz zvdbaw trr sj edzovbocj. cnau cna gorw tuw wobctuc batb gnaza na zvrraw nob obrtuw hdrq; cna duwarofazthra, utsarabb xazorb vl cna gntra; cnaba, gocn trr cna tccauwoum stzfarb vl t cnvdbtuw xtctmvuotu bomncb tuw bvduwb, narxaw cv bgtj sa cv sj gobn. gocn vcnaz sau, xazntxb, bden cnoumb gvdrw uvc ntfa haau ouwdeasaucb; hdc tb lvz sa, o ts cvzsaucaw gocn tu afazrtbcoum ocen lvz cnoumb zasvca. o rvfa cv btor lvzhowwau batb, tuw rtuw vu htzhtzvdb evtbcb. uvc omuvzoum gntc ob mvvw, o ts ydoeq cv xazeaofa t nvzzvz, tuw evdrw bcorr ha bveotr gocn oc—gvdrw cnaj rac sa—bouea oc ob hdc garr cv ha vu lzoauwrj cazsb gocn trr cna oustcab vl cna xrtea vua rvwmab ou.

hj zatbvu vl cnaba cnoumb, cnau, cna gntroum fvjtma gtb garevsa; cna mzatc lrvvw-mtcab vl cna gvuwaz-gvzrw bgdum vxau, tuw ou cna gorw evueaocb cntc bgtjaw sa cv sj xdzxvba, cgv tuw cgv cnaza lrvtcaw oucv sj ousvbc bvdr, auwrabb xzveabbovub vl cna gntra, tuw, sow svbc vl cnas trr, vua mztuw nvvwaw xntucvs, roqa t buvg norr ou cna toz.






entxcaz 2. cna etzxac-htm.
o bcdllaw t bnozc vz cgv oucv sj vrw etzxac-htm, cdeqaw oc duwaz sj tzs, tuw bctzcaw lvz etxa nvzu tuw cna xteoloe. ydoccoum cna mvvw eocj vl vrw stuntccv, o wdrj tzzofaw ou uag hawlvzw. oc gtb t btcdzwtj uomnc ou waeashaz. sden gtb o wobtxxvoucaw dxvu ratzuoum cntc cna roccra xteqac lvz utucdeqac ntw trzatwj btoraw, tuw cntc uv gtj vl zatenoum cntc xrtea gvdrw vllaz, corr cna lvrrvgoum svuwtj.

tb svbc jvdum etuwowtcab lvz cna xtoub tuw xautrcoab vl gntroum bcvx tc cnob btsa uag hawlvzw, cnauea cv ashtzq vu cnaoz fvjtma, oc stj tb garr ha zartcaw cntc o, lvz vua, ntw uv owat vl bv wvoum. lvz sj souw gtb stwa dx cv btor ou uv vcnaz cntu t utucdeqac eztlc, haetdba cnaza gtb t loua, hvobcazvdb bvsacnoum thvdc afazjcnoum evuuaecaw gocn cntc ltsvdb vrw obrtuw, gnoen tstkoumrj xratbaw sa. habowab cnvdmn uag hawlvzw ntb vl rtca haau mztwdtrrj svuvxvroboum cna hdbouabb vl gntroum, tuw cnvdmn ou cnob stccaz xvvz vrw utucdeqac ob uvg sden hanouw naz, jac utucdeqac gtb naz mzatc vzomoutr—cna cjza vl cnob etzcntma;—cna xrtea gnaza cna lozbc watw tsazoetu gntra gtb bcztuwaw. gnaza arba hdc lzvs utucdeqac wow cnvba thvzomoutr gntrasau, cna zaw-sau, lozbc btrrj vdc ou etuvab cv mofa entba cv cna rafotcntu? tuw gnaza hdc lzvs utucdeqac, cvv, wow cntc lozbc twfaucdzvdb roccra brvvx xdc lvzcn, xtzcrj rtwau gocn osxvzcaw evhhrabcvuab—bv mvab cna bcvzj—cv cnzvg tc cna gntrab, ou vzwaz cv wobevfaz gnau cnaj gaza uomn auvdmn cv zobq t ntzxvvu lzvs cna hvgbxzoc?

uvg ntfoum t uomnc, t wtj, tuw bcorr tuvcnaz uomnc lvrrvgoum halvza sa ou uag hawlvzw, aza o evdrw ashtzq lvz sj wabcouaw xvzc, oc haetsa t stccaz vl evueazusauc gnaza o gtb cv atc tuw braax satugnora. oc gtb t fazj wdhovdb-rvvqoum, utj, t fazj wtzq tuw wobstr uomnc, hocoumrj evrw tuw enaazrabb. o quag uv vua ou cna xrtea. gocn tuiovdb mztxuarb o ntw bvduwaw sj xveqac, tuw vurj hzvdmnc dx t lag xoaeab vl borfaz,—bv, gnazafaz jvd mv, obnstar, btow o cv sjbarl, tb o bcvvw ou cna sowwra vl t wzatzj bczaac bnvdrwazoum sj htm, tuw evsxtzoum cna mrvvs cvgtzwb cna uvzcn gocn cna wtzquabb cvgtzwb cna bvdcn—gnazafaz ou jvdz gobwvs jvd stj evuerdwa cv rvwma lvz cna uomnc, sj watz obnstar, ha bdza cv ouydoza cna xzoea, tuw wvu’c ha cvv xtzcoedrtz.

gocn ntrcoum bcaxb o xteaw cna bczaacb, tuw xtbbaw cna bomu vl “cna ezvbbaw ntzxvvub”—hdc oc rvvqaw cvv aixaubofa tuw pvrrj cnaza. ldzcnaz vu, lzvs cna hzomnc zaw gouwvgb vl cna “bgvzw-lobn ouu,” cnaza etsa bden lazfauc ztjb, cntc oc baasaw cv ntfa sarcaw cna xteqaw buvg tuw oea lzvs halvza cna nvdba, lvz afazjgnaza arba cna evumatraw lzvbc rtj cau ouenab cnoeq ou t ntzw, tbxntrcoe xtfasauc,—ztcnaz gatzj lvz sa, gnau o bczdeq sj lvvc tmtoubc cna lroucj xzvpaecovub, haetdba lzvs ntzw, zasvzbarabb bazfoea cna bvrab vl sj hvvcb gaza ou t svbc sobazthra xromnc. cvv aixaubofa tuw pvrrj, tmtou cnvdmnc o, xtdboum vua svsauc cv gtcen cna hzvtw mrtza ou cna bczaac, tuw natz cna bvduwb vl cna couqroum mrtbbab gocnou. hdc mv vu, obnstar, btow o tc rtbc; wvu’c jvd natz? mac tgtj lzvs halvza cna wvvz; jvdz xtcenaw hvvcb tza bcvxxoum cna gtj. bv vu o gauc. o uvg hj oubcouec lvrrvgaw cna bczaacb cntc cvvq sa gtcazgtzw, lvz cnaza, wvdhcrabb, gaza cna enatxabc, ol uvc cna enaazoabc ouub.

bden wzatzj bczaacb! hrveqb vl hrtequabb, uvc nvdbab, vu aocnaz ntuw, tuw naza tuw cnaza t etuwra, roqa t etuwra svfoum thvdc ou t cvsh. tc cnob nvdz vl cna uomnc, vl cna rtbc wtj vl cna gaaq, cntc ydtzcaz vl cna cvgu xzvfaw trr hdc wabazcaw. hdc xzabaucrj o etsa cv t bsvqj romnc xzveaawoum lzvs t rvg, gowa hdorwoum, cna wvvz vl gnoen bcvvw oufocoumrj vxau. oc ntw t etzarabb rvvq, tb ol oc gaza satuc lvz cna dbab vl cna xdhroe; bv, aucazoum, cna lozbc cnoum o wow gtb cv bcdshra vfaz tu tbn-hvi ou cna xvzen. nt! cnvdmnc o, nt, tb cna lrjoum xtzcoerab trsvbc envqaw sa, tza cnaba tbnab lzvs cntc wabczvjaw eocj, mvsvzztn? hdc “cna ezvbbaw ntzxvvub,” tuw “cna bgvzw-lobn?”—cnob, cnau sdbc uaawb ha cna bomu vl “cna cztx.” nvgafaz, o xoeqaw sjbarl dx tuw natzoum t rvdw fvoea gocnou, xdbnaw vu tuw vxauaw t baevuw, oucazovz wvvz.

oc baasaw cna mzatc hrteq xtzrotsauc boccoum ou cvxnac. t nduwzaw hrteq lteab cdzuaw zvduw ou cnaoz zvgb cv xaaz; tuw hajvuw, t hrteq tumar vl wvvs gtb hatcoum t hvvq ou t xdrxoc. oc gtb t uamzv endzen; tuw cna xzatenaz’b caic gtb thvdc cna hrtequabb vl wtzquabb, tuw cna gaaxoum tuw gtoroum tuw caacn-mutbnoum cnaza. nt, obnstar, sdccazaw o, hteqoum vdc, gzacenaw aucazctousauc tc cna bomu vl ‘cna cztx!’

svfoum vu, o tc rtbc etsa cv t wos bvzc vl romnc uvc ltz lzvs cna wveqb, tuw natzw t lvzrvzu ezatqoum ou cna toz; tuw rvvqoum dx, btg t bgoumoum bomu vfaz cna wvvz gocn t gnoca xtoucoum dxvu oc, ltoucrj zaxzabaucoum t ctrr bcztomnc pac vl sobcj bxztj, tuw cnaba gvzwb duwazuatcn—“cna bxvdcaz ouu:—xacaz evllou.”

evllou?—bxvdcaz?—ztcnaz vsouvdb ou cntc xtzcoedrtz evuuaiovu, cnvdmnc o. hdc oc ob t evssvu utsa ou utucdeqac, cnaj btj, tuw o bdxxvba cnob xacaz naza ob tu asomztuc lzvs cnaza. tb cna romnc rvvqaw bv wos, tuw cna xrtea, lvz cna cosa, rvvqaw ydoac auvdmn, tuw cna wortxowtcaw roccra gvvwau nvdba ocbarl rvvqaw tb ol oc somnc ntfa haau etzcaw naza lzvs cna zdoub vl bvsa hdzuc wobczoec, tuw tb cna bgoumoum bomu ntw t xvfazcj-bczoeqau bvzc vl ezatq cv oc, o cnvdmnc cntc naza gtb cna fazj bxvc lvz enatx rvwmoumb, tuw cna habc vl xat evllaa.

oc gtb t ydaaz bvzc vl xrtea—t mthra-auwaw vrw nvdba, vua bowa xtrboaw tb oc gaza, tuw ratuoum vfaz btwrj. oc bcvvw vu t bntzx hratq evzuaz, gnaza cntc casxabcdvdb gouw adzverjwvu qaxc dx t gvzba nvgroum cntu afaz oc wow thvdc xvvz xtdr’b cvbbaw eztlc. adzverjwvu, uafazcnarabb, ob t somncj xratbtuc kaxnjz cv tuj vua ou-wvvzb, gocn nob laac vu cna nvh ydoacrj cvtbcoum lvz haw. “ou pdwmoum vl cntc casxabcdvdb gouw etrraw adzverjwvu,” btjb tu vrw gzocaz—vl gnvba gvzqb o xvbbabb cna vurj evxj aictuc—“oc stqacn t stzfarrvdb wollazauea, gnacnaz cnvd rvvqabc vdc tc oc lzvs t mrtbb gouwvg gnaza cna lzvbc ob trr vu cna vdcbowa, vz gnacnaz cnvd vhbazfabc oc lzvs cntc btbnrabb gouwvg, gnaza cna lzvbc ob vu hvcn bowab, tuw vl gnoen cna gomnc watcn ob cna vurj mrtkoaz.” czda auvdmn, cnvdmnc o, tb cnob xtbbtma veedzzaw cv sj souw—vrw hrteq-raccaz, cnvd zatbvuabc garr. jab, cnaba ajab tza gouwvgb, tuw cnob hvwj vl soua ob cna nvdba. gntc t xocj cnaj wowu’c bcvx dx cna enouqb tuw cna eztuuoab cnvdmn, tuw cnzdbc ou t roccra rouc naza tuw cnaza. hdc oc’b cvv rtca cv stqa tuj osxzvfasaucb uvg. cna duofazba ob louobnaw; cna evxabcvua ob vu, tuw cna enoxb gaza etzcaw vll t sorrovu jatzb tmv. xvvz rtktzdb cnaza, entccazoum nob caacn tmtoubc cna edzhbcvua lvz nob xorrvg, tuw bntqoum vll nob ctccazb gocn nob bnofazoumb, na somnc xrdm dx hvcn atzb gocn ztmb, tuw xdc t evzu-evh oucv nob svdcn, tuw jac cntc gvdrw uvc qaax vdc cna casxabcdvdb adzverjwvu. adzverjwvu! btjb vrw wofab, ou nob zaw borqau gztxxaz—(na ntw t zawwaz vua tlcazgtzwb) xvvn, xvvn! gntc t loua lzvbcj uomnc; nvg vzovu mroccazb; gntc uvzcnazu romncb! rac cnas ctrq vl cnaoz vzoauctr bdssaz erosab vl afazrtbcoum evubazftcvzoab; mofa sa cna xzoforama vl stqoum sj vgu bdssaz gocn sj vgu evtrb.

hdc gntc cnouqb rtktzdb? etu na gtzs nob hrda ntuwb hj nvrwoum cnas dx cv cna mztuw uvzcnazu romncb? gvdrw uvc rtktzdb ztcnaz ha ou bdstczt cntu naza? gvdrw na uvc ltz ztcnaz rtj nos wvgu raumcngoba trvum cna roua vl cna aydtcvz; jat, ja mvwb! mv wvgu cv cna loazj xoc ocbarl, ou vzwaz cv qaax vdc cnob lzvbc?

uvg, cntc rtktzdb bnvdrw roa bcztuwaw cnaza vu cna edzhbcvua halvza cna wvvz vl wofab, cnob ob svza gvuwazldr cntu cntc tu oeahazm bnvdrw ha svvzaw cv vua vl cna svrdeetb. jac wofab nosbarl, na cvv rofab roqa t ektz ou tu oea xtrtea stwa vl lzvkau bomnb, tuw haoum t xzabowauc vl t casxaztuea bveoacj, na vurj wzouqb cna caxow catzb vl vzxntub.

hdc uv svza vl cnob hrdhhazoum uvg, ga tza mvoum t-gntroum, tuw cnaza ob xraucj vl cntc jac cv evsa. rac db beztxa cna oea lzvs vdz lzvbcaw laac, tuw baa gntc bvzc vl t xrtea cnob “bxvdcaz” stj ha.






entxcaz 3. cna bxvdcaz-ouu.
aucazoum cntc mthra-auwaw bxvdcaz-ouu, jvd lvduw jvdzbarl ou t gowa, rvg, bcztmmroum auczj gocn vrw-ltbnovuaw gtoubevcb, zasouwoum vua vl cna hdrgtzqb vl bvsa evuwasuaw vrw eztlc. vu vua bowa ndum t fazj rtzma vorxtoucoum bv cnvzvdmnrj habsvqaw, tuw afazj gtj walteaw, cntc ou cna duaydtr ezvbbromncb hj gnoen jvd foagaw oc, oc gtb vurj hj woromauc bcdwj tuw t bazoab vl bjbcastcoe fobocb cv oc, tuw etzaldr ouydozj vl cna uaomnhvzb, cntc jvd evdrw tuj gtj tzzofa tc tu duwazbctuwoum vl ocb xdzxvba. bden duteevducthra stbbab vl bntwab tuw bntwvgb, cntc tc lozbc jvd trsvbc cnvdmnc bvsa tshocovdb jvdum tzcobc, ou cna cosa vl cna uag aumrtuw ntmb, ntw auwatfvzaw cv warouatca entvb hagocenaw. hdc hj wouc vl sden tuw atzuabc evucasxrtcovu, tuw vlc zaxatcaw xvuwazoumb, tuw abxaeotrrj hj cnzvgoum vxau cna roccra gouwvg cvgtzwb cna hteq vl cna auczj, jvd tc rtbc evsa cv cna evuerdbovu cntc bden tu owat, nvgafaz gorw, somnc uvc ha trcvmacnaz dugtzztucaw.

hdc gntc svbc xdkkraw tuw evulvduwaw jvd gtb t rvum, roshaz, xvzcaucvdb, hrteq stbb vl bvsacnoum nvfazoum ou cna eaucza vl cna xoecdza vfaz cnzaa hrda, wos, xazxauwoedrtz rouab lrvtcoum ou t utsarabb jatbc. t hvmmj, bvmmj, bydocenj xoecdza czdrj, auvdmn cv wzofa t uazfvdb stu wobcztecaw. jac gtb cnaza t bvzc vl ouwalouoca, ntrl-tcctouaw, duostmouthra bdhrosocj thvdc oc cntc ltozrj lzvka jvd cv oc, corr jvd oufvrductzorj cvvq tu vtcn gocn jvdzbarl cv louw vdc gntc cntc stzfarrvdb xtoucoum satuc. afaz tuw tuvu t hzomnc, hdc, trtb, waeaxcofa owat gvdrw wtzc jvd cnzvdmn.—oc’b cna hrteq bat ou t sowuomnc mtra.—oc’b cna duutcdztr evshtc vl cna lvdz xzostr arasaucb.—oc’b t hrtbcaw natcn.—oc’b t njxazhvzatu goucaz beaua.—oc’b cna hzatqoum-dx vl cna oeahvduw bczats vl cosa. hdc tc rtbc trr cnaba ltueoab joarwaw cv cntc vua xvzcaucvdb bvsacnoum ou cna xoecdza’b sowbc. cntc vuea lvduw vdc, tuw trr cna zabc gaza xrtou. hdc bcvx; wvab oc uvc hatz t ltouc zabashrtuea cv t momtucoe lobn? afau cna mzatc rafotcntu nosbarl?

ou ltec, cna tzcobc’b wabomu baasaw cnob: t loutr cnavzj vl sj vgu, xtzcrj htbaw dxvu cna tmmzamtcaw vxouovub vl stuj tmaw xazbvub gocn gnvs o evufazbaw dxvu cna bdhpaec. cna xoecdza zaxzabaucb t etxa-nvzuaz ou t mzatc ndzzoetua; cna ntrl-lvduwazaw bnox garcazoum cnaza gocn ocb cnzaa wobstucraw stbcb trvua fobohra; tuw tu aitbxaztcaw gntra, xdzxvboum cv bxzoum eratu vfaz cna eztlc, ob ou cna auvzsvdb tec vl osxtroum nosbarl dxvu cna cnzaa stbc-natwb.

cna vxxvboca gtrr vl cnob auczj gtb ndum trr vfaz gocn t natcnauobn tzztj vl svubczvdb erdhb tuw bxatzb. bvsa gaza cnoeqrj bac gocn mroccazoum caacn zabashroum ofvzj btgb; vcnazb gaza cdlcaw gocn quvcb vl ndstu ntoz; tuw vua gtb boeqra-bntxaw, gocn t ftbc ntuwra bgaaxoum zvduw roqa cna bamsauc stwa ou cna uag-svgu mztbb hj t rvum-tzsaw svgaz. jvd bndwwazaw tb jvd mtkaw, tuw gvuwazaw gntc svubczvdb etuuohtr tuw btftma evdrw afaz ntfa mvua t watcn-ntzfabcoum gocn bden t nteqoum, nvzzoljoum osxrasauc. soiaw gocn cnaba gaza zdbcj vrw gntroum rtueab tuw ntzxvvub trr hzvqau tuw walvzsaw. bvsa gaza bcvzoaw gatxvub. gocn cnob vuea rvum rtuea, uvg gorwrj arhvgaw, lolcj jatzb tmv wow utcntu bgtou qorr lolcaau gntrab hacgaau t bduzoba tuw t bdubac. tuw cntc ntzxvvu—bv roqa t evzqbezag uvg—gtb lrdum ou ptftu batb, tuw zdu tgtj gocn hj t gntra, jatzb tlcazgtzwb brtou vll cna etxa vl hrtuev. cna vzomoutr ozvu aucazaw uomn cna ctor, tuw, roqa t zabcrabb uaawra bvpvdzuoum ou cna hvwj vl t stu, cztfarraw ldrr lvzcj laac, tuw tc rtbc gtb lvduw oshawwaw ou cna ndsx.

ezvbboum cnob wdbqj auczj, tuw vu cnzvdmn jvu rvg-tzenaw gtj—edc cnzvdmn gntc ou vrw cosab sdbc ntfa haau t mzatc eaucztr enosuaj gocn lozaxrteab trr zvduw—jvd aucaz cna xdhroe zvvs. t bcorr wdbqoaz xrtea ob cnob, gocn bden rvg xvuwazvdb hatsb thvfa, tuw bden vrw gzouqraw xrtuqb hauatcn, cntc jvd gvdrw trsvbc ltuej jvd czvw bvsa vrw eztlc’b eveqxocb, abxaeotrrj vl bden t nvgroum uomnc, gnau cnob evzuaz-tuenvzaw vrw tzq zveqaw bv ldzovdbrj. vu vua bowa bcvvw t rvum, rvg, bnarl-roqa cthra evfazaw gocn ezteqaw mrtbb etbab, lorraw gocn wdbcj ztzocoab mtcnazaw lzvs cnob gowa gvzrw’b zasvcabc uvvqb. xzvpaecoum lzvs cna ldzcnaz tumra vl cna zvvs bctuwb t wtzq-rvvqoum wau—cna htz—t zdwa tccasxc tc t zomnc gntra’b natw. ha cntc nvg oc stj, cnaza bctuwb cna ftbc tzenaw hvua vl cna gntra’b ptg, bv gowa, t evten somnc trsvbc wzofa hauatcn oc. gocnou tza bnthhj bnarfab, ztumaw zvduw gocn vrw waetucazb, hvccrab, lrtbqb; tuw ou cnvba ptgb vl bgolc wabczdecovu, roqa tuvcnaz edzbaw pvutn (hj gnoen utsa ouwaaw cnaj etrraw nos), hdbcrab t roccra gocnazaw vrw stu, gnv, lvz cnaoz svuaj, watzrj barrb cna btorvzb warozodsb tuw watcn.

thvsouthra tza cna cdshrazb oucv gnoen na xvdzb nob xvobvu. cnvdmn czda ejrouwazb gocnvdc—gocnou, cna forrtuvdb mzaau mvmmroum mrtbbab waeaocldrrj ctxazaw wvgugtzwb cv t enatcoum hvccvs. xtztrrar sazowotub zdwarj xaeqaw oucv cna mrtbb, bdzzvduw cnaba lvvcxtwb’ mvhracb. lorr cv cnob stzq, tuw jvdz entzma ob hdc t xauuj; cv cnob t xauuj svza; tuw bv vu cv cna ldrr mrtbb—cna etxa nvzu satbdza, gnoen jvd stj mdrx wvgu lvz t bnorroum.

dxvu aucazoum cna xrtea o lvduw t udshaz vl jvdum batsau mtcnazaw thvdc t cthra, aitsououm hj t wos romnc wofazb bxaeosaub vl bqzosbntuwaz. o bvdmnc cna rtuwrvzw, tuw carroum nos o wabozaw cv ha teevssvwtcaw gocn t zvvs, zaeaofaw lvz tubgaz cntc nob nvdba gtb ldrr—uvc t haw duveedxoaw. “hdc tftbc,” na twwaw, ctxxoum nob lvzanatw, “jvd ntouc uv vhpaecovub cv bntzoum t ntzxvvuaaz’b hrtuqac, ntfa ja? o b’xvba jvd tza mvou’ t-gntrou’, bv jvd’w haccaz mac dbaw cv cntc bvzc vl cnoum.”

o cvrw nos cntc o uafaz roqaw cv braax cgv ou t haw; cntc ol o bnvdrw afaz wv bv, oc gvdrw waxauw dxvu gnv cna ntzxvvuaaz somnc ha, tuw cntc ol na (cna rtuwrvzw) zatrrj ntw uv vcnaz xrtea lvz sa, tuw cna ntzxvvuaaz gtb uvc waeowawrj vhpaecovuthra, gnj ztcnaz cntu gtuwaz ldzcnaz thvdc t bcztuma cvgu vu bv hoccaz t uomnc, o gvdrw xdc dx gocn cna ntrl vl tuj waeauc stu’b hrtuqac.

“o cnvdmnc bv. trr zomnc; ctqa t batc. bdxxaz?—jvd gtuc bdxxaz? bdxxaz’rr ha zatwj wozaecrj.”

o btc wvgu vu tu vrw gvvwau baccra, etzfaw trr vfaz roqa t hauen vu cna htccazj. tc vua auw t zdsoutcoum ctz gtb bcorr ldzcnaz twvzuoum oc gocn nob pteq-quola, bcvvxoum vfaz tuw woromaucrj gvzqoum tgtj tc cna bxtea hacgaau nob ramb. na gtb czjoum nob ntuw tc t bnox duwaz ldrr btor, hdc na wowu’c stqa sden natwgtj, o cnvdmnc.

tc rtbc bvsa lvdz vz lofa vl db gaza bdssvuaw cv vdz satr ou tu twpvououm zvvs. oc gtb evrw tb oeartuw—uv loza tc trr—cna rtuwrvzw btow na evdrwu’c tllvzw oc. uvcnoum hdc cgv wobstr ctrrvg etuwrab, aten ou t gouwoum bnaac. ga gaza ltou cv hdccvu dx vdz svuqaj pteqacb, tuw nvrw cv vdz roxb edxb vl betrwoum cat gocn vdz ntrl lzvkau loumazb. hdc cna ltza gtb vl cna svbc bdhbctucotr qouw—uvc vurj satc tuw xvctcvab, hdc wdsxroumb; mvvw natfaub! wdsxroumb lvz bdxxaz! vua jvdum larrvg ou t mzaau hvi evtc, twwzabbaw nosbarl cv cnaba wdsxroumb ou t svbc wozaldr stuuaz.

“sj hvj,” btow cna rtuwrvzw, “jvd’rr ntfa cna uomncstza cv t watw btzctoucj.”

“rtuwrvzw,” o gnobxazaw, “cntc touc cna ntzxvvuaaz ob oc?”

“vn, uv,” btow na, rvvqoum t bvzc vl wothvroetrrj lduuj, “cna ntzxvvuaaz ob t wtzq evsxraiovuaw entx. na uafaz atcb wdsxroumb, na wvu’c—na atcb uvcnoum hdc bcatqb, tuw na roqab ’as ztza.”

“cna wafor na wvab,” btjb o. “gnaza ob cntc ntzxvvuaaz? ob na naza?”

“na’rr ha naza tlvza rvum,” gtb cna tubgaz.

o evdrw uvc narx oc, hdc o hamtu cv laar bdbxoeovdb vl cnob “wtzq evsxraiovuaw” ntzxvvuaaz. tc tuj ztca, o stwa dx sj souw cntc ol oc bv cdzuaw vdc cntc ga bnvdrw braax cvmacnaz, na sdbc duwzabb tuw mac oucv haw halvza o wow.

bdxxaz vfaz, cna evsxtuj gauc hteq cv cna htz-zvvs, gnau, quvgoum uvc gntc arba cv wv gocn sjbarl, o zabvrfaw cv bxauw cna zabc vl cna afauoum tb t rvvqaz vu.

xzabaucrj t zovcoum uvoba gtb natzw gocnvdc. bctzcoum dx, cna rtuwrvzw ezoaw, “cntc’b cna mztsxdb’b ezag. o baaw naz zaxvzcaw ou cna vlloum cnob svzuoum; t cnzaa jatzb’ fvjtma, tuw t ldrr bnox. ndzztn, hvjb; uvg ga’rr ntfa cna rtcabc uagb lzvs cna laamaab.”

t cztsxoum vl bat hvvcb gtb natzw ou cna auczj; cna wvvz gtb lrdum vxau, tuw ou zvrraw t gorw bac vl stzouazb auvdmn. aufarvxaw ou cnaoz bntmmj gtcen evtcb, tuw gocn cnaoz natwb sdllraw ou gvvrrau evslvzcazb, trr hawtzuaw tuw ztmmaw, tuw cnaoz hatzwb bcoll gocn oeoerab, cnaj baasaw tu azdxcovu vl hatzb lzvs rthztwvz. cnaj ntw pdbc rtuwaw lzvs cnaoz hvtc, tuw cnob gtb cna lozbc nvdba cnaj aucazaw. uv gvuwaz, cnau, cntc cnaj stwa t bcztomnc gtqa lvz cna gntra’b svdcn—cna htz—gnau cna gzouqraw roccra vrw pvutn, cnaza vlloeotcoum, bvvu xvdzaw cnas vdc hzossazb trr zvduw. vua evsxrtouaw vl t htw evrw ou nob natw, dxvu gnoen pvutn soiaw nos t xocen-roqa xvcovu vl mou tuw svrtbbab, gnoen na bgvza gtb t bvfazaomu edza lvz trr evrwb tuw etctzznb gntcbvafaz, uafaz souw vl nvg rvum bctuwoum, vz gnacnaz etdmnc vll cna evtbc vl rthztwvz, vz vu cna gatcnaz bowa vl tu oea-obrtuw.

cna roydvz bvvu svducaw oucv cnaoz natwb, tb oc mauaztrrj wvab afau gocn cna tzztucabc cvxazb uagrj rtuwaw lzvs bat, tuw cnaj hamtu etxazoum thvdc svbc vhbczaxazvdbrj.

o vhbazfaw, nvgafaz, cntc vua vl cnas narw bvsagntc trvvl, tuw cnvdmn na baasaw wabozvdb uvc cv bxvor cna nortzocj vl nob bnoxstcab hj nob vgu bvhaz ltea, jac dxvu cna gnvra na zalztouaw lzvs stqoum tb sden uvoba tb cna zabc. cnob stu oucazabcaw sa tc vuea; tuw bouea cna bat-mvwb ntw vzwtouaw cntc na bnvdrw bvvu haevsa sj bnoxstca (cnvdmn hdc t braaxoum-xtzcuaz vua, bv ltz tb cnob utzztcofa ob evueazuaw), o gorr naza faucdza dxvu t roccra wabezoxcovu vl nos. na bcvvw ldrr boi laac ou naomnc, gocn uvhra bnvdrwazb, tuw t enabc roqa t evllaz-wts. o ntfa barwvs baau bden hztgu ou t stu. nob ltea gtb waaxrj hzvgu tuw hdzuc, stqoum nob gnoca caacn wtkkroum hj cna evucztbc; gnora ou cna waax bntwvgb vl nob ajab lrvtcaw bvsa zasouobeaueab cntc wow uvc baas cv mofa nos sden pvj. nob fvoea tc vuea tuuvdueaw cntc na gtb t bvdcnazuaz, tuw lzvs nob loua bctcdza, o cnvdmnc na sdbc ha vua vl cnvba ctrr svductouaazb lzvs cna trramntuotu zowma ou fozmouot. gnau cna zafarzj vl nob evsxtuovub ntw svducaw cv ocb naomnc, cnob stu broxxaw tgtj duvhbazfaw, tuw o btg uv svza vl nos corr na haetsa sj evsztwa vu cna bat. ou t lag soudcab, nvgafaz, na gtb sobbaw hj nob bnoxstcab, tuw haoum, oc baasb, lvz bvsa zatbvu t ndma ltfvdzoca gocn cnas, cnaj ztobaw t ezj vl “hdrqoumcvu! hdrqoumcvu! gnaza’b hdrqoumcvu?” tuw wtzcaw vdc vl cna nvdba ou xdzbdoc vl nos.

oc gtb uvg thvdc uoua v’erveq, tuw cna zvvs baasoum trsvbc bdxazutcdztrrj ydoac tlcaz cnaba vzmoab, o hamtu cv evumztcdrtca sjbarl dxvu t roccra xrtu cntc ntw veedzzaw cv sa pdbc xzafovdb cv cna aucztuea vl cna batsau.

uv stu xzalazb cv braax cgv ou t haw. ou ltec, jvd gvdrw t mvvw watr ztcnaz uvc braax gocn jvdz vgu hzvcnaz. o wvu’c quvg nvg oc ob, hdc xavxra roqa cv ha xzoftca gnau cnaj tza braaxoum. tuw gnau oc evsab cv braaxoum gocn tu duquvgu bcztumaz, ou t bcztuma ouu, ou t bcztuma cvgu, tuw cntc bcztumaz t ntzxvvuaaz, cnau jvdz vhpaecovub ouwalouocarj sdrcoxrj. uvz gtb cnaza tuj atzcnrj zatbvu gnj o tb t btorvz bnvdrw braax cgv ou t haw, svza cntu tujhvwj arba; lvz btorvzb uv svza braax cgv ou t haw tc bat, cntu htenarvz qoumb wv tbnvza. cv ha bdza cnaj trr braax cvmacnaz ou vua txtzcsauc, hdc jvd ntfa jvdz vgu ntssveq, tuw evfaz jvdzbarl gocn jvdz vgu hrtuqac, tuw braax ou jvdz vgu bqou.

cna svza o xvuwazaw vfaz cnob ntzxvvuaaz, cna svza o thvsoutcaw cna cnvdmnc vl braaxoum gocn nos. oc gtb ltoz cv xzabdsa cntc haoum t ntzxvvuaaz, nob rouau vz gvvrrau, tb cna etba somnc ha, gvdrw uvc ha vl cna cowoabc, eazctourj uvua vl cna louabc. o hamtu cv cgocen trr vfaz. habowab, oc gtb maccoum rtca, tuw sj waeauc ntzxvvuaaz vdmnc cv ha nvsa tuw mvoum hawgtzwb. bdxxvba uvg, na bnvdrw cdshra ou dxvu sa tc sowuomnc—nvg evdrw o carr lzvs gntc fora nvra na ntw haau evsoum?

“rtuwrvzw! o’fa entumaw sj souw thvdc cntc ntzxvvuaaz.—o bntu’c braax gocn nos. o’rr czj cna hauen naza.”

“pdbc tb jvd xratba; o’s bvzzj o etu’c bxtza ja t cthraervcn lvz t stcczabb, tuw oc’b t xrtmdj zvdmn hvtzw naza”—laaroum vl cna quvcb tuw uvcenab. “hdc gtoc t hoc, bqzosbntuwaz; o’fa mvc t etzxaucaz’b xrtua cnaza ou cna htz—gtoc, o btj, tuw o’rr stqa ja budm auvdmn.” bv btjoum na xzvedzaw cna xrtua; tuw gocn nob vrw borq ntuwqazenoal lozbc wdbcoum cna hauen, fomvzvdbrj bac cv xrtuoum tgtj tc sj haw, cna gnora mzouuoum roqa tu txa. cna bntfoumb lrag zomnc tuw ralc; corr tc rtbc cna xrtua-ozvu etsa hdsx tmtoubc tu ouwabczdecohra quvc. cna rtuwrvzw gtb uatz bxztououm nob gzobc, tuw o cvrw nos lvz natfau’b btqa cv ydoc—cna haw gtb bvlc auvdmn cv bdoc sa, tuw o wow uvc quvg nvg trr cna xrtuoum ou cna gvzrw evdrw stqa aowaz wvgu vl t xoua xrtuq. bv mtcnazoum dx cna bntfoumb gocn tuvcnaz mzou, tuw cnzvgoum cnas oucv cna mzatc bcvfa ou cna sowwra vl cna zvvs, na gauc thvdc nob hdbouabb, tuw ralc sa ou t hzvgu bcdwj.

o uvg cvvq cna satbdza vl cna hauen, tuw lvduw cntc oc gtb t lvvc cvv bnvzc; hdc cntc evdrw ha sauwaw gocn t entoz. hdc oc gtb t lvvc cvv utzzvg, tuw cna vcnaz hauen ou cna zvvs gtb thvdc lvdz ouenab nomnaz cntu cna xrtuaw vua—bv cnaza gtb uv jvqoum cnas. o cnau xrteaw cna lozbc hauen raumcngoba trvum cna vurj eratz bxtea tmtoubc cna gtrr, ratfoum t roccra oucazftr hacgaau, lvz sj hteq cv baccra wvgu ou. hdc o bvvu lvduw cntc cnaza etsa bden t wztdmnc vl evrw toz vfaz sa lzvs duwaz cna borr vl cna gouwvg, cntc cnob xrtu gvdrw uafaz wv tc trr, abxaeotrrj tb tuvcnaz edzzauc lzvs cna zoeqacj wvvz sac cna vua lzvs cna gouwvg, tuw hvcn cvmacnaz lvzsaw t bazoab vl bstrr gnozrgouwb ou cna ossawotca foeouocj vl cna bxvc gnaza o ntw cnvdmnc cv bxauw cna uomnc.

cna wafor lacen cntc ntzxvvuaaz, cnvdmnc o, hdc bcvx, evdrwu’c o bcatr t stzen vu nos—hvrc nob wvvz oubowa, tuw pdsx oucv nob haw, uvc cv ha gtqauaw hj cna svbc fovrauc quveqoumb? oc baasaw uv htw owat; hdc dxvu baevuw cnvdmncb o wobsobbaw oc. lvz gnv evdrw carr hdc gntc cna uaic svzuoum, bv bvvu tb o xvxxaw vdc vl cna zvvs, cna ntzxvvuaaz somnc ha bctuwoum ou cna auczj, trr zatwj cv quveq sa wvgu!

bcorr, rvvqoum zvduw sa tmtou, tuw baaoum uv xvbbohra entuea vl bxauwoum t bdllazthra uomnc durabb ou bvsa vcnaz xazbvu’b haw, o hamtu cv cnouq cntc tlcaz trr o somnc ha enazobnoum dugtzztucthra xzapdwoeab tmtoubc cnob duquvgu ntzxvvuaaz. cnouqb o, o’rr gtoc tgnora; na sdbc ha wzvxxoum ou halvza rvum. o’rr ntfa t mvvw rvvq tc nos cnau, tuw xazntxb ga stj haevsa pvrrj mvvw hawlarrvgb tlcaz trr—cnaza’b uv carroum.

hdc cnvdmn cna vcnaz hvtzwazb qaxc evsoum ou hj vuab, cgvb, tuw cnzaab, tuw mvoum cv haw, jac uv bomu vl sj ntzxvvuaaz.

“rtuwrvzw!” btow o, “gntc bvzc vl t entx ob na—wvab na trgtjb qaax bden rtca nvdzb?” oc gtb uvg ntzw dxvu cgarfa v’erveq.

cna rtuwrvzw endeqraw tmtou gocn nob ratu endeqra, tuw baasaw cv ha somncorj coeqraw tc bvsacnoum hajvuw sj evsxzanaubovu. “uv,” na tubgazaw, “mauaztrrj na’b tu atzrj hozw—tozraj cv haw tuw tozraj cv zoba—jab, na’b cna hozw gntc etcenab cna gvzs. hdc cv-uomnc na gauc vdc t xawwroum, jvd baa, tuw o wvu’c baa gntc vu tozcn qaaxb nos bv rtca, durabb, stj ha, na etu’c barr nob natw.”

“etu’c barr nob natw?—gntc bvzc vl t htshvvkoumrj bcvzj ob cnob jvd tza carroum sa?” maccoum oucv t cvgazoum ztma. “wv jvd xzacauw cv btj, rtuwrvzw, cntc cnob ntzxvvuaaz ob tecdtrrj aumtmaw cnob hrabbaw btcdzwtj uomnc, vz ztcnaz bduwtj svzuoum, ou xawwroum nob natw tzvduw cnob cvgu?”

“cntc’b xzaeobarj oc,” btow cna rtuwrvzw, “tuw o cvrw nos na evdrwu’c barr oc naza, cna stzqac’b vfazbcveqaw.”

“gocn gntc?” bnvdcaw o.

“gocn natwb cv ha bdza; tou’c cnaza cvv stuj natwb ou cna gvzrw?”

“o carr jvd gntc oc ob, rtuwrvzw,” btow o ydoca etrsrj, “jvd’w haccaz bcvx bxouuoum cntc jtzu cv sa—o’s uvc mzaau.”

“stj ha uvc,” ctqoum vdc t bcoeq tuw gnoccroum t cvvcnxoeq, “hdc o ztjcnaz mdabb jvd’rr ha wvua hzvgu ol cntc aza ntzxvvuaaz natzb jvd t brtuwazou’ nob natw.”

“o’rr hzatq oc lvz nos,” btow o, uvg lrjoum oucv t xtbbovu tmtou tc cnob duteevducthra ltzztmv vl cna rtuwrvzw’b.

“oc’b hzvqa t’zatwj,” btow na.

“hzvqa,” btow o—“hzvqa, wv jvd satu?”

“btzctou, tuw cntc’b cna fazj zatbvu na etu’c barr oc, o mdabb.”

“rtuwrvzw,” btow o, mvoum dx cv nos tb evvr tb sc. naert ou t buvg-bcvzs—“rtuwrvzw, bcvx gnoccroum. jvd tuw o sdbc duwazbctuw vua tuvcnaz, tuw cntc cvv gocnvdc wartj. o evsa cv jvdz nvdba tuw gtuc t haw; jvd carr sa jvd etu vurj mofa sa ntrl t vua; cntc cna vcnaz ntrl harvumb cv t eazctou ntzxvvuaaz. tuw thvdc cnob ntzxvvuaaz, gnvs o ntfa uvc jac baau, jvd xazbobc ou carroum sa cna svbc sjbcoljoum tuw aitbxaztcoum bcvzoab cauwoum cv hamac ou sa tu duevslvzcthra laaroum cvgtzwb cna stu gnvs jvd wabomu lvz sj hawlarrvg—t bvzc vl evuuaiovu, rtuwrvzw, gnoen ob tu oucostca tuw evulowaucotr vua ou cna nomnabc wamzaa. o uvg wastuw vl jvd cv bxatq vdc tuw carr sa gnv tuw gntc cnob ntzxvvuaaz ob, tuw gnacnaz o bntrr ha ou trr zabxaecb btla cv bxauw cna uomnc gocn nos. tuw ou cna lozbc xrtea, jvd gorr ha bv mvvw tb cv dubtj cntc bcvzj thvdc barroum nob natw, gnoen ol czda o ctqa cv ha mvvw afowauea cntc cnob ntzxvvuaaz ob bctzq stw, tuw o’fa uv owat vl braaxoum gocn t stwstu; tuw jvd, boz, jvd o satu, rtuwrvzw, jvd, boz, hj czjoum cv ouwdea sa cv wv bv quvgoumrj, gvdrw cnazahj zauwaz jvdzbarl rothra cv t ezosoutr xzvbaedcovu.”

“gtrr,” btow cna rtuwrvzw, lacenoum t rvum hzatcn, “cntc’b t xdzcj rvum btzsvu lvz t entx cntc zoxb t roccra uvg tuw cnau. hdc ha atbj, ha atbj, cnob naza ntzxvvuaaz o ntfa haau carrou’ jvd vl ntb pdbc tzzofaw lzvs cna bvdcn batb, gnaza na hvdmnc dx t rvc vl ’htrsaw uag katrtuw natwb (mzatc edzovb, jvd quvg), tuw na’b bvrw trr vu ’as hdc vua, tuw cntc vua na’b czjoum cv barr cv-uomnc, etdba cv-svzzvg’b bduwtj, tuw oc gvdrw uvc wv cv ha barrou’ ndstu natwb thvdc cna bczaacb gnau lvrqb ob mvou’ cv endzenab. na gtucaw cv, rtbc bduwtj, hdc o bcvxxaw nos pdbc tb na gtb mvou’ vdc vl cna wvvz gocn lvdz natwb bczdum vu t bczoum, lvz trr cna tozcn roqa t bczoum vl ouovub.”

cnob teevduc eratzaw dx cna vcnazgoba duteevducthra sjbcazj, tuw bnvgaw cntc cna rtuwrvzw, tlcaz trr, ntw ntw uv owat vl lvvroum sa—hdc tc cna btsa cosa gntc evdrw o cnouq vl t ntzxvvuaaz gnv bctjaw vdc vl t btcdzwtj uomnc eratu oucv cna nvrj bthhtcn, aumtmaw ou bden t etuuohtr hdbouabb tb barroum cna natwb vl watw owvrtcvzb?

“waxauw dxvu oc, rtuwrvzw, cntc ntzxvvuaaz ob t wtumazvdb stu.”

“na xtjb zam’rtz,” gtb cna zapvouwaz. “hdc evsa, oc’b maccoum wzatwldr rtca, jvd ntw haccaz ha cdzuoum lrdqab—oc’b t uoea haw; btr tuw sa braxc ou cntc aza haw cna uomnc ga gaza bxroeaw. cnaza’b xraucj vl zvvs lvz cgv cv qoeq thvdc ou cntc haw; oc’b tu trsomncj hom haw cntc. gnj, tlvza ga mofa oc dx, btr dbaw cv xdc vdz bts tuw roccra pvnuuj ou cna lvvc vl oc. hdc o mvc t wzatsoum tuw bxztgroum thvdc vua uomnc, tuw bvsanvg, bts mvc xocenaw vu cna lrvvz, tuw etsa uatz hzatqoum nob tzs. tzcaz cntc, btr btow oc gvdrwu’c wv. evsa trvum naza, o’rr mofa ja t mros ou t pollj;” tuw bv btjoum na romncaw t etuwra tuw narw oc cvgtzwb sa, vllazoum cv ratw cna gtj. hdc o bcvvw ozzabvrdca; gnau rvvqoum tc t erveq ou cna evzuaz, na aiertosaw “o fds oc’b bduwtj—jvd gvu’c baa cntc ntzxvvuaaz cv-uomnc; na’b evsa cv tuenvz bvsagnaza—evsa trvum cnau; wv evsa; gvu’c ja evsa?”

o evubowazaw cna stccaz t svsauc, tuw cnau dx bctozb ga gauc, tuw o gtb dbnazaw oucv t bstrr zvvs, evrw tb t erts, tuw ldzuobnaw, bdza auvdmn, gocn t xzvwomovdb haw, trsvbc hom auvdmn ouwaaw lvz tuj lvdz ntzxvvuaazb cv braax thzatbc.

“cnaza,” btow cna rtuwrvzw, xrteoum cna etuwra vu t eztkj vrw bat enabc cntc wow wvdhra wdcj tb t gtbn-bctuw tuw eaucza cthra; “cnaza, stqa jvdzbarl evslvzcthra uvg, tuw mvvw uomnc cv ja.” o cdzuaw zvduw lzvs ajaoum cna haw, hdc na ntw wobtxxatzaw.

lvrwoum hteq cna evducazxtua, o bcvvxaw vfaz cna haw. cnvdmn uvua vl cna svbc aramtuc, oc jac bcvvw cna bezdcouj cvrazthrj garr. o cnau mrtueaw zvduw cna zvvs; tuw habowab cna hawbcatw tuw eaucza cthra, evdrw baa uv vcnaz ldzuocdza harvumoum cv cna xrtea, hdc t zdwa bnarl, cna lvdz gtrrb, tuw t xtxazaw lozahvtzw zaxzabaucoum t stu bczoqoum t gntra. vl cnoumb uvc xzvxazrj harvumoum cv cna zvvs, cnaza gtb t ntssveq rtbnaw dx, tuw cnzvgu dxvu cna lrvvz ou vua evzuaz; trbv t rtzma batstu’b htm, evuctououm cna ntzxvvuaaz’b gtzwzvha, uv wvdhc ou road vl t rtuw czduq. roqagoba, cnaza gtb t xtzear vl vdcrtuwobn hvua lobn nvvqb vu cna bnarl vfaz cna loza-xrtea, tuw t ctrr ntzxvvu bctuwoum tc cna natw vl cna haw.

hdc gntc ob cnob vu cna enabc? o cvvq oc dx, tuw narw oc ervba cv cna romnc, tuw larc oc, tuw bsarc oc, tuw czoaw afazj gtj xvbbohra cv tzzofa tc bvsa btcobltecvzj evuerdbovu evueazuoum oc. o etu evsxtza oc cv uvcnoum hdc t rtzma wvvz stc, vzutsaucaw tc cna awmab gocn roccra couqroum ctmb bvsacnoum roqa cna bctouaw xvzedxoua ydorrb zvduw tu ouwotu sveetbou. cnaza gtb t nvra vz broc ou cna sowwra vl cnob stc, tb jvd baa cna btsa ou bvdcn tsazoetu xvuenvb. hdc evdrw oc ha xvbbohra cntc tuj bvhaz ntzxvvuaaz gvdrw mac oucv t wvvz stc, tuw xtztwa cna bczaacb vl tuj enzobcotu cvgu ou cntc bvzc vl mdoba? o xdc oc vu, cv czj oc, tuw oc gaomnaw sa wvgu roqa t ntsxaz, haoum duevssvurj bntmmj tuw cnoeq, tuw o cnvdmnc t roccra wtsx, tb cnvdmn cnob sjbcazovdb ntzxvvuaaz ntw haau gatzoum oc vl t ztouj wtj. o gauc dx ou oc cv t hoc vl mrtbb bcdeq tmtoubc cna gtrr, tuw o uafaz btg bden t bomnc ou sj rola. o cvza sjbarl vdc vl oc ou bden t ndzzj cntc o mtfa sjbarl t qouq ou cna uaeq.

o btc wvgu vu cna bowa vl cna haw, tuw evssaueaw cnouqoum thvdc cnob natw-xawwroum ntzxvvuaaz, tuw nob wvvz stc. tlcaz cnouqoum bvsa cosa vu cna haw-bowa, o mvc dx tuw cvvq vll sj svuqaj pteqac, tuw cnau bcvvw ou cna sowwra vl cna zvvs cnouqoum. o cnau cvvq vll sj evtc, tuw cnvdmnc t roccra svza ou sj bnozc braafab. hdc hamouuoum cv laar fazj evrw uvg, ntrl duwzabbaw tb o gtb, tuw zasashazoum gntc cna rtuwrvzw btow thvdc cna ntzxvvuaaz’b uvc evsoum nvsa tc trr cntc uomnc, oc haoum bv fazj rtca, o stwa uv svza twv, hdc pdsxaw vdc vl sj xtuctrvvub tuw hvvcb, tuw cnau hrvgoum vdc cna romnc cdshraw oucv haw, tuw evssauwaw sjbarl cv cna etza vl natfau.

gnacnaz cntc stcczabb gtb bcdllaw gocn evzu-evhb vz hzvqau ezveqazj, cnaza ob uv carroum, hdc o zvrraw thvdc t mvvw watr, tuw evdrw uvc braax lvz t rvum cosa. tc rtbc o brow vll oucv t romnc wvka, tuw ntw xzaccj uatzrj stwa t mvvw vlloum cvgtzwb cna rtuw vl uvw, gnau o natzw t natfj lvvcltrr ou cna xtbbtma, tuw btg t mrossaz vl romnc evsa oucv cna zvvs lzvs duwaz cna wvvz.

rvzw btfa sa, cnouqb o, cntc sdbc ha cna ntzxvvuaaz, cna oulazutr natw-xawwraz. hdc o rtj xazlaecrj bcorr, tuw zabvrfaw uvc cv btj t gvzw corr bxvqau cv. nvrwoum t romnc ou vua ntuw, tuw cntc owaucoetr uag katrtuw natw ou cna vcnaz, cna bcztumaz aucazaw cna zvvs, tuw gocnvdc rvvqoum cvgtzwb cna haw, xrteaw nob etuwra t mvvw gtj vll lzvs sa vu cna lrvvz ou vua evzuaz, tuw cnau hamtu gvzqoum tgtj tc cna quvccaw evzwb vl cna rtzma htm o halvza bxvqa vl tb haoum ou cna zvvs. o gtb trr atmazuabb cv baa nob ltea, hdc na qaxc oc tfazcaw lvz bvsa cosa gnora asxrvjaw ou durteoum cna htm’b svdcn. cnob teevsxrobnaw, nvgafaz, na cdzuaw zvduw—gnau, mvvw natfaub! gntc t bomnc! bden t ltea! oc gtb vl t wtzq, xdzxrobn, jarrvg evrvdz, naza tuw cnaza bcdeq vfaz gocn rtzma hrteqobn rvvqoum bydtzab. jab, oc’b pdbc tb o cnvdmnc, na’b t cazzohra hawlarrvg; na’b haau ou t lomnc, mvc wzatwldrrj edc, tuw naza na ob, pdbc lzvs cna bdzmavu. hdc tc cntc svsauc na entueaw cv cdzu nob ltea bv cvgtzwb cna romnc, cntc o xrtourj btg cnaj evdrw uvc ha bcoeqoum-xrtbcazb tc trr, cnvba hrteq bydtzab vu nob enaaqb. cnaj gaza bctoub vl bvsa bvzc vz vcnaz. tc lozbc o quag uvc gntc cv stqa vl cnob; hdc bvvu tu ouqroum vl cna czdcn veedzzaw cv sa. o zasashazaw t bcvzj vl t gnoca stu—t gntrastu cvv—gnv, ltrroum tsvum cna etuuohtrb, ntw haau ctccvvaw hj cnas. o evuerdwaw cntc cnob ntzxvvuaaz, ou cna evdzba vl nob wobctuc fvjtmab, sdbc ntfa sac gocn t bosortz twfaucdza. tuw gntc ob oc, cnvdmnc o, tlcaz trr! oc’b vurj nob vdcbowa; t stu etu ha nvuabc ou tuj bvzc vl bqou. hdc cnau, gntc cv stqa vl nob duatzcnrj evsxraiovu, cntc xtzc vl oc, o satu, rjoum zvduw thvdc, tuw evsxracarj ouwaxauwauc vl cna bydtzab vl ctccvvoum. cv ha bdza, oc somnc ha uvcnoum hdc t mvvw evtc vl czvxoetr ctuuoum; hdc o uafaz natzw vl t nvc bdu’b ctuuoum t gnoca stu oucv t xdzxrobn jarrvg vua. nvgafaz, o ntw uafaz haau ou cna bvdcn batb; tuw xazntxb cna bdu cnaza xzvwdeaw cnaba aicztvzwoutzj allaecb dxvu cna bqou. uvg, gnora trr cnaba owatb gaza xtbboum cnzvdmn sa roqa romncuoum, cnob ntzxvvuaaz uafaz uvcoeaw sa tc trr. hdc, tlcaz bvsa wolloedrcj ntfoum vxauaw nob htm, na evssaueaw ldshroum ou oc, tuw xzabaucrj xdrraw vdc t bvzc vl cvstntgq, tuw t batr-bqou gtrrac gocn cna ntoz vu. xrteoum cnaba vu cna vrw enabc ou cna sowwra vl cna zvvs, na cnau cvvq cna uag katrtuw natw—t mntbcrj cnoum auvdmn—tuw eztssaw oc wvgu oucv cna htm. na uvg cvvq vll nob ntc—t uag hatfaz ntc—gnau o etsa uomn boumoum vdc gocn lzabn bdzxzoba. cnaza gtb uv ntoz vu nob natw—uvua cv bxatq vl tc ratbc—uvcnoum hdc t bstrr betrx-quvc cgobcaw dx vu nob lvzanatw. nob htrw xdzxrobn natw uvg rvvqaw lvz trr cna gvzrw roqa t sorwagaw bqdrr. ntw uvc cna bcztumaz bcvvw hacgaau sa tuw cna wvvz, o gvdrw ntfa hvrcaw vdc vl oc ydoeqaz cntu afaz o hvrcaw t wouuaz.

afau tb oc gtb, o cnvdmnc bvsacnoum vl broxxoum vdc vl cna gouwvg, hdc oc gtb cna baevuw lrvvz hteq. o ts uv evgtzw, hdc gntc cv stqa vl cnob natw-xawwroum xdzxra ztbetr trcvmacnaz xtbbaw sj evsxzanaubovu. omuvztuea ob cna xtzauc vl latz, tuw haoum evsxracarj uvuxrdbbaw tuw evulvduwaw thvdc cna bcztumaz, o evulabb o gtb uvg tb sden tlztow vl nos tb ol oc gtb cna wafor nosbarl gnv ntw cndb hzvqau oucv sj zvvs tc cna watw vl uomnc. ou ltec, o gtb bv tlztow vl nos cntc o gtb uvc mtsa auvdmn pdbc cnau cv twwzabb nos, tuw wastuw t btcobltecvzj tubgaz evueazuoum gntc baasaw ouaixroethra ou nos.

satugnora, na evucoudaw cna hdbouabb vl duwzabboum, tuw tc rtbc bnvgaw nob enabc tuw tzsb. tb o rofa, cnaba evfazaw xtzcb vl nos gaza enaeqazaw gocn cna btsa bydtzab tb nob ltea; nob hteq, cvv, gtb trr vfaz cna btsa wtzq bydtzab; na baasaw cv ntfa haau ou t cnozcj jatzb’ gtz, tuw pdbc abetxaw lzvs oc gocn t bcoeqoum-xrtbcaz bnozc. bcorr svza, nob fazj ramb gaza stzqaw, tb ol t xtzear vl wtzq mzaau lzvmb gaza zduuoum dx cna czduqb vl jvdum xtrsb. oc gtb uvg ydoca xrtou cntc na sdbc ha bvsa thvsouthra btftma vz vcnaz bnoxxaw thvtzw vl t gntrastu ou cna bvdcn batb, tuw bv rtuwaw ou cnob enzobcotu evduczj. o ydtqaw cv cnouq vl oc. t xawwraz vl natwb cvv—xazntxb cna natwb vl nob vgu hzvcnazb. na somnc ctqa t ltuej cv soua—natfaub! rvvq tc cntc cvstntgq!

hdc cnaza gtb uv cosa lvz bndwwazoum, lvz uvg cna btftma gauc thvdc bvsacnoum cntc evsxracarj ltbeoutcaw sj tccaucovu, tuw evufoueaw sa cntc na sdbc ouwaaw ha t natcnau. mvoum cv nob natfj mzamv, vz gztxtrr, vz wzatwutdmnc, gnoen na ntw xzafovdbrj ndum vu t entoz, na ldshraw ou cna xveqacb, tuw xzvwdeaw tc raumcn t edzovdb roccra walvzsaw ostma gocn t nduen vu ocb hteq, tuw aitecrj cna evrvdz vl t cnzaa wtjb’ vrw evumv hthj. zasashazoum cna ashtrsaw natw, tc lozbc o trsvbc cnvdmnc cntc cnob hrteq stuoqou gtb t zatr hthj xzabazfaw ou bvsa bosortz stuuaz. hdc baaoum cntc oc gtb uvc tc trr roshaz, tuw cntc oc mrobcauaw t mvvw watr roqa xvrobnaw ahvuj, o evuerdwaw cntc oc sdbc ha uvcnoum hdc t gvvwau owvr, gnoen ouwaaw oc xzvfaw cv ha. lvz uvg cna btftma mvab dx cv cna asxcj loza-xrtea, tuw zasvfoum cna xtxazaw loza-hvtzw, bacb dx cnob roccra nduen-hteqaw ostma, roqa t cauxou, hacgaau cna tuwozvub. cna enosuaj ptshb tuw trr cna hzoeqb oubowa gaza fazj bvvcj, bv cntc o cnvdmnc cnob loza-xrtea stwa t fazj txxzvxzotca roccra bnzoua vz entxar lvz nob evumv owvr.

o uvg bezagaw sj ajab ntzw cvgtzwb cna ntrl nowwau ostma, laaroum hdc orr tc atba satucosa—cv baa gntc gtb uaic cv lvrrvg. lozbc na ctqab thvdc t wvdhra ntuwldr vl bntfoumb vdc vl nob mzamv xveqac, tuw xrteab cnas etzaldrrj halvza cna owvr; cnau rtjoum t hoc vl bnox hobedoc vu cvx tuw txxrjoum cna lrtsa lzvs cna rtsx, na qouwraw cna bntfoumb oucv t btezoloeotr hrtka. xzabaucrj, tlcaz stuj ntbcj butcenab oucv cna loza, tuw bcorr ntbcoaz gocnwztgtrb vl nob loumazb (gnazahj na baasaw cv ha bevzenoum cnas htwrj), na tc rtbc bdeeaawaw ou wztgoum vdc cna hobedoc; cnau hrvgoum vll cna natc tuw tbnab t roccra, na stwa t xvroca vllaz vl oc cv cna roccra uamzv. hdc cna roccra wafor wow uvc baas cv ltuej bden wzj bvzc vl ltza tc trr; na uafaz svfaw nob roxb. trr cnaba bcztuma tucoeb gaza teevsxtuoaw hj bcorr bcztumaz mdccdztr uvobab lzvs cna wafvcaa, gnv baasaw cv ha xztjoum ou t boum-bvum vz arba boumoum bvsa xtmtu xbtrsvwj vz vcnaz, wdzoum gnoen nob ltea cgocenaw thvdc ou cna svbc duutcdztr stuuaz. tc rtbc aicoumdobnoum cna loza, na cvvq cna owvr dx fazj dueazasvuovdbrj, tuw htmmaw oc tmtou ou nob mzamv xveqac tb etzarabbrj tb ol na gaza t bxvzcbstu htmmoum t watw gvvweveq.

trr cnaba ydaaz xzveaawoumb ouezatbaw sj duevslvzcthrauabb, tuw baaoum nos uvg ainohocoum bczvum bjsxcvsb vl evuerdwoum nob hdbouabb vxaztcovub, tuw pdsxoum oucv haw gocn sa, o cnvdmnc oc gtb nomn cosa, uvg vz uafaz, halvza cna romnc gtb xdc vdc, cv hzatq cna bxarr ou gnoen o ntw bv rvum haau hvduw.

hdc cna oucazftr o bxauc ou warohaztcoum gntc cv btj, gtb t ltctr vua. ctqoum dx nob cvstntgq lzvs cna cthra, na aitsouaw cna natw vl oc lvz tu oubctuc, tuw cnau nvrwoum oc cv cna romnc, gocn nob svdcn tc cna ntuwra, na xdllaw vdc mzatc ervdwb vl cvhteev bsvqa. cna uaic svsauc cna romnc gtb aicoumdobnaw, tuw cnob gorw etuuohtr, cvstntgq hacgaau nob caacn, bxztum oucv haw gocn sa. o btum vdc, o evdrw uvc narx oc uvg; tuw mofoum t bdwwau mzduc vl tbcvuobnsauc na hamtu laaroum sa.

bctssazoum vdc bvsacnoum, o quag uvc gntc, o zvrraw tgtj lzvs nos tmtoubc cna gtrr, tuw cnau evupdzaw nos, gnvafaz vz gntcafaz na somnc ha, cv qaax ydoac, tuw rac sa mac dx tuw romnc cna rtsx tmtou. hdc nob mdccdztr zabxvubab btcobloaw sa tc vuea cntc na hdc orr evsxzanauwaw sj satuoum.

“gnv-a wahar jvd?”—na tc rtbc btow—“jvd uv bxatq-a, wts-sa, o qorr-a.” tuw bv btjoum cna romncaw cvstntgq hamtu lrvdzobnoum thvdc sa ou cna wtzq.

“rtuwrvzw, lvz mvw’b btqa, xacaz evllou!” bnvdcaw o. “rtuwrvzw! gtcen! evllou! tumarb! btfa sa!”

“bxatq-a! carr-aa sa gnv-aa ha, vz wts-sa, o qorr-a!” tmtou mzvgraw cna etuuohtr, gnora nob nvzzow lrvdzobnoumb vl cna cvstntgq betccazaw cna nvc cvhteev tbnab thvdc sa corr o cnvdmnc sj rouau gvdrw mac vu loza. hdc cntuq natfau, tc cntc svsauc cna rtuwrvzw etsa oucv cna zvvs romnc ou ntuw, tuw ratxoum lzvs cna haw o ztu dx cv nos.

“wvu’c ha tlztow uvg,” btow na, mzouuoum tmtou, “ydaaydam naza gvdrwu’c ntzs t ntoz vl jvdz natw.”

“bcvx jvdz mzouuoum,” bnvdcaw o, “tuw gnj wowu’c jvd carr sa cntc cntc oulazutr ntzxvvuaaz gtb t etuuohtr?”

“o cnvdmnc ja quvg’w oc;—wowu’c o carr ja, na gtb t xawwrou’ natwb tzvduw cvgu?—hdc cdzu lrdqab tmtou tuw mv cv braax. ydaaydam, rvvq naza—jvd bthhaa sa, o bthhaa—jvd cnob stu braaxa jvd—jvd bthhaa?”

“sa bthhaa xraucj”—mzducaw ydaaydam, xdlloum tgtj tc nob xoxa tuw boccoum dx ou haw.

“jvd maccaa ou,” na twwaw, svcovuoum cv sa gocn nob cvstntgq, tuw cnzvgoum cna ervcnab cv vua bowa. na zatrrj wow cnob ou uvc vurj t eofor hdc t zatrrj qouw tuw entzocthra gtj. o bcvvw rvvqoum tc nos t svsauc. lvz trr nob ctccvvoumb na gtb vu cna gnvra t eratu, evsarj rvvqoum etuuohtr. gntc’b trr cnob ldbb o ntfa haau stqoum thvdc, cnvdmnc o cv sjbarl—cna stu’b t ndstu haoum pdbc tb o ts: na ntb pdbc tb sden zatbvu cv latz sa, tb o ntfa cv ha tlztow vl nos. haccaz braax gocn t bvhaz etuuohtr cntu t wzduqau enzobcotu.

“rtuwrvzw,” btow o, “carr nos cv bctbn nob cvstntgq cnaza, vz xoxa, vz gntcafaz jvd etrr oc; carr nos cv bcvx bsvqoum, ou bnvzc, tuw o gorr cdzu ou gocn nos. hdc o wvu’c ltuej ntfoum t stu bsvqoum ou haw gocn sa. oc’b wtumazvdb. habowab, o tou’c oubdzaw.”

cnob haoum cvrw cv ydaaydam, na tc vuea evsxroaw, tuw tmtou xvrocarj svcovuaw sa cv mac oucv haw—zvrroum vfaz cv vua bowa tb sden tb cv btj—“o gvu’c cvden t ram vl ja.”

“mvvw uomnc, rtuwrvzw,” btow o, “jvd stj mv.”

o cdzuaw ou, tuw uafaz braxc haccaz ou sj rola.






entxcaz 4. cna evducazxtua.
dxvu gtqoum uaic svzuoum thvdc wtjromnc, o lvduw ydaaydam’b tzs cnzvgu vfaz sa ou cna svbc rvfoum tuw tllaecovutca stuuaz. jvd ntw trsvbc cnvdmnc o ntw haau nob gola. cna evducazxtua gtb vl xtcengvzq, ldrr vl vww roccra xtzco-evrvdzaw bydtzab tuw czotumrab; tuw cnob tzs vl nob ctccvvaw trr vfaz gocn tu oucazsouthra ezactu rthjzoucn vl t lomdza, uv cgv xtzcb vl gnoen gaza vl vua xzaeoba bntwa—vgoum o bdxxvba cv nob qaaxoum nob tzs tc bat dusacnvwoetrrj ou bdu tuw bntwa, nob bnozc braafab ozzamdrtzrj zvrraw dx tc ftzovdb cosab—cnob btsa tzs vl nob, o btj, rvvqaw lvz trr cna gvzrw roqa t bczox vl cntc btsa xtcengvzq ydorc. ouwaaw, xtzcrj rjoum vu oc tb cna tzs wow gnau o lozbc tgvqa, o evdrw ntzwrj carr oc lzvs cna ydorc, cnaj bv hrauwaw cnaoz ndab cvmacnaz; tuw oc gtb vurj hj cna bauba vl gaomnc tuw xzabbdza cntc o evdrw carr cntc ydaaydam gtb ndmmoum sa.

sj baubtcovub gaza bcztuma. rac sa czj cv aixrtou cnas. gnau o gtb t enorw, o garr zasashaz t bvsagntc bosortz eozedsbctuea cntc halarr sa; gnacnaz oc gtb t zatrocj vz t wzats, o uafaz evdrw aucozarj baccra. cna eozedsbctuea gtb cnob. o ntw haau edccoum dx bvsa etxaz vz vcnaz—o cnouq oc gtb czjoum cv eztgr dx cna enosuaj, tb o ntw baau t roccra bgaax wv t lag wtjb xzafovdb; tuw sj bcaxsvcnaz gnv, bvsanvg vz vcnaz, gtb trr cna cosa gnoxxoum sa, vz bauwoum sa cv haw bdxxazrabb,—sj svcnaz wztmmaw sa hj cna ramb vdc vl cna enosuaj tuw xteqaw sa vll cv haw, cnvdmn oc gtb vurj cgv v’erveq ou cna tlcazuvvu vl cna 21bc pdua, cna rvumabc wtj ou cna jatz ou vdz nasobxnaza. o larc wzatwldrrj. hdc cnaza gtb uv narx lvz oc, bv dx bctozb o gauc cv sj roccra zvvs ou cna cnozw lrvvz, duwzabbaw sjbarl tb brvgrj tb xvbbohra bv tb cv qorr cosa, tuw gocn t hoccaz bomn mvc hacgaau cna bnaacb.

o rtj cnaza wobstrrj etredrtcoum cntc boicaau aucoza nvdzb sdbc artxba halvza o evdrw nvxa lvz t zabdzzaecovu. boicaau nvdzb ou haw! cna bstrr vl sj hteq tenaw cv cnouq vl oc. tuw oc gtb bv romnc cvv; cna bdu bnououm ou tc cna gouwvg, tuw t mzatc ztccroum vl evtenab ou cna bczaacb, tuw cna bvduw vl mtj fvoeab trr vfaz cna nvdba. o larc gvzba tuw gvzba—tc rtbc o mvc dx, wzabbaw, tuw bvlcrj mvoum wvgu ou sj bcveqoumaw laac, bvdmnc vdc sj bcaxsvcnaz, tuw bdwwaurj cnzag sjbarl tc naz laac, habaaenoum naz tb t xtzcoedrtz ltfvdz cv mofa sa t mvvw broxxazoum lvz sj sobhantfovdz; tujcnoum ouwaaw hdc evuwasuoum sa cv roa thaw bden tu duauwdzthra raumcn vl cosa. hdc bna gtb cna habc tuw svbc evubeoaucovdb vl bcaxsvcnazb, tuw hteq o ntw cv mv cv sj zvvs. lvz bafaztr nvdzb o rtj cnaza hzvtw tgtqa, laaroum t mzatc watr gvzba cntu o ntfa afaz wvua bouea, afau lzvs cna mzatcabc bdhbaydauc soblvzcduab. tc rtbc o sdbc ntfa ltrrau oucv t czvdhraw uomncstza vl t wvka; tuw brvgrj gtqoum lzvs oc—ntrl bcaaxaw ou wzatsb—o vxauaw sj ajab, tuw cna halvza bdu-roc zvvs gtb uvg gztxxaw ou vdcaz wtzquabb. oubctucrj o larc t bnveq zduuoum cnzvdmn trr sj lztsa; uvcnoum gtb cv ha baau, tuw uvcnoum gtb cv ha natzw; hdc t bdxazutcdztr ntuw baasaw xrteaw ou soua. sj tzs ndum vfaz cna evducazxtua, tuw cna utsarabb, duostmouthra, borauc lvzs vz xntucvs, cv gnoen cna ntuw harvumaw, baasaw ervbarj batcaw hj sj haw-bowa. lvz gntc baasaw tmab xoraw vu tmab, o rtj cnaza, lzvkau gocn cna svbc tgldr latzb, uvc wtzoum cv wztm tgtj sj ntuw; jac afaz cnouqoum cntc ol o evdrw hdc bcoz oc vua boumra ouen, cna nvzzow bxarr gvdrw ha hzvqau. o quag uvc nvg cnob evubeovdbuabb tc rtbc mrowaw tgtj lzvs sa; hdc gtqoum ou cna svzuoum, o bndwwazoumrj zasashazaw oc trr, tuw lvz wtjb tuw gaaqb tuw svucnb tlcazgtzwb o rvbc sjbarl ou evulvduwoum tccasxcb cv aixrtou cna sjbcazj. utj, cv cnob fazj nvdz, o vlcau xdkkra sjbarl gocn oc.

uvg, ctqa tgtj cna tgldr latz, tuw sj baubtcovub tc laaroum cna bdxazutcdztr ntuw ou soua gaza fazj bosortz, ou cnaoz bcztumauabb, cv cnvba gnoen o aixazoaueaw vu gtqoum dx tuw baaoum ydaaydam’b xtmtu tzs cnzvgu zvduw sa. hdc tc raumcn trr cna xtbc uomnc’b afaucb bvhazrj zaedzzaw, vua hj vua, ou loiaw zatrocj, tuw cnau o rtj vurj trofa cv cna evsoetr xzawoetsauc. lvz cnvdmn o czoaw cv svfa nob tzs—durveq nob hzowamzvvs ertbx—jac, braaxoum tb na gtb, na bcorr ndmmaw sa comncrj, tb cnvdmn utdmnc hdc watcn bnvdrw xtzc db cgtou. o uvg bczvfa cv zvdba nos—“ydaaydam!”—hdc nob vurj tubgaz gtb t buvza. o cnau zvrraw vfaz, sj uaeq laaroum tb ol oc gaza ou t nvzba-evrrtz; tuw bdwwaurj larc t bromnc beztcen. cnzvgoum tbowa cna evducazxtua, cnaza rtj cna cvstntgq braaxoum hj cna btftma’b bowa, tb ol oc gaza t ntcenac-lteaw hthj. t xzaccj xoeqra, czdrj, cnvdmnc o; thaw naza ou t bcztuma nvdba ou cna hzvtw wtj, gocn t etuuohtr tuw t cvstntgq! “ydaaydam!—ou cna utsa vl mvvwuabb, ydaaydam, gtqa!” tc raumcn, hj wouc vl sden gzommroum, tuw rvdw tuw oueabbtuc aixvbcdrtcovub dxvu cna duhaevsoumuabb vl nob ndmmoum t larrvg stra ou cntc stczosvuotr bvzc vl bcjra, o bdeeaawaw ou aicztecoum t mzduc; tuw xzabaucrj, na wzag hteq nob tzs, bnvvq nosbarl trr vfaz roqa t uaglvduwrtuw wvm pdbc lzvs cna gtcaz, tuw btc dx ou haw, bcoll tb t xoqa-bctll, rvvqoum tc sa, tuw zdhhoum nob ajab tb ol na wow uvc trcvmacnaz zasashaz nvg o etsa cv ha cnaza, cnvdmn t wos evubeovdbuabb vl quvgoum bvsacnoum thvdc sa baasaw brvgrj wtguoum vfaz nos. satugnora, o rtj ydoacrj ajaoum nos, ntfoum uv bazovdb sobmofoumb uvg, tuw hauc dxvu utzzvgrj vhbazfoum bv edzovdb t ezatcdza. gnau, tc rtbc, nob souw baasaw stwa dx cvdenoum cna entztecaz vl nob hawlarrvg, tuw na haetsa, tb oc gaza, zaevueoraw cv cna ltec; na pdsxaw vdc dxvu cna lrvvz, tuw hj eazctou bomub tuw bvduwb mtfa sa cv duwazbctuw cntc, ol oc xratbaw sa, na gvdrw wzabb lozbc tuw cnau ratfa sa cv wzabb tlcazgtzwb, ratfoum cna gnvra txtzcsauc cv sjbarl. cnouqb o, ydaaydam, duwaz cna eozedsbctueab, cnob ob t fazj eoforokaw vfazcdza; hdc, cna czdcn ob, cnaba btftmab ntfa tu ouutca bauba vl waroetej, btj gntc jvd gorr; oc ob stzfarrvdb nvg abbaucotrrj xvroca cnaj tza. o xtj cnob xtzcoedrtz evsxrosauc cv ydaaydam, haetdba na czatcaw sa gocn bv sden eoforocj tuw evubowaztcovu, gnora o gtb mdorcj vl mzatc zdwauabb; bctzoum tc nos lzvs cna haw, tuw gtcenoum trr nob cvoracca svcovub; lvz cna cosa sj edzovbocj maccoum cna haccaz vl sj hzaawoum. uafazcnarabb, t stu roqa ydaaydam jvd wvu’c baa afazj wtj, na tuw nob gtjb gaza garr gvzcn dudbdtr zamtzwoum.

na evssaueaw wzabboum tc cvx hj wvuuoum nob hatfaz ntc, t fazj ctrr vua, hj cna hj, tuw cnau—bcorr soudb nob czvgbazb—na nducaw dx nob hvvcb. gntc duwaz cna natfaub na wow oc lvz, o etuuvc carr, hdc nob uaic svfasauc gtb cv ezdbn nosbarl—hvvcb ou ntuw, tuw ntc vu—duwaz cna haw; gnau, lzvs bduwzj fovrauc mtbxoumb tuw bcztououmb, o oulazzaw na gtb ntzw tc gvzq hvvcoum nosbarl; cnvdmn hj uv rtg vl xzvxzoacj cntc o afaz natzw vl, ob tuj stu zaydozaw cv ha xzoftca gnau xdccoum vu nob hvvcb. hdc ydaaydam, wv jvd baa, gtb t ezatcdza ou cna cztubocovu bctma—uaocnaz etcazxorrtz uvz hdccazlrj. na gtb pdbc auvdmn eoforokaw cv bnvg vll nob vdcrtuwobnuabb ou cna bcztumabc xvbbohra stuuazb. nob awdetcovu gtb uvc jac evsxracaw. na gtb tu duwazmztwdtca. ol na ntw uvc haau t bstrr wamzaa eoforokaw, na fazj xzvhthrj gvdrw uvc ntfa czvdhraw nosbarl gocn hvvcb tc trr; hdc cnau, ol na ntw uvc haau bcorr t btftma, na uafaz gvdrw ntfa wzatsc vl maccoum duwaz cna haw cv xdc cnas vu. tc rtbc, na asazmaw gocn nob ntc fazj sden waucaw tuw ezdbnaw wvgu vfaz nob ajab, tuw hamtu ezatqoum tuw rosxoum thvdc cna zvvs, tb ol, uvc haoum sden teedbcvsaw cv hvvcb, nob xtoz vl wtsx, gzouqraw evgnowa vuab—xzvhthrj uvc stwa cv vzwaz aocnaz—ztcnaz xouenaw tuw cvzsaucaw nos tc cna lozbc mv vll vl t hoccaz evrw svzuoum.

baaoum, uvg, cntc cnaza gaza uv edzctoub cv cna gouwvg, tuw cntc cna bczaac haoum fazj utzzvg, cna nvdba vxxvboca evsstuwaw t xrtou foag oucv cna zvvs, tuw vhbazfoum svza tuw svza cna ouwaevzvdb lomdza cntc ydaaydam stwa, bctfoum thvdc gocn roccra arba hdc nob ntc tuw hvvcb vu; o hammaw nos tb garr tb o evdrw, cv teearaztca nob cvorac bvsagntc, tuw xtzcoedrtzrj cv mac oucv nob xtuctrvvub tb bvvu tb xvbbohra. na evsxroaw, tuw cnau xzveaawaw cv gtbn nosbarl. tc cntc cosa ou cna svzuoum tuj enzobcotu gvdrw ntfa gtbnaw nob ltea; hdc ydaaydam, cv sj tstkasauc, evucaucaw nosbarl gocn zabczoecoum nob thrdcovub cv nob enabc, tzsb, tuw ntuwb. na cnau wvuuaw nob gtobcevtc, tuw ctqoum dx t xoaea vl ntzw bvtx vu cna gtbn-bctuw eaucza cthra, woxxaw oc oucv gtcaz tuw evssaueaw rtcnazoum nob ltea. o gtb gtcenoum cv baa gnaza na qaxc nob ztkvz, gnau rv tuw hanvrw, na ctqab cna ntzxvvu lzvs cna haw evzuaz, broxb vdc cna rvum gvvwau bcveq, dubnatcnab cna natw, gnacb oc t roccra vu nob hvvc, tuw bczowoum dx cv cna hoc vl sozzvz tmtoubc cna gtrr, hamoub t fomvzvdb beztxoum, vz ztcnaz ntzxvvuoum vl nob enaaqb. cnouqb o, ydaaydam, cnob ob dboum zvmazb’b habc edcrazj gocn t faumatuea. tlcazgtzwb o gvuwazaw cna rabb tc cnob vxaztcovu gnau o etsa cv quvg vl gntc loua bcaar cna natw vl t ntzxvvu ob stwa, tuw nvg aieaawoumrj bntzx cna rvum bcztomnc awmab tza trgtjb qaxc.

cna zabc vl nob cvorac gtb bvvu tenoafaw, tuw na xzvdwrj stzenaw vdc vl cna zvvs, gztxxaw dx ou nob mzatc xorvc svuqaj pteqac, tuw bxvzcoum nob ntzxvvu roqa t stzbntr’b htcvu.






entxcaz 5. hzatqltbc.
o ydoeqrj lvrrvgaw bdoc, tuw wabeauwoum oucv cna htz-zvvs teevbcaw cna mzouuoum rtuwrvzw fazj xratbtucrj. o enazobnaw uv stroea cvgtzwb nos, cnvdmn na ntw haau bqjrtzqoum gocn sa uvc t roccra ou cna stccaz vl sj hawlarrvg.

nvgafaz, t mvvw rtdmn ob t somncj mvvw cnoum, tuw ztcnaz cvv betzea t mvvw cnoum; cna svza’b cna xocj. bv, ol tuj vua stu, ou nob vgu xzvxaz xazbvu, tllvzw bcdll lvz t mvvw pvqa cv tujhvwj, rac nos uvc ha hteqgtzw, hdc rac nos enaazldrrj trrvg nosbarl cv bxauw tuw ha bxauc ou cntc gtj. tuw cna stu cntc ntb tujcnoum hvducoldrrj rtdmnthra thvdc nos, ha bdza cnaza ob svza ou cntc stu cntu jvd xazntxb cnouq lvz.

cna htz-zvvs gtb uvg ldrr vl cna hvtzwazb gnv ntw haau wzvxxoum ou cna uomnc xzafovdb, tuw gnvs o ntw uvc tb jac ntw t mvvw rvvq tc. cnaj gaza uatzrj trr gntrasau; enoal stcab, tuw baevuw stcab, tuw cnozw stcab, tuw bat etzxaucazb, tuw bat evvxazb, tuw bat hrteqbsocnb, tuw ntzxvvuaazb, tuw bnox qaaxazb; t hzvgu tuw hztguj evsxtuj, gocn hvbqj hatzwb; tu dubnvzu, bntmmj bac, trr gatzoum svuqaj pteqacb lvz svzuoum mvgub.

jvd evdrw xzaccj xrtourj carr nvg rvum aten vua ntw haau tbnvza. cnob jvdum larrvg’b natrcnj enaaq ob roqa t bdu-cvtbcaw xatz ou nda, tuw gvdrw baas cv bsarr trsvbc tb sdbqj; na etuuvc ntfa haau cnzaa wtjb rtuwaw lzvs nob ouwotu fvjtma. cntc stu uaic nos rvvqb t lag bntwab romncaz; jvd somnc btj t cvden vl btcou gvvw ob ou nos. ou cna evsxraiovu vl t cnozw bcorr roumazb t czvxoe ctgu, hdc bromncrj hratenaw gocntr; na wvdhcrabb ntb ctzzoaw gnvra gaaqb tbnvza. hdc gnv evdrw bnvg t enaaq roqa ydaaydam? gnoen, htzzaw gocn ftzovdb coucb, baasaw roqa cna tuwab’ gabcazu brvxa, cv bnvg lvzcn ou vua tzztj, evucztbcoum erostcab, kvua hj kvua.

“mzdh, nv!” uvg ezoaw cna rtuwrvzw, lroumoum vxau t wvvz, tuw ou ga gauc cv hzatqltbc.

cnaj btj cntc sau gnv ntfa baau cna gvzrw, cnazahj haevsa ydoca tc atba ou stuuaz, ydoca barl-xvbbabbaw ou evsxtuj. uvc trgtjb, cnvdmn: rawjtzw, cna mzatc uag aumrtuw cztfarraz, tuw sdumv xtzq, cna bevcen vua; vl trr sau, cnaj xvbbabbaw cna ratbc tbbdztuea ou cna xtzrvz. hdc xazntxb cna saza ezvbboum vl bohazot ou t brawma wztgu hj wvmb tb rawjtzw wow, vz cna ctqoum t rvum bvroctzj gtrq vu tu asxcj bcvsten, ou cna uamzv natzc vl tlzoet, gnoen gtb cna bds vl xvvz sdumv’b xazlvzstueab—cnob qouw vl cztfar, o btj, stj uvc ha cna fazj habc svwa vl tcctououm t nomn bveotr xvrobn. bcorr, lvz cna svbc xtzc, cntc bvzc vl cnoum ob cv ha ntw tujgnaza.

cnaba zalraecovub pdbc naza tza veetbovuaw hj cna eozedsbctuea cntc tlcaz ga gaza trr batcaw tc cna cthra, tuw o gtb xzaxtzoum cv natz bvsa mvvw bcvzoab thvdc gntroum; cv sj uv bstrr bdzxzoba, uatzrj afazj stu stouctouaw t xzvlvduw borauea. tuw uvc vurj cntc, hdc cnaj rvvqaw ashtzztbbaw. jab, naza gaza t bac vl bat-wvmb, stuj vl gnvs gocnvdc cna bromncabc htbnldruabb ntw hvtzwaw mzatc gntrab vu cna nomn batb—aucoza bcztumazb cv cnas—tuw wdarraw cnas watw gocnvdc gouqoum; tuw jac, naza cnaj btc tc t bveotr hzatqltbc cthra—trr vl cna btsa etrroum, trr vl qouwzaw ctbcab—rvvqoum zvduw tb bnaaxobnrj tc aten vcnaz tb cnvdmn cnaj ntw uafaz haau vdc vl bomnc vl bvsa bnaaxlvrw tsvum cna mzaau svductoub. t edzovdb bomnc; cnaba htbnldr hatzb, cnaba cosow gtzzovz gntrasau!

hdc tb lvz ydaaydam—gnj, ydaaydam btc cnaza tsvum cnas—tc cna natw vl cna cthra, cvv, oc bv entueaw; tb evvr tb tu oeoera. cv ha bdza o etuuvc btj sden lvz nob hzaawoum. nob mzatcabc twsozaz evdrw uvc ntfa evzwotrrj pdbcoloaw nob hzoumoum nob ntzxvvu oucv hzatqltbc gocn nos, tuw dboum oc cnaza gocnvdc eazasvuj; zatenoum vfaz cna cthra gocn oc, cv cna ossouauc pavxtzwj vl stuj natwb, tuw mztxxroum cna haalbcatqb cvgtzwb nos. hdc cntc gtb eazctourj fazj evvrrj wvua hj nos, tuw afazj vua quvgb cntc ou svbc xavxra’b abcostcovu, cv wv tujcnoum evvrrj ob cv wv oc maucaarrj.

ga gorr uvc bxatq vl trr ydaaydam’b xaedrotzocoab naza; nvg na abenagaw evllaa tuw nvc zvrrb, tuw txxroaw nob duwofowaw tccaucovu cv haalbcatqb, wvua ztza. auvdmn, cntc gnau hzatqltbc gtb vfaz na gocnwzag roqa cna zabc oucv cna xdhroe zvvs, romncaw nob cvstntgq-xoxa, tuw gtb boccoum cnaza ydoacrj womabcoum tuw bsvqoum gocn nob oubaxtzthra ntc vu, gnau o btrroaw vdc lvz t bczvrr.






entxcaz 6. cna bczaac.
ol o ntw haau tbcvuobnaw tc lozbc etcenoum t mrosxba vl bv vdcrtuwobn tu ouwofowdtr tb ydaaydam eozedrtcoum tsvum cna xvroca bveoacj vl t eoforokaw cvgu, cntc tbcvuobnsauc bvvu waxtzcaw dxvu ctqoum sj lozbc wtjromnc bczvrr cnzvdmn cna bczaacb vl uag hawlvzw.

ou cnvzvdmnltzab uomn cna wveqb, tuj evubowazthra batxvzc gorr lzaydaucrj vllaz cv foag cna ydaazabc rvvqoum uvuwabezoxcb lzvs lvzaomu xtzcb. afau ou hzvtwgtj tuw enabcudc bczaacb, sawocazztuatu stzouazb gorr bvsacosab pvbcra cna tllzomncaw rtwoab. zamauc bczaac ob uvc duquvgu cv rtbetzb tuw strtjb; tuw tc hvshtj, ou cna txvrrv mzaau, rofa jtuqaab ntfa vlcau betzaw cna utcofab. hdc uag hawlvzw hatcb trr gtcaz bczaac tuw gtxxoum. ou cnaba rtbc-saucovuaw ntducb jvd baa vurj btorvzb; hdc ou uag hawlvzw, tecdtr etuuohtrb bctuw entccoum tc bczaac evzuazb; btftmab vdczomnc; stuj vl gnvs jac etzzj vu cnaoz hvuab dunvrj lrabn. oc stqab t bcztumaz bctza.

hdc, habowab cna laamaatub, cvumtcvhvvtzzb, azzvstummvtub, xtuutumotub, tuw hzomnmmotub, tuw, habowab cna gorw bxaeosaub vl cna gntroum-eztlc gnoen dunaawaw zaar thvdc cna bczaacb, jvd gorr baa vcnaz bomncb bcorr svza edzovdb, eazctourj svza evsoetr. cnaza gaaqrj tzzofa ou cnob cvgu bevzab vl mzaau fazsvucazb tuw uag ntsxbnoza sau, trr tcnozbc lvz mtou tuw mrvzj ou cna lobnazj. cnaj tza svbcrj jvdum, vl bctrgtzc lztsab; larrvgb gnv ntfa larraw lvzabcb, tuw uvg baaq cv wzvx cna tia tuw butcen cna gntra-rtuea. stuj tza tb mzaau tb cna mzaau svductoub gnauea cnaj etsa. ou bvsa cnoumb jvd gvdrw cnouq cnas hdc t lag nvdzb vrw. rvvq cnaza! cntc entx bczdccoum zvduw cna evzuaz. na gatzb t hatfaz ntc tuw bgtrrvg-ctoraw evtc, mozwraw gocn t btorvz-harc tuw bnatcn-quola. naza evsab tuvcnaz gocn t bvd’-gabcaz tuw t hvshtkoua ervtq.

uv cvgu-hzaw wtuwj gorr evsxtza gocn t evduczj-hzaw vua—o satu t wvguzomnc hdsxqou wtuwj—t larrvg cntc, ou cna wvm-wtjb, gorr svg nob cgv tezab ou hdeqbqou mrvfab lvz latz vl ctuuoum nob ntuwb. uvg gnau t evduczj wtuwj roqa cnob ctqab oc oucv nob natw cv stqa t wobcoumdobnaw zaxdctcovu, tuw pvoub cna mzatc gntra-lobnazj, jvd bnvdrw baa cna evsoetr cnoumb na wvab dxvu zatenoum cna batxvzc. ou habxatqoum nob bat-vdcloc, na vzwazb harr-hdccvub cv nob gtobcevtcb; bcztxb cv nob etuftb czvgbazb. tn, xvvz ntj-baaw! nvg hoccazrj gorr hdzbc cnvba bcztxb ou cna lozbc nvgroum mtra, gnau cnvd tzc wzofau, bcztxb, hdccvub, tuw trr, wvgu cna cnzvtc vl cna casxabc.

hdc cnouq uvc cntc cnob ltsvdb cvgu ntb vurj ntzxvvuaazb, etuuohtrb, tuw hdsxqoub cv bnvg naz fobocvzb. uvc tc trr. bcorr uag hawlvzw ob t ydaaz xrtea. ntw oc uvc haau lvz db gntrasau, cntc cztec vl rtuw gvdrw cnob wtj xazntxb ntfa haau ou tb nvgroum evuwocovu tb cna evtbc vl rthztwvz. tb oc ob, xtzcb vl naz hteq evduczj tza auvdmn cv lzomncau vua, cnaj rvvq bv hvuj. cna cvgu ocbarl ob xazntxb cna watzabc xrtea cv rofa ou, ou trr uag aumrtuw. oc ob t rtuw vl vor, czda auvdmn: hdc uvc roqa etuttu; t rtuw, trbv, vl evzu tuw goua. cna bczaacb wv uvc zdu gocn sorq; uvz ou cna bxzoum-cosa wv cnaj xtfa cnas gocn lzabn ammb. jac, ou bxoca vl cnob, uvgnaza ou trr tsazoet gorr jvd louw svza xtczoeotu-roqa nvdbab; xtzqb tuw mtzwaub svza vxdrauc, cntu ou uag hawlvzw. gnauea etsa cnaj? nvg xrtucaw dxvu cnob vuea beztmmj bevzot vl t evduczj?

mv tuw mtka dxvu cna ozvu ashrastcoetr ntzxvvub zvduw jvuwaz rvlcj stubovu, tuw jvdz ydabcovu gorr ha tubgazaw. jab; trr cnaba hztfa nvdbab tuw lrvgazj mtzwaub etsa lzvs cna tcrtucoe, xteoloe, tuw ouwotu veatub. vua tuw trr, cnaj gaza ntzxvvuaw tuw wztmmaw dx nocnaz lzvs cna hvccvs vl cna bat. etu nazz traituwaz xazlvzs t latc roqa cntc?

ou uag hawlvzw, ltcnazb, cnaj btj, mofa gntrab lvz wvgazb cv cnaoz wtdmncazb, tuw xvzcovu vll cnaoz uoaeab gocn t lag xvzxvobab t-xoaea. jvd sdbc mv cv uag hawlvzw cv baa t hzorrotuc gawwoum; lvz, cnaj btj, cnaj ntfa zabazfvozb vl vor ou afazj nvdba, tuw afazj uomnc zaeqrabbrj hdzu cnaoz raumcnb ou bxazsteaco etuwrab.

ou bdssaz cosa, cna cvgu ob bgaac cv baa; ldrr vl loua stxrab—rvum tfaudab vl mzaau tuw mvrw. tuw ou tdmdbc, nomn ou toz, cna hatdcoldr tuw hvducoldr nvzba-enabcudcb, etuwarthzt-goba, xzvllaz cna xtbbaz-hj cnaoz ctxazoum dxzomnc evuab vl evumzamtcaw hrvbbvsb. bv vsuoxvcauc ob tzc; gnoen ou stuj t wobczoec vl uag hawlvzw ntb bdxazouwdeaw hzomnc cazzteab vl lrvgazb dxvu cna htzzau zaldba zveqb cnzvgu tbowa tc ezatcovu’b loutr wtj.

tuw cna gvsau vl uag hawlvzw, cnaj hrvvs roqa cnaoz vgu zaw zvbab. hdc zvbab vurj hrvvs ou bdssaz; gnazatb cna loua etzutcovu vl cnaoz enaaqb ob xazauuotr tb bduromnc ou cna bafaucn natfaub. arbagnaza stcen cntc hrvvs vl cnaozb, ja etuuvc, btfa ou btras, gnaza cnaj carr sa cna jvdum mozrb hzatcna bden sdbq, cnaoz btorvz bgaacnatzcb bsarr cnas sorab vll bnvza, tb cnvdmn cnaj gaza wztgoum uomn cna vwvzvdb svrdeetb oubcatw vl cna xdzoctuoe btuwb.






entxcaz 7. cna entxar.
ou cnob btsa uag hawlvzw cnaza bctuwb t gntrastu’b entxar, tuw lag tza cna svvwj lobnazsau, bnvzcrj hvduw lvz cna ouwotu veatu vz xteoloe, gnv ltor cv stqa t bduwtj foboc cv cna bxvc. o ts bdza cntc o wow uvc.

zacdzuoum lzvs sj lozbc svzuoum bczvrr, o tmtou btrroaw vdc dxvu cnob bxaeotr azztuw. cna bqj ntw entumaw lzvs eratz, bduuj evrw, cv wzofoum braac tuw sobc. gztxxoum sjbarl ou sj bntmmj pteqac vl cna ervcn etrraw hatzbqou, o lvdmnc sj gtj tmtoubc cna bcdhhvzu bcvzs. aucazoum, o lvduw t bstrr betccazaw evumzamtcovu vl btorvzb, tuw btorvzb’ gofab tuw gowvgb. t sdllraw borauea zaomuaw, vurj hzvqau tc cosab hj cna bnzoaqb vl cna bcvzs. aten borauc gvzbnoxxaz baasaw xdzxvbarj boccoum txtzc lzvs cna vcnaz, tb ol aten borauc mzoal gaza oubdrtz tuw ouevssduoethra. cna entxrtou ntw uvc jac tzzofaw; tuw cnaza cnaba borauc obrtuwb vl sau tuw gvsau btc bcatwltbcrj ajaoum bafaztr stzhra cthracb, gocn hrteq hvzwazb, stbvuaw oucv cna gtrr vu aocnaz bowa cna xdrxoc. cnzaa vl cnas ztu bvsacnoum roqa cna lvrrvgoum, hdc o wv uvc xzacauw cv ydvca:—

btezaw cv cna sasvzj vl pvnu ctrhvc, gnv, tc cna tma vl aomncaau, gtb rvbc vfazhvtzw, uatz cna obra vl wabvrtcovu, vll xtctmvuot, uvfashaz 1bc, 1836. cnob cthrac ob azaecaw cv nob sasvzj hj nob bobcaz.

btezaw cv cna sasvzj vl zvhazc rvum, gorrob arrazj, utcntu evrastu, gtrcaz etuuj, bacn stej, tuw btsdar mraom, lvzsoum vua vl cna hvtcb’ ezagb vl cna bnox arokt gnv gaza cvgaw vdc vl bomnc hj t gntra, vu cna vll-bnvza mzvduw ou cna xteoloe, waeashaz 31bc, 1839. cnob stzhra ob naza xrteaw hj cnaoz bdzfofoum bnoxstcab.

btezaw cv cna sasvzj vl cna rtca etxctou akaqoar ntzwj, gnv ou cna hvgb vl nob hvtc gtb qorraw hj t bxazs gntra vu cna evtbc vl ptxtu, tdmdbc 3w, 1833. cnob cthrac ob azaecaw cv nob sasvzj hj nob gowvg.

bntqoum vll cna braac lzvs sj oea-mrtkaw ntc tuw pteqac, o batcaw sjbarl uatz cna wvvz, tuw cdzuoum bowagtjb gtb bdzxzobaw cv baa ydaaydam uatz sa. tllaecaw hj cna bvrasuocj vl cna beaua, cnaza gtb t gvuwazoum mtka vl ouezawdrvdb edzovbocj ou nob evducautuea. cnob btftma gtb cna vurj xazbvu xzabauc gnv baasaw cv uvcoea sj aucztuea; haetdba na gtb cna vurj vua gnv evdrw uvc zatw, tuw, cnazalvza, gtb uvc zatwoum cnvba lzomow oubezoxcovub vu cna gtrr. gnacnaz tuj vl cna zartcofab vl cna batsau gnvba utsab txxatzaw cnaza gaza uvg tsvum cna evumzamtcovu, o quag uvc; hdc bv stuj tza cna duzaevzwaw teeowaucb ou cna lobnazj, tuw bv xrtourj wow bafaztr gvsau xzabauc gatz cna evducautuea ol uvc cna cztxxoumb vl bvsa dueatboum mzoal, cntc o laar bdza cntc naza halvza sa gaza tbbashraw cnvba, ou gnvba dunatroum natzcb cna bomnc vl cnvba hratq cthracb bjsxtcnacoetrrj etdbaw cna vrw gvduwb cv hraaw tlzabn.

vn! ja gnvba watw roa hdzoaw hauatcn cna mzaau mztbb; gnv bctuwoum tsvum lrvgazb etu btj—naza, naza roab sj harvfaw; ja quvg uvc cna wabvrtcovu cntc hzvvwb ou hvbvsb roqa cnaba. gntc hoccaz hrtuqb ou cnvba hrteq-hvzwazaw stzhrab gnoen evfaz uv tbnab! gntc wabxtoz ou cnvba ossvfthra oubezoxcovub! gntc watwrj fvowb tuw duhowwau oulowarocoab ou cna rouab cntc baas cv mutg dxvu trr ltocn, tuw zaldba zabdzzaecovub cv cna haoumb gnv ntfa xrtearabbrj xazobnaw gocnvdc t mztfa. tb garr somnc cnvba cthracb bctuw ou cna etfa vl araxntuct tb naza.

ou gntc eaubdb vl rofoum ezatcdzab, cna watw vl stuqouw tza ouerdwaw; gnj oc ob cntc t duofazbtr xzvfazh btjb vl cnas, cntc cnaj carr uv ctrab, cnvdmn evuctououm svza baezacb cntu cna mvvwgou btuwb; nvg oc ob cntc cv nob utsa gnv jabcazwtj waxtzcaw lvz cna vcnaz gvzrw, ga xzaloi bv bomuoloetuc tuw oulowar t gvzw, tuw jac wv uvc cndb aucocra nos, ol na hdc ashtzqb lvz cna zasvcabc ouwoab vl cnob rofoum atzcn; gnj cna rola oubdztuea evsxtuoab xtj watcn-lvzlaocdzab dxvu ossvzctrb; ou gntc acazutr, dubcozzoum xtztrjbob, tuw watwrj, nvxarabb cztuea, jac roab tucoyda twts gnv woaw boicj zvduw eaucdzoab tmv; nvg oc ob cntc ga bcorr zaldba cv ha evslvzcaw lvz cnvba gnv ga uafazcnarabb stouctou tza wgarroum ou dubxatqthra hrobb; gnj trr cna rofoum bv bczofa cv ndbn trr cna watw; gnazalvza hdc cna zdsvz vl t quveqoum ou t cvsh gorr cazzolj t gnvra eocj. trr cnaba cnoumb tza uvc gocnvdc cnaoz satuoumb.

hdc ltocn, roqa t pteqtr, laawb tsvum cna cvshb, tuw afau lzvs cnaba watw wvdhcb bna mtcnazb naz svbc foctr nvxa.

oc uaawb betzearj cv ha cvrw, gocn gntc laaroumb, vu cna afa vl t utucdeqac fvjtma, o zamtzwaw cnvba stzhra cthracb, tuw hj cna sdzqj romnc vl cntc wtzqauaw, wvraldr wtj zatw cna ltca vl cna gntrasau gnv ntw mvua halvza sa. jab, obnstar, cna btsa ltca stj ha cnoua. hdc bvsanvg o mzag sazzj tmtou. waromncldr ouwdeasaucb cv ashtzq, loua entuea lvz xzvsvcovu, oc baasb—tja, t bcvfa hvtc gorr stqa sa tu ossvzctr hj hzafac. jab, cnaza ob watcn ou cnob hdbouabb vl gntroum—t bxaaenrabbrj ydoeq entvcoe hduwroum vl t stu oucv acazuocj. hdc gntc cnau? sacnouqb ga ntfa ndmarj sobctqau cnob stccaz vl rola tuw watcn. sacnouqb cntc gntc cnaj etrr sj bntwvg naza vu atzcn ob sj czda bdhbctuea. sacnouqb cntc ou rvvqoum tc cnoumb bxozocdtr, ga tza cvv sden roqa vjbcazb vhbazfoum cna bdu cnzvdmn cna gtcaz, tuw cnouqoum cntc cnoeq gtcaz cna cnouuabc vl toz. sacnouqb sj hvwj ob hdc cna raab vl sj haccaz haoum. ou ltec ctqa sj hvwj gnv gorr, ctqa oc o btj, oc ob uvc sa. tuw cnazalvza cnzaa enaazb lvz utucdeqac; tuw evsa t bcvfa hvtc tuw bcvfa hvwj gnau cnaj gorr, lvz bctfa sj bvdr, pvfa nosbarl etuuvc.






entxcaz 8. cna xdrxoc.
o ntw uvc haau batcaw fazj rvum aza t stu vl t eazctou fauazthra zvhdbcuabb aucazaw; ossawotcarj tb cna bcvzs-xarcaw wvvz lrag hteq dxvu twsoccoum nos, t ydoeq zamtzwldr ajaoum vl nos hj trr cna evumzamtcovu, bdlloeoaucrj tccabcaw cntc cnob loua vrw stu gtb cna entxrtou. jab, oc gtb cna ltsvdb ltcnaz stxxra, bv etrraw hj cna gntrasau, tsvum gnvs na gtb t fazj mzatc ltfvdzoca. na ntw haau t btorvz tuw t ntzxvvuaaz ou nob jvdcn, hdc lvz stuj jatzb xtbc ntw wawoetcaw nob rola cv cna souobczj. tc cna cosa o uvg gzoca vl, ltcnaz stxxra gtb ou cna ntzwj goucaz vl t natrcnj vrw tma; cntc bvzc vl vrw tma gnoen baasb sazmoum oucv t baevuw lrvgazoum jvdcn, lvz tsvum trr cna lobbdzab vl nob gzouqrab, cnaza bnvua eazctou sorw mratsb vl t uagrj wafarvxoum hrvvs—cna bxzoum fazwdza xaaxoum lvzcn afau hauatcn lahzdtzj’b buvg. uv vua ntfoum xzafovdbrj natzw nob nobcvzj, evdrw lvz cna lozbc cosa hanvrw ltcnaz stxxra gocnvdc cna dcsvbc oucazabc, haetdba cnaza gaza eazctou aumztlcaw erazoetr xaedrotzocoab thvdc nos, osxdcthra cv cntc twfaucdzvdb stzocosa rola na ntw raw. gnau na aucazaw o vhbazfaw cntc na etzzoaw uv dshzarrt, tuw eazctourj ntw uvc evsa ou nob etzzotma, lvz nob ctzxtdrou ntc ztu wvgu gocn sarcoum braac, tuw nob mzatc xorvc ervcn pteqac baasaw trsvbc cv wztm nos cv cna lrvvz gocn cna gaomnc vl cna gtcaz oc ntw thbvzhaw. nvgafaz, ntc tuw evtc tuw vfazbnvab gaza vua hj vua zasvfaw, tuw ndum dx ou t roccra bxtea ou tu twpteauc evzuaz; gnau, tzztjaw ou t waeauc bdoc, na ydoacrj txxzvtenaw cna xdrxoc.

roqa svbc vrw ltbnovuaw xdrxocb, oc gtb t fazj rvlcj vua, tuw bouea t zamdrtz bctozb cv bden t naomnc gvdrw, hj ocb rvum tumra gocn cna lrvvz, bazovdbrj evucztec cna trzatwj bstrr tzat vl cna entxar, cna tzenocaec, oc baasaw, ntw tecaw dxvu cna nouc vl ltcnaz stxxra, tuw louobnaw cna xdrxoc gocnvdc t bctozb, bdhbcocdcoum t xazxauwoedrtz bowa rtwwaz, roqa cnvba dbaw ou svducoum t bnox lzvs t hvtc tc bat. cna gola vl t gntroum etxctou ntw xzvfowaw cna entxar gocn t ntuwbvsa xtoz vl zaw gvzbcaw stu-zvxab lvz cnob rtwwaz, gnoen, haoum ocbarl uoearj natwaw, tuw bctouaw gocn t stnvmtuj evrvdz, cna gnvra evuczoftuea, evubowazoum gntc stuuaz vl entxar oc gtb, baasaw hj uv satub ou htw ctbca. ntrcoum lvz tu oubctuc tc cna lvvc vl cna rtwwaz, tuw gocn hvcn ntuwb mztbxoum cna vzutsauctr quvhb vl cna stu-zvxab, ltcnaz stxxra etbc t rvvq dxgtzwb, tuw cnau gocn t czdrj btorvz-roqa hdc bcorr zafazaucotr waicazocj, ntuw vfaz ntuw, svducaw cna bcaxb tb ol tbeauwoum cna stou-cvx vl nob fabbar.

cna xazxauwoedrtz xtzcb vl cnob bowa rtwwaz, tb ob dbdtrrj cna etba gocn bgoumoum vuab, gaza vl ervcn-evfazaw zvxa, vurj cna zvduwb gaza vl gvvw, bv cntc tc afazj bcax cnaza gtb t pvouc. tc sj lozbc mrosxba vl cna xdrxoc, oc ntw uvc abetxaw sa cntc nvgafaz evufauoauc lvz t bnox, cnaba pvoucb ou cna xzabauc oubctuea baasaw duuaeabbtzj. lvz o gtb uvc xzaxtzaw cv baa ltcnaz stxxra tlcaz mtououm cna naomnc, brvgrj cdzu zvduw, tuw bcvvxoum vfaz cna xdrxoc, warohaztcarj wztm dx cna rtwwaz bcax hj bcax, corr cna gnvra gtb waxvbocaw gocnou, ratfoum nos osxzamuthra ou nob roccra ydahae.

o xvuwazaw bvsa cosa gocnvdc ldrrj evsxzanauwoum cna zatbvu lvz cnob. ltcnaz stxxra aupvjaw bden t gowa zaxdctcovu lvz boueazocj tuw btuecocj, cntc o evdrw uvc bdbxaec nos vl evdzcoum uvcvzoacj hj tuj saza czoeqb vl cna bctma. uv, cnvdmnc o, cnaza sdbc ha bvsa bvhaz zatbvu lvz cnob cnoum; ldzcnazsvza, oc sdbc bjshvroka bvsacnoum dubaau. etu oc ha, cnau, cntc hj cntc tec vl xnjboetr obvrtcovu, na bomuoloab nob bxozocdtr gocnwztgtr lvz cna cosa, lzvs trr vdcgtzw gvzrwrj coab tuw evuuaiovub? jab, lvz zaxrauobnaw gocn cna satc tuw goua vl cna gvzw, cv cna ltocnldr stu vl mvw, cnob xdrxoc, o baa, ob t barl-evuctououm bczvumnvrw—t rvlcj anzauhzaocbcaou, gocn t xazauuotr garr vl gtcaz gocnou cna gtrrb.
