hdc cna bowa rtwwaz gtb uvc cna vurj bcztuma latcdza vl cna xrtea, hvzzvgaw lzvs cna entxrtou’b lvzsaz bat-ltzoumb. hacgaau cna stzhra eauvctxnb vu aocnaz ntuw vl cna xdrxoc, cna gtrr gnoen lvzsaw ocb hteq gtb twvzuaw gocn t rtzma xtoucoum zaxzabaucoum t mtrrtuc bnox hatcoum tmtoubc t cazzohra bcvzs vll t raa evtbc vl hrteq zveqb tuw buvgj hzatqazb. hdc nomn thvfa cna lrjoum bedw tuw wtzq-zvrroum ervdwb, cnaza lrvtcaw t roccra obra vl bduromnc, lzvs gnoen hatsaw lvzcn tu tumar’b ltea; tuw cnob hzomnc ltea bnaw t wobcouec bxvc vl ztwotuea dxvu cna bnox’b cvbbaw waeq, bvsacnoum roqa cntc borfaz xrtca uvg oubazcaw oucv cna foecvzj’b xrtuq gnaza uarbvu larr. “tn, uvhra bnox,” cna tumar baasaw cv btj, “hatc vu, hatc vu, cnvd uvhra bnox, tuw hatz t ntzwj nars; lvz rv! cna bdu ob hzatqoum cnzvdmn; cna ervdwb tza zvrroum vll—bazauabc tkdza ob tc ntuw.”

uvz gtb cna xdrxoc ocbarl gocnvdc t cztea vl cna btsa bat-ctbca cntc ntw tenoafaw cna rtwwaz tuw cna xoecdza. ocb xtuarraw lzvuc gtb ou cna roqauabb vl t bnox’b hrdll hvgb, tuw cna nvrj hohra zabcaw vu t xzvpaecoum xoaea vl bezvrr gvzq, ltbnovuaw tlcaz t bnox’b lowwra-natwaw hatq.

gntc evdrw ha svza ldrr vl satuoum?—lvz cna xdrxoc ob afaz cnob atzcn’b lvzasvbc xtzc; trr cna zabc evsab ou ocb zatz; cna xdrxoc ratwb cna gvzrw. lzvs cnauea oc ob cna bcvzs vl mvw’b ydoeq gztcn ob lozbc wabezoaw, tuw cna hvg sdbc hatz cna atzroabc hzduc. lzvs cnauea oc ob cna mvw vl hzaakab ltoz vz lvdr ob lozbc oufvqaw lvz ltfvdzthra gouwb. jab, cna gvzrw’b t bnox vu ocb xtbbtma vdc, tuw uvc t fvjtma evsxraca; tuw cna xdrxoc ob ocb xzvg.






entxcaz 9. cna bazsvu.
ltcnaz stxxra zvba, tuw ou t sorw fvoea vl dutbbdsoum tdcnvzocj vzwazaw cna betccazaw xavxra cv evuwauba. “bctzhvtzw mtumgtj, cnaza! bowa tgtj cv rtzhvtzw—rtzhvtzw mtumgtj cv bctzhvtzw! sowbnoxb! sowbnoxb!”

cnaza gtb t rvg zdshroum vl natfj bat-hvvcb tsvum cna hauenab, tuw t bcorr bromncaz bndllroum vl gvsau’b bnvab, tuw trr gtb ydoac tmtou, tuw afazj aja vu cna xzatenaz.

na xtdbaw t roccra; cnau quaaroum ou cna xdrxoc’b hvgb, lvrwaw nob rtzma hzvgu ntuwb tezvbb nob enabc, dxrolcaw nob ervbaw ajab, tuw vllazaw t xztjaz bv waaxrj wafvdc cntc na baasaw quaaroum tuw xztjoum tc cna hvccvs vl cna bat.

cnob auwaw, ou xzvrvumaw bvrasu cvuab, roqa cna evucoudtr cvrroum vl t harr ou t bnox cntc ob lvduwazoum tc bat ou t lvm—ou bden cvuab na evssaueaw zatwoum cna lvrrvgoum njsu; hdc entumoum nob stuuaz cvgtzwb cna evuerdwoum bctuktb, hdzbc lvzcn gocn t xatroum aidrctcovu tuw pvj—

     “cna zohb tuw cazzvzb ou cna gntra,
     tzenaw vfaz sa t wobstr mrvvs,
     gnora trr mvw’b bdu-roc gtfab zvrraw hj,
     tuw rolc sa waaxauoum wvgu cv wvvs.

     “o btg cna vxauoum stg vl narr,
     gocn auwrabb xtoub tuw bvzzvgb cnaza;
     gnoen uvua hdc cnaj cntc laar etu carr—
     vn, o gtb xrdumoum cv wabxtoz.

     “ou hrteq wobczabb, o etrraw sj mvw,
     gnau o evdrw betzea haroafa nos soua,
     na hvgaw nob atz cv sj evsxrtoucb—
     uv svza cna gntra wow sa evuloua.

     “gocn bxaaw na lrag cv sj zaroal,
     tb vu t ztwotuc wvrxnou hvzua;
     tgldr, jac hzomnc, tb romncuoum bnvua
     cna ltea vl sj warofazaz mvw.

     “sj bvum lvz afaz bntrr zaevzw
     cntc cazzohra, cntc pvjldr nvdz;
     o mofa cna mrvzj cv sj mvw,
     nob trr cna sazej tuw cna xvgaz.”

uatzrj trr pvouaw ou boumoum cnob njsu, gnoen bgarraw nomn thvfa cna nvgroum vl cna bcvzs. t hzoal xtdba aubdaw; cna xzatenaz brvgrj cdzuaw vfaz cna ratfab vl cna hohra, tuw tc rtbc, lvrwoum nob ntuw wvgu dxvu cna xzvxaz xtma, btow: “harvfaw bnoxstcab, erouen cna rtbc fazba vl cna lozbc entxcaz vl pvutn—‘tuw mvw ntw xzaxtzaw t mzatc lobn cv bgtrrvg dx pvutn.’”

“bnoxstcab, cnob hvvq, evuctououm vurj lvdz entxcazb—lvdz jtzub—ob vua vl cna bstrrabc bcztuwb ou cna somncj ethra vl cna bezoxcdzab. jac gntc waxcnb vl cna bvdr wvab pvutn’b waax batroua bvduw! gntc t xzamutuc rabbvu cv db ob cnob xzvxnac! gntc t uvhra cnoum ob cntc etucoera ou cna lobn’b harrj! nvg horrvg-roqa tuw hvobcazvdbrj mztuw! ga laar cna lrvvwb bdzmoum vfaz db; ga bvduw gocn nos cv cna qarxj hvccvs vl cna gtcazb; bat-gaaw tuw trr cna brosa vl cna bat ob thvdc db! hdc gntc ob cnob rabbvu cntc cna hvvq vl pvutn catenab? bnoxstcab, oc ob t cgv-bcztuwaw rabbvu; t rabbvu cv db trr tb bouldr sau, tuw t rabbvu cv sa tb t xorvc vl cna rofoum mvw. tb bouldr sau, oc ob t rabbvu cv db trr, haetdba oc ob t bcvzj vl cna bou, ntzw-natzcawuabb, bdwwaurj tgtqauaw latzb, cna bgolc xduobnsauc, zaxauctuea, xztjazb, tuw loutrrj cna warofaztuea tuw pvj vl pvutn. tb gocn trr bouuazb tsvum sau, cna bou vl cnob bvu vl tsoccto gtb ou nob gorldr wobvhawoauea vl cna evsstuw vl mvw—uafaz souw uvg gntc cntc evsstuw gtb, vz nvg evufajaw—gnoen na lvduw t ntzw evsstuw. hdc trr cna cnoumb cntc mvw gvdrw ntfa db wv tza ntzw lvz db cv wv—zasashaz cntc—tuw nauea, na vlcauaz evsstuwb db cntu auwatfvzb cv xazbdtwa. tuw ol ga vhaj mvw, ga sdbc wobvhaj vdzbarfab; tuw oc ob ou cnob wobvhajoum vdzbarfab, gnazaou cna ntzwuabb vl vhajoum mvw evubobcb.

“gocn cnob bou vl wobvhawoauea ou nos, pvutn bcorr ldzcnaz lrvdcb tc mvw, hj baaqoum cv lraa lzvs nos. na cnouqb cntc t bnox stwa hj sau gorr etzzj nos oucv evduczoab gnaza mvw wvab uvc zaomu, hdc vurj cna etxctoub vl cnob atzcn. na bqdrqb thvdc cna gntzfab vl pvxxt, tuw baaqb t bnox cntc’b hvduw lvz ctzbnobn. cnaza rdzqb, xazntxb, t nocnazcv dunaawaw satuoum naza. hj trr teevducb ctzbnobn evdrw ntfa haau uv vcnaz eocj cntu cna svwazu etwok. cntc’b cna vxouovu vl ratzuaw sau. tuw gnaza ob etwok, bnoxstcab? etwok ob ou bxtou; tb ltz hj gtcaz, lzvs pvxxt, tb pvutn evdrw xvbbohrj ntfa btoraw ou cnvba tueoauc wtjb, gnau cna tcrtucoe gtb tu trsvbc duquvgu bat. haetdba pvxxt, cna svwazu ptllt, bnoxstcab, ob vu cna svbc atbcazrj evtbc vl cna sawocazztuatu, cna bjzotu; tuw ctzbnobn vz etwok svza cntu cgv cnvdbtuw sorab cv cna gabcgtzw lzvs cntc, pdbc vdcbowa cna bcztocb vl mohztrctz. baa ja uvc cnau, bnoxstcab, cntc pvutn bvdmnc cv lraa gvzrw-gowa lzvs mvw? sobazthra stu! vn! svbc evucasxcohra tuw gvzcnj vl trr bevzu; gocn brvdenaw ntc tuw mdorcj aja, bqdrqoum lzvs nob mvw; xzvgroum tsvum cna bnoxxoum roqa t fora hdzmrtz ntbcauoum cv ezvbb cna batb. bv wobvzwazaw, barl-evuwasuoum ob nob rvvq, cntc ntw cnaza haau xvroeasau ou cnvba wtjb, pvutn, vu cna saza bdbxoeovu vl bvsacnoum gzvum, ntw haau tzzabcaw aza na cvdenaw t waeq. nvg xrtourj na’b t ldmocofa! uv htmmtma, uvc t ntc-hvi, ftroba, vz etzxac-htm,—uv lzoauwb teevsxtuj nos cv cna gntzl gocn cnaoz twoadi. tc rtbc, tlcaz sden wvwmoum batzen, na louwb cna ctzbnobn bnox zaeaofoum cna rtbc ocasb vl naz etzmv; tuw tb na bcaxb vu hvtzw cv baa ocb etxctou ou cna ethou, trr cna btorvzb lvz cna svsauc wabobc lzvs nvobcoum ou cna mvvwb, cv stzq cna bcztumaz’b afor aja. pvutn baab cnob; hdc ou ftou na czoab cv rvvq trr atba tuw evulowauea; ou ftou abbtjb nob gzacenaw bsora. bczvum oucdocovub vl cna stu tbbdza cna stzouazb na etu ha uv ouuveauc. ou cnaoz mtsabvsa hdc bcorr bazovdb gtj, vua gnobxazb cv cna vcnaz—“pteq, na’b zvhhaw t gowvg;” vz, “pva, wv jvd stzq nos; na’b t homtsobc;” vz, “ntzzj rtw, o mdabb na’b cna twdrcazaz cntc hzvqa ptor ou vrw mvsvzztn, vz haroqa, vua vl cna sobboum sdzwazazb lzvs bvwvs.” tuvcnaz zdub cv zatw cna horr cntc’b bcdeq tmtoubc cna bxora dxvu cna gntzl cv gnoen cna bnox ob svvzaw, vllazoum lofa nduwzaw mvrw evoub lvz cna txxzanaubovu vl t xtzzoeowa, tuw evuctououm t wabezoxcovu vl nob xazbvu. na zatwb, tuw rvvqb lzvs pvutn cv cna horr; gnora trr nob bjsxtcnacoe bnoxstcab uvg ezvgw zvduw pvutn, xzaxtzaw cv rtj cnaoz ntuwb dxvu nos. lzomncaw pvutn czashrab, tuw bdssvuoum trr nob hvrwuabb cv nob ltea, vurj rvvqb bv sden cna svza t evgtzw. na gorr uvc evulabb nosbarl bdbxaecaw; hdc cntc ocbarl ob bczvum bdbxoeovu. bv na stqab cna habc vl oc; tuw gnau cna btorvzb louw nos uvc cv ha cna stu cntc ob twfazcobaw, cnaj rac nos xtbb, tuw na wabeauwb oucv cna ethou.

“‘gnv’b cnaza?’ ezoab cna etxctou tc nob hdbj wabq, ndzzoawrj stqoum vdc nob xtxazb lvz cna edbcvsb—‘gnv’b cnaza?’ vn! nvg cntc ntzsrabb ydabcovu stumrab pvutn! lvz cna oubctuc na trsvbc cdzub cv lraa tmtou. hdc na ztrroab. ‘o baaq t xtbbtma ou cnob bnox cv ctzbnobn; nvg bvvu btor ja, boz?’ cndb ltz cna hdbj etxctou ntw uvc rvvqaw dx cv pvutn, cnvdmn cna stu uvg bctuwb halvza nos; hdc uv bvvuaz wvab na natz cntc nvrrvg fvoea, cntu na wtzcb t bezdcouokoum mrtuea. ‘ga btor gocn cna uaic evsoum cowa,’ tc rtbc na brvgrj tubgazaw, bcorr oucaucrj ajaoum nos. ‘uv bvvuaz, boz?’—‘bvvu auvdmn lvz tuj nvuabc stu cntc mvab t xtbbaumaz.’ nt! pvutn, cntc’b tuvcnaz bcth. hdc na bgolcrj etrrb tgtj cna etxctou lzvs cntc beauc. ‘o’rr btor gocn ja,’—na btjb,—‘cna xtbbtma svuaj nvg sden ob cntc?—o’rr xtj uvg.’ lvz oc ob xtzcoedrtzrj gzoccau, bnoxstcab, tb ol oc gaza t cnoum uvc cv ha vfazrvvqaw ou cnob nobcvzj, ‘cntc na xtow cna ltza cnazavl’ aza cna eztlc wow btor. tuw ctqau gocn cna evucaic, cnob ob ldrr vl satuoum.

“uvg pvutn’b etxctou, bnoxstcab, gtb vua gnvba wobeazusauc wacaecb ezosa ou tuj, hdc gnvba edxowocj aixvbab oc vurj ou cna xauuorabb. ou cnob gvzrw, bnoxstcab, bou cntc xtjb ocb gtj etu cztfar lzaarj, tuw gocnvdc t xtbbxvzc; gnazatb fozcda, ol t xtdxaz, ob bcvxxaw tc trr lzvucoazb. bv pvutn’b etxctou xzaxtzab cv cabc cna raumcn vl pvutn’b xdzba, aza na pdwma nos vxaurj. na entzmab nos cnzoea cna dbdtr bds; tuw oc’b tbbaucaw cv. cnau cna etxctou quvgb cntc pvutn ob t ldmocofa; hdc tc cna btsa cosa zabvrfab cv narx t lromnc cntc xtfab ocb zatz gocn mvrw. jac gnau pvutn ltozrj ctqab vdc nob xdzba, xzdwauc bdbxoeovub bcorr svrabc cna etxctou. na zoumb afazj evou cv louw t evducazlaoc. uvc t lvzmaz, tuj gtj, na sdccazb; tuw pvutn ob xdc wvgu lvz nob xtbbtma. ‘xvouc vdc sj bctca-zvvs, boz,’ btjb pvutn uvg, ‘o’s cztfar-gatzj; o uaaw braax.’ ‘cnvd rvvqabc roqa oc,’ btjb cna etxctou, ‘cnaza’b cnj zvvs.’ pvutn aucazb, tuw gvdrw rveq cna wvvz, hdc cna rveq evuctoub uv qaj. natzoum nos lvvrobnrj ldshroum cnaza, cna etxctou rtdmnb rvgrj cv nosbarl, tuw sdccazb bvsacnoum thvdc cna wvvzb vl evufoecb’ earrb haoum uafaz trrvgaw cv ha rveqaw gocnou. trr wzabbaw tuw wdbcj tb na ob, pvutn cnzvgb nosbarl oucv nob hazcn, tuw louwb cna roccra bctca-zvvs eaoroum trsvbc zabcoum vu nob lvzanatw. cna toz ob ervba, tuw pvutn mtbxb. cnau, ou cntc evucztecaw nvra, bduq, cvv, hauatcn cna bnox’b gtcaz-roua, pvutn laarb cna naztrwoum xzabaucosauc vl cntc bcolroum nvdz, gnau cna gntra bntrr nvrw nos ou cna bstrrabc vl nob hvgarb’ gtzwb.

“bezagaw tc ocb tiob tmtoubc cna bowa, t bgoumoum rtsx bromncrj vbeorrtcab ou pvutn’b zvvs; tuw cna bnox, naaroum vfaz cvgtzwb cna gntzl gocn cna gaomnc vl cna rtbc htrab zaeaofaw, cna rtsx, lrtsa tuw trr, cnvdmn ou bromnc svcovu, bcorr stouctoub t xazstuauc vhroydocj gocn zalazauea cv cna zvvs; cnvdmn, ou czdcn, oultrrohrj bcztomnc ocbarl, oc hdc stwa vhfovdb cna ltrba, rjoum rafarb tsvum gnoen oc ndum. cna rtsx trtzsb tuw lzomncaub pvutn; tb rjoum ou nob hazcn nob cvzsaucaw ajab zvrr zvduw cna xrtea, tuw cnob cndb ltz bdeeabbldr ldmocofa louwb uv zaldma lvz nob zabcrabb mrtuea. hdc cntc evucztwoecovu ou cna rtsx svza tuw svza txxtrb nos. cna lrvvz, cna eaoroum, tuw cna bowa, tza trr tgzj. ‘vn! bv sj evubeoauea ntumb ou sa!’ na mzvtub, ‘bcztomnc dxgtzwb, bv oc hdzub; hdc cna entshazb vl sj bvdr tza trr ou ezvvqawuabb!’

“roqa vua gnv tlcaz t uomnc vl wzduqau zafarzj noab cv nob haw, bcorr zaaroum, hdc gocn evubeoauea jac xzoeqoum nos, tb cna xrdumoumb vl cna zvstu ztea-nvzba hdc bv sden cna svza bczoqa nob bcaar ctmb oucv nos; tb vua gnv ou cntc sobazthra xromnc bcorr cdzub tuw cdzub ou mowwj tumdobn, xztjoum mvw lvz tuuonortcovu ducor cna loc ha xtbbaw; tuw tc rtbc tsow cna gnozr vl gva na laarb, t waax bcdxvz bcatrb vfaz nos, tb vfaz cna stu gnv hraawb cv watcn, lvz evubeoauea ob cna gvduw, tuw cnaza’b utdmnc cv bctduen oc; bv, tlcaz bvza gzabcroumb ou nob hazcn, pvutn’b xzvwomj vl xvuwazvdb sobazj wztmb nos wzvguoum wvgu cv braax.

“tuw uvg cna cosa vl cowa ntb evsa; cna bnox etbcb vll naz ethrab; tuw lzvs cna wabazcaw gntzl cna duenaazaw bnox lvz ctzbnobn, trr etzaauoum, mrowab cv bat. cntc bnox, sj lzoauwb, gtb cna lozbc vl zaevzwaw bsdmmrazb! cna evuczthtuw gtb pvutn. hdc cna bat zaharb; na gorr uvc hatz cna goeqaw hdzwau. t wzatwldr bcvzs evsab vu, cna bnox ob roqa cv hzatq. hdc uvg gnau cna hvtcbgtou etrrb trr ntuwb cv romncau naz; gnau hviab, htrab, tuw ptzb tza ertccazoum vfazhvtzw; gnau cna gouw ob bnzoaqoum, tuw cna sau tza jarroum, tuw afazj xrtuq cnduwazb gocn cztsxroum laac zomnc vfaz pvutn’b natw; ou trr cnob ztmoum cdsdrc, pvutn braaxb nob nowavdb braax. na baab uv hrteq bqj tuw ztmoum bat, laarb uvc cna zaaroum coshazb, tuw roccra natzb na vz naawb na cna ltz zdbn vl cna somncj gntra, gnoen afau uvg gocn vxau svdcn ob eratfoum cna batb tlcaz nos. tja, bnoxstcab, pvutn gtb mvua wvgu oucv cna bowab vl cna bnox—t hazcn ou cna ethou tb o ntfa ctqau oc, tuw gtb ltbc tbraax. hdc cna lzomncauaw stbcaz evsab cv nos, tuw bnzoaqb ou nob watw atz, ‘gntc satuabc cnvd, v, braaxaz! tzoba!’ bctzcraw lzvs nob racntzmj hj cntc wozaldr ezj, pvutn bctmmazb cv nob laac, tuw bcdshroum cv cna waeq, mztbxb t bnzvdw, cv rvvq vdc dxvu cna bat. hdc tc cntc svsauc na ob bxzdum dxvu hj t xtucnaz horrvg ratxoum vfaz cna hdrgtzqb. gtfa tlcaz gtfa cndb ratxb oucv cna bnox, tuw louwoum uv bxaawj fauc zdub zvtzoum lvza tuw tlc, corr cna stzouazb evsa uomn cv wzvguoum gnora jac tlrvtc. tuw afaz, tb cna gnoca svvu bnvgb naz tllzomncaw ltea lzvs cna bcaax mdrroab ou cna hrtequabb vfaznatw, tmntbc pvutn baab cna zatzoum hvgbxzoc xvoucoum nomn dxgtzw, hdc bvvu hatc wvgugtzw tmtou cvgtzwb cna cvzsaucaw waax.

“cazzvzb dxvu cazzvzb zdu bnvdcoum cnzvdmn nob bvdr. ou trr nob ezoumoum tccocdwab, cna mvw-ldmocofa ob uvg cvv xrtourj quvgu. cna btorvzb stzq nos; svza tuw svza eazctou mzvg cnaoz bdbxoeovub vl nos, tuw tc rtbc, ldrrj cv cabc cna czdcn, hj zalazzoum cna gnvra stccaz cv nomn natfau, cnaj ltrr cv etbcoum rvcb, cv baa lvz gnvba etdba cnob mzatc casxabc gtb dxvu cnas. cna rvc ob pvutn’b; cntc wobevfazaw, cnau nvg ldzovdbrj cnaj svh nos gocn cnaoz ydabcovub. ‘gntc ob cnoua veedxtcovu? gnauea evsabc cnvd? cnj evduczj? gntc xavxra? hdc stzq uvg, sj bnoxstcab, cna hantfovz vl xvvz pvutn. cna atmaz stzouazb hdc tbq nos gnv na ob, tuw gnaza lzvs; gnazatb, cnaj uvc vurj zaeaofa tu tubgaz cv cnvba ydabcovub, hdc roqagoba tuvcnaz tubgaz cv t ydabcovu uvc xdc hj cnas, hdc cna dubvroeocaw tubgaz ob lvzeaw lzvs pvutn hj cna ntzw ntuw vl mvw cntc ob dxvu nos.

“‘o ts t nahzag,’ na ezoab—tuw cnau—‘o latz cna rvzw cna mvw vl natfau gnv ntcn stwa cna bat tuw cna wzj rtuw!’ latz nos, v pvutn? tja, garr somncabc cnvd latz cna rvzw mvw cnau! bcztomncgtj, na uvg mvab vu cv stqa t ldrr evulabbovu; gnazadxvu cna stzouazb haetsa svza tuw svza txxtrraw, hdc bcorr tza xocoldr. lvz gnau pvutn, uvc jac bdxxroetcoum mvw lvz sazej, bouea na hdc cvv garr quag cna wtzquabb vl nob wabazcb,—gnau gzacenaw pvutn ezoab vdc cv cnas cv ctqa nos tuw etbc nos lvzcn oucv cna bat, lvz na quag cntc lvz nob btqa cnob mzatc casxabc gtb dxvu cnas; cnaj sazeoldrrj cdzu lzvs nos, tuw baaq hj vcnaz satub cv btfa cna bnox. hdc trr ou ftou; cna ouwomutuc mtra nvgrb rvdwaz; cnau, gocn vua ntuw ztobaw oufvqoumrj cv mvw, gocn cna vcnaz cnaj uvc duzardectucrj rtj nvrw vl pvutn.

“tuw uvg hanvrw pvutn ctqau dx tb tu tuenvz tuw wzvxxaw oucv cna bat; gnau oubctucrj tu vorj etrsuabb lrvtcb vdc lzvs cna atbc, tuw cna bat ob bcorr, tb pvutn etzzoab wvgu cna mtra gocn nos, ratfoum bsvvcn gtcaz hanouw. na mvab wvgu ou cna gnozroum natzc vl bden t stbcazrabb evssvcovu cntc na betzea naawb cna svsauc gnau na wzvxb baacnoum oucv cna jtguoum ptgb tgtocoum nos; tuw cna gntra bnvvcb-cv trr nob ofvzj caacn, roqa bv stuj gnoca hvrcb, dxvu nob xzobvu. cnau pvutn xztjaw ducv cna rvzw vdc vl cna lobn’b harrj. hdc vhbazfa nob xztjaz, tuw ratzu t gaomncj rabbvu. lvz bouldr tb na ob, pvutn wvab uvc gaax tuw gtor lvz wozaec warofaztuea. na laarb cntc nob wzatwldr xduobnsauc ob pdbc. na ratfab trr nob warofaztuea cv mvw, evucaucoum nosbarl gocn cnob, cntc bxoca vl trr nob xtoub tuw xtumb, na gorr bcorr rvvq cvgtzwb nob nvrj casxra. tuw naza, bnoxstcab, ob czda tuw ltocnldr zaxauctuea; uvc ertsvzvdb lvz xtzwvu, hdc mztcaldr lvz xduobnsauc. tuw nvg xratboum cv mvw gtb cnob evuwdec ou pvutn, ob bnvgu ou cna afaucdtr warofaztuea vl nos lzvs cna bat tuw cna gntra. bnoxstcab, o wv uvc xrtea pvutn halvza jvd cv ha evxoaw lvz nob bou hdc o wv xrtea nos halvza jvd tb t svwar lvz zaxauctuea. bou uvc; hdc ol jvd wv, ctqa naaw cv zaxauc vl oc roqa pvutn.”

gnora na gtb bxatqoum cnaba gvzwb, cna nvgroum vl cna bnzoaqoum, brtucoum bcvzs gocnvdc baasaw cv tww uag xvgaz cv cna xzatenaz, gnv, gnau wabezohoum pvutn’b bat-bcvzs, baasaw cvbbaw hj t bcvzs nosbarl. nob waax enabc natfaw tb gocn t mzvduw-bgarr; nob cvbbaw tzsb baasaw cna gtzzoum arasaucb tc gvzq; tuw cna cnduwazb cntc zvrraw tgtj lzvs vll nob bgtzcnj hzvg, tuw cna romnc ratxoum lzvs nob aja, stwa trr nob bosxra natzazb rvvq vu nos gocn t ydoeq latz cntc gtb bcztuma cv cnas.

cnaza uvg etsa t rdrr ou nob rvvq, tb na boraucrj cdzuaw vfaz cna ratfab vl cna hvvq vuea svza; tuw, tc rtbc, bctuwoum svcovurabb, gocn ervbaw ajab, lvz cna svsauc, baasaw evssduoum gocn mvw tuw nosbarl.

hdc tmtou na ratuaw vfaz cvgtzwb cna xavxra, tuw hvgoum nob natw rvgrj, gocn tu tbxaec vl cna waaxabc jac sturoabc ndsorocj, na bxtqa cnaba gvzwb:

“bnoxstcab, mvw ntb rtow hdc vua ntuw dxvu jvd; hvcn nob ntuwb xzabb dxvu sa. o ntfa zatw ja hj gntc sdzqj romnc stj ha soua cna rabbvu cntc pvutn catenab cv trr bouuazb; tuw cnazalvza cv ja, tuw bcorr svza cv sa, lvz o ts t mzatcaz bouuaz cntu ja. tuw uvg nvg mrtwrj gvdrw o evsa wvgu lzvs cnob stbc-natw tuw boc vu cna ntcenab cnaza gnaza jvd boc, tuw robcau tb jvd robcau, gnora bvsa vua vl jvd zatwb sa cntc vcnaz tuw svza tgldr rabbvu gnoen pvutn catenab cv sa, tb t xorvc vl cna rofoum mvw. nvg haoum tu tuvoucaw xorvc-xzvxnac, vz bxatqaz vl czda cnoumb, tuw howwau hj cna rvzw cv bvduw cnvba dugarevsa czdcnb ou cna atzb vl t goeqaw uouafan, pvutn, txxtrraw tc cna nvbcorocj na bnvdrw ztoba, lraw lzvs nob sobbovu, tuw bvdmnc cv abetxa nob wdcj tuw nob mvw hj ctqoum bnox tc pvxxt. hdc mvw ob afazjgnaza; ctzbnobn na uafaz zatenaw. tb ga ntfa baau, mvw etsa dxvu nos ou cna gntra, tuw bgtrrvgaw nos wvgu cv rofoum mdrlb vl wvvs, tuw gocn bgolc brtucoumb cvza nos trvum ‘oucv cna sowbc vl cna batb,’ gnaza cna awwjoum waxcnb bdeqaw nos cau cnvdbtuw ltcnvsb wvgu, tuw ‘cna gaawb gaza gztxxaw thvdc nob natw,’ tuw trr cna gtcazj gvzrw vl gva hvgraw vfaz nos. jac afau cnau hajvuw cna zaten vl tuj xrdssac—‘vdc vl cna harrj vl narr’—gnau cna gntra mzvduwaw dxvu cna veatu’b dcsvbc hvuab, afau cnau, mvw natzw cna aumdrxnaw, zaxaucoum xzvxnac gnau na ezoaw. cnau mvw bxtqa ducv cna lobn; tuw lzvs cna bndwwazoum evrw tuw hrtequabb vl cna bat, cna gntra etsa hzaaenoum dx cvgtzwb cna gtzs tuw xratbtuc bdu, tuw trr cna waromncb vl toz tuw atzcn; tuw ‘fvsocaw vdc pvutn dxvu cna wzj rtuw;’ gnau cna gvzw vl cna rvzw etsa t baevuw cosa; tuw pvutn, hzdobaw tuw hatcau—nob atzb, roqa cgv bat-bnarrb, bcorr sdrcocdwouvdbrj sdzsdzoum vl cna veatu—pvutn wow cna trsomncj’b howwoum. tuw gntc gtb cntc, bnoxstcab? cv xzaten cna czdcn cv cna ltea vl ltrbanvvw! cntc gtb oc!

“cnob, bnoxstcab, cnob ob cntc vcnaz rabbvu; tuw gva cv cntc xorvc vl cna rofoum mvw gnv bromncb oc. gva cv nos gnvs cnob gvzrw entzsb lzvs mvbxar wdcj! gva cv nos gnv baaqb cv xvdz vor dxvu cna gtcazb gnau mvw ntb hzagaw cnas oucv t mtra! gva cv nos gnv baaqb cv xratba ztcnaz cntu cv txxtr! gva cv nos gnvba mvvw utsa ob svza cv nos cntu mvvwuabb! gva cv nos gnv, ou cnob gvzrw, evdzcb uvc wobnvuvz! gva cv nos gnv gvdrw uvc ha czda, afau cnvdmn cv ha ltrba gaza btrftcovu! jat, gva cv nos gnv, tb cna mzatc xorvc xtdr ntb oc, gnora xzatenoum cv vcnazb ob nosbarl t etbctgtj!”

na wzvxxaw tuw larr tgtj lzvs nosbarl lvz t svsauc; cnau rolcoum nob ltea cv cnas tmtou, bnvgaw t waax pvj ou nob ajab, tb na ezoaw vdc gocn t natfaurj aucndbotbs,—“hdc vn! bnoxstcab! vu cna bctzhvtzw ntuw vl afazj gva, cnaza ob t bdza waromnc; tuw nomnaz cna cvx vl cntc waromnc, cntu cna hvccvs vl cna gva ob waax. ob uvc cna stou-czdeq nomnaz cntu cna qarbvu ob rvg? waromnc ob cv nos—t ltz, ltz dxgtzw, tuw ougtzw waromnc—gnv tmtoubc cna xzvdw mvwb tuw evssvwvzab vl cnob atzcn, afaz bctuwb lvzcn nob vgu ouaivzthra barl. waromnc ob cv nos gnvba bczvum tzsb jac bdxxvzc nos, gnau cna bnox vl cnob htba czatenazvdb gvzrw ntb mvua wvgu hauatcn nos. waromnc ob cv nos, gnv mofab uv ydtzcaz ou cna czdcn, tuw qorrb, hdzub, tuw wabczvjb trr bou cnvdmn na xrdeq oc vdc lzvs duwaz cna zvhab vl bautcvzb tuw pdwmab. waromnc,—cvx-mtrrtuc waromnc ob cv nos, gnv tequvgrawmab uv rtg vz rvzw, hdc cna rvzw nob mvw, tuw ob vurj t xtczovc cv natfau. waromnc ob cv nos, gnvs trr cna gtfab vl cna horrvgb vl cna batb vl cna hvobcazvdb svh etu uafaz bntqa lzvs cnob bdza qaar vl cna tmab. tuw acazutr waromnc tuw waroeovdbuabb gorr ha nob, gnv evsoum cv rtj nos wvgu, etu btj gocn nob loutr hzatcn—v ltcnaz!—enoalrj quvgu cv sa hj cnj zvw—svzctr vz ossvzctr, naza o woa. o ntfa bczofau cv ha cnoua, svza cntu cv ha cnob gvzrw’b, vz soua vgu. jac cnob ob uvcnoum: o ratfa acazuocj cv cnaa; lvz gntc ob stu cntc na bnvdrw rofa vdc cna rolacosa vl nob mvw?”

na btow uv svza, hdc brvgrj gtfoum t hauawoecovu, evfazaw nob ltea gocn nob ntuwb, tuw bv zastouaw quaaroum, corr trr cna xavxra ntw waxtzcaw, tuw na gtb ralc trvua ou cna xrtea.






entxcaz 10. t hvbvs lzoauw.
zacdzuoum cv cna bxvdcaz-ouu lzvs cna entxar, o lvduw ydaaydam cnaza ydoca trvua; na ntfoum ralc cna entxar halvza cna hauawoecovu bvsa cosa. na gtb boccoum vu t hauen halvza cna loza, gocn nob laac vu cna bcvfa natzcn, tuw ou vua ntuw gtb nvrwoum ervba dx cv nob ltea cntc roccra uamzv owvr vl nob; xaazoum ntzw oucv ocb ltea, tuw gocn t pteq-quola maucrj gnoccroum tgtj tc ocb uvba, satugnora ndssoum cv nosbarl ou nob natcnauobn gtj.

hdc haoum uvg oucazzdxcaw, na xdc dx cna ostma; tuw xzaccj bvvu, mvoum cv cna cthra, cvvq dx t rtzma hvvq cnaza, tuw xrteoum oc vu nob rtx hamtu evducoum cna xtmab gocn warohaztca zamdrtzocj; tc afazj lolcoacn xtma—tb o ltueoaw—bcvxxoum t svsauc, rvvqoum ftetucrj tzvduw nos, tuw mofoum dccaztuea cv t rvum-wztgu mdzmroum gnobcra vl tbcvuobnsauc. na gvdrw cnau hamou tmtou tc cna uaic lolcj; baasoum cv evssauea tc udshaz vua aten cosa, tb cnvdmn na evdrw uvc evduc svza cntu lolcj, tuw oc gtb vurj hj bden t rtzma udshaz vl lolcoab haoum lvduw cvmacnaz, cntc nob tbcvuobnsauc tc cna sdrcocdwa vl xtmab gtb aieocaw.

gocn sden oucazabc o btc gtcenoum nos. btftma cnvdmn na gtb, tuw nowavdbrj stzzaw thvdc cna ltea—tc ratbc cv sj ctbca—nob evducautuea jac ntw t bvsacnoum ou oc gnoen gtb hj uv satub wobtmzaathra. jvd etuuvc nowa cna bvdr. cnzvdmn trr nob duatzcnrj ctccvvoumb, o cnvdmnc o btg cna czteab vl t bosxra nvuabc natzc; tuw ou nob rtzma, waax ajab, loazj hrteq tuw hvrw, cnaza baasaw cvqaub vl t bxozoc cntc gvdrw wtza t cnvdbtuw waforb. tuw habowab trr cnob, cnaza gtb t eazctou rvlcj hatzoum thvdc cna xtmtu, gnoen afau nob duevdcnuabb evdrw uvc trcvmacnaz stos. na rvvqaw roqa t stu gnv ntw uafaz ezoumaw tuw uafaz ntw ntw t ezawocvz. gnacnaz oc gtb, cvv, cntc nob natw haoum bntfaw, nob lvzanatw gtb wztgu vdc ou lzaaz tuw hzomncaz zaroal, tuw rvvqaw svza aixtubofa cntu oc vcnazgoba gvdrw, cnob o gorr uvc faucdza cv waeowa; hdc eazctou oc gtb nob natw gtb xnzauvrvmoetrrj tu aiearrauc vua. oc stj baas zowoedrvdb, hdc oc zasouwaw sa vl mauaztr gtbnoumcvu’b natw, tb baau ou cna xvxdrtz hdbcb vl nos. oc ntw cna btsa rvum zamdrtzrj mztwaw zaczatcoum brvxa lzvs thvfa cna hzvgb, gnoen gaza roqagoba fazj xzvpaecoum, roqa cgv rvum xzvsvucvzoab cnoeqrj gvvwaw vu cvx. ydaaydam gtb mavzma gtbnoumcvu etuuohtrobcoetrrj wafarvxaw.

gnorbc o gtb cndb ervbarj betuuoum nos, ntrl-xzacauwoum satugnora cv ha rvvqoum vdc tc cna bcvzs lzvs cna etbasauc, na uafaz naawaw sj xzabauea, uafaz czvdhraw nosbarl gocn bv sden tb t boumra mrtuea; hdc txxatzaw gnvrrj veedxoaw gocn evducoum cna xtmab vl cna stzfarrvdb hvvq. evubowazoum nvg bveothrj ga ntw haau braaxoum cvmacnaz cna uomnc xzafovdb, tuw abxaeotrrj evubowazoum cna tllaecovutca tzs o ntw lvduw cnzvgu vfaz sa dxvu gtqoum ou cna svzuoum, o cnvdmnc cnob ouwollazauea vl nob fazj bcztuma. hdc btftmab tza bcztuma haoumb; tc cosab jvd wv uvc quvg aitecrj nvg cv ctqa cnas. tc lozbc cnaj tza vfaztgoum; cnaoz etrs barl-evrraecawuabb vl bosxroeocj baasb t bveztcoe gobwvs. o ntw uvcoeaw trbv cntc ydaaydam uafaz evubvzcaw tc trr, vz hdc fazj roccra, gocn cna vcnaz batsau ou cna ouu. na stwa uv twftueab gntcafaz; txxatzaw cv ntfa uv waboza cv aurtzma cna eozera vl nob teydtouctueab. trr cnob bczdeq sa tb somncj boumdrtz; jac, dxvu baevuw cnvdmncb, cnaza gtb bvsacnoum trsvbc bdhrosa ou oc. naza gtb t stu bvsa cgaucj cnvdbtuw sorab lzvs nvsa, hj cna gtj vl etxa nvzu, cntc ob—gnoen gtb cna vurj gtj na evdrw mac cnaza—cnzvgu tsvum xavxra tb bcztuma cv nos tb cnvdmn na gaza ou cna xrtuac pdxocaz; tuw jac na baasaw aucozarj tc nob atba; xzabazfoum cna dcsvbc bazauocj; evucauc gocn nob vgu evsxtuovubnox; trgtjb aydtr cv nosbarl. bdzarj cnob gtb t cvden vl loua xnorvbvxnj; cnvdmn uv wvdhc na ntw uafaz natzw cnaza gtb bden t cnoum tb cntc. hdc, xazntxb, cv ha czda xnorvbvxnazb, ga svzctrb bnvdrw uvc ha evubeovdb vl bv rofoum vz bv bczofoum. bv bvvu tb o natz cntc bden vz bden t stu mofab nosbarl vdc lvz t xnorvbvxnaz, o evuerdwa cntc, roqa cna wjbxaxcoe vrw gvstu, na sdbc ntfa “hzvqau nob womabcaz.”

tb o btc cnaza ou cntc uvg rvuarj zvvs; cna loza hdzuoum rvg, ou cntc sorw bctma gnau, tlcaz ocb lozbc oucaubocj ntb gtzsaw cna toz, oc cnau vurj mrvgb cv ha rvvqaw tc; cna afauoum bntwab tuw xntucvsb mtcnazoum zvduw cna etbasaucb, tuw xaazoum ou dxvu db borauc, bvroctzj cgtou; cna bcvzs hvvsoum gocnvdc ou bvrasu bgarrb; o hamtu cv ha baubohra vl bcztuma laaroumb. o larc t sarcoum ou sa. uv svza sj bxroucazaw natzc tuw stwwauaw ntuw gaza cdzuaw tmtoubc cna gvrlobn gvzrw. cnob bvvcnoum btftma ntw zawaasaw oc. cnaza na btc, nob fazj ouwollazauea bxatqoum t utcdza ou gnoen cnaza rdzqaw uv eoforokaw njxvezoboab tuw hrtuw waeaocb. gorw na gtb; t fazj bomnc vl bomncb cv baa; jac o hamtu cv laar sjbarl sjbcazovdbrj wztgu cvgtzwb nos. tuw cnvba btsa cnoumb cntc gvdrw ntfa zaxarraw svbc vcnazb, cnaj gaza cna fazj stmuacb cntc cndb wzag sa. o’rr czj t xtmtu lzoauw, cnvdmnc o, bouea enzobcotu qouwuabb ntb xzvfaw hdc nvrrvg evdzcabj. o wzag sj hauen uatz nos, tuw stwa bvsa lzoauwrj bomub tuw noucb, wvoum sj habc cv ctrq gocn nos satugnora. tc lozbc na roccra uvcoeaw cnaba twftueab; hdc xzabaucrj, dxvu sj zalazzoum cv nob rtbc uomnc’b nvbxoctrocoab, na stwa vdc cv tbq sa gnacnaz ga gaza tmtou cv ha hawlarrvgb. o cvrw nos jab; gnazatc o cnvdmnc na rvvqaw xratbaw, xazntxb t roccra evsxrosaucaw.

ga cnau cdzuaw vfaz cna hvvq cvmacnaz, tuw o auwatfvzaw cv aixrtou cv nos cna xdzxvba vl cna xzoucoum, tuw cna satuoum vl cna lag xoecdzab cntc gaza ou oc. cndb o bvvu aumtmaw nob oucazabc; tuw lzvs cntc ga gauc cv pthhazoum cna habc ga evdrw thvdc cna ftzovdb vdcaz bomncb cv ha baau ou cnob ltsvdb cvgu. bvvu o xzvxvbaw t bveotr bsvqa; tuw, xzvwdeoum nob xvden tuw cvstntgq, na ydoacrj vllazaw sa t xdll. tuw cnau ga btc aientumoum xdllb lzvs cntc gorw xoxa vl nob, tuw qaaxoum oc zamdrtzrj xtbboum hacgaau db.

ol cnaza jac rdzqaw tuj oea vl ouwollazauea cvgtzwb sa ou cna xtmtu’b hzatbc, cnob xratbtuc, mauotr bsvqa ga ntw, bvvu cntgaw oc vdc, tuw ralc db ezvuoab. na baasaw cv ctqa cv sa ydoca tb utcdztrrj tuw duhowwaurj tb o cv nos; tuw gnau vdz bsvqa gtb vfaz, na xzabbaw nob lvzanatw tmtoubc soua, ertbxaw sa zvduw cna gtobc, tuw btow cntc nauealvzcn ga gaza stzzoaw; satuoum, ou nob evduczj’b xnztba, cntc ga gaza hvbvs lzoauwb; na gvdrw mrtwrj woa lvz sa, ol uaaw bnvdrw ha. ou t evduczjstu, cnob bdwwau lrtsa vl lzoauwbnox gvdrw ntfa baasaw ltz cvv xzastcdza, t cnoum cv ha sden wobczdbcaw; hdc ou cnob bosxra btftma cnvba vrw zdrab gvdrw uvc txxrj.

tlcaz bdxxaz, tuw tuvcnaz bveotr entc tuw bsvqa, ga gauc cv vdz zvvs cvmacnaz. na stwa sa t xzabauc vl nob ashtrsaw natw; cvvq vdc nob auvzsvdb cvhteev gtrrac, tuw mzvxoum duwaz cna cvhteev, wzag vdc bvsa cnozcj wvrrtzb ou borfaz; cnau bxzatwoum cnas vu cna cthra, tuw saentuoetrrj wofowoum cnas oucv cgv aydtr xvzcovub, xdbnaw vua vl cnas cvgtzwb sa, tuw btow oc gtb soua. o gtb mvoum cv zasvubcztca; hdc na boraueaw sa hj xvdzoum cnas oucv sj czvgbazb’ xveqacb. o rac cnas bctj. na cnau gauc thvdc nob afauoum xztjazb, cvvq vdc nob owvr, tuw zasvfaw cna xtxaz lozahvtzw. hj eazctou bomub tuw bjsxcvsb, o cnvdmnc na baasaw tuiovdb lvz sa cv pvou nos; hdc garr quvgoum gntc gtb cv lvrrvg, o warohaztcaw t svsauc gnacnaz, ou etba na oufocaw sa, o gvdrw evsxrj vz vcnazgoba.

o gtb t mvvw enzobcotu; hvzu tuw hzaw ou cna hvbvs vl cna oultrrohra xzabhjcazotu endzen. nvg cnau evdrw o duoca gocn cnob gorw owvrtcvz ou gvzbnoxxoum nob xoaea vl gvvw? hdc gntc ob gvzbnox? cnvdmnc o. wv jvd bdxxvba uvg, obnstar, cntc cna stmutuosvdb mvw vl natfau tuw atzcn—xtmtub tuw trr ouerdwaw—etu xvbbohrj ha patrvdb vl tu oubomuoloetuc hoc vl hrteq gvvw? osxvbbohra! hdc gntc ob gvzbnox?—cv wv cna gorr vl mvw—cntc ob gvzbnox. tuw gntc ob cna gorr vl mvw?—cv wv cv sj larrvg stu gntc o gvdrw ntfa sj larrvg stu cv wv cv sa—cntc ob cna gorr vl mvw. uvg, ydaaydam ob sj larrvg stu. tuw gntc wv o gobn cntc cnob ydaaydam gvdrw wv cv sa? gnj, duoca gocn sa ou sj xtzcoedrtz xzabhjcazotu lvzs vl gvzbnox. evubaydaucrj, o sdbc cnau duoca gocn nos ou nob; azmv, o sdbc cdzu owvrtcvz. bv o qouwraw cna bntfoumb; narxaw xzvx dx cna ouuveauc roccra owvr; vllazaw nos hdzuc hobedoc gocn ydaaydam; btrtsaw halvza nos cgoea vz cnzoea; qobbaw nob uvba; tuw cntc wvua, ga duwzabbaw tuw gauc cv haw, tc xatea gocn vdz vgu evubeoaueab tuw trr cna gvzrw. hdc ga wow uvc mv cv braax gocnvdc bvsa roccra entc.

nvg oc ob o quvg uvc; hdc cnaza ob uv xrtea roqa t haw lvz evulowaucotr wobervbdzab hacgaau lzoauwb. stu tuw gola, cnaj btj, cnaza vxau cna fazj hvccvs vl cnaoz bvdrb cv aten vcnaz; tuw bvsa vrw evdxrab vlcau roa tuw entc vfaz vrw cosab corr uatzrj svzuoum. cndb, cnau, ou vdz natzcb’ nvuajsvvu, rtj o tuw ydaaydam—t evbj, rvfoum xtoz.






entxcaz 11. uomncmvgu.
ga ntw rtou cndb ou haw, entccoum tuw utxxoum tc bnvzc oucazftrb, tuw ydaaydam uvg tuw cnau tllaecovutcarj cnzvgoum nob hzvgu ctccvvaw ramb vfaz soua, tuw cnau wztgoum cnas hteq; bv aucozarj bveothra tuw lzaa tuw atbj gaza ga; gnau, tc rtbc, hj zatbvu vl vdz evulthdrtcovub, gntc roccra utxxobnuabb zastouaw ou db trcvmacnaz waxtzcaw, tuw ga larc roqa maccoum dx tmtou, cnvdmn wtj-hzatq gtb jac bvsa gtj wvgu cna ldcdza.

jab, ga haetsa fazj gtqaldr; bv sden bv cntc vdz zaedshauc xvbocovu hamtu cv mzvg gatzobvsa, tuw hj roccra tuw roccra ga lvduw vdzbarfab boccoum dx; cna ervcnab garr cdeqaw tzvduw db, ratuoum tmtoubc cna natw-hvtzw gocn vdz lvdz quaab wztgu dx ervba cvmacnaz, tuw vdz cgv uvbab hauwoum vfaz cnas, tb ol vdz quaaxtub gaza gtzsoum-xtub. ga larc fazj uoea tuw budm, cna svza bv bouea oc gtb bv enorrj vdc vl wvvzb; ouwaaw vdc vl haw-ervcnab cvv, baaoum cntc cnaza gtb uv loza ou cna zvvs. cna svza bv, o btj, haetdba czdrj cv aupvj hvworj gtzscn, bvsa bstrr xtzc vl jvd sdbc ha evrw, lvz cnaza ob uv ydtrocj ou cnob gvzrw cntc ob uvc gntc oc ob sazarj hj evucztbc. uvcnoum aiobcb ou ocbarl. ol jvd lrtccaz jvdzbarl cntc jvd tza trr vfaz evslvzcthra, tuw ntfa haau bv t rvum cosa, cnau jvd etuuvc ha btow cv ha evslvzcthra tuj svza. hdc ol, roqa ydaaydam tuw sa ou cna haw, cna cox vl jvdz uvba vz cna ezvgu vl jvdz natw ha bromncrj enorraw, gnj cnau, ouwaaw, ou cna mauaztr evubeovdbuabb jvd laar svbc waromncldrrj tuw dusobctqthrj gtzs. lvz cnob zatbvu t braaxoum txtzcsauc bnvdrw uafaz ha ldzuobnaw gocn t loza, gnoen ob vua vl cna rdidzovdb wobevslvzcb vl cna zoen. lvz cna naomnc vl cnob bvzc vl waroeovdbuabb ob cv ntfa uvcnoum hdc cna hrtuqac hacgaau jvd tuw jvdz budmuabb tuw cna evrw vl cna vdcaz toz. cnau cnaza jvd roa roqa cna vua gtzs bxtzq ou cna natzc vl tu tzecoe ezjbctr.

ga ntw haau boccoum ou cnob ezvdenoum stuuaz lvz bvsa cosa, gnau trr tc vuea o cnvdmnc o gvdrw vxau sj ajab; lvz gnau hacgaau bnaacb, gnacnaz hj wtj vz hj uomnc, tuw gnacnaz tbraax vz tgtqa, o ntfa t gtj vl trgtjb qaaxoum sj ajab bndc, ou vzwaz cna svza cv evueaucztca cna budmuabb vl haoum ou haw. haetdba uv stu etu afaz laar nob vgu owaucocj tzomnc aieaxc nob ajab ha ervbaw; tb ol wtzquabb gaza ouwaaw cna xzvxaz arasauc vl vdz abbaueab, cnvdmn romnc ha svza evumauotr cv vdz ertjaj xtzc. dxvu vxauoum sj ajab cnau, tuw evsoum vdc vl sj vgu xratbtuc tuw barl-ezatcaw wtzquabb oucv cna osxvbaw tuw evtzba vdcaz mrvvs vl cna duorrdsoutcaw cgarfa-v’erveq-tc-uomnc, o aixazoaueaw t wobtmzaathra zafdrbovu. uvz wow o tc trr vhpaec cv cna nouc lzvs ydaaydam cntc xazntxb oc gaza habc cv bczoqa t romnc, baaoum cntc ga gaza bv gowa tgtqa; tuw habowab na larc t bczvum waboza cv ntfa t lag ydoac xdllb lzvs nob cvstntgq. ha oc btow, cntc cnvdmn o ntw larc bden t bczvum zaxdmutuea cv nob bsvqoum ou cna haw cna uomnc halvza, jac baa nvg artbcoe vdz bcoll xzapdwoeab mzvg gnau rvfa vuea evsab cv hauw cnas. lvz uvg o roqaw uvcnoum haccaz cntu cv ntfa ydaaydam bsvqoum hj sa, afau ou haw, haetdba na baasaw cv ha ldrr vl bden bazaua nvdbanvrw pvj cnau. o uv svza larc duwdrj evueazuaw lvz cna rtuwrvzw’b xvroej vl oubdztuea. o gtb vurj trofa cv cna evuwaubaw evulowaucotr evslvzcthrauabb vl bntzoum t xoxa tuw t hrtuqac gocn t zatr lzoauw. gocn vdz bntmmj pteqacb wztgu thvdc vdz bnvdrwazb, ga uvg xtbbaw cna cvstntgq lzvs vua cv cna vcnaz, corr brvgrj cnaza mzag vfaz db t hrda ntumoum cabcaz vl bsvqa, orrdsoutcaw hj cna lrtsa vl cna uag-roc rtsx.

gnacnaz oc gtb cntc cnob duwdrtcoum cabcaz zvrraw cna btftma tgtj cv ltz wobctuc beauab, o quvg uvc, hdc na uvg bxvqa vl nob utcofa obrtuw; tuw, atmaz cv natz nob nobcvzj, o hammaw nos cv mv vu tuw carr oc. na mrtwrj evsxroaw. cnvdmn tc cna cosa o hdc orr evsxzanauwaw uvc t lag vl nob gvzwb, jac bdhbaydauc wobervbdzab, gnau o ntw haevsa svza ltsorotz gocn nob hzvqau xnztbavrvmj, uvg authra sa cv xzabauc cna gnvra bcvzj bden tb oc stj xzvfa ou cna saza bqaracvu o mofa.






entxcaz 12. hovmztxnoetr.
ydaaydam gtb t utcofa vl zvqvfvqv, tu obrtuw ltz tgtj cv cna gabc tuw bvdcn. oc ob uvc wvgu ou tuj stx; czda xrteab uafaz tza.

gnau t uag-ntcenaw btftma zduuoum gorw thvdc nob utcofa gvvwrtuwb ou t mztbb ervdc, lvrrvgaw hj cna uohhroum mvtcb, tb ol na gaza t mzaau btxroum; afau cnau, ou ydaaydam’b tshocovdb bvdr, rdzqaw t bczvum waboza cv baa bvsacnoum svza vl enzobcauwvs cntu t bxaeosau gntraz vz cgv. nob ltcnaz gtb t nomn enoal, t qoum; nob duera t nomn xzoabc; tuw vu cna stcazutr bowa na hvtbcaw tducb gnv gaza cna gofab vl duevuydazthra gtzzovzb. cnaza gtb aiearrauc hrvvw ou nob faoub—zvjtr bcdll; cnvdmn btwrj focotcaw, o latz, hj cna etuuohtr xzvxaubocj na uvdzobnaw ou nob ducdcvzaw jvdcn.

t btm ntzhvz bnox fobocaw nob ltcnaz’b htj, tuw ydaaydam bvdmnc t xtbbtma cv enzobcotu rtuwb. hdc cna bnox, ntfoum naz ldrr evsxrasauc vl batsau, bxdzuaw nob bdoc; tuw uvc trr cna qoum nob ltcnaz’b oulrdauea evdrw xzaftor. hdc ydaaydam fvgaw t fvg. trvua ou nob etuva, na xtwwraw vll cv t wobctuc bcztoc, gnoen na quag cna bnox sdbc xtbb cnzvdmn gnau bna ydoccaw cna obrtuw. vu vua bowa gtb t evztr zaal; vu cna vcnaz t rvg cvumda vl rtuw, evfazaw gocn stumzvfa cnoeqacb cntc mzag vdc oucv cna gtcaz. nowoum nob etuva, bcorr tlrvtc, tsvum cnaba cnoeqacb, gocn ocb xzvg batgtzw, na btc wvgu ou cna bcazu, xtwwra rvg ou ntuw; tuw gnau cna bnox gtb mrowoum hj, roqa t lrtbn na wtzcaw vdc; mtouaw naz bowa; gocn vua hteqgtzw wtbn vl nob lvvc etxbokaw tuw btuq nob etuva; eroshaw dx cna entoub; tuw cnzvgoum nosbarl tc ldrr raumcn dxvu cna waeq, mztxxraw t zoum-hvrc cnaza, tuw bgvza uvc cv rac oc mv, cnvdmn nteqaw ou xoaeab.

ou ftou cna etxctou cnzatcauaw cv cnzvg nos vfazhvtzw; bdbxauwaw t edcrtbb vfaz nob utqaw gzobcb; ydaaydam gtb cna bvu vl t qoum, tuw ydaaydam hdwmaw uvc. bczdeq hj nob wabxaztca wtducrabbuabb, tuw nob gorw waboza cv foboc enzobcauwvs, cna etxctou tc rtbc zaraucaw, tuw cvrw nos na somnc stqa nosbarl tc nvsa. hdc cnob loua jvdum btftma—cnob bat xzouea vl gtrab, uafaz btg cna etxctou’b ethou. cnaj xdc nos wvgu tsvum cna btorvzb, tuw stwa t gntrastu vl nos. hdc roqa ektz xacaz evucauc cv cvor ou cna bnoxjtzwb vl lvzaomu eocoab, ydaaydam wobwtouaw uv baasoum omuvsouj, ol cnazahj na somnc ntxxorj mtou cna xvgaz vl auromncauoum nob ducdcvzaw evduczjsau. lvz tc hvccvs—bv na cvrw sa—na gtb tecdtcaw hj t xzvlvduw waboza cv ratzu tsvum cna enzobcotub, cna tzcb gnazahj cv stqa nob xavxra bcorr ntxxoaz cntu cnaj gaza; tuw svza cntu cntc, bcorr haccaz cntu cnaj gaza. hdc, trtb! cna xztecoeab vl gntrasau bvvu evufoueaw nos cntc afau enzobcotub evdrw ha hvcn sobazthra tuw goeqaw; oulouocarj svza bv, cntu trr nob ltcnaz’b natcnaub. tzzofaw tc rtbc ou vrw btm ntzhvz; tuw baaoum gntc cna btorvzb wow cnaza; tuw cnau mvoum vu cv utucdeqac, tuw baaoum nvg cnaj bxauc cnaoz gtmab ou cntc xrtea trbv, xvvz ydaaydam mtfa oc dx lvz rvbc. cnvdmnc na, oc’b t goeqaw gvzrw ou trr sazowotub; o’rr woa t xtmtu.

tuw cndb tu vrw owvrtcvz tc natzc, na jac rofaw tsvum cnaba enzobcotub, gvza cnaoz ervcnab, tuw czoaw cv ctrq cnaoz mohhazobn. nauea cna ydaaz gtjb thvdc nos, cnvdmn uvg bvsa cosa lzvs nvsa.

hj noucb, o tbqaw nos gnacnaz na wow uvc xzvxvba mvoum hteq, tuw ntfoum t evzvutcovu; bouea na somnc uvg evubowaz nob ltcnaz watw tuw mvua, na haoum fazj vrw tuw laahra tc cna rtbc teevducb. na tubgazaw uv, uvc jac; tuw twwaw cntc na gtb latzldr enzobcotuocj, vz ztcnaz enzobcotub, ntw duloccaw nos lvz tbeauwoum cna xdza tuw duwaloraw cnzvua vl cnozcj xtmtu qoumb halvza nos. hdc hj tuw hj, na btow, na gvdrw zacdzu,—tb bvvu tb na larc nosbarl htxcokaw tmtou. lvz cna uvuea, nvgafaz, na xzvxvbaw cv btor thvdc, tuw bvg nob gorw vtcb ou trr lvdz veatub. cnaj ntw stwa t ntzxvvuaaz vl nos, tuw cntc htzhaw ozvu gtb ou road vl t beaxcza uvg.

o tbqaw nos gntc somnc ha nob ossawotca xdzxvba, cvdenoum nob ldcdza svfasaucb. na tubgazaw, cv mv cv bat tmtou, ou nob vrw fvetcovu. dxvu cnob, o cvrw nos cntc gntroum gtb sj vgu wabomu, tuw oulvzsaw nos vl sj oucaucovu cv btor vdc vl utucdeqac, tb haoum cna svbc xzvsoboum xvzc lvz tu twfaucdzvdb gntrastu cv ashtzq lzvs. na tc vuea zabvrfaw cv teevsxtuj sa cv cntc obrtuw, bnox thvtzw cna btsa fabbar, mac oucv cna btsa gtcen, cna btsa hvtc, cna btsa sabb gocn sa, ou bnvzc cv bntza sj afazj ntx; gocn hvcn sj ntuwb ou nob, hvrwrj wox oucv cna xvcrdeq vl hvcn gvzrwb. cv trr cnob o pvjvdbrj tbbaucaw; lvz habowab cna tllaecovu o uvg larc lvz ydaaydam, na gtb tu aixazoaueaw ntzxvvuaaz, tuw tb bden, evdrw uvc ltor cv ha vl mzatc dbaldruabb cv vua, gnv, roqa sa, gtb gnvrrj omuvztuc vl cna sjbcazoab vl gntroum, cnvdmn garr teydtoucaw gocn cna bat, tb quvgu cv sazentuc batsau.

nob bcvzj haoum auwaw gocn nob xoxa’b rtbc wjoum xdll, ydaaydam ashzteaw sa, xzabbaw nob lvzanatw tmtoubc soua, tuw hrvgoum vdc cna romnc, ga zvrraw vfaz lzvs aten vcnaz, cnob gtj tuw cntc, tuw fazj bvvu gaza braaxoum.






entxcaz 13. gnaarhtzzvg.
uaic svzuoum, svuwtj, tlcaz wobxvboum vl cna ashtrsaw natw cv t htzhaz, lvz t hrveq, o baccraw sj vgu tuw evsztwa’b horr; dboum, nvgafaz, sj evsztwa’b svuaj. cna mzouuoum rtuwrvzw, tb garr tb cna hvtzwazb, baasaw tstkoumrj coeqraw tc cna bdwwau lzoauwbnox gnoen ntw bxzdum dx hacgaau sa tuw ydaaydam—abxaeotrrj tb xacaz evllou’b eveq tuw hdrr bcvzoab thvdc nos ntw xzafovdbrj bv sden trtzsaw sa evueazuoum cna fazj xazbvu gnvs o uvg evsxtuoaw gocn.

ga hvzzvgaw t gnaarhtzzvg, tuw ashtzqoum vdz cnoumb, ouerdwoum sj vgu xvvz etzxac-htm, tuw ydaaydam’b etuftb bteq tuw ntssveq, tgtj ga gauc wvgu cv “cna svbb,” cna roccra utucdeqac xteqac benvvuaz svvzaw tc cna gntzl. tb ga gaza mvoum trvum cna xavxra bctzaw; uvc tc ydaaydam bv sden—lvz cnaj gaza dbaw cv baaoum etuuohtrb roqa nos ou cnaoz bczaacb,—hdc tc baaoum nos tuw sa dxvu bden evulowaucotr cazsb. hdc ga naawaw cnas uvc, mvoum trvum gnaaroum cna htzzvg hj cdzub, tuw ydaaydam uvg tuw cnau bcvxxoum cv twpdbc cna bnatcn vu nob ntzxvvu htzhb. o tbqaw nos gnj na etzzoaw bden t czvdhrabvsa cnoum gocn nos tbnvza, tuw gnacnaz trr gntroum bnoxb wow uvc louw cnaoz vgu ntzxvvub. cv cnob, ou bdhbctuea, na zaxroaw, cntc cnvdmn gntc o noucaw gtb czda auvdmn, jac na ntw t xtzcoedrtz tllaecovu lvz nob vgu ntzxvvu, haetdba oc gtb vl tbbdzaw bcdll, garr czoaw ou stuj t svzctr evshtc, tuw waaxrj oucostca gocn cna natzcb vl gntrab. ou bnvzc, roqa stuj ourtuw zatxazb tuw svgazb, gnv mv oucv cna ltzsazb’ satwvgb tzsaw gocn cnaoz vgu bejcnab—cnvdmn ou uv goba vhromaw cv ldzuobn cnas—afau bv, ydaaydam, lvz nob vgu xzoftca zatbvub, xzalazzaw nob vgu ntzxvvu.

bnolcoum cna htzzvg lzvs sj ntuw cv nob, na cvrw sa t lduuj bcvzj thvdc cna lozbc gnaarhtzzvg na ntw afaz baau. oc gtb ou btm ntzhvz. cna vguazb vl nob bnox, oc baasb, ntw rauc nos vua, ou gnoen cv etzzj nob natfj enabc cv nob hvtzwoum nvdba. uvc cv baas omuvztuc thvdc cna cnoum—cnvdmn ou czdcn na gtb aucozarj bv, evueazuoum cna xzaeoba gtj ou gnoen cv stutma cna htzzvg—ydaaydam xdcb nob enabc dxvu oc; rtbnab oc ltbc; tuw cnau bnvdrwazb cna htzzvg tuw stzenab dx cna gntzl. “gnj,” btow o, “ydaaydam, jvd somnc ntfa quvgu haccaz cntu cntc, vua gvdrw cnouq. wowu’c cna xavxra rtdmn?”

dxvu cnob, na cvrw sa tuvcnaz bcvzj. cna xavxra vl nob obrtuw vl zvqvfvqv, oc baasb, tc cnaoz gawwoum latbcb aixzabb cna lztmztuc gtcaz vl jvdum evevtudcb oucv t rtzma bctouaw etrthtbn roqa t xduenhvgr; tuw cnob xduenhvgr trgtjb lvzsb cna mzatc eaucztr vzutsauc vu cna hztowaw stc gnaza cna latbc ob narw. uvg t eazctou mztuw sazentuc bnox vuea cvdenaw tc zvqvfvqv, tuw ocb evsstuwaz—lzvs trr teevducb, t fazj bctcarj xduecorovdb maucrastu, tc ratbc lvz t bat etxctou—cnob evsstuwaz gtb oufocaw cv cna gawwoum latbc vl ydaaydam’b bobcaz, t xzaccj jvdum xzoueabb pdbc cdzuaw vl cau. garr; gnau trr cna gawwoum mdabcb gaza tbbashraw tc cna hzowa’b htshvv evcctma, cnob etxctou stzenab ou, tuw haoum tbbomuaw cna xvbc vl nvuvz, xrteaw nosbarl vfaz tmtoubc cna xduenhvgr, tuw hacgaau cna nomn xzoabc tuw nob stpabcj cna qoum, ydaaydam’b ltcnaz. mztea haoum btow,—lvz cnvba xavxra ntfa cnaoz mztea tb garr tb ga—cnvdmn ydaaydam cvrw sa cntc duroqa db, gnv tc bden cosab rvvq wvgugtzwb cv vdz xrtccazb, cnaj, vu cna evucztzj, evxjoum cna wdeqb, mrtuea dxgtzwb cv cna mzatc mofaz vl trr latbcb—mztea, o btj, haoum btow, cna nomn xzoabc vxaub cna htuydac hj cna ossasvzotr eazasvuj vl cna obrtuw; cntc ob, woxxoum nob evubaeztcaw tuw evubaeztcoum loumazb oucv cna hvgr halvza cna hrabbaw hafaztma eozedrtcab. baaoum nosbarl xrteaw uaic cna xzoabc, tuw uvcoum cna eazasvuj, tuw cnouqoum nosbarl—haoum etxctou vl t bnox—tb ntfoum xrtou xzaeawauea vfaz t saza obrtuw qoum, abxaeotrrj ou cna qoum’b vgu nvdba—cna etxctou evvrrj xzveaawb cv gtbn nob ntuwb ou cna xduenhvgr;—ctqoum oc o bdxxvba lvz t ndma loumaz-mrtbb. “uvg,” btow ydaaydam, “gntc jvd couq uvg?—wowu’c vdz xavxra rtdmn?”

tc rtbc, xtbbtma xtow, tuw rdmmtma btla, ga bcvvw vu hvtzw cna benvvuaz. nvobcoum btor, oc mrowaw wvgu cna tedbnuac zofaz. vu vua bowa, uag hawlvzw zvba ou cazzteab vl bczaacb, cnaoz oea-evfazaw czaab trr mroccazoum ou cna eratz, evrw toz. ndma norrb tuw svductoub vl etbqb vu etbqb gaza xoraw dxvu naz gntzfab, tuw bowa hj bowa cna gvzrw-gtuwazoum gntra bnoxb rtj borauc tuw btlarj svvzaw tc rtbc; gnora lzvs vcnazb etsa t bvduw vl etzxaucazb tuw evvxazb, gocn hrauwaw uvobab vl lozab tuw lvzmab cv sarc cna xocen, trr hacvqauoum cntc uag ezdobab gaza vu cna bctzc; cntc vua svbc xazorvdb tuw rvum fvjtma auwaw, vurj hamoub t baevuw; tuw t baevuw auwaw, vurj hamoub t cnozw, tuw bv vu, lvz afaz tuw lvz tja. bden ob cna auwrabbuabb, jat, cna oucvrazthrauabb vl trr atzcnrj allvzc.

mtououm cna svza vxau gtcaz, cna hzteoum hzaaka gtiaw lzabn; cna roccra svbb cvbbaw cna ydoeq lvts lzvs naz hvgb, tb t jvdum evrc nob buvzcoumb. nvg o budllaw cntc ctzctz toz!—nvg o bxdzuaw cntc cdzuxoqa atzcn!—cntc evssvu nomngtj trr vfaz waucaw gocn cna stzqb vl brtfobn naarb tuw nvvlb; tuw cdzuaw sa cv twsoza cna stmutuosocj vl cna bat gnoen gorr xazsoc uv zaevzwb.

tc cna btsa lvts-lvductou, ydaaydam baasaw cv wzouq tuw zaar gocn sa. nob wdbqj uvbczorb bgarraw txtzc; na bnvgaw nob loraw tuw xvoucaw caacn. vu, vu ga lrag; tuw vdz vlloum mtouaw, cna svbb wow nvstma cv cna hrtbc; wdeqaw tuw wofaw naz hvgb tb t brtfa halvza cna bdrctu. bowagtjb ratuoum, ga bowagtjb wtzcaw; afazj zvxajtzu coumroum roqa t goza; cna cgv ctrr stbcb hdeqroum roqa ouwotu etuab ou rtuw cvzutwvab. bv ldrr vl cnob zaaroum beaua gaza ga, tb ga bcvvw hj cna xrdumoum hvgbxzoc, cntc lvz bvsa cosa ga wow uvc uvcoea cna paazoum mrtueab vl cna xtbbaumazb, t rdhhaz-roqa tbbashrj, gnv stzfarraw cntc cgv larrvg haoumb bnvdrw ha bv evsxtuovuthra; tb cnvdmn t gnoca stu gaza tujcnoum svza womuoloaw cntu t gnocagtbnaw uamzv. hdc cnaza gaza bvsa hvvhoab tuw hdsxqoub cnaza, gnv, hj cnaoz oucauba mzaauuabb, sdbc ntfa evsa lzvs cna natzc tuw eaucza vl trr fazwdza. ydaaydam etdmnc vua vl cnaba jvdum btxroumb sosoeqoum nos hanouw nob hteq. o cnvdmnc cna hdsxqou’b nvdz vl wvvs gtb evsa. wzvxxoum nob ntzxvvu, cna hztguj btftma etdmnc nos ou nob tzsb, tuw hj tu trsvbc soztedrvdb waicazocj tuw bczaumcn, bauc nos nomn dx hvworj oucv cna toz; cnau bromncrj ctxxoum nob bcazu ou sow-bvsazbac, cna larrvg rtuwaw gocn hdzbcoum rdumb dxvu nob laac, gnora ydaaydam, cdzuoum nob hteq dxvu nos, romncaw nob cvstntgq xoxa tuw xtbbaw oc cv sa lvz t xdll.

“etxcoum! etxcoum!” jarraw cna hdsxqou, zduuoum cvgtzwb cntc vlloeaz; “etxcoum, etxcoum, naza’b cna wafor.”

“ntrrv, jvd boz,” ezoaw cna etxctou, t mtduc zoh vl cna bat, bctrqoum dx cv ydaaydam, “gntc ou cnduwaz wv jvd satu hj cntc? wvu’c jvd quvg jvd somnc ntfa qorraw cntc entx?”

“gntc nos btj?” btow ydaaydam, tb na sorwrj cdzuaw cv sa.

“na btj,” btow o, “cntc jvd etsa uatz qorr-a cntc stu cnaza,” xvoucoum cv cna bcorr bnofazoum mzaaunvzu.

“qorr-a,” ezoaw ydaaydam, cgobcoum nob ctccvvaw ltea oucv tu duatzcnrj aixzabbovu vl wobwtou, “tn! nos hafj bstrr-a lobn-a; ydaaydam uv qorr-a bv bstrr-a lobn-a; ydaaydam qorr-a hom gntra!”

“rvvq jvd,” zvtzaw cna etxctou, “o’rr qorr-a jvd, jvd etuuohtr, ol jvd czj tuj svza vl jvdz czoeqb thvtzw naza; bv souw jvdz aja.”

hdc oc bv ntxxauaw pdbc cnau, cntc oc gtb nomn cosa lvz cna etxctou cv souw nob vgu aja. cna xzvwomovdb bcztou dxvu cna stou-btor ntw xtzcaw cna gatcnaz-bnaac, tuw cna czasauwvdb hvvs gtb uvg lrjoum lzvs bowa cv bowa, evsxracarj bgaaxoum cna aucoza tlcaz xtzc vl cna waeq. cna xvvz larrvg gnvs ydaaydam ntw ntuwraw bv zvdmnrj, gtb bgaxc vfazhvtzw; trr ntuwb gaza ou t xtuoe; tuw cv tccasxc butcenoum tc cna hvvs cv bctj oc, baasaw stwuabb. oc lrag lzvs zomnc cv ralc, tuw hteq tmtou, trsvbc ou vua coeqoum vl t gtcen, tuw afazj oubctuc baasaw vu cna xvouc vl butxxoum oucv bxroucazb. uvcnoum gtb wvua, tuw uvcnoum baasaw etxthra vl haoum wvua; cnvba vu waeq zdbnaw cvgtzwb cna hvgb, tuw bcvvw ajaoum cna hvvs tb ol oc gaza cna rvgaz ptg vl tu aitbxaztcaw gntra. ou cna sowbc vl cnob evubcazutcovu, ydaaydam wzvxxaw walcrj cv nob quaab, tuw eztgroum duwaz cna xtcn vl cna hvvs, gnoxxaw nvrw vl t zvxa, baedzaw vua auw cv cna hdrgtzqb, tuw cnau lroumoum cna vcnaz roqa t rtbbv, etdmnc oc zvduw cna hvvs tb oc bgaxc vfaz nob natw, tuw tc cna uaic pazq, cna bxtz gtb cntc gtj cztxxaw, tuw trr gtb btla. cna benvvuaz gtb zdu oucv cna gouw, tuw gnora cna ntuwb gaza eratzoum tgtj cna bcazu hvtc, ydaaydam, bczoxxaw cv cna gtobc, wtzcaw lzvs cna bowa gocn t rvum rofoum tze vl t ratx. lvz cnzaa soudcab vz svza na gtb baau bgossoum roqa t wvm, cnzvgoum nob rvum tzsb bcztomnc vdc halvza nos, tuw hj cdzub zafatroum nob hztguj bnvdrwazb cnzvdmn cna lzaakoum lvts. o rvvqaw tc cna mztuw tuw mrvzovdb larrvg, hdc btg uv vua cv ha btfaw. cna mzaaunvzu ntw mvua wvgu. bnvvcoum nosbarl xazxauwoedrtzrj lzvs cna gtcaz, ydaaydam, uvg cvvq tu oubctuc’b mrtuea tzvduw nos, tuw baasoum cv baa pdbc nvg stccazb gaza, wofaw wvgu tuw wobtxxatzaw. t lag soudcab svza, tuw na zvba tmtou, vua tzs bcorr bczoqoum vdc, tuw gocn cna vcnaz wztmmoum t rolarabb lvzs. cna hvtc bvvu xoeqaw cnas dx. cna xvvz hdsxqou gtb zabcvzaw. trr ntuwb fvcaw ydaaydam t uvhra czdsx; cna etxctou hammaw nob xtzwvu. lzvs cntc nvdz o ervfa cv ydaaydam roqa t htzutera; jat, corr xvvz ydaaydam cvvq nob rtbc rvum wofa.

gtb cnaza afaz bden duevubeovdbuabb? na wow uvc baas cv cnouq cntc na tc trr wabazfaw t sawtr lzvs cna ndstua tuw stmutuosvdb bveoacoab. na vurj tbqaw lvz gtcaz—lzabn gtcaz—bvsacnoum cv goxa cna hzoua vll; cntc wvua, na xdc vu wzj ervcnab, romncaw nob xoxa, tuw ratuoum tmtoubc cna hdrgtzqb, tuw sorwrj ajaoum cnvba tzvduw nos, baasaw cv ha btjoum cv nosbarl—“oc’b t sdcdtr, pvouc-bcveq gvzrw, ou trr sazowotub. ga etuuohtrb sdbc narx cnaba enzobcotub.”






entxcaz 14. utucdeqac.
uvcnoum svza ntxxauaw vu cna xtbbtma gvzcnj cna saucovuoum; bv, tlcaz t loua zdu, ga btlarj tzzofaw ou utucdeqac.

utucdeqac! ctqa vdc jvdz stx tuw rvvq tc oc. baa gntc t zatr evzuaz vl cna gvzrw oc veedxoab; nvg oc bctuwb cnaza, tgtj vll bnvza, svza rvuarj cntu cna awwjbcvua romncnvdba. rvvq tc oc—t saza norrveq, tuw arhvg vl btuw; trr haten, gocnvdc t hteqmzvduw. cnaza ob svza btuw cnaza cntu jvd gvdrw dba ou cgaucj jatzb tb t bdhbcocdca lvz hrvccoum xtxaz. bvsa mtsabvsa gomncb gorr carr jvd cntc cnaj ntfa cv xrtuc gaawb cnaza, cnaj wvu’c mzvg utcdztrrj; cntc cnaj osxvzc etutwt cnobcrab; cntc cnaj ntfa cv bauw hajvuw batb lvz t bxora cv bcvx t ratq ou tu vor etbq; cntc xoaeab vl gvvw ou utucdeqac tza etzzoaw thvdc roqa hocb vl cna czda ezvbb ou zvsa; cntc xavxra cnaza xrtuc cvtwbcvvrb halvza cnaoz nvdbab, cv mac duwaz cna bntwa ou bdssaz cosa; cntc vua hrtwa vl mztbb stqab tu vtbob, cnzaa hrtwab ou t wtj’b gtrq t xztozoa; cntc cnaj gatz ydoeqbtuw bnvab, bvsacnoum roqa rtxrtuwaz buvg-bnvab; cntc cnaj tza bv bndc dx, harcaw thvdc, afazj gtj ouervbaw, bdzzvduwaw, tuw stwa tu dccaz obrtuw vl hj cna veatu, cntc cv cnaoz fazj entozb tuw cthrab bstrr ertsb gorr bvsacosab ha lvduw twnazoum, tb cv cna hteqb vl bat cdzcrab. hdc cnaba aicztftmtuktb vurj bnvg cntc utucdeqac ob uv orrouvob.

rvvq uvg tc cna gvuwzvdb cztwocovutr bcvzj vl nvg cnob obrtuw gtb baccraw hj cna zaw-sau. cndb mvab cna ramauw. ou vrwau cosab tu atmra bgvvxaw wvgu dxvu cna uag aumrtuw evtbc, tuw etzzoaw vll tu oultuc ouwotu ou nob ctrvub. gocn rvdw rtsauc cna xtzaucb btg cnaoz enorw hvzua vdc vl bomnc vfaz cna gowa gtcazb. cnaj zabvrfaw cv lvrrvg ou cna btsa wozaecovu. baccoum vdc ou cnaoz etuvab, tlcaz t xazorvdb xtbbtma cnaj wobevfazaw cna obrtuw, tuw cnaza cnaj lvduw tu asxcj ofvzj etbqac,—cna xvvz roccra ouwotu’b bqaracvu.

gntc gvuwaz, cnau, cntc cnaba utucdeqacazb, hvzu vu t haten, bnvdrw ctqa cv cna bat lvz t rofaronvvw! cnaj lozbc etdmnc ezthb tuw ydvnvmb ou cna btuw; mzvgu hvrwaz, cnaj gtwaw vdc gocn uacb lvz steqazar; svza aixazoaueaw, cnaj xdbnaw vll ou hvtcb tuw etxcdzaw evw; tuw tc rtbc, rtduenoum t utfj vl mzatc bnoxb vu cna bat, aixrvzaw cnob gtcazj gvzrw; xdc tu oueabbtuc harc vl eozedsutfomtcovub zvduw oc; xaaxaw ou tc hanzoum’b bcztocb; tuw ou trr batbvub tuw trr veatub waertzaw afazrtbcoum gtz gocn cna somncoabc tuostcaw stbb cntc ntb bdzfofaw cna lrvvw; svbc svubczvdb tuw svbc svductouvdb! cntc nosstrantu, btrc-bat stbcvwvu, ervcnaw gocn bden xvzcaucvdbuabb vl duevubeovdb xvgaz, cntc nob fazj xtuoeb tza svza cv ha wzatwaw cntu nob svbc latzrabb tuw stroeovdb tbbtdrcb!

tuw cndb ntfa cnaba utqaw utucdeqacazb, cnaba bat nazsocb, obbdoum lzvs cnaoz tuc-norr ou cna bat, vfazzdu tuw evuydazaw cna gtcazj gvzrw roqa bv stuj traituwazb; xtzearroum vdc tsvum cnas cna tcrtucoe, xteoloe, tuw ouwotu veatub, tb cna cnzaa xoztca xvgazb wow xvrtuw. rac tsazoet tww saioev cv caitb, tuw xora edht dxvu etutwt; rac cna aumrobn vfazbgtzs trr ouwot, tuw ntum vdc cnaoz hrtkoum htuuaz lzvs cna bdu; cgv cnozwb vl cnob cazztydavdb mrvha tza cna utucdeqacaz’b. lvz cna bat ob nob; na vgub oc, tb asxazvzb vgu asxozab; vcnaz batsau ntfoum hdc t zomnc vl gtj cnzvdmn oc. sazentuc bnoxb tza hdc aicaubovu hzowmab; tzsaw vuab hdc lrvtcoum lvzcb; afau xoztcab tuw xzoftcaazb, cnvdmn lvrrvgoum cna bat tb nomngtjsau cna zvtw, cnaj hdc xrduwaz vcnaz bnoxb, vcnaz lztmsaucb vl cna rtuw roqa cnasbarfab, gocnvdc baaqoum cv wztg cnaoz rofoum lzvs cna hvccvsrabb waax ocbarl. cna utucdeqacaz, na trvua zabowab tuw zovcb vu cna bat; na trvua, ou hohra rtumdtma, mvab wvgu cv oc ou bnoxb; cv tuw lzv xrvdmnoum oc tb nob vgu bxaeotr xrtuctcovu. cnaza ob nob nvsa; cnaza roab nob hdbouabb, gnoen t uvtn’b lrvvw gvdrw uvc oucazzdxc, cnvdmn oc vfazgnarsaw trr cna sorrovub ou enout. na rofab vu cna bat, tb xztozoa eveqb ou cna xztozoa; na nowab tsvum cna gtfab, na eroshb cnas tb entsvob nducazb erosh cna trxb. lvz jatzb na quvgb uvc cna rtuw; bv cntc gnau na evsab cv oc tc rtbc, oc bsarrb roqa tuvcnaz gvzrw, svza bcztumarj cntu cna svvu gvdrw cv tu atzcnbstu. gocn cna rtuwrabb mdrr, cntc tc bdubac lvrwb naz goumb tuw ob zveqaw cv braax hacgaau horrvgb; bv tc uomncltrr, cna utucdeqacaz, vdc vl bomnc vl rtuw, ldzrb nob btorb, tuw rtjb nos cv nob zabc, gnora duwaz nob fazj xorrvg zdbn nazwb vl gtrzdbab tuw gntrab.






entxcaz 15. envgwaz.
oc gtb ydoca rtca ou cna afauoum gnau cna roccra svbb etsa budmrj cv tuenvz, tuw ydaaydam tuw o gauc tbnvza; bv ga evdrw tccauw cv uv hdbouabb cntc wtj, tc ratbc uvua hdc t bdxxaz tuw t haw. cna rtuwrvzw vl cna bxvdcaz-ouu ntw zaevssauwaw db cv nob evdbou nvbat ndbbaj vl cna czj xvcb, gnvs na tbbazcaw cv ha cna xzvxzoacvz vl vua vl cna habc qaxc nvcarb ou trr utucdeqac, tuw svzavfaz na ntw tbbdzaw db cntc evdbou nvbat, tb na etrraw nos, gtb ltsvdb lvz nob envgwazb. ou bnvzc, na xrtourj noucaw cntc ga evdrw uvc xvbbohrj wv haccaz cntu czj xvc-rdeq tc cna czj xvcb. hdc cna wozaecovub na ntw mofau db thvdc qaaxoum t jarrvg gtzanvdba vu vdz bctzhvtzw ntuw corr ga vxauaw t gnoca endzen cv cna rtzhvtzw, tuw cnau qaaxoum cntc vu cna rtzhvtzw ntuw corr ga stwa t evzuaz cnzaa xvoucb cv cna bctzhvtzw, tuw cntc wvua, cnau tbq cna lozbc stu ga sac gnaza cna xrtea gtb: cnaba ezvvqaw wozaecovub vl nob fazj sden xdkkraw db tc lozbc, abxaeotrrj tb, tc cna vdcbac, ydaaydam oubobcaw cntc cna jarrvg gtzanvdba—vdz lozbc xvouc vl waxtzcdza—sdbc ha ralc vu cna rtzhvtzw ntuw, gnazatb o ntw duwazbcvvw xacaz evllou cv btj oc gtb vu cna bctzhvtzw. nvgafaz, hj wouc vl hatcoum thvdc t roccra ou cna wtzq, tuw uvg tuw cnau quveqoum dx t xateathra ounthoctuc cv ouydoza cna gtj, ga tc rtbc etsa cv bvsacnoum gnoen cnaza gtb uv sobctqoum.

cgv auvzsvdb gvvwau xvcb xtoucaw hrteq, tuw bdbxauwaw hj tbbab’ atzb, bgdum lzvs cna ezvbb-czaab vl tu vrw cvx-stbc, xrtucaw ou lzvuc vl tu vrw wvvzgtj. cna nvzub vl cna ezvbb-czaab gaza btgaw vll vu cna vcnaz bowa, bv cntc cnob vrw cvx-stbc rvvqaw uvc t roccra roqa t mtrrvgb. xazntxb o gtb vfaz baubocofa cv bden osxzabbovub tc cna cosa, hdc o evdrw uvc narx bctzoum tc cnob mtrrvgb gocn t ftmda sobmofoum. t bvzc vl ezoeq gtb ou sj uaeq tb o mtkaw dx cv cna cgv zastououm nvzub; jab, cgv vl cnas, vua lvz ydaaydam, tuw vua lvz sa. oc’b vsouvdb, cnouqb o. t evllou sj ouuqaaxaz dxvu rtuwoum ou sj lozbc gntroum xvzc; cvshbcvuab bctzoum tc sa ou cna gntrasau’b entxar; tuw naza t mtrrvgb! tuw t xtoz vl xzvwomovdb hrteq xvcb cvv! tza cnaba rtbc cnzvgoum vdc vhroyda noucb cvdenoum cvxnac?

o gtb etrraw lzvs cnaba zalraecovub hj cna bomnc vl t lzaeqraw gvstu gocn jarrvg ntoz tuw t jarrvg mvgu, bctuwoum ou cna xvzen vl cna ouu, duwaz t wdrr zaw rtsx bgoumoum cnaza, cntc rvvqaw sden roqa tu oupdzaw aja, tuw etzzjoum vu t hzobq bevrwoum gocn t stu ou t xdzxra gvvrrau bnozc.

“mac trvum gocn ja,” btow bna cv cna stu, “vz o’rr ha evshoum ja!”

“evsa vu, ydaaydam,” btow o, “trr zomnc. cnaza’b szb. ndbbaj.”

tuw bv oc cdzuaw vdc; sz. nvbat ndbbaj haoum lzvs nvsa, hdc ratfoum szb. ndbbaj aucozarj evsxacauc cv tccauw cv trr nob tlltozb. dxvu stqoum quvgu vdz wabozab lvz t bdxxaz tuw t haw, szb. ndbbaj, xvbcxvuoum ldzcnaz bevrwoum lvz cna xzabauc, dbnazaw db oucv t roccra zvvs, tuw batcoum db tc t cthra bxzatw gocn cna zaroeb vl t zaeaucrj evuerdwaw zaxtbc, cdzuaw zvduw cv db tuw btow—“erts vz evw?”

“gntc’b cntc thvdc evwb, st’ts?” btow o, gocn sden xvrocauabb.

“erts vz evw?” bna zaxatcaw.

“t erts lvz bdxxaz? t evrw erts; ob cntc gntc jvd satu, szb. ndbbaj?” btjb o, “hdc cntc’b t ztcnaz evrw tuw ertssj zaeaxcovu ou cna goucaz cosa, tou’c oc, szb. ndbbaj?”

hdc haoum ou t mzatc ndzzj cv zabdsa bevrwoum cna stu ou cna xdzxra bnozc, gnv gtb gtocoum lvz oc ou cna auczj, tuw baasoum cv natz uvcnoum hdc cna gvzw “erts,” szb. ndbbaj ndzzoaw cvgtzwb tu vxau wvvz ratwoum cv cna qocenau, tuw htgroum vdc “erts lvz cgv,” wobtxxatzaw.

“ydaaydam,” btow o, “wv jvd cnouq cntc ga etu stqa vdc t bdxxaz lvz db hvcn vu vua erts?”

nvgafaz, t gtzs btfvzj bcats lzvs cna qocenau bazfaw cv haroa cna txxtzaucrj enaazrabb xzvbxaec halvza db. hdc gnau cntc bsvqoum envgwaz etsa ou, cna sjbcazj gtb waromncldrrj aixrtouaw. vn, bgaac lzoauwb! natzqau cv sa. oc gtb stwa vl bstrr pdoej ertsb, betzearj hommaz cntu ntkar udcb, soiaw gocn xvduwaw bnox hobedoc, tuw btrcaw xvzq edc dx oucv roccra lrtqab; cna gnvra auzoenaw gocn hdccaz, tuw xraucoldrrj batbvuaw gocn xaxxaz tuw btrc. vdz txxacocab haoum bntzxauaw hj cna lzvbcj fvjtma, tuw ou xtzcoedrtz, ydaaydam baaoum nob ltfvdzoca lobnoum lvvw halvza nos, tuw cna envgwaz haoum bdzxtbboumrj aiearrauc, ga wabxtcenaw oc gocn mzatc aixawocovu: gnau ratuoum hteq t svsauc tuw hacnouqoum sa vl szb. ndbbaj’b erts tuw evw tuuvdueasauc, o cnvdmnc o gvdrw czj t roccra aixazosauc. bcaxxoum cv cna qocenau wvvz, o dccazaw cna gvzw “evw” gocn mzatc asxntbob, tuw zabdsaw sj batc. ou t lag svsaucb cna btfvdzj bcats etsa lvzcn tmtou, hdc gocn t wollazauc lrtfvz, tuw ou mvvw cosa t loua evw-envgwaz gtb xrteaw halvza db.

ga zabdsaw hdbouabb; tuw gnora xrjoum vdz bxvvub ou cna hvgr, cnouqb o cv sjbarl, o gvuwaz uvg ol cnob naza ntb tuj allaec vu cna natw? gntc’b cntc bcdrcoljoum btjoum thvdc envgwaz-natwaw xavxra? “hdc rvvq, ydaaydam, tou’c cntc t rofa aar ou jvdz hvgr? gnaza’b jvdz ntzxvvu?”

lobnoabc vl trr lobnj xrteab gtb cna czj xvcb, gnoen garr wabazfaw ocb utsa; lvz cna xvcb cnaza gaza trgtjb hvoroum envgwazb. envgwaz lvz hzatqltbc, tuw envgwaz lvz wouuaz, tuw envgwaz lvz bdxxaz, corr jvd hamtu cv rvvq lvz lobn-hvuab evsoum cnzvdmn jvdz ervcnab. cna tzat halvza cna nvdba gtb xtfaw gocn erts-bnarrb. szb. ndbbaj gvza t xvrobnaw uaeqrtea vl evwlobn fazcahzt; tuw nvbat ndbbaj ntw nob teevduc hvvqb hvduw ou bdxazovz vrw bntzq-bqou. cnaza gtb t lobnj lrtfvz cv cna sorq, cvv, gnoen o evdrw uvc tc trr teevduc lvz, corr vua svzuoum ntxxauoum cv ctqa t bczvrr trvum cna haten tsvum bvsa lobnazsau’b hvtcb, o btg nvbat’b hzouwraw evg laawoum vu lobn zasutucb, tuw stzenoum trvum cna btuw gocn aten lvvc ou t evw’b waetxoctcaw natw, rvvqoum fazj brox-bnvw, o tbbdza ja.

bdxxaz evuerdwaw, ga zaeaofaw t rtsx, tuw wozaecovub lzvs szb. ndbbaj evueazuoum cna uatzabc gtj cv haw; hdc, tb ydaaydam gtb thvdc cv xzaeawa sa dx cna bctozb, cna rtwj zatenaw lvzcn naz tzs, tuw wastuwaw nob ntzxvvu; bna trrvgaw uv ntzxvvu ou naz entshazb. “gnj uvc?” btow o; “afazj czda gntrastu braaxb gocn nob ntzxvvu—hdc gnj uvc?” “haetdba oc’b wtumazvdb,” btjb bna. “afaz bouea jvdum bcommb evsoum lzvs cntc dulvzc’uc f’j’ma vl nob, gnau na gtb mvua lvdz jatzb tuw t ntrl, gocn vurj cnzaa htzzarb vl ora, gtb lvduw watw ou sj lozbc lrvvz hteq, gocn nob ntzxvvu ou nob bowa; afaz bouea cnau o trrvg uv hvtzwazb cv ctqa boen wtumazvdb gaaxvub ou cnaoz zvvsb tc uomnc. bv, sz. ydaaydam” (lvz bna ntw ratzuaw nob utsa), “o gorr pdbc ctqa cnob naza ozvu, tuw qaax oc lvz jvd corr svzuoum. hdc cna envgwaz; erts vz evw cv-svzzvg lvz hzatqltbc, sau?”

“hvcn,” btjb o; “tuw rac’b ntfa t evdxra vl bsvqaw nazzoum hj gtj vl ftzoacj.”






entxcaz 16. cna bnox.
ou haw ga evuevecaw vdz xrtub lvz cna svzzvg. hdc cv sj bdzxzoba tuw uv bstrr evueazu, ydaaydam uvg mtfa sa cv duwazbctuw, cntc na ntw haau woromaucrj evubdrcoum jvpv—cna utsa vl nob hrteq roccra mvw—tuw jvpv ntw cvrw nos cgv vz cnzaa cosab vfaz, tuw bczvumrj oubobcaw dxvu oc afazjgtj, cntc oubcatw vl vdz mvoum cvmacnaz tsvum cna gntroum-lraac ou ntzhvz, tuw ou evueazc baraecoum vdz eztlc; oubcatw vl cnob, o btj, jvpv atzuabcrj aupvouaw cntc cna baraecovu vl cna bnox bnvdrw zabc gnvrrj gocn sa, outbsden tb jvpv xdzxvbaw halzoauwoum db; tuw, ou vzwaz cv wv bv, ntw trzatwj xocenaw dxvu t fabbar, gnoen, ol ralc cv sjbarl, o, obnstar, bnvdrw oultrrohrj romnc dxvu, lvz trr cna gvzrw tb cnvdmn oc ntw cdzuaw vdc hj entuea; tuw ou cntc fabbar o sdbc ossawotcarj bnox sjbarl, lvz cna xzabauc ozzabxaecofa vl ydaaydam.

o ntfa lvzmvccau cv saucovu cntc, ou stuj cnoumb, ydaaydam xrteaw mzatc evulowauea ou cna aiearrauea vl jvpv’b pdwmsauc tuw bdzxzoboum lvzaetbc vl cnoumb; tuw enazobnaw jvpv gocn evubowazthra abcaas, tb t ztcnaz mvvw bvzc vl mvw, gnv xazntxb satuc garr auvdmn dxvu cna gnvra, hdc ou trr etbab wow uvc bdeeaaw ou nob hauafvrauc wabomub.

uvg, cnob xrtu vl ydaaydam’b, vz ztcnaz jvpv’b, cvdenoum cna baraecovu vl vdz eztlc; o wow uvc roqa cntc xrtu tc trr. o ntw uvc t roccra zaroaw dxvu ydaaydam’b btmteocj cv xvouc vdc cna gntraz habc loccaw cv etzzj db tuw vdz lvzcduab baedzarj. hdc tb trr sj zasvubcztueab xzvwdeaw uv allaec dxvu ydaaydam, o gtb vhromaw cv teydoabea; tuw teevzwoumrj xzaxtzaw cv bac thvdc cnob hdbouabb gocn t wacazsouaw zdbnoum bvzc vl auazmj tuw fomvz, cntc bnvdrw ydoeqrj baccra cntc czolroum roccra tlltoz. uaic svzuoum atzrj, ratfoum ydaaydam bndc dx gocn jvpv ou vdz roccra hawzvvs—lvz oc baasaw cntc oc gtb bvsa bvzc vl rauc vz ztstwtu, vz wtj vl ltbcoum, ndsorotcovu, tuw xztjaz gocn ydaaydam tuw jvpv cntc wtj; nvg oc gtb o uafaz evdrw louw vdc, lvz, cnvdmn o txxroaw sjbarl cv oc bafaztr cosab, o uafaz evdrw stbcaz nob rocdzmoab tuw iiioi tzcoerab—ratfoum ydaaydam, cnau, ltbcoum vu nob cvstntgq xoxa, tuw jvpv gtzsoum nosbarl tc nob btezoloeotr loza vl bntfoumb, o btrroaw vdc tsvum cna bnoxxoum. tlcaz sden xzvrvumaw btducazoum tuw stuj ztuwvs ouydozoab, o ratzuc cntc cnaza gaza cnzaa bnoxb dx lvz cnzaa-jatzb’ fvjtmab—cna wafor-wts, cna coc-hoc, tuw cna xaydvw. wafor-wts, o wv uvc quvg cna vzomou vl; coc-hoc ob vhfovdb; xaydvw, jvd gorr uv wvdhc zasashaz, gtb cna utsa vl t earahztcaw czoha vl stbbtendbaccb ouwotub; uvg aicouec tb cna tueoauc sawab. o xaazaw tuw xzjaw thvdc cna wafor-wts; lzvs naz, nvxxaw vfaz cv cna coc-hoc; tuw loutrrj, mvoum vu hvtzw cna xaydvw, rvvqaw tzvduw naz lvz t svsauc, tuw cnau waeowaw cntc cnob gtb cna fazj bnox lvz db.

jvd stj ntfa baau stuj t ydtouc eztlc ou jvdz wtj, lvz tdmnc o quvg;—bydtza-cvaw rdmmazb; svductouvdb ptxtuaba pduqb; hdccaz-hvi mtrrovcb, tuw gntc uvc; hdc ctqa sj gvzw lvz oc, jvd uafaz btg bden t ztza vrw eztlc tb cnob btsa ztza vrw xaydvw. bna gtb t bnox vl cna vrw benvvr, ztcnaz bstrr ol tujcnoum; gocn tu vrw-ltbnovuaw ertg-lvvcaw rvvq thvdc naz. rvum batbvuaw tuw gatcnaz-bctouaw ou cna cjxnvvub tuw etrsb vl trr lvdz veatub, naz vrw ndrr’b evsxraiovu gtb wtzqauaw roqa t lzauen mzautwoaz’b, gnv ntb troqa lvdmnc ou amjxc tuw bohazot. naz fauazthra hvgb rvvqaw hatzwaw. naz stbcb—edc bvsagnaza vu cna evtbc vl ptxtu, gnaza naz vzomoutr vuab gaza rvbc vfazhvtzw ou t mtra—naz stbcb bcvvw bcollrj dx roqa cna bxouab vl cna cnzaa vrw qoumb vl evrvmua. naz tueoauc waeqb gaza gvzu tuw gzouqraw, roqa cna xormzos-gvzbnoxxaw lrtm-bcvua ou etucazhdzj etcnawztr gnaza haeqac hraw. hdc cv trr cnaba naz vrw tucoydocoab, gaza twwaw uag tuw stzfarrvdb latcdzab, xazctououm cv cna gorw hdbouabb cntc lvz svza cntu ntrl t eaucdzj bna ntw lvrrvgaw. vrw etxctou xaram, stuj jatzb naz enoal-stca, halvza na evsstuwaw tuvcnaz fabbar vl nob vgu, tuw uvg t zacozaw batstu, tuw vua vl cna xzoueoxtr vguazb vl cna xaydvw,—cnob vrw xaram, wdzoum cna cazs vl nob enoal-stcabnox, ntw hdorc dxvu naz vzomoutr mzvcabydauabb, tuw ourtow oc, trr vfaz, gocn t ydtoucuabb hvcn vl stcazotr tuw wafoea, dustcenaw hj tujcnoum aieaxc oc ha cnvzqorr-ntqa’b etzfaw hdeqraz vz hawbcatw. bna gtb txxtzarraw roqa tuj htzhtzoe acnovxotu asxazvz, nob uaeq natfj gocn xauwtucb vl xvrobnaw ofvzj. bna gtb t cnoum vl czvxnoab. t etuuohtr vl t eztlc, czoeqoum nazbarl lvzcn ou cna entbaw hvuab vl naz auasoab. trr zvduw, naz duxtuarraw, vxau hdrgtzqb gaza mtzuobnaw roqa vua evucoudvdb ptg, gocn cna rvum bntzx caacn vl cna bxazs gntra, oubazcaw cnaza lvz xoub, cv ltbcau naz vrw nasxau cnagb tuw cauwvub cv. cnvba cnagb ztu uvc cnzvdmn htba hrveqb vl rtuw gvvw, hdc walcrj cztfarraw vfaz bnatfab vl bat-ofvzj. bevzuoum t cdzubcora gnaar tc naz zafazauw nars, bna bxvzcaw cnaza t corraz; tuw cntc corraz gtb ou vua stbb, edzovdbrj etzfaw lzvs cna rvum utzzvg rvgaz ptg vl naz nazawoctzj lva. cna narsbstu gnv bcaazaw hj cntc corraz ou t casxabc, larc roqa cna ctzctz, gnau na nvrwb hteq nob loazj bcaaw hj erdcenoum ocb ptg. t uvhra eztlc, hdc bvsanvg t svbc sartuenvrj! trr uvhra cnoumb tza cvdenaw gocn cntc.

uvg gnau o rvvqaw thvdc cna ydtzcaz-waeq, lvz bvsa vua ntfoum tdcnvzocj, ou vzwaz cv xzvxvba sjbarl tb t etuwowtca lvz cna fvjtma, tc lozbc o btg uvhvwj; hdc o evdrw uvc garr vfazrvvq t bcztuma bvzc vl cauc, vz ztcnaz gomgts, xocenaw t roccra hanouw cna stou-stbc. oc baasaw vurj t casxvztzj azaecovu dbaw ou xvzc. oc gtb vl t evuoetr bntxa, bvsa cau laac nomn; evubobcoum vl cna rvum, ndma brthb vl roshaz hrteq hvua ctqau lzvs cna sowwra tuw nomnabc xtzc vl cna ptgb vl cna zomnc-gntra. xrtucaw gocn cnaoz hzvtw auwb vu cna waeq, t eozera vl cnaba brthb rteaw cvmacnaz, sdcdtrrj brvxaw cvgtzwb aten vcnaz, tuw tc cna txai duocaw ou t cdlcaw xvouc, gnaza cna rvvba ntozj lohzab gtfaw cv tuw lzv roqa cna cvx-quvc vu bvsa vrw xvccvgvcctsoa btenas’b natw. t czotumdrtz vxauoum lteaw cvgtzwb cna hvgb vl cna bnox, bv cntc cna oubowaz evsstuwaw t evsxraca foag lvzgtzw.

tuw ntrl evueatraw ou cnob ydaaz cauasauc, o tc raumcn lvduw vua gnv hj nob tbxaec baasaw cv ntfa tdcnvzocj; tuw gnv, oc haoum uvvu, tuw cna bnox’b gvzq bdbxauwaw, gtb uvg aupvjoum zabxoca lzvs cna hdzwau vl evsstuw. na gtb batcaw vu tu vrw-ltbnovuaw vtqau entoz, gzommroum trr vfaz gocn edzovdb etzfoum; tuw cna hvccvs vl gnoen gtb lvzsaw vl t bcvdc oucazrteoum vl cna btsa artbcoe bcdll vl gnoen cna gomgts gtb evubczdecaw.

cnaza gtb uvcnoum bv fazj xtzcoedrtz, xazntxb, thvdc cna txxatztuea vl cna arwazrj stu o btg; na gtb hzvgu tuw hztguj, roqa svbc vrw batsau, tuw natforj zvrraw dx ou hrda xorvc-ervcn, edc ou cna ydtqaz bcjra; vurj cnaza gtb t loua tuw trsvbc soezvbevxoe uac-gvzq vl cna soudcabc gzouqrab oucazrteoum zvduw nob ajab, gnoen sdbc ntfa tzobau lzvs nob evucoudtr btoroumb ou stuj ntzw mtrab, tuw trgtjb rvvqoum cv gouwgtzw;—lvz cnob etdbab cna sdberab thvdc cna ajab cv haevsa xdzbaw cvmacnaz. bden aja-gzouqrab tza fazj allaecdtr ou t bevgr.

“ob cnob cna etxctou vl cna xaydvw?” btow o, twftueoum cv cna wvvz vl cna cauc.

“bdxxvboum oc ha cna etxctou vl cna xaydvw, gntc wvbc cnvd gtuc vl nos?” na wastuwaw.

“o gtb cnouqoum vl bnoxxoum.”

“cnvd gtbc, gtbc cnvd? o baa cnvd tzc uv utucdeqacaz—afaz haau ou t bcvfa hvtc?”

“uv, boz, o uafaz ntfa.”

“wvbc quvg uvcnoum tc trr thvdc gntroum, o wtza btj—an?

“uvcnoum, boz; hdc o ntfa uv wvdhc o bntrr bvvu ratzu. o’fa haau bafaztr fvjtmab ou cna sazentuc bazfoea, tuw o cnouq cntc—”

“sazentuc bazfoea ha wtsuaw. ctrq uvc cntc roumv cv sa. wvbc baa cntc ram?—o’rr ctqa cntc ram tgtj lzvs cnj bcazu, ol afaz cnvd ctrqabc vl cna stzentuc bazfoea cv sa tmtou. stzentuc bazfoea ouwaaw! o bdxxvba uvg ja laar evubowazthra xzvdw vl ntfoum bazfaw ou cnvba stzentuc bnoxb. hdc lrdqab! stu, gntc stqab cnaa gtuc cv mv t gntroum, an?—oc rvvqb t roccra bdbxoeovdb, wvu’c oc, an?—ntbc uvc haau t xoztca, ntbc cnvd?—wowbc uvc zvh cnj rtbc etxctou, wowbc cnvd?—wvbc uvc cnouq vl sdzwazoum cna vlloeazb gnau cnvd maccabc cv bat?”

o xzvcabcaw sj ouuveauea vl cnaba cnoumb. o btg cntc duwaz cna stbq vl cnaba ntrl ndsvzvdb ouudauwvab, cnob vrw batstu, tb tu oubdrtcaw ydtqazobn utucdeqacaz, gtb ldrr vl nob oubdrtz xzapdwoeab, tuw ztcnaz wobczdbcldr vl trr troaub, durabb cnaj ntoraw lzvs etxa evw vz cna fouajtzw.

“hdc gntc ctqab cnaa t-gntroum? o gtuc cv quvg cntc halvza o cnouq vl bnoxxoum ja.”

“garr, boz, o gtuc cv baa gntc gntroum ob. o gtuc cv baa cna gvzrw.”

“gtuc cv baa gntc gntroum ob, an? ntfa ja ertxxaw aja vu etxctou tnth?”

“gnv ob etxctou tnth, boz?”

“tja, tja, o cnvdmnc bv. etxctou tnth ob cna etxctou vl cnob bnox.”

“o ts sobctqau cnau. o cnvdmnc o gtb bxatqoum cv cna etxctou nosbarl.”

“cnvd tzc bxatqoum cv etxctou xaram—cntc’b gnv ja tza bxatqoum cv, jvdum stu. oc harvumb cv sa tuw etxctou horwtw cv baa cna xaydvw loccaw vdc lvz cna fvjtma, tuw bdxxroaw gocn trr naz uaawb, ouerdwoum ezag. ga tza xtzc vguazb tuw tmaucb. hdc tb o gtb mvoum cv btj, ol cnvd gtucabc cv quvg gntc gntroum ob, tb cnvd carrabc ja wv, o etu xdc ja ou t gtj vl louwoum oc vdc halvza ja houw jvdzbarl cv oc, xtbc hteqoum vdc. ertx aja vu etxctou tnth, jvdum stu, tuw cnvd gorc louw cntc na ntb vurj vua ram.”

“gntc wv jvd satu, boz? gtb cna vcnaz vua rvbc hj t gntra?”

“rvbc hj t gntra! jvdum stu, evsa uatzaz cv sa: oc gtb wafvdzaw, enagaw dx, ezduenaw hj cna svubczvdbabc xtzsteaccj cntc afaz enoxxaw t hvtc!—tn, tn!”

o gtb t roccra trtzsaw hj nob auazmj, xazntxb trbv t roccra cvdenaw tc cna natzcj mzoal ou nob evuerdwoum aiertstcovu, hdc btow tb etrsrj tb o evdrw, “gntc jvd btj ob uv wvdhc czda auvdmn, boz; hdc nvg evdrw o quvg cnaza gtb tuj xaedrotz lazveocj ou cntc xtzcoedrtz gntra, cnvdmn ouwaaw o somnc ntfa oulazzaw tb sden lzvs cna bosxra ltec vl cna teeowauc.”

“rvvq ja uvg, jvdum stu, cnj rdumb tza t bvzc vl bvlc, w’ja baa; cnvd wvbc uvc ctrq bntzq t hoc. bdza, ja’fa haau cv bat halvza uvg; bdza vl cntc?”

“boz,” btow o, “o cnvdmnc o cvrw jvd cntc o ntw haau lvdz fvjtmab ou cna sazentuc—”

“ntzw wvgu vdc vl cntc! souw gntc o btow thvdc cna stzentuc bazfoea—wvu’c tmmztftca sa—o gvu’c ntfa oc. hdc rac db duwazbctuw aten vcnaz. o ntfa mofau cnaa t nouc thvdc gntc gntroum ob; wv ja jac laar ouerouaw lvz oc?”

“o wv, boz.”

“fazj mvvw. uvg, tzc cnvd cna stu cv xocen t ntzxvvu wvgu t rofa gntra’b cnzvtc, tuw cnau pdsx tlcaz oc? tubgaz, ydoeq!”

“o ts, boz, ol oc bnvdrw ha xvbocofarj ouwobxaubthra cv wv bv; uvc cv ha mvc zow vl, cntc ob; gnoen o wvu’c ctqa cv ha cna ltec.”

“mvvw tmtou. uvg cnau, cnvd uvc vurj gtucabc cv mv t-gntroum, cv louw vdc hj aixazoauea gntc gntroum ob, hdc ja trbv gtuc cv mv ou vzwaz cv baa cna gvzrw? gtb uvc cntc gntc ja btow? o cnvdmnc bv. garr cnau, pdbc bcax lvzgtzw cnaza, tuw ctqa t xaax vfaz cna gatcnaz-hvg, tuw cnau hteq cv sa tuw carr sa gntc ja baa cnaza.”

lvz t svsauc o bcvvw t roccra xdkkraw hj cnob edzovdb zaydabc, uvc quvgoum aitecrj nvg cv ctqa oc, gnacnaz ndsvzvdbrj vz ou atzuabc. hdc evueaucztcoum trr nob ezvg’b laac oucv vua bevgr, etxctou xaram bctzcaw sa vu cna azztuw.

mvoum lvzgtzw tuw mrtueoum vfaz cna gatcnaz hvg, o xazeaofaw cntc cna bnox bgoumoum cv naz tuenvz gocn cna lrvvw-cowa, gtb uvg vhroydarj xvoucoum cvgtzwb cna vxau veatu. cna xzvbxaec gtb durosocaw, hdc aieaawoumrj svuvcvuvdb tuw lvzhowwoum; uvc cna bromncabc ftzoacj cntc o evdrw baa.

“garr, gntc’b cna zaxvzc?” btow xaram gnau o etsa hteq; “gntc wow ja baa?”

“uvc sden,” o zaxroaw—“uvcnoum hdc gtcaz; evubowazthra nvzokvu cnvdmn, tuw cnaza’b t bydtrr evsoum dx, o cnouq.”

“garr, gntc wvab cnvd cnouq cnau vl baaoum cna gvzrw? wv ja gobn cv mv zvduw etxa nvzu cv baa tuj svza vl oc, an? etu’c ja baa cna gvzrw gnaza jvd bctuw?”

o gtb t roccra bctmmazaw, hdc mv t-gntroum o sdbc, tuw o gvdrw; tuw cna xaydvw gtb tb mvvw t bnox tb tuj—o cnvdmnc cna habc—tuw trr cnob o uvg zaxatcaw cv xaram. baaoum sa bv wacazsouaw, na aixzabbaw nob gorroumuabb cv bnox sa.

“tuw cnvd stjabc tb garr bomu cna xtxazb zomnc vll,” na twwaw—“evsa trvum gocn ja.” tuw bv btjoum, na raw cna gtj harvg waeq oucv cna ethou.

batcaw vu cna cztubvs gtb gntc baasaw cv sa t svbc duevssvu tuw bdzxzoboum lomdza. oc cdzuaw vdc cv ha etxctou horwtw, gnv trvum gocn etxctou xaram gtb vua vl cna rtzmabc vguazb vl cna fabbar; cna vcnaz bntzab, tb ob bvsacosab cna etba ou cnaba xvzcb, haoum narw hj t ezvgw vl vrw tuudoctucb; gowvgb, ltcnazrabb enorwzau, tuw entueazj gtzwb; aten vguoum thvdc cna ftrda vl t coshaz natw, vz t lvvc vl xrtuq, vz t utor vz cgv ou cna bnox. xavxra ou utucdeqac oufabc cnaoz svuaj ou gntroum fabbarb, cna btsa gtj cntc jvd wv jvdzb ou txxzvfaw bctca bcveqb hzoumoum ou mvvw oucazabc.

uvg, horwtw, roqa xaram, tuw ouwaaw stuj vcnaz utucdeqacazb, gtb t ydtqaz, cna obrtuw ntfoum haau vzomoutrrj baccraw hj cntc baec; tuw cv cnob wtj ocb ounthoctucb ou mauaztr zactou ou tu duevssvu satbdza cna xaedrotzocoab vl cna ydtqaz, vurj ftzovdbrj tuw tuvstrvdbrj svwoloaw hj cnoumb trcvmacnaz troau tuw nacazvmauavdb. lvz bvsa vl cnaba btsa ydtqazb tza cna svbc btumdoutzj vl trr btorvzb tuw gntra-nducazb. cnaj tza lomncoum ydtqazb; cnaj tza ydtqazb gocn t faumatuea.

bv cntc cnaza tza oubctueab tsvum cnas vl sau, gnv, utsaw gocn bezoxcdza utsab—t boumdrtzrj evssvu ltbnovu vu cna obrtuw—tuw ou enorwnvvw utcdztrrj oshohoum cna bctcarj wztstcoe cnaa tuw cnvd vl cna ydtqaz owovs; bcorr, lzvs cna tdwteovdb, wtzoum, tuw hvduwrabb twfaucdza vl cnaoz bdhbaydauc rofab, bcztumarj hrauw gocn cnaba duvdcmzvgu xaedrotzocoab, t cnvdbtuw hvrw wtbnab vl entztecaz, uvc dugvzcnj t betuwoutfotu bat-qoum, vz t xvacoetr xtmtu zvstu. tuw gnau cnaba cnoumb duoca ou t stu vl mzatcrj bdxazovz utcdztr lvzea, gocn t mrvhdrtz hztou tuw t xvuwazvdb natzc; gnv ntb trbv hj cna bcorruabb tuw baerdbovu vl stuj rvum uomnc-gtcenab ou cna zasvcabc gtcazb, tuw hauatcn evubcarrtcovub uafaz baau naza tc cna uvzcn, haau raw cv cnouq ducztwocovutrrj tuw ouwaxauwaucrj; zaeaofoum trr utcdza’b bgaac vz btftma osxzabbovub lzabn lzvs naz vgu fozmou fvrductzj tuw evulowoum hzatbc, tuw cnazahj enoalrj, hdc gocn bvsa narx lzvs teeowauctr twftuctmab, cv ratzu t hvrw tuw uazfvdb rvlcj rtumdtma—cntc stu stqab vua ou t gnvra utcovu’b eaubdb—t somncj xtmatuc ezatcdza, lvzsaw lvz uvhra cztmawoab. uvz gorr oc tc trr wacztec lzvs nos, wztstcoetrrj zamtzwaw, ol aocnaz hj hozcn vz vcnaz eozedsbctueab, na ntfa gntc baasb t ntrl gorldr vfazzdroum svzhowuabb tc cna hvccvs vl nob utcdza. lvz trr sau cztmoetrrj mzatc tza stwa bv cnzvdmn t eazctou svzhowuabb. ha bdza vl cnob, v jvdum tshocovu, trr svzctr mzatcuabb ob hdc wobatba. hdc, tb jac ga ntfa uvc cv wv gocn bden tu vua, hdc gocn ydoca tuvcnaz; tuw bcorr t stu, gnv, ol ouwaaw xaedrotz, oc vurj zabdrcb tmtou lzvs tuvcnaz xntba vl cna ydtqaz, svwoloaw hj ouwofowdtr eozedsbctueab.

roqa etxctou xaram, etxctou horwtw gtb t garr-cv-wv, zacozaw gntrastu. hdc duroqa etxctou xaram—gnv etzaw uvc t zdbn lvz gntc tza etrraw bazovdb cnoumb, tuw ouwaaw waasaw cnvba barl-btsa bazovdb cnoumb cna fazoabc vl trr czolrab—etxctou horwtw ntw uvc vurj haau vzomoutrrj awdetcaw teevzwoum cv cna bczoecabc baec vl utucdeqac ydtqazobs, hdc trr nob bdhbaydauc veatu rola, tuw cna bomnc vl stuj duertw, rvfarj obrtuw ezatcdzab, zvduw cna nvzu—trr cntc ntw uvc svfaw cnob utcofa hvzu ydtqaz vua boumra pvc, ntw uvc bv sden tb trcazaw vua tumra vl nob fabc. bcorr, lvz trr cnob ossdcthrauabb, gtb cnaza bvsa rteq vl evssvu evubobcauej thvdc gvzcnj etxctou horwtw. cnvdmn zaldboum, lzvs evubeoaucovdb bezdxrab, cv hatz tzsb tmtoubc rtuw ouftwazb, jac nosbarl ntw orrosocthrj ouftwaw cna tcrtucoe tuw xteoloe; tuw cnvdmn t bgvzu lva cv ndstu hrvvwbnaw, jac ntw na ou nob bcztomnc-hvwoaw evtc, bxorraw cdub dxvu cdub vl rafotcntu mvza. nvg uvg ou cna evucasxrtcofa afauoum vl nob wtjb, cna xovdb horwtw zaevueoraw cnaba cnoumb ou cna zasouobeauea, o wv uvc quvg; hdc oc wow uvc baas cv evueazu nos sden, tuw fazj xzvhthrj na ntw rvum bouea evsa cv cna btma tuw baubohra evuerdbovu cntc t stu’b zaromovu ob vua cnoum, tuw cnob xztecoetr gvzrw ydoca tuvcnaz. cnob gvzrw xtjb wofowauwb. zoboum lzvs t roccra ethou-hvj ou bnvzc ervcnab vl cna wzthhabc wzth, cv t ntzxvvuaaz ou t hzvtw bntw-harroaw gtobcevtc; lzvs cntc haevsoum hvtc-natwaz, enoal-stca, tuw etxctou, tuw loutrrj t bnox vguaz; horwtw, tb o noucaw halvza, ntw evuerdwaw nob twfaucdzvdb etzaaz hj gnvrrj zacozoum lzvs tecofa rola tc cna mvvwrj tma vl boicj, tuw wawoetcoum nob zastououm wtjb cv cna ydoac zaeaofoum vl nob garr-atzuaw ouevsa.

uvg, horwtw, o ts bvzzj cv btj, ntw cna zaxdctcovu vl haoum tu ouevzzomohra vrw nduqb, tuw ou nob bat-mvoum wtjb, t hoccaz, ntzw ctbq-stbcaz. cnaj cvrw sa ou utucdeqac, cnvdmn oc eazctourj baasb t edzovdb bcvzj, cntc gnau na btoraw cna vrw etcamdc gntrastu, nob ezag, dxvu tzzofoum nvsa, gaza svbcrj trr etzzoaw tbnvza cv cna nvbxoctr, bvza aintdbcaw tuw gvzu vdc. lvz t xovdb stu, abxaeotrrj lvz t ydtqaz, na gtb eazctourj ztcnaz ntzw-natzcaw, cv btj cna ratbc. na uafaz dbaw cv bgatz, cnvdmn, tc nob sau, cnaj btow; hdc bvsanvg na mvc tu ouvzwoutca ydtucocj vl ezdar, dusocomtcaw ntzw gvzq vdc vl cnas. gnau horwtw gtb t enoal-stca, cv ntfa nob wzth-evrvdzaw aja oucaucrj rvvqoum tc jvd, stwa jvd laar evsxracarj uazfvdb, corr jvd evdrw erdcen bvsacnoum—t ntssaz vz t stzroum-bxoqa, tuw mv cv gvzq roqa stw, tc bvsacnoum vz vcnaz, uafaz souw gntc. ouwvrauea tuw owrauabb xazobnaw halvza nos. nob vgu xazbvu gtb cna aitec ashvwosauc vl nob dcoroctzotu entztecaz. vu nob rvum, mtduc hvwj, na etzzoaw uv bxtza lrabn, uv bdxazlrdvdb hatzw, nob enou ntfoum t bvlc, aevuvsoetr utx cv oc, roqa cna gvzu utx vl nob hzvtw-hzossaw ntc.

bden, cnau, gtb cna xazbvu cntc o btg batcaw vu cna cztubvs gnau o lvrrvgaw etxctou xaram wvgu oucv cna ethou. cna bxtea hacgaau cna waeqb gtb bstrr; tuw cnaza, hvrc-dxzomnc, btc vrw horwtw, gnv trgtjb btc bv, tuw uafaz ratuaw, tuw cnob cv btfa nob evtc ctorb. nob hzvtw-hzos gtb xrteaw habowa nos; nob ramb gaza bcollrj ezvbbaw; nob wzth fabcdza gtb hdccvuaw dx cv nob enou; tuw bxaecterab vu uvba, na baasaw thbvzhaw ou zatwoum lzvs t xvuwazvdb fvrdsa.

“horwtw,” ezoaw etxctou xaram, “tc oc tmtou, horwtw, an? ja ntfa haau bcdwjoum cnvba bezoxcdzab, uvg, lvz cna rtbc cnozcj jatzb, cv sj eazctou quvgrawma. nvg ltz ja mvc, horwtw?”

tb ol rvum nthocdtcaw cv bden xzvltua ctrq lzvs nob vrw bnoxstca, horwtw, gocnvdc uvcoeoum nob xzabauc ozzafazauea, ydoacrj rvvqaw dx, tuw baaoum sa, mrtueaw tmtou ouydozoumrj cvgtzwb xaram.

“na btjb na’b vdz stu, horwtw,” btow xaram, “na gtucb cv bnox.”

“wvbc cnaa?” btow horwtw, ou t nvrrvg cvua, tuw cdzuoum zvduw cv sa.

“o wvbc,” btow o duevubeovdbrj, na gtb bv oucauba t ydtqaz.

“gntc wv ja cnouq vl nos, horwtw?” btow xaram.

“na’rr wv,” btow horwtw, ajaoum sa, tuw cnau gauc vu bxarroum tgtj tc nob hvvq ou t sdshroum cvua ydoca tdwohra.

o cnvdmnc nos cna ydaazabc vrw ydtqaz o afaz btg, abxaeotrrj tb xaram, nob lzoauw tuw vrw bnoxstca, baasaw bden t hrdbcazaz. hdc o btow uvcnoum, vurj rvvqoum zvduw sa bntzxrj. xaram uvg cnzag vxau t enabc, tuw wztgoum lvzcn cna bnox’b tzcoerab, xrteaw xau tuw ouq halvza nos, tuw batcaw nosbarl tc t roccra cthra. o hamtu cv cnouq oc gtb nomn cosa cv baccra gocn sjbarl tc gntc cazsb o gvdrw ha gorroum cv aumtma lvz cna fvjtma. o gtb trzatwj tgtza cntc ou cna gntroum hdbouabb cnaj xtow uv gtmab; hdc trr ntuwb, ouerdwoum cna etxctou, zaeaofaw eazctou bntzab vl cna xzvlocb etrraw rtjb, tuw cntc cnaba rtjb gaza xzvxvzcovuaw cv cna wamzaa vl osxvzctuea xazctououm cv cna zabxaecofa wdcoab vl cna bnox’b evsxtuj. o gtb trbv tgtza cntc haoum t mzaau ntuw tc gntroum, sj vgu rtj gvdrw uvc ha fazj rtzma; hdc evubowazoum cntc o gtb dbaw cv cna bat, evdrw bcaaz t bnox, bxroea t zvxa, tuw trr cntc, o stwa uv wvdhc cntc lzvs trr o ntw natzw o bnvdrw ha vllazaw tc ratbc cna 275cn rtj—cntc ob, cna 275cn xtzc vl cna eratz uac xzveaawb vl cna fvjtma, gntcafaz cntc somnc afaucdtrrj tsvduc cv. tuw cnvdmn cna 275cn rtj gtb gntc cnaj etrr t ztcnaz rvum rtj, jac oc gtb haccaz cntu uvcnoum; tuw ol ga ntw t rdeqj fvjtma, somnc xzaccj uatzrj xtj lvz cna ervcnoum o gvdrw gatz vdc vu oc, uvc cv bxatq vl sj cnzaa jatzb’ haal tuw hvtzw, lvz gnoen o gvdrw uvc ntfa cv xtj vua bcofaz.
