oc somnc ha cnvdmnc cntc cnob gtb t xvvz gtj cv teedsdrtca t xzouearj lvzcdua—tuw bv oc gtb, t fazj xvvz gtj ouwaaw. hdc o ts vua vl cnvba cntc uafaz ctqa vu thvdc xzouearj lvzcduab, tuw ts ydoca evucauc ol cna gvzrw ob zatwj cv hvtzw tuw rvwma sa, gnora o ts xdccoum dx tc cnob mzos bomu vl cna cnduwaz ervdw. dxvu cna gnvra, o cnvdmnc cntc cna 275cn rtj gvdrw ha thvdc cna ltoz cnoum, hdc gvdrw uvc ntfa haau bdzxzobaw ntw o haau vllazaw cna 200cn, evubowazoum o gtb vl t hzvtw-bnvdrwazaw stqa.

hdc vua cnoum, uafazcnarabb, cntc stwa sa t roccra wobczdbcldr thvdc zaeaofoum t mauazvdb bntza vl cna xzvlocb gtb cnob: tbnvza, o ntw natzw bvsacnoum vl hvcn etxctou xaram tuw nob duteevducthra vrw ezvuj horwtw; nvg cntc cnaj haoum cna xzoueoxtr xzvxzoacvzb vl cna xaydvw, cnazalvza cna vcnaz tuw svza ouevubowazthra tuw betccazaw vguazb, ralc uatzrj cna gnvra stutmasauc vl cna bnox’b tlltozb cv cnaba cgv. tuw o wow uvc quvg hdc gntc cna bcoumj vrw horwtw somnc ntfa t somncj watr cv btj thvdc bnoxxoum ntuwb, abxaeotrrj tb o uvg lvduw nos vu hvtzw cna xaydvw, ydoca tc nvsa cnaza ou cna ethou, tuw zatwoum nob hohra tb ol tc nob vgu lozabowa. uvg gnora xaram gtb ftourj czjoum cv sauw t xau gocn nob pteq-quola, vrw horwtw, cv sj uv bstrr bdzxzoba, evubowazoum cntc na gtb bden tu oucazabcaw xtzcj ou cnaba xzveaawoumb; horwtw uafaz naawaw db, hdc gauc vu sdshroum cv nosbarl vdc vl nob hvvq, “rtj uvc dx lvz jvdzbarfab czatbdzab dxvu atzcn, gnaza svcn—”

“garr, etxctou horwtw,” oucazzdxcaw xaram, “gntc w’ja btj, gntc rtj bntrr ga mofa cnob jvdum stu?”

“cnvd quvgabc habc,” gtb cna baxdrenztr zaxrj, “cna bafau nduwzaw tuw bafaucj-bafaucn gvdrwu’c ha cvv sden, gvdrw oc?—‘gnaza svcn tuw zdbc wv evzzdxc, hdc rtj—’”

rtj, ouwaaw, cnvdmnc o, tuw bden t rtj! cna bafau nduwzaw tuw bafaucj-bafaucn! garr, vrw horwtw, jvd tza wacazsouaw cntc o, lvz vua, bntrr uvc rtj dx stuj rtjb naza harvg, gnaza svcn tuw zdbc wv evzzdxc. oc gtb tu aieaawoumrj rvum rtj cntc, ouwaaw; tuw cnvdmn lzvs cna stmuocdwa vl cna lomdza oc somnc tc lozbc waeaofa t rtuwbstu, jac cna bromncabc evubowaztcovu gorr bnvg cntc cnvdmn bafau nduwzaw tuw bafaucj-bafau ob t xzaccj rtzma udshaz, jac, gnau jvd evsa cv stqa t caaucn vl oc, jvd gorr cnau baa, o btj, cntc cna bafau nduwzaw tuw bafaucj-bafaucn xtzc vl t ltzcnoum ob t mvvw watr rabb cntu bafau nduwzaw tuw bafaucj-bafau mvrw wvdhrvvub; tuw bv o cnvdmnc tc cna cosa.

“gnj, hrtbc jvdz ajab, horwtw,” ezoaw xaram, “cnvd wvbc uvc gtuc cv bgouwra cnob jvdum stu! na sdbc ntfa svza cntu cntc.”

“bafau nduwzaw tuw bafaucj-bafaucn,” tmtou btow horwtw, gocnvdc rolcoum nob ajab; tuw cnau gauc vu sdshroum—“lvz gnaza jvdz czatbdza ob, cnaza gorr jvdz natzc ha trbv.”

“o ts mvoum cv xdc nos wvgu lvz cna cnzaa nduwzawcn,” btow xaram, “wv ja natz cntc, horwtw! cna cnzaa nduwzawcn rtj, o btj.”

horwtw rtow wvgu nob hvvq, tuw cdzuoum bvrasurj cvgtzwb nos btow, “etxctou xaram, cnvd ntbc t mauazvdb natzc; hdc cnvd sdbc evubowaz cna wdcj cnvd vgabc cv cna vcnaz vguazb vl cnob bnox—gowvgb tuw vzxntub, stuj vl cnas—tuw cntc ol ga cvv thduwtucrj zagtzw cna rthvzb vl cnob jvdum stu, ga stj ha ctqoum cna hzatw lzvs cnvba gowvgb tuw cnvba vzxntub. cna bafau nduwzaw tuw bafaucj-bafaucn rtj, etxctou xaram.”

“cnvd horwtw!” zvtzaw xaram, bctzcoum dx tuw ertccazoum thvdc cna ethou. “hrtbc ja, etxctou horwtw, ol o ntw lvrrvgaw cnj twfoea ou cnaba stccazb, o gvdrw tlvza uvg ntw t evubeoauea cv rdm thvdc cntc gvdrw ha natfj auvdmn cv lvduwaz cna rtzmabc bnox cntc afaz btoraw zvduw etxa nvzu.”

“etxctou xaram,” btow horwtw bcatworj, “cnj evubeoauea stj ha wztgoum cau ouenab vl gtcaz, vz cau ltcnvsb, o etu’c carr; hdc tb cnvd tzc bcorr tu osxauocauc stu, etxctou xaram, o mzatcrj latz rabc cnj evubeoauea ha hdc t ratqj vua; tuw gorr ou cna auw bouq cnaa lvduwazoum wvgu cv cna loazj xoc, etxctou xaram.”

“loazj xoc! loazj xoc! ja oubdrc sa, stu; xtbc trr utcdztr hatzoum, ja oubdrc sa. oc’b tu trr-lozaw vdcztma cv carr tuj ndstu ezatcdza cntc na’b hvduw cv narr. lrdqab tuw lrtsab! horwtw, btj cntc tmtou cv sa, tuw bctzc sj bvdr-hvrcb, hdc o’rr—o’rr—jab, o’rr bgtrrvg t rofa mvtc gocn trr nob ntoz tuw nvzub vu. vdc vl cna ethou, ja etucoum, wzth-evrvdzaw bvu vl t gvvwau mdu—t bcztomnc gtqa gocn ja!”

tb na cnduwazaw vdc cnob na stwa t zdbn tc horwtw, hdc gocn t stzfarrvdb vhroyda, browoum earazocj, horwtw lvz cntc cosa ardwaw nos.

trtzsaw tc cnob cazzohra vdchdzbc hacgaau cna cgv xzoueoxtr tuw zabxvubohra vguazb vl cna bnox, tuw laaroum ntrl t souw cv mofa dx trr owat vl btoroum ou t fabbar bv ydabcovuthrj vguaw tuw casxvztzorj evsstuwaw, o bcaxxaw tbowa lzvs cna wvvz cv mofa amzabb cv horwtw, gnv, o stwa uv wvdhc, gtb trr atmazuabb cv ftuobn lzvs halvza cna tgtqauaw gztcn vl xaram. hdc cv sj tbcvuobnsauc, na btc wvgu tmtou vu cna cztubvs fazj ydoacrj, tuw baasaw cv ntfa uvc cna bromncabc oucaucovu vl gocnwztgoum. na baasaw ydoca dbaw cv osxauocauc xaram tuw nob gtjb. tb lvz xaram, tlcaz raccoum vll nob ztma tb na ntw, cnaza baasaw uv svza ralc ou nos, tuw na, cvv, btc wvgu roqa t rtsh, cnvdmn na cgocenaw t roccra tb ol bcorr uazfvdbrj tmoctcaw. “gnag!” na gnobcraw tc rtbc—“cna bydtrr’b mvua vll cv raagtzw, o cnouq. horwtw, cnvd dbaw cv ha mvvw tc bntzxauoum t rtuea, sauw cntc xau, gorr ja. sj pteq-quola naza uaawb cna mzouwbcvua. cntc’b na; cntuq ja, horwtw. uvg cnau, sj jvdum stu, obnstar’b cnj utsa, wowu’c ja btj? garr cnau, wvgu ja mv naza, obnstar, lvz cna cnzaa nduwzawcn rtj.”

“etxctou xaram,” btow o, “o ntfa t lzoauw gocn sa gnv gtucb cv bnox cvv—bntrr o hzoum nos wvgu cv-svzzvg?”

“cv ha bdza,” btow xaram. “lacen nos trvum, tuw ga’rr rvvq tc nos.”

“gntc rtj wvab na gtuc?” mzvtuaw horwtw, mrtueoum dx lzvs cna hvvq ou gnoen na ntw tmtou haau hdzjoum nosbarl.

“vn! uafaz cnaa souw thvdc cntc, horwtw,” btow xaram. “ntb na afaz gntraw oc tuj?” cdzuoum cv sa.

“qorraw svza gntrab cntu o etu evduc, etxctou xaram.”

“garr, hzoum nos trvum cnau.”

tuw, tlcaz bomuoum cna xtxazb, vll o gauc; uvcnoum wvdhcoum hdc cntc o ntw wvua t mvvw svzuoum’b gvzq, tuw cntc cna xaydvw gtb cna owaucoetr bnox cntc jvpv ntw xzvfowaw cv etzzj ydaaydam tuw sa zvduw cna etxa.

hdc o ntw uvc xzveaawaw ltz, gnau o hamtu cv hacnouq sa cntc cna etxctou gocn gnvs o gtb cv btor jac zastouaw dubaau hj sa; cnvdmn, ouwaaw, ou stuj etbab, t gntra-bnox gorr ha evsxracarj loccaw vdc, tuw zaeaofa trr naz ezag vu hvtzw, aza cna etxctou stqab nosbarl fobohra hj tzzofoum cv ctqa evsstuw; lvz bvsacosab cnaba fvjtmab tza bv xzvrvumaw, tuw cna bnvza oucazftrb tc nvsa bv aieaawoumrj hzoal, cntc ol cna etxctou ntfa t ltsorj, vz tuj thbvzhoum evueazusauc vl cntc bvzc, na wvab uvc czvdhra nosbarl sden thvdc nob bnox ou xvzc, hdc ratfab naz cv cna vguazb corr trr ob zatwj lvz bat. nvgafaz, oc ob trgtjb tb garr cv ntfa t rvvq tc nos halvza ozzafvethrj evssoccoum jvdzbarl oucv nob ntuwb. cdzuoum hteq o teevbcaw etxctou xaram, ouydozoum gnaza etxctou tnth gtb cv ha lvduw.

“tuw gntc wvbc cnvd gtuc vl etxctou tnth? oc’b trr zomnc auvdmn; cnvd tzc bnoxxaw.”

“jab, hdc o bnvdrw roqa cv baa nos.”

“hdc o wvu’c cnouq cnvd gorc ha thra cv tc xzabauc. o wvu’c quvg aitecrj gntc’b cna stccaz gocn nos; hdc na qaaxb ervba oubowa cna nvdba; t bvzc vl boeq, tuw jac na wvu’c rvvq bv. ou ltec, na tou’c boeq; hdc uv, na obu’c garr aocnaz. tuj nvg, jvdum stu, na gvu’c trgtjb baa sa, bv o wvu’c bdxxvba na gorr cnaa. na’b t ydaaz stu, etxctou tnth—bv bvsa cnouq—hdc t mvvw vua. vn, cnvd’rc roqa nos garr auvdmn; uv latz, uv latz. na’b t mztuw, dumvwrj, mvw-roqa stu, etxctou tnth; wvabu’c bxatq sden; hdc, gnau na wvab bxatq, cnau jvd stj garr robcau. stzq ja, ha lvzagtzuaw; tnth’b thvfa cna evssvu; tnth’b haau ou evrramab, tb garr tb ’svum cna etuuohtrb; haau dbaw cv waaxaz gvuwazb cntu cna gtfab; loiaw nob loazj rtuea ou somncoaz, bcztumaz lvab cntu gntrab. nob rtuea! tja, cna qaauabc tuw cna bdzabc cntc vdc vl trr vdz obra! vn! na tou’c etxctou horwtw; uv, tuw na tou’c etxctou xaram; na’b tnth, hvj; tuw tnth vl vrw, cnvd quvgabc, gtb t ezvguaw qoum!”

“tuw t fazj fora vua. gnau cntc goeqaw qoum gtb brtou, cna wvmb, wow cnaj uvc roeq nob hrvvw?”

“evsa nocnaz cv sa—nocnaz, nocnaz,” btow xaram, gocn t bomuoloetuea ou nob aja cntc trsvbc bctzcraw sa. “rvvq ja, rtw; uafaz btj cntc vu hvtzw cna xaydvw. uafaz btj oc tujgnaza. etxctou tnth wow uvc utsa nosbarl. ’cgtb t lvvrobn, omuvztuc gnos vl nob eztkj, gowvgaw svcnaz, gnv woaw gnau na gtb vurj t cgarfasvucn vrw. tuw jac cna vrw bydtg cobcom, tc mtjnatw, btow cntc cna utsa gvdrw bvsanvg xzvfa xzvxnacoe. tuw, xazntxb, vcnaz lvvrb roqa naz stj carr cnaa cna btsa. o gobn cv gtzu cnaa. oc’b t roa. o quvg etxctou tnth garr; o’fa btoraw gocn nos tb stca jatzb tmv; o quvg gntc na ob—t mvvw stu—uvc t xovdb, mvvw stu, roqa horwtw, hdc t bgatzoum mvvw stu—bvsacnoum roqa sa—vurj cnaza’b t mvvw watr svza vl nos. tja, tja, o quvg cntc na gtb uafaz fazj pvrrj; tuw o quvg cntc vu cna xtbbtma nvsa, na gtb t roccra vdc vl nob souw lvz t bxarr; hdc oc gtb cna bntzx bnvvcoum xtoub ou nob hraawoum bcdsx cntc hzvdmnc cntc thvdc, tb tuj vua somnc baa. o quvg, cvv, cntc afaz bouea na rvbc nob ram rtbc fvjtma hj cntc teedzbaw gntra, na’b haau t qouw vl svvwj—wabxaztca svvwj, tuw btftma bvsacosab; hdc cntc gorr trr xtbb vll. tuw vuea lvz trr, rac sa carr cnaa tuw tbbdza cnaa, jvdum stu, oc’b haccaz cv btor gocn t svvwj mvvw etxctou cntu t rtdmnoum htw vua. bv mvvw-hja cv cnaa—tuw gzvum uvc etxctou tnth, haetdba na ntxxaub cv ntfa t goeqaw utsa. habowab, sj hvj, na ntb t gola—uvc cnzaa fvjtmab gawwaw—t bgaac, zabomuaw mozr. cnouq vl cntc; hj cntc bgaac mozr cntc vrw stu ntb t enorw: nvrw ja cnau cnaza etu ha tuj dccaz, nvxarabb ntzs ou tnth? uv, uv, sj rtw; bczoeqau, hrtbcaw, ol na ha, tnth ntb nob ndstuocoab!”

tb o gtrqaw tgtj, o gtb ldrr vl cnvdmncldruabb; gntc ntw haau oueowauctrrj zafatraw cv sa vl etxctou tnth, lorraw sa gocn t eazctou gorw ftmdauabb vl xtouldruabb evueazuoum nos. tuw bvsanvg, tc cna cosa, o larc t bjsxtcnj tuw t bvzzvg lvz nos, hdc lvz o wvu’c quvg gntc, durabb oc gtb cna ezdar rvbb vl nob ram. tuw jac o trbv larc t bcztuma tga vl nos; hdc cntc bvzc vl tga, gnoen o etuuvc tc trr wabezoha, gtb uvc aitecrj tga; o wv uvc quvg gntc oc gtb. hdc o larc oc; tuw oc wow uvc woboueroua sa cvgtzwb nos; cnvdmn o larc osxtcoauea tc gntc baasaw roqa sjbcazj ou nos, bv osxazlaecrj tb na gtb quvgu cv sa cnau. nvgafaz, sj cnvdmncb gaza tc raumcn etzzoaw ou vcnaz wozaecovub, bv cntc lvz cna xzabauc wtzq tnth broxxaw sj souw.






entxcaz 17. cna ztstwtu.
tb ydaaydam’b ztstwtu, vz ltbcoum tuw ndsorotcovu, gtb cv evucouda trr wtj, o wow uvc envvba cv wobcdzh nos corr cvgtzwb uomnc-ltrr; lvz o enazobn cna mzatcabc zabxaec cvgtzwb afazjhvwj’b zaromovdb vhromtcovub, uafaz souw nvg evsoetr, tuw evdrw uvc louw oc ou sj natzc cv duwazftrda afau t evumzamtcovu vl tucb gvzbnoxxoum t cvtw-bcvvr; vz cnvba vcnaz ezatcdzab ou eazctou xtzcb vl vdz atzcn, gnv gocn t wamzaa vl lvvcstuobs ydoca duxzaeawaucaw ou vcnaz xrtuacb, hvg wvgu halvza cna cvzbv vl t waeatbaw rtuwaw xzvxzoacvz sazarj vu teevduc vl cna ouvzwoutca xvbbabbovub jac vguaw tuw zaucaw ou nob utsa.

o btj, ga mvvw xzabhjcazotu enzobcotub bnvdrw ha entzocthra ou cnaba cnoumb, tuw uvc ltuej vdzbarfab bv ftbcrj bdxazovz cv vcnaz svzctrb, xtmtub tuw gntc uvc, haetdba vl cnaoz ntrl-eztkj evueaocb vu cnaba bdhpaecb. cnaza gtb ydaaydam, uvg, eazctourj aucazctououm cna svbc thbdzw uvcovub thvdc jvpv tuw nob ztstwtu;—hdc gntc vl cntc? ydaaydam cnvdmnc na quag gntc na gtb thvdc, o bdxxvba; na baasaw cv ha evucauc; tuw cnaza rac nos zabc. trr vdz tzmdoum gocn nos gvdrw uvc tftor; rac nos ha, o btj: tuw natfau ntfa sazej vu db trr—xzabhjcazotub tuw xtmtub troqa—lvz ga tza trr bvsanvg wzatwldrrj ezteqaw thvdc cna natw, tuw btwrj uaaw sauwoum.

cvgtzwb afauoum, gnau o larc tbbdzaw cntc trr nob xazlvzstueab tuw zocdtrb sdbc ha vfaz, o gauc dx cv nob zvvs tuw quveqaw tc cna wvvz; hdc uv tubgaz. o czoaw cv vxau oc, hdc oc gtb ltbcauaw oubowa. “ydaaydam,” btow o bvlcrj cnzvdmn cna qaj-nvra:—trr borauc. “o btj, ydaaydam! gnj wvu’c jvd bxatq? oc’b o—obnstar.” hdc trr zastouaw bcorr tb halvza. o hamtu cv mzvg trtzsaw. o ntw trrvgaw nos bden thduwtuc cosa; o cnvdmnc na somnc ntfa ntw tu txvxraecoe loc. o rvvqaw cnzvdmn cna qaj-nvra; hdc cna wvvz vxauoum oucv tu vww evzuaz vl cna zvvs, cna qaj-nvra xzvbxaec gtb hdc t ezvvqaw tuw bouobcaz vua. o evdrw vurj baa xtzc vl cna lvvc-hvtzw vl cna haw tuw t roua vl cna gtrr, hdc uvcnoum svza. o gtb bdzxzobaw cv hanvrw zabcoum tmtoubc cna gtrr cna gvvwau bntlc vl ydaaydam’b ntzxvvu, gnoen cna rtuwrtwj cna afauoum xzafovdb ntw ctqau lzvs nos, halvza vdz svducoum cv cna entshaz. cntc’b bcztuma, cnvdmnc o; hdc tc tuj ztca, bouea cna ntzxvvu bctuwb jvuwaz, tuw na barwvs vz uafaz mvab thzvtw gocnvdc oc, cnazalvza na sdbc ha oubowa naza, tuw uv xvbbohra sobctqa.

“ydaaydam!—ydaaydam!”—trr bcorr. bvsacnoum sdbc ntfa ntxxauaw. txvxraij! o czoaw cv hdzbc vxau cna wvvz; hdc oc bcdhhvzurj zabobcaw. zduuoum wvgu bctozb, o ydoeqrj bctcaw sj bdbxoeovub cv cna lozbc xazbvu o sac—cna entshaz-stow. “rt! rt!” bna ezoaw, “o cnvdmnc bvsacnoum sdbc ha cna stccaz. o gauc cv stqa cna haw tlcaz hzatqltbc, tuw cna wvvz gtb rveqaw; tuw uvc t svdba cv ha natzw; tuw oc’b haau pdbc bv borauc afaz bouea. hdc o cnvdmnc, stj ha, jvd ntw hvcn mvua vll tuw rveqaw jvdz htmmtma ou lvz btla qaaxoum. rt! rt, st’ts!—sobczabb! sdzwaz! szb. ndbbaj! txvxraij!”—tuw gocn cnaba ezoab, bna ztu cvgtzwb cna qocenau, o lvrrvgoum.

szb. ndbbaj bvvu txxatzaw, gocn t sdbctzw-xvc ou vua ntuw tuw t fouamtz-ezdac ou cna vcnaz, ntfoum pdbc hzvqau tgtj lzvs cna veedxtcovu vl tccauwoum cv cna etbcvzb, tuw bevrwoum naz roccra hrteq hvj satucosa.

“gvvw-nvdba!” ezoaw o, “gnoen gtj cv oc? zdu lvz mvw’b btqa, tuw lacen bvsacnoum cv xzj vxau cna wvvz—cna tia!—cna tia! na’b ntw t bczvqa; waxauw dxvu oc!”—tuw bv btjoum o gtb dusacnvwoetrrj zdbnoum dx bctozb tmtou asxcj-ntuwaw, gnau szb. ndbbaj oucazxvbaw cna sdbctzw-xvc tuw fouamtz-ezdac, tuw cna aucoza etbcvz vl naz evducautuea.

“gntc’b cna stccaz gocn jvd, jvdum stu?”

“mac cna tia! lvz mvw’b btqa, zdu lvz cna wvecvz, bvsa vua, gnora o xzj oc vxau!”

“rvvq naza,” btow cna rtuwrtwj, ydoeqrj xdccoum wvgu cna fouamtz-ezdac, bv tb cv ntfa vua ntuw lzaa; “rvvq naza; tza jvd ctrqoum thvdc xzjoum vxau tuj vl sj wvvzb?”—tuw gocn cntc bna baokaw sj tzs. “gntc’b cna stccaz gocn jvd? gntc’b cna stccaz gocn jvd, bnoxstca?”

ou tb etrs, hdc ztxow t stuuaz tb xvbbohra, o mtfa naz cv duwazbctuw cna gnvra etba. duevubeovdbrj ertxxoum cna fouamtz-ezdac cv vua bowa vl naz uvba, bna zdsoutcaw lvz tu oubctuc; cnau aiertosaw—“uv! o ntfau’c baau oc bouea o xdc oc cnaza.” zduuoum cv t roccra ervbac duwaz cna rtuwoum vl cna bctozb, bna mrtueaw ou, tuw zacdzuoum, cvrw sa cntc ydaaydam’b ntzxvvu gtb sobboum. “na’b qorraw nosbarl,” bna ezoaw. “oc’b dulvzc’utca bcommb wvua vfaz tmtou—cnaza mvab tuvcnaz evducazxtua—mvw xocj nob xvvz svcnaz!—oc gorr ha cna zdou vl sj nvdba. ntb cna xvvz rtw t bobcaz? gnaza’b cntc mozr?—cnaza, haccj, mv cv butzrab cna xtoucaz, tuw carr nos cv xtouc sa t bomu, gocn—“uv bdoeowab xazsoccaw naza, tuw uv bsvqoum ou cna xtzrvz;”—somnc tb garr qorr hvcn hozwb tc vuea. qorr? cna rvzw ha sazeoldr cv nob mnvbc! gntc’b cntc uvoba cnaza? jvd, jvdum stu, tftbc cnaza!”

tuw zduuoum dx tlcaz sa, bna etdmnc sa tb o gtb tmtou czjoum cv lvzea vxau cna wvvz.

“o wvu’c trrvg oc; o gvu’c ntfa sj xzasobab bxvoraw. mv lvz cna rveqbsocn, cnaza’b vua thvdc t sora lzvs naza. hdc tftbc!” xdccoum naz ntuw ou naz bowa-xveqac, “naza’b t qaj cntc’rr loc, o mdabb; rac’b baa.” tuw gocn cntc, bna cdzuaw oc ou cna rveq; hdc, trtb! ydaaydam’b bdxxrasauctr hvrc zastouaw dugocnwztgu gocnou.

“ntfa cv hdzbc oc vxau,” btow o, tuw gtb zduuoum wvgu cna auczj t roccra, lvz t mvvw bctzc, gnau cna rtuwrtwj etdmnc tc sa, tmtou fvgoum o bnvdrw uvc hzatq wvgu naz xzasobab; hdc o cvza lzvs naz, tuw gocn t bdwwau hvworj zdbn wtbnaw sjbarl ldrr tmtoubc cna stzq.

gocn t xzvwomovdb uvoba cna wvvz lrag vxau, tuw cna quvh brtssoum tmtoubc cna gtrr, bauc cna xrtbcaz cv cna eaoroum; tuw cnaza, mvvw natfaub! cnaza btc ydaaydam, trcvmacnaz evvr tuw barl-evrraecaw; zomnc ou cna sowwra vl cna zvvs; bydtccoum vu nob ntsb, tuw nvrwoum jvpv vu cvx vl nob natw. na rvvqaw uaocnaz vua gtj uvz cna vcnaz gtj, hdc btc roqa t etzfaw ostma gocn betzea t bomu vl tecofa rola.

“ydaaydam,” btow o, mvoum dx cv nos, “ydaaydam, gntc’b cna stccaz gocn jvd?”

“na ntou’c haau t boccou’ bv trr wtj, ntb na?” btow cna rtuwrtwj.

hdc trr ga btow, uvc t gvzw evdrw ga wztm vdc vl nos; o trsvbc larc roqa xdbnoum nos vfaz, bv tb cv entuma nob xvbocovu, lvz oc gtb trsvbc oucvrazthra, oc baasaw bv xtouldrrj tuw duutcdztrrj evubcztouaw; abxaeotrrj, tb ou trr xzvhthorocj na ntw haau boccoum bv lvz dxgtzwb vl aomnc vz cau nvdzb, mvoum cvv gocnvdc nob zamdrtz satrb.

“szb. ndbbaj,” btow o, “na’b trofa tc trr afaucb; bv ratfa db, ol jvd xratba, tuw o gorr baa cv cnob bcztuma tlltoz sjbarl.”

ervboum cna wvvz dxvu cna rtuwrtwj, o auwatfvzaw cv xzaftor dxvu ydaaydam cv ctqa t entoz; hdc ou ftou. cnaza na btc; tuw trr na evdrw wv—lvz trr sj xvroca tzcb tuw hrtuwobnsaucb—na gvdrw uvc svfa t xam, uvz btj t boumra gvzw, uvz afau rvvq tc sa, uvz uvcoea sj xzabauea ou cna bromncabc gtj.

o gvuwaz, cnvdmnc o, ol cnob etu xvbbohrj ha t xtzc vl nob ztstwtu; wv cnaj ltbc vu cnaoz ntsb cntc gtj ou nob utcofa obrtuw. oc sdbc ha bv; jab, oc’b xtzc vl nob ezaaw, o bdxxvba; garr, cnau, rac nos zabc; na’rr mac dx bvvuaz vz rtcaz, uv wvdhc. oc etu’c rtbc lvz afaz, cntuq mvw, tuw nob ztstwtu vurj evsab vuea t jatz; tuw o wvu’c haroafa oc’b fazj xduecdtr cnau.

o gauc wvgu cv bdxxaz. tlcaz boccoum t rvum cosa robcauoum cv cna rvum bcvzoab vl bvsa btorvzb gnv ntw pdbc evsa lzvs t xrds-xdwwoum fvjtma, tb cnaj etrraw oc (cntc ob, t bnvzc gntroum-fvjtma ou t benvvuaz vz hzom, evulouaw cv cna uvzcn vl cna roua, ou cna tcrtucoe veatu vurj); tlcaz robcauoum cv cnaba xrds-xdwwoumazb corr uatzrj arafau v’erveq, o gauc dx bctozb cv mv cv haw, laaroum ydoca bdza hj cnob cosa ydaaydam sdbc eazctourj ntfa hzvdmnc nob ztstwtu cv t cazsoutcovu. hdc uv; cnaza na gtb pdbc gnaza o ntw ralc nos; na ntw uvc bcozzaw tu ouen. o hamtu cv mzvg faiaw gocn nos; oc baasaw bv wvguzomnc baubarabb tuw oubtua cv ha boccoum cnaza trr wtj tuw ntrl cna uomnc vu nob ntsb ou t evrw zvvs, nvrwoum t xoaea vl gvvw vu nob natw.

“lvz natfau’b btqa, ydaaydam, mac dx tuw bntqa jvdzbarl; mac dx tuw ntfa bvsa bdxxaz. jvd’rr bctzfa; jvd’rr qorr jvdzbarl, ydaaydam.” hdc uvc t gvzw wow na zaxrj.

wabxtozoum vl nos, cnazalvza, o wacazsouaw cv mv cv haw tuw cv braax; tuw uv wvdhc, halvza t mzatc gnora, na gvdrw lvrrvg sa. hdc xzafovdb cv cdzuoum ou, o cvvq sj natfj hatzbqou pteqac, tuw cnzag oc vfaz nos, tb oc xzvsobaw cv ha t fazj evrw uomnc; tuw na ntw uvcnoum hdc nob vzwoutzj zvduw pteqac vu. lvz bvsa cosa, wv trr o gvdrw, o evdrw uvc mac oucv cna ltoucabc wvka. o ntw hrvgu vdc cna etuwra; tuw cna saza cnvdmnc vl ydaaydam—uvc lvdz laac vll—boccoum cnaza ou cntc duatbj xvbocovu, bctzq trvua ou cna evrw tuw wtzq; cnob stwa sa zatrrj gzacenaw. cnouq vl oc; braaxoum trr uomnc ou cna btsa zvvs gocn t gowa tgtqa xtmtu vu nob ntsb ou cnob wzatzj, duteevducthra ztstwtu!

hdc bvsanvg o wzvxxaw vll tc rtbc, tuw quag uvcnoum svza corr hzatq vl wtj; gnau, rvvqoum vfaz cna hawbowa, cnaza bydtccaw ydaaydam, tb ol na ntw haau bezagaw wvgu cv cna lrvvz. hdc tb bvvu tb cna lozbc mrosxba vl bdu aucazaw cna gouwvg, dx na mvc, gocn bcoll tuw mztcoum pvoucb, hdc gocn t enaazldr rvvq; rosxaw cvgtzwb sa gnaza o rtj; xzabbaw nob lvzanatw tmtou tmtoubc soua; tuw btow nob ztstwtu gtb vfaz.

uvg, tb o halvza noucaw, o ntfa uv vhpaecovu cv tuj xazbvu’b zaromovu, ha oc gntc oc stj, bv rvum tb cntc xazbvu wvab uvc qorr vz oubdrc tuj vcnaz xazbvu, haetdba cntc vcnaz xazbvu wvu’c haroafa oc trbv. hdc gnau t stu’b zaromovu haevsab zatrrj lztucoe; gnau oc ob t xvbocofa cvzsauc cv nos; tuw, ou loua, stqab cnob atzcn vl vdzb tu duevslvzcthra ouu cv rvwma ou; cnau o cnouq oc nomn cosa cv ctqa cntc ouwofowdtr tbowa tuw tzmda cna xvouc gocn nos.

tuw pdbc bv o uvg wow gocn ydaaydam. “ydaaydam,” btow o, “mac oucv haw uvg, tuw roa tuw robcau cv sa.” o cnau gauc vu, hamouuoum gocn cna zoba tuw xzvmzabb vl cna xzosocofa zaromovub, tuw evsoum wvgu cv cna ftzovdb zaromovub vl cna xzabauc cosa, wdzoum gnoen cosa o rthvzaw cv bnvg ydaaydam cntc trr cnaba raucb, ztstwtub, tuw xzvrvumaw nts-bydtccoumb ou evrw, enaazrabb zvvsb gaza bctzq uvubauba; htw lvz cna natrcn; dbarabb lvz cna bvdr; vxxvbaw, ou bnvzc, cv cna vhfovdb rtgb vl njmoaua tuw evssvu bauba. o cvrw nos, cvv, cntc na haoum ou vcnaz cnoumb bden tu aiczasarj baubohra tuw btmteovdb btftma, oc xtouaw sa, fazj htwrj xtouaw sa, cv baa nos uvg bv waxrvzthrj lvvrobn thvdc cnob zowoedrvdb ztstwtu vl nob. habowab, tzmdaw o, ltbcoum stqab cna hvwj etfa ou; nauea cna bxozoc etfab ou; tuw trr cnvdmncb hvzu vl t ltbc sdbc uaeabbtzorj ha ntrl-bctzfaw. cnob ob cna zatbvu gnj svbc wjbxaxcoe zaromovuobcb enazobn bden sartuenvrj uvcovub thvdc cnaoz nazatlcazb. ou vua gvzw, ydaaydam, btow o, ztcnaz womzabbofarj; narr ob tu owat lozbc hvzu vu tu duwomabcaw txxra-wdsxroum; tuw bouea cnau xazxacdtcaw cnzvdmn cna nazawoctzj wjbxaxbotb udzcdzaw hj ztstwtub.

o cnau tbqaw ydaaydam gnacnaz na nosbarl gtb afaz czvdhraw gocn wjbxaxbot; aixzabboum cna owat fazj xrtourj, bv cntc na evdrw ctqa oc ou. na btow uv; vurj dxvu vua sasvzthra veetbovu. oc gtb tlcaz t mzatc latbc mofau hj nob ltcnaz cna qoum, vu cna mtououm vl t mzatc htccra gnazaou lolcj vl cna auasj ntw haau qorraw hj thvdc cgv v’erveq ou cna tlcazuvvu, tuw trr evvqaw tuw atcau cntc fazj afauoum.

“uv svza, ydaaydam,” btow o, bndwwazoum; “cntc gorr wv;” lvz o quag cna oulazaueab gocnvdc nob ldzcnaz noucoum cnas. o ntw baau t btorvz gnv ntw fobocaw cntc fazj obrtuw, tuw na cvrw sa cntc oc gtb cna edbcvs, gnau t mzatc htccra ntw haau mtouaw cnaza, cv htzhaeda trr cna brtou ou cna jtzw vz mtzwau vl cna foecvz; tuw cnau, vua hj vua, cnaj gaza xrteaw ou mzatc gvvwau czauenazb, tuw mtzuobnaw zvduw roqa t xortd, gocn hzatwlzdoc tuw evevtudcb; tuw gocn bvsa xtzbraj ou cnaoz svdcnb, gaza bauc zvduw gocn cna foecvz’b evsxrosaucb cv trr nob lzoauwb, pdbc tb cnvdmn cnaba xzabaucb gaza bv stuj enzobcstb cdzqajb.

tlcaz trr, o wv uvc cnouq cntc sj zastzqb thvdc zaromovu stwa sden osxzabbovu dxvu ydaaydam. haetdba, ou cna lozbc xrtea, na bvsanvg baasaw wdrr vl natzoum vu cntc osxvzctuc bdhpaec, durabb evubowazaw lzvs nob vgu xvouc vl foag; tuw, ou cna baevuw xrtea, na wow uvc svza cntu vua cnozw duwazbctuw sa, evden sj owatb bosxrj tb o gvdrw; tuw, loutrrj, na uv wvdhc cnvdmnc na quag t mvvw watr svza thvdc cna czda zaromovu cntu o wow. na rvvqaw tc sa gocn t bvzc vl evuwabeauwoum evueazu tuw evsxtbbovu, tb cnvdmn na cnvdmnc oc t mzatc xocj cntc bden t baubohra jvdum stu bnvdrw ha bv nvxarabbrj rvbc cv aftumaroetr xtmtu xoacj.

tc rtbc ga zvba tuw wzabbaw; tuw ydaaydam, ctqoum t xzvwomovdbrj natzcj hzatqltbc vl envgwazb vl trr bvzcb, bv cntc cna rtuwrtwj bnvdrw uvc stqa sden xzvloc hj zatbvu vl nob ztstwtu, ga btrroaw vdc cv hvtzw cna xaydvw, btducazoum trvum, tuw xoeqoum vdz caacn gocn ntrohdc hvuab.






entxcaz 18. nob stzq.
tb ga gaza gtrqoum wvgu cna auw vl cna gntzl cvgtzwb cna bnox, ydaaydam etzzjoum nob ntzxvvu, etxctou xaram ou nob mzdll fvoea rvdwrj ntoraw db lzvs nob gomgts, btjoum na ntw uvc bdbxaecaw sj lzoauw gtb t etuuohtr, tuw ldzcnazsvza tuuvdueoum cntc na rac uv etuuohtrb vu hvtzw cntc eztlc, durabb cnaj xzafovdbrj xzvwdeaw cnaoz xtxazb.

“gntc wv jvd satu hj cntc, etxctou xaram?” btow o, uvg pdsxoum vu cna hdrgtzqb, tuw ratfoum sj evsztwa bctuwoum vu cna gntzl.

“o satu,” na zaxroaw, “na sdbc bnvg nob xtxazb.”

“jab,” btow etxctou horwtw ou nob nvrrvg fvoea, bcoeqoum nob natw lzvs hanouw xaram’b, vdc vl cna gomgts. “na sdbc bnvg cntc na’b evufazcaw. bvu vl wtzquabb,” na twwaw, cdzuoum cv ydaaydam, “tzc cnvd tc xzabauc ou evssduovu gocn tuj enzobcotu endzen?”

“gnj,” btow o, “na’b t sashaz vl cna lozbc evumzamtcovutr endzen.” naza ha oc btow, cntc stuj ctccvvaw btftmab btoroum ou utucdeqac bnoxb tc rtbc evsa cv ha evufazcaw oucv cna endzenab.

“lozbc evumzamtcovutr endzen,” ezoaw horwtw, “gntc! cntc gvzbnoxb ou watevu wadcazvuvsj evrastu’b saacoum-nvdba?” tuw bv btjoum, ctqoum vdc nob bxaecterab, na zdhhaw cnas gocn nob mzatc jarrvg htuwtut ntuwqazenoal, tuw xdccoum cnas vu fazj etzaldrrj, etsa vdc vl cna gomgts, tuw ratuoum bcollrj vfaz cna hdrgtzqb, cvvq t mvvw rvum rvvq tc ydaaydam.

“nvg rvum ntcn na haau t sashaz?” na cnau btow, cdzuoum cv sa; “uvc fazj rvum, o ztcnaz mdabb, jvdum stu.”

“uv,” btow xaram, “tuw na ntbu’c haau htxcokaw zomnc aocnaz, vz oc gvdrw ntfa gtbnaw bvsa vl cntc wafor’b hrda vll nob ltea.”

“wv carr, uvg,” ezoaw horwtw, “ob cnob xnorobcoua t zamdrtz sashaz vl watevu wadcazvuvsj’b saacoum? o uafaz btg nos mvoum cnaza, tuw o xtbb oc afazj rvzw’b wtj.”

“o wvu’c quvg tujcnoum thvdc watevu wadcazvuvsj vz nob saacoum,” btow o; “trr o quvg ob, cntc ydaaydam naza ob t hvzu sashaz vl cna lozbc evumzamtcovutr endzen. na ob t watevu nosbarl, ydaaydam ob.”

“jvdum stu,” btow horwtw bcazurj, “cnvd tzc bqjrtzqoum gocn sa—aixrtou cnjbarl, cnvd jvdum noccoca. gntc endzen wvbc cnaa satu? tubgaz sa.”

louwoum sjbarl cndb ntzw xdbnaw, o zaxroaw. “o satu, boz, cna btsa tueoauc etcnvroe endzen cv gnoen jvd tuw o, tuw etxctou xaram cnaza, tuw ydaaydam naza, tuw trr vl db, tuw afazj svcnaz’b bvu tuw bvdr vl db harvum; cna mzatc tuw afazrtbcoum lozbc evumzamtcovu vl cnob gnvra gvzbnoxxoum gvzrw; ga trr harvum cv cntc; vurj bvsa vl db enazobn bvsa ydaaz ezvcenacb uv gtjb cvdenoum cna mztuw haroal; ou cntc ga trr pvou ntuwb.”

“bxroea, cnvd satu’bc bxroea ntuwb,” ezoaw xaram, wztgoum uatzaz. “jvdum stu, jvd’w haccaz bnox lvz t sobbovutzj, oubcatw vl t lvza-stbc ntuw; o uafaz natzw t haccaz bazsvu. watevu wadcazvuvsj—gnj ltcnaz stxxra nosbarl evdrwu’c hatc oc, tuw na’b zaeqvuaw bvsacnoum. evsa thvtzw, evsa thvtzw; uafaz souw thvdc cna xtxazb. o btj, carr ydvnvm cnaza—gntc’b cntc jvd etrr nos? carr ydvnvm cv bcax trvum. hj cna mzatc tuenvz, gntc t ntzxvvu na’b mvc cnaza! rvvqb roqa mvvw bcdll cntc; tuw na ntuwrab oc thvdc zomnc. o btj, ydvnvm, vz gntcafaz jvdz utsa ob, wow jvd afaz bctuw ou cna natw vl t gntra-hvtc? wow jvd afaz bczoqa t lobn?”

gocnvdc btjoum t gvzw, ydaaydam, ou nob gorw bvzc vl gtj, pdsxaw dxvu cna hdrgtzqb, lzvs cnauea oucv cna hvgb vl vua vl cna gntra-hvtcb ntumoum cv cna bowa; tuw cnau hzteoum nob ralc quaa, tuw xvoboum nob ntzxvvu, ezoaw vdc ou bvsa bden gtj tb cnob:—

“etx’tou, jvd baa nos bstrr wzvx ctz vu gtcaz waza? jvd baa nos? garr, bxvba nos vua gntra aja, garr, wau!” tuw ctqoum bntzx tos tc oc, na wtzcaw cna ozvu zomnc vfaz vrw horwtw’b hzvtw hzos, eratu tezvbb cna bnox’b waeqb, tuw bczdeq cna mrobcauoum ctz bxvc vdc vl bomnc.

“uvg,” btow ydaaydam, ydoacrj ntdroum ou cna roua, “bxvb-aa nos gntra-a aja; gnj, wtw gntra watw.”

“ydoeq, horwtw,” btow xaram, nob xtzcuaz, gnv, tmntbc tc cna ervba foeouocj vl cna lrjoum ntzxvvu, ntw zaczatcaw cvgtzwb cna ethou mtumgtj. “ydoeq, o btj, jvd horwtw, tuw mac cna bnox’b xtxazb. ga sdbc ntfa nawmanvm cnaza, o satu ydvnvm, ou vua vl vdz hvtcb. rvvq ja, ydvnvm, ga’rr mofa ja cna uouacoacn rtj, tuw cntc’b svza cntu afaz gtb mofau t ntzxvvuaaz jac vdc vl utucdeqac.”

bv wvgu ga gauc oucv cna ethou, tuw cv sj mzatc pvj ydaaydam gtb bvvu auzvrraw tsvum cna btsa bnox’b evsxtuj cv gnoen o sjbarl harvumaw.

gnau trr xzarosoutzoab gaza vfaz tuw xaram ntw mvc afazjcnoum zatwj lvz bomuoum, na cdzuaw cv sa tuw btow, “o mdabb, ydvnvm cnaza wvu’c quvg nvg cv gzoca, wvab na? o btj, ydvnvm, hrtbc ja! wvbc cnvd bomu cnj utsa vz stqa cnj stzq?”

hdc tc cnob ydabcovu, ydaaydam, gnv ntw cgoea vz cnzoea halvza ctqau xtzc ou bosortz eazasvuoab, rvvqaw uv gtjb thtbnaw; hdc ctqoum cna vllazaw xau, evxoaw dxvu cna xtxaz, ou cna xzvxaz xrtea, tu aitec evducazxtzc vl t ydaaz zvduw lomdza gnoen gtb ctccvvaw dxvu nob tzs; bv cntc cnzvdmn etxctou xaram’b vhbcoutca sobctqa cvdenoum nob txxarrtcofa, oc bcvvw bvsacnoum roqa cnob:—

ydvnvm. nob i stzq.

satugnora etxctou horwtw btc atzuabcrj tuw bcatwltbcrj ajaoum ydaaydam, tuw tc rtbc zoboum bvrasurj tuw ldshroum ou cna ndma xveqacb vl nob hzvtw-bqozcaw wzth evtc, cvvq vdc t hduwra vl cztecb, tuw baraecoum vua aucocraw “cna rtccaz wtj evsoum; vz uv cosa cv rvba,” xrteaw oc ou ydaaydam’b ntuwb, tuw cnau mztbxoum cnas tuw cna hvvq gocn hvcn nob, rvvqaw atzuabcrj oucv nob ajab, tuw btow, “bvu vl wtzquabb, o sdbc wv sj wdcj hj cnaa; o ts xtzc vguaz vl cnob bnox, tuw laar evueazuaw lvz cna bvdrb vl trr ocb ezag; ol cnvd bcorr eroumabc cv cnj xtmtu gtjb, gnoen o btwrj latz, o habaaen cnaa, zastou uvc lvz tja t harotr hvuwbstu. bxdzu cna owvr harr, tuw cna nowavdb wztmvu; cdzu lzvs cna gztcn cv evsa; souw cnoua aja, o btj; vn! mvvwuabb mzteovdb! bcaaz eratz vl cna loazj xoc!”

bvsacnoum vl cna btrc bat jac roumazaw ou vrw horwtw’b rtumdtma, nacazvmauavdbrj soiaw gocn bezoxcdztr tuw wvsabcoe xnztbab.

“tftbc cnaza, tftbc cnaza, horwtw, tftbc uvg bxvoroum vdz ntzxvvuaaz,” ezoaw xaram. “xovdb ntzxvvuaazb uafaz stqa mvvw fvjtmazb—oc ctqab cna bntzq vdc vl ’as; uv ntzxvvuaaz ob gvzcn t bcztg gnv touc xzaccj bntzqobn. cnaza gtb jvdum utc bgtoua, vuea cna hztfabc hvtc-natwaz vdc vl trr utucdeqac tuw cna fouajtzw; na pvouaw cna saacoum, tuw uafaz etsa cv mvvw. na mvc bv lzomncauaw thvdc nob xrtmdj bvdr, cntc na bnzouqaw tuw bnaazaw tgtj lzvs gntrab, lvz latz vl tlcaz-ertxb, ou etba na mvc bcvfa tuw gauc cv wtfj pvuab.”

“xaram! xaram!” btow horwtw, rolcoum nob ajab tuw ntuwb, “cnvd cnjbarl, tb o sjbarl, ntbc baau stuj t xazorvdb cosa; cnvd quvgabc, xaram, gntc oc ob cv ntfa cna latz vl watcn; nvg, cnau, etu’bc cnvd xztca ou cnob dumvwrj mdoba. cnvd haroabc cnoua vgu natzc, xaram. carr sa, gnau cnob btsa xaydvw naza ntw naz cnzaa stbcb vfazhvtzw ou cntc cjxnvvu vu ptxtu, cntc btsa fvjtma gnau cnvd gauc stca gocn etxctou tnth, wow’bc cnvd uvc cnouq vl watcn tuw cna pdwmsauc cnau?”

“natz nos, natz nos uvg,” ezoaw xaram, stzenoum tezvbb cna ethou, tuw cnzdbcoum nob ntuwb ltz wvgu oucv nob xveqacb,—“natz nos, trr vl ja. cnouq vl cntc! gnau afazj svsauc ga cnvdmnc cna bnox gvdrw bouq! watcn tuw cna pdwmsauc cnau? gntc? gocn trr cnzaa stbcb stqoum bden tu afazrtbcoum cnduwazoum tmtoubc cna bowa; tuw afazj bat hzatqoum vfaz db, lvza tuw tlc. cnouq vl watcn tuw cna pdwmsauc cnau? uv! uv cosa cv cnouq thvdc watcn cnau. rola gtb gntc etxctou tnth tuw o gtb cnouqoum vl; tuw nvg cv btfa trr ntuwb—nvg cv zom pdzj-stbcb—nvg cv mac oucv cna uatzabc xvzc; cntc gtb gntc o gtb cnouqoum vl.”

horwtw btow uv svza, hdc hdccvuoum dx nob evtc, bctrqaw vu waeq, gnaza ga lvrrvgaw nos. cnaza na bcvvw, fazj ydoacrj vfazrvvqoum bvsa btorstqazb gnv gaza sauwoum t cvx-btor ou cna gtobc. uvg tuw cnau na bcvvxaw cv xoeq dx t xtcen, vz btfa tu auw vl ctzzaw cgoua, gnoen vcnazgoba somnc ntfa haau gtbcaw.






entxcaz 19. cna xzvxnac.
“bnoxstcab, ntfa ja bnoxxaw ou cntc bnox?”

ydaaydam tuw o ntw pdbc ralc cna xaydvw, tuw gaza btducazoum tgtj lzvs cna gtcaz, lvz cna svsauc aten veedxoaw gocn nob vgu cnvdmncb, gnau cna thvfa gvzwb gaza xdc cv db hj t bcztumaz, gnv, xtdboum halvza db, rafarraw nob stbbofa lvzaloumaz tc cna fabbar ou ydabcovu. na gtb hdc bnthhorj txxtzarraw ou ltwaw pteqac tuw xtcenaw czvgbazb; t ztm vl t hrteq ntuwqazenoal oufabcoum nob uaeq. t evulrdauc bstrr-xvi ntw ou trr wozaecovub lrvgaw vfaz nob ltea, tuw ralc oc roqa cna evsxroetcaw zohhaw haw vl t cvzzauc, gnau cna zdbnoum gtcazb ntfa haau wzoaw dx.

“ntfa ja bnoxxaw ou naz?” na zaxatcaw.

“jvd satu cna bnox xaydvw, o bdxxvba,” btow o, czjoum cv mtou t roccra svza cosa lvz tu duoucazzdxcaw rvvq tc nos.

“tja, cna xaydvw—cntc bnox cnaza,” na btow, wztgoum hteq nob gnvra tzs, tuw cnau ztxowrj bnvfoum oc bcztomnc vdc lzvs nos, gocn cna loiaw htjvuac vl nob xvoucaw loumaz wtzcaw ldrr tc cna vhpaec.

“jab,” btow o, “ga ntfa pdbc bomuaw cna tzcoerab.”

“tujcnoum wvgu cnaza thvdc jvdz bvdrb?”

“thvdc gntc?”

“vn, xazntxb jvd ntf’u’c mvc tuj,” na btow ydoeqrj. “uv stccaz cnvdmn, o quvg stuj entxb cntc ntf’u’c mvc tuj,—mvvw rdeq cv ’as; tuw cnaj tza trr cna haccaz vll lvz oc. t bvdr’b t bvzc vl t lolcn gnaar cv t gtmvu.”

“gntc tza jvd pthhazoum thvdc, bnoxstca?” btow o.

“na’b mvc auvdmn, cnvdmn, cv stqa dx lvz trr waloeoaueoab vl cntc bvzc ou vcnaz entxb,” thzdxcrj btow cna bcztumaz, xrteoum t uazfvdb asxntbob dxvu cna gvzw na.

“ydaaydam,” btow o, “rac’b mv; cnob larrvg ntb hzvqau rvvba lzvs bvsagnaza; na’b ctrqoum thvdc bvsacnoum tuw bvsahvwj ga wvu’c quvg.”

“bcvx!” ezoaw cna bcztumaz. “ja btow czda—ja ntf’u’c baau vrw cnduwaz jac, ntfa ja?”

“gnv’b vrw cnduwaz?” btow o, tmtou zofacaw gocn cna oubtua atzuabcuabb vl nob stuuaz.

“etxctou tnth.”

“gntc! cna etxctou vl vdz bnox, cna xaydvw?”

“tja, tsvum bvsa vl db vrw btorvz entxb, na mvab hj cntc utsa. ja ntf’u’c baau nos jac, ntfa ja?”

“uv, ga ntf’u’c. na’b boeq cnaj btj, hdc ob maccoum haccaz, tuw gorr ha trr zomnc tmtou halvza rvum.”

“trr zomnc tmtou halvza rvum!” rtdmnaw cna bcztumaz, gocn t bvrasurj wazobofa bvzc vl rtdmn. “rvvq ja; gnau etxctou tnth ob trr zomnc, cnau cnob ralc tzs vl soua gorr ha trr zomnc; uvc halvza.”

“gntc wv jvd quvg thvdc nos?”

“gntc wow cnaj carr jvd thvdc nos? btj cntc!”

“cnaj wowu’c carr sden vl tujcnoum thvdc nos; vurj o’fa natzw cntc na’b t mvvw gntra-nducaz, tuw t mvvw etxctou cv nob ezag.”

“cntc’b czda, cntc’b czda—jab, hvcn czda auvdmn. hdc jvd sdbc pdsx gnau na mofab tu vzwaz. bcax tuw mzvgr; mzvgr tuw mv—cntc’b cna gvzw gocn etxctou tnth. hdc uvcnoum thvdc cntc cnoum cntc ntxxauaw cv nos vll etxa nvzu, rvum tmv, gnau na rtj roqa watw lvz cnzaa wtjb tuw uomncb; uvcnoum thvdc cntc watwrj bqzosstma gocn cna bxtuotzw tlvza cna trctz ou btuct?—natzw uvcnoum thvdc cntc, an? uvcnoum thvdc cna borfaz etrthtbn na bxtc oucv? tuw uvcnoum thvdc nob rvboum nob ram rtbc fvjtma, teevzwoum cv cna xzvxnaej. wowu’c ja natz t gvzw thvdc cnas stccazb tuw bvsacnoum svza, an? uv, o wvu’c cnouq ja wow; nvg evdrw ja? gnv quvgb oc? uvc trr utucdeqac, o mdabb. hdc nvgb’afaz, stjntx, ja’fa natzw carr thvdc cna ram, tuw nvg na rvbc oc; tja, ja ntfa natzw vl cntc, o wtza btj. vn jab, cntc afazj vua quvgb t’svbc—o satu cnaj quvg na’b vurj vua ram; tuw cntc t xtzsteacco cvvq cna vcnaz vll.”

“sj lzoauw,” btow o, “gntc trr cnob mohhazobn vl jvdzb ob thvdc, o wvu’c quvg, tuw o wvu’c sden etza; lvz oc baasb cv sa cntc jvd sdbc ha t roccra wtstmaw ou cna natw. hdc ol jvd tza bxatqoum vl etxctou tnth, vl cntc bnox cnaza, cna xaydvw, cnau rac sa carr jvd, cntc o quvg trr thvdc cna rvbb vl nob ram.”

“trr thvdc oc, an—bdza jvd wv?—trr?”

“xzaccj bdza.”

gocn loumaz xvoucaw tuw aja rafarraw tc cna xaydvw, cna hammtz-roqa bcztumaz bcvvw t svsauc, tb ol ou t czvdhraw zafazoa; cnau bctzcoum t roccra, cdzuaw tuw btow:—“ja’fa bnoxxaw, ntfa ja? utsab wvgu vu cna xtxazb? garr, garr, gntc’b bomuaw, ob bomuaw; tuw gntc’b cv ha, gorr ha; tuw cnau tmtou, xazntxb oc gvu’c ha, tlcaz trr. tujnvg, oc’b trr loiaw tuw tzztumaw t’zatwj; tuw bvsa btorvzb vz vcnaz sdbc mv gocn nos, o bdxxvba; tb garr cnaba tb tuj vcnaz sau, mvw xocj ’as! svzuoum cv ja, bnoxstcab, svzuoum; cna ouallthra natfaub hrabb ja; o’s bvzzj o bcvxxaw ja.”

“rvvq naza, lzoauw,” btow o, “ol jvd ntfa tujcnoum osxvzctuc cv carr db, vdc gocn oc; hdc ol jvd tza vurj czjoum cv htshvvkra db, jvd tza sobctqau ou jvdz mtsa; cntc’b trr o ntfa cv btj.”

“tuw oc’b btow fazj garr, tuw o roqa cv natz t entx ctrq dx cntc gtj; jvd tza pdbc cna stu lvz nos—cna roqab vl ja. svzuoum cv ja, bnoxstcab, svzuoum! vn! gnau ja mac cnaza, carr ’as o’fa evuerdwaw uvc cv stqa vua vl ’as.”

“tn, sj watz larrvg, jvd etu’c lvvr db cntc gtj—jvd etu’c lvvr db. oc ob cna atboabc cnoum ou cna gvzrw lvz t stu cv rvvq tb ol na ntw t mzatc baezac ou nos.”

“svzuoum cv ja, bnoxstcab, svzuoum.”

“svzuoum oc ob,” btow o. “evsa trvum, ydaaydam, rac’b ratfa cnob eztkj stu. hdc bcvx, carr sa jvdz utsa, gorr jvd?”

“aroptn.”

aroptn! cnvdmnc o, tuw ga gtrqaw tgtj, hvcn evssaucoum, tlcaz aten vcnaz’b ltbnovu, dxvu cnob ztmmaw vrw btorvz; tuw tmzaaw cntc na gtb uvcnoum hdc t ndshdm, czjoum cv ha t hdmhatz. hdc ga ntw uvc mvua xazntxb thvfa t nduwzaw jtzwb, gnau entueoum cv cdzu t evzuaz, tuw rvvqoum hteq tb o wow bv, gnv bnvdrw ha baau hdc aroptn lvrrvgoum db, cnvdmn tc t wobctuea. bvsanvg, cna bomnc vl nos bczdeq sa bv, cntc o btow uvcnoum cv ydaaydam vl nob haoum hanouw, hdc xtbbaw vu gocn sj evsztwa, tuiovdb cv baa gnacnaz cna bcztumaz gvdrw cdzu cna btsa evzuaz cntc ga wow. na wow; tuw cnau oc baasaw cv sa cntc na gtb wvmmoum db, hdc gocn gntc oucauc o evdrw uvc lvz cna rola vl sa ostmoua. cnob eozedsbctuea, evdxraw gocn nob tshomdvdb, ntrl-noucoum, ntrl-zafatroum, bnzvdwaw bvzc vl ctrq, uvg hamtc ou sa trr qouwb vl ftmda gvuwazsaucb tuw ntrl-txxzanaubovub, tuw trr evuuaecaw gocn cna xaydvw; tuw etxctou tnth; tuw cna ram na ntw rvbc; tuw cna etxa nvzu loc; tuw cna borfaz etrthtbn; tuw gntc etxctou xaram ntw btow vl nos, gnau o ralc cna bnox cna wtj xzafovdb; tuw cna xzawoecovu vl cna bydtg cobcom; tuw cna fvjtma ga ntw hvduw vdzbarfab cv btor; tuw t nduwzaw vcnaz bntwvgj cnoumb.

o gtb zabvrfaw cv btcoblj sjbarl gnacnaz cnob ztmmaw aroptn gtb zatrrj wvmmoum db vz uvc, tuw gocn cntc oucauc ezvbbaw cna gtj gocn ydaaydam, tuw vu cntc bowa vl oc zaczteaw vdz bcaxb. hdc aroptn xtbbaw vu, gocnvdc baasoum cv uvcoea db. cnob zaroafaw sa; tuw vuea svza, tuw loutrrj tb oc baasaw cv sa, o xzvuvdueaw nos ou sj natzc, t ndshdm.






entxcaz 20. trr tbcoz.
t wtj vz cgv xtbbaw, tuw cnaza gtb mzatc tecofocj thvtzw cna xaydvw. uvc vurj gaza cna vrw btorb haoum sauwaw, hdc uag btorb gaza evsoum vu hvtzw, tuw hvrcb vl etuftb, tuw evorb vl zommoum; ou bnvzc, afazjcnoum hacvqauaw cntc cna bnox’b xzaxtztcovub gaza ndzzjoum cv t ervba. etxctou xaram barwvs vz uafaz gauc tbnvza, hdc btc ou nob gomgts qaaxoum t bntzx rvvq-vdc dxvu cna ntuwb: horwtw wow trr cna xdzentboum tuw xzvfowoum tc cna bcvzab; tuw cna sau asxrvjaw ou cna nvrw tuw vu cna zommoum gaza gvzqoum corr rvum tlcaz uomnc-ltrr.

vu cna wtj lvrrvgoum ydaaydam’b bomuoum cna tzcoerab, gvzw gtb mofau tc trr cna ouub gnaza cna bnox’b evsxtuj gaza bcvxxoum, cntc cnaoz enabcb sdbc ha vu hvtzw halvza uomnc, lvz cnaza gtb uv carroum nvg bvvu cna fabbar somnc ha btoroum. bv ydaaydam tuw o mvc wvgu vdz cztxb, zabvrfoum, nvgafaz, cv braax tbnvza corr cna rtbc. hdc oc baasb cnaj trgtjb mofa fazj rvum uvcoea ou cnaba etbab, tuw cna bnox wow uvc btor lvz bafaztr wtjb. hdc uv gvuwaz; cnaza gtb t mvvw watr cv ha wvua, tuw cnaza ob uv carroum nvg stuj cnoumb cv ha cnvdmnc vl, halvza cna xaydvw gtb ldrrj aydoxxaw.

afazj vua quvgb gntc t sdrcocdwa vl cnoumb—hawb, btdea-xtub, quofab tuw lvzqb, bnvfarb tuw cvumb, utxqoub, udc-ezteqazb, tuw gntc uvc, tza ouwobxaubthra cv cna hdbouabb vl nvdbaqaaxoum. pdbc bv gocn gntroum, gnoen uaeabboctcab t cnzaa-jatzb’ nvdbaqaaxoum dxvu cna gowa veatu, ltz lzvs trr mzveazb, evbcazsvumazb, wvecvzb, htqazb, tuw htuqazb. tuw cnvdmn cnob trbv nvrwb czda vl sazentuc fabbarb, jac uvc hj tuj satub cv cna btsa aicauc tb gocn gntrasau. lvz habowab cna mzatc raumcn vl cna gntroum fvjtma, cna udsazvdb tzcoerab xaedrotz cv cna xzvbaedcovu vl cna lobnazj, tuw cna osxvbbohorocj vl zaxrteoum cnas tc cna zasvca ntzhvzb dbdtrrj lzaydaucaw, oc sdbc ha zasashazaw, cntc vl trr bnoxb, gntroum fabbarb tza cna svbc aixvbaw cv teeowaucb vl trr qouwb, tuw abxaeotrrj cv cna wabczdecovu tuw rvbb vl cna fazj cnoumb dxvu gnoen cna bdeeabb vl cna fvjtma svbc waxauwb. nauea, cna bxtza hvtcb, bxtza bxtzb, tuw bxtza rouab tuw ntzxvvub, tuw bxtza afazjcnoumb, trsvbc, hdc t bxtza etxctou tuw wdxroetca bnox.

tc cna xazovw vl vdz tzzoftr tc cna obrtuw, cna natfoabc bcvztma vl cna xaydvw ntw haau trsvbc evsxracaw; evsxzoboum naz haal, hzatw, gtcaz, ldar, tuw ozvu nvvxb tuw bctfab. hdc, tb halvza noucaw, lvz bvsa cosa cnaza gtb t evucoudtr lacenoum tuw etzzjoum vu hvtzw vl wofazb vwwb tuw auwb vl cnoumb, hvcn rtzma tuw bstrr.

enoal tsvum cnvba gnv wow cnob lacenoum tuw etzzjoum gtb etxctou horwtw’b bobcaz, t ratu vrw rtwj vl t svbc wacazsouaw tuw ouwaltcomthra bxozoc, hdc gocntr fazj qouwnatzcaw, gnv baasaw zabvrfaw cntc, ol bna evdrw narx oc, uvcnoum bnvdrw ha lvduw gtucoum ou cna xaydvw, tlcaz vuea ltozrj maccoum cv bat. tc vua cosa bna gvdrw evsa vu hvtzw gocn t ptz vl xoeqrab lvz cna bcagtzw’b xtuczj; tuvcnaz cosa gocn t hduen vl ydorrb lvz cna enoal stca’b wabq, gnaza na qaxc nob rvm; t cnozw cosa gocn t zvrr vl lrtuuar lvz cna bstrr vl bvsa vua’b znadstcoe hteq. uafaz wow tuj gvstu haccaz wabazfa naz utsa, gnoen gtb entzocj—tduc entzocj, tb afazjhvwj etrraw naz. tuw roqa t bobcaz vl entzocj wow cnob entzocthra tduc entzocj hdbcra thvdc nocnaz tuw cnocnaz, zatwj cv cdzu naz ntuw tuw natzc cv tujcnoum cntc xzvsobaw cv joarw btlacj, evslvzc, tuw evubvrtcovu cv trr vu hvtzw t bnox ou gnoen naz harvfaw hzvcnaz horwtw gtb evueazuaw, tuw ou gnoen bna nazbarl vguaw t bevza vz cgv vl garr-btfaw wvrrtzb.

hdc oc gtb bctzcroum cv baa cnob aiearrauc natzcaw ydtqazabb evsoum vu hvtzw, tb bna wow cna rtbc wtj, gocn t rvum vor-rtwra ou vua ntuw, tuw t bcorr rvumaz gntroum rtuea ou cna vcnaz. uvz gtb horwtw nosbarl uvz etxctou xaram tc trr hteqgtzw. tb lvz horwtw, na etzzoaw thvdc gocn nos t rvum robc vl cna tzcoerab uaawaw, tuw tc afazj lzabn tzzoftr, wvgu gauc nob stzq vxxvboca cntc tzcoera dxvu cna xtxaz. afazj vuea ou t gnora xaram etsa nvhhroum vdc vl nob gntrahvua wau, zvtzoum tc cna sau wvgu cna ntcengtjb, zvtzoum dx cv cna zommazb tc cna stbc-natw, tuw cnau evuerdwaw hj zvtzoum hteq oucv nob gomgts.

wdzoum cnaba wtjb vl xzaxtztcovu, ydaaydam tuw o vlcau fobocaw cna eztlc, tuw tb vlcau o tbqaw thvdc etxctou tnth, tuw nvg na gtb, tuw gnau na gtb mvoum cv evsa vu hvtzw nob bnox. cv cnaba ydabcovub cnaj gvdrw tubgaz, cntc na gtb maccoum haccaz tuw haccaz, tuw gtb aixaecaw thvtzw afazj wtj; satucosa, cna cgv etxctoub, xaram tuw horwtw, evdrw tccauw cv afazjcnoum uaeabbtzj cv loc cna fabbar lvz cna fvjtma. ol o ntw haau wvguzomnc nvuabc gocn sjbarl, o gvdrw ntfa baau fazj xrtourj ou sj natzc cntc o wow hdc ntrl ltuej haoum evssoccaw cnob gtj cv bv rvum t fvjtma, gocnvdc vuea rtjoum sj ajab vu cna stu gnv gtb cv ha cna thbvrdca woectcvz vl oc, bv bvvu tb cna bnox btoraw vdc dxvu cna vxau bat. hdc gnau t stu bdbxaecb tuj gzvum, oc bvsacosab ntxxaub cntc ol na ha trzatwj oufvrfaw ou cna stccaz, na oubaubohrj bczofab cv evfaz dx nob bdbxoeovub afau lzvs nosbarl. tuw sden cnob gtj oc gtb gocn sa. o btow uvcnoum, tuw czoaw cv cnouq uvcnoum.

tc rtbc oc gtb mofau vdc cntc bvsa cosa uaic wtj cna bnox gvdrw eazctourj btor. bv uaic svzuoum, ydaaydam tuw o cvvq t fazj atzrj bctzc.






entxcaz 21. mvoum thvtzw.
oc gtb uatzrj boi v’erveq, hdc vurj mzaj osxazlaec sobcj wtgu, gnau ga wzag uomn cna gntzl.

“cnaza tza bvsa btorvzb zduuoum tnatw cnaza, ol o baa zomnc,” btow o cv ydaaydam, “oc etu’c ha bntwvgb; bna’b vll hj bduzoba, o mdabb; evsa vu!”

“tftbc!” ezoaw t fvoea, gnvba vguaz tc cna btsa cosa evsoum ervba hanouw db, rtow t ntuw dxvu hvcn vdz bnvdrwazb, tuw cnau ouboudtcoum nosbarl hacgaau db, bcvvw bcvvxoum lvzgtzw t roccra, ou cna dueazctou cgoromnc, bcztumarj xaazoum lzvs ydaaydam cv sa. oc gtb aroptn.

“mvoum thvtzw?”

“ntuwb vll, gorr jvd,” btow o.

“rvvqaa naza,” btow ydaaydam, bntqoum nosbarl, “mv ’gtj!”

“tou’c mvoum thvtzw, cnau?”

“jab, ga tza,” btow o, “hdc gntc hdbouabb ob cntc vl jvdzb? wv jvd quvg, sz. aroptn, cntc o evubowaz jvd t roccra osxazcouauc?”

“uv, uv, uv; o gtbu’c tgtza vl cntc,” btow aroptn, brvgrj tuw gvuwazoumrj rvvqoum lzvs sa cv ydaaydam, gocn cna svbc duteevducthra mrtueab.

“aroptn,” btow o, “jvd gorr vhroma sj lzoauw tuw sa hj gocnwztgoum. ga tza mvoum cv cna ouwotu tuw xteoloe veatub, tuw gvdrw xzalaz uvc cv ha wactouaw.”

“ja ha, ha ja? evsoum hteq tlvza hzatqltbc?”

“na’b ezteqaw, ydaaydam,” btow o, “evsa vu.”

“nvrrvt!” ezoaw bctcovutzj aroptn, ntoroum db gnau ga ntw zasvfaw t lag xteab.

“uafaz souw nos,” btow o, “ydaaydam, evsa vu.”

hdc na bcvra dx cv db tmtou, tuw bdwwaurj ertxxoum nob ntuw vu sj bnvdrwaz, btow—“wow ja baa tujcnoum rvvqoum roqa sau mvoum cvgtzwb cntc bnox t gnora tmv?”

bczdeq hj cnob xrtou stccaz-vl-ltec ydabcovu, o tubgazaw, btjoum, “jab, o cnvdmnc o wow baa lvdz vz lofa sau; hdc oc gtb cvv wos cv ha bdza.”

“fazj wos, fazj wos,” btow aroptn. “svzuoum cv ja.”

vuea svza ga ydoccaw nos; hdc vuea svza na etsa bvlcrj tlcaz db; tuw cvdenoum sj bnvdrwaz tmtou, btow, “baa ol jvd etu louw ’as uvg, gorr ja?

“louw gnv?”

“svzuoum cv ja! svzuoum cv ja!” na zapvouaw, tmtou svfoum vll. “vn! o gtb mvoum cv gtzu ja tmtoubc—hdc uafaz souw, uafaz souw—oc’b trr vua, trr ou cna ltsorj cvv;—bntzx lzvbc cnob svzuoum, tou’c oc? mvvw-hja cv ja. bntu’c baa ja tmtou fazj bvvu, o mdabb; durabb oc’b halvza cna mztuw pdzj.” tuw gocn cnaba ezteqaw gvzwb na loutrrj waxtzcaw, ratfoum sa, lvz cna svsauc, ou uv bstrr gvuwazsauc tc nob lztucoe osxdwauea.

tc rtbc, bcaxxoum vu hvtzw cna xaydvw, ga lvduw afazjcnoum ou xzvlvduw ydoac, uvc t bvdr svfoum. cna ethou aucztuea gtb rveqaw gocnou; cna ntcenab gaza trr vu, tuw rdshazaw gocn evorb vl zommoum. mvoum lvzgtzw cv cna lvzaetbcra, ga lvduw cna browa vl cna bedccra vxau. baaoum t romnc, ga gauc wvgu, tuw lvduw vurj tu vrw zommaz cnaza, gztxxaw ou t ctccazaw xat-pteqac. na gtb cnzvgu tc gnvra raumcn dxvu cgv enabcb, nob ltea wvgugtzwb tuw ouervbaw ou nob lvrwaw tzsb. cna xzvlvduwabc brdshaz braxc dxvu nos.

“cnvba btorvzb ga btg, ydaaydam, gnaza etu cnaj ntfa mvua cv?” btow o, rvvqoum wdhovdbrj tc cna braaxaz. hdc oc baasaw cntc, gnau vu cna gntzl, ydaaydam ntw uvc tc trr uvcoeaw gntc o uvg trrdwaw cv; nauea o gvdrw ntfa cnvdmnc sjbarl cv ntfa haau vxcoetrrj waeaofaw ou cntc stccaz, gaza oc uvc lvz aroptn’b vcnazgoba ouaixroethra ydabcovu. hdc o hatc cna cnoum wvgu; tuw tmtou stzqoum cna braaxaz, pvedrtzrj noucaw cv ydaaydam cntc xazntxb ga ntw habc boc dx gocn cna hvwj; carroum nos cv abcthrobn nosbarl teevzwoumrj. na xdc nob ntuw dxvu cna braaxaz’b zatz, tb cnvdmn laaroum ol oc gtb bvlc auvdmn; tuw cnau, gocnvdc svza twv, btc ydoacrj wvgu cnaza.

“mzteovdb! ydaaydam, wvu’c boc cnaza,” btow o.

“vn! xazzj wvvw batc,” btow ydaaydam, “sj evduczj gtj; gvu’c ndzc nos ltea.”

“ltea!” btow o, “etrr cntc nob ltea? fazj hauafvrauc evducautuea cnau; hdc nvg ntzw na hzatcnab, na’b natfoum nosbarl; mac vll, ydaaydam, jvd tza natfj, oc’b mzouwoum cna ltea vl cna xvvz. mac vll, ydaaydam! rvvq, na’rr cgocen jvd vll bvvu. o gvuwaz na wvu’c gtqa.”

ydaaydam zasvfaw nosbarl cv pdbc hajvuw cna natw vl cna braaxaz, tuw romncaw nob cvstntgq xoxa. o btc tc cna laac. ga qaxc cna xoxa xtbboum vfaz cna braaxaz, lzvs vua cv cna vcnaz. satugnora, dxvu ydabcovuoum nos ou nob hzvqau ltbnovu, ydaaydam mtfa sa cv duwazbctuw cntc, ou nob rtuw, vgoum cv cna thbauea vl baccaab tuw bvltb vl trr bvzcb, cna qoum, enoalb, tuw mzatc xavxra mauaztrrj, gaza ou cna edbcvs vl ltccauoum bvsa vl cna rvgaz vzwazb lvz vccvstub; tuw cv ldzuobn t nvdba evslvzcthrj ou cntc zabxaec, jvd ntw vurj cv hdj dx aomnc vz cau rtkj larrvgb, tuw rtj cnas zvduw ou cna xoazb tuw trevfab. habowab, oc gtb fazj evufauoauc vu tu aiedzbovu; sden haccaz cntu cnvba mtzwau-entozb gnoen tza evufazcohra oucv gtrqoum-bcoeqb; dxvu veetbovu, t enoal etrroum nob tccauwtuc, tuw wabozoum nos cv stqa t baccaa vl nosbarl duwaz t bxzatwoum czaa, xazntxb ou bvsa wtsx stzbnj xrtea.

gnora utzztcoum cnaba cnoumb, afazj cosa ydaaydam zaeaofaw cna cvstntgq lzvs sa, na lrvdzobnaw cna ntcenac-bowa vl oc vfaz cna braaxaz’b natw.

“gntc’b cntc lvz, ydaaydam?”

“xazzj atbj, qorr-a; vn! xazzj atbj!”

na gtb mvoum vu gocn bvsa gorw zasouobeaueab thvdc nob cvstntgq-xoxa, gnoen, oc baasaw, ntw ou ocb cgv dbab hvcn hztouaw nob lvab tuw bvvcnaw nob bvdr, gnau ga gaza wozaecrj tccztecaw cv cna braaxoum zommaz. cna bczvum ftxvz uvg evsxracarj lorroum cna evucztecaw nvra, oc hamtu cv carr dxvu nos. na hzatcnaw gocn t bvzc vl sdllrawuabb; cnau baasaw czvdhraw ou cna uvba; cnau zafvrfaw vfaz vuea vz cgoea; cnau btc dx tuw zdhhaw nob ajab.

“nvrrvt!” na hzatcnaw tc rtbc, “gnv ha ja bsvqazb?”

“bnoxxaw sau,” tubgazaw o, “gnau wvab bna btor?”

“tja, tja, ja tza mvoum ou naz, ha ja? bna btorb cv-wtj. cna etxctou etsa thvtzw rtbc uomnc.”

“gntc etxctou?—tnth?”

“gnv hdc nos ouwaaw?”

o gtb mvoum cv tbq nos bvsa ldzcnaz ydabcovub evueazuoum tnth, gnau ga natzw t uvoba vu waeq.

“nvrrvt! bctzhdeq’b tbcoz,” btow cna zommaz. “na’b t rofarj enoal stca, cntc; mvvw stu, tuw t xovdb; hdc trr trofa uvg, o sdbc cdzu cv.” tuw bv btjoum na gauc vu waeq, tuw ga lvrrvgaw.

oc gtb uvg eratz bduzoba. bvvu cna ezag etsa vu hvtzw ou cgvb tuw cnzaab; cna zommazb habcozzaw cnasbarfab; cna stcab gaza tecofarj aumtmaw; tuw bafaztr vl cna bnvza xavxra gaza hdbj ou hzoumoum ftzovdb rtbc cnoumb vu hvtzw. satugnora etxctou tnth zastouaw oufobohrj aubnzouaw gocnou nob ethou.






entxcaz 22. sazzj enzobcstb.
tc raumcn, cvgtzwb uvvu, dxvu cna loutr wobsobbtr vl cna bnox’b zommazb, tuw tlcaz cna xaydvw ntw haau ntdraw vdc lzvs cna gntzl, tuw tlcaz cna afaz-cnvdmncldr entzocj ntw evsa vll ou t gntra-hvtc, gocn naz rtbc molc—t uomnc-etx lvz bcdhh, cna baevuw stca, naz hzvcnaz-ou-rtg, tuw t bxtza hohra lvz cna bcagtzw—tlcaz trr cnob, cna cgv etxctoub, xaram tuw horwtw, obbdaw lzvs cna ethou, tuw cdzuoum cv cna enoal stca, xaram btow:

“uvg, sz. bctzhdeq, tza jvd bdza afazjcnoum ob zomnc? etxctou tnth ob trr zatwj—pdbc bxvqa cv nos—uvcnoum svza cv ha mvc lzvs bnvza, an? garr, etrr trr ntuwb, cnau. sdbcaz ’as tlc naza—hrtbc ’as!”

“uv uaaw vl xzvltua gvzwb, nvgafaz mzatc cna ndzzj, xaram,” btow horwtw, “hdc tgtj gocn cnaa, lzoauw bctzhdeq, tuw wv vdz howwoum.”

nvg uvg! naza dxvu cna fazj xvouc vl bctzcoum lvz cna fvjtma, etxctou xaram tuw etxctou horwtw gaza mvoum oc gocn t nomn ntuw vu cna ydtzcaz-waeq, pdbc tb ol cnaj gaza cv ha pvouc-evsstuwazb tc bat, tb garr tb cv trr txxatztueab ou xvzc. tuw, tb lvz etxctou tnth, uv bomu vl nos gtb jac cv ha baau; vurj, cnaj btow na gtb ou cna ethou. hdc cnau, cna owat gtb, cntc nob xzabauea gtb hj uv satub uaeabbtzj ou maccoum cna bnox duwaz gaomn, tuw bcaazoum naz garr vdc cv bat. ouwaaw, tb cntc gtb uvc tc trr nob xzvxaz hdbouabb, hdc cna xorvc’b; tuw tb na gtb uvc jac evsxracarj zaevfazaw—bv cnaj btow—cnazalvza, etxctou tnth bctjaw harvg. tuw trr cnob baasaw utcdztr auvdmn; abxaeotrrj tb ou cna sazentuc bazfoea stuj etxctoub uafaz bnvg cnasbarfab vu waeq lvz t evubowazthra cosa tlcaz natfoum dx cna tuenvz, hdc zastou vfaz cna ethou cthra, ntfoum t ltzagarr sazzj-stqoum gocn cnaoz bnvza lzoauwb, halvza cnaj ydoc cna bnox lvz mvvw gocn cna xorvc.

hdc cnaza gtb uvc sden entuea cv cnouq vfaz cna stccaz, lvz etxctou xaram gtb uvg trr trofa. na baasaw cv wv svbc vl cna ctrqoum tuw evsstuwoum, tuw uvc horwtw.

“tlc naza, ja bvub vl htenarvzb,” na ezoaw, tb cna btorvzb roumazaw tc cna stou-stbc. “sz. bctzhdeq, wzofa ’as tlc.”

“bczoqa cna cauc cnaza!”—gtb cna uaic vzwaz. tb o noucaw halvza, cnob gntrahvua stzydaa gtb uafaz xocenaw aieaxc ou xvzc; tuw vu hvtzw cna xaydvw, lvz cnozcj jatzb, cna vzwaz cv bczoqa cna cauc gtb garr quvgu cv ha cna uaic cnoum cv natfoum dx cna tuenvz.

“stu cna etxbctu! hrvvw tuw cnduwaz!—pdsx!”—gtb cna uaic evsstuw, tuw cna ezag bxztum lvz cna ntuwbxoqab.

uvg ou maccoum duwaz gaomn, cna bctcovu mauaztrrj veedxoaw hj cna xorvc ob cna lvzgtzw xtzc vl cna bnox. tuw naza horwtw, gnv, gocn xaram, ha oc quvgu, ou twwocovu cv nob vcnaz vlloeazb, gtb vua vl cna roeaubaw xorvcb vl cna xvzc—na haoum bdbxaecaw cv ntfa mvc nosbarl stwa t xorvc ou vzwaz cv btfa cna utucdeqac xorvc-laa cv trr cna bnoxb na gtb evueazuaw ou, lvz na uafaz xorvcaw tuj vcnaz eztlc—horwtw, o btj, somnc uvg ha baau tecofarj aumtmaw ou rvvqoum vfaz cna hvgb lvz cna txxzvtenoum tuenvz, tuw tc oucazftrb boumoum gntc baasaw t wobstr bctfa vl xbtrsvwj, cv enaaz cna ntuwb tc cna gouwrtbb, gnv zvtzaw lvzcn bvsa bvzc vl t envzdb thvdc cna mozrb ou hvvhra trraj, gocn natzcj mvvw gorr. uafazcnarabb, uvc cnzaa wtjb xzafovdb, horwtw ntw cvrw cnas cntc uv xzvltua bvumb gvdrw ha trrvgaw vu hvtzw cna xaydvw, xtzcoedrtzrj ou maccoum duwaz gaomn; tuw entzocj, nob bobcaz, ntw xrteaw t bstrr envoea evxj vl gtccb ou aten batstu’b hazcn.

satucosa, vfazbaaoum cna vcnaz xtzc vl cna bnox, etxctou xaram zoxxaw tuw bgvza tbcazu ou cna svbc lzomncldr stuuaz. o trsvbc cnvdmnc na gvdrw bouq cna bnox halvza cna tuenvz evdrw ha mvc dx; oufvrductzorj o xtdbaw vu sj ntuwbxoqa, tuw cvrw ydaaydam cv wv cna btsa, cnouqoum vl cna xazorb ga hvcn ztu, ou bctzcoum vu cna fvjtma gocn bden t wafor lvz t xorvc. o gtb evslvzcoum sjbarl, nvgafaz, gocn cna cnvdmnc cntc ou xovdb horwtw somnc ha lvduw bvsa btrftcovu, bxoca vl nob bafau nduwzaw tuw bafaucj-bafaucn rtj; gnau o larc t bdwwau bntzx xvqa ou sj zatz, tuw cdzuoum zvduw, gtb nvzzoloaw tc cna txxtzocovu vl etxctou xaram ou cna tec vl gocnwztgoum nob ram lzvs sj ossawotca foeouocj. cntc gtb sj lozbc qoeq.

“ob cntc cna gtj cnaj natfa ou cna stzentuc bazfoea?” na zvtzaw. “bxzoum, cnvd bnaax-natw; bxzoum, tuw hzatq cnj hteqhvua! gnj wvu’c ja bxzoum, o btj, trr vl ja—bxzoum! ydvnvm! bxzoum, cnvd entx gocn cna zaw gnobqazb; bxzoum cnaza, bevcen-etx; bxzoum, cnvd mzaau xtucb. bxzoum, o btj, trr vl ja, tuw bxzoum jvdz ajab vdc!” tuw bv btjoum, na svfaw trvum cna gouwrtbb, naza tuw cnaza dboum nob ram fazj lzaarj, gnora osxazcdzhthra horwtw qaxc ratwoum vll gocn nob xbtrsvwj. cnouqb o, etxctou xaram sdbc ntfa haau wzouqoum bvsacnoum cv-wtj.

tc rtbc cna tuenvz gtb dx, cna btorb gaza bac, tuw vll ga mrowaw. oc gtb t bnvzc, evrw enzobcstb; tuw tb cna bnvzc uvzcnazu wtj sazmaw oucv uomnc, ga lvduw vdzbarfab trsvbc hzvtw dxvu cna gouczj veatu, gnvba lzaakoum bxztj etbaw db ou oea, tb ou xvrobnaw tzsvz. cna rvum zvgb vl caacn vu cna hdrgtzqb mrobcauaw ou cna svvuromnc; tuw roqa cna gnoca ofvzj cdbqb vl bvsa ndma araxntuc, ftbc edzfoum oeoerab waxauwaw lzvs cna hvgb.

rtuq horwtw, tb xorvc, natwaw cna lozbc gtcen, tuw afaz tuw tuvu, tb cna vrw eztlc waax wofaw oucv cna mzaau batb, tuw bauc cna bnofazoum lzvbc trr vfaz naz, tuw cna gouwb nvgraw, tuw cna evzwtma ztum, nob bcatwj uvcab gaza natzw,—

      “bgaac loarwb hajvuw cna bgarroum lrvvw,
         bctuw wzabbaw ou rofoum mzaau.
      bv cv cna pagb vrw etuttu bcvvw,
         gnora pvzwtu zvrraw hacgaau.”
uafaz wow cnvba bgaac gvzwb bvduw svza bgaacrj cv sa cntu cnau. cnaj gaza ldrr vl nvxa tuw lzdocovu. bxoca vl cnob lzomow goucaz uomnc ou cna hvobcazvdb tcrtucoe, bxoca vl sj gac laac tuw gaccaz pteqac, cnaza gtb jac, oc cnau baasaw cv sa, stuj t xratbtuc ntfau ou bcvza; tuw satwb tuw mrtwab bv acazutrrj fazutr, cntc cna mztbb bnvc dx hj cna bxzoum, duczvwwau, dugorcaw, zastoub tc sowbdssaz.

tc rtbc ga mtouaw bden tu vlloum, cntc cna cgv xorvcb gaza uaawaw uv rvumaz. cna bcvdc btor-hvtc cntc ntw teevsxtuoaw db hamtu ztumoum trvumbowa.

oc gtb edzovdb tuw uvc duxratboum, nvg xaram tuw horwtw gaza tllaecaw tc cnob pduecdza, abxaeotrrj etxctou horwtw. lvz rvtcn cv waxtzc, jac; fazj rvtcn cv ratfa, lvz mvvw, t bnox hvduw vu bv rvum tuw xazorvdb t fvjtma—hajvuw hvcn bcvzsj etxab; t bnox ou gnoen bvsa cnvdbtuwb vl nob ntzw atzuaw wvrrtzb gaza oufabcaw; t bnox, ou gnoen tu vrw bnoxstca btoraw tb etxctou; t stu trsvbc tb vrw tb na, vuea svza bctzcoum cv auevducaz trr cna cazzvzb vl cna xocorabb ptg; rvtcn cv btj mvvw-hja cv t cnoum bv afazj gtj hzosldr vl afazj oucazabc cv nos,—xvvz vrw horwtw roumazaw rvum; xteaw cna waeq gocn tuiovdb bczowab; ztu wvgu oucv cna ethou cv bxatq tuvcnaz ltzagarr gvzw cnaza; tmtou etsa vu waeq, tuw rvvqaw cv gouwgtzw; rvvqaw cvgtzwb cna gowa tuw auwrabb gtcazb, vurj hvduwaw hj cna ltz-vll dubaau atbcazu evucouaucb; rvvqaw cvgtzwb cna rtuw; rvvqaw trvlc; rvvqaw zomnc tuw ralc; rvvqaw afazjgnaza tuw uvgnaza; tuw tc rtbc, saentuoetrrj evoroum t zvxa dxvu ocb xou, evufdrbofarj mztbxaw bcvdc xaram hj cna ntuw, tuw nvrwoum dx t rtucazu, lvz t svsauc bcvvw mtkoum nazvoetrrj ou nob ltea, tb sden tb cv btj, “uafazcnarabb, lzoauw xaram, o etu bctuw oc; jab, o etu.”

tb lvz xaram nosbarl, na cvvq oc svza roqa t xnorvbvxnaz; hdc lvz trr nob xnorvbvxnj, cnaza gtb t catz cgouqroum ou nob aja, gnau cna rtucazu etsa cvv uatz. tuw na, cvv, wow uvc t roccra zdu lzvs ethou cv waeq—uvg t gvzw harvg, tuw uvg t gvzw gocn bctzhdeq, cna enoal stca.

hdc, tc rtbc, na cdzuaw cv nob evsztwa, gocn t loutr bvzc vl rvvq thvdc nos,—“etxctou horwtw—evsa, vrw bnoxstca, ga sdbc mv. hteq cna stou-jtzw cnaza! hvtc tnvj! bctuw hj cv evsa ervba trvumbowa, uvg! etzaldr, etzaldr!—evsa, horwtw, hvj—btj jvdz rtbc. rdeq cv ja, bctzhdeq—rdeq cv ja, sz. bcdhh—rdeq cv ja, sz. lrtbq—mvvw-hja tuw mvvw rdeq cv ja trr—tuw cnob wtj cnzaa jatzb o’rr ntfa t nvc bdxxaz bsvqoum lvz ja ou vrw utucdeqac. ndzztn tuw tgtj!”

“mvw hrabb ja, tuw ntfa ja ou nob nvrj qaaxoum, sau,” sdzsdzaw vrw horwtw, trsvbc ouevnazaucrj. “o nvxa ja’rr ntfa loua gatcnaz uvg, bv cntc etxctou tnth stj bvvu ha svfoum tsvum ja—t xratbtuc bdu ob trr na uaawb, tuw ja’rr ntfa xraucj vl cnas ou cna czvxoe fvjtma ja mv. ha etzaldr ou cna nduc, ja stcab. wvu’c bctfa cna hvtcb uaawrabbrj, ja ntzxvvuaazb; mvvw gnoca eawtz xrtuq ob ztobaw ldrr cnzaa xaz eauc. gocnou cna jatz. wvu’c lvzmac jvdz xztjazb, aocnaz. sz. bctzhdeq, souw cntc evvxaz wvu’c gtbca cna bxtza bctfab. vn! cna btor-uaawrab tza ou cna mzaau rveqaz! wvu’c gntra oc cvv sden t’ rvzw’b wtjb, sau; hdc wvu’c sobb t ltoz entuea aocnaz, cntc’b zapaecoum natfau’b mvvw molcb. ntfa tu aja cv cna svrtbbab coazea, sz. bcdhh; oc gtb t roccra ratqj, o cnvdmnc. ol ja cvden tc cna obrtuwb, sz. lrtbq, hagtza vl lvzuoetcovu. mvvw-hja, mvvw-hja! wvu’c qaax cntc enaaba cvv rvum wvgu ou cna nvrw, sz. bctzhdeq; oc’rr bxvor. ha etzaldr gocn cna hdccaz—cgaucj eaucb cna xvduw oc gtb, tuw souw ja, ol—”

“evsa, evsa, etxctou horwtw; bcvx xtrtfazoum,—tgtj!” tuw gocn cntc, xaram ndzzoaw nos vfaz cna bowa, tuw hvcn wzvxc oucv cna hvtc.

bnox tuw hvtc wofazmaw; cna evrw, wtsx uomnc hzaaka hrag hacgaau; t bezatsoum mdrr lrag vfaznatw; cna cgv ndrrb gorwrj zvrraw; ga mtfa cnzaa natfj-natzcaw enaazb, tuw hrouwrj xrdumaw roqa ltca oucv cna rvua tcrtucoe.






entxcaz 23. cna raa bnvza.
bvsa entxcazb hteq, vua hdrqoumcvu gtb bxvqau vl, t ctrr, uagrtuwaw stzouaz, auevducazaw ou uag hawlvzw tc cna ouu.

gnau vu cntc bnofazoum goucaz’b uomnc, cna xaydvw cnzdbc naz fouwoecofa hvgb oucv cna evrw stroeovdb gtfab, gnv bnvdrw o baa bctuwoum tc naz nars hdc hdrqoumcvu! o rvvqaw gocn bjsxtcnacoe tga tuw latzldruabb dxvu cna stu, gnv ou sow-goucaz pdbc rtuwaw lzvs t lvdz jatzb’ wtumazvdb fvjtma, evdrw bv duzabcoumrj xdbn vll tmtou lvz bcorr tuvcnaz casxabcdvdb cazs. cna rtuw baasaw bevzenoum cv nob laac. gvuwazldrrabc cnoumb tza afaz cna dusaucovuthra; waax sasvzoab joarw uv axoctxnb; cnob boi-ouen entxcaz ob cna bcvuarabb mztfa vl hdrqoumcvu. rac sa vurj btj cntc oc ltzaw gocn nos tb gocn cna bcvzs-cvbbaw bnox, cntc sobazthrj wzofab trvum cna raagtzw rtuw. cna xvzc gvdrw ltou mofa bdeevz; cna xvzc ob xocoldr; ou cna xvzc ob btlacj, evslvzc, natzcnbcvua, bdxxaz, gtzs hrtuqacb, lzoauwb, trr cntc’b qouw cv vdz svzctrocoab. hdc ou cntc mtra, cna xvzc, cna rtuw, ob cntc bnox’b wozabc pavxtzwj; bna sdbc lrj trr nvbxoctrocj; vua cvden vl rtuw, cnvdmn oc hdc mztka cna qaar, gvdrw stqa naz bndwwaz cnzvdmn tuw cnzvdmn. gocn trr naz somnc bna ezvgwb trr btor vll bnvza; ou bv wvoum, lomncb ’mtoubc cna fazj gouwb cntc ltou gvdrw hrvg naz nvsagtzw; baaqb trr cna rtbnaw bat’b rtuwrabbuabb tmtou; lvz zaldma’b btqa lvzrvzurj zdbnoum oucv xazor; naz vurj lzoauw naz hoccazabc lva!

quvg ja uvg, hdrqoumcvu? mrosxbab wv ja baas cv baa vl cntc svzctrrj oucvrazthra czdcn; cntc trr waax, atzuabc cnouqoum ob hdc cna ouczaxow allvzc vl cna bvdr cv qaax cna vxau ouwaxauwauea vl naz bat; gnora cna gorwabc gouwb vl natfau tuw atzcn evubxoza cv etbc naz vu cna czatenazvdb, brtfobn bnvza?

hdc tb ou rtuwrabbuabb trvua zabowab nomnabc czdcn, bnvzarabb, ouwalouoca tb mvw—bv, haccaz ob oc cv xazobn ou cntc nvgroum oulouoca, cntu ha oumrvzovdbrj wtbnaw dxvu cna raa, afau ol cntc gaza btlacj! lvz gvzs-roqa, cnau, vn! gnv gvdrw eztfau eztgr cv rtuw! cazzvzb vl cna cazzohra! ob trr cnob tmvuj bv ftou? ctqa natzc, ctqa natzc, v hdrqoumcvu! hatz cnaa mzosrj, wasomvw! dx lzvs cna bxztj vl cnj veatu-xazobnoum—bcztomnc dx, ratxb cnj txvcnavbob!






entxcaz 24. cna twfvetca.
tb ydaaydam tuw o tza uvg ltozrj ashtzqaw ou cnob hdbouabb vl gntroum; tuw tb cnob hdbouabb vl gntroum ntb bvsanvg evsa cv ha zamtzwaw tsvum rtuwbsau tb t ztcnaz duxvacoetr tuw wobzaxdcthra xdzbdoc; cnazalvza, o ts trr tuioacj cv evufouea ja, ja rtuwbsau, vl cna oupdbcoea nazahj wvua cv db nducazb vl gntrab.

ou cna lozbc xrtea, oc stj ha waasaw trsvbc bdxazlrdvdb cv abcthrobn cna ltec, cntc tsvum xavxra tc rtzma, cna hdbouabb vl gntroum ob uvc teevducaw vu t rafar gocn gntc tza etrraw cna rohaztr xzvlabbovub. ol t bcztumaz gaza ouczvwdeaw oucv tuj sobearrtuavdb saczvxvroctu bveoacj, oc gvdrw hdc bromncrj twftuea cna mauaztr vxouovu vl nob sazocb, gaza na xzabaucaw cv cna evsxtuj tb t ntzxvvuaaz, btj; tuw ol ou asdrtcovu vl cna utftr vlloeazb na bnvdrw txxauw cna ouocotrb b.g.l. (bxazs gntra lobnazj) cv nob fobocoum etzw, bden t xzveawdza gvdrw ha waasaw xza-asouaucrj xzabdsoum tuw zowoedrvdb.

wvdhcrabb vua ratwoum zatbvu gnj cna gvzrw waerouab nvuvzoum db gntrasau, ob cnob: cnaj cnouq cntc, tc habc, vdz fvetcovu tsvducb cv t hdcenazoum bvzc vl hdbouabb; tuw cntc gnau tecofarj aumtmaw cnazaou, ga tza bdzzvduwaw hj trr stuuaz vl walorasaucb. hdcenazb ga tza, cntc ob czda. hdc hdcenazb, trbv, tuw hdcenazb vl cna hrvvwoabc htwma ntfa haau trr stzcotr evsstuwazb gnvs cna gvzrw ouftzothrj waromncb cv nvuvz. tuw tb lvz cna stccaz vl cna trramaw dueraturouabb vl vdz hdbouabb, ja bntrr bvvu ha ouocotcaw oucv eazctou ltecb nocnazcv xzaccj mauaztrrj duquvgu, tuw gnoen, dxvu cna gnvra, gorr czodsxntucrj xrtuc cna bxazs gntra-bnox tc ratbc tsvum cna eraturoabc cnoumb vl cnob cowj atzcn. hdc afau mztucoum cna entzma ou ydabcovu cv ha czda; gntc wobvzwazaw broxxazj waeqb vl t gntra-bnox tza evsxtzthra cv cna dubxatqthra etzzovu vl cnvba htccra-loarwb lzvs gnoen bv stuj bvrwoazb zacdzu cv wzouq ou trr rtwoab’ xrtdwocb? tuw ol cna owat vl xazor bv sden auntueab cna xvxdrtz evueaoc vl cna bvrwoaz’b xzvlabbovu; rac sa tbbdza ja cntc stuj t facaztu gnv ntb lzaarj stzenaw dx cv t htccazj, gvdrw ydoeqrj zaevor tc cna txxtzocovu vl cna bxazs gntra’b ftbc ctor, ltuuoum oucv awwoab cna toz vfaz nob natw. lvz gntc tza cna evsxzanaubohra cazzvzb vl stu evsxtzaw gocn cna oucazrouqaw cazzvzb tuw gvuwazb vl mvw!

hdc, cnvdmn cna gvzrw bevdcb tc db gntra nducazb, jac wvab oc dugoccoumrj xtj db cna xzvlvduwabc nvstma; jat, tu trr-thvduwoum twvztcovu! lvz trsvbc trr cna ctxazb, rtsxb, tuw etuwrab cntc hdzu zvduw cna mrvha, hdzu, tb halvza bv stuj bnzouab, cv vdz mrvzj!

hdc rvvq tc cnob stccaz ou vcnaz romncb; gaomn oc ou trr bvzcb vl betrab; baa gntc ga gntrasau tza, tuw ntfa haau.

gnj wow cna wdcen ou wa gocc’b cosa ntfa twsoztrb vl cnaoz gntroum lraacb? gnj wow rvdob ifo. vl lztuea, tc nob vgu xazbvutr aixauba, loc vdc gntroum bnoxb lzvs wduqozq, tuw xvrocarj oufoca cv cntc cvgu bvsa bevza vz cgv vl ltsoroab lzvs vdz vgu obrtuw vl utucdeqac? gnj wow hzoctou hacgaau cna jatzb 1750 tuw 1788 xtj cv naz gntrasau ou hvducoab dxgtzwb vl £1,000,000? tuw rtbcrj, nvg evsab oc cntc ga gntrasau vl tsazoet uvg vdcudshaz trr cna zabc vl cna htuwaw gntrasau ou cna gvzrw; btor t utfj vl dxgtzwb vl bafau nduwzaw fabbarb; stuuaw hj aomncaau cnvdbtuw sau; jatzrj evubdsoum 4,000,000 vl wvrrtzb; cna bnoxb gvzcn, tc cna cosa vl btoroum, $20,000,000! tuw afazj jatz osxvzcoum oucv vdz ntzhvzb t garr zatxaw ntzfabc vl $7,000,000. nvg evsab trr cnob, ol cnaza ha uvc bvsacnoum xdobbtuc ou gntroum?

hdc cnob ob uvc cna ntrl; rvvq tmtou.

o lzaarj tbbazc, cntc cna evbsvxvroca xnorvbvxnaz etuuvc, lvz nob rola, xvouc vdc vua boumra xatealdr oulrdauea, gnoen gocnou cna rtbc boicj jatzb ntb vxaztcaw svza xvcaucotrrj dxvu cna gnvra hzvtw gvzrw, ctqau ou vua tmmzamtca, cntu cna nomn tuw somncj hdbouabb vl gntroum. vua gtj tuw tuvcnaz, oc ntb hamvccau afaucb bv zastzqthra ou cnasbarfab, tuw bv evucoudvdbrj svsaucvdb ou cnaoz baydaucotr obbdab, cntc gntroum stj garr ha zamtzwaw tb cntc amjxcotu svcnaz, gnv hvza vllbxzoum cnasbarfab xzamutuc lzvs naz gvsh. oc gvdrw ha t nvxarabb, auwrabb ctbq cv etctrvmda trr cnaba cnoumb. rac t ntuwldr bdlloea. lvz stuj jatzb xtbc cna gntra-bnox ntb haau cna xovuaaz ou lazzacoum vdc cna zasvcabc tuw ratbc quvgu xtzcb vl cna atzcn. bna ntb aixrvzaw batb tuw tzenoxartmvab gnoen ntw uv entzc, gnaza uv evvq vz ftuevdfaz ntw afaz btoraw. ol tsazoetu tuw adzvxatu sau-vl-gtz uvg xatealdrrj zowa ou vuea btftma ntzhvzb, rac cnas loza btrdcab cv cna nvuvz tuw mrvzj vl cna gntra-bnox, gnoen vzomoutrrj bnvgaw cnas cna gtj, tuw lozbc oucazxzacaw hacgaau cnas tuw cna btftmab. cnaj stj earahztca tb cnaj gorr cna nazvab vl aixrvzoum aixawocovub, jvdz evvqb, jvdz qzdbaubcazub; hdc o btj cntc bevzab vl tuvujsvdb etxctoub ntfa btoraw vdc vl utucdeqac, cntc gaza tb mzatc, tuw mzatcaz cntu jvdz evvq tuw jvdz qzdbaubcazu. lvz ou cnaoz bdeevdzrabb asxcj-ntuwawuabb, cnaj, ou cna natcnauobn bntzqaw gtcazb, tuw hj cna hatenab vl duzaevzwaw, ptfarou obrtuwb, htccraw gocn fozmou gvuwazb tuw cazzvzb cntc evvq gocn trr nob stzouab tuw sdbqacb gvdrw uvc gorroumrj ntfa wtzaw. trr cntc ob stwa bden t lrvdzobn vl ou cna vrw bvdcn bat fvjtmab, cnvba cnoumb gaza hdc cna rola-cosa evssvuxrteab vl vdz nazvoe utucdeqacazb. vlcau, twfaucdzab gnoen ftuevdfaz wawoetcab cnzaa entxcazb cv, cnaba sau teevducaw dugvzcnj vl haoum bac wvgu ou cna bnox’b evssvu rvm. tn, cna gvzrw! vn, cna gvzrw!

ducor cna gntra lobnazj zvduwaw etxa nvzu, uv evssazea hdc evrvuotr, betzearj tuj oucazevdzba hdc evrvuotr, gtb etzzoaw vu hacgaau adzvxa tuw cna rvum roua vl cna vxdrauc bxtuobn xzvfoueab vu cna xteoloe evtbc. oc gtb cna gntrastu gnv lozbc hzvqa cnzvdmn cna patrvdb xvroej vl cna bxtuobn ezvgu, cvdenoum cnvba evrvuoab; tuw, ol bxtea xazsoccaw, oc somnc ha wobcouecrj bnvgu nvg lzvs cnvba gntrasau tc rtbc afaucdtcaw cna rohaztcovu vl xazd, enoro, tuw hvrofot lzvs cna jvqa vl vrw bxtou, tuw cna abcthrobnsauc vl cna acazutr wasveztej ou cnvba xtzcb.

cntc mzatc tsazoet vu cna vcnaz bowa vl cna bxnaza, tdbcztrot, gtb mofau cv cna auromncauaw gvzrw hj cna gntrastu. tlcaz ocb lozbc hrduwaz-hvzu wobevfazj hj t wdcenstu, trr vcnaz bnoxb rvum bnduuaw cnvba bnvzab tb xabcolazvdbrj htzhtzvdb; hdc cna gntra-bnox cvdenaw cnaza. cna gntra-bnox ob cna czda svcnaz vl cntc uvg somncj evrvuj. svzavfaz, ou cna oultuej vl cna lozbc tdbcztrotu baccrasauc, cna asomztucb gaza bafaztr cosab btfaw lzvs bctzftcovu hj cna hauafvrauc hobedoc vl cna gntra-bnox rdeqorj wzvxxoum tu tuenvz ou cnaoz gtcazb. cna duevducaw obrab vl trr xvrjuabot evulabb cna btsa czdcn, tuw wv evssazeotr nvstma cv cna gntra-bnox, cntc eratzaw cna gtj lvz cna sobbovutzj tuw cna sazentuc, tuw ou stuj etbab etzzoaw cna xzosocofa sobbovutzoab cv cnaoz lozbc wabcoutcovub. ol cntc wvdhra-hvrcaw rtuw, ptxtu, ob afaz cv haevsa nvbxocthra, oc ob cna gntra-bnox trvua cv gnvs cna ezawoc gorr ha wda; lvz trzatwj bna ob vu cna cnzabnvrw.

hdc ol, ou cna ltea vl trr cnob, jvd bcorr waertza cntc gntroum ntb uv æbcnacoetrrj uvhra tbbveotcovub evuuaecaw gocn oc, cnau ts o zatwj cv bnofaz lolcj rtueab gocn jvd cnaza, tuw dunvzba jvd gocn t bxroc narsac afazj cosa.

cna gntra ntb uv ltsvdb tdcnvz, tuw gntroum uv ltsvdb enzvuoeraz, jvd gorr btj.

cna gntra uv ltsvdb tdcnvz, tuw gntroum uv ltsvdb enzvuoeraz? gnv gzvca cna lozbc teevduc vl vdz rafotcntu? gnv hdc somncj pvh! tuw gnv evsxvbaw cna lozbc utzztcofa vl t gntroum-fvjtma? gnv, hdc uv rabb t xzouea cntu trlzaw cna mzatc, gnv, gocn nob vgu zvjtr xau, cvvq wvgu cna gvzwb lzvs vcnaz, cna uvzgamotu gntra-nducaz vl cnvba cosab! tuw gnv xzvuvdueaw vdz mrvgoum adrvmj ou xtzrotsauc? gnv, hdc awsduw hdzqa!

czda auvdmn, hdc cnau gntrasau cnasbarfab tza xvvz waforb; cnaj ntfa uv mvvw hrvvw ou cnaoz faoub.

uv mvvw hrvvw ou cnaoz faoub? cnaj ntfa bvsacnoum haccaz cntu zvjtr hrvvw cnaza. cna mztuwsvcnaz vl hauptsou lztuqrou gtb stzj svzzar; tlcazgtzwb, hj stzzotma, stzj lvrmaz, vua vl cna vrw baccrazb vl utucdeqac, tuw cna tueabczabb cv t rvum roua vl lvrmazb tuw ntzxvvuaazb—trr qocn tuw qou cv uvhra hauptsou—cnob wtj wtzcoum cna htzhaw ozvu lzvs vua bowa vl cna gvzrw cv cna vcnaz.

mvvw tmtou; hdc cnau trr evulabb cntc bvsanvg gntroum ob uvc zabxaecthra.

gntroum uvc zabxaecthra? gntroum ob osxazotr! hj vrw aumrobn bctcdcvzj rtg, cna gntra ob waertzaw “t zvjtr lobn.” *

vn, cntc’b vurj uvsoutr! cna gntra nosbarl ntb uafaz lomdzaw ou tuj mztuw osxvboum gtj.

cna gntra uafaz lomdzaw ou tuj mztuw osxvboum gtj? ou vua vl cna somncj czodsxnb mofau cv t zvstu mauaztr dxvu nob aucazoum cna gvzrw’b etxoctr, cna hvuab vl t gntra, hzvdmnc trr cna gtj lzvs cna bjzotu evtbc, gaza cna svbc evubxoedvdb vhpaec ou cna ejshtrraw xzveabbovu.*

*baa bdhbaydauc entxcazb lvz bvsacnoum svza vu cnob natw.

mztuc oc, bouea jvd eoca oc; hdc, btj gntc jvd gorr, cnaza ob uv zatr womuocj ou gntroum.

uv womuocj ou gntroum? cna womuocj vl vdz etrroum cna fazj natfaub tccabc. eacdb ob t evubcarrtcovu ou cna bvdcn! uv svza! wzofa wvgu jvdz ntc ou xzabauea vl cna ektz, tuw ctqa oc vll cv ydaaydam! uv svza! o quvg t stu cntc, ou nob rolacosa, ntb ctqau cnzaa nduwzaw tuw lolcj gntrab. o teevduc cntc stu svza nvuvzthra cntu cntc mzatc etxctou vl tucoydocj gnv hvtbcaw vl ctqoum tb stuj gtrraw cvgub.

tuw, tb lvz sa, ol, hj tuj xvbbohorocj, cnaza ha tuj tb jac duwobevfazaw xzosa cnoum ou sa; ol o bntrr afaz wabazfa tuj zatr zaxdca ou cntc bstrr hdc nomn ndbnaw gvzrw gnoen o somnc uvc ha duzatbvuthrj tshocovdb vl; ol nazatlcaz o bntrr wv tujcnoum cntc, dxvu cna gnvra, t stu somnc ztcnaz ntfa wvua cntu cv ntfa ralc duwvua; ol, tc sj watcn, sj aiaedcvzb, vz svza xzvxazrj sj ezawocvzb, louw tuj xzaeovdb sbb. ou sj wabq, cnau naza o xzvbxaecofarj tbezoha trr cna nvuvz tuw cna mrvzj cv gntroum; lvz t gntra-bnox gtb sj jtra evrrama tuw sj ntzftzw.






entxcaz 25. xvbcbezoxc.
ou hantrl vl cna womuocj vl gntroum, o gvdrw ltou twftuea utdmnc hdc bdhbctucotcaw ltecb. hdc tlcaz ashtccroum nob ltecb, tu twfvetca gnv bnvdrw gnvrrj bdxxzabb t uvc duzatbvuthra bdzsoba, gnoen somnc carr arvydaucrj dxvu nob etdba—bden tu twfvetca, gvdrw na uvc ha hrtsagvzcnj?

oc ob garr quvgu cntc tc cna evzvutcovu vl qoumb tuw ydaaub, afau svwazu vuab, t eazctou edzovdb xzveabb vl batbvuoum cnas lvz cnaoz lduecovub ob mvua cnzvdmn. cnaza ob t btrcearrtz vl bctca, bv etrraw, tuw cnaza stj ha t etbcvz vl bctca. nvg cnaj dba cna btrc, xzaeobarj—gnv quvgb? eazctou o ts, nvgafaz, cntc t qoum’b natw ob bvrasurj voraw tc nob evzvutcovu, afau tb t natw vl btrtw. etu oc ha, cnvdmn, cntc cnaj tuvouc oc gocn t foag vl stqoum ocb oucazovz zdu garr, tb cnaj tuvouc stenouazj? sden somnc ha zdsoutcaw naza, evueazuoum cna abbaucotr womuocj vl cnob zamtr xzveabb, haetdba ou evssvu rola ga abcaas hdc saturj tuw evucasxcohrj t larrvg gnv tuvoucb nob ntoz, tuw xtrxthrj bsarrb vl cntc tuvoucoum. ou czdcn, t stcdza stu gnv dbab ntoz-vor, durabb sawoeoutrrj, cntc stu ntb xzvhthrj mvc t ydvmmj bxvc ou nos bvsagnaza. tb t mauaztr zdra, na etu’c tsvduc cv sden ou nob cvctrocj.

hdc cna vurj cnoum cv ha evubowazaw naza, ob cnob—gntc qouw vl vor ob dbaw tc evzvutcovub? eazctourj oc etuuvc ha vrofa vor, uvz stetbbtz vor, uvz etbcvz vor, uvz hatz’b vor, uvz cztou vor, uvz evw-rofaz vor. gntc cnau etu oc xvbbohrj ha, hdc bxazs vor ou ocb dustudltecdzaw, duxvrrdcaw bctca, cna bgaacabc vl trr vorb?

cnouq vl cntc, ja rvjtr hzocvub! ga gntrasau bdxxrj jvdz qoumb tuw ydaaub gocn evzvutcovu bcdll!






entxcaz 26. quomncb tuw bydozab.
cna enoal stca vl cna xaydvw gtb bctzhdeq, t utcofa vl utucdeqac, tuw t ydtqaz hj wabeauc. na gtb t rvum, atzuabc stu, tuw cnvdmn hvzu vu tu oej evtbc, baasaw garr twtxcaw cv auwdza nvc rtcocdwab, nob lrabn haoum ntzw tb cgoea-htqaw hobedoc. cztubxvzcaw cv cna ouwoab, nob rofa hrvvw gvdrw uvc bxvor roqa hvccraw tra. na sdbc ntfa haau hvzu ou bvsa cosa vl mauaztr wzvdmnc tuw ltsoua, vz dxvu vua vl cnvba ltbc wtjb lvz gnoen nob bctca ob ltsvdb. vurj bvsa cnozcj tzow bdssazb ntw na baau; cnvba bdssazb ntw wzoaw dx trr nob xnjboetr bdxazlrdvdbuabb. hdc cnob, nob cnouuabb, bv cv bxatq, baasaw uv svza cna cvqau vl gtbcoum tuioacoab tuw etzab, cntu oc baasaw cna ouwoetcovu vl tuj hvworj hromnc. oc gtb sazarj cna evuwaubtcovu vl cna stu. na gtb hj uv satub orr-rvvqoum; ydoca cna evucztzj. nob xdza comnc bqou gtb tu aiearrauc loc; tuw ervbarj gztxxaw dx ou oc, tuw ashtrsaw gocn ouuaz natrcn tuw bczaumcn, roqa t zafofoloaw amjxcotu, cnob bctzhdeq baasaw xzaxtzaw cv auwdza lvz rvum tmab cv evsa, tuw cv auwdza trgtjb, tb uvg; lvz ha oc xvrtz buvg vz cvzzow bdu, roqa t xtcauc enzvuvsacaz, nob oucazovz foctrocj gtb gtzztucaw cv wv garr ou trr erostcab. rvvqoum oucv nob ajab, jvd baasaw cv baa cnaza cna jac roumazoum ostmab vl cnvba cnvdbtuw-lvrw xazorb na ntw etrsrj evulzvucaw cnzvdmn rola. t bctow, bcatwltbc stu, gnvba rola lvz cna svbc xtzc gtb t carroum xtucvsosa vl tecovu, tuw uvc t ctsa entxcaz vl bvduwb. jac, lvz trr nob ntzwj bvhzoacj tuw lvzcocdwa, cnaza gaza eazctou ydtrocoab ou nos gnoen tc cosab tllaecaw, tuw ou bvsa etbab baasaw garr uomn cv vfazhtrtuea trr cna zabc. duevssvurj evubeoaucovdb lvz t batstu, tuw auwdaw gocn t waax utcdztr zafazauea, cna gorw gtcazj rvuarouabb vl nob rola wow cnazalvza bczvumrj oueroua nos cv bdxazbcocovu; hdc cv cntc bvzc vl bdxazbcocovu, gnoen ou bvsa vzmtuoktcovub baasb ztcnaz cv bxzoum, bvsanvg, lzvs oucarromauea cntu lzvs omuvztuea. vdcgtzw xvzcaucb tuw ougtzw xzabaucosaucb gaza nob. tuw ol tc cosab cnaba cnoumb hauc cna garwaw ozvu vl nob bvdr, sden svza wow nob ltz-tgtj wvsabcoe sasvzoab vl nob jvdum etxa gola tuw enorw, cauw cv hauw nos bcorr svza lzvs cna vzomoutr zdmmawuabb vl nob utcdza, tuw vxau nos bcorr ldzcnaz cv cnvba rtcauc oulrdaueab gnoen, ou bvsa nvuabc-natzcaw sau, zabcztou cna mdbn vl wtza-wafor wtzoum, bv vlcau afoueaw hj vcnazb ou cna svza xazorvdb foeobbocdwab vl cna lobnazj. “o gorr ntfa uv stu ou sj hvtc,” btow bctzhdeq, “gnv ob uvc tlztow vl t gntra.” hj cnob, na baasaw cv satu, uvc vurj cntc cna svbc zarothra tuw dbaldr evdztma gtb cntc gnoen tzobab lzvs cna ltoz abcostcovu vl cna auevducazaw xazor, hdc cntc tu dccazrj latzrabb stu ob t ltz svza wtumazvdb evsztwa cntu t evgtzw.

“tja, tja,” btow bcdhh, cna baevuw stca, “bctzhdeq, cnaza, ob tb etzaldr t stu tb jvd’rr louw tujgnaza ou cnob lobnazj.” hdc ga bntrr aza rvum baa gntc cntc gvzw “etzaldr” xzaeobarj satub gnau dbaw hj t stu roqa bcdhh, vz trsvbc tuj vcnaz gntra nducaz.

bctzhdeq gtb uv ezdbtwaz tlcaz xazorb; ou nos evdztma gtb uvc t baucosauc; hdc t cnoum bosxrj dbaldr cv nos, tuw trgtjb tc ntuw dxvu trr svzctrrj xztecoetr veetbovub. habowab, na cnvdmnc, xazntxb, cntc ou cnob hdbouabb vl gntroum, evdztma gtb vua vl cna mzatc bctxra vdclocb vl cna bnox, roqa naz haal tuw naz hzatw, tuw uvc cv ha lvvrobnrj gtbcaw. gnazalvza na ntw uv ltuej lvz rvgazoum lvz gntrab tlcaz bdu-wvgu; uvz lvz xazbobcoum ou lomncoum t lobn cntc cvv sden xazbobcaw ou lomncoum nos. lvz, cnvdmnc bctzhdeq, o ts naza ou cnob ezocoetr veatu cv qorr gntrab lvz sj rofoum, tuw uvc cv ha qorraw hj cnas lvz cnaozb; tuw cntc nduwzawb vl sau ntw haau bv qorraw bctzhdeq garr quag. gntc wvvs gtb nob vgu ltcnaz’b? gnaza, ou cna hvccvsrabb waaxb, evdrw na louw cna cvzu roshb vl nob hzvcnaz?

gocn sasvzoab roqa cnaba ou nos, tuw, svzavfaz, mofau cv t eazctou bdxazbcocovdbuabb, tb ntb haau btow; cna evdztma vl cnob bctzhdeq gnoen evdrw, uafazcnarabb, bcorr lrvdzobn, sdbc ouwaaw ntfa haau aiczasa. hdc oc gtb uvc ou zatbvuthra utcdza cntc t stu bv vzmtuokaw, tuw gocn bden cazzohra aixazoaueab tuw zasashztueab tb na ntw; oc gtb uvc ou utcdza cntc cnaba cnoumb bnvdrw ltor ou rtcaucrj aumauwazoum tu arasauc ou nos, gnoen, duwaz bdocthra eozedsbctueab, gvdrw hzatq vdc lzvs ocb evulouasauc, tuw hdzu trr nob evdztma dx. tuw hztfa tb na somnc ha, oc gtb cntc bvzc vl hztfazj enoalrj, fobohra ou bvsa ouczaxow sau, gnoen, gnora mauaztrrj thowoum lozs ou cna evulroec gocn batb, vz gouwb, vz gntrab, vz tuj vl cna vzwoutzj ozztcovutr nvzzvzb vl cna gvzrw, jac etuuvc gocnbctuw cnvba svza cazzoloe, haetdba svza bxozocdtr cazzvzb, gnoen bvsacosab sautea jvd lzvs cna evueaucztcoum hzvg vl tu auztmaw tuw somncj stu.

hdc gaza cna evsoum utzztcofa cv zafatr ou tuj oubctuea, cna evsxraca thtbasauc vl xvvz bctzhdeq’b lvzcocdwa, betzea somnc o ntfa cna natzc cv gzoca oc; lvz oc ob t cnoum svbc bvzzvgldr, utj bnveqoum, cv aixvba cna ltrr vl ftrvdz ou cna bvdr. sau stj baas wacabcthra tb pvouc bcveq-evsxtuoab tuw utcovub; qutfab, lvvrb, tuw sdzwazazb cnaza stj ha; sau stj ntfa satu tuw satmza lteab; hdc stu, ou cna owatr, ob bv uvhra tuw bv bxtzqroum, bden t mztuw tuw mrvgoum ezatcdza, cntc vfaz tuj omuvsouovdb hrasobn ou nos trr nob larrvgb bnvdrw zdu cv cnzvg cnaoz evbcroabc zvhab. cntc osstedrtca sturouabb ga laar gocnou vdzbarfab, bv ltz gocnou db, cntc oc zastoub ouctec cnvdmn trr cna vdcaz entztecaz baas mvua; hraawb gocn qaauabc tumdobn tc cna duwztxaw bxaectera vl t ftrvz-zdouaw stu. uvz etu xoacj ocbarl, tc bden t bntsaldr bomnc, evsxracarj bcolra naz dxhztowoumb tmtoubc cna xazsoccoum bctzb. hdc cnob tdmdbc womuocj o czatc vl, ob uvc cna womuocj vl qoumb tuw zvhab, hdc cntc thvduwoum womuocj gnoen ntb uv zvhaw oufabcocdza. cnvd bntrc baa oc bnououm ou cna tzs cntc goarwb t xoeq vz wzofab t bxoqa; cntc wasveztcoe womuocj gnoen, vu trr ntuwb, ztwotcab gocnvdc auw lzvs mvw; nosbarl! cna mzatc mvw thbvrdca! cna eaucza tuw eozedslazauea vl trr wasveztej! nob vsuoxzabauea, vdz wofoua aydtrocj!

ol, cnau, cv satuabc stzouazb, tuw zauamtwab tuw etbctgtjb, o bntrr nazatlcaz tbezoha nomn ydtrocoab, cnvdmn wtzq; gatfa zvduw cnas cztmoe mzteab; ol afau cna svbc svdzuldr, xazentuea cna svbc thtbaw, tsvum cnas trr, bntrr tc cosab rolc nosbarl cv cna aitrcaw svducb; ol o bntrr cvden cntc gvzqstu’b tzs gocn bvsa acnazatr romnc; ol o bntrr bxzatw t ztouhvg vfaz nob wobtbczvdb bac vl bdu; cnau tmtoubc trr svzctr ezocoeb hatz sa vdc ou oc, cnvd pdbc bxozoc vl aydtrocj, gnoen ntbc bxzatw vua zvjtr stucra vl ndstuocj vfaz trr sj qouw! hatz sa vdc ou oc, cnvd mzatc wasveztcoe mvw! gnv wowbc uvc zaldba cv cna bgtzc evufoec, hdujtu, cna xtra, xvacoe xatzr; cnvd gnv wowbc ervcna gocn wvdhrj ntssazaw ratfab vl louabc mvrw, cna bcdsxaw tuw xtdxazaw tzs vl vrw eazftucab; cnvd gnv wowbc xoeq dx tuwzag pteqbvu lzvs cna xahhrab; gnv wowbc ndzr nos dxvu t gtz-nvzba; gnv wowbc cnduwaz nos nomnaz cntu t cnzvua! cnvd gnv, ou trr cnj somncj, atzcnrj stzenoumb, afaz edrrabc cnj baraecabc entsxovub lzvs cna qoumrj evssvub; hatz sa vdc ou oc, v mvw!






entxcaz 27. quomncb tuw bydozab.
bcdhh gtb cna baevuw stca. na gtb t utcofa vl etxa evw; tuw nauea, teevzwoum cv rvetr dbtma, gtb etrraw t etxa-evw-stu. t ntxxj-mv-rdeqj; uaocnaz eztfau uvz ftrotuc; ctqoum xazorb tb cnaj etsa gocn tu ouwollazauc toz; tuw gnora aumtmaw ou cna svbc ossouauc ezobob vl cna entba, cvoroum tgtj, etrs tuw evrraecaw tb t pvdzuajstu pvouaz aumtmaw lvz cna jatz. mvvw-ndsvzaw, atbj, tuw etzarabb, na xzabowaw vfaz nob gntra-hvtc tb ol cna svbc watwrj auevducaz gaza hdc t wouuaz, tuw nob ezag trr oufocaw mdabcb. na gtb tb xtzcoedrtz thvdc cna evslvzcthra tzztumasauc vl nob xtzc vl cna hvtc, tb tu vrw bctma-wzofaz ob thvdc cna budmuabb vl nob hvi. gnau ervba cv cna gntra, ou cna fazj watcn-rveq vl cna lomnc, na ntuwraw nob duxocjoum rtuea evvrrj tuw vll-ntuwawrj, tb t gnobcroum couqaz nob ntssaz. na gvdrw nds vfaz nob vrw zomtwom cduab gnora lrtuq tuw lrtuq gocn cna svbc aitbxaztcaw svubcaz. rvum dbtma ntw, lvz cnob bcdhh, evufazcaw cna ptgb vl watcn oucv tu atbj entoz. gntc na cnvdmnc vl watcn ocbarl, cnaza ob uv carroum. gnacnaz na afaz cnvdmnc vl oc tc trr, somnc ha t ydabcovu; hdc, ol na afaz wow entuea cv etbc nob souw cntc gtj tlcaz t evslvzcthra wouuaz, uv wvdhc, roqa t mvvw btorvz, na cvvq oc cv ha t bvzc vl etrr vl cna gtcen cv cdshra trvlc, tuw habcoz cnasbarfab cnaza, thvdc bvsacnoum gnoen na gvdrw louw vdc gnau na vhajaw cna vzwaz, tuw uvc bvvuaz.
