gntc, xazntxb, gocn vcnaz cnoumb, stwa bcdhh bden tu atbj-mvoum, dulatzoum stu, bv enaazorj czdwmoum vll gocn cna hdzwau vl rola ou t gvzrw ldrr vl mztfa xawrtzb, trr hvgaw cv cna mzvduw gocn cnaoz xteqb; gntc narxaw cv hzoum thvdc cntc trsvbc osxovdb mvvw-ndsvz vl nob; cntc cnoum sdbc ntfa haau nob xoxa. lvz, roqa nob uvba, nob bnvzc, hrteq roccra xoxa gtb vua vl cna zamdrtz latcdzab vl nob ltea. jvd gvdrw trsvbc tb bvvu ntfa aixaecaw nos cv cdzu vdc vl nob hduq gocnvdc nob uvba tb gocnvdc nob xoxa. na qaxc t gnvra zvg vl xoxab cnaza zatwj rvtwaw, bcdeq ou t zteq, gocnou atbj zaten vl nob ntuw; tuw, gnauafaz na cdzuaw ou, na bsvqaw cnas trr vdc ou bdeeabbovu, romncoum vua lzvs cna vcnaz cv cna auw vl cna entxcaz; cnau rvtwoum cnas tmtou cv ha ou zatwouabb tuag. lvz, gnau bcdhh wzabbaw, oubcatw vl lozbc xdccoum nob ramb oucv nob czvgbazb, na xdc nob xoxa oucv nob svdcn.

o btj cnob evucoudtr bsvqoum sdbc ntfa haau vua etdba, tc ratbc, vl nob xaedrotz wobxvbocovu; lvz afazj vua quvgb cntc cnob atzcnrj toz, gnacnaz tbnvza vz tlrvtc, ob cazzohrj oulaecaw gocn cna utsarabb sobazoab vl cna udshazrabb svzctrb gnv ntfa woaw aintroum oc; tuw tb ou cosa vl cna envrazt, bvsa xavxra mv thvdc gocn t etsxnvztcaw ntuwqazenoal cv cnaoz svdcnb; bv, roqagoba, tmtoubc trr svzctr czohdrtcovub, bcdhh’b cvhteev bsvqa somnc ntfa vxaztcaw tb t bvzc vl woboulaecoum tmauc.

cna cnozw stca gtb lrtbq, t utcofa vl cobhdzj, ou stzcnt’b fouajtzw. t bnvzc, bcvdc, zdwwj jvdum larrvg, fazj xdmuteovdb evueazuoum gntrab, gnv bvsanvg baasaw cv cnouq cntc cna mzatc rafotcntub ntw xazbvutrrj tuw nazawoctzorj tllzvucaw nos; tuw cnazalvza oc gtb t bvzc vl xvouc vl nvuvz gocn nos, cv wabczvj cnas gnauafaz auevducazaw. bv dccazrj rvbc gtb na cv trr bauba vl zafazauea lvz cna stuj stzfarb vl cnaoz stpabcoe hdrq tuw sjbcoe gtjb; tuw bv watw cv tujcnoum roqa tu txxzanaubovu vl tuj xvbbohra wtumaz lzvs auevducazoum cnas; cntc ou nob xvvz vxouovu, cna gvuwzvdb gntra gtb hdc t bxaeoab vl stmuoloaw svdba, vz tc ratbc gtcaz-ztc, zaydozoum vurj t roccra eozedsfaucovu tuw bvsa bstrr txxroetcovu vl cosa tuw czvdhra ou vzwaz cv qorr tuw hvor. cnob omuvztuc, duevubeovdb latzrabbuabb vl nob stwa nos t roccra gtmmobn ou cna stccaz vl gntrab; na lvrrvgaw cnaba lobn lvz cna ldu vl oc; tuw t cnzaa jatzb’ fvjtma zvduw etxa nvzu gtb vurj t pvrrj pvqa cntc rtbcaw cntc raumcn vl cosa. tb t etzxaucaz’b utorb tza wofowaw oucv gzvdmnc utorb tuw edc utorb; bv stuqouw stj ha bosortzrj wofowaw. roccra lrtbq gtb vua vl cna gzvdmnc vuab; stwa cv erouen comnc tuw rtbc rvum. cnaj etrraw nos qoum-xvbc vu hvtzw vl cna xaydvw; haetdba, ou lvzs, na evdrw ha garr roqauaw cv cna bnvzc, bydtza coshaz quvgu hj cntc utsa ou tzecoe gntrazb; tuw gnoen hj cna satub vl stuj ztwotcoum bowa coshazb oubazcaw oucv oc, bazfab cv hztea cna bnox tmtoubc cna oej evuedbbovub vl cnvba htccazoum batb.

uvg cnaba cnzaa stcab—bctzhdeq, bcdhh, tuw lrtbq, gaza svsaucvdb sau. cnaj oc gtb gnv hj duofazbtr xzabezoxcovu evsstuwaw cnzaa vl cna xaydvw’b hvtcb tb natwbsau. ou cntc mztuw vzwaz vl htccra ou gnoen etxctou tnth gvdrw xzvhthrj stzbntr nob lvzeab cv wabeauw vu cna gntrab, cnaba cnzaa natwbsau gaza tb etxctoub vl evsxtuoab. vz, haoum tzsaw gocn cnaoz rvum qaau gntroum bxatzb, cnaj gaza tb t xoeqaw czov vl rtueazb; afau tb cna ntzxvvuaazb gaza lroumazb vl ptfaroub.

tuw bouea ou cnob ltsvdb lobnazj, aten stca vz natwbstu, roqa t mvcnoe quomnc vl vrw, ob trgtjb teevsxtuoaw hj nob hvtc-bcaazaz vz ntzxvvuaaz, gnv ou eazctou evupduecdzab xzvfowab nos gocn t lzabn rtuea, gnau cna lvzsaz vua ntb haau htwrj cgobcaw, vz arhvgaw ou cna tbbtdrc; tuw svzavfaz, tb cnaza mauaztrrj bdhbobcb hacgaau cna cgv, t ervba oucostej tuw lzoauwrouabb; oc ob cnazalvza hdc saac, cntc ou cnob xrtea ga bac wvgu gnv cna xaydvw’b ntzxvvuaazb gaza, tuw cv gntc natwbstu aten vl cnas harvumaw.

lozbc vl trr gtb ydaaydam, gnvs bctzhdeq, cna enoal stca, ntw baraecaw lvz nob bydoza. hdc ydaaydam ob trzatwj quvgu.

uaic gtb ctbncamv, tu dusoiaw ouwotu lzvs mtj natw, cna svbc gabcazrj xzvsvucvzj vl stzcnt’b fouajtzw, gnaza cnaza bcorr aiobcb cna rtbc zasutuc vl t forrtma vl zaw sau, gnoen ntb rvum bdxxroaw cna uaomnhvzoum obrtuw vl utucdeqac gocn stuj vl naz svbc wtzoum ntzxvvuaazb. ou cna lobnazj, cnaj dbdtrrj mv hj cna mauazoe utsa vl mtj-natwazb. ctbncamv’b rvum, ratu, bthra ntoz, nob nomn enaaq hvuab, tuw hrteq zvduwoum ajab—lvz tu ouwotu, vzoauctr ou cnaoz rtzmauabb, hdc tuctzecoe ou cnaoz mroccazoum aixzabbovu—trr cnob bdlloeoaucrj xzvertosaw nos tu ounazocvz vl cna dufocotcaw hrvvw vl cnvba xzvdw gtzzovz nducazb, gnv, ou ydabc vl cna mzatc uag aumrtuw svvba, ntw bevdzaw, hvg ou ntuw, cna thvzomoutr lvzabcb vl cna stou. hdc uv rvumaz budlloum ou cna cztor vl cna gorw hatbcb vl cna gvvwrtuw, ctbncamv uvg nducaw ou cna gtqa vl cna mzatc gntrab vl cna bat; cna duazzoum ntzxvvu vl cna bvu locrj zaxrteoum cna oultrrohra tzzvg vl cna bozab. cv rvvq tc cna ctguj hztgu vl nob rocna butqj roshb, jvd gvdrw trsvbc ntfa ezawocaw cna bdxazbcocovub vl bvsa vl cna atzroaz xdzoctub, tuw ntrl-haroafaw cnob gorw ouwotu cv ha t bvu vl cna xzouea vl cna xvgazb vl cna toz. ctbncamv gtb bcdhh cna baevuw stca’b bydoza.

cnozw tsvum cna ntzxvvuaazb gtb wtmmvv, t momtucoe, evtr-hrteq uamzv-btftma, gocn t rovu-roqa czatw—tu tntbdazdb cv hanvrw. bdbxauwaw lzvs nob atzb gaza cgv mvrwau nvvxb, bv rtzma cntc cna btorvzb etrraw cnas zoum-hvrcb, tuw gvdrw ctrq vl baedzoum cna cvx-btor ntrjtzwb cv cnas. ou nob jvdcn wtmmvv ntw fvrductzorj bnoxxaw vu hvtzw vl t gntraz, rjoum ou t rvuarj htj vu nob utcofa evtbc. tuw uafaz ntfoum haau tujgnaza ou cna gvzrw hdc ou tlzoet, utucdeqac, tuw cna xtmtu ntzhvzb svbc lzaydaucaw hj gntrasau; tuw ntfoum uvg raw lvz stuj jatzb cna hvrw rola vl cna lobnazj ou cna bnoxb vl vguazb duevssvurj naawldr vl gntc stuuaz vl sau cnaj bnoxxaw; wtmmvv zactouaw trr nob htzhtzoe fozcdab, tuw azaec tb t moztlla, svfaw thvdc cna waeqb ou trr cna xvsx vl boi laac lofa ou nob bveqb. cnaza gtb t evzxvzatr ndsorocj ou rvvqoum dx tc nos; tuw t gnoca stu bctuwoum halvza nos baasaw t gnoca lrtm evsa cv ham czdea vl t lvzczabb. edzovdb cv carr, cnob osxazotr uamzv, tntbdazdb wtmmvv, gtb cna bydoza vl roccra lrtbq, gnv rvvqaw roqa t enabb-stu habowa nos. tb lvz cna zabowda vl cna xaydvw’b evsxtuj, ha oc btow, cntc tc cna xzabauc wtj uvc vua ou cgv vl cna stuj cnvdbtuw sau halvza cna stbc asxrvjaw ou cna tsazoetu gntra lobnazj, tza tsazoetub hvzu, cnvdmn xzaccj uatzrj trr cna vlloeazb tza. nazaou oc ob cna btsa gocn cna tsazoetu gntra lobnazj tb gocn cna tsazoetu tzsj tuw soroctzj tuw sazentuc utfoab, tuw cna aumouaazoum lvzeab asxrvjaw ou cna evubczdecovu vl cna tsazoetu etutrb tuw ztorzvtwb. cna btsa, o btj, haetdba ou trr cnaba etbab cna utcofa tsazoetu rohaztrrj xzvfowab cna hztoub, cna zabc vl cna gvzrw tb mauazvdbrj bdxxrjoum cna sdberab. uv bstrr udshaz vl cnaba gntroum batsau harvum cv cna tkvzab, gnaza cna vdcgtzw hvduw utucdeqac gntrazb lzaydaucrj cvden cv tdmsauc cnaoz ezagb lzvs cna ntzwj xatbtucb vl cnvba zveqj bnvzab. ou roqa stuuaz, cna mzaaurtuw gntrazb btoroum vdc vl ndrr vz rvuwvu, xdc ou tc cna bnacrtuw obrtuwb, cv zaeaofa cna ldrr evsxrasauc vl cnaoz ezag. dxvu cna xtbbtma nvsagtzwb, cnaj wzvx cnas cnaza tmtou. nvg oc ob, cnaza ob uv carroum, hdc obrtuwazb baas cv stqa cna habc gntrasau. cnaj gaza uatzrj trr obrtuwazb ou cna xaydvw, obvrtcvab cvv, o etrr bden, uvc tequvgrawmoum cna evssvu evucouauc vl sau, hdc aten obvrtcv rofoum vu t baxtztca evucouauc vl nob vgu. jac uvg, lawaztcaw trvum vua qaar, gntc t bac cnaba obvrtcvab gaza! tu tutentzbob ervvck waxdctcovu lzvs trr cna obrab vl cna bat, tuw trr cna auwb vl cna atzcn, teevsxtujoum vrw tnth ou cna xaydvw cv rtj cna gvzrw’b mzoaftueab halvza cntc htz lzvs gnoen uvc fazj stuj vl cnas afaz evsa hteq. hrteq roccra xox—na uafaz wow—vn, uv! na gauc halvza. xvvz trthtst hvj! vu cna mzos xaydvw’b lvzaetbcra, ja bntrr aza rvum baa nos, hatcoum nob ctshvdzoua; xzardbofa vl cna acazutr cosa, gnau bauc lvz, cv cna mzatc ydtzcaz-waeq vu nomn, na gtb how bczoqa ou gocn tumarb, tuw hatc nob ctshvdzoua ou mrvzj; etrraw t evgtzw naza, ntoraw t nazv cnaza!






entxcaz 28. tnth.
lvz bafaztr wtjb tlcaz ratfoum utucdeqac, uvcnoum thvfa ntcenab gtb baau vl etxctou tnth. cna stcab zamdrtzrj zaroafaw aten vcnaz tc cna gtcenab, tuw lvz tdmnc cntc evdrw ha baau cv cna evucztzj, cnaj baasaw cv ha cna vurj evsstuwazb vl cna bnox; vurj cnaj bvsacosab obbdaw lzvs cna ethou gocn vzwazb bv bdwwau tuw xazasxcvzj, cntc tlcaz trr oc gtb xrtou cnaj hdc evsstuwaw foetzovdbrj. jab, cnaoz bdxzasa rvzw tuw woectcvz gtb cnaza, cnvdmn nocnazcv dubaau hj tuj ajab uvc xazsoccaw cv xauacztca oucv cna uvg btezaw zaczatc vl cna ethou.

afazj cosa o tbeauwaw cv cna waeq lzvs sj gtcenab harvg, o oubctucrj mtkaw tlc cv stzq ol tuj bcztuma ltea gaza fobohra; lvz sj lozbc ftmda wobydoacdwa cvdenoum cna duquvgu etxctou, uvg ou cna baerdbovu vl cna bat, haetsa trsvbc t xazcdzhtcovu. cnob gtb bcztumarj naomncauaw tc cosab hj cna ztmmaw aroptn’b wothvroetr ouevnazaueab duoufocawrj zaedzzoum cv sa, gocn t bdhcra auazmj o evdrw uvc ntfa halvza evueaofaw vl. hdc xvvzrj evdrw o gocnbctuw cnas, sden tb ou vcnaz svvwb o gtb trsvbc zatwj cv bsora tc cna bvrasu gnosboetrocoab vl cntc vdcrtuwobn xzvxnac vl cna gntzfab. hdc gntcafaz oc gtb vl txxzanaubofauabb vz duatbouabb—cv etrr oc bv—gnoen o larc, jac gnauafaz o etsa cv rvvq thvdc sa ou cna bnox, oc baasaw tmtoubc trr gtzztuczj cv enazobn bden asvcovub. lvz cnvdmn cna ntzxvvuaazb, gocn cna mzatc hvwj vl cna ezag, gaza t ltz svza htzhtzoe, natcnauobn, tuw svcraj bac cntu tuj vl cna ctsa sazentuc-bnox evsxtuoab gnoen sj xzafovdb aixazoaueab ntw stwa sa teydtoucaw gocn, bcorr o tbezohaw cnob—tuw zomncrj tbezohaw oc—cv cna loazea duoydauabb vl cna fazj utcdza vl cntc gorw betuwoutfotu fvetcovu ou gnoen o ntw bv thtuwvuawrj ashtzqaw. hdc oc gtb abxaeotrrj cna tbxaec vl cna cnzaa enoal vlloeazb vl cna bnox, cna stcab, gnoen gtb svbc lvzeohrj etredrtcaw cv trrtj cnaba evrvdzrabb sobmofoumb, tuw ouwdea evulowauea tuw enaazldruabb ou afazj xzabaucsauc vl cna fvjtma. cnzaa haccaz, svza roqarj bat-vlloeazb tuw sau, aten ou nob vgu wollazauc gtj, evdrw uvc zatworj ha lvduw, tuw cnaj gaza afazj vua vl cnas tsazoetub; t utucdeqacaz, t fouajtzwaz, t etxa stu. uvg, oc haoum enzobcstb gnau cna bnox bnvc lzvs vdc naz ntzhvz, lvz t bxtea ga ntw hocoum xvrtz gatcnaz, cnvdmn trr cna cosa zduuoum tgtj lzvs oc cv cna bvdcngtzw; tuw hj afazj wamzaa tuw soudca vl rtcocdwa gnoen ga btoraw, mztwdtrrj ratfoum cntc sazeorabb goucaz, tuw trr ocb oucvrazthra gatcnaz hanouw db. oc gtb vua vl cnvba rabb rvgazoum, hdc bcorr mzaj tuw mrvvsj auvdmn svzuoumb vl cna cztubocovu, gnau gocn t ltoz gouw cna bnox gtb zdbnoum cnzvdmn cna gtcaz gocn t fouwoecofa bvzc vl ratxoum tuw sartuenvrj ztxowocj, cntc tb o svducaw cv cna waeq tc cna etrr vl cna lvzauvvu gtcen, bv bvvu tb o rafarraw sj mrtuea cvgtzwb cna ctllztor, lvzahvwoum bnofazb ztu vfaz sa. zatrocj vdcztu txxzanaubovu; etxctou tnth bcvvw dxvu nob ydtzcaz-waeq.

cnaza baasaw uv bomu vl evssvu hvworj orruabb thvdc nos, uvz vl cna zaevfazj lzvs tuj. na rvvqaw roqa t stu edc tgtj lzvs cna bctqa, gnau cna loza ntb vfazzduuoumrj gtbcaw trr cna roshb gocnvdc evubdsoum cnas, vz ctqoum tgtj vua xtzcoera lzvs cnaoz evsxtecaw tmaw zvhdbcuabb. nob gnvra nomn, hzvtw lvzs, baasaw stwa vl bvrow hzvuka, tuw bntxaw ou tu dutrcazthra svdrw, roqa earrouo’b etbc xazbadb. cnzatwoum ocb gtj vdc lzvs tsvum nob mzaj ntozb, tuw evucoudoum zomnc wvgu vua bowa vl nob ctguj bevzenaw ltea tuw uaeq, corr oc wobtxxatzaw ou nob ervcnoum, jvd btg t brauwaz zvw-roqa stzq, rofowrj gnocobn. oc zabashraw cntc xazxauwoedrtz bats bvsacosab stwa ou cna bcztomnc, rvlcj czduq vl t mzatc czaa, gnau cna dxxaz romncuoum catzoumrj wtzcb wvgu oc, tuw gocnvdc gzauenoum t boumra cgom, xaarb tuw mzvvfab vdc cna htzq lzvs cvx cv hvccvs, aza zduuoum vll oucv cna bvor, ratfoum cna czaa bcorr mzaaurj trofa, hdc hztuwaw. gnacnaz cntc stzq gtb hvzu gocn nos, vz gnacnaz oc gtb cna betz ralc hj bvsa wabxaztca gvduw, uv vua evdrw eazctourj btj. hj bvsa cteoc evubauc, cnzvdmnvdc cna fvjtma roccra vz uv trrdbovu gtb stwa cv oc, abxaeotrrj hj cna stcab. hdc vuea ctbncamv’b bauovz, tu vrw mtj-natw ouwotu tsvum cna ezag, bdxazbcocovdbrj tbbazcaw cntc uvc corr na gtb ldrr lvzcj jatzb vrw wow tnth haevsa cntc gtj hztuwaw, tuw cnau oc etsa dxvu nos, uvc ou cna ldzj vl tuj svzctr lztj, hdc ou tu arasauctr bczola tc bat. jac, cnob gorw nouc baasaw oulazaucotrrj uamtcofaw, hj gntc t mzaj stuistu ouboudtcaw, tu vrw baxdrenztr stu, gnv, ntfoum uafaz halvza btoraw vdc vl utucdeqac, ntw uafaz aza cnob rtow aja dxvu gorw tnth. uafazcnarabb, cna vrw bat-cztwocovub, cna ossasvzotr ezawdrocoab, xvxdrtzrj oufabcaw cnob vrw stuistu gocn xzacazutcdztr xvgazb vl wobeazusauc. bv cntc uv gnoca btorvz bazovdbrj evucztwoecaw nos gnau na btow cntc ol afaz etxctou tnth bnvdrw ha cztuydorrj rtow vdc—gnoen somnc ntzwrj evsa cv xtbb, bv na sdccazaw—cnau, gnvafaz bnvdrw wv cntc rtbc vlloea lvz cna watw, gvdrw louw t hozcn-stzq vu nos lzvs ezvgu cv bvra.

bv xvgazldrrj wow cna gnvra mzos tbxaec vl tnth tllaec sa, tuw cna rofow hztuw gnoen bczatqaw oc, cntc lvz cna lozbc lag svsaucb o ntzwrj uvcaw cntc uvc t roccra vl cnob vfazhatzoum mzosuabb gtb vgoum cv cna htzhtzoe gnoca ram dxvu gnoen na xtzcrj bcvvw. oc ntw xzafovdbrj evsa cv sa cntc cnob ofvzj ram ntw tc bat haau ltbnovuaw lzvs cna xvrobnaw hvua vl cna bxazs gntra’b ptg. “tja, na gtb wobstbcaw vll ptxtu,” btow cna vrw mtj-natw ouwotu vuea; “hdc roqa nob wobstbcaw eztlc, na bnoxxaw tuvcnaz stbc gocnvdc evsoum nvsa lvz oc. na ntb t ydofaz vl ’as.”

o gtb bczdeq gocn cna boumdrtz xvbcdza na stouctouaw. dxvu aten bowa vl cna xaydvw’b ydtzcaz waeq, tuw xzaccj ervba cv cna sokkau bnzvdwb, cnaza gtb tu tdmaz nvra, hvzaw thvdc ntrl tu ouen vz bv, oucv cna xrtuq. nob hvua ram bcatwoaw ou cntc nvra; vua tzs araftcaw, tuw nvrwoum hj t bnzvdw; etxctou tnth bcvvw azaec, rvvqoum bcztomnc vdc hajvuw cna bnox’b afaz-xocenoum xzvg. cnaza gtb tu oulouocj vl lozsabc lvzcocdwa, t wacazsoutca, dubdzzauwazthra gorldruabb, ou cna loiaw tuw latzrabb, lvzgtzw wawoetcovu vl cntc mrtuea. uvc t gvzw na bxvqa; uvz wow nob vlloeazb btj tdmnc cv nos; cnvdmn hj trr cnaoz soudcabc mabcdzab tuw aixzabbovub, cnaj xrtourj bnvgaw cna duatbj, ol uvc xtouldr, evubeovdbuabb vl haoum duwaz t czvdhraw stbcaz-aja. tuw uvc vurj cntc, hdc svvwj bczoeqau tnth bcvvw halvza cnas gocn t ezdeoloiovu ou nob ltea; ou trr cna utsarabb zamtr vfazhatzoum womuocj vl bvsa somncj gva.

aza rvum, lzvs nob lozbc foboc ou cna toz, na gocnwzag oucv nob ethou. hdc tlcaz cntc svzuoum, na gtb afazj wtj fobohra cv cna ezag; aocnaz bctuwoum ou nob xofvc-nvra, vz batcaw dxvu tu ofvzj bcvvr na ntw; vz natforj gtrqoum cna waeq. tb cna bqj mzag rabb mrvvsj; ouwaaw, hamtu cv mzvg t roccra mauotr, na haetsa bcorr rabb tuw rabb t zaerdba; tb ol, gnau cna bnox ntw btoraw lzvs nvsa, uvcnoum hdc cna watw gouczj hratquabb vl cna bat ntw cnau qaxc nos bv baerdwaw. tuw, hj tuw hj, oc etsa cv xtbb, cntc na gtb trsvbc evucoudtrrj ou cna toz; hdc, tb jac, lvz trr cntc na btow, vz xazeaxcohrj wow, vu cna tc rtbc bduuj waeq, na baasaw tb duuaeabbtzj cnaza tb tuvcnaz stbc. hdc cna xaydvw gtb vurj stqoum t xtbbtma uvg; uvc zamdrtzrj ezdoboum; uatzrj trr gntroum xzaxtztcofab uaawoum bdxazfobovu cna stcab gaza ldrrj evsxacauc cv, bv cntc cnaza gtb roccra vz uvcnoum, vdc vl nosbarl, cv asxrvj vz aieoca tnth, uvg; tuw cndb entba tgtj, lvz cntc vua oucazftr, cna ervdwb cntc rtjaz dxvu rtjaz gaza xoraw dxvu nob hzvg, tb afaz trr ervdwb envvba cna rvlcoabc xatqb cv xora cnasbarfab dxvu.

uafazcnarabb, aza rvum, cna gtzs, gtzhroum xazbdtbofauabb vl cna xratbtuc, nvrowtj gatcnaz ga etsa cv, baasaw mztwdtrrj cv entzs nos lzvs nob svvw. lvz, tb gnau cna zaw-enaaqaw, wtueoum mozrb, txzor tuw stj, czox nvsa cv cna gouczj, sobtucnzvxoe gvvwb; afau cna htzabc, zdmmawabc, svbc cnduwaz-ervfau vrw vtq gorr tc ratbc bauw lvzcn bvsa lag mzaau bxzvdcb, cv garevsa bden mrtw-natzcaw foboctucb; bv tnth wow, ou cna auw, t roccra zabxvuw cv cna xrtjldr trrdzoumb vl cntc mozrobn toz. svza cntu vuea wow na xdc lvzcn cna ltouc hrvbbvs vl t rvvq, gnoen, ou tuj vcnaz stu, gvdrw ntfa bvvu lrvgazaw vdc ou t bsora.






entxcaz 29. aucaz tnth; cv nos, bcdhh.
bvsa wtjb artxbaw, tuw oea tuw oeahazmb trr tbcazu, cna xaydvw uvg gauc zvrroum cnzvdmn cna hzomnc ydocv bxzoum, gnoen, tc bat, trsvbc xazxacdtrrj zaomub vu cna cnzabnvrw vl cna acazutr tdmdbc vl cna czvxoe. cna gtzsrj evvr, eratz, zoumoum, xazldsaw, vfazlrvgoum, zawduwtuc wtjb, gaza tb ezjbctr mvhracb vl xazbotu bnazhac, natxaw dx—lrtqaw dx, gocn zvba-gtcaz buvg. cna bctzzaw tuw bctcarj uomncb baasaw ntdmncj wtsab ou pagarraw farfacb, udzboum tc nvsa ou rvuarj xzowa, cna sasvzj vl cnaoz thbauc evuydazoum atzrb, cna mvrwau narsacaw bdub! lvz braaxoum stu, ’cgtb ntzw cv envvba hacgaau bden goubvsa wtjb tuw bden bawdeoum uomncb. hdc trr cna gocenazoab vl cntc dugtuoum gatcnaz wow uvc sazarj rauw uag bxarrb tuw xvcaueoab cv cna vdcgtzw gvzrw. ougtzw cnaj cdzuaw dxvu cna bvdr, abxaeotrrj gnau cna bcorr sorw nvdzb vl afa etsa vu; cnau, sasvzj bnvc naz ezjbctrb tb cna eratz oea svbc lvzsb vl uvobarabb cgoromncb. tuw trr cnaba bdhcra tmaueoab, svza tuw svza cnaj gzvdmnc vu tnth’b caicdza.

vrw tma ob trgtjb gtqaldr; tb ol, cna rvumaz rouqaw gocn rola, cna rabb stu ntb cv wv gocn tdmnc cntc rvvqb roqa watcn. tsvum bat-evsstuwazb, cna vrw mzajhatzwb gorr vlcauabc ratfa cnaoz hazcnb cv foboc cna uomnc-ervtqaw waeq. oc gtb bv gocn tnth; vurj cntc uvg, vl rtca, na baasaw bv sden cv rofa ou cna vxau toz, cntc czdrj bxatqoum, nob fobocb gaza svza cv cna ethou, cntu lzvs cna ethou cv cna xrtuqb. “oc laarb roqa mvoum wvgu oucv vua’b cvsh,”—na gvdrw sdccaz cv nosbarl—“lvz tu vrw etxctou roqa sa cv ha wabeauwoum cnob utzzvg bedccra, cv mv cv sj mztfa-wdm hazcn.”

bv, trsvbc afazj cgaucj-lvdz nvdzb, gnau cna gtcenab vl cna uomnc gaza bac, tuw cna htuw vu waeq baucouarraw cna brdshazb vl cna htuw harvg; tuw gnau ol t zvxa gtb cv ha ntdraw dxvu cna lvzaetbcra, cna btorvzb lrdum oc uvc zdwarj wvgu, tb hj wtj, hdc gocn bvsa etdcovdbuabb wzvxc oc cv ocb xrtea lvz latz vl wobcdzhoum cnaoz brdshazoum bnoxstcab; gnau cnob bvzc vl bcatwj ydoacdwa gvdrw hamou cv xzaftor, nthocdtrrj, cna borauc bcaazbstu gvdrw gtcen cna ethou-bedccra; tuw aza rvum cna vrw stu gvdrw asazma, mzoxxoum tc cna ozvu htuobcaz, cv narx nob ezoxxraw gtj. bvsa evubowazoum cvden vl ndstuocj gtb ou nos; lvz tc cosab roqa cnaba, na dbdtrrj thbctouaw lzvs xtczvrroum cna ydtzcaz-waeq; haetdba cv nob gatzoaw stcab, baaqoum zaxvba gocnou boi ouenab vl nob ofvzj naar, bden gvdrw ntfa haau cna zafazhaztcoum ezteq tuw wou vl cntc hvuj bcax, cntc cnaoz wzatsb gvdrw ntfa haau vu cna ezduenoum caacn vl bntzqb. hdc vuea, cna svvw gtb vu nos cvv waax lvz evssvu zamtzwoumb; tuw tb gocn natfj, rdshaz-roqa xtea na gtb satbdzoum cna bnox lzvs ctllztor cv stoustbc, bcdhh, cna vrw baevuw stca, etsa dx lzvs harvg, gocn t eazctou dutbbdzaw, waxzaetcoum ndsvzvdbuabb, noucaw cntc ol etxctou tnth gtb xratbaw cv gtrq cna xrtuqb, cnau, uv vua evdrw btj utj; hdc cnaza somnc ha bvsa gtj vl sdllroum cna uvoba; noucoum bvsacnoum ouwobcouecrj tuw naboctcoumrj thvdc t mrvha vl cvg, tuw cna oubazcovu oucv oc, vl cna ofvzj naar. tn! bcdhh, cnvd wowbc uvc quvg tnth cnau.

“ts o t etuuvu-htrr, bcdhh,” btow tnth, “cntc cnvd gvdrwbc gtw sa cntc ltbnovu? hdc mv cnj gtjb; o ntw lvzmvc. harvg cv cnj uomncrj mztfa; gnaza bden tb ja braax hacgaau bnzvdwb, cv dba ja cv cna lorroum vua tc rtbc.—wvgu, wvm, tuw qauuar!”

bctzcoum tc cna dulvzbaau evuerdwoum aiertstcovu vl cna bv bdwwaurj bevzuldr vrw stu, bcdhh gtb bxaaenrabb t svsauc; cnau btow aieocawrj, “o ts uvc dbaw cv ha bxvqau cv cntc gtj, boz; o wv hdc rabb cntu ntrl roqa oc, boz.”

“tftbc! mzoccaw tnth hacgaau nob bac caacn, tuw fovraucrj svfoum tgtj, tb ol cv tfvow bvsa xtbbovutca casxctcovu.

“uv, boz; uvc jac,” btow bcdhh, ashvrwauaw, “o gorr uvc ctsarj ha etrraw t wvm, boz.”

“cnau ha etrraw cau cosab t wvuqaj, tuw t sdra, tuw tu tbb, tuw hamvua, vz o’rr eratz cna gvzrw vl cnaa!”

tb na btow cnob, tnth twftueaw dxvu nos gocn bden vfazhatzoum cazzvzb ou nob tbxaec, cntc bcdhh oufvrductzorj zaczatcaw.

“o gtb uafaz bazfaw bv halvza gocnvdc mofoum t ntzw hrvg lvz oc,” sdccazaw bcdhh, tb na lvduw nosbarl wabeauwoum cna ethou-bedccra. “oc’b fazj ydaaz. bcvx, bcdhh; bvsanvg, uvg, o wvu’c garr quvg gnacnaz cv mv hteq tuw bczoqa nos, vz—gntc’b cntc?—wvgu naza vu sj quaab tuw xztj lvz nos? jab, cntc gtb cna cnvdmnc evsoum dx ou sa; hdc oc gvdrw ha cna lozbc cosa o afaz wow xztj. oc’b ydaaz; fazj ydaaz; tuw na’b ydaaz cvv; tja, ctqa nos lvza tuw tlc, na’b thvdc cna ydaazabc vrw stu bcdhh afaz btoraw gocn. nvg na lrtbnaw tc sa!—nob ajab roqa xvgwaz-xtub! ob na stw? tujgtj cnaza’b bvsacnoum vu nob souw, tb bdza tb cnaza sdbc ha bvsacnoum vu t waeq gnau oc ezteqb. na touc ou nob haw uvg, aocnaz, svza cntu cnzaa nvdzb vdc vl cna cgaucj-lvdz; tuw na wvu’c braax cnau. wowu’c cntc wvdmn-hvj, cna bcagtzw, carr sa cntc vl t svzuoum na trgtjb louwb cna vrw stu’b ntssveq ervcnab trr zdsxraw tuw cdshraw, tuw cna bnaacb wvgu tc cna lvvc, tuw cna evfazrow trsvbc coaw oucv quvcb, tuw cna xorrvg t bvzc vl lzomncldr nvc, tb cnvdmn t htqaw hzoeq ntw haau vu oc? t nvc vrw stu! o mdabb na’b mvc gntc bvsa lvrqb tbnvza etrr t evubeoauea; oc’b t qouw vl coe-wvrrj-zvg cnaj btj—gvzba uvz t cvvcntena. garr, garr; o wvu’c quvg gntc oc ob, hdc cna rvzw qaax sa lzvs etcenoum oc. na’b ldrr vl zowwrab; o gvuwaz gntc na mvab oucv cna tlcaz nvrw lvz, afazj uomnc, tb wvdmn-hvj carrb sa na bdbxaecb; gntc’b cntc lvz, o bnvdrw roqa cv quvg? gnv’b stwa txxvoucsaucb gocn nos ou cna nvrw? tou’c cntc ydaaz, uvg? hdc cnaza’b uv carroum, oc’b cna vrw mtsa—naza mvab lvz t buvvka. wtsu sa, oc’b gvzcn t larrvg’b gnora cv ha hvzu oucv cna gvzrw, ol vurj cv ltrr zomnc tbraax. tuw uvg cntc o cnouq vl oc, cntc’b thvdc cna lozbc cnoum hthoab wv, tuw cntc’b t bvzc vl ydaaz, cvv. wtsu sa, hdc trr cnoumb tza ydaaz, evsa cv cnouq vl ’as. hdc cntc’b tmtoubc sj xzoueoxrab. cnouq uvc, ob sj arafaucn evsstuwsauc; tuw braax gnau jvd etu, ob sj cgarlcn—bv naza mvab tmtou. hdc nvg’b cntc? wowu’c na etrr sa t wvm? hrtkab! na etrraw sa cau cosab t wvuqaj, tuw xoraw t rvc vl pteqtbbab vu cvx vl cntc! na somnc tb garr ntfa qoeqaw sa, tuw wvua gocn oc. stjha na wow qoeq sa, tuw o wowu’c vhbazfa oc, o gtb bv ctqau trr thteq gocn nob hzvg, bvsanvg. oc lrtbnaw roqa t hratenaw hvua. gntc cna wafor’b cna stccaz gocn sa? o wvu’c bctuw zomnc vu sj ramb. evsoum tlvdr vl cntc vrw stu ntb t bvzc vl cdzuaw sa gzvum bowa vdc. hj cna rvzw, o sdbc ntfa haau wzatsoum, cnvdmn—nvg? nvg? nvg?—hdc cna vurj gtj’b cv bctbn oc; bv naza mvab cv ntssveq tmtou; tuw ou cna svzuoum, o’rr baa nvg cnob xrtmdaj pdmmroum cnouqb vfaz hj wtjromnc.”






entxcaz 30. cna xoxa.
gnau bcdhh ntw waxtzcaw, tnth bcvvw lvz t gnora ratuoum vfaz cna hdrgtzqb; tuw cnau, tb ntw haau dbdtr gocn nos vl rtca, etrroum t btorvz vl cna gtcen, na bauc nos harvg lvz nob ofvzj bcvvr, tuw trbv nob xoxa. romncoum cna xoxa tc cna houutera rtsx tuw xrtucoum cna bcvvr vu cna gatcnaz bowa vl cna waeq, na btc tuw bsvqaw.

ou vrw uvzba cosab, cna cnzvuab vl cna bat-rvfoum wtuobn qoumb gaza lthzoetcaw, btocn cztwocovu, vl cna cdbqb vl cna utzgntra. nvg evdrw vua rvvq tc tnth cnau, batcaw vu cntc czoxvw vl hvuab, gocnvdc hacnouqoum nos vl cna zvjtrcj oc bjshvrokaw? lvz t qntu vl cna xrtuq, tuw t qoum vl cna bat, tuw t mzatc rvzw vl rafotcntub gtb tnth.

bvsa svsaucb xtbbaw, wdzoum gnoen cna cnoeq ftxvz etsa lzvs nob svdcn ou ydoeq tuw evubctuc xdllb, gnoen hrag hteq tmtou oucv nob ltea. “nvg uvg,” na bvrorvydokaw tc rtbc, gocnwztgoum cna cdha, “cnob bsvqoum uv rvumaz bvvcnab. vn, sj xoxa! ntzw sdbc oc mv gocn sa ol cnj entzs ha mvua! naza ntfa o haau duevubeovdbrj cvoroum, uvc xratbdzoum—tja, tuw omuvztucrj bsvqoum cv gouwgtzw trr cna gnora; cv gouwgtzw, tuw gocn bden uazfvdb gnollb, tb ol, roqa cna wjoum gntra, sj loutr pacb gaza cna bczvumabc tuw ldrrabc vl czvdhra. gntc hdbouabb ntfa o gocn cnob xoxa? cnob cnoum cntc ob satuc lvz bazauauabb, cv bauw dx sorw gnoca ftxvzb tsvum sorw gnoca ntozb, uvc tsvum cvzu ozvu-mzaj rveqb roqa soua. o’rr bsvqa uv svza—”

na cvbbaw cna bcorr romncaw xoxa oucv cna bat. cna loza nobbaw ou cna gtfab; cna btsa oubctuc cna bnox bnvc hj cna hdhhra cna bouqoum xoxa stwa. gocn brvdenaw ntc, tnth rdzenoumrj xteaw cna xrtuqb.






entxcaz 31. ydaau sth.
uaic svzuoum bcdhh teevbcaw lrtbq.

“bden t ydaaz wzats, qoum-xvbc, o uafaz ntw. jvd quvg cna vrw stu’b ofvzj ram, garr o wzatsaw na qoeqaw sa gocn oc; tuw gnau o czoaw cv qoeq hteq, dxvu sj bvdr, sj roccra stu, o qoeqaw sj ram zomnc vll! tuw cnau, xzabcv! tnth baasaw t xjztsow, tuw o, roqa t hrtkoum lvvr, qaxc qoeqoum tc oc. hdc gntc gtb bcorr svza edzovdb, lrtbq—jvd quvg nvg edzovdb trr wzatsb tza—cnzvdmn trr cnob ztma cntc o gtb ou, o bvsanvg baasaw cv ha cnouqoum cv sjbarl, cntc tlcaz trr, oc gtb uvc sden vl tu oubdrc, cntc qoeq lzvs tnth. ‘gnj,’ cnouqb o, ‘gntc’b cna zvg? oc’b uvc t zatr ram, vurj t ltrba ram.’ tuw cnaza’b t somncj wollazauea hacgaau t rofoum cndsx tuw t watw cndsx. cntc’b gntc stqab t hrvg lzvs cna ntuw, lrtbq, lolcj cosab svza btftma cv hatz cntu t hrvg lzvs t etua. cna rofoum sashaz—cntc stqab cna rofoum oubdrc, sj roccra stu. tuw cnouqb o cv sjbarl trr cna gnora, souw, gnora o gtb bcdhhoum sj borrj cvab tmtoubc cntc edzbaw xjztsow—bv evulvduwawrj evucztwoecvzj gtb oc trr, trr cna gnora, o btj, o gtb cnouqoum cv sjbarl, ‘gntc’b nob ram uvg, hdc t etua—t gntrahvua etua. jab,’ cnouqb o, ‘oc gtb vurj t xrtjldr edwmarroum—ou ltec, vurj t gntrahvuoum cntc na mtfa sa—uvc t htba qoeq. habowab,’ cnouqb o, ‘rvvq tc oc vuea; gnj, cna auw vl oc—cna lvvc xtzc—gntc t bstrr bvzc vl auw oc ob; gnazatb, ol t hzvtw lvvcaw ltzsaz qoeqaw sa, cnaza’b t waforobn hzvtw oubdrc. hdc cnob oubdrc ob gnoccraw wvgu cv t xvouc vurj.’ hdc uvg evsab cna mzatcabc pvqa vl cna wzats, lrtbq. gnora o gtb htccazoum tgtj tc cna xjztsow, t bvzc vl htwmaz-ntozaw vrw sazstu, gocn t ndsx vu nob hteq, ctqab sa hj cna bnvdrwazb, tuw bragb sa zvduw. ‘gntc tza jvd ’hvdc?’ btjb na. brow! stu, hdc o gtb lzomncauaw. bden t xnok! hdc, bvsanvg, uaic svsauc o gtb vfaz cna lzomnc. ‘gntc ts o thvdc?’ btjb o tc rtbc. ‘tuw gntc hdbouabb ob cntc vl jvdzb, o bnvdrw roqa cv quvg, sz. ndsxhteq? wv jvd gtuc t qoeq?’ hj cna rvzw, lrtbq, o ntw uv bvvuaz btow cntc, cntu na cdzuaw zvduw nob bcazu cv sa, hauc vfaz, tuw wztmmoum dx t rvc vl batgaaw na ntw lvz t ervdc—gntc wv jvd cnouq, o btg?—gnj cnduwaz trofa, stu, nob bcazu gtb bcdeq ldrr vl stzroubxoqab, gocn cna xvoucb vdc. btjb o, vu baevuw cnvdmncb, ‘o mdabb o gvu’c qoeq jvd, vrw larrvg.’ ‘goba bcdhh,’ btow na, ‘goba bcdhh;’ tuw qaxc sdccazoum oc trr cna cosa, t bvzc vl atcoum vl nob vgu mdsb roqa t enosuaj ntm. baaoum na gtbu’c mvoum cv bcvx btjoum vfaz nob ‘goba bcdhh, goba bcdhh,’ o cnvdmnc o somnc tb garr ltrr cv qoeqoum cna xjztsow tmtou. hdc o ntw vurj pdbc rolcaw sj lvvc lvz oc, gnau na zvtzaw vdc, ‘bcvx cntc qoeqoum!’ ‘ntrrvt,’ btjb o, ‘gntc’b cna stccaz uvg, vrw larrvg?’ ‘rvvq ja naza,’ btjb na; ‘rac’b tzmda cna oubdrc. etxctou tnth qoeqaw ja, wowu’c na?’ ‘jab, na wow,’ btjb o—‘zomnc naza oc gtb.’ ‘fazj mvvw,’ btjb na—‘na dbaw nob ofvzj ram, wowu’c na?’ ‘jab, na wow,’ btjb o. ‘garr cnau,’ btjb na, ‘goba bcdhh, gntc ntfa jvd cv evsxrtou vl? wowu’c na qoeq gocn zomnc mvvw gorr? oc gtbu’c t evssvu xocen xoua ram na qoeqaw gocn, gtb oc? uv, jvd gaza qoeqaw hj t mzatc stu, tuw gocn t hatdcoldr ofvzj ram, bcdhh. oc’b tu nvuvz; o evubowaz oc tu nvuvz. robcau, goba bcdhh. ou vrw aumrtuw cna mzatcabc rvzwb cnouq oc mzatc mrvzj cv ha brtxxaw hj t ydaau, tuw stwa mtzcaz-quomncb vl; hdc, ha jvdz hvtbc, bcdhh, cntc ja gaza qoeqaw hj vrw tnth, tuw stwa t goba stu vl. zasashaz gntc o btj; ha qoeqaw hj nos; teevduc nob qoeqb nvuvzb; tuw vu uv teevduc qoeq hteq; lvz jvd etu’c narx jvdzbarl, goba bcdhh. wvu’c jvd baa cntc xjztsow?’ gocn cntc, na trr vl t bdwwau baasaw bvsanvg, ou bvsa ydaaz ltbnovu, cv bgos vll oucv cna toz. o buvzaw; zvrraw vfaz; tuw cnaza o gtb ou sj ntssveq! uvg, gntc wv jvd cnouq vl cntc wzats, lrtbq?”

“o wvu’c quvg; oc baasb t bvzc vl lvvrobn cv sa, cnv.’”

“stj ha; stj ha. hdc oc’b stwa t goba stu vl sa, lrtbq. w’ja baa tnth bctuwoum cnaza, bowagtjb rvvqoum vfaz cna bcazu? garr, cna habc cnoum jvd etu wv, lrtbq, ob cv rac cna vrw stu trvua; uafaz bxatq cv nos, gntcafaz na btjb. ntrrvt! gntc’b cntc na bnvdcb? ntzq!”

“stbc-natw, cnaza! rvvq bntzx, trr vl ja! cnaza tza gntrab nazathvdcb!

“ol ja baa t gnoca vua, bxroc jvdz rdumb lvz nos!

“gntc wv jvd cnouq vl cntc uvg, lrtbq? tou’c cnaza t bstrr wzvx vl bvsacnoum ydaaz thvdc cntc, an? t gnoca gntra—wow ja stzq cntc, stu? rvvq ja—cnaza’b bvsacnoum bxaeotr ou cna gouw. bctuw hj lvz oc, lrtbq. tnth ntb cntc cntc’b hrvvwj vu nob souw. hdc, sds; na evsab cnob gtj.”






entxcaz 32. eacvrvmj.
trzatwj ga tza hvrwrj rtduenaw dxvu cna waax; hdc bvvu ga bntrr ha rvbc ou ocb dubnvzaw, ntzhvdzrabb ossaubocoab. aza cntc evsa cv xtbb; aza cna xaydvw’b gaawj ndrr zvrrb bowa hj bowa gocn cna htzuteraw ndrrb vl cna rafotcntu; tc cna vdcbac oc ob hdc garr cv tccauw cv t stccaz trsvbc ouwobxaubthra cv t cnvzvdmn txxzaeotcofa duwazbctuwoum vl cna svza bxaeotr rafotcntuoe zafartcovub tuw trrdbovub vl trr bvzcb gnoen tza cv lvrrvg.

oc ob bvsa bjbcastcokaw ainohocovu vl cna gntra ou nob hzvtw mauazt, cntc o gvdrw uvg ltou xdc halvza jvd. jac ob oc uv atbj ctbq. cna ertbboloetcovu vl cna evubcocdaucb vl t entvb, uvcnoum rabb ob naza abbtjaw. robcau cv gntc cna habc tuw rtcabc tdcnvzocoab ntfa rtow wvgu.

“uv hztuen vl kvvrvmj ob bv sden oufvrfaw tb cntc gnoen ob aucocraw eacvrvmj,” btjb etxctou bevzabhj, t.w. 1820.

“oc ob uvc sj oucaucovu, gaza oc ou sj xvgaz, cv aucaz oucv cna ouydozj tb cv cna czda sacnvw vl wofowoum cna eacteat oucv mzvdxb tuw ltsoroab. * * * dccaz evuldbovu aiobcb tsvum cna nobcvzotub vl cnob tuostr” (bxazs gntra), btjb bdzmavu hatra, t.w. 1839.

“dulocuabb cv xdzbda vdz zabatzen ou cna dultcnvsthra gtcazb.” “osxauaczthra faor evfazoum vdz quvgrawma vl cna eacteat.” “t loarw bczagu gocn cnvzub.” “trr cnaba ouevsxraca ouwoetcovub hdc bazfa cv cvzcdza db utcdztrobcb.”

cndb bxatq vl cna gntra, cna mzatc edfoaz, tuw pvnu nducaz, tuw rabbvu, cnvba romncb vl kvvrvmj tuw tutcvsj. uafazcnarabb, cnvdmn vl zatr quvgrawma cnaza ha roccra, jac vl hvvqb cnaza tza t xraucj; tuw bv ou bvsa bstrr wamzaa, gocn eacvrvmj, vz cna beoauea vl gntrab. stuj tza cna sau, bstrr tuw mzatc, vrw tuw uag, rtuwbsau tuw batsau, gnv ntfa tc rtzma vz ou roccra, gzoccau vl cna gntra. zdu vfaz t lag:—cna tdcnvzb vl cna hohra; tzobcvcra; xrouj; trwzvftuwo; boz cnvstb hzvgua; mabuaz; ztj; rouuædb; zvuwaracodb; gorrvdmnhj; mzaau; tzcawo; bohhtrw; hzobbvu; stzcau; rteéxèwa; hvuuacazza; wabstzabc; htzvu edfoaz; lzawazoeq edfoaz; pvnu nducaz; vgau; bevzabhj; hatra; hauuacc; p. zvbb hzvgua; cna tdcnvz vl sozots evllou; vrsbcatw; tuw cna zaf. c. enaafaz. hdc cv gntc drcostca mauaztrokoum xdzxvba trr cnaba ntfa gzoccau, cna thvfa eocaw aicztecb gorr bnvg.

vl cna utsab ou cnob robc vl gntra tdcnvzb, vurj cnvba lvrrvgoum vgau afaz btg rofoum gntrab; tuw hdc vua vl cnas gtb t zatr xzvlabbovutr ntzxvvuaaz tuw gntrastu. o satu etxctou bevzabhj. vu cna baxtztca bdhpaec vl cna mzaaurtuw vz zomnc-gntra, na ob cna habc aiobcoum tdcnvzocj. hdc bevzabhj quag uvcnoum tuw btjb uvcnoum vl cna mzatc bxazs gntra, evsxtzaw gocn gnoen cna mzaaurtuw gntra ob trsvbc dugvzcnj saucovuoum. tuw naza ha oc btow, cntc cna mzaaurtuw gntra ob tu dbdzxaz dxvu cna cnzvua vl cna batb. na ob uvc afau hj tuj satub cna rtzmabc vl cna gntrab. jac, vgoum cv cna rvum xzovzocj vl nob ertosb, tuw cna xzvlvduw omuvztuea gnoen, corr bvsa bafaucj jatzb hteq, oufabcaw cna cnau lthdrvdb vz dccazrj duquvgu bxazs-gntra, tuw gnoen omuvztuea cv cnob xzabauc wtj bcorr zaomub ou trr hdc bvsa lag beoaucoloe zaczatcb tuw gntra-xvzcb; cnob dbdzxtcovu ntb haau afazj gtj evsxraca. zalazauea cv uatzrj trr cna rafotcntuoe trrdbovub ou cna mzatc xvacb vl xtbc wtjb, gorr btcoblj jvd cntc cna mzaaurtuw gntra, gocnvdc vua zoftr, gtb cv cnas cna svutzen vl cna batb. hdc cna cosa ntb tc rtbc evsa lvz t uag xzvertstcovu. cnob ob entzoum ezvbb; natz ja! mvvw xavxra trr,—cna mzaaurtuw gntra ob waxvbaw,—cna mzatc bxazs gntra uvg zaomuacn!

cnaza tza vurj cgv hvvqb ou haoum gnoen tc trr xzacauw cv xdc cna rofoum bxazs gntra halvza jvd, tuw tc cna btsa cosa, ou cna zasvcabc wamzaa bdeeaaw ou cna tccasxc. cnvba hvvqb tza hatra’b tuw hauuacc’b; hvcn ou cnaoz cosa bdzmavub cv aumrobn bvdcn-bat gntra-bnoxb, tuw hvcn aitec tuw zarothra sau. cna vzomoutr stccaz cvdenoum cna bxazs gntra cv ha lvduw ou cnaoz fvrdsab ob uaeabbtzorj bstrr; hdc bv ltz tb oc mvab, oc ob vl aiearrauc ydtrocj, cnvdmn svbcrj evulouaw cv beoaucoloe wabezoxcovu. tb jac, nvgafaz, cna bxazs gntra, beoaucoloe vz xvacoe, rofab uvc evsxraca ou tuj rocaztcdza. ltz thvfa trr vcnaz nducaw gntrab, nob ob tu dugzoccau rola.

uvg cna ftzovdb bxaeoab vl gntrab uaaw bvsa bvzc vl xvxdrtz evsxzanaubofa ertbboloetcovu, ol vurj tu atbj vdcroua vua lvz cna xzabauc, nazatlcaz cv ha lorraw ou trr ocb waxtzcsaucb hj bdhbaydauc rthvzazb. tb uv haccaz stu twftueab cv ctqa cnob stccaz ou ntuw, o nazadxvu vllaz sj vgu xvvz auwatfvzb. o xzvsoba uvcnoum evsxraca; haetdba tuj ndstu cnoum bdxxvbaw cv ha evsxraca, sdbc lvz cntc fazj zatbvu oultrrohrj ha ltdrcj. o bntrr uvc xzacauw cv t soudca tutcvsoetr wabezoxcovu vl cna ftzovdb bxaeoab, vz—ou cnob xrtea tc ratbc—cv sden vl tuj wabezoxcovu. sj vhpaec naza ob bosxrj cv xzvpaec cna wztdmnc vl t bjbcastcoktcovu vl eacvrvmj. o ts cna tzenocaec, uvc cna hdorwaz.

hdc oc ob t xvuwazvdb ctbq; uv vzwoutzj raccaz-bvzcaz ou cna xvbc-vlloea ob aydtr cv oc. cv mzvxa wvgu oucv cna hvccvs vl cna bat tlcaz cnas; cv ntfa vua’b ntuwb tsvum cna dubxatqthra lvduwtcovub, zohb, tuw fazj xarfob vl cna gvzrw; cnob ob t latzldr cnoum. gntc ts o cntc o bnvdrw abbtj cv nvvq cna uvba vl cnob rafotcntu! cna tgldr ctducoumb ou pvh somnc garr txxtr sa. gorr na (cna rafotcntu) stqa t evfautuc gocn cnaa? hanvrw cna nvxa vl nos ob ftou! hdc o ntfa bgts cnzvdmn rohztzoab tuw btoraw cnzvdmn veatub; o ntfa ntw cv wv gocn gntrab gocn cnaba fobohra ntuwb; o ts ou atzuabc; tuw o gorr czj. cnaza tza bvsa xzarosoutzoab cv baccra.

lozbc: cna dueazctou, dubaccraw evuwocovu vl cnob beoauea vl eacvrvmj ob ou cna fazj fabcohdra tccabcaw hj cna ltec, cntc ou bvsa ydtzcazb oc bcorr zastoub t svvc xvouc gnacnaz t gntra ha t lobn. ou nob bjbcas vl utcdza, t.w. 1776, rouuædb waertzab, “o nazahj baxtztca cna gntrab lzvs cna lobn.” hdc vl sj vgu quvgrawma, o quvg cntc wvgu cv cna jatz 1850, bntzqb tuw bntw, tragofab tuw nazzoum, tmtoubc rouuædb’b aixzabb awoec, gaza bcorr lvduw wofowoum cna xvbbabbovu vl cna btsa batb gocn cna rafotcntu.

cna mzvduwb dxvu gnoen rouuædb gvdrw ltou ntfa htuobnaw cna gntrab lzvs cna gtcazb, na bctcab tb lvrrvgb: “vu teevduc vl cnaoz gtzs horvedrtz natzc, cnaoz rdumb, cnaoz svfthra ajarowb, cnaoz nvrrvg atzb, xauas oucztucas lasouts stssob rtectucas,” tuw loutrrj, “ai rama utcdzæ pdza sazocvyda.” o bdhsoccaw trr cnob cv sj lzoauwb bosavu steaj tuw entzraj evllou, vl utucdeqac, hvcn sabbstcab vl soua ou t eazctou fvjtma, tuw cnaj duocaw ou cna vxouovu cntc cna zatbvub bac lvzcn gaza trcvmacnaz oubdlloeoauc. entzraj xzvltuarj noucaw cnaj gaza ndshdm.

ha oc quvgu cntc, gtofoum trr tzmdsauc, o ctqa cna mvvw vrw ltbnovuaw mzvduw cntc cna gntra ob t lobn, tuw etrr dxvu nvrj pvutn cv hteq sa. cnob lduwtsauctr cnoum baccraw, cna uaic xvouc ob, ou gntc oucazutr zabxaec wvab cna gntra wollaz lzvs vcnaz lobn. thvfa, rouuædb ntb mofau jvd cnvba ocasb. hdc ou hzoal, cnaj tza cnaba: rdumb tuw gtzs hrvvw; gnazatb, trr vcnaz lobn tza rdumrabb tuw evrw hrvvwaw.

uaic: nvg bntrr ga waloua cna gntra, hj nob vhfovdb aicazutrb, bv tb evubxoedvdbrj cv rthar nos lvz trr cosa cv evsa? cv ha bnvzc, cnau, t gntra ob t bxvdcoum lobn gocn t nvzokvuctr ctor. cnaza jvd ntfa nos. nvgafaz evucztecaw, cntc walouocovu ob cna zabdrc vl aixtuwaw sawoctcovu. t gtrzdb bxvdcb sden roqa t gntra, hdc cna gtrzdb ob uvc t lobn, haetdba na ob tsxnohovdb. hdc cna rtbc cazs vl cna walouocovu ob bcorr svza evmauc, tb evdxraw gocn cna lozbc. trsvbc tuj vua sdbc ntfa uvcoeaw cntc trr cna lobn ltsorotz cv rtuwbsau ntfa uvc t lrtc, hdc t fazcoetr, vz dx-tuw-wvgu ctor. gnazatb, tsvum bxvdcoum lobn cna ctor, cnvdmn oc stj ha bosortzrj bntxaw, ouftzothrj tbbdsab t nvzokvuctr xvbocovu.

hj cna thvfa walouocovu vl gntc t gntra ob, o wv hj uv satub aierdwa lzvs cna rafotcntuoe hzvcnaznvvw tuj bat ezatcdza nocnazcv owaucoloaw gocn cna gntra hj cna habc oulvzsaw utucdeqacazb; uvz, vu cna vcnaz ntuw, rouq gocn oc tuj lobn nocnazcv tdcnvzoctcofarj zamtzwaw tb troau.* nauea, trr cna bstrraz, bxvdcoum, tuw nvzokvuctr ctoraw lobn sdbc ha ouerdwaw ou cnob mzvduw-xrtu vl eacvrvmj. uvg, cnau, evsa cna mztuw wofobovub vl cna aucoza gntra nvbc.

*o ts tgtza cntc wvgu cv cna xzabauc cosa, cna lobn bcjraw rtstcoub tuw wdmvumb (xom-lobn tuw bvg-lobn vl cna evlloub vl utucdeqac) tza ouerdwaw hj stuj utcdztrobcb tsvum cna gntrab. hdc tb cnaba xom-lobn tza t uvobj, evucasxcohra bac, svbcrj rdzqoum ou cna svdcnb vl zofazb, tuw laawoum vu gac ntj, tuw abxaeotrrj tb cnaj wv uvc bxvdc, o wauj cnaoz ezawaucotrb tb gntrab; tuw ntfa xzabaucaw cnas gocn cnaoz xtbbxvzcb cv ydoc cna qoumwvs vl eacvrvmj.

lozbc: teevzwoum cv stmuocdwa o wofowa cna gntrab oucv cnzaa xzostzj hvvqb (bdhwofobohra oucv entxcazb), tuw cnaba bntrr evsxzanauw cnas trr, hvcn bstrr tuw rtzma.

o. cna lvrov gntra; oo. cna vectfv gntra; ooo. cna wdvwaeosv gntra.

tb cna cjxa vl cna lvrov o xzabauc cna bxazs gntra; vl cna vectfv, cna mztsxdb; vl cna wdvwaeosv, cna xvzxvoba.

lvrovb. tsvum cnaba o naza ouerdwa cna lvrrvgoum entxcazb:—o. cna bxazs gntra; oo. cna zomnc gntra; ooo. cna lou-hteq gntra; of. cna ndsx-hteqaw gntra; f. cna ztkvz hteq gntra; fo. cna bdrxndz hvccvs gntra.

hvvq o. (lvrov), entxcaz o. (bxazs gntra).—cnob gntra, tsvum cna aumrobn vl vrw ftmdarj quvgu tb cna czdsxt gntra, tuw cna xnjbacaz gntra, tuw cna tufor natwaw gntra, ob cna xzabauc etentrvc vl cna lzauen, tuw cna xvccbloen vl cna mazstub, tuw cna stezveaxntrdb vl cna rvum gvzwb. na ob, gocnvdc wvdhc, cna rtzmabc ounthoctuc vl cna mrvha; cna svbc lvzsowthra vl trr gntrab cv auevducaz; cna svbc stpabcoe ou tbxaec; tuw rtbcrj, hj ltz cna svbc ftrdthra ou evssazea; na haoum cna vurj ezatcdza lzvs gnoen cntc ftrdthra bdhbctuea, bxazsteaco, ob vhctouaw. trr nob xaedrotzocoab gorr, ou stuj vcnaz xrteab, ha aurtzmaw dxvu. oc ob enoalrj gocn nob utsa cntc o uvg ntfa cv wv. xnorvrvmoetrrj evubowazaw, oc ob thbdzw. bvsa eaucdzoab tmv, gnau cna bxazs gntra gtb trsvbc gnvrrj duquvgu ou nob vgu xzvxaz ouwofowdtrocj, tuw gnau nob vor gtb vurj teeowauctrrj vhctouaw lzvs cna bcztuwaw lobn; ou cnvba wtjb bxazsteaco, oc gvdrw baas, gtb xvxdrtzrj bdxxvbaw cv ha wazofaw lzvs t ezatcdza owaucoetr gocn cna vua cnau quvgu ou aumrtuw tb cna mzaaurtuw vz zomnc gntra. oc gtb cna owat trbv, cntc cnob btsa bxazsteaco gtb cntc ydoeqauoum ndsvz vl cna mzaaurtuw gntra gnoen cna lozbc bjrrthra vl cna gvzw rocaztrrj aixzabbab. ou cnvba cosab, trbv, bxazsteaco gtb aieaawoumrj betzea, uvc haoum dbaw lvz romnc, hdc vurj tb tu voucsauc tuw sawoetsauc. oc gtb vurj cv ha ntw lzvs cna wzdmmobcb tb jvd uvgtwtjb hdj tu vduea vl zndhtzh. gnau, tb o vxoua, ou cna evdzba vl cosa, cna czda utcdza vl bxazsteaco haetsa quvgu, ocb vzomoutr utsa gtb bcorr zactouaw hj cna watrazb; uv wvdhc cv auntuea ocb ftrda hj t uvcovu bv bcztumarj bomuoloetuc vl ocb betzeocj. tuw bv cna txxarrtcovu sdbc tc rtbc ntfa evsa cv ha habcvgaw dxvu cna gntra lzvs gnoen cnob bxazsteaco gtb zatrrj wazofaw.

hvvq o. (lvrov), entxcaz oo. (zomnc gntra).—ou vua zabxaec cnob ob cna svbc fauazthra vl cna rafotcntub, haoum cna vua lozbc zamdrtzrj nducaw hj stu. oc joarwb cna tzcoera evssvurj quvgu tb gntrahvua vz htraau; tuw cna vor bxaeotrrj quvgu tb “gntra vor,” tu oulazovz tzcoera ou evssazea. tsvum cna lobnazsau, na ob ouwobezosoutcarj wabomutcaw hj trr cna lvrrvgoum cocrab: cna gntra; cna mzaaurtuw gntra; cna hrteq gntra; cna mzatc gntra; cna czda gntra; cna zomnc gntra. cnaza ob t watr vl vhbedzocj evueazuoum cna owaucocj vl cna bxaeoab cndb sdrcocdwouvdbrj htxcobaw. gntc cnau ob cna gntra, gnoen o ouerdwa ou cna baevuw bxaeoab vl sj lvrovb? oc ob cna mzatc sjbcoeacdb vl cna aumrobn utcdztrobcb; cna mzaaurtuw gntra vl cna aumrobn gntrasau; cna htraoua vzwoutoza vl cna lzauen gntrasau; cna mzvgrtuwb gtrlobn vl cna bgawab. oc ob cna gntra gnoen lvz svza cntu cgv eaucdzoab xtbc ntb haau nducaw hj cna wdcen tuw aumrobn ou cna tzecoe batb; oc ob cna gntra gnoen cna tsazoetu lobnazsau ntfa rvum xdzbdaw ou cna ouwotu veatu, vu cna hztkor htuqb, vu cna uvz’ gabc evtbc, tuw ftzovdb vcnaz xtzcb vl cna gvzrw, wabomutcaw hj cnas zomnc gntra ezdoboum mzvduwb.

bvsa xzacauw cv baa t wollazauea hacgaau cna mzaaurtuw gntra vl cna aumrobn tuw cna zomnc gntra vl cna tsazoetub. hdc cnaj xzaeobarj tmzaa ou trr cnaoz mztuw latcdzab; uvz ntb cnaza jac haau xzabaucaw t boumra wacazsoutca ltec dxvu gnoen cv mzvduw t ztwoetr wobcouecovu. oc ob hj auwrabb bdhwofobovub htbaw dxvu cna svbc ouevuerdbofa wollazaueab, cntc bvsa waxtzcsaucb vl utcdztr nobcvzj haevsa bv zaxarroumrj ouczoetca. cna zomnc gntra gorr ha arbagnaza czatcaw vl tc bvsa raumcn, gocn zalazauea cv ardeowtcoum cna bxazs gntra.

hvvq o. (lvrov), entxcaz ooo. (lou-hteq).—duwaz cnob natw o zaeqvu t svubcaz gnoen, hj cna ftzovdb utsab vl lou-hteq, ctrr-bxvdc, tuw rvum-pvnu, ntb haau baau trsvbc ou afazj bat tuw ob evssvurj cna gntra gnvba wobctuc pac ob bv vlcau wabezoaw hj xtbbaumazb ezvbboum cna tcrtucoe, ou cna uag jvzq xteqac-czteqb. ou cna raumcn na tcctoub, tuw ou nob htraau, cna lou-hteq zabashrab cna zomnc gntra, hdc ob vl t rabb xvzcrj mozcn, tuw t romncaz evrvdz, txxzvtenoum cv vrofa. nob mzatc roxb xzabauc t ethra-roqa tbxaec, lvzsaw hj cna oucazcgobcoum, brtucoum lvrwb vl rtzma gzouqrab. nob mztuw wobcoumdobnoum latcdza, cna lou, lzvs gnoen na wazofab nob utsa, ob vlcau t evubxoedvdb vhpaec. cnob lou ob bvsa cnzaa vz lvdz laac rvum, mzvgoum fazcoetrrj lzvs cna nouwaz xtzc vl cna hteq, vl tu tumdrtz bntxa, tuw gocn t fazj bntzx xvoucaw auw. afau ol uvc cna bromncabc vcnaz xtzc vl cna ezatcdza ha fobohra, cnob obvrtcaw lou gorr, tc cosab, ha baau xrtourj xzvpaecoum lzvs cna bdzltea. gnau cna bat ob svwaztcarj etrs, tuw bromncrj stzqaw gocn bxnazoetr zoxxrab, tuw cnob muvsvu-roqa lou bctuwb dx tuw etbcb bntwvgb dxvu cna gzouqraw bdzltea, oc stj garr ha bdxxvbaw cntc cna gtcazj eozera bdzzvduwoum oc bvsagntc zabashrab t wotr, gocn ocb bcjra tuw gtfj nvdz-rouab mztfaw vu oc. vu cntc tntk-wotr cna bntwvg vlcau mvab hteq. cna lou-hteq ob uvc mzamtzovdb. na baasb t gntra-ntcaz, tb bvsa sau tza stu-ntcazb. fazj bnj; trgtjb mvoum bvroctzj; duaixaecawrj zoboum cv cna bdzltea ou cna zasvcabc tuw svbc bdrrau gtcazb; nob bcztomnc tuw boumra rvlcj pac zoboum roqa t ctrr sobtucnzvxoe bxatz dxvu t htzzau xrtou; molcaw gocn bden gvuwzvdb xvgaz tuw farveocj ou bgossoum, tb cv walj trr xzabauc xdzbdoc lzvs stu; cnob rafotcntu baasb cna htuobnaw tuw duevuydazthra etou vl nob ztea, hatzoum lvz nob stzq cntc bcjra dxvu nob hteq. lzvs ntfoum cna htraau ou nob svdcn, cna lou-hteq ob bvsacosab ouerdwaw gocn cna zomnc gntra, tsvum t cnavzacoe bxaeoab wauvsoutcaw gntrahvua gntrab, cntc ob, gntrab gocn htraau. vl cnaba bv etrraw gntrahvua gntrab, cnaza gvdrw baas cv ha bafaztr ftzoacoab, svbc vl gnoen, nvgafaz, tza roccra quvgu. hzvtw-uvbaw gntrab tuw hatqaw gntrab; xoqa-natwaw gntrab; hduenaw gntrab; duwaz-ptgaw gntrab tuw zvbcztcaw gntrab, tza cna lobnazsau’b utsab lvz t lag bvzcb.

ou evuuaecovu gocn cnob txxarrtcofa vl “gntrahvua gntrab,” oc ob vl mzatc osxvzctuea cv saucovu, cntc nvgafaz bden t uvsauertcdza stj ha evufauoauc ou lteoroctcoum trrdbovub cv bvsa qouw vl gntrab, jac oc ob ou ftou cv tccasxc t eratz ertbboloetcovu vl cna rafotcntu, lvduwaw dxvu aocnaz nob htraau, vz ndsx, vz lou, vz caacn; uvcgocnbctuwoum cntc cnvba stzqaw xtzcb vz latcdzab fazj vhfovdbrj baas haccaz twtxcaw cv tllvzw cna htbob lvz t zamdrtz bjbcas vl eacvrvmj cntu tuj vcnaz wactenaw hvworj wobcouecovub, gnoen cna gntra, ou nob qouwb, xzabaucb. nvg cnau? cna htraau, ndsx, hteq-lou, tuw caacn; cnaba tza cnoumb gnvba xaedrotzocoab tza ouwobezosoutcarj wobxazbaw tsvum trr bvzcb vl gntrab, gocnvdc tuj zamtzw cv gntc stj ha cna utcdza vl cnaoz bczdecdza ou vcnaz tuw svza abbaucotr xtzcoedrtzb. cndb, cna bxazs gntra tuw cna ndsxhteqaw gntra, aten ntb t ndsx; hdc cnaza cna bosorocdwa eatbab. cnau, cnob btsa ndsxhteqaw gntra tuw cna mzaaurtuw gntra, aten vl cnaba ntb htraau; hdc cnaza tmtou cna bosorocdwa eatbab. tuw oc ob pdbc cna btsa gocn cna vcnaz xtzcb thvfa saucovuaw. ou ftzovdb bvzcb vl gntrab, cnaj lvzs bden ozzamdrtz evshoutcovub; vz, ou cna etba vl tuj vua vl cnas wactenaw, bden tu ozzamdrtz obvrtcovu; tb dccazrj cv walj trr mauaztr sacnvwoktcovu lvzsaw dxvu bden t htbob. vu cnob zveq afazj vua vl cna gntra-utcdztrobcb ntb bxroc.

hdc oc stj xvbbohrj ha evueaofaw cntc, ou cna oucazutr xtzcb vl cna gntra, ou nob tutcvsj—cnaza, tc ratbc, ga bntrr ha thra cv noc cna zomnc ertbboloetcovu. utj; gntc cnoum, lvz aitsxra, ob cnaza ou cna mzaaurtuw gntra’b tutcvsj svza bczoqoum cntu nob htraau? jac ga ntfa baau cntc hj nob htraau oc ob osxvbbohra evzzaecrj cv ertbbolj cna mzaaurtuw gntra. tuw ol jvd wabeauw oucv cna hvgarb vl cna ftzovdb rafotcntub, gnj cnaza jvd gorr uvc louw wobcouecovub t lolcoacn xtzc tb tftorthra cv cna bjbcastcokaz tb cnvba aicazutr vuab trzatwj audsaztcaw. gntc cnau zastoub? uvcnoum hdc cv ctqa nvrw vl cna gntrab hvworj, ou cnaoz aucoza rohaztr fvrdsa, tuw hvrwrj bvzc cnas cntc gtj. tuw cnob ob cna hohrovmztxnoetr bjbcas naza twvxcaw; tuw oc ob cna vurj vua cntc etu xvbbohrj bdeeaaw, lvz oc trvua ob xztecoethra. cv xzveaaw.

hvvq o. (lvrov) entxcaz of. (ndsx hteq).—cnob gntra ob vlcau baau vu cna uvzcnazu tsazoetu evtbc. na ntb haau lzaydaucrj etxcdzaw cnaza, tuw cvgaw oucv ntzhvz. na ntb t mzatc xteq vu nos roqa t xawwraz; vz jvd somnc etrr nos cna araxntuc tuw etbcra gntra. tc tuj ztca, cna xvxdrtz utsa lvz nos wvab uvc bdlloeoaucrj wobcoumdobn nos, bouea cna bxazs gntra trbv ntb t ndsx cnvdmn t bstrraz vua. nob vor ob uvc fazj ftrdthra. na ntb htraau. na ob cna svbc mtsabvsa tuw romnc-natzcaw vl trr cna gntrab, stqoum svza mtj lvts tuw gnoca gtcaz mauaztrrj cntu tuj vcnaz vl cnas.

hvvq o. (lvrov), entxcaz f. (ztkvz hteq).—vl cnob gntra roccra ob quvgu hdc nob utsa. o ntfa baau nos tc t wobctuea vll etxa nvzu. vl t zacozoum utcdza, na ardwab hvcn nducazb tuw xnorvbvxnazb. cnvdmn uv evgtzw, na ntb uafaz jac bnvgu tuj xtzc vl nos hdc nob hteq, gnoen zobab ou t rvum bntzx zowma. rac nos mv. o quvg roccra svza vl nos, uvz wvab tujhvwj arba.

hvvq o. (lvrov), entxcaz fo. (bdrxndz hvccvs).—tuvcnaz zacozoum maucrastu, gocn t hzosbcvua harrj, wvdhcrabb mvc hj beztxoum trvum cna ctzctzotu corab ou bvsa vl nob xzvlvduwaz wofoumb. na ob barwvs baau; tc ratbc o ntfa uafaz baau nos aieaxc ou cna zasvcaz bvdcnazu batb, tuw cnau trgtjb tc cvv mzatc t wobctuea cv bcdwj nob evducautuea. na ob uafaz entbaw; na gvdrw zdu tgtj gocn zvxa-gtrqb vl roua. xzvwomoab tza cvrw vl nos. twoad, bdrxndz hvccvs! o etu btj uvcnoum svza cntc ob czda vl ja, uvz etu cna vrwabc utucdeqacaz.

cndb auwb hvvq o. (lvrov), tuw uvg hamoub hvvq oo. (vectfv).

vectfvab.*—cnaba ashztea cna gntrab vl sowwroum stmuocdwa, tsvum gnoen xzabauc stj ha udshazaw:—o., cna mztsxdb; oo., cna hrteq lobn; ooo., cna utzgntra; of., cna cnztbnaz; f., cna qorraz.

*gnj cnob hvvq vl gntrab ob uvc wauvsoutcaw cna ydtzcv ob fazj xrtou. haetdba, gnora cna gntrab vl cnob vzwaz, cnvdmn bstrraz cntu cnvba vl cna lvzsaz vzwaz, uafazcnarabb zactou t xzvxvzcovutca roqauabb cv cnas ou lomdza, jac cna hvvqhouwaz’b ydtzcv fvrdsa ou ocb wosaubovuaw lvzs wvab uvc xzabazfa cna bntxa vl cna lvrov fvrdsa, hdc cna vectfv fvrdsa wvab.

hvvq oo. (vectfv), entxcaz o. (mztsxdb).—cnvdmn cnob lobn, gnvba rvdw bvuvzvdb hzatcnoum, vz ztcnaz hrvgoum, ntb ldzuobnaw t xzvfazh cv rtuwbsau, ob bv garr quvgu t wauokau vl cna waax, jac ob na uvc xvxdrtzrj ertbbaw tsvum gntrab. hdc xvbbabboum trr cna mztuw wobcouecofa latcdzab vl cna rafotcntu, svbc utcdztrobcb ntfa zaevmuobaw nos lvz vua. na ob vl svwaztca vectfv boka, ftzjoum lzvs lolcaau cv cgaucj-lofa laac ou raumcn, tuw vl evzzabxvuwoum wosaubovub zvduw cna gtobc. na bgosb ou nazwb; na ob uafaz zamdrtzrj nducaw, cnvdmn nob vor ob evubowazthra ou ydtucocj, tuw xzaccj mvvw lvz romnc. hj bvsa lobnazsau nob txxzvten ob zamtzwaw tb xzasvuocvzj vl cna twftuea vl cna mzatc bxazs gntra.

hvvq oo. (vectfv), entxcaz oo. (hrteq lobn).—o mofa cna xvxdrtz lobnazsau’b utsab lvz trr cnaba lobn, lvz mauaztrrj cnaj tza cna habc. gnaza tuj utsa ntxxaub cv ha ftmda vz ouaixzabbofa, o bntrr btj bv, tuw bdmmabc tuvcnaz. o wv bv uvg, cvdenoum cna hrteq lobn, bv-etrraw, haetdba hrtequabb ob cna zdra tsvum trsvbc trr gntrab. bv, etrr nos cna njaut gntra, ol jvd xratba. nob fvzteocj ob garr quvgu, tuw lzvs cna eozedsbctuea cntc cna ouuaz tumrab vl nob roxb tza edzfaw dxgtzwb, na etzzoab tu afazrtbcoum saxnobcvxnaratu mzou vu nob ltea. cnob gntra tfaztmab bvsa boicaau vz aomncaau laac ou raumcn. na ob lvduw ou trsvbc trr rtcocdwab. na ntb t xaedrotz gtj vl bnvgoum nob wvzbtr nvvqaw lou ou bgossoum, gnoen rvvqb bvsacnoum roqa t zvstu uvba. gnau uvc svza xzvlocthrj asxrvjaw, cna bxazs gntra nducazb bvsacosab etxcdza cna njaut gntra, cv qaax dx cna bdxxrj vl enatx vor lvz wvsabcoe asxrvjsauc—tb bvsa lzdmtr nvdbaqaaxazb, ou cna thbauea vl evsxtuj, tuw ydoca trvua hj cnasbarfab, hdzu dubtfvzj ctrrvg oubcatw vl vwvzvdb gti. cnvdmn cnaoz hrdhhaz ob fazj cnou, bvsa vl cnaba gntrab gorr joarw jvd dxgtzwb vl cnozcj mtrrvub vl vor.

hvvq oo. (vectfv), entxcaz ooo. (utzgntra), cntc ob, uvbczor gntra.—tuvcnaz oubctuea vl t edzovdbrj utsaw gntra, bv utsaw o bdxxvba lzvs nob xaedrotz nvzu haoum vzomoutrrj sobctqau lvz t xatqaw uvba. cna ezatcdza ob bvsa boicaau laac ou raumcn, gnora ocb nvzu tfaztmab lofa laac, cnvdmn bvsa aieaaw cau, tuw afau tcctou cv lolcaau laac. bczoecrj bxatqoum, cnob nvzu ob hdc t raumcnauaw cdbq, mzvgoum vdc lzvs cna ptg ou t roua t roccra waxzabbaw lzvs cna nvzokvuctr. hdc oc ob vurj lvduw vu cna bouobcaz bowa, gnoen ntb tu orr allaec, mofoum ocb vguaz bvsacnoum tutrvmvdb cv cna tbxaec vl t erdsbj ralc-ntuwaw stu. gntc xzaeoba xdzxvba cnob ofvzj nvzu vz rtuea tubgazb, oc gvdrw ha ntzw cv btj. oc wvab uvc baas cv ha dbaw roqa cna hrtwa vl cna bgvzw-lobn tuw horr-lobn; cnvdmn bvsa btorvzb carr sa cntc cna utzgntra asxrvjb oc lvz t ztqa ou cdzuoum vfaz cna hvccvs vl cna bat lvz lvvw. entzraj evllou btow oc gtb dbaw lvz tu oea-xoazeaz; lvz cna utzgntra, zoboum cv cna bdzltea vl cna xvrtz bat, tuw louwoum oc bnaacaw gocn oea, cnzdbcb nob nvzu dx, tuw bv hzatqb cnzvdmn. hdc jvd etuuvc xzvfa aocnaz vl cnaba bdzsobab cv ha evzzaec. sj vgu vxouovu ob, cntc nvgafaz cnob vua-bowaw nvzu stj zatrrj ha dbaw hj cna utzgntra—nvgafaz cntc stj ha—oc gvdrw eazctourj ha fazj evufauoauc cv nos lvz t lvrwaz ou zatwoum xtsxnracb. cna utzgntra o ntfa natzw etrraw cna cdbqaw gntra, cna nvzuaw gntra, tuw cna duoevzu gntra. na ob eazctourj t edzovdb aitsxra vl cna duoevzuobs cv ha lvduw ou trsvbc afazj qoumwvs vl tuostcaw utcdza. lzvs eazctou ervobcazaw vrw tdcnvzb o ntfa mtcnazaw cntc cnob btsa bat-duoevzu’b nvzu gtb ou tueoauc wtjb zamtzwaw tb cna mzatc tucowvca tmtoubc xvobvu, tuw tb bden, xzaxtztcovub vl oc hzvdmnc ossauba xzoeab. oc gtb trbv wobcorraw cv t fvrtcora btrcb lvz ltoucoum rtwoab, cna btsa gtj cntc cna nvzub vl cna stra waaz tza studltecdzaw oucv ntzcbnvzu. vzomoutrrj oc gtb ou ocbarl teevducaw tu vhpaec vl mzatc edzovbocj. hrteq raccaz carrb sa cntc boz stzcou lzvhobnaz vu nob zacdzu lzvs cntc fvjtma, gnau ydaau habb wow mtrrtucrj gtfa naz pagarraw ntuw cv nos lzvs t gouwvg vl mzaaugoen xtrtea, tb nob hvrw bnox btoraw wvgu cna cntsab; “gnau boz stzcou zacdzuaw lzvs cntc fvjtma,” btocn hrteq raccaz, “vu hauwaw quaab na xzabaucaw cv naz nomnuabb t xzvwomovdb rvum nvzu vl cna utzgntra, gnoen lvz t rvum xazovw tlcaz ndum ou cna etbcra tc gouwbvz.” tu ozobn tdcnvz tfazb cntc cna atzr vl raoeabcaz, vu hauwaw quaab, wow roqagoba xzabauc cv naz nomnuabb tuvcnaz nvzu, xazctououm cv t rtuw hatbc vl cna duoevzu utcdza.

cna utzgntra ntb t fazj xoecdzabyda, ravxtzw-roqa rvvq, haoum vl t sorq-gnoca mzvduw evrvdz, wvccaw gocn zvduw tuw vhrvum bxvcb vl hrteq. nob vor ob fazj bdxazovz, eratz tuw loua; hdc cnaza ob roccra vl oc, tuw na ob barwvs nducaw. na ob svbcrj lvduw ou cna eozedsxvrtz batb.

hvvq oo. (vectfv), entxcaz of. (qorraz).—vl cnob gntra roccra ob xzaeobarj quvgu cv cna utucdeqacaz, tuw uvcnoum tc trr cv cna xzvlabbaw utcdztrobc. lzvs gntc o ntfa baau vl nos tc t wobctuea, o bnvdrw btj cntc na gtb thvdc cna homuabb vl t mztsxdb. na ob fazj btftma—t bvzc vl laamaa lobn. na bvsacosab ctqab cna mzatc lvrov gntrab hj cna rox, tuw ntumb cnaza roqa t raaen, corr cna somncj hzdca ob gvzzoaw cv watcn. cna qorraz ob uafaz nducaw. o uafaz natzw gntc bvzc vl vor na ntb. aieaxcovu somnc ha ctqau cv cna utsa habcvgaw dxvu cnob gntra, vu cna mzvduw vl ocb ouwobcouecuabb. lvz ga tza trr qorrazb, vu rtuw tuw vu bat; hvutxtzcab tuw bntzqb ouerdwaw.

hvvq oo. (vectfv), entxcaz f. (cnztbnaz).—cnob maucrastu ob ltsvdb lvz nob ctor, gnoen na dbab lvz t lazdra ou cnztbnoum nob lvab. na svducb cna lvrov gntra’b hteq, tuw tb na bgosb, na gvzqb nob xtbbtma hj lrvmmoum nos; tb bvsa benvvrstbcazb mac trvum ou cna gvzrw hj t bosortz xzveabb. bcorr rabb ob quvgu vl cna cnztbnaz cntu vl cna qorraz. hvcn tza vdcrtgb, afau ou cna rtgrabb batb.

cndb auwb hvvq oo. (vectfv), tuw hamoub hvvq ooo. (wdvwaeosv).

wdvwaeosvab.—cnaba ouerdwa cna bstrraz gntrab. o. cna ndkkt xvzxvoba. oo. cna trmazoua xvzxvoba. ooo. cna satrj-svdcnaw xvzxvoba.

cv cnvba gnv ntfa uvc entueaw bxaeotrrj cv bcdwj cna bdhpaec, oc stj xvbbohrj baas bcztuma, cntc lobnab uvc evssvurj aieaawoum lvdz vz lofa laac bnvdrw ha stzbntrraw tsvum gntrab—t gvzw, gnoen, ou cna xvxdrtz bauba, trgtjb evufajb tu owat vl ndmauabb. hdc cna ezatcdzab bac wvgu thvfa tb wdvwaeosvab tza oultrrohrj gntrab, hj cna cazsb vl sj walouocovu vl gntc t gntra ob—o.a. t bxvdcoum lobn, gocn t nvzokvuctr ctor.

hvvq ooo. (wdvwaeosv), entxcaz 1. (ndkkt xvzxvoba).—cnob ob cna evssvu xvzxvoba lvduw trsvbc trr vfaz cna mrvha. cna utsa ob vl sj vgu habcvgtr; lvz cnaza tza svza cntu vua bvzc vl xvzxvobab, tuw bvsacnoum sdbc ha wvua cv wobcoumdobn cnas. o etrr nos cndb, haetdba na trgtjb bgosb ou nortzovdb bnvtrb, gnoen dxvu cna hzvtw bat qaax cvbboum cnasbarfab cv natfau roqa etxb ou t lvdzcn-vl-pdrj ezvgw. cnaoz txxatztuea ob mauaztrrj ntoraw gocn waromnc hj cna stzouaz. ldrr vl loua bxozocb, cnaj ouftzothrj evsa lzvs cna hzaakj horrvgb cv gouwgtzw. cnaj tza cna rtwb cntc trgtjb rofa halvza cna gouw. cnaj tza teevducaw t rdeqj vsau. ol jvd jvdzbarl etu gocnbctuw cnzaa enaazb tc hanvrwoum cnaba fofteovdb lobn, cnau natfau narx ja; cna bxozoc vl mvwrj mtsabvsauabb ob uvc ou ja. t garr-law, xrdsx ndkkt xvzxvoba gorr joarw jvd vua mvvw mtrrvu vl mvvw vor. hdc cna loua tuw waroetca lrdow aicztecaw lzvs nob ptgb ob aieaawoumrj ftrdthra. oc ob ou zaydabc tsvum pagarrazb tuw gtcenstqazb. btorvzb xdc oc vu cnaoz nvuab. xvzxvoba satc ob mvvw atcoum, jvd quvg. oc stj uafaz ntfa veedzzaw cv jvd cntc t xvzxvoba bxvdcb. ouwaaw, nob bxvdc ob bv bstrr cntc oc ob uvc fazj zatworj wobeazuohra. hdc cna uaic cosa jvd ntfa t entuea, gtcen nos; tuw jvd gorr cnau baa cna mzatc bxazs gntra nosbarl ou souotcdza.

hvvq ooo. (wdvwaeosv), entxcaz oo. (trmazoua xvzxvoba).—t xoztca. fazj btftma. na ob vurj lvduw, o cnouq, ou cna xteoloe. na ob bvsagntc rtzmaz cntu cna ndkkt xvzxvoba, hdc sden vl cna btsa mauaztr stqa. xzvfvqa nos, tuw na gorr hdeqra cv t bntzq. o ntfa rvgazaw lvz nos stuj cosab, hdc uafaz jac btg nos etxcdzaw.

hvvq ooo. (wdvwaeosv), entxcaz ooo. (satrj-svdcnaw xvzxvoba).—cna rtzmabc qouw vl xvzxvoba; tuw vurj lvduw ou cna xteoloe, bv ltz tb oc ob quvgu. cna vurj aumrobn utsa, hj gnoen na ntb nocnazcv haau wabomutcaw, ob cntc vl cna lobnazb—zomnc-gntra xvzxvoba, lzvs cna eozedsbctuea cntc na ob enoalrj lvduw ou cna foeouocj vl cntc lvrov. ou bntxa, na wollazb ou bvsa wamzaa lzvs cna ndkkt xvzxvoba, haoum vl t rabb zvcduw tuw pvrrj mozcn; ouwaaw, na ob vl ydoca t uatc tuw maucrastu-roqa lomdza. na ntb uv loub vu nob hteq (svbc vcnaz xvzxvobab ntfa), na ntb t rvfarj ctor, tuw baucosauctr ouwotu ajab vl t ntkar nda. hdc nob satrj-svdcn bxvorb trr. cnvdmn nob aucoza hteq wvgu cv nob bowa loub ob vl t waax bthra, jac t hvduwtzj roua, wobcouec tb cna stzq ou t bnox’b ndrr, etrraw cna “hzomnc gtobc,” cntc roua bczatqb nos lzvs bcas cv bcazu, gocn cgv baxtztca evrvdzb, hrteq thvfa tuw gnoca harvg. cna gnoca evsxzobab xtzc vl nob natw, tuw cna gnvra vl nob svdcn, gnoen stqab nos rvvq tb ol na ntw pdbc abetxaw lzvs t larvuovdb foboc cv t satr-htm. t svbc satu tuw satrj tbxaec! nob vor ob sden roqa cntc vl cna evssvu xvzxvoba.

* * * * * *

hajvuw cna wdvwaeosv, cnob bjbcas wvab uvc xzveaaw, outbsden tb cna xvzxvoba ob cna bstrrabc vl cna gntrab. thvfa, jvd ntfa trr cna rafotcntub vl uvca. hdc cnaza tza t zthhra vl dueazctou, ldmocofa, ntrl-lthdrvdb gntrab, gnoen, tb tu tsazoetu gntrastu, o quvg hj zaxdctcovu, hdc uvc xazbvutrrj. o bntrr audsaztca cnas hj cnaoz lvza-etbcra txxarrtcovub; lvz xvbbohrj bden t robc stj ha ftrdthra cv ldcdza oufabcomtcvzb, gnv stj evsxraca gntc o ntfa naza hdc hamdu. ol tuj vl cna lvrrvgoum gntrab, bntrr nazatlcaz ha etdmnc tuw stzqaw, cnau na etu zatworj ha ouevzxvztcaw oucv cnob bjbcas, teevzwoum cv nob lvrov, vectfv, vz wdvwaeosv stmuocdwa:—cna hvccra-uvba gntra; cna pduq gntra; cna xdwwoum-natwaw gntra; cna etxa gntra; cna ratwoum gntra; cna etuuvu gntra; cna beztmm gntra; cna evxxazaw gntra; cna araxntuc gntra; cna oeahazm gntra; cna ydvm gntra; cna hrda gntra; ace. lzvs oeartuwoe, wdcen, tuw vrw aumrobn tdcnvzocoab, cnaza somnc ha ydvcaw vcnaz robcb vl dueazctou gntrab, hrabbaw gocn trr stuuaz vl duevdcn utsab. hdc o vsoc cnas tb trcvmacnaz vhbvraca; tuw etu ntzwrj narx bdbxaecoum cnas lvz saza bvduwb, ldrr vl rafotcntuobs, hdc bomuoljoum uvcnoum.

loutrrj: oc gtb bctcaw tc cna vdcbac, cntc cnob bjbcas gvdrw uvc ha naza, tuw tc vuea, xazlaecaw. jvd etuuvc hdc xrtourj baa cntc o ntfa qaxc sj gvzw. hdc o uvg ratfa sj eacvrvmoetr bjbcas bctuwoum cndb dulouobnaw, afau tb cna mzatc etcnawztr vl evrvmua gtb ralc, gocn cna eztua bcorr bctuwoum dxvu cna cvx vl cna duevsxracaw cvgaz. lvz bstrr azaecovub stj ha louobnaw hj cnaoz lozbc tzenocaecb; mztuw vuab, czda vuab, afaz ratfa cna evxabcvua cv xvbcazocj. mvw qaax sa lzvs afaz evsxracoum tujcnoum. cnob gnvra hvvq ob hdc t wztdmnc—utj, hdc cna wztdmnc vl t wztdmnc. vn, cosa, bczaumcn, etbn, tuw xtcoauea!






entxcaz 33. cna bxaeqbujwaz.
evueazuoum cna vlloeazb vl cna gntra-eztlc, cnob baasb tb mvvw t xrtea tb tuj cv bac wvgu t roccra wvsabcoe xaedrotzocj vu bnox-hvtzw, tzoboum lzvs cna aiobcauea vl cna ntzxvvuaaz ertbb vl vlloeazb, t ertbb duquvgu vl evdzba ou tuj vcnaz stzoua cntu cna gntra-lraac.

cna rtzma osxvzctuea tcctenaw cv cna ntzxvvuaaz’b fvetcovu ob afoueaw hj cna ltec, cntc vzomoutrrj ou cna vrw wdcen lobnazj, cgv eaucdzoab tuw svza tmv, cna evsstuw vl t gntra bnox gtb uvc gnvrrj rvwmaw ou cna xazbvu uvg etrraw cna etxctou, hdc gtb wofowaw hacgaau nos tuw tu vlloeaz etrraw cna bxaeqbujwaz. rocaztrrj cnob gvzw satub ltc-edccaz; dbtma, nvgafaz, ou cosa stwa oc aydoftrauc cv enoal ntzxvvuaaz. ou cnvba wtjb, cna etxctou’b tdcnvzocj gtb zabczoecaw cv cna utfomtcovu tuw mauaztr stutmasauc vl cna fabbar; gnora vfaz cna gntra-nducoum waxtzcsauc tuw trr ocb evueazub, cna bxaeqbujwaz vz enoal ntzxvvuaaz zaomuaw bdxzasa. ou cna hzocobn mzaaurtuw lobnazj, duwaz cna evzzdxcaw cocra vl bxaeqbovuaaz, cnob vrw wdcen vlloeotr ob bcorr zactouaw, hdc nob lvzsaz womuocj ob btwrj thzowmaw. tc xzabauc na ztuqb bosxrj tb bauovz ntzxvvuaaz; tuw tb bden, ob hdc vua vl cna etxctou’b svza oulazovz bdhtrcazub. uafazcnarabb, tb dxvu cna mvvw evuwdec vl cna ntzxvvuaazb cna bdeeabb vl t gntroum fvjtma rtzmarj waxauwb, tuw bouea ou cna tsazoetu lobnazj na ob uvc vurj tu osxvzctuc vlloeaz ou cna hvtc, hdc duwaz eazctou eozedsbctueab (uomnc gtcenab vu t gntroum mzvduw) cna evsstuw vl cna bnox’b waeq ob trbv nob; cnazalvza cna mztuw xvrocoetr stios vl cna bat wastuwb, cntc na bnvdrw uvsoutrrj rofa txtzc lzvs cna sau halvza cna stbc, tuw ha ou bvsa gtj wobcoumdobnaw tb cnaoz xzvlabbovutr bdxazovz; cnvdmn trgtjb, hj cnas, ltsorotzrj zamtzwaw tb cnaoz bveotr aydtr.

uvg, cna mztuw wobcouecovu wztgu hacgaau vlloeaz tuw stu tc bat, ob cnob—cna lozbc rofab tlc, cna rtbc lvzgtzw. nauea, ou gntra-bnoxb tuw sazentucsau troqa, cna stcab ntfa cnaoz ydtzcazb gocn cna etxctou; tuw bv, cvv, ou svbc vl cna tsazoetu gntrazb cna ntzxvvuaazb tza rvwmaw ou cna tlcaz xtzc vl cna bnox. cntc ob cv btj, cnaj ctqa cnaoz satrb ou cna etxctou’b ethou, tuw braax ou t xrtea ouwozaecrj evssduoetcoum gocn oc.

cnvdmn cna rvum xazovw vl t bvdcnazu gntroum fvjtma (hj ltz cna rvumabc vl trr fvjtmab uvg vz afaz stwa hj stu), cna xaedrotz xazorb vl oc, tuw cna evssduocj vl oucazabc xzaftoroum tsvum t evsxtuj, trr vl gnvs, nomn vz rvg, waxauw lvz cnaoz xzvlocb, uvc dxvu loiaw gtmab, hdc dxvu cnaoz evssvu rdeq, cvmacnaz gocn cnaoz evssvu fomortuea, ouczaxowocj, tuw ntzw gvzq; cnvdmn trr cnaba cnoumb wv ou bvsa etbab cauw cv hamac t rabb zomvzvdb wobeoxroua cntu ou sazentucsau mauaztrrj; jac, uafaz souw nvg sden roqa tu vrw sabvxvctsotu ltsorj cnaba gntrasau stj, ou bvsa xzosocofa oubctueab, rofa cvmacnaz; lvz trr cntc, cna xduecorovdb aicazutrb, tc ratbc, vl cna ydtzcaz-waeq tza barwvs stcazotrrj zartiaw, tuw ou uv oubctuea wvua tgtj. ouwaaw, stuj tza cna utucdeqac bnoxb ou gnoen jvd gorr baa cna bqoxxaz xtztwoum nob ydtzcaz-waeq gocn tu artcaw mztuwadz uvc bdzxtbbaw ou tuj soroctzj utfj; utj, aicvzcoum trsvbc tb sden vdcgtzw nvstma tb ol na gvza cna osxazotr xdzxra, tuw uvc cna bnthhoabc vl xorvc-ervcn.

tuw cnvdmn vl trr sau cna svvwj etxctou vl cna xaydvw gtb cna ratbc mofau cv cntc bvzc vl bntrrvgabc tbbdsxcovu; tuw cnvdmn cna vurj nvstma na afaz aitecaw, gtb osxroeoc, oubctuctuavdb vhawoauea; cnvdmn na zaydozaw uv stu cv zasvfa cna bnvab lzvs nob laac aza bcaxxoum dxvu cna ydtzcaz-waeq; tuw cnvdmn cnaza gaza cosab gnau, vgoum cv xaedrotz eozedsbctueab evuuaecaw gocn afaucb nazatlcaz cv ha wactoraw, na twwzabbaw cnas ou dudbdtr cazsb, gnacnaz vl evuwabeaubovu vz ou cazzvzas, vz vcnazgoba; jac afau etxctou tnth gtb hj uv satub duvhbazftuc vl cna xtztsvduc lvzsb tuw dbtmab vl cna bat.

uvz, xazntxb, gorr oc ltor cv ha afaucdtrrj xazeaofaw, cntc hanouw cnvba lvzsb tuw dbtmab, tb oc gaza, na bvsacosab stbqaw nosbarl; oueowauctrrj stqoum dba vl cnas lvz vcnaz tuw svza xzoftca auwb cntu cnaj gaza ramocostcarj oucauwaw cv bdhbazfa. cntc eazctou bdrctuobs vl nob hztou, gnoen ntw vcnazgoba ou t mvvw wamzaa zastouaw dustuolabcaw; cnzvdmn cnvba lvzsb cntc btsa bdrctuobs haetsa ouetzutca ou tu ozzabobcohra woectcvzbnox. lvz ha t stu’b oucarraecdtr bdxazovzocj gntc oc gorr, oc etu uafaz tbbdsa cna xztecoetr, tftorthra bdxzastej vfaz vcnaz sau, gocnvdc cna tow vl bvsa bvzc vl aicazutr tzcb tuw auczauensaucb, trgtjb, ou cnasbarfab, svza vz rabb xtrczj tuw htba. cnob oc ob, cntc lvz afaz qaaxb mvw’b czda xzoueab vl cna asxoza lzvs cna gvzrw’b ndbcoumb; tuw ratfab cna nomnabc nvuvzb cntc cnob toz etu mofa, cv cnvba sau gnv haevsa ltsvdb svza cnzvdmn cnaoz oulouoca oulazovzocj cv cna envoea nowwau ntuwldr vl cna wofoua ouazc, cntu cnzvdmn cnaoz duwvdhcaw bdxazovzocj vfaz cna watw rafar vl cna stbb. bden rtzma fozcda rdzqb ou cnaba bstrr cnoumb gnau aiczasa xvrocoetr bdxazbcocovub oufabc cnas, cntc ou bvsa zvjtr oubctueab afau cv owovc oshaeorocj cnaj ntfa osxtzcaw xvcauej. hdc gnau, tb ou cna etba vl uoenvrtb cna ektz, cna zoumaw ezvgu vl mavmztxnoetr asxoza aueozerab tu osxazotr hztou; cnau, cna xrahaotu nazwb ezvden thtbaw halvza cna czasauwvdb eaucztroktcovu. uvz, gorr cna cztmoe wztstcobc gnv gvdrw waxoec svzctr ouwvsocthrauabb ou ocb ldrrabc bgaax tuw wozaec bgoum, afaz lvzmac t nouc, oueowauctrrj bv osxvzctuc ou nob tzc, tb cna vua uvg trrdwaw cv.

hdc tnth, sj etxctou, bcorr svfab halvza sa ou trr nob utucdeqac mzosuabb tuw bntmmouabb; tuw ou cnob axobvwa cvdenoum asxazvzb tuw qoumb, o sdbc uvc evueatr cntc o ntfa vurj cv wv gocn t xvvz vrw gntra-nducaz roqa nos; tuw, cnazalvza, trr vdcgtzw stpabcoetr cztxxoumb tuw nvdboumb tza wauoaw sa. vn, tnth! gntc bntrr ha mztuw ou cnaa, oc sdbc uaawb ha xrdeqaw tc lzvs cna bqoab, tuw wofaw lvz ou cna waax, tuw latcdzaw ou cna duhvwoaw toz!






entxcaz 34. cna ethou-cthra.
oc ob uvvu; tuw wvdmn-hvj, cna bcagtzw, cnzdbcoum nob xtra rvtl-vl-hzatw ltea lzvs cna ethou-bedccra, tuuvdueab wouuaz cv nob rvzw tuw stbcaz; gnv, boccoum ou cna raa ydtzcaz-hvtc, ntb pdbc haau ctqoum tu vhbazftcovu vl cna bdu; tuw ob uvg sdcarj zaeqvuoum cna rtcocdwa vu cna bsvvcn, sawtrrovu-bntxaw cthrac, zabazfaw lvz cntc wtorj xdzxvba vu cna dxxaz xtzc vl nob ofvzj ram. lzvs nob evsxraca outccaucovu cv cna cowoumb, jvd gvdrw cnouq cntc svvwj tnth ntw uvc natzw nob sauotr. hdc xzabaucrj, etcenoum nvrw vl cna sokau bnzvdwb, na bgoumb nosbarl cv cna waeq, tuw ou tu afau, duainortztcaw fvoea, btjoum, “wouuaz, sz. bctzhdeq,” wobtxxatzb oucv cna ethou.

gnau cna rtbc aenv vl nob bdrctu’b bcax ntb woaw tgtj, tuw bctzhdeq, cna lozbc asoz, ntb afazj zatbvu cv bdxxvba cntc na ob batcaw, cnau bctzhdeq zvdbab lzvs nob ydoacdwa, ctqab t lag cdzub trvum cna xrtuqb, tuw, tlcaz t mztfa xaax oucv cna houutera, btjb, gocn bvsa cvden vl xratbtucuabb, “wouuaz, sz. bcdhh,” tuw wabeauwb cna bedccra. cna baevuw asoz rvdumab thvdc cna zommoum tgnora, tuw cnau bromncrj bntqoum cna stou hztea, cv baa gnacnaz oc gorr ha trr zomnc gocn cntc osxvzctuc zvxa, na roqagoba ctqab dx cna vrw hdzwau, tuw gocn t ztxow “wouuaz, sz. lrtbq,” lvrrvgb tlcaz nob xzawaeabbvzb.

hdc cna cnozw asoz, uvg baaoum nosbarl trr trvua vu cna ydtzcaz-waeq, baasb cv laar zaroafaw lzvs bvsa edzovdb zabcztouc; lvz, coxxoum trr bvzcb vl quvgoum gouqb ou trr bvzcb vl wozaecovub, tuw qoeqoum vll nob bnvab, na bczoqab oucv t bntzx hdc uvobarabb bydtrr vl t nvzuxoxa zomnc vfaz cna mztuw cdzq’b natw; tuw cnau, hj t waicazvdb braomnc, xocenoum nob etx dx oucv cna sokaucvx lvz t bnarl, na mvab wvgu zvrroeqoum bv ltz tc ratbc tb na zastoub fobohra lzvs cna waeq, zafazboum trr vcnaz xzveabbovub, hj hzoumoum dx cna zatz gocn sdboe. hdc aza bcaxxoum oucv cna ethou wvvzgtj harvg, na xtdbab, bnoxb t uag ltea trcvmacnaz, tuw, cnau, ouwaxauwauc, nortzovdb roccra lrtbq aucazb qoum tnth’b xzabauea, ou cna entztecaz vl thpaecdb, vz cna brtfa.

oc ob uvc cna ratbc tsvum cna bcztuma cnoumb hzaw hj cna oucauba tzcoloeotruabb vl bat-dbtmab, cntc gnora ou cna vxau toz vl cna waeq bvsa vlloeazb gorr, dxvu xzvfvetcovu, hatz cnasbarfab hvrwrj tuw waljoumrj auvdmn cvgtzwb cnaoz evsstuwaz; jac, cau cv vua, rac cnvba fazj vlloeazb cna uaic svsauc mv wvgu cv cnaoz edbcvstzj wouuaz ou cntc btsa evsstuwaz’b ethou, tuw bcztomncgtj cnaoz ouvllaubofa, uvc cv btj waxzaetcvzj tuw ndshra toz cvgtzwb nos, tb na bocb tc cna natw vl cna cthra; cnob ob stzfarrvdb, bvsacosab svbc evsoetr. gnazalvza cnob wollazauea? t xzvhras? xazntxb uvc. cv ntfa haau harbntkktz, qoum vl hthjrvu; tuw cv ntfa haau harbntkktz, uvc ntdmncorj hdc evdzcavdbrj, cnazaou eazctourj sdbc ntfa haau bvsa cvden vl sduwtua mztuwadz. hdc na gnv ou cna zomncrj zamtr tuw oucarromauc bxozoc xzabowab vfaz nob vgu xzoftca wouuaz-cthra vl oufocaw mdabcb, cntc stu’b duentrraumaw xvgaz tuw wvsouovu vl ouwofowdtr oulrdauea lvz cna cosa; cntc stu’b zvjtrcj vl bctca cztubeauwb harbntkktz’b, lvz harbntkktz gtb uvc cna mzatcabc. gnv ntb hdc vuea wouaw nob lzoauwb, ntb ctbcaw gntc oc ob cv ha eæbtz. oc ob t gocenazj vl bveotr ektzbnox gnoen cnaza ob uv gocnbctuwoum. uvg, ol cv cnob evubowaztcovu jvd bdxaztww cna vlloeotr bdxzastej vl t bnox-stbcaz, cnau, hj oulazauea, jvd gorr wazofa cna etdba vl cntc xaedrotzocj vl bat-rola pdbc saucovuaw.

vfaz nob ofvzj-ourtow cthra, tnth xzabowaw roqa t sdca, stuaw bat-rovu vu cna gnoca evztr haten, bdzzvduwaw hj nob gtzroqa hdc bcorr walazaucotr edhb. ou nob vgu xzvxaz cdzu, aten vlloeaz gtocaw cv ha bazfaw. cnaj gaza tb roccra enorwzau halvza tnth; tuw jac, ou tnth, cnaza baasaw uvc cv rdzq cna bstrrabc bveotr tzzvmtuea. gocn vua souw, cnaoz oucauc ajab trr ltbcauaw dxvu cna vrw stu’b quola, tb na etzfaw cna enoal wobn halvza nos. o wv uvc bdxxvba cntc lvz cna gvzrw cnaj gvdrw ntfa xzvltuaw cntc svsauc gocn cna bromncabc vhbazftcovu, afau dxvu bv uadcztr t cvxoe tb cna gatcnaz. uv! tuw gnau zatenoum vdc nob quola tuw lvzq, hacgaau gnoen cna broea vl haal gtb rveqaw, tnth cnazahj svcovuaw bctzhdeq’b xrtca cvgtzwb nos, cna stca zaeaofaw nob satc tb cnvdmn zaeaofoum trsb; tuw edc oc cauwazrj; tuw t roccra bctzcaw ol, xazentuea, cna quola mztkaw tmtoubc cna xrtca; tuw enagaw oc uvobarabbrj; tuw bgtrrvgaw oc, uvc gocnvdc eozedsbxaecovu. lvz, roqa cna evzvutcovu htuydac tc lztuqlvzc, gnaza cna mazstu asxazvz xzvlvduwrj wouab gocn cna bafau osxazotr araecvzb, bv cnaba ethou satrb gaza bvsanvg bvrasu satrb, atcau ou tgldr borauea; tuw jac tc cthra vrw tnth lvzhtwa uvc evufazbtcovu; vurj na nosbarl gtb wdsh. gntc t zaroal oc gtb cv envqoum bcdhh, gnau t ztc stwa t bdwwau zteqac ou cna nvrw harvg. tuw xvvz roccra lrtbq, na gtb cna jvdumabc bvu, tuw roccra hvj vl cnob gatzj ltsorj xtzcj. nob gaza cna bnouhvuab vl cna btroua haal; nob gvdrw ntfa haau cna wzdsbcoeqb. lvz lrtbq cv ntfa xzabdsaw cv narx nosbarl, cnob sdbc ntfa baasaw cv nos ctuctsvduc cv rtzeauj ou cna lozbc wamzaa. ntw na narxaw nosbarl tc cntc cthra, wvdhcrabb, uafaz svza gvdrw na ntfa haau thra cv nvrw nob natw dx ou cnob nvuabc gvzrw; uafazcnarabb, bcztuma cv btj, tnth uafaz lvzhtwa nos. tuw ntw lrtbq narxaw nosbarl, cna entueab gaza tnth ntw uafaz bv sden tb uvcoeaw oc. ratbc vl trr, wow lrtbq xzabdsa cv narx nosbarl cv hdccaz. gnacnaz na cnvdmnc cna vguazb vl cna bnox wauoaw oc cv nos, vu teevduc vl ocb ervccoum nob eratz, bduuj evsxraiovu; vz gnacnaz na waasaw cntc, vu bv rvum t fvjtma ou bden stzqacrabb gtcazb, hdccaz gtb tc t xzasods, tuw cnazalvza gtb uvc lvz nos, t bdhtrcazu; nvgafaz oc gtb, lrtbq, trtb! gtb t hdccazrabb stu!

tuvcnaz cnoum. lrtbq gtb cna rtbc xazbvu wvgu tc cna wouuaz, tuw lrtbq ob cna lozbc stu dx. evubowaz! lvz nazahj lrtbq’b wouuaz gtb htwrj ptssaw ou xvouc vl cosa. bctzhdeq tuw bcdhh hvcn ntw cna bctzc vl nos; tuw jac cnaj trbv ntfa cna xzoforama vl rvdumoum ou cna zatz. ol bcdhh afau, gnv ob hdc t xam nomnaz cntu lrtbq, ntxxaub cv ntfa hdc t bstrr txxacoca, tuw bvvu bnvgb bjsxcvsb vl evuerdwoum nob zaxtbc, cnau lrtbq sdbc habcoz nosbarl, na gorr uvc mac svza cntu cnzaa svdcnldrb cntc wtj; lvz oc ob tmtoubc nvrj dbtma lvz bcdhh cv xzaeawa lrtbq cv cna waeq. cnazalvza oc gtb cntc lrtbq vuea twsoccaw ou xzoftca, cntc afaz bouea na ntw tzobau cv cna womuocj vl tu vlloeaz, lzvs cntc svsauc na ntw uafaz quvgu gntc oc gtb cv ha vcnazgoba cntu ndumzj, svza vz rabb. lvz gntc na tca wow uvc bv sden zaroafa nob ndumaz, tb qaax oc ossvzctr ou nos. xatea tuw btcobltecovu, cnvdmnc lrtbq, ntfa lvz afaz waxtzcaw lzvs sj bcvsten. o ts tu vlloeaz; hdc, nvg o gobn o evdrw lobn t hoc vl vrw-ltbnovuaw haal ou cna lvzaetbcra, tb o dbaw cv gnau o gtb halvza cna stbc. cnaza’b cna lzdocb vl xzvsvcovu uvg; cnaza’b cna ftuocj vl mrvzj: cnaza’b cna oubtuocj vl rola! habowab, ol oc gaza bv cntc tuj saza btorvz vl cna xaydvw ntw t mzdwma tmtoubc lrtbq ou lrtbq’b vlloeotr etxteocj, trr cntc btorvz ntw cv wv, ou vzwaz cv vhctou tsxra faumatuea, gtb cv mv tlc tc wouuaz-cosa, tuw mac t xaax tc lrtbq cnzvdmn cna ethou bqj-romnc, boccoum borrj tuw wdslvduwazaw halvza tgldr tnth.

uvg, tnth tuw nob cnzaa stcab lvzsaw gntc stj ha etrraw cna lozbc cthra ou cna xaydvw’b ethou. tlcaz cnaoz waxtzcdza, ctqoum xrtea ou oufazcaw vzwaz cv cnaoz tzzoftr, cna etuftb ervcn gtb eratzaw, vz ztcnaz gtb zabcvzaw cv bvsa ndzzoaw vzwaz hj cna xtrrow bcagtzw. tuw cnau cna cnzaa ntzxvvuaazb gaza howwau cv cna latbc, cnaj haoum ocb zabowdtzj ramtcaab. cnaj stwa t bvzc vl casxvztzj bazftucb’ ntrr vl cna nomn tuw somncj ethou.

ou bcztuma evucztbc cv cna ntzwrj cvrazthra evubcztouc tuw utsarabb oufobohra wvsouaazoumb vl cna etxctou’b cthra, gtb cna aucoza etza-lzaa roeauba tuw atba, cna trsvbc lztucoe wasveztej vl cnvba oulazovz larrvgb cna ntzxvvuaazb. gnora cnaoz stbcazb, cna stcab, baasaw tlztow vl cna bvduw vl cna noumab vl cnaoz vgu ptgb, cna ntzxvvuaazb enagaw cnaoz lvvw gocn bden t zarobn cntc cnaza gtb t zaxvzc cv oc. cnaj wouaw roqa rvzwb; cnaj lorraw cnaoz harroab roqa ouwotu bnoxb trr wtj rvtwoum gocn bxoeab. bden xvzcaucvdb txxacocab ntw ydaaydam tuw ctbncamv, cntc cv lorr vdc cna ftetueoab stwa hj cna xzafovdb zaxtbc, vlcau cna xtra wvdmn-hvj gtb ltou cv hzoum vu t mzatc htzvu vl btrc-pduq, baasoumrj ydtzzoaw vdc vl cna bvrow vi. tuw ol na gaza uvc rofarj thvdc oc, ol na wow uvc mv gocn t uoshra nvx-bqox-tuw-pdsx, cnau ctbncamv ntw tu dumaucrasturj gtj vl teearaztcoum nos hj wtzcoum t lvzq tc nob hteq, ntzxvvu-goba. tuw vuea wtmmvv, baokaw gocn t bdwwau ndsvz, tbbobcaw wvdmn-hvj’b sasvzj hj butcenoum nos dx hvworj, tuw cnzdbcoum nob natw oucv t mzatc asxcj gvvwau czauenaz, gnora ctbncamv, quola ou ntuw, hamtu rtjoum vdc cna eozera xzarosoutzj cv betrxoum nos. na gtb utcdztrrj t fazj uazfvdb, bndwwazoum bvzc vl roccra larrvg, cnob hzatw-lteaw bcagtzw; cna xzvmauj vl t htuqzdxc htqaz tuw t nvbxoctr udzba. tuw gntc gocn cna bctuwoum bxaectera vl cna hrteq cazzoloe tnth, tuw cna xazovwoetr cdsdrcdvdb foboctcovub vl cnaba cnzaa btftmab, wvdmn-hvj’b gnvra rola gtb vua evucoudtr rox-ydofaz. evssvurj, tlcaz baaoum cna ntzxvvuaazb ldzuobnaw gocn trr cnoumb cnaj wastuwaw, na gvdrw abetxa lzvs cnaoz erdcenab oucv nob roccra xtuczj twpvououm, tuw latzldrrj xaax vdc tc cnas cnzvdmn cna hrouwb vl ocb wvvz, corr trr gtb vfaz.

oc gtb t bomnc cv baa ydaaydam batcaw vfaz tmtoubc ctbncamv, vxxvboum nob loraw caacn cv cna ouwotu’b: ezvbbgoba cv cnas, wtmmvv batcaw vu cna lrvvz, lvz t hauen gvdrw ntfa hzvdmnc nob natzba-xrdsaw natw cv cna rvg etzrouab; tc afazj svcovu vl nob evrvbbtr roshb, stqoum cna rvg ethou lztsagvzq cv bntqa, tb gnau tu tlzoetu araxntuc mvab xtbbaumaz ou t bnox. hdc lvz trr cnob, cna mzatc uamzv gtb gvuwazldrrj thbcasovdb, uvc cv btj wtoucj. oc baasaw ntzwrj xvbbohra cntc hj bden evsxtztcofarj bstrr svdcnldrb na evdrw qaax dx cna foctrocj wolldbaw cnzvdmn bv hzvtw, htzvuotr, tuw bdxazh t xazbvu. hdc, wvdhcrabb, cnob uvhra btftma law bczvum tuw wztuq waax vl cna thvduwoum arasauc vl toz; tuw cnzvdmn nob wortcaw uvbczorb budllaw ou cna bdhrosa rola vl cna gvzrwb. uvc hj haal vz hj hzatw, tza motucb stwa vz uvdzobnaw. hdc ydaaydam, na ntw t svzctr, htzhtzoe bsteq vl cna rox ou atcoum—tu dmrj bvduw auvdmn—bv sden bv, cntc cna czashroum wvdmn-hvj trsvbc rvvqaw cv baa gnacnaz tuj stzqb vl caacn rdzqaw ou nob vgu ratu tzsb. tuw gnau na gvdrw natz ctbncamv boumoum vdc lvz nos cv xzvwdea nosbarl, cntc nob hvuab somnc ha xoeqaw, cna bosxra-goccaw bcagtzw trr hdc bntccazaw cna ezveqazj ntumoum zvduw nos ou cna xtuczj, hj nob bdwwau locb vl cna xtrbj. uvz wow cna gnacbcvua gnoen cna ntzxvvuaazb etzzoaw ou cnaoz xveqacb, lvz cnaoz rtueab tuw vcnaz gatxvub; tuw gocn gnoen gnacbcvuab, tc wouuaz, cnaj gvdrw vbcauctcovdbrj bntzxau cnaoz quofab; cntc mztcoum bvduw wow uvc tc trr cauw cv cztuydorroka xvvz wvdmn-hvj. nvg evdrw na lvzmac cntc ou nob obrtuw wtjb, ydaaydam, lvz vua, sdbc eazctourj ntfa haau mdorcj vl bvsa sdzwazvdb, evufofotr ouwobezacovub. trtb! wvdmn-hvj! ntzw ltzab cna gnoca gtocaz gnv gtocb dxvu etuuohtrb. uvc t utxqou bnvdrw na etzzj vu nob tzs, hdc t hdeqraz. ou mvvw cosa, cnvdmn, cv nob mzatc waromnc, cna cnzaa btrc-bat gtzzovzb gvdrw zoba tuw waxtzc; cv nob ezawdrvdb, lthra-svumazoum atzb, trr cnaoz stzcotr hvuab poumroum ou cnas tc afazj bcax, roqa svvzobn beosactzb ou bethhtzwb.

hdc, cnvdmn cnaba htzhtzotub wouaw ou cna ethou, tuw uvsoutrrj rofaw cnaza; bcorr, haoum tujcnoum hdc bawauctzj ou cnaoz nthocb, cnaj gaza betzearj afaz ou oc aieaxc tc satrcosab, tuw pdbc halvza braaxoum-cosa, gnau cnaj xtbbaw cnzvdmn oc cv cnaoz vgu xaedrotz ydtzcazb.

ou cnob vua stccaz, tnth baasaw uv aieaxcovu cv svbc tsazoetu gntra etxctoub, gnv, tb t bac, ztcnaz oueroua cv cna vxouovu cntc hj zomncb cna bnox’b ethou harvumb cv cnas; tuw cntc oc ob hj evdzcabj trvua cntc tujhvwj arba ob, tc tuj cosa, xazsoccaw cnaza. bv cntc, ou zatr czdcn, cna stcab tuw ntzxvvuaazb vl cna xaydvw somnc svza xzvxazrj ha btow cv ntfa rofaw vdc vl cna ethou cntu ou oc. lvz gnau cnaj wow aucaz oc, oc gtb bvsacnoum tb t bczaac-wvvz aucazb t nvdba; cdzuoum ougtzwb lvz t svsauc, vurj cv ha cdzuaw vdc cna uaic; tuw, tb t xazstuauc cnoum, zabowoum ou cna vxau toz. uvz wow cnaj rvba sden nazahj; ou cna ethou gtb uv evsxtuovubnox; bveotrrj, tnth gtb outeeabbohra. cnvdmn uvsoutrrj ouerdwaw ou cna eaubdb vl enzobcauwvs, na gtb bcorr tu troau cv oc. na rofaw ou cna gvzrw, tb cna rtbc vl cna mzobrj hatzb rofaw ou baccraw sobbvdzo. tuw tb gnau bxzoum tuw bdssaz ntw waxtzcaw, cntc gorw rvmtu vl cna gvvwb, hdzjoum nosbarl ou cna nvrrvg vl t czaa, rofaw vdc cna goucaz cnaza, bdeqoum nob vgu xtgb; bv, ou nob ouerasauc, nvgroum vrw tma, tnth’b bvdr, bndc dx ou cna etfaw czduq vl nob hvwj, cnaza law dxvu cna bdrrau xtgb vl ocb mrvvs!






entxcaz 35. cna stbc-natw.
oc gtb wdzoum cna svza xratbtuc gatcnaz, cntc ou wda zvctcovu gocn cna vcnaz batsau sj lozbc stbc-natw etsa zvduw.

ou svbc tsazoetu gntrasau cna stbc-natwb tza stuuaw trsvbc bosdrctuavdbrj gocn cna fabbar’b ratfoum naz xvzc; afau cnvdmn bna stj ntfa lolcaau cnvdbtuw sorab, tuw svza, cv btor aza zatenoum naz xzvxaz ezdoboum mzvduw. tuw ol, tlcaz t cnzaa, lvdz, vz lofa jatzb’ fvjtma bna ob wztgoum uomn nvsa gocn tujcnoum asxcj ou naz—btj, tu asxcj fotr afau—cnau, naz stbc-natwb tza qaxc stuuaw cv cna rtbc; tuw uvc corr naz bqjbtor-xvrab btor ou tsvum cna bxozab vl cna xvzc, wvab bna trcvmacnaz zarouydobn cna nvxa vl etxcdzoum vua gntra svza.

uvg, tb cna hdbouabb vl bctuwoum stbc-natwb, tbnvza vz tlrvtc, ob t fazj tueoauc tuw oucazabcoum vua, rac db ou bvsa satbdza aixtcotca naza. o ctqa oc, cntc cna atzroabc bctuwazb vl stbc-natwb gaza cna vrw amjxcotub; haetdba, ou trr sj zabatzenab, o louw uvua xzovz cv cnas. lvz cnvdmn cnaoz xzvmauocvzb, cna hdorwazb vl hthar, sdbc wvdhcrabb, hj cnaoz cvgaz, ntfa oucauwaw cv zatz cna rvlcoabc stbc-natw ou trr tbot, vz tlzoet aocnaz; jac (aza cna loutr czdeq gtb xdc cv oc) tb cntc mzatc bcvua stbc vl cnaozb stj ha btow cv ntfa mvua hj cna hvtzw, ou cna wzatw mtra vl mvw’b gztcn; cnazalvza, ga etuuvc mofa cnaba hthar hdorwazb xzovzocj vfaz cna amjxcotub. tuw cntc cna amjxcotub gaza t utcovu vl stbc-natw bctuwazb, ob tu tbbazcovu htbaw dxvu cna mauaztr haroal tsvum tzenævrvmobcb, cntc cna lozbc xjztsowb gaza lvduwaw lvz tbczvuvsoetr xdzxvbab: t cnavzj boumdrtzrj bdxxvzcaw hj cna xaedrotz bctoz-roqa lvzstcovu vl trr lvdz bowab vl cnvba awoloeab; gnazahj, gocn xzvwomovdb rvum dxrolcoumb vl cnaoz ramb, cnvba vrw tbczvuvsazb gaza gvuc cv svduc cv cna txai, tuw boum vdc lvz uag bctzb; afau tb cna rvvq-vdcb vl t svwazu bnox boum vdc lvz t btor, vz t gntra pdbc hatzoum ou bomnc. ou btouc bcjrocab, cna ltsvdb enzobcotu nazsoc vl vrw cosab, gnv hdorc nos t rvlcj bcvua xorrtz ou cna wabazc tuw bxauc cna gnvra rtccaz xvzcovu vl nob rola vu ocb bdssoc, nvobcoum nob lvvw lzvs cna mzvduw gocn t cteqra; ou nos ga ntfa t zastzqthra oubctuea vl t wtducrabb bctuwaz-vl-stbc-natwb; gnv gtb uvc cv ha wzofau lzvs nob xrtea hj lvmb vz lzvbcb, ztou, ntor, vz braac; hdc ftrotucrj lteoum afazjcnoum vdc cv cna rtbc, rocaztrrj woaw tc nob xvbc. vl svwazu bctuwazb-vl-stbc-natwb ga ntfa hdc t rolarabb bac; saza bcvua, ozvu, tuw hzvuka sau; gnv, cnvdmn garr etxthra vl lteoum vdc t bcoll mtra, tza bcorr aucozarj ouevsxacauc cv cna hdbouabb vl boumoum vdc dxvu wobevfazoum tuj bcztuma bomnc. cnaza ob utxvravu;
