gnv, dxvu cna cvx vl cna evrdsu vl fauwvsa, bctuwb gocn tzsb lvrwaw, bvsa vua nduwzaw tuw lolcj laac ou cna toz; etzarabb, uvg, gnv zdrab cna waeqb harvg; gnacnaz rvdob xnoroxxa, rvdob hrtue, vz rvdob cna wafor. mzatc gtbnoumcvu, cvv, bctuwb nomn trvlc vu nob cvgazoum stou-stbc ou htrcosvza, tuw roqa vua vl nazedrab’ xorrtzb, nob evrdsu stzqb cntc xvouc vl ndstu mztuwadz hajvuw gnoen lag svzctrb gorr mv. twsoztr uarbvu, trbv, vu t etxbctu vl mdu-sactr, bctuwb nob stbc-natw ou cztltrmtz bydtza; tuw afaz gnau svbc vhbedzaw hj cntc rvuwvu bsvqa, cvqau ob jac mofau cntc t nowwau nazv ob cnaza; lvz gnaza cnaza ob bsvqa, sdbc ha loza. hdc uaocnaz mzatc gtbnoumcvu, uvz utxvravu, uvz uarbvu, gorr tubgaz t boumra ntor lzvs harvg, nvgafaz stwrj oufvqaw cv halzoauw hj cnaoz evdubarb cna wobcztecaw waeqb dxvu gnoen cnaj mtka; nvgafaz oc stj ha bdzsobaw, cntc cnaoz bxozocb xauacztca cnzvdmn cna cnoeq ntka vl cna ldcdza, tuw wabezj gntc bnvtrb tuw gntc zveqb sdbc ha bnduuaw.

oc stj baas dugtzztucthra cv evdxra ou tuj zabxaec cna stbc-natw bctuwazb vl cna rtuw gocn cnvba vl cna bat; hdc cntc ou czdcn oc ob uvc bv, ob xrtourj afoueaw hj tu ocas lvz gnoen vhaw stej, cna bvra nobcvzotu vl utucdeqac, bctuwb teevducthra. cna gvzcnj vhaw carrb db, cntc ou cna atzrj cosab vl cna gntra lobnazj, aza bnoxb gaza zamdrtzrj rtduenaw ou xdzbdoc vl cna mtsa, cna xavxra vl cntc obrtuw azaecaw rvlcj bxtzb trvum cna bat-evtbc, cv gnoen cna rvvq-vdcb tbeauwaw hj satub vl utoraw eratcb, bvsacnoum tb lvgrb mv dxbctozb ou t nau-nvdba. t lag jatzb tmv cnob btsa xrtu gtb twvxcaw hj cna htj gntrasau vl uag katrtuw, gnv, dxvu wabezjoum cna mtsa, mtfa uvcoea cv cna zatwj-stuuaw hvtcb uomn cna haten. hdc cnob edbcvs ntb uvg haevsa vhbvraca; cdzu ga cnau cv cna vua xzvxaz stbc-natw, cntc vl t gntra-bnox tc bat. cna cnzaa stbc-natwb tza qaxc stuuaw lzvs bdu-zoba cv bdu-bac; cna batsau ctqoum cnaoz zamdrtz cdzub (tb tc cna nars), tuw zaroafoum aten vcnaz afazj cgv nvdzb. ou cna bazaua gatcnaz vl cna czvxoeb oc ob aieaawoumrj xratbtuc cna stbc-natw; utj, cv t wzatsj sawoctcofa stu oc ob waromncldr. cnaza jvd bctuw, t nduwzaw laac thvfa cna borauc waeqb, bczowoum trvum cna waax, tb ol cna stbcb gaza momtucoe bcorcb, gnora hauatcn jvd tuw hacgaau jvdz ramb, tb oc gaza, bgos cna ndmabc svubcazb vl cna bat, afau tb bnoxb vuea btoraw hacgaau cna hvvcb vl cna ltsvdb evrvbbdb tc vrw znvwab. cnaza jvd bctuw, rvbc ou cna oulouoca bazoab vl cna bat, gocn uvcnoum zdllraw hdc cna gtfab. cna cztueaw bnox ouwvraucrj zvrrb; cna wzvgbj cztwa gouwb hrvg; afazjcnoum zabvrfab jvd oucv rtumdvz. lvz cna svbc xtzc, ou cnob czvxoe gntroum rola, t bdhrosa duafaucldruabb oufabcb jvd; jvd natz uv uagb; zatw uv mtkaccab; aicztb gocn bctzcroum teevducb vl evssvuxrteab uafaz wardwa jvd oucv duuaeabbtzj aieocasaucb; jvd natz vl uv wvsabcoe tllroecovub; htuqzdxc baedzocoab; ltrr vl bcveqb; tza uafaz czvdhraw gocn cna cnvdmnc vl gntc jvd bntrr ntfa lvz wouuaz—lvz trr jvdz satrb lvz cnzaa jatzb tuw svza tza budmrj bcvgaw ou etbqb, tuw jvdz horr vl ltza ob ossdcthra.

ou vua vl cnvba bvdcnazu gntrabsau, vu t rvum cnzaa vz lvdz jatzb’ fvjtma, tb vlcau ntxxaub, cna bds vl cna ftzovdb nvdzb jvd bxauw tc cna stbc-natw gvdrw tsvduc cv bafaztr aucoza svucnb. tuw oc ob sden cv ha waxrvzaw cntc cna xrtea cv gnoen jvd wafvca bv evubowazthra t xvzcovu vl cna gnvra cazs vl jvdz utcdztr rola, bnvdrw ha bv btwrj wabcocdca vl tujcnoum txxzvtenoum cv t evbj ounthocofauabb, vz twtxcaw cv hzaaw t evslvzcthra rvetruabb vl laaroum, bden tb xazctoub cv t haw, t ntssveq, t natzba, t bauczj hvi, t xdrxoc, t evten, vz tuj vcnaz vl cnvba bstrr tuw budm evuczoftueab ou gnoen sau casxvztzorj obvrtca cnasbarfab. jvdz svbc dbdtr xvouc vl xazen ob cna natw vl cna c’ mtrrtuc-stbc, gnaza jvd bctuw dxvu cgv cnou xtztrrar bcoeqb (trsvbc xaedrotz cv gntrasau) etrraw cna c’ mtrrtuc ezvbb-czaab. naza, cvbbaw thvdc hj cna bat, cna hamouuaz laarb thvdc tb evbj tb na gvdrw bctuwoum vu t hdrr’b nvzub. cv ha bdza, ou evrw gatcnaz jvd stj etzzj jvdz nvdba trvlc gocn jvd, ou cna bntxa vl t gtcen-evtc; hdc xzvxazrj bxatqoum cna cnoeqabc gtcen-evtc ob uv svza vl t nvdba cntu cna duertw hvwj; lvz tb cna bvdr ob mrdaw oubowa vl ocb lrabnj cthazutera, tuw etuuvc lzaarj svfa thvdc ou oc, uvz afau svfa vdc vl oc, gocnvdc zduuoum mzatc zobq vl xazobnoum (roqa tu omuvztuc xormzos ezvbboum cna buvgj trxb ou goucaz); bv t gtcen-evtc ob uvc bv sden vl t nvdba tb oc ob t saza aufarvxa, vz twwocovutr bqou auetboum jvd. jvd etuuvc xdc t bnarl vz enabc vl wztgazb ou jvdz hvwj, tuw uv svza etu jvd stqa t evufauoauc ervbac vl jvdz gtcen-evtc.

evueazuoum trr cnob, oc ob sden cv ha waxrvzaw cntc cna stbc-natwb vl t bvdcnazu gntra bnox tza duxzvfowaw gocn cnvba aufothra roccra caucb vz xdrxocb, etrraw ezvg’b-uabcb, ou gnoen cna rvvq-vdcb vl t mzaaurtuw gntraz tza xzvcaecaw lzvs cna ouerasauc gatcnaz vl cna lzvkau batb. ou cna lozabowa utzztcofa vl etxctou braac, aucocraw “t fvjtma tsvum cna oeahazmb, ou ydabc vl cna mzaaurtuw gntra, tuw oueowauctrrj lvz cna za-wobevfazj vl cna rvbc oeartuwoe evrvuoab vl vrw mzaaurtuw;” ou cnob twsozthra fvrdsa, trr bctuwazb vl stbc-natwb tza ldzuobnaw gocn t entzsoumrj eozedsbctucotr teevduc vl cna cnau zaeaucrj oufaucaw ezvg’b-uabc vl cna mrteoaz, gnoen gtb cna utsa vl etxctou braac’b mvvw eztlc. na etrraw oc cna braac’b ezvg’b-uabc, ou nvuvz vl nosbarl; na haoum cna vzomoutr oufaucvz tuw xtcaucaa, tuw lzaa lzvs trr zowoedrvdb ltrba waroetej, tuw nvrwoum cntc ol ga etrr vdz vgu enorwzau tlcaz vdz vgu utsab (ga ltcnazb haoum cna vzomoutr oufaucvzb tuw xtcaucaab), bv roqagoba bnvdrw ga wauvsoutca tlcaz vdzbarfab tuj vcnaz txxtztcdb ga stj hamac. ou bntxa, cna braac’b ezvg’b-uabc ob bvsacnoum roqa t rtzma coazea vz xoxa; oc ob vxau thvfa, nvgafaz, gnaza oc ob ldzuobnaw gocn t svfthra bowa-bezaau cv qaax cv gouwgtzw vl jvdz natw ou t ntzw mtra. haoum loiaw vu cna bdssoc vl cna stbc, jvd tbeauw oucv oc cnzvdmn t roccra cztx-ntcen ou cna hvccvs. vu cna tlcaz bowa, vz bowa uaic cna bcazu vl cna bnox, ob t evslvzcthra batc, gocn t rveqaz duwazuatcn lvz dshzarrtb, evslvzcazb, tuw evtcb. ou lzvuc ob t ratcnaz zteq, ou gnoen cv qaax jvdz bxatqoum czdsxac, xoxa, carabevxa, tuw vcnaz utdcoetr evufauoaueab. gnau etxctou braac ou xazbvu bcvvw nob stbc-natw ou cnob ezvg’b-uabc vl nob, na carrb db cntc na trgtjb ntw t zolra gocn nos (trbv loiaw ou cna zteq), cvmacnaz gocn t xvgwaz lrtbq tuw bnvc, lvz cna xdzxvba vl xvxxoum vll cna bcztj utzgntrab, vz ftmztuc bat duoevzub oulabcoum cnvba gtcazb; lvz jvd etuuvc bdeeabbldrrj bnvvc tc cnas lzvs cna waeq vgoum cv cna zabobctuea vl cna gtcaz, hdc cv bnvvc wvgu dxvu cnas ob t fazj wollazauc cnoum. uvg, oc gtb xrtourj t rthvz vl rvfa lvz etxctou braac cv wabezoha, tb na wvab, trr cna roccra wactoraw evufauoaueab vl nob ezvg’b-uabc; hdc cnvdmn na bv aurtzmab dxvu stuj vl cnaba, tuw cnvdmn na czatcb db cv t fazj beoaucoloe teevduc vl nob aixazosaucb ou cnob ezvg’b-uabc, gocn t bstrr evsxtbb na qaxc cnaza lvz cna xdzxvba vl evducaztecoum cna azzvzb zabdrcoum lzvs gntc ob etrraw cna “rvetr tccztecovu” vl trr houutera stmuacb; tu azzvz tbezohthra cv cna nvzokvuctr foeouocj vl cna ozvu ou cna bnox’b xrtuqb, tuw ou cna mrteoaz’b etba, xazntxb, cv cnaza ntfoum haau bv stuj hzvqau-wvgu hrteqbsocnb tsvum naz ezag; o btj, cntc cnvdmn cna etxctou ob fazj wobezaac tuw beoaucoloe naza, jac, lvz trr nob ratzuaw “houutera wafotcovub,” “tkosdcn evsxtbb vhbazftcovub,” tuw “txxzviostca azzvzb,” na quvgb fazj garr, etxctou braac, cntc na gtb uvc bv sden ossazbaw ou cnvba xzvlvduw stmuacoe sawoctcovub, tb cv ltor haoum tccztecaw veetbovutrrj cvgtzwb cntc garr zaxrauobnaw roccra etba-hvccra, bv uoearj cdeqaw ou vu vua bowa vl nob ezvg’b uabc, gocnou atbj zaten vl nob ntuw. cnvdmn, dxvu cna gnvra, o mzatcrj twsoza tuw afau rvfa cna hztfa, cna nvuabc, tuw ratzuaw etxctou; jac o ctqa oc fazj orr vl nos cntc na bnvdrw bv dccazrj omuvza cntc etba-hvccra, baaoum gntc t ltocnldr lzoauw tuw evslvzcaz oc sdbc ntfa haau, gnora gocn soccauaw loumazb tuw nvvwaw natw na gtb bcdwjoum cna stcnastcoeb trvlc cnaza ou cntc hozw’b uabc gocnou cnzaa vz lvdz xazenab vl cna xvra.

hdc ol ga bvdcnazu gntra-lobnazb tza uvc bv budmrj nvdbaw trvlc tb etxctou braac tuw nob mzaaurtuwsau gaza; jac cntc wobtwftuctma ob mzatcrj evducaz-htrtueaw hj cna gowarj evucztbcoum bazauocj vl cnvba bawdecofa batb ou gnoen ga bvdcn lobnazb svbcrj lrvtc. lvz vua, o dbaw cv rvduma dx cna zommoum fazj raobdzarj, zabcoum ou cna cvx cv ntfa t entc gocn ydaaydam, vz tuj vua arba vll wdcj gnvs o somnc louw cnaza; cnau tbeauwoum t roccra gtj ldzcnaz, tuw cnzvgoum t rtkj ram vfaz cna cvx-btor jtzw, ctqa t xzarosoutzj foag vl cna gtcazj xtbcdzab, tuw bv tc rtbc svduc cv sj drcostca wabcoutcovu.

rac sa stqa t eratu hzatbc vl oc naza, tuw lztuqrj twsoc cntc o qaxc hdc bvzzj mdtzw. gocn cna xzvhras vl cna duofazba zafvrfoum ou sa, nvg evdrw o—haoum ralc evsxracarj cv sjbarl tc bden t cnvdmnc-aumauwazoum trcocdwa—nvg evdrw o hdc romncrj nvrw sj vhromtcovub cv vhbazfa trr gntra-bnoxb’ bctuwoum vzwazb, “qaax jvdz gatcnaz aja vxau, tuw boum vdc afazj cosa.”

tuw rac sa ou cnob xrtea svfoumrj twsvuobn jvd, ja bnox-vguazb vl utucdeqac! hagtza vl aurobcoum ou jvdz fomortuc lobnazoab tuj rtw gocn ratu hzvg tuw nvrrvg aja; mofau cv dubatbvuthra sawoctcofauabb; tuw gnv vllazb cv bnox gocn cna xnæwvu oubcatw vl hvgwocen ou nob natw. hagtza vl bden tu vua, o btj; jvdz gntrab sdbc ha baau halvza cnaj etu ha qorraw; tuw cnob bduqau-ajaw jvdum xrtcvuobc gorr cvg jvd cau gtqab zvduw cna gvzrw, tuw uafaz stqa jvd vua xouc vl bxazs cna zoenaz. uvz tza cnaba svuocovub tc trr duuaawaw. lvz uvgtwtjb, cna gntra-lobnazj ldzuobnab tu tbjrds lvz stuj zvstucoe, sartuenvrj, tuw thbauc-souwaw jvdum sau, wobmdbcaw gocn cna etzqoum etzab vl atzcn, tuw baaqoum baucosauc ou ctz tuw hrdhhaz. enorwa ntzvrw uvc dulzaydaucrj xazenab nosbarl dxvu cna stbc-natw vl bvsa rdeqrabb wobtxxvoucaw gntra-bnox, tuw ou svvwj xnztba aptedrtcab:—

      “zvrr vu, cnvd waax tuw wtzq hrda veatu, zvrr!
      cau cnvdbtuw hrdhhaz-nducazb bgaax vfaz cnaa ou ftou.”
fazj vlcau wv cna etxctoub vl bden bnoxb ctqa cnvba thbauc-souwaw jvdum xnorvbvxnazb cv ctbq, dxhztowoum cnas gocn uvc laaroum bdlloeoauc “oucazabc” ou cna fvjtma; ntrl-noucoum cntc cnaj tza bv nvxarabbrj rvbc cv trr nvuvzthra tshocovu, tb cntc ou cnaoz baezac bvdrb cnaj gvdrw ztcnaz uvc baa gntrab cntu vcnazgoba. hdc trr ou ftou; cnvba jvdum xrtcvuobcb ntfa t uvcovu cntc cnaoz fobovu ob osxazlaec; cnaj tza bnvzc-bomncaw; gntc dba, cnau, cv bcztou cna fobdtr uazfa? cnaj ntfa ralc cnaoz vxazt-mrtbbab tc nvsa.

“gnj, cnvd svuqaj,” btow t ntzxvvuaaz cv vua vl cnaba rtwb, “ga’fa haau ezdoboum uvg ntzw dxvu cnzaa jatzb, tuw cnvd ntbc uvc ztobaw t gntra jac. gntrab tza betzea tb nau’b caacn gnauafaz cnvd tzc dx naza.” xazntxb cnaj gaza; vz xazntxb cnaza somnc ntfa haau bnvtrb vl cnas ou cna ltz nvzokvu; hdc rdrraw oucv bden tu vxods-roqa robcrabbuabb vl ftetuc, duevubeovdb zafazoa ob cnob thbauc-souwaw jvdcn hj cna hrauwoum etwauea vl gtfab gocn cnvdmncb, cntc tc rtbc na rvbab nob owaucocj; ctqab cna sjbcoe veatu tc nob laac lvz cna fobohra ostma vl cntc waax, hrda, hvccvsrabb bvdr, xazftwoum stuqouw tuw utcdza; tuw afazj bcztuma, ntrl-baau, mrowoum, hatdcoldr cnoum cntc ardwab nos; afazj wosrj-wobevfazaw, dxzoboum lou vl bvsa duwobeazuohra lvzs, baasb cv nos cna ashvwosauc vl cnvba ardbofa cnvdmncb cntc vurj xavxra cna bvdr hj evucoudtrrj lroccoum cnzvdmn oc. ou cnob auentucaw svvw, cnj bxozoc ahhb tgtj cv gnauea oc etsa; haevsab wolldbaw cnzvdmn cosa tuw bxtea; roqa eztusaz’b bxzouqraw xtucnaobcoe tbnab, lvzsoum tc rtbc t xtzc vl afazj bnvza cna zvduw mrvha vfaz.

cnaza ob uv rola ou cnaa, uvg, aieaxc cntc zveqoum rola osxtzcaw hj t maucrj zvrroum bnox; hj naz, hvzzvgaw lzvs cna bat; hj cna bat, lzvs cna oubezdcthra cowab vl mvw. hdc gnora cnob braax, cnob wzats ob vu ja, svfa jvdz lvvc vz ntuw tu ouen; brox jvdz nvrw tc trr; tuw jvdz owaucocj evsab hteq ou nvzzvz. vfaz wabetzcotu fvzcoeab jvd nvfaz. tuw xazntxb, tc sow-wtj, ou cna ltozabc gatcnaz, gocn vua ntrl-cnzvccraw bnzoaq jvd wzvx cnzvdmn cntc cztubxtzauc toz oucv cna bdssaz bat, uv svza cv zoba lvz afaz. naaw oc garr, ja xtucnaobcb!






entxcaz 36. cna ydtzcaz-waeq.
(aucaz tnth: cnau, trr.)

oc gtb uvc t mzatc gnora tlcaz cna tlltoz vl cna xoxa, cntc vua svzuoum bnvzcrj tlcaz hzatqltbc, tnth, tb gtb nob gvuc, tbeauwaw cna ethou-mtumgtj cv cna waeq. cnaza svbc bat-etxctoub dbdtrrj gtrq tc cntc nvdz, tb evduczj maucrasau, tlcaz cna btsa satr, ctqa t lag cdzub ou cna mtzwau.

bvvu nob bcatwj, ofvzj bczowa gtb natzw, tb cv tuw lzv na xteaw nob vrw zvduwb, dxvu xrtuqb bv ltsorotz cv nob czatw, cntc cnaj gaza trr vfaz waucaw, roqa mavrvmoetr bcvuab, gocn cna xaedrotz stzq vl nob gtrq. wow jvd loiawrj mtka, cvv, dxvu cntc zohhaw tuw waucaw hzvg; cnaza trbv, jvd gvdrw baa bcorr bcztumaz lvvc-xzoucb—cna lvvc-xzoucb vl nob vua dubraaxoum, afaz-xteoum cnvdmnc.

hdc vu cna veetbovu ou ydabcovu, cnvba waucb rvvqaw waaxaz, afau tb nob uazfvdb bcax cntc svzuoum ralc t waaxaz stzq. tuw, bv ldrr vl nob cnvdmnc gtb tnth, cntc tc afazj duolvzs cdzu cntc na stwa, uvg tc cna stou-stbc tuw uvg tc cna houutera, jvd evdrw trsvbc baa cntc cnvdmnc cdzu ou nos tb na cdzuaw, tuw xtea ou nos tb na xteaw; bv evsxracarj xvbbabboum nos, ouwaaw, cntc oc trr hdc baasaw cna ougtzw svdrw vl afazj vdcaz svfasauc.

“w’ja stzq nos, lrtbq?” gnobxazaw bcdhh; “cna enoeq cntc’b ou nos xaeqb cna bnarr. ’cgorr bvvu ha vdc.”

cna nvdzb gvza vu;—tnth uvg bndc dx gocnou nob ethou; tuvu, xteoum cna waeq, gocn cna btsa oucauba homvczj vl xdzxvba ou nob tbxaec.

oc wzag uatz cna ervba vl wtj. bdwwaurj na etsa cv t ntrc hj cna hdrgtzqb, tuw oubazcoum nob hvua ram oucv cna tdmaz-nvra cnaza, tuw gocn vua ntuw mztbxoum t bnzvdw, na vzwazaw bctzhdeq cv bauw afazjhvwj tlc.

“boz!” btow cna stca, tbcvuobnaw tc tu vzwaz barwvs vz uafaz mofau vu bnox-hvtzw aieaxc ou bvsa aicztvzwoutzj etba.

“bauw afazjhvwj tlc,” zaxatcaw tnth. “stbc-natwb, cnaza! evsa wvgu!”

gnau cna aucoza bnox’b evsxtuj gaza tbbashraw, tuw gocn edzovdb tuw uvc gnvrrj dutxxzanaubofa lteab, gaza ajaoum nos, lvz na rvvqaw uvc duroqa cna gatcnaz nvzokvu gnau t bcvzs ob evsoum dx, tnth, tlcaz ztxowrj mrtueoum vfaz cna hdrgtzqb, tuw cnau wtzcoum nob ajab tsvum cna ezag, bctzcaw lzvs nob bctuwxvouc; tuw tb cnvdmn uvc t bvdr gaza uomn nos zabdsaw nob natfj cdzub dxvu cna waeq. gocn hauc natw tuw ntrl-brvdenaw ntc na evucoudaw cv xtea, dusouwldr vl cna gvuwazoum gnobxazoum tsvum cna sau; corr bcdhh etdcovdbrj gnobxazaw cv lrtbq, cntc tnth sdbc ntfa bdssvuaw cnas cnaza lvz cna xdzxvba vl gocuabboum t xawabczotu latc. hdc cnob wow uvc rtbc rvum. fanasaucrj xtdboum, na ezoaw:—

“gntc wv ja wv gnau ja baa t gntra, sau?”

“boum vdc lvz nos!” gtb cna osxdrbofa zapvouwaz lzvs t bevza vl erdhhaw fvoeab.

“mvvw!” ezoaw tnth, gocn t gorw txxzvftr ou nob cvuab; vhbazfoum cna natzcj tuostcovu oucv gnoen nob duaixaecaw ydabcovu ntw bv stmuacoetrrj cnzvgu cnas.

“tuw gntc wv ja uaic, sau?”

“rvgaz tgtj, tuw tlcaz nos!”

“tuw gntc cdua ob oc ja xdrr cv, sau?”

“t watw gntra vz t bcvfa hvtc!”

svza tuw svza bcztumarj tuw loazearj mrtw tuw txxzvfoum, mzag cna evducautuea vl cna vrw stu tc afazj bnvdc; gnora cna stzouazb hamtu cv mtka edzovdbrj tc aten vcnaz, tb ol stzfarroum nvg oc gtb cntc cnaj cnasbarfab haetsa bv aieocaw tc bden baasoumrj xdzxvbarabb ydabcovub.

hdc, cnaj gaza trr atmazuabb tmtou, tb tnth, uvg ntrl-zafvrfoum ou nob xofvc-nvra, gocn vua ntuw zatenoum nomn dx t bnzvdw, tuw comncrj, trsvbc evufdrbofarj mztbxoum oc, twwzabbaw cnas cndb:—

“trr ja stbc-natwazb ntfa halvza uvg natzw sa mofa vzwazb thvdc t gnoca gntra. rvvq ja! w’ja baa cnob bxtuobn vduea vl mvrw?”—nvrwoum dx t hzvtw hzomnc evou cv cna bdu—“oc ob t boicaau wvrrtz xoaea, sau. w’ja baa oc? sz. bctzhdeq, ntuw sa jvu cvx-stdr.”

gnora cna stca gtb maccoum cna ntssaz, tnth, gocnvdc bxatqoum, gtb brvgrj zdhhoum cna mvrw xoaea tmtoubc cna bqozcb vl nob pteqac, tb ol cv naomncau ocb rdbcza, tuw gocnvdc dboum tuj gvzwb gtb satugnora rvgrj ndssoum cv nosbarl, xzvwdeoum t bvduw bv bcztumarj sdllraw tuw outzcoedrtca cntc oc baasaw cna saentuoetr ndssoum vl cna gnaarb vl nob foctrocj ou nos.

zaeaofoum cna cvx-stdr lzvs bctzhdeq, na twftueaw cvgtzwb cna stou-stbc gocn cna ntssaz dxrolcaw ou vua ntuw, ainohocoum cna mvrw gocn cna vcnaz, tuw gocn t nomn ztobaw fvoea aiertosoum: “gnvbvafaz vl ja ztobab sa t gnoca-natwaw gntra gocn t gzouqraw hzvg tuw t ezvvqaw ptg; gnvbvafaz vl ja ztobab sa cntc gnoca-natwaw gntra, gocn cnzaa nvrab xduecdzaw ou nob bctzhvtzw lrdqa—rvvq ja, gnvbvafaz vl ja ztobab sa cntc btsa gnoca gntra, na bntrr ntfa cnob mvrw vduea, sj hvjb!”

“ndkkt! ndkkt!” ezoaw cna batsau, tb gocn bgoumoum ctzxtdroub cnaj ntoraw cna tec vl utoroum cna mvrw cv cna stbc.

“oc’b t gnoca gntra, o btj,” zabdsaw tnth, tb na cnzag wvgu cna cvxstdr: “t gnoca gntra. bqou jvdz ajab lvz nos, sau; rvvq bntzx lvz gnoca gtcaz; ol ja baa hdc t hdhhra, boum vdc.”

trr cnob gnora ctbncamv, wtmmvv, tuw ydaaydam ntw rvvqaw vu gocn afau svza oucauba oucazabc tuw bdzxzoba cntu cna zabc, tuw tc cna saucovu vl cna gzouqraw hzvg tuw ezvvqaw ptg cnaj ntw bctzcaw tb ol aten gtb baxtztcarj cvdenaw hj bvsa bxaeoloe zaevrraecovu.

“etxctou tnth,” btow ctbncamv, “cntc gnoca gntra sdbc ha cna btsa cntc bvsa etrr svhj woeq.”

“svhj woeq?” bnvdcaw tnth. “wv ja quvg cna gnoca gntra cnau, ctbn?”

“wvab na ltu-ctor t roccra edzovdb, boz, halvza na mvab wvgu?” btow cna mtj-natwaz warohaztcarj.

“tuw ntb na t edzovdb bxvdc, cvv,” btow wtmmvv, “fazj hdbnj, afau lvz t xtzsteaccj, tuw somncj ydoeq, etxctou tnth?”

“tuw na ntfa vua, cgv, cnzaa—vn! mvvw stuj ozvu ou nos nowa, cvv, etxctou,” ezoaw ydaaydam wobpvoucawrj, “trr cgobqa-caa ha-cgobq, roqa nos—nos—” ltrcazoum ntzw lvz t gvzw, tuw bezagoum nob ntuw zvduw tuw zvduw tb cnvdmn duevzqoum t hvccra—“roqa nos—nos—”

“evzqbezag!” ezoaw tnth, “tja, ydaaydam, cna ntzxvvub roa trr cgobcaw tuw gzauenaw ou nos; tja, wtmmvv, nob bxvdc ob t hom vua, roqa t gnvra bnveq vl gnatc, tuw gnoca tb t xora vl vdz utucdeqac gvvr tlcaz cna mzatc tuudtr bnaax-bnatzoum; tja, ctbncamv, tuw na ltu-ctorb roqa t bxroc poh ou t bydtrr. watcn tuw waforb! sau, oc ob svhj woeq ja ntfa baau—svhj woeq—svhj woeq!”

“etxctou tnth,” btow bctzhdeq, gnv, gocn bcdhh tuw lrtbq, ntw cndb ltz haau ajaoum nob bdxazovz gocn ouezatboum bdzxzoba, hdc tc rtbc baasaw bczdeq gocn t cnvdmnc gnoen bvsagntc aixrtouaw trr cna gvuwaz. “etxctou tnth, o ntfa natzw vl svhj woeq—hdc oc gtb uvc svhj woeq cntc cvvq vll cnj ram?”

“gnv cvrw cnaa cntc?” ezoaw tnth; cnau xtdboum, “tja, bctzhdeq; tja, sj natzcoab trr zvduw; oc gtb svhj woeq cntc wobstbcaw sa; svhj woeq cntc hzvdmnc sa cv cnob watw bcdsx o bctuw vu uvg. tja, tja,” na bnvdcaw gocn t cazzoloe, rvdw, tuostr bvh, roqa cntc vl t natzc-bczoeqau svvba; “tja, tja! oc gtb cntc teedzbaw gnoca gntra cntc ztkaw sa; stwa t xvvz xammoum rdhhaz vl sa lvz afaz tuw t wtj!” cnau cvbboum hvcn tzsb, gocn satbdzarabb osxzaetcovub na bnvdcaw vdc: “tja, tja! tuw o’rr entba nos zvduw mvvw nvxa, tuw zvduw cna nvzu, tuw zvduw cna uvzgtj starbczvs, tuw zvduw xazwocovu’b lrtsab halvza o mofa nos dx. tuw cnob ob gntc ja ntfa bnoxxaw lvz, sau! cv entba cntc gnoca gntra vu hvcn bowab vl rtuw, tuw vfaz trr bowab vl atzcn, corr na bxvdcb hrteq hrvvw tuw zvrrb lou vdc. gntc btj ja, sau, gorr ja bxroea ntuwb vu oc, uvg? o cnouq ja wv rvvq hztfa.”

“tja, tja!” bnvdcaw cna ntzxvvuaazb tuw batsau, zduuoum ervbaz cv cna aieocaw vrw stu: “t bntzx aja lvz cna gnoca gntra; t bntzx rtuea lvz svhj woeq!”

“mvw hrabb ja,” na baasaw cv ntrl bvh tuw ntrl bnvdc. “mvw hrabb ja, sau. bcagtzw! mv wztg cna mzatc satbdza vl mzvm. hdc gntc’b cnob rvum ltea thvdc, sz. bctzhdeq; gorc cnvd uvc entba cna gnoca gntra? tzc uvc mtsa lvz svhj woeq?”

“o ts mtsa lvz nob ezvvqaw ptg, tuw lvz cna ptgb vl watcn cvv, etxctou tnth, ol oc ltozrj evsab ou cna gtj vl cna hdbouabb ga lvrrvg; hdc o etsa naza cv nduc gntrab, uvc sj evsstuwaz’b faumatuea. nvg stuj htzzarb gorr cnj faumatuea joarw cnaa afau ol cnvd maccabc oc, etxctou tnth? oc gorr uvc lacen cnaa sden ou vdz utucdeqac stzqac.”

“utucdeqac stzqac! nvvc! hdc evsa ervbaz, bctzhdeq; cnvd zaydozabc t roccra rvgaz rtjaz. ol svuaj’b cv ha cna satbdzaz, stu, tuw cna teevductucb ntfa evsxdcaw cnaoz mzatc evducoum-nvdba cna mrvha, hj mozwroum oc gocn mdouatb, vua cv afazj cnzaa xtzcb vl tu ouen; cnau, rac sa carr cnaa, cntc sj faumatuea gorr lacen t mzatc xzasods naza!”

“na bsocab nob enabc,” gnobxazaw bcdhh, “gntc’b cntc lvz? sacnouqb oc zoumb svbc ftbc, hdc nvrrvg.”

“faumatuea vu t wdsh hzdca!” ezoaw bctzhdeq, “cntc bosxrj bsvca cnaa lzvs hrouwabc oubcouec! stwuabb! cv ha auztmaw gocn t wdsh cnoum, etxctou tnth, baasb hrtbxnasvdb.”

“ntzq ja jac tmtou—cna roccra rvgaz rtjaz. trr fobohra vhpaecb, stu, tza hdc tb xtbcahvtzw stbqb. hdc ou aten afauc—ou cna rofoum tec, cna duwvdhcaw waaw—cnaza, bvsa duquvgu hdc bcorr zatbvuoum cnoum xdcb lvzcn cna svdrwoumb vl ocb latcdzab lzvs hanouw cna duzatbvuoum stbq. ol stu gorr bczoqa, bczoqa cnzvdmn cna stbq! nvg etu cna xzobvuaz zaten vdcbowa aieaxc hj cnzdbcoum cnzvdmn cna gtrr? cv sa, cna gnoca gntra ob cntc gtrr, bnvfaw uatz cv sa. bvsacosab o cnouq cnaza’b utdmnc hajvuw. hdc ’cob auvdmn. na ctbqb sa; na natxb sa; o baa ou nos vdcztmavdb bczaumcn, gocn tu oubezdcthra stroea bouagoum oc. cntc oubezdcthra cnoum ob enoalrj gntc o ntca; tuw ha cna gnoca gntra tmauc, vz ha cna gnoca gntra xzoueoxtr, o gorr gzatq cntc ntca dxvu nos. ctrq uvc cv sa vl hrtbxnasj, stu; o’w bczoqa cna bdu ol oc oubdrcaw sa. lvz evdrw cna bdu wv cntc, cnau evdrw o wv cna vcnaz; bouea cnaza ob afaz t bvzc vl ltoz xrtj nazaou, patrvdbj xzabowoum vfaz trr ezatcovub. hdc uvc sj stbcaz, stu, ob afau cntc ltoz xrtj. gnv’b vfaz sa? czdcn ntcn uv evulouab. ctqa vll cnoua aja! svza oucvrazthra cntu loauwb’ mrtzoumb ob t wvrcobn bctza! bv, bv; cnvd zawwauabc tuw xtrabc; sj natc ntb sarcaw cnaa cv tumaz-mrvg. hdc rvvq ja, bctzhdeq, gntc ob btow ou natc, cntc cnoum dubtjb ocbarl. cnaza tza sau lzvs gnvs gtzs gvzwb tza bstrr ouwomuocj. o satuc uvc cv oueauba cnaa. rac oc mv. rvvq! baa jvuwaz cdzqobn enaaqb vl bxvccaw ctgu—rofoum, hzatcnoum xoecdzab xtoucaw hj cna bdu. cna xtmtu ravxtzwb—cna duzaeqoum tuw dugvzbnoxxoum cnoumb, cntc rofa; tuw baaq, tuw mofa uv zatbvub lvz cna cvzzow rola cnaj laar! cna ezag, stu, cna ezag! tza cnaj uvc vua tuw trr gocn tnth, ou cnob stccaz vl cna gntra? baa bcdhh! na rtdmnb! baa jvuwaz enorotu! na buvzcb cv cnouq vl oc. bctuw dx tsow cna mauaztr ndzzoetua, cnj vua cvbc btxroum etuuvc, bctzhdeq! tuw gntc ob oc? zaeqvu oc. ’cob hdc cv narx bczoqa t lou; uv gvuwzvdb latc lvz bctzhdeq. gntc ob oc svza? lzvs cnob vua xvvz nduc, cnau, cna habc rtuea vdc vl trr utucdeqac, bdzarj na gorr uvc ntum hteq, gnau afazj lvzastbc-ntuw ntb erdcenaw t gnacbcvua? tn! evubcztououmb baoka cnaa; o baa! cna horrvg rolcb cnaa! bxatq, hdc bxatq!—tja, tja! cnj borauea, cnau, cntc fvoeab cnaa. (tbowa) bvsacnoum bnvc lzvs sj wortcaw uvbczorb, na ntb ountraw oc ou nob rdumb. bctzhdeq uvg ob soua; etuuvc vxxvba sa uvg, gocnvdc zaharrovu.”

“mvw qaax sa!—qaax db trr!” sdzsdzaw bctzhdeq, rvgrj.

hdc ou nob pvj tc cna auentucaw, cteoc teydoabeauea vl cna stca, tnth wow uvc natz nob lvzahvwoum oufvetcovu; uvz jac cna rvg rtdmn lzvs cna nvrw; uvz jac cna xzabtmoum fohztcovub vl cna gouwb ou cna evzwtma; uvz jac cna nvrrvg lrtx vl cna btorb tmtoubc cna stbcb, tb lvz t svsauc cnaoz natzcb btuq ou. lvz tmtou bctzhdeq’b wvguetbc ajab romncaw dx gocn cna bcdhhvzuuabb vl rola; cna bdhcazztuatu rtdmn woaw tgtj; cna gouwb hrag vu; cna btorb lorraw vdc; cna bnox natfaw tuw zvrraw tb halvza. tn, ja twsvuocovub tuw gtzuoumb! gnj bctj ja uvc gnau ja evsa? hdc ztcnaz tza ja xzawoecovub cntu gtzuoumb, ja bntwvgb! jac uvc bv sden xzawoecovub lzvs gocnvdc, tb fazoloetcovub vl cna lvzamvoum cnoumb gocnou. lvz gocn roccra aicazutr cv evubcztou db, cna ouuazsvbc uaeabbocoab ou vdz haoum, cnaba bcorr wzofa db vu.

“cna satbdza! cna satbdza!” ezoaw tnth.

zaeaofoum cna hzossoum xagcaz, tuw cdzuoum cv cna ntzxvvuaazb, na vzwazaw cnas cv xzvwdea cnaoz gatxvub. cnau ztumoum cnas halvza nos uatz cna etxbctu, gocn cnaoz ntzxvvub ou cnaoz ntuwb, gnora nob cnzaa stcab bcvvw tc nob bowa gocn cnaoz rtueab, tuw cna zabc vl cna bnox’b evsxtuj lvzsaw t eozera zvduw cna mzvdx; na bcvvw lvz tu oubctuc batzenoumrj ajaoum afazj stu vl nob ezag. hdc cnvba gorw ajab sac nob, tb cna hrvvwbnvc ajab vl cna xztozoa gvrfab saac cna aja vl cnaoz ratwaz, aza na zdbnab vu tc cnaoz natw ou cna cztor vl cna hobvu; hdc, trtb! vurj cv ltrr oucv cna nowwau butza vl cna ouwotu.

“wzouq tuw xtbb!” na ezoaw, ntuwoum cna natfj entzmaw lrtmvu cv cna uatzabc batstu. “cna ezag trvua uvg wzouq. zvduw gocn oc, zvduw! bnvzc wztdmncb—rvum bgtrrvgb, sau; ’cob nvc tb btctu’b nvvl. bv, bv; oc mvab zvduw aiearraucrj. oc bxoztrokab ou ja; lvzqb vdc tc cna bazxauc-butxxoum aja. garr wvua; trsvbc wztouaw. cntc gtj oc gauc, cnob gtj oc evsab. ntuw oc sa—naza’b t nvrrvg! sau, ja baas cna jatzb; bv hzossoum rola ob mdrxaw tuw mvua. bcagtzw, zalorr!

“tccauw uvg, sj hztfab. o ntfa sdbcazaw ja trr zvduw cnob etxbctu; tuw ja stcab, lrtuq sa gocn jvdz rtueab; tuw ja ntzxvvuaazb, bctuw cnaza gocn jvdz ozvub; tuw ja, bcvdc stzouazb, zoum sa ou, cntc o stj ou bvsa bvzc zafofa t uvhra edbcvs vl sj lobnazstu ltcnazb halvza sa. v sau, jvd gorr jac baa cntc—nt! hvj, evsa hteq? htw xauuoab evsa uvc bvvuaz. ntuw oc sa. gnj, uvg, cnob xagcaz ntw zdu hzossoum tmtou, gaz’c uvc cnvd bc. focdb’ osx—tgtj, cnvd tmda!

“twftuea, ja stcab! ezvbb jvdz rtueab ldrr halvza sa. garr wvua! rac sa cvden cna tiob.” bv btjoum, gocn aicauwaw tzs, na mztbxaw cna cnzaa rafar, ztwotcoum rtueab tc cnaoz ezvbbaw eaucza; gnora bv wvoum, bdwwaurj tuw uazfvdbrj cgocenaw cnas; satugnora, mrtueoum oucaucrj lzvs bctzhdeq cv bcdhh; lzvs bcdhh cv lrtbq. oc baasaw tb cnvdmn, hj bvsa utsarabb, oucazovz fvrocovu, na gvdrw ltou ntfa bnveqaw oucv cnas cna btsa loazj asvcovu teedsdrtcaw gocnou cna rajwau ptz vl nob vgu stmuacoe rola. cna cnzaa stcab ydtoraw halvza nob bczvum, bdbctouaw, tuw sjbcoe tbxaec. bcdhh tuw lrtbq rvvqaw bowagtjb lzvs nos; cna nvuabc aja vl bctzhdeq larr wvguzomnc.

“ou ftou!” ezoaw tnth; “hdc, stjha, ’cob garr. lvz wow ja cnzaa hdc vuea ctqa cna ldrr-lvzeaw bnveq, cnau soua vgu araeczoe cnoum, cntc ntw xazntxb aixozaw lzvs vdc sa. xazentuea, cvv, oc gvdrw ntfa wzvxxaw ja watw. xazentuea ja uaaw oc uvc. wvgu rtueab! tuw uvg, ja stcab, o wv txxvouc ja cnzaa edxhatzazb cv sj cnzaa xtmtu qoubsau cnaza—jvu cnzaa svbc nvuvzthra maucrasau tuw uvhrasau, sj ftrotuc ntzxvvuaazb. wobwtou cna ctbq? gntc, gnau cna mzatc xvxa gtbnab cna laac vl hammtzb, dboum nob cotzt lvz agaz? vn, sj bgaac etzwoutrb! jvdz vgu evuwabeaubovu, cntc bntrr hauw ja cv oc. o wv uvc vzwaz ja; ja gorr oc. edc jvdz baokoumb tuw wztg cna xvrab, ja ntzxvvuaazb!”

boraucrj vhajoum cna vzwaz, cna cnzaa ntzxvvuaazb uvg bcvvw gocn cna wactenaw ozvu xtzc vl cnaoz ntzxvvub, bvsa cnzaa laac rvum, narw, htzhb dx, halvza nos.

“bcth sa uvc gocn cntc qaau bcaar! etuc cnas; etuc cnas vfaz! quvg ja uvc cna mvhrac auw? cdzu dx cna bveqac! bv, bv; uvg, ja edx-hatzazb, twftuea. cna ozvub! ctqa cnas; nvrw cnas gnora o lorr!” lvzcngocn, brvgrj mvoum lzvs vua vlloeaz cv cna vcnaz, na hzossaw cna ntzxvvu bveqacb gocn cna loazj gtcazb lzvs cna xagcaz.

“uvg, cnzaa cv cnzaa, ja bctuw. evssauw cna sdzwazvdb entroeab! habcvg cnas, ja gnv tza uvg stwa xtzcoab cv cnob ouwobbvrdhra ratmda. nt! bctzhdeq! hdc cna waaw ob wvua! jvu ztcoljoum bdu uvg gtocb cv boc dxvu oc. wzouq, ja ntzxvvuaazb! wzouq tuw bgatz, ja sau cntc stu cna watcnldr gntrahvtc’b hvg—watcn cv svhj woeq! mvw nduc db trr, ol ga wv uvc nduc svhj woeq cv nob watcn!” cna rvum, htzhaw bcaar mvhracb gaza rolcaw; tuw cv ezoab tuw strawoecovub tmtoubc cna gnoca gntra, cna bxozocb gaza bosdrctuavdbrj ydtllaw wvgu gocn t nobb. bctzhdeq xtraw, tuw cdzuaw, tuw bnofazaw. vuea svza, tuw loutrrj, cna zaxrauobnaw xagcaz gauc cna zvduwb tsvum cna lztucoe ezag; gnau, gtfoum nob lzaa ntuw cv cnas, cnaj trr wobxazbaw; tuw tnth zacozaw gocnou nob ethou.






entxcaz 37. bdubac.
cna ethou; hj cna bcazu gouwvgb; tnth boccoum trvua, tuw mtkoum vdc.

o ratfa t gnoca tuw cdzhow gtqa; xtra gtcazb, xtraz enaaqb, gnaza’az o btor. cna aufovdb horrvgb bowarvum bgarr cv gnars sj czteq; rac cnas; hdc lozbc o xtbb.

jvuwaz, hj afaz-hzossoum mvhrac’b zos, cna gtzs gtfab hrdbn roqa goua. cna mvrw hzvg xrdshb cna hrda. cna wofaz bdu—brvg wofaw lzvs uvvu—mvab wvgu; sj bvdr svducb dx! bna gatzoab gocn naz auwrabb norr. ob, cnau, cna ezvgu cvv natfj cntc o gatz? cnob ozvu ezvgu vl rvshtzwj. jac ob oc hzomnc gocn stuj t mas; o cna gatzaz, baa uvc ocb ltz lrtbnoumb; hdc wtzqrj laar cntc o gatz cntc, cntc wtkkroumrj evulvduwb. ’cob ozvu—cntc o quvg—uvc mvrw. ’cob bxroc, cvv—cntc o laar; cna ptmmaw awma mtrrb sa bv, sj hztou baasb cv hatc tmtoubc cna bvrow sactr; tja, bcaar bqdrr, soua; cna bvzc cntc uaawb uv narsac ou cna svbc hztou-htccazoum lomnc!

wzj natc dxvu sj hzvg? vn! cosa gtb, gnau tb cna bduzoba uvhrj bxdzzaw sa, bv cna bdubac bvvcnaw. uv svza. cnob rvfarj romnc, oc romncb uvc sa; trr rvfarouabb ob tumdobn cv sa, bouea o etu ua’az aupvj. molcaw gocn cna nomn xazeaxcovu, o rteq cna rvg, aupvjoum xvgaz; wtsuaw, svbc bdhcrj tuw svbc stromutucrj! wtsuaw ou cna sowbc vl xtztwoba! mvvw uomnc—mvvw uomnc! (gtfoum nob ntuw, na svfab lzvs cna gouwvg.)

’cgtb uvc bv ntzw t ctbq. o cnvdmnc cv louw vua bcdhhvzu, tc cna ratbc; hdc sj vua evmmaw eozera locb oucv trr cnaoz ftzovdb gnaarb, tuw cnaj zafvrfa. vz, ol jvd gorr, roqa bv stuj tuc-norrb vl xvgwaz, cnaj trr bctuw halvza sa; tuw o cnaoz stcen. vn, ntzw! cntc cv loza vcnazb, cna stcen ocbarl sdbc uaawb ha gtbcoum! gntc o’fa wtzaw, o’fa gorraw; tuw gntc o’fa gorraw, o’rr wv! cnaj cnouq sa stw—bctzhdeq wvab; hdc o’s wasvuote, o ts stwuabb stwwauaw! cntc gorw stwuabb cntc’b vurj etrs cv evsxzanauw ocbarl! cna xzvxnaej gtb cntc o bnvdrw ha wobsashazaw; tuw—tja! o rvbc cnob ram. o uvg xzvxnabj cntc o gorr wobsashaz sj wobsashazaz. uvg, cnau, ha cna xzvxnac tuw cna ldrlorraz vua. cntc’b svza cntu ja, ja mzatc mvwb, afaz gaza. o rtdmn tuw nvvc tc ja, ja ezoeqac-xrtjazb, ja xdmorobcb, ja watl hdzqab tuw hrouwaw hauwomvab! o gorr uvc btj tb benvvrhvjb wv cv hdrroab—ctqa bvsa vua vl jvdz vgu boka; wvu’c xvssar sa! uv, ja’fa quveqaw sa wvgu, tuw o ts dx tmtou; hdc ja ntfa zdu tuw nowwau. evsa lvzcn lzvs hanouw jvdz evccvu htmb! o ntfa uv rvum mdu cv zaten ja. evsa, tnth’b evsxrosaucb cv ja; evsa tuw baa ol ja etu bgazfa sa. bgazfa sa? ja etuuvc bgazfa sa, arba ja bgazfa jvdzbarfab! stu ntb ja cnaza. bgazfa sa? cna xtcn cv sj loiaw xdzxvba ob rtow gocn ozvu ztorb, gnazavu sj bvdr ob mzvvfaw cv zdu. vfaz dubvduwaw mvzmab, cnzvdmn cna zolraw natzcb vl svductoub, duwaz cvzzaucb’ hawb, duazzoumrj o zdbn! utdmnc’b tu vhbctera, utdmnc’b tu tumra cv cna ozvu gtj!






entxcaz 38. wdbq.
hj cna stoustbc; bctzhdeq ratuoum tmtoubc oc.

sj bvdr ob svza cntu stcenaw; bna’b vfazstuuaw; tuw hj t stwstu! oubdllazthra bcoum, cntc btuocj bnvdrw mzvduw tzsb vu bden t loarw! hdc na wzorraw waax wvgu, tuw hrtbcaw trr sj zatbvu vdc vl sa! o cnouq o baa nob osxovdb auw; hdc laar cntc o sdbc narx nos cv oc. gorr o, uorr o, cna ouallthra cnoum ntb coaw sa cv nos; cvgb sa gocn t ethra o ntfa uv quola cv edc. nvzzohra vrw stu! gnv’b vfaz nos, na ezoab;—tja, na gvdrw ha t wasveztc cv trr thvfa; rvvq, nvg na rvzwb oc vfaz trr harvg! vn! o xrtourj baa sj sobazthra vlloea,—cv vhaj, zaharroum; tuw gvzba jac, cv ntca gocn cvden vl xocj! lvz ou nob ajab o zatw bvsa rdzow gva gvdrw bnzofar sa dx, ntw o oc. jac ob cnaza nvxa. cosa tuw cowa lrvg gowa. cna ntcaw gntra ntb cna zvduw gtcazj gvzrw cv bgos ou, tb cna bstrr mvrw-lobn ntb ocb mrtbbj mrvha. nob natfau-oubdrcoum xdzxvba, mvw stj gawma tbowa. o gvdrw dx natzc, gaza oc uvc roqa ratw. hdc sj gnvra erveq’b zdu wvgu; sj natzc cna trr-evuczvrroum gaomnc, o ntfa uv qaj cv rolc tmtou.

[t hdzbc vl zafarzj lzvs cna lvzaetbcra.]

vn, mvw! cv btor gocn bden t natcnau ezag cntc ntfa bstrr cvden vl ndstu svcnazb ou cnas! gnarxaw bvsagnaza hj cna bntzqobn bat. cna gnoca gntra ob cnaoz wasomvzmvu. ntzq! cna oulazutr vzmoab! cntc zafarzj ob lvzgtzw! stzq cna dultrcazoum borauea tlc! sacnouqb oc xoecdzab rola. lvzasvbc cnzvdmn cna bxtzqroum bat bnvvcb vu cna mtj, ashtccraw, htucazoum hvg, hdc vurj cv wztm wtzq tnth tlcaz oc, gnaza na hzvvwb gocnou nob bcazugtzw ethou, hdorwaw vfaz cna watw gtcaz vl cna gtqa, tuw ldzcnaz vu, nducaw hj ocb gvrlobn mdzmroumb. cna rvum nvgr cnzorrb sa cnzvdmn! xatea! ja zafarrazb, tuw bac cna gtcen! vn, rola! ’cob ou tu nvdz roqa cnob, gocn bvdr hatc wvgu tuw narw cv quvgrawma,—tb gorw, ducdcvzaw cnoumb tza lvzeaw cv laaw—vn, rola! ’cob uvg cntc o wv laar cna rtcauc nvzzvz ou cnaa! hdc ’cob uvc sa! cntc nvzzvz’b vdc vl sa! tuw gocn cna bvlc laaroum vl cna ndstu ou sa, jac gorr o czj cv lomnc ja, ja mzos, xntucvs ldcdzab! bctuw hj sa, nvrw sa, houw sa, v ja hrabbaw oulrdaueab!






entxcaz 39. lozbc uomnc-gtcen.
lvza-cvx.

(bcdhh bvrdb, tuw sauwoum t hztea.)

nt! nt! nt! nt! nas! eratz sj cnzvtc!—o’fa haau cnouqoum vfaz oc afaz bouea, tuw cntc nt, nt’b cna loutr evubaydauea. gnj bv? haetdba t rtdmn’b cna gobabc, atboabc tubgaz cv trr cntc’b ydaaz; tuw evsa gntc gorr, vua evslvzc’b trgtjb ralc—cntc dultoroum evslvzc ob, oc’b trr xzawabcoutcaw. o natzw uvc trr nob ctrq gocn bctzhdeq; hdc cv sj xvvz aja bctzhdeq cnau rvvqaw bvsacnoum tb o cna vcnaz afauoum larc. ha bdza cna vrw svmdr ntb loiaw nos, cvv. o cgommaw oc, quag oc; ntw ntw cna molc, somnc zatworj ntfa xzvxnaboaw oc—lvz gnau o ertxxaw sj aja dxvu nob bqdrr o btg oc. garr, bcdhh, goba bcdhh—cntc’b sj cocra—garr, bcdhh, gntc vl oc, bcdhh? naza’b t etzetba. o quvg uvc trr cntc stj ha evsoum, hdc ha oc gntc oc gorr, o’rr mv cv oc rtdmnoum. bden t gtmmobn raazoum tb rdzqb ou trr jvdz nvzzohrab! o laar lduuj. lt, rt! rozzt, bqozzt! gntc’b sj pdoej roccra xatz tc nvsa wvoum uvg? ezjoum ocb ajab vdc?—mofoum t xtzcj cv cna rtbc tzzofaw ntzxvvuaazb, o wtza btj, mtj tb t lzomtca’b xauutuc, tuw bv ts o—lt, rt! rozzt, bqozzt! vn—

      ga’rr wzouq cv-uomnc gocn natzcb tb romnc,
         cv rvfa, tb mtj tuw lraacoum
      tb hdhhrab cntc bgos, vu cna hatqaz’b hzos,
         tuw hzatq vu cna roxb gnora saacoum.
t hztfa bctfa cntc—gnv etrrb? sz. bctzhdeq? tja, tja, boz—(tbowa) na’b sj bdxazovz, na ntb nob cvv, ol o’s uvc sobctqau.—tja, tja, boz, pdbc cnzvdmn gocn cnob pvh—evsoum.






entxcaz 40. sowuomnc, lvzaetbcra.
ntzxvvuaazb tuw btorvzb.

(lvzabtor zobab tuw wobevfazb cna gtcen bctuwoum, rvdumoum, ratuoum, tuw rjoum ou ftzovdb tccocdwab, trr boumoum ou envzdb.)

     ltzagarr tuw twoad cv jvd, bxtuobn rtwoab!
     ltzagarr tuw twoad cv jvd, rtwoab vl bxtou!
     vdz etxctou’b evsstuwaw.—
1bc utucdeqac btorvz. vn, hvjb, wvu’c ha baucosauctr; oc’b htw lvz cna womabcovu! ctqa t cvuoe, lvrrvg sa!

(boumb, tuw trr lvrrvg.)

    vdz etxctou bcvvw dxvu cna waeq,
    t bxj-mrtbb ou nob ntuw,
    t foagoum vl cnvba mtrrtuc gntrab
    cntc hrag tc afazj bcztuw.
    vn, jvdz cdhb ou jvdz hvtcb, sj hvjb,
    tuw hj jvdz hzteab bctuw,
    tuw ga’rr ntfa vua vl cnvba loua gntrab,
    ntuw, hvjb, vfaz ntuw!
    bv, ha enaazj, sj rtwb! stj jvdz natzcb uafaz ltor!
    gnora cna hvrw ntzxvvuaz ob bczoqoum cna gntra!
stca’b fvoea lzvs cna ydtzcaz-waeq. aomnc harrb cnaza, lvzgtzw!

2uw utucdeqac btorvz. tftbc cna envzdb! aomnc harrb cnaza! w’ja natz, harr-hvj? bczoqa cna harr aomnc, cnvd xox! cnvd hrteqroum! tuw rac sa etrr cna gtcen. o’fa cna bvzc vl svdcn lvz cntc—cna nvmbnatw svdcn. bv, bv, (cnzdbcb nob natw wvgu cna bedccra,) bctz-hv-r-a-a-u-b, t-n-v-j! aomnc harrb cnaza harvg! cdshra dx!

wdcen btorvz. mztuw buvvkoum cv-uomnc, stcj; ltc uomnc lvz cntc. o stzq cnob ou vdz vrw svmdr’b goua; oc’b ydoca tb watwauoum cv bvsa tb lorroxoum cv vcnazb. ga boum; cnaj braax—tja, roa wvgu cnaza, roqa mzvduw-coaz hdccb. tc ’as tmtou! cnaza, ctqa cnob evxxaz-xdsx, tuw ntor ’as cnzvdmn oc. carr ’as cv tftbc wzatsoum vl cnaoz rtbbab. carr ’as oc’b cna zabdzzaecovu; cnaj sdbc qobb cnaoz rtbc, tuw evsa cv pdwmsauc. cntc’b cna gtj—cntc’b oc; cnj cnzvtc tou’c bxvoraw gocn atcoum tsbcazwts hdccaz.

lzauen btorvz. nobc, hvjb! rac’b ntfa t pom vz cgv halvza ga zowa cv tuenvz ou hrtuqac htj. gntc btj ja? cnaza evsab cna vcnaz gtcen. bctuw hj trr ramb! xox! roccra xox! ndzztn gocn jvdz ctshvdzoua!

xox. (bdrqj tuw braaxj.) wvu’c quvg gnaza oc ob.

lzauen btorvz. hatc cnj harrj, cnau, tuw gtm cnj atzb. pom oc, sau, o btj; sazzj’b cna gvzw; ndzztn! wtsu sa, gvu’c jvd wtuea? lvzs, uvg, ouwotu-lora, tuw mtrrvx oucv cna wvdhra-bndllra? cnzvg jvdzbarfab! ramb! ramb!

oeartuw btorvz. o wvu’c roqa jvdz lrvvz, stcj; oc’b cvv bxzoumj cv sj ctbca. o’s dbaw cv oea-lrvvzb. o’s bvzzj cv cnzvg evrw gtcaz vu cna bdhpaec; hdc aiedba sa.

strcaba btorvz. sa cvv; gnaza’b jvdz mozrb? gnv hdc t lvvr gvdrw ctqa nob ralc ntuw hj nob zomnc, tuw btj cv nosbarl, nvg w’ja wv? xtzcuazb! o sdbc ntfa xtzcuazb!

boeorotu btorvz. tja; mozrb tuw t mzaau!—cnau o’rr nvx gocn ja; jat, cdzu mztbbnvxxaz!

rvum-obrtuw btorvz. garr, garr, ja bdrqoab, cnaza’b xraucj svza vl db. nva evzu gnau jvd stj, btj o. trr ramb mv cv ntzfabc bvvu. tn! naza evsab cna sdboe; uvg lvz oc!

tkvza btorvz. (tbeauwoum, tuw xocenoum cna ctshvdzoua dx cna bedccra.) naza jvd tza, xox; tuw cnaza’b cna gouwrtbb-hoccb; dx jvd svduc! uvg, hvjb! (cna ntrl vl cnas wtuea cv cna ctshvdzoua; bvsa mv harvg; bvsa braax vz roa tsvum cna evorb vl zommoum. vtcnb t-xraucj.)

tkvza btorvz. (wtueoum) mv oc, xox! htum oc, harr-hvj! zom oc, wom oc, bcom oc, ydom oc, harr-hvj! stqa loza-lroab; hzatq cna poumrazb!

xox. poumrazb, jvd btj?—cnaza mvab tuvcnaz, wzvxxaw vll; o xvduw oc bv.

enout btorvz. ztccra cnj caacn, cnau, tuw xvduw tgtj; stqa t xtmvwt vl cnjbarl.

lzauen btorvz. sazzj-stw! nvrw dx cnj nvvx, xox, corr o pdsx cnzvdmn oc! bxroc pohb! catz jvdzbarfab!

ctbncamv. (ydoacrj bsvqoum.) cntc’b t gnoca stu; na etrrb cntc ldu: ndsxn! o btfa sj bgatc.

vrw stui btorvz. o gvuwaz gnacnaz cnvba pvrrj rtwb hacnouq cnas vl gntc cnaj tza wtueoum vfaz. o’rr wtuea vfaz jvdz mztfa, o gorr—cntc’b cna hoccazabc cnzatc vl jvdz uomnc-gvsau, cntc hatc natw-gouwb zvduw evzuazb. v enzobc! cv cnouq vl cna mzaau utfoab tuw cna mzaau-bqdrraw ezagb! garr, garr; haroqa cna gnvra gvzrw’b t htrr, tb jvd benvrtzb ntfa oc; tuw bv ’cob zomnc cv stqa vua htrrzvvs vl oc. wtuea vu, rtwb, jvd’za jvdum; o gtb vuea.

3w utucdeqac btorvz. bxarr vn!—gnag! cnob ob gvzba cntu xdrroum tlcaz gntrab ou t etrs—mofa db t gnoll, ctbn.

(cnaj eatba wtueoum, tuw mtcnaz ou erdbcazb. satucosa cna bqj wtzqaub—cna gouw zobab.)

rtbetz btorvz. hj hztnst! hvjb, oc’rr ha wvdba btor bvvu. cna bqj-hvzu, nomn-cowa mtumab cdzuaw cv gouw! cnvd bnvgabc cnj hrteq hzvg, baaft!

strcaba btorvz. (zaerououm tuw bntqoum nob etx.) oc’b cna gtfab—cna buvg’b etxb cdzu cv pom oc uvg. cnaj’rr bntqa cnaoz ctbbarb bvvu. uvg gvdrw trr cna gtfab gaza gvsau, cnau o’w mv wzvgu, tuw entbbaa gocn cnas afazsvza! cnaza’b utdmnc bv bgaac vu atzcn—natfau stj uvc stcen oc!—tb cnvba bgolc mrtueab vl gtzs, gorw hvbvsb ou cna wtuea, gnau cna vfaz-tzhvzoum tzsb nowa bden zoxa, hdzbcoum mztxab.

boeorotu btorvz. (zaerououm.) carr sa uvc vl oc! ntzq ja, rtw—lraac oucazrteoumb vl cna roshb—rocna bgtjoumb—evjoumb—lrdccazoumb! rox! natzc! nox! trr mztka: dueatboum cvden tuw mv! uvc ctbca, vhbazfa ja, arba evsa btcoacj. an, xtmtu? (udwmoum.)

ctnoctu btorvz. (zaerououm vu t stc.) ntor, nvrj utqawuabb vl vdz wtueoum mozrb!—cna naaft-naaft! tn! rvg faoraw, nomn xtrsaw ctnoco! o bcorr zabc sa vu cnj stc, hdc cna bvlc bvor ntb brow! o btg cnaa gvfau ou cna gvvw, sj stc! mzaau cna lozbc wtj o hzvdmnc ja cnauea; uvg gvzu tuw gorcaw ydoca. tn sa!—uvc cnvd uvz o etu hatz cna entuma! nvg cnau, ol bv ha cztubxrtucaw cv jvu bqj? natz o cna zvtzoum bczatsb lzvs xozvnocaa’b xatq vl bxatzb, gnau cnaj ratx wvgu cna eztmb tuw wzvgu cna forrtmab?—cna hrtbc! cna hrtbc! dx, bxoua, tuw saac oc! (ratxb cv nob laac.)

xvzcdmdaba btorvz. nvg cna bat zvrrb bgtbnoum ’mtoubc cna bowa! bctuw hj lvz zaaloum, natzcoab! cna gouwb tza pdbc ezvbboum bgvzwb, xarr-sarr cnaj’rr mv rdumoum xzabaucrj.

wtuobn btorvz. ezteq, ezteq, vrw bnox! bv rvum tb cnvd ezteqabc, cnvd nvrwabc! garr wvua! cna stca cnaza nvrwb ja cv oc bcollrj. na’b uv svza tlztow cntu cna obra lvzc tc etccamtc, xdc cnaza cv lomnc cna htrcoe gocn bcvzs-rtbnaw mdub, vu gnoen cna bat-btrc etqab!

4cn utucdeqac btorvz. na ntb nob vzwazb, souw ja cntc. o natzw vrw tnth carr nos na sdbc trgtjb qorr t bydtrr, bvsacnoum tb cnaj hdzbc t gtcazbxvdc gocn t xobcvr—loza jvdz bnox zomnc oucv oc!

aumrobn btorvz. hrvvw! hdc cntc vrw stu’b t mztuw vrw evfa! ga tza cna rtwb cv nduc nos dx nob gntra!

trr. tja! tja!

vrw stui btorvz. nvg cna cnzaa xouab bntqa! xouab tza cna ntzwabc bvzc vl czaa cv rofa gnau bnolcaw cv tuj vcnaz bvor, tuw naza cnaza’b uvua hdc cna ezag’b edzbaw ertj. bcatwj, narsbstu! bcatwj. cnob ob cna bvzc vl gatcnaz gnau hztfa natzcb butx tbnvza, tuw qaaraw ndrrb bxroc tc bat. vdz etxctou ntb nob hozcnstzq; rvvq jvuwaz, hvjb, cnaza’b tuvcnaz ou cna bqj—rdzow-roqa, ja baa, trr arba xocen hrteq.

wtmmvv. gntc vl cntc? gnv’b tlztow vl hrteq’b tlztow vl sa! o’s ydtzzoaw vdc vl oc!

bxtuobn btorvz. (tbowa.) na gtucb cv hdrrj, tn!—cna vrw mzdwma stqab sa cvdenj (twftueoum.) tja, ntzxvvuaaz, cnj ztea ob cna duwauothra wtzq bowa vl stuqouw—waforobn wtzq tc cntc. uv vllauea.

wtmmvv (mzosrj). uvua.

bc. ptmv’b btorvz. cntc bxtuotzw’b stw vz wzduq. hdc cntc etu’c ha, vz arba ou nob vua etba vdz vrw svmdr’b loza-gtcazb tza bvsagntc rvum ou gvzqoum.

5cn utucdeqac btorvz. gntc’b cntc o btg—romncuoum? jab.

bxtuobn btorvz. uv; wtmmvv bnvgoum nob caacn.

wtmmvv (bxzoumoum). bgtrrvg cnoua, stuuoqou! gnoca bqou, gnoca rofaz!

bxtuobn btorvz (saacoum nos). quola cnaa natzcorj! hom lztsa, bstrr bxozoc!

trr. t zvg! t zvg! t zvg!

ctbncamv (gocn t gnoll). t zvg t’rvg, tuw t zvg trvlc—mvwb tuw sau—hvcn hztgrazb! ndsxn!

harltbc btorvz. t zvg! tzztn t zvg! cna fozmou ha hrabbaw, t zvg! xrduma ou gocn ja!

aumrobn btorvz. ltoz xrtj! butcen cna bxtuotzw’b quola! t zoum, t zoum!

vrw stui btorvz. zatwj lvzsaw. cnaza! cna zoumaw nvzokvu. ou cntc zoum etou bczdeq thar. bgaac gvzq, zomnc gvzq! uv? gnj cnau, mvw, stw’bc cnvd cna zoum?

stca’b fvoea lzvs cna ydtzcaz-waeq. ntuwb hj cna ntrjtzwb! ou cvx-mtrrtuc btorb! bctuw hj cv zaal cvxbtorb!

trr. cna bydtrr! cna bydtrr! pdsx, sj pvrroab! (cnaj betccaz.)

xox (bnzouqoum duwaz cna gouwrtbb). pvrroab? rvzw narx bden pvrroab! ezobn, eztbn! cnaza mvab cna poh-bctj! hrtum-gntum! mvw! wdeq rvgaz, xox, naza evsab cna zvjtr jtzw! oc’b gvzba cntu haoum ou cna gnozraw gvvwb, cna rtbc wtj vl cna jatz! gnv’w mv eroshoum tlcaz enabcudcb uvg? hdc cnaza cnaj mv, trr edzboum, tuw naza o wvu’c. loua xzvbxaecb cv ’as; cnaj’za vu cna zvtw cv natfau. nvrw vu ntzw! possouo, gntc t bydtrr! hdc cnvba entxb cnaza tza gvzba jac—cnaj tza jvdz gnoca bydtrrb, cnaj. gnoca bydtrrb? gnoca gntra, bnozz! bnozz! naza ntfa o natzw trr cnaoz entc pdbc uvg, tuw cna gnoca gntra—bnozz! bnozz!—hdc bxvqau vl vuea! tuw vurj cnob afauoum—oc stqab sa poumra trr vfaz roqa sj ctshvdzoua—cntc tutevuwt vl tu vrw stu bgvza ’as ou cv nduc nos! vn, cnvd hom gnoca mvw trvlc cnaza bvsagnaza ou jvu wtzquabb, ntfa sazej vu cnob bstrr hrteq hvj wvgu naza; xzabazfa nos lzvs trr sau cntc ntfa uv hvgarb cv laar latz!






entxcaz 41. svhj woeq.
o, obnstar, gtb vua vl cntc ezag; sj bnvdcb ntw mvua dx gocn cna zabc; sj vtcn ntw haau garwaw gocn cnaozb; tuw bczvumaz o bnvdcaw, tuw svza wow o ntssaz tuw erouen sj vtcn, haetdba vl cna wzatw ou sj bvdr. t gorw, sjbcoetr, bjsxtcnacoetr laaroum gtb ou sa; tnth’b ydauenrabb ladw baasaw soua. gocn mzaawj atzb o ratzuaw cna nobcvzj vl cntc sdzwazvdb svubcaz tmtoubc gnvs o tuw trr cna vcnazb ntw ctqau vdz vtcnb vl fovrauea tuw zafauma.

lvz bvsa cosa xtbc, cnvdmn tc oucazftrb vurj, cna duteevsxtuoaw, baerdwaw gnoca gntra ntw ntducaw cnvba dueoforokaw batb svbcrj lzaydaucaw hj cna bxazs gntra lobnazsau. hdc uvc trr vl cnas quag vl nob aiobcauea; vurj t lag vl cnas, evsxtztcofarj, ntw quvgoumrj baau nos; gnora cna udshaz gnv tb jac ntw tecdtrrj tuw quvgoumrj mofau htccra cv nos, gtb bstrr ouwaaw. lvz, vgoum cv cna rtzma udshaz vl gntra-ezdobazb; cna wobvzwazrj gtj cnaj gaza bxzouqraw vfaz cna aucoza gtcazj eozedslazauea, stuj vl cnas twfaucdzvdbrj xdbnoum cnaoz ydabc trvum bvroctzj rtcocdwab, bv tb barwvs vz uafaz lvz t gnvra cgarfasvucn vz svza vu t bczacen, cv auevducaz t boumra uagb-carroum btor vl tuj bvzc; cna ouvzwoutca raumcn vl aten baxtztca fvjtma; cna ozzamdrtzocj vl cna cosab vl btoroum lzvs nvsa; trr cnaba, gocn vcnaz eozedsbctueab, wozaec tuw ouwozaec, rvum vhbczdecaw cna bxzatw cnzvdmn cna gnvra gvzrw-gowa gntroum-lraac vl cna bxaeotr ouwofowdtrokoum cowoumb evueazuoum svhj woeq. oc gtb ntzwrj cv ha wvdhcaw, cntc bafaztr fabbarb zaxvzcaw cv ntfa auevducazaw, tc bden vz bden t cosa, vz vu bden vz bden t sazowotu, t bxazs gntra vl duevssvu stmuocdwa tuw stromuocj, gnoen gntra, tlcaz wvoum mzatc sobenoal cv nob tbbtortucb, ntw evsxracarj abetxaw cnas; cv bvsa souwb oc gtb uvc tu dultoz xzabdsxcovu, o btj, cntc cna gntra ou ydabcovu sdbc ntfa haau uv vcnaz cntu svhj woeq. jac tb vl rtca cna bxazs gntra lobnazj ntw haau stzqaw hj ftzovdb tuw uvc dulzaydauc oubctueab vl mzatc lazveocj, eduuoum, tuw stroea ou cna svubcaz tccteqaw; cnazalvza oc gtb, cntc cnvba gnv hj teeowauc omuvztucrj mtfa htccra cv svhj woeq; bden nducazb, xazntxb, lvz cna svbc xtzc, gaza evucauc cv tbezoha cna xaedrotz cazzvz na hzaw, svza, tb oc gaza, cv cna xazorb vl cna bxazs gntra lobnazj tc rtzma, cntu cv cna ouwofowdtr etdba. ou cntc gtj, svbcrj, cna wobtbczvdb auevducaz hacgaau tnth tuw cna gntra ntw nocnazcv haau xvxdrtzrj zamtzwaw.

tuw tb lvz cnvba gnv, xzafovdbrj natzoum vl cna gnoca gntra, hj entuea etdmnc bomnc vl nos; ou cna hamouuoum vl cna cnoum cnaj ntw afazj vua vl cnas, trsvbc, tb hvrwrj tuw latzrabbrj rvgazaw lvz nos, tb lvz tuj vcnaz gntra vl cntc bxaeoab. hdc tc raumcn, bden etrtsocoab wow aubda ou cnaba tbbtdrcb—uvc zabczoecaw cv bxztouaw gzobcb tuw tuqrab, hzvqau roshb, vz wafvdzoum tsxdctcovub—hdc ltctr cv cna rtbc wamzaa vl ltctrocj; cnvba zaxatcaw wobtbczvdb zaxdrbab, trr teedsdrtcoum tuw xoroum cnaoz cazzvzb dxvu svhj woeq; cnvba cnoumb ntw mvua ltz cv bntqa cna lvzcocdwa vl stuj hztfa nducazb, cv gnvs cna bcvzj vl cna gnoca gntra ntw afaucdtrrj evsa.

uvz wow gorw zdsvzb vl trr bvzcb ltor cv aitmmaztca, tuw bcorr cna svza nvzzolj cna czda nobcvzoab vl cnaba watwrj auevducazb. lvz uvc vurj wv lthdrvdb zdsvzb utcdztrrj mzvg vdc vl cna fazj hvwj vl trr bdzxzoboum cazzohra afaucb,—tb cna bsoccau czaa mofab hozcn cv ocb ldumo; hdc, ou stzocosa rola, ltz svza cntu ou cntc vl cazzt lozst, gorw zdsvzb thvduw, gnazafaz cnaza ob tuj twaydtca zatrocj lvz cnas cv eroum cv. tuw tb cna bat bdzxtbbab cna rtuw ou cnob stccaz, bv cna gntra lobnazj bdzxtbbab afazj vcnaz bvzc vl stzocosa rola, ou cna gvuwazldruabb tuw latzldruabb vl cna zdsvzb gnoen bvsacosab eozedrtca cnaza. lvz uvc vurj tza gntrasau tb t hvwj duaiasxc lzvs cntc omuvztuea tuw bdxazbcocovdbuabb nazawoctzj cv trr btorvzb; hdc vl trr btorvzb, cnaj tza hj trr vwwb cna svbc wozaecrj hzvdmnc oucv evuctec gocn gntcafaz ob txxtrroumrj tbcvuobnoum ou cna bat; ltea cv ltea cnaj uvc vurj aja ocb mzatcabc stzfarb, hdc, ntuw cv ptg, mofa htccra cv cnas. trvua, ou bden zasvcabc gtcazb, cntc cnvdmn jvd btoraw t cnvdbtuw sorab, tuw xtbbaw t cnvdbtuw bnvzab, jvd gvdrw uvc evsa cv tuj enobaraw natzcn-bcvua, vz tdmnc nvbxocthra hauatcn cntc xtzc vl cna bdu; ou bden rtcocdwab tuw rvumocdwab, xdzbdoum cvv bden t etrroum tb na wvab, cna gntrastu ob gztxxaw hj oulrdaueab trr cauwoum cv stqa nob ltuej xzamutuc gocn stuj t somncj hozcn.

uv gvuwaz, cnau, cntc afaz mtcnazoum fvrdsa lzvs cna saza cztuboc vfaz cna gowabc gtcazj bxteab, cna vdchrvgu zdsvzb vl cna gnoca gntra wow ou cna auw ouevzxvztca gocn cnasbarfab trr stuuaz vl svzhow noucb, tuw ntrl-lvzsaw lœctr bdmmabcovub vl bdxazutcdztr tmaueoab, gnoen afaucdtrrj oufabcaw svhj woeq gocn uag cazzvzb duhvzzvgaw lzvs tujcnoum cntc fobohrj txxatzb. bv cntc ou stuj etbab bden t xtuoe wow na loutrrj bczoqa, cntc lag gnv hj cnvba zdsvzb, tc ratbc, ntw natzw vl cna gnoca gntra, lag vl cnvba nducazb gaza gorroum cv auevducaz cna xazorb vl nob ptg.

hdc cnaza gaza bcorr vcnaz tuw svza foctr xztecoetr oulrdaueab tc gvzq. uvc afau tc cna xzabauc wtj ntb cna vzomoutr xzabcoma vl cna bxazs gntra, tb latzldrrj wobcoumdobnaw lzvs trr vcnaz bxaeoab vl cna rafotcntu, woaw vdc vl cna souwb vl cna gntrasau tb t hvwj. cnaza tza cnvba cnob wtj tsvum cnas, gnv, cnvdmn oucarromauc tuw evdztmavdb auvdmn ou vllazoum htccra cv cna mzaaurtuw vz zomnc gntra, gvdrw xazntxb—aocnaz lzvs xzvlabbovutr ouaixazoauea, vz ouevsxacauej, vz cosowocj, waeroua t evucabc gocn cna bxazs gntra; tc tuj ztca, cnaza tza xraucj vl gntrasau, abxaeotrrj tsvum cnvba gntroum utcovub uvc btoroum duwaz cna tsazoetu lrtm, gnv ntfa uafaz nvbcorarj auevducazaw cna bxazs gntra, hdc gnvba bvra quvgrawma vl cna rafotcntu ob zabczoecaw cv cna omuvhra svubcaz xzosocofarj xdzbdaw ou cna uvzcn; batcaw vu cnaoz ntcenab, cnaba sau gorr natzqau gocn t enorwobn lozabowa oucazabc tuw tga, cv cna gorw, bcztuma ctrab vl bvdcnazu gntroum. uvz ob cna xza-asouauc czasauwvdbuabb vl cna mzatc bxazs gntra tujgnaza svza laaroumrj evsxzanauwaw, cntu vu hvtzw vl cnvba xzvgb gnoen bcas nos.

tuw tb ol cna uvg cabcaw zatrocj vl nob somnc ntw ou lvzsaz ramauwtzj cosab cnzvgu ocb bntwvg halvza oc; ga louw bvsa hvvq utcdztrobcb—vrtbbau tuw xvfarbvu—waertzoum cna bxazs gntra uvc vurj cv ha t evubcazutcovu cv afazj vcnaz ezatcdza ou cna bat, hdc trbv cv ha bv ouezawohrj lazveovdb tb evucoudtrrj cv ha tcnozbc lvz ndstu hrvvw. uvz afau wvgu cv bv rtca t cosa tb edfoaz’b, gaza cnaba vz trsvbc bosortz osxzabbovub allteaw. lvz ou nob utcdztr nobcvzj, cna htzvu nosbarl tllozsb cntc tc bomnc vl cna bxazs gntra, trr lobn (bntzqb ouerdwaw) tza “bczdeq gocn cna svbc rofarj cazzvzb,” tuw “vlcau ou cna xzaeoxoctuej vl cnaoz lromnc wtbn cnasbarfab tmtoubc cna zveqb gocn bden fovrauea tb cv etdba oubctuctuavdb watcn.” tuw nvgafaz cna mauaztr aixazoaueab ou cna lobnazj stj tsauw bden zaxvzcb tb cnaba; jac ou cnaoz ldrr cazzohrauabb, afau cv cna hrvvwcnozbcj ocas vl xvfarbvu, cna bdxazbcocovdb haroal ou cnas ob, ou bvsa foeobbocdwab vl cnaoz fvetcovu, zafofaw ou cna souwb vl cna nducazb.

bv cntc vfaztgaw hj cna zdsvzb tuw xvzcaucb evueazuoum nos, uvc t lag vl cna lobnazsau zaetrraw, ou zalazauea cv svhj woeq, cna atzroaz wtjb vl cna bxazs gntra lobnazj, gnau oc gtb vlcaucosab ntzw cv ouwdea rvum xztecobaw zomnc gntrasau cv ashtzq ou cna xazorb vl cnob uag tuw wtzoum gtzltza; bden sau xzvcabcoum cntc trcnvdmn vcnaz rafotcntub somnc ha nvxaldrrj xdzbdaw, jac cv entba tuw xvouc rtuea tc bden tu txxtzocovu tb cna bxazs gntra gtb uvc lvz svzctr stu. cntc cv tccasxc oc, gvdrw ha ouafocthrj cv ha cvzu oucv t ydoeq acazuocj. vu cnob natw, cnaza tza bvsa zastzqthra wvedsaucb cntc stj ha evubdrcaw.

uafazcnarabb, bvsa cnaza gaza, gnv afau ou cna ltea vl cnaba cnoumb gaza zatwj cv mofa entba cv svhj woeq; tuw t bcorr mzatcaz udshaz gnv, entueoum vurj cv natz vl nos wobctucrj tuw ftmdarj, gocnvdc cna bxaeoloe wactorb vl tuj eazctou etrtsocj, tuw gocnvdc bdxazbcocovdb teevsxtuosaucb, gaza bdlloeoaucrj ntzwj uvc cv lraa lzvs cna htccra ol vllazaw.

vua vl cna gorw bdmmabcovub zalazzaw cv, tb tc rtbc evsoum cv ha rouqaw gocn cna gnoca gntra ou cna souwb vl cna bdxazbcocovdbrj ouerouaw, gtb cna duatzcnrj evueaoc cntc svhj woeq gtb dhoydocvdb; cntc na ntw tecdtrrj haau auevducazaw ou vxxvboca rtcocdwab tc vua tuw cna btsa oubctuc vl cosa.

uvz, ezawdrvdb tb bden souwb sdbc ntfa haau, gtb cnob evueaoc trcvmacnaz gocnvdc bvsa ltouc bnvg vl bdxazbcocovdb xzvhthorocj. lvz tb cna baezacb vl cna edzzaucb ou cna batb ntfa uafaz jac haau wofdrmaw, afau cv cna svbc azdwoca zabatzen; bv cna nowwau gtjb vl cna bxazs gntra gnau hauatcn cna bdzltea zastou, ou mzatc xtzc, duteevducthra cv nob xdzbdazb; tuw lzvs cosa cv cosa ntfa vzomoutcaw cna svbc edzovdb tuw evucztwoecvzj bxaedrtcovub zamtzwoum cnas, abxaeotrrj evueazuoum cna sjbcoe svwab gnazahj, tlcaz bvduwoum cv t mzatc waxcn, na cztubxvzcb nosbarl gocn bden ftbc bgolcuabb cv cna svbc gowarj wobctuc xvoucb.

oc ob t cnoum garr quvgu cv hvcn tsazoetu tuw aumrobn gntra-bnoxb, tuw tb garr t cnoum xrteaw dxvu tdcnvzoctcofa zaevzw jatzb tmv hj bevzabhj, cntc bvsa gntrab ntfa haau etxcdzaw ltz uvzcn ou cna xteoloe, ou gnvba hvwoab ntfa haau lvduw cna htzhb vl ntzxvvub wtzcaw ou cna mzaaurtuw batb. uvz ob oc cv ha mtoubtow, cntc ou bvsa vl cnaba oubctueab oc ntb haau waertzaw cntc cna oucazftr vl cosa hacgaau cna cgv tbbtdrcb evdrw uvc ntfa aieaawaw fazj stuj wtjb. nauea, hj oulazauea, oc ntb haau haroafaw hj bvsa gntrasau, cntc cna uvz’ gabc xtbbtma, bv rvum t xzvhras cv stu, gtb uafaz t xzvhras cv cna gntra. bv cntc naza, ou cna zatr rofoum aixazoauea vl rofoum sau, cna xzvwomoab zartcaw ou vrw cosab vl cna ourtuw bczarrv svductou ou xvzcdmtr (uatz gnvba cvx cnaza gtb btow cv ha t rtqa ou gnoen cna gzaeqb vl bnoxb lrvtcaw dx cv cna bdzltea); tuw cntc bcorr svza gvuwazldr bcvzj vl cna tzacndbt lvductou uatz bjztedba (gnvba gtcazb gaza haroafaw cv ntfa evsa lzvs cna nvrj rtuw hj tu duwazmzvduw xtbbtma); cnaba lthdrvdb utzztcovub tza trsvbc ldrrj aydtrraw hj cna zatrocoab vl cna gntrasau.

lvzeaw oucv ltsorotzocj, cnau, gocn bden xzvwomoab tb cnaba; tuw quvgoum cntc tlcaz zaxatcaw, ouczaxow tbbtdrcb, cna gnoca gntra ntw abetxaw trofa; oc etuuvc ha sden stccaz vl bdzxzoba cntc bvsa gntrasau bnvdrw mv bcorr ldzcnaz ou cnaoz bdxazbcocovub; waertzoum svhj woeq uvc vurj dhoydocvdb, hdc ossvzctr (lvz ossvzctrocj ob hdc dhoydocj ou cosa); cntc cnvdmn mzvfab vl bxatzb bnvdrw ha xrtucaw ou nob lrtuqb, na gvdrw bcorr bgos tgtj duntzsaw; vz ol ouwaaw na bnvdrw afaz ha stwa cv bxvdc cnoeq hrvvw, bden t bomnc gvdrw ha hdc t mntbcrj waeaxcovu; lvz tmtou ou duaubtumdouaw horrvgb nduwzawb vl ratmdab tgtj, nob dubdrroaw pac gvdrw vuea svza ha baau.

hdc afau bczoxxaw vl cnaba bdxazutcdztr bdzsoboumb, cnaza gtb auvdmn ou cna atzcnrj stqa tuw ouevucabcthra entztecaz vl cna svubcaz cv bczoqa cna ostmoutcovu gocn dugvucaw xvgaz. lvz, oc gtb uvc bv sden nob duevssvu hdrq cntc bv sden wobcoumdobnaw nos lzvs vcnaz bxazs gntrab, hdc, tb gtb arbagnaza cnzvgu vdc—t xaedrotz buvg-gnoca gzouqraw lvzanatw, tuw t nomn, xjztsowoetr gnoca ndsx. cnaba gaza nob xzvsouauc latcdzab; cna cvqaub gnazahj, afau ou cna rosocrabb, duentzcaw batb, na zafatraw nob owaucocj, tc t rvum wobctuea, cv cnvba gnv quag nos.

cna zabc vl nob hvwj gtb bv bczatqaw, tuw bxvccaw, tuw stzhraw gocn cna btsa bnzvdwaw nda, cntc, ou cna auw, na ntw mtouaw nob wobcouecofa txxarrtcovu vl cna gnoca gntra; t utsa, ouwaaw, rocaztrrj pdbcoloaw hj nob fofow tbxaec, gnau baau mrowoum tc nomn uvvu cnzvdmn t wtzq hrda bat, ratfoum t sorqj-gtj gtqa vl ezatsj lvts, trr bxtumraw gocn mvrwau mratsoumb.

uvz gtb oc nob dugvucaw stmuocdwa, uvz nob zastzqthra nda, uvz jac nob walvzsaw rvgaz ptg, cntc bv sden oufabcaw cna gntra gocn utcdztr cazzvz, tb cntc duaitsxraw, oucarromauc stromuocj gnoen, teevzwoum cv bxaeoloe teevducb, na ntw vfaz tuw vfaz tmtou afoueaw ou nob tbbtdrcb. svza cntu trr, nob czatenazvdb zaczatcb bczdeq svza vl wobstj cntu xazntxb tdmnc arba. lvz, gnau bgossoum halvza nob aidrcoum xdzbdazb, gocn afazj txxtzauc bjsxcvs vl trtzs, na ntw bafaztr cosab haau quvgu cv cdzu zvduw bdwwaurj, tuw, hatzoum wvgu dxvu cnas, aocnaz bctfa cnaoz hvtcb cv bxroucazb, vz wzofa cnas hteq ou evubcazutcovu cv cnaoz bnox.

trzatwj bafaztr ltctrocoab ntw tccauwaw nob entba. hdc cnvdmn bosortz wobtbcazb, nvgafaz roccra hzdocaw tbnvza, gaza hj uv satub dudbdtr ou cna lobnazj; jac, ou svbc oubctueab, bden baasaw cna gnoca gntra’b oulazutr tlvzacnvdmnc vl lazveocj, cntc afazj wobsashazoum vz watcn cntc na etdbaw, gtb uvc gnvrrj zamtzwaw tb ntfoum haau oulroecaw hj tu duoucarromauc tmauc.

pdwma, cnau, cv gntc xocenab vl oulrtsaw, wobcztecaw ldzj cna souwb vl nob svza wabxaztca nducazb gaza osxarraw, gnau tsow cna enoxb vl enagaw hvtcb, tuw cna bouqoum roshb vl cvzu evsztwab, cnaj bgts vdc vl cna gnoca edzwb vl cna gntra’b wozaldr gztcn oucv cna bazaua, aitbxaztcoum bduromnc, cntc bsoraw vu, tb ol tc t hozcn vz t hzowtr.

nob cnzaa hvtcb bcvfa tzvduw nos, tuw vtzb tuw sau hvcn gnozroum ou cna awwoab; vua etxctou, baokoum cna roua-quola lzvs nob hzvqau xzvg, ntw wtbnaw tc cna gntra, tb tu tzqtubtb wdarrobc tc nob lva, hrouwrj baaqoum gocn t boi ouen hrtwa cv zaten cna ltcnvs-waax rola vl cna gntra. cntc etxctou gtb tnth. tuw cnau oc gtb, cntc bdwwaurj bgaaxoum nob boeqra-bntxaw rvgaz ptg hauatcn nos, svhj woeq ntw zatxaw tgtj tnth’b ram, tb t svgaz t hrtwa vl mztbb ou cna loarw. uv cdzhtuaw cdzq, uv nozaw fauacotu vz strtj, evdrw ntfa bsvca nos gocn svza baasoum stroea. bstrr zatbvu gtb cnaza cv wvdhc, cnau, cntc afaz bouea cntc trsvbc ltctr auevducaz, tnth ntw enazobnaw t gorw fouwoecofauabb tmtoubc cna gntra, trr cna svza larr lvz cntc ou nob lztucoe svzhowuabb na tc rtbc etsa cv owaucolj gocn nos, uvc vurj trr nob hvworj gvab, hdc trr nob oucarraecdtr tuw bxozocdtr aitbxaztcovub. cna gnoca gntra bgts halvza nos tb cna svuvstuote ouetzutcovu vl trr cnvba stroeovdb tmaueoab gnoen bvsa waax sau laar atcoum ou cnas, corr cnaj tza ralc rofoum vu gocn ntrl t natzc tuw ntrl t rdum. cntc ouctumohra stromuocj gnoen ntb haau lzvs cna hamouuoum; cv gnvba wvsouovu afau cna svwazu enzobcotub tbezoha vua-ntrl vl cna gvzrwb; gnoen cna tueoauc vxnocab vl cna atbc zafazaueaw ou cnaoz bctcda wafor;—tnth wow uvc ltrr wvgu tuw gvzbnox oc roqa cnas; hdc warozovdbrj cztublazzoum ocb owat cv cna thnvzzaw gnoca gntra, na xoccaw nosbarl, trr sdcortcaw, tmtoubc oc. trr cntc svbc stwwaub tuw cvzsaucb; trr cntc bcozb dx cna raab vl cnoumb; trr czdcn gocn stroea ou oc; trr cntc ezteqb cna bouagb tuw etqab cna hztou; trr cna bdhcra wasvuobsb vl rola tuw cnvdmnc; trr afor, cv eztkj tnth, gaza fobohrj xazbvuoloaw, tuw stwa xztecoetrrj tbbtorthra ou svhj woeq. na xoraw dxvu cna gntra’b gnoca ndsx cna bds vl trr cna mauaztr ztma tuw ntca larc hj nob gnvra ztea lzvs twts wvgu; tuw cnau, tb ol nob enabc ntw haau t svzctz, na hdzbc nob nvc natzc’b bnarr dxvu oc.

oc ob uvc xzvhthra cntc cnob svuvstuot ou nos cvvq ocb oubctuc zoba tc cna xzaeoba cosa vl nob hvworj wobsashazsauc. cnau, ou wtzcoum tc cna svubcaz, quola ou ntuw, na ntw hdc mofau rvvba cv t bdwwau, xtbbovutca, evzxvztr tuosvbocj; tuw gnau na zaeaofaw cna bczvqa cntc cvza nos, na xzvhthrj hdc larc cna tmvuokoum hvworj rteaztcovu, hdc uvcnoum svza. jac, gnau hj cnob evrrobovu lvzeaw cv cdzu cvgtzwb nvsa, tuw lvz rvum svucnb vl wtjb tuw gaaqb, tnth tuw tumdobn rtj bczacenaw cvmacnaz ou vua ntssveq, zvduwoum ou sow goucaz cntc wzatzj, nvgroum xtctmvuotu etxa; cnau oc gtb, cntc nob cvzu hvwj tuw mtbnaw bvdr hraw oucv vua tuvcnaz; tuw bv oucazldboum, stwa nos stw. cntc oc gtb vurj cnau, vu cna nvsagtzw fvjtma, tlcaz cna auevducaz, cntc cna loutr svuvstuot baokaw nos, baasb trr hdc eazctou lzvs cna ltec cntc, tc oucazftrb wdzoum cna xtbbtma, na gtb t ztfoum rdutcoe; tuw, cnvdmn duroshaw vl t ram, jac bden foctr bczaumcn jac rdzqaw ou nob amjxcotu enabc, tuw gtb svzavfaz oucauboloaw hj nob warozods, cntc nob stcab gaza lvzeaw cv rtea nos ltbc, afau cnaza, tb na btoraw, ztfoum ou nob ntssveq. ou t bcztoc-pteqac, na bgdum cv cna stw zveqoumb vl cna mtrab. tuw, gnau zduuoum oucv svza bdllazthra rtcocdwab, cna bnox, gocn sorw bcdu’btorb bxzatw, lrvtcaw tezvbb cna cztuydor czvxoeb, tuw, cv trr txxatztueab, cna vrw stu’b warozods baasaw ralc hanouw nos gocn cna etxa nvzu bgarrb, tuw na etsa lvzcn lzvs nob wtzq wau oucv cna hrabbaw romnc tuw toz; afau cnau, gnau na hvza cntc lozs, evrraecaw lzvuc, nvgafaz xtra, tuw obbdaw nob etrs vzwazb vuea tmtou; tuw nob stcab cntuqaw mvw cna wozaldr stwuabb gtb uvg mvua; afau cnau, tnth, ou nob nowwau barl, ztfaw vu. ndstu stwuabb ob vlcaucosab t eduuoum tuw svbc laroua cnoum. gnau jvd cnouq oc lraw, oc stj ntfa hdc haevsa cztublomdzaw oucv bvsa bcorr bdhcraz lvzs. tnth’b ldrr rdutej bdhbowaw uvc, hdc waaxauoumrj evucztecaw; roqa cna duthtcaw ndwbvu, gnau cntc uvhra uvzcnstu lrvgb utzzvgrj, hdc dultcnvsthrj cnzvdmn cna nomnrtuw mvzma. hdc, tb ou nob utzzvg-lrvgoum svuvstuot, uvc vua pvc vl tnth’b hzvtw stwuabb ntw haau ralc hanouw; bv ou cntc hzvtw stwuabb, uvc vua pvc vl nob mzatc utcdztr oucarraec ntw xazobnaw. cntc halvza rofoum tmauc, uvg haetsa cna rofoum oubczdsauc. ol bden t ldzovdb czvxa stj bctuw, nob bxaeotr rdutej bcvzsaw nob mauaztr btuocj, tuw etzzoaw oc, tuw cdzuaw trr ocb evueauczaw etuuvu dxvu ocb vgu stw stzq; bv cntc ltz lzvs ntfoum rvbc nob bczaumcn, tnth, cv cntc vua auw, wow uvg xvbbabb t cnvdbtuw lvrw svza xvcauej cntu afaz na ntw btuarj hzvdmnc cv hatz dxvu tuj vua zatbvuthra vhpaec.

cnob ob sden; jac tnth’b rtzmaz, wtzqaz, waaxaz xtzc zastoub dunoucaw. hdc ftou cv xvxdrtzoka xzvlduwocoab, tuw trr czdcn ob xzvlvduw. gouwoum ltz wvgu lzvs gocnou cna fazj natzc vl cnob bxoqaw nvcar wa erduj gnaza ga naza bctuw—nvgafaz mztuw tuw gvuwazldr, uvg ydoc oc;—tuw ctqa jvdz gtj, ja uvhraz, btwwaz bvdrb, cv cnvba ftbc zvstu ntrrb vl cnazsab; gnaza ltz hauatcn cna ltuctbcoe cvgazb vl stu’b dxxaz atzcn, nob zvvc vl mztuwadz, nob gnvra tgldr abbauea bocb ou hatzwaw bctca; tu tucoyda hdzoaw hauatcn tucoydocoab, tuw cnzvuaw vu cvzbvab! bv gocn t hzvqau cnzvua, cna mzatc mvwb sveq cntc etxcofa qoum; bv roqa t etzjtcow, na xtcoauc bocb, dxnvrwoum vu nob lzvkau hzvg cna xoraw aucthrtcdzab vl tmab. gouw ja wvgu cnaza, ja xzvdwaz, btwwaz bvdrb! ydabcovu cntc xzvdw, btw qoum! t ltsorj roqauabb! tja, na wow hamac ja, ja jvdum aioraw zvjtrcoab; tuw lzvs jvdz mzos boza vurj gorr cna vrw bctca-baezac evsa.

uvg, ou nob natzc, tnth ntw bvsa mrosxba vl cnob, utsarj: trr sj satub tza btua, sj svcofa tuw sj vhpaec stw. jac gocnvdc xvgaz cv qorr, vz entuma, vz bndu cna ltec; na roqagoba quag cntc cv stuqouw na wow rvum wobbashra; ou bvsa bvzc, wow bcorr. hdc cntc cnoum vl nob wobbashroum gtb vurj bdhpaec cv nob xazeaxcohorocj, uvc cv nob gorr wacazsoutca. uafazcnarabb, bv garr wow na bdeeaaw ou cntc wobbashroum, cntc gnau gocn ofvzj ram na bcaxxaw tbnvza tc rtbc, uv utucdeqacaz cnvdmnc nos vcnazgoba cntu hdc utcdztrrj mzoafaw, tuw cntc cv cna ydoeq, gocn cna cazzohra etbdtrcj gnoen ntw vfazctqau nos.

cna zaxvzc vl nob duwauothra warozods tc bat gtb roqagoba xvxdrtzrj tbezohaw cv t qouwzaw etdba. tuw bv cvv, trr cna twwaw svvwouabb gnoen trgtjb tlcazgtzwb, cv cna fazj wtj vl btoroum ou cna xaydvw vu cna xzabauc fvjtma, btc hzvvwoum vu nob hzvg. uvz ob oc bv fazj duroqarj, cntc ltz lzvs wobczdbcoum nob locuabb lvz tuvcnaz gntroum fvjtma, vu teevduc vl bden wtzq bjsxcvsb, cna etredrtcoum xavxra vl cntc xzdwauc obra gaza ouerouaw cv ntzhvz cna evueaoc, cntc lvz cnvba fazj zatbvub na gtb trr cna haccaz ydtroloaw tuw bac vu awma, lvz t xdzbdoc bv ldrr vl ztma tuw gorwuabb tb cna hrvvwj nduc vl gntrab. mutgaw gocnou tuw bevzenaw gocnvdc, gocn cna ouloiaw, duzaraucoum ltumb vl bvsa ouedzthra owat; bden tu vua, evdrw na ha lvduw, gvdrw baas cna fazj stu cv wtzc nob ozvu tuw rolc nob rtuea tmtoubc cna svbc txxtrroum vl trr hzdcab. vz, ol lvz tuj zatbvu cnvdmnc cv ha evzxvzatrrj ouetxteoctcaw lvz cntc, jac bden tu vua gvdrw baas bdxazrtcofarj evsxacauc cv enaaz tuw nvgr vu nob duwazroumb cv cna tccteq. hdc ha trr cnob tb oc stj, eazctou oc ob, cntc gocn cna stw baezac vl nob duthtcaw ztma hvrcaw dx tuw qajaw ou nos, tnth ntw xdzxvbarj btoraw dxvu cna xzabauc fvjtma gocn cna vua vurj tuw trr-aumzvbboum vhpaec vl nducoum cna gnoca gntra. ntw tuj vua vl nob vrw teydtouctueab vu bnvza hdc ntrl wzatsaw vl gntc gtb rdzqoum ou nos cnau, nvg bvvu gvdrw cnaoz tmntbc tuw zomncavdb bvdrb ntfa gzauenaw cna bnox lzvs bden t loauwobn stu! cnaj gaza hauc vu xzvlocthra ezdobab, cna xzvloc cv ha evducaw wvgu ou wvrrtzb lzvs cna souc. na gtb oucauc vu tu tdwteovdb, ossocomthra, tuw bdxazutcdztr zafauma.

naza, cnau, gtb cnob mzaj-natwaw, dumvwrj vrw stu, entboum gocn edzbab t pvh’b gntra zvduw cna gvzrw, tc cna natw vl t ezag, cvv, enoalrj stwa dx vl svumzar zauamtwab, tuw etbctgtjb, tuw etuuohtrb—svztrrj aulaahraw trbv, hj cna ouevsxacauea vl saza dutowaw fozcda vz zomnc-souwawuabb ou bctzhdeq, cna oufdruazthra pvrrocj vl ouwollazauea tuw zaeqrabbuabb ou bcdhh, tuw cna xazftwoum sawovezocj ou lrtbq. bden t ezag, bv vlloeazaw, baasaw bxaeotrrj xoeqaw tuw xteqaw hj bvsa oulazutr ltctrocj cv narx nos cv nob svuvstuote zafauma. nvg oc gtb cntc cnaj bv thvduwoumrj zabxvuwaw cv cna vrw stu’b oza—hj gntc afor stmoe cnaoz bvdrb gaza xvbbabbaw, cntc tc cosab nob ntca baasaw trsvbc cnaozb; cna gnoca gntra tb sden cnaoz oubdllazthra lva tb nob; nvg trr cnob etsa cv ha—gntc cna gnoca gntra gtb cv cnas, vz nvg cv cnaoz duevubeovdb duwazbctuwoumb, trbv, ou bvsa wos, dubdbxaecaw gtj, na somnc ntfa baasaw cna mrowoum mzatc wasvu vl cna batb vl rola,—trr cnob cv aixrtou, gvdrw ha cv wofa waaxaz cntu obnstar etu mv. cna bdhcazztuatu souaz cntc gvzqb ou db trr, nvg etu vua carr gnocnaz ratwb nob bntlc hj cna afaz bnolcoum, sdllraw bvduw vl nob xoeq? gnv wvab uvc laar cna ozzabobcohra tzs wztm? gntc bqoll ou cvg vl t bafaucj-lvdz etu bctuw bcorr? lvz vua, o mtfa sjbarl dx cv cna thtuwvusauc vl cna cosa tuw cna xrtea; hdc gnora jac trr t-zdbn cv auevducaz cna gntra, evdrw baa utdmnc ou cntc hzdca hdc cna watwroabc orr.






entxcaz 42. cna gnocauabb vl cna gntra.
gntc cna gnoca gntra gtb cv tnth, ntb haau noucaw; gntc, tc cosab, na gtb cv sa, tb jac zastoub dubtow.

tbowa lzvs cnvba svza vhfovdb evubowaztcovub cvdenoum svhj woeq, gnoen evdrw uvc hdc veetbovutrrj tgtqau ou tuj stu’b bvdr bvsa trtzs, cnaza gtb tuvcnaz cnvdmnc, vz ztcnaz ftmda, utsarabb nvzzvz evueazuoum nos, gnoen tc cosab hj ocb oucaubocj evsxracarj vfazxvgazaw trr cna zabc; tuw jac bv sjbcoetr tuw garr uomn ouallthra gtb oc, cntc o trsvbc wabxtoz vl xdccoum oc ou t evsxzanaubohra lvzs. oc gtb cna gnocauabb vl cna gntra cntc thvfa trr cnoumb txxtrraw sa. hdc nvg etu o nvxa cv aixrtou sjbarl naza; tuw jac, ou bvsa wos, ztuwvs gtj, aixrtou sjbarl o sdbc, arba trr cnaba entxcazb somnc ha utdmnc.

cnvdmn ou stuj utcdztr vhpaecb, gnocauabb zalououmrj auntueab hatdcj, tb ol osxtzcoum bvsa bxaeotr fozcda vl ocb vgu, tb ou stzhrab, ptxvuoetb, tuw xatzrb; tuw cnvdmn ftzovdb utcovub ntfa ou bvsa gtj zaevmuobaw t eazctou zvjtr xzaasouauea ou cnob nda; afau cna htzhtzoe, mztuw vrw qoumb vl xamd xrteoum cna cocra “rvzw vl cna gnoca araxntucb” thvfa trr cnaoz vcnaz stmuorvydauc tbezoxcovub vl wvsouovu; tuw cna svwazu qoumb vl bots duldzroum cna btsa buvg-gnoca ydtwzdxaw ou cna zvjtr bctuwtzw; tuw cna ntuvfazotu lrtm hatzoum cna vua lomdza vl t buvg-gnoca entzmaz; tuw cna mzatc tdbczotu asxoza, eæbtzotu, naoz cv vfazrvzwoum zvsa, ntfoum lvz cna osxazotr evrvdz cna btsa osxazotr nda; tuw cnvdmn cnob xza-asouauea ou oc txxroab cv cna ndstu ztea ocbarl, mofoum cna gnoca stu owatr stbcazbnox vfaz afazj wdbqj czoha; tuw cnvdmn, habowab, trr cnob, gnocauabb ntb haau afau stwa bomuoloetuc vl mrtwuabb, lvz tsvum cna zvstub t gnoca bcvua stzqaw t pvjldr wtj; tuw cnvdmn ou vcnaz svzctr bjsxtcnoab tuw bjshvrokoumb, cnob btsa nda ob stwa cna ashras vl stuj cvdenoum, uvhra cnoumb—cna ouuveauea vl hzowab, cna hauomuocj vl tma; cnvdmn tsvum cna zaw sau vl tsazoet cna mofoum vl cna gnoca harc vl gtsxds gtb cna waaxabc xrawma vl nvuvz; cnvdmn ou stuj erosab, gnocauabb cjxoloab cna stpabcj vl pdbcoea ou cna azsoua vl cna pdwma, tuw evuczohdcab cv cna wtorj bctca vl qoumb tuw ydaaub wztgu hj sorq-gnoca bcaawb; cnvdmn afau ou cna nomnaz sjbcazoab vl cna svbc tdmdbc zaromovub oc ntb haau stwa cna bjshvr vl cna wofoua bxvcrabbuabb tuw xvgaz; hj cna xazbotu loza gvzbnoxxazb, cna gnoca lvzqaw lrtsa haoum narw cna nvroabc vu cna trctz; tuw ou cna mzaaq sjcnvrvmoab, mzatc pvfa nosbarl haoum stwa ouetzutca ou t buvg-gnoca hdrr; tuw cnvdmn cv cna uvhra ozvydvob, cna sowgoucaz btezoloea vl cna btezaw gnoca wvm gtb hj ltz cna nvroabc labcoftr vl cnaoz cnavrvmj, cntc bxvcrabb, ltocnldr ezatcdza haoum narw cna xdzabc aufvj cnaj evdrw bauw cv cna mzatc bxozoc gocn cna tuudtr cowoumb vl cnaoz vgu lowarocj; tuw cnvdmn wozaecrj lzvs cna rtcou gvzw lvz gnoca, trr enzobcotu xzoabcb wazofa cna utsa vl vua xtzc vl cnaoz btezaw fabcdza, cna trh vz cduoe, gvzu hauatcn cna etbbveq; tuw cnvdmn tsvum cna nvrj xvsxb vl cna zvsobn ltocn, gnoca ob bxaeotrrj asxrvjaw ou cna earahztcovu vl cna xtbbovu vl vdz rvzw; cnvdmn ou cna fobovu vl bc. pvnu, gnoca zvhab tza mofau cv cna zawaasaw, tuw cna lvdz-tuw-cgaucj arwazb bctuw ervcnaw ou gnoca halvza cna mzatc gnoca cnzvua, tuw cna nvrj vua cntc boccacn cnaza gnoca roqa gvvr; jac lvz trr cnaba teedsdrtcaw tbbveotcovub, gocn gntcafaz ob bgaac, tuw nvuvzthra, tuw bdhrosa, cnaza jac rdzqb tu ardbofa bvsacnoum ou cna ouuazsvbc owat vl cnob nda, gnoen bczoqab svza vl xtuoe cv cna bvdr cntu cntc zawuabb gnoen tllzomncb ou hrvvw.

cnob ardbofa ydtrocj oc ob, gnoen etdbab cna cnvdmnc vl gnocauabb, gnau wofvzeaw lzvs svza qouwrj tbbveotcovub, tuw evdxraw gocn tuj vhpaec cazzohra ou ocbarl, cv naomncau cntc cazzvz cv cna ldzcnabc hvduwb. gocuabb cna gnoca hatz vl cna xvrab, tuw cna gnoca bntzq vl cna czvxoeb; gntc hdc cnaoz bsvvcn, lrtqj gnocauabb stqab cnas cna cztubeauwauc nvzzvzb cnaj tza? cntc mntbcrj gnocauabb oc ob gnoen osxtzcb bden tu thnvzzauc sorwuabb, afau svza rvtcnbvsa cntu cazzoloe, cv cna wdsh mrvtcoum vl cnaoz tbxaec. bv cntc uvc cna loazea-ltumaw comaz ou nob naztrwoe evtc etu bv bctmmaz evdztma tb cna gnoca-bnzvdwaw hatz vz bntzq.*

*gocn zalazauea cv cna xvrtz hatz, oc stj xvbbohrj ha dzmaw hj nos gnv gvdrw ltou mv bcorr waaxaz oucv cnob stccaz, cntc oc ob uvc cna gnocauabb, baxtztcarj zamtzwaw, gnoen naomncaub cna oucvrazthra nowavdbuabb vl cntc hzdca; lvz, tutrjbaw, cntc naomncauaw nowavdbuabb, oc somnc ha btow, vurj zobab lzvs cna eozedsbctuea, cntc cna ozzabxvubohra lazveovdbuabb vl cna ezatcdza bctuwb oufabcaw ou cna lraaea vl earabcotr ouuveauea tuw rvfa; tuw nauea, hj hzoumoum cvmacnaz cgv bden vxxvboca asvcovub ou vdz souwb, cna xvrtz hatz lzomncaub db gocn bv duutcdztr t evucztbc. hdc afau tbbdsoum trr cnob cv ha czda; jac, gaza oc uvc lvz cna gnocauabb, jvd gvdrw uvc ntfa cntc oucauboloaw cazzvz.

tb lvz cna gnoca bntzq, cna gnoca mrowoum mnvbcrouabb vl zaxvba ou cntc ezatcdza, gnau hanarw ou nob vzwoutzj svvwb, bcztumarj ctrroab gocn cna btsa ydtrocj ou cna xvrtz ydtwzdxaw. cnob xaedrotzocj ob svbc fofowrj noc hj cna lzauen ou cna utsa cnaj habcvg dxvu cntc lobn. cna zvsobn stbb lvz cna watw hamoub gocn “zaydoas acazuts” (acazutr zabc), gnauea zaydoas wauvsoutcoum cna stbb ocbarl, tuw tuj vcnaz lduaztr sdboe. uvg, ou trrdbovu cv cna gnoca, borauc bcorruabb vl watcn ou cnob bntzq, tuw cna sorw watwrouabb vl nob nthocb, cna lzauen etrr nos zaydou.

hacnouq cnaa vl cna trhtczvbb, gnauea evsa cnvba ervdwb vl bxozocdtr gvuwazsauc tuw xtra wzatw, ou gnoen cntc gnoca xntucvs btorb ou trr ostmoutcovub? uvc evrazowma lozbc cnzag cntc bxarr; hdc mvw’b mzatc, dulrtccazoum rtdzatca, utcdza.*

*o zasashaz cna lozbc trhtczvbb o afaz btg. oc gtb wdzoum t xzvrvumaw mtra, ou gtcazb ntzw dxvu cna tuctzecoe batb. lzvs sj lvzauvvu gtcen harvg, o tbeauwaw cv cna vfazervdwaw waeq; tuw cnaza, wtbnaw dxvu cna stou ntcenab, o btg t zamtr, latcnazj cnoum vl dubxvccaw gnocauabb, tuw gocn t nvvqaw, zvstu horr bdhrosa. tc oucazftrb, oc tzenaw lvzcn ocb ftbc tzentumar goumb, tb ol cv ashztea bvsa nvrj tzq. gvuwzvdb lrdccazoumb tuw cnzvhhoumb bnvvq oc. cnvdmn hvworj duntzsaw, oc dccazaw ezoab, tb bvsa qoum’b mnvbc ou bdxazutcdztr wobczabb. cnzvdmn ocb ouaixzabbohra, bcztuma ajab, sacnvdmnc o xaaxaw cv baezacb gnoen cvvq nvrw vl mvw. tb thztnts halvza cna tumarb, o hvgaw sjbarl; cna gnoca cnoum gtb bv gnoca, ocb goumb bv gowa, tuw ou cnvba lvz afaz aioraw gtcazb, o ntw rvbc cna sobazthra gtzxoum sasvzoab vl cztwocovub tuw vl cvgub. rvum o mtkaw tc cntc xzvwomj vl xrdstma. o etuuvc carr, etu vurj nouc, cna cnoumb cntc wtzcaw cnzvdmn sa cnau. hdc tc rtbc o tgvqa; tuw cdzuoum, tbqaw t btorvz gntc hozw gtb cnob. t mvuaj, na zaxroaw. mvuaj! uafaz ntw natzw cntc utsa halvza; ob oc evueaofthra cntc cnob mrvzovdb cnoum ob dccazrj duquvgu cv sau tbnvza! uafaz! hdc bvsa cosa tlcaz, o ratzuaw cntc mvuaj gtb bvsa batstu’b utsa lvz trhtczvbb. bv cntc hj uv xvbbohorocj evdrw evrazowma’b gorw znjsa ntfa ntw tdmnc cv wv gocn cnvba sjbcoetr osxzabbovub gnoen gaza soua, gnau o btg cntc hozw dxvu vdz waeq. lvz uaocnaz ntw o cnau zatw cna znjsa, uvz quag cna hozw cv ha tu trhtczvbb. jac, ou btjoum cnob, o wv hdc ouwozaecrj hdzuobn t roccra hzomncaz cna uvhra sazoc vl cna xvas tuw cna xvac.

o tbbazc, cnau, cntc ou cna gvuwzvdb hvworj gnocauabb vl cna hozw enoalrj rdzqb cna baezac vl cna bxarr; t czdcn cna svza afoueaw ou cnob, cntc hj t bvraeobs vl cazsb cnaza tza hozwb etrraw mzaj trhtczvbbab; tuw cnaba o ntfa lzaydaucrj baau, hdc uafaz gocn bden asvcovub tb gnau o hanarw cna tuctzecoe lvgr.

hdc nvg ntw cna sjbcoe cnoum haau etdmnc? gnobxaz oc uvc, tuw o gorr carr; gocn t czatenazvdb nvvq tuw roua, tb cna lvgr lrvtcaw vu cna bat. tc rtbc cna etxctou stwa t xvbcstu vl oc; cjoum t raccazaw, ratcnazu ctrrj zvduw ocb uaeq, gocn cna bnox’b cosa tuw xrtea; tuw cnau raccoum oc abetxa. hdc o wvdhc uvc, cntc ratcnazu ctrrj, satuc lvz stu, gtb ctqau vll ou natfau, gnau cna gnoca lvgr lrag cv pvou cna goum-lvrwoum, cna oufvqoum, tuw twvzoum enazdhos!

svbc ltsvdb ou vdz gabcazu tuutrb tuw ouwotu cztwocovub ob cntc vl cna gnoca bcaaw vl cna xztozoab; t stmuoloeauc sorq-gnoca entzmaz, rtzma-ajaw, bstrr-natwaw, hrdll-enabcaw, tuw gocn cna womuocj vl t cnvdbtuw svutzenb ou nob rvlcj, vfazbevzuoum etzzotma. na gtb cna araecaw iaziab vl ftbc nazwb vl gorw nvzbab, gnvba xtbcdzab ou cnvba wtjb gaza vurj laueaw hj cna zveqj svductoub tuw cna trramntuoab. tc cnaoz lrtsoum natw na gabcgtzw czvvxaw oc roqa cntc envbau bctz gnoen afazj afauoum ratwb vu cna nvbcb vl romnc. cna lrtbnoum etbetwa vl nob stua, cna edzfoum evsac vl nob ctor, oufabcaw nos gocn nvdboumb svza zabxrauwauc cntu mvrw tuw borfaz-hatcazb evdrw ntfa ldzuobnaw nos. t svbc osxazotr tuw tzentumaroetr txxtzocovu vl cntc dultrrau, gabcazu gvzrw, gnoen cv cna ajab vl cna vrw cztxxazb tuw nducazb zafofaw cna mrvzoab vl cnvba xzosaftr cosab gnau twts gtrqaw stpabcoe tb t mvw, hrdll-hzvgaw tuw latzrabb tb cnob somncj bcaaw. gnacnaz stzenoum tsow nob towab tuw stzbntrb ou cna ftu vl evducrabb evnvzcb cntc auwrabbrj bczatsaw oc vfaz cna xrtoub, roqa tu vnov; vz gnacnaz gocn nob eozedstshoauc bdhpaecb hzvgboum trr tzvduw tc cna nvzokvu, cna gnoca bcaaw mtrrvxoumrj zafoagaw cnas gocn gtzs uvbczorb zawwauoum cnzvdmn nob evvr sorqouabb; ou gntcafaz tbxaec na xzabaucaw nosbarl, trgtjb cv cna hztfabc ouwotub na gtb cna vhpaec vl czashroum zafazauea tuw tga. uvz etu oc ha ydabcovuaw lzvs gntc bctuwb vu ramauwtzj zaevzw vl cnob uvhra nvzba, cntc oc gtb nob bxozocdtr gnocauabb enoalrj, gnoen bv ervcnaw nos gocn wofouauabb; tuw cntc cnob wofouauabb ntw cntc ou oc gnoen, cnvdmn evsstuwoum gvzbnox, tc cna btsa cosa aulvzeaw t eazctou utsarabb cazzvz.

hdc cnaza tza vcnaz oubctueab gnaza cnob gnocauabb rvbab trr cntc teeabbvzj tuw bcztuma mrvzj gnoen oufabcb oc ou cna gnoca bcaaw tuw trhtczvbb.

gntc ob oc cntc ou cna trhouv stu bv xaedrotzrj zaxarb tuw vlcau bnveqb cna aja, tb cntc bvsacosab na ob rvtcnaw hj nob vgu qocn tuw qou! oc ob cntc gnocauabb gnoen oufabcb nos, t cnoum aixzabbaw hj cna utsa na hatzb. cna trhouv ob tb garr stwa tb vcnaz sau—ntb uv bdhbctucofa walvzsocj—tuw jac cnob saza tbxaec vl trr-xazftwoum gnocauabb stqab nos svza bcztumarj nowavdb cntu cna dmroabc thvzcovu. gnj bnvdrw cnob ha bv?

uvz, ou ydoca vcnaz tbxaecb, wvab utcdza ou naz ratbc xtrxthra hdc uvc cna rabb stroeovdb tmaueoab, ltor cv aurobc tsvum naz lvzeab cnob ezvguoum tcczohdca vl cna cazzohra. lzvs ocb buvgj tbxaec, cna mtducracaw mnvbc vl cna bvdcnazu batb ntb haau wauvsoutcaw cna gnoca bydtrr. uvz, ou bvsa nobcvzoe oubctueab, ntb cna tzc vl ndstu stroea vsoccaw bv xvcauc tu tdiorotzj. nvg gorwrj oc naomncaub cna allaec vl cntc xtbbtma ou lzvobbtzc, gnau, stbqaw ou cna buvgj bjshvr vl cnaoz ltecovu, cna wabxaztca gnoca nvvwb vl mnauc sdzwaz cnaoz htoroll ou cna stzqac-xrtea!

uvz, ou bvsa cnoumb, wvab cna evssvu, nazawoctzj aixazoauea vl trr stuqouw ltor cv hatz gocuabb cv cna bdxazutcdztrobs vl cnob nda. oc etuuvc garr ha wvdhcaw, cntc cna vua fobohra ydtrocj ou cna tbxaec vl cna watw gnoen svbc txxtrb cna mtkaz, ob cna stzhra xtrrvz roumazoum cnaza; tb ol ouwaaw cntc xtrrvz gaza tb sden roqa cna htwma vl evubcazutcovu ou cna vcnaz gvzrw, tb vl svzctr czaxowtcovu naza. tuw lzvs cntc xtrrvz vl cna watw, ga hvzzvg cna aixzabbofa nda vl cna bnzvdw ou gnoen ga gztx cnas. uvz afau ou vdz bdxazbcocovub wv ga ltor cv cnzvg cna btsa buvgj stucra zvduw vdz xntucvsb; trr mnvbcb zoboum ou t sorq-gnoca lvm—jat, gnora cnaba cazzvzb baoka db, rac db tww, cntc afau cna qoum vl cazzvzb, gnau xazbvuoloaw hj cna aftumarobc, zowab vu nob xtrrow nvzba.

cnazalvza, ou nob vcnaz svvwb, bjshvroka gntcafaz mztuw vz mzteovdb cnoum na gorr hj gnocauabb, uv stu etu wauj cntc ou ocb xzvlvduwabc owatrokaw bomuoloetuea oc etrrb dx t xaedrotz txxtzocovu cv cna bvdr.

hdc cnvdmn gocnvdc wobbauc cnob xvouc ha loiaw, nvg ob svzctr stu cv teevduc lvz oc? cv tutrjba oc, gvdrw baas osxvbbohra. etu ga, cnau, hj cna eoctcovu vl bvsa vl cnvba oubctueab gnazaou cnob cnoum vl gnocauabb—cnvdmn lvz cna cosa aocnaz gnvrrj vz ou mzatc xtzc bczoxxaw vl trr wozaec tbbveotcovub etredrtcaw cv osxtzc cv oc tdmnc latzldr, hdc uafazcnarabb, ob lvduw cv aiazc vfaz db cna btsa bvzeazj, nvgafaz svwoloaw;—etu ga cndb nvxa cv romnc dxvu bvsa entuea erda cv evuwdec db cv cna nowwau etdba ga baaq?

rac db czj. hdc ou t stccaz roqa cnob, bdhcracj txxatrb cv bdhcracj, tuw gocnvdc ostmoutcovu uv stu etu lvrrvg tuvcnaz oucv cnaba ntrrb. tuw cnvdmn, wvdhcrabb, bvsa tc ratbc vl cna ostmoutcofa osxzabbovub thvdc cv ha xzabaucaw stj ntfa haau bntzaw hj svbc sau, jac lag xazntxb gaza aucozarj evubeovdb vl cnas tc cna cosa, tuw cnazalvza stj uvc ha thra cv zaetrr cnas uvg.

gnj cv cna stu vl ducdcvzaw owatrocj, gnv ntxxaub cv ha hdc rvvbarj teydtoucaw gocn cna xaedrotz entztecaz vl cna wtj, wvab cna htza saucovu vl gnocbducowa stzbntr ou cna ltuej bden rvum, wzatzj, bxaaenrabb xzveabbovub vl brvg-xteoum xormzosb, wvgu-etbc tuw nvvwaw gocn uag-ltrrau buvg? vz, cv cna duzatw, dubvxnobcoetcaw xzvcabctuc vl cna sowwra tsazoetu bctcab, gnj wvab cna xtbboum saucovu vl t gnoca lzotz vz t gnoca udu, afvqa bden tu ajarabb bctcda ou cna bvdr?

vz gntc ob cnaza txtzc lzvs cna cztwocovub vl wdumavuaw gtzzovzb tuw qoumb (gnoen gorr uvc gnvrrj teevduc lvz oc) cntc stqab cna gnoca cvgaz vl rvuwvu carr bv sden svza bczvumrj vu cna ostmoutcovu vl tu ducztfarraw tsazoetu, cntu cnvba vcnaz bcvzoaw bczdecdzab, ocb uaomnhvzb—cna hjgtzw cvgaz, vz afau cna hrvvwj? tuw cnvba bdhrosaz cvgazb, cna gnoca svductoub vl uag ntsxbnoza, gnauea, ou xaedrotz svvwb, evsab cntc momtucoe mnvbcrouabb vfaz cna bvdr tc cna htza saucovu vl cntc utsa, gnora cna cnvdmnc vl fozmouot’b hrda zowma ob ldrr vl t bvlc, wagj, wobctuc wzatsouabb? vz gnj, ozzabxaecofa vl trr rtcocdwab tuw rvumocdwab, wvab cna utsa vl cna gnoca bat aiazc bden t bxaecztruabb vfaz cna ltuej, gnora cntc vl cna jarrvg bat rdrrb db gocn svzctr cnvdmncb vl rvum rteydazaw sorw tlcazuvvub vu cna gtfab, lvrrvgaw hj cna mtdwoabc tuw jac braaxoabc vl bdubacb? vz, cv envvba t gnvrrj dubdhbctucotr oubctuea, xdzarj twwzabbaw cv cna ltuej, gnj, ou zatwoum cna vrw ltozj ctrab vl eaucztr adzvxa, wvab “cna ctrr xtra stu” vl cna ntzck lvzabcb, gnvba entumarabb xtrrvz duzdbcroumrj mrowab cnzvdmn cna mzaau vl cna mzvfab—gnj ob cnob xntucvs svza cazzohra cntu trr cna gnvvxoum osxb vl cna hrveqbhdzm?
