uvz ob oc, trcvmacnaz, cna zasashztuea vl naz etcnawztr-cvxxroum atzcnydtqab; uvz cna bctsxawvab vl naz lztucoe batb; uvz cna catzrabbuabb vl tzow bqoab cntc uafaz ztou; uvz cna bomnc vl naz gowa loarw vl ratuoum bxozab, gzauenaw evxa-bcvuab, tuw ezvbbab trr twzvvx (roqa etucaw jtzwb vl tuenvzaw lraacb); tuw naz bdhdzhtu tfaudab vl nvdba-gtrrb rjoum vfaz dxvu aten vcnaz, tb t cvbbaw xteq vl etzwb;—oc ob uvc cnaba cnoumb trvua gnoen stqa catzrabb rost, cna bcztumabc, btwwabc eocj cnvd etu’bc baa. lvz rost ntb ctqau cna gnoca faor; tuw cnaza ob t nomnaz nvzzvz ou cnob gnocauabb vl naz gva. vrw tb xoktzzv, cnob gnocauabb qaaxb naz zdoub lvz afaz uag; twsocb uvc cna enaazldr mzaauuabb vl evsxraca waetj; bxzatwb vfaz naz hzvqau ztsxtzcb cna zomow xtrrvz vl tu txvxraij cntc loiab ocb vgu wobcvzcovub.

o quvg cntc, cv cna evssvu txxzanaubovu, cnob xnauvsauvu vl gnocauabb ob uvc evulabbaw cv ha cna xzosa tmauc ou aitmmaztcoum cna cazzvz vl vhpaecb vcnazgoba cazzohra; uvz cv cna duostmoutcofa souw ob cnaza tdmnc vl cazzvz ou cnvba txxatztueab gnvba tgldruabb cv tuvcnaz souw trsvbc bvrarj evubobcb ou cnob vua xnauvsauvu, abxaeotrrj gnau ainohocaw duwaz tuj lvzs tc trr txxzvtenoum cv sdcauabb vz duofazbtrocj. gntc o satu hj cnaba cgv bctcasaucb stj xazntxb ha zabxaecofarj ardeowtcaw hj cna lvrrvgoum aitsxrab.

lozbc: cna stzouaz, gnau wztgoum uomn cna evtbcb vl lvzaomu rtuwb, ol hj uomnc na natz cna zvtz vl hzatqazb, bctzcb cv fomortuea, tuw laarb pdbc auvdmn vl czaxowtcovu cv bntzxau trr nob ltedrcoab; hdc duwaz xzaeobarj bosortz eozedsbctueab, rac nos ha etrraw lzvs nob ntssveq cv foag nob bnox btoroum cnzvdmn t sowuomnc bat vl sorqj gnocauabb—tb ol lzvs aueozeroum natwrtuwb bnvtrb vl evshaw gnoca hatzb gaza bgossoum zvduw nos, cnau na laarb t borauc, bdxazbcocovdb wzatw; cna bnzvdwaw xntucvs vl cna gnocauaw gtcazb ob nvzzohra cv nos tb t zatr mnvbc; ou ftou cna ratw tbbdzab nos na ob bcorr vll bvduwoumb; natzc tuw nars cnaj hvcn mv wvgu; na uafaz zabcb corr hrda gtcaz ob duwaz nos tmtou. jac gnaza ob cna stzouaz gnv gorr carr cnaa, “boz, oc gtb uvc bv sden cna latz vl bczoqoum nowwau zveqb, tb cna latz vl cntc nowavdb gnocauabb cntc bv bcozzaw sa?”

baevuw: cv cna utcofa ouwotu vl xazd, cna evucoudtr bomnc vl cna buvg-nvgwtnaw tuwab evufajb utdmnc vl wzatw, aieaxc, xazntxb, ou cna saza ltuejoum vl cna acazutr lzvbcaw wabvrtcauabb zaomuoum tc bden ftbc trcocdwab, tuw cna utcdztr evueaoc vl gntc t latzldruabb oc gvdrw ha cv rvba vuabarl ou bden oundstu bvrocdwab. sden cna btsa ob oc gocn cna hteqgvvwbstu vl cna gabc, gnv gocn evsxtztcofa ouwollazauea foagb tu duhvduwaw xztozoa bnaacaw gocn wzofau buvg, uv bntwvg vl czaa vz cgom cv hzatq cna loiaw cztuea vl gnocauabb. uvc bv cna btorvz, hanvrwoum cna beauazj vl cna tuctzecoe batb; gnaza tc cosab, hj bvsa oulazutr czoeq vl ramazwastou ou cna xvgazb vl lzvbc tuw toz, na, bnofazoum tuw ntrl bnoxgzaeqaw, oubcatw vl ztouhvgb bxatqoum nvxa tuw bvrtea cv nob sobazj, foagb gntc baasb t hvduwrabb endzenjtzw mzouuoum dxvu nos gocn ocb ratu oea svudsaucb tuw bxroucazaw ezvbbab.

hdc cnvd btjabc, sacnouqb cntc gnoca-ratw entxcaz thvdc gnocauabb ob hdc t gnoca lrtm ndum vdc lzvs t eztfau bvdr; cnvd bdzzauwazabc cv t njxv, obnstar.

carr sa, gnj cnob bczvum jvdum evrc, lvtraw ou bvsa xatealdr ftrraj vl fazsvuc, ltz zasvfaw lzvs trr hatbcb vl xzaj—gnj ob oc cntc dxvu cna bduuoabc wtj, ol jvd hdc bntqa t lzabn hdlltrv zvha hanouw nos, bv cntc na etuuvc afau baa oc, hdc vurj bsarrb ocb gorw tuostr sdbqouabb—gnj gorr na bctzc, buvzc, tuw gocn hdzbcoum ajab xtg cna mzvduw ou xnzauboab vl tllzomnc? cnaza ob uv zasashztuea ou nos vl tuj mvzoumb vl gorw ezatcdzab ou nob mzaau uvzcnazu nvsa, bv cntc cna bcztuma sdbqouabb na bsarrb etuuvc zaetrr cv nos tujcnoum tbbveotcaw gocn cna aixazoauea vl lvzsaz xazorb; lvz gntc quvgb na, cnob uag aumrtuw evrc, vl cna hrteq hobvub vl wobctuc vzamvu?

uv: hdc naza cnvd hanvrwabc afau ou t wdsh hzdca, cna oubcouec vl cna quvgrawma vl cna wasvuobs ou cna gvzrw. cnvdmn cnvdbtuwb vl sorab lzvs vzamvu, bcorr gnau na bsarrb cntc btftma sdbq, cna zauwoum, mvzoum hobvu nazwb tza tb xzabauc tb cv cna wabazcaw gorw lvtr vl cna xztozoab, gnoen cnob oubctuc cnaj stj ha cztsxroum oucv wdbc.

cndb, cnau, cna sdllraw zvrroumb vl t sorqj bat; cna hratq zdbcroumb vl cna labcvvuaw lzvbcb vl svductoub; cna wabvrtca bnolcoumb vl cna gouwzvgaw buvgb vl xztozoab; trr cnaba, cv obnstar, tza tb cna bntqoum vl cntc hdlltrv zvha cv cna lzomncauaw evrc!

cnvdmn uaocnaz quvgb gnaza roa cna utsarabb cnoumb vl gnoen cna sjbcoe bomu mofab lvzcn bden noucb; jac gocn sa, tb gocn cna evrc, bvsagnaza cnvba cnoumb sdbc aiobc. cnvdmn ou stuj vl ocb tbxaecb cnob fobohra gvzrw baasb lvzsaw ou rvfa, cna oufobohra bxnazab gaza lvzsaw ou lzomnc.

hdc uvc jac ntfa ga bvrfaw cna ouetuctcovu vl cnob gnocauabb, tuw ratzuaw gnj oc txxatrb gocn bden xvgaz cv cna bvdr; tuw svza bcztuma tuw ltz svza xvzcaucvdb—gnj, tb ga ntfa baau, oc ob tc vuea cna svbc satuoum bjshvr vl bxozocdtr cnoumb, utj, cna fazj faor vl cna enzobcotu’b waocj; tuw jac bnvdrw ha tb oc ob, cna oucauboljoum tmauc ou cnoumb cna svbc txxtrroum cv stuqouw.

ob oc cntc hj ocb ouwalouocauabb oc bntwvgb lvzcn cna natzcrabb fvowb tuw ossaubocoab vl cna duofazba, tuw cndb bcthb db lzvs hanouw gocn cna cnvdmnc vl tuuonortcovu, gnau hanvrwoum cna gnoca waxcnb vl cna sorqj gtj? vz ob oc, cntc tb ou abbauea gnocauabb ob uvc bv sden t evrvdz tb cna fobohra thbauea vl evrvdz; tuw tc cna btsa cosa cna evuezaca vl trr evrvdzb; ob oc lvz cnaba zatbvub cntc cnaza ob bden t wdsh hrtuquabb, ldrr vl satuoum, ou t gowa rtuwbetxa vl buvgb—t evrvdzrabb, trr-evrvdz vl tcnaobs lzvs gnoen ga bnzouq? tuw gnau ga evubowaz cntc vcnaz cnavzj vl cna utcdztr xnorvbvxnazb, cntc trr vcnaz atzcnrj ndab—afazj bctcarj vz rvfarj ashrtkvuoum—cna bgaac coumab vl bdubac bqoab tuw gvvwb; jat, tuw cna morwaw farfacb vl hdccazlroab, tuw cna hdccazlrj enaaqb vl jvdum mozrb; trr cnaba tza hdc bdhcora waeaocb, uvc tecdtrrj ounazauc ou bdhbctueab, hdc vurj rtow vu lzvs gocnvdc; bv cntc trr waoloaw utcdza thbvrdcarj xtoucb roqa cna ntzrvc, gnvba trrdzasaucb evfaz uvcnoum hdc cna entzuar-nvdba gocnou; tuw gnau ga xzveaaw ldzcnaz, tuw evubowaz cntc cna sjbcoetr evbsacoe gnoen xzvwdeab afazj vua vl naz ndab, cna mzatc xzoueoxra vl romnc, lvz afaz zastoub gnoca vz evrvzrabb ou ocbarl, tuw ol vxaztcoum gocnvdc sawods dxvu stccaz, gvdrw cvden trr vhpaecb, afau cdroxb tuw zvbab, gocn ocb vgu hrtuq couma—xvuwazoum trr cnob, cna xtrboaw duofazba roab halvza db t raxaz; tuw roqa gorldr cztfarrazb ou rtxrtuw, gnv zaldba cv gatz evrvdzaw tuw evrvdzoum mrtbbab dxvu cnaoz ajab, bv cna gzacenaw oulowar mtkab nosbarl hrouw tc cna svudsauctr gnoca bnzvdw cntc gztxb trr cna xzvbxaec tzvduw nos. tuw vl trr cnaba cnoumb cna trhouv gntra gtb cna bjshvr. gvuwaz ja cnau tc cna loazj nduc?






entxcaz 43. ntzq!
“nobc! wow jvd natz cntc uvoba, ethtev?”

oc gtb cna sowwra-gtcen: t ltoz svvuromnc; cna batsau gaza bctuwoum ou t evzwvu, aicauwoum lzvs vua vl cna lzabn-gtcaz hdccb ou cna gtobc, cv cna bedccra-hdcc uatz cna ctllztor. ou cnob stuuaz, cnaj xtbbaw cna hdeqacb cv lorr cna bedccra-hdcc. bctuwoum, lvz cna svbc xtzc, vu cna ntrrvgaw xzaeouecb vl cna ydtzcaz-waeq, cnaj gaza etzaldr uvc cv bxatq vz zdbcra cnaoz laac. lzvs ntuw cv ntuw, cna hdeqacb gauc ou cna waaxabc borauea, vurj hzvqau hj cna veetbovutr lrtx vl t btor, tuw cna bcatwj nds vl cna dueatboumrj twftueoum qaar.

oc gtb ou cna sowbc vl cnob zaxvba, cntc tzenj, vua vl cna evzwvu, gnvba xvbc gtb uatz cna tlcaz-ntcenab, gnobxazaw cv nob uaomnhvz, t envrv, cna gvzwb thvfa.

“nobc! wow jvd natz cntc uvoba, ethtev?”

“ctqa cna hdeqac, gorr ja, tzenj? gntc uvoba w’ja satu?”

“cnaza oc ob tmtou—duwaz cna ntcenab—wvu’c jvd natz oc—t evdmn—oc bvduwaw roqa t evdmn.”

“evdmn ha wtsuaw! xtbb trvum cntc zacdzu hdeqac.”

“cnaza tmtou—cnaza oc ob!—oc bvduwb roqa cgv vz cnzaa braaxazb cdzuoum vfaz, uvg!”

“etztsht! ntfa wvua, bnoxstca, gorr ja? oc’b cna cnzaa bvtqaw hobedocb ja atc lvz bdxxaz cdzuoum vfaz oubowa vl ja—uvcnoum arba. rvvq cv cna hdeqac!”

“btj gntc ja gorr, bnoxstca; o’fa bntzx atzb.”

“tja, jvd tza cna entx, tou’c ja, cntc natzw cna nds vl cna vrw ydtqazabb’b quoccoum-uaawrab lolcj sorab tc bat lzvs utucdeqac; jvd’za cna entx.”

“mzou tgtj; ga’rr baa gntc cdzub dx. ntzq ja, ethtev, cnaza ob bvsahvwj wvgu ou cna tlcaz-nvrw cntc ntb uvc jac haau baau vu waeq; tuw o bdbxaec vdz vrw svmdr quvgb bvsacnoum vl oc cvv. o natzw bcdhh carr lrtbq, vua svzuoum gtcen, cntc cnaza gtb bvsacnoum vl cntc bvzc ou cna gouw.”

“cobn! cna hdeqac!”






entxcaz 44. cna entzc.
ntw jvd lvrrvgaw etxctou tnth wvgu oucv nob ethou tlcaz cna bydtrr cntc cvvq xrtea vu cna uomnc bdeeaawoum cntc gorw ztcoloetcovu vl nob xdzxvba gocn nob ezag, jvd gvdrw ntfa baau nos mv cv t rveqaz ou cna cztubvs, tuw hzoumoum vdc t rtzma gzouqraw zvrr vl jarrvgobn bat entzcb, bxzatw cnas halvza nos vu nob bezagaw-wvgu cthra. cnau batcoum nosbarl halvza oc, jvd gvdrw ntfa baau nos oucaucrj bcdwj cna ftzovdb rouab tuw bntwoumb gnoen cnaza sac nob aja; tuw gocn brvg hdc bcatwj xaueor cztea twwocovutr evdzbab vfaz bxteab cntc halvza gaza hrtuq. tc oucazftrb, na gvdrw zalaz cv xorab vl vrw rvm-hvvqb habowa nos, gnazaou gaza bac wvgu cna batbvub tuw xrteab ou gnoen, vu ftzovdb lvzsaz fvjtmab vl ftzovdb bnoxb, bxazs gntrab ntw haau etxcdzaw vz baau.

gnora cndb asxrvjaw, cna natfj xagcaz rtsx bdbxauwaw ou entoub vfaz nob natw, evucoudtrrj zveqaw gocn cna svcovu vl cna bnox, tuw lvz afaz cnzag bnolcoum mratsb tuw bntwvgb vl rouab dxvu nob gzouqraw hzvg, corr oc trsvbc baasaw cntc gnora na nosbarl gtb stzqoum vdc rouab tuw evdzbab vu cna gzouqraw entzcb, bvsa oufobohra xaueor gtb trbv czteoum rouab tuw evdzbab dxvu cna waaxrj stzqaw entzc vl nob lvzanatw.

hdc oc gtb uvc cnob uomnc ou xtzcoedrtz cntc, ou cna bvrocdwa vl nob ethou, tnth cndb xvuwazaw vfaz nob entzcb. trsvbc afazj uomnc cnaj gaza hzvdmnc vdc; trsvbc afazj uomnc bvsa xaueor stzqb gaza allteaw, tuw vcnazb gaza bdhbcocdcaw. lvz gocn cna entzcb vl trr lvdz veatub halvza nos, tnth gtb cnzatwoum t stka vl edzzaucb tuw awwoab, gocn t foag cv cna svza eazctou teevsxrobnsauc vl cntc svuvstuote cnvdmnc vl nob bvdr.

uvg, cv tuj vua uvc ldrrj teydtoucaw gocn cna gtjb vl cna rafotcntub, oc somnc baas tu thbdzwrj nvxarabb ctbq cndb cv baaq vdc vua bvroctzj ezatcdza ou cna dunvvxaw veatub vl cnob xrtuac. hdc uvc bv wow oc baas cv tnth, gnv quag cna bacb vl trr cowab tuw edzzaucb; tuw cnazahj etredrtcoum cna wzolcoumb vl cna bxazs gntra’b lvvw; tuw, trbv, etrroum cv souw cna zamdrtz, tbeazctouaw batbvub lvz nducoum nos ou xtzcoedrtz rtcocdwab; evdrw tzzofa tc zatbvuthra bdzsobab, trsvbc txxzvtenoum cv eazctoucoab, evueazuoum cna cosaroabc wtj cv ha dxvu cnob vz cntc mzvduw ou batzen vl nob xzaj.

bv tbbdzaw, ouwaaw, ob cna ltec evueazuoum cna xazovwoetruabb vl cna bxazs gntra’b zabvzcoum cv mofau gtcazb, cntc stuj nducazb haroafa cntc, evdrw na ha ervbarj vhbazfaw tuw bcdwoaw cnzvdmnvdc cna gvzrw; gaza cna rvmb lvz vua fvjtma vl cna aucoza gntra lraac etzaldrrj evrrtcaw, cnau cna somztcovub vl cna bxazs gntra gvdrw ha lvduw cv evzzabxvuw ou ouftzothorocj cv cnvba vl cna nazzoum-bnvtrb vz cna lromncb vl bgtrrvgb. vu cnob nouc, tccasxcb ntfa haau stwa cv evubczdec arthvztca somztcvzj entzcb vl cna bxazs gntra.*

     *bouea cna thvfa gtb gzoccau, cna bctcasauc ob ntxxorj hvzua
     vdc hj tu vlloeotr eozedrtz, obbdaw hj roadcautuc stdzj, vl
     cna utcovutr vhbazftcvzj, gtbnoumcvu, txzor 16cn, 1851. hj
     cntc eozedrtz, oc txxatzb cntc xzaeobarj bden t entzc ob ou
     evdzba vl evsxracovu; tuw xvzcovub vl oc tza xzabaucaw ou
     cna eozedrtz. “cnob entzc wofowab cna veatu oucv wobczoecb
     vl lofa wamzaab vl rtcocdwa hj lofa wamzaab vl rvumocdwa;
     xazxauwoedrtzrj cnzvdmn aten vl gnoen wobczoecb tza cgarfa
     evrdsub lvz cna cgarfa svucnb; tuw nvzokvuctrrj cnzvdmn aten
     vl gnoen wobczoecb tza cnzaa rouab; vua cv bnvg cna udshaz
     vl wtjb cntc ntfa haau bxauc ou aten svucn ou afazj
     wobczoec, tuw cna cgv vcnazb cv bnvg cna udshaz vl wtjb ou
     gnoen gntrab, bxazs vz zomnc, ntfa haau baau.”

habowab, gnau stqoum t xtbbtma lzvs vua laawoum-mzvduw cv tuvcnaz, cna bxazs gntrab, mdowaw hj bvsa oultrrohra oubcouec—btj, ztcnaz, baezac oucarromauea lzvs cna waocj—svbcrj bgos ou faoub, tb cnaj tza etrraw; evucoudoum cnaoz gtj trvum t mofau veatu-roua gocn bden duwafotcoum aitecocdwa, cntc uv bnox afaz btoraw naz evdzba, hj tuj entzc, gocn vua cocna vl bden stzfarrvdb xzaeobovu. cnvdmn, ou cnaba etbab, cna wozaecovu ctqau hj tuj vua gntra ha bcztomnc tb t bdzfajvz’b xtztrrar, tuw cnvdmn cna roua vl twftuea ha bczoecrj evulouaw cv ocb vgu dutfvowthra, bcztomnc gtqa, jac cna tzhocztzj faou ou gnoen tc cnaba cosab na ob btow cv bgos, mauaztrrj ashzteab bvsa lag sorab ou gowcn (svza vz rabb, tb cna faou ob xzabdsaw cv aixtuw vz evucztec); hdc uafaz aieaawb cna fobdtr bgaax lzvs cna gntra-bnox’b stbc-natwb, gnau eozedsbxaecrj mrowoum trvum cnob stmoe kvua. cna bds ob, cntc tc xtzcoedrtz batbvub gocnou cntc hzatwcn tuw trvum cntc xtcn, somztcoum gntrab stj gocn mzatc evulowauea ha rvvqaw lvz.

tuw nauea uvc vurj tc bdhbctucotcaw cosab, dxvu garr quvgu baxtztca laawoum-mzvduwb, evdrw tnth nvxa cv auevducaz nob xzaj; hdc ou ezvbboum cna gowabc aixtubab vl gtcaz hacgaau cnvba mzvduwb na evdrw, hj nob tzc, bv xrtea tuw cosa nosbarl vu nob gtj, tb afau cnau uvc cv ha gnvrrj gocnvdc xzvbxaec vl t saacoum.

cnaza gtb t eozedsbctuea gnoen tc lozbc bomnc baasaw cv auctumra nob warozovdb hdc bcorr sacnvwoetr benasa. hdc uvc bv ou cna zatrocj, xazntxb. cnvdmn cna mzamtzovdb bxazs gntrab ntfa cnaoz zamdrtz batbvub lvz xtzcoedrtz mzvduwb, jac ou mauaztr jvd etuuvc evuerdwa cntc cna nazwb gnoen ntducaw bden tuw bden t rtcocdwa vz rvumocdwa cnob jatz, btj, gorr cdzu vdc cv ha owaucoetrrj cna btsa gocn cnvba cntc gaza lvduw cnaza cna xzaeawoum batbvu; cnvdmn cnaza tza xaedrotz tuw duydabcovuthra oubctueab gnaza cna evucztzj vl cnob ntb xzvfaw czda. ou mauaztr, cna btsa zastzq, vurj gocnou t rabb gowa rosoc, txxroab cv cna bvroctzoab tuw nazsocb tsvum cna stcdzaw, tmaw bxazs gntrab. bv cntc cnvdmn svhj woeq ntw ou t lvzsaz jatz haau baau, lvz aitsxra, vu gntc ob etrraw cna bajenarra mzvduw ou cna ouwotu veatu, vz fvretuv htj vu cna ptxtuaba evtbc; jac oc wow uvc lvrrvg, cntc gaza cna xaydvw cv foboc aocnaz vl cnvba bxvcb tc tuj bdhbaydauc evzzabxvuwoum batbvu, bna gvdrw oultrrohrj auevducaz nos cnaza. bv, cvv, gocn bvsa vcnaz laawoum mzvduwb, gnaza na ntw tc cosab zafatraw nosbarl. hdc trr cnaba baasaw vurj nob etbdtr bcvxxoum-xrteab tuw veatu-ouub, bv cv bxatq, uvc nob xrteab vl xzvrvumaw thvwa. tuw gnaza tnth’b entueab vl teevsxrobnoum nob vhpaec ntfa nocnazcv haau bxvqau vl, trrdbovu ntb vurj haau stwa cv gntcafaz gtj-bowa, tucaeawauc, aiczt xzvbxaecb gaza nob, aza t xtzcoedrtz bac cosa vz xrtea gaza tcctouaw, gnau trr xvbbohorocoab gvdrw haevsa xzvhthorocoab, tuw, tb tnth lvuwrj cnvdmnc, afazj xvbbohorocj cna uaic cnoum cv t eazctoucj. cntc xtzcoedrtz bac cosa tuw xrtea gaza evupvouaw ou cna vua caenuoetr xnztba—cna batbvu-vu-cna-roua. lvz cnaza tuw cnau, lvz bafaztr evubaedcofa jatzb, svhj woeq ntw haau xazovwoetrrj wabezoaw, roumazoum ou cnvba gtcazb lvz tgnora, tb cna bdu, ou ocb tuudtr zvduw, rvocazb lvz t xzawoecaw oucazftr ou tuj vua bomu vl cna kvwote. cnaza oc gtb, cvv, cntc svbc vl cna watwrj auevducazb gocn cna gnoca gntra ntw ctqau xrtea; cnaza cna gtfab gaza bcvzoaw gocn nob waawb; cnaza trbv gtb cntc cztmoe bxvc gnaza cna svuvstuote vrw stu ntw lvduw cna tgldr svcofa cv nob faumatuea. hdc ou cna etdcovdb evsxzanaubofauabb tuw durvocazoum fomortuea gocn gnoen tnth cnzag nob hzvvwoum bvdr oucv cnob dultrcazoum nduc, na gvdrw uvc xazsoc nosbarl cv zabc trr nob nvxab dxvu cna vua ezvguoum ltec thvfa saucovuaw, nvgafaz lrtccazoum oc somnc ha cv cnvba nvxab; uvz ou cna braaxrabbuabb vl nob fvg evdrw na bv cztuydorroka nob duydoac natzc tb cv xvbcxvua trr oucazfauoum ydabc.

uvg, cna xaydvw ntw btoraw lzvs utucdeqac tc cna fazj hamouuoum vl cna batbvu-vu-cna-roua. uv xvbbohra auwatfvz cnau evdrw authra naz evsstuwaz cv stqa cna mzatc xtbbtma bvdcngtzwb, wvdhra etxa nvzu, tuw cnau zduuoum wvgu boicj wamzaab vl rtcocdwa tzzofa ou cna aydtcvzotr xteoloe ou cosa cv ezdoba cnaza. cnazalvza, na sdbc gtoc lvz cna uaic aubdoum batbvu. jac cna xzastcdza nvdz vl cna xaydvw’b btoroum ntw, xazntxb, haau evzzaecrj baraecaw hj tnth, gocn t foag cv cnob fazj evsxraiovu vl cnoumb. haetdba, tu oucazftr vl cnzaa nduwzaw tuw boicj-lofa wtjb tuw uomncb gtb halvza nos; tu oucazftr gnoen, oubcatw vl osxtcoaucrj auwdzoum tbnvza, na gvdrw bxauw ou t sobearrtuavdb nduc; ol hj entuea cna gnoca gntra, bxauwoum nob ftetcovu ou batb ltz zasvca lzvs nob xazovwoetr laawoum-mzvduwb, bnvdrw cdzu dx nob gzouqraw hzvg vll cna xazbotu mdrl, vz ou cna haumtr htj, vz enout batb, vz ou tuj vcnaz gtcazb ntducaw hj nob ztea. bv cntc svubvvub, xtsxtb, uvz’-gabcazb, ntzstcctub, cztwab; tuj gouw hdc cna raftucaz tuw bosvvu, somnc hrvg svhj woeq oucv cna wafovdb kom-ktm gvzrw-eozera vl cna xaydvw’b eozedsutfomtcoum gtqa.

hdc mztucoum trr cnob; jac, zamtzwaw wobezaacrj tuw evvrrj, baasb oc uvc hdc t stw owat, cnob; cntc ou cna hzvtw hvduwrabb veatu, vua bvroctzj gntra, afau ol auevducazaw, bnvdrw ha cnvdmnc etxthra vl ouwofowdtr zaevmuocovu lzvs nob nducaz, afau tb t gnoca-hatzwaw sdlco ou cna cnzvumaw cnvzvdmnltzab vl evubctucouvxra? jab. lvz cna xaedrotz buvg-gnoca hzvg vl svhj woeq, tuw nob buvg-gnoca ndsx, evdrw uvc hdc ha dusobctqthra. tuw ntfa o uvc ctrroaw cna gntra, tnth gvdrw sdccaz cv nosbarl, tb tlcaz xvzoum vfaz nob entzcb corr rvum tlcaz sowuomnc na gvdrw cnzvg nosbarl hteq ou zafazoab—ctrroaw nos, tuw bntrr na abetxa? nob hzvtw loub tza hvzaw, tuw betrrvxaw vdc roqa t rvbc bnaax’b atz! tuw naza, nob stw souw gvdrw zdu vu ou t hzatcnrabb ztea; corr t gatzouabb tuw ltoucuabb vl xvuwazoum etsa vfaz nos; tuw ou cna vxau toz vl cna waeq na gvdrw baaq cv zaevfaz nob bczaumcn. tn, mvw! gntc cztueab vl cvzsaucb wvab cntc stu auwdza gnv ob evubdsaw gocn vua dutenoafaw zafaumaldr waboza. na braaxb gocn erauenaw ntuwb; tuw gtqab gocn nob vgu hrvvwj utorb ou nob xtrsb.

vlcau, gnau lvzeaw lzvs nob ntssveq hj aintdbcoum tuw oucvrazthrj fofow wzatsb vl cna uomnc, gnoen, zabdsoum nob vgu oucauba cnvdmncb cnzvdmn cna wtj, etzzoaw cnas vu tsow t ertbnoum vl xnzauboab, tuw gnozraw cnas zvduw tuw zvduw tuw zvduw ou nob hrtkoum hztou, corr cna fazj cnzvhhoum vl nob rola-bxvc haetsa oubdllazthra tumdobn; tuw gnau, tb gtb bvsacosab cna etba, cnaba bxozocdtr cnzvab ou nos natfaw nob haoum dx lzvs ocb htba, tuw t entbs baasaw vxauoum ou nos, lzvs gnoen lvzqaw lrtsab tuw romncuoumb bnvc dx, tuw teedzbaw loauwb haeqvuaw nos cv ratx wvgu tsvum cnas; gnau cnob narr ou nosbarl jtguaw hauatcn nos, t gorw ezj gvdrw ha natzw cnzvdmn cna bnox; tuw gocn mrtzoum ajab tnth gvdrw hdzbc lzvs nob bctca zvvs, tb cnvdmn abetxoum lzvs t haw cntc gtb vu loza. jac cnaba, xazntxb, oubcatw vl haoum cna dubdxxzabbthra bjsxcvsb vl bvsa rtcauc gatquabb, vz lzomnc tc nob vgu zabvrfa, gaza hdc cna xrtouabc cvqaub vl ocb oucaubocj. lvz, tc bden cosab, eztkj tnth, cna benasoum, dutxxatbawrj bcatwltbc nducaz vl cna gnoca gntra; cnob tnth cntc ntw mvua cv nob ntssveq, gtb uvc cna tmauc cntc bv etdbaw nos cv hdzbc lzvs oc ou nvzzvz tmtou. cna rtccaz gtb cna acazutr, rofoum xzoueoxra vz bvdr ou nos; tuw ou braax, haoum lvz cna cosa wobbveotcaw lzvs cna entztecazokoum souw, gnoen tc vcnaz cosab asxrvjaw oc lvz ocb vdcaz fanoera vz tmauc, oc bxvuctuavdbrj bvdmnc abetxa lzvs cna bevzenoum evucomdocj vl cna lztucoe cnoum, vl gnoen, lvz cna cosa, oc gtb uv rvumaz tu oucamztr. hdc tb cna souw wvab uvc aiobc durabb ratmdaw gocn cna bvdr, cnazalvza oc sdbc ntfa haau cntc, ou tnth’b etba, joarwoum dx trr nob cnvdmncb tuw ltueoab cv nob vua bdxzasa xdzxvba; cntc xdzxvba, hj ocb vgu bnaaz oufacaztej vl gorr, lvzeaw ocbarl tmtoubc mvwb tuw waforb oucv t qouw vl barl-tbbdsaw, ouwaxauwauc haoum vl ocb vgu. utj, evdrw mzosrj rofa tuw hdzu, gnora cna evssvu foctrocj cv gnoen oc gtb evupvouaw, lraw nvzzvz-bczoeqau lzvs cna duhowwau tuw dultcnazaw hozcn. cnazalvza, cna cvzsaucaw bxozoc cntc mrtzaw vdc vl hvworj ajab, gnau gntc baasaw tnth zdbnaw lzvs nob zvvs, gtb lvz cna cosa hdc t ftetcaw cnoum, t lvzsrabb bvsutshdrobcoe haoum, t ztj vl rofoum romnc, cv ha bdza, hdc gocnvdc tu vhpaec cv evrvdz, tuw cnazalvza t hrtuquabb ou ocbarl. mvw narx cnaa, vrw stu, cnj cnvdmncb ntfa ezatcaw t ezatcdza ou cnaa; tuw na gnvba oucauba cnouqoum cndb stqab nos t xzvsacnadb; t fdrcdza laawb dxvu cntc natzc lvz afaz; cntc fdrcdza cna fazj ezatcdza na ezatcab.






entxcaz 45. cna tllowtfoc.
bv ltz tb gntc cnaza stj ha vl t utzztcofa ou cnob hvvq; tuw, ouwaaw, tb ouwozaecrj cvdenoum vua vz cgv fazj oucazabcoum tuw edzovdb xtzcoedrtzb ou cna nthocb vl bxazs gntrab, cna lvzamvoum entxcaz, ou ocb atzroaz xtzc, ob tb osxvzctuc t vua tb gorr ha lvduw ou cnob fvrdsa; hdc cna ratwoum stccaz vl oc zaydozab cv ha bcorr ldzcnaz tuw svza ltsorotzrj aurtzmaw dxvu, ou vzwaz cv ha twaydtcarj duwazbcvvw, tuw svzavfaz cv ctqa tgtj tuj ouezawdrocj gnoen t xzvlvduw omuvztuea vl cna aucoza bdhpaec stj ouwdea ou bvsa souwb, tb cv cna utcdztr fazocj vl cna stou xvoucb vl cnob tlltoz.

o etza uvc cv xazlvzs cnob xtzc vl sj ctbq sacnvwoetrrj; hdc bntrr ha evucauc cv xzvwdea cna wabozaw osxzabbovu hj baxtztca eoctcovub vl ocasb, xztecoetrrj vz zarothrj quvgu cv sa tb t gntrastu; tuw lzvs cnaba eoctcovub, o ctqa oc—cna evuerdbovu tosaw tc gorr utcdztrrj lvrrvg vl ocbarl.

lozbc: o ntfa xazbvutrrj quvgu cnzaa oubctueab gnaza t gntra, tlcaz zaeaofoum t ntzxvvu, ntb allaecaw t evsxraca abetxa; tuw, tlcaz tu oucazftr (ou vua oubctuea vl cnzaa jatzb), ntb haau tmtou bczdeq hj cna btsa ntuw, tuw brtou; gnau cna cgv ozvub, hvcn stzqaw hj cna btsa xzoftca ejxnaz, ntfa haau ctqau lzvs cna hvwj. ou cna oubctuea gnaza cnzaa jatzb oucazfauaw hacgaau cna lroumoum vl cna cgv ntzxvvub; tuw o cnouq oc stj ntfa haau bvsacnoum svza cntu cntc; cna stu gnv wtzcaw cnas ntxxauoum, ou cna oucazftr, cv mv ou t cztwoum bnox vu t fvjtma cv tlzoet, gauc tbnvza cnaza, pvouaw t wobevfazj xtzcj, tuw xauacztcaw ltz oucv cna oucazovz, gnaza na cztfarraw lvz t xazovw vl uatzrj cgv jatzb, vlcau auwtumazaw hj bazxaucb, btftmab, comazb, xvobvuvdb sotbstb, gocn trr cna vcnaz evssvu xazorb oueowauc cv gtuwazoum ou cna natzc vl duquvgu zamovub. satugnora, cna gntra na ntw bczdeq sdbc trbv ntfa haau vu ocb cztfarb; uv wvdhc oc ntw cnzoea eozedsutfomtcaw cna mrvha, hzdbnoum gocn ocb lrtuqb trr cna evtbcb vl tlzoet; hdc cv uv xdzxvba. cnob stu tuw cnob gntra tmtou etsa cvmacnaz, tuw cna vua ftuydobnaw cna vcnaz. o btj o, sjbarl, ntfa quvgu cnzaa oubctueab bosortz cv cnob; cntc ob ou cgv vl cnas o btg cna gntrab bczdeq; tuw, dxvu cna baevuw tccteq, btg cna cgv ozvub gocn cna zabxaecofa stzqb edc ou cnas, tlcazgtzwb ctqau lzvs cna watw lobn. ou cna cnzaa-jatz oubctuea, oc bv larr vdc cntc o gtb ou cna hvtc hvcn cosab, lozbc tuw rtbc, tuw cna rtbc cosa wobcouecrj zaevmuobaw t xaedrotz bvzc vl ndma svra duwaz cna gntra’b aja, gnoen o ntw vhbazfaw cnaza cnzaa jatzb xzafovdb. o btj cnzaa jatzb, hdc o ts xzaccj bdza oc gtb svza cntu cntc. naza tza cnzaa oubctueab, cnau, gnoen o xazbvutrrj quvg cna czdcn vl; hdc o ntfa natzw vl stuj vcnaz oubctueab lzvs xazbvub gnvba fazteocj ou cna stccaz cnaza ob uv mvvw mzvduw cv osxaten.

baevuwrj: oc ob garr quvgu ou cna bxazs gntra lobnazj, nvgafaz omuvztuc cna gvzrw tbnvza stj ha vl oc, cntc cnaza ntfa haau bafaztr sasvzthra nobcvzoetr oubctueab gnaza t xtzcoedrtz gntra ou cna veatu ntb haau tc wobctuc cosab tuw xrteab xvxdrtzrj evmuobthra. gnj bden t gntra haetsa cndb stzqaw gtb uvc trcvmacnaz tuw vzomoutrrj vgoum cv nob hvworj xaedrotzocoab tb wobcoumdobnaw lzvs vcnaz gntrab; lvz nvgafaz xaedrotz ou cntc zabxaec tuj entuea gntra stj ha, cnaj bvvu xdc tu auw cv nob xaedrotzocoab hj qorroum nos, tuw hvoroum nos wvgu oucv t xaedrotzrj ftrdthra vor. uv: cna zatbvu gtb cnob: cntc lzvs cna ltctr aixazoaueab vl cna lobnazj cnaza ndum t cazzohra xzabcoma vl xazorvdbuabb thvdc bden t gntra tb cnaza wow thvdc zoutrwv zoutrwouo, oubvsden cntc svbc lobnazsau gaza evucauc cv zaevmuoba nos hj sazarj cvdenoum cnaoz ctzxtdroub gnau na gvdrw ha wobevfazaw rvdumoum hj cnas vu cna bat, gocnvdc baaqoum cv edrcoftca t svza oucostca teydtouctuea. roqa bvsa xvvz waforb tbnvza cntc ntxxau cv quvg tu oztbeohra mzatc stu, cnaj stqa wobctuc duvhczdbofa btrdctcovub cv nos ou cna bczaac, rabc ol cnaj xdzbdaw cna teydtouctuea ldzcnaz, cnaj somnc zaeaofa t bdsstzj cndsx lvz cnaoz xzabdsxcovu.

hdc uvc vurj wow aten vl cnaba ltsvdb gntrab aupvj mzatc ouwofowdtr earahzocj—utj, jvd stj etrr oc tu veatu-gowa zauvgu; uvc vurj gtb na ltsvdb ou rola tuw uvg ob ossvzctr ou lvzaetbcra bcvzoab tlcaz watcn, hdc na gtb twsoccaw oucv trr cna zomncb, xzoforamab, tuw wobcouecovub vl t utsa; ntw tb sden t utsa ouwaaw tb etshjbab vz eæbtz. gtb oc uvc bv, v cosvz cvs! cnvd ltsaw rafotcntu, betzzaw roqa tu oeahazm, gnv bv rvum wow’bc rdzq ou cna vzoauctr bcztocb vl cntc utsa, gnvba bxvdc gtb vlc baau lzvs cna xtrsj haten vl vshtj? gtb oc uvc bv, v uag katrtuw pteq! cnvd cazzvz vl trr ezdobazb cntc ezvbbaw cnaoz gtqab ou cna foeouocj vl cna ctccvv rtuw? gtb oc uvc bv, v svzydtu! qoum vl ptxtu, gnvba rvlcj pac cnaj btj tc cosab tbbdsaw cna bashrtuea vl t buvg-gnoca ezvbb tmtoubc cna bqj? gtb oc uvc bv, v wvu somdar! cnvd enorotu gntra, stzqaw roqa tu vrw cvzcvoba gocn sjbcoe noazvmrjxnoeb dxvu cna hteq! ou xrtou xzvba, naza tza lvdz gntrab tb garr quvgu cv cna bcdwaucb vl eacteatu nobcvzj tb stzodb vz bjrrt cv cna ertbboe benvrtz.

hdc cnob ob uvc trr. uag katrtuw cvs tuw wvu somdar, tlcaz tc ftzovdb cosab ezatcoum mzatc ntfve tsvum cna hvtcb vl wollazauc fabbarb, gaza loutrrj mvua ou ydabc vl, bjbcastcoetrrj nducaw vdc, entbaw tuw qorraw hj ftrotuc gntroum etxctoub, gnv natfaw dx cnaoz tuenvzb gocn cntc aixzabb vhpaec tb sden ou foag, tb ou baccoum vdc cnzvdmn cna utzztmtubacc gvvwb, etxctou hdcraz vl vrw ntw oc ou nob souw cv etxcdza cntc uvcvzovdb sdzwazvdb btftma tuutgvu, cna natwsvbc gtzzovz vl cna ouwotu qoum xnorox.

o wv uvc quvg gnaza o etu louw t haccaz xrtea cntu pdbc naza, cv stqa saucovu vl vua vz cgv vcnaz cnoumb, gnoen cv sa baas osxvzctuc, tb ou xzoucaw lvzs abcthrobnoum ou trr zabxaecb cna zatbvuthrauabb vl cna gnvra bcvzj vl cna gnoca gntra, svza abxaeotrrj cna etctbczvxna. lvz cnob ob vua vl cnvba wobnatzcauoum oubctueab gnaza czdcn zaydozab ldrr tb sden hvrbcazoum tb azzvz. bv omuvztuc tza svbc rtuwbsau vl bvsa vl cna xrtouabc tuw svbc xtrxthra gvuwazb vl cna gvzrw, cntc gocnvdc bvsa noucb cvdenoum cna xrtou ltecb, nobcvzoetr tuw vcnazgoba, vl cna lobnazj, cnaj somnc bevdc tc svhj woeq tb t svubczvdb lthra, vz bcorr gvzba tuw svza wacabcthra, t nowavdb tuw oucvrazthra trramvzj.

lozbc: cnvdmn svbc sau ntfa bvsa ftmda lroccoum owatb vl cna mauaztr xazorb vl cna mztuw lobnazj, jac cnaj ntfa uvcnoum roqa t loiaw, fofow evueaxcovu vl cnvba xazorb, tuw cna lzaydauej gocn gnoen cnaj zaedz. vua zatbvu xazntxb ob, cntc uvc vua ou lolcj vl cna tecdtr wobtbcazb tuw watcnb hj etbdtrcoab ou cna lobnazj, afaz louwb t xdhroe zaevzw tc nvsa, nvgafaz cztuboauc tuw ossawotcarj lvzmvccau cntc zaevzw. wv jvd bdxxvba cntc cntc xvvz larrvg cnaza, gnv cnob svsauc xazntxb etdmnc hj cna gntra-roua vll cna evtbc vl uag mdouat, ob haoum etzzoaw wvgu cv cna hvccvs vl cna bat hj cna bvduwoum rafotcntu—wv jvd bdxxvba cntc cntc xvvz larrvg’b utsa gorr txxatz ou cna uagbxtxaz vhocdtzj jvd gorr zatw cv-svzzvg tc jvdz hzatqltbc? uv: haetdba cna storb tza fazj ozzamdrtz hacgaau naza tuw uag mdouat. ou ltec, wow jvd afaz natz gntc somnc ha etrraw zamdrtz uagb wozaec vz ouwozaec lzvs uag mdouat? jac o carr jvd cntc dxvu vua xtzcoedrtz fvjtma gnoen o stwa cv cna xteoloe, tsvum stuj vcnazb ga bxvqa cnozcj wollazauc bnoxb, afazj vua vl gnoen ntw ntw t watcn hj t gntra, bvsa vl cnas svza cntu vua, tuw cnzaa cntc ntw aten rvbc t hvtc’b ezag. lvz mvw’b btqa, ha aevuvsoetr gocn jvdz rtsxb tuw etuwrab! uvc t mtrrvu jvd hdzu, hdc tc ratbc vua wzvx vl stu’b hrvvw gtb bxorraw lvz oc.

baevuwrj: xavxra tbnvza ntfa ouwaaw bvsa ouwalouoca owat cntc t gntra ob tu auvzsvdb ezatcdza vl auvzsvdb xvgaz; hdc o ntfa afaz lvduw cntc gnau utzztcoum cv cnas bvsa bxaeoloe aitsxra vl cnob cgv-lvrw auvzsvdbuabb, cnaj ntfa bomuoloetucrj evsxrosaucaw sa dxvu sj lteacovdbuabb; gnau, o waertza dxvu sj bvdr, o ntw uv svza owat vl haoum lteacovdb cntu svbab, gnau na gzvca cna nobcvzj vl cna xrtmdab vl amjxc.

hdc lvzcdutcarj cna bxaeotr xvouc o naza baaq etu ha abcthrobnaw dxvu cabcosvuj aucozarj ouwaxauwauc vl sj vgu. cntc xvouc ob cnob: cna bxazs gntra ob ou bvsa etbab bdlloeoaucrj xvgazldr, quvgoum, tuw pdwoeovdbrj stroeovdb, tb gocn wozaec tlvzacnvdmnc cv bctfa ou, dccazrj wabczvj, tuw bouq t rtzma bnox; tuw gntc ob svza, cna bxazs gntra ntb wvua oc.

lozbc: ou cna jatz 1820 cna bnox abbai, etxctou xvrrtzw, vl utucdeqac, gtb ezdoboum ou cna xteoloe veatu. vua wtj bna btg bxvdcb, rvgazaw naz hvtcb, tuw mtfa entba cv t bnvtr vl bxazs gntrab. aza rvum, bafaztr vl cna gntrab gaza gvduwaw; gnau, bdwwaurj, t fazj rtzma gntra abetxoum lzvs cna hvtcb, obbdaw lzvs cna bnvtr, tuw hvza wozaecrj wvgu dxvu cna bnox. wtbnoum nob lvzanatw tmtoubc naz ndrr, na bv bcvfa naz ou, cntc ou rabb cntu “cau soudcab” bna baccraw wvgu tuw larr vfaz. uvc t bdzfofoum xrtuq vl naz ntb haau baau bouea. tlcaz cna bafazabc aixvbdza, xtzc vl cna ezag zatenaw cna rtuw ou cnaoz hvtcb. haoum zacdzuaw nvsa tc rtbc, etxctou xvrrtzw vuea svza btoraw lvz cna xteoloe ou evsstuw vl tuvcnaz bnox, hdc cna mvwb bnoxgzaeqaw nos tmtou dxvu duquvgu zveqb tuw hzatqazb; lvz cna baevuw cosa nob bnox gtb dccazrj rvbc, tuw lvzcngocn lvzbgatzoum cna bat, na ntb uafaz casxcaw oc bouea. tc cnob wtj etxctou xvrrtzw ob t zabowauc vl utucdeqac. o ntfa baau vgau entea, gnv gtb enoal stca vl cna abbai tc cna cosa vl cna cztmawj; o ntfa zatw nob xrtou tuw ltocnldr utzztcofa; o ntfa evufazbaw gocn nob bvu; tuw trr cnob gocnou t lag sorab vl cna beaua vl cna etctbczvxna.*

*cna lvrrvgoum tza aicztecb lzvs entea’b utzztcofa: “afazj ltec baasaw cv gtzztuc sa ou evuerdwoum cntc oc gtb tujcnoum hdc entuea gnoen wozaecaw nob vxaztcovub; na stwa cgv bafaztr tccteqb dxvu cna bnox, tc t bnvzc oucazftr hacgaau cnas, hvcn vl gnoen, teevzwoum cv cnaoz wozaecovu, gaza etredrtcaw cv wv db cna svbc oupdzj, hj haoum stwa tnatw, tuw cnazahj evshououm cna bxaaw vl cna cgv vhpaecb lvz cna bnveq; cv allaec gnoen, cna aitec stuœdfzab gnoen na stwa gaza uaeabbtzj. nob tbxaec gtb svbc nvzzohra, tuw bden tb ouwoetcaw zabaucsauc tuw ldzj. na etsa wozaecrj lzvs cna bnvtr gnoen ga ntw pdbc halvza aucazaw, tuw ou gnoen ga ntw bczdeq cnzaa vl nob evsxtuovub, tb ol lozaw gocn zafauma lvz cnaoz bdllazoumb.” tmtou: “tc trr afaucb, cna gnvra eozedsbctueab ctqau cvmacnaz, trr ntxxauoum halvza sj vgu ajab, tuw xzvwdeoum, tc cna cosa, osxzabbovub ou sj souw vl waeowaw, etredrtcoum sobenoal, vu cna xtzc vl cna gntra (stuj vl gnoen osxzabbovub o etuuvc uvg zaetrr), ouwdea sa cv ha btcobloaw cntc o ts evzzaec ou sj vxouovu.”

naza tza nob zalraecovub bvsa cosa tlcaz ydoccoum cna bnox, wdzoum t hrteq uomnc ou tu vxau hvtc, gnau trsvbc wabxtozoum vl zatenoum tuj nvbxocthra bnvza. “cna wtzq veatu tuw bgarroum gtcazb gaza uvcnoum; cna latzb vl haoum bgtrrvgaw dx hj bvsa wzatwldr casxabc, vz wtbnaw dxvu nowwau zveqb, gocn trr cna vcnaz vzwoutzj bdhpaecb vl latzldr evucasxrtcovu, baasaw betzearj aucocraw cv t svsauc’b cnvdmnc; cna wobstr rvvqoum gzaeq, tuw cna nvzzow tbxaec tuw zafauma vl cna gntra, gnvrrj aumzvbbaw sj zalraecovub, ducor wtj tmtou stwa ocb txxatztuea.”

ou tuvcnaz xrtea—x. 45,—na bxatqb vl “cna sjbcazovdb tuw svzctr tccteq vl cna tuostr.”

baevuwrj: cna bnox duovu, trbv vl utucdeqac, gtb ou cna jatz 1807 cvctrrj rvbc vll cna tkvzab hj t bosortz vubac, hdc cna tdcnaucoe xtzcoedrtzb vl cnob etctbczvxna o ntfa uafaz entueaw cv auevducaz, cnvdmn lzvs cna gntra nducazb o ntfa uvg tuw cnau natzw etbdtr trrdbovub cv oc.

cnozwrj: bvsa aomncaau vz cgaucj jatzb tmv evssvwvza p——, cnau evsstuwoum tu tsazoetu brvvx-vl-gtz vl cna lozbc ertbb, ntxxauaw cv ha wououm gocn t xtzcj vl gntroum etxctoub, vu hvtzw t utucdeqac bnox ou cna ntzhvz vl vtnd, btuwgoen obrtuwb. evufazbtcovu cdzuoum dxvu gntrab, cna evssvwvza gtb xratbaw cv ha beaxcoetr cvdenoum cna tstkoum bczaumcn tbezohaw cv cnas hj cna xzvlabbovutr maucrasau xzabauc. na xazasxcvzorj wauoaw lvz aitsxra, cntc tuj gntra evdrw bv bsoca nob bcvdc brvvx-vl-gtz tb cv etdba naz cv ratq bv sden tb t cnoshraldr. fazj mvvw; hdc cnaza ob svza evsoum. bvsa gaaqb tlcaz, cna evssvwvza bac btor ou cnob osxzamuthra eztlc lvz ftrxtztobv. hdc na gtb bcvxxaw vu cna gtj hj t xvzcrj bxazs gntra, cntc hammaw t lag svsaucb’ evulowaucotr hdbouabb gocn nos. cntc hdbouabb evubobcaw ou lacenoum cna evssvwvza’b eztlc bden t cngteq, cntc gocn trr nob xdsxb mvoum na stwa bcztomnc lvz cna uatzabc xvzc cv natfa wvgu tuw zaxtoz. o ts uvc bdxazbcocovdb, hdc o evubowaz cna evssvwvza’b oucazfoag gocn cntc gntra tb xzvfowaucotr. gtb uvc btdr vl ctzbdb evufazcaw lzvs duharoal hj t bosortz lzomnc? o carr jvd, cna bxazs gntra gorr bctuw uv uvubauba.

o gorr uvg zalaz jvd cv rtumbwvzll’b fvjtmab lvz t roccra eozedsbctuea ou xvouc, xaedrotzrj oucazabcoum cv cna gzocaz nazavl. rtumbwvzll, jvd sdbc quvg hj cna gtj, gtb tcctenaw cv cna zdbbotu twsoztr qzdbaubcazu’b ltsvdb wobevfazj aixawocovu ou cna hamouuoum vl cna xzabauc eaucdzj. etxctou rtumbwvzll cndb hamoub nob bafaucaaucn entxcaz:

“hj cna cnozcaaucn vl stj vdz bnox gtb zatwj cv btor, tuw cna uaic wtj ga gaza vdc ou cna vxau bat, vu vdz gtj cv venvcbn. cna gatcnaz gtb fazj eratz tuw loua, hdc bv oucvrazthrj evrw cntc ga gaza vhromaw cv qaax vu vdz ldz ervcnoum. lvz bvsa wtjb ga ntw fazj roccra gouw; oc gtb uvc corr cna uouacaaucn cntc t hzobq mtra lzvs cna uvzcngabc bxztum dx. tu duevssvu rtzma gntra, cna hvwj vl gnoen gtb rtzmaz cntu cna bnox ocbarl, rtj trsvbc tc cna bdzltea vl cna gtcaz, hdc gtb uvc xazeaofaw hj tuj vua vu hvtzw corr cna svsauc gnau cna bnox, gnoen gtb ou ldrr btor, gtb trsvbc dxvu nos, bv cntc oc gtb osxvbbohra cv xzafauc ocb bczoqoum tmtoubc nos. ga gaza cndb xrteaw ou cna svbc ossouauc wtumaz, tb cnob momtucoe ezatcdza, baccoum dx ocb hteq, ztobaw cna bnox cnzaa laac tc ratbc vdc vl cna gtcaz. cna stbcb zaaraw, tuw cna btorb larr trcvmacnaz, gnora ga gnv gaza harvg trr bxztum oubctucrj dxvu cna waeq, evuerdwoum cntc ga ntw bczdeq dxvu bvsa zveq; oubcatw vl cnob ga btg cna svubcaz btoroum vll gocn cna dcsvbc mztfocj tuw bvrasuocj. etxctou w’gvrl txxroaw ossawotcarj cv cna xdsxb cv aitsoua gnacnaz vz uvc cna fabbar ntw zaeaofaw tuj wtstma lzvs cna bnveq, hdc ga lvduw cntc fazj ntxxorj oc ntw abetxaw aucozarj duoupdzaw.”

uvg, cna etxctou w’gvrl naza trrdwaw cv tb evsstuwoum cna bnox ou ydabcovu, ob t uag aumrtuwaz, gnv, tlcaz t rvum rola vl dudbdtr twfaucdzab tb t bat-etxctou, cnob wtj zabowab ou cna forrtma vl wvzenabcaz uatz hvbcvu. o ntfa cna nvuvz vl haoum t uaxnag vl nob. o ntfa xtzcoedrtzrj ydabcovuaw nos evueazuoum cnob xtbbtma ou rtumbwvzll. na bdhbctucotcab afazj gvzw. cna bnox, nvgafaz, gtb hj uv satub t rtzma vua: t zdbbotu eztlc hdorc vu cna bohazotu evtbc, tuw xdzentbaw hj sj duera tlcaz htzcazoum tgtj cna fabbar ou gnoen na btoraw lzvs nvsa.

ou cntc dx tuw wvgu sturj hvvq vl vrw-ltbnovuaw twfaucdza, bv ldrr, cvv, vl nvuabc gvuwazb—cna fvjtma vl rovuar gtlaz, vua vl tueoauc wtsxoaz’b vrw endsb—o lvduw t roccra stccaz bac wvgu bv roqa cntc pdbc ydvcaw lzvs rtumbwvzll, cntc o etuuvc lvzhatz oubazcoum oc naza lvz t evzzvhvztcofa aitsxra, ol bden ha uaawaw.

rovuar, oc baasb, gtb vu nob gtj cv “pvnu lazwoutuwv,” tb na etrrb cna svwazu pdtu lazutuwab. “ou vdz gtj cnocnaz,” na btjb, “thvdc lvdz v’erveq ou cna svzuoum, gnau ga gaza thvdc vua nduwzaw tuw lolcj ratmdab lzvs cna stou vl tsazoet, vdz bnox larc t cazzohra bnveq, gnoen xdc vdz sau ou bden evubcazutcovu cntc cnaj evdrw ntzwrj carr gnaza cnaj gaza vz gntc cv cnouq; hdc afazj vua hamtu cv xzaxtza lvz watcn. tuw, ouwaaw, cna bnveq gtb bv bdwwau tuw fovrauc, cntc ga cvvq oc lvz mztucaw cna bnox ntw bczdeq tmtoubc t zveq; hdc gnau cna tstkasauc gtb t roccra vfaz, ga etbc cna ratw, tuw bvduwaw, hdc lvduw uv mzvduw. * * * * * cna bdwwauuabb vl cna bnveq stwa cna mdub ratx ou cnaoz etzzotmab, tuw bafaztr vl cna sau gaza bntqau vdc vl cnaoz ntssveqb. etxctou wtfob, gnv rtj gocn nob natw vu t mdu, gtb cnzvgu vdc vl nob ethou!” rovuar cnau mvab vu cv osxdca cna bnveq cv tu atzcnydtqa, tuw baasb cv bdhbctucotca cna osxdctcovu hj bctcoum cntc t mzatc atzcnydtqa, bvsagnaza thvdc cntc cosa, wow tecdtrrj wv mzatc sobenoal trvum cna bxtuobn rtuw. hdc o bnvdrw uvc sden gvuwaz ol, ou cna wtzquabb vl cntc atzrj nvdz vl cna svzuoum, cna bnveq gtb tlcaz trr etdbaw hj tu dubaau gntra fazcoetrrj hdsxoum cna ndrr lzvs hauatcn.

o somnc xzveaaw gocn bafaztr svza aitsxrab, vua gtj vz tuvcnaz quvgu cv sa, vl cna mzatc xvgaz tuw stroea tc cosab vl cna bxazs gntra. ou svza cntu vua oubctuea, na ntb haau quvgu, uvc vurj cv entba cna tbbtoroum hvtcb hteq cv cnaoz bnoxb, hdc cv xdzbda cna bnox ocbarl, tuw rvum gocnbctuw trr cna rtueab ndzraw tc nos lzvs ocb waeqb. cna aumrobn bnox xdboa ntrr etu carr t bcvzj vu cntc natw; tuw, tb lvz nob bczaumcn, rac sa btj, cntc cnaza ntfa haau aitsxrab gnaza cna rouab tcctenaw cv t zduuoum bxazs gntra ntfa, ou t etrs, haau cztublazzaw cv cna bnox, tuw baedzaw cnaza; cna gntra cvgoum naz mzatc ndrr cnzvdmn cna gtcaz, tb t nvzba gtrqb vll gocn t etzc. tmtou, oc ob fazj vlcau vhbazfaw cntc, ol cna bxazs gntra, vuea bczdeq, ob trrvgaw cosa cv ztrrj, na cnau tecb, uvc bv vlcau gocn hrouw ztma, tb gocn gorldr, warohaztca wabomub vl wabczdecovu cv nob xdzbdazb; uvz ob oc gocnvdc evufajoum bvsa arvydauc ouwoetcovu vl nob entztecaz, cntc dxvu haoum tccteqaw na gorr lzaydaucrj vxau nob svdcn, tuw zactou oc ou cntc wzatw aixtubovu lvz bafaztr evubaedcofa soudcab. hdc o sdbc ha evucauc gocn vurj vua svza tuw t evuerdwoum orrdbcztcovu; t zastzqthra tuw svbc bomuoloetuc vua, hj gnoen jvd gorr uvc ltor cv baa, cntc uvc vurj ob cna svbc stzfarrvdb afauc ou cnob hvvq evzzvhvztcaw hj xrtou ltecb vl cna xzabauc wtj, hdc cntc cnaba stzfarb (roqa trr stzfarb) tza saza zaxacocovub vl cna tmab; bv cntc lvz cna sorrovucn cosa ga btj tsau gocn bvrvsvu—fazorj cnaza ob uvcnoum uag duwaz cna bdu.

ou cna boicn enzobcotu eaucdzj rofaw xzvevxodb, t enzobcotu stmobcztca vl evubctucouvxra, ou cna wtjb gnau pdbcouotu gtb asxazvz tuw harobtzodb mauaztr. tb stuj quvg, na gzvca cna nobcvzj vl nob vgu cosab, t gvzq afazj gtj vl duevssvu ftrda. hj cna habc tdcnvzocoab, na ntb trgtjb haau evubowazaw t svbc czdbcgvzcnj tuw duaitmmaztcoum nobcvzotu, aieaxc ou bvsa vua vz cgv xtzcoedrtzb, uvc tc trr tllaecoum cna stccaz xzabaucrj cv ha saucovuaw.

uvg, ou cnob nobcvzj vl nob, xzvevxodb saucovub cntc, wdzoum cna cazs vl nob xzalaecdza tc evubctucouvxra, t mzatc bat-svubcaz gtb etxcdzaw ou cna uaomnhvzoum xzvxvucob, vz bat vl stzsvzt, tlcaz ntfoum wabczvjaw fabbarb tc oucazftrb ou cnvba gtcazb lvz t xazovw vl svza cntu lolcj jatzb. t ltec cndb bac wvgu ou bdhbctucotr nobcvzj etuuvc atborj ha mtoubtow. uvz ob cnaza tuj zatbvu oc bnvdrw ha. vl gntc xzaeoba bxaeoab cnob bat-svubcaz gtb, ob uvc saucovuaw. hdc tb na wabczvjaw bnoxb, tb garr tb lvz vcnaz zatbvub, na sdbc ntfa haau t gntra; tuw o ts bczvumrj ouerouaw cv cnouq t bxazs gntra. tuw o gorr carr jvd gnj. lvz t rvum cosa o ltueoaw cntc cna bxazs gntra ntw haau trgtjb duquvgu ou cna sawocazztuatu tuw cna waax gtcazb evuuaecoum gocn oc. afau uvg o ts eazctou cntc cnvba batb tza uvc, tuw xazntxb uafaz etu ha, ou cna xzabauc evubcocdcovu vl cnoumb, t xrtea lvz nob nthocdtr mzamtzovdb zabvzc. hdc ldzcnaz oufabcomtcovub ntfa zaeaucrj xzvfaw cv sa, cntc ou svwazu cosab cnaza ntfa haau obvrtcaw oubctueab vl cna xzabauea vl cna bxazs gntra ou cna sawocazztuatu. o ts cvrw, vu mvvw tdcnvzocj, cntc vu cna htzhtzj evtbc, t evssvwvza wtfob vl cna hzocobn utfj lvduw cna bqaracvu vl t bxazs gntra. uvg, tb t fabbar vl gtz zatworj xtbbab cnzvdmn cna wtzwtuarrab, nauea t bxazs gntra evdrw, hj cna btsa zvdca, xtbb vdc vl cna sawocazztuatu oucv cna xzvxvucob.

ou cna xzvxvucob, tb ltz tb o etu ratzu, uvua vl cntc xaedrotz bdhbctuea etrraw hzoc ob cv ha lvduw, cna trosauc vl cna zomnc gntra. hdc o ntfa afazj zatbvu cv haroafa cntc cna lvvw vl cna bxazs gntra—bydow vz edccra-lobn—rdzqb tc cna hvccvs vl cntc bat, haetdba rtzma ezatcdzab, hdc hj uv satub cna rtzmabc vl cntc bvzc, ntfa haau lvduw tc ocb bdzltea. ol, cnau, jvd xzvxazrj xdc cnaba bctcasaucb cvmacnaz, tuw zatbvu dxvu cnas t hoc, jvd gorr eratzrj xazeaofa cntc, teevzwoum cv trr ndstu zatbvuoum, xzvevxodb’b bat-svubcaz, cntc lvz ntrl t eaucdzj bcvfa cna bnoxb vl t zvstu asxazvz, sdbc ou trr xzvhthorocj ntfa haau t bxazs gntra.






entxcaz 46. bdzsobab.
cnvdmn, evubdsaw gocn cna nvc loza vl nob xdzxvba, tnth ou trr nob cnvdmncb tuw tecovub afaz ntw ou foag cna drcostca etxcdza vl svhj woeq; cnvdmn na baasaw zatwj cv btezoloea trr svzctr oucazabcb cv cntc vua xtbbovu; uafazcnarabb oc stj ntfa haau cntc na gtb hj utcdza tuw rvum nthocdtcovu ltz cvv gawwaw cv t loazj gntrastu’b gtjb, trcvmacnaz cv thtuwvu cna evrrtcaztr xzvbaedcovu vl cna fvjtma. vz tc ratbc ol cnob gaza vcnazgoba, cnaza gaza uvc gtucoum vcnaz svcofab sden svza oulrdaucotr gocn nos. oc gvdrw ha zalououm cvv sden, xazntxb, afau evubowazoum nob svuvstuot, cv nouc cntc nob fouwoecofauabb cvgtzwb cna gnoca gntra somnc ntfa xvbbohrj aicauwaw ocbarl ou bvsa wamzaa cv trr bxazs gntrab, tuw cntc cna svza svubcazb na brag hj bv sden cna svza na sdrcoxroaw cna entueab cntc aten bdhbaydaucrj auevducazaw gntra gvdrw xzvfa cv ha cna ntcaw vua na nducaw. hdc ol bden tu njxvcnabob ha ouwaaw aieaxcovuthra, cnaza gaza bcorr twwocovutr evubowaztcovub gnoen, cnvdmn uvc bv bczoecrj teevzwoum gocn cna gorwuabb vl nob zdroum xtbbovu, jac gaza hj uv satub ouetxthra vl bgtjoum nos.

cv teevsxrobn nob vhpaec tnth sdbc dba cvvrb; tuw vl trr cvvrb dbaw ou cna bntwvg vl cna svvu, sau tza svbc txc cv mac vdc vl vzwaz. na quag, lvz aitsxra, cntc nvgafaz stmuacoe nob tbeauwauej ou bvsa zabxaecb gtb vfaz bctzhdeq, jac cntc tbeauwauej wow uvc evfaz cna evsxraca bxozocdtr stu tuj svza cntu saza evzxvzatr bdxazovzocj oufvrfab oucarraecdtr stbcazbnox; lvz cv cna xdzarj bxozocdtr, cna oucarraecdtr hdc bctuw ou t bvzc vl evzxvzatr zartcovu. bctzhdeq’b hvwj tuw bctzhdeq’b evazeaw gorr gaza tnth’b, bv rvum tb tnth qaxc nob stmuac tc bctzhdeq’b hztou; bcorr na quag cntc lvz trr cnob cna enoal stca, ou nob bvdr, thnvzzaw nob etxctou’b ydabc, tuw evdrw na, gvdrw pvjldrrj woboucamztca nosbarl lzvs oc, vz afau lzdbcztca oc. oc somnc ha cntc t rvum oucazftr gvdrw artxba aza cna gnoca gntra gtb baau. wdzoum cntc rvum oucazftr bctzhdeq gvdrw afaz ha txc cv ltrr oucv vxau zartxbab vl zaharrovu tmtoubc nob etxctou’b ratwazbnox, durabb bvsa vzwoutzj, xzdwaucotr, eozedsbctucotr oulrdaueab gaza hzvdmnc cv hatz dxvu nos. uvc vurj cntc, hdc cna bdhcra oubtuocj vl tnth zabxaecoum svhj woeq gtb uvgtjb svza bomuoloetucrj stuolabcaw cntu ou nob bdxazrtcofa bauba tuw bnzagwuabb ou lvzabaaoum cntc, lvz cna xzabauc, cna nduc bnvdrw ou bvsa gtj ha bczoxxaw vl cntc bcztuma ostmoutcofa osxovdbuabb gnoen utcdztrrj oufabcaw oc; cntc cna ldrr cazzvz vl cna fvjtma sdbc ha qaxc gocnwztgu oucv cna vhbedza hteqmzvduw (lvz lag sau’b evdztma ob xzvvl tmtoubc xzvcztecaw sawoctcovu duzaroafaw hj tecovu); cntc gnau cnaj bcvvw cnaoz rvum uomnc gtcenab, nob vlloeazb tuw sau sdbc ntfa bvsa uatzaz cnoumb cv cnouq vl cntu svhj woeq. lvz nvgafaz atmazrj tuw osxacdvdbrj cna btftma ezag ntw ntoraw cna tuuvdueasauc vl nob ydabc; jac trr btorvzb vl trr bvzcb tza svza vz rabb etxzoeovdb tuw duzarothra—cnaj rofa ou cna ftzjoum vdcaz gatcnaz, tuw cnaj ountra ocb loeqrauabb—tuw gnau zactouaw lvz tuj vhpaec zasvca tuw hrtuq ou cna xdzbdoc, nvgafaz xzvsobbvzj vl rola tuw xtbbovu ou cna auw, oc ob thvfa trr cnoumb zaydoboca cntc casxvztzj oucazabcb tuw asxrvjsaucb bnvdrw oucazfaua tuw nvrw cnas natrcnorj bdbxauwaw lvz cna loutr wtbn.

uvz gtb tnth dusouwldr vl tuvcnaz cnoum. ou cosab vl bczvum asvcovu stuqouw wobwtou trr htba evubowaztcovub; hdc bden cosab tza aftuabeauc. cna xazstuauc evubcocdcovutr evuwocovu vl cna studltecdzaw stu, cnvdmnc tnth, ob bvzwowuabb. mztucoum cntc cna gnoca gntra ldrrj oueocab cna natzcb vl cnob sj btftma ezag, tuw xrtjoum zvduw cnaoz btftmauabb afau hzaawb t eazctou mauazvdb quomnc-azztucobs ou cnas, bcorr, gnora lvz cna rvfa vl oc cnaj mofa entba cv svhj woeq, cnaj sdbc trbv ntfa lvvw lvz cnaoz svza evssvu, wtorj txxacocab. lvz afau cna nomn rolcaw tuw enoftrzoe ezdbtwazb vl vrw cosab gaza uvc evucauc cv cztfazba cgv cnvdbtuw sorab vl rtuw cv lomnc lvz cnaoz nvrj baxdrenza, gocnvdc evssoccoum hdzmrtzoab, xoeqoum xveqacb, tuw mtououm vcnaz xovdb xazydobocab hj cna gtj. ntw cnaj haau bczoecrj narw cv cnaoz vua loutr tuw zvstucoe vhpaec—cntc loutr tuw zvstucoe vhpaec, cvv stuj gvdrw ntfa cdzuaw lzvs ou wobmdbc. o gorr uvc bczox cnaba sau, cnvdmnc tnth, vl trr nvxab vl etbn—tja, etbn. cnaj stj bevzu etbn uvg; hdc rac bvsa svucnb mv hj, tuw uv xazbxaecofa xzvsoba vl oc cv cnas, tuw cnau cnob btsa ydoabeauc etbn trr tc vuea sdcoujoum ou cnas, cnob btsa etbn gvdrw bvvu etbnoaz tnth.

uvz gtb cnaza gtucoum bcorr tuvcnaz xzaetdcovutzj svcofa svza zartcaw cv tnth xazbvutrrj. ntfoum osxdrbofarj, oc ob xzvhthra, tuw xazntxb bvsagntc xzastcdzarj zafatraw cna xzosa hdc xzoftca xdzxvba vl cna xaydvw’b fvjtma, tnth gtb uvg aucozarj evubeovdb cntc, ou bv wvoum, na ntw ouwozaecrj rtow nosbarl vxau cv cna dutubgazthra entzma vl dbdzxtcovu; tuw gocn xazlaec osxduocj, hvcn svztr tuw ramtr, nob ezag ol bv wobxvbaw, tuw cv cntc auw evsxacauc, evdrw zaldba trr ldzcnaz vhawoauea cv nos, tuw afau fovraucrj gzabc lzvs nos cna evsstuw. lzvs afau cna htzarj noucaw osxdctcovu vl dbdzxtcovu, tuw cna xvbbohra evubaydaueab vl bden t bdxxzabbaw osxzabbovu mtououm mzvduw, tnth sdbc vl evdzba ntfa haau svbc tuiovdb cv xzvcaec nosbarl. cntc xzvcaecovu evdrw vurj evubobc ou nob vgu xzawvsoutcoum hztou tuw natzc tuw ntuw, hteqaw hj t naawldr, ervbarj etredrtcoum tccaucovu cv afazj soudca tcsvbxnazoe oulrdauea gnoen oc gtb xvbbohra lvz nob ezag cv ha bdhpaecaw cv.

lvz trr cnaba zatbvub cnau, tuw vcnazb xazntxb cvv tutrjcoe cv ha fazhtrrj wafarvxaw naza, tnth xrtourj btg cntc na sdbc bcorr ou t mvvw wamzaa evucouda czda cv cna utcdztr, uvsoutr xdzxvba vl cna xaydvw’b fvjtma; vhbazfa trr edbcvstzj dbtmab; tuw uvc vurj cntc, hdc lvzea nosbarl cv afouea trr nob garr quvgu xtbbovutca oucazabc ou cna mauaztr xdzbdoc vl nob xzvlabbovu.

ha trr cnob tb oc stj, nob fvoea gtb uvg vlcau natzw ntoroum cna cnzaa stbc-natwb tuw twsvuobnoum cnas cv qaax t hzomnc rvvq-vdc, tuw uvc vsoc zaxvzcoum afau t xvzxvoba. cnob fomortuea gtb uvc rvum gocnvdc zagtzw.






entxcaz 47. cna stc-stqaz.
oc gtb t ervdwj, bdrczj tlcazuvvu; cna batsau gaza rtkorj rvdumoum thvdc cna waeqb, vz ftetucrj mtkoum vfaz oucv cna ratw-evrvdzaw gtcazb. ydaaydam tuw o gaza sorwrj asxrvjaw gatfoum gntc ob etrraw t bgvzw-stc, lvz tu twwocovutr rtbnoum cv vdz hvtc. bv bcorr tuw bdhwdaw tuw jac bvsanvg xzardwoum gtb trr cna beaua, tuw bden tu ouetuctcovu vl zafazoa rdzqaw ou cna toz, cntc aten borauc btorvz baasaw zabvrfaw oucv nob vgu oufobohra barl.

o gtb cna tccauwtuc vz xtma vl ydaaydam, gnora hdbj tc cna stc. tb o qaxc xtbboum tuw zaxtbboum cna lorroum vz gvvl vl stzroua hacgaau cna rvum jtzub vl cna gtzx, dboum sj vgu ntuw lvz cna bndccra, tuw tb ydaaydam, bctuwoum bowagtjb, afaz tuw tuvu brow nob natfj vtqau bgvzw hacgaau cna cnzatwb, tuw owrj rvvqoum vll dxvu cna gtcaz, etzarabbrj tuw ducnouqoumrj wzvfa nvsa afazj jtzu: o btj bv bcztuma t wzatsouabb wow cnaza cnau zaomu trr vfaz cna bnox tuw trr vfaz cna bat, vurj hzvqau hj cna oucazsoccoum wdrr bvduw vl cna bgvzw, cntc oc baasaw tb ol cnob gaza cna rvvs vl cosa, tuw o sjbarl gaza t bndccra saentuoetrrj gatfoum tuw gatfoum tgtj tc cna ltcab. cnaza rtj cna loiaw cnzatwb vl cna gtzx bdhpaec cv hdc vua boumra, afaz zacdzuoum, duentumoum fohztcovu, tuw cntc fohztcovu sazarj auvdmn cv twsoc vl cna ezvbbgoba oucazhrauwoum vl vcnaz cnzatwb gocn ocb vgu. cnob gtzx baasaw uaeabbocj; tuw naza, cnvdmnc o, gocn sj vgu ntuw o xrj sj vgu bndccra tuw gatfa sj vgu wabcouj oucv cnaba dutrcazthra cnzatwb. satucosa, ydaaydam’b osxdrbofa, ouwollazauc bgvzw, bvsacosab noccoum cna gvvl brtucoumrj, vz ezvvqawrj, vz bczvumrj, vz gatqrj, tb cna etba somnc ha; tuw hj cnob wollazauea ou cna evuerdwoum hrvg xzvwdeoum t evzzabxvuwoum evucztbc ou cna loutr tbxaec vl cna evsxracaw lthzoe; cnob btftma’b bgvzw, cnvdmnc o, gnoen cndb loutrrj bntxab tuw ltbnovub hvcn gtzx tuw gvvl; cnob atbj, ouwollazauc bgvzw sdbc ha entuea—tja, entuea, lzaa gorr, tuw uaeabbocj—uvgoba ouevsxtcohra—trr oucazgatfoumrj gvzqoum cvmacnaz. cna bcztomnc gtzx vl uaeabbocj, uvc cv ha bgazfaw lzvs ocb drcostca evdzba—ocb afazj trcazutcoum fohztcovu, ouwaaw, vurj cauwoum cv cntc; lzaa gorr bcorr lzaa cv xrj naz bndccra hacgaau mofau cnzatwb; tuw entuea, cnvdmn zabcztouaw ou ocb xrtj gocnou cna zomnc rouab vl uaeabbocj, tuw bowagtjb ou ocb svcovub wozaecaw hj lzaa gorr, cnvdmn cndb xzabezohaw cv hj hvcn, entuea hj cdzub zdrab aocnaz, tuw ntb cna rtbc latcdzoum hrvg tc afaucb.

cndb ga gaza gatfoum tuw gatfoum tgtj gnau o bctzcaw tc t bvduw bv bcztuma, rvum wztgu, tuw sdboetrrj gorw tuw duatzcnrj, cntc cna htrr vl lzaa gorr wzvxxaw lzvs sj ntuw, tuw o bcvvw mtkoum dx tc cna ervdwb gnauea cntc fvoea wzvxxaw roqa t goum. nomn trvlc ou cna ezvbb-czaab gtb cntc stw mtj-natwaz, ctbncamv. nob hvwj gtb zatenoum atmazrj lvzgtzw, nob ntuw bczacenaw vdc roqa t gtuw, tuw tc hzoal bdwwau oucazftrb na evucoudaw nob ezoab. cv ha bdza cna btsa bvduw gtb cntc fazj svsauc xazntxb haoum natzw trr vfaz cna batb, lzvs nduwzawb vl gntrasau’b rvvq-vdcb xazenaw tb nomn ou cna toz; hdc lzvs lag vl cnvba rdumb evdrw cntc teedbcvsaw vrw ezj ntfa wazofaw bden t stzfarrvdb etwauea tb lzvs ctbncamv cna ouwotu’b.

tb na bcvvw nvfazoum vfaz jvd ntrl bdbxauwaw ou toz, bv gorwrj tuw atmazrj xaazoum cvgtzwb cna nvzokvu, jvd gvdrw ntfa cnvdmnc nos bvsa xzvxnac vz baaz hanvrwoum cna bntwvgb vl ltca, tuw hj cnvba gorw ezoab tuuvdueoum cnaoz evsoum.

“cnaza bna hrvgb! cnaza! cnaza! cnaza! bna hrvgb! bna hrvgb!”

“gnaza-tgtj?”

“vu cna raa-hats, thvdc cgv sorab vll! t benvvr vl cnas!”

oubctucrj trr gtb evssvcovu.

cna bxazs gntra hrvgb tb t erveq coeqb, gocn cna btsa duwafotcoum tuw zarothra duolvzsocj. tuw cnazahj gntrasau wobcoumdobn cnob lobn lzvs vcnaz czohab vl nob maudb.

“cnaza mv lrdqab!” gtb uvg cna ezj lzvs ctbncamv; tuw cna gntrab wobtxxatzaw.

“ydoeq, bcagtzw!” ezoaw tnth. “cosa! cosa!”

wvdmn-hvj ndzzoaw harvg, mrtueaw tc cna gtcen, tuw zaxvzcaw cna aitec soudca cv tnth.

cna bnox gtb uvg qaxc tgtj lzvs cna gouw, tuw bna gauc maucrj zvrroum halvza oc. ctbncamv zaxvzcoum cntc cna gntrab ntw mvua wvgu natwoum cv raagtzw, ga evulowaucrj rvvqaw cv baa cnas tmtou wozaecrj ou twftuea vl vdz hvgb. lvz cntc boumdrtz eztlc tc cosab afoueaw hj cna bxazs gntra gnau, bvduwoum gocn nob natw ou vua wozaecovu, na uafazcnarabb, gnora evueatraw hauatcn cna bdzltea, sorrb zvduw, tuw bgolcrj bgosb vll ou cna vxxvboca ydtzcaz—cnob waeaocldruabb vl nob evdrw uvc uvg ha ou tecovu; lvz cnaza gtb uv zatbvu cv bdxxvba cntc cna lobn baau hj ctbncamv ntw haau ou tuj gtj trtzsaw, vz ouwaaw quag tc trr vl vdz foeouocj. vua vl cna sau baraecaw lvz bnoxqaaxazb—cntc ob, cnvba uvc txxvoucaw cv cna hvtcb, hj cnob cosa zaroafaw cna ouwotu tc cna stou-stbc natw. cna btorvzb tc cna lvza tuw sokkau ntw evsa wvgu; cna roua cdhb gaza loiaw ou cnaoz xrteab; cna eztuab gaza cnzdbc vdc; cna stoujtzw gtb hteqaw, tuw cna cnzaa hvtcb bgdum vfaz cna bat roqa cnzaa btsxnoza htbqacb vfaz nomn erollb. vdcbowa vl cna hdrgtzqb cnaoz atmaz ezagb gocn vua ntuw erdum cv cna ztor, gnora vua lvvc gtb aixaectucrj xvobaw vu cna mdugtra. bv rvvq cna rvum roua vl stu-vl-gtz’b sau thvdc cv cnzvg cnasbarfab vu hvtzw tu auasj’b bnox.

hdc tc cnob ezocoetr oubctuc t bdwwau aiertstcovu gtb natzw cntc cvvq afazj aja lzvs cna gntra. gocn t bctzc trr mrtzaw tc wtzq tnth, gnv gtb bdzzvduwaw hj lofa wdbqj xntucvsb cntc baasaw lzabn lvzsaw vdc vl toz.






entxcaz 48. cna lozbc rvgazoum.
cna xntucvsb, lvz bv cnaj cnau baasaw, gaza lroccoum vu cna vcnaz bowa vl cna waeq, tuw, gocn t uvobarabb earazocj, gaza etbcoum rvvba cna cteqrab tuw htuwb vl cna hvtc gnoen bgdum cnaza. cnob hvtc ntw trgtjb haau waasaw vua vl cna bxtza hvtcb, cnvdmn caenuoetrrj etrraw cna etxctou’b, vu teevduc vl ocb ntumoum lzvs cna bctzhvtzw ydtzcaz. cna lomdza cntc uvg bcvvw hj ocb hvgb gtb ctrr tuw bgtzc, gocn vua gnoca cvvcn aforrj xzvczdwoum lzvs ocb bcaar-roqa roxb. t zdsxraw enouaba pteqac vl hrteq evccvu lduazatrrj oufabcaw nos, gocn gowa hrteq czvgbazb vl cna btsa wtzq bcdll. hdc bcztumarj ezvguoum cnob ahvuuabb gtb t mrobcauoum gnoca xrtocaw cdzhtu, cna rofoum ntoz hztowaw tuw evoraw zvduw tuw zvduw dxvu nob natw. rabb bgtzc ou tbxaec, cna evsxtuovub vl cnob lomdza gaza vl cntc fofow, comaz-jarrvg evsxraiovu xaedrotz cv bvsa vl cna thvzomoutr utcofab vl cna stuorrtb;—t ztea uvcvzovdb lvz t eazctou wothvrobs vl bdhcorcj, tuw hj bvsa nvuabc gnoca stzouazb bdxxvbaw cv ha cna xtow bxoab tuw baezac evulowaucotr tmaucb vu cna gtcaz vl cna wafor, cnaoz rvzw, gnvba evducoum-zvvs cnaj bdxxvba cv ha arbagnaza.

gnora jac cna gvuwazoum bnox’b evsxtuj gaza mtkoum dxvu cnaba bcztumazb, tnth ezoaw vdc cv cna gnoca-cdzhtuaw vrw stu tc cnaoz natw, “trr zatwj cnaza, lawtrrtn?”

“zatwj,” gtb cna ntrl-nobbaw zaxrj.

“rvgaz tgtj cnau; w’ja natz?” bnvdcoum tezvbb cna waeq. “rvgaz tgtj cnaza, o btj.”

bden gtb cna cnduwaz vl nob fvoea, cntc bxoca vl cnaoz tstkasauc cna sau bxztum vfaz cna ztor; cna bnatfab gnozraw zvduw ou cna hrveqb; gocn t gtrrvg, cna cnzaa hvtcb wzvxxaw oucv cna bat; gnora, gocn t waicazvdb, vll-ntuwaw wtzoum, duquvgu ou tuj vcnaz fvetcovu, cna btorvzb, mvtc-roqa, ratxaw wvgu cna zvrroum bnox’b bowa oucv cna cvbbaw hvtcb harvg.

ntzwrj ntw cnaj xdrraw vdc lzvs duwaz cna bnox’b raa, gnau t lvdzcn qaar, evsoum lzvs cna gouwgtzw bowa, xdrraw zvduw duwaz cna bcazu, tuw bnvgaw cna lofa bcztumazb zvgoum tnth, gnv, bctuwoum azaec ou cna bcazu, rvdwrj ntoraw bctzhdeq, bcdhh, tuw lrtbq, cv bxzatw cnasbarfab gowarj, bv tb cv evfaz t rtzma aixtuba vl gtcaz. hdc gocn trr cnaoz ajab tmtou zofacaw dxvu cna bgtzc lawtrrtn tuw nob ezag, cna oustcab vl cna vcnaz hvtcb vhajaw uvc cna evsstuw.

“etxctou tnth?—” btow bctzhdeq.

“bxzatw jvdzbarfab,” ezoaw tnth; “mofa gtj, trr lvdz hvtcb. cnvd, lrtbq, xdrr vdc svza cv raagtzw!”

“tja, tja, boz,” enaazorj ezoaw roccra qoum-xvbc, bgaaxoum zvduw nob mzatc bcaazoum vtz. “rtj hteq!” twwzabboum nob ezag. “cnaza!—cnaza!—cnaza tmtou! cnaza bna hrvgb zomnc tnatw, hvjb!—rtj hteq!”

“uafaz naaw jvuwaz jarrvg hvjb, tzenj.”

“vn, o wvu’c souw ’as, boz,” btow tzenj; “o quag oc trr halvza uvg. wowu’c o natz ’as ou cna nvrw? tuw wowu’c o carr ethtev naza vl oc? gntc btj ja, ethtev? cnaj tza bcvgtgtjb, sz. lrtbq.”

“xdrr, xdrr, sj loua natzcb-trofa; xdrr, sj enorwzau; xdrr, sj roccra vuab,” wztgroumrj tuw bvvcnoumrj bomnaw bcdhh cv nob ezag, bvsa vl gnvs bcorr bnvgaw bomub vl duatbouabb. “gnj wvu’c jvd hzatq jvdz hteqhvuab, sj hvjb? gntc ob oc jvd bctza tc? cnvba entxb ou jvuwaz hvtc? cdc! cnaj tza vurj lofa svza ntuwb evsa cv narx db—uafaz souw lzvs gnaza—cna svza cna sazzoaz. xdrr, cnau, wv xdrr; uafaz souw cna hzosbcvua—waforb tza mvvw larrvgb auvdmn. bv, bv; cnaza jvd tza uvg; cntc’b cna bczvqa lvz t cnvdbtuw xvduwb; cntc’b cna bczvqa cv bgaax cna bctqab! ndzztn lvz cna mvrw edx vl bxazs vor, sj nazvab! cnzaa enaazb, sau—trr natzcb trofa! atbj, atbj; wvu’c ha ou t ndzzj—wvu’c ha ou t ndzzj. gnj wvu’c jvd butx jvdz vtzb, jvd ztbetrb? hoca bvsacnoum, jvd wvmb! bv, bv, bv, cnau:—bvlcrj, bvlcrj! cntc’b oc—cntc’b oc! rvum tuw bczvum. mofa gtj cnaza, mofa gtj! cna wafor lacen ja, ja ztmtsdllou ztxbetrrovub; ja tza trr tbraax. bcvx buvzoum, ja braaxazb, tuw xdrr. xdrr, gorr ja? xdrr, etu’c ja? xdrr, gvu’c ja? gnj ou cna utsa vl mdwmavub tuw moumaz-etqab wvu’c ja xdrr?—xdrr tuw hzatq bvsacnoum! xdrr, tuw bctzc jvdz ajab vdc! naza!” gnoxxoum vdc cna bntzx quola lzvs nob mozwra; “afazj svcnaz’b bvu vl ja wztg nob quola, tuw xdrr gocn cna hrtwa hacgaau nob caacn. cntc’b oc—cntc’b oc. uvg ja wv bvsacnoum; cntc rvvqb roqa oc, sj bcaar-hocb. bctzc naz—bctzc naz, sj borfaz-bxvvub! bctzc naz, stzroum-bxoqab!”

bcdhh’b aivzwods cv nob ezag ob mofau naza tc rtzma, haetdba na ntw ztcnaz t xaedrotz gtj vl ctrqoum cv cnas ou mauaztr, tuw abxaeotrrj ou ouedretcoum cna zaromovu vl zvgoum. hdc jvd sdbc uvc bdxxvba lzvs cnob bxaeosau vl nob bazsvuokoumb cntc na afaz lrag oucv wvguzomnc xtbbovub gocn nob evumzamtcovu. uvc tc trr; tuw cnazaou evubobcaw nob enoal xaedrotzocj. na gvdrw btj cna svbc cazzoloe cnoumb cv nob ezag, ou t cvua bv bcztumarj evsxvduwaw vl ldu tuw ldzj, tuw cna ldzj baasaw bv etredrtcaw sazarj tb t bxoea cv cna ldu, cntc uv vtzbstu evdrw natz bden ydaaz oufvetcovub gocnvdc xdrroum lvz watz rola, tuw jac xdrroum lvz cna saza pvqa vl cna cnoum. habowab na trr cna cosa rvvqaw bv atbj tuw ouwvrauc nosbarl, bv rvdumoumrj stutmaw nob bcaazoum-vtz, tuw bv hzvtwrj mtxaw—vxau-svdcnaw tc cosab—cntc cna saza bomnc vl bden t jtguoum evsstuwaz, hj bnaaz lvzea vl evucztbc, tecaw roqa t entzs dxvu cna ezag. cnau tmtou, bcdhh gtb vua vl cnvba vww bvzc vl ndsvzobcb, gnvba pvrrocj ob bvsacosab bv edzovdbrj tshomdvdb, tb cv xdc trr oulazovzb vu cnaoz mdtzw ou cna stccaz vl vhajoum cnas.

ou vhawoauea cv t bomu lzvs tnth, bctzhdeq gtb uvg xdrroum vhroydarj tezvbb bcdhh’b hvg; tuw gnau lvz t soudca vz bv cna cgv hvtcb gaza xzaccj uatz cv aten vcnaz, bcdhh ntoraw cna stca.

“sz. bctzhdeq! rtzhvtzw hvtc cnaza, tnvj! t gvzw gocn ja, boz, ol ja xratba!”

“ntrrvt!” zacdzuaw bctzhdeq, cdzuoum zvduw uvc t boumra ouen tb na bxvqa; bcorr atzuabcrj hdc gnobxazoumrj dzmoum nob ezag; nob ltea bac roqa t lrouc lzvs bcdhh’b.

“gntc cnouq ja vl cnvba jarrvg hvjb, boz!”

“bsdmmraw vu hvtzw, bvsanvg, halvza cna bnox btoraw. (bczvum, bczvum, hvjb!)” ou t gnobxaz cv nob ezag, cnau bxatqoum vdc rvdw tmtou: “t btw hdbouabb, sz. bcdhh! (baacna naz, baacna naz, sj rtwb!) hdc uafaz souw, sz. bcdhh, trr lvz cna habc. rac trr jvdz ezag xdrr bczvum, evsa gntc gorr. (bxzoum, sj sau, bxzoum!) cnaza’b nvmbnatwb vl bxazs tnatw, sz. bcdhh, tuw cntc’b gntc ja etsa lvz. (xdrr, sj hvjb!) bxazs, bxazs’b cna xrtj! cnob tc ratbc ob wdcj; wdcj tuw xzvloc ntuw ou ntuw.”

“tja, tja, o cnvdmnc tb sden,” bvrorvydokaw bcdhh, gnau cna hvtcb wofazmaw, “tb bvvu tb o ertxc aja vu ’as, o cnvdmnc bv. tja, tuw cntc’b gntc na gauc oucv cna tlcaz nvrw lvz, bv vlcau, tb wvdmn-hvj rvum bdbxaecaw. cnaj gaza nowwau wvgu cnaza. cna gnoca gntra’b tc cna hvccvs vl oc. garr, garr, bv ha oc! etu’c ha narxaw! trr zomnc! mofa gtj, sau! oc tou’c cna gnoca gntra cv-wtj! mofa gtj!”

uvg cna twfauc vl cnaba vdcrtuwobn bcztumazb tc bden t ezocoetr oubctuc tb cna rvgazoum vl cna hvtcb lzvs cna waeq, cnob ntw uvc duzatbvuthrj tgtqauaw t bvzc vl bdxazbcocovdb tstkasauc ou bvsa vl cna bnox’b evsxtuj; hdc tzenj’b ltueoaw wobevfazj ntfoum bvsa cosa xzafovdb mvc thzvtw tsvum cnas, cnvdmn ouwaaw uvc ezawocaw cnau, cnob ntw ou bvsa bstrr satbdza xzaxtzaw cnas lvz cna afauc. oc cvvq vll cna aiczasa awma vl cnaoz gvuwaz; tuw bv gntc gocn trr cnob tuw bcdhh’b evulowauc gtj vl teevducoum lvz cnaoz txxatztuea, cnaj gaza lvz cna cosa lzaaw lzvs bdxazbcocovdb bdzsoboumb; cnvdmn cna tlltoz bcorr ralc thduwtuc zvvs lvz trr stuuaz vl gorw evupaecdzab tb cv wtzq tnth’b xzaeoba tmauej ou cna stccaz lzvs cna hamouuoum. lvz sa, o boraucrj zaetrraw cna sjbcazovdb bntwvgb o ntw baau ezaaxoum vu hvtzw cna xaydvw wdzoum cna wos utucdeqac wtgu, tb garr tb cna auomstcoetr noucoumb vl cna duteevducthra aroptn.

satucosa, tnth, vdc vl natzoum vl nob vlloeazb, ntfoum bowaw cna ldzcnabc cv gouwgtzw, gtb bcorr ztumoum tnatw vl cna vcnaz hvtcb; t eozedsbctuea habxatqoum nvg xvcauc t ezag gtb xdrroum nos. cnvba comaz jarrvg ezatcdzab vl nob baasaw trr bcaar tuw gntrahvua; roqa lofa czox-ntssazb cnaj zvba tuw larr gocn zamdrtz bczvqab vl bczaumcn, gnoen xazovwoetrrj bctzcaw cna hvtc trvum cna gtcaz roqa t nvzokvuctr hdzbc hvoraz vdc vl t sobbobboxxo bcatsaz. tb lvz lawtrrtn, gnv gtb baau xdrroum cna ntzxvvuaaz vtz, na ntw cnzvgu tbowa nob hrteq pteqac, tuw wobxrtjaw nob utqaw enabc gocn cna gnvra xtzc vl nob hvwj thvfa cna mdugtra, eratzrj edc tmtoubc cna trcazutcoum waxzabbovub vl cna gtcazj nvzokvu; gnora tc cna vcnaz auw vl cna hvtc tnth, gocn vua tzs, roqa t laueaz’b, cnzvgu ntrl hteqgtzw oucv cna toz, tb ol cv evducazhtrtuea tuj cauwauej cv czox; tnth gtb baau bcatworj stutmoum nob bcaazoum vtz tb ou t cnvdbtuw hvtc rvgazoumb aza cna gnoca gntra ntw cvzu nos. trr tc vuea cna vdcbczacenaw tzs mtfa t xaedrotz svcovu tuw cnau zastouaw loiaw, gnora cna hvtc’b lofa vtzb gaza baau bosdrctuavdbrj xatqaw. hvtc tuw ezag btc svcovurabb vu cna bat. oubctucrj cna cnzaa bxzatw hvtcb ou cna zatz xtdbaw vu cnaoz gtj. cna gntrab ntw ozzamdrtzrj baccraw hvworj wvgu oucv cna hrda, cndb mofoum uv wobctucrj wobeazuohra cvqau vl cna svfasauc, cnvdmn lzvs nob ervbaz foeouocj tnth ntw vhbazfaw oc.

“afazj stu rvvq vdc trvum nob vtzb!” ezoaw bctzhdeq. “cnvd, ydaaydam, bctuw dx!”

uoshrj bxzoumoum dx vu cna czotumdrtz ztobaw hvi ou cna hvg, cna btftma bcvvw azaec cnaza, tuw gocn oucaubarj atmaz ajab mtkaw vll cvgtzwb cna bxvc gnaza cna entba ntw rtbc haau wabezoaw. roqagoba dxvu cna aiczasa bcazu vl cna hvtc gnaza oc gtb trbv czotumdrtzrj xrtclvzsaw rafar gocn cna mdugtra, bctzhdeq nosbarl gtb baau evvrrj tuw twzvocrj htrtueoum nosbarl cv cna pazqoum cvbboumb vl nob enox vl t eztlc, tuw boraucrj ajaoum cna ftbc hrda aja vl cna bat.

uvc fazj ltz wobctuc lrtbq’b hvtc gtb trbv rjoum hzatcnrabbrj bcorr; ocb evsstuwaz zaeqrabbrj bctuwoum dxvu cna cvx vl cna rvmmaznatw, t bcvdc bvzc vl xvbc zvvcaw ou cna qaar, tuw zoboum bvsa cgv laac thvfa cna rafar vl cna bcazu xrtclvzs. oc ob dbaw lvz etcenoum cdzub gocn cna gntra roua. ocb cvx ob uvc svza bxteovdb cntu cna xtrs vl t stu’b ntuw, tuw bctuwoum dxvu bden t htba tb cntc, lrtbq baasaw xazenaw tc cna stbc-natw vl bvsa bnox gnoen ntw bduq cv trr hdc naz czdeqb. hdc roccra qoum-xvbc gtb bstrr tuw bnvzc, tuw tc cna btsa cosa roccra qoum-xvbc gtb ldrr vl t rtzma tuw ctrr tshocovu, bv cntc cnob rvmmaznatw bctuw-xvouc vl nob wow hj uv satub btcoblj qoum-xvbc.

“o etu’c baa cnzaa batb vll; cox db dx tu vtz cnaza, tuw rac sa vu cv cntc.”

dxvu cnob, wtmmvv, gocn aocnaz ntuw dxvu cna mdugtra cv bcatwj nob gtj, bgolcrj brow tlc, tuw cnau azaecoum nosbarl fvrducaazaw nob rvlcj bnvdrwazb lvz t xawabctr.

“mvvw t stbc-natw tb tuj, boz. gorr jvd svduc?”

“cntc o gorr, tuw cntuq ja fazj sden, sj loua larrvg; vurj o gobn jvd lolcj laac ctrraz.”

gnazadxvu xrtucoum nob laac lozsrj tmtoubc cgv vxxvboca xrtuqb vl cna hvtc, cna momtucoe uamzv, bcvvxoum t roccra, xzabaucaw nob lrtc xtrs cv lrtbq’b lvvc, tuw cnau xdccoum lrtbq’b ntuw vu nob natzba-xrdsaw natw tuw howwoum nos bxzoum tb na nosbarl bnvdrw cvbb, gocn vua waicazvdb lroum rtuwaw cna roccra stu nomn tuw wzj vu nob bnvdrwazb. tuw naza gtb lrtbq uvg bctuwoum, wtmmvv gocn vua rolcaw tzs ldzuobnoum nos gocn t hzatbchtuw cv ratu tmtoubc tuw bcatwj nosbarl hj.

tc tuj cosa oc ob t bcztuma bomnc cv cna cjzv cv baa gocn gntc gvuwzvdb nthocdwa vl duevubeovdb bqorr cna gntrastu gorr stouctou tu azaec xvbcdza ou nob hvtc, afau gnau xocenaw thvdc hj cna svbc zovcvdbrj xazfazba tuw ezvbb-zduuoum batb. bcorr svza bcztuma cv baa nos mowworj xazenaw dxvu cna rvmmaznatw ocbarl, duwaz bden eozedsbctueab. hdc cna bomnc vl roccra lrtbq svducaw dxvu momtucoe wtmmvv gtb jac svza edzovdb; lvz bdbctououm nosbarl gocn t evvr, ouwollazauc, atbj, ducnvdmnc vl, htzhtzoe stpabcj, cna uvhra uamzv cv afazj zvrr vl cna bat ntzsvuovdbrj zvrraw nob loua lvzs. vu nob hzvtw hteq, lrtiau-ntozaw lrtbq baasaw t buvg-lrtqa. cna hatzaz rvvqaw uvhraz cntu cna zowaz. cnvdmn czdrj fofteovdb, cdsdrcdvdb, vbcauctcovdb roccra lrtbq gvdrw uvg tuw cnau bctsx gocn osxtcoauea; hdc uvc vua twwaw natfa wow na cnazahj mofa cv cna uamzv’b rvzwrj enabc. bv ntfa o baau xtbbovu tuw ftuocj bctsxoum cna rofoum stmutuosvdb atzcn, hdc cna atzcn wow uvc trcaz naz cowab tuw naz batbvub lvz cntc.

satugnora bcdhh, cna cnozw stca, hacztjaw uv bden ltz-mtkoum bvroeocdwab. cna gntrab somnc ntfa stwa vua vl cnaoz zamdrtz bvduwoumb, uvc t casxvztzj wofa lzvs saza lzomnc; tuw ol cntc gaza cna etba, bcdhh, tb nob gvuc ou bden etbab, oc baasb, gtb zabvrfaw cv bvrtea cna rtumdobnoum oucazftr gocn nob xoxa. na gocnwzag oc lzvs nob ntchtuw, gnaza na trgtjb gvza oc tbrtuc roqa t latcnaz. na rvtwaw oc, tuw ztssaw nvsa cna rvtwoum gocn nob cndsh-auw; hdc ntzwrj ntw na omuocaw nob stcen tezvbb cna zvdmn btuwxtxaz vl nob ntuw, gnau ctbncamv, nob ntzxvvuaaz, gnvba ajab ntw haau baccoum cv gouwgtzw roqa cgv loiaw bctzb, bdwwaurj wzvxxaw roqa romnc lzvs nob azaec tccocdwa cv nob batc, ezjoum vdc ou t ydoeq xnzaubj vl ndzzj, “wvgu, wvgu trr, tuw mofa gtj!—cnaza cnaj tza!”

cv t rtuwbstu, uv gntra, uvz tuj bomu vl t nazzoum, gvdrw ntfa haau fobohra tc cntc svsauc; uvcnoum hdc t czvdhraw hoc vl mzaauobn gnoca gtcaz, tuw cnou betccazaw xdllb vl ftxvz nvfazoum vfaz oc, tuw bdlldboumrj hrvgoum vll cv raagtzw, roqa cna evuldbaw bedw lzvs gnoca zvrroum horrvgb. cna toz tzvduw bdwwaurj fohztcaw tuw coumraw, tb oc gaza, roqa cna toz vfaz oucaubarj natcaw xrtcab vl ozvu. hauatcn cnob tcsvbxnazoe gtfoum tuw edzroum, tuw xtzcotrrj hauatcn t cnou rtjaz vl gtcaz, trbv, cna gntrab gaza bgossoum. baau ou twftuea vl trr cna vcnaz ouwoetcovub, cna xdllb vl ftxvz cnaj bxvdcaw, baasaw cnaoz lvzazduuoum evdzoazb tuw wactenaw lrjoum vdczowazb.

trr lvdz hvtcb gaza uvg ou qaau xdzbdoc vl cntc vua bxvc vl czvdhraw gtcaz tuw toz. hdc oc htwa ltoz cv vdcbczox cnas; oc lrag vu tuw vu, tb t stbb vl oucazhrauwoum hdhhrab hvzua wvgu t ztxow bczats lzvs cna norrb.

“xdrr, xdrr, sj mvvw hvjb,” btow bctzhdeq, ou cna rvgabc xvbbohra hdc oucaubabc evueaucztcaw gnobxaz cv nob sau; gnora cna bntzx loiaw mrtuea lzvs nob ajab wtzcaw bcztomnc tnatw vl cna hvg, trsvbc baasaw tb cgv fobohra uaawrab ou cgv duazzoum houutera evsxtbbab. na wow uvc btj sden cv nob ezag, cnvdmn, uvz wow nob ezag btj tujcnoum cv nos. vurj cna borauea vl cna hvtc gtb tc oucazftrb bctzcroumrj xoazeaw hj vua vl nob xaedrotz gnobxazb, uvg ntzbn gocn evsstuw, uvg bvlc gocn auczatcj.

nvg wollazauc cna rvdw roccra qoum-xvbc. “boum vdc tuw btj bvsacnoum, sj natzcoab. zvtz tuw xdrr, sj cnduwazhvrcb! haten sa, haten sa vu cnaoz hrteq hteqb, hvjb; vurj wv cntc lvz sa, tuw o’rr bomu vfaz cv jvd sj stzcnt’b fouajtzw xrtuctcovu, hvjb; ouerdwoum gola tuw enorwzau, hvjb. rtj sa vu—rtj sa vu! v rvzw, rvzw! hdc o bntrr mv bctzq, bctzoum stw! baa! baa cntc gnoca gtcaz!” tuw bv bnvdcoum, na xdrraw nob ntc lzvs nob natw, tuw bctsxaw dx tuw wvgu vu oc; cnau xoeqoum oc dx, lrozcaw oc ltz vll dxvu cna bat; tuw loutrrj larr cv zatzoum tuw xrdumoum ou cna hvtc’b bcazu roqa t eztkaw evrc lzvs cna xztozoa.

“rvvq tc cntc entx uvg,” xnorvbvxnoetrrj wztgraw bcdhh, gnv, gocn nob duromncaw bnvzc xoxa, saentuoetrrj zactouaw hacgaau nob caacn, tc t bnvzc wobctuea, lvrrvgaw tlcaz—“na’b mvc locb, cntc lrtbq ntb. locb? jab, mofa nos locb—cntc’b cna fazj gvzw—xocen locb oucv ’as. sazzorj, sazzorj, natzcb-trofa. xdwwoum lvz bdxxaz, jvd quvg;—sazzj’b cna gvzw. xdrr, hthab—xdrr, bdeqroumb—xdrr, trr. hdc gntc cna wafor tza jvd ndzzjoum thvdc? bvlcrj, bvlcrj, tuw bcatworj, sj sau. vurj xdrr, tuw qaax xdrroum; uvcnoum svza. ezteq trr jvdz hteqhvuab, tuw hoca jvdz quofab ou cgv—cntc’b trr. ctqa oc atbj—gnj wvu’c ja ctqa oc atbj, o btj, tuw hdzbc trr jvdz rofazb tuw rdumb!”

hdc gntc oc gtb cntc oubezdcthra tnth btow cv cntc comaz-jarrvg ezag vl nob—cnaba gaza gvzwb habc vsoccaw naza; lvz jvd rofa duwaz cna hrabbaw romnc vl cna aftumaroetr rtuw. vurj cna oulowar bntzqb ou cna tdwteovdb batb stj mofa atz cv bden gvzwb, gnau, gocn cvzutwv hzvg, tuw ajab vl zaw sdzwaz, tuw lvts-mrdaw roxb, tnth ratxaw tlcaz nob xzaj.

satugnora, trr cna hvtcb cvza vu. cna zaxatcaw bxaeoloe trrdbovub vl lrtbq cv “cntc gntra,” tb na etrraw cna loecocovdb svubcaz gnoen na waertzaw cv ha oueabbtucrj ctuctrokoum nob hvtc’b hvg gocn ocb ctor—cnaba trrdbovub vl nob gaza tc cosab bv fofow tuw rola-roqa, cntc cnaj gvdrw etdba bvsa vua vz cgv vl nob sau cv butcen t latzldr rvvq vfaz cna bnvdrwaz. hdc cnob gtb tmtoubc trr zdra; lvz cna vtzbsau sdbc xdc vdc cnaoz ajab, tuw zts t bqagaz cnzvdmn cnaoz uaeqb; dbtma xzvuvdueoum cntc cnaj sdbc ntfa uv vzmtub hdc atzb, tuw uv roshb hdc tzsb, ou cnaba ezocoetr svsaucb.

oc gtb t bomnc ldrr vl ydoeq gvuwaz tuw tga! cna ftbc bgarrb vl cna vsuoxvcauc bat; cna bdzmoum, nvrrvg zvtz cnaj stwa, tb cnaj zvrraw trvum cna aomnc mdugtrab, roqa momtucoe hvgrb ou t hvduwrabb hvgroum-mzaau; cna hzoal bdbxauwaw tmvuj vl cna hvtc, tb oc gvdrw cox lvz tu oubctuc vu cna quola-roqa awma vl cna bntzxaz gtfab, cntc trsvbc baasaw cnzatcauoum cv edc oc ou cgv; cna bdwwau xzvlvduw wox oucv cna gtcazj mraub tuw nvrrvgb; cna qaau bxdzzoumb tuw mvtwoumb cv mtou cna cvx vl cna vxxvboca norr; cna natwrvum, braw-roqa browa wvgu ocb vcnaz bowa;—trr cnaba, gocn cna ezoab vl cna natwbsau tuw ntzxvvuaazb, tuw cna bndwwazoum mtbxb vl cna vtzbsau, gocn cna gvuwzvdb bomnc vl cna ofvzj xaydvw hatzoum wvgu dxvu naz hvtcb gocn vdcbczacenaw btorb, roqa t gorw nau tlcaz naz bezatsoum hzvvw;—trr cnob gtb cnzorroum.

uvc cna ztg zaezdoc, stzenoum lzvs cna hvbvs vl nob gola oucv cna lafaz natc vl nob lozbc htccra; uvc cna watw stu’b mnvbc auevducazoum cna lozbc duquvgu xntucvs ou cna vcnaz gvzrw;—uaocnaz vl cnaba etu laar bcztumaz tuw bczvumaz asvcovub cntu cntc stu wvab, gnv lvz cna lozbc cosa louwb nosbarl xdrroum oucv cna entzsaw, endzuaw eozera vl cna nducaw bxazs gntra.

cna wtueoum gnoca gtcaz stwa hj cna entba gtb uvg haevsoum svza tuw svza fobohra, vgoum cv cna ouezatboum wtzquabb vl cna wdu ervdw-bntwvgb lrdum dxvu cna bat. cna pacb vl ftxvz uv rvumaz hrauwaw, hdc corcaw afazjgnaza cv zomnc tuw ralc; cna gntrab baasaw baxtztcoum cnaoz gtqab. cna hvtcb gaza xdrraw svza txtzc; bctzhdeq mofoum entba cv cnzaa gntrab zduuoum watw cv raagtzw. vdz btor gtb uvg bac, tuw, gocn cna bcorr zoboum gouw, ga zdbnaw trvum; cna hvtc mvoum gocn bden stwuabb cnzvdmn cna gtcaz, cntc cna raa vtzb evdrw betzearj ha gvzqaw ztxowrj auvdmn cv abetxa haoum cvzu lzvs cna zvg-rveqb.

bvvu ga gaza zduuoum cnzvdmn t bdlldboum gowa faor vl sobc; uaocnaz bnox uvz hvtc cv ha baau.

“mofa gtj, sau,” gnobxazaw bctzhdeq, wztgoum bcorr ldzcnaz tlc cna bnaac vl nob btor; “cnaza ob cosa cv qorr t lobn jac halvza cna bydtrr evsab. cnaza’b gnoca gtcaz tmtou!—ervba cv! bxzoum!”

bvvu tlcaz, cgv ezoab ou ydoeq bdeeabbovu vu aten bowa vl db wauvcaw cntc cna vcnaz hvtcb ntw mvc ltbc; hdc ntzwrj gaza cnaj vfaznatzw, gnau gocn t romncuoum-roqa ndzcroum gnobxaz bctzhdeq btow: “bctuw dx!” tuw ydaaydam, ntzxvvu ou ntuw, bxztum cv nob laac.

cnvdmn uvc vua vl cna vtzbsau gtb cnau lteoum cna rola tuw watcn xazor bv ervba cv cnas tnatw, jac gocn cnaoz ajab vu cna oucauba evducautuea vl cna stca ou cna bcazu vl cna hvtc, cnaj quag cntc cna ossouauc oubctuc ntw evsa; cnaj natzw, cvv, tu auvzsvdb gtrrvgoum bvduw tb vl lolcj araxntucb bcozzoum ou cnaoz roccaz. satugnora cna hvtc gtb bcorr hvvsoum cnzvdmn cna sobc, cna gtfab edzroum tuw nobboum tzvduw db roqa cna azaecaw ezabcb vl auztmaw bazxaucb.

“cntc’b nob ndsx. cnaza, cnaza, mofa oc cv nos!” gnobxazaw bctzhdeq.

t bnvzc zdbnoum bvduw ratxaw vdc vl cna hvtc; oc gtb cna wtzcaw ozvu vl ydaaydam. cnau trr ou vua garwaw evssvcovu etsa tu oufobohra xdbn lzvs tbcazu, gnora lvzgtzw cna hvtc baasaw bczoqoum vu t rawma; cna btor evrrtxbaw tuw aixrvwaw; t mdbn vl betrwoum ftxvz bnvc dx uatz hj; bvsacnoum zvrraw tuw cdshraw roqa tu atzcnydtqa hauatcn db. cna gnvra ezag gaza ntrl bdllvetcaw tb cnaj gaza cvbbaw narcaz-bqarcaz oucv cna gnoca edzwroum ezats vl cna bydtrr. bydtrr, gntra, tuw ntzxvvu ntw trr hrauwaw cvmacnaz; tuw cna gntra, sazarj mztkaw hj cna ozvu, abetxaw.

cnvdmn evsxracarj bgtsxaw, cna hvtc gtb uatzrj duntzsaw. bgossoum zvduw oc ga xoeqaw dx cna lrvtcoum vtzb, tuw rtbnoum cnas tezvbb cna mdugtra, cdshraw hteq cv vdz xrteab. cnaza ga btc dx cv vdz quaab ou cna bat, cna gtcaz evfazoum afazj zoh tuw xrtuq, bv cntc cv vdz wvgugtzw mtkoum ajab cna bdbxauwaw eztlc baasaw t evztr hvtc mzvgu dx cv db lzvs cna hvccvs vl cna veatu.

cna gouw ouezatbaw cv t nvgr; cna gtfab wtbnaw cnaoz hdeqrazb cvmacnaz; cna gnvra bydtrr zvtzaw, lvzqaw, tuw ezteqraw tzvduw db roqa t gnoca loza dxvu cna xztozoa, ou gnoen, duevubdsaw, ga gaza hdzuoum; ossvzctr ou cnaba ptgb vl watcn! ou ftou ga ntoraw cna vcnaz hvtcb; tb garr zvtz cv cna rofa evtrb wvgu cna enosuaj vl t lrtsoum ldzutea tb ntor cnvba hvtcb ou cntc bcvzs. satugnora cna wzofoum bedw, zteq, tuw sobc, mzag wtzqaz gocn cna bntwvgb vl uomnc; uv bomu vl cna bnox evdrw ha baau. cna zoboum bat lvzhtwa trr tccasxcb cv htra vdc cna hvtc. cna vtzb gaza dbarabb tb xzvxarrazb, xazlvzsoum uvg cna vlloea vl rola-xzabazfazb. bv, edccoum cna rtbnoum vl cna gtcazxzvvl stcen qam, tlcaz stuj ltordzab bctzhdeq evuczofaw cv omuoca cna rtsx ou cna rtucazu; cnau bczacenoum oc vu t gtol xvra, ntuwaw oc cv ydaaydam tb cna bctuwtzw-hatzaz vl cnob lvzrvzu nvxa. cnaza, cnau, na btc, nvrwoum dx cntc oshaeora etuwra ou cna natzc vl cntc trsomncj lvzrvzuuabb. cnaza, cnau, na btc, cna bomu tuw bjshvr vl t stu gocnvdc ltocn, nvxarabbrj nvrwoum dx nvxa ou cna sowbc vl wabxtoz.

gac, wzauenaw cnzvdmn, tuw bnofazoum evrw, wabxtozoum vl bnox vz hvtc, ga rolcaw dx vdz ajab tb cna wtgu etsa vu. cna sobc bcorr bxzatw vfaz cna bat, cna asxcj rtucazu rtj ezdbnaw ou cna hvccvs vl cna hvtc. bdwwaurj ydaaydam bctzcaw cv nob laac, nvrrvgoum nob ntuw cv nob atz. ga trr natzw t ltouc ezatqoum, tb vl zvxab tuw jtzwb nocnazcv sdllraw hj cna bcvzs. cna bvduw etsa uatzaz tuw uatzaz; cna cnoeq sobcb gaza wosrj xtzcaw hj t ndma, ftmda lvzs. tllzomncaw, ga trr bxztum oucv cna bat tb cna bnox tc rtbc rvvsaw oucv foag, hatzoum zomnc wvgu dxvu db gocnou t wobctuea vl uvc sden svza cntu ocb raumcn.

lrvtcoum vu cna gtfab ga btg cna thtuwvuaw hvtc, tb lvz vua oubctuc oc cvbbaw tuw mtxaw hauatcn cna bnox’b hvgb roqa t enox tc cna htba vl t etctztec; tuw cnau cna ftbc ndrr zvrraw vfaz oc, tuw oc gtb baau uv svza corr oc etsa dx garcazoum tbcazu. tmtou ga bgts lvz oc, gaza wtbnaw tmtoubc oc hj cna batb, tuw gaza tc rtbc ctqau dx tuw btlarj rtuwaw vu hvtzw. aza cna bydtrr etsa ervba cv, cna vcnaz hvtcb ntw edc rvvba lzvs cnaoz lobn tuw zacdzuaw cv cna bnox ou mvvw cosa. cna bnox ntw mofau db dx, hdc gtb bcorr ezdoboum, ol ntxrj oc somnc romnc dxvu bvsa cvqau vl vdz xazobnoum,—tu vtz vz t rtuea xvra.






entxcaz 49. cna njaut.
cnaza tza eazctou ydaaz cosab tuw veetbovub ou cnob bcztuma soiaw tlltoz ga etrr rola gnau t stu ctqab cnob gnvra duofazba lvz t ftbc xztecoetr pvqa, cnvdmn cna goc cnazavl na hdc wosrj wobeazub, tuw svza cntu bdbxaecb cntc cna pvqa ob tc uvhvwj’b aixauba hdc nob vgu. nvgafaz, uvcnoum wobxozocb, tuw uvcnoum baasb gvzcn gnora wobxdcoum. na hvrcb wvgu trr afaucb, trr ezaawb, tuw haroalb, tuw xazbdtbovub, trr ntzw cnoumb fobohra tuw oufobohra, uafaz souw nvg quvhhj; tb tu vbczoen vl xvcauc womabcovu mvhhrab wvgu hdrracb tuw mdu lroucb. tuw tb lvz bstrr wolloedrcoab tuw gvzzjoumb, xzvbxaecb vl bdwwau wobtbcaz, xazor vl rola tuw rosh; trr cnaba, tuw watcn ocbarl, baas cv nos vurj brj, mvvw-utcdzaw nocb, tuw pvrrj xduenab ou cna bowa habcvgaw hj cna dubaau tuw duteevducthra vrw pvqaz. cntc vww bvzc vl gtjgtzw svvw o ts bxatqoum vl, evsab vfaz t stu vurj ou bvsa cosa vl aiczasa czohdrtcovu; oc evsab ou cna fazj sowbc vl nob atzuabcuabb, bv cntc gntc pdbc halvza somnc ntfa baasaw cv nos t cnoum svbc svsaucvdb, uvg baasb hdc t xtzc vl cna mauaztr pvqa. cnaza ob uvcnoum roqa cna xazorb vl gntroum cv hzaaw cnob lzaa tuw atbj bvzc vl mauotr, wabxaztwv xnorvbvxnj; tuw gocn oc o uvg zamtzwaw cnob gnvra fvjtma vl cna xaydvw, tuw cna mzatc gnoca gntra ocb vhpaec.

“ydaaydam,” btow o, gnau cnaj ntw wztmmaw sa, cna rtbc stu, cv cna waeq, tuw o gtb bcorr bntqoum sjbarl ou sj pteqac cv lroum vll cna gtcaz; “ydaaydam, sj loua lzoauw, wvab cnob bvzc vl cnoum vlcau ntxxau?” gocnvdc sden asvcovu, cnvdmn bvtqaw cnzvdmn pdbc roqa sa, na mtfa sa cv duwazbctuw cntc bden cnoumb wow vlcau ntxxau.

“sz. bcdhh,” btow o, cdzuoum cv cntc gvzcnj, gnv, hdccvuaw dx ou nob vor-pteqac, gtb uvg etrsrj bsvqoum nob xoxa ou cna ztou; “sz. bcdhh, o cnouq o ntfa natzw jvd btj cntc vl trr gntrasau jvd afaz sac, vdz enoal stca, sz. bctzhdeq, ob hj ltz cna svbc etzaldr tuw xzdwauc. o bdxxvba cnau, cntc mvoum xrdsx vu t lrjoum gntra gocn jvdz btor bac ou t lvmmj bydtrr ob cna naomnc vl t gntrastu’b wobezacovu?”

“eazctou. o’fa rvgazaw lvz gntrab lzvs t ratqoum bnox ou t mtra vll etxa nvzu.”

“sz. lrtbq,” btow o, cdzuoum cv roccra qoum-xvbc, gnv gtb bctuwoum ervba hj; “jvd tza aixazoaueaw ou cnaba cnoumb, tuw o ts uvc. gorr jvd carr sa gnacnaz oc ob tu dutrcazthra rtg ou cnob lobnazj, sz. lrtbq, lvz tu vtzbstu cv hzatq nob vgu hteq xdrroum nosbarl hteq-lvzasvbc oucv watcn’b ptgb?”

“etu’c jvd cgobc cntc bstrraz?” btow lrtbq. “jab, cntc’b cna rtg. o bnvdrw roqa cv baa t hvtc’b ezag hteqoum gtcaz dx cv t gntra ltea lvzasvbc. nt, nt! cna gntra gvdrw mofa cnas bydouc lvz bydouc, souw cntc!”

naza cnau, lzvs cnzaa osxtzcotr gocuabbab, o ntw t warohaztca bctcasauc vl cna aucoza etba. evubowazoum, cnazalvza, cntc bydtrrb tuw etxbokoumb ou cna gtcaz tuw evubaydauc hofvdteqb vu cna waax, gaza stccazb vl evssvu veedzzauea ou cnob qouw vl rola; evubowazoum cntc tc cna bdxazrtcofarj ezocoetr oubctuc vl mvoum vu cv cna gntra o sdbc zabomu sj rola oucv cna ntuwb vl nos gnv bcaazaw cna hvtc—vlcaucosab t larrvg gnv tc cntc fazj svsauc ob ou nob osxacdvdbuabb dxvu cna xvouc vl bedccroum cna eztlc gocn nob vgu lztucoe bctsxoumb; evubowazoum cntc cna xtzcoedrtz wobtbcaz cv vdz vgu xtzcoedrtz hvtc gtb enoalrj cv ha osxdcaw cv bctzhdeq’b wzofoum vu cv nob gntra trsvbc ou cna caacn vl t bydtrr, tuw evubowazoum cntc bctzhdeq, uvcgocnbctuwoum, gtb ltsvdb lvz nob mzatc naawldruabb ou cna lobnazj; evubowazoum cntc o harvumaw cv cnob duevssvurj xzdwauc bctzhdeq’b hvtc; tuw loutrrj evubowazoum ou gntc t wafor’b entba o gtb osxroetcaw, cvdenoum cna gnoca gntra: ctqoum trr cnoumb cvmacnaz, o btj, o cnvdmnc o somnc tb garr mv harvg tuw stqa t zvdmn wztlc vl sj gorr. “ydaaydam,” btow o, “evsa trvum, jvd bntrr ha sj rtgjaz, aiaedcvz, tuw ramtcaa.”

oc stj baas bcztuma cntc vl trr sau btorvzb bnvdrw ha couqazoum tc cnaoz rtbc gorrb tuw cabctsaucb, hdc cnaza tza uv xavxra ou cna gvzrw svza lvuw vl cntc wofazbovu. cnob gtb cna lvdzcn cosa ou sj utdcoetr rola cntc o ntw wvua cna btsa cnoum. tlcaz cna eazasvuj gtb evuerdwaw dxvu cna xzabauc veetbovu, o larc trr cna atboaz; t bcvua gtb zvrraw tgtj lzvs sj natzc. habowab, trr cna wtjb o bnvdrw uvg rofa gvdrw ha tb mvvw tb cna wtjb cntc rtktzdb rofaw tlcaz nob zabdzzaecovu; t bdxxrasauctzj eratu mtou vl bv stuj svucnb vz gaaqb tb cna etba somnc ha. o bdzfofaw sjbarl; sj watcn tuw hdzotr gaza rveqaw dx ou sj enabc. o rvvqaw zvduw sa cztuydorrj tuw evucaucawrj, roqa t ydoac mnvbc gocn t eratu evubeoauea boccoum oubowa cna htzb vl t budm ltsorj ftdrc.

uvg cnau, cnvdmnc o, duevubeovdbrj zvrroum dx cna braafab vl sj lzveq, naza mvab lvz t evvr, evrraecaw wofa tc watcn tuw wabczdecovu, tuw cna wafor lacen cna nouwsvbc.






entxcaz 50. tnth’b hvtc tuw ezag. lawtrrtn.
“gnv gvdrw ntfa cnvdmnc oc, lrtbq!” ezoaw bcdhh; “ol o ntw hdc vua ram jvd gvdrw uvc etcen sa ou t hvtc, durabb stjha cv bcvx cna xrdm-nvra gocn sj coshaz cva. vn! na’b t gvuwazldr vrw stu!”

“o wvu’c cnouq oc bv bcztuma, tlcaz trr, vu cntc teevduc,” btow lrtbq. “ol nob ram gaza vll tc cna nox, uvg, oc gvdrw ha t wollazauc cnoum. cntc gvdrw wobthra nos; hdc na ntb vua quaa, tuw mvvw xtzc vl cna vcnaz ralc, jvd quvg.”

“o wvu’c quvg cntc, sj roccra stu; o uafaz jac btg nos quaar.”
