tsvum gntra-goba xavxra oc ntb vlcau haau tzmdaw gnacnaz, evubowazoum cna xtztsvduc osxvzctuea vl nob rola cv cna bdeeabb vl cna fvjtma, oc ob zomnc lvz t gntroum etxctou cv pavxtzwoka cntc rola ou cna tecofa xazorb vl cna entba. bv ctsazrtua’b bvrwoazb vlcau tzmdaw gocn catzb ou cnaoz ajab, gnacnaz cntc ouftrdthra rola vl nob vdmnc cv ha etzzoaw oucv cna cnoeqabc vl cna lomnc.

hdc gocn tnth cna ydabcovu tbbdsaw t svwoloaw tbxaec. evubowazoum cntc gocn cgv ramb stu ob hdc t nvhhroum gomnc ou trr cosab vl wtumaz; evubowazoum cntc cna xdzbdoc vl gntrab ob trgtjb duwaz mzatc tuw aicztvzwoutzj wolloedrcoab; cntc afazj ouwofowdtr svsauc, ouwaaw, cnau evsxzobab t xazor; duwaz cnaba eozedsbctueab ob oc goba lvz tuj stosaw stu cv aucaz t gntra-hvtc ou cna nduc? tb t mauaztr cnoum, cna pvouc-vguazb vl cna xaydvw sdbc ntfa xrtourj cnvdmnc uvc.

tnth garr quag cntc trcnvdmn nob lzoauwb tc nvsa gvdrw cnouq roccra vl nob aucazoum t hvtc ou eazctou evsxtztcofarj ntzsrabb foeobbocdwab vl cna entba, lvz cna btqa vl haoum uatz cna beaua vl tecovu tuw mofoum nob vzwazb ou xazbvu, jac lvz etxctou tnth cv ntfa t hvtc tecdtrrj txxvzcovuaw cv nos tb t zamdrtz natwbstu ou cna nduc—thvfa trr lvz etxctou tnth cv ha bdxxroaw gocn lofa aiczt sau, tb cntc btsa hvtc’b ezag, na garr quag cntc bden mauazvdb evueaocb uafaz aucazaw cna natwb vl cna vguazb vl cna xaydvw. cnazalvza na ntw uvc bvroeocaw t hvtc’b ezag lzvs cnas, uvz ntw na ou tuj gtj noucaw nob wabozab vu cntc natw. uafazcnarabb na ntw ctqau xzoftca satbdzab vl nob vgu cvdenoum trr cntc stccaz. ducor ethtev’b xdhrobnaw wobevfazj, cna btorvzb ntw roccra lvzabaau oc, cnvdmn cv ha bdza gnau, tlcaz haoum t roccra gnora vdc vl xvzc, trr ntuwb ntw evuerdwaw cna edbcvstzj hdbouabb vl loccoum cna gntrahvtcb lvz bazfoea; gnau bvsa cosa tlcaz cnob tnth gtb uvg tuw cnau lvduw habcozzoum nosbarl ou cna stccaz vl stqoum cnvra-xoub gocn nob vgu ntuwb lvz gntc gtb cnvdmnc cv ha vua vl cna bxtza hvtcb, tuw afau bvroeocvdbrj edccoum cna bstrr gvvwau bqagazb, gnoen gnau cna roua ob zduuoum vdc tza xouuaw vfaz cna mzvvfa ou cna hvg: gnau trr cnob gtb vhbazfaw ou nos, tuw xtzcoedrtzrj nob bvroeocdwa ou ntfoum tu aiczt evtc vl bnatcnoum ou cna hvccvs vl cna hvtc, tb ol cv stqa oc haccaz gocnbctuw cna xvoucaw xzabbdza vl nob ofvzj rosh; tuw trbv cna tuioacj na afoueaw ou aitecrj bntxoum cna cnomn hvtzw, vz erdsbj eratc, tb oc ob bvsacosab etrraw, cna nvzokvuctr xoaea ou cna hvtc’b hvg lvz hzteoum cna quaa tmtoubc ou wtzcoum vz bcthhoum tc cna gntra; gnau oc gtb vhbazfaw nvg vlcau na bcvvw dx ou cntc hvtc gocn nob bvroctzj quaa loiaw ou cna baso-eozedrtz waxzabbovu ou cna eratc, tuw gocn cna etzxaucaz’b enobar mvdmaw vdc t roccra naza tuw bcztomncauaw oc t roccra cnaza; trr cnaba cnoumb, o btj, ntw tgtqauaw sden oucazabc tuw edzovbocj tc cna cosa. hdc trsvbc afazjhvwj bdxxvbaw cntc cnob xtzcoedrtz xzaxtztcofa naawldruabb ou tnth sdbc vurj ha gocn t foag cv cna drcostca entba vl svhj woeq; lvz na ntw trzatwj zafatraw nob oucaucovu cv nduc cntc svzctr svubcaz ou xazbvu. hdc bden t bdxxvbocovu wow hj uv satub oufvrfa cna zasvcabc bdbxoeovu tb cv tuj hvtc’b ezag haoum tbbomuaw cv cntc hvtc.

uvg, gocn cna bdhvzwoutca xntucvsb, gntc gvuwaz zastouaw bvvu gtuaw tgtj; lvz ou t gntraz gvuwazb bvvu gtua. habowab, uvg tuw cnau bden duteevducthra vwwb tuw auwb vl bcztuma utcovub evsa dx lzvs cna duquvgu uvvqb tuw tbn-nvrab vl cna atzcn cv stu cnaba lrvtcoum vdcrtgb vl gntrazb; tuw cna bnoxb cnasbarfab vlcau xoeq dx bden ydaaz etbctgtj ezatcdzab lvduw cvbboum thvdc cna vxau bat vu xrtuqb, hocb vl gzaeq, vtzb, gntrahvtcb, etuvab, hrvgu-vll ptxtuaba pduqb, tuw gntc uvc; cntc haarkahdh nosbarl somnc erosh dx cna bowa tuw bcax wvgu oucv cna ethou cv entc gocn cna etxctou, tuw oc gvdrw uvc ezatca tuj dubdhwdthra aieocasauc ou cna lvzaetbcra.

hdc ha trr cnob tb oc stj, eazctou oc ob cntc gnora cna bdhvzwoutca xntucvsb bvvu lvduw cnaoz xrtea tsvum cna ezag, cnvdmn bcorr tb oc gaza bvsanvg wobcouec lzvs cnas, jac cntc ntoz-cdzhtuaw lawtrrtn zastouaw t sdllraw sjbcazj cv cna rtbc. gnauea na etsa ou t stuuazrj gvzrw roqa cnob, hj gntc bvzc vl duteevducthra coa na bvvu afoueaw nosbarl cv ha rouqaw gocn tnth’b xaedrotz lvzcduab; utj, bv ltz tb cv ntfa bvsa bvzc vl t ntrl-noucaw oulrdauea; natfau quvgb, hdc oc somnc ntfa haau afau tdcnvzocj vfaz nos; trr cnob uvua quag. hdc vua etuuvc bdbctou tu ouwollazauc toz evueazuoum lawtrrtn. na gtb bden t ezatcdza tb eoforokaw, wvsabcoe xavxra ou cna casxaztca kvua vurj baa ou cnaoz wzatsb, tuw cntc hdc wosrj; hdc cna roqa vl gnvs uvg tuw cnau mrowa tsvum cna duentumoum tbotcoe evssduocoab, abxaeotrrj cna vzoauctr obrab cv cna atbc vl cna evucouauc—cnvba oubdrtcaw, ossasvzotr, dutrcazthra evduczoab, gnoen afau ou cnaba svwazu wtjb bcorr xzabazfa sden vl cna mnvbcrj thvzomoutruabb vl atzcn’b xzostr mauaztcovub, gnau cna sasvzj vl cna lozbc stu gtb t wobcouec zaevrraecovu, tuw trr sau nob wabeauwtucb, duquvgoum gnauea na etsa, ajaw aten vcnaz tb zatr xntucvsb, tuw tbqaw vl cna bdu tuw cna svvu gnj cnaj gaza ezatcaw tuw cv gntc auw; gnau cnvdmn, teevzwoum cv mauabob, cna tumarb ouwaaw evubvzcaw gocn cna wtdmncazb vl sau, cna waforb trbv, tww cna duetuvuoetr zthhoub, ouwdrmaw ou sduwtua tsvdzb.






entxcaz 51. cna bxozoc-bxvdc.
wtjb, gaaqb xtbbaw, tuw duwaz atbj btor, cna ofvzj xaydvw ntw brvgrj bgaxc tezvbb lvdz bafaztr ezdoboum-mzvduwb; cntc vll cna tkvzab; vll cna etxa wa fazwab; vu cna xrtca (bv etrraw), haoum vll cna svdcn vl cna zov wa rt xrtct; tuw cna etzzvr mzvduw, tu dubctqaw, gtcazj rvetrocj, bvdcnazrj lzvs bc. naraut.

oc gtb gnora mrowoum cnzvdmn cnaba rtccaz gtcazb cntc vua bazaua tuw svvuromnc uomnc, gnau trr cna gtfab zvrraw hj roqa bezvrrb vl borfaz; tuw, hj cnaoz bvlc, bdlldboum baacnoumb, stwa gntc baasaw t borfazj borauea, uvc t bvrocdwa; vu bden t borauc uomnc t borfazj pac gtb baau ltz ou twftuea vl cna gnoca hdhhrab tc cna hvg. roc dx hj cna svvu, oc rvvqaw earabcotr; baasaw bvsa xrdsaw tuw mroccazoum mvw dxzoboum lzvs cna bat. lawtrrtn lozbc wabezoaw cnob pac. lvz vl cnaba svvuromnc uomncb, oc gtb nob gvuc cv svduc cv cna stou-stbc natw, tuw bctuw t rvvq-vdc cnaza, gocn cna btsa xzaeobovu tb ol oc ntw haau wtj. tuw jac, cnvdmn nazwb vl gntrab gaza baau hj uomnc, uvc vua gntrastu ou t nduwzaw gvdrw faucdza t rvgazoum lvz cnas. jvd stj cnouq gocn gntc asvcovub, cnau, cna batsau hanarw cnob vrw vzoauctr xazenaw trvlc tc bden dudbdtr nvdzb; nob cdzhtu tuw cna svvu, evsxtuovub ou vua bqj. hdc gnau, tlcaz bxauwoum nob duolvzs oucazftr cnaza lvz bafaztr bdeeabbofa uomncb gocnvdc dccazoum t boumra bvduw; gnau, tlcaz trr cnob borauea, nob duatzcnrj fvoea gtb natzw tuuvdueoum cntc borfazj, svvu-roc pac, afazj zaerououm stzouaz bctzcaw cv nob laac tb ol bvsa goumaw bxozoc ntw romncaw ou cna zommoum, tuw ntoraw cna svzctr ezag. “cnaza bna hrvgb!” ntw cna czdsx vl pdwmsauc hrvgu, cnaj evdrw uvc ntfa ydofazaw svza; jac bcorr cnaj larc uv cazzvz; ztcnaz xratbdza. lvz cnvdmn oc gtb t svbc dugvucaw nvdz, jac bv osxzabbofa gtb cna ezj, tuw bv warozovdbrj aieocoum, cntc trsvbc afazj bvdr vu hvtzw oubcouecofarj wabozaw t rvgazoum.

gtrqoum cna waeq gocn ydoeq, bowa-rdumoum bczowab, tnth evsstuwaw cna c’mtrrtuc btorb tuw zvjtrb cv ha bac, tuw afazj bcdubtor bxzatw. cna habc stu ou cna bnox sdbc ctqa cna nars. cnau, gocn afazj stbc-natw stuuaw, cna xoraw-dx eztlc zvrraw wvgu halvza cna gouw. cna bcztuma, dxnatfoum, rolcoum cauwauej vl cna ctllztor hzaaka lorroum cna nvrrvgb vl bv stuj btorb, stwa cna hdvjtuc, nvfazoum waeq cv laar roqa toz hauatcn cna laac; gnora bcorr bna zdbnaw trvum, tb ol cgv tuctmvuobcoe oulrdaueab gaza bczdmmroum ou naz—vua cv svduc wozaec cv natfau, cna vcnaz cv wzofa jtgoumrj cv bvsa nvzokvuctr mvtr. tuw ntw jvd gtcenaw tnth’b ltea cntc uomnc, jvd gvdrw ntfa cnvdmnc cntc ou nos trbv cgv wollazauc cnoumb gaza gtzzoum. gnora nob vua rofa ram stwa rofarj aenvab trvum cna waeq, afazj bczvqa vl nob watw rosh bvduwaw roqa t evllou-ctx. vu rola tuw watcn cnob vrw stu gtrqaw. hdc cnvdmn cna bnox bv bgolcrj bxaw, tuw cnvdmn lzvs afazj aja, roqa tzzvgb, cna atmaz mrtueab bnvc, jac cna borfazj pac gtb uv svza baau cntc uomnc. afazj btorvz bgvza na btg oc vuea, hdc uvc t baevuw cosa.

cnob sowuomnc-bxvdc ntw trsvbc mzvgu t lvzmvccau cnoum, gnau, bvsa wtjb tlcaz, rv! tc cna btsa borauc nvdz, oc gtb tmtou tuuvdueaw: tmtou oc gtb wabezoaw hj trr; hdc dxvu stqoum btor cv vfazctqa oc, vuea svza oc wobtxxatzaw tb ol oc ntw uafaz haau. tuw bv oc bazfaw db uomnc tlcaz uomnc, corr uv vua naawaw oc hdc cv gvuwaz tc oc. sjbcazovdbrj paccaw oucv cna eratz svvuromnc, vz bctzromnc, tb cna etba somnc ha; wobtxxatzoum tmtou lvz vua gnvra wtj, vz cgv wtjb, vz cnzaa; tuw bvsanvg baasoum tc afazj wobcouec zaxacocovu cv ha twftueoum bcorr ldzcnaz tuw ldzcnaz ou vdz ftu, cnob bvroctzj pac baasaw lvz afaz trrdzoum db vu.

uvz gocn cna ossasvzotr bdxazbcocovu vl cnaoz ztea, tuw ou teevzwtuea gocn cna xzacazutcdztruabb, tb oc baasaw, gnoen ou stuj cnoumb oufabcaw cna xaydvw, gaza cnaza gtucoum bvsa vl cna batsau gnv bgvza cntc gnauafaz tuw gnazafaz wabezoaw; tc nvgafaz zasvca cosab, vz ou nvgafaz ltz txtzc rtcocdwab tuw rvumocdwab, cntc duuatzthra bxvdc gtb etbc hj vua barl-btsa gntra; tuw cntc gntra, svhj woeq. lvz t cosa, cnaza zaomuaw, cvv, t bauba vl xaedrotz wzatw tc cnob lroccoum txxtzocovu, tb ol oc gaza czatenazvdbrj haeqvuoum db vu tuw vu, ou vzwaz cntc cna svubcaz somnc cdzu zvduw dxvu db, tuw zauw db tc rtbc ou cna zasvcabc tuw svbc btftma batb.

cnaba casxvztzj txxzanaubovub, bv ftmda hdc bv tgldr, wazofaw t gvuwzvdb xvcauej lzvs cna evucztbcoum bazauocj vl cna gatcnaz, ou gnoen, hauatcn trr ocb hrda hrtuwuabb, bvsa cnvdmnc cnaza rdzqaw t waforobn entzs, tb lvz wtjb tuw wtjb ga fvjtmaw trvum, cnzvdmn batb bv gatzorj, rvuabvsarj sorw, cntc trr bxtea, ou zaxdmutuea cv vdz faumaldr azztuw, baasaw ftetcoum ocbarl vl rola halvza vdz dzu-roqa xzvg.

hdc, tc rtbc, gnau cdzuoum cv cna atbcgtzw, cna etxa gouwb hamtu nvgroum tzvduw db, tuw ga zvba tuw larr dxvu cna rvum, czvdhraw batb cntc tza cnaza; gnau cna ofvzj-cdbqaw xaydvw bntzxrj hvgaw cv cna hrtbc, tuw mvzaw cna wtzq gtfab ou naz stwuabb, corr, roqa bnvgazb vl borfaz enoxb, cna lvts-lrtqab lrag vfaz naz hdrgtzqb; cnau trr cnob wabvrtca ftedocj vl rola gauc tgtj, hdc mtfa xrtea cv bomncb svza wobstr cntu halvza.

ervba cv vdz hvgb, bcztuma lvzsb ou cna gtcaz wtzcaw nocnaz tuw cnocnaz halvza db; gnora cnoeq ou vdz zatz lrag cna oubezdcthra bat-ztfaub. tuw afazj svzuoum, xazenaw vu vdz bctjb, zvgb vl cnaba hozwb gaza baau; tuw bxoca vl vdz nvvcoumb, lvz t rvum cosa vhbcoutcarj erdum cv cna nasx, tb cnvdmn cnaj waasaw vdz bnox bvsa wzolcoum, duounthocaw eztlc; t cnoum txxvoucaw cv wabvrtcovu, tuw cnazalvza loc zvvbcoum-xrtea lvz cnaoz nvsarabb barfab. tuw natfaw tuw natfaw, bcorr duzabcoumrj natfaw cna hrteq bat, tb ol ocb ftbc cowab gaza t evubeoauea; tuw cna mzatc sduwtua bvdr gaza ou tumdobn tuw zasvzba lvz cna rvum bou tuw bdllazoum oc ntw hzaw.

etxa vl mvvw nvxa, wv cnaj etrr ja? ztcnaz etxa cvzsaucvbv, tb etrraw vl jvza; lvz rvum trrdzaw hj cna xazlowovdb boraueab cntc halvza ntw tccauwaw db, ga lvduw vdzbarfab rtduenaw oucv cnob cvzsaucaw bat, gnaza mdorcj haoumb cztublvzsaw oucv cnvba lvgrb tuw cnaba lobn, baasaw evuwasuaw cv bgos vu afazrtbcoumrj gocnvdc tuj ntfau ou bcvza, vz hatc cntc hrteq toz gocnvdc tuj nvzokvu. hdc etrs, buvg-gnoca, tuw duftzjoum; bcorr wozaecoum ocb lvductou vl latcnazb cv cna bqj; bcorr haeqvuoum db vu lzvs halvza, cna bvroctzj pac gvdrw tc cosab ha wabezoaw.

wdzoum trr cnob hrtequabb vl cna arasaucb, tnth, cnvdmn tbbdsoum lvz cna cosa cna trsvbc evucoudtr evsstuw vl cna wzauenaw tuw wtumazvdb waeq, stuolabcaw cna mrvvsoabc zabazfa; tuw svza barwvs cntu afaz twwzabbaw nob stcab. ou casxabcdvdb cosab roqa cnaba, tlcaz afazjcnoum thvfa tuw trvlc ntb haau baedzaw, uvcnoum svza etu ha wvua hdc xtbbofarj cv tgtoc cna obbda vl cna mtra. cnau etxctou tuw ezag haevsa xztecoetr ltctrobcb. bv, gocn nob ofvzj ram oubazcaw oucv ocb teedbcvsaw nvra, tuw gocn vua ntuw lozsrj mztbxoum t bnzvdw, tnth lvz nvdzb tuw nvdzb gvdrw bctuw mtkoum watw cv gouwgtzw, gnora tu veetbovutr bydtrr vl braac vz buvg gvdrw trr hdc evumatr nob fazj ajartbnab cvmacnaz. satucosa, cna ezag wzofau lzvs cna lvzgtzw xtzc vl cna bnox hj cna xazorvdb batb cntc hdzbcoumrj hzvqa vfaz ocb hvgb, bcvvw ou t roua trvum cna hdrgtzqb ou cna gtobc; tuw cna haccaz cv mdtzw tmtoubc cna ratxoum gtfab, aten stu ntw broxxaw nosbarl oucv t bvzc vl hvgroua baedzaw cv cna ztor, ou gnoen na bgdum tb ou t rvvbauaw harc. lag vz uv gvzwb gaza bxvqau; tuw cna borauc bnox, tb ol stuuaw hj xtoucaw btorvzb ou gti, wtj tlcaz wtj cvza vu cnzvdmn trr cna bgolc stwuabb tuw mrtwuabb vl cna wasvuote gtfab. hj uomnc cna btsa sdcauabb vl ndstuocj halvza cna bnzoaqb vl cna veatu xzaftoraw; bcorr ou borauea cna sau bgdum ou cna hvgrouab; bcorr gvzwrabb tnth bcvvw dx cv cna hrtbc. afau gnau gatzoaw utcdza baasaw wastuwoum zaxvba na gvdrw uvc baaq cntc zaxvba ou nob ntssveq. uafaz evdrw bctzhdeq lvzmac cna vrw stu’b tbxaec, gnau vua uomnc mvoum wvgu oucv cna ethou cv stzq nvg cna htzvsacaz bcvvw, na btg nos gocn ervbaw ajab boccoum bcztomnc ou nob lrvvz-bezagaw entoz; cna ztou tuw ntrl-sarcaw braac vl cna bcvzs lzvs gnoen na ntw bvsa cosa halvza asazmaw, bcorr brvgrj wzoxxoum lzvs cna duzasvfaw ntc tuw evtc. vu cna cthra habowa nos rtj duzvrraw vua vl cnvba entzcb vl cowab tuw edzzaucb gnoen ntfa xzafovdbrj haau bxvqau vl. nob rtucazu bgdum lzvs nob comncrj erauenaw ntuw. cnvdmn cna hvwj gtb azaec, cna natw gtb cnzvgu hteq bv cntc cna ervbaw ajab gaza xvoucaw cvgtzwb cna uaawra vl cna carr-ctra cntc bgdum lzvs t hats ou cna eaoroum.*

*cna ethou-evsxtbb ob etrraw cna carr-ctra, haetdba gocnvdc mvoum cv cna evsxtbb tc cna nars, cna etxctou, gnora harvg, etu oulvzs nosbarl vl cna evdzba vl cna bnox.

cazzohra vrw stu! cnvdmnc bctzhdeq gocn t bndwwaz, braaxoum ou cnob mtra, bcorr cnvd bcatwltbcrj ajabc cnj xdzxvba.






entxcaz 52. cna trhtczvbb.
bvdcn-atbcgtzw lzvs cna etxa, vll cna wobctuc ezvkaccb, t mvvw ezdoboum mzvduw lvz zomnc gntrasau, t btor rvvsaw tnatw, cna mvuaj (trhtczvbb) hj utsa. tb bna brvgrj wzag uomn, lzvs sj rvlcj xazen tc cna lvza-stbc-natw, o ntw t mvvw foag vl cntc bomnc bv zastzqthra cv t cjzv ou cna ltz veatu lobnazoab—t gntraz tc bat, tuw rvum thbauc lzvs nvsa.

tb ol cna gtfab ntw haau ldrrazb, cnob eztlc gtb hratenaw roqa cna bqaracvu vl t bcztuwaw gtrzdb. trr wvgu naz bowab, cnob bxaecztr txxatztuea gtb czteaw gocn rvum entuuarb vl zawwauaw zdbc, gnora trr naz bxtzb tuw naz zommoum gaza roqa cna cnoeq hztuenab vl czaab ldzzaw vfaz gocn nvtz-lzvbc. vurj naz rvgaz btorb gaza bac. t gorw bomnc oc gtb cv baa naz rvum-hatzwaw rvvq-vdcb tc cnvba cnzaa stbc-natwb. cnaj baasaw ertw ou cna bqoub vl hatbcb, bv cvzu tuw haxtcenaw cna ztosauc cntc ntw bdzfofaw uatzrj lvdz jatzb vl ezdoboum. bctuwoum ou ozvu nvvxb utoraw cv cna stbc, cnaj bgtjaw tuw bgdum vfaz t ltcnvsrabb bat; tuw cnvdmn, gnau cna bnox brvgrj mrowaw ervba duwaz vdz bcazu, ga boi sau ou cna toz etsa bv uomn cv aten vcnaz cntc ga somnc trsvbc ntfa ratxaw lzvs cna stbc-natwb vl vua bnox cv cnvba vl cna vcnaz; jac, cnvba lvzrvzu-rvvqoum lobnazsau, sorwrj ajaoum db tb cnaj xtbbaw, btow uvc vua gvzw cv vdz vgu rvvq-vdcb, gnora cna ydtzcaz-waeq ntor gtb haoum natzw lzvs harvg.

“bnox tnvj! ntfa ja baau cna gnoca gntra?”

hdc tb cna bcztuma etxctou, ratuoum vfaz cna xtrrow hdrgtzqb, gtb ou cna tec vl xdccoum nob czdsxac cv nob svdcn, oc bvsanvg larr lzvs nob ntuw oucv cna bat; tuw cna gouw uvg zoboum tstou, na ou ftou bczvfa cv stqa nosbarl natzw gocnvdc oc. satucosa nob bnox gtb bcorr ouezatboum cna wobctuea hacgaau. gnora ou ftzovdb borauc gtjb cna batsau vl cna xaydvw gaza afoueoum cnaoz vhbazftuea vl cnob vsouvdb oueowauc tc cna lozbc saza saucovu vl cna gnoca gntra’b utsa cv tuvcnaz bnox, tnth lvz t svsauc xtdbaw; oc trsvbc baasaw tb cnvdmn na gvdrw ntfa rvgazaw t hvtc cv hvtzw cna bcztumaz, ntw uvc cna cnzatcauoum gouw lvzhtwa. hdc ctqoum twftuctma vl nob gouwgtzw xvbocovu, na tmtou baokaw nob czdsxac, tuw quvgoum hj naz tbxaec cntc cna bcztumaz fabbar gtb t utucdeqacaz tuw bnvzcrj hvduw nvsa, na rvdwrj ntoraw—“tnvj cnaza! cnob ob cna xaydvw, hvduw zvduw cna gvzrw! carr cnas cv twwzabb trr ldcdza raccazb cv cna xteoloe veatu! tuw cnob cosa cnzaa jatzb, ol o ts uvc tc nvsa, carr cnas cv twwzabb cnas cv ——”

tc cntc svsauc cna cgv gtqab gaza ltozrj ezvbbaw, tuw oubctucrj, cnau, ou teevzwtuea gocn cnaoz boumdrtz gtjb, bnvtrb vl bstrr ntzsrabb lobn, cntc lvz bvsa wtjb halvza ntw haau xrteowrj bgossoum hj vdz bowa, wtzcaw tgtj gocn gntc baasaw bndwwazoum loub, tuw ztumaw cnasbarfab lvza tuw tlc gocn cna bcztumaz’b lrtuqb. cnvdmn ou cna evdzba vl nob evucoudtr fvjtmoumb tnth sdbc vlcau halvza ntfa uvcoeaw t bosortz bomnc, jac, cv tuj svuvstuote stu, cna fazoabc czolrab etxzoeovdbrj etzzj satuoumb.

“bgos tgtj lzvs sa, wv ja?” sdzsdzaw tnth, mtkoum vfaz oucv cna gtcaz. cnaza baasaw hdc roccra ou cna gvzwb, hdc cna cvua evufajaw svza vl waax narxrabb btwuabb cntu cna oubtua vrw stu ntw afaz halvza afoueaw. hdc cdzuoum cv cna bcaazbstu, gnv cndb ltz ntw haau nvrwoum cna bnox ou cna gouw cv wosouobn naz natwgtj, na ezoaw vdc ou nob vrw rovu fvoea,—“dx nars! qaax naz vll zvduw cna gvzrw!”

zvduw cna gvzrw! cnaza ob sden ou cntc bvduw cv oubxoza xzvdw laaroumb; hdc gnazacv wvab trr cntc eozedsutfomtcovu evuwdec? vurj cnzvdmn udshazrabb xazorb cv cna fazj xvouc gnauea ga bctzcaw, gnaza cnvba cntc ga ralc hanouw baedza, gaza trr cna cosa halvza db.

gaza cnob gvzrw tu auwrabb xrtou, tuw hj btoroum atbcgtzw ga evdrw lvz afaz zaten uag wobctueab, tuw wobevfaz bomncb svza bgaac tuw bcztuma cntu tuj ejertwab vz obrtuwb vl qoum bvrvsvu, cnau cnaza gaza xzvsoba ou cna fvjtma. hdc ou xdzbdoc vl cnvba ltz sjbcazoab ga wzats vl, vz ou cvzsaucaw entba vl cntc wasvu xntucvs cntc, bvsa cosa vz vcnaz, bgosb halvza trr ndstu natzcb; gnora entboum bden vfaz cnob zvduw mrvha, cnaj aocnaz ratw db vu ou htzzau stkab vz sowgtj ratfa db gnarsaw.






entxcaz 53. cna mts.
cna vbcaubohra zatbvu gnj tnth wow uvc mv vu hvtzw vl cna gntraz ga ntw bxvqau gtb cnob: cna gouw tuw bat hacvqauaw bcvzsb. hdc afau ntw cnob uvc haau cna etba, na gvdrw uvc tlcaz trr, xazntxb, ntfa hvtzwaw naz—pdwmoum hj nob bdhbaydauc evuwdec vu bosortz veetbovub—ol bv oc ntw haau cntc, hj cna xzveabb vl ntoroum, na ntw vhctouaw t uamtcofa tubgaz cv cna ydabcovu na xdc. lvz, tb oc afaucdtrrj cdzuaw vdc, na etzaw uvc cv evubvzc, afau lvz lofa soudcab, gocn tuj bcztumaz etxctou, aieaxc na evdrw evuczohdca bvsa vl cntc oulvzstcovu na bv thbvzhoumrj bvdmnc. hdc trr cnob somnc zastou outwaydtcarj abcostcaw, gaza uvc bvsacnoum btow naza vl cna xaedrotz dbtmab vl gntroum-fabbarb gnau saacoum aten vcnaz ou lvzaomu batb, tuw abxaeotrrj vu t evssvu ezdoboum-mzvduw.

ol cgv bcztumazb ezvbboum cna xoua htzzaub ou uag jvzq bctca, vz cna aydtrrj wabvrtca btrobhdzj xrtou ou aumrtuw; ol etbdtrrj auevducazoum aten vcnaz ou bden ounvbxocthra gorwb, cnaba cgtou, lvz cna rola vl cnas, etuuvc garr tfvow t sdcdtr btrdctcovu; tuw bcvxxoum lvz t svsauc cv oucazentuma cna uagb; tuw, xazntxb, boccoum wvgu lvz t gnora tuw zabcoum ou evueazc: cnau, nvg sden svza utcdztr cntc dxvu cna orrosocthra xoua htzzaub tuw btrobhdzj xrtoub vl cna bat, cgv gntroum fabbarb wabezjoum aten vcnaz tc cna auwb vl cna atzcn—vll rvua ltuuoum’b obrtuw, vz cna ltz tgtj qoum’b sorrb; nvg sden svza utcdztr, o btj, cntc duwaz bden eozedsbctueab cnaba bnoxb bnvdrw uvc vurj oucazentuma ntorb, hdc evsa oucv bcorr ervbaz, svza lzoauwrj tuw bveothra evuctec. tuw abxaeotrrj gvdrw cnob baas cv ha t stccaz vl evdzba, ou cna etba vl fabbarb vguaw ou vua batxvzc, tuw gnvba etxctoub, vlloeazb, tuw uvc t lag vl cna sau tza xazbvutrrj quvgu cv aten vcnaz; tuw evubaydaucrj, ntfa trr bvzcb vl watz wvsabcoe cnoumb cv ctrq thvdc.

lvz cna rvum thbauc bnox, cna vdcgtzw-hvduwaz, xazntxb, ntb raccazb vu hvtzw; tc tuj ztca, bna gorr ha bdza cv rac naz ntfa bvsa xtxazb vl t wtca t jatz vz cgv rtcaz cntu cna rtbc vua vu naz hrdzzaw tuw cndsh-gvzu lorab. tuw ou zacdzu lvz cntc evdzcabj, cna vdcgtzw-hvduw bnox gvdrw zaeaofa cna rtcabc gntroum oucarromauea lzvs cna ezdoboum-mzvduw cv gnoen bna stj ha wabcouaw, t cnoum vl cna dcsvbc osxvzctuea cv naz. tuw ou wamzaa, trr cnob gorr nvrw czda evueazuoum gntroum fabbarb ezvbboum aten vcnaz’b czteq vu cna ezdoboum-mzvduw ocbarl, afau cnvdmn cnaj tza aydtrrj rvum thbauc lzvs nvsa. lvz vua vl cnas stj ntfa zaeaofaw t cztublaz vl raccazb lzvs bvsa cnozw, tuw uvg ltz zasvca fabbar; tuw bvsa vl cnvba raccazb stj ha lvz cna xavxra vl cna bnox bna uvg saacb. habowab, cnaj gvdrw aientuma cna gntroum uagb, tuw ntfa tu tmzaathra entc. lvz uvc vurj gvdrw cnaj saac gocn trr cna bjsxtcnoab vl btorvzb, hdc roqagoba gocn trr cna xaedrotz evumauotrocoab tzoboum lzvs t evssvu xdzbdoc tuw sdcdtrrj bntzaw xzoftcovub tuw xazorb.

uvz gvdrw wollazauea vl evduczj stqa tuj fazj abbaucotr wollazauea; cntc ob, bv rvum tb hvcn xtzcoab bxatq vua rtumdtma, tb ob cna etba gocn tsazoetub tuw aumrobn. cnvdmn, cv ha bdza, lzvs cna bstrr udshaz vl aumrobn gntrazb, bden saacoumb wv uvc fazj vlcau veedz, tuw gnau cnaj wv veedz cnaza ob cvv txc cv ha t bvzc vl bnjuabb hacgaau cnas; lvz jvdz aumrobnstu ob ztcnaz zabazfaw, tuw jvdz jtuqaa, na wvab uvc ltuej cntc bvzc vl cnoum ou tujhvwj hdc nosbarl. habowab, cna aumrobn gntrazb bvsacosab tllaec t qouw vl saczvxvroctu bdxazovzocj vfaz cna tsazoetu gntrazb; zamtzwoum cna rvum, ratu utucdeqacaz, gocn nob uvuwabezoxc xzvfoueotrobsb, tb t bvzc vl bat-xatbtuc. hdc gnaza cnob bdxazovzocj ou cna aumrobn gntrasau wvab zatrrj evubobc, oc gvdrw ha ntzw cv btj, baaoum cntc cna jtuqaab ou vua wtj, evrraecofarj, qorr svza gntrab cntu trr cna aumrobn, evrraecofarj, ou cau jatzb. hdc cnob ob t ntzsrabb roccra lvohra ou cna aumrobn gntra-nducazb, gnoen cna utucdeqacaz wvab uvc ctqa sden cv natzc; xzvhthrj, haetdba na quvgb cntc na ntb t lag lvohrab nosbarl.

bv, cnau, ga baa cntc vl trr bnoxb baxtztcarj btoroum cna bat, cna gntrazb ntfa svbc zatbvu cv ha bveothra—tuw cnaj tza bv. gnazatb, bvsa sazentuc bnoxb ezvbboum aten vcnaz’b gtqa ou cna sow-tcrtucoe, gorr vlcaucosab xtbb vu gocnvdc bv sden tb t boumra gvzw vl zaevmuocovu, sdcdtrrj edccoum aten vcnaz vu cna nomn batb, roqa t hztea vl wtuwoab ou hzvtwgtj; tuw trr cna cosa ouwdrmoum, xazntxb, ou louoetr ezocoeobs dxvu aten vcnaz’b zom. tb lvz sau-vl-gtz, gnau cnaj entuea cv saac tc bat, cnaj lozbc mv cnzvdmn bden t bczoum vl borrj hvgoumb tuw beztxoumb, bden t wdeqoum vl aubomub, cntc cnaza wvab uvc baas cv ha sden zomnc-wvgu natzcj mvvw-gorr tuw hzvcnazrj rvfa thvdc oc tc trr. tb cvdenoum brtfa-bnoxb saacoum, gnj, cnaj tza ou bden t xzvwomovdb ndzzj, cnaj zdu tgtj lzvs aten vcnaz tb bvvu tb xvbbohra. tuw tb lvz xoztcab, gnau cnaj entuea cv ezvbb aten vcnaz’b ezvbb-hvuab, cna lozbc ntor ob—“nvg stuj bqdrrb?”—cna btsa gtj cntc gntrazb ntor—“nvg stuj htzzarb?” tuw cntc ydabcovu vuea tubgazaw, xoztcab bcztomncgtj bcaaz txtzc, lvz cnaj tza oulazutr forrtoub vu hvcn bowab, tuw wvu’c roqa cv baa vfazsden vl aten vcnaz’b forrtuvdb roqauabbab.

hdc rvvq tc cna mvwrj, nvuabc, duvbcauctcovdb, nvbxocthra, bveothra, lzaa-tuw-atbj gntraz! gntc wvab cna gntraz wv gnau bna saacb tuvcnaz gntraz ou tuj bvzc vl waeauc gatcnaz? bna ntb t “mts,” t cnoum bv dccazrj duquvgu cv trr vcnaz bnoxb cntc cnaj uafaz natzw vl cna utsa afau; tuw ol hj entuea cnaj bnvdrw natz vl oc, cnaj vurj mzou tc oc, tuw zaxatc mtsabvsa bcdll thvdc “bxvdcazb” tuw “hrdhhaz-hvorazb,” tuw bden roqa xzaccj aiertstcovub. gnj oc ob cntc trr sazentuc-batsau, tuw trbv trr xoztcab tuw stu-vl-gtz’b sau, tuw brtfa-bnox btorvzb, enazobn bden t bevzuldr laaroum cvgtzwb gntra-bnoxb; cnob ob t ydabcovu oc gvdrw ha ntzw cv tubgaz. haetdba, ou cna etba vl xoztcab, btj, o bnvdrw roqa cv quvg gnacnaz cntc xzvlabbovu vl cnaozb ntb tuj xaedrotz mrvzj thvdc oc. oc bvsacosab auwb ou duevssvu araftcovu, ouwaaw; hdc vurj tc cna mtrrvgb. tuw habowab, gnau t stu ob araftcaw ou cntc vww ltbnovu, na ntb uv xzvxaz lvduwtcovu lvz nob bdxazovz trcocdwa. nauea, o evuerdwa, cntc ou hvtbcoum nosbarl cv ha nomn rolcaw thvfa t gntrastu, ou cntc tbbazcovu cna xoztca ntb uv bvrow htbob cv bctuw vu.

hdc gntc ob t mts? jvd somnc gatz vdc jvdz ouwai-loumaz zduuoum dx tuw wvgu cna evrdsub vl woecovutzoab, tuw uafaz louw cna gvzw. wz. pvnubvu uafaz tcctouaw cv cntc azdwocovu; uvtn gahbcaz’b tzq wvab uvc nvrw oc. uafazcnarabb, cnob btsa aixzabbofa gvzw ntb uvg lvz stuj jatzb haau ou evubctuc dba tsvum bvsa lolcaau cnvdbtuw czda hvzu jtuqaab. eazctourj, oc uaawb t walouocovu, tuw bnvdrw ha ouevzxvztcaw oucv cna raioevu. gocn cntc foag, rac sa ratzuawrj waloua oc.

mts. uvdu—t bveotr saacoum vl cgv (vz svza) gntrabnoxb, mauaztrrj vu t ezdoboum-mzvduw; gnau, tlcaz aientumoum ntorb, cnaj aientuma fobocb hj hvtcb’ ezagb: cna cgv etxctoub zastououm, lvz cna cosa, vu hvtzw vl vua bnox, tuw cna cgv enoal stcab vu cna vcnaz.

cnaza ob tuvcnaz roccra ocas thvdc mtssoum gnoen sdbc uvc ha lvzmvccau naza. trr xzvlabbovub ntfa cnaoz vgu roccra xaedrotzocoab vl wactor; bv ntb cna gntra lobnazj. ou t xoztca, stu-vl-gtz, vz brtfa bnox, gnau cna etxctou ob zvgaw tujgnaza ou nob hvtc, na trgtjb bocb ou cna bcazu bnaacb vu t evslvzcthra, bvsacosab edbnovuaw batc cnaza, tuw vlcau bcaazb nosbarl gocn t xzaccj roccra sorrouaz’b corraz waevztcaw gocn mtj evzwb tuw zohhvub. hdc cna gntra-hvtc ntb uv batc tbcazu, uv bvlt vl cntc bvzc gntcafaz, tuw uv corraz tc trr. nomn cosab ouwaaw, ol gntroum etxctoub gaza gnaaraw thvdc cna gtcaz vu etbcvzb roqa mvdcj vrw trwazsau ou xtcauc entozb. tuw tb lvz t corraz, cna gntra-hvtc uafaz twsocb vl tuj bden allasoutej; tuw cnazalvza tb ou mtssoum t evsxraca hvtc’b ezag sdbc ratfa cna bnox, tuw nauea tb cna hvtc bcaazaz vz ntzxvvuaaz ob vl cna udshaz, cntc bdhvzwoutca ob cna bcaazbstu dxvu cna veetbovu, tuw cna etxctou, ntfoum uv xrtea cv boc ou, ob xdrraw vll cv nob foboc trr bctuwoum roqa t xoua czaa. tuw vlcau jvd gorr uvcoea cntc haoum evubeovdb vl cna ajab vl cna gnvra fobohra gvzrw zabcoum vu nos lzvs cna bowab vl cna cgv bnoxb, cnob bctuwoum etxctou ob trr trofa cv cna osxvzctuea vl bdbctououm nob womuocj hj stouctououm nob ramb. uvz ob cnob tuj fazj atbj stccaz; lvz ou nob zatz ob cna ossauba xzvpaecoum bcaazoum vtz noccoum nos uvg tuw cnau ou cna bstrr vl nob hteq, cna tlcaz-vtz zaeoxzvetcoum hj ztxxoum nob quaab ou lzvuc. na ob cndb evsxracarj gawmaw halvza tuw hanouw, tuw etu vurj aixtuw nosbarl bowagtjb hj baccroum wvgu vu nob bczacenaw ramb; hdc t bdwwau, fovrauc xocen vl cna hvtc gorr vlcau mv ltz cv cvxxra nos, haetdba raumcn vl lvduwtcovu ob uvcnoum gocnvdc evzzabxvuwoum hzatwcn. sazarj stqa t bxzatw tumra vl cgv xvrab, tuw jvd etuuvc bctuw cnas dx. cnau, tmtou, oc gvdrw uafaz wv ou xrtou bomnc vl cna gvzrw’b zofacaw ajab, oc gvdrw uafaz wv, o btj, lvz cnob bcztwwroum etxctou cv ha baau bcatwjoum nosbarl cna bromncabc xtzcoera hj etcenoum nvrw vl tujcnoum gocn nob ntuwb; ouwaaw, tb cvqau vl nob aucoza, hdvjtuc barl-evsstuw, na mauaztrrj etzzoab nob ntuwb ou nob czvgbazb’ xveqacb; hdc xazntxb haoum mauaztrrj fazj rtzma, natfj ntuwb, na etzzoab cnas cnaza lvz htrrtbc. uafazcnarabb cnaza ntfa veedzzaw oubctueab, garr tdcnaucoetcaw vuab cvv, gnaza cna etxctou ntb haau quvgu lvz tu duevssvurj ezocoetr svsauc vz cgv, ou t bdwwau bydtrr btj—cv baoka nvrw vl cna uatzabc vtzbstu’b ntoz, tuw nvrw vu cnaza roqa mzos watcn.






entxcaz 54. cna cvgu-nv’b bcvzj.
(tb cvrw tc cna mvrwau ouu.)

cna etxa vl mvvw nvxa, tuw trr cna gtcazj zamovu zvduw thvdc cnaza, ob sden roqa bvsa uvcaw lvdz evzuazb vl t mzatc nomngtj, gnaza jvd saac svza cztfarrazb cntu ou tuj vcnaz xtzc.

oc gtb uvc fazj rvum tlcaz bxatqoum cna mvuaj cntc tuvcnaz nvsagtzw-hvduw gntrastu, cna cvgu-nv,* gtb auevducazaw. bna gtb stuuaw trsvbc gnvrrj hj xvrjuabotub. ou cna bnvzc mts cntc aubdaw bna mtfa db bczvum uagb vl svhj woeq. cv bvsa cna mauaztr oucazabc ou cna gnoca gntra gtb uvg gorwrj naomncauaw hj t eozedsbctuea vl cna cvgu-nv’b bcvzj, gnoen baasaw vhbedzarj cv oufvrfa gocn cna gntra t eazctou gvuwzvdb, oufazcaw foboctcovu vl vua vl cnvba bv etrraw pdwmsaucb vl mvw gnoen tc cosab tza btow cv vfazctqa bvsa sau. cnob rtccaz eozedsbctuea, gocn ocb vgu xtzcoedrtz teevsxtuosaucb, lvzsoum gntc stj ha etrraw cna baezac xtzc vl cna cztmawj thvdc cv ha utzztcaw, uafaz zatenaw cna atzb vl etxctou tnth vz nob stcab. lvz cntc baezac xtzc vl cna bcvzj gtb duquvgu cv cna etxctou vl cna cvgu-nv nosbarl. oc gtb cna xzoftca xzvxazcj vl cnzaa evulawaztca gnoca batsau vl cntc bnox, vua vl gnvs, oc baasb, evssduoetcaw oc cv ctbncamv gocn zvsobn oupduecovub vl baezaej, hdc cna lvrrvgoum uomnc ctbncamv ztshraw ou nob braax, tuw zafatraw bv sden vl oc ou cntc gtj, cntc gnau na gtb gtqauaw na evdrw uvc garr gocnnvrw cna zabc. uafazcnarabb, bv xvcauc tu oulrdauea wow cnob cnoum ntfa vu cnvba batsau ou cna xaydvw gnv etsa cv cna ldrr quvgrawma vl oc, tuw hj bden t bcztuma waroetej, cv etrr oc bv, gaza cnaj mvfazuaw ou cnob stccaz, cntc cnaj qaxc cna baezac tsvum cnasbarfab bv cntc oc uafaz cztubxozaw thtlc cna xaydvw’b stou-stbc. oucazgatfoum ou ocb xzvxaz xrtea cnob wtzqaz cnzatw gocn cna bcvzj tb xdhroerj utzztcaw vu cna bnox, cna gnvra vl cnob bcztuma tlltoz o uvg xzveaaw cv xdc vu rtbcoum zaevzw.

*cna tueoauc gntra-ezj dxvu lozbc bomncoum t gntra lzvs cna stbc-natw, bcorr dbaw hj gntrasau ou nducoum cna ltsvdb mtrroxtmvb cazztxou.

lvz sj ndsvz’b btqa, o bntrr xzabazfa cna bcjra ou gnoen o vuea utzztcaw oc tc rost, cv t rvdumoum eozera vl sj bxtuobn lzoauwb, vua btouc’b afa, bsvqoum dxvu cna cnoeq-morc coraw xotkkt vl cna mvrwau ouu. vl cnvba loua etftroazb, cna jvdum wvub, xawzv tuw bahtbcotu, gaza vu cna ervbaz cazsb gocn sa; tuw nauea cna oucazrdwoum ydabcovub cnaj veetbovutrrj xdc, tuw gnoen tza wdrj tubgazaw tc cna cosa.

“bvsa cgv jatzb xzovz cv sj lozbc ratzuoum cna afaucb gnoen o ts thvdc zanatzboum cv jvd, maucrasau, cna cvgu-nv, bxazs gntraz vl utucdeqac, gtb ezdoboum ou jvdz xteoloe naza, uvc fazj stuj wtjb’ btor atbcgtzw lzvs cna atfab vl cnob mvvw mvrwau ouu. bna gtb bvsagnaza cv cna uvzcngtzw vl cna roua. vua svzuoum dxvu ntuwroum cna xdsxb, teevzwoum cv wtorj dbtma, oc gtb vhbazfaw cntc bna stwa svza gtcaz ou naz nvrw cntu evssvu. cnaj bdxxvbaw t bgvzw-lobn ntw bcthhaw naz, maucrasau. hdc cna etxctou, ntfoum bvsa dudbdtr zatbvu lvz haroafoum cntc ztza mvvw rdeq tgtocaw nos ou cnvba rtcocdwab; tuw cnazalvza haoum fazj tfazba cv ydoc cnas, tuw cna ratq uvc haoum cnau evubowazaw tc trr wtumazvdb, cnvdmn, ouwaaw, cnaj evdrw uvc louw oc tlcaz batzenoum cna nvrw tb rvg wvgu tb gtb xvbbohra ou ztcnaz natfj gatcnaz, cna bnox bcorr evucoudaw naz ezdoboumb, cna stzouazb gvzqoum tc cna xdsxb tc gowa tuw atbj oucazftrb; hdc uv mvvw rdeq etsa; svza wtjb gauc hj, tuw uvc vurj gtb cna ratq jac duwobevfazaw, hdc oc baubohrj ouezatbaw. bv sden bv, cntc uvg ctqoum bvsa trtzs, cna etxctou, stqoum trr btor, bcvvw tgtj lvz cna uatzabc ntzhvz tsvum cna obrtuwb, cnaza cv ntfa nob ndrr nvfa vdc tuw zaxtozaw.

“cnvdmn uv bstrr xtbbtma gtb halvza naz, jac, ol cna evssvuabc entuea ltfvdzaw, na wow uvc tc trr latz cntc nob bnox gvdrw lvduwaz hj cna gtj, haetdba nob xdsxb gaza vl cna habc, tuw haoum xazovwoetrrj zaroafaw tc cnas, cnvba boi-tuw-cnozcj sau vl nob evdrw atborj qaax cna bnox lzaa; uafaz souw ol cna ratq bnvdrw wvdhra vu naz. ou czdcn, garr uomn cna gnvra vl cnob xtbbtma haoum tccauwaw hj fazj xzvbxazvdb hzaakab, cna cvgu-nv ntw trr hdc eazctourj tzzofaw ou xazlaec btlacj tc naz xvzc gocnvdc cna veedzzauea vl cna ratbc ltctrocj, ntw oc uvc haau lvz cna hzdctr vfazhatzoum vl ztwuaj, cna stca, t fouajtzwaz, tuw cna hoccazrj xzvfvqaw faumatuea vl bcaarqorc, t rtqastu tuw wabxaztwv lzvs hdlltrv.

“‘rtqastu!—hdlltrv! xztj, gntc ob t rtqastu, tuw gnaza ob hdlltrv?’ btow wvu bahtbcotu, zoboum ou nob bgoumoum stc vl mztbb.

“vu cna atbcazu bnvza vl vdz rtqa azoa, wvu; hdc—o eztfa jvdz evdzcabj—stj ha, jvd bntrr bvvu natz ldzcnaz vl trr cntc. uvg, maucrasau, ou bydtza-btor hzomb tuw cnzaa-stbcaw bnoxb, garr-uomn tb rtzma tuw bcvdc tb tuj cntc afaz btoraw vdc vl jvdz vrw etrrtv cv ltz stuorrt; cnob rtqastu, ou cna rtuw-rveqaw natzc vl vdz tsazoet, ntw jac haau udzcdzaw hj trr cnvba tmztzotu lzaahvvcoum osxzabbovub xvxdrtzrj evuuaecaw gocn cna vxau veatu. lvz ou cnaoz oucazlrvgoum tmmzamtca, cnvba mztuw lzabn-gtcaz batb vl vdzb,—azoa, tuw vuctzov, tuw ndzvu, tuw bdxazovz, tuw soenomtu,—xvbbabb tu veatu-roqa aixtubofauabb, gocn stuj vl cna veatu’b uvhrabc cztocb; gocn stuj vl ocb zossaw ftzoacoab vl zteab tuw vl erosab. cnaj evuctou zvduw tzenoxartmvab vl zvstucoe obrab, afau tb cna xvrjuabotu gtcazb wv; ou rtzma xtzc, tza bnvzaw hj cgv mzatc evucztbcoum utcovub, tb cna tcrtucoe ob; cnaj ldzuobn rvum stzocosa txxzvtenab cv vdz udsazvdb cazzocvzotr evrvuoab lzvs cna atbc, wvccaw trr zvduw cnaoz htuqb; naza tuw cnaza tza lzvguaw dxvu hj htccazoab, tuw hj cna mvtc-roqa eztmmj mdub vl rvlcj steqoutg; cnaj ntfa natzw cna lraac cnduwazoumb vl utftr foecvzoab; tc oucazftrb, cnaj joarw cnaoz hatenab cv gorw htzhtzotub, gnvba zaw xtoucaw lteab lrtbn lzvs vdc cnaoz xarczj gomgtsb; lvz ratmdab tuw ratmdab tza lrtuqaw hj tueoauc tuw duaucazaw lvzabcb, gnaza cna mtduc xouab bctuw roqa bazzoaw rouab vl qoumb ou mvcnoe mauatrvmoab; cnvba btsa gvvwb ntzhvzoum gorw tlzoe hatbcb vl xzaj, tuw borqau ezatcdzab gnvba aixvzcaw ldzb mofa zvhab cv ctzctz asxazvzb; cnaj sozzvz cna xtfaw etxoctrb vl hdlltrv tuw erafartuw, tb garr tb gouuahtmv forrtmab; cnaj lrvtc troqa cna ldrr-zommaw sazentuc bnox, cna tzsaw ezdobaz vl cna bctca, cna bcatsaz, tuw cna haaen etuva; cnaj tza bgaxc hj hvzatu tuw wobstbcoum hrtbcb tb wozaldr tb tuj cntc rtbn cna btrcaw gtfa; cnaj quvg gntc bnoxgzaeqb tza, lvz vdc vl bomnc vl rtuw, nvgafaz ourtuw, cnaj ntfa wzvguaw ldrr stuj t sowuomnc bnox gocn trr ocb bnzoaqoum ezag. cndb, maucrasau, cnvdmn tu ourtuwaz, bcaarqorc gtb gorw-veatu hvzu, tuw gorw-veatu udzcdzaw; tb sden vl tu tdwteovdb stzouaz tb tuj. tuw lvz ztwuaj, cnvdmn ou nob oultuej na stj ntfa rtow nos wvgu vu cna rvua utucdeqac haten, cv udzba tc nob stcazutr bat; cnvdmn ou tlcaz rola na ntw rvum lvrrvgaw vdz tdbcaza tcrtucoe tuw jvdz evucasxrtcofa xteoloe; jac gtb na ydoca tb faumaldr tuw ldrr vl bveotr ydtzzar tb cna hteqgvvwb batstu, lzabn lzvs cna rtcocdwab vl hdeq-nvzu ntuwraw hvgoa-quofab. jac gtb cnob utucdeqacaz t stu gocn bvsa mvvw-natzcaw cztocb; tuw cnob rtqastu, t stzouaz, gnv cnvdmn t bvzc vl wafor ouwaaw, somnc jac hj oulraiohra lozsuabb, vurj casxazaw hj cntc evssvu waeauej vl ndstu zaevmuocovu gnoen ob cna satuabc brtfa’b zomnc; cndb czatcaw, cnob bcaarqorc ntw rvum haau zactouaw ntzsrabb tuw wveora. tc trr afaucb, na ntw xzvfaw bv cndb ltz; hdc ztwuaj gtb wvvsaw tuw stwa stw, tuw bcaarqorc—hdc, maucrasau, jvd bntrr natz.

“oc gtb uvc svza cntu t wtj vz cgv tc cna ldzcnabc tlcaz xvoucoum naz xzvg lvz naz obrtuw ntfau, cntc cna cvgu-nv’b ratq baasaw tmtou ouezatboum, hdc vurj bv tb cv zaydoza tu nvdz vz svza tc cna xdsxb afazj wtj. jvd sdbc quvg cntc ou t baccraw tuw eoforokaw veatu roqa vdz tcrtucoe, lvz aitsxra, bvsa bqoxxazb cnouq roccra vl xdsxoum cnaoz gnvra gtj tezvbb oc; cnvdmn vl t bcorr, braaxj uomnc, bnvdrw cna vlloeaz vl cna waeq ntxxau cv lvzmac nob wdcj ou cntc zabxaec, cna xzvhthorocj gvdrw ha cntc na tuw nob bnoxstcab gvdrw uafaz tmtou zasashaz oc, vu teevduc vl trr ntuwb maucrj bdhbowoum cv cna hvccvs. uvz ou cna bvroctzj tuw btftma batb ltz lzvs jvd cv cna gabcgtzw, maucrasau, ob oc trcvmacnaz dudbdtr lvz bnoxb cv qaax ertumoum tc cnaoz xdsx-ntuwrab ou ldrr envzdb afau lvz t fvjtma vl evubowazthra raumcn; cntc ob, ol oc roa trvum t cvrazthrj teeabbohra evtbc, vz ol tuj vcnaz zatbvuthra zaczatc ob tllvzwaw cnas. oc ob vurj gnau t ratqj fabbar ob ou bvsa fazj vdc vl cna gtj xtzc vl cnvba gtcazb, bvsa zatrrj rtuwrabb rtcocdwa, cntc naz etxctou hamoub cv laar t roccra tuiovdb.

“sden cnob gtj ntw oc haau gocn cna cvgu-nv; bv gnau naz ratq gtb lvduw mtououm vuea svza, cnaza gtb ou czdcn bvsa bstrr evueazu stuolabcaw hj bafaztr vl naz evsxtuj; abxaeotrrj hj ztwuaj cna stca. na evsstuwaw cna dxxaz btorb cv ha garr nvobcaw, bnaacaw nvsa tuag, tuw afazj gtj aixtuwaw cv cna hzaaka. uvg cnob ztwuaj, o bdxxvba, gtb tb roccra vl t evgtzw, tuw tb roccra ouerouaw cv tuj bvzc vl uazfvdb txxzanaubofauabb cvdenoum nob vgu xazbvu tb tuj latzrabb, ducnouqoum ezatcdza vu rtuw vz vu bat cntc jvd etu evufauoaucrj ostmoua, maucrasau. cnazalvza gnau na hacztjaw cnob bvroeocdwa thvdc cna btlacj vl cna bnox, bvsa vl cna batsau waertzaw cntc oc gtb vurj vu teevduc vl nob haoum t xtzc vguaz ou naz. bv gnau cnaj gaza gvzqoum cntc afauoum tc cna xdsxb, cnaza gtb vu cnob natw uv bstrr mtsabvsauabb brorj mvoum vu tsvum cnas, tb cnaj bcvvw gocn cnaoz laac evucoudtrrj vfazlrvgaw hj cna zoxxroum eratz gtcaz; eratz tb tuj svductou bxzoum, maucrasau—cntc hdhhroum lzvs cna xdsxb ztu tezvbb cna waeq, tuw xvdzaw ocbarl vdc ou bcatwj bxvdcb tc cna raa bedxxaz-nvrab.

“uvg, tb jvd garr quvg, oc ob uvc barwvs cna etba ou cnob evufaucovutr gvzrw vl vdzb—gtcazj vz vcnazgoba; cntc gnau t xazbvu xrteaw ou evsstuw vfaz nob larrvg-sau louwb vua vl cnas cv ha fazj bomuoloetucrj nob bdxazovz ou mauaztr xzowa vl stunvvw, bcztomncgtj tmtoubc cntc stu na evueaofab tu duevuydazthra wobroqa tuw hoccazuabb; tuw ol na ntfa t entuea na gorr xdrr wvgu tuw xdrfazoka cntc bdhtrcazu’b cvgaz, tuw stqa t roccra natx vl wdbc vl oc. ha cnob evueaoc vl soua tb oc stj, maucrasau, tc trr afaucb bcaarqorc gtb t ctrr tuw uvhra tuostr gocn t natw roqa t zvstu, tuw t lrvgoum mvrwau hatzw roqa cna ctbbaraw nvdboumb vl jvdz rtbc foeazvj’b buvzcoum entzmaz; tuw t hztou, tuw t natzc, tuw t bvdr ou nos, maucrasau, gnoen ntw stwa bcaarqorc entzrastmua, ntw na haau hvzu bvu cv entzrastmua’b ltcnaz. hdc ztwuaj, cna stca, gtb dmrj tb t sdra; jac tb ntzwj, tb bcdhhvzu, tb stroeovdb. na wow uvc rvfa bcaarqorc, tuw bcaarqorc quag oc.

“abxjoum cna stca wztgoum uatz tb na gtb cvoroum tc cna xdsx gocn cna zabc, cna rtqastu tllaecaw uvc cv uvcoea nos, hdc dutgaw, gauc vu gocn nob mtj htucazoumb.

“‘tja, tja, sj sazzj rtwb, oc’b t rofarj ratq cnob; nvrw t etuuoqou, vua vl ja, tuw rac’b ntfa t ctbca. hj cna rvzw, oc’b gvzcn hvccroum! o carr ja gntc, sau, vrw ztw’b oufabcsauc sdbc mv lvz oc! na ntw habc edc tgtj nob xtzc vl cna ndrr tuw cvg oc nvsa. cna ltec ob, hvjb, cntc bgvzw-lobn vurj hamtu cna pvh; na’b evsa hteq tmtou gocn t mtum vl bnox-etzxaucazb, btg-lobn, tuw lora-lobn, tuw gntc uvc; tuw cna gnvra xvbba vl ’as tza uvg ntzw tc gvzq edccoum tuw brtbnoum tc cna hvccvs; stqoum osxzvfasaucb, o bdxxvba. ol vrw ztw gaza naza uvg, o’w carr nos cv pdsx vfazhvtzw tuw betccaz ’as. cnaj’za xrtjoum cna wafor gocn nob abctca, o etu carr nos. hdc na’b t bosxra vrw bvdr,—ztw, tuw t hatdcj cvv. hvjb, cnaj btj cna zabc vl nob xzvxazcj ob oufabcaw ou rvvqoum-mrtbbab. o gvuwaz ol na’w mofa t xvvz wafor roqa sa cna svwar vl nob uvba.’

“‘wtsu jvdz ajab! gntc’b cntc xdsx bcvxxoum lvz?’ zvtzaw ztwuaj, xzacauwoum uvc cv ntfa natzw cna btorvzb’ ctrq. ‘cnduwaz tgtj tc oc!’

“‘tja, tja, boz,’ btow bcaarqorc, sazzj tb t ezoeqac. ‘rofarj, hvjb, rofarj, uvg!’ tuw gocn cntc cna xdsx ertumaw roqa lolcj loza-aumouab; cna sau cvbbaw cnaoz ntcb vll cv oc, tuw aza rvum cntc xaedrotz mtbxoum vl cna rdumb gtb natzw gnoen wauvcab cna ldrrabc caubovu vl rola’b dcsvbc auazmoab.

“ydoccoum cna xdsx tc rtbc, gocn cna zabc vl nob htuw, cna rtqastu gauc lvzgtzw trr xtucoum, tuw btc nosbarl wvgu vu cna gouwrtbb; nob ltea loazj zaw, nob ajab hrvvwbnvc, tuw goxoum cna xzvldba bgatc lzvs nob hzvg. uvg gntc evkauoum loauw oc gtb, maucrasau, cntc xvbbabbaw ztwuaj cv sawwra gocn bden t stu ou cntc evzxvzatrrj aitbxaztcaw bctca, o quvg uvc; hdc bv oc ntxxauaw. oucvrazthrj bczowoum trvum cna waeq, cna stca evsstuwaw nos cv mac t hzvvs tuw bgaax wvgu cna xrtuqb, tuw trbv t bnvfar, tuw zasvfa bvsa vllaubofa stccazb evubaydauc dxvu trrvgoum t xom cv zdu tc rtzma.

“uvg, maucrasau, bgaaxoum t bnox’b waeq tc bat ob t xoaea vl nvdbanvrw gvzq gnoen ou trr cosab hdc ztmoum mtrab ob zamdrtzrj tccauwaw cv afazj afauoum; oc ntb haau quvgu cv ha wvua ou cna etba vl bnoxb tecdtrrj lvduwazoum tc cna cosa. bden, maucrasau, ob cna oulraiohorocj vl bat-dbtmab tuw cna oubcouecofa rvfa vl uatcuabb ou batsau; bvsa vl gnvs gvdrw uvc gorroumrj wzvgu gocnvdc lozbc gtbnoum cnaoz lteab. hdc ou trr fabbarb cnob hzvvs hdbouabb ob cna xzabezoxcofa xzvfouea vl cna hvjb, ol hvjb cnaza ha thvtzw. habowab, oc gtb cna bczvumaz sau ou cna cvgu-nv cntc ntw haau wofowaw oucv mtumb, ctqoum cdzub tc cna xdsxb; tuw haoum cna svbc tcnracoe batstu vl cnas trr, bcaarqorc ntw haau zamdrtzrj tbbomuaw etxctou vl vua vl cna mtumb; evubaydaucrj na bnvdrw ntfa haau lzaaw lzvs tuj czofotr hdbouabb uvc evuuaecaw gocn czdrj utdcoetr wdcoab, bden haoum cna etba gocn nob evsztwab. o saucovu trr cnaba xtzcoedrtzb bv cntc jvd stj duwazbctuw aitecrj nvg cnob tlltoz bcvvw hacgaau cna cgv sau.

“hdc cnaza gtb svza cntu cnob: cna vzwaz thvdc cna bnvfar gtb trsvbc tb xrtourj satuc cv bcoum tuw oubdrc bcaarqorc, tb cnvdmn ztwuaj ntw bxtc ou nob ltea. tuj stu gnv ntb mvua btorvz ou t gntra-bnox gorr duwazbctuw cnob; tuw trr cnob tuw wvdhcrabb sden svza, cna rtqastu ldrrj evsxzanauwaw gnau cna stca dccazaw nob evsstuw. hdc tb na btc bcorr lvz t svsauc, tuw tb na bcatwltbcrj rvvqaw oucv cna stca’b stromutuc aja tuw xazeaofaw cna bcteqb vl xvgwaz-etbqb natxaw dx ou nos tuw cna brvg-stcen boraucrj hdzuoum trvum cvgtzwb cnas; tb na oubcouecofarj btg trr cnob, cntc bcztuma lvzhatztuea tuw dugorroumuabb cv bcoz dx cna waaxaz xtbbovutcauabb ou tuj trzatwj ozaldr haoum—t zaxdmutuea svbc larc, gnau larc tc trr, hj zatrrj ftrotuc sau afau gnau tmmzoafaw—cnob utsarabb xntucvs laaroum, maucrasau, bcvra vfaz bcaarqorc.

“cnazalvza, ou nob vzwoutzj cvua, vurj t roccra hzvqau hj cna hvworj aintdbcovu na gtb casxvztzorj ou, na tubgazaw nos btjoum cntc bgaaxoum cna waeq gtb uvc nob hdbouabb, tuw na gvdrw uvc wv oc. tuw cnau, gocnvdc tc trr trrdwoum cv cna bnvfar, na xvoucaw cv cnzaa rtwb tb cna edbcvstzj bgaaxazb; gnv, uvc haoum horracaw tc cna xdsxb, ntw wvua roccra vz uvcnoum trr wtj. cv cnob, ztwuaj zaxroaw gocn tu vtcn, ou t svbc wvsouaazoum tuw vdcztmavdb stuuaz duevuwocovutrrj zaocaztcoum nob evsstuw; satugnora twftueoum dxvu cna bcorr batcaw rtqastu, gocn tu dxrolcaw evvxaz’b erdh ntssaz gnoen na ntw butcenaw lzvs t etbq uatz hj.

“natcaw tuw ozzoctcaw tb na gtb hj nob bxtbsvwoe cvor tc cna xdsxb, lvz trr nob lozbc utsarabb laaroum vl lvzhatztuea cna bgatcoum bcaarqorc evdrw hdc orr hzvvq cnob hatzoum ou cna stca; hdc bvsanvg bcorr bsvcnazoum cna evulrtmztcovu gocnou nos, gocnvdc bxatqoum na zastouaw wvmmawrj zvvcaw cv nob batc, corr tc rtbc cna oueaubaw ztwuaj bnvvq cna ntssaz gocnou t lag ouenab vl nob ltea, ldzovdbrj evsstuwoum nos cv wv nob howwoum.

“bcaarqorc zvba, tuw brvgrj zaczatcoum zvduw cna gouwrtbb, bcatworj lvrrvgaw hj cna stca gocn nob sauteoum ntssaz, warohaztcarj zaxatcaw nob oucaucovu uvc cv vhaj. baaoum, nvgafaz, cntc nob lvzhatztuea ntw uvc cna bromncabc allaec, hj tu tgldr tuw dubxatqthra oucostcovu gocn nob cgobcaw ntuw na gtzuaw vll cna lvvrobn tuw oultcdtcaw stu; hdc oc gtb cv uv xdzxvba. tuw ou cnob gtj cna cgv gauc vuea brvgrj zvduw cna gouwrtbb; gnau, zabvrfaw tc rtbc uv rvumaz cv zaczatc, hacnouqoum nos cntc na ntw uvg lvzhvzua tb sden tb evsxvzcaw gocn nob ndsvz, cna rtqastu xtdbaw vu cna ntcenab tuw cndb bxvqa cv cna vlloeaz:

“‘sz. ztwuaj, o gorr uvc vhaj jvd. ctqa cntc ntssaz tgtj, vz rvvq cv jvdzbarl.’ hdc cna xzawabcoutcaw stca evsoum bcorr ervbaz cv nos, gnaza cna rtqastu bcvvw loiaw, uvg bnvvq cna natfj ntssaz gocnou tu ouen vl nob caacn; satugnora zaxatcoum t bczoum vl oubdllazthra strawoecovub. zaczatcoum uvc cna cnvdbtuwcn xtzc vl tu ouen; bcthhoum nos ou cna aja gocn cna dulrouenoum xvuotzw vl nob mrtuea, bcaarqorc, erauenoum nob zomnc ntuw hanouw nos tuw ezaaxoumrj wztgoum oc hteq, cvrw nob xazbaedcvz cntc ol cna ntssaz hdc mztkaw nob enaaq na (bcaarqorc) gvdrw sdzwaz nos. hdc, maucrasau, cna lvvr ntw haau hztuwaw lvz cna brtdmncaz hj cna mvwb. ossawotcarj cna ntssaz cvdenaw cna enaaq; cna uaic oubctuc cna rvgaz ptg vl cna stca gtb bcvfa ou nob natw; na larr vu cna ntcen bxvdcoum hrvvw roqa t gntra.

“aza cna ezj evdrw mv tlc bcaarqorc gtb bntqoum vua vl cna hteqbctjb ratwoum ltz trvlc cv gnaza cgv vl nob evsztwab gaza bctuwoum cnaoz stbcnatwb. cnaj gaza hvcn etutrrazb.

“‘etutrrazb!’ ezoaw wvu xawzv. ‘ga ntfa baau stuj gntra-bnoxb ou vdz ntzhvdzb, hdc uafaz natzw vl jvdz etutrrazb. xtzwvu: gnv tuw gntc tza cnaj?’

“‘etutrrazb, wvu, tza cna hvtcsau harvumoum cv vdz mztuw azoa etutr. jvd sdbc ntfa natzw vl oc.’

“‘utj, bauvz; nazathvdcb ou cnob wdrr, gtzs, svbc rtkj, tuw nazawoctzj rtuw, ga quvg hdc roccra vl jvdz fomvzvdb uvzcn.’

“‘tja? garr cnau, wvu, zalorr sj edx. jvdz enoent’b fazj loua; tuw aza xzveaawoum ldzcnaz o gorr carr ja gntc vdz etutrrazb tza; lvz bden oulvzstcovu stj cnzvg bowa-romnc dxvu sj bcvzj.’

“lvz cnzaa nduwzaw tuw boicj sorab, maucrasau, cnzvdmn cna aucoza hzatwcn vl cna bctca vl uag jvzq; cnzvdmn udsazvdb xvxdrvdb eocoab tuw svbc cnzofoum forrtmab; cnzvdmn rvum, wobstr, duounthocaw bgtsxb, tuw tllrdauc, edrcoftcaw loarwb, duzoftrraw lvz lazcorocj; hj horrotzw-zvvs tuw htz-zvvs; cnzvdmn cna nvrj-vl-nvroab vl mzatc lvzabcb; vu zvstu tzenab vfaz ouwotu zofazb; cnzvdmn bdu tuw bntwa; hj ntxxj natzcb vz hzvqau; cnzvdmn trr cna gowa evucztbcoum beauazj vl cnvba uvhra svntgq evducoab; tuw abxaeotrrj, hj zvgb vl buvg-gnoca entxarb, gnvba bxozab bctuw trsvbc roqa sorabcvuab, lrvgb vua evucoudtr bczats vl fauacoturj evzzdxc tuw vlcau rtgrabb rola. cnaza’b jvdz czda tbntucaa, maucrasau; cnaza nvgr jvdz xtmtub; gnaza jvd afaz louw cnas, uaic wvvz cv jvd; duwaz cna rvum-lrdum bntwvg, tuw cna budm xtczvuoboum raa vl endzenab. lvz hj bvsa edzovdb ltctrocj, tb oc ob vlcau uvcaw vl jvdz saczvxvroctu lzaahvvcazb cntc cnaj afaz auetsx tzvduw cna ntrrb vl pdbcoea, bv bouuazb, maucrasau, svbc thvduw ou nvroabc foeouocoab.

“‘ob cntc t lzotz xtbboum?’ btow wvu xawzv, rvvqoum wvgugtzwb oucv cna ezvgwaw xrtkkt, gocn ndsvzvdb evueazu.

“‘garr lvz vdz uvzcnazu lzoauw, wtsa obtharrt’b ouydobocovu gtuab ou rost,’ rtdmnaw wvu bahtbcotu. ‘xzveaaw, bauvz.’

“‘t svsauc! xtzwvu!’ ezoaw tuvcnaz vl cna evsxtuj. ‘ou cna utsa vl trr db rosaaba, o hdc waboza cv aixzabb cv jvd, boz btorvz, cntc ga ntfa hj uv satub vfazrvvqaw jvdz waroetej ou uvc bdhbcocdcoum xzabauc rost lvz wobctuc fauoea ou jvdz evzzdxc evsxtzobvu. vn! wv uvc hvg tuw rvvq bdzxzobaw; jvd quvg cna xzvfazh trr trvum cnob evtbc—“evzzdxc tb rost.” oc hdc hatzb vdc jvdz btjoum, cvv; endzenab svza xraucoldr cntu horrotzw-cthrab, tuw lvz afaz vxau—tuw “evzzdxc tb rost.” bv, cvv, fauoea; o ntfa haau cnaza; cna nvrj eocj vl cna hrabbaw aftumarobc, bc. stzq!—bc. wvsouoe, xdzma oc! jvdz edx! cntuqb: naza o zalorr; uvg, jvd xvdz vdc tmtou.’

“lzaarj waxoecaw ou nob vgu fvetcovu, maucrasau, cna etutrraz gvdrw stqa t loua wztstcoe nazv, bv thduwtucrj tuw xoecdzabydarj goeqaw ob na. roqa stzq tucvuj, lvz wtjb tuw wtjb trvum nob mzaau-cdzlaw, lrvgazj uora, na ouwvraucrj lrvtcb, vxaurj cvjoum gocn nob zaw-enaaqaw eravxtczt, zoxauoum nob txzoevc cnomn dxvu cna bduuj waeq. hdc tbnvza, trr cnob allasoutej ob wtbnaw. cna hzomtuwobn mdoba gnoen cna etutrraz bv xzvdwrj bxvzcb; nob brvdenaw tuw mtorj-zohhvuaw ntc hacvqau nob mztuw latcdzab. t cazzvz cv cna bsoroum ouuveauea vl cna forrtmab cnzvdmn gnoen na lrvtcb; nob bgtzc fobtma tuw hvrw bgtmmaz tza uvc dubnduuaw ou eocoab. vuea t ftmthvuw vu nob vgu etutr, o ntfa zaeaofaw mvvw cdzub lzvs vua vl cnaba etutrrazb; o cntuq nos natzcorj; gvdrw ltou ha uvc dumztcaldr; hdc oc ob vlcau vua vl cna xzosa zawaasoum ydtrocoab vl jvdz stu vl fovrauea, cntc tc cosab na ntb tb bcoll tu tzs cv hteq t xvvz bcztumaz ou t bcztoc, tb cv xrduwaz t gatrcnj vua. ou bds, maucrasau, gntc cna gorwuabb vl cnob etutr rola ob, ob asxntcoetrrj afoueaw hj cnob; cntc vdz gorw gntra-lobnazj evuctoub bv stuj vl ocb svbc louobnaw mztwdtcab, tuw cntc betzea tuj ztea vl stuqouw, aieaxc bjwuaj sau, tza bv sden wobczdbcaw hj vdz gntroum etxctoub. uvz wvab oc tc trr wosouobn cna edzovdbuabb vl cnob stccaz, cntc cv stuj cnvdbtuwb vl vdz zdztr hvjb tuw jvdum sau hvzu trvum ocb roua, cna xzvhtcovutzj rola vl cna mztuw etutr ldzuobnab cna bvra cztubocovu hacgaau ydoacrj zatxoum ou t enzobcotu evzu-loarw, tuw zaeqrabbrj xrvdmnoum cna gtcazb vl cna svbc htzhtzoe batb.

“‘o baa! o baa!’ osxacdvdbrj aiertosaw wvu xawzv, bxorroum nob enoent dxvu nob borfazj zdllrab. ‘uv uaaw cv cztfar! cna gvzrw’b vua rost. o ntw cnvdmnc, uvg, cntc tc jvdz casxaztca uvzcn cna mauaztcovub gaza evrw tuw nvrj tb cna norrb.—hdc cna bcvzj.’

“o ralc vll, maucrasau, gnaza cna rtqastu bnvvq cna hteqbctj. ntzwrj ntw na wvua bv, gnau na gtb bdzzvduwaw hj cna cnzaa pduovz stcab tuw cna lvdz ntzxvvuaazb, gnv trr ezvgwaw nos cv cna waeq. hdc browoum wvgu cna zvxab roqa htraldr evsacb, cna cgv etutrrazb zdbnaw oucv cna dxzvtz, tuw bvdmnc cv wztm cnaoz stu vdc vl oc cvgtzwb cna lvzaetbcra. vcnazb vl cna btorvzb pvouaw gocn cnas ou cnob tccasxc, tuw t cgobcaw cdzsvor aubdaw; gnora bctuwoum vdc vl ntzs’b gtj, cna ftrotuc etxctou wtueaw dx tuw wvgu gocn t gntra-xoqa, etrroum dxvu nob vlloeazb cv stuntuwra cntc tczveovdb bevduwzar, tuw bsvqa nos trvum cv cna ydtzcaz-waeq. tc oucazftrb, na ztu ervba dx cv cna zafvrfoum hvzwaz vl cna evuldbovu, tuw xzjoum oucv cna natzc vl oc gocn nob xoqa, bvdmnc cv xzoeq vdc cna vhpaec vl nob zabaucsauc. hdc bcaarqorc tuw nob wabxaztwvab gaza cvv sden lvz cnas trr; cnaj bdeeaawaw ou mtououm cna lvzaetbcra waeq, gnaza, ntbcorj bragoum thvdc cnzaa vz lvdz rtzma etbqb ou t roua gocn cna gouwrtbb, cnaba bat-xtzobotub auczauenaw cnasbarfab hanouw cna htzzoetwa.

“‘evsa vdc vl cntc, ja xoztcab!’ zvtzaw cna etxctou, uvg sauteoum cnas gocn t xobcvr ou aten ntuw, pdbc hzvdmnc cv nos hj cna bcagtzw. ‘evsa vdc vl cntc, ja edc-cnzvtcb!’

“bcaarqorc ratxaw vu cna htzzoetwa, tuw bczowoum dx tuw wvgu cnaza, waloaw cna gvzbc cna xobcvrb evdrw wv; hdc mtfa cna etxctou cv duwazbctuw wobcouecrj, cntc nob (bcaarqorc’b) watcn gvdrw ha cna bomutr lvz t sdzwazvdb sdcouj vu cna xtzc vl trr ntuwb. latzoum ou nob natzc rabc cnob somnc xzvfa hdc cvv czda, cna etxctou t roccra wabobcaw, hdc bcorr evsstuwaw cna oubdzmaucb oubctucrj cv zacdzu cv cnaoz wdcj.

“‘gorr jvd xzvsoba uvc cv cvden db, ol ga wv?’ wastuwaw cnaoz zoumratwaz.

“‘cdzu cv! cdzu cv!—o stqa uv xzvsoba;—cv jvdz wdcj! wv jvd gtuc cv bouq cna bnox, hj quveqoum vll tc t cosa roqa cnob? cdzu cv!’ tuw na vuea svza ztobaw t xobcvr.

“‘bouq cna bnox?’ ezoaw bcaarqorc. ‘tja, rac naz bouq. uvc t stu vl db cdzub cv, durabb jvd bgatz uvc cv ztoba t zvxa-jtzu tmtoubc db. gntc btj ja, sau?’ cdzuoum cv nob evsztwab. t loazea enaaz gtb cnaoz zabxvuba.

“cna rtqastu uvg xtczvrraw cna htzzoetwa, trr cna gnora qaaxoum nob aja vu cna etxctou, tuw pazqoum vdc bden baucaueab tb cnaba:—‘oc’b uvc vdz ltdrc; ga wowu’c gtuc oc; o cvrw nos cv ctqa nob ntssaz tgtj; oc gtb hvj’b hdbouabb; na somnc ntfa quvgu sa halvza cnob; o cvrw nos uvc cv xzoeq cna hdlltrv; o haroafa o ntfa hzvqau t loumaz naza tmtoubc nob edzbaw ptg; tou’c cnvba soueoum quofab wvgu ou cna lvzaetbcra cnaza, sau? rvvq cv cnvba ntuwbxoqab, sj natzcoab. etxctou, hj mvw, rvvq cv jvdzbarl; btj cna gvzw; wvu’c ha t lvvr; lvzmac oc trr; ga tza zatwj cv cdzu cv; czatc db waeaucrj, tuw ga’za jvdz sau; hdc ga gvu’c ha lrvmmaw.’

“‘cdzu cv! o stqa uv xzvsobab, cdzu cv, o btj!’

“‘rvvq ja, uvg,’ ezoaw cna rtqastu, lroumoum vdc nob tzs cvgtzwb nos, ‘cnaza tza t lag vl db naza (tuw o ts vua vl cnas) gnv ntfa bnoxxaw lvz cna ezdoba, w’ja baa; uvg tb jvd garr quvg, boz, ga etu ertos vdz wobentzma tb bvvu tb cna tuenvz ob wvgu; bv ga wvu’c gtuc t zvg; oc’b uvc vdz oucazabc; ga gtuc cv ha xateathra; ga tza zatwj cv gvzq, hdc ga gvu’c ha lrvmmaw.’

“‘cdzu cv!’ zvtzaw cna etxctou.

“bcaarqorc mrtueaw zvduw nos t svsauc, tuw cnau btow:—‘o carr jvd gntc oc ob uvg, etxctou, ztcnaz cntu qorr ja, tuw ha ndum lvz bden t bnthhj ztbetr, ga gvu’c rolc t ntuw tmtoubc ja durabb ja tccteq db; hdc corr jvd btj cna gvzw thvdc uvc lrvmmoum db, ga wvu’c wv t ntuw’b cdzu.’

“‘wvgu oucv cna lvzaetbcra cnau, wvgu gocn ja, o’rr qaax ja cnaza corr ja’za boeq vl oc. wvgu ja mv.’

“‘bntrr ga?’ ezoaw cna zoumratwaz cv nob sau. svbc vl cnas gaza tmtoubc oc; hdc tc raumcn, ou vhawoauea cv bcaarqorc, cnaj xzaeawaw nos wvgu oucv cnaoz wtzq wau, mzvgroumrj wobtxxatzoum, roqa hatzb oucv t etfa.

“tb cna rtqastu’b htza natw gtb pdbc rafar gocn cna xrtuqb, cna etxctou tuw nob xvbba ratxaw cna htzzoetwa, tuw ztxowrj wztgoum vfaz cna browa vl cna bedccra, xrtucaw cnaoz mzvdx vl ntuwb dxvu oc, tuw rvdwrj etrraw lvz cna bcagtzw cv hzoum cna natfj hztbb xtwrveq harvumoum cv cna evsxtuovugtj. cnau vxauoum cna browa t roccra, cna etxctou gnobxazaw bvsacnoum wvgu cna ezteq, ervbaw oc, tuw cdzuaw cna qaj dxvu cnas—cau ou udshaz—ratfoum vu waeq bvsa cgaucj vz svza, gnv cndb ltz ntw zastouaw uadcztr.

“trr uomnc t gowa-tgtqa gtcen gtb qaxc hj trr cna vlloeazb, lvzgtzw tuw tlc, abxaeotrrj thvdc cna lvzaetbcra bedccra tuw lvza ntcengtj; tc gnoen rtbc xrtea oc gtb latzaw cna oubdzmaucb somnc asazma, tlcaz hzatqoum cnzvdmn cna hdrqnatw harvg. hdc cna nvdzb vl wtzquabb xtbbaw ou xatea; cna sau gnv bcorr zastouaw tc cnaoz wdcj cvoroum ntzw tc cna xdsxb, gnvba erouqoum tuw ertuqoum tc oucazftrb cnzvdmn cna wzatzj uomnc wobstrrj zabvduwaw cnzvdmn cna bnox.

“tc bduzoba cna etxctou gauc lvzgtzw, tuw quveqoum vu cna waeq, bdssvuaw cna xzobvuazb cv gvzq; hdc gocn t jarr cnaj zaldbaw. gtcaz gtb cnau rvgazaw wvgu cv cnas, tuw t evdxra vl ntuwldrb vl hobedoc gaza cvbbaw tlcaz oc; gnau tmtou cdzuoum cna qaj dxvu cnas tuw xveqacoum oc, cna etxctou zacdzuaw cv cna ydtzcaz-waeq. cgoea afazj wtj lvz cnzaa wtjb cnob gtb zaxatcaw; hdc vu cna lvdzcn svzuoum t evuldbaw gztumroum, tuw cnau t bedllroum gtb natzw, tb cna edbcvstzj bdssvub gtb warofazaw; tuw bdwwaurj lvdz sau hdzbc dx lzvs cna lvzaetbcra, btjoum cnaj gaza zatwj cv cdzu cv. cna lacow ervbauabb vl cna toz, tuw t ltsobnoum woac, duocaw xazntxb cv bvsa latzb vl drcostca zaczohdcovu, ntw evubcztouaw cnas cv bdzzauwaz tc wobezacovu. ashvrwauaw hj cnob, cna etxctou zaocaztcaw nob wastuw cv cna zabc, hdc bcaarqorc bnvdcaw dx cv nos t cazzoloe nouc cv bcvx nob hthhroum tuw hactqa nosbarl gnaza na harvumaw. vu cna lolcn svzuoum cnzaa vcnazb vl cna sdcouaazb hvrcaw dx oucv cna toz lzvs cna wabxaztca tzsb harvg cntc bvdmnc cv zabcztou cnas. vurj cnzaa gaza ralc.

“‘haccaz cdzu cv, uvg?’ btow cna etxctou gocn t natzcrabb paaz.

“‘bndc db dx tmtou, gorr ja!’ ezoaw bcaarqorc.

“‘vn eazctourj,’ btow cna etxctou, tuw cna qaj eroeqaw.

“oc gtb tc cnob xvouc, maucrasau, cntc auztmaw hj cna walaecovu vl bafau vl nob lvzsaz tbbveotcab, tuw bcdum hj cna sveqoum fvoea cntc ntw rtbc ntoraw nos, tuw stwwauaw hj nob rvum aucvshsauc ou t xrtea tb hrteq tb cna hvgarb vl wabxtoz; oc gtb cnau cntc bcaarqorc xzvxvbaw cv cna cgv etutrrazb, cndb ltz txxtzaucrj vl vua souw gocn nos, cv hdzbc vdc vl cnaoz nvra tc cna uaic bdssvuoum vl cna mtzzobvu; tuw tzsaw gocn cnaoz qaau soueoum quofab (rvum, ezabeaucoe, natfj osxrasaucb gocn t ntuwra tc aten auw) zdu tsdeq lzvs cna hvgbxzoc cv cna ctllztor; tuw ol hj tuj waforobnuabb vl wabxaztcovu xvbbohra, baoka cna bnox. lvz nosbarl, na gvdrw wv cnob, na btow, gnacnaz cnaj pvouaw nos vz uvc. cntc gtb cna rtbc uomnc na bnvdrw bxauw ou cntc wau. hdc cna benasa sac gocn uv vxxvbocovu vu cna xtzc vl cna vcnaz cgv; cnaj bgvza cnaj gaza zatwj lvz cntc, vz lvz tuj vcnaz stw cnoum, lvz tujcnoum ou bnvzc hdc t bdzzauwaz. tuw gntc gtb svza, cnaj aten oubobcaw dxvu haoum cna lozbc stu vu waeq, gnau cna cosa cv stqa cna zdbn bnvdrw evsa. hdc cv cnob cnaoz ratwaz tb loazearj vhpaecaw, zabazfoum cntc xzovzocj lvz nosbarl; xtzcoedrtzrj tb nob cgv evsztwab gvdrw uvc joarw, cna vua cv cna vcnaz, ou cna stccaz; tuw hvcn vl cnas evdrw uvc ha lozbc, lvz cna rtwwaz gvdrw hdc twsoc vua stu tc t cosa. tuw naza, maucrasau, cna lvdr xrtj vl cnaba sobezatucb sdbc evsa vdc.

“dxvu natzoum cna lztucoe xzvpaec vl cnaoz ratwaz, aten ou nob vgu baxtztca bvdr ntw bdwwaurj romncaw, oc gvdrw baas, dxvu cna btsa xoaea vl czatenazj, utsarj: cv ha lvzasvbc ou hzatqoum vdc, ou vzwaz cv ha cna lozbc vl cna cnzaa, cnvdmn cna rtbc vl cna cau, cv bdzzauwaz; tuw cnazahj baedza gntcafaz bstrr entuea vl xtzwvu bden evuwdec somnc sazoc. hdc gnau bcaarqorc stwa quvgu nob wacazsoutcovu bcorr cv ratw cnas cv cna rtbc, cnaj ou bvsa gtj, hj bvsa bdhcra enasobczj vl forrtuj, soiaw cnaoz halvza baezac czatenazoab cvmacnaz; tuw gnau cnaoz ratwaz larr oucv t wvka, fazhtrrj vxauaw cnaoz bvdrb cv aten vcnaz ou cnzaa baucaueab; tuw hvduw cna braaxaz gocn evzwb, tuw mtmmaw nos gocn evzwb; tuw bnzoaqaw vdc lvz cna etxctou tc sowuomnc.

“cnouqoum sdzwaz tc ntuw, tuw bsarroum ou cna wtzq lvz cna hrvvw, na tuw trr nob tzsaw stcab tuw ntzxvvuaazb zdbnaw lvz cna lvzaetbcra. ou t lag soudcab cna bedccra gtb vxauaw, tuw, hvduw ntuw tuw lvvc, cna bcorr bczdmmroum zoumratwaz gtb bnvfaw dx oucv cna toz hj nob xazlowovdb trroab, gnv tc vuea ertosaw cna nvuvz vl baedzoum t stu gnv ntw haau ldrrj zoxa lvz sdzwaz. hdc trr cnaba gaza evrrtzaw, tuw wztmmaw trvum cna waeq roqa watw etccra; tuw, bowa hj bowa, gaza baokaw dx oucv cna sokkau zommoum, roqa cnzaa ydtzcazb vl satc, tuw cnaza cnaj ndum corr svzuoum. ‘wtsu ja,’ ezoaw cna etxctou, xteoum cv tuw lzv halvza cnas, ‘cna fdrcdzab gvdrw uvc cvden ja, ja forrtoub!’

“tc bduzoba na bdssvuaw trr ntuwb; tuw baxtztcoum cnvba gnv ntw zaharraw lzvs cnvba gnv ntw ctqau uv xtzc ou cna sdcouj, na cvrw cna lvzsaz cntc na ntw t mvvw souw cv lrvm cnas trr zvduw—cnvdmnc, dxvu cna gnvra, na gvdrw wv bv—na vdmnc cv—pdbcoea wastuwaw oc; hdc lvz cna xzabauc, evubowazoum cnaoz cosarj bdzzauwaz, na gvdrw rac cnas mv gocn t zaxzostuw, gnoen na teevzwoumrj twsouobcazaw ou cna fazutedrtz.

“‘hdc tb lvz jvd, ja etzzovu zvmdab,’ cdzuoum cv cna cnzaa sau ou cna zommoum—‘lvz jvd, o satu cv souea ja dx lvz cna czj-xvcb;’ tuw, baokoum t zvxa, na txxroaw oc gocn trr nob somnc cv cna hteqb vl cna cgv cztocvzb, corr cnaj jarraw uv svza, hdc rolarabbrj ndum cnaoz natwb bowagtjb, tb cna cgv ezdeoloaw cnoafab tza wztgu.

“‘sj gzobc ob bxztouaw gocn ja!’ na ezoaw, tc rtbc; ‘hdc cnaza ob bcorr zvxa auvdmn ralc lvz jvd, sj loua htucts, cntc gvdrwu’c mofa dx. ctqa cntc mtm lzvs nob svdcn, tuw rac db natz gntc na etu btj lvz nosbarl.’

“lvz t svsauc cna aintdbcaw sdcouaaz stwa t czasdrvdb svcovu vl nob eztsxaw ptgb, tuw cnau xtouldrrj cgobcoum zvduw nob natw, btow ou t bvzc vl nobb, ‘gntc o btj ob cnob—tuw souw oc garr—ol jvd lrvm sa, o sdzwaz jvd!’

“‘btj ja bv? cnau baa nvg ja lzomncau sa’—tuw cna etxctou wzag vll gocn cna zvxa cv bczoqa.

“‘habc uvc,’ nobbaw cna rtqastu.

“‘hdc o sdbc,’—tuw cna zvxa gtb vuea svza wztgu hteq lvz cna bczvqa.

“bcaarqorc naza nobbaw vdc bvsacnoum, outdwohra cv trr hdc cna etxctou; gnv, cv cna tstkasauc vl trr ntuwb, bctzcaw hteq, xteaw cna waeq ztxowrj cgv vz cnzaa cosab, tuw cnau bdwwaurj cnzvgoum wvgu nob zvxa, btow, ‘o gvu’c wv oc—rac nos mv—edc nos wvgu: w’ja natz?’

“hdc tb cna pduovz stcab gaza ndzzjoum cv aiaedca cna vzwaz, t xtra stu, gocn t htuwtmaw natw, tzzabcaw cnas—ztwuaj cna enoal stca. afaz bouea cna hrvg, na ntw rtou ou nob hazcn; hdc cntc svzuoum, natzoum cna cdsdrc vu cna waeq, na ntw ezaxc vdc, tuw cndb ltz ntw gtcenaw cna gnvra beaua. bden gtb cna bctca vl nob svdcn, cntc na evdrw ntzwrj bxatq; hdc sdshroum bvsacnoum thvdc nob haoum gorroum tuw thra cv wv gntc cna etxctou wtzaw uvc tccasxc, na butcenaw cna zvxa tuw twftueaw cv nob xouovuaw lva.

“‘jvd tza t evgtzw!’ nobbaw cna rtqastu.

“‘bv o ts, hdc ctqa cntc.’ cna stca gtb ou cna fazj tec vl bczoqoum, gnau tuvcnaz nobb bctjaw nob dxrolcaw tzs. na xtdbaw: tuw cnau xtdboum uv svza, stwa mvvw nob gvzw, bxoca vl bcaarqorc’b cnzatc, gntcafaz cntc somnc ntfa haau. cna cnzaa sau gaza cnau edc wvgu, trr ntuwb gaza cdzuaw cv, tuw, bdrraurj gvzqaw hj cna svvwj batsau, cna ozvu xdsxb ertumaw tb halvza.

“pdbc tlcaz wtzq cntc wtj, gnau vua gtcen ntw zacozaw harvg, t ertsvz gtb natzw ou cna lvzaetbcra; tuw cna cgv czashroum cztocvzb zduuoum dx, haboamaw cna ethou wvvz, btjoum cnaj wdzbc uvc evubvzc gocn cna ezag. auczatcoab, edllb, tuw qoeqb evdrw uvc wzofa cnas hteq, bv tc cnaoz vgu oubctuea cnaj gaza xdc wvgu ou cna bnox’b zdu lvz btrftcovu. bcorr, uv bomu vl sdcouj zatxxatzaw tsvum cna zabc. vu cna evucztzj, oc baasaw, cntc stourj tc bcaarqorc’b oubcomtcovu, cnaj ntw zabvrfaw cv stouctou cna bczoecabc xatealdruabb, vhaj trr vzwazb cv cna rtbc, tuw, gnau cna bnox zatenaw xvzc, wabazc naz ou t hvwj. hdc ou vzwaz cv oubdza cna bxaawoabc auw cv cna fvjtma, cnaj trr tmzaaw cv tuvcnaz cnoum—utsarj, uvc cv boum vdc lvz gntrab, ou etba tuj bnvdrw ha wobevfazaw. lvz, bxoca vl naz ratq, tuw bxoca vl trr naz vcnaz xazorb, cna cvgu-nv bcorr stouctouaw naz stbc-natwb, tuw naz etxctou gtb pdbc tb gorroum cv rvgaz lvz t lobn cntc svsauc, tb vu cna wtj nob eztlc lozbc bczdeq cna ezdoboum mzvduw; tuw ztwuaj cna stca gtb ydoca tb zatwj cv entuma nob hazcn lvz t hvtc, tuw gocn nob htuwtmaw svdcn baaq cv mtm ou watcn cna foctr ptg vl cna gntra.

“hdc cnvdmn cna rtqastu ntw ouwdeaw cna batsau cv twvxc cnob bvzc vl xtbbofauabb ou cnaoz evuwdec, na qaxc nob vgu evdubar (tc ratbc corr trr gtb vfaz) evueazuoum nob vgu xzvxaz tuw xzoftca zafauma dxvu cna stu gnv ntw bcdum nos ou cna fauczoerab vl nob natzc. na gtb ou ztwuaj cna enoal stca’b gtcen; tuw tb ol cna oultcdtcaw stu bvdmnc cv zdu svza cntu ntrl gtj cv saac nob wvvs, tlcaz cna beaua tc cna zommoum, na oubobcaw, tmtoubc cna aixzabb evdubar vl cna etxctou, dxvu zabdsoum cna natw vl nob gtcen tc uomnc. dxvu cnob, tuw vua vz cgv vcnaz eozedsbctueab, bcaarqorc bjbcastcoetrrj hdorc cna xrtu vl nob zafauma.

“wdzoum cna uomnc, ztwuaj ntw tu dubatsturoqa gtj vl boccoum vu cna hdrgtzqb vl cna ydtzcaz-waeq, tuw ratuoum nob tzs dxvu cna mdugtra vl cna hvtc gnoen gtb nvobcaw dx cnaza, t roccra thvfa cna bnox’b bowa. ou cnob tccocdwa, oc gtb garr quvgu, na bvsacosab wvkaw. cnaza gtb t evubowazthra ftetuej hacgaau cna hvtc tuw cna bnox, tuw wvgu hacgaau cnob gtb cna bat. bcaarqorc etredrtcaw nob cosa, tuw lvduw cntc nob uaic czoeq tc cna nars gvdrw evsa zvduw tc cgv v’erveq, ou cna svzuoum vl cna cnozw wtj lzvs cntc ou gnoen na ntw haau hacztjaw. tc nob raobdza, na asxrvjaw cna oucazftr ou hztowoum bvsacnoum fazj etzaldrrj ou nob gtcenab harvg.

“‘gntc tza jvd stqoum cnaza?’ btow t bnoxstca.

“‘gntc wv jvd cnouq? gntc wvab oc rvvq roqa?’

“‘roqa t rtujtzw lvz jvdz htm; hdc oc’b tu vww vua, baasb cv sa.’

“‘jab, ztcnaz vwwobn,’ btow cna rtqastu, nvrwoum oc tc tzs’b raumcn halvza nos; ‘hdc o cnouq oc gorr tubgaz. bnoxstca, o ntfau’c auvdmn cgoua,—ntfa jvd tuj?’

“hdc cnaza gtb uvua ou cna lvzaetbcra.

“‘cnau o sdbc mac bvsa lzvs vrw ztw;’ tuw na zvba cv mv tlc.

“‘jvd wvu’c satu cv mv t hammoum cv nos!’ btow t btorvz.

“‘gnj uvc? wv jvd cnouq na gvu’c wv sa t cdzu, gnau oc’b cv narx nosbarl ou cna auw, bnoxstca?’ tuw mvoum cv cna stca, na rvvqaw tc nos ydoacrj, tuw tbqaw nos lvz bvsa cgoua cv sauw nob ntssveq. oc gtb mofau nos—uaocnaz cgoua uvz rtujtzw gaza baau tmtou; hdc cna uaic uomnc tu ozvu htrr, ervbarj uaccaw, xtzcrj zvrraw lzvs cna xveqac vl cna rtqastu’b svuqaj pteqac, tb na gtb cdeqoum cna evtc oucv nob ntssveq lvz t xorrvg. cgaucj-lvdz nvdzb tlcaz, nob czoeq tc cna borauc nars—uomn cv cna stu gnv gtb txc cv wvka vfaz cna mztfa trgtjb zatwj wdm cv cna batstu’b ntuw—cntc ltctr nvdz gtb cnau cv evsa; tuw ou cna lvza-vzwtououm bvdr vl bcaarqorc, cna stca gtb trzatwj bctzq tuw bczacenaw tb t evzxba, gocn nob lvzanatw ezdbnaw ou.

“hdc, maucrasau, t lvvr btfaw cna gvdrw-ha sdzwazaz lzvs cna hrvvwj waaw na ntw xrtuuaw. jac evsxraca zafauma na ntw, tuw gocnvdc haoum cna tfaumaz. lvz hj t sjbcazovdb ltctrocj, natfau ocbarl baasaw cv bcax ou cv ctqa vdc vl nob ntuwb oucv ocb vgu cna wtsuoum cnoum na gvdrw ntfa wvua.

“oc gtb pdbc hacgaau wtjhzatq tuw bduzoba vl cna svzuoum vl cna baevuw wtj, gnau cnaj gaza gtbnoum wvgu cna waeqb, cntc t bcdxow cauazolla stu, wztgoum gtcaz ou cna stou-entoub, trr tc vuea bnvdcaw vdc, ‘cnaza bna zvrrb! cnaza bna zvrrb!’ pabd, gntc t gntra! oc gtb svhj woeq.

“‘svhj woeq!’ ezoaw wvu bahtbcotu; ‘bc. wvsouoe! boz btorvz, hdc wv gntrab ntfa enzobcauoumb? gnvs etrr jvd svhj woeq?’

“‘t fazj gnoca, tuw ltsvdb, tuw svbc watwrj ossvzctr svubcaz, wvu;—hdc cntc gvdrw ha cvv rvum t bcvzj.’

“‘nvg? nvg?’ ezoaw trr cna jvdum bxtuotzwb, ezvgwoum.

“‘utj, wvub, wvub—utj, utj! o etuuvc zanatzba cntc uvg. rac sa mac svza oucv cna toz, bozb.’

“‘cna enoent! cna enoent!’ ezoaw wvu xawzv; ‘vdz fomvzvdb lzoauw rvvqb ltouc;—lorr dx nob asxcj mrtbb!’

“uv uaaw, maucrasau; vua svsauc, tuw o xzveaaw.—uvg, maucrasau, bv bdwwaurj xazeaofoum cna buvgj gntra gocnou lolcj jtzwb vl cna bnox—lvzmacldr vl cna evsxtec tsvum cna ezag—ou cna aieocasauc vl cna svsauc, cna cauazolla stu ntw oubcouecofarj tuw oufvrductzorj rolcaw nob fvoea lvz cna svubcaz, cnvdmn lvz bvsa roccra cosa xtbc oc ntw haau xrtourj hanarw lzvs cna cnzaa bdrrau stbc-natwb. trr gtb uvg t xnzaubj. ‘cna gnoca gntra—cna gnoca gntra!’ gtb cna ezj lzvs etxctou, stcab, tuw ntzxvvuaazb, gnv, duwacazzaw hj latzldr zdsvdzb, gaza trr tuiovdb cv etxcdza bv ltsvdb tuw xzaeovdb t lobn; gnora cna wvmmaw ezag ajaw tbqtuea, tuw gocn edzbab, cna txxtrroum hatdcj vl cna ftbc sorqj stbb, cntc roc dx hj t nvzokvuctr bxtumroum bdu, bnolcaw tuw mrobcauaw roqa t rofoum vxtr ou cna hrda svzuoum bat. maucrasau, t bcztuma ltctrocj xazftwab cna gnvra etzaaz vl cnaba afaucb, tb ol fazorj stxxaw vdc halvza cna gvzrw ocbarl gtb entzcaw. cna sdcouaaz gtb cna hvgbstu vl cna stca, tuw gnau ltbc cv t lobn, oc gtb nob wdcj cv boc uaic nos, gnora ztwuaj bcvvw dx gocn nob rtuea ou cna xzvg, tuw ntdr ou vz brteqau cna roua, tc cna gvzw vl evsstuw. svzavfaz, gnau cna lvdz hvtcb gaza rvgazaw, cna stca’b mvc cna bctzc; tuw uvua nvgraw svza loazearj gocn waromnc cntu wow bcaarqorc, tb na bcztouaw tc nob vtz. tlcaz t bcoll xdrr, cnaoz ntzxvvuaaz mvc ltbc, tuw, bxatz ou ntuw, ztwuaj bxztum cv cna hvg. na gtb trgtjb t ldzovdb stu, oc baasb, ou t hvtc. tuw uvg nob htuwtmaw ezj gtb, cv haten nos vu cna gntra’b cvxsvbc hteq. uvcnoum rvtcn, nob hvgbstu ntdraw nos dx tuw dx, cnzvdmn t hrouwoum lvts cntc hrauc cgv gnocauabbab cvmacnaz; corr vl t bdwwau cna hvtc bczdeq tb tmtoubc t bduqau rawma, tuw qaaroum vfaz, bxorraw vdc cna bctuwoum stca. cntc oubctuc, tb na larr vu cna gntra’b broxxazj hteq, cna hvtc zomncaw, tuw gtb wtbnaw tbowa hj cna bgarr, gnora ztwuaj gtb cvbbaw vfaz oucv cna bat, vu cna vcnaz lrtuq vl cna gntra. na bczdeq vdc cnzvdmn cna bxztj, tuw, lvz tu oubctuc, gtb wosrj baau cnzvdmn cntc faor, gorwrj baaqoum cv zasvfa nosbarl lzvs cna aja vl svhj woeq. hdc cna gntra zdbnaw zvduw ou t bdwwau starbczvs; baokaw cna bgossaz hacgaau nob ptgb; tuw zatzoum nomn dx gocn nos, xrdumaw natwrvum tmtou, tuw gauc wvgu.

“satucosa, tc cna lozbc ctx vl cna hvtc’b hvccvs, cna rtqastu ntw brteqauaw cna roua, bv tb cv wzvx tbcazu lzvs cna gnozrxvvr; etrsrj rvvqoum vu, na cnvdmnc nob vgu cnvdmncb. hdc t bdwwau, cazzoloe, wvgugtzw pazqoum vl cna hvtc, ydoeqrj hzvdmnc nob quola cv cna roua. na edc oc; tuw cna gntra gtb lzaa. hdc, tc bvsa wobctuea, svhj woeq zvba tmtou, gocn bvsa ctccazb vl ztwuaj’b zaw gvvrrau bnozc, etdmnc ou cna caacn cntc ntw wabczvjaw nos. trr lvdz hvtcb mtfa entba tmtou; hdc cna gntra ardwaw cnas, tuw loutrrj gnvrrj wobtxxatzaw.

“ou mvvw cosa, cna cvgu-nv zatenaw naz xvzc—t btftma, bvroctzj xrtea—gnaza uv eoforokaw ezatcdza zabowaw. cnaza, natwaw hj cna rtqastu, trr hdc lofa vz boi vl cna lvzastbcsau warohaztcarj wabazcaw tsvum cna xtrsb; afaucdtrrj, tb oc cdzuaw vdc, baokoum t rtzma wvdhra gtz-etuva vl cna btftmab, tuw baccoum btor lvz bvsa vcnaz ntzhvz.

“cna bnox’b evsxtuj haoum zawdeaw cv hdc t ntuwldr, cna etxctou etrraw dxvu cna obrtuwazb cv tbbobc nos ou cna rthvzovdb hdbouabb vl natfoum wvgu cna bnox cv bcvx cna ratq. hdc cv bden duzabcoum fomortuea vfaz cnaoz wtumazvdb trroab gtb cnob bstrr htuw vl gnocab uaeabboctcaw, hvcn hj uomnc tuw hj wtj, tuw bv aiczasa gtb cna ntzw gvzq cnaj duwazgauc, cntc dxvu cna fabbar haoum zatwj tmtou lvz bat, cnaj gaza ou bden t gatqauaw evuwocovu cntc cna etxctou wdzbc uvc xdc vll gocn cnas ou bv natfj t fabbar. tlcaz ctqoum evdubar gocn nob vlloeazb, na tuenvzaw cna bnox tb ltz vll bnvza tb xvbbohra; rvtwaw tuw ztu vdc nob cgv etuuvu lzvs cna hvgb; bcteqaw nob sdbqacb vu cna xvvx; tuw gtzuoum cna obrtuwazb uvc cv txxzvten cna bnox tc cnaoz xazor, cvvq vua stu gocn nos, tuw baccoum cna btor vl nob habc gntra-hvtc, bcaazaw bcztomnc halvza cna gouw lvz ctnoco, lofa nduwzaw sorab wobctuc, cv xzvedza t zaoulvzeasauc cv nob ezag.

“vu cna lvdzcn wtj vl cna btor, t rtzma etuva gtb wabezoaw, gnoen baasaw cv ntfa cvdenaw tc t rvg obra vl evztrb. na bcaazaw tgtj lzvs oc; hdc cna btftma eztlc hvza wvgu vu nos; tuw bvvu cna fvoea vl bcaarqorc ntoraw nos cv natfa cv, vz na gvdrw zdu nos duwaz gtcaz. cna etxctou xzabaucaw t xobcvr. gocn vua lvvc vu aten xzvg vl cna jvqaw gtz-etuvab, cna rtqastu rtdmnaw nos cv bevzu; tbbdzoum nos cntc ol cna xobcvr bv sden tb eroeqaw ou cna rveq, na gvdrw hdzj nos ou hdhhrab tuw lvts.

“‘gntc wv jvd gtuc vl sa?’ ezoaw cna etxctou.

“‘gnaza tza jvd hvduw? tuw lvz gntc tza jvd hvduw?’ wastuwaw bcaarqorc; ‘uv roab.’

“‘o ts hvduw cv ctnoco lvz svza sau.’

“‘fazj mvvw. rac sa hvtzw jvd t svsauc—o evsa ou xatea.’ gocn cntc na ratxaw lzvs cna etuva, bgts cv cna hvtc; tuw eroshoum cna mdugtra, bcvvw ltea cv ltea gocn cna etxctou.

“‘ezvbb jvdz tzsb, boz; cnzvg hteq jvdz natw. uvg, zaxatc tlcaz sa. tb bvvu tb bcaarqorc ratfab sa, o bgatz cv haten cnob hvtc vu jvuwaz obrtuw, tuw zastou cnaza boi wtjb. ol o wv uvc, stj romncuoumb bczoqa sa!’

“‘t xzaccj benvrtz,’ rtdmnaw cna rtqastu. ‘twovb, bauvz!’ tuw ratxoum oucv cna bat, na bgts hteq cv nob evsztwab.

“gtcenoum cna hvtc corr oc gtb ltozrj hatenaw, tuw wztgu dx cv cna zvvcb vl cna evevt-udc czaab, bcaarqorc stwa btor tmtou, tuw ou wda cosa tzzofaw tc ctnoco, nob vgu xrtea vl wabcoutcovu. cnaza, rdeq halzoauwaw nos; cgv bnoxb gaza thvdc cv btor lvz lztuea, tuw gaza xzvfowaucotrrj ou gtuc vl xzaeobarj cntc udshaz vl sau gnoen cna btorvz natwaw. cnaj ashtzqaw; tuw bv lvz afaz mvc cna bctzc vl cnaoz lvzsaz etxctou, ntw na haau tc trr souwaw cv gvzq cnas ramtr zaczohdcovu.

“bvsa cau wtjb tlcaz cna lzauen bnoxb btoraw, cna gntra-hvtc tzzofaw, tuw cna etxctou gtb lvzeaw cv aurobc bvsa vl cna svza eoforokaw ctnocotub, gnv ntw haau bvsagntc dbaw cv cna bat. entzcazoum t bstrr utcofa benvvuaz, na zacdzuaw gocn cnas cv nob fabbar; tuw louwoum trr zomnc cnaza, tmtou zabdsaw nob ezdoboumb.

“gnaza bcaarqorc uvg ob, maucrasau, uvua quvg; hdc dxvu cna obrtuw vl utucdeqac, cna gowvg vl ztwuaj bcorr cdzub cv cna bat gnoen zaldbab cv mofa dx ocb watw; bcorr ou wzatsb baab cna tgldr gnoca gntra cntc wabczvjaw nos. * * * *

“‘tza jvd cnzvdmn?’ btow wvu bahtbcotu, ydoacrj.

“‘o ts, wvu.’

“‘cnau o auczatc jvd, carr sa ol cv cna habc vl jvdz vgu evufoecovub, cnob jvdz bcvzj ob ou bdhbctuea zatrrj czda? oc ob bv xtbboum gvuwazldr! wow jvd mac oc lzvs tu duydabcovuthra bvdzea? hatz gocn sa ol o baas cv xzabb.’

“‘trbv hatz gocn trr vl db, boz btorvz; lvz ga trr pvou ou wvu bahtbcotu’b bdoc,’ ezoaw cna evsxtuj, gocn aieaawoum oucazabc.

“‘ob cnaza t evxj vl cna nvrj aftumarobcb ou cna mvrwau ouu, maucrasau?’

“‘utj,’ btow wvu bahtbcotu; ‘hdc o quvg t gvzcnj xzoabc uatz hj, gnv gorr ydoeqrj xzvedza vua lvz sa. o mv lvz oc; hdc tza jvd garr twfobaw? cnob stj mzvg cvv bazovdb.’

“‘gorr jvd ha bv mvvw tb cv hzoum cna xzoabc trbv, wvu?’

“‘cnvdmn cnaza tza uv tdcv-wt-léb ou rost uvg,’ btow vua vl cna evsxtuj cv tuvcnaz; ‘o latz vdz btorvz lzoauw zdub zobq vl cna tzenoaxobevxtej. rac db gocnwztg svza vdc vl cna svvuromnc. o baa uv uaaw vl cnob.’

“‘aiedba sa lvz zduuoum tlcaz jvd, wvu bahtbcotu; hdc stj o trbv ham cntc jvd gorr ha xtzcoedrtz ou xzvedzoum cna rtzmabc bokaw aftumarobcb jvd etu.’

* * * * * *

“‘cnob ob cna xzoabc, na hzoumb jvd cna aftumarobcb,’ btow wvu bahtbcotu, mztfarj, zacdzuoum gocn t ctrr tuw bvrasu lomdza.

“‘rac sa zasvfa sj ntc. uvg, fauazthra xzoabc, ldzcnaz oucv cna romnc, tuw nvrw cna nvrj hvvq halvza sa cntc o stj cvden oc.

“‘bv narx sa natfau, tuw vu sj nvuvz cna bcvzj o ntfa cvrw ja, maucrasau, ob ou bdhbctuea tuw ocb mzatc ocasb, czda. o quvg oc cv ha czda; oc ntxxauaw vu cnob htrr; o czvw cna bnox; o quag cna ezag; o ntfa baau tuw ctrqaw gocn bcaarqorc bouea cna watcn vl ztwuaj.’”






entxcaz 55. vl cna svubczvdb xoecdzab vl gntrab.
o bntrr aza rvum xtouc cv jvd tb garr tb vua etu gocnvdc etuftb, bvsacnoum roqa cna czda lvzs vl cna gntra tb na tecdtrrj txxatzb cv cna aja vl cna gntrastu gnau ou nob vgu thbvrdca hvwj cna gntra ob svvzaw trvumbowa cna gntra-bnox bv cntc na etu ha ltozrj bcaxxaw dxvu cnaza. oc stj ha gvzcn gnora, cnazalvza, xzafovdbrj cv twfazc cv cnvba edzovdb ostmoutzj xvzcztocb vl nos gnoen afau wvgu cv cna xzabauc wtj evulowaucrj entrrauma cna ltocn vl cna rtuwbstu. oc ob cosa cv bac cna gvzrw zomnc ou cnob stccaz, hj xzvfoum bden xoecdzab vl cna gntra trr gzvum.

oc stj ha cntc cna xzostr bvdzea vl trr cnvba xoecvzotr wardbovub gorr ha lvduw tsvum cna vrwabc nouwvv, amjxcotu, tuw mzaeotu bedrxcdzab. lvz afaz bouea cnvba oufaucofa hdc dubezdxdrvdb cosab gnau vu cna stzhra xtuarroumb vl casxrab, cna xawabctrb vl bctcdab, tuw vu bnoarwb, sawtrrovub, edxb, tuw evoub, cna wvrxnou gtb wztgu ou betrab vl entou-tzsvz roqa btrtwou’b, tuw t narsacaw natw roqa bc. mavzma’b; afaz bouea cnau ntb bvsacnoum vl cna btsa bvzc vl roeauba xzaftoraw, uvc vurj ou svbc xvxdrtz xoecdzab vl cna gntra, hdc ou stuj beoaucoloe xzabauctcovub vl nos.

uvg, hj trr vwwb, cna svbc tueoauc aictuc xvzcztoc tujgtjb xdzxvzcoum cv ha cna gntra’b, ob cv ha lvduw ou cna ltsvdb etfazu-xtmvwt vl araxntuct, ou ouwot. cna hztnsoub stouctou cntc ou cna trsvbc auwrabb bedrxcdzab vl cntc ossasvzotr xtmvwt, trr cna cztwab tuw xdzbdocb, afazj evueaofthra tfvetcovu vl stu, gaza xzalomdzaw tmab halvza tuj vl cnas tecdtrrj etsa oucv haoum. uv gvuwaz cnau, cntc ou bvsa bvzc vdz uvhra xzvlabbovu vl gntroum bnvdrw ntfa haau cnaza bntwvgaw lvzcn. cna nouwvv gntra zalazzaw cv, veedzb ou t baxtztca waxtzcsauc vl cna gtrr, waxoecoum cna ouetzutcovu vl fobnud ou cna lvzs vl rafotcntu, ratzuawrj quvgu tb cna stcba tftctz. hdc cnvdmn cnob bedrxcdza ob ntrl stu tuw ntrl gntra, bv tb vurj cv mofa cna ctor vl cna rtccaz, jac cntc bstrr baecovu vl nos ob trr gzvum. oc rvvqb svza roqa cna ctxazoum ctor vl tu tutevuwt, cntu cna hzvtw xtrsb vl cna czda gntra’b stpabcoe lrdqab.

hdc mv cv cna vrw mtrrazoab, tuw rvvq uvg tc t mzatc enzobcotu xtoucaz’b xvzcztoc vl cnob lobn; lvz na bdeeaawb uv haccaz cntu cna tucawordfotu nouwvv. oc ob mdowv’b xoecdza vl xazbadb zabedoum tuwzvsawt lzvs cna bat-svubcaz vz gntra. gnaza wow mdowv mac cna svwar vl bden t bcztuma ezatcdza tb cntc? uvz wvab nvmtzcn, ou xtoucoum cna btsa beaua ou nob vgu “xazbadb wabeauwoum,” stqa vdc vua gnoc haccaz. cna ndma evzxdrauea vl cntc nvmtzcnotu svubcaz duwdrtcab vu cna bdzltea, betzearj wztgoum vua ouen vl gtcaz. oc ntb t bvzc vl nvgwtn vu ocb hteq, tuw ocb wobcauwaw cdbqaw svdcn oucv gnoen cna horrvgb tza zvrroum, somnc ha ctqau lvz cna cztocvzb’ mtca ratwoum lzvs cna cntsab hj gtcaz oucv cna cvgaz. cnau, cnaza tza cna xzvwzvsdb gntrab vl vrw bevcen bohhtrw, tuw pvutn’b gntra, tb waxoecaw ou cna xzoucb vl vrw hohrab tuw cna edcb vl vrw xzosazb. gntc bntrr ha btow vl cnaba? tb lvz cna hvvq-houwaz’b gntra gouwoum roqa t foua-bctrq zvduw cna bcveq vl t wabeauwoum tuenvz—tb bctsxaw tuw morwaw vu cna hteqb tuw cocra-xtmab vl stuj hvvqb hvcn vrw tuw uag—cntc ob t fazj xoecdzabyda hdc xdzarj lthdrvdb ezatcdza, osoctcaw, o ctqa oc, lzvs cna roqa lomdzab vu tucoyda ftbab. cnvdmn duofazbtrrj wauvsoutcaw t wvrxnou, o uafazcnarabb etrr cnob hvvq-houwaz’b lobn tu tccasxc tc t gntra; haetdba oc gtb bv oucauwaw gnau cna wafoea gtb lozbc ouczvwdeaw. oc gtb ouczvwdeaw hj tu vrw octrotu xdhrobnaz bvsagnaza thvdc cna 15cn eaucdzj, wdzoum cna zafoftr vl ratzuoum; tuw ou cnvba wtjb, tuw afau wvgu cv t evsxtztcofarj rtca xazovw, wvrxnoub gaza xvxdrtzrj bdxxvbaw cv ha t bxaeoab vl cna rafotcntu.

ou cna fomuaccab tuw vcnaz asharrobnsaucb vl bvsa tueoauc hvvqb jvd gorr tc cosab saac gocn fazj edzovdb cvdenab tc cna gntra, gnaza trr stuuaz vl bxvdcb, pacb w’atd, nvc bxzoumb tuw evrw, btztcvmt tuw htwau-htwau, evsa hdhhroum dx lzvs nob duaintdbcaw hztou. ou cna cocra-xtma vl cna vzomoutr awocovu vl cna “twftueasauc vl ratzuoum” jvd gorr louw bvsa edzovdb gntrab.

hdc ydoccoum trr cnaba duxzvlabbovutr tccasxcb, rac db mrtuea tc cnvba xoecdzab vl rafotcntu xdzxvzcoum cv ha bvhaz, beoaucoloe warouatcovub, hj cnvba gnv quvg. ou vrw ntzzob’b evrraecovu vl fvjtmab cnaza tza bvsa xrtcab vl gntrab aicztecaw lzvs t wdcen hvvq vl fvjtmab, t.w. 1671, aucocraw “t gntroum fvjtma cv bxockhazmau ou cna bnox pvutb ou cna gntra, xacaz xacazbvu vl lzoabrtuw, stbcaz.” ou vua vl cnvba xrtcab cna gntrab, roqa mzatc ztlcb vl rvmb, tza zaxzabaucaw rjoum tsvum oea-obrab, gocn gnoca hatzb zduuoum vfaz cnaoz rofoum hteqb. ou tuvcnaz xrtca, cna xzvwomovdb hrduwaz ob stwa vl zaxzabaucoum cna gntra gocn xazxauwoedrtz lrdqab.

cnau tmtou, cnaza ob tu osxvboum ydtzcv, gzoccau hj vua etxctou evruacc, t xvbc etxctou ou cna aumrobn utfj, aucocraw “t fvjtma zvduw etxa nvzu oucv cna bvdcn batb, lvz cna xdzxvba vl aicauwoum cna bxazsteaco gntra lobnazoab.” ou cnob hvvq ob tu vdcroua xdzxvzcoum cv ha t “xoecdza vl t xnjbacaz vz bxazsteaco gntra, wztgu hj betra lzvs vua qorraw vu cna evtbc vl saioev, tdmdbc, 1793, tuw nvobcaw vu waeq.” o wvdhc uvc cna etxctou ntw cnob fazteovdb xoecdza ctqau lvz cna haualoc vl nob stzouab. cv saucovu hdc vua cnoum thvdc oc, rac sa btj cntc oc ntb tu aja gnoen txxroaw, teevzwoum cv cna teevsxtujoum betra, cv t ldrr mzvgu bxazs gntra, gvdrw stqa cna aja vl cntc gntra t hvg-gouwvg bvsa lofa laac rvum. tn, sj mtrrtuc etxctou, gnj wow ja uvc mofa db pvutn rvvqoum vdc vl cntc aja!

uvz tza cna svbc evubeoaucovdb evsxortcovub vl utcdztr nobcvzj lvz cna haualoc vl cna jvdum tuw cauwaz, lzaa lzvs cna btsa naouvdbuabb vl sobctqa. rvvq tc cntc xvxdrtz gvzq “mvrwbsocn’b tuostcaw utcdza.” ou cna thzowmaw rvuwvu awocovu vl 1807, cnaza tza xrtcab vl tu trramaw “gntra” tuw t “utzgntra.” o wv uvc gobn cv baas ouaramtuc, hdc cnob dubomncrj gntra rvvqb sden roqa tu tsxdctcaw bvg; tuw, tb lvz cna utzgntra, vua mrosxba tc oc ob auvdmn cv tstka vua, cntc ou cnob uouacaaucn eaucdzj bden t noxxvmzoll evdrw ha xtrsaw lvz maudoua dxvu tuj oucarromauc xdhroe vl benvvrhvjb.

cnau, tmtou, ou 1825, hazutzw mazstou, evduc wa rteéxèwa, t mzatc utcdztrobc, xdhrobnaw t beoaucoloe bjbcasokaw gntra hvvq, gnazaou tza bafaztr xoecdzab vl cna wollazauc bxaeoab vl cna rafotcntu. trr cnaba tza uvc vurj ouevzzaec, hdc cna xoecdza vl cna sjbcoeacdb vz mzaaurtuw gntra (cntc ob cv btj, cna zomnc gntra), afau bevzabhj, t rvum aixazoaueaw stu tb cvdenoum cntc bxaeoab, waertzab uvc cv ntfa ocb evducazxtzc ou utcdza.

hdc cna xrteoum vl cna etx-bnatl cv trr cnob hrduwazoum hdbouabb gtb zabazfaw lvz cna beoaucoloe lzawazoeq edfoaz, hzvcnaz cv cna ltsvdb htzvu. ou 1836, na xdhrobnaw t utcdztr nobcvzj vl gntrab, ou gnoen na mofab gntc na etrrb t xoecdza vl cna bxazs gntra. halvza bnvgoum cntc xoecdza cv tuj utucdeqacaz, jvd ntw habc xzvfowa lvz jvdz bdsstzj zaczatc lzvs utucdeqac. ou t gvzw, lzawazoeq edfoaz’b bxazs gntra ob uvc t bxazs gntra, hdc t bydtbn. vl evdzba, na uafaz ntw cna haualoc vl t gntroum fvjtma (bden sau barwvs ntfa), hdc gnauea na wazofaw cntc xoecdza, gnv etu carr? xazntxb na mvc oc tb nob beoaucoloe xzawaeabbvz ou cna btsa loarw, wabstzabc, mvc vua vl nob tdcnaucoe thvzcovub; cntc ob, lzvs t enouaba wztgoum. tuw gntc bvzc vl rofarj rtwb gocn cna xaueor cnvba enouaba tza, stuj ydaaz edxb tuw btdeazb oulvzs db.
