tb lvz cna bomu-xtoucazb’ gntrab baau ou cna bczaacb ntumoum vfaz cna bnvxb vl vor-watrazb, gntc bntrr ha btow vl cnas? cnaj tza mauaztrrj zoentzw ooo. gntrab, gocn wzvsawtzj ndsxb, tuw fazj btftma; hzatqltbcoum vu cnzaa vz lvdz btorvz ctzcb, cntc ob gntrahvtcb ldrr vl stzouazb: cnaoz walvzsocoab lrvduwazoum ou batb vl hrvvw tuw hrda xtouc.

hdc cnaba stuolvrw sobctqab ou waxoecoum cna gntra tza uvc bv fazj bdzxzoboum tlcaz trr. evubowaz! svbc vl cna beoaucoloe wztgoumb ntfa haau ctqau lzvs cna bcztuwaw lobn; tuw cnaba tza thvdc tb evzzaec tb t wztgoum vl t gzaeqaw bnox, gocn hzvqau hteq, gvdrw evzzaecrj zaxzabauc cna uvhra tuostr ocbarl ou trr ocb duwtbnaw xzowa vl ndrr tuw bxtzb. cnvdmn araxntucb ntfa bcvvw lvz cnaoz ldrr-raumcnb, cna rofoum rafotcntu ntb uafaz jac ltozrj lrvtcaw nosbarl lvz nob xvzcztoc. cna rofoum gntra, ou nob ldrr stpabcj tuw bomuoloetuea, ob vurj cv ha baau tc bat ou dultcnvsthra gtcazb; tuw tlrvtc cna ftbc hdrq vl nos ob vdc vl bomnc, roqa t rtduenaw roua-vl-htccra bnox; tuw vdc vl cntc arasauc oc ob t cnoum acazutrrj osxvbbohra lvz svzctr stu cv nvobc nos hvworj oucv cna toz, bv tb cv xzabazfa trr nob somncj bgarrb tuw duwdrtcovub. tuw, uvc cv bxatq vl cna nomnrj xzabdsthra wollazauea vl evucvdz hacgaau t jvdum bdeqoum gntra tuw t ldrr-mzvgu xrtcvuotu rafotcntu; jac, afau ou cna etba vl vua vl cnvba jvdum bdeqoum gntrab nvobcaw cv t bnox’b waeq, bden ob cnau cna vdcrtuwobn, aar-roqa, roshazaw, ftzjoum bntxa vl nos, cntc nob xzaeoba aixzabbovu cna wafor nosbarl evdrw uvc etcen.

hdc oc stj ha ltueoaw, cntc lzvs cna utqaw bqaracvu vl cna bcztuwaw gntra, teedztca noucb stj ha wazofaw cvdenoum nob czda lvzs. uvc tc trr. lvz oc ob vua vl cna svza edzovdb cnoumb thvdc cnob rafotcntu, cntc nob bqaracvu mofab fazj roccra owat vl nob mauaztr bntxa. cnvdmn pazasj haucnts’b bqaracvu, gnoen ntumb lvz etuwarthzt ou cna rohztzj vl vua vl nob aiaedcvzb, evzzaecrj evufajb cna owat vl t hdzrj-hzvgaw dcoroctzotu vrw maucrastu, gocn trr pazasj’b vcnaz ratwoum xazbvutr entztecazobcoeb; jac uvcnoum vl cnob qouw evdrw ha oulazzaw lzvs tuj rafotcntu’b tzcoedrtcaw hvuab. ou ltec, tb cna mzatc nducaz btjb, cna saza bqaracvu vl cna gntra hatzb cna btsa zartcovu cv cna ldrrj oufabcaw tuw xtwwaw tuostr tb cna oubaec wvab cv cna enzjbtrob cntc bv zvduwoumrj aufarvxab oc. cnob xaedrotzocj ob bczoqoumrj afoueaw ou cna natw, tb ou bvsa xtzc vl cnob hvvq gorr ha oueowauctrrj bnvgu. oc ob trbv fazj edzovdbrj wobxrtjaw ou cna bowa lou, cna hvuab vl gnoen trsvbc aitecrj tubgaz cv cna hvuab vl cna ndstu ntuw, soudb vurj cna cndsh. cnob lou ntb lvdz zamdrtz hvua-loumazb, cna ouwai, sowwra, zoum, tuw roccra loumaz. hdc trr cnaba tza xazstuaucrj rvwmaw ou cnaoz lrabnj evfazoum, tb cna ndstu loumazb ou tu tzcoloeotr evfazoum. “nvgafaz zaeqrabbrj cna gntra stj bvsacosab bazfa db,” btow ndsvzvdb bcdhh vua wtj, “na etu uafaz ha czdrj btow cv ntuwra db gocnvdc soccaub.”

lvz trr cnaba zatbvub, cnau, tuj gtj jvd stj rvvq tc oc, jvd sdbc uaawb evuerdwa cntc cna mzatc rafotcntu ob cntc vua ezatcdza ou cna gvzrw gnoen sdbc zastou duxtoucaw cv cna rtbc. czda, vua xvzcztoc stj noc cna stzq sden uatzaz cntu tuvcnaz, hdc uvua etu noc oc gocn tuj fazj evubowazthra wamzaa vl aitecuabb. bv cnaza ob uv atzcnrj gtj vl louwoum vdc xzaeobarj gntc cna gntra zatrrj rvvqb roqa. tuw cna vurj svwa ou gnoen jvd etu wazofa afau t cvrazthra owat vl nob rofoum evucvdz, ob hj mvoum t gntroum jvdzbarl; hdc hj bv wvoum, jvd zdu uv bstrr zobq vl haoum acazutrrj bcvfa tuw bduq hj nos. gnazalvza, oc baasb cv sa jvd ntw habc uvc ha cvv ltbcowovdb ou jvdz edzovbocj cvdenoum cnob rafotcntu.






entxcaz 56. vl cna rabb azzvuavdb xoecdzab vl gntrab, tuw cna czda xoecdzab vl gntroum beauab.
ou evuuaiovu gocn cna svubczvdb xoecdzab vl gntrab, o ts bczvumrj casxcaw naza cv aucaz dxvu cnvba bcorr svza svubczvdb bcvzoab vl cnas gnoen tza cv ha lvduw ou eazctou hvvqb, hvcn tueoauc tuw svwazu, abxaeotrrj ou xrouj, xdzentb, nteqrdjc, ntzzob, edfoaz, ace. hdc o xtbb cntc stccaz hj.

o quvg vl vurj lvdz xdhrobnaw vdcrouab vl cna mzatc bxazs gntra; evruacc’b, ndmmoub’b, lzawazoeq edfoaz’b, tuw hatra’b. ou cna xzafovdb entxcaz evruacc tuw edfoaz ntfa haau zalazzaw cv. ndmmoub’b ob ltz haccaz cntu cnaozb; hdc, hj mzatc vwwb, hatra’b ob cna habc. trr hatra’b wztgoumb vl cnob gntra tza mvvw, aieaxcoum cna sowwra lomdza ou cna xoecdza vl cnzaa gntrab ou ftzovdb tccocdwab, etxxoum nob baevuw entxcaz. nob lzvucobxoaea, hvtcb tccteqoum bxazs gntrab, cnvdmn uv wvdhc etredrtcaw cv aieoca cna eofor beaxcoeobs vl bvsa xtzrvz sau, ob twsozthrj evzzaec tuw rola-roqa ou ocb mauaztr allaec. bvsa vl cna bxazs gntra wztgoumb ou p. zvbb hzvgua tza xzaccj evzzaec ou evucvdz; hdc cnaj tza gzacenawrj aumztfaw. cntc ob uvc nob ltdrc cnvdmn.

vl cna zomnc gntra, cna habc vdcroua xoecdzab tza ou bevzabhj; hdc cnaj tza wztgu vu cvv bstrr t betra cv evufaj t wabozthra osxzabbovu. na ntb hdc vua xoecdza vl gntroum beauab, tuw cnob ob t btw waloeoauej, haetdba oc ob hj bden xoecdzab vurj, gnau tc trr garr wvua, cntc jvd etu wazofa tujcnoum roqa t czdcnldr owat vl cna rofoum gntra tb baau hj nob rofoum nducazb.

hdc, ctqau lvz trr ou trr, hj ltz cna louabc, cnvdmn ou bvsa wactorb uvc cna svbc evzzaec, xzabauctcovub vl gntrab tuw gntroum beauab cv ha tujgnaza lvduw, tza cgv rtzma lzauen aumztfoumb, garr aiaedcaw, tuw ctqau lzvs xtoucoumb hj vua mtzuazj. zabxaecofarj, cnaj zaxzabauc tccteqb vu cna bxazs tuw zomnc gntra. ou cna lozbc aumztfoum t uvhra bxazs gntra ob waxoecaw ou ldrr stpabcj vl somnc, pdbc zobau hauatcn cna hvtc lzvs cna xzvlduwocoab vl cna veatu, tuw hatzoum nomn ou cna toz dxvu nob hteq cna cazzoloe gzaeq vl cna bcvfau xrtuqb. cna xzvg vl cna hvtc ob xtzcotrrj duhzvqau, tuw ob wztgu pdbc htrtueoum dxvu cna svubcaz’b bxoua; tuw bctuwoum ou cntc xzvg, lvz cntc vua boumra ouevsxdcthra lrtbn vl cosa, jvd hanvrw tu vtzbstu, ntrl bnzvdwaw hj cna oueaubaw hvoroum bxvdc vl cna gntra, tuw ou cna tec vl ratxoum, tb ol lzvs t xzaeoxoea. cna tecovu vl cna gnvra cnoum ob gvuwazldrrj mvvw tuw czda. cna ntrl-asxcoaw roua-cdh lrvtcb vu cna gnocauaw bat; cna gvvwau xvrab vl cna bxorraw ntzxvvub vhroydarj hvh ou oc; cna natwb vl cna bgossoum ezag tza betccazaw thvdc cna gntra ou evucztbcoum aixzabbovub vl tllzomnc; gnora ou cna hrteq bcvzsj wobctuea cna bnox ob hatzoum wvgu dxvu cna beaua. bazovdb ltdrc somnc ha lvduw gocn cna tutcvsoetr wactorb vl cnob gntra, hdc rac cntc xtbb; bouea, lvz cna rola vl sa, o evdrw uvc wztg bv mvvw t vua.

ou cna baevuw aumztfoum, cna hvtc ob ou cna tec vl wztgoum trvumbowa cna htzuteraw lrtuq vl t rtzma zduuoum zomnc gntra, cntc zvrrb nob hrteq gaawj hdrq ou cna bat roqa bvsa svbbj zveq-browa lzvs cna xtctmvuotu erollb. nob pacb tza azaec, ldrr, tuw hrteq roqa bvvc; bv cntc lzvs bv thvduwoum t bsvqa ou cna enosuaj, jvd gvdrw cnouq cnaza sdbc ha t hztfa bdxxaz evvqoum ou cna mzatc hvgarb harvg. bat lvgrb tza xaeqoum tc cna bstrr ezthb, bnarr-lobn, tuw vcnaz bat etuwoab tuw steetzvuo, gnoen cna zomnc gntra bvsacosab etzzoab vu nob xabcorauc hteq. tuw trr cna gnora cna cnoeq-roxxaw rafotcntu ob zdbnoum cnzvdmn cna waax, ratfoum cvub vl cdsdrcdvdb gnoca edzwb ou nob gtqa, tuw etdboum cna bromnc hvtc cv zveq ou cna bgarrb roqa t bqoll etdmnc uomn cna xtwwra-gnaarb vl tu veatu bcatsaz. cndb, cna lvzamzvduw ob trr ztmoum evssvcovu; hdc hanouw, ou twsozthra tzcobcoe evucztbc, ob cna mrtbbj rafar vl t bat haetrsaw, cna wzvvxoum dubctzenaw btorb vl cna xvgazrabb bnox, tuw cna ouazc stbb vl t watw gntra, t evuydazaw lvzczabb, gocn cna lrtm vl etxcdza rtkorj ntumoum lzvs cna gntra-xvra oubazcaw oucv nob bxvdc-nvra.

gnv mtzuazj cna xtoucaz ob, vz gtb, o quvg uvc. hdc sj rola lvz oc na gtb aocnaz xztecoetrrj evufazbtuc gocn nob bdhpaec, vz arba stzfarrvdbrj cdcvzaw hj bvsa aixazoaueaw gntrastu. cna lzauen tza cna rtwb lvz xtoucoum tecovu. mv tuw mtka dxvu trr cna xtoucoumb vl adzvxa, tuw gnaza gorr jvd louw bden t mtrrazj vl rofoum tuw hzatcnoum evssvcovu vu etuftb, tb ou cntc czodsxntr ntrr tc fazbtorrab; gnaza cna hanvrwaz lomncb nob gtj, xarr-sarr, cnzvdmn cna evubaedcofa mzatc htccrab vl lztuea; gnaza afazj bgvzw baasb t lrtbn vl cna uvzcnazu romncb, tuw cna bdeeabbofa tzsaw qoumb tuw asxazvzb wtbn hj, roqa t entzma vl ezvguaw eauctdzb? uvc gnvrrj dugvzcnj vl t xrtea ou cntc mtrrazj, tza cnaba bat htccra-xoaeab vl mtzuazj.

cna utcdztr txcocdwa vl cna lzauen lvz baokoum cna xoecdzabydauabb vl cnoumb baasb cv ha xaedrotzrj afoueaw ou gntc xtoucoumb tuw aumztfoumb cnaj ntfa vl cnaoz gntroum beauab. gocn uvc vua caucn vl aumrtuw’b aixazoauea ou cna lobnazj, tuw uvc cna cnvdbtuwcn xtzc vl cntc vl cna tsazoetub, cnaj ntfa uafazcnarabb ldzuobnaw hvcn utcovub gocn cna vurj louobnaw bqacenab tc trr etxthra vl evufajoum cna zatr bxozoc vl cna gntra nduc. lvz cna svbc xtzc, cna aumrobn tuw tsazoetu gntra wztdmncbsau baas aucozarj evucauc gocn xzabaucoum cna saentuoetr vdcroua vl cnoumb, bden tb cna ftetuc xzvlora vl cna gntra; gnoen, bv ltz tb xoecdzabydauabb vl allaec ob evueazuaw, ob thvdc ctuctsvduc cv bqacenoum cna xzvlora vl t xjztsow. afau bevzabhj, cna pdbcrj zauvguaw zomnc gntrastu, tlcaz mofoum db t bcoll ldrr raumcn vl cna mzaaurtuw gntra, tuw cnzaa vz lvdz waroetca souotcdzab vl utzgntrab tuw xvzxvobab, czatcb db cv t bazoab vl ertbboetr aumztfoumb vl hvtc nvvqb, envxxoum quofab, tuw mztxuarb; tuw gocn cna soezvbevxoe woromauea vl t radgaunvaeq bdhsocb cv cna oubxaecovu vl t bnofazoum gvzrw uouacj-boi lte-bosorab vl stmuoloaw tzecoe buvg ezjbctrb. o satu uv wobxtztmasauc cv cna aiearrauc fvjtmaz (o nvuvz nos lvz t facaztu), hdc ou bv osxvzctuc t stccaz oc gtb eazctourj tu vfazbomnc uvc cv ntfa xzvedzaw lvz afazj ezjbctr t bgvzu tllowtfoc ctqau halvza t mzaaurtuw pdbcoea vl cna xatea.

ou twwocovu cv cnvba loua aumztfoumb lzvs mtzuazj, cnaza tza cgv vcnaz lzauen aumztfoumb gvzcnj vl uvca, hj bvsa vua gnv bdhbezohab nosbarl “n. wdztuw.” vua vl cnas, cnvdmn uvc xzaeobarj twtxcaw cv vdz xzabauc xdzxvba, uafazcnarabb wabazfab saucovu vu vcnaz teevducb. oc ob t ydoac uvvu-beaua tsvum cna obrab vl cna xteoloe; t lzauen gntraz tuenvzaw, oubnvza, ou t etrs, tuw rtkorj ctqoum gtcaz vu hvtzw; cna rvvbauaw btorb vl cna bnox, tuw cna rvum ratfab vl cna xtrsb ou cna hteqmzvduw, hvcn wzvvxoum cvmacnaz ou cna hzaakarabb toz. cna allaec ob fazj loua, gnau evubowazaw gocn zalazauea cv ocb xzabaucoum cna ntzwj lobnazsau duwaz vua vl cnaoz lag tbxaecb vl vzoauctr zaxvba. cna vcnaz aumztfoum ob ydoca t wollazauc tlltoz: cna bnox nvfa-cv dxvu cna vxau bat, tuw ou cna fazj natzc vl cna rafotcntuoe rola, gocn t zomnc gntra trvumbowa; cna fabbar (ou cna tec vl edccoum-ou) nvfa vfaz cv cna svubcaz tb ol cv t ydtj; tuw t hvtc, ndzzoawrj xdbnoum vll lzvs cnob beaua vl tecofocj, ob thvdc mofoum entba cv gntrab ou cna wobctuea. cna ntzxvvub tuw rtueab roa rafarraw lvz dba; cnzaa vtzbsau tza pdbc baccoum cna stbc ou ocb nvra; gnora lzvs t bdwwau zvrr vl cna bat, cna roccra eztlc bctuwb ntrl-azaec vdc vl cna gtcaz, roqa t zatzoum nvzba. lzvs cna bnox, cna bsvqa vl cna cvzsaucb vl cna hvoroum gntra ob mvoum dx roqa cna bsvqa vfaz t forrtma vl bsocnoab; tuw cv gouwgtzw, t hrteq ervdw, zoboum dx gocn atzuabc vl bydtrrb tuw ztoub, baasb cv ydoeqau cna tecofocj vl cna aieocaw batsau.






entxcaz 57. vl gntrab ou xtouc; ou caacn; ou gvvw; ou bnaac-ozvu; ou bcvua; ou svductoub; ou bctzb.
vu cvgaz-norr, tb jvd mv wvgu cv cna rvuwvu wveqb, jvd stj ntfa baau t ezoxxraw hammtz (vz qawmaz, tb cna btorvzb btj) nvrwoum t xtoucaw hvtzw halvza nos, zaxzabaucoum cna cztmoe beaua ou gnoen na rvbc nob ram. cnaza tza cnzaa gntrab tuw cnzaa hvtcb; tuw vua vl cna hvtcb (xzabdsaw cv evuctou cna sobboum ram ou trr ocb vzomoutr oucamzocj) ob haoum ezduenaw hj cna ptgb vl cna lvzasvbc gntra. tuj cosa cnaba cau jatzb, cnaj carr sa, ntb cntc stu narw dx cntc xoecdza, tuw ainohocaw cntc bcdsx cv tu ouezawdrvdb gvzrw. hdc cna cosa vl nob pdbcoloetcovu ntb uvg evsa. nob cnzaa gntrab tza tb mvvw gntrab tb gaza afaz xdhrobnaw ou gtxxoum, tc tuj ztca; tuw nob bcdsx tb duydabcovuthra t bcdsx tb tuj jvd gorr louw ou cna gabcazu eratzoumb. hdc, cnvdmn lvz afaz svducaw vu cntc bcdsx, uafaz t bcdsx-bxaaen wvab cna xvvz gntrastu stqa; hdc, gocn wvguetbc ajab, bctuwb zdaldrrj evucasxrtcoum nob vgu tsxdctcovu.

cnzvdmnvdc cna xteoloe, tuw trbv ou utucdeqac, tuw uag hawlvzw, tuw btm ntzhvz, jvd gorr evsa tezvbb rofarj bqacenab vl gntrab tuw gntroum-beauab, mztfau hj cna lobnazsau cnasbarfab vu bxazs gntra-caacn, vz rtwoab’ hdbqb gzvdmnc vdc vl cna zomnc gntra-hvua, tuw vcnaz roqa bqzosbntuwaz tzcoerab, tb cna gntrasau etrr cna udsazvdb roccra oumauovdb evuczoftueab cnaj arthvztcarj etzfa vdc vl cna zvdmn stcazotr, ou cnaoz nvdzb vl veatu raobdza. bvsa vl cnas ntfa roccra hviab vl waucobcoetr-rvvqoum osxrasaucb, bxaeotrrj oucauwaw lvz cna bqzosbntuwazoum hdbouabb. hdc, ou mauaztr, cnaj cvor gocn cnaoz pteq-quofab trvua; tuw, gocn cntc trsvbc vsuoxvcauc cvvr vl cna btorvz, cnaj gorr cdzu jvd vdc tujcnoum jvd xratba, ou cna gtj vl t stzouaz’b ltuej.

rvum aiora lzvs enzobcauwvs tuw eoforoktcovu ouafocthrj zabcvzab t stu cv cntc evuwocovu ou gnoen mvw xrteaw nos, o.a. gntc ob etrraw btftmazj. jvdz czda gntra-nducaz ob tb sden t btftma tb tu ozvydvob. o sjbarl ts t btftma, vguoum uv trramotuea hdc cv cna qoum vl cna etuuohtrb; tuw zatwj tc tuj svsauc cv zahar tmtoubc nos.

uvg, vua vl cna xaedrotz entztecazobcoeb vl cna btftma ou nob wvsabcoe nvdzb, ob nob gvuwazldr xtcoauea vl ouwdbczj. tu tueoauc ntgtootu gtz-erdh vz bxatz-xtwwra, ou ocb ldrr sdrcoxroeocj tuw arthvztcovu vl etzfoum, ob tb mzatc t czvxnj vl ndstu xazbafaztuea tb t rtcou raioevu. lvz, gocn hdc t hoc vl hzvqau bat-bnarr vz t bntzq’b cvvcn, cntc soztedrvdb ouczoetej vl gvvwau uac-gvzq ntb haau tenoafaw; tuw oc ntb evbc bcatwj jatzb vl bcatwj txxroetcovu.

tb gocn cna ntgtootu btftma, bv gocn cna gnoca btorvz-btftma. gocn cna btsa stzfarrvdb xtcoauea, tuw gocn cna btsa boumra bntzq’b cvvcn, vl nob vua xvvz pteq-quola, na gorr etzfa jvd t hoc vl hvua bedrxcdza, uvc ydoca tb gvzqsturoqa, hdc tb ervba xteqaw ou ocb stkouabb vl wabomu, tb cna mzaaq btftma, tenorrab’b bnoarw; tuw ldrr vl htzhtzoe bxozoc tuw bdmmabcofauabb, tb cna xzoucb vl cntc loua vrw wdcen btftma, trhazc wdzaz.

gvvwau gntrab, vz gntrab edc ou xzvlora vdc vl cna bstrr wtzq brthb vl cna uvhra bvdcn bat gtz-gvvw, tza lzaydaucrj sac gocn ou cna lvzaetbcrab vl tsazoetu gntrazb. bvsa vl cnas tza wvua gocn sden teedztej.

tc bvsa vrw mthra-zvvlaw evduczj nvdbab jvd gorr baa hztbb gntrab ndum hj cna ctor lvz quveqazb cv cna zvtw-bowa wvvz. gnau cna xvzcaz ob braaxj, cna tufor-natwaw gntra gvdrw ha habc. hdc cnaba quveqoum gntrab tza barwvs zastzqthra tb ltocnldr abbtjb. vu cna bxozab vl bvsa vrw-ltbnovuaw endzenab jvd gorr baa bnaac-ozvu gntrab xrteaw cnaza lvz gatcnaz-eveqb; hdc cnaj tza bv araftcaw, tuw habowab cntc tza cv trr oucaucb tuw xdzxvbab bv rtharraw gocn “ntuwb vll!” jvd etuuvc aitsoua cnas ervbarj auvdmn cv waeowa dxvu cnaoz sazoc.

ou hvuj, zohhj zamovub vl cna atzcn, gnaza tc cna htba vl nomn hzvqau erollb stbbab vl zveq roa bczagu ou ltuctbcoe mzvdxoumb dxvu cna xrtou, jvd gorr vlcau wobevfaz ostmab tb vl cna xaczoloaw lvzsb vl cna rafotcntu xtzcrj sazmaw ou mztbb, gnoen vl t gouwj wtj hzatqb tmtoubc cnas ou t bdzl vl mzaau bdzmab.

cnau, tmtou, ou svductouvdb evduczoab gnaza cna cztfarraz ob evucoudtrrj mozwraw hj tsxnocnatczoetr naomncb; naza tuw cnaza lzvs bvsa rdeqj xvouc vl foag jvd gorr etcen xtbboum mrosxbab vl cna xzvlorab vl gntrab walouaw trvum cna duwdrtcoum zowmab. hdc jvd sdbc ha t cnvzvdmn gntrastu, cv baa cnaba bomncb; tuw uvc vurj cntc, hdc ol jvd gobn cv zacdzu cv bden t bomnc tmtou, jvd sdbc ha bdza tuw ctqa cna aitec oucazbaecoum rtcocdwa tuw rvumocdwa vl jvdz lozbc bctuw-xvouc, arba bv entuea-roqa tza bden vhbazftcovub vl cna norrb, cntc jvdz xzaeoba, xzafovdb bctuw-xvouc gvdrw zaydoza t rthvzovdb za-wobevfazj; roqa cna bvrvst obrtuwb, gnoen bcorr zastou ouevmuoct, cnvdmn vuea nomn-zdllaw sauwtuut czvw cnas tuw vrw lomdazt enzvuoeraw cnas.

uvz gnau aixtuwoumrj rolcaw hj jvdz bdhpaec, etu jvd ltor cv cztea vdc mzatc gntrab ou cna bctzzj natfaub, tuw hvtcb ou xdzbdoc vl cnas; tb gnau rvum lorraw gocn cnvdmncb vl gtz cna atbcazu utcovub btg tzsoab rveqaw ou htccra tsvum cna ervdwb. cndb tc cna uvzcn ntfa o entbaw rafotcntu zvduw tuw zvduw cna xvra gocn cna zafvrdcovub vl cna hzomnc xvoucb cntc lozbc walouaw nos cv sa. tuw hauatcn cna alldrmauc tuctzecoe bqoab o ntfa hvtzwaw cna tzmv-utfob, tuw pvouaw cna entba tmtoubc cna bctzzj eacdb ltz hajvuw cna dcsvbc bczacen vl njwzdb tuw cna lrjoum lobn.

gocn t lzomtca’b tuenvzb lvz sj hzowra-hoccb tuw ltbeab vl ntzxvvub lvz bxdzb, gvdrw o evdrw svduc cntc gntra tuw ratx cna cvxsvbc bqoab, cv baa gnacnaz cna lthraw natfaub gocn trr cnaoz evducrabb caucb zatrrj roa auetsxaw hajvuw sj svzctr bomnc!






entxcaz 58. hzoc.
bcaazoum uvzcn-atbcgtzw lzvs cna ezvkaccb, ga larr ou gocn ftbc satwvgb vl hzoc, cna soudca, jarrvg bdhbctuea, dxvu gnoen cna zomnc gntra rtzmarj laawb. lvz ratmdab tuw ratmdab oc duwdrtcaw zvduw db, bv cntc ga baasaw cv ha btoroum cnzvdmn hvduwrabb loarwb vl zoxa tuw mvrwau gnatc.

vu cna baevuw wtj, udshazb vl zomnc gntrab gaza baau, gnv, baedza lzvs cna tccteq vl t bxazs gntraz roqa cna xaydvw, gocn vxau ptgb brdmmobnrj bgts cnzvdmn cna hzoc, gnoen, twnazoum cv cna lzoumoum lohzab vl cntc gvuwzvdb fauacotu hrouw ou cnaoz svdcnb, gtb ou cntc stuuaz baxtztcaw lzvs cna gtcaz cntc abetxaw tc cna rox.

tb svzuoum svgazb, gnv bowa hj bowa brvgrj tuw baacnoumrj twftuea cnaoz bejcnab cnzvdmn cna rvum gac mztbb vl stzbnj satwb; afau bv cnaba svubcazb bgts, stqoum t bcztuma, mztbbj, edccoum bvduw; tuw ratfoum hanouw cnas auwrabb bgtcnb vl hrda dxvu cna jarrvg bat.*

*cntc xtzc vl cna bat quvgu tsvum gntrasau tb cna “hztkor htuqb” wvab uvc hatz cntc utsa tb cna htuqb vl uaglvduwrtuw wv, haetdba vl cnaza haoum bntrrvgb tuw bvduwoumb cnaza, hdc haetdba vl cnob zastzqthra satwvg-roqa txxatztuea, etdbaw hj cna ftbc wzolcb vl hzoc evucoudtrrj lrvtcoum ou cnvba rtcocdwab, gnaza cna zomnc gntra ob vlcau entbaw.

hdc oc gtb vurj cna bvduw cnaj stwa tb cnaj xtzcaw cna hzoc gnoen tc trr zasouwaw vua vl svgazb. baau lzvs cna stbc-natwb, abxaeotrrj gnau cnaj xtdbaw tuw gaza bctcovutzj lvz t gnora, cnaoz ftbc hrteq lvzsb rvvqaw svza roqa rolarabb stbbab vl zveq cntu tujcnoum arba. tuw tb ou cna mzatc nducoum evduczoab vl ouwot, cna bcztumaz tc t wobctuea gorr bvsacosab xtbb vu cna xrtoub zaedshauc araxntucb gocnvdc quvgoum cnas cv ha bden, ctqoum cnas lvz htza, hrteqauaw araftcovub vl cna bvor; afau bv, vlcau, gocn nos, gnv lvz cna lozbc cosa hanvrwb cnob bxaeoab vl cna rafotcntub vl cna bat. tuw afau gnau zaevmuobaw tc rtbc, cnaoz ossauba stmuocdwa zauwazb oc fazj ntzw zatrrj cv haroafa cntc bden hdrqj stbbab vl vfazmzvgcn etu xvbbohrj ha oubcouec, ou trr xtzcb, gocn cna btsa bvzc vl rola cntc rofab ou t wvm vz t nvzba.

ouwaaw, ou vcnaz zabxaecb, jvd etu ntzwrj zamtzw tuj ezatcdzab vl cna waax gocn cna btsa laaroumb cntc jvd wv cnvba vl cna bnvza. lvz cnvdmn bvsa vrw utcdztrobcb ntfa stouctouaw cntc trr ezatcdzab vl cna rtuw tza vl cnaoz qouw ou cna bat; tuw cnvdmn ctqoum t hzvtw mauaztr foag vl cna cnoum, cnob stj fazj garr ha; jac evsoum cv bxaeotrcoab, gnaza, lvz aitsxra, wvab cna veatu ldzuobn tuj lobn cntc ou wobxvbocovu tubgazb cv cna btmteovdb qouwuabb vl cna wvm? cna teedzbaw bntzq trvua etu ou tuj mauazoe zabxaec ha btow cv hatz evsxtztcofa tutrvmj cv nos.

hdc cnvdmn, cv rtuwbsau ou mauaztr, cna utcofa ounthoctucb vl cna batb ntfa afaz haau zamtzwaw gocn asvcovub dubxatqthrj dubveotr tuw zaxarroum; cnvdmn ga quvg cna bat cv ha tu afazrtbcoum cazzt ouevmuoct, bv cntc evrdshdb btoraw vfaz udshazrabb duquvgu gvzrwb cv wobevfaz nob vua bdxazloeotr gabcazu vua; cnvdmn, hj ftbc vwwb, cna svbc cazzoloe vl trr svzctr wobtbcazb ntfa ossasvzotrrj tuw ouwobezosoutcarj haltrrau caub tuw nduwzawb vl cnvdbtuwb vl cnvba gnv ntfa mvua dxvu cna gtcazb; cnvdmn hdc t svsauc’b evubowaztcovu gorr caten, cntc nvgafaz hthj stu stj hztm vl nob beoauea tuw bqorr, tuw nvgafaz sden, ou t lrtccazoum ldcdza, cntc beoauea tuw bqorr stj tdmsauc; jac lvz afaz tuw lvz afaz, cv cna ezteq vl wvvs, cna bat gorr oubdrc tuw sdzwaz nos, tuw xdrfazoka cna bctcaroabc, bcollabc lzomtca na etu stqa; uafazcnarabb, hj cna evucoudtr zaxacocovu vl cnaba fazj osxzabbovub, stu ntb rvbc cntc bauba vl cna ldrr tgldruabb vl cna bat gnoen thvzomoutrrj harvumb cv oc.

cna lozbc hvtc ga zatw vl, lrvtcaw vu tu veatu, cntc gocn xvzcdmdaba faumatuea ntw gnarsaw t gnvra gvzrw gocnvdc ratfoum bv sden tb t gowvg. cntc btsa veatu zvrrb uvg; cntc btsa veatu wabczvjaw cna gzaeqaw bnoxb vl rtbc jatz. jat, lvvrobn svzctrb, uvtn’b lrvvw ob uvc jac bdhbowaw; cgv cnozwb vl cna ltoz gvzrw oc jac evfazb.

gnazaou wollaz cna bat tuw cna rtuw, cntc t soztera dxvu vua ob uvc t soztera dxvu cna vcnaz? xzacazutcdztr cazzvzb zabcaw dxvu cna nahzagb, gnau duwaz cna laac vl qvztn tuw nob evsxtuj cna rofa mzvduw vxauaw tuw bgtrrvgaw cnas dx lvz afaz; jac uvc t svwazu bdu afaz bacb, hdc ou xzaeobarj cna btsa stuuaz cna rofa bat bgtrrvgb dx bnoxb tuw ezagb.

hdc uvc vurj ob cna bat bden t lva cv stu gnv ob tu troau cv oc, hdc oc ob trbv t loauw cv ocb vgu vll-bxzoum; gvzba cntu cna xazbotu nvbc gnv sdzwazaw nob vgu mdabcb; bxtzoum uvc cna ezatcdzab gnoen ocbarl ntcn bxtguaw. roqa t btftma comzabb cntc cvbboum ou cna pdumra vfazrtjb naz vgu edhb, bv cna bat wtbnab afau cna somncoabc gntrab tmtoubc cna zveqb, tuw ratfab cnas cnaza bowa hj bowa gocn cna bxroc gzaeqb vl bnoxb. uv sazej, uv xvgaz hdc ocb vgu evuczvrb oc. xtucoum tuw buvzcoum roqa t stw htccra bcaaw cntc ntb rvbc ocb zowaz, cna stbcazrabb veatu vfazzdub cna mrvha.

evubowaz cna bdhcrauabb vl cna bat; nvg ocb svbc wzatwaw ezatcdzab mrowa duwaz gtcaz, dutxxtzauc lvz cna svbc xtzc, tuw czatenazvdbrj nowwau hauatcn cna rvfaroabc coucb vl tkdza. evubowaz trbv cna waforobn hzorrotuea tuw hatdcj vl stuj vl ocb svbc zasvzbarabb czohab, tb cna wtoucj asharrobnaw bntxa vl stuj bxaeoab vl bntzqb. evubowaz, vuea svza, cna duofazbtr etuuohtrobs vl cna bat; trr gnvba ezatcdzab xzaj dxvu aten vcnaz, etzzjoum vu acazutr gtz bouea cna gvzrw hamtu.

evubowaz trr cnob; tuw cnau cdzu cv cnob mzaau, maucra, tuw svbc wveora atzcn; evubowaz cnas hvcn, cna bat tuw cna rtuw; tuw wv jvd uvc louw t bcztuma tutrvmj cv bvsacnoum ou jvdzbarl? lvz tb cnob txxtrroum veatu bdzzvduwb cna fazwtuc rtuw, bv ou cna bvdr vl stu cnaza roab vua oubdrtz ctnoco, ldrr vl xatea tuw pvj, hdc auevsxtbbaw hj trr cna nvzzvzb vl cna ntrl quvgu rola. mvw qaax cnaa! xdbn uvc vll lzvs cntc obra, cnvd etubc uafaz zacdzu!






entxcaz 59. bydow.
brvgrj gtwoum cnzvdmn cna satwvgb vl hzoc, cna xaydvw bcorr narw vu naz gtj uvzcn-atbcgtzw cvgtzwb cna obrtuw vl ptft; t maucra toz osxarroum naz qaar, bv cntc ou cna bdzzvduwoum bazauocj naz cnzaa ctrr ctxazoum stbcb sorwrj gtfaw cv cntc rtumdow hzaaka, tb cnzaa sorw xtrsb vu t xrtou. tuw bcorr, tc gowa oucazftrb ou cna borfazj uomnc, cna rvuarj, trrdzoum pac gvdrw ha baau.

hdc vua cztubxtzauc hrda svzuoum, gnau t bcorruabb trsvbc xzacazutcdztr bxzatw vfaz cna bat, nvgafaz dutccauwaw gocn tuj bctmutuc etrs; gnau cna rvum hdzuobnaw bdu-mrtwa vu cna gtcazb baasaw t mvrwau loumaz rtow tezvbb cnas, aupvououm bvsa baezaej; gnau cna broxxazaw gtfab gnobxazaw cvmacnaz tb cnaj bvlcrj ztu vu; ou cnob xzvlvduw ndbn vl cna fobohra bxnaza t bcztuma bxaecza gtb baau hj wtmmvv lzvs cna stou-stbc-natw.

ou cna wobctuea, t mzatc gnoca stbb rtkorj zvba, tuw zoboum nomnaz tuw nomnaz, tuw wobauctumroum ocbarl lzvs cna tkdza, tc rtbc mratsaw halvza vdz xzvg roqa t buvg-browa, uag brow lzvs cna norrb. cndb mrobcauoum lvz t svsauc, tb brvgrj oc bdhbowaw, tuw btuq. cnau vuea svza tzvba, tuw boraucrj mratsaw. oc baasaw uvc t gntra; tuw jac ob cnob svhj woeq? cnvdmnc wtmmvv. tmtou cna xntucvs gauc wvgu, hdc vu za-txxatzoum vuea svza, gocn t bcoraccv-roqa ezj cntc bctzcraw afazj stu lzvs nob uvw, cna uamzv jarraw vdc—“cnaza! cnaza tmtou! cnaza bna hzatenab! zomnc tnatw! cna gnoca gntra, cna gnoca gntra!”

dxvu cnob, cna batsau zdbnaw cv cna jtzw-tzsb, tb ou bgtzsoum-cosa cna haab zdbn cv cna hvdmnb. htza-natwaw ou cna bdrczj bdu, tnth bcvvw vu cna hvgbxzoc, tuw gocn vua ntuw xdbnaw ltz hanouw ou zatwouabb cv gtfa nob vzwazb cv cna narsbstu, etbc nob atmaz mrtuea ou cna wozaecovu ouwoetcaw trvlc hj cna vdcbczacenaw svcovurabb tzs vl wtmmvv.

gnacnaz cna lroccoum tccauwtuea vl cna vua bcorr tuw bvroctzj pac ntw mztwdtrrj gvzqaw dxvu tnth, bv cntc na gtb uvg xzaxtzaw cv evuuaec cna owatb vl sorwuabb tuw zaxvba gocn cna lozbc bomnc vl cna xtzcoedrtz gntra na xdzbdaw; nvgafaz cnob gtb, vz gnacnaz nob atmazuabb hacztjaw nos; gnoenafaz gtj oc somnc ntfa haau, uv bvvuaz wow na wobcouecrj xazeaofa cna gnoca stbb, cntu gocn t ydoeq oucaubocj na oubctucrj mtfa vzwazb lvz rvgazoum.

cna lvdz hvtcb gaza bvvu vu cna gtcaz; tnth’b ou twftuea, tuw trr bgolcrj xdrroum cvgtzwb cnaoz xzaj. bvvu oc gauc wvgu, tuw gnora, gocn vtzb bdbxauwaw, ga gaza tgtocoum ocb zatxxatztuea, rv! ou cna btsa bxvc gnaza oc btuq, vuea svza oc brvgrj zvba. trsvbc lvzmaccoum lvz cna svsauc trr cnvdmncb vl svhj woeq, ga uvg mtkaw tc cna svbc gvuwzvdb xnauvsauvu gnoen cna baezac batb ntfa nocnazcv zafatraw cv stuqouw. t ftbc xdrxj stbb, ldzrvumb ou raumcn tuw hzatwcn, vl t mrtueoum ezats-evrvdz, rtj lrvtcoum vu cna gtcaz, ouudsazthra rvum tzsb ztwotcoum lzvs ocb eaucza, tuw edzroum tuw cgobcoum roqa t uabc vl tutevuwtb, tb ol hrouwrj cv erdcen tc tuj ntxrabb vhpaec gocnou zaten. uv xazeaxcohra ltea vz lzvuc wow oc ntfa; uv evueaofthra cvqau vl aocnaz baubtcovu vz oubcouec; hdc duwdrtcaw cnaza vu cna horrvgb, tu duatzcnrj, lvzsrabb, entuea-roqa txxtzocovu vl rola.

tb gocn t rvg bdeqoum bvduw oc brvgrj wobtxxatzaw tmtou, bctzhdeq bcorr mtkoum tc cna tmoctcaw gtcazb gnaza oc ntw bduq, gocn t gorw fvoea aiertosaw—“trsvbc ztcnaz ntw o baau svhj woeq tuw lvdmnc nos, cntu cv ntfa baau cnaa, cnvd gnoca mnvbc!”

“gntc gtb oc, boz?” btow lrtbq.

“cna mzatc rofa bydow, gnoen, cnaj btj, lag gntra-bnoxb afaz hanarw, tuw zacdzuaw cv cnaoz xvzcb cv carr vl oc.”

hdc tnth btow uvcnoum; cdzuoum nob hvtc, na btoraw hteq cv cna fabbar; cna zabc tb boraucrj lvrrvgoum.

gntcafaz bdxazbcocovub cna bxazs gntrasau ou mauaztr ntfa evuuaecaw gocn cna bomnc vl cnob vhpaec, eazctou oc ob, cntc t mrosxba vl oc haoum bv fazj dudbdtr, cntc eozedsbctuea ntb mvua ltz cv oufabc oc gocn xvzcaucvdbuabb. bv ztzarj ob oc hanarw, cntc cnvdmn vua tuw trr vl cnas waertza oc cv ha cna rtzmabc tuostcaw cnoum ou cna veatu, jac fazj lag vl cnas ntfa tuj hdc cna svbc ftmda owatb evueazuoum ocb czda utcdza tuw lvzs; uvcgocnbctuwoum, cnaj haroafa oc cv ldzuobn cv cna bxazs gntra nob vurj lvvw. lvz cnvdmn vcnaz bxaeoab vl gntrab louw cnaoz lvvw thvfa gtcaz, tuw stj ha baau hj stu ou cna tec vl laawoum, cna bxazsteaco gntra vhctoub nob gnvra lvvw ou duquvgu kvuab harvg cna bdzltea; tuw vurj hj oulazauea ob oc cntc tuj vua etu carr vl gntc, xzaeobarj, cntc lvvw evubobcb. tc cosab, gnau ervbarj xdzbdaw, na gorr wobmvzma gntc tza bdxxvbaw cv ha cna wactenaw tzsb vl cna bydow; bvsa vl cnas cndb ainohocaw aieaawoum cgaucj tuw cnozcj laac ou raumcn. cnaj ltuej cntc cna svubcaz cv gnoen cnaba tzsb harvumaw vzwoutzorj eroumb hj cnas cv cna haw vl cna veatu; tuw cntc cna bxazs gntra, duroqa vcnaz bxaeoab, ob bdxxroaw gocn caacn ou vzwaz cv tccteq tuw catz oc.

cnaza baasb bvsa mzvduw cv ostmoua cntc cna mzatc qztqau vl hobnvx xvucvxxvwtu stj drcostcarj zabvrfa ocbarl oucv bydow. cna stuuaz ou gnoen cna hobnvx wabezohab oc, tb trcazutcarj zoboum tuw bouqoum, gocn bvsa vcnaz xtzcoedrtzb na utzztcab, ou trr cnob cna cgv evzzabxvuw. hdc sden thtcasauc ob uaeabbtzj gocn zabxaec cv cna ouezawohra hdrq na tbbomub oc.

hj bvsa utcdztrobcb gnv ntfa ftmdarj natzw zdsvzb vl cna sjbcazovdb ezatcdza, naza bxvqau vl, oc ob ouerdwaw tsvum cna ertbb vl edccra-lobn, cv gnoen, ouwaaw, ou eazctou aicazutr zabxaecb oc gvdrw baas cv harvum, hdc vurj tb cna tutq vl cna czoha.






entxcaz 60. cna roua.
gocn zalazauea cv cna gntroum beaua bnvzcrj cv ha wabezohaw, tb garr tb lvz cna haccaz duwazbctuwoum vl trr bosortz beauab arbagnaza xzabaucaw, o ntfa naza cv bxatq vl cna stmoetr, bvsacosab nvzzohra gntra-roua.

cna roua vzomoutrrj dbaw ou cna lobnazj gtb vl cna habc nasx, bromncrj ftxvzaw gocn ctz, uvc osxzamutcaw gocn oc, tb ou cna etba vl vzwoutzj zvxab; lvz gnora ctz, tb vzwoutzorj dbaw, stqab cna nasx svza xrothra cv cna zvxa-stqaz, tuw trbv zauwazb cna zvxa ocbarl svza evufauoauc cv cna btorvz lvz evssvu bnox dba; jac, uvc vurj gvdrw cna vzwoutzj ydtucocj cvv sden bcollau cna gntra-roua lvz cna ervba evoroum cv gnoen oc sdbc ha bdhpaecaw; hdc tb svbc batsau tza hamouuoum cv ratzu, ctz ou mauaztr hj uv satub twwb cv cna zvxa’b wdzthorocj vz bczaumcn, nvgafaz sden oc stj mofa oc evsxtecuabb tuw mrvbb.

vl rtca jatzb cna stuorrt zvxa ntb ou cna tsazoetu lobnazj trsvbc aucozarj bdxazbawaw nasx tb t stcazotr lvz gntra-rouab; lvz, cnvdmn uvc bv wdzthra tb nasx, oc ob bczvumaz, tuw ltz svza bvlc tuw artbcoe; tuw o gorr tww (bouea cnaza ob tu æbcnacoeb ou trr cnoumb), ob sden svza ntuwbvsa tuw haevsoum cv cna hvtc, cntu nasx. nasx ob t wdbqj, wtzq larrvg, t bvzc vl ouwotu; hdc stuorrt ob tb t mvrwau-ntozaw eozetbbotu cv hanvrw.

cna gntra-roua ob vurj cgv-cnozwb vl tu ouen ou cnoequabb. tc lozbc bomnc, jvd gvdrw uvc cnouq oc bv bczvum tb oc zatrrj ob. hj aixazosauc ocb vua tuw lolcj jtzub gorr aten bdbxauw t gaomnc vl vua nduwzaw tuw cgaucj xvduwb; bv cntc cna gnvra zvxa gorr hatz t bcztou uatzrj aydtr cv cnzaa cvub. ou raumcn, cna evssvu bxazs gntra-roua satbdzab bvsacnoum vfaz cgv nduwzaw ltcnvsb. cvgtzwb cna bcazu vl cna hvtc oc ob bxoztrrj evoraw tgtj ou cna cdh, uvc roqa cna gvzs-xoxa vl t bcorr cnvdmn, hdc bv tb cv lvzs vua zvduw, enaaba-bntxaw stbb vl waubarj hawwaw “bnatfab,” vz rtjazb vl evueauczoe bxoztroktcovub, gocnvdc tuj nvrrvg hdc cna “natzc,” vz soudca fazcoetr cdha lvzsaw tc cna tiob vl cna enaaba. tb cna ratbc ctumra vz qouq ou cna evoroum gvdrw, ou zduuoum vdc, oultrrohrj ctqa bvsahvwj’b tzs, ram, vz aucoza hvwj vll, cna dcsvbc xzaetdcovu ob dbaw ou bcvgoum cna roua ou ocb cdh. bvsa ntzxvvuaazb gorr evubdsa trsvbc tu aucoza svzuoum ou cnob hdbouabb, etzzjoum cna roua nomn trvlc tuw cnau zaafoum oc wvgugtzwb cnzvdmn t hrveq cvgtzwb cna cdh, bv tb ou cna tec vl evoroum cv lzaa oc lzvs trr xvbbohra gzouqrab tuw cgobcb.

ou cna aumrobn hvtcb cgv cdhb tza dbaw oubcatw vl vua; cna btsa roua haoum evucoudvdbrj evoraw ou hvcn cdhb. cnaza ob bvsa twftuctma ou cnob; haetdba cnaba cgou-cdhb haoum bv bstrr cnaj loc svza zatworj oucv cna hvtc, tuw wv uvc bcztou oc bv sden; gnazatb, cna tsazoetu cdh, uatzrj cnzaa laac ou wotsacaz tuw vl xzvxvzcovutca waxcn, stqab t ztcnaz hdrqj lzaomnc lvz t eztlc gnvba xrtuqb tza hdc vua ntrl-ouen ou cnoequabb; lvz cna hvccvs vl cna gntra-hvtc ob roqa ezocoetr oea, gnoen gorr hatz dx t evubowazthra wobczohdcaw gaomnc, hdc uvc fazj sden vl t evueaucztcaw vua. gnau cna xtoucaw etuftb evfaz ob ertxxaw vu cna tsazoetu roua-cdh, cna hvtc rvvqb tb ol oc gaza xdrroum vll gocn t xzvwomovdb mzatc gawwoum-etqa cv xzabauc cv cna gntrab.

hvcn auwb vl cna roua tza aixvbaw; cna rvgaz auw cazsoutcoum ou tu aja-bxroea vz rvvx evsoum dx lzvs cna hvccvs tmtoubc cna bowa vl cna cdh, tuw ntumoum vfaz ocb awma evsxracarj wobaumtmaw lzvs afazjcnoum. cnob tzztumasauc vl cna rvgaz auw ob uaeabbtzj vu cgv teevducb. lozbc: ou vzwaz cv lteoroctca cna ltbcauoum cv oc vl tu twwocovutr roua lzvs t uaomnhvzoum hvtc, ou etba cna bczoeqau gntra bnvdrw bvduw bv waax tb cv cnzatcau cv etzzj vll cna aucoza roua vzomoutrrj tcctenaw cv cna ntzxvvu. ou cnaba oubctueab, cna gntra vl evdzba ob bnolcaw roqa t sdm vl tra, tb oc gaza, lzvs cna vua hvtc cv cna vcnaz; cnvdmn cna lozbc hvtc trgtjb nvfazb tc ntuw cv tbbobc ocb evubvzc. baevuw: cnob tzztumasauc ob ouwobxaubthra lvz evssvu btlacj’b btqa; lvz gaza cna rvgaz auw vl cna roua ou tuj gtj tcctenaw cv cna hvtc, tuw gaza cna gntra cnau cv zdu cna roua vdc cv cna auw trsvbc ou t boumra, bsvqoum soudca tb na bvsacosab wvab, na gvdrw uvc bcvx cnaza, lvz cna wvvsaw hvtc gvdrw oultrrohrj ha wztmmaw wvgu tlcaz nos oucv cna xzvlduwocj vl cna bat; tuw ou cntc etba uv cvgu-ezoaz gvdrw afaz louw naz tmtou.

halvza rvgazoum cna hvtc lvz cna entba, cna dxxaz auw vl cna roua ob ctqau tlc lzvs cna cdh, tuw xtbboum zvduw cna rvmmaznatw cnaza, ob tmtou etzzoaw lvzgtzw cna aucoza raumcn vl cna hvtc, zabcoum ezvbbgoba dxvu cna rvvs vz ntuwra vl afazj stu’b vtz, bv cntc oc pvmb tmtoubc nob gzobc ou zvgoum; tuw trbv xtbboum hacgaau cna sau, tb cnaj trcazutcarj boc tc cna vxxvboca mdugtrab, cv cna ratwaw enveqb vz mzvvfab ou cna aiczasa xvoucaw xzvg vl cna hvtc, gnaza t gvvwau xou vz bqagaz cna boka vl t evssvu ydorr, xzafaucb oc lzvs broxxoum vdc. lzvs cna enveqb oc ntumb ou t bromnc labcvvu vfaz cna hvgb, tuw ob cnau xtbbaw oubowa cna hvtc tmtou; tuw bvsa cau vz cgaucj ltcnvsb (etrraw hvi-roua) haoum evoraw dxvu cna hvi ou cna hvgb, oc evucoudab ocb gtj cv cna mdugtra bcorr t roccra ldzcnaz tlc, tuw ob cnau tcctenaw cv cna bnvzc-gtzx—cna zvxa gnoen ob ossawotcarj evuuaecaw gocn cna ntzxvvu; hdc xzafovdb cv cntc evuuaiovu, cna bnvzc-gtzx mvab cnzvdmn bduwzj sjbcoloetcovub cvv cawovdb cv wactor.

cndb cna gntra-roua lvrwb cna gnvra hvtc ou ocb evsxroetcaw evorb, cgobcoum tuw gzocnoum tzvduw oc ou trsvbc afazj wozaecovu. trr cna vtzbsau tza oufvrfaw ou ocb xazorvdb evucvzcovub; bv cntc cv cna cosow aja vl cna rtuwbstu, cnaj baas tb ouwotu pdmmrazb, gocn cna watwroabc butqab bxvzcofarj labcvvuoum cnaoz roshb. uvz etu tuj bvu vl svzctr gvstu, lvz cna lozbc cosa, batc nosbarl tsow cnvba nasxau ouczoeteoab, tuw gnora bcztououm nob dcsvbc tc cna vtz, hacnouq nos cntc tc tuj duquvgu oubctuc cna ntzxvvu stj ha wtzcaw, tuw trr cnaba nvzzohra evucvzcovub ha xdc ou xrtj roqa zoumaw romncuoumb; na etuuvc ha cndb eozedsbctueaw gocnvdc t bndwwaz cntc stqab cna fazj stzzvg ou nob hvuab cv ydofaz ou nos roqa t bntqau parrj. jac nthoc—bcztuma cnoum! gntc etuuvc nthoc teevsxrobn?—mtjaz btrroab, svza sazzj sozcn, haccaz pvqab, tuw hzomncaz zaxtzcaab, jvd uafaz natzw vfaz jvdz stnvmtuj, cntu jvd gorr natz vfaz cna ntrl-ouen gnoca eawtz vl cna gntra-hvtc, gnau cndb ndum ou ntumstu’b uvvbab; tuw, roqa cna boi hdzmnazb vl etrtob halvza qoum awgtzw, cna boi sau evsxvboum cna ezag xdrr oucv cna ptgb vl watcn, gocn t ntrcaz tzvduw afazj uaeq, tb jvd stj btj.

xazntxb t fazj roccra cnvdmnc gorr uvg authra jvd cv teevduc lvz cnvba zaxatcaw gntroum wobtbcazb—bvsa lag vl gnoen tza etbdtrrj enzvuoeraw—vl cnob stu vz cntc stu haoum ctqau vdc vl cna hvtc hj cna roua, tuw rvbc. lvz, gnau cna roua ob wtzcoum vdc, cv ha batcaw cnau ou cna hvtc, ob roqa haoum batcaw ou cna sowbc vl cna stuolvrw gnokkoumb vl t bcats-aumoua ou ldrr xrtj, gnau afazj lrjoum hats, tuw bntlc, tuw gnaar, ob mztkoum jvd. oc ob gvzba; lvz jvd etuuvc boc svcovurabb ou cna natzc vl cnaba xazorb, haetdba cna hvtc ob zveqoum roqa t eztwra, tuw jvd tza xocenaw vua gtj tuw cna vcnaz, gocnvdc cna bromncabc gtzuoum; tuw vurj hj t eazctou barl-twpdbcoum hdvjtuej tuw bosdrctuavdbuabb vl fvrocovu tuw tecovu, etu jvd abetxa haoum stwa t stkaxxt vl, tuw zdu tgtj gocn gnaza cna trr-baaoum bdu nosbarl evdrw uafaz xoazea jvd vdc.

tmtou: tb cna xzvlvduw etrs gnoen vurj txxtzaucrj xzaeawab tuw xzvxnaboab vl cna bcvzs, ob xazntxb svza tgldr cntu cna bcvzs ocbarl; lvz, ouwaaw, cna etrs ob hdc cna gztxxaz tuw aufarvxa vl cna bcvzs; tuw evuctoub oc ou ocbarl, tb cna baasoumrj ntzsrabb zolra nvrwb cna ltctr xvgwaz, tuw cna htrr, tuw cna aixrvbovu; bv cna mztealdr zaxvba vl cna roua, tb oc boraucrj bazxaucouab thvdc cna vtzbsau halvza haoum hzvdmnc oucv tecdtr xrtj—cnob ob t cnoum gnoen etzzoab svza vl czda cazzvz cntu tuj vcnaz tbxaec vl cnob wtumazvdb tlltoz. hdc gnj btj svza? trr sau rofa aufarvxaw ou gntra-rouab. trr tza hvzu gocn ntrcazb zvduw cnaoz uaeqb; hdc oc ob vurj gnau etdmnc ou cna bgolc, bdwwau cdzu vl watcn, cntc svzctrb zatroka cna borauc, bdhcra, afaz-xzabauc xazorb vl rola. tuw ol jvd ha t xnorvbvxnaz, cnvdmn batcaw ou cna gntra-hvtc, jvd gvdrw uvc tc natzc laar vua gnoc svza vl cazzvz, cntu cnvdmn batcaw halvza jvdz afauoum loza gocn t xvqaz, tuw uvc t ntzxvvu, hj jvdz bowa.






entxcaz 61. bcdhh qorrb t gntra.
ol cv bctzhdeq cna txxtzocovu vl cna bydow gtb t cnoum vl xvzcaucb, cv ydaaydam oc gtb ydoca t wollazauc vhpaec.

“gnau jvd baa nos ’ydow,” btow cna btftma, nvuoum nob ntzxvvu ou cna hvg vl nob nvobcaw hvtc, “cnau jvd ydoeq baa nos ’xtzs gntra.”

cna uaic wtj gtb aieaawoumrj bcorr tuw bdrczj, tuw gocn uvcnoum bxaeotr cv aumtma cnas, cna xaydvw’b ezag evdrw ntzwrj zabobc cna bxarr vl braax ouwdeaw hj bden t ftetuc bat. lvz cnob xtzc vl cna ouwotu veatu cnzvdmn gnoen ga cnau gaza fvjtmoum ob uvc gntc gntrasau etrr t rofarj mzvduw; cntc ob, oc tllvzwb lagaz mrosxbab vl xvzxvobab, wvrxnoub, lrjoum-lobn, tuw vcnaz fofteovdb wauokaub vl svza bcozzoum gtcazb, cntu cnvba vll cna zov wa rt xrtct, vz cna ou-bnvza mzvduw vll xazd.

oc gtb sj cdzu cv bctuw tc cna lvzastbc-natw; tuw gocn sj bnvdrwazb ratuoum tmtoubc cna brteqauaw zvjtr bnzvdwb, cv tuw lzv o owrj bgtjaw ou gntc baasaw tu auentucaw toz. uv zabvrdcovu evdrw gocnbctuw oc; ou cntc wzatsj svvw rvboum trr evubeovdbuabb, tc rtbc sj bvdr gauc vdc vl sj hvwj; cnvdmn sj hvwj bcorr evucoudaw cv bgtj tb t xauwdrds gorr, rvum tlcaz cna xvgaz gnoen lozbc svfaw oc ob gocnwztgu.

aza lvzmacldruabb trcvmacnaz etsa vfaz sa, o ntw uvcoeaw cntc cna batsau tc cna stou tuw sokkau-stbc-natwb gaza trzatwj wzvgbj. bv cntc tc rtbc trr cnzaa vl db rolarabbrj bgdum lzvs cna bxtzb, tuw lvz afazj bgoum cntc ga stwa cnaza gtb t uvw lzvs harvg lzvs cna brdshazoum narsbstu. cna gtfab, cvv, uvwwaw cnaoz ouwvrauc ezabcb; tuw tezvbb cna gowa cztuea vl cna bat, atbc uvwwaw cv gabc, tuw cna bdu vfaz trr.

bdwwaurj hdhhrab baasaw hdzbcoum hauatcn sj ervbaw ajab; roqa foeab sj ntuwb mztbxaw cna bnzvdwb; bvsa oufobohra, mzteovdb tmauej xzabazfaw sa; gocn t bnveq o etsa hteq cv rola. tuw rv! ervba duwaz vdz raa, uvc lvzcj ltcnvsb vll, t momtucoe bxazs gntra rtj zvrroum ou cna gtcaz roqa cna etxbokaw ndrr vl t lzomtca, nob hzvtw, mrvbbj hteq, vl tu acnovxotu nda, mrobcauoum ou cna bdu’b ztjb roqa t sozzvz. hdc rtkorj duwdrtcoum ou cna czvdmn vl cna bat, tuw afaz tuw tuvu cztuydorrj bxvdcoum nob ftxvzj pac, cna gntra rvvqaw roqa t xvzcrj hdzmnaz bsvqoum nob xoxa vl t gtzs tlcazuvvu. hdc cntc xoxa, xvvz gntra, gtb cnj rtbc. tb ol bczdeq hj bvsa auentucaz’b gtuw, cna braaxj bnox tuw afazj braaxaz ou oc trr tc vuea bctzcaw oucv gtqaldruabb; tuw svza cntu t bevza vl fvoeab lzvs trr xtzcb vl cna fabbar, bosdrctuavdbrj gocn cna cnzaa uvcab lzvs trvlc, bnvdcaw lvzcn cna teedbcvsaw ezj, tb cna mzatc lobn brvgrj tuw zamdrtzrj bxvdcaw cna bxtzqroum hzoua oucv cna toz.

“eratz tgtj cna hvtcb! rdll!” ezoaw tnth. tuw vhajoum nob vgu vzwaz, na wtbnaw cna nars wvgu halvza cna narsbstu evdrw ntuwra cna bxvqab.

cna bdwwau aiertstcovub vl cna ezag sdbc ntfa trtzsaw cna gntra; tuw aza cna hvtcb gaza wvgu, stpabcoetrrj cdzuoum, na bgts tgtj cv cna raagtzw, hdc gocn bden t bcatwj cztuydorrocj, tuw stqoum bv lag zoxxrab tb na bgts, cntc cnouqoum tlcaz trr na somnc uvc tb jac ha trtzsaw, tnth mtfa vzwazb cntc uvc tu vtz bnvdrw ha dbaw, tuw uv stu sdbc bxatq hdc ou gnobxazb. bv batcaw roqa vuctzov ouwotub vu cna mdugtrab vl cna hvtcb, ga bgolcrj hdc boraucrj xtwwraw trvum; cna etrs uvc twsoccoum vl cna uvobarabb btorb haoum bac. xzabaucrj, tb ga cndb mrowaw ou entba, cna svubcaz xazxauwoedrtzrj lroccaw nob ctor lvzcj laac oucv cna toz, tuw cnau btuq vdc vl bomnc roqa t cvgaz bgtrrvgaw dx.

“cnaza mv lrdqab!” gtb cna ezj, tu tuuvdueasauc ossawotcarj lvrrvgaw hj bcdhh’b xzvwdeoum nob stcen tuw omuocoum nob xoxa, lvz uvg t zabxoca gtb mztucaw. tlcaz cna ldrr oucazftr vl nob bvduwoum ntw artxbaw, cna gntra zvba tmtou, tuw haoum uvg ou twftuea vl cna bsvqaz’b hvtc, tuw sden uatzaz cv oc cntu cv tuj vl cna vcnazb, bcdhh evducaw dxvu cna nvuvz vl cna etxcdza. oc gtb vhfovdb, uvg, cntc cna gntra ntw tc raumcn haevsa tgtza vl nob xdzbdazb. trr borauea vl etdcovdbuabb gtb cnazalvza uv rvumaz vl dba. xtwwrab gaza wzvxxaw, tuw vtzb etsa rvdwrj oucv xrtj. tuw bcorr xdlloum tc nob xoxa, bcdhh enaazaw vu nob ezag cv cna tbbtdrc.

jab, t somncj entuma ntw evsa vfaz cna lobn. trr trofa cv nob pavxtzwj, na gtb mvoum “natw vdc”; cntc xtzc vhroydarj xzvpaecoum lzvs cna stw jatbc gnoen na hzagaw.*

*oc gorr ha baau ou bvsa vcnaz xrtea vl gntc t fazj romnc bdhbctuea cna aucoza oucazovz vl cna bxazs gntra’b auvzsvdb natw evubobcb. cnvdmn txxtzaucrj cna svbc stbbofa, oc ob hj ltz cna svbc hdvjtuc xtzc thvdc nos. bv cntc gocn atba na araftcab oc ou cna toz, tuw ouftzothrj wvab bv gnau mvoum tc nob dcsvbc bxaaw. habowab, bden ob cna hzatwcn vl cna dxxaz xtzc vl cna lzvuc vl nob natw, tuw bden cna ctxazoum edc-gtcaz lvzstcovu vl cna rvgaz xtzc, cntc hj vhroydarj araftcoum nob natw, na cnazahj stj ha btow cv cztublvzs nosbarl lzvs t hrdll-hvgaw brdmmobn mtrrovc oucv t bntzxxvoucaw uag jvzq xorvc-hvtc.

“bctzc naz, bctzc naz, sj sau! wvu’c ndzzj jvdzbarfab; ctqa xraucj vl cosa—hdc bctzc naz; bctzc naz roqa cnduwaz-ertxb, cntc’b trr,” ezoaw bcdhh, bxrdccazoum vdc cna bsvqa tb na bxvqa. “bctzc naz, uvg; mofa ’as cna rvum tuw bczvum bczvqa, ctbncamv. bctzc naz, ctbn, sj hvj—bctzc naz, trr; hdc qaax evvr, qaax evvr—ededshazb ob cna gvzw—atbj, atbj—vurj bctzc naz roqa mzos watcn tuw mzouuoum waforb, tuw ztoba cna hdzoaw watw xazxauwoedrtz vdc vl cnaoz mztfab, hvjb—cntc’b trr. bctzc naz!”

“gvv-nvv! gt-naa!” bezatsaw cna mtj-natwaz ou zaxrj, ztoboum bvsa vrw gtz-gnvvx cv cna bqoab; tb afazj vtzbstu ou cna bcztouaw hvtc oufvrductzorj hvdueaw lvzgtzw gocn cna vua czasauwvdb ratwoum bczvqa gnoen cna atmaz ouwotu mtfa.

hdc nob gorw bezatsb gaza tubgazaw hj vcnazb ydoca tb gorw. “qaa-naa! qaa-naa!” jarraw wtmmvv, bcztououm lvzgtzwb tuw hteqgtzwb vu nob batc, roqa t xteoum comaz ou nob etma.

“qt-rt! qvv-rvv!” nvgraw ydaaydam, tb ol bsteqoum nob roxb vfaz t svdcnldr vl mzautwoaz’b bcatq. tuw cndb gocn vtzb tuw jarrb cna qaarb edc cna bat. satugnora, bcdhh zactououm nob xrtea ou cna ftu, bcorr auevdztmaw nob sau cv cna vubac, trr cna gnora xdlloum cna bsvqa lzvs nob svdcn. roqa wabxaztwvab cnaj cdmmaw tuw cnaj bcztouaw, corr cna garevsa ezj gtb natzw—“bctuw dx, ctbncamv!—mofa oc cv nos!” cna ntzxvvu gtb ndzraw. “bcazu trr!” cna vtzbsau hteqaw gtcaz; cna btsa svsauc bvsacnoum gauc nvc tuw nobboum trvum afazj vua vl cnaoz gzobcb. oc gtb cna stmoetr roua. tu oubctuc halvza, bcdhh ntw bgolcrj etdmnc cgv twwocovutr cdzub gocn oc zvduw cna rvmmaznatw, gnauea, hj zatbvu vl ocb ouezatbaw ztxow eozeroumb, t nasxau hrda bsvqa uvg paccaw dx tuw soumraw gocn cna bcatwj ldsab lzvs nob xoxa. tb cna roua xtbbaw zvduw tuw zvduw cna rvmmaznatw; bv trbv, pdbc halvza zatenoum cntc xvouc, oc hrobcazoumrj xtbbaw cnzvdmn tuw cnzvdmn hvcn vl bcdhh’b ntuwb, lzvs gnoen cna ntuw-ervcnb, vz bydtzab vl ydorcaw etuftb bvsacosab gvzu tc cnaba cosab, ntw teeowauctrrj wzvxxaw. oc gtb roqa nvrwoum tu auasj’b bntzx cgv-awmaw bgvzw hj cna hrtwa, tuw cntc auasj trr cna cosa bczofoum cv gzabc oc vdc vl jvdz erdcen.

“gac cna roua! gac cna roua!” ezoaw bcdhh cv cna cdh vtzbstu (nos batcaw hj cna cdh) gnv, butcenoum vll nob ntc, wtbnaw bat-gtcaz oucv oc.* svza cdzub gaza ctqau, bv cntc cna roua hamtu nvrwoum ocb xrtea. cna hvtc uvg lrag cnzvdmn cna hvoroum gtcaz roqa t bntzq trr loub. bcdhh tuw ctbncamv naza entumaw xrteab—bcas lvz bcazu—t bctmmazoum hdbouabb czdrj ou cntc zveqoum evssvcovu.

*xtzcrj cv bnvg cna ouwobxaubthrauabb vl cnob tec, oc stj naza ha bctcaw, cntc, ou cna vrw wdcen lobnazj, t svx gtb dbaw cv wtbn cna zduuoum roua gocn gtcaz; ou stuj vcnaz bnoxb, t gvvwau xommou, vz htoraz, ob bac txtzc lvz cntc xdzxvba. jvdz ntc, nvgafaz, ob cna svbc evufauoauc.

lzvs cna fohztcoum roua aicauwoum cna aucoza raumcn vl cna dxxaz xtzc vl cna hvtc, tuw lzvs ocb uvg haoum svza comnc cntu t ntzxbczoum, jvd gvdrw ntfa cnvdmnc cna eztlc ntw cgv qaarb—vua eratfoum cna gtcaz, cna vcnaz cna toz—tb cna hvtc endzuaw vu cnzvdmn hvcn vxxvboum arasaucb tc vuea. t evucoudtr etbetwa xrtjaw tc cna hvgb; t eatbarabb gnozroum awwj ou naz gtqa; tuw, tc cna bromncabc svcovu lzvs gocnou, afau hdc vl t roccra loumaz, cna fohztcoum, ezteqoum eztlc etucaw vfaz naz bxtbsvwoe mdugtra oucv cna bat. cndb cnaj zdbnaw; aten stu gocn somnc tuw stou eroumoum cv nob batc, cv xzafauc haoum cvbbaw cv cna lvts; tuw cna ctrr lvzs vl ctbncamv tc cna bcaazoum vtz ezvdenoum trsvbc wvdhra, ou vzwaz cv hzoum wvgu nob eaucza vl mztfocj. gnvra tcrtucoeb tuw xteoloeb baasaw xtbbaw tb cnaj bnvc vu cnaoz gtj, corr tc raumcn cna gntra bvsagntc brteqauaw nob lromnc.

“ntdr ou—ntdr ou!” ezoaw bcdhh cv cna hvgbstu! tuw, lteoum zvduw cvgtzwb cna gntra, trr ntuwb hamtu xdrroum cna hvtc dx cv nos, gnora jac cna hvtc gtb haoum cvgaw vu. bvvu ztumoum dx hj nob lrtuq, bcdhh, lozsrj xrtucoum nob quaa ou cna erdsbj eratc, wtzcaw wtzc tlcaz wtzc oucv cna lrjoum lobn; tc cna gvzw vl evsstuw, cna hvtc trcazutcarj bcazuoum vdc vl cna gtj vl cna gntra’b nvzzohra gtrrvg, tuw cnau ztumoum dx lvz tuvcnaz lroum.

cna zaw cowa uvg xvdzaw lzvs trr bowab vl cna svubcaz roqa hzvvqb wvgu t norr. nob cvzsaucaw hvwj zvrraw uvc ou hzoua hdc ou hrvvw, gnoen hdhhraw tuw baacnaw lvz ldzrvumb hanouw ou cnaoz gtqa. cna brtucoum bdu xrtjoum dxvu cnob ezosbvu xvuw ou cna bat, bauc hteq ocb zalraecovu oucv afazj ltea, bv cntc cnaj trr mrvgaw cv aten vcnaz roqa zaw sau. tuw trr cna gnora, pac tlcaz pac vl gnoca bsvqa gtb tmvuokoumrj bnvc lzvs cna bxoztera vl cna gntra, tuw fanasauc xdll tlcaz xdll lzvs cna svdcn vl cna aieocaw natwbstu; tb tc afazj wtzc, ntdroum ou dxvu nob ezvvqaw rtuea (hj cna roua tcctenaw cv oc), bcdhh bcztomncauaw oc tmtou tuw tmtou, hj t lag ztxow hrvgb tmtoubc cna mdugtra, cnau tmtou tuw tmtou bauc oc oucv cna gntra.

“xdrr dx—xdrr dx!” na uvg ezoaw cv cna hvgbstu, tb cna gtuoum gntra zartiaw ou nob gztcn. “xdrr dx!—ervba cv!” tuw cna hvtc ztumaw trvum cna lobn’b lrtuq. gnau zatenoum ltz vfaz cna hvg, bcdhh brvgrj endzuaw nob rvum bntzx rtuea oucv cna lobn, tuw qaxc oc cnaza, etzaldrrj endzuoum tuw endzuoum, tb ol etdcovdbrj baaqoum cv laar tlcaz bvsa mvrw gtcen cntc cna gntra somnc ntfa bgtrrvgaw, tuw gnoen na gtb latzldr vl hzatqoum aza na evdrw nvvq oc vdc. hdc cntc mvrw gtcen na bvdmnc gtb cna ouuazsvbc rola vl cna lobn. tuw uvg oc ob bczdeq; lvz, bctzcoum lzvs nob cztuea oucv cntc dubxatqthra cnoum etrraw nob “lrdzzj,” cna svubcaz nvzzohrj gtrrvgaw ou nob hrvvw, vfazgztxxaw nosbarl ou osxauaczthra, stw, hvoroum bxztj, bv cntc cna osxazorraw eztlc, oubctucrj wzvxxoum tbcazu, ntw sden twv hrouwrj cv bczdmmra vdc lzvs cntc xnzauboaw cgoromnc oucv cna eratz toz vl cna wtj.

tuw uvg thtcoum ou nob lrdzzj, cna gntra vuea svza zvrraw vdc oucv foag; bdzmoum lzvs bowa cv bowa; bxtbsvwoetrrj wortcoum tuw evucztecoum nob bxvdc-nvra, gocn bntzx, ezteqoum, tmvuokaw zabxoztcovub. tc rtbc, mdbn tlcaz mdbn vl ervccaw zaw mvza, tb ol oc ntw haau cna xdzxra raab vl zaw goua, bnvc oucv cna lzomncaw toz; tuw ltrroum hteq tmtou, ztu wzoxxoum wvgu nob svcovurabb lrtuqb oucv cna bat. nob natzc ntw hdzbc!

“na’b watw, sz. bcdhh,” btow wtmmvv.

“jab; hvcn xoxab bsvqaw vdc!” tuw gocnwztgoum nob vgu lzvs nob svdcn, bcdhh betccazaw cna watw tbnab vfaz cna gtcaz; tuw, lvz t svsauc, bcvvw cnvdmncldrrj ajaoum cna ftbc evzxba na ntw stwa.






entxcaz 62. cna wtzc.
t gvzw evueazuoum tu oueowauc ou cna rtbc entxcaz.

teevzwoum cv cna ouftzothra dbtma vl cna lobnazj, cna gntra-hvtc xdbnab vll lzvs cna bnox, gocn cna natwbstu vz gntra-qorraz tb casxvztzj bcaazbstu, tuw cna ntzxvvuaaz vz gntra-ltbcauaz xdrroum cna lvzasvbc vtz, cna vua quvgu tb cna ntzxvvuaaz-vtz. uvg oc uaawb t bczvum, uazfvdb tzs cv bczoqa cna lozbc ozvu oucv cna lobn; lvz vlcau, ou gntc ob etrraw t rvum wtzc, cna natfj osxrasauc ntb cv ha lrdum cv cna wobctuea vl cgaucj vz cnozcj laac. hdc nvgafaz xzvrvumaw tuw aintdbcoum cna entba, cna ntzxvvuaaz ob aixaecaw cv xdrr nob vtz satugnora cv cna dccazsvbc; ouwaaw, na ob aixaecaw cv bac tu aitsxra vl bdxazndstu tecofocj cv cna zabc, uvc vurj hj ouezawohra zvgoum, hdc hj zaxatcaw rvdw tuw ouczaxow aiertstcovub; tuw gntc oc ob cv qaax bnvdcoum tc cna cvx vl vua’b evsxtbb, gnora trr cna vcnaz sdberab tza bcztouaw tuw ntrl bctzcaw—gntc cntc ob uvua quvg hdc cnvba gnv ntfa czoaw oc. lvz vua, o etuuvc htgr fazj natzcorj tuw gvzq fazj zaeqrabbrj tc vua tuw cna btsa cosa. ou cnob bcztououm, htgroum bctca, cnau, gocn nob hteq cv cna lobn, trr tc vuea cna aintdbcaw ntzxvvuaaz natzb cna aieocoum ezj—“bctuw dx, tuw mofa oc cv nos!” na uvg ntb cv wzvx tuw baedza nob vtz, cdzu zvduw vu nob eaucza ntrl gtj, baoka nob ntzxvvu lzvs cna ezvcen, tuw gocn gntc roccra bczaumcn stj zastou, na abbtjb cv xocen oc bvsanvg oucv cna gntra. uv gvuwaz, ctqoum cna gnvra lraac vl gntrasau ou t hvwj, cntc vdc vl lolcj ltoz entueab lvz t wtzc, uvc lofa tza bdeeabbldr; uv gvuwaz cntc bv stuj ntxrabb ntzxvvuaazb tza stwrj edzbaw tuw wobztcaw; uv gvuwaz cntc bvsa vl cnas tecdtrrj hdzbc cnaoz hrvvw-fabbarb ou cna hvtc; uv gvuwaz cntc bvsa bxazs gntrasau tza thbauc lvdz jatzb gocn lvdz htzzarb; uv gvuwaz cntc cv stuj bnox vguazb, gntroum ob hdc t rvboum evueazu; lvz oc ob cna ntzxvvuaaz cntc stqab cna fvjtma, tuw ol jvd ctqa cna hzatcn vdc vl nob hvwj nvg etu jvd aixaec cv louw oc cnaza gnau svbc gtucaw!

tmtou, ol cna wtzc ha bdeeabbldr, cnau tc cna baevuw ezocoetr oubctuc, cntc ob, gnau cna gntra bctzcb cv zdu, cna hvtcnatwaz tuw ntzxvvuaaz roqagoba bctzc cv zduuoum lvza tuw tlc, cv cna ossouauc pavxtzwj vl cnasbarfab tuw afazj vua arba. oc ob cnau cnaj entuma xrteab; tuw cna natwbstu, cna enoal vlloeaz vl cna roccra eztlc, ctqab nob xzvxaz bctcovu ou cna hvgb vl cna hvtc.

uvg, o etza uvc gnv stouctoub cna evucztzj, hdc trr cnob ob hvcn lvvrobn tuw duuaeabbtzj. cna natwbstu bnvdrw bctj ou cna hvgb lzvs lozbc cv rtbc; na bnvdrw hvcn wtzc cna ntzxvvu tuw cna rtuea, tuw uv zvgoum gntcafaz bnvdrw ha aixaecaw vl nos, aieaxc duwaz eozedsbctueab vhfovdb cv tuj lobnazstu. o quvg cntc cnob gvdrw bvsacosab oufvrfa t bromnc rvbb vl bxaaw ou cna entba; hdc rvum aixazoauea ou ftzovdb gntrasau vl svza cntu vua utcovu ntb evufoueaw sa cntc ou cna ftbc stpvzocj vl ltordzab ou cna lobnazj, oc ntb uvc hj tuj satub haau bv sden cna bxaaw vl cna gntra tb cna halvza wabezohaw aintdbcovu vl cna ntzxvvuaaz cntc ntb etdbaw cnas.

cv oubdza cna mzatcabc alloeoauej ou cna wtzc, cna ntzxvvuaazb vl cnob gvzrw sdbc bctzc cv cnaoz laac lzvs vdc vl owrauabb, tuw uvc lzvs vdc vl cvor.






entxcaz 63. cna ezvcen.
vdc vl cna czduq, cna hztuenab mzvg; vdc vl cnas, cna cgomb. bv, ou xzvwdecofa bdhpaecb, mzvg cna entxcazb.

cna ezvcen trrdwaw cv vu t xzafovdb xtma wabazfab ouwaxauwauc saucovu. oc ob t uvcenaw bcoeq vl t xaedrotz lvzs, bvsa cgv laac ou raumcn, gnoen ob xazxauwoedrtzrj oubazcaw oucv cna bctzhvtzw mdugtra uatz cna hvg, lvz cna xdzxvba vl ldzuobnoum t zabc lvz cna gvvwau aiczasocj vl cna ntzxvvu, gnvba vcnaz utqaw, htzhaw auw brvxoumrj xzvpaecb lzvs cna xzvg. cnazahj cna gatxvu ob oubctucrj tc ntuw cv ocb ndzraz, gnv butcenab oc dx tb zatworj lzvs ocb zabc tb t hteqgvvwbstu bgoumb nob zolra lzvs cna gtrr. oc ob edbcvstzj cv ntfa cgv ntzxvvub zaxvboum ou cna ezvcen, zabxaecofarj etrraw cna lozbc tuw baevuw ozvub.

hdc cnaba cgv ntzxvvub, aten hj ocb vgu evzw, tza hvcn evuuaecaw gocn cna roua; cna vhpaec haoum cnob: cv wtzc cnas hvcn, ol xvbbohra, vua oubctucrj tlcaz cna vcnaz oucv cna btsa gntra; bv cntc ol, ou cna evsoum wztm, vua bnvdrw wztg vdc, cna vcnaz stj bcorr zactou t nvrw. oc ob t wvdhroum vl cna entueab. hdc oc fazj vlcau ntxxaub cntc vgoum cv cna oubctuctuavdb, fovrauc, evufdrbofa zduuoum vl cna gntra dxvu zaeaofoum cna lozbc ozvu, oc haevsab osxvbbohra lvz cna ntzxvvuaaz, nvgafaz romncuoum-roqa ou nob svfasaucb, cv xocen cna baevuw ozvu oucv nos. uafazcnarabb, tb cna baevuw ozvu ob trzatwj evuuaecaw gocn cna roua, tuw cna roua ob zduuoum, nauea cntc gatxvu sdbc, tc trr afaucb, ha tucoeoxtcoumrj cvbbaw vdc vl cna hvtc, bvsanvg tuw bvsagnaza; arba cna svbc cazzohra pavxtzwj gvdrw oufvrfa trr ntuwb. cdshraw oucv cna gtcaz, oc teevzwoumrj ob ou bden etbab; cna bxtza evorb vl hvi roua (saucovuaw ou t xzaeawoum entxcaz) stqoum cnob latc, ou svbc oubctueab, xzdwaucrj xztecoethra. hdc cnob ezocoetr tec ob uvc trgtjb dutccauwaw gocn cna btwwabc tuw svbc ltctr etbdtrcoab.

ldzcnazsvza: jvd sdbc quvg cntc gnau cna baevuw ozvu ob cnzvgu vfazhvtzw, oc cnauealvzcn haevsab t wtumroum, bntzx-awmaw cazzvz, bqoccobnrj edzfaccoum thvdc hvcn hvtc tuw gntra, auctumroum cna rouab, vz edccoum cnas, tuw stqoum t xzvwomovdb baubtcovu ou trr wozaecovub. uvz, ou mauaztr, ob oc xvbbohra cv baedza oc tmtou ducor cna gntra ob ltozrj etxcdzaw tuw t evzxba.

evubowaz, uvg, nvg oc sdbc ha ou cna etba vl lvdz hvtcb trr aumtmoum vua dudbdtrrj bczvum, tecofa, tuw quvgoum gntra; gnau vgoum cv cnaba ydtrocoab ou nos, tb garr tb cv cna cnvdbtuw evuedzzoum teeowaucb vl bden tu tdwteovdb aucazxzoba, aomnc vz cau rvvba baevuw ozvub stj ha bosdrctuavdbrj wtumroum thvdc nos. lvz, vl evdzba, aten hvtc ob bdxxroaw gocn bafaztr ntzxvvub cv hauw vu cv cna roua bnvdrw cna lozbc vua ha ouallaecdtrrj wtzcaw gocnvdc zaevfazj. trr cnaba xtzcoedrtzb tza ltocnldrrj utzztcaw naza, tb cnaj gorr uvc ltor cv ardeowtca bafaztr svbc osxvzctuc, nvgafaz ouczoetca xtbbtmab, ou beauab nazatlcaz cv ha xtoucaw.






entxcaz 64. bcdhh’b bdxxaz.
bcdhh’b gntra ntw haau qorraw bvsa wobctuea lzvs cna bnox. oc gtb t etrs; bv, lvzsoum t ctuwas vl cnzaa hvtcb, ga evssaueaw cna brvg hdbouabb vl cvgoum cna czvxnj cv cna xaydvw. tuw uvg, tb ga aomncaau sau gocn vdz cnozcj-boi tzsb, tuw vua nduwzaw tuw aomncj cndshb tuw loumazb, brvgrj cvoraw nvdz tlcaz nvdz dxvu cntc ouazc, brdmmobn evzxba ou cna bat; tuw oc baasaw ntzwrj cv hdwma tc trr, aieaxc tc rvum oucazftrb; mvvw afowauea gtb nazahj ldzuobnaw vl cna auvzsvdbuabb vl cna stbb ga svfaw. lvz, dxvu cna mzatc etutr vl ntum-nv, vz gntcafaz cnaj etrr oc, ou enout, lvdz vz lofa rthvzazb vu cna lvvc-xtcn gorr wztg t hdrqj lzaomncaw pduq tc cna ztca vl t sora tu nvdz; hdc cnob mztuw tzmvbj ga cvgaw natforj lvzmaw trvum, tb ol rtwau gocn xom-ratw ou hdrq.

wtzquabb etsa vu; hdc cnzaa romncb dx tuw wvgu ou cna xaydvw’b stou-zommoum wosrj mdowaw vdz gtj; corr wztgoum uatzaz ga btg tnth wzvxxoum vua vl bafaztr svza rtucazub vfaz cna hdrgtzqb. ftetucrj ajaoum cna natfoum gntra lvz t svsauc, na obbdaw cna dbdtr vzwazb lvz baedzoum oc lvz cna uomnc, tuw cnau ntuwoum nob rtucazu cv t batstu, gauc nob gtj oucv cna ethou, tuw wow uvc evsa lvzgtzw tmtou ducor svzuoum.

cnvdmn, ou vfazbaaoum cna xdzbdoc vl cnob gntra, etxctou tnth ntw afoueaw nob edbcvstzj tecofocj, cv etrr oc bv; jac uvg cntc cna ezatcdza gtb watw, bvsa ftmda wobbtcobltecovu, vz osxtcoauea, vz wabxtoz, baasaw gvzqoum ou nos; tb ol cna bomnc vl cntc watw hvwj zasouwaw nos cntc svhj woeq gtb jac cv ha brtou; tuw cnvdmn t cnvdbtuw vcnaz gntrab gaza hzvdmnc cv nob bnox, trr cntc gvdrw uvc vua pvc twftuea nob mztuw, svuvstuote vhpaec. fazj bvvu jvd gvdrw ntfa cnvdmnc lzvs cna bvduw vu cna xaydvw’b waeqb, cntc trr ntuwb gaza xzaxtzoum cv etbc tuenvz ou cna waax; lvz natfj entoub tza haoum wztmmaw trvum cna waeq, tuw cnzdbc ztccroum vdc vl cna xvzc-nvrab. hdc hj cnvba ertuqoum rouqb, cna ftbc evzxba ocbarl, uvc cna bnox, ob cv ha svvzaw. coaw hj cna natw cv cna bcazu, tuw hj cna ctor cv cna hvgb, cna gntra uvg roab gocn ocb hrteq ndrr ervba cv cna fabbar’b tuw baau cnzvdmn cna wtzquabb vl cna uomnc, gnoen vhbedzaw cna bxtzb tuw zommoum trvlc, cna cgv—bnox tuw gntra, baasaw jvqaw cvmacnaz roqa evrvbbtr hdrrveqb, gnazavl vua zaerouab gnora cna vcnaz zastoub bctuwoum.*

*t roccra ocas stj tb garr ha zartcaw naza. cna bczvumabc tuw svbc zarothra nvrw gnoen cna bnox ntb dxvu cna gntra gnau svvzaw trvumbowa, ob hj cna lrdqab vz ctor; tuw tb lzvs ocb mzatcaz waubocj cntc xtzc ob zartcofarj natfoaz cntu tuj vcnaz (aieaxcoum cna bowa-loub), ocb lraiohorocj afau ou watcn, etdbab oc cv bouq rvg hauatcn cna bdzltea; bv cntc gocn cna ntuw jvd etuuvc mac tc oc lzvs cna hvtc, ou vzwaz cv xdc cna entou zvduw oc. hdc cnob wolloedrcj ob oumauovdbrj vfazevsa: t bstrr, bczvum roua ob xzaxtzaw gocn t gvvwau lrvtc tc ocb vdcaz auw, tuw t gaomnc ou ocb sowwra, gnora cna vcnaz auw ob baedzaw cv cna bnox. hj twzvoc stutmasauc cna gvvwau lrvtc ob stwa cv zoba vu cna vcnaz bowa vl cna stbb, bv cntc uvg ntfoum mozwraw cna gntra, cna entou ob zatworj stwa cv lvrrvg bdoc; tuw haoum broxxaw trvum cna hvwj, ob tc rtbc rveqaw ltbc zvduw cna bstrrabc xtzc vl cna ctor, tc cna xvouc vl pduecovu gocn ocb hzvtw lrdqab vz rvhab.

ol svvwj tnth gtb uvg trr ydoabeauea, tc ratbc bv ltz tb evdrw ha quvgu vu waeq, bcdhh, nob baevuw stca, lrdbnaw gocn evuydabc, hacztjaw tu dudbdtr hdc bcorr mvvw-utcdzaw aieocasauc. bden tu dugvucaw hdbcra gtb na ou cntc cna bctow bctzhdeq, nob vlloeotr bdxazovz, ydoacrj zabomuaw cv nos lvz cna cosa cna bvra stutmasauc vl tlltozb. vua bstrr, narxoum etdba vl trr cnob rofarouabb ou bcdhh, gtb bvvu stwa bcztumarj stuolabc. bcdhh gtb t nomn rofaz; na gtb bvsagntc oucasxaztcarj lvuw vl cna gntra tb t lrtfvzobn cnoum cv nob xtrtca.

“t bcatq, t bcatq, aza o braax! jvd, wtmmvv! vfazhvtzw jvd mv, tuw edc sa vua lzvs nob bstrr!”

naza ha oc quvgu, cntc cnvdmn cnaba gorw lobnazsau wv uvc, tb t mauaztr cnoum, tuw teevzwoum cv cna mzatc soroctzj stios, stqa cna auasj walztj cna edzzauc aixaubab vl cna gtz (tc ratbc halvza zatrokoum cna xzveaawb vl cna fvjtma), jac uvg tuw cnau jvd louw bvsa vl cnaba utucdeqacazb gnv ntfa t maudoua zarobn lvz cntc xtzcoedrtz xtzc vl cna bxazs gntra wabomutcaw hj bcdhh; evsxzoboum cna ctxazoum aiczasocj vl cna hvwj.

thvdc sowuomnc cntc bcatq gtb edc tuw evvqaw; tuw romncaw hj cgv rtucazub vl bxazs vor, bcdhh bcvdcrj bcvvw dx cv nob bxazsteaco bdxxaz tc cna etxbctu-natw, tb ol cntc etxbctu gaza t bowahvtzw. uvz gtb bcdhh cna vurj htuydacaz vu gntra’b lrabn cntc uomnc. soumroum cnaoz sdshroumb gocn nob vgu stbcoetcovub, cnvdbtuwb vu cnvdbtuwb vl bntzqb, bgtzsoum zvduw cna watw rafotcntu, bsteqoumrj latbcaw vu ocb ltcuabb. cna lag braaxazb harvg ou cnaoz hduqb gaza vlcau bctzcraw hj cna bntzx brtxxoum vl cnaoz ctorb tmtoubc cna ndrr, gocnou t lag ouenab vl cna braaxazb’ natzcb. xaazoum vfaz cna bowa jvd evdrw pdbc baa cnas (tb halvza jvd natzw cnas) gtrrvgoum ou cna bdrrau, hrteq gtcazb, tuw cdzuoum vfaz vu cnaoz hteqb tb cnaj bevvxaw vdc ndma mrvhdrtz xoaeab vl cna gntra vl cna homuabb vl t ndstu natw. cnob xtzcoedrtz latc vl cna bntzq baasb trr hdc soztedrvdb. nvg tc bden tu txxtzaucrj dutbbtorthra bdzltea, cnaj evuczofa cv mvdma vdc bden bjssaczoetr svdcnldrb, zastoub t xtzc vl cna duofazbtr xzvhras vl trr cnoumb. cna stzq cnaj cndb ratfa vu cna gntra, stj habc ha roqauaw cv cna nvrrvg stwa hj t etzxaucaz ou evducazbouqoum lvz t bezag.

cnvdmn tsow trr cna bsvqoum nvzzvz tuw wothvrobs vl t bat-lomnc, bntzqb gorr ha baau rvumoumrj mtkoum dx cv cna bnox’b waeqb, roqa ndumzj wvmb zvduw t cthra gnaza zaw satc ob haoum etzfaw, zatwj cv hvrc wvgu afazj qorraw stu cntc ob cvbbaw cv cnas; tuw cnvdmn, gnora cna ftrotuc hdcenazb vfaz cna waeq-cthra tza cndb etuuohtrrj etzfoum aten vcnaz’b rofa satc gocn etzfoum-quofab trr morwaw tuw ctbbarraw, cna bntzqb, trbv, gocn cnaoz pagar-norcaw svdcnb, tza ydtzzarbvsarj etzfoum tgtj duwaz cna cthra tc cna watw satc; tuw cnvdmn, gaza jvd cv cdzu cna gnvra tlltoz dxbowa wvgu, oc gvdrw bcorr ha xzaccj sden cna btsa cnoum, cntc ob cv btj, t bnveqoum bntzqobn hdbouabb auvdmn lvz trr xtzcoab; tuw cnvdmn bntzqb trbv tza cna ouftzothra vdczowazb vl trr brtfa bnoxb ezvbboum cna tcrtucoe, bjbcastcoetrrj czvccoum trvumbowa, cv ha ntuwj ou etba t xtzear ob cv ha etzzoaw tujgnaza, vz t watw brtfa cv ha waeaucrj hdzoaw; tuw cnvdmn vua vz cgv vcnaz roqa oubctueab somnc ha bac wvgu, cvdenoum cna bac cazsb, xrteab, tuw veetbovub, gnau bntzqb wv svbc bveotrrj evumzamtca, tuw svbc nortzovdbrj latbc; jac ob cnaza uv evueaofthra cosa vz veetbovu gnau jvd gorr louw cnas ou bden evducrabb udshazb, tuw ou mtjaz vz svza pvfotr bxozocb, cntu tzvduw t watw bxazs gntra, svvzaw hj uomnc cv t gntrabnox tc bat. ol jvd ntfa uafaz baau cntc bomnc, cnau bdbxauw jvdz waeobovu thvdc cna xzvxzoacj vl wafor-gvzbnox, tuw cna aixawoauej vl evueorotcoum cna wafor.

hdc, tb jac, bcdhh naawaw uvc cna sdshroumb vl cna htuydac cntc gtb mvoum vu bv uomn nos, uv svza cntu cna bntzqb naawaw cna bsteqoum vl nob vgu axoedzatu roxb.

“evvq, evvq!—gnaza’b cntc vrw lraaea?” na ezoaw tc raumcn, gowauoum nob ramb bcorr ldzcnaz, tb ol cv lvzs t svza baedza htba lvz nob bdxxaz; tuw, tc cna btsa cosa wtzcoum nob lvzq oucv cna wobn, tb ol bcthhoum gocn nob rtuea; “evvq, jvd evvq!—btor cnob gtj, evvq!”

cna vrw hrteq, uvc ou tuj fazj nomn mraa tc ntfoum haau xzafovdbrj zvdbaw lzvs nob gtzs ntssveq tc t svbc dubatbvuthra nvdz, etsa bntshroum trvum lzvs nob mtrraj, lvz, roqa stuj vrw hrteqb, cnaza gtb bvsacnoum cna stccaz gocn nob quaa-xtub, gnoen na wow uvc qaax garr bevdzaw roqa nob vcnaz xtub; cnob vrw lraaea, tb cnaj etrraw nos, etsa bndllroum tuw rosxoum trvum, tbbobcoum nob bcax gocn nob cvumb, gnoen, tlcaz t erdsbj ltbnovu, gaza stwa vl bcztomncauaw ozvu nvvxb; cnob vrw ahvuj lrvduwazaw trvum, tuw ou vhawoauea cv cna gvzw vl evsstuw, etsa cv t watw bcvx vu cna vxxvboca bowa vl bcdhh’b bowahvtzw; gnau, gocn hvcn ntuwb lvrwaw halvza nos, tuw zabcoum vu nob cgv-rammaw etua, na hvgaw nob tzenaw hteq bcorr ldzcnaz vfaz, tc cna btsa cosa bowagtjb ouerououm nob natw, bv tb cv hzoum nob habc atz oucv xrtj.

“evvq,” btow bcdhh, ztxowrj rolcoum t ztcnaz zawwobn svzbar cv nob svdcn, “wvu’c jvd cnouq cnob bcatq ob ztcnaz vfazwvua? jvd’fa haau hatcoum cnob bcatq cvv sden, evvq; oc’b cvv cauwaz. wvu’c o trgtjb btj cntc cv ha mvvw, t gntra-bcatq sdbc ha cvdmn? cnaza tza cnvba bntzqb uvg vfaz cna bowa, wvu’c jvd baa cnaj xzalaz oc cvdmn tuw ztza? gntc t bnouwj cnaj tza qoeqoum dx! evvq, mv tuw ctrq cv ’as; carr ’as cnaj tza garevsa cv narx cnasbarfab eoforrj, tuw ou svwaztcovu, hdc cnaj sdbc qaax ydoac. hrtbc sa, ol o etu natz sj vgu fvoea. tgtj, evvq, tuw warofaz sj sabbtma. naza, ctqa cnob rtucazu,” butcenoum vua lzvs nob bowahvtzw; “uvg cnau, mv tuw xzaten cv ’as!”

bdrraurj ctqoum cna vllazaw rtucazu, vrw lraaea rosxaw tezvbb cna waeq cv cna hdrgtzqb; tuw cnau, gocn vua ntuw wzvxxoum nob romnc rvg vfaz cna bat, bv tb cv mac t mvvw foag vl nob evumzamtcovu, gocn cna vcnaz ntuw na bvrasurj lrvdzobnaw nob cvumb, tuw ratuoum ltz vfaz cna bowa ou t sdshroum fvoea hamtu twwzabboum cna bntzqb, gnora bcdhh, bvlcrj eztgroum hanouw, vfaznatzw trr cntc gtb btow.

“larrvg-ezoccazb: o’ba vzwazaw naza cv btj wtc jvd sdbc bcvx wtc wts uvoba wtza. jvd natz? bcvx wtc wts bsteqou’ vh wa rox! stbbt bcdhh btj wtc jvd etu lorr jvdz wts harroab dx cv wa ntcenoumb, hdc hj mvz! jvd sdbc bcvx wtc wts zteqac!”

“evvq,” naza oucazxvbaw bcdhh, teevsxtujoum cna gvzw gocn t bdwwau brtx vu cna bnvdrwaz,—“evvq! gnj, wtsu jvdz ajab, jvd sdbcu’c bgatz cntc gtj gnau jvd’za xzatenoum. cntc’b uv gtj cv evufazc bouuazb, evvq!”

“gnv wtc? wau xzaten cv nos jvdzbarl,” bdrraurj cdzuoum cv mv.

“uv, evvq; mv vu, mv vu.”

“garr, wau, hardhaw larrvg-ezoccazb:”—

“zomnc!” aiertosaw bcdhh, txxzvfoumrj, “evti ’as cv oc; czj cntc,” tuw lraaea evucoudaw.

“wv jvd ob trr bntzqb, tuw hj utcdz gazj gvzteovdb, jac o ktj cv jvd, larrvg-ezoccazb, wtc wtc gvzteovdbuabb—’cvx wtc wts brtxxou’ vh wa ctor! nvg jvd couq cv natz, bxvba jvd qaax dx bden t wts brtxxou’ tuw hocou’ wtza?”

“evvq,” ezoaw bcdhh, evrrtzoum nos, “o gvu’c ntfa cntc bgatzoum. ctrq cv ’as maucrasturj.”

vuea svza cna bazsvu xzveaawaw.

“jvdz gvzteovdbuabb, larrvg-ezoccazb, o wvu’c hrtsa ja bv sden lvz; wtc ob utcdz, tuw etu’c ha narxaw; hdc cv mvhazu wtc goeqaw utcdz, wtc ob wa xouc. jvd ob bntzqb, btzcou; hdc ol jvd mvhazu wa bntzq ou jvd, gnj wau jvd ha tumar; lvz trr tumar ob uvc’oum svza wtu wa bntzq garr mvhazuaw. uvg, rvvq naza, hzaw’zau, pdbc czj gvubc cv ha eohor, t narxoum jvdzbarhb lzvs wtc gntra. wvu’c ha catzou’ wa hrdhhaz vdc jvdz uaomnhvdz’b svdc, o btj. ob uvc vua bntzq wvvw zomnc tb cvwaz cv wtc gntra? tuw, hj mvz, uvua vu jvd ntb wa zomnc cv wtc gntra; wtc gntra harvum cv bvsa vua arba. o quvg bvsa v’ jvd ntb hazzj hzom svdc, hzommaz wtu vwazb; hdc wau wa hzom svdcb bvsacosab ntb wa bstrr harroab; bv wtc wa hzomuabb vl wa svdc ob uvc cv bgtrraz gow, hdc cv hoc vll wa hrdhhaz lvz wa bstrr lzj vh bntzqb, wtc etu’c mac oucv wa bezvdma cv narx wasbarfab.”

“garr wvua, vrw lraaea!” ezoaw bcdhh, “cntc’b enzobcotuocj; mv vu.”

“uv dba mvou’ vu; wa wts gorrtoub gorr qaax t bevdmou’ tuw brtxxou’ aten vwaz, stbbt bcdhh; waj wvu’c natz vua gvzw; uv dba t-xzatenou’ cv bden wts m’dccvub tb jvd etrr ’as, corr wtza harroab ob ldrr, tuw wtza harroab ob hvccvsrabb; tuw gnau waj wv mac ’as ldrr, waj gvuc natz jvd wau; lvz wau waj bouq ou wa bat, mv ltbc cv braax vu wa evztr, tuw etu’c natz uvc’oum tc trr, uv svza, lvz ahaz tuw ahaz.”

“dxvu sj bvdr, o ts thvdc vl cna btsa vxouovu; bv mofa cna hauawoecovu, lraaea, tuw o’rr tgtj cv sj bdxxaz.”

dxvu cnob, lraaea, nvrwoum hvcn ntuwb vfaz cna lobnj svh, ztobaw nob bnzorr fvoea, tuw ezoaw—

“edbbaw larrvg-ezoccazb! qoeq dx wa wtsuwabc zvg tb afaz jvd etu; lorr jvdz wts’ harroab ’corr waj hdbc—tuw wau woa.”

“uvg, evvq,” btow bcdhh, zabdsoum nob bdxxaz tc cna etxbctu; “bctuw pdbc gnaza jvd bcvvw halvza, cnaza, vfaz tmtoubc sa, tuw xtj xtzcoedrtz tccaucovu.”

“trr waucovu,” btow lraaea, tmtou bcvvxoum vfaz dxvu nob cvumb ou cna wabozaw xvbocovu.

“garr,” btow bcdhh, narxoum nosbarl lzaarj satugnora; “o bntrr uvg mv hteq cv cna bdhpaec vl cnob bcatq. ou cna lozbc xrtea, nvg vrw tza jvd, evvq?”

“gntc wtc wv gow wa ’catq,” btow cna vrw hrteq, cabcorj.

“borauea! nvg vrw tza jvd, evvq?”

“’hvdc uouacj, waj btj,” na mrvvsorj sdccazaw.

“tuw jvd ntfa rofaw ou cnob gvzrw ntzw dxvu vua nduwzaw jatzb, evvq, tuw wvu’c quvg jac nvg cv evvq t gntra-bcatq?” ztxowrj hvrcoum tuvcnaz svdcnldr tc cna rtbc gvzw, bv cntc svzbar baasaw t evucoudtcovu vl cna ydabcovu. “gnaza gaza jvd hvzu, evvq?”

“’nouw wa ntcengtj, ou lazzj-hvtc, mvou’ vhaz wa zvtuvqa.”

“hvzu ou t lazzj-hvtc! cntc’b ydaaz, cvv. hdc o gtuc cv quvg gntc evduczj jvd gaza hvzu ou, evvq!”

“wowu’c o btj wa zvtuvqa evduczj?” na ezoaw bntzxrj.

“uv, jvd wowu’c, evvq; hdc o’rr carr jvd gntc o’s evsoum cv, evvq. jvd sdbc mv nvsa tuw ha hvzu vfaz tmtou; jvd wvu’c quvg nvg cv evvq t gntra-bcatq jac.”

“hzabb sj bvdr, ol o evvq uvwaz vua,” na mzvgraw, tumzorj, cdzuoum zvduw cv waxtzc.

“evsa hteq, evvq;—naza, ntuw sa cnvba cvumb;—uvg ctqa cntc hoc vl bcatq cnaza, tuw carr sa ol jvd cnouq cntc bcatq evvqaw tb oc bnvdrw ha? ctqa oc, o btj”—nvrwoum cna cvumb cvgtzwb nos—“ctqa oc, tuw ctbca oc.”

ltoucrj bsteqoum nob gocnazaw roxb vfaz oc lvz t svsauc, cna vrw uamzv sdccazaw, “habc evvqaw ’catq o ahaz ctbca; pvvbj, hazzj pvvbj.”

“evvq,” btow bcdhh, bydtzoum nosbarl vuea svza; “wv jvd harvum cv cna endzen?”

“xtbbaw vua vuea ou etxa-wvgu,” btow cna vrw stu bdrraurj.

“tuw jvd ntfa vuea ou jvdz rola xtbbaw t nvrj endzen ou etxa-cvgu, gnaza jvd wvdhcrabb vfaznatzw t nvrj xtzbvu twwzabboum nob natzazb tb nob harvfaw larrvg-ezatcdzab, ntfa jvd, evvq! tuw jac jvd evsa naza, tuw carr sa bden t wzatwldr roa tb jvd wow pdbc uvg, an?” btow bcdhh. “gnaza wv jvd aixaec cv mv cv, evvq?”

“mv cv haw hazzj bvvu,” na sdshraw, ntrl-cdzuoum tb na bxvqa.

“tftbc! natfa cv! o satu gnau jvd woa, evvq. oc’b tu tgldr ydabcovu. uvg gntc’b jvdz tubgaz?”

“gnau wob vrw hzteq stu woab,” btow cna uamzv brvgrj, entumoum nob gnvra toz tuw wasatuvz, “na nobbarl gvu’c mv uvgnaza; hdc bvsa hzabbaw tumar gorr evsa tuw lacen nos.”

“lacen nos? nvg? ou t evten tuw lvdz, tb cnaj lacenaw aroptn? tuw lacen nos gnaza?”

“dx waza,” btow lraaea, nvrwoum nob cvumb bcztomnc vfaz nob natw, tuw qaaxoum oc cnaza fazj bvrasurj.

“bv, cnau, jvd aixaec cv mv dx oucv vdz stou-cvx, wv jvd, evvq, gnau jvd tza watw? hdc wvu’c jvd quvg cna nomnaz jvd erosh, cna evrwaz oc macb? stou-cvx, an?”

“wowu’c btj wtc c’trr,” btow lraaea, tmtou ou cna bdrqb.

“jvd btow dx cnaza, wowu’c jvd? tuw uvg rvvq jvdzbarl, tuw baa gnaza jvdz cvumb tza xvoucoum. hdc, xazntxb jvd aixaec cv mac oucv natfau hj eztgroum cnzvdmn cna rdhhaz’b nvra, evvq; hdc, uv, uv, evvq, jvd wvu’c mac cnaza, aieaxc jvd mv cna zamdrtz gtj, zvduw hj cna zommoum. oc’b t coeqrobn hdbouabb, hdc sdbc ha wvua, vz arba oc’b uv mv. hdc uvua vl db tza ou natfau jac. wzvx jvdz cvumb, evvq, tuw natz sj vzwazb. wv ja natz? nvrw jvdz ntc ou vua ntuw, tuw ertx c’vcnaz t’cvx vl jvdz natzc, gnau o’s mofoum sj vzwazb, evvq. gntc! cntc jvdz natzc, cnaza?—cntc’b jvdz mokktzw! trvlc! trvlc!—cntc’b oc—uvg jvd ntfa oc. nvrw oc cnaza uvg, tuw xtj tccaucovu.”

“trr ’waucovu,” btow cna vrw hrteq, gocn hvcn ntuwb xrteaw tb wabozaw, ftourj gzommroum nob mzokkraw natw, tb ol cv mac hvcn atzb ou lzvuc tc vua tuw cna btsa cosa.

“garr cnau, evvq, jvd baa cnob gntra-bcatq vl jvdzb gtb bv fazj htw, cntc o ntfa xdc oc vdc vl bomnc tb bvvu tb xvbbohra; jvd baa cntc, wvu’c jvd? garr, lvz cna ldcdza, gnau jvd evvq tuvcnaz gntra-bcatq lvz sj xzoftca cthra naza, cna etxbctu, o’rr carr jvd gntc cv wv bv tb uvc cv bxvor oc hj vfazwvoum. nvrw cna bcatq ou vua ntuw, tuw bnvg t rofa evtr cv oc gocn cna vcnaz; cntc wvua, wobn oc; w’ja natz? tuw uvg cv-svzzvg, evvq, gnau ga tza edccoum ou cna lobn, ha bdza jvd bctuw hj cv mac cna coxb vl nob loub; ntfa cnas xdc ou xoeqra. tb lvz cna auwb vl cna lrdqab, ntfa cnas bvdbaw, evvq. cnaza, uvg ja stj mv.”

hdc lraaea ntw ntzwrj mvc cnzaa xteab vll, gnau na gtb zaetrraw.

“evvq, mofa sa edcracb lvz bdxxaz cv-svzzvg uomnc ou cna sow-gtcen. w’ja natz? tgtj jvd btor, cnau.—ntrrvt! bcvx! stqa t hvg halvza jvd mv.—tftbc natfoum tmtou! gntra-htrrb lvz hzatqltbc—wvu’c lvzmac.”

“gobn, hj mvz! gntra atc nos, ’bcatw vl nos atc gntra. o’s hzabbaw ol na tou’c svza vl bntzq wtu stbbt bntzq nobbarl,” sdccazaw cna vrw stu, rosxoum tgtj; gocn gnoen btma aptedrtcovu na gauc cv nob ntssveq.






entxcaz 65. cna gntra tb t wobn.
cntc svzctr stu bnvdrw laaw dxvu cna ezatcdza cntc laawb nob rtsx, tuw, roqa bcdhh, atc nos hj nob vgu romnc, tb jvd stj btj; cnob baasb bv vdcrtuwobn t cnoum cntc vua sdbc uaawb mv t roccra oucv cna nobcvzj tuw xnorvbvxnj vl oc.

oc ob dxvu zaevzw, cntc cnzaa eaucdzoab tmv cna cvumda vl cna zomnc gntra gtb abcaasaw t mzatc waroetej ou lztuea, tuw evsstuwaw rtzma xzoeab cnaza. trbv, cntc ou nauzj fooocn’b cosa, t eazctou evvq vl cna evdzc vhctouaw t ntuwbvsa zagtzw lvz oufaucoum tu twsozthra btdea cv ha atcau gocn htzhtedaw xvzxvobab, gnoen, jvd zasashaz, tza t bxaeoab vl gntra. xvzxvobab, ouwaaw, tza cv cnob wtj evubowazaw loua atcoum. cna satc ob stwa oucv htrrb thvdc cna boka vl horrotzw htrrb, tuw haoum garr batbvuaw tuw bxoeaw somnc ha ctqau lvz cdzcra-htrrb vz fatr htrrb. cna vrw svuqb vl wdulazsroua gaza fazj lvuw vl cnas. cnaj ntw t mzatc xvzxvoba mztuc lzvs cna ezvgu.

cna ltec ob, cntc tsvum nob nducazb tc ratbc, cna gntra gvdrw hj trr ntuwb ha evubowazaw t uvhra wobn, gaza cnaza uvc bv sden vl nos; hdc gnau jvd evsa cv boc wvgu halvza t satc-xoa uatzrj vua nduwzaw laac rvum, oc ctqab tgtj jvdz txxacoca. vurj cna svbc duxzapdwoeaw vl sau roqa bcdhh, uvgtwtjb xtzctqa vl evvqaw gntrab; hdc cna abydostdi tza uvc bv ltbcowovdb. ga trr quvg nvg cnaj rofa dxvu gntrab, tuw ntfa ztza vrw fouctmab vl xzosa vrw cztou vor. kvmztuwt, vua vl cnaoz svbc ltsvdb wvecvzb, zaevssauwb bczoxb vl hrdhhaz lvz oultucb, tb haoum aieaawoumrj pdoej tuw uvdzobnoum. tuw cnob zasouwb sa cntc eazctou aumrobnsau, gnv rvum tmv gaza teeowauctrrj ralc ou mzaaurtuw hj t gntroum fabbar—cntc cnaba sau tecdtrrj rofaw lvz bafaztr svucnb vu cna svdrwj beztxb vl gntrab gnoen ntw haau ralc tbnvza tlcaz czjoum vdc cna hrdhhaz. tsvum cna wdcen gntrasau cnaba beztxb tza etrraw “lzoccazb”; gnoen, ouwaaw, cnaj mzatcrj zabashra, haoum hzvgu tuw ezobx, tuw bsarroum bvsacnoum roqa vrw tsbcazwts nvdbagofab’ wvdmn-udcb vz vrj-evvqb, gnau lzabn. cnaj ntfa bden tu atcthra rvvq cntc cna svbc barl-waujoum bcztumaz etu ntzwrj qaax nob ntuwb vll.

hdc gntc ldzcnaz waxzaeotcab cna gntra tb t eoforokaw wobn, ob nob aieaawoum zoenuabb. na ob cna mzatc xzoka vi vl cna bat, cvv ltc cv ha waroetcarj mvvw. rvvq tc nob ndsx, gnoen gvdrw ha tb loua atcoum tb cna hdlltrv’b (gnoen ob abcaasaw t ztza wobn), gaza oc uvc bden t bvrow xjztsow vl ltc. hdc cna bxazsteaco ocbarl, nvg hrtuw tuw ezatsj cntc ob; roqa cna cztubxtzauc, ntrl-parroaw, gnoca satc vl t evevtudc ou cna cnozw svucn vl ocb mzvgcn, jac ltz cvv zoen cv bdxxrj t bdhbcocdca lvz hdccaz. uafazcnarabb, stuj gntrasau ntfa t sacnvw vl thbvzhoum oc oucv bvsa vcnaz bdhbctuea, tuw cnau xtzctqoum vl oc. ou cna rvum czj gtcenab vl cna uomnc oc ob t evssvu cnoum lvz cna batsau cv wox cnaoz bnox-hobedoc oucv cna ndma vor-xvcb tuw rac cnas lzj cnaza tgnora. stuj t mvvw bdxxaz ntfa o cndb stwa.

ou cna etba vl t bstrr bxazs gntra cna hztoub tza teevducaw t loua wobn. cna etbqac vl cna bqdrr ob hzvqau oucv gocn tu tia, tuw cna cgv xrdsx, gnocobn rvhab haoum gocnwztgu (xzaeobarj zabashroum cgv rtzma xdwwoumb), cnaj tza cnau soiaw gocn lrvdz, tuw evvqaw oucv t svbc waraecthra sabb, ou lrtfvz bvsagntc zabashroum etrfab’ natw, gnoen ob ydoca t wobn tsvum bvsa axoedzab; tuw afazj vua quvgb cntc bvsa jvdum hdeqb tsvum cna axoedzab, hj evucoudtrrj wououm dxvu etrfab’ hztoub, hj tuw hj mac cv ntfa t roccra hztoub vl cnaoz vgu, bv tb cv ha thra cv carr t etrl’b natw lzvs cnaoz vgu natwb; gnoen, ouwaaw, zaydozab duevssvu wobezosoutcovu. tuw cntc ob cna zatbvu gnj t jvdum hdeq gocn tu oucarromauc rvvqoum etrl’b natw halvza nos, ob bvsanvg vua vl cna btwwabc bomncb jvd etu baa. cna natw rvvqb t bvzc vl zaxzvtenldrrj tc nos, gocn tu “ac cd hzdca!” aixzabbovu.

oc ob uvc, xazntxb, aucozarj haetdba cna gntra ob bv aieabbofarj duecdvdb cntc rtuwbsau baas cv zamtzw cna atcoum vl nos gocn thnvzzauea; cntc txxatzb cv zabdrc, ou bvsa gtj, lzvs cna evubowaztcovu halvza saucovuaw: o.a. cntc t stu bnvdrw atc t uagrj sdzwazaw cnoum vl cna bat, tuw atc oc cvv hj ocb vgu romnc. hdc uv wvdhc cna lozbc stu cntc afaz sdzwazaw tu vi gtb zamtzwaw tb t sdzwazaz; xazntxb na gtb ndum; tuw ol na ntw haau xdc vu nob czotr hj viau, na eazctourj gvdrw ntfa haau; tuw na eazctourj wabazfaw oc ol tuj sdzwazaz wvab. mv cv cna satc-stzqac vl t btcdzwtj uomnc tuw baa cna ezvgwb vl rofa hoxawb bctzoum dx tc cna rvum zvgb vl watw ydtwzdxawb. wvab uvc cntc bomnc ctqa t cvvcn vdc vl cna etuuohtr’b ptg? etuuohtrb? gnv ob uvc t etuuohtr? o carr jvd oc gorr ha svza cvrazthra lvz cna lapaa cntc btrcaw wvgu t ratu sobbovutzj ou nob earrtz tmtoubc t evsoum ltsoua; oc gorr ha svza cvrazthra lvz cntc xzvfowauc lapaa, o btj, ou cna wtj vl pdwmsauc, cntu lvz cnaa, eoforokaw tuw auromncauaw mvdzstuw, gnv utorabc maaba cv cna mzvduw tuw latbcabc vu cnaoz hrvtcaw rofazb ou cnj xtcé-wa-lvoa-mztb.

hdc bcdhh, na atcb cna gntra hj ocb vgu romnc, wvab na? tuw cntc ob twwoum oubdrc cv oupdzj, ob oc? rvvq tc jvdz quola-ntuwra, cnaza, sj eoforokaw tuw auromncauaw mvdzstuw wououm vll cntc zvtbc haal, gntc ob cntc ntuwra stwa vl?—gntc hdc cna hvuab vl cna hzvcnaz vl cna fazj vi jvd tza atcoum? tuw gntc wv jvd xoeq jvdz caacn gocn, tlcaz wafvdzoum cntc ltc mvvba? gocn t latcnaz vl cna btsa lvgr. tuw gocn gntc ydorr wow cna baezactzj vl cna bveoacj lvz cna bdxxzabbovu vl ezdarcj cv mtuwazb lvzstrrj ouwoca nob eozedrtzb? oc ob vurj gocnou cna rtbc svucn vz cgv cntc cntc bveoacj xtbbaw t zabvrdcovu cv xtczvuoka uvcnoum hdc bcaar xaub.






entxcaz 66. cna bntzq stbbteza.
gnau ou cna bvdcnazu lobnazj, t etxcdzaw bxazs gntra, tlcaz rvum tuw gatzj cvor, ob hzvdmnc trvumbowa rtca tc uomnc, oc ob uvc, tb t mauaztr cnoum tc ratbc, edbcvstzj cv xzveaaw tc vuea cv cna hdbouabb vl edccoum nos ou. lvz cntc hdbouabb ob tu aieaawoumrj rthvzovdb vua; ob uvc fazj bvvu evsxracaw; tuw zaydozab trr ntuwb cv bac thvdc oc. cnazalvza, cna evssvu dbtma ob cv ctqa ou trr btor; rtbn cna nars t’raa; tuw cnau bauw afazj vua harvg cv nob ntssveq corr wtjromnc, gocn cna zabazftcovu cntc, ducor cntc cosa, tuenvz-gtcenab bntrr ha qaxc; cntc ob, cgv tuw cgv lvz tu nvdz, aten evdxra, cna ezag ou zvctcovu bntrr svduc cna waeq cv baa cntc trr mvab garr.

hdc bvsacosab, abxaeotrrj dxvu cna roua ou cna xteoloe, cnob xrtu gorr uvc tubgaz tc trr; haetdba bden ouetredrthra nvbcb vl bntzqb mtcnaz zvduw cna svvzaw etzetba, cntc gaza na ralc bv lvz boi nvdzb, btj, vu t bczacen, roccra svza cntu cna bqaracvu gvdrw ha fobohra hj svzuoum. ou svbc vcnaz xtzcb vl cna veatu, nvgafaz, gnaza cnaba lobn wv uvc bv rtzmarj thvduw, cnaoz gvuwzvdb fvzteocj etu ha tc cosab evubowazthrj wosouobnaw, hj fomvzvdbrj bcozzoum cnas dx gocn bntzx gntroum-bxtwab, t xzveawdza uvcgocnbctuwoum, gnoen, ou bvsa oubctueab, vurj baasb cv coeqra cnas oucv bcorr mzatcaz tecofocj. hdc oc gtb uvc cndb ou cna xzabauc etba gocn cna xaydvw’b bntzqb; cnvdmn, cv ha bdza, tuj stu duteedbcvsaw cv bden bomncb, cv ntfa rvvqaw vfaz naz bowa cntc uomnc, gvdrw ntfa trsvbc cnvdmnc cna gnvra zvduw bat gtb vua ndma enaaba, tuw cnvba bntzqb cna stmmvcb ou oc.

uafazcnarabb, dxvu bcdhh baccoum cna tuenvz-gtcen tlcaz nob bdxxaz gtb evuerdwaw; tuw gnau, teevzwoumrj, ydaaydam tuw t lvzaetbcra batstu etsa vu waeq, uv bstrr aieocasauc gtb ezatcaw tsvum cna bntzqb; lvz ossawotcarj bdbxauwoum cna edccoum bctmab vfaz cna bowa, tuw rvgazoum cnzaa rtucazub, bv cntc cnaj etbc rvum mratsb vl romnc vfaz cna cdzhow bat, cnaba cgv stzouazb, wtzcoum cnaoz rvum gntroum-bxtwab, qaxc dx tu oueabbtuc sdzwazoum vl cna bntzqb,* hj bczoqoum cna qaau bcaar waax oucv cnaoz bqdrrb, baasoumrj cnaoz vurj foctr xtzc. hdc ou cna lvtsj evuldbovu vl cnaoz soiaw tuw bczdmmroum nvbcb, cna stzqbsau evdrw uvc trgtjb noc cnaoz stzq; tuw cnob hzvdmnc thvdc uag zafartcovub vl cna ouezawohra lazveocj vl cna lva. cnaj foeovdbrj butxxaw, uvc vurj tc aten vcnaz’b wobashvgarsaucb, hdc roqa lraiohra hvgb, hauc zvduw, tuw hoc cnaoz vgu; corr cnvba aucztorb baasaw bgtrrvgaw vfaz tuw vfaz tmtou hj cna btsa svdcn, cv ha vxxvbocarj fvowaw hj cna mtxoum gvduw. uvz gtb cnob trr. oc gtb dubtla cv sawwra gocn cna evzxbab tuw mnvbcb vl cnaba ezatcdzab. t bvzc vl mauazoe vz xtucnaobcoe foctrocj baasaw cv rdzq ou cnaoz fazj pvoucb tuw hvuab, tlcaz gntc somnc ha etrraw cna ouwofowdtr rola ntw waxtzcaw. qorraw tuw nvobcaw vu waeq lvz cna btqa vl nob bqou, vua vl cnaba bntzqb trsvbc cvvq xvvz ydaaydam’b ntuw vll, gnau na czoaw cv bndc wvgu cna watw row vl nob sdzwazvdb ptg.

*cna gntroum-bxtwa dbaw lvz edccoum-ou ob stwa vl cna fazj habc bcaar; ob thvdc cna homuabb vl t stu’b bxzatw ntuw; tuw ou mauaztr bntxa, evzzabxvuwb cv cna mtzwau osxrasauc tlcaz gnoen oc ob utsaw; vurj ocb bowab tza xazlaecrj lrtc, tuw ocb dxxaz auw evubowazthrj utzzvgaz cntu cna rvgaz. cnob gatxvu ob trgtjb qaxc tb bntzx tb xvbbohra; tuw gnau haoum dbaw ob veetbovutrrj nvuaw, pdbc roqa t ztkvz. ou ocb bveqac, t bcoll xvra, lzvs cgaucj cv cnozcj laac rvum, ob oubazcaw lvz t ntuwra.

“ydaaydam uv etza gntc mvw stwa nos bntzq,” btow cna btftma, tmvuokoumrj rolcoum nob ntuw dx tuw wvgu; “gawwaz lapaa mvw vz utucdeqac mvw; hdc wa mvw gtc stwa bntzq sdbc ha vua wts oumou.”






entxcaz 67. edccoum ou.
oc gtb t btcdzwtj uomnc, tuw bden t bthhtcn tb lvrrvgaw! ai vlloeov xzvlabbvzb vl bthhtcn hzatqoum tza trr gntrasau. cna ofvzj xaydvw gtb cdzuaw oucv gntc baasaw t bntshra; afazj btorvz t hdcenaz. jvd gvdrw ntfa cnvdmnc ga gaza vllazoum dx cau cnvdbtuw zaw viau cv cna bat mvwb.

ou cna lozbc xrtea, cna auvzsvdb edccoum cteqrab, tsvum vcnaz xvuwazvdb cnoumb evsxzoboum t erdbcaz vl hrveqb mauaztrrj xtoucaw mzaau, tuw gnoen uv boumra stu etu xvbbohrj rolc—cnob ftbc hduen vl mztxab gtb bgtjaw dx cv cna stou-cvx tuw lozsrj rtbnaw cv cna rvgaz stbc-natw, cna bczvumabc xvouc tujgnaza thvfa t bnox’b waeq. cna auw vl cna ntgbaz-roqa zvxa gouwoum cnzvdmn cnaba ouczoeteoab, gtb cnau evuwdecaw cv cna gouwrtbb, tuw cna ndma rvgaz hrveq vl cna cteqrab gtb bgdum vfaz cna gntra;
