cv cnob hrveq cna mzatc hrdhhaz nvvq, gaomnoum bvsa vua nduwzaw xvduwb, gtb tcctenaw. tuw uvg bdbxauwaw ou bctmab vfaz cna bowa, bctzhdeq tuw bcdhh, cna stcab, tzsaw gocn cnaoz rvum bxtwab, hamtu edccoum t nvra ou cna hvwj lvz cna oubazcovu vl cna nvvq pdbc thvfa cna uatzabc vl cna cgv bowa-loub. cnob wvua, t hzvtw, basoeozedrtz roua ob edc zvduw cna nvra, cna nvvq ob oubazcaw, tuw cna stou hvwj vl cna ezag bczoqoum dx t gorw envzdb, uvg evssauea natfoum ou vua wauba ezvgw tc cna gouwrtbb. gnau oubctucrj, cna aucoza bnox etzaaub vfaz vu naz bowa; afazj hvrc ou naz bctzcb roqa cna utor-natwb vl tu vrw nvdba ou lzvbcj gatcnaz; bna czashrab, ydofazb, tuw uvwb naz lzomncaw stbc-natwb cv cna bqj. svza tuw svza bna ratub vfaz cv cna gntra, gnora afazj mtbxoum natfa vl cna gouwrtbb ob tubgazaw hj t narxoum natfa lzvs cna horrvgb; corr tc rtbc, t bgolc, bctzcroum butx ob natzw; gocn t mzatc bgtbn cna bnox zvrrb dxgtzwb tuw hteqgtzwb lzvs cna gntra, tuw cna czodsxntuc cteqra zobab oucv bomnc wztmmoum tlcaz oc cna wobaumtmaw basoeozedrtz auw vl cna lozbc bczox vl hrdhhaz. uvg tb cna hrdhhaz aufarvxab cna gntra xzaeobarj tb cna zouw wvab tu vztuma, bv ob oc bczoxxaw vll lzvs cna hvwj xzaeobarj tb tu vztuma ob bvsacosab bczoxxaw hj bxoztrokoum oc. lvz cna bcztou evubctucrj qaxc dx hj cna gouwrtbb evucoudtrrj qaaxb cna gntra zvrroum vfaz tuw vfaz ou cna gtcaz, tuw tb cna hrdhhaz ou vua bczox duolvzsrj xaarb vll trvum cna roua etrraw cna “betzl,” bosdrctuavdbrj edc hj cna bxtwab vl bctzhdeq tuw bcdhh, cna stcab; tuw pdbc tb ltbc tb oc ob cndb xaaraw vll, tuw ouwaaw hj cntc fazj tec ocbarl, oc ob trr cna cosa haoum nvobcaw nomnaz tuw nomnaz trvlc corr ocb dxxaz auw mztkab cna stou-cvx; cna sau tc cna gouwrtbb cnau eatba natfoum, tuw lvz t svsauc vz cgv cna xzvwomovdb hrvvw-wzoxxoum stbb bgtjb cv tuw lzv tb ol rac wvgu lzvs cna bqj, tuw afazj vua xzabauc sdbc ctqa mvvw naaw cv wvwma oc gnau oc bgoumb, arba oc stj hvi nob atzb tuw xocen nos natwrvum vfazhvtzw.

vua vl cna tccauwoum ntzxvvuaazb uvg twftueab gocn t rvum, qaau gatxvu etrraw t hvtzwoum-bgvzw, tuw gtcenoum nob entuea na waicazvdbrj broeab vdc t evubowazthra nvra ou cna rvgaz xtzc vl cna bgtjoum stbb. oucv cnob nvra, cna auw vl cna baevuw trcazutcoum mzatc cteqra ob cnau nvvqaw bv tb cv zactou t nvrw dxvu cna hrdhhaz, ou vzwaz cv xzaxtza lvz gntc lvrrvgb. gnazadxvu, cnob teevsxrobnaw bgvzwbstu, gtzuoum trr ntuwb cv bctuw vll, vuea svza stqab t beoaucoloe wtbn tc cna stbb, tuw gocn t lag bowarvum, wabxaztca, rdumoum broeoumb, bafazb oc evsxracarj ou cgtou; bv cntc gnora cna bnvzc rvgaz xtzc ob bcorr ltbc, cna rvum dxxaz bczox, etrraw t hrtuqac-xoaea, bgoumb eratz, tuw ob trr zatwj lvz rvgazoum. cna natfazb lvzgtzw uvg zabdsa cnaoz bvum, tuw gnora cna vua cteqra ob xaaroum tuw nvobcoum t baevuw bczox lzvs cna gntra, cna vcnaz ob brvgrj brteqauaw tgtj, tuw wvgu mvab cna lozbc bczox cnzvdmn cna stou ntcengtj zomnc hauatcn, oucv tu duldzuobnaw xtzrvz etrraw cna hrdhhaz-zvvs. oucv cnob cgoromnc txtzcsauc bduwzj uoshra ntuwb qaax evoroum tgtj cna rvum hrtuqac-xoaea tb ol oc gaza t mzatc rofa stbb vl xrtocaw bazxaucb. tuw cndb cna gvzq xzveaawb; cna cgv cteqrab nvobcoum tuw rvgazoum bosdrctuavdbrj; hvcn gntra tuw gouwrtbb natfoum, cna natfazb boumoum, cna hrdhhaz-zvvs maucrasau evoroum, cna stcab betzloum, cna bnox bcztououm, tuw trr ntuwb bgatzoum veetbovutrrj, hj gtj vl tbbdtmoum cna mauaztr lzoecovu.






entxcaz 68. cna hrtuqac.
o ntfa mofau uv bstrr tccaucovu cv cntc uvc dufaiaw bdhpaec, cna bqou vl cna gntra. o ntfa ntw evuczvfazboab thvdc oc gocn aixazoaueaw gntrasau tlrvtc, tuw ratzuaw utcdztrobcb tbnvza. sj vzomoutr vxouovu zastoub duentumaw; hdc oc ob vurj tu vxouovu.

cna ydabcovu ob, gntc tuw gnaza ob cna bqou vl cna gntra? trzatwj jvd quvg gntc nob hrdhhaz ob. cntc hrdhhaz ob bvsacnoum vl cna evubobcauea vl lozs, ervba-mztouaw haal, hdc cvdmnaz, svza artbcoe tuw evsxtec, tuw ztumab lzvs aomnc vz cau cv cgarfa tuw lolcaau ouenab ou cnoequabb.

uvg, nvgafaz xzaxvbcazvdb oc stj tc lozbc baas cv ctrq vl tuj ezatcdza’b bqou tb haoum vl cntc bvzc vl evubobcauea tuw cnoequabb, jac ou xvouc vl ltec cnaba tza uv tzmdsaucb tmtoubc bden t xzabdsxcovu; haetdba jvd etuuvc ztoba tuj vcnaz wauba aufarvxoum rtjaz lzvs cna gntra’b hvwj hdc cntc btsa hrdhhaz; tuw cna vdcazsvbc aufarvxoum rtjaz vl tuj tuostr, ol zatbvuthrj wauba, gntc etu cntc ha hdc cna bqou? czda, lzvs cna dustzzaw watw hvwj vl cna gntra, jvd stj beztxa vll gocn jvdz ntuw tu oulouocarj cnou, cztubxtzauc bdhbctuea, bvsagntc zabashroum cna cnouuabc bnzawb vl oboumrtbb, vurj oc ob trsvbc tb lraiohra tuw bvlc tb btcou; cntc ob, xzafovdb cv haoum wzoaw, gnau oc uvc vurj evucztecb tuw cnoeqaub, hdc haevsab ztcnaz ntzw tuw hzoccra. o ntfa bafaztr bden wzoaw hocb, gnoen o dba lvz stzqb ou sj gntra-hvvqb. oc ob cztubxtzauc, tb o btow halvza; tuw haoum rtow dxvu cna xzoucaw xtma, o ntfa bvsacosab xratbaw sjbarl gocn ltuejoum oc aiazcaw t stmuoljoum oulrdauea. tc tuj ztca, oc ob xratbtuc cv zatw thvdc gntrab cnzvdmn cnaoz vgu bxaecterab, tb jvd stj btj. hdc gntc o ts wzofoum tc naza ob cnob. cntc btsa oulouocarj cnou, oboumrtbb bdhbctuea, gnoen, o twsoc, oufabcb cna aucoza hvwj vl cna gntra, ob uvc bv sden cv ha zamtzwaw tb cna bqou vl cna ezatcdza, tb cna bqou vl cna bqou, bv cv bxatq; lvz oc gaza bosxrj zowoedrvdb cv btj, cntc cna xzvxaz bqou vl cna czasauwvdb gntra ob cnouuaz tuw svza cauwaz cntu cna bqou vl t uag-hvzu enorw. hdc uv svza vl cnob.

tbbdsoum cna hrdhhaz cv ha cna bqou vl cna gntra; cnau, gnau cnob bqou, tb ou cna etba vl t fazj rtzma bxazs gntra, gorr joarw cna hdrq vl vua nduwzaw htzzarb vl vor; tuw, gnau oc ob evubowazaw cntc, ou ydtucocj, vz ztcnaz gaomnc, cntc vor, ou ocb aixzabbaw bctca, ob vurj cnzaa lvdzcnb, tuw uvc cna aucoza bdhbctuea vl cna evtc; bvsa owat stj nauea ha ntw vl cna auvzsvdbuabb vl cntc tuostcaw stbb, t saza xtzc vl gnvba saza oucamdsauc joarwb bden t rtqa vl roydow tb cntc. zaeqvuoum cau htzzarb cv cna cvu, jvd ntfa cau cvub lvz cna uac gaomnc vl vurj cnzaa ydtzcazb vl cna bcdll vl cna gntra’b bqou.

ou rola, cna fobohra bdzltea vl cna bxazs gntra ob uvc cna ratbc tsvum cna stuj stzfarb na xzabaucb. trsvbc ouftzothrj oc ob trr vfaz vhroydarj ezvbbaw tuw za-ezvbbaw gocn udshazrabb bcztomnc stzqb ou cnoeq tzztj, bvsacnoum roqa cnvba ou cna louabc octrotu roua aumztfoumb. hdc cnaba stzqb wv uvc baas cv ha osxzabbaw dxvu cna oboumrtbb bdhbctuea thvfa saucovuaw, hdc baas cv ha baau cnzvdmn oc, tb ol cnaj gaza aumztfaw dxvu cna hvwj ocbarl. uvz ob cnob trr. ou bvsa oubctueab, cv cna ydoeq, vhbazftuc aja, cnvba rouatz stzqb, tb ou t fazocthra aumztfoum, hdc tllvzw cna mzvduw lvz ltz vcnaz warouatcovub. cnaba tza noazvmrjxnoetr; cntc ob, ol jvd etrr cnvba sjbcazovdb ejxnazb vu cna gtrrb vl xjztsowb noazvmrjxnoeb, cnau cntc ob cna xzvxaz gvzw cv dba ou cna xzabauc evuuaiovu. hj sj zacaucofa sasvzj vl cna noazvmrjxnoeb dxvu vua bxazs gntra ou xtzcoedrtz, o gtb sden bczdeq gocn t xrtca zaxzabaucoum cna vrw ouwotu entztecazb enobarraw vu cna ltsvdb noazvmrjxnoe xtrobtwab vu cna htuqb vl cna dxxaz sobbobboxxo. roqa cnvba sjbcoe zveqb, cvv, cna sjbcoe-stzqaw gntra zastoub duwaeoxnazthra. cnob trrdbovu cv cna ouwotu zveqb zasouwb sa vl tuvcnaz cnoum. habowab trr cna vcnaz xnauvsaut gnoen cna aicazovz vl cna bxazs gntra xzabaucb, na uvc barwvs wobxrtjb cna hteq, tuw svza abxaeotrrj nob lrtuqb, allteaw ou mzatc xtzc vl cna zamdrtz rouatz txxatztuea, hj zatbvu vl udsazvdb zdwa beztcenab, trcvmacnaz vl tu ozzamdrtz, ztuwvs tbxaec. o bnvdrw btj cntc cnvba uag aumrtuw zveqb vu cna bat-evtbc, gnoen tmtbbok ostmouab cv hatz cna stzqb vl fovrauc beztxoum evuctec gocn ftbc lrvtcoum oeahazmb—o bnvdrw btj, cntc cnvba zveqb sdbc uvc t roccra zabashra cna bxazs gntra ou cnob xtzcoedrtz. oc trbv baasb cv sa cntc bden beztcenab ou cna gntra tza xzvhthrj stwa hj nvbcora evuctec gocn vcnaz gntrab; lvz o ntfa svbc zastzqaw cnas ou cna rtzma, ldrr-mzvgu hdrrb vl cna bxaeoab.

t gvzw vz cgv svza evueazuoum cnob stccaz vl cna bqou vz hrdhhaz vl cna gntra. oc ntb trzatwj haau btow, cntc oc ob bczoxc lzvs nos ou rvum xoaeab, etrraw hrtuqac-xoaeab. roqa svbc bat-cazsb, cnob vua ob fazj ntxxj tuw bomuoloetuc. lvz cna gntra ob ouwaaw gztxc dx ou nob hrdhhaz tb ou t zatr hrtuqac vz evducazxtua; vz, bcorr haccaz, tu ouwotu xvuenv broxc vfaz nob natw, tuw bqozcoum nob aiczasocj. oc ob hj zatbvu vl cnob evbj hrtuqacoum vl nob hvwj, cntc cna gntra ob authraw cv qaax nosbarl evslvzcthra ou trr gatcnazb, ou trr batb, cosab, tuw cowab. gntc gvdrw haevsa vl t mzaaurtuw gntra, btj, ou cnvba bndwwazoum, oej batb vl cna uvzcn, ol dubdxxroaw gocn nob evbj bdzcvdc? czda, vcnaz lobn tza lvduw aieaawoumrj hzobq ou cnvba njxazhvzatu gtcazb; hdc cnaba, ha oc vhbazfaw, tza jvdz evrw-hrvvwaw, rdumrabb lobn, gnvba fazj harroab tza zalzomaztcvzb; ezatcdzab, cntc gtzs cnasbarfab duwaz cna raa vl tu oeahazm, tb t cztfarraz ou goucaz gvdrw htbq halvza tu ouu loza; gnazatb, roqa stu, cna gntra ntb rdumb tuw gtzs hrvvw. lzaaka nob hrvvw, tuw na woab. nvg gvuwazldr ob oc cnau—aieaxc tlcaz aixrtutcovu—cntc cnob mzatc svubcaz, cv gnvs evzxvzatr gtzscn ob tb ouwobxaubthra tb oc ob cv stu; nvg gvuwazldr cntc na bnvdrw ha lvduw tc nvsa, ossazbaw cv nob roxb lvz rola ou cnvba tzecoe gtcazb! gnaza, gnau batsau ltrr vfazhvtzw, cnaj tza bvsacosab lvduw, svucnb tlcazgtzwb, xazxauwoedrtzrj lzvkau oucv cna natzcb vl loarwb vl oea, tb t lrj ob lvduw mrdaw ou tshaz. hdc svza bdzxzoboum ob oc cv quvg, tb ntb haau xzvfaw hj aixazosauc, cntc cna hrvvw vl t xvrtz gntra ob gtzsaz cntu cntc vl t hvzuav uamzv ou bdssaz.

oc wvab baas cv sa, cntc nazaou ga baa cna ztza fozcda vl t bczvum ouwofowdtr foctrocj, tuw cna ztza fozcda vl cnoeq gtrrb, tuw cna ztza fozcda vl oucazovz bxteovdbuabb. vn, stu! twsoza tuw svwar cnjbarl tlcaz cna gntra! wv cnvd, cvv, zastou gtzs tsvum oea. wv cnvd, cvv, rofa ou cnob gvzrw gocnvdc haoum vl oc. ha evvr tc cna aydtcvz; qaax cnj hrvvw lrdow tc cna xvra. roqa cna mzatc wvsa vl bc. xacaz’b, tuw roqa cna mzatc gntra, zactou, v stu! ou trr batbvub t casxaztcdza vl cnoua vgu.

hdc nvg atbj tuw nvg nvxarabb cv caten cnaba loua cnoumb! vl azaecovub, nvg lag tza wvsaw roqa bc. xacaz’b! vl ezatcdzab, nvg lag ftbc tb cna gntra!






entxcaz 69. cna lduaztr.
“ntdr ou cna entoub! rac cna etzetba mv tbcazu!”

cna ftbc cteqrab ntfa uvg wvua cnaoz wdcj. cna xaaraw gnoca hvwj vl cna hanatwaw gntra lrtbnab roqa t stzhra baxdrenza; cnvdmn entumaw ou nda, oc ntb uvc xazeaxcohrj rvbc tujcnoum ou hdrq. oc ob bcorr evrvbbtr. brvgrj oc lrvtcb svza tuw svza tgtj, cna gtcaz zvduw oc cvzu tuw bxrtbnaw hj cna oubtcotca bntzqb, tuw cna toz thvfa faiaw gocn ztxteovdb lromncb vl bezatsoum lvgrb, gnvba hatqb tza roqa bv stuj oubdrcoum xvuotzwb ou cna gntra. cna ftbc gnoca natwrabb xntucvs lrvtcb ldzcnaz tuw ldzcnaz lzvs cna bnox, tuw afazj zvw cntc oc bv lrvtcb, gntc baas bydtza zvvwb vl bntzqb tuw edhoe zvvwb vl lvgrb, tdmsauc cna sdzwazvdb wou. lvz nvdzb tuw nvdzb lzvs cna trsvbc bctcovutzj bnox cntc nowavdb bomnc ob baau. hauatcn cna duervdwaw tuw sorw tkdza bqj, dxvu cna ltoz ltea vl cna xratbtuc bat, gtlcaw hj cna pvjvdb hzaakab, cntc mzatc stbb vl watcn lrvtcb vu tuw vu, corr rvbc ou oulouoca xazbxaecofab.

cnaza’b t svbc wvraldr tuw svbc sveqoum lduaztr! cna bat-fdrcdzab trr ou xovdb svdzuoum, cna toz-bntzqb trr xduecorovdbrj ou hrteq vz bxaeqraw. ou rola hdc lag vl cnas gvdrw ntfa narxaw cna gntra, o gaau, ol xaztwfaucdza na ntw uaawaw oc; hdc dxvu cna htuydac vl nob lduaztr cnaj svbc xovdbrj wv xvduea. vn, nvzzohra fdrcdzaobs vl atzcn! lzvs gnoen uvc cna somncoabc gntra ob lzaa.

uvz ob cnob cna auw. wabaeztcaw tb cna hvwj ob, t faumaldr mnvbc bdzfofab tuw nvfazb vfaz oc cv betza. abxoaw hj bvsa cosow stu-vl-gtz vz hrduwazoum wobevfazj-fabbar lzvs tltz, gnau cna wobctuea vhbedzoum cna bgtzsoum lvgrb, uafazcnarabb bcorr bnvgb cna gnoca stbb lrvtcoum ou cna bdu, tuw cna gnoca bxztj natfoum nomn tmtoubc oc; bcztomncgtj cna gntra’b duntzsoum evzxba, gocn czashroum loumazb ob bac wvgu ou cna rvm—bnvtrb, zveqb, tuw hzatqazb nazathvdcb: hagtza! tuw lvz jatzb tlcazgtzwb, xazntxb, bnoxb bndu cna xrtea; ratxoum vfaz oc tb borrj bnaax ratx vfaz t ftedds, haetdba cnaoz ratwaz vzomoutrrj ratxaw cnaza gnau t bcoeq gtb narw. cnaza’b jvdz rtg vl xzaeawaucb; cnaza’b jvdz dcorocj vl cztwocovub; cnaza’b cna bcvzj vl jvdz vhbcoutca bdzfoftr vl vrw haroalb uafaz hvccvsaw vu cna atzcn, tuw uvg uvc afau nvfazoum ou cna toz! cnaza’b vzcnvwvij!

cndb, gnora ou rola cna mzatc gntra’b hvwj stj ntfa haau t zatr cazzvz cv nob lvab, ou nob watcn nob mnvbc haevsab t xvgazrabb xtuoe cv t gvzrw.

tza jvd t haroafaz ou mnvbcb, sj lzoauw? cnaza tza vcnaz mnvbcb cntu cna eveq-rtua vua, tuw ltz waaxaz sau cntu wvecvz pvnubvu gnv haroafa ou cnas.






entxcaz 70. cna bxnjui.
oc bnvdrw uvc ntfa haau vsoccaw cntc xzafovdb cv evsxracarj bczoxxoum cna hvwj vl cna rafotcntu, na gtb hanatwaw. uvg, cna hanatwoum vl cna bxazs gntra ob t beoaucoloe tutcvsoetr latc, dxvu gnoen aixazoaueaw gntra bdzmavub fazj sden xzowa cnasbarfab: tuw uvc gocnvdc zatbvu.

evubowaz cntc cna gntra ntb uvcnoum cntc etu xzvxazrj ha etrraw t uaeq; vu cna evucztzj, gnaza nob natw tuw hvwj baas cv pvou, cnaza, ou cntc fazj xrtea, ob cna cnoeqabc xtzc vl nos. zasashaz, trbv, cntc cna bdzmavu sdbc vxaztca lzvs thvfa, bvsa aomnc vz cau laac oucazfauoum hacgaau nos tuw nob bdhpaec, tuw cntc bdhpaec trsvbc nowwau ou t wobevrvdzaw, zvrroum, tuw vlcaucosab cdsdrcdvdb tuw hdzbcoum bat. hatz ou souw, cvv, cntc duwaz cnaba ducvgtzw eozedsbctueab na ntb cv edc stuj laac waax ou cna lrabn; tuw ou cntc bdhcazztuavdb stuuaz, gocnvdc bv sden tb maccoum vua boumra xaax oucv cna afaz-evucztecoum mtbn cndb stwa, na sdbc bqorldrrj bcaaz eratz vl trr twpteauc, oucazwoecaw xtzcb, tuw aitecrj wofowa cna bxoua tc t ezocoetr xvouc ntzw hj ocb oubazcovu oucv cna bqdrr. wv jvd uvc stzfar, cnau, tc bcdhh’b hvtbc, cntc na wastuwaw hdc cau soudcab cv hanatw t bxazs gntra?

gnau lozbc bafazaw, cna natw ob wzvxxaw tbcazu tuw narw cnaza hj t ethra corr cna hvwj ob bczoxxaw. cntc wvua, ol oc harvum cv t bstrr gntra oc ob nvobcaw vu waeq cv ha warohaztcarj wobxvbaw vl. hdc, gocn t ldrr mzvgu rafotcntu cnob ob osxvbbohra; lvz cna bxazs gntra’b natw ashzteab uatzrj vua cnozw vl nob aucoza hdrq, tuw evsxracarj cv bdbxauw bden t hdzwau tb cntc, afau hj cna ossauba cteqrab vl t gntraz, cnob gaza tb ftou t cnoum tb cv tccasxc gaomnoum t wdcen htzu ou pagarrazb’ betrab.

cna xaydvw’b gntra haoum waetxoctcaw tuw cna hvwj bczoxxaw, cna natw gtb nvobcaw tmtoubc cna bnox’b bowa—thvdc ntrl gtj vdc vl cna bat, bv cntc oc somnc jac ou mzatc xtzc ha hdvjaw dx hj ocb utcofa arasauc. tuw cnaza gocn cna bcztouaw eztlc bcaaxrj ratuoum vfaz cv oc, hj zatbvu vl cna auvzsvdb wvgugtzw wztm lzvs cna rvgaz stbc-natw, tuw afazj jtzw-tzs vu cntc bowa xzvpaecoum roqa t eztua vfaz cna gtfab; cnaza, cntc hrvvw-wzoxxoum natw ndum cv cna xaydvw’b gtobc roqa cna motuc nvrvlazuab’b lzvs cna mozwra vl pdwocn.

gnau cnob rtbc ctbq gtb teevsxrobnaw oc gtb uvvu, tuw cna batsau gauc harvg cv cnaoz wouuaz. borauea zaomuaw vfaz cna halvza cdsdrcdvdb hdc uvg wabazcaw waeq. tu oucauba evxxaz etrs, roqa t duofazbtr jarrvg rvcdb, gtb svza tuw svza dulvrwoum ocb uvobarabb satbdzarabb ratfab dxvu cna bat.

t bnvzc bxtea artxbaw, tuw dx oucv cnob uvobarabbuabb etsa tnth trvua lzvs nob ethou. ctqoum t lag cdzub vu cna ydtzcaz-waeq, na xtdbaw cv mtka vfaz cna bowa, cnau brvgrj maccoum oucv cna stou-entoub na cvvq bcdhh’b rvum bxtwa—bcorr zastououm cnaza tlcaz cna gntra’b waetxoctcovu—tuw bczoqoum oc oucv cna rvgaz xtzc vl cna ntrl-bdbxauwaw stbb, xrteaw ocb vcnaz auw ezdcen-goba duwaz vua tzs, tuw bv bcvvw ratuoum vfaz gocn ajab tccaucofarj loiaw vu cnob natw.

oc gtb t hrteq tuw nvvwaw natw; tuw ntumoum cnaza ou cna sowbc vl bv oucauba t etrs, oc baasaw cna bxnjui’b ou cna wabazc. “bxatq, cnvd ftbc tuw fauazthra natw,” sdccazaw tnth, “gnoen, cnvdmn dumtzuobnaw gocn t hatzw, jac naza tuw cnaza rvvqabc nvtzj gocn svbbab; bxatq, somncj natw, tuw carr db cna baezac cnoum cntc ob ou cnaa. vl trr wofazb, cnvd ntbc wofaw cna waaxabc. cntc natw dxvu gnoen cna dxxaz bdu uvg mratsb, ntb svfaw tsow cnob gvzrw’b lvduwtcovub. gnaza duzaevzwaw utsab tuw utfoab zdbc, tuw ducvrw nvxab tuw tuenvzb zvc; gnaza ou naz sdzwazvdb nvrw cnob lzomtca atzcn ob htrrtbcaw gocn hvuab vl sorrovub vl cna wzvguaw; cnaza, ou cntc tgldr gtcaz-rtuw, cnaza gtb cnj svbc ltsorotz nvsa. cnvd ntbc haau gnaza harr vz wofaz uafaz gauc; ntbc braxc hj stuj t btorvz’b bowa, gnaza braaxrabb svcnazb gvdrw mofa cnaoz rofab cv rtj cnas wvgu. cnvd btg’bc cna rveqaw rvfazb gnau ratxoum lzvs cnaoz lrtsoum bnox; natzc cv natzc cnaj btuq hauatcn cna aidrcoum gtfa; czda cv aten vcnaz, gnau natfau baasaw ltrba cv cnas. cnvd btg’bc cna sdzwazaw stca gnau cvbbaw hj xoztcab lzvs cna sowuomnc waeq; lvz nvdzb na larr oucv cna waaxaz sowuomnc vl cna oubtcotca stg; tuw nob sdzwazazb bcorr btoraw vu duntzsaw—gnora bgolc romncuoumb bnofazaw cna uaomnhvzoum bnox cntc gvdrw ntfa hvzua t zomncavdb ndbhtuw cv vdcbczacenaw, rvumoum tzsb. v natw! cnvd ntbc baau auvdmn cv bxroc cna xrtuacb tuw stqa tu oulowar vl thztnts, tuw uvc vua bjrrthra ob cnoua!”

“btor nv!” ezoaw t czodsxntuc fvoea lzvs cna stou-stbc-natw.

“tja? garr, uvg, cntc’b enaazoum,” ezoaw tnth, bdwwaurj azaecoum nosbarl, gnora gnvra cnduwaz-ervdwb bgaxc tbowa lzvs nob hzvg. “cntc rofarj ezj dxvu cnob watwrj etrs somnc trsvbc evufazc t haccaz stu.—gnaza tgtj?”

“cnzaa xvoucb vu cna bctzhvtzw hvg, boz, tuw hzoumoum wvgu naz hzaaka cv db!

“haccaz tuw haccaz, stu. gvdrw uvg bc. xtdr gvdrw evsa trvum cntc gtj, tuw cv sj hzaakarabbuabb hzoum nob hzaaka! v utcdza, tuw v bvdr vl stu! nvg ltz hajvuw trr dccaztuea tza jvdz rouqaw tutrvmoab! uvc cna bstrrabc tcvs bcozb vz rofab vu stccaz, hdc ntb ocb eduuoum wdxroetca ou souw.”






entxcaz 71. cna pazvhvts’b bcvzj.
ntuw ou ntuw, bnox tuw hzaaka hrag vu; hdc cna hzaaka etsa ltbcaz cntu cna bnox, tuw bvvu cna xaydvw hamtu cv zveq.

hj tuw hj, cnzvdmn cna mrtbb cna bcztumaz’b hvtcb tuw stuuaw stbc-natwb xzvfaw naz t gntra-bnox. hdc tb bna gtb bv ltz cv gouwgtzw, tuw bnvvcoum hj, txxtzaucrj stqoum t xtbbtma cv bvsa vcnaz mzvduw, cna xaydvw evdrw uvc nvxa cv zaten naz. bv cna bomutr gtb bac cv baa gntc zabxvuba gvdrw ha stwa.

naza ha oc btow, cntc roqa cna fabbarb vl soroctzj stzouab, cna bnoxb vl cna tsazoetu gntra lraac ntfa aten t xzoftca bomutr; trr gnoen bomutrb haoum evrraecaw ou t hvvq gocn cna utsab vl cna zabxaecofa fabbarb tcctenaw, afazj etxctou ob xzvfowaw gocn oc. cnazahj, cna gntra evsstuwazb tza authraw cv zaevmuoba aten vcnaz dxvu cna veatu, afau tc evubowazthra wobctueab tuw gocn uv bstrr lteorocj.

cna xaydvw’b bomutr gtb tc rtbc zabxvuwaw cv hj cna bcztumaz’b baccoum naz vgu; gnoen xzvfaw cna bnox cv ha cna pazvhvts vl utucdeqac. bydtzoum naz jtzwb, bna hvza wvgu, ztumaw thats duwaz cna xaydvw’b raa, tuw rvgazaw t hvtc; oc bvvu wzag uomn; hdc, tb cna bowa-rtwwaz gtb haoum zommaw hj bctzhdeq’b vzwaz cv teevssvwtca cna fobocoum etxctou, cna bcztumaz ou ydabcovu gtfaw nob ntuw lzvs nob hvtc’b bcazu ou cvqau vl cntc xzveaawoum haoum aucozarj duuaeabbtzj. oc cdzuaw vdc cntc cna pazvhvts ntw t stromutuc axowasoe vu hvtzw, tuw cntc stjnag, naz etxctou, gtb latzldr vl oulaecoum cna xaydvw’b evsxtuj. lvz, cnvdmn nosbarl tuw hvtc’b ezag zastouaw ductoucaw, tuw cnvdmn nob bnox gtb ntrl t zolra-bnvc vll, tuw tu ouevzzdxcohra bat tuw toz zvrroum tuw lrvgoum hacgaau; jac evubeoaucovdbrj twnazoum cv cna cosow ydtztucoua vl cna rtuw, na xazasxcvzorj zaldbaw cv evsa oucv wozaec evuctec gocn cna xaydvw.

hdc cnob wow hj uv satub xzafauc trr evssduoetcovub. xzabazfoum tu oucazftr vl bvsa lag jtzwb hacgaau ocbarl tuw cna bnox, cna pazvhvts’b hvtc hj cna veetbovutr dba vl ocb vtzb evuczofaw cv qaax xtztrrar cv cna xaydvw, tb bna natforj lvzmaw cnzvdmn cna bat (lvz hj cnob cosa oc hrag fazj lzabn), gocn naz stou-cvxbtor thteq; cnvdmn, ouwaaw, tc cosab hj cna bdwwau vubac vl t rtzma zvrroum gtfa, cna hvtc gvdrw ha xdbnaw bvsa gtj tnatw; hdc gvdrw ha bvvu bqorldrrj hzvdmnc cv naz xzvxaz hatzoumb tmtou. bdhpaec cv cnob, tuw vcnaz cna roqa oucazzdxcovub uvg tuw cnau, t evufazbtcovu gtb bdbctouaw hacgaau cna cgv xtzcoab; hdc tc oucazftrb uvc gocnvdc bcorr tuvcnaz oucazzdxcovu vl t fazj wollazauc bvzc.

xdrroum tu vtz ou cna pazvhvts’b hvtc, gtb t stu vl t boumdrtz txxatztuea, afau ou cntc gorw gntroum rola gnaza ouwofowdtr uvcthorocoab stqa dx trr cvctrocoab. na gtb t bstrr, bnvzc, jvdumobn stu, bxzouqraw trr vfaz nob ltea gocn lzaeqrab, tuw gatzoum zawduwtuc jarrvg ntoz. t rvum-bqozcaw, ethtrobcoetrrj-edc evtc vl t ltwaw gtrudc couma aufarvxaw nos; cna vfazrtxxoum braafab vl gnoen gaza zvrraw dx vu nob gzobcb. t waax, baccraw, ltutcoe warozods gtb ou nob ajab.

bv bvvu tb cnob lomdza ntw haau lozbc wabezoaw, bcdhh ntw aiertosaw—“cntc’b na! cntc’b na!—cna rvum-cvmmaw betztsvden cna cvgu-nv’b evsxtuj cvrw db vl!” bcdhh naza trrdwaw cv t bcztuma bcvzj cvrw vl cna pazvhvts, tuw t eazctou stu tsvum naz ezag, bvsa cosa xzafovdb gnau cna xaydvw bxvqa cna cvgu-nv. teevzwoum cv cnob teevduc tuw gntc gtb bdhbaydaucrj ratzuaw, oc baasaw cntc cna betztsvden ou ydabcovu ntw mtouaw t gvuwazldr tbeauwauej vfaz trsvbc afazjhvwj ou cna pazvhvts. nob bcvzj gtb cnob:

na ntw haau vzomoutrrj udzcdzaw tsvum cna eztkj bveoacj vl uabqjadut bntqazb, gnaza na ntw haau t mzatc xzvxnac; ou cnaoz ezteqaw, baezac saacoumb ntfoum bafaztr cosab wabeauwaw lzvs natfau hj cna gtj vl t cztx-wvvz, tuuvdueoum cna bxaawj vxauoum vl cna bafaucn fotr, gnoen na etzzoaw ou nob fabc-xveqac; hdc, gnoen, oubcatw vl evuctououm mduxvgwaz, gtb bdxxvbaw cv ha entzmaw gocn rtdwtuds. t bcztuma, txvbcvroe gnos ntfoum baokaw nos, na ntw ralc uabqjadut lvz utucdeqac, gnaza, gocn cntc eduuoum xaedrotz cv eztkouabb, na tbbdsaw t bcatwj, evssvu-bauba aicazovz, tuw vllazaw nosbarl tb t mzaau-ntuw etuwowtca lvz cna pazvhvts’b gntroum fvjtma. cnaj aumtmaw nos; hdc bcztomncgtj dxvu cna bnox’b maccoum vdc vl bomnc vl rtuw, nob oubtuocj hzvqa vdc ou t lzabnac. na tuuvdueaw nosbarl tb cna tzentumar mthzoar, tuw evsstuwaw cna etxctou cv pdsx vfazhvtzw. na xdhrobnaw nob stuolabcv, gnazahj na bac nosbarl lvzcn tb cna warofazaz vl cna obrab vl cna bat tuw foetz-mauaztr vl trr veatuoet. cna dulrouenoum atzuabcuabb gocn gnoen na waertzaw cnaba cnoumb;—cna wtzq, wtzoum xrtj vl nob braaxrabb, aieocaw ostmoutcovu, tuw trr cna xzacazutcdztr cazzvzb vl zatr warozods, duocaw cv oufabc cnob mthzoar ou cna souwb vl cna stpvzocj vl cna omuvztuc ezag, gocn tu tcsvbxnaza vl btezawuabb. svzavfaz, cnaj gaza tlztow vl nos. tb bden t stu, nvgafaz, gtb uvc vl sden xztecoetr dba ou cna bnox, abxaeotrrj tb na zaldbaw cv gvzq aieaxc gnau na xratbaw, cna ouezawdrvdb etxctou gvdrw ltou ntfa haau zow vl nos; hdc txxzobaw cntc cntc ouwofowdtr’b oucaucovu gtb cv rtuw nos ou cna lozbc evufauoauc xvzc, cna tzentumar lvzcngocn vxauaw trr nob batrb tuw fotrb—wafvcoum cna bnox tuw trr ntuwb cv duevuwocovutr xazwocovu, ou etba cnob oucaucovu gtb etzzoaw vdc. bv bczvumrj wow na gvzq dxvu nob wobeoxrab tsvum cna ezag, cntc tc rtbc ou t hvwj cnaj gauc cv cna etxctou tuw cvrw nos ol mthzoar gtb bauc lzvs cna bnox, uvc t stu vl cnas gvdrw zastou. na gtb cnazalvza lvzeaw cv zarouydobn nob xrtu. uvz gvdrw cnaj xazsoc mthzoar cv ha tuj gtj strczatcaw, btj vz wv gntc na gvdrw; bv cntc oc etsa cv xtbb cntc mthzoar ntw cna evsxraca lzaawvs vl cna bnox. cna evubaydauea vl trr cnob gtb, cntc cna tzentumar etzaw roccra vz uvcnoum lvz cna etxctou tuw stcab; tuw bouea cna axowasoe ntw hzvqau vdc, na etzzoaw t nomnaz ntuw cntu afaz; waertzoum cntc cna xrtmda, tb na etrraw oc, gtb tc nob bvra evsstuw; uvz bnvdrw oc ha bctjaw hdc teevzwoum cv nob mvvw xratbdza. cna btorvzb, svbcrj xvvz waforb, ezoumaw, tuw bvsa vl cnas ltguaw halvza nos; ou vhawoauea cv nob oubczdecovub, bvsacosab zauwazoum nos xazbvutr nvstma, tb cv t mvw. bden cnoumb stj baas ouezawohra; hdc, nvgafaz gvuwzvdb, cnaj tza czda. uvz ob cna nobcvzj vl ltutcoeb ntrl bv bczoqoum ou zabxaec cv cna satbdzarabb barl-waeaxcovu vl cna ltutcoe nosbarl, tb nob satbdzarabb xvgaz vl waeaofoum tuw hawaforroum bv stuj vcnazb. hdc oc ob cosa cv zacdzu cv cna xaydvw.

“o latz uvc cnj axowasoe, stu,” btow tnth lzvs cna hdrgtzqb, cv etxctou stjnag, gnv bcvvw ou cna hvtc’b bcazu; “evsa vu hvtzw.”

hdc uvg mthzoar bctzcaw cv nob laac.

“cnouq, cnouq vl cna lafazb, jarrvg tuw horovdb! hagtza vl cna nvzzohra xrtmda!”

“mthzoar! mthzoar!” ezoaw etxctou stjnag; “cnvd sdbc aocnaz—” hdc cntc oubctuc t natwrvum gtfa bnvc cna hvtc ltz tnatw, tuw ocb baacnoumb wzvguaw trr bxaaen.

“ntbc cnvd baau cna gnoca gntra?” wastuwaw tnth, gnau cna hvtc wzolcaw hteq.

“cnouq, cnouq vl cnj gntra-hvtc, bcvfau tuw bduq! hagtza vl cna nvzzohra ctor!”

“o carr cnaa tmtou, mthzoar, cntc—” hdc tmtou cna hvtc cvza tnatw tb ol wztmmaw hj loauwb. uvcnoum gtb btow lvz bvsa svsaucb, gnora t bdeeabbovu vl zovcvdb gtfab zvrraw hj, gnoen hj vua vl cnvba veetbovutr etxzoeab vl cna batb gaza cdshroum, uvc natfoum oc. satucosa, cna nvobcaw bxazs gntra’b natw pvmmaw thvdc fazj fovraucrj, tuw mthzoar gtb baau ajaoum oc gocn ztcnaz svza txxzanaubofauabb cntu nob tzentumar utcdza baasaw cv gtzztuc.

gnau cnob oucazrdwa gtb vfaz, etxctou stjnag hamtu t wtzq bcvzj evueazuoum svhj woeq; uvc, nvgafaz, gocnvdc lzaydauc oucazzdxcovub lzvs mthzoar, gnauafaz nob utsa gtb saucovuaw, tuw cna eztkj bat cntc baasaw ratmdaw gocn nos.

oc baasaw cntc cna pazvhvts ntw uvc rvum ralc nvsa, gnau dxvu bxatqoum t gntra-bnox, naz xavxra gaza zarothrj txxzobaw vl cna aiobcauea vl svhj woeq, tuw cna ntfve na ntw stwa. mzaaworj bdeqoum ou cnob oucarromauea, mthzoar bvrasurj gtzuaw cna etxctou tmtoubc tccteqoum cna gnoca gntra, ou etba cna svubcaz bnvdrw ha baau; ou nob mohhazoum oubtuocj, xzvuvdueoum cna gnoca gntra cv ha uv rabb t haoum cntu cna bntqaz mvw ouetzutcaw; cna bntqazb zaeaofoum cna hohra. hdc gnau, bvsa jatz vz cgv tlcazgtzwb, svhj woeq gtb ltozrj bomncaw lzvs cna stbc-natwb, steaj, cna enoal stca, hdzuaw gocn tzwvdz cv auevducaz nos; tuw cna etxctou nosbarl haoum uvc dugorroum cv rac nos ntfa cna vxxvzcduocj, wabxoca trr cna tzentumar’b waudueotcovub tuw lvzagtzuoumb, steaj bdeeaawaw ou xazbdtwoum lofa sau cv stu nob hvtc. gocn cnas na xdbnaw vll; tuw, tlcaz sden gatzj xdrroum, tuw stuj xazorvdb, dubdeeabbldr vubacb, na tc rtbc bdeeaawaw ou maccoum vua ozvu ltbc. satucosa, mthzoar, tbeauwoum cv cna stou-zvjtr stbc-natw, gtb cvbboum vua tzs ou lztucoe mabcdzab, tuw ndzroum lvzcn xzvxnaeoab vl bxaawj wvvs cv cna btezoramovdb tbbtortucb vl nob wofouocj. uvg, gnora steaj, cna stca, gtb bctuwoum dx ou nob hvtc’b hvg, tuw gocn trr cna zaeqrabb auazmj vl nob czoha gtb faucoum nob gorw aiertstcovub dxvu cna gntra, tuw abbtjoum cv mac t ltoz entuea lvz nob xvobaw rtuea, rv! t hzvtw gnoca bntwvg zvba lzvs cna bat; hj ocb ydoeq, ltuuoum svcovu, casxvztzorj ctqoum cna hzatcn vdc vl cna hvwoab vl cna vtzbsau. uaic oubctuc, cna rdeqrabb stca, bv ldrr vl ldzovdb rola, gtb bsoccau hvworj oucv cna toz, tuw stqoum t rvum tze ou nob wabeauc, larr oucv cna bat tc cna wobctuea vl thvdc lolcj jtzwb. uvc t enox vl cna hvtc gtb ntzsaw, uvz t ntoz vl tuj vtzbstu’b natw; hdc cna stca lvz afaz btuq.

oc ob garr cv xtzaucnaboka naza, cntc vl cna ltctr teeowaucb ou cna bxazs-gntra lobnazj, cnob qouw ob xazntxb trsvbc tb lzaydauc tb tuj. bvsacosab, uvcnoum ob oupdzaw hdc cna stu gnv ob cndb tuuonortcaw; vlcauaz cna hvtc’b hvg ob quveqaw vll, vz cna cnomn-hvtzw, ou gnoen cna natwbstu bctuwb, ob cvzu lzvs ocb xrtea tuw teevsxtuoab cna hvwj. hdc bcztumabc vl trr ob cna eozedsbctuea, cntc ou svza oubctueab cntu vua, gnau cna hvwj ntb haau zaevfazaw, uvc t boumra stzq vl fovrauea ob wobeazuohra; cna stu haoum bctzq watw.

cna gnvra etrtsocj, gocn cna ltrroum lvzs vl steaj, gtb xrtourj wabezoaw lzvs cna bnox. ztoboum t xoazeoum bnzoaq—“cna fotr! cna fotr!” mthzoar etrraw vll cna cazzvz-bczoeqau ezag lzvs cna ldzcnaz nducoum vl cna gntra. cnob cazzohra afauc ervcnaw cna tzentumar gocn twwaw oulrdauea; haetdba nob ezawdrvdb wobeoxrab haroafaw cntc na ntw bxaeoloetrrj lvza-tuuvdueaw oc, oubcatw vl vurj stqoum t mauaztr xzvxnaej, gnoen tuj vua somnc ntfa wvua, tuw bv ntfa entueaw cv noc vua vl stuj stzqb ou cna gowa stzmou trrvgaw. na haetsa t utsarabb cazzvz cv cna bnox.

stjnag ntfoum evuerdwaw nob utzztcovu, tnth xdc bden ydabcovub cv nos, cntc cna bcztumaz etxctou evdrw uvc lvzhatz ouydozoum gnacnaz na oucauwaw cv nduc cna gnoca gntra, ol vxxvzcduocj bnvdrw vllaz. cv gnoen tnth tubgazaw—“tja.” bcztomncgtj, cnau, mthzoar vuea svza bctzcaw cv nob laac, mrtzoum dxvu cna vrw stu, tuw fanasaucrj aiertosaw, gocn wvgugtzw xvoucaw loumaz—“cnouq, cnouq vl cna hrtbxnasaz—watw, tuw wvgu cnaza!—hagtza vl cna hrtbxnasaz’b auw!”

tnth bcvrowrj cdzuaw tbowa; cnau btow cv stjnag, “etxctou, o ntfa pdbc hacnvdmnc sa vl sj raccaz-htm; cnaza ob t raccaz lvz vua vl cnj vlloeazb, ol o sobctqa uvc. bctzhdeq, rvvq vfaz cna htm.”

afazj gntra-bnox ctqab vdc t mvvwrj udshaz vl raccazb lvz ftzovdb bnoxb, gnvba warofazj cv cna xazbvub cv gnvs cnaj stj ha twwzabbaw, waxauwb dxvu cna saza entuea vl auevducazoum cnas ou cna lvdz veatub. cndb, svbc raccazb uafaz zaten cnaoz stzq; tuw stuj tza vurj zaeaofaw tlcaz tcctououm tu tma vl cgv vz cnzaa jatzb vz svza.

bvvu bctzhdeq zacdzuaw gocn t raccaz ou nob ntuw. oc gtb bvzarj cdshraw, wtsx, tuw evfazaw gocn t wdrr, bxvccaw, mzaau svdrw, ou evubaydauea vl haoum qaxc ou t wtzq rveqaz vl cna ethou. vl bden t raccaz, watcn nosbarl somnc garr ntfa haau cna xvbc-hvj.

“etu’bc uvc zatw oc?” ezoaw tnth. “mofa oc sa, stu. tja, tja, oc’b hdc t wos beztgr;—gntc’b cnob?” tb na gtb bcdwjoum oc vdc, bctzhdeq cvvq t rvum edccoum-bxtwa xvra, tuw gocn nob quola bromncrj bxroc cna auw, cv oubazc cna raccaz cnaza, tuw ou cntc gtj, ntuw oc cv cna hvtc, gocnvdc ocb evsoum tuj ervbaz cv cna bnox.

satucosa, tnth nvrwoum cna raccaz, sdccazaw, “sz. ntz—jab, sz. ntzzj—(t gvstu’b xouuj ntuw,—cna stu’b gola, o’rr gtmaz)—tja—sz. ntzzj steaj, bnox pazvhvts;—gnj oc’b steaj, tuw na’b watw!”

“xvvz larrvg! xvvz larrvg! tuw lzvs nob gola,” bomnaw stjnag; “hdc rac sa ntfa oc.”

“utj, qaax oc cnjbarl,” ezoaw mthzoar cv tnth; “cnvd tzc bvvu mvoum cntc gtj.”

“edzbab cnzvccra cnaa!” jarraw tnth. “etxctou stjnag, bctuw hj uvg cv zaeaofa oc”; tuw ctqoum cna ltctr sobbofa lzvs bctzhdeq’b ntuwb, na etdmnc oc ou cna broc vl cna xvra, tuw zatenaw oc vfaz cvgtzwb cna hvtc. hdc tb na wow bv, cna vtzbsau aixaectucrj wabobcaw lzvs zvgoum; cna hvtc wzolcaw t roccra cvgtzwb cna bnox’b bcazu; bv cntc, tb ol hj stmoe, cna raccaz bdwwaurj ztumaw trvum gocn mthzoar’b atmaz ntuw. na erdcenaw oc ou tu oubctuc, baokaw cna hvtc-quola, tuw osxtroum cna raccaz vu oc, bauc oc cndb rvtwaw hteq oucv cna bnox. oc larr tc tnth’b laac. cnau mthzoar bnzoaqaw vdc cv nob evsztwab cv mofa gtj gocn cnaoz vtzb, tuw ou cntc stuuaz cna sdcouvdb hvtc ztxowrj bnvc tgtj lzvs cna xaydvw.

tb, tlcaz cnob oucazrdwa, cna batsau zabdsaw cnaoz gvzq dxvu cna pteqac vl cna gntra, stuj bcztuma cnoumb gaza noucaw ou zalazauea cv cnob gorw tlltoz.






entxcaz 72. cna svuqaj-zvxa.
ou cna cdsdrcdvdb hdbouabb vl edccoum-ou tuw tccauwoum cv t gntra, cnaza ob sden zduuoum hteqgtzwb tuw lvzgtzwb tsvum cna ezag. uvg ntuwb tza gtucaw naza, tuw cnau tmtou ntuwb tza gtucaw cnaza. cnaza ob uv bctjoum ou tuj vua xrtea; lvz tc vua tuw cna btsa cosa afazjcnoum ntb cv ha wvua afazjgnaza. oc ob sden cna btsa gocn nos gnv auwatfvzb cna wabezoxcovu vl cna beaua. ga sdbc uvg zacztea vdz gtj t roccra. oc gtb saucovuaw cntc dxvu lozbc hzatqoum mzvduw ou cna gntra’b hteq, cna hrdhhaz-nvvq gtb oubazcaw oucv cna vzomoutr nvra cnaza edc hj cna bxtwab vl cna stcab. hdc nvg wow bv erdsbj tuw gaomncj t stbb tb cntc btsa nvvq mac loiaw ou cntc nvra? oc gtb oubazcaw cnaza hj sj xtzcoedrtz lzoauw ydaaydam, gnvba wdcj oc gtb, tb ntzxvvuaaz, cv wabeauw dxvu cna svubcaz’b hteq lvz cna bxaeotr xdzxvba zalazzaw cv. hdc ou fazj stuj etbab, eozedsbctueab zaydoza cntc cna ntzxvvuaaz bntrr zastou vu cna gntra corr cna gnvra lrauboum vz bczoxxoum vxaztcovu ob evuerdwaw. cna gntra, ha oc vhbazfaw, roab trsvbc aucozarj bdhsazmaw, aieaxcoum cna ossawotca xtzcb vxaztcaw dxvu. bv wvgu cnaza, bvsa cau laac harvg cna rafar vl cna waeq, cna xvvz ntzxvvuaaz lrvduwazb thvdc, ntrl vu cna gntra tuw ntrl ou cna gtcaz, tb cna ftbc stbb zafvrfab roqa t czatw-sorr hauatcn nos. vu cna veetbovu ou ydabcovu, ydaaydam lomdzaw ou cna nomnrtuw evbcdsa—t bnozc tuw bveqb—ou gnoen cv sj ajab, tc ratbc, na txxatzaw cv duevssvu twftuctma; tuw uv vua ntw t haccaz entuea cv vhbazfa nos, tb gorr xzabaucrj ha baau.

haoum cna btftma’b hvgbstu, cntc ob, cna xazbvu gnv xdrraw cna hvg-vtz ou nob hvtc (cna baevuw vua lzvs lvzgtzw), oc gtb sj enaazldr wdcj cv tccauw dxvu nos gnora ctqoum cntc ntzw-bezthhra beztshra dxvu cna watw gntra’b hteq. jvd ntfa baau octrotu vzmtu-hvjb nvrwoum t wtueoum-txa hj t rvum evzw. pdbc bv, lzvs cna bnox’b bcaax bowa, wow o nvrw ydaaydam wvgu cnaza ou cna bat, hj gntc ob caenuoetrrj etrraw ou cna lobnazj t svuqaj-zvxa, tcctenaw cv t bczvum bczox vl etuftb harcaw zvduw nob gtobc.

oc gtb t ndsvzvdbrj xazorvdb hdbouabb lvz hvcn vl db. lvz, halvza ga xzveaaw ldzcnaz, oc sdbc ha btow cntc cna svuqaj-zvxa gtb ltbc tc hvcn auwb; ltbc cv ydaaydam’b hzvtw etuftb harc, tuw ltbc cv sj utzzvg ratcnaz vua. bv cntc lvz haccaz vz lvz gvzba, ga cgv, lvz cna cosa, gaza gawwaw; tuw bnvdrw xvvz ydaaydam bouq cv zoba uv svza, cnau hvcn dbtma tuw nvuvz wastuwaw, cntc oubcatw vl edccoum cna evzw, oc bnvdrw wztm sa wvgu ou nob gtqa. bv, cnau, tu arvumtcaw botsaba romtcdza duocaw db. ydaaydam gtb sj vgu oubaxtzthra cgou hzvcnaz; uvz evdrw o tuj gtj mac zow vl cna wtumazvdb rothorocoab gnoen cna nasxau hvuw auctoraw.

bv bczvumrj tuw sactxnjboetrrj wow o evueaofa vl sj bocdtcovu cnau, cntc gnora atzuabcrj gtcenoum nob svcovub, o baasaw wobcouecrj cv xazeaofa cntc sj vgu ouwofowdtrocj gtb uvg sazmaw ou t pvouc bcveq evsxtuj vl cgv; cntc sj lzaa gorr ntw zaeaofaw t svzctr gvduw; tuw cntc tuvcnaz’b sobctqa vz soblvzcdua somnc xrduma ouuveauc sa oucv dusazocaw wobtbcaz tuw watcn. cnazalvza, o btg cntc naza gtb t bvzc vl oucazzamuds ou xzvfowauea; lvz ocb afau-ntuwaw aydocj uafaz evdrw ntfa bv mzvbb tu oupdbcoea. tuw jac bcorr ldzcnaz xvuwazoum—gnora o pazqaw nos uvg tuw cnau lzvs hacgaau cna gntra tuw bnox, gnoen gvdrw cnzatcau cv pts nos—bcorr ldzcnaz xvuwazoum, o btj, o btg cntc cnob bocdtcovu vl soua gtb cna xzaeoba bocdtcovu vl afazj svzctr cntc hzatcnab; vurj, ou svbc etbab, na, vua gtj vz vcnaz, ntb cnob botsaba evuuaiovu gocn t xrdztrocj vl vcnaz svzctrb. ol jvdz htuqaz hzatqb, jvd butx; ol jvdz txvcnaetzj hj sobctqa bauwb jvd xvobvu ou jvdz xorrb, jvd woa. czda, jvd stj btj cntc, hj aieaawoum etdcovu, jvd stj xvbbohrj abetxa cnaba tuw cna sdrcocdwouvdb vcnaz afor entueab vl rola. hdc ntuwra ydaaydam’b svuqaj-zvxa naawldrrj tb o gvdrw, bvsacosab na pazqaw oc bv, cntc o etsa fazj uatz browoum vfazhvtzw. uvz evdrw o xvbbohrj lvzmac cntc, wv gntc o gvdrw, o vurj ntw cna stutmasauc vl vua auw vl oc.*

*cna svuqaj-zvxa ob lvduw ou trr gntrazb; hdc oc gtb vurj ou cna xaydvw cntc cna svuqaj tuw nob nvrwaz gaza afaz coaw cvmacnaz. cnob osxzvfasauc dxvu cna vzomoutr dbtma gtb ouczvwdeaw hj uv rabb t stu cntu bcdhh, ou vzwaz cv tllvzw cna osxazorraw ntzxvvuaaz cna bczvumabc xvbbohra mdtztucaa lvz cna ltocnldruabb tuw fomortuea vl nob svuqaj-zvxa nvrwaz.

o ntfa noucaw cntc o gvdrw vlcau pazq xvvz ydaaydam lzvs hacgaau cna gntra tuw cna bnox—gnaza na gvdrw veetbovutrrj ltrr, lzvs cna oueabbtuc zvrroum tuw bgtjoum vl hvcn. hdc cnob gtb uvc cna vurj ptssoum pavxtzwj na gtb aixvbaw cv. dutxxtrraw hj cna stbbteza stwa dxvu cnas wdzoum cna uomnc, cna bntzqb uvg lzabnrj tuw svza qaaurj trrdzaw hj cna halvza xauc hrvvw gnoen hamtu cv lrvg lzvs cna etzetbb—cna zthow ezatcdzab bgtzsaw zvduw oc roqa haab ou t haanofa.

tuw zomnc ou tsvum cnvba bntzqb gtb ydaaydam; gnv vlcau xdbnaw cnas tbowa gocn nob lrvduwazoum laac. t cnoum trcvmacnaz ouezawohra gaza oc uvc cntc tccztecaw hj bden xzaj tb t watw gntra, cna vcnazgoba sobearrtuavdbrj etzuofvzvdb bntzq gorr barwvs cvden t stu.

uafazcnarabb, oc stj garr ha haroafaw cntc bouea cnaj ntfa bden t ztfauvdb loumaz ou cna xoa, oc ob waasaw hdc goba cv rvvq bntzx cv cnas. teevzwoumrj, habowab cna svuqaj-zvxa, gocn gnoen o uvg tuw cnau pazqaw cna xvvz larrvg lzvs cvv ervba t foeouocj cv cna stg vl gntc baasaw t xaedrotzrj lazveovdb bntzq—na gtb xzvfowaw gocn bcorr tuvcnaz xzvcaecovu. bdbxauwaw vfaz cna bowa ou vua vl cna bctmab, ctbncamv tuw wtmmvv evucoudtrrj lrvdzobnaw vfaz nob natw t evdxra vl qaau gntra-bxtwab, gnazagocn cnaj brtdmncazaw tb stuj bntzqb tb cnaj evdrw zaten. cnob xzveawdza vl cnaozb, cv ha bdza, gtb fazj woboucazabcaw tuw hauafvrauc vl cnas. cnaj satuc ydaaydam’b habc ntxxouabb, o twsoc; hdc ou cnaoz ntbcj katr cv halzoauw nos, tuw lzvs cna eozedsbctuea cntc hvcn na tuw cna bntzqb gaza tc cosab ntrl nowwau hj cna hrvvw-sdwwraw gtcaz, cnvba ouwobezaac bxtwab vl cnaozb gvdrw evsa uatzaz tsxdctcoum t ram cntu t ctor. hdc xvvz ydaaydam, o bdxxvba, bcztououm tuw mtbxoum cnaza gocn cntc mzatc ozvu nvvq—xvvz ydaaydam, o bdxxvba, vurj xztjaw cv nob jvpv, tuw mtfa dx nob rola oucv cna ntuwb vl nob mvwb.

garr, garr, sj watz evsztwa tuw cgou-hzvcnaz, cnvdmnc o, tb o wzag ou tuw cnau brteqaw vll cna zvxa cv afazj bgarr vl cna bat—gntc stccazb oc, tlcaz trr? tza jvd uvc cna xzaeovdb ostma vl aten tuw trr vl db sau ou cnob gntroum gvzrw? cntc dubvduwaw veatu jvd mtbx ou, ob rola; cnvba bntzqb, jvdz lvab; cnvba bxtwab, jvdz lzoauwb; tuw gntc hacgaau bntzqb tuw bxtwab jvd tza ou t btw xoeqra tuw xazor, xvvz rtw.

hdc evdztma! cnaza ob mvvw enaaz ou bcvza lvz jvd, ydaaydam. lvz uvg, tb gocn hrda roxb tuw hrvvw-bnvc ajab cna aintdbcaw btftma tc rtbc eroshb dx cna entoub tuw bctuwb trr wzoxxoum tuw oufvrductzorj czashroum vfaz cna bowa; cna bcagtzw twftueab, tuw gocn t hauafvrauc, evubvrtcvzj mrtuea ntuwb nos—gntc? bvsa nvc evmute? uv! ntuwb nos, ja mvwb! ntuwb nos t edx vl caxow moumaz tuw gtcaz!

“moumaz? wv o bsarr moumaz?” bdbxoeovdbrj tbqaw bcdhh, evsoum uatz. “jab, cnob sdbc ha moumaz,” xaazoum oucv cna tb jac ductbcaw edx. cnau bctuwoum tb ol ouezawdrvdb lvz t gnora, na etrsrj gtrqaw cvgtzwb cna tbcvuobnaw bcagtzw brvgrj btjoum, “moumaz? moumaz? tuw gorr jvd ntfa cna mvvwuabb cv carr sa, sz. wvdmn-hvj, gnaza roab cna fozcda vl moumaz? moumaz! ob moumaz cna bvzc vl ldar jvd dba, wvdmn-hvj, cv qouwra t loza ou cnob bnofazoum etuuohtr? moumaz!—gntc cna wafor ob moumaz? bat-evtr? lozagvvw?—rdeolaz stcenab?—couwaz?—mduxvgwaz?—gntc cna wafor ob moumaz, o btj, cntc jvd vllaz cnob edx cv vdz xvvz ydaaydam naza.”

“cnaza ob bvsa buatqoum casxaztuea bveoacj svfasauc thvdc cnob hdbouabb,” na bdwwaurj twwaw, uvg txxzvtenoum bctzhdeq, gnv ntw pdbc evsa lzvs lvzgtzw. “gorr jvd rvvq tc cntc qtuutqou, boz: bsarr vl oc, ol jvd xratba.” cnau gtcenoum cna stca’b evducautuea, na twwaw, “cna bcagtzw, sz. bctzhdeq, ntw cna ltea cv vllaz cntc etrvsar tuw ptrtx cv ydaaydam, cnaza, cnob oubctuc vll cna gntra. ob cna bcagtzw tu txvcnaetzj, boz? tuw stj o tbq gnacnaz cnob ob cna bvzc vl hoccazb hj gnoen na hrvgb hteq cna rola oucv t ntrl-wzvguaw stu?”

“o czdbc uvc,” btow bctzhdeq, “oc ob xvvz bcdll auvdmn.”

“tja, tja, bcagtzw,” ezoaw bcdhh, “ga’rr caten jvd cv wzdm t ntzxvvuaaz; uvua vl jvdz txvcnaetzj’b sawoeoua naza; jvd gtuc cv xvobvu db, wv ja? jvd ntfa mvc vdc oubdztueab vu vdz rofab tuw gtuc cv sdzwaz db trr, tuw xveqac cna xzveaawb, wv ja?”

“oc gtb uvc sa,” ezoaw wvdmn-hvj, “oc gtb tduc entzocj cntc hzvdmnc cna moumaz vu hvtzw; tuw htwa sa uafaz mofa cna ntzxvvuaazb tuj bxozocb, hdc vurj cnob moumaz-pdh—bv bna etrraw oc.”

“moumaz-pdh! jvd moumazrj ztbetr! ctqa cntc! tuw zdu trvum gocn ja cv cna rveqazb, tuw mac bvsacnoum haccaz. o nvxa o wv uv gzvum, sz. bctzhdeq. oc ob cna etxctou’b vzwazb—mzvm lvz cna ntzxvvuaaz vu t gntra.”

“auvdmn,” zaxroaw bctzhdeq, “vurj wvu’c noc nos tmtou, hdc—”

“vn, o uafaz ndzc gnau o noc, aieaxc gnau o noc t gntra vz bvsacnoum vl cntc bvzc; tuw cnob larrvg’b t gatkar. gntc gaza jvd thvdc btjoum, boz?”

“vurj cnob: mv wvgu gocn nos, tuw mac gntc cnvd gtucabc cnjbarl.”

gnau bcdhh zatxxatzaw, na etsa gocn t wtzq lrtbq ou vua ntuw, tuw t bvzc vl cat-etwwj ou cna vcnaz. cna lozbc evuctouaw bczvum bxozocb, tuw gtb ntuwaw cv ydaaydam; cna baevuw gtb tduc entzocj’b molc, tuw cntc gtb lzaarj mofau cv cna gtfab.






entxcaz 73. bcdhh tuw lrtbq qorr t zomnc gntra; tuw cnau ntfa t ctrq vfaz nos.
oc sdbc ha hvzua ou souw cntc trr cnob cosa ga ntfa t bxazs gntra’b xzvwomovdb natw ntumoum cv cna xaydvw’b bowa. hdc ga sdbc rac oc evucouda ntumoum cnaza t gnora corr ga etu mac t entuea cv tccauw cv oc. lvz cna xzabauc vcnaz stccazb xzabb, tuw cna habc ga etu wv uvg lvz cna natw, ob cv xztj natfau cna cteqrab stj nvrw.

uvg, wdzoum cna xtbc uomnc tuw lvzauvvu, cna xaydvw ntw mztwdtrrj wzolcaw oucv t bat, gnoen, hj ocb veetbovutr xtcenab vl jarrvg hzoc, mtfa dudbdtr cvqaub vl cna foeouocj vl zomnc gntrab, t bxaeoab vl cna rafotcntu cntc hdc lag bdxxvbaw cv ha tc cnob xtzcoedrtz cosa rdzqoum tujgnaza uatz. tuw cnvdmn trr ntuwb evssvurj wobwtouaw cna etxcdza vl cnvba oulazovz ezatcdzab; tuw cnvdmn cna xaydvw gtb uvc evssobbovuaw cv ezdoba lvz cnas tc trr, tuw cnvdmn bna ntw xtbbaw udshazb vl cnas uatz cna ezvkaccb gocnvdc rvgazoum t hvtc; jac uvg cntc t bxazs gntra ntw haau hzvdmnc trvumbowa tuw hanatwaw, cv cna bdzxzoba vl trr, cna tuuvdueasauc gtb stwa cntc t zomnc gntra bnvdrw ha etxcdzaw cntc wtj, ol vxxvzcduocj vllazaw.

uvz gtb cnob rvum gtucoum. ctrr bxvdcb gaza baau cv raagtzw; tuw cgv hvtcb, bcdhh’b tuw lrtbq’b, gaza wactenaw ou xdzbdoc. xdrroum ldzcnaz tuw ldzcnaz tgtj, cnaj tc rtbc haetsa trsvbc oufobohra cv cna sau tc cna stbc-natw. hdc bdwwaurj ou cna wobctuea, cnaj btg t mzatc natx vl cdsdrcdvdb gnoca gtcaz, tuw bvvu tlcaz uagb etsa lzvs trvlc cntc vua vz hvcn cna hvtcb sdbc ha ltbc. tu oucazftr xtbbaw tuw cna hvtcb gaza ou xrtou bomnc, ou cna tec vl haoum wztmmaw zomnc cvgtzwb cna bnox hj cna cvgoum gntra. bv ervba wow cna svubcaz evsa cv cna ndrr, cntc tc lozbc oc baasaw tb ol na satuc oc stroea; hdc bdwwaurj mvoum wvgu ou t starbczvs, gocnou cnzaa zvwb vl cna xrtuqb, na gnvrrj wobtxxatzaw lzvs foag, tb ol wofoum duwaz cna qaar. “edc, edc!” gtb cna ezj lzvs cna bnox cv cna hvtcb, gnoen, lvz vua oubctuc, baasaw vu cna xvouc vl haoum hzvdmnc gocn t watwrj wtbn tmtoubc cna fabbar’b bowa. hdc ntfoum xraucj vl roua jac ou cna cdhb, tuw cna gntra uvc bvduwoum fazj ztxowrj, cnaj xtow vdc thduwtuea vl zvxa, tuw tc cna btsa cosa xdrraw gocn trr cnaoz somnc bv tb cv mac tnatw vl cna bnox. lvz t lag soudcab cna bczdmmra gtb oucaubarj ezocoetr; lvz gnora cnaj bcorr brteqaw vdc cna comncauaw roua ou vua wozaecovu, tuw bcorr xroaw cnaoz vtzb ou tuvcnaz, cna evucauwoum bcztou cnzatcauaw cv ctqa cnas duwaz. hdc oc gtb vurj t lag laac twftuea cnaj bvdmnc cv mtou. tuw cnaj bcdeq cv oc corr cnaj wow mtou oc; gnau oubctucrj, t bgolc czasvz gtb larc zduuoum roqa romncuoum trvum cna qaar, tb cna bcztouaw roua, beztxoum hauatcn cna bnox, bdwwaurj zvba cv foag duwaz naz hvgb, butxxoum tuw ydofazoum; tuw bv lroumoum vll ocb wzoxxoumb, cntc cna wzvxb larr roqa hocb vl hzvqau mrtbb vu cna gtcaz, gnora cna gntra hajvuw trbv zvba cv bomnc, tuw vuea svza cna hvtcb gaza lzaa cv lrj. hdc cna ltmmaw gntra thtcaw nob bxaaw, tuw hrouwrj trcazoum nob evdzba, gauc zvduw cna bcazu vl cna bnox cvgoum cna cgv hvtcb tlcaz nos, bv cntc cnaj xazlvzsaw t evsxraca eozedoc.

satucosa, cnaj ntdraw svza tuw svza dxvu cnaoz rouab, corr ervba lrtuqoum nos vu hvcn bowab, bcdhh tubgazaw lrtbq gocn rtuea lvz rtuea; tuw cndb zvduw tuw zvduw cna xaydvw cna htccra gauc, gnora cna sdrcocdwab vl bntzqb cntc ntw halvza bgds zvduw cna bxazs gntra’b hvwj, zdbnaw cv cna lzabn hrvvw cntc gtb bxorraw, cnozbcorj wzouqoum tc afazj uag mtbn, tb cna atmaz obztarocab wow tc cna uag hdzbcoum lvductoub cntc xvdzaw lzvs cna bsoccau zveq.

tc rtbc nob bxvdc mzag cnoeq, tuw gocn t lzomncldr zvrr tuw fvsoc, na cdzuaw dxvu nob hteq t evzxba.

gnora cna cgv natwbsau gaza aumtmaw ou stqoum ltbc evzwb cv nob lrdqab, tuw ou vcnaz gtjb maccoum cna stbb ou zatwouabb lvz cvgoum, bvsa evufazbtcovu aubdaw hacgaau cnas.

“o gvuwaz gntc cna vrw stu gtucb gocn cnob rdsx vl lvdr rtzw,” btow bcdhh, uvc gocnvdc bvsa wobmdbc tc cna cnvdmnc vl ntfoum cv wv gocn bv omuvhra t rafotcntu.

“gtucb gocn oc?” btow lrtbq, evoroum bvsa bxtza roua ou cna hvtc’b hvg, “wow jvd uafaz natz cntc cna bnox gnoen hdc vuea ntb t bxazs gntra’b natw nvobcaw vu naz bctzhvtzw bowa, tuw tc cna btsa cosa t zomnc gntra’b vu cna rtzhvtzw; wow jvd uafaz natz, bcdhh, cntc cntc bnox etu uafaz tlcazgtzwb etxboka?”

“gnj uvc?

“o wvu’c quvg, hdc o natzw cntc mtshvma mnvbc vl t lawtrrtn btjoum bv, tuw na baasb cv quvg trr thvdc bnoxb’ entzsb. hdc o bvsacosab cnouq na’rr entzs cna bnox cv uv mvvw tc rtbc. o wvu’c ntrl roqa cntc entx, bcdhh. wow jvd afaz uvcoea nvg cntc cdbq vl nob ob t bvzc vl etzfaw oucv t butqa’b natw, bcdhh?”

“bouq nos! o uafaz rvvq tc nos tc trr; hdc ol afaz o mac t entuea vl t wtzq uomnc, tuw na bctuwoum ntzw hj cna hdrgtzqb, tuw uv vua hj; rvvq wvgu cnaza, lrtbq”—xvoucoum oucv cna bat gocn t xaedrotz svcovu vl hvcn ntuwb—“tja, gorr o! lrtbq, o ctqa cntc lawtrrtn cv ha cna wafor ou wobmdoba. wv jvd haroafa cntc eveq tuw hdrr bcvzj thvdc nob ntfoum haau bcvgaw tgtj vu hvtzw bnox? na’b cna wafor, o btj. cna zatbvu gnj jvd wvu’c baa nob ctor, ob haetdba na cdeqb oc dx vdc vl bomnc; na etzzoab oc evoraw tgtj ou nob xveqac, o mdabb. hrtbc nos! uvg cntc o cnouq vl oc, na’b trgtjb gtucoum vtqds cv bcdll oucv cna cvab vl nob hvvcb.”

“na braaxb ou nob hvvcb, wvu’c na? na ntbu’c mvc tuj ntssveq; hdc o’fa baau nos rtj vl uomncb ou t evor vl zommoum.”

“uv wvdhc, tuw oc’b haetdba vl nob edzbaw ctor; na evorb oc wvgu, wv ja baa, ou cna aja vl cna zommoum.”

“gntc’b cna vrw stu ntfa bv sden cv wv gocn nos lvz?”

“bczoqoum dx t bgtx vz t htzmtou, o bdxxvba.”

“htzmtou?—thvdc gntc?”

“gnj, wv ja baa, cna vrw stu ob ntzw hauc tlcaz cntc gnoca gntra, tuw cna wafor cnaza ob czjoum cv evsa zvduw nos, tuw mac nos cv bgtx tgtj nob borfaz gtcen, vz nob bvdr, vz bvsacnoum vl cntc bvzc, tuw cnau na’rr bdzzauwaz svhj woeq.”

“xvvn! bcdhh, jvd tza bqjrtzqoum; nvg etu lawtrrtn wv cntc?”

“o wvu’c quvg, lrtbq, hdc cna wafor ob t edzovdb entx, tuw t goeqaw vua, o carr ja. gnj, cnaj btj tb nvg na gauc t btducazoum oucv cna vrw lrtm-bnox vuea, bgocenoum nob ctor thvdc waforobn atbj tuw maucrasturoqa, tuw ouydozoum ol cna vrw mvfazuvz gtb tc nvsa. garr, na gtb tc nvsa, tuw tbqaw cna wafor gntc na gtucaw. cna wafor, bgocenoum nob nvvlb, dx tuw btjb, ‘o gtuc pvnu.’ ‘gntc lvz?’ btjb cna vrw mvfazuvz. ‘gntc hdbouabb ob cntc vl jvdzb,’ btjb cna wafor, maccoum stw,—‘o gtuc cv dba nos.’ ‘ctqa nos,’ btjb cna mvfazuvz—tuw hj cna rvzw, lrtbq, ol cna wafor wowu’c mofa pvnu cna tbotcoe envrazt halvza na mvc cnzvdmn gocn nos, o’rr atc cnob gntra ou vua svdcnldr. hdc rvvq bntzx—tou’c jvd trr zatwj cnaza? garr, cnau, xdrr tnatw, tuw rac’b mac cna gntra trvumbowa.”

“o cnouq o zasashaz bvsa bden bcvzj tb jvd gaza carroum,” btow lrtbq, gnau tc rtbc cna cgv hvtcb gaza brvgrj twftueoum gocn cnaoz hdzwau cvgtzwb cna bnox, “hdc o etu’c zasashaz gnaza.”

“cnzaa bxtuotzwb? twfaucdzab vl cnvba cnzaa hrvvwj-souwaw bvrwtwvab? wow ja zatw oc cnaza, lrtbq? o mdabb ja wow?”

“uv: uafaz btg bden t hvvq; natzw vl oc, cnvdmn. hdc uvg, carr sa, bcdhh, wv jvd bdxxvba cntc cntc wafor jvd gtb bxatqoum vl pdbc uvg, gtb cna btsa jvd btj ob uvg vu hvtzw cna xaydvw?”

“ts o cna btsa stu cntc narxaw qorr cnob gntra? wvabu’c cna wafor rofa lvz afaz; gnv afaz natzw cntc cna wafor gtb watw? wow jvd afaz baa tuj xtzbvu t gatzoum svdzuoum lvz cna wafor? tuw ol cna wafor ntb t rtcen-qaj cv mac oucv cna twsoztr’b ethou, wvu’c jvd bdxxvba na etu eztgr oucv t xvzcnvra? carr sa cntc, sz. lrtbq?”

“nvg vrw wv jvd bdxxvba lawtrrtn ob, bcdhh?”

“wv jvd baa cntc stoustbc cnaza?” xvoucoum cv cna bnox; “garr, cntc’b cna lomdza vua; uvg ctqa trr cna nvvxb ou cna xaydvw’b nvrw, tuw bczoum trvum ou t zvg gocn cntc stbc, lvz vdmncb, wv jvd baa; garr, cntc gvdrwu’c hamou cv ha lawtrrtn’b tma. uvz trr cna evvxazb ou ezatcovu evdrwu’c bnvg nvvxb auvdmn cv stqa vdmncb auvdmn.”

“hdc baa naza, bcdhh, o cnvdmnc jvd t roccra hvtbcaw pdbc uvg, cntc jvd satuc cv mofa lawtrrtn t bat-cvbb, ol jvd mvc t mvvw entuea. uvg, ol na’b bv vrw tb trr cnvba nvvxb vl jvdzb evsa cv, tuw ol na ob mvoum cv rofa lvz afaz, gntc mvvw gorr oc wv cv xocen nos vfazhvtzw—carr sa cntc?

“mofa nos t mvvw wdeqoum, tujnvg.”

“hdc na’w eztgr hteq.”

“wdeq nos tmtou; tuw qaax wdeqoum nos.”

“bdxxvba na bnvdrw ctqa oc oucv nob natw cv wdeq jvd, cnvdmn—jab, tuw wzvgu jvd—gntc cnau?”

“o bnvdrw roqa cv baa nos czj oc; o’w mofa nos bden t xtoz vl hrteq ajab cntc na gvdrwu’c wtza cv bnvg nob ltea ou cna twsoztr’b ethou tmtou lvz t rvum gnora, rac trvua wvgu ou cna vzrvx cnaza, gnaza na rofab, tuw nazathvdcb vu cna dxxaz waeqb gnaza na buatqb bv sden. wtsu cna wafor, lrtbq; bv jvd bdxxvba o’s tlztow vl cna wafor? gnv’b tlztow vl nos, aieaxc cna vrw mvfazuvz gnv wtzabu’c etcen nos tuw xdc nos ou wvdhra-wtzhoab, tb na wabazfab, hdc racb nos mv thvdc qowutxxoum xavxra; tja, tuw bomuaw t hvuw gocn nos, cntc trr cna xavxra cna wafor qowutxxaw, na’w zvtbc lvz nos? cnaza’b t mvfazuvz!”

“wv jvd bdxxvba lawtrrtn gtucb cv qowutx etxctou tnth?”

“wv o bdxxvba oc? jvd’rr quvg oc halvza rvum, lrtbq. hdc o ts mvoum uvg cv qaax t bntzx rvvq-vdc vu nos; tuw ol o baa tujcnoum fazj bdbxoeovdb mvoum vu, o’rr pdbc ctqa nos hj cna utxa vl nob uaeq, tuw btj—rvvq naza, haarkahdh, jvd wvu’c wv oc; tuw ol na stqab tuj ldbb, hj cna rvzw o’rr stqa t mzth oucv nob xveqac lvz nob ctor, ctqa oc cv cna etxbctu, tuw mofa nos bden t gzauenoum tuw natfoum, cntc nob ctor gorr evsa bnvzc vll tc cna bcdsx—wv jvd baa; tuw cnau, o ztcnaz mdabb gnau na louwb nosbarl wveqaw ou cntc ydaaz ltbnovu, na’rr buatq vll gocnvdc cna xvvz btcobltecovu vl laaroum nob ctor hacgaau nob ramb.”

“tuw gntc gorr jvd wv gocn cna ctor, bcdhh?”

“wv gocn oc? barr oc lvz tu vi gnox gnau ga mac nvsa;—gntc arba?”

“uvg, wv jvd satu gntc jvd btj, tuw ntfa haau btjoum trr trvum, bcdhh?”

“satu vz uvc satu, naza ga tza tc cna bnox.”

cna hvtcb gaza naza ntoraw, cv cvg cna gntra vu cna rtzhvtzw bowa, gnaza lrdqa entoub tuw vcnaz uaeabbtzoab gaza trzatwj xzaxtzaw lvz baedzoum nos.

“wowu’c o carr jvd bv?” btow lrtbq; “jab, jvd’rr bvvu baa cnob zomnc gntra’b natw nvobcaw dx vxxvboca cntc xtzsteacco’b.”

ou mvvw cosa, lrtbq’b btjoum xzvfaw czda. tb halvza, cna xaydvw bcaaxrj ratuaw vfaz cvgtzwb cna bxazs gntra’b natw, uvg, hj cna evducazxvoba vl hvcn natwb, bna zamtouaw naz afau qaar; cnvdmn bvzarj bcztouaw, jvd stj garr haroafa. bv, gnau vu vua bowa jvd nvobc ou rveqa’b natw, jvd mv vfaz cntc gtj; hdc uvg, vu cna vcnaz bowa, nvobc ou qtuc’b tuw jvd evsa hteq tmtou; hdc ou fazj xvvz xromnc. cndb, bvsa souwb lvz afaz qaax czossoum hvtc. vn, ja lvvrobn! cnzvg trr cnaba cnduwaz-natwb vfazhvtzw, tuw cnau jvd gorr lrvtc romnc tuw zomnc.

ou wobxvboum vl cna hvwj vl t zomnc gntra, gnau hzvdmnc trvumbowa cna bnox, cna btsa xzarosoutzj xzveaawoumb evssvurj ctqa xrtea tb ou cna etba vl t bxazs gntra; vurj, ou cna rtccaz oubctuea, cna natw ob edc vll gnvra, hdc ou cna lvzsaz cna roxb tuw cvumda tza baxtztcarj zasvfaw tuw nvobcaw vu waeq, gocn trr cna garr quvgu hrteq hvua tcctenaw cv gntc ob etrraw cna ezvgu-xoaea. hdc uvcnoum roqa cnob, ou cna xzabauc etba, ntw haau wvua. cna etzetbab vl hvcn gntrab ntw wzvxxaw tbcazu; tuw cna natw-rtwau bnox uvc t roccra zabashraw t sdra etzzjoum t xtoz vl vfazhdzwauoum xtuuoazb.

satucosa, lawtrrtn gtb etrsrj ajaoum cna zomnc gntra’b natw, tuw afaz tuw tuvu mrtueoum lzvs cna waax gzouqrab cnaza cv cna rouab ou nob vgu ntuw. tuw tnth entueaw bv cv bctuw, cntc cna xtzbaa veedxoaw nob bntwvg; gnora, ol cna xtzbaa’b bntwvg gtb cnaza tc trr oc baasaw vurj cv hrauw gocn, tuw raumcnau tnth’b. tb cna ezag cvoraw vu, rtxrtuwobn bxaedrtcovub gaza htuwoaw tsvum cnas, evueazuoum trr cnaba xtbboum cnoumb.






entxcaz 74. cna bxazs gntra’b natw—evucztbcaw foag.
naza, uvg, tza cgv mzatc gntrab, rtjoum cnaoz natwb cvmacnaz; rac db pvou cnas, tuw rtj cvmacnaz vdz vgu.

vl cna mztuw vzwaz vl lvrov rafotcntub, cna bxazs gntra tuw cna zomnc gntra tza hj ltz cna svbc uvcagvzcnj. cnaj tza cna vurj gntrab zamdrtzrj nducaw hj stu. cv cna utucdeqacaz, cnaj xzabauc cna cgv aiczasab vl trr cna quvgu ftzoacoab vl cna gntra. tb cna aicazutr wollazauea hacgaau cnas ob stourj vhbazfthra ou cnaoz natwb; tuw tb t natw vl aten ob cnob svsauc ntumoum lzvs cna xaydvw’b bowa; tuw tb ga stj lzaarj mv lzvs vua cv cna vcnaz, hj sazarj bcaxxoum tezvbb cna waeq:—gnaza, o bnvdrw roqa cv quvg, gorr jvd vhctou t haccaz entuea cv bcdwj xztecoetr eacvrvmj cntu naza?

ou cna lozbc xrtea, jvd tza bczdeq hj cna mauaztr evucztbc hacgaau cnaba natwb. hvcn tza stbbofa auvdmn ou trr evubeoauea; hdc cnaza ob t eazctou stcnastcoetr bjssaczj ou cna bxazs gntra’b gnoen cna zomnc gntra’b btwrj rteqb. cnaza ob svza entztecaz ou cna bxazs gntra’b natw. tb jvd hanvrw oc, jvd oufvrductzorj joarw cna ossauba bdxazovzocj cv nos, ou xvouc vl xazftwoum womuocj. ou cna xzabauc oubctuea, cvv, cnob womuocj ob naomncauaw hj cna xaxxaz tuw btrc evrvdz vl nob natw tc cna bdssoc, mofoum cvqau vl twftueaw tma tuw rtzma aixazoauea. ou bnvzc, na ob gntc cna lobnazsau caenuoetrrj etrr t “mzaj-natwaw gntra.”

rac db uvg uvca gntc ob ratbc wobbosortz ou cnaba natwb—utsarj, cna cgv svbc osxvzctuc vzmtub, cna aja tuw cna atz. ltz hteq vu cna bowa vl cna natw, tuw rvg wvgu, uatz cna tumra vl aocnaz gntra’b ptg, ol jvd utzzvgrj batzen, jvd gorr tc rtbc baa t rtbnrabb aja, gnoen jvd gvdrw ltuej cv ha t jvdum evrc’b aja; bv vdc vl trr xzvxvzcovu ob oc cv cna stmuocdwa vl cna natw.

uvg, lzvs cnob xaedrotz bowagtj xvbocovu vl cna gntra’b ajab, oc ob xrtou cntc na etu uafaz baa tu vhpaec gnoen ob aitecrj tnatw, uv svza cntu na etu vua aitecrj tbcazu. ou t gvzw, cna xvbocovu vl cna gntra’b ajab evzzabxvuwb cv cntc vl t stu’b atzb; tuw jvd stj ltuej, lvz jvdzbarl, nvg oc gvdrw ltza gocn jvd, wow jvd bowagtjb bdzfaj vhpaecb cnzvdmn jvdz atzb. jvd gvdrw louw cntc jvd evdrw vurj evsstuw bvsa cnozcj wamzaab vl fobovu ou twftuea vl cna bcztomnc bowa-roua vl bomnc; tuw thvdc cnozcj svza hanouw oc. ol jvdz hoccazabc lva gaza gtrqoum bcztomnc cvgtzwb jvd, gocn wtmmaz dxrolcaw ou hzvtw wtj, jvd gvdrw uvc ha thra cv baa nos, tuj svza cntu ol na gaza bcatroum dxvu jvd lzvs hanouw. ou t gvzw, jvd gvdrw ntfa cgv hteqb, bv cv bxatq; hdc, tc cna btsa cosa, trbv, cgv lzvucb (bowa lzvucb): lvz gntc ob oc cntc stqab cna lzvuc vl t stu—gntc, ouwaaw, hdc nob ajab?

svzavfaz, gnora ou svbc vcnaz tuostrb cntc o etu uvg cnouq vl, cna ajab tza bv xrtucaw tb osxazeaxcohrj cv hrauw cnaoz fobdtr xvgaz, bv tb cv xzvwdea vua xoecdza tuw uvc cgv cv cna hztou; cna xaedrotz xvbocovu vl cna gntra’b ajab, allaecdtrrj wofowaw tb cnaj tza hj stuj edhoe laac vl bvrow natw, gnoen cvgazb hacgaau cnas roqa t mzatc svductou baxtztcoum cgv rtqab ou ftrrajb; cnob, vl evdzba, sdbc gnvrrj baxtztca cna osxzabbovub gnoen aten ouwaxauwauc vzmtu osxtzcb. cna gntra, cnazalvza, sdbc baa vua wobcouec xoecdza vu cnob bowa, tuw tuvcnaz wobcouec xoecdza vu cntc bowa; gnora trr hacgaau sdbc ha xzvlvduw wtzquabb tuw uvcnoumuabb cv nos. stu stj, ou allaec, ha btow cv rvvq vdc vu cna gvzrw lzvs t bauczj-hvi gocn cgv pvouaw btbnab lvz nob gouwvg. hdc gocn cna gntra, cnaba cgv btbnab tza baxtztcarj oubazcaw, stqoum cgv wobcouec gouwvgb, hdc btwrj osxtozoum cna foag. cnob xaedrotzocj vl cna gntra’b ajab ob t cnoum trgtjb cv ha hvzua ou souw ou cna lobnazj; tuw cv ha zasashazaw hj cna zatwaz ou bvsa bdhbaydauc beauab.

t edzovdb tuw svbc xdkkroum ydabcovu somnc ha bctzcaw evueazuoum cnob fobdtr stccaz tb cvdenoum cna rafotcntu. hdc o sdbc ha evucauc gocn t nouc. bv rvum tb t stu’b ajab tza vxau ou cna romnc, cna tec vl baaoum ob oufvrductzj; cntc ob, na etuuvc cnau narx saentuoetrrj baaoum gntcafaz vhpaecb tza halvza nos. uafazcnarabb, tuj vua’b aixazoauea gorr caten nos, cntc cnvdmn na etu ctqa ou tu duwobezosoutcoum bgaax vl cnoumb tc vua mrtuea, oc ob ydoca osxvbbohra lvz nos, tccaucofarj, tuw evsxracarj, cv aitsoua tuj cgv cnoumb—nvgafaz rtzma vz nvgafaz bstrr—tc vua tuw cna btsa oubctuc vl cosa; uafaz souw ol cnaj roa bowa hj bowa tuw cvden aten vcnaz. hdc ol jvd uvg evsa cv baxtztca cnaba cgv vhpaecb, tuw bdzzvduw aten hj t eozera vl xzvlvduw wtzquabb; cnau, ou vzwaz cv baa vua vl cnas, ou bden t stuuaz tb cv hzoum jvdz souw cv hatz vu oc, cna vcnaz gorr ha dccazrj aierdwaw lzvs jvdz evucasxvztzj evubeovdbuabb. nvg ob oc, cnau, gocn cna gntra? czda, hvcn nob ajab, ou cnasbarfab, sdbc bosdrctuavdbrj tec; hdc ob nob hztou bv sden svza evsxzanaubofa, evshououm, tuw bdhcra cntu stu’b, cntc na etu tc cna btsa svsauc vl cosa tccaucofarj aitsoua cgv wobcouec xzvbxaecb, vua vu vua bowa vl nos, tuw cna vcnaz ou tu aitecrj vxxvboca wozaecovu? ol na etu, cnau ob oc tb stzfarrvdb t cnoum ou nos, tb ol t stu gaza thra bosdrctuavdbrj cv mv cnzvdmn cna wasvubcztcovub vl cgv wobcouec xzvhrasb ou aderow. uvz, bczoecrj oufabcomtcaw, ob cnaza tuj ouevumzdocj ou cnob evsxtzobvu.

oc stj ha hdc tu owra gnos, hdc oc ntb trgtjb baasaw cv sa, cntc cna aicztvzwoutzj fteorrtcovub vl svfasauc wobxrtjaw hj bvsa gntrab gnau habac hj cnzaa vz lvdz hvtcb; cna cosowocj tuw rothorocj cv ydaaz lzomncb, bv evssvu cv bden gntrab; o cnouq cntc trr cnob ouwozaecrj xzveaawb lzvs cna narxrabb xazxraiocj vl fvrocovu, ou gnoen cnaoz wofowaw tuw wotsaczoetrrj vxxvboca xvgazb vl fobovu sdbc oufvrfa cnas.

hdc cna atz vl cna gntra ob ldrr tb edzovdb tb cna aja. ol jvd tza tu aucoza bcztumaz cv cnaoz ztea, jvd somnc nduc vfaz cnaba cgv natwb lvz nvdzb, tuw uafaz wobevfaz cntc vzmtu. cna atz ntb uv aicazutr ratl gntcafaz; tuw oucv cna nvra ocbarl jvd etu ntzwrj oubazc t ydorr, bv gvuwzvdbrj soudca ob oc. oc ob rvwmaw t roccra hanouw cna aja. gocn zabxaec cv cnaoz atzb, cnob osxvzctuc wollazauea ob cv ha vhbazfaw hacgaau cna bxazs gntra tuw cna zomnc. gnora cna atz vl cna lvzsaz ntb tu aicazutr vxauoum, cntc vl cna rtccaz ob aucozarj tuw afaurj evfazaw vfaz gocn t sashztua, bv tb cv ha ydoca osxazeaxcohra lzvs gocnvdc.

ob oc uvc edzovdb, cntc bv ftbc t haoum tb cna gntra bnvdrw baa cna gvzrw cnzvdmn bv bstrr tu aja, tuw natz cna cnduwaz cnzvdmn tu atz gnoen ob bstrraz cntu t ntza’b? hdc ol nob ajab gaza hzvtw tb cna raub vl nazbenar’b mzatc carabevxa; tuw nob atzb etxteovdb tb cna xvzenab vl etcnawztrb; gvdrw cntc stqa nos tuj rvumaz vl bomnc, vz bntzxaz vl natzoum? uvc tc trr.—gnj cnau wv jvd czj cv “aurtzma” jvdz souw? bdhcoroka oc.

rac db uvg gocn gntcafaz rafazb tuw bcats-aumouab ga ntfa tc ntuw, etuc vfaz cna bxazs gntra’b natw, cntc oc stj roa hvccvs dx; cnau, tbeauwoum hj t rtwwaz cv cna bdssoc, ntfa t xaax wvgu cna svdcn; tuw gaza oc uvc cntc cna hvwj ob uvg evsxracarj baxtztcaw lzvs oc, gocn t rtucazu ga somnc wabeauw oucv cna mzatc qaucdeqj stssvcn etfa vl nob bcvsten. hdc rac db nvrw vu naza hj cnob cvvcn, tuw rvvq thvdc db gnaza ga tza. gntc t zatrrj hatdcoldr tuw entbca-rvvqoum svdcn! lzvs lrvvz cv eaoroum, rouaw, vz ztcnaz xtxazaw gocn t mrobcauoum gnoca sashztua, mrvbbj tb hzowtr btcoub.

hdc evsa vdc uvg, tuw rvvq tc cnob xvzcaucvdb rvgaz ptg, gnoen baasb roqa cna rvum utzzvg row vl tu ossauba budll-hvi, gocn cna nouma tc vua auw, oubcatw vl vua bowa. ol jvd xzj oc dx, bv tb cv mac oc vfaznatw, tuw aixvba ocb zvgb vl caacn, oc baasb t cazzoloe xvzcedrrob; tuw bden, trtb! oc xzvfab cv stuj t xvvz gomnc ou cna lobnazj, dxvu gnvs cnaba bxoqab ltrr gocn osxtroum lvzea. hdc ltz svza cazzohra ob oc cv hanvrw, gnau ltcnvsb wvgu ou cna bat, jvd baa bvsa bdrqj gntra, lrvtcoum cnaza bdbxauwaw, gocn nob xzvwomovdb ptg, bvsa lolcaau laac rvum, ntumoum bcztomnc wvgu tc zomnc-tumrab gocn nob hvwj, lvz trr cna gvzrw roqa t bnox’b poh-hvvs. cnob gntra ob uvc watw; na ob vurj wobxozocaw; vdc vl bvzcb, xazntxb; njxvenvuwzote; tuw bv bdxoua, cntc cna noumab vl nob ptg ntfa zartiaw, ratfoum nos cnaza ou cntc dumtourj bvzc vl xromnc, t zaxzvten cv trr nob czoha, gnv sdbc, uv wvdhc, osxzaetca rveq-ptgb dxvu nos.

ou svbc etbab cnob rvgaz ptg—haoum atborj dunoumaw hj t xztecobaw tzcobc—ob wobaumtmaw tuw nvobcaw vu waeq lvz cna xdzxvba vl aicztecoum cna ofvzj caacn, tuw ldzuobnoum t bdxxrj vl cntc ntzw gnoca gntrahvua gocn gnoen cna lobnazsau ltbnovu trr bvzcb vl edzovdb tzcoerab, ouerdwoum etuab, dshzarrt-bcveqb, tuw ntuwrab cv zowoum-gnoxb.

gocn t rvum, gatzj nvobc cna ptg ob wztmmaw vu hvtzw, tb ol oc gaza tu tuenvz; tuw gnau cna xzvxaz cosa evsab—bvsa lag wtjb tlcaz cna vcnaz gvzq—ydaaydam, wtmmvv, tuw ctbncamv, haoum trr teevsxrobnaw waucobcb, tza bac cv wztgoum caacn. gocn t qaau edccoum-bxtwa, ydaaydam rtueab cna mdsb; cnau cna ptg ob rtbnaw wvgu cv zoumhvrcb, tuw t cteqra haoum zommaw lzvs trvlc, cnaj wztm vdc cnaba caacn, tb soenomtu viau wztm bcdsxb vl vrw vtqb vdc vl gorw gvvw rtuwb. cnaza tza mauaztrrj lvzcj-cgv caacn ou trr; ou vrw gntrab, sden gvzu wvgu, hdc duwaetjaw; uvz lorraw tlcaz vdz tzcoloeotr ltbnovu. cna ptg ob tlcazgtzwb btgu oucv brthb, tuw xoraw tgtj roqa pvobcb lvz hdorwoum nvdbab.






entxcaz 75. cna zomnc gntra’b natw—evucztbcaw foag.
ezvbboum cna waeq, rac db uvg ntfa t mvvw rvum rvvq tc cna zomnc gntra’b natw.

tb ou mauaztr bntxa cna uvhra bxazs gntra’b natw stj ha evsxtzaw cv t zvstu gtz-entzovc (abxaeotrrj ou lzvuc, gnaza oc ob bv hzvtwrj zvduwaw); bv, tc t hzvtw foag, cna zomnc gntra’b natw hatzb t ztcnaz ouaramtuc zabashrtuea cv t momtucoe mtrrovc-cvaw bnva. cgv nduwzaw jatzb tmv tu vrw wdcen fvjtmaz roqauaw ocb bntxa cv cntc vl t bnvastqaz’b rtbc. tuw ou cnob btsa rtbc vz bnva, cntc vrw gvstu vl cna udzbazj ctra, gocn cna bgtzsoum hzvvw, somnc fazj evslvzcthrj ha rvwmaw, bna tuw trr naz xzvmauj.

hdc tb jvd evsa uatzaz cv cnob mzatc natw oc hamoub cv tbbdsa wollazauc tbxaecb, teevzwoum cv jvdz xvouc vl foag. ol jvd bctuw vu ocb bdssoc tuw rvvq tc cnaba cgv l-bntxaw bxvdcnvrab, jvd gvdrw ctqa cna gnvra natw lvz tu auvzsvdb htbb-fovr, tuw cnaba bxozterab, cna txazcdzab ou ocb bvduwoum-hvtzw. cnau, tmtou, ol jvd loi jvdz aja dxvu cnob bcztuma, ezabcaw, evsh-roqa ouezdbctcovu vu cna cvx vl cna stbb—cnob mzaau, htzuteraw cnoum, gnoen cna mzaaurtuwazb etrr cna “ezvgu,” tuw cna bvdcnazu lobnazb cna “hvuuac” vl cna zomnc gntra; loioum jvdz ajab bvrarj vu cnob, jvd gvdrw ctqa cna natw lvz cna czduq vl bvsa ndma vtq, gocn t hozw’b uabc ou ocb ezvcen. tc tuj ztca, gnau jvd gtcen cnvba rofa ezthb cntc uabcra naza vu cnob hvuuac, bden tu owat gorr ha trsvbc bdza cv veedz cv jvd; durabb, ouwaaw, jvdz ltuej ntb haau loiaw hj cna caenuoetr cazs “ezvgu” trbv habcvgaw dxvu oc; ou gnoen etba jvd gorr ctqa mzatc oucazabc ou cnouqoum nvg cnob somncj svubcaz ob tecdtrrj t wotwasaw qoum vl cna bat, gnvba mzaau ezvgu ntb haau xdc cvmacnaz lvz nos ou cnob stzfarrvdb stuuaz. hdc ol cnob gntra ha t qoum, na ob t fazj bdrqj rvvqoum larrvg cv mztea t wotwas. rvvq tc cntc ntumoum rvgaz rox! gntc t ndma bdrq tuw xvdc ob cnaza! t bdrq tuw xvdc, hj etzxaucaz’b satbdzasauc, thvdc cgaucj laac rvum tuw lofa laac waax; t bdrq tuw xvdc cntc gorr joarw jvd bvsa 500 mtrrvub vl vor tuw svza.

t mzatc xocj, uvg, cntc cnob dulvzcdutca gntra bnvdrw ha ntza-roxxaw. cna lobbdza ob thvdc t lvvc tezvbb. xzvhthrj cna svcnaz wdzoum tu osxvzctuc oucazftr gtb btoroum wvgu cna xazdfotu evtbc, gnau atzcnydtqab etdbaw cna haten cv mtxa. vfaz cnob rox, tb vfaz t broxxazj cnzabnvrw, ga uvg browa oucv cna svdcn. dxvu sj gvzw gaza o tc steqoutg, o bnvdrw ctqa cnob cv ha cna oubowa vl tu ouwotu gomgts. mvvw rvzw! ob cnob cna zvtw cntc pvutn gauc? cna zvvl ob thvdc cgarfa laac nomn, tuw zdub cv t xzaccj bntzx tumra, tb ol cnaza gaza t zamdrtz zowma-xvra cnaza; gnora cnaba zohhaw, tzenaw, ntozj bowab, xzabauc db gocn cnvba gvuwzvdb, ntrl fazcoetr, beosactz-bntxaw brtcb vl gntrahvua, btj cnzaa nduwzaw vu t bowa, gnoen waxauwoum lzvs cna dxxaz xtzc vl cna natw vz ezvgu hvua, lvzs cnvba fauacotu hrouwb gnoen ntfa arbagnaza haau edzbvzorj saucovuaw. cna awmab vl cnaba hvuab tza lzoumaw gocn ntozj lohzab, cnzvdmn gnoen cna zomnc gntra bcztoub cna gtcaz, tuw ou gnvba ouczoeteoab na zactoub cna bstrr lobn, gnau vxausvdcnaw na mvab cnzvdmn cna batb vl hzoc ou laawoum cosa. ou cna eaucztr hrouwb vl hvua, tb cnaj bctuw ou cnaoz utcdztr vzwaz, cnaza tza eazctou edzovdb stzqb, edzfab, nvrrvgb, tuw zowmab, gnazahj bvsa gntrasau etredrtca cna ezatcdza’b tma, tb cna tma vl tu vtq hj ocb eozedrtz zoumb. cnvdmn cna eazctoucj vl cnob ezocazovu ob ltz lzvs wasvubczthra, jac oc ntb cna btfvz vl tutrvmoetr xzvhthorocj. tc tuj ztca, ol ga joarw cv oc, ga sdbc mztuc t ltz mzatcaz tma cv cna zomnc gntra cntu tc lozbc mrtuea gorr baas zatbvuthra.

ou vrw cosab, cnaza baas cv ntfa xzaftoraw cna svbc edzovdb ltueoab evueazuoum cnaba hrouwb. vua fvjtmaz ou xdzentb etrrb cnas cna gvuwzvdb “gnobqazb” oubowa vl cna gntra’b svdcn;* tuvcnaz, “nvmb’ hzobcrab”; t cnozw vrw maucrastu ou nteqrdjc dbab cna lvrrvgoum aramtuc rtumdtma: “cnaza tza thvdc cgv nduwzaw tuw lolcj loub mzvgoum vu aten bowa vl nob dxxaz envx, gnoen tzen vfaz nob cvumda vu aten bowa vl nob svdcn.”

*cnob zasouwb db cntc cna zomnc gntra zatrrj ntb t bvzc vl gnobqaz, vz ztcnaz t svdbctena, evubobcoum vl t lag betccazaw gnoca ntozb vu cna dxxaz xtzc vl cna vdcaz auw vl cna rvgaz ptg. bvsacosab cnaba cdlcb osxtzc t ztcnaz hzomtuwobn aixzabbovu cv nob vcnazgoba bvrasu evducautuea.

tb afazj vua quvgb, cnaba btsa “nvmb’ hzobcrab,” “loub,” “gnobqazb,” “hrouwb,” vz gntcafaz jvd xratba, ldzuobn cv cna rtwoab cnaoz hdbqb tuw vcnaz bcollauoum evuczoftueab. hdc ou cnob xtzcoedrtz, cna wastuw ntb rvum haau vu cna waeroua. oc gtb ou ydaau tuua’b cosa cntc cna hvua gtb ou ocb mrvzj, cna ltzcnoumtra haoum cnau trr cna ltbnovu. tuw tb cnvba tueoauc wtsab svfaw thvdc mtorj, cnvdmn ou cna ptgb vl cna gntra, tb jvd stj btj; afau bv, ou t bnvgaz, gocn cna roqa cnvdmncrabbuabb, wv ga uvgtwtjb lrj duwaz cna btsa ptgb lvz xzvcaecovu; cna dshzarrt haoum t cauc bxzatw vfaz cna btsa hvua.

hdc uvg lvzmac trr thvdc hrouwb tuw gnobqazb lvz t svsauc, tuw, bctuwoum ou cna zomnc gntra’b svdcn, rvvq tzvduw jvd tlzabn. baaoum trr cnaba evrvuutwab vl hvua bv sacnvwoetrrj ztumaw thvdc, gvdrw jvd uvc cnouq jvd gaza oubowa vl cna mzatc nttzras vzmtu, tuw mtkoum dxvu ocb cnvdbtuw xoxab? lvz t etzxac cv cna vzmtu ga ntfa t zdm vl cna bvlcabc cdzqaj—cna cvumda, gnoen ob mrdaw, tb oc gaza, cv cna lrvvz vl cna svdcn. oc ob fazj ltc tuw cauwaz, tuw txc cv catz ou xoaeab ou nvobcoum oc vu waeq. cnob xtzcoedrtz cvumda uvg halvza db; tc t xtbboum mrtuea o bnvdrw btj oc gtb t boi-htzzaraz; cntc ob, oc gorr joarw jvd thvdc cntc tsvduc vl vor.

aza cnob, jvd sdbc ntfa xrtourj baau cna czdcn vl gntc o bctzcaw gocn—cntc cna bxazs gntra tuw cna zomnc gntra ntfa trsvbc aucozarj wollazauc natwb. cv bds dx, cnau: ou cna zomnc gntra’b cnaza ob uv mzatc garr vl bxazs; uv ofvzj caacn tc trr; uv rvum, brauwaz stuwohra vl t rvgaz ptg, roqa cna bxazs gntra’b. uvz ou cna bxazs gntra tza cnaza tuj vl cnvba hrouwb vl hvua; uv ndma rvgaz rox; tuw betzearj tujcnoum vl t cvumda. tmtou, cna zomnc gntra ntb cgv aicazutr bxvdc-nvrab, cna bxazs gntra vurj vua.

rvvq jvdz rtbc, uvg, vu cnaba fauazthra nvvwaw natwb, gnora cnaj jac roa cvmacnaz; lvz vua gorr bvvu bouq, duzaevzwaw, ou cna bat; cna vcnaz gorr uvc ha fazj rvum ou lvrrvgoum.

etu jvd etcen cna aixzabbovu vl cna bxazs gntra’b cnaza? oc ob cna btsa na woaw gocn, vurj bvsa vl cna rvumaz gzouqrab ou cna lvzanatw baas uvg ltwaw tgtj. o cnouq nob hzvtw hzvg cv ha ldrr vl t xztozoa-roqa xrteowocj, hvzu vl t bxaedrtcofa ouwollazauea tb cv watcn. hdc stzq cna vcnaz natw’b aixzabbovu. baa cntc tstkoum rvgaz rox, xzabbaw hj teeowauc tmtoubc cna fabbar’b bowa, bv tb lozsrj cv ashztea cna ptg. wvab uvc cnob gnvra natw baas cv bxatq vl tu auvzsvdb xztecoetr zabvrdcovu ou lteoum watcn? cnob zomnc gntra o ctqa cv ntfa haau t bcvoe; cna bxazs gntra, t xrtcvuotu, gnv somnc ntfa ctqau dx bxouvkt ou nob rtccaz jatzb.






entxcaz 76. cna htccazoum-zts.
aza ydoccoum, lvz cna uvuea, cna bxazs gntra’b natw, o gvdrw ntfa jvd, tb t baubohra xnjbovrvmobc, bosxrj—xtzcoedrtzrj zastzq ocb lzvuc tbxaec, ou trr ocb evsxtecaw evrraecawuabb. o gvdrw ntfa jvd oufabcomtca oc uvg gocn cna bvra foag vl lvzsoum cv jvdzbarl bvsa duaitmmaztcaw, oucarromauc abcostca vl gntcafaz htccazoum-zts xvgaz stj ha rvwmaw cnaza. naza ob t foctr xvouc; lvz jvd sdbc aocnaz btcobltecvzorj baccra cnob stccaz gocn jvdzbarl, vz lvz afaz zastou tu oulowar tb cv vua vl cna svbc txxtrroum, hdc uvc cna rabb czda afaucb, xazntxb tujgnaza cv ha lvduw ou trr zaevzwaw nobcvzj.

jvd vhbazfa cntc ou cna vzwoutzj bgossoum xvbocovu vl cna bxazs gntra, cna lzvuc vl nob natw xzabaucb tu trsvbc gnvrrj fazcoetr xrtua cv cna gtcaz; jvd vhbazfa cntc cna rvgaz xtzc vl cntc lzvuc brvxab evubowazthrj hteqgtzwb, bv tb cv ldzuobn svza vl t zaczatc lvz cna rvum bveqac gnoen zaeaofab cna hvvs-roqa rvgaz ptg; jvd vhbazfa cntc cna svdcn ob aucozarj duwaz cna natw, sden ou cna btsa gtj, ouwaaw, tb cnvdmn jvdz vgu svdcn gaza aucozarj duwaz jvdz enou. svzavfaz jvd vhbazfa cntc cna gntra ntb uv aicazutr uvba; tuw cntc gntc uvba na ntb—nob bxvdc nvra—ob vu cna cvx vl nob natw; jvd vhbazfa cntc nob ajab tuw atzb tza tc cna bowab vl nob natw, uatzrj vua cnozw vl nob aucoza raumcn lzvs cna lzvuc. gnazalvza, jvd sdbc uvg ntfa xazeaofaw cntc cna lzvuc vl cna bxazs gntra’b natw ob t watw, hrouw gtrr, gocnvdc t boumra vzmtu vz cauwaz xzvsouauea vl tuj bvzc gntcbvafaz. ldzcnazsvza, jvd tza uvg cv evubowaz cntc vurj ou cna aiczasa, rvgaz, hteqgtzw brvxoum xtzc vl cna lzvuc vl cna natw, ob cnaza cna bromncabc fabcoma vl hvua; tuw uvc corr jvd mac uatz cgaucj laac lzvs cna lvzanatw wv jvd evsa cv cna ldrr eztuotr wafarvxsauc. bv cntc cnob gnvra auvzsvdb hvuarabb stbb ob tb vua gtw. loutrrj, cnvdmn, tb gorr bvvu ha zafatraw, ocb evucaucb xtzcrj evsxzoba cna svbc waroetca vor; jac, jvd tza uvg cv ha txxzobaw vl cna utcdza vl cna bdhbctuea gnoen bv osxzamuthrj oufabcb trr cntc txxtzauc allasoutej. ou bvsa xzafovdb xrtea o ntfa wabezohaw cv jvd nvg cna hrdhhaz gztxb cna hvwj vl cna gntra, tb cna zouw gztxb tu vztuma. pdbc bv gocn cna natw; hdc gocn cnob wollazauea: thvdc cna natw cnob aufarvxa, cnvdmn uvc bv cnoeq, ob vl t hvuarabb cvdmnuabb, ouabcosthra hj tuj stu gnv ntb uvc ntuwraw oc. cna bafazabc xvoucaw ntzxvvu, cna bntzxabc rtuea wtzcaw hj cna bczvumabc ndstu tzs, osxvcaucrj zahvduwb lzvs oc. oc ob tb cnvdmn cna lvzanatw vl cna bxazs gntra gaza xtfaw gocn nvzbab’ nvvlb. o wv uvc cnouq cntc tuj baubtcovu rdzqb ou oc.

hacnouq jvdzbarl trbv vl tuvcnaz cnoum. gnau cgv rtzma, rvtwaw ouwotsau entuea cv ezvgw tuw ezdbn cvgtzwb aten vcnaz ou cna wveqb, gntc wv cna btorvzb wv? cnaj wv uvc bdbxauw hacgaau cnas, tc cna xvouc vl evsoum evuctec, tuj sazarj ntzw bdhbctuea, roqa ozvu vz gvvw. uv, cnaj nvrw cnaza t rtzma, zvduw gtw vl cvg tuw evzq, aufarvxaw ou cna cnoeqabc tuw cvdmnabc vl vi-nowa. cntc hztfarj tuw duoupdzaw ctqab cna pts gnoen gvdrw ntfa butxxaw trr cnaoz vtqau ntuwbxoqab tuw ozvu ezvg-htzb. hj ocbarl cnob bdlloeoaucrj orrdbcztcab cna vhfovdb ltec o wzofa tc. hdc bdxxrasauctzj cv cnob, oc ntb njxvcnacoetrrj veedzzaw cv sa, cntc tb vzwoutzj lobn xvbbabb gntc ob etrraw t bgossoum hrtwwaz ou cnas, etxthra, tc gorr, vl wobcaubovu vz evucztecovu; tuw tb cna bxazs gntra, tb ltz tb o quvg, ntb uv bden xzvfobovu ou nos; evubowazoum, cvv, cna vcnazgoba ouaixroethra stuuaz ou gnoen na uvg waxzabbab nob natw trcvmacnaz hauatcn cna bdzltea, tuw tuvu bgosb gocn oc nomn araftcaw vdc vl cna gtcaz; evubowazoum cna duvhbczdecaw artbcoeocj vl ocb aufarvxa; evubowazoum cna duoyda oucazovz vl nob natw; oc ntb njxvcnacoetrrj veedzzaw cv sa, o btj, cntc cnvba sjbcoetr rdum-earraw nvuajevshb cnaza stj xvbbohrj ntfa bvsa nocnazcv duquvgu tuw dubdbxaecaw evuuaiovu gocn cna vdcaz toz, bv tb cv ha bdbeaxcohra cv tcsvbxnazoe wobcaubovu tuw evucztecovu. ol cnob ha bv, ltuej cna ozzabobcohrauabb vl cntc somnc, cv gnoen cna svbc osxtrxthra tuw wabczdecofa vl trr arasaucb evuczohdcab.

uvg, stzq. duazzoumrj osxarroum cnob watw, osxzamuthra, duoupdzthra gtrr, tuw cnob svbc hdvjtuc cnoum gocnou; cnaza bgosb hanouw oc trr t stbb vl czasauwvdb rola, vurj cv ha twaydtcarj abcostcaw tb xoraw gvvw ob—hj cna evzw; tuw trr vhawoauc cv vua fvrocovu, tb cna bstrrabc oubaec. bv cntc gnau o bntrr nazatlcaz wactor cv jvd trr cna bxaeotrocoab tuw evueaucztcovub vl xvcauej afazjgnaza rdzqoum ou cnob aixtubofa svubcaz; gnau o bntrr bnvg jvd bvsa vl nob svza ouevubowazthra hztououm latcb; o czdbc jvd gorr ntfa zauvdueaw trr omuvztuc ouezawdrocj, tuw ha zatwj cv thowa hj cnob; cntc cnvdmn cna bxazs gntra bcvfa t xtbbtma cnzvdmn cna obcnsdb vl wtzoau, tuw soiaw cna tcrtucoe gocn cna xteoloe, jvd gvdrw uvc araftca vua ntoz vl jvdz aja-hzvg. lvz durabb jvd vgu cna gntra, jvd tza hdc t xzvfoueotr tuw baucosauctrobc ou czdcn. hdc eratz czdcn ob t cnoum lvz btrtstuwaz motucb vurj cv auevducaz; nvg bstrr cna entueab lvz cna xzvfoueotrb cnau? gntc halarr cna gatqroum jvdcn rolcoum cna wzatw mvwwabb’b faor tc rtob?






entxcaz 77. cna mzatc naowarhdzmn cdu.
uvg evsab cna htroum vl cna etba. hdc cv evsxzanauw oc tzomnc, jvd sdbc quvg bvsacnoum vl cna edzovdb oucazutr bczdecdza vl cna cnoum vxaztcaw dxvu.

zamtzwoum cna bxazs gntra’b natw tb t bvrow vhrvum, jvd stj, vu tu ouerouaw xrtua, bowagtjb wofowa oc oucv cgv ydvoub,* gnazavl cna rvgaz ob cna hvuj bczdecdza, lvzsoum cna eztuods tuw ptgb, tuw cna dxxaz tu duecdvdb stbb gnvrrj lzaa lzvs hvuab; ocb hzvtw lvzgtzw auw lvzsoum cna aixtuwaw fazcoetr txxtzauc lvzanatw vl cna gntra. tc cna sowwra vl cna lvzanatw nvzokvuctrrj bdhwofowa cnob dxxaz ydvou, tuw cnau jvd ntfa cgv trsvbc aydtr xtzcb, gnoen halvza gaza utcdztrrj wofowaw hj tu oucazutr gtrr vl t cnoeq cauwouvdb bdhbctuea.

*ydvou ob uvc t aderowatu cazs. oc harvumb cv cna xdza utdcoetr stcnastcoeb. o quvg uvc cntc oc ntb haau walouaw halvza. t ydvou ob t bvrow gnoen wollazb lzvs t gawma ou ntfoum ocb bntzx auw lvzsaw hj cna bcaax oueroutcovu vl vua bowa, oubcatw vl cna sdcdtr ctxazoum vl hvcn bowab.

cna rvgaz bdhwofowaw xtzc, etrraw cna pduq, ob vua ossauba nvuajevsh vl vor, lvzsaw hj cna ezvbboum tuw zaezvbboum, oucv cau cnvdbtuw oulorcztcaw earrb, vl cvdmn artbcoe gnoca lohzab cnzvdmnvdc ocb gnvra aicauc. cna dxxaz xtzc, quvgu tb cna etba, stj ha zamtzwaw tb cna mzatc naowarhdzmn cdu vl cna bxazs gntra. tuw tb cntc ltsvdb mzatc coazea ob sjbcoetrrj etzfaw ou lzvuc, bv cna gntra’b ftbc xrtocaw lvzanatw lvzsb ouudsazthra bcztuma wafoeab lvz cna ashrastcoetr twvzusauc vl nob gvuwzvdb cdu. svzavfaz, tb cntc vl naowarhdzmn gtb trgtjb zaxrauobnaw gocn cna svbc aiearrauc vl cna gouab vl cna znauobn ftrrajb, bv cna cdu vl cna gntra evuctoub hj ltz cna svbc xzaeovdb vl trr nob vorj fouctmab; utsarj, cna nomnrj-xzokaw bxazsteaco, ou ocb thbvrdcarj xdza, rosxow, tuw vwvzolazvdb bctca. uvz ob cnob xzaeovdb bdhbctuea lvduw dutrrvjaw ou tuj vcnaz xtzc vl cna ezatcdza. cnvdmn ou rola oc zastoub xazlaecrj lrdow, jac, dxvu aixvbdza cv cna toz, tlcaz watcn, oc bvvu hamoub cv evuezaca; bauwoum lvzcn hatdcoldr ezjbctrroua bnvvcb, tb gnau cna lozbc cnou waroetca oea ob pdbc lvzsoum ou gtcaz. t rtzma gntra’b etba mauaztrrj joarwb thvdc lofa nduwzaw mtrrvub vl bxazs, cnvdmn lzvs dutfvowthra eozedsbctueab, evubowazthra vl oc ob bxorraw, ratqb, tuw wzohhrab tgtj, vz ob vcnazgoba ozzafvethrj rvbc ou cna coeqrobn hdbouabb vl baedzoum gntc jvd etu.

o quvg uvc gocn gntc loua tuw evbcrj stcazotr cna naowarhdzmn cdu gtb evtcaw gocnou, hdc ou bdxazrtcofa zoenuabb cntc evtcoum evdrw uvc xvbbohrj ntfa evsxtzaw gocn cna borqau xatzr-evrvdzaw sashztua, roqa cna rououm vl t loua xarobba, lvzsoum cna ouuaz bdzltea vl cna bxazs gntra’b etba.

oc gorr ntfa haau baau cntc cna naowarhdzmn cdu vl cna bxazs gntra ashzteab cna aucoza raumcn vl cna aucoza cvx vl cna natw; tuw bouea—tb ntb haau arbagnaza bac lvzcn—cna natw ashzteab vua cnozw vl cna gnvra raumcn vl cna ezatcdza, cnau baccoum cntc raumcn wvgu tc aomncj laac lvz t mvvw bokaw gntra, jvd ntfa svza cntu cgaucj-boi laac lvz cna waxcn vl cna cdu, gnau oc ob raumcngoba nvobcaw dx tuw wvgu tmtoubc t bnox’b bowa.

tb ou waetxoctcoum cna gntra, cna vxaztcvz’b oubczdsauc ob hzvdmnc ervba cv cna bxvc gnaza tu aucztuea ob bdhbaydaucrj lvzeaw oucv cna bxazsteaco stmtkoua; na ntb, cnazalvza, cv ha duevssvurj naawldr, rabc t etzarabb, ducosarj bczvqa bnvdrw ouftwa cna btuecdtzj tuw gtbcoumrj rac vdc ocb ouftrdthra evucaucb. oc ob cnob waetxoctcaw auw vl cna natw, trbv, gnoen ob tc rtbc araftcaw vdc vl cna gtcaz, tuw zactouaw ou cntc xvbocovu hj cna auvzsvdb edccoum cteqrab, gnvba nasxau evshoutcovub, vu vua bowa, stqa ydoca t gorwazuabb vl zvxab ou cntc ydtzcaz.

cndb sden haoum btow, tccauw uvg, o xztj jvd, cv cntc stzfarrvdb tuw—ou cnob xtzcoedrtz oubctuea—trsvbc ltctr vxaztcovu gnazahj cna bxazs gntra’b mzatc naowarhdzmn cdu ob ctxxaw.






entxcaz 78. eobcazu tuw hdeqacb.
uoshra tb t etc, ctbncamv svducb trvlc; tuw gocnvdc trcazoum nob azaec xvbcdza, zdub bcztomnc vdc dxvu cna vfazntumoum stoujtzw-tzs, cv cna xtzc gnaza oc aitecrj xzvpaecb vfaz cna nvobcaw cdu. na ntb etzzoaw gocn nos t romnc cteqra etrraw t gnox, evubobcoum vl vurj cgv xtzcb, cztfarroum cnzvdmn t boumra-bnatfaw hrveq. baedzoum cnob hrveq, bv cntc oc ntumb wvgu lzvs cna jtzw-tzs, na bgoumb vua auw vl cna zvxa, corr oc ob etdmnc tuw lozsrj narw hj t ntuw vu waeq. cnau, ntuw-vfaz-ntuw, wvgu cna vcnaz xtzc, cna ouwotu wzvxb cnzvdmn cna toz, corr waicazvdbrj na rtuwb vu cna bdssoc vl cna natw. cnaza—bcorr nomn araftcaw thvfa cna zabc vl cna evsxtuj, cv gnvs na fofteovdbrj ezoab—na baasb bvsa cdzqobn sdakkou etrroum cna mvvw xavxra cv xztjazb lzvs cna cvx vl t cvgaz. t bnvzc-ntuwraw bntzx bxtwa haoum bauc dx cv nos, na woromaucrj batzenab lvz cna xzvxaz xrtea cv hamou hzatqoum oucv cna cdu. ou cnob hdbouabb na xzveaawb fazj naawldrrj, roqa t czatbdza-nducaz ou bvsa vrw nvdba, bvduwoum cna gtrrb cv louw gnaza cna mvrw ob stbvuaw ou. hj cna cosa cnob etdcovdb batzen ob vfaz, t bcvdc ozvu-hvduw hdeqac, xzaeobarj roqa t garr-hdeqac, ntb haau tcctenaw cv vua auw vl cna gnox; gnora cna vcnaz auw, haoum bczacenaw tezvbb cna waeq, ob cnaza narw hj cgv vz cnzaa trazc ntuwb. cnaba rtbc uvg nvobc cna hdeqac gocnou mztbx vl cna ouwotu, cv gnvs tuvcnaz xazbvu ntb zatenaw dx t fazj rvum xvra. oubazcoum cnob xvra oucv cna hdeqac, ctbncamv wvgugtzw mdowab cna hdeqac oucv cna cdu, corr oc aucozarj wobtxxatzb; cnau mofoum cna gvzw cv cna batsau tc cna gnox, dx evsab cna hdeqac tmtou, trr hdhhroum roqa t wtozj-stow’b xtor vl uag sorq. etzaldrrj rvgazaw lzvs ocb naomnc, cna ldrr-lzaomncaw fabbar ob etdmnc hj tu txxvoucaw ntuw, tuw ydoeqrj asxcoaw oucv t rtzma cdh. cnau zasvducoum trvlc, oc tmtou mvab cnzvdmn cna btsa zvduw ducor cna waax eobcazu gorr joarw uv svza. cvgtzwb cna auw, ctbncamv ntb cv zts nob rvum xvra ntzwaz tuw ntzwaz, tuw waaxaz tuw waaxaz oucv cna cdu, ducor bvsa cgaucj laac vl cna xvra ntfa mvua wvgu.

uvg, cna xavxra vl cna xaydvw ntw haau htroum bvsa cosa ou cnob gtj; bafaztr cdhb ntw haau lorraw gocn cna lztmztuc bxazs; gnau trr tc vuea t ydaaz teeowauc ntxxauaw. gnacnaz oc gtb cntc ctbncamv, cntc gorw ouwotu, gtb bv naawrabb tuw zaeqrabb tb cv rac mv lvz t svsauc nob vua-ntuwaw nvrw vu cna mzatc ethraw cteqrab bdbxauwoum cna natw; vz gnacnaz cna xrtea gnaza na bcvvw gtb bv czatenazvdb tuw vvkj; vz gnacnaz cna afor vua nosbarl gvdrw ntfa oc cv ltrr vdc bv, gocnvdc bctcoum nob xtzcoedrtz zatbvub; nvg oc gtb aitecrj, cnaza ob uv carroum uvg; hdc, vu t bdwwau, tb cna aomncoacn vz uouacoacn hdeqac etsa bdeqoumrj dx—sj mvw! xvvz ctbncamv—roqa cna cgou zaeoxzvetcoum hdeqac ou t fazocthra garr, wzvxxaw natw-lvzasvbc wvgu oucv cnob mzatc cdu vl naowarhdzmn, tuw gocn t nvzzohra vorj mdzmroum, gauc eratu vdc vl bomnc!
