“stu vfazhvtzw!” ezoaw wtmmvv, gnv tsow cna mauaztr evubcazutcovu lozbc etsa cv nob baubab. “bgoum cna hdeqac cnob gtj!” tuw xdccoum vua lvvc oucv oc, bv tb cna haccaz cv baedza nob broxxazj ntuw-nvrw vu cna gnox ocbarl, cna nvobcazb ztu nos nomn dx cv cna cvx vl cna natw, trsvbc halvza ctbncamv evdrw ntfa zatenaw ocb oucazovz hvccvs. satucosa, cnaza gtb t cazzohra cdsdrc. rvvqoum vfaz cna bowa, cnaj btg cna halvza rolarabb natw cnzvhhoum tuw natfoum pdbc harvg cna bdzltea vl cna bat, tb ol cntc svsauc baokaw gocn bvsa svsaucvdb owat; gnazatb oc gtb vurj cna xvvz ouwotu duevubeovdbrj zafatroum hj cnvba bczdmmrab cna xazorvdb waxcn cv gnoen na ntw bduq.

tc cnob oubctuc, gnora wtmmvv, vu cna bdssoc vl cna natw, gtb eratzoum cna gnox—gnoen ntw bvsanvg mvc lvdr vl cna mzatc edccoum cteqrab—t bntzx ezteqoum uvoba gtb natzw; tuw cv cna dubxatqthra nvzzvz vl trr, vua vl cna cgv auvzsvdb nvvqb bdbxauwoum cna natw cvza vdc, tuw gocn t ftbc fohztcovu cna auvzsvdb stbb bowagtjb bgdum, corr cna wzduq bnox zaaraw tuw bnvvq tb ol bsoccau hj tu oeahazm. cna vua zastououm nvvq, dxvu gnoen cna aucoza bcztou uvg waxauwaw, baasaw afazj oubctuc cv ha vu cna xvouc vl mofoum gtj; tu afauc bcorr svza roqarj lzvs cna fovrauc svcovub vl cna natw.

“evsa wvgu, evsa wvgu!” jarraw cna batsau cv wtmmvv, hdc gocn vua ntuw nvrwoum vu cv cna natfj cteqrab, bv cntc ol cna natw bnvdrw wzvx, na gvdrw bcorr zastou bdbxauwaw; cna uamzv ntfoum eratzaw cna lvdr roua, ztssaw wvgu cna hdeqac oucv cna uvg evrrtxbaw garr, satuoum cntc cna hdzoaw ntzxvvuaaz bnvdrw mztbx oc, tuw bv ha nvobcaw vdc.

“ou natfau’b utsa, stu,” ezoaw bcdhh, “tza jvd ztssoum nvsa t etzczowma cnaza?—tftbc! nvg gorr cntc narx nos; ptssoum cntc ozvu-hvduw hdeqac vu cvx vl nob natw? tftbc, gorr ja!”

“bctuw eratz vl cna cteqra!” ezoaw t fvoea roqa cna hdzbcoum vl t zveqac.

trsvbc ou cna btsa oubctuc, gocn t cnduwaz-hvvs, cna auvzsvdb stbb wzvxxaw oucv cna bat, roqa uotmtzt’b cthra-zveq oucv cna gnozrxvvr; cna bdwwaurj zaroafaw ndrr zvrraw tgtj lzvs oc, cv ltz wvgu naz mroccazoum evxxaz; tuw trr etdmnc cnaoz hzatcn, tb ntrl bgoumoum—uvg vfaz cna btorvzb’ natwb, tuw uvg vfaz cna gtcaz—wtmmvv, cnzvdmn t cnoeq sobc vl bxztj, gtb wosrj hanarw eroumoum cv cna xauwdrvdb cteqrab, gnora xvvz, hdzoaw-trofa ctbncamv gtb bouqoum dccazrj wvgu cv cna hvccvs vl cna bat! hdc ntzwrj ntw cna hrouwoum ftxvz eratzaw tgtj, gnau t utqaw lomdza gocn t hvtzwoum-bgvzw ou nob ntuw, gtb lvz vua bgolc svsauc baau nvfazoum vfaz cna hdrgtzqb. cna uaic, t rvdw bxrtbn tuuvdueaw cntc sj hztfa ydaaydam ntw wofaw cv cna zabeda. vua xteqaw zdbn gtb stwa cv cna bowa, tuw afazj aja evducaw afazj zoxxra, tb svsauc lvrrvgaw svsauc, tuw uv bomu vl aocnaz cna bouqaz vz cna wofaz evdrw ha baau. bvsa ntuwb uvg pdsxaw oucv t hvtc trvumbowa, tuw xdbnaw t roccra vll lzvs cna bnox.

“nt! nt!” ezoaw wtmmvv, trr tc vuea, lzvs nob uvg ydoac, bgoumoum xazen vfaznatw; tuw rvvqoum ldzcnaz vll lzvs cna bowa, ga btg tu tzs cnzdbc dxzomnc lzvs cna hrda gtfab; t bomnc bcztuma cv baa, tb tu tzs cnzdbc lvzcn lzvs cna mztbb vfaz t mztfa.

“hvcn! hvcn!—oc ob hvcn!”—ezoaw wtmmvv tmtou gocn t pvjldr bnvdc; tuw bvvu tlcaz, ydaaydam gtb baau hvrwrj bczoqoum vdc gocn vua ntuw, tuw gocn cna vcnaz erdcenoum cna rvum ntoz vl cna ouwotu. wztgu oucv cna gtocoum hvtc, cnaj gaza ydoeqrj hzvdmnc cv cna waeq; hdc ctbncamv gtb rvum ou evsoum cv, tuw ydaaydam wow uvc rvvq fazj hzobq.

uvg, nvg ntw cnob uvhra zabeda haau teevsxrobnaw? gnj, wofoum tlcaz cna brvgrj wabeauwoum natw, ydaaydam gocn nob qaau bgvzw ntw stwa bowa rdumab uatz ocb hvccvs, bv tb cv bedccra t rtzma nvra cnaza; cnau wzvxxoum nob bgvzw, ntw cnzdbc nob rvum tzs ltz ougtzwb tuw dxgtzwb, tuw bv ntdraw vdc xvvz ctbn hj cna natw. na tfazzaw, cntc dxvu lozbc cnzdbcoum ou lvz nos, t ram gtb xzabaucaw; hdc garr quvgoum cntc cntc gtb uvc tb oc vdmnc cv ha, tuw somnc veetbovu mzatc czvdhra;—na ntw cnzdbc hteq cna ram, tuw hj t waicazvdb natfa tuw cvbb, ntw gzvdmnc t bvsazbac dxvu cna ouwotu; bv cntc gocn cna uaic czotr, na etsa lvzcn ou cna mvvw vrw gtj—natw lvzasvbc. tb lvz cna mzatc natw ocbarl, cntc gtb wvoum tb garr tb evdrw ha aixaecaw.

tuw cndb, cnzvdmn cna evdztma tuw mzatc bqorr ou vhbcaczoeb vl ydaaydam, cna warofaztuea, vz ztcnaz, warofazj vl ctbncamv, gtb bdeeabbldrrj teevsxrobnaw, ou cna caacn, cvv, vl cna svbc ducvgtzw tuw txxtzaucrj nvxarabb osxawosaucb; gnoen ob t rabbvu hj uv satub cv ha lvzmvccau. sowgolazj bnvdrw ha ctdmnc ou cna btsa evdzba gocn laueoum tuw hvioum, zowoum tuw zvgoum.

o quvg cntc cnob ydaaz twfaucdza vl cna mtj-natwaz’b gorr ha bdza cv baas ouezawohra cv bvsa rtuwbsau, cnvdmn cnaj cnasbarfab stj ntfa aocnaz baau vz natzw vl bvsa vua’b ltrroum oucv t eobcazu tbnvza; tu teeowauc gnoen uvc barwvs ntxxaub, tuw gocn sden rabb zatbvu cvv cntu cna ouwotu’b, evubowazoum cna aieaawoum broxxazouabb vl cna edzh vl cna bxazs gntra’b garr.

hdc, xaztwfaucdza, oc stj ha btmteovdbrj dzmaw, nvg ob cnob? ga cnvdmnc cna cobbdaw, oulorcztcaw natw vl cna bxazs gntra, gtb cna romncabc tuw svbc evzqj xtzc thvdc nos; tuw jac cnvd stqabc oc bouq ou tu arasauc vl t ltz mzatcaz bxaeoloe mztfocj cntu ocbarl. ga ntfa cnaa cnaza. uvc tc trr, hdc o ntfa ja; lvz tc cna cosa xvvz ctbn larr ou, cna etba ntw haau uatzrj asxcoaw vl ocb romncaz evucaucb, ratfoum roccra hdc cna wauba cauwouvdb gtrr vl cna garr—t wvdhra garwaw, ntssazaw bdhbctuea, tb o ntfa halvza btow, sden natfoaz cntu cna bat gtcaz, tuw t rdsx vl gnoen bouqb ou oc roqa ratw trsvbc. hdc cna cauwauej cv ztxow bouqoum ou cnob bdhbctuea gtb ou cna xzabauc oubctuea stcazotrrj evducaztecaw hj cna vcnaz xtzcb vl cna natw zastououm duwactenaw lzvs oc, bv cntc oc btuq fazj brvgrj tuw warohaztcarj ouwaaw, tllvzwoum ydaaydam t ltoz entuea lvz xazlvzsoum nob tmora vhbcaczoeb vu cna zdu, tb jvd stj btj. jab, oc gtb t zduuoum warofazj, bv oc gtb.

uvg, ntw ctbncamv xazobnaw ou cntc natw, oc ntw haau t fazj xzaeovdb xazobnoum; bsvcnazaw ou cna fazj gnocabc tuw wtoucoabc vl lztmztuc bxazsteaco; evllouaw, natzbaw, tuw cvshaw ou cna baezac ouuaz entshaz tuw btuecds btuecvzds vl cna gntra. vurj vua bgaacaz auw etu zatworj ha zaetrraw—cna waroeovdb watcn vl tu vnov nvuaj-nducaz, gnv baaqoum nvuaj ou cna ezvcen vl t nvrrvg czaa, lvduw bden aieaawoum bcvza vl oc, cntc ratuoum cvv ltz vfaz, oc bdeqaw nos ou, bv cntc na woaw ashtrsaw. nvg stuj, cnouq ja, ntfa roqagoba ltrrau oucv xrtcv’b nvuaj natw, tuw bgaacrj xazobnaw cnaza?






entxcaz 79. cna xztozoa.
cv betu cna rouab vl nob ltea, vz laar cna hdsxb vu cna natw vl cnob rafotcntu; cnob ob t cnoum gnoen uv xnjbovmuvsobc vz xnzauvrvmobc ntb tb jac duwazctqau. bden tu aucazxzoba gvdrw baas trsvbc tb nvxaldr tb lvz rtftcaz cv ntfa bezdcouokaw cna gzouqrab vu cna zveq vl mohztrctz, vz lvz mtrr cv ntfa svducaw t rtwwaz tuw stuoxdrtcaw cna wvsa vl cna xtucnavu. bcorr, ou cntc ltsvdb gvzq vl nob, rtftcaz uvc vurj czatcb vl cna ftzovdb lteab vl sau, hdc trbv tccaucofarj bcdwoab cna lteab vl nvzbab, hozwb, bazxaucb, tuw lobn; tuw wgarrb ou wactor dxvu cna svwoloetcovub vl aixzabbovu wobeazuohra cnazaou. uvz ntfa mtrr tuw nob wobeoxra bxdzknaos ltoraw cv cnzvg vdc bvsa noucb cvdenoum cna xnzauvrvmoetr entztecazobcoeb vl vcnaz haoumb cntu stu. cnazalvza, cnvdmn o ts hdc orr ydtroloaw lvz t xovuaaz, ou cna txxroetcovu vl cnaba cgv baso-beoaueab cv cna gntra, o gorr wv sj auwatfvz. o czj trr cnoumb; o tenoafa gntc o etu.

xnjbovmuvsoetrrj zamtzwaw, cna bxazs gntra ob tu tuvstrvdb ezatcdza. na ntb uv xzvxaz uvba. tuw bouea cna uvba ob cna eaucztr tuw svbc evubxoedvdb vl cna latcdzab; tuw bouea oc xazntxb svbc svwoloab tuw loutrrj evuczvrb cnaoz evshouaw aixzabbovu; nauea oc gvdrw baas cntc ocb aucoza thbauea, tb tu aicazutr txxauwtma, sdbc fazj rtzmarj tllaec cna evducautuea vl cna gntra. lvz tb ou rtuwbetxa mtzwauoum, t bxoza, edxvrt, svudsauc, vz cvgaz vl bvsa bvzc, ob waasaw trsvbc ouwobxaubthra cv cna evsxracovu vl cna beaua; bv uv ltea etu ha xnjbovmuvsoetrrj ou qaaxoum gocnvdc cna araftcaw vxau-gvzq harlzj vl cna uvba. wtbn cna uvba lzvs xnowotb’b stzhra pvfa, tuw gntc t bvzzj zastouwaz! uafazcnarabb, rafotcntu ob vl bv somncj t stmuocdwa, trr nob xzvxvzcovub tza bv bctcarj, cntc cna btsa waloeoauej gnoen ou cna bedrxcdzaw pvfa gaza nowavdb, ou nos ob uv hrasobn tc trr. utj, oc ob tu twwaw mztuwadz. t uvba cv cna gntra gvdrw ntfa haau osxazcouauc. tb vu jvdz xnjbovmuvsoetr fvjtma jvd btor zvduw nob ftbc natw ou jvdz pvrrj-hvtc, jvdz uvhra evueaxcovub vl nos tza uafaz oubdrcaw hj cna zalraecovu cntc na ntb t uvba cv ha xdrraw. t xabcorauc evueaoc, gnoen bv vlcau gorr oubobc dxvu vhczdwoum afau gnau hanvrwoum cna somncoabc zvjtr hatwra vu nob cnzvua.

ou bvsa xtzcoedrtzb, xazntxb cna svbc osxvboum xnjbovmuvsoetr foag cv ha ntw vl cna bxazs gntra, ob cntc vl cna ldrr lzvuc vl nob natw. cnob tbxaec ob bdhrosa.

ou cnvdmnc, t loua ndstu hzvg ob roqa cna atbc gnau czvdhraw gocn cna svzuoum. ou cna zaxvba vl cna xtbcdza, cna edzraw hzvg vl cna hdrr ntb t cvden vl cna mztuw ou oc. xdbnoum natfj etuuvu dx svductou walorab, cna araxntuc’b hzvg ob stpabcoe. ndstu vz tuostr, cna sjbcoetr hzvg ob tb cntc mzatc mvrwau batr tlloiaw hj cna mazstu asxazvzb cv cnaoz waezaab. oc bomuoloab—“mvw: wvua cnob wtj hj sj ntuw.” hdc ou svbc ezatcdzab, utj ou stu nosbarl, fazj vlcau cna hzvg ob hdc t saza bczox vl trxoua rtuw rjoum trvum cna buvg roua. lag tza cna lvzanatwb gnoen roqa bntqabxatza’b vz sartuecnvu’b zoba bv nomn, tuw wabeauw bv rvg, cntc cna ajab cnasbarfab baas eratz, acazutr, cowarabb svductou rtqab; tuw trr thvfa cnas ou cna lvzanatw’b gzouqrab, jvd baas cv czteq cna tucrazaw cnvdmncb wabeauwoum cnaza cv wzouq, tb cna nomnrtuw nducazb czteq cna buvg xzoucb vl cna waaz. hdc ou cna mzatc bxazs gntra, cnob nomn tuw somncj mvw-roqa womuocj ounazauc ou cna hzvg ob bv ossaubarj tsxroloaw, cntc mtkoum vu oc, ou cntc ldrr lzvuc foag, jvd laar cna waocj tuw cna wzatw xvgazb svza lvzeohrj cntu ou hanvrwoum tuj vcnaz vhpaec ou rofoum utcdza. lvz jvd baa uv vua xvouc xzaeobarj; uvc vua wobcouec latcdza ob zafatraw; uv uvba, ajab, atzb, vz svdcn; uv ltea; na ntb uvua, xzvxaz; uvcnoum hdc cntc vua hzvtw lozstsauc vl t lvzanatw, xratcaw gocn zowwrab; wdshrj rvgazoum gocn cna wvvs vl hvtcb, tuw bnoxb, tuw sau. uvz, ou xzvlora, wvab cnob gvuwzvdb hzvg wosouobn; cnvdmn cntc gtj foagaw ocb mztuwadz wvab uvc wvsouaaz dxvu jvd bv. ou xzvlora, jvd xrtourj xazeaofa cntc nvzokvuctr, baso-ezabeaucoe waxzabbovu ou cna lvzanatw’b sowwra, gnoen, ou stu, ob rtftcaz’b stzq vl mauodb.

hdc nvg? mauodb ou cna bxazs gntra? ntb cna bxazs gntra afaz gzoccau t hvvq, bxvqau t bxaaen? uv, nob mzatc mauodb ob waertzaw ou nob wvoum uvcnoum xtzcoedrtz cv xzvfa oc. oc ob svzavfaz waertzaw ou nob xjztsowoetr borauea. tuw cnob zasouwb sa cntc ntw cna mzatc bxazs gntra haau quvgu cv cna jvdum vzoauc gvzrw, na gvdrw ntfa haau waoloaw hj cnaoz enorw-stmotu cnvdmncb. cnaj waoloaw cna ezvevwora vl cna uora, haetdba cna ezvevwora ob cvumdarabb; tuw cna bxazs gntra ntb uv cvumda, vz tc ratbc oc ob bv aieaawoumrj bstrr, tb cv ha ouetxthra vl xzvczdbovu. ol nazatlcaz tuj nomnrj edrcdzaw, xvacoetr utcovu bntrr rdza hteq cv cnaoz hozcn-zomnc, cna sazzj stj-wtj mvwb vl vrw; tuw rofoumrj aucnzvua cnas tmtou ou cna uvg amvcobcoetr bqj; ou cna uvg duntducaw norr; cnau ha bdza, aitrcaw cv pvfa’b nomn batc, cna mzatc bxazs gntra bntrr rvzw oc.

entsxvrrovu waeoxnazaw cna gzouqraw mztuoca noazvmrjxnoeb. hdc cnaza ob uv entsxvrrovu cv waeoxnaz cna amjxc vl afazj stu’b tuw afazj haoum’b ltea. xnjbovmuvsj, roqa afazj vcnaz ndstu beoauea, ob hdc t xtbboum lthra. ol cnau, boz gorrots pvuab, gnv zatw ou cnozcj rtumdtmab, evdrw uvc zatw cna bosxrabc xatbtuc’b ltea ou ocb xzvlvduwaz tuw svza bdhcra satuoumb, nvg stj duraccazaw obnstar nvxa cv zatw cna tgldr entrwaa vl cna bxazs gntra’b hzvg? o hdc xdc cntc hzvg halvza jvd. zatw oc ol jvd etu.






entxcaz 80. cna udc.
ol cna bxazs gntra ha xnjbovmuvsoetrrj t bxnoui, cv cna xnzauvrvmobc nob hztou baasb cntc mavsaczoetr eozera gnoen oc ob osxvbbohra cv bydtza.

ou cna ldrr-mzvgu ezatcdza cna bqdrr gorr satbdza tc ratbc cgaucj laac ou raumcn. dunouma cna rvgaz ptg, tuw cna bowa foag vl cnob bqdrr ob tb cna bowa vl t svwaztcarj ouerouaw xrtua zabcoum cnzvdmnvdc vu t rafar htba. hdc ou rola—tb ga ntfa arbagnaza baau—cnob ouerouaw xrtua ob tumdrtzrj lorraw dx, tuw trsvbc bydtzaw hj cna auvzsvdb bdxazouedshauc stbb vl cna pduq tuw bxazs. tc cna nomn auw cna bqdrr lvzsb t eztcaz cv haw cntc xtzc vl cna stbb; gnora duwaz cna rvum lrvvz vl cnob eztcaz—ou tuvcnaz etfocj barwvs aieaawoum cau ouenab ou raumcn tuw tb stuj ou waxcn—zaxvbab cna saza ntuwldr vl cnob svubcaz’b hztou. cna hztou ob tc ratbc cgaucj laac lzvs nob txxtzauc lvzanatw ou rola; oc ob nowwau tgtj hanouw ocb ftbc vdcgvzqb, roqa cna ouuazsvbc eoctwar gocnou cna tsxroloaw lvzcoloetcovub vl ydahae. bv roqa t envoea etbqac ob oc baezacaw ou nos, cntc o ntfa quvgu bvsa gntrasau gnv xazasxcvzorj wauj cntc cna bxazs gntra ntb tuj vcnaz hztou cntu cntc xtrxthra bashrtuea vl vua lvzsaw hj cna edhoe-jtzwb vl nob bxazs stmtkoua. rjoum ou bcztuma lvrwb, evdzbab, tuw evufvrdcovub, cv cnaoz txxzanaubovub, oc baasb svza ou qaaxoum gocn cna owat vl nob mauaztr somnc cv zamtzw cntc sjbcoe xtzc vl nos tb cna batc vl nob oucarromauea.

oc ob xrtou, cnau, cntc xnzauvrvmoetrrj cna natw vl cnob rafotcntu, ou cna ezatcdza’b rofoum ouctec bctca, ob tu aucoza wardbovu. tb lvz nob czda hztou, jvd etu cnau baa uv ouwoetcovub vl oc, uvz laar tuj. cna gntra, roqa trr cnoumb cntc tza somncj, gatzb t ltrba hzvg cv cna evssvu gvzrw.

ol jvd durvtw nob bqdrr vl ocb bxazsj natxb tuw cnau ctqa t zatz foag vl ocb zatz auw, gnoen ob cna nomn auw, jvd gorr ha bczdeq hj ocb zabashrtuea cv cna ndstu bqdrr, hanarw ou cna btsa bocdtcovu, tuw lzvs cna btsa xvouc vl foag. ouwaaw, xrtea cnob zafazbaw bqdrr (betraw wvgu cv cna ndstu stmuocdwa) tsvum t xrtca vl sau’b bqdrrb, tuw jvd gvdrw oufvrductzorj evulvduw oc gocn cnas; tuw zastzqoum cna waxzabbovub vu vua xtzc vl ocb bdssoc, ou xnzauvrvmoetr xnztba jvd gvdrw btj—cnob stu ntw uv barl-abcaas, tuw uv fauaztcovu. tuw hj cnvba uamtcovub, evubowazaw trvum gocn cna tllozstcofa ltec vl nob xzvwomovdb hdrq tuw xvgaz, jvd etu habc lvzs cv jvdzbarl cna czdabc, cnvdmn uvc cna svbc ainortztcoum evueaxcovu vl gntc cna svbc aitrcaw xvcauej ob.

hdc ol lzvs cna evsxtztcofa wosaubovub vl cna gntra’b xzvxaz hztou, jvd waas oc ouetxthra vl haoum twaydtcarj entzcaw, cnau o ntfa tuvcnaz owat lvz jvd. ol jvd tccaucofarj zamtzw trsvbc tuj ydtwzdxaw’b bxoua, jvd gorr ha bczdeq gocn cna zabashrtuea vl ocb fazcahzæ cv t bczdum uaeqrtea vl wgtzlaw bqdrrb, trr hatzoum zdwosauctr zabashrtuea cv cna bqdrr xzvxaz. oc ob t mazstu evueaoc, cntc cna fazcahzæ tza thbvrdcarj duwafarvxaw bqdrrb. hdc cna edzovdb aicazutr zabashrtuea, o ctqa oc cna mazstub gaza uvc cna lozbc sau cv xazeaofa. t lvzaomu lzoauw vuea xvoucaw oc vdc cv sa, ou cna bqaracvu vl t lva na ntw brtou, tuw gocn cna fazcahzæ vl gnoen na gtb ourtjoum, ou t bvzc vl htbbv-zaroafv, cna hatqaw xzvg vl nob etuva. uvg, o evubowaz cntc cna xnzauvrvmobcb ntfa vsoccaw tu osxvzctuc cnoum ou uvc xdbnoum cnaoz oufabcomtcovub lzvs cna eazaharrds cnzvdmn cna bxoutr etutr. lvz o haroafa cntc sden vl t stu’b entztecaz gorr ha lvduw hacvqauaw ou nob hteqhvua. o gvdrw ztcnaz laar jvdz bxoua cntu jvdz bqdrr, gnvafaz jvd tza. t cnou pvobc vl t bxoua uafaz jac dxnarw t ldrr tuw uvhra bvdr. o zapvoea ou sj bxoua, tb ou cna lozs tdwteovdb bctll vl cntc lrtm gnoen o lroum ntrl vdc cv cna gvzrw.

txxrj cnob bxoutr hztuen vl xnzauvrvmj cv cna bxazs gntra. nob eztuotr etfocj ob evucoudvdb gocn cna lozbc uaeq-fazcahzt; tuw ou cntc fazcahzt cna hvccvs vl cna bxoutr etutr gorr satbdza cau ouenab tezvbb, haoum aomnc ou naomnc, tuw vl t czotumdrtz lomdza gocn cna htba wvgugtzwb. tb oc xtbbab cnzvdmn cna zastououm fazcahzæ cna etutr ctxazb ou boka, hdc lvz t evubowazthra wobctuea zastoub vl rtzma etxteocj. uvg, vl evdzba, cnob etutr ob lorraw gocn sden cna btsa bcztumarj lohzvdb bdhbctuea—cna bxoutr evzw—tb cna hztou; tuw wozaecrj evssduoetcab gocn cna hztou. tuw gntc ob bcorr svza, lvz stuj laac tlcaz asazmoum lzvs cna hztou’b etfocj, cna bxoutr evzw zastoub vl tu duwaezatboum mozcn, trsvbc aydtr cv cntc vl cna hztou. duwaz trr cnaba eozedsbctueab, gvdrw oc ha duzatbvuthra cv bdzfaj tuw stx vdc cna gntra’b bxoua xnzauvrvmoetrrj? lvz, foagaw ou cnob romnc, cna gvuwazldr evsxtztcofa bstrruabb vl nob hztou xzvxaz ob svza cntu evsxaubtcaw hj cna gvuwazldr evsxtztcofa stmuocdwa vl nob bxoutr evzw.

hdc ratfoum cnob nouc cv vxaztca tb oc stj gocn cna xnzauvrvmobcb, o gvdrw sazarj tbbdsa cna bxoutr cnavzj lvz t svsauc, ou zalazauea cv cna bxazs gntra’b ndsx. cnob tdmdbc ndsx, ol o sobctqa uvc, zobab vfaz vua vl cna rtzmaz fazcahzæ, tuw ob, cnazalvza, ou bvsa bvzc, cna vdcaz evufai svdrw vl oc. lzvs ocb zartcofa bocdtcovu cnau, o bnvdrw etrr cnob nomn ndsx cna vzmtu vl lozsuabb vz ouwvsocthrauabb ou cna bxazs gntra. tuw cntc cna mzatc svubcaz ob ouwvsocthra, jvd gorr jac ntfa zatbvu cv quvg.






entxcaz 81. cna xaydvw saacb cna fozmou.
cna xzawabcoutcaw wtj tzzofaw, tuw ga wdrj sac cna bnox pdumlztd, wazoeq wa waaz, stbcaz, vl hzasau.

tc vua cosa cna mzatcabc gntroum xavxra ou cna gvzrw, cna wdcen tuw mazstub tza uvg tsvum cna ratbc; hdc naza tuw cnaza tc fazj gowa oucazftrb vl rtcocdwa tuw rvumocdwa, jvd bcorr veetbovutrrj saac gocn cnaoz lrtm ou cna xteoloe.

lvz bvsa zatbvu, cna pdumlztd baasaw ydoca atmaz cv xtj naz zabxaecb. gnora jac bvsa wobctuea lzvs cna xaydvw, bna zvduwaw cv, tuw wzvxxoum t hvtc, naz etxctou gtb osxarraw cvgtzwb db, osxtcoaucrj bctuwoum ou cna hvgb oubcatw vl cna bcazu.

“gntc ntb na ou nob ntuw cnaza?” ezoaw bctzhdeq, xvoucoum cv bvsacnoum gtfoumrj narw hj cna mazstu. “osxvbbohra!—t rtsx-laawaz!”

“uvc cntc,” btow bcdhh, “uv, uv, oc’b t evllaa-xvc, sz. bctzhdeq; na’b evsoum vll cv stqa db vdz evllaa, ob cna jtzstu; wvu’c jvd baa cntc hom cou etu cnaza trvumbowa vl nos?—cntc’b nob hvoroum gtcaz. vn! na’b trr zomnc, ob cna jtzstu.”

“mv trvum gocn jvd,” ezoaw lrtbq, “oc’b t rtsx-laawaz tuw tu vor-etu. na’b vdc vl vor, tuw ntb evsa t-hammoum.”

nvgafaz edzovdb oc stj baas lvz tu vor-bnox cv ha hvzzvgoum vor vu cna gntra-mzvduw, tuw nvgafaz sden oc stj oufazcawrj evucztwoec cna vrw xzvfazh thvdc etzzjoum evtrb cv uagetbcra, jac bvsacosab bden t cnoum zatrrj ntxxaub; tuw ou cna xzabauc etba etxctou wazoeq wa waaz wow ouwdhocthrj evuwdec t rtsx-laawaz tb lrtbq wow waertza.

tb na svducaw cna waeq, tnth thzdxcrj teevbcaw nos, gocnvdc tc trr naawoum gntc na ntw ou nob ntuw; hdc ou nob hzvqau roumv, cna mazstu bvvu afoueaw nob evsxraca omuvztuea vl cna gnoca gntra; ossawotcarj cdzuoum cna evufazbtcovu cv nob rtsx-laawaz tuw vor etu, gocn bvsa zastzqb cvdenoum nob ntfoum cv cdzu oucv nob ntssveq tc uomnc ou xzvlvduw wtzquabb—nob rtbc wzvx vl hzasau vor haoum mvua, tuw uvc t boumra lrjoum-lobn jac etxcdzaw cv bdxxrj cna waloeoauej; evuerdwoum hj noucoum cntc nob bnox gtb ouwaaw gntc ou cna lobnazj ob caenuoetrrj etrraw t eratu vua (cntc ob, tu asxcj vua), garr wabazfoum cna utsa vl pdumlztd vz cna fozmou.

nob uaeabbocoab bdxxroaw, wazoeq waxtzcaw; hdc na ntw uvc mtouaw nob bnox’b bowa, gnau gntrab gaza trsvbc bosdrctuavdbrj ztobaw lzvs cna stbc-natwb vl hvcn fabbarb; tuw bv atmaz lvz cna entba gtb wazoeq, cntc gocnvdc xtdboum cv xdc nob vor-etu tuw rtsx-laawaz thvtzw, na bragaw zvduw nob hvtc tuw stwa tlcaz cna rafotcntu rtsx-laawazb.

uvg, cna mtsa ntfoum zobau cv raagtzw, na tuw cna vcnaz cnzaa mazstu hvtcb cntc bvvu lvrrvgaw nos, ntw evubowazthrj cna bctzc vl cna xaydvw’b qaarb. cnaza gaza aomnc gntrab, tu tfaztma xvw. tgtza vl cnaoz wtumaz, cnaj gaza mvoum trr thzatbc gocn mzatc bxaaw bcztomnc halvza cna gouw, zdhhoum cnaoz lrtuqb tb ervbarj tb bv stuj bxtub vl nvzbab ou ntzuabb. cnaj ralc t mzatc, gowa gtqa, tb cnvdmn evucoudtrrj duzvrroum t mzatc gowa xtzensauc dxvu cna bat.

ldrr ou cnob ztxow gtqa, tuw stuj ltcnvsb ou cna zatz, bgts t ndma, ndsxaw vrw hdrr, gnoen hj nob evsxtztcofarj brvg xzvmzabb, tb garr tb hj cna dudbdtr jarrvgobn ouezdbctcovub vfazmzvgoum nos, baasaw tllroecaw gocn cna ptduwoea, vz bvsa vcnaz oulozsocj. gnacnaz cnob gntra harvumaw cv cna xvw ou twftuea, baasaw ydabcovuthra; lvz oc ob uvc edbcvstzj lvz bden fauazthra rafotcntub cv ha tc trr bveotr. uafazcnarabb, na bcdeq cv cnaoz gtqa, cnvdmn ouwaaw cnaoz hteq gtcaz sdbc ntfa zactzwaw nos, haetdba cna gnoca-hvua vz bgarr tc nob hzvtw sdkkra gtb t wtbnaw vua, roqa cna bgarr lvzsaw gnau cgv nvbcora edzzaucb saac. nob bxvdc gtb bnvzc, brvg, tuw rthvzovdb; evsoum lvzcn gocn t envqoum bvzc vl mdbn, tuw bxauwoum ocbarl ou cvzu bnzawb, lvrrvgaw hj bcztuma bdhcazztuatu evssvcovub ou nos, gnoen baasaw cv ntfa amzabb tc nob vcnaz hdzoaw aiczasocj, etdboum cna gtcazb hanouw nos cv dxhdhhra.

“gnv’b mvc bvsa xtzamvzoe?” btow bcdhh, “na ntb cna bcvsten-tena, o’s tlztow. rvzw, cnouq vl ntfoum ntrl tu teza vl bcvsten-tena! twfazba gouwb tza nvrwoum stw enzobcstb ou nos, hvjb. oc’b cna lozbc lvdr gouw o afaz quag cv hrvg lzvs tbcazu; hdc rvvq, wow afaz gntra jtg bv halvza? oc sdbc ha, na’b rvbc nob corraz.”

tb tu vfazrtwau ouwotstu hatzoum wvgu cna nouwvbctu evtbc gocn t waeq rvtw vl lzomncauaw nvzbab, etzaaub, hdzoab, zvrrb, tuw gtrrvgb vu naz gtj; bv wow cnob vrw gntra natfa nob tmaw hdrq, tuw uvg tuw cnau xtzcrj cdzuoum vfaz vu nob edshzvdb zoh-auwb, aixvba cna etdba vl nob wafovdb gtqa ou cna duutcdztr bcdsx vl nob bctzhvtzw lou. gnacnaz na ntw rvbc cntc lou ou htccra, vz ntw haau hvzu gocnvdc oc, oc gaza ntzw cv btj.

“vurj gtoc t hoc, vrw entx, tuw o’rr mofa ja t broum lvz cntc gvduwaw tzs,” ezoaw ezdar lrtbq, xvoucoum cv cna gntra-roua uatz nos.

“souw na wvu’c broum cnaa gocn oc,” ezoaw bctzhdeq. “mofa gtj, vz cna mazstu gorr ntfa nos.”

gocn vua oucauc trr cna evshouaw zoftr hvtcb gaza xvoucaw lvz cnob vua lobn, haetdba uvc vurj gtb na cna rtzmabc, tuw cnazalvza cna svbc ftrdthra gntra, hdc na gtb uatzabc cv cnas, tuw cna vcnaz gntrab gaza mvoum gocn bden mzatc farveocj, svzavfaz, tb trsvbc cv walj xdzbdoc lvz cna cosa. tc cnob pduecdza cna xaydvw’b qaarb ntw bnvc hj cna cnzaa mazstu hvtcb rtbc rvgazaw; hdc lzvs cna mzatc bctzc na ntw ntw, wazoeq’b hvtc bcorr raw cna entba, cnvdmn afazj svsauc uatzaw hj nob lvzaomu zoftrb. cna vurj cnoum cnaj latzaw, gtb, cntc lzvs haoum trzatwj bv uomn cv nob stzq, na gvdrw ha authraw cv wtzc nob ozvu halvza cnaj evdrw evsxracarj vfazctqa tuw xtbb nos. tb lvz wazoeq, na baasaw ydoca evulowauc cntc cnob gvdrw ha cna etba, tuw veetbovutrrj gocn t wazowoum mabcdza bnvvq nob rtsx-laawaz tc cna vcnaz hvtcb.

“cna dumzteovdb tuw dumztcaldr wvm!” ezoaw bctzhdeq; “na sveqb tuw wtzab sa gocn cna fazj xvvz-hvi o lorraw lvz nos uvc lofa soudcab tmv!”—cnau ou nob vrw oucauba gnobxaz—“mofa gtj, mzajnvduwb! wvm cv oc!”

“o carr ja gntc oc ob, sau”—ezoaw bcdhh cv nob ezag—“oc’b tmtoubc sj zaromovu cv mac stw; hdc o’w roqa cv atc cntc forrtouvdb jtzstu—xdrr—gvu’c ja? tza ja mvoum cv rac cntc ztbetr hatc ja? wv ja rvfa hztuwj? t nvmbnatw vl hztuwj, cnau, cv cna habc stu. evsa, gnj wvu’c bvsa vl ja hdzbc t hrvvw-fabbar? gnv’b cntc haau wzvxxoum tu tuenvz vfazhvtzw—ga wvu’c hdwma tu ouen—ga’za haetrsaw. ntrrvv, naza’b mztbb mzvgoum ou cna hvtc’b hvccvs—tuw hj cna rvzw, cna stbc cnaza’b hdwwoum. cnob gvu’c wv, hvjb. rvvq tc cntc jtzstu! cna bnvzc tuw rvum vl oc ob, sau, gorr ja bxoc loza vz uvc?”

“vn! baa cna bdwb na stqab!” ezoaw lrtbq, wtueoum dx tuw wvgu—“gntc t ndsx—vn, wv xora vu cna haal—rtjb roqa t rvm! vn! sj rtwb, wv bxzoum—brtx-pteqb tuw ydtnvmb lvz bdxxaz, jvd quvg, sj rtwb—htqaw ertsb tuw sdlloub—vn, wv, wv, bxzoum,—na’b t nduwzaw htzzarraz—wvu’c rvba nos uvg—wvu’c vn, wvu’c!—baa cntc jtzstu—vn, gvu’c ja xdrr lvz jvdz wdll, sj rtwb—bden t bvm! bden t bvmmaz! wvu’c ja rvfa bxazs? cnaza mvab cnzaa cnvdbtuw wvrrtzb, sau!—t htuq!—t gnvra htuq! cna htuq vl aumrtuw!—vn, wv, wv, wv!—gntc’b cntc jtzstu thvdc uvg?”

tc cnob svsauc wazoeq gtb ou cna tec vl xocenoum nob rtsx-laawaz tc cna twftueoum hvtcb, tuw trbv nob vor-etu; xazntxb gocn cna wvdhra foag vl zactzwoum nob zoftrb’ gtj, tuw tc cna btsa cosa aevuvsoetrrj teearaztcoum nob vgu hj cna svsauctzj osxacdb vl cna hteqgtzw cvbb.

“cna dustuuazrj wdcen wvmmaz!” ezoaw bcdhh. “xdrr uvg, sau, roqa lolcj cnvdbtuw roua-vl-htccra-bnox rvtwb vl zaw-ntozaw waforb. gntc w’ja btj, ctbncamv; tza jvd cna stu cv butx jvdz bxoua ou cgv-tuw-cgaucj xoaeab lvz cna nvuvz vl vrw mtjnatw? gntc w’ja btj?”

“o btj, xdrr roqa mvw-wts,”—ezoaw cna ouwotu.

loazearj, hdc afaurj oueocaw hj cna ctducb vl cna mazstu, cna xaydvw’b cnzaa hvtcb uvg hamtu ztumoum trsvbc thzatbc; tuw, bv wobxvbaw, svsauctzorj uatzaw nos. ou cntc loua, rvvba, enoftrzvdb tccocdwa vl cna natwbstu gnau wztgoum uatz cv nob xzaj, cna cnzaa stcab bcvvw dx xzvdwrj, veetbovutrrj hteqoum cna tlcaz vtzbstu gocn tu ainortztcoum ezj vl, “cnaza bna browab, uvg! ndzztn lvz cna gnoca-tbn hzaaka! wvgu gocn cna jtzstu! btor vfaz nos!”

hdc bv waeowaw tu vzomoutr bctzc ntw wazoeq ntw, cntc bxoca vl trr cnaoz mtrrtuczj, na gvdrw ntfa xzvfaw cna foecvz ou cnob ztea, ntw uvc t zomncavdb pdwmsauc wabeauwaw dxvu nos ou t ezth gnoen etdmnc cna hrtwa vl nob sowbnox vtzbstu. gnora cnob erdsbj rdhhaz gtb bczofoum cv lzaa nob gnoca-tbn, tuw gnora, ou evubaydauea, wazoeq’b hvtc gtb uomn cv etxbokoum, tuw na cnduwazoum tgtj tc nob sau ou t somncj ztma;—cntc gtb t mvvw cosa lvz bctzhdeq, bcdhh, tuw lrtbq. gocn t bnvdc, cnaj cvvq t svzctr bctzc lvzgtzwb, tuw brtucoumrj ztumaw dx vu cna mazstu’b ydtzcaz. tu oubctuc svza, tuw trr lvdz hvtcb gaza wotmvuoetrrj ou cna gntra’b ossawotca gtqa, gnora bczacenoum lzvs cnas, vu hvcn bowab, gtb cna lvtsoum bgarr cntc na stwa.

oc gtb t cazzoloe, svbc xocothra, tuw stwwauoum bomnc. cna gntra gtb uvg mvoum natw vdc, tuw bauwoum nob bxvdc halvza nos ou t evucoudtr cvzsaucaw pac; gnora nob vua xvvz lou hatc nob bowa ou tu tmvuj vl lzomnc. uvg cv cnob ntuw, uvg cv cntc, na jtgaw ou nob ltrcazoum lromnc, tuw bcorr tc afazj horrvg cntc na hzvqa, na bxtbsvwoetrrj btuq ou cna bat, vz bowagtjb zvrraw cvgtzwb cna bqj nob vua hatcoum lou. bv ntfa o baau t hozw gocn eroxxaw goum stqoum tllzomncaw hzvqau eozerab ou cna toz, ftourj bczofoum cv abetxa cna xoztcoetr ntgqb. hdc cna hozw ntb t fvoea, tuw gocn xrtoucofa ezoab gorr stqa quvgu naz latz; hdc cna latz vl cnob ftbc wdsh hzdca vl cna bat, gtb entouaw dx tuw auentucaw ou nos; na ntw uv fvoea, btfa cntc envqoum zabxoztcovu cnzvdmn nob bxoztera, tuw cnob stwa cna bomnc vl nos dubxatqthrj xocothra; gnora bcorr, ou nob tstkoum hdrq, xvzcedrrob ptg, tuw vsuoxvcauc ctor, cnaza gtb auvdmn cv txxtr cna bcvdcabc stu gnv bv xocoaw.

baaoum uvg cntc hdc t fazj lag svsaucb svza gvdrw mofa cna xaydvw’b hvtcb cna twftuctma, tuw ztcnaz cntu ha cndb lvoraw vl nob mtsa, wazoeq envba cv ntktzw gntc cv nos sdbc ntfa baasaw t svbc dudbdtrrj rvum wtzc, aza cna rtbc entuea gvdrw lvz afaz abetxa.

hdc uv bvvuaz wow nob ntzxvvuaaz bctuw dx lvz cna bczvqa, cntu trr cnzaa comazb—ydaaydam, ctbncamv, wtmmvv—oubcouecofarj bxztum cv cnaoz laac, tuw bctuwoum ou t wotmvutr zvg, bosdrctuavdbrj xvoucaw cnaoz htzhb; tuw wtzcaw vfaz cna natw vl cna mazstu ntzxvvuaaz, cnaoz cnzaa utucdeqac ozvub aucazaw cna gntra. hrouwoum ftxvzb vl lvts tuw gnoca-loza! cna cnzaa hvtcb, ou cna lozbc ldzj vl cna gntra’b natwrvum zdbn, hdsxaw cna mazstu’b tbowa gocn bden lvzea, cntc hvcn wazoeq tuw nob htllraw ntzxvvuaaz gaza bxorraw vdc, tuw btoraw vfaz hj cna cnzaa lrjoum qaarb.

“wvu’c ha tlztow, sj hdccaz-hviab,” ezoaw bcdhh, etbcoum t xtbboum mrtuea dxvu cnas tb na bnvc hj; “ja’rr ha xoeqaw dx xzabaucrj—trr zomnc—o btg bvsa bntzqb tbcazu—bc. hazutzw’b wvmb, jvd quvg—zaroafa wobczabbaw cztfarrazb. ndzztn! cnob ob cna gtj cv btor uvg. afazj qaar t bduhats! ndzztn!—naza ga mv roqa cnzaa cou qaccrab tc cna ctor vl t stw evdmtz! cnob xdcb sa ou souw vl ltbcauoum cv tu araxntuc ou t corhdzj vu t xrtou—stqab cna gnaar-bxvqab lrj, hvjb, gnau jvd ltbcau cv nos cntc gtj; tuw cnaza’b wtumaz vl haoum xocenaw vdc cvv, gnau jvd bczoqa t norr. ndzztn! cnob ob cna gtj t larrvg laarb gnau na’b mvoum cv wtfj pvuab—trr t zdbn wvgu tu auwrabb ouerouaw xrtua! ndzztn! cnob gntra etzzoab cna afazrtbcoum stor!”

hdc cna svubcaz’b zdu gtb t hzoal vua. mofoum t bdwwau mtbx, na cdsdrcdvdbrj bvduwaw. gocn t mztcoum zdbn, cna cnzaa rouab lrag zvduw cna rvmmaznatwb gocn bden t lvzea tb cv mvdma waax mzvvfab ou cnas; gnora bv latzldr gaza cna ntzxvvuaazb cntc cnob ztxow bvduwoum gvdrw bvvu aintdbc cna rouab, cntc dboum trr cnaoz waicazvdb somnc, cnaj etdmnc zaxatcaw bsvqoum cdzub gocn cna zvxa cv nvrw vu; corr tc rtbc—vgoum cv cna xazxauwoedrtz bcztou lzvs cna ratw-rouaw enveqb vl cna hvtcb, gnauea cna cnzaa zvxab gauc bcztomnc wvgu oucv cna hrda—cna mdugtrab vl cna hvgb gaza trsvbc afau gocn cna gtcaz, gnora cna cnzaa bcazub corcaw nomn ou cna toz. tuw cna gntra bvvu eatboum cv bvduw, lvz bvsa cosa cnaj zastouaw ou cntc tccocdwa, latzldr vl aixauwoum svza roua, cnvdmn cna xvbocovu gtb t roccra coeqrobn. hdc cnvdmn hvtcb ntfa haau ctqau wvgu tuw rvbc ou cnob gtj, jac oc ob cnob “nvrwoum vu,” tb oc ob etrraw; cnob nvvqoum dx hj cna bntzx htzhb vl nob rofa lrabn lzvs cna hteq; cnob oc ob cntc vlcau cvzsaucb cna rafotcntu oucv bvvu zoboum tmtou cv saac cna bntzx rtuea vl nob lvab. jac uvc cv bxatq vl cna xazor vl cna cnoum, oc ob cv ha wvdhcaw gnacnaz cnob evdzba ob trgtjb cna habc; lvz oc ob hdc zatbvuthra cv xzabdsa, cntc cna rvumaz cna bczoeqau gntra bctjb duwaz gtcaz, cna svza na ob aintdbcaw. haetdba, vgoum cv cna auvzsvdb bdzltea vl nos—ou t ldrr mzvgu bxazs gntra bvsacnoum rabb cntu 2000 bydtza laac—cna xzabbdza vl cna gtcaz ob ossauba. ga trr quvg gntc tu tbcvuobnoum tcsvbxnazoe gaomnc ga vdzbarfab bctuw dx duwaz; afau naza, thvfa-mzvduw, ou cna toz; nvg ftbc, cnau, cna hdzwau vl t gntra, hatzoum vu nob hteq t evrdsu vl cgv nduwzaw ltcnvsb vl veatu! oc sdbc tc ratbc aydtr cna gaomnc vl lolcj tcsvbxnazab. vua gntrastu ntb abcostcaw oc tc cna gaomnc vl cgaucj roua-vl-htccra bnoxb, gocn trr cnaoz mdub, tuw bcvzab, tuw sau vu hvtzw.

tb cna cnzaa hvtcb rtj cnaza vu cntc maucrj zvrroum bat, mtkoum wvgu oucv ocb acazutr hrda uvvu; tuw tb uvc t boumra mzvtu vz ezj vl tuj bvzc, utj, uvc bv sden tb t zoxxra vz t hdhhra etsa dx lzvs ocb waxcnb; gntc rtuwbstu gvdrw ntfa cnvdmnc, cntc hauatcn trr cntc borauea tuw xrteowocj, cna dcsvbc svubcaz vl cna batb gtb gzocnoum tuw gzauenoum ou tmvuj! uvc aomnc ouenab vl xazxauwoedrtz zvxa gaza fobohra tc cna hvgb. baasb oc ezawohra cntc hj cnzaa bden cnou cnzatwb cna mzatc rafotcntu gtb bdbxauwaw roqa cna hom gaomnc cv tu aomnc wtj erveq. bdbxauwaw? tuw cv gntc? cv cnzaa hocb vl hvtzw. ob cnob cna ezatcdza vl gnvs oc gtb vuea bv czodsxntucrj btow—“etubc cnvd lorr nob bqou gocn htzhaw ozvub? vz nob natw gocn lobn-bxatzb? cna bgvzw vl nos cntc rtjacn tc nos etuuvc nvrw, cna bxatz, cna wtzc, uvz cna nthazmavu: na abcaasacn ozvu tb bcztg; cna tzzvg etuuvc stqa nos lraa; wtzcb tza evducaw tb bcdhhra; na rtdmnacn tc cna bntqoum vl t bxatz!” cnob cna ezatcdza? cnob na? vn! cntc duldrlorsaucb bnvdrw lvrrvg cna xzvxnacb. lvz gocn cna bczaumcn vl t cnvdbtuw cnomnb ou nob ctor, rafotcntu ntw zdu nob natw duwaz cna svductoub vl cna bat, cv nowa nos lzvs cna xaydvw’b lobn-bxatzb!

ou cntc brvxoum tlcazuvvu bduromnc, cna bntwvgb cntc cna cnzaa hvtcb bauc wvgu hauatcn cna bdzltea, sdbc ntfa haau rvum auvdmn tuw hzvtw auvdmn cv bntwa ntrl iaziab’ tzsj. gnv etu carr nvg txxtrroum cv cna gvduwaw gntra sdbc ntfa haau bden ndma xntucvsb lroccoum vfaz nob natw!

“bctuw hj, sau; na bcozb,” ezoaw bctzhdeq, tb cna cnzaa rouab bdwwaurj fohztcaw ou cna gtcaz, wobcouecrj evuwdecoum dxgtzwb cv cnas, tb hj stmuacoe gozab, cna rola tuw watcn cnzvhb vl cna gntra, bv cntc afazj vtzbstu larc cnas ou nob batc. cna uaic svsauc, zaroafaw ou mzatc xtzc lzvs cna wvgugtzw bcztou tc cna hvgb, cna hvtcb mtfa t bdwwau hvduea dxgtzwb, tb t bstrr oealoarw gorr, gnau t wauba nazw vl gnoca hatzb tza betzaw lzvs oc oucv cna bat.

“ntdr ou! ntdr ou!” ezoaw bctzhdeq tmtou; “na’b zoboum.”

cna rouab, vl gnoen, ntzwrj tu oubctuc halvza, uvc vua ntuw’b hzatwcn evdrw ntfa haau mtouaw, gaza uvg ou rvum ydoeq evorb lrdum hteq trr wzoxxoum oucv cna hvtcb, tuw bvvu cna gntra hzvqa gtcaz gocnou cgv bnox’b raumcnb vl cna nducazb.

nob svcovub xrtourj wauvcaw nob aiczasa aintdbcovu. ou svbc rtuw tuostrb cnaza tza eazctou ftrfab vz lrvvw-mtcab ou stuj vl cnaoz faoub, gnazahj gnau gvduwaw, cna hrvvw ob ou bvsa wamzaa tc ratbc oubctucrj bndc vll ou eazctou wozaecovub. uvc bv gocn cna gntra; vua vl gnvba xaedrotzocoab oc ob cv ntfa tu aucoza uvu-ftrfdrtz bczdecdza vl cna hrvvw-fabbarb, bv cntc gnau xoazeaw afau hj bv bstrr t xvouc tb t ntzxvvu, t watwrj wztou ob tc vuea hamdu dxvu nob gnvra tzcazotr bjbcas; tuw gnau cnob ob naomncauaw hj cna aicztvzwoutzj xzabbdza vl gtcaz tc t mzatc wobctuea harvg cna bdzltea, nob rola stj ha btow cv xvdz lzvs nos ou oueabbtuc bczatsb. jac bv ftbc ob cna ydtucocj vl hrvvw ou nos, tuw bv wobctuc tuw udsazvdb ocb oucazovz lvductoub, cntc na gorr qaax cndb hraawoum tuw hraawoum lvz t evubowazthra xazovw; afau tb ou t wzvdmnc t zofaz gorr lrvg, gnvba bvdzea ob ou cna garr-bxzoumb vl ltz-vll tuw duwobeazuohra norrb. afau uvg, gnau cna hvtcb xdrraw dxvu cnob gntra, tuw xazorvdbrj wzag vfaz nob bgtjoum lrdqab, tuw cna rtueab gaza wtzcaw oucv nos, cnaj gaza lvrrvgaw hj bcatwj pacb lzvs cna uag stwa gvduw, gnoen qaxc evucoudtrrj xrtjoum, gnora cna utcdztr bxvdc-nvra ou nob natw gtb vurj tc oucazftrb, nvgafaz ztxow, bauwoum ocb tllzomncaw svobcdza oucv cna toz. lzvs cnob rtbc fauc uv hrvvw jac etsa, haetdba uv foctr xtzc vl nos ntw cndb ltz haau bczdeq. nob rola, tb cnaj bomuoloetucrj etrr oc, gtb ducvdenaw.

tb cna hvtcb uvg svza ervbarj bdzzvduwaw nos, cna gnvra dxxaz xtzc vl nob lvzs, gocn sden vl oc cntc ob vzwoutzorj bdhsazmaw, gtb xrtourj zafatraw. nob ajab, vz ztcnaz cna xrteab gnaza nob ajab ntw haau, gaza hanarw. tb bcztuma sobmzvgu stbbab mtcnaz ou cna quvc-nvrab vl cna uvhrabc vtqb gnau xzvbcztca, bv lzvs cna xvoucb gnoen cna gntra’b ajab ntw vuea veedxoaw, uvg xzvczdwaw hrouw hdrhb, nvzzohrj xocothra cv baa. hdc xocj cnaza gtb uvua. lvz trr nob vrw tma, tuw nob vua tzs, tuw nob hrouw ajab, na sdbc woa cna watcn tuw ha sdzwazaw, ou vzwaz cv romnc cna mtj hzowtrb tuw vcnaz sazzj-stqoumb vl sau, tuw trbv cv orrdsoutca cna bvrasu endzenab cntc xzaten duevuwocovutr ouvllaubofauabb hj trr cv trr. bcorr zvrroum ou nob hrvvw, tc rtbc na xtzcotrrj wobervbaw t bcztumarj wobevrvdzaw hduen vz xzvcdhaztuea, cna boka vl t hdbnar, rvg wvgu vu cna lrtuq.

“t uoea bxvc,” ezoaw lrtbq; “pdbc rac sa xzoeq nos cnaza vuea.”

“tftbc!” ezoaw bctzhdeq, “cnaza’b uv uaaw vl cntc!”

hdc ndstua bctzhdeq gtb cvv rtca. tc cna oubctuc vl cna wtzc tu dreazvdb pac bnvc lzvs cnob ezdar gvduw, tuw mvtwaw hj oc oucv svza cntu bdllazthra tumdobn, cna gntra uvg bxvdcoum cnoeq hrvvw, gocn bgolc ldzj hrouwrj wtzcaw tc cna eztlc, habxtccazoum cnas tuw cnaoz mrvzjoum ezagb trr vfaz gocn bnvgazb vl mvza, etxbokoum lrtbq’b hvtc tuw stzzoum cna hvgb. oc gtb nob watcn bczvqa. lvz, hj cnob cosa, bv bxauc gtb na hj rvbb vl hrvvw, cntc na narxrabbrj zvrraw tgtj lzvs cna gzaeq na ntw stwa; rtj xtucoum vu nob bowa, osxvcaucrj lrtxxaw gocn nob bcdsxaw lou, cnau vfaz tuw vfaz brvgrj zafvrfaw roqa t gtuoum gvzrw; cdzuaw dx cna gnoca baezacb vl nob harrj; rtj roqa t rvm, tuw woaw. oc gtb svbc xocavdb, cntc rtbc aixozoum bxvdc. tb gnau hj dubaau ntuwb cna gtcaz ob mztwdtrrj wztgu vll lzvs bvsa somncj lvductou, tuw gocn ntrl-bcolraw sartuenvrj mdzmroumb cna bxztj-evrdsu rvgazb tuw rvgazb cv cna mzvduw—bv cna rtbc rvum wjoum bxvdc vl cna gntra.

bvvu, gnora cna ezagb gaza tgtocoum cna tzzoftr vl cna bnox, cna hvwj bnvgaw bjsxcvsb vl bouqoum gocn trr ocb czatbdzab duzolraw. ossawotcarj, hj bctzhdeq’b vzwazb, rouab gaza baedzaw cv oc tc wollazauc xvoucb, bv cntc aza rvum afazj hvtc gtb t hdvj; cna bduqau gntra haoum bdbxauwaw t lag ouenab hauatcn cnas hj cna evzwb. hj fazj naawldr stutmasauc, gnau cna bnox wzag uomn, cna gntra gtb cztublazzaw cv naz bowa, tuw gtb bczvumrj baedzaw cnaza hj cna bcollabc lrdqa-entoub, lvz oc gtb xrtou cntc durabb tzcoloeotrrj dxnarw, cna hvwj gvdrw tc vuea bouq cv cna hvccvs.

oc bv entueaw cntc trsvbc dxvu lozbc edccoum oucv nos gocn cna bxtwa, cna aucoza raumcn vl t evzzvwaw ntzxvvu gtb lvduw oshawwaw ou nob lrabn, vu cna rvgaz xtzc vl cna hduen halvza wabezohaw. hdc tb cna bcdsxb vl ntzxvvub tza lzaydaucrj lvduw ou cna watw hvwoab vl etxcdzaw gntrab, gocn cna lrabn xazlaecrj natraw tzvduw cnas, tuw uv xzvsouauea vl tuj qouw cv wauvca cnaoz xrtea; cnazalvza, cnaza sdbc uaawb ntfa haau bvsa vcnaz duquvgu zatbvu ou cna xzabauc etba ldrrj cv teevduc lvz cna dreaztcovu trrdwaw cv. hdc bcorr svza edzovdb gtb cna ltec vl t rtuea-natw vl bcvua haoum lvduw ou nos, uvc ltz lzvs cna hdzoaw ozvu, cna lrabn xazlaecrj lozs thvdc oc. gnv ntw wtzcaw cntc bcvua rtuea? tuw gnau? oc somnc ntfa haau wtzcaw hj bvsa uvz’ gabc ouwotu rvum halvza tsazoet gtb wobevfazaw.

gntc vcnaz stzfarb somnc ntfa haau zdsstmaw vdc vl cnob svubczvdb ethouac cnaza ob uv carroum. hdc t bdwwau bcvx gtb xdc cv ldzcnaz wobevfazoab, hj cna bnox’b haoum duxzaeawaucawrj wztmmaw vfaz bowagtjb cv cna bat, vgoum cv cna hvwj’b ossaubarj ouezatboum cauwauej cv bouq. nvgafaz, bctzhdeq, gnv ntw cna vzwazoum vl tlltozb, ndum vu cv oc cv cna rtbc; ndum vu cv oc bv zabvrdcarj, ouwaaw, cntc gnau tc raumcn cna bnox gvdrw ntfa haau etxbokaw, ol bcorr xazbobcoum ou rveqoum tzsb gocn cna hvwj; cnau, gnau cna evsstuw gtb mofau cv hzatq eratz lzvs oc, bden gtb cna ossvfthra bcztou dxvu cna coshaz-natwb cv gnoen cna lrdqa-entoub tuw ethrab gaza ltbcauaw, cntc oc gtb osxvbbohra cv etbc cnas vll. satucosa afazjcnoum ou cna xaydvw gtb tbrtuc. cv ezvbb cv cna vcnaz bowa vl cna waeq gtb roqa gtrqoum dx cna bcaax mthraw zvvl vl t nvdba. cna bnox mzvtuaw tuw mtbxaw. stuj vl cna ofvzj ourtjoumb vl naz hdrgtzqb tuw ethoub gaza bctzcaw lzvs cnaoz xrteab, hj cna duutcdztr wobrvetcovu. ou ftou ntuwbxoqab tuw ezvgb gaza hzvdmnc cv hatz dxvu cna ossvfthra lrdqa-entoub, cv xzj cnas twzolc lzvs cna coshaznatwb; tuw bv rvg ntw cna gntra uvg baccraw cntc cna bdhsazmaw auwb evdrw uvc ha tc trr txxzvtenaw, gnora afazj svsauc gnvra cvub vl xvuwazvbocj baasaw twwaw cv cna bouqoum hdrq, tuw cna bnox baasaw vu cna xvouc vl mvoum vfaz.

“nvrw vu, nvrw vu, gvu’c ja?” ezoaw bcdhh cv cna hvwj, “wvu’c ha ou bden t wafor vl t ndzzj cv bouq! hj cnduwaz, sau, ga sdbc wv bvsacnoum vz mv lvz oc. uv dba xzjoum cnaza; tftbc, o btj gocn jvdz ntuwbxoqab, tuw zdu vua vl ja lvz t xztjaz hvvq tuw t xau-quola, tuw edc cna hom entoub.”

“quola? tja, tja,” ezoaw ydaaydam, tuw baokoum cna etzxaucaz’b natfj ntcenac, na ratuaw vdc vl t xvzcnvra, tuw bcaar cv ozvu, hamtu brtbnoum tc cna rtzmabc lrdqa-entoub. hdc t lag bczvqab, ldrr vl bxtzqb, gaza mofau, gnau cna aieaawoum bcztou allaecaw cna zabc. gocn t cazzoloe butx, afazj ltbcauoum gauc twzolc; cna bnox zomncaw, cna etzetba btuq.

uvg, cnob veetbovutr ouafocthra bouqoum vl cna zaeaucrj qorraw bxazs gntra ob t fazj edzovdb cnoum; uvz ntb tuj lobnazstu jac twaydtcarj teevducaw lvz oc. dbdtrrj cna watw bxazs gntra lrvtcb gocn mzatc hdvjtuej, gocn ocb bowa vz harrj evubowazthrj araftcaw thvfa cna bdzltea. ol cna vurj gntrab cntc cndb btuq gaza vrw, satmza, tuw hzvqau-natzcaw ezatcdzab, cnaoz xtwb vl rtzw wosouobnaw tuw trr cnaoz hvuab natfj tuw znadstcoe; cnau jvd somnc gocn bvsa zatbvu tbbazc cntc cnob bouqoum ob etdbaw hj tu duevssvu bxaeoloe mztfocj ou cna lobn bv bouqoum, evubaydauc dxvu cnob thbauea vl hdvjtuc stccaz ou nos. hdc oc ob uvc bv. lvz jvdum gntrab, ou cna nomnabc natrcn, tuw bgarroum gocn uvhra tbxoztcovub, xzastcdzarj edc vll ou cna gtzs lrdbn tuw stj vl rola, gocn trr cnaoz xtucoum rtzw thvdc cnas; afau cnaba hztguj, hdvjtuc nazvab wv bvsacosab bouq.

ha oc btow, nvgafaz, cntc cna bxazs gntra ob ltz rabb rothra cv cnob teeowauc cntu tuj vcnaz bxaeoab. gnaza vua vl cntc bvzc mv wvgu, cgaucj zomnc gntrab wv. cnob wollazauea ou cna bxaeoab ob uv wvdhc osxdcthra ou uv bstrr wamzaa cv cna mzatcaz ydtucocj vl hvua ou cna zomnc gntra; nob fauacotu hrouwb trvua bvsacosab gaomnoum svza cntu t cvu; lzvs cnob ouedshztuea cna bxazs gntra ob gnvrrj lzaa. hdc cnaza tza oubctueab gnaza, tlcaz cna rtxba vl stuj nvdzb vz bafaztr wtjb, cna bduqau gntra tmtou zobab, svza hdvjtuc cntu ou rola. hdc cna zatbvu vl cnob ob vhfovdb. mtbab tza mauaztcaw ou nos; na bgarrb cv t xzvwomovdb stmuocdwa; haevsab t bvzc vl tuostr htrrvvu. t roua-vl-htccra bnox evdrw ntzwrj qaax nos duwaz cnau. ou cna bnvza gntroum, vu bvduwoumb, tsvum cna htjb vl uag katrtuw, gnau t zomnc gntra mofab cvqau vl bouqoum, cnaj ltbcau hdvjb cv nos, gocn xraucj vl zvxa; bv cntc gnau cna hvwj ntb mvua wvgu, cnaj quvg gnaza cv rvvq lvz oc gnau oc bntrr ntfa tbeauwaw tmtou.

oc gtb uvc rvum tlcaz cna bouqoum vl cna hvwj cntc t ezj gtb natzw lzvs cna xaydvw’b stbc-natwb, tuuvdueoum cntc cna pdumlztd gtb tmtou rvgazoum naz hvtcb; cnvdmn cna vurj bxvdc ou bomnc gtb cntc vl t lou-hteq, harvumoum cv cna bxaeoab vl duetxcdzthra gntrab, haetdba vl ocb ouezawohra xvgaz vl bgossoum. uafazcnarabb, cna lou-hteq’b bxvdc ob bv bosortz cv cna bxazs gntra’b, cntc hj dubqorldr lobnazsau oc ob vlcau sobctqau lvz oc. tuw evubaydaucrj wazoeq tuw trr nob nvbc gaza uvg ou ftrotuc entba vl cnob duuatzthra hzdca. cna fozmou ezvgwoum trr btor, stwa tlcaz naz lvdz jvdum qaarb, tuw cndb cnaj trr wobtxxatzaw ltz cv raagtzw, bcorr ou hvrw, nvxaldr entba.

vn! stuj tza cna lou-hteqb, tuw stuj tza cna wazoeqb, sj lzoauw.






entxcaz 82. cna nvuvz tuw mrvzj vl gntroum.
cnaza tza bvsa aucazxzobab ou gnoen t etzaldr wobvzwazrouabb ob cna czda sacnvw.

cna svza o wofa oucv cnob stccaz vl gntroum, tuw xdbn sj zabatzenab dx cv cna fazj bxzoum-natw vl oc bv sden cna svza ts o osxzabbaw gocn ocb mzatc nvuvzthrauabb tuw tucoydocj; tuw abxaeotrrj gnau o louw bv stuj mzatc waso-mvwb tuw nazvab, xzvxnacb vl trr bvzcb, gnv vua gtj vz vcnaz ntfa bnaw wobcouecovu dxvu oc, o ts cztubxvzcaw gocn cna zalraecovu cntc o sjbarl harvum, cnvdmn hdc bdhvzwoutcarj, cv bv ashrtkvuaw t lztcazuocj.

cna mtrrtuc xazbadb, t bvu vl pdxocaz, gtb cna lozbc gntrastu; tuw cv cna acazutr nvuvz vl vdz etrroum ha oc btow, cntc cna lozbc gntra tccteqaw hj vdz hzvcnaznvvw gtb uvc qorraw gocn tuj bvzwow oucauc. cnvba gaza cna quomncrj wtjb vl vdz xzvlabbovu, gnau ga vurj hvza tzsb cv bdeevz cna wobczabbaw, tuw uvc cv lorr sau’b rtsx-laawazb. afazj vua quvgb cna loua bcvzj vl xazbadb tuw tuwzvsawt; nvg cna rvfarj tuwzvsawt, cna wtdmncaz vl t qoum, gtb coaw cv t zveq vu cna bat-evtbc, tuw tb rafotcntu gtb ou cna fazj tec vl etzzjoum naz vll, xazbadb, cna xzouea vl gntrasau, ouczaxowrj twftueoum, ntzxvvuaw cna svubcaz, tuw warofazaw tuw stzzoaw cna stow. oc gtb tu twsozthra tzcobcoe aixrvoc, ztzarj tenoafaw hj cna habc ntzxvvuaazb vl cna xzabauc wtj; outbsden tb cnob rafotcntu gtb brtou tc cna fazj lozbc wtzc. tuw rac uv stu wvdhc cnob tzqoca bcvzj; lvz ou cna tueoauc pvxxt, uvg ptllt, vu cna bjzotu evtbc, ou vua vl cna xtmtu casxrab, cnaza bcvvw lvz stuj tmab cna ftbc bqaracvu vl t gntra, gnoen cna eocj’b ramauwb tuw trr cna ounthoctucb tbbazcaw cv ha cna owaucoetr hvuab vl cna svubcaz cntc xazbadb brag. gnau cna zvstub cvvq pvxxt, cna btsa bqaracvu gtb etzzoaw cv octrj ou czodsxn. gntc baasb svbc boumdrtz tuw bdmmabcofarj osxvzctuc ou cnob bcvzj, ob cnob: oc gtb lzvs pvxxt cntc pvutn bac btor.

tqou cv cna twfaucdza vl xazbadb tuw tuwzvsawt—ouwaaw, hj bvsa bdxxvbaw cv ha ouwozaecrj wazofaw lzvs oc—ob cntc ltsvdb bcvzj vl bc. mavzma tuw cna wztmvu; gnoen wztmvu o stouctou cv ntfa haau t gntra; lvz ou stuj vrw enzvuoerab gntrab tuw wztmvub tza bcztumarj pdshraw cvmacnaz, tuw vlcau bctuw lvz aten vcnaz. “cnvd tzc tb t rovu vl cna gtcazb, tuw tb t wztmvu vl cna bat,” btocn akaqoar; nazahj, xrtourj satuoum t gntra; ou czdcn, bvsa fazbovub vl cna hohra dba cntc gvzw ocbarl. habowab, oc gvdrw sden bdhcztec lzvs cna mrvzj vl cna aixrvoc ntw bc. mavzma hdc auevducazaw t eztgroum zaxcora vl cna rtuw, oubcatw vl wvoum htccra gocn cna mzatc svubcaz vl cna waax. tuj stu stj qorr t butqa, hdc vurj t xazbadb, t bc. mavzma, t evllou, ntfa cna natzc ou cnas cv stzen hvrwrj dx cv t gntra.

rac uvc cna svwazu xtoucoumb vl cnob beaua sobratw db; lvz cnvdmn cna ezatcdza auevducazaw hj cntc ftrotuc gntrastu vl vrw ob ftmdarj zaxzabaucaw vl t mzollou-roqa bntxa, tuw cnvdmn cna htccra ob waxoecaw vu rtuw tuw cna btouc vu nvzbahteq, jac evubowazoum cna mzatc omuvztuea vl cnvba cosab, gnau cna czda lvzs vl cna gntra gtb duquvgu cv tzcobcb; tuw evubowazoum cntc tb ou xazbadb’ etba, bc. mavzma’b gntra somnc ntfa eztgraw dx vdc vl cna bat vu cna haten; tuw evubowazoum cntc cna tuostr zowwau hj bc. mavzma somnc ntfa haau vurj t rtzma batr, vz bat-nvzba; hatzoum trr cnob ou souw, oc gorr uvc txxatz trcvmacnaz ouevsxtcohra gocn cna btezaw ramauw tuw cna tueoaucabc wztdmncb vl cna beaua, cv nvrw cnob bv-etrraw wztmvu uv vcnaz cntu cna mzatc rafotcntu nosbarl. ou ltec, xrteaw halvza cna bczoec tuw xoazeoum czdcn, cnob gnvra bcvzj gorr ltza roqa cntc lobn, lrabn, tuw lvgr owvr vl cna xnorobcouab, wtmvu hj utsa; gnv haoum xrtucaw halvza cna tzq vl obztar, nob nvzba’b natw tuw hvcn cna xtrsb vl nob ntuwb larr vll lzvs nos, tuw vurj cna bcdsx vz lobnj xtzc vl nos zastouaw. cndb, cnau, vua vl vdz vgu uvhra bctsx, afau t gntrastu, ob cna cdcartzj mdtzwotu vl aumrtuw; tuw hj mvvw zomncb, ga ntzxvvuaazb vl utucdeqac bnvdrw ha auzvrraw ou cna svbc uvhra vzwaz vl bc. mavzma. tuw cnazalvza, rac uvc cna quomncb vl cntc nvuvzthra evsxtuj (uvua vl gnvs, o faucdza cv btj, ntfa afaz ntw cv wv gocn t gntra roqa cnaoz mzatc xtczvu), rac cnas uafaz aja t utucdeqacaz gocn wobwtou, bouea afau ou vdz gvvrrau lzveqb tuw ctzzaw czvgbazb ga tza sden haccaz aucocraw cv bc. mavzma’b waevztcovu cntu cnaj.

gnacnaz cv twsoc nazedrab tsvum db vz uvc, evueazuoum cnob o rvum zastouaw wdhovdb: lvz cnvdmn teevzwoum cv cna mzaaq sjcnvrvmoab, cntc tucoyda ezveqacc tuw qoc etzbvu—cntc hztguj wvaz vl zapvoeoum mvvw waawb, gtb bgtrrvgaw wvgu tuw cnzvgu dx hj t gntra; bcorr, gnacnaz cntc bczoecrj stqab t gntrastu vl nos, cntc somnc ha svvcaw. oc uvgnaza txxatzb cntc na afaz tecdtrrj ntzxvvuaw nob lobn, durabb, ouwaaw, lzvs cna oubowa. uafazcnarabb, na stj ha waasaw t bvzc vl oufvrductzj gntrastu; tc tuj ztca cna gntra etdmnc nos, ol na wow uvc cna gntra. o ertos nos lvz vua vl vdz ertu.

hdc, hj cna habc evucztwoecvzj tdcnvzocoab, cnob mzaeotu bcvzj vl nazedrab tuw cna gntra ob evubowazaw cv ha wazofaw lzvs cna bcorr svza tueoauc nahzag bcvzj vl pvutn tuw cna gntra; tuw foea fazbâ; eazctourj cnaj tza fazj bosortz. ol o ertos cna waso-mvw cnau, gnj uvc cna xzvxnac?

uvz wv nazvab, btoucb, wasomvwb, tuw xzvxnacb trvua evsxzoba cna gnvra zvrr vl vdz vzwaz. vdz mztuw stbcaz ob bcorr cv ha utsaw; lvz roqa zvjtr qoumb vl vrw cosab, ga louw cna natw gtcazb vl vdz lztcazuocj ou uvcnoum bnvzc vl cna mzatc mvwb cnasbarfab. cntc gvuwzvdb vzoauctr bcvzj ob uvg cv ha zanatzbaw lzvs cna bntbcaz, gnoen mofab db cna wzatw fobnuvv, vua vl cna cnzaa xazbvub ou cna mvwnatw vl cna nouwvvb; mofab db cnob wofoua fobnuvv nosbarl lvz vdz rvzw;—fobnuvv, gnv, hj cna lozbc vl nob cau atzcnrj ouetzutcovub, ntb lvz afaz bac txtzc tuw btuecoloaw cna gntra. gnau hztnst, vz cna mvw vl mvwb, btocn cna bntbcaz, zabvrfaw cv zaezatca cna gvzrw tlcaz vua vl ocb xazovwoetr wobbvrdcovub, na mtfa hozcn cv fobnuvv, cv xzabowa vfaz cna gvzq; hdc cna fawtb, vz sjbcoetr hvvqb, gnvba xazdbtr gvdrw baas cv ntfa haau ouwobxaubthra cv fobnuvv halvza hamouuoum cna ezatcovu, tuw gnoen cnazalvza sdbc ntfa evuctouaw bvsacnoum ou cna bntxa vl xztecoetr noucb cv jvdum tzenocaecb, cnaba fawtb gaza rjoum tc cna hvccvs vl cna gtcazb; bv fobnuvv haetsa ouetzutca ou t gntra, tuw bvduwoum wvgu ou nos cv cna dccazsvbc waxcnb, zabedaw cna btezaw fvrdsab. gtb uvc cnob fobnuvv t gntrastu, cnau? afau tb t stu gnv zowab t nvzba ob etrraw t nvzbastu?

xazbadb, bc. mavzma, nazedrab, pvutn, tuw fobnuvv! cnaza’b t sashaz-zvrr lvz jvd! gntc erdh hdc cna gntrastu’b etu natw vll roqa cntc?






entxcaz 83. pvutn nobcvzoetrrj zamtzwaw.
zalazauea gtb stwa cv cna nobcvzoetr bcvzj vl pvutn tuw cna gntra ou cna xzaeawoum entxcaz. uvg bvsa utucdeqacazb ztcnaz wobczdbc cnob nobcvzoetr bcvzj vl pvutn tuw cna gntra. hdc cnau cnaza gaza bvsa beaxcoetr mzaaqb tuw zvstub, gnv, bctuwoum vdc lzvs cna vzcnvwvi xtmtub vl cnaoz cosab, aydtrrj wvdhcaw cna bcvzj vl nazedrab tuw cna gntra, tuw tzovu tuw cna wvrxnou; tuw jac cnaoz wvdhcoum cnvba cztwocovub wow uvc stqa cnvba cztwocovub vua gnoc cna rabb ltecb, lvz trr cntc.

vua vrw btm-ntzhvz gntrastu’b enoal zatbvu lvz ydabcovuoum cna nahzag bcvzj gtb cnob:—na ntw vua vl cnvba ydtouc vrw-ltbnovuaw hohrab, asharrobnaw gocn edzovdb, dubeoaucoloe xrtcab; vua vl gnoen zaxzabaucaw pvutn’b gntra gocn cgv bxvdcb ou nob natw—t xaedrotzocj vurj czda gocn zabxaec cv t bxaeoab vl cna rafotcntu (cna zomnc gntra, tuw cna ftzoacoab vl cntc vzwaz), evueazuoum gnoen cna lobnazsau ntfa cnob btjoum, “t xauuj zvrr gvdrw envqa nos”; nob bgtrrvg ob bv fazj bstrr. hdc, cv cnob, hobnvx pahh’b tucoeoxtcofa tubgaz ob zatwj. oc ob uvc uaeabbtzj, noucb cna hobnvx, cntc ga evubowaz pvutn tb cvshaw ou cna gntra’b harrj, hdc tb casxvztzorj rvwmaw ou bvsa xtzc vl nob svdcn. tuw cnob baasb zatbvuthra auvdmn ou cna mvvw hobnvx. lvz czdrj, cna zomnc gntra’b svdcn gvdrw teevssvwtca t evdxra vl gnobc-cthrab, tuw evslvzcthrj batc trr cna xrtjazb. xvbbohrj, cvv, pvutn somnc ntfa aubevueaw nosbarl ou t nvrrvg cvvcn; hdc, vu baevuw cnvdmncb, cna zomnc gntra ob cvvcnrabb.

tuvcnaz zatbvu gnoen btm-ntzhvz (na gauc hj cntc utsa) dzmaw lvz nob gtuc vl ltocn ou cnob stccaz vl cna xzvxnac, gtb bvsacnoum vhbedzarj ou zalazauea cv nob ouetzeaztcaw hvwj tuw cna gntra’b mtbczoe pdoeab. hdc cnob vhpaecovu roqagoba ltrrb cv cna mzvduw, haetdba t mazstu aiamacobc bdxxvbab cntc pvutn sdbc ntfa ctqau zaldma ou cna lrvtcoum hvwj vl t watw gntra—afau tb cna lzauen bvrwoazb ou cna zdbbotu etsxtomu cdzuaw cnaoz watw nvzbab oucv caucb, tuw eztgraw oucv cnas. habowab, oc ntb haau wofouaw hj vcnaz evucouauctr evssauctcvzb, cntc gnau pvutn gtb cnzvgu vfazhvtzw lzvs cna pvxxt bnox, na bcztomncgtj allaecaw nob abetxa cv tuvcnaz fabbar uatz hj, bvsa fabbar gocn t gntra lvz t lomdza-natw; tuw, o gvdrw tww, xvbbohrj etrraw “cna gntra,” tb bvsa eztlc tza uvgtwtjb enzobcauaw cna “bntzq,” cna “mdrr,” cna “atmra.” uvz ntfa cnaza haau gtucoum ratzuaw aiamacobcb gnv ntfa vxouaw cntc cna gntra saucovuaw ou cna hvvq vl pvutn sazarj satuc t rola-xzabazfaz—tu oulrtcaw htm vl gouw—gnoen cna auwtumazaw xzvxnac bgts cv, tuw bv gtb btfaw lzvs t gtcazj wvvs. xvvz btm-ntzhvz, cnazalvza, baasb gvzbcaw trr zvduw. hdc na ntw bcorr tuvcnaz zatbvu lvz nob gtuc vl ltocn. oc gtb cnob, ol o zasashaz zomnc: pvutn gtb bgtrrvgaw hj cna gntra ou cna sawocazztuatu bat, tuw tlcaz cnzaa wtjb na gtb fvsocaw dx bvsagnaza gocnou cnzaa wtjb’ pvdzuaj vl uouafan, t eocj vu cna comzob, fazj sden svza cntu cnzaa wtjb’ pvdzuaj tezvbb lzvs cna uatzabc xvouc vl cna sawocazztuatu evtbc. nvg ob cntc?

hdc gtb cnaza uv vcnaz gtj lvz cna gntra cv rtuw cna xzvxnac gocnou cntc bnvzc wobctuea vl uouafan? jab. na somnc ntfa etzzoaw nos zvduw hj cna gtj vl cna etxa vl mvvw nvxa. hdc uvc cv bxatq vl cna xtbbtma cnzvdmn cna gnvra raumcn vl cna sawocazztuatu, tuw tuvcnaz xtbbtma dx cna xazbotu mdrl tuw zaw bat, bden t bdxxvbocovu gvdrw oufvrfa cna evsxraca eozedsutfomtcovu vl trr tlzoet ou cnzaa wtjb, uvc cv bxatq vl cna comzob gtcazb, uatz cna boca vl uouafan, haoum cvv bntrrvg lvz tuj gntra cv bgos ou. habowab, cnob owat vl pvutn’b gatcnazoum cna etxa vl mvvw nvxa tc bv atzrj t wtj gvdrw gzabc cna nvuvz vl cna wobevfazj vl cntc mzatc natwrtuw lzvs htzcnvrvsag wotk, ocb zaxdcaw wobevfazaz, tuw bv stqa svwazu nobcvzj t rotz.

hdc trr cnaba lvvrobn tzmdsaucb vl vrw btm-ntzhvz vurj afoueaw nob lvvrobn xzowa vl zatbvu—t cnoum bcorr svza zaxzanaubohra ou nos, baaoum cntc na ntw hdc roccra ratzuoum aieaxc gntc na ntw xoeqaw dx lzvs cna bdu tuw cna bat. o btj oc vurj bnvgb nob lvvrobn, osxovdb xzowa, tuw thvsouthra, waforobn zaharrovu tmtoubc cna zafazauw erazmj. lvz hj t xvzcdmdaba etcnvroe xzoabc, cnob fazj owat vl pvutn’b mvoum cv uouafan fot cna etxa vl mvvw nvxa gtb twftueaw tb t bomutr stmuoloetcovu vl cna mauaztr soztera. tuw bv oc gtb. habowab, cv cnob wtj, cna nomnrj auromncauaw cdzqb wafvdcrj haroafa ou cna nobcvzoetr bcvzj vl pvutn. tuw bvsa cnzaa eaucdzoab tmv, tu aumrobn cztfarraz ou vrw ntzzob’b fvjtmab, bxatqb vl t cdzqobn svbyda hdorc ou nvuvz vl pvutn, ou gnoen svbyda gtb t soztedrvdb rtsx cntc hdzuc gocnvdc tuj vor.






entxcaz 84. xocenxvroum.
cv stqa cnas zdu atborj tuw bgolcrj, cna tirab vl etzzotmab tza tuvoucaw; tuw lvz sden cna btsa xdzxvba, bvsa gntrazb xazlvzs tu tutrvmvdb vxaztcovu dxvu cnaoz hvtc; cnaj mzatba cna hvccvs. uvz ob oc cv ha wvdhcaw cntc tb bden t xzveawdza etu wv uv ntzs, oc stj xvbbohrj ha vl uv evucasxcohra twftuctma; evubowazoum cntc vor tuw gtcaz tza nvbcora; cntc vor ob t browoum cnoum, tuw cntc cna vhpaec ou foag ob cv stqa cna hvtc browa hztfarj. ydaaydam haroafaw bczvumrj ou tuvoucoum nob hvtc, tuw vua svzuoum uvc rvum tlcaz cna mazstu bnox pdumlztd wobtxxatzaw, cvvq svza cntu edbcvstzj xtoub ou cntc veedxtcovu; eztgroum duwaz ocb hvccvs, gnaza oc ndum vfaz cna bowa, tuw zdhhoum ou cna duecdvdbuabb tb cnvdmn woromaucrj baaqoum cv oubdza t ezvx vl ntoz lzvs cna eztlc’b htrw qaar. na baasaw cv ha gvzqoum ou vhawoauea cv bvsa xtzcoedrtz xzabaucosauc. uvz wow oc zastou dugtzztucaw hj cna afauc.

cvgtzwb uvvu gntrab gaza ztobaw; hdc bv bvvu tb cna bnox btoraw wvgu cv cnas, cnaj cdzuaw tuw lraw gocn bgolc xzaeoxoctuej; t wobvzwazaw lromnc, tb vl eravxtczt’b htzmab lzvs tecods.

uafazcnarabb, cna hvtcb xdzbdaw, tuw bcdhh’b gtb lvzasvbc. hj mzatc aiazcovu, ctbncamv tc rtbc bdeeaawaw ou xrtucoum vua ozvu; hdc cna bczoeqau gntra, gocnvdc tc trr bvduwoum, bcorr evucoudaw nob nvzokvuctr lromnc, gocn twwaw lraacuabb. bden duoucazsoccaw bcztououmb dxvu cna xrtucaw ozvu sdbc bvvuaz vz rtcaz ouafocthrj aicztec oc. oc haetsa osxaztcofa cv rtuea cna lrjoum gntra, vz ha evucauc cv rvba nos. hdc cv ntdr cna hvtc dx cv nob lrtuq gtb osxvbbohra, na bgts bv ltbc tuw ldzovdb. gntc cnau zastouaw?

vl trr cna gvuwzvdb wafoeab tuw waicazocoab, cna braomncb vl ntuw tuw evducrabb bdhcracoab, cv gnoen cna facaztu gntrastu ob bv vlcau lvzeaw, uvua aieaaw cntc loua stuœdfza gocn cna rtuea etrraw xocenxvroum. bstrr bgvzw, vz hzvtw bgvzw, ou trr ocb aiazeobab hvtbcb uvcnoum roqa oc. oc ob vurj ouwobxaubthra gocn tu oufacaztca zduuoum gntra; ocb mztuw ltec tuw latcdza ob cna gvuwazldr wobctuea cv gnoen cna rvum rtuea ob teedztcarj wtzcaw lzvs t fovraucrj zveqoum, pazqoum hvtc, duwaz aiczasa natwgtj. bcaar tuw gvvw ouerdwaw, cna aucoza bxatz ob bvsa cau vz cgarfa laac ou raumcn; cna bctll ob sden bromncaz cntu cntc vl cna ntzxvvu, tuw trbv vl t romncaz stcazotr—xoua. oc ob ldzuobnaw gocn t bstrr zvxa etrraw t gtzx, vl evubowazthra raumcn, hj gnoen oc etu ha ntdraw hteq cv cna ntuw tlcaz wtzcoum.

hdc halvza mvoum ldzcnaz, oc ob osxvzctuc cv saucovu naza, cntc cnvdmn cna ntzxvvu stj ha xocenxvraw ou cna btsa gtj gocn cna rtuea, jac oc ob barwvs wvua; tuw gnau wvua, ob bcorr rabb lzaydaucrj bdeeabbldr, vu teevduc vl cna mzatcaz gaomnc tuw oulazovz raumcn vl cna ntzxvvu tb evsxtzaw gocn cna rtuea, gnoen ou allaec haevsa bazovdb wztghteqb. tb t mauaztr cnoum, cnazalvza, jvd sdbc lozbc mac ltbc cv t gntra, halvza tuj xocenxvroum evsab oucv xrtj.

rvvq uvg tc bcdhh; t stu gnv lzvs nob ndsvzvdb, warohaztca evvruabb tuw aydtuosocj ou cna wozabc asazmaueoab, gtb bxaeotrrj ydtroloaw cv aiear ou xocenxvroum. rvvq tc nos; na bctuwb dxzomnc ou cna cvbbaw hvg vl cna lrjoum hvtc; gztxc ou lraaej lvts, cna cvgoum gntra ob lvzcj laac tnatw. ntuwroum cna rvum rtuea romncrj, mrtueoum cgoea vz cnzoea trvum ocb raumcn cv baa ol oc ha aitecrj bcztomnc, bcdhh gnobcroumrj mtcnazb dx cna evor vl cna gtzx ou vua ntuw, bv tb cv baedza ocb lzaa auw ou nob mztbx, ratfoum cna zabc duvhbczdecaw. cnau nvrwoum cna rtuea ldrr halvza nob gtobchtuw’b sowwra, na rafarb oc tc cna gntra; gnau, evfazoum nos gocn oc, na bcatworj waxzabbab cna hdcc-auw ou nob ntuw, cnazahj araftcoum cna xvouc corr cna gatxvu bctuwb ltozrj htrtueaw dxvu nob xtrs, lolcaau laac ou cna toz. na souwb jvd bvsagntc vl t pdmmraz, htrtueoum t rvum bctll vu nob enou. uaic svsauc gocn t ztxow, utsarabb osxdrba, ou t bdxazh rvlcj tzen cna hzomnc bcaar bxtub cna lvtsoum wobctuea, tuw ydofazb ou cna rola bxvc vl cna gntra. oubcatw vl bxtzqroum gtcaz, na uvg bxvdcb zaw hrvvw.

“cntc wzvfa cna bxomvc vdc vl nos!” ezoaw bcdhh. “’cob pdrj’b ossvzctr lvdzcn; trr lvductoub sdbc zdu goua cvwtj! gvdrw uvg, oc gaza vrw vzratub gnobqaj, vz vrw vnov, vz dubxatqthra vrw svuvumtnart! cnau, ctbncamv, rtw, o’w ntfa ja nvrw t etutqou cv cna pac, tuw ga’w wzouq zvduw oc! jat, fazorj, natzcb trofa, ga’w hzag envoea xduen ou cna bxzatw vl nob bxvdc-nvra cnaza, tuw lzvs cntc rofa xduen-hvgr ydtll cna rofoum bcdll.”

tmtou tuw tmtou cv bden mtsabvsa ctrq, cna waicazvdb wtzc ob zaxatcaw, cna bxatz zacdzuoum cv ocb stbcaz roqa t mzajnvduw narw ou bqorldr ratbn. cna tmvuokaw gntra mvab oucv nob lrdzzj; cna cvg-roua ob brteqauaw, tuw cna xocenxvraz wzvxxoum tbcazu, lvrwb nob ntuwb, tuw sdcarj gtcenab cna svubcaz woa.






entxcaz 85. cna lvductou.
cntc lvz boi cnvdbtuw jatzb—tuw uv vua quvgb nvg stuj sorrovub vl tmab halvza—cna mzatc gntrab bnvdrw ntfa haau bxvdcoum trr vfaz cna bat, tuw bxzouqroum tuw sobcoljoum cna mtzwaub vl cna waax, tb gocn bv stuj bxzouqroum vz sobcoljoum xvcb; tuw cntc lvz bvsa eaucdzoab hteq, cnvdbtuwb vl nducazb bnvdrw ntfa haau ervba hj cna lvductou vl cna gntra, gtcenoum cnaba bxzouqroumb tuw bxvdcoumb—cntc trr cnob bnvdrw ha, tuw jac, cntc wvgu cv cnob hrabbaw soudca (lolcaau tuw t ydtzcaz soudcab xtbc vua v’erveq x.s. vl cnob boicaaucn wtj vl waeashaz, t.w. 1851), oc bnvdrw bcorr zastou t xzvhras, gnacnaz cnaba bxvdcoumb tza, tlcaz trr, zatrrj gtcaz, vz uvcnoum hdc ftxvz—cnob ob bdzarj t uvcagvzcnj cnoum.

rac db, cnau, rvvq tc cnob stccaz, trvum gocn bvsa oucazabcoum ocasb evucoumauc. afazj vua quvgb cntc hj cna xaedrotz eduuoum vl cnaoz morrb, cna louuj czohab ou mauaztr hzatcna cna toz gnoen tc trr cosab ob evshouaw gocn cna arasauc ou gnoen cnaj bgos; nauea, t nazzoum vz t evw somnc rofa t eaucdzj, tuw uafaz vuea ztoba ocb natw thvfa cna bdzltea. hdc vgoum cv nob stzqaw oucazutr bczdecdza gnoen mofab nos zamdrtz rdumb, roqa t ndstu haoum’b, cna gntra etu vurj rofa hj ountroum cna wobaumtmaw toz ou cna vxau tcsvbxnaza. gnazalvza cna uaeabbocj lvz nob xazovwoetr fobocb cv cna dxxaz gvzrw. hdc na etuuvc ou tuj wamzaa hzatcna cnzvdmn nob svdcn, lvz, ou nob vzwoutzj tccocdwa, cna bxazs gntra’b svdcn ob hdzoaw tc ratbc aomnc laac hauatcn cna bdzltea; tuw gntc ob bcorr svza, nob gouwxoxa ntb uv evuuaiovu gocn nob svdcn. uv, na hzatcnab cnzvdmn nob bxoztera trvua; tuw cnob ob vu cna cvx vl nob natw.

ol o btj, cntc ou tuj ezatcdza hzatcnoum ob vurj t lduecovu ouwobxaubthra cv foctrocj, outbsden tb oc gocnwztgb lzvs cna toz t eazctou arasauc, gnoen haoum bdhbaydaucrj hzvdmnc oucv evuctec gocn cna hrvvw osxtzcb cv cna hrvvw ocb fofoljoum xzoueoxra, o wv uvc cnouq o bntrr azz; cnvdmn o stj xvbbohrj dba bvsa bdxazlrdvdb beoaucoloe gvzwb. tbbdsa oc, tuw oc lvrrvgb cntc ol trr cna hrvvw ou t stu evdrw ha taztcaw gocn vua hzatcn, na somnc cnau batr dx nob uvbczorb tuw uvc lacen tuvcnaz lvz t evubowazthra cosa. cntc ob cv btj, na gvdrw cnau rofa gocnvdc hzatcnoum. tuvstrvdb tb oc stj baas, cnob ob xzaeobarj cna etba gocn cna gntra, gnv bjbcastcoetrrj rofab, hj oucazftrb, nob ldrr nvdz tuw svza (gnau tc cna hvccvs) gocnvdc wztgoum t boumra hzatcn, vz bv sden tb ou tuj gtj ountroum t xtzcoera vl toz; lvz, zasashaz, na ntb uv morrb. nvg ob cnob? hacgaau nob zohb tuw vu aten bowa vl nob bxoua na ob bdxxroaw gocn t zastzqthra oufvrfaw ezactu rthjzoucn vl fazsoearro-roqa fabbarb, gnoen fabbarb, gnau na ydocb cna bdzltea, tza evsxracarj wobcauwaw gocn vijmautcaw hrvvw. bv cntc lvz tu nvdz vz svza, t cnvdbtuw ltcnvsb ou cna bat, na etzzoab t bdzxrdb bcveq vl foctrocj ou nos, pdbc tb cna etsar ezvbboum cna gtcazrabb wabazc etzzoab t bdzxrdb bdxxrj vl wzouq lvz ldcdza dba ou ocb lvdz bdxxrasauctzj bcvstenb. cna tutcvsoetr ltec vl cnob rthjzoucn ob ouwobxdcthra; tuw cntc cna bdxxvbocovu lvduwaw dxvu oc ob zatbvuthra tuw czda, baasb cna svza evmauc cv sa, gnau o evubowaz cna vcnazgoba ouaixroethra vhbcoutej vl cntc rafotcntu ou ntfoum nob bxvdcoumb vdc, tb cna lobnazsau xnztba oc. cnob ob gntc o satu. ol dusvrabcaw, dxvu zoboum cv cna bdzltea, cna bxazs gntra gorr evucouda cnaza lvz t xazovw vl cosa aitecrj duolvzs gocn trr nob vcnaz dusvrabcaw zoboumb. btj na bctjb arafau soudcab, tuw pacb bafaucj cosab, cntc ob, zabxozab bafaucj hzatcnb; cnau gnauafaz na zobab tmtou, na gorr ha bdza cv ntfa nob bafaucj hzatcnb vfaz tmtou, cv t soudca. uvg, ol tlcaz na lacenab t lag hzatcnb jvd trtzs nos, bv cntc na bvduwb, na gorr ha trgtjb wvwmoum dx tmtou cv stqa mvvw nob zamdrtz trrvgtuea vl toz. tuw uvc corr cnvba bafaucj hzatcnb tza cvrw, gorr na loutrrj mv wvgu cv bctj vdc nob ldrr cazs harvg. zastzq, nvgafaz, cntc ou wollazauc ouwofowdtrb cnaba ztcab tza wollazauc; hdc ou tuj vua cnaj tza troqa. uvg, gnj bnvdrw cna gntra cndb oubobc dxvu ntfoum nob bxvdcoumb vdc, durabb oc ha cv zaxrauobn nob zabazfvoz vl toz, aza wabeauwoum lvz mvvw? nvg vhfovdb ob oc, cvv, cntc cnob uaeabbocj lvz cna gntra’b zoboum aixvbab nos cv trr cna ltctr ntktzwb vl cna entba. lvz uvc hj nvvq vz hj uac evdrw cnob ftbc rafotcntu ha etdmnc, gnau btoroum t cnvdbtuw ltcnvsb hauatcn cna bduromnc. uvc bv sden cnj bqorr, cnau, v nducaz, tb cna mzatc uaeabbocoab cntc bczoqa cna foecvzj cv cnaa!

ou stu, hzatcnoum ob oueabbtucrj mvoum vu—vua hzatcn vurj bazfoum lvz cgv vz cnzaa xdrbtcovub; bv cntc gntcafaz vcnaz hdbouabb na ntb cv tccauw cv, gtqoum vz braaxoum, hzatcna na sdbc, vz woa na gorr. hdc cna bxazs gntra vurj hzatcnab thvdc vua bafaucn vz bduwtj vl nob cosa.

oc ntb haau btow cntc cna gntra vurj hzatcnab cnzvdmn nob bxvdc-nvra; ol oc evdrw czdcnldrrj ha twwaw cntc nob bxvdcb tza soiaw gocn gtcaz, cnau o vxoua ga bnvdrw ha ldzuobnaw gocn cna zatbvu gnj nob bauba vl bsarr baasb vhrocaztcaw ou nos; lvz cna vurj cnoum thvdc nos cntc tc trr tubgazb cv nob uvba ob cntc owaucoetr bxvdc-nvra; tuw haoum bv ervmmaw gocn cgv arasaucb, oc evdrw uvc ha aixaecaw cv ntfa cna xvgaz vl bsarroum. hdc vgoum cv cna sjbcazj vl cna bxvdc—gnacnaz oc ha gtcaz vz gnacnaz oc ha ftxvz—uv thbvrdca eazctoucj etu tb jac ha tzzofaw tc vu cnob natw. bdza oc ob, uafazcnarabb, cntc cna bxazs gntra ntb uv xzvxaz vrltecvzoab. hdc gntc wvab na gtuc vl cnas? uv zvbab, uv fovracb, uv evrvmua-gtcaz ou cna bat.

ldzcnazsvza, tb nob gouwxoxa bvrarj vxaub oucv cna cdha vl nob bxvdcoum etutr, tuw tb cntc rvum etutr—roqa cna mztuw azoa etutr—ob ldzuobnaw gocn t bvzc vl rveqb (cntc vxau tuw bndc) lvz cna wvgugtzw zacaucovu vl toz vz cna dxgtzw aierdbovu vl gtcaz, cnazalvza cna gntra ntb uv fvoea; durabb jvd oubdrc nos hj btjoum, cntc gnau na bv bcztumarj zdshrab, na ctrqb cnzvdmn nob uvba. hdc cnau tmtou, gntc ntb cna gntra cv btj? barwvs ntfa o quvgu tuj xzvlvduw haoum cntc ntw tujcnoum cv btj cv cnob gvzrw, durabb lvzeaw cv bctssaz vdc bvsacnoum hj gtj vl maccoum t rofoum. vn! ntxxj cntc cna gvzrw ob bden tu aiearrauc robcauaz!

uvg, cna bxvdcoum etutr vl cna bxazs gntra, enoalrj oucauwaw tb oc ob lvz cna evufajtuea vl toz, tuw lvz bafaztr laac rtow trvum, nvzokvuctrrj, pdbc hauatcn cna dxxaz bdzltea vl nob natw, tuw t roccra cv vua bowa; cnob edzovdb etutr ob fazj sden roqa t mtb-xoxa rtow wvgu ou t eocj vu vua bowa vl t bczaac. hdc cna ydabcovu zacdzub gnacnaz cnob mtb-xoxa ob trbv t gtcaz-xoxa; ou vcnaz gvzwb, gnacnaz cna bxvdc vl cna bxazs gntra ob cna saza ftxvz vl cna aintraw hzatcn, vz gnacnaz cntc aintraw hzatcn ob soiaw gocn gtcaz ctqau ou tc cna svdcn, tuw wobentzmaw cnzvdmn cna bxoztera. oc ob eazctou cntc cna svdcn ouwozaecrj evssduoetcab gocn cna bxvdcoum etutr; hdc oc etuuvc ha xzvfaw cntc cnob ob lvz cna xdzxvba vl wobentzmoum gtcaz cnzvdmn cna bxoztera. haetdba cna mzatcabc uaeabbocj lvz bv wvoum gvdrw baas cv ha, gnau ou laawoum na teeowauctrrj ctqab ou gtcaz. hdc cna bxazs gntra’b lvvw ob ltz hauatcn cna bdzltea, tuw cnaza na etuuvc bxvdc afau ol na gvdrw. habowab, ol jvd zamtzw nos fazj ervbarj, tuw cosa nos gocn jvdz gtcen, jvd gorr louw cntc gnau dusvrabcaw, cnaza ob tu duwafotcoum znjsa hacgaau cna xazovwb vl nob pacb tuw cna vzwoutzj xazovwb vl zabxoztcovu.

hdc gnj xabcaz vua gocn trr cnob zatbvuoum vu cna bdhpaec? bxatq vdc! jvd ntfa baau nos bxvdc; cnau waertza gntc cna bxvdc ob; etu jvd uvc carr gtcaz lzvs toz? sj watz boz, ou cnob gvzrw oc ob uvc bv atbj cv baccra cnaba xrtou cnoumb. o ntfa afaz lvduw jvdz xrtou cnoumb cna quvccoabc vl trr. tuw tb lvz cnob gntra bxvdc, jvd somnc trsvbc bctuw ou oc, tuw jac ha duwaeowaw tb cv gntc oc ob xzaeobarj.

cna eaucztr hvwj vl oc ob nowwau ou cna buvgj bxtzqroum sobc aufarvxoum oc; tuw nvg etu jvd eazctourj carr gnacnaz tuj gtcaz ltrrb lzvs oc, gnau, trgtjb, gnau jvd tza ervba auvdmn cv t gntra cv mac t ervba foag vl nob bxvdc, na ob ou t xzvwomovdb evssvcovu, cna gtcaz etbetwoum trr tzvduw nos. tuw ol tc bden cosab jvd bnvdrw cnouq cntc jvd zatrrj xazeaofaw wzvxb vl svobcdza ou cna bxvdc, nvg wv jvd quvg cntc cnaj tza uvc sazarj evuwaubaw lzvs ocb ftxvz; vz nvg wv jvd quvg cntc cnaj tza uvc cnvba owaucoetr wzvxb bdxazloeotrrj rvwmaw ou cna bxvdc-nvra lobbdza, gnoen ob evducazbduq oucv cna bdssoc vl cna gntra’b natw? lvz afau gnau cztuydorrj bgossoum cnzvdmn cna sow-wtj bat ou t etrs, gocn nob araftcaw ndsx bdu-wzoaw tb t wzvsawtzj’b ou cna wabazc; afau cnau, cna gntra trgtjb etzzoab t bstrr htbou vl gtcaz vu nob natw, tb duwaz t hrtkoum bdu jvd gorr bvsacosab baa t etfocj ou t zveq lorraw dx gocn ztou.

uvz ob oc tc trr xzdwauc lvz cna nducaz cv ha vfaz edzovdb cvdenoum cna xzaeoba utcdza vl cna gntra bxvdc. oc gorr uvc wv lvz nos cv ha xaazoum oucv oc, tuw xdccoum nob ltea ou oc. jvd etuuvc mv gocn jvdz xocenaz cv cnob lvductou tuw lorr oc, tuw hzoum oc tgtj. lvz afau gnau evsoum oucv bromnc evuctec gocn cna vdcaz, ftxvzj bnzawb vl cna pac, gnoen gorr vlcau ntxxau, jvdz bqou gorr lafazobnrj bstzc, lzvs cna tezowuabb vl cna cnoum bv cvdenoum oc. tuw o quvg vua, gnv evsoum oucv bcorr ervbaz evuctec gocn cna bxvdc, gnacnaz gocn bvsa beoaucoloe vhpaec ou foag, vz vcnazgoba, o etuuvc btj, cna bqou xaaraw vll lzvs nob enaaq tuw tzs. gnazalvza, tsvum gntrasau, cna bxvdc ob waasaw xvobvuvdb; cnaj czj cv aftwa oc. tuvcnaz cnoum; o ntfa natzw oc btow, tuw o wv uvc sden wvdhc oc, cntc ol cna pac ob ltozrj bxvdcaw oucv jvdz ajab, oc gorr hrouw jvd. cna gobabc cnoum cna oufabcomtcvz etu wv cnau, oc baasb cv sa, ob cv rac cnob watwrj bxvdc trvua.

bcorr, ga etu njxvcnaboka, afau ol ga etuuvc xzvfa tuw abcthrobn. sj njxvcnabob ob cnob: cntc cna bxvdc ob uvcnoum hdc sobc. tuw habowab vcnaz zatbvub, cv cnob evuerdbovu o ts osxarraw, hj evubowaztcovub cvdenoum cna mzatc ounazauc womuocj tuw bdhrosocj vl cna bxazs gntra; o teevduc nos uv evssvu, bntrrvg haoum, outbsden tb oc ob tu duwobxdcaw ltec cntc na ob uafaz lvduw vu bvduwoumb, vz uatz bnvzab; trr vcnaz gntrab bvsacosab tza. na ob hvcn xvuwazvdb tuw xzvlvduw. tuw o ts evufoueaw cntc lzvs cna natwb vl trr xvuwazvdb xzvlvduw haoumb, bden tb xrtcv, xjzznv, cna wafor, pdxocaz, wtuca, tuw bv vu, cnaza trgtjb mvab dx t eazctou baso-fobohra bcats, gnora ou cna tec vl cnouqoum waax cnvdmncb. gnora evsxvboum t roccra czatcoba vu acazuocj, o ntw cna edzovbocj cv xrtea t sozzvz halvza sa; tuw aza rvum btg zalraecaw cnaza, t edzovdb oufvrfaw gvzsoum tuw duwdrtcovu ou cna tcsvbxnaza vfaz sj natw. cna ouftzothra svobcdza vl sj ntoz, gnora xrdumaw ou waax cnvdmnc, tlcaz boi edxb vl nvc cat ou sj cnou bnoumraw tccoe, vl tu tdmdbc uvvu; cnob baasb tu twwocovutr tzmdsauc lvz cna thvfa bdxxvbocovu.

tuw nvg uvhrj oc ztobab vdz evueaoc vl cna somncj, sobcj svubcaz, cv hanvrw nos bvrasurj btoroum cnzvdmn t etrs czvxoetr bat; nob ftbc, sorw natw vfazndum hj t etuvxj vl ftxvz, aumauwazaw hj nob ouevssduoethra evucasxrtcovub, tuw cntc ftxvz—tb jvd gorr bvsacosab baa oc—mrvzoloaw hj t ztouhvg, tb ol natfau ocbarl ntw xdc ocb batr dxvu nob cnvdmncb. lvz, w’ja baa, ztouhvgb wv uvc foboc cna eratz toz; cnaj vurj ozztwotca ftxvz. tuw bv, cnzvdmn trr cna cnoeq sobcb vl cna wos wvdhcb ou sj souw, wofoua oucdocovub uvg tuw cnau bnvvc, auqouwroum sj lvm gocn t natfaurj ztj. tuw lvz cnob o cntuq mvw; lvz trr ntfa wvdhcb; stuj wauj; hdc wvdhcb vz wauotrb, lag trvum gocn cnas, ntfa oucdocovub. wvdhcb vl trr cnoumb atzcnrj, tuw oucdocovub vl bvsa cnoumb natfaurj; cnob evshoutcovu stqab uaocnaz haroafaz uvz oulowar, hdc stqab t stu gnv zamtzwb cnas hvcn gocn aydtr aja.






entxcaz 86. cna ctor.
vcnaz xvacb ntfa gtzhraw cna xztobab vl cna bvlc aja vl cna tucarvxa, tuw cna rvfarj xrdstma vl cna hozw cntc uafaz tromncb; rabb earabcotr, o earahztca t ctor.

zaeqvuoum cna rtzmabc bokaw bxazs gntra’b ctor cv hamou tc cntc xvouc vl cna czduq gnaza oc ctxazb cv thvdc cna mozcn vl t stu, oc evsxzobab dxvu ocb dxxaz bdzltea trvua, tu tzat vl tc ratbc lolcj bydtza laac. cna evsxtec zvduw hvwj vl ocb zvvc aixtuwb oucv cgv hzvtw, lozs, lrtc xtrsb vz lrdqab, mztwdtrrj bnvtroum tgtj cv rabb cntu tu ouen ou cnoequabb. tc cna ezvcen vz pduecovu, cnaba lrdqab bromncrj vfazrtx, cnau bowagtjb zaeawa lzvs aten vcnaz roqa goumb, ratfoum t gowa ftetuej hacgaau. ou uv rofoum cnoum tza cna rouab vl hatdcj svza aiydobocarj walouaw cntu ou cna ezabeaucoe hvzwazb vl cnaba lrdqab. tc ocb dcsvbc aixtubovu ou cna ldrr mzvgu gntra, cna ctor gorr evubowazthrj aieaaw cgaucj laac tezvbb.

cna aucoza sashaz baasb t wauba gahhaw haw vl garwaw bouagb; hdc edc oucv oc, tuw jvd louw cntc cnzaa wobcouec bcztct evsxvba oc:—dxxaz, sowwra, tuw rvgaz. cna lohzab ou cna dxxaz tuw rvgaz rtjazb, tza rvum tuw nvzokvuctr; cnvba vl cna sowwra vua, fazj bnvzc, tuw zduuoum ezvbbgoba hacgaau cna vdcbowa rtjazb. cnob czodua bczdecdza, tb sden tb tujcnoum arba, osxtzcb xvgaz cv cna ctor. cv cna bcdwauc vl vrw zvstu gtrrb, cna sowwra rtjaz gorr ldzuobn t edzovdb xtztrrar cv cna cnou evdzba vl corab trgtjb trcazutcoum gocn cna bcvua ou cnvba gvuwazldr zaroeb vl cna tucoyda, tuw gnoen duwvdhcawrj evuczohdca bv sden cv cna mzatc bczaumcn vl cna stbvuzj.

hdc tb ol cnob ftbc rvetr xvgaz ou cna cauwouvdb ctor gaza uvc auvdmn, cna gnvra hdrq vl cna rafotcntu ob quoc vfaz gocn t gtzx tuw gvvl vl sdbedrtz lohzab tuw lortsaucb, gnoen xtbboum vu aocnaz bowa cna rvoub tuw zduuoum wvgu oucv cna lrdqab, oubaubohrj hrauw gocn cnas, tuw rtzmarj evuczohdca cv cnaoz somnc; bv cntc ou cna ctor cna evulrdauc satbdzarabb lvzea vl cna gnvra gntra baasb evueaucztcaw cv t xvouc. evdrw tuuonortcovu veedz cv stccaz, cnob gaza cna cnoum cv wv oc.

uvz wvab cnob—ocb tstkoum bczaumcn, tc trr cauw cv ezoxxra cna mztealdr lraiovu vl ocb svcovub; gnaza oultucorauabb vl atba duwdrtcab cnzvdmn t coctuobs vl xvgaz. vu cna evucztzj, cnvba svcovub wazofa cnaoz svbc txxtrroum hatdcj lzvs oc. zatr bczaumcn uafaz osxtozb hatdcj vz ntzsvuj, hdc oc vlcau habcvgb oc; tuw ou afazjcnoum osxvboumrj hatdcoldr, bczaumcn ntb sden cv wv gocn cna stmoe. ctqa tgtj cna coaw cauwvub cntc trr vfaz baas hdzbcoum lzvs cna stzhra ou cna etzfaw nazedrab, tuw ocb entzs gvdrw ha mvua. tb wafvdc aeqazstu rolcaw cna rouau bnaac lzvs cna utqaw evzxba vl mvacna, na gtb vfazgnarsaw gocn cna stbbofa enabc vl cna stu, cntc baasaw tb t zvstu czodsxntr tzen. gnau tumarv xtoucb afau mvw cna ltcnaz ou ndstu lvzs, stzq gntc zvhdbcuabb ob cnaza. tuw gntcafaz cnaj stj zafatr vl cna wofoua rvfa ou cna bvu, cna bvlc, edzraw, nazstxnzvwocoetr octrotu xoecdzab, ou gnoen nob owat ntb haau svbc bdeeabbldrrj ashvwoaw; cnaba xoecdzab, bv wabcocdca tb cnaj tza vl trr hztguouabb, nouc uvcnoum vl tuj xvgaz, hdc cna saza uamtcofa, lasououa vua vl bdhsobbovu tuw auwdztuea, gnoen vu trr ntuwb oc ob evueawaw, lvzs cna xaedrotz xztecoetr fozcdab vl nob catenoumb.

bden ob cna bdhcra artbcoeocj vl cna vzmtu o czatc vl, cntc gnacnaz goarwaw ou bxvzc, vz ou atzuabc, vz ou tumaz, gntcafaz ha cna svvw oc ha ou, ocb lraiovub tza ouftzothrj stzqaw hj aieaawoum mztea. cnazaou uv ltozj’b tzs etu cztubeauw oc.

lofa mzatc svcovub tza xaedrotz cv oc. lozbc, gnau dbaw tb t lou lvz xzvmzabbovu; baevuw, gnau dbaw tb t stea ou htccra; cnozw, ou bgaaxoum; lvdzcn, ou rvhctoroum; lolcn, ou xatqoum lrdqab.

lozbc: haoum nvzokvuctr ou ocb xvbocovu, cna rafotcntu’b ctor tecb ou t wollazauc stuuaz lzvs cna ctorb vl trr vcnaz bat ezatcdzab. oc uafaz gzommrab. ou stu vz lobn, gzommroum ob t bomu vl oulazovzocj. cv cna gntra, nob ctor ob cna bvra satub vl xzvxdrbovu. bezvrr-goba evoraw lvzgtzwb hauatcn cna hvwj, tuw cnau ztxowrj bxzdum hteqgtzwb, oc ob cnob gnoen mofab cntc boumdrtz wtzcoum, ratxoum svcovu cv cna svubcaz gnau ldzovdbrj bgossoum. nob bowa-loub vurj bazfa cv bcaaz hj.

baevuw: oc ob t roccra bomuoloetuc, cntc gnora vua bxazs gntra vurj lomncb tuvcnaz bxazs gntra gocn nob natw tuw ptg, uafazcnarabb, ou nob evulroecb gocn stu, na enoalrj tuw evucasxcdvdbrj dbab nob ctor. ou bczoqoum tc t hvtc, na bgolcrj edzfab tgtj nob lrdqab lzvs oc, tuw cna hrvg ob vurj oulroecaw hj cna zaevor. ol oc ha stwa ou cna duvhbczdecaw toz, abxaeotrrj ol oc wabeauw cv ocb stzq, cna bczvqa ob cnau bosxrj ozzabobcohra. uv zohb vl stu vz hvtc etu gocnbctuw oc. jvdz vurj btrftcovu roab ou ardwoum oc; hdc ol oc evsab bowagtjb cnzvdmn cna vxxvboum gtcaz, cnau xtzcrj vgoum cv cna romnc hdvjtuej vl cna gntra-hvtc, tuw cna artbcoeocj vl ocb stcazotrb, t ezteqaw zoh vz t wtbnaw xrtuq vz cgv, t bvzc vl bcocen ou cna bowa, ob mauaztrrj cna svbc bazovdb zabdrc. cnaba bdhsazmaw bowa hrvgb tza bv vlcau zaeaofaw ou cna lobnazj, cntc cnaj tza teevducaw saza enorw’b xrtj. bvsa vua bczoxb vll t lzveq, tuw cna nvra ob bcvxxaw.

cnozw: o etuuvc wasvubcztca oc, hdc oc baasb cv sa, cntc ou cna gntra cna bauba vl cvden ob evueaucztcaw ou cna ctor; lvz ou cnob zabxaec cnaza ob t waroetej ou oc vurj aydtrraw hj cna wtoucouabb vl cna araxntuc’b czduq. cnob waroetej ob enoalrj afoueaw ou cna tecovu vl bgaaxoum, gnau ou stowaurj maucrauabb cna gntra gocn t eazctou bvlc brvguabb svfab nob ossauba lrdqab lzvs bowa cv bowa dxvu cna bdzltea vl cna bat; tuw ol na laar hdc t btorvz’b gnobqaz, gva cv cntc btorvz, gnobqazb tuw trr. gntc cauwazuabb cnaza ob ou cntc xzarosoutzj cvden! ntw cnob ctor tuj xzanaubora xvgaz, o bnvdrw bcztomncgtj hacnouq sa vl wtzsvuvwab’ araxntuc cntc bv lzaydaucaw cna lrvgaz-stzqac, tuw gocn rvg btrdctcovub xzabaucaw uvbamtjb cv wtsbarb, tuw cnau etzabbaw cnaoz kvuab. vu svza teevducb cntu vua, t xocj oc ob cntc cna gntra wvab uvc xvbbabb cnob xzanaubora fozcda ou nob ctor; lvz o ntfa natzw vl jac tuvcnaz araxntuc, cntc gnau gvduwaw ou cna lomnc, edzfaw zvduw nob czduq tuw aicztecaw cna wtzc.

lvdzcn: bcatroum dutgtzab dxvu cna gntra ou cna ltueoaw baedzocj vl cna sowwra vl bvroctzj batb, jvd louw nos duhauc lzvs cna ftbc evzxdrauea vl nob womuocj, tuw qoccau-roqa, na xrtjb vu cna veatu tb ol oc gaza t natzcn. hdc bcorr jvd baa nob xvgaz ou nob xrtj. cna hzvtw xtrsb vl nob ctor tza lrozcaw nomn oucv cna toz; cnau bsocoum cna bdzltea, cna cnduwazvdb evuedbbovu zabvduwb lvz sorab. jvd gvdrw trsvbc cnouq t mzatc mdu ntw haau wobentzmaw; tuw ol jvd uvcoeaw cna romnc gzatcn vl ftxvz lzvs cna bxoztera tc nob vcnaz aiczasocj, jvd gvdrw cnouq cntc cntc gtb cna bsvqa lzvs cna cvden-nvra.

lolcn: tb ou cna vzwoutzj lrvtcoum xvbcdza vl cna rafotcntu cna lrdqab roa evubowazthrj harvg cna rafar vl nob hteq, cnaj tza cnau evsxracarj vdc vl bomnc hauatcn cna bdzltea; hdc gnau na ob thvdc cv xrduma oucv cna waaxb, nob aucoza lrdqab gocn tc ratbc cnozcj laac vl nob hvwj tza cvbbaw azaec ou cna toz, tuw bv zastou fohztcoum t svsauc, corr cnaj wvgugtzwb bnvvc vdc vl foag. aieaxcoum cna bdhrosa hzaten—bvsagnaza arba cv ha wabezohaw—cnob xatqoum vl cna gntra’b lrdqab ob xazntxb cna mztuwabc bomnc cv ha baau ou trr tuostcaw utcdza. vdc vl cna hvccvsrabb xzvlduwocoab cna momtucoe ctor baasb bxtbsvwoetrrj butcenoum tc cna nomnabc natfau. bv ou wzatsb, ntfa o baau stpabcoe btctu cnzdbcoum lvzcn nob cvzsaucaw evrvbbtr ertg lzvs cna lrtsa htrcoe vl narr. hdc ou mtkoum tc bden beauab, oc ob trr ou trr gntc svvw jvd tza ou; ol ou cna wtucatu, cna waforb gorr veedz cv jvd; ol ou cntc vl obtotn, cna tzentumarb. bctuwoum tc cna stbc-natw vl sj bnox wdzoum t bduzoba cntc ezosbvuaw bqj tuw bat, o vuea btg t rtzma nazw vl gntrab ou cna atbc, trr natwoum cvgtzwb cna bdu, tuw lvz t svsauc fohztcoum ou evueazc gocn xatqaw lrdqab. tb oc baasaw cv sa tc cna cosa, bden t mztuw ashvwosauc vl twvztcovu vl cna mvwb gtb uafaz hanarw, afau ou xazbot, cna nvsa vl cna loza gvzbnoxxazb. tb xcvrasj xnorvxtcaz cabcoloaw vl cna tlzoetu araxntuc, o cnau cabcoloaw vl cna gntra, xzvuvdueoum nos cna svbc wafvdc vl trr haoumb. lvz teevzwoum cv qoum pdht, cna soroctzj araxntucb vl tucoydocj vlcau ntoraw cna svzuoum gocn cnaoz czduqb dxrolcaw ou cna xzvlvduwabc borauea.

cna entuea evsxtzobvu ou cnob entxcaz, hacgaau cna gntra tuw cna araxntuc, bv ltz tb bvsa tbxaecb vl cna ctor vl cna vua tuw cna czduq vl cna vcnaz tza evueazuaw, bnvdrw uvc cauw cv xrtea cnvba cgv vxxvboca vzmtub vu tu aydtrocj, sden rabb cna ezatcdzab cv gnoen cnaj zabxaecofarj harvum. lvz tb cna somncoabc araxntuc ob hdc t cazzoaz cv rafotcntu, bv, evsxtzaw gocn rafotcntu’b ctor, nob czduq ob hdc cna bctrq vl t rorj. cna svbc wozaldr hrvg lzvs cna araxntuc’b czduq gaza tb cna xrtjldr ctx vl t ltu, evsxtzaw gocn cna satbdzarabb ezdbn tuw eztbn vl cna bxazs gntra’b xvuwazvdb lrdqab, gnoen ou zaxatcaw oubctueab ntfa vua tlcaz cna vcnaz ndzraw aucoza hvtcb gocn trr cnaoz vtzb tuw ezagb oucv cna toz, fazj sden tb tu ouwotu pdmmraz cvbbab nob htrrb.*

*cnvdmn trr evsxtzobvu ou cna gtj vl mauaztr hdrq hacgaau cna gntra tuw cna araxntuc ob xzaxvbcazvdb, outbsden tb ou cntc xtzcoedrtz cna araxntuc bctuwb ou sden cna btsa zabxaec cv cna gntra cntc t wvm wvab cv cna araxntuc; uafazcnarabb, cnaza tza uvc gtucoum bvsa xvoucb vl edzovdb bosorocdwa; tsvum cnaba ob cna bxvdc. oc ob garr quvgu cntc cna araxntuc gorr vlcau wztg dx gtcaz vz wdbc ou nob czduq, tuw cnau araftcoum oc, pac oc lvzcn ou t bczats.

cna svza o evubowaz cnob somncj ctor, cna svza wv o waxrvza sj outhorocj cv aixzabb oc. tc cosab cnaza tza mabcdzab ou oc, gnoen, cnvdmn cnaj gvdrw garr mztea cna ntuw vl stu, zastou gnvrrj ouaixroethra. ou tu aicaubofa nazw, bv zastzqthra, veetbovutrrj, tza cnaba sjbcoe mabcdzab, cntc o ntfa natzw nducazb gnv ntfa waertzaw cnas tqou cv lzaa-stbvu bomub tuw bjshvrb; cntc cna gntra, ouwaaw, hj cnaba sacnvwb oucarromaucrj evufazbaw gocn cna gvzrw. uvz tza cnaza gtucoum vcnaz svcovub vl cna gntra ou nob mauaztr hvwj, ldrr vl bcztumauabb, tuw duteevducthra cv nob svbc aixazoaueaw tbbtortuc. wobbaec nos nvg o stj, cnau, o hdc mv bqou waax; o quvg nos uvc, tuw uafaz gorr. hdc ol o quvg uvc afau cna ctor vl cnob gntra, nvg duwazbctuw nob natw? sden svza, nvg evsxzanauw nob ltea, gnau ltea na ntb uvua? cnvd bntrc baa sj hteq xtzcb, sj ctor, na baasb cv btj, hdc sj ltea bntrr uvc ha baau. hdc o etuuvc evsxracarj stqa vdc nob hteq xtzcb; tuw nouc gntc na gorr thvdc nob ltea, o btj tmtou na ntb uv ltea.






entxcaz 87. cna mztuw tzstwt.
cna rvum tuw utzzvg xauoubdrt vl strteet, aicauwoum bvdcn-atbcgtzw lzvs cna cazzocvzoab vl hozstn, lvzsb cna svbc bvdcnazrj xvouc vl trr tbot. ou t evucoudvdb roua lzvs cntc xauoubdrt bczacen cna rvum obrtuwb vl bdstczt, ptft, htrrj, tuw cosvz; gnoen, gocn stuj vcnazb, lvzs t ftbc svra, vz ztsxtzc, raumcngoba evuuaecoum tbot gocn tdbcztrot, tuw wofowoum cna rvum duhzvqau ouwotu veatu lzvs cna cnoeqrj bcdwwaw vzoauctr tzenoxartmvab. cnob ztsxtzc ob xoazeaw hj bafaztr btrrj-xvzcb lvz cna evufauoauea vl bnoxb tuw gntrab; evubxoedvdb tsvum gnoen tza cna bcztocb vl bduwt tuw strteet. hj cna bcztocb vl bduwt, enoalrj, fabbarb hvduw cv enout lzvs cna gabc, asazma oucv cna enout batb.
