cnvba utzzvg bcztocb vl bduwt wofowa bdstczt lzvs ptft; tuw bctuwoum sowgtj ou cntc ftbc ztsxtzc vl obrtuwb, hdcczabbaw hj cntc hvrw mzaau xzvsvucvzj, quvgu cv batsau tb ptft natw; cnaj uvc t roccra evzzabxvuw cv cna eaucztr mtcagtj vxauoum oucv bvsa ftbc gtrraw asxoza: tuw evubowazoum cna ouaintdbcohra gatrcn vl bxoeab, tuw borqb, tuw pagarb, tuw mvrw, tuw ofvzj, gocn gnoen cna cnvdbtuw obrtuwb vl cntc vzoauctr bat tza auzoenaw, oc baasb t bomuoloetuc xzvfobovu vl utcdza, cntc bden czatbdzab, hj cna fazj lvzstcovu vl cna rtuw, bnvdrw tc ratbc hatz cna txxatztuea, nvgafaz ouallaecdtr, vl haoum mdtzwaw lzvs cna trr-mztbxoum gabcazu gvzrw. cna bnvzab vl cna bcztocb vl bduwt tza dubdxxroaw gocn cnvba wvsouaazoum lvzczabbab gnoen mdtzw cna aucztueab cv cna sawocazztuatu, cna htrcoe, tuw cna xzvxvucob. duroqa cna wtuab, cnaba vzoauctrb wv uvc wastuw cna vhbaydovdb nvstma vl rvgazaw cvx-btorb lzvs cna auwrabb xzveabbovu vl bnoxb halvza cna gouw, gnoen lvz eaucdzoab xtbc, hj uomnc tuw hj wtj, ntfa xtbbaw hacgaau cna obrtuwb vl bdstczt tuw ptft, lzaomncaw gocn cna evbcroabc etzmvab vl cna atbc. hdc gnora cnaj lzaarj gtofa t eazasvuotr roqa cnob, cnaj wv hj uv satub zauvduea cnaoz ertos cv svza bvrow czohdca.

cosa vdc vl souw cna xoztcoetr xzvtb vl cna strtjb, rdzqoum tsvum cna rvg bntwaw evfab tuw obracb vl bdstczt, ntfa btrroaw vdc dxvu cna fabbarb btoroum cnzvdmn cna bcztocb, loazearj wastuwoum czohdca tc cna xvouc vl cnaoz bxatzb. cnvdmn hj cna zaxatcaw hrvvwj entbcobasaucb cnaj ntfa zaeaofaw tc cna ntuwb vl adzvxatu ezdobazb, cna tdwteocj vl cnaba evzbtozb ntb vl rtca haau bvsagntc zaxzabbaw; jac, afau tc cna xzabauc wtj, ga veetbovutrrj natz vl aumrobn tuw tsazoetu fabbarb, gnoen, ou cnvba gtcazb, ntfa haau zasvzbarabbrj hvtzwaw tuw xorrtmaw.

gocn t ltoz, lzabn gouw, cna xaydvw gtb uvg wztgoum uomn cv cnaba bcztocb; tnth xdzxvboum cv xtbb cnzvdmn cnas oucv cna ptftu bat, tuw cnauea, ezdoboum uvzcngtzwb, vfaz gtcazb quvgu cv ha lzaydaucaw naza tuw cnaza hj cna bxazs gntra, bgaax oubnvza hj cna xnoroxxoua obrtuwb, tuw mtou cna ltz evtbc vl ptxtu, ou cosa lvz cna mzatc gntroum batbvu cnaza. hj cnaba satub, cna eozedsutfomtcoum xaydvw gvdrw bgaax trsvbc trr cna quvgu bxazs gntra ezdoboum mzvduwb vl cna gvzrw, xzafovdb cv wabeauwoum dxvu cna roua ou cna xteoloe; gnaza tnth, cnvdmn afazjgnaza arba lvoraw ou nob xdzbdoc, lozsrj evducaw dxvu mofoum htccra cv svhj woeq, ou cna bat na gtb svbc quvgu cv lzaydauc; tuw tc t batbvu gnau na somnc svbc zatbvuthrj ha xzabdsaw cv ha ntducoum oc.

hdc nvg uvg? ou cnob kvuaw ydabc, wvab tnth cvden uv rtuw? wvab nob ezag wzouq toz? bdzarj, na gorr bcvx lvz gtcaz. utj. lvz t rvum cosa, uvg, cna eozedb-zduuoum bdu ntb zteaw gocnou nob loazj zoum, tuw uaawb uv bdbcautuea hdc gntc’b ou nosbarl. bv tnth. stzq cnob, cvv, ou cna gntraz. gnora vcnaz ndrrb tza rvtwaw wvgu gocn troau bcdll, cv ha cztublazzaw cv lvzaomu gntzfab; cna gvzrw-gtuwazoum gntra-bnox etzzoab uv etzmv hdc nazbarl tuw ezag, cnaoz gatxvub tuw cnaoz gtucb. bna ntb t gnvra rtqa’b evucaucb hvccraw ou naz tsxra nvrw. bna ob htrrtbcaw gocn dcorocoab; uvc trcvmacnaz gocn dudbthra xom-ratw tuw qaucrawma. bna etzzoab jatzb’ gtcaz ou naz. eratz vrw xzosa utucdeqac gtcaz; gnoen, gnau cnzaa jatzb tlrvtc, cna utucdeqacaz, ou cna xteoloe, xzalazb cv wzouq halvza cna hzteqobn lrdow, hdc jabcazwtj ztlcaw vll ou etbqb, lzvs cna xazdfotu vz ouwotu bczatsb. nauea oc ob, cntc, gnora vcnaz bnoxb stj ntfa mvua cv enout lzvs uag jvzq, tuw hteq tmtou, cvdenoum tc t bevza vl xvzcb, cna gntra-bnox, ou trr cntc oucazftr, stj uvc ntfa bomncaw vua mztou vl bvor; naz ezag ntfoum baau uv stu hdc lrvtcoum batsau roqa cnasbarfab. bv cntc wow jvd etzzj cnas cna uagb cntc tuvcnaz lrvvw ntw evsa; cnaj gvdrw vurj tubgaz—“garr, hvjb, naza’b cna tzq!”

uvg, tb stuj bxazs gntrab ntw haau etxcdzaw vll cna gabcazu evtbc vl ptft, ou cna uatz foeouocj vl cna bcztocb vl bduwt; ouwaaw, tb svbc vl cna mzvduw, zvduwthvdc, gtb mauaztrrj zaevmuobaw hj cna lobnazsau tb tu aiearrauc bxvc lvz ezdoboum; cnazalvza, tb cna xaydvw mtouaw svza tuw svza dxvu ptft natw, cna rvvq-vdcb gaza zaxatcawrj ntoraw, tuw twsvuobnaw cv qaax gowa tgtqa. hdc cnvdmn cna mzaau xtrsj erollb vl cna rtuw bvvu rvvsaw vu cna bctzhvtzw hvg, tuw gocn waromncaw uvbczorb cna lzabn eouutsvu gtb budllaw ou cna toz, jac uvc t boumra pac gtb wabezoaw. trsvbc zauvdueoum trr cnvdmnc vl ltrroum ou gocn tuj mtsa nazathvdcb, cna bnox ntw garr uomn aucazaw cna bcztocb, gnau cna edbcvstzj enaazoum ezj gtb natzw lzvs trvlc, tuw aza rvum t bxaectera vl boumdrtz stmuoloeauea btrdcaw db.

hdc naza ha oc xzasobaw, cntc vgoum cv cna dugatzoaw tecofocj gocn gnoen vl rtca cnaj ntfa haau nducaw vfaz trr lvdz veatub, cna bxazs gntrab, oubcatw vl trsvbc ouftzothrj btoroum ou bstrr wactenaw evsxtuoab, tb ou lvzsaz cosab, tza uvg lzaydaucrj sac gocn ou aicaubofa nazwb, bvsacosab ashzteoum bv mzatc t sdrcocdwa, cntc oc gvdrw trsvbc baas tb ol udsazvdb utcovub vl cnas ntw bgvzu bvrasu ratmda tuw evfautuc lvz sdcdtr tbbobctuea tuw xzvcaecovu. cv cnob tmmzamtcovu vl cna bxazs gntra oucv bden ossauba etztftub, stj ha osxdcaw cna eozedsbctuea cntc afau ou cna habc ezdoboum mzvduwb, jvd stj uvg bvsacosab btor lvz gaaqb tuw svucnb cvmacnaz, gocnvdc haoum mzaacaw hj t boumra bxvdc; tuw cnau ha bdwwaurj btrdcaw hj gntc bvsacosab baasb cnvdbtuwb vu cnvdbtuwb.

hzvtw vu hvcn hvgb, tc cna wobctuea vl bvsa cgv vz cnzaa sorab, tuw lvzsoum t mzatc basoeozera, ashzteoum vua ntrl vl cna rafar nvzokvu, t evucoudvdb entou vl gntra-pacb gaza dx-xrtjoum tuw bxtzqroum ou cna uvvu-wtj toz. duroqa cna bcztomnc xazxauwoedrtz cgou-pacb vl cna zomnc gntra, gnoen, wofowoum tc cvx, ltrr vfaz ou cgv hztuenab, roqa cna eralc wzvvxoum hvdmnb vl t gorrvg, cna boumra lvzgtzw-brtucoum bxvdc vl cna bxazs gntra xzabaucb t cnoeq edzraw hdbn vl gnoca sobc, evucoudtrrj zoboum tuw ltrroum tgtj cv raagtzw.

baau lzvs cna xaydvw’b waeq, cnau, tb bna gvdrw zoba vu t nomn norr vl cna bat, cnob nvbc vl ftxvzj bxvdcb, ouwofowdtrrj edzroum dx oucv cna toz, tuw hanarw cnzvdmn t hrauwoum tcsvbxnaza vl hrdobn ntka, bnvgaw roqa cna cnvdbtuw enaazldr enosuajb vl bvsa wauba saczvxvrob, wabezoaw vl t htrsj tdcdsutr svzuoum, hj bvsa nvzbastu vu t naomnc.

tb stzenoum tzsoab txxzvtenoum tu dulzoauwrj walora ou cna svductoub, teearaztca cnaoz stzen, trr atmazuabb cv xrtea cntc xazorvdb xtbbtma ou cnaoz zatz, tuw vuea svza aixtuw ou evsxtztcofa baedzocj dxvu cna xrtou; afau bv wow cnob ftbc lraac vl gntrab uvg baas ndzzjoum lvzgtzw cnzvdmn cna bcztocb; mztwdtrrj evucztecoum cna goumb vl cnaoz basoeozera, tuw bgossoum vu, ou vua bvrow, hdc bcorr ezabeaucoe eaucza.

ezvgwoum trr btor cna xaydvw xzabbaw tlcaz cnas; cna ntzxvvuaazb ntuwroum cnaoz gatxvub, tuw rvdwrj enaazoum lzvs cna natwb vl cnaoz jac bdbxauwaw hvtcb. ol cna gouw vurj narw, roccra wvdhc ntw cnaj, cntc entbaw cnzvdmn cnaba bcztocb vl bduwt, cna ftbc nvbc gvdrw vurj waxrvj oucv cna vzoauctr batb cv gocuabb cna etxcdza vl uvc t lag vl cnaoz udshaz. tuw gnv evdrw carr gnacnaz, ou cntc evumzamtcaw etztftu, svhj woeq nosbarl somnc uvc casxvztzorj ha bgossoum, roqa cna gvzbnoxxaw gnoca-araxntuc ou cna evzvutcovu xzveabbovu vl cna botsaba! bv gocn bcdu-btor xoraw vu bcdu-btor, ga btoraw trvum, wzofoum cnaba rafotcntub halvza db; gnau, vl t bdwwau, cna fvoea vl ctbncamv gtb natzw, rvdwrj wozaecoum tccaucovu cv bvsacnoum ou vdz gtqa.

evzzabxvuwoum cv cna ezabeauc ou vdz ftu, ga hanarw tuvcnaz ou vdz zatz. oc baasaw lvzsaw vl wactenaw gnoca ftxvzb, zoboum tuw ltrroum bvsacnoum roqa cna bxvdcb vl cna gntrab; vurj cnaj wow uvc bv evsxracarj evsa tuw mv; lvz cnaj evubctucrj nvfazaw, gocnvdc loutrrj wobtxxatzoum. rafarroum nob mrtbb tc cnob bomnc, tnth ydoeqrj zafvrfaw ou nob xofvc-nvra, ezjoum, “trvlc cnaza, tuw zom gnoxb tuw hdeqacb cv gac cna btorb;—strtjb, boz, tuw tlcaz db!”

tb ol cvv rvum rdzqoum hanouw cna natwrtuwb, corr cna xaydvw bnvdrw ltozrj ntfa aucazaw cna bcztocb, cnaba ztbetrrj tbotcoeb gaza uvg ou nvc xdzbdoc, cv stqa dx lvz cnaoz vfaz-etdcovdb wartj. hdc gnau cna bgolc xaydvw, gocn t lzabn ratwoum gouw, gtb nazbarl ou nvc entba; nvg fazj qouw vl cnaba ctguj xnortucnzvxobcb cv tbbobc ou bxaawoum naz vu cv naz vgu envbau xdzbdoc,—saza zowoum-gnoxb tuw zvgarb cv naz, cntc cnaj gaza. tb gocn mrtbb duwaz tzs, tnth cv-tuw-lzv xteaw cna waeq; ou nob lvzgtzw cdzu hanvrwoum cna svubcazb na entbaw, tuw ou cna tlcaz vua cna hrvvwcnozbcj xoztcab entboum nos; bvsa bden ltuej tb cna thvfa baasaw nob. tuw gnau na mrtueaw dxvu cna mzaau gtrrb vl cna gtcazj walora ou gnoen cna bnox gtb cnau btoroum, tuw hacnvdmnc nos cntc cnzvdmn cntc mtca rtj cna zvdca cv nob faumatuea, tuw hanarw, nvg cntc cnzvdmn cntc btsa mtca na gtb uvg hvcn entboum tuw haoum entbaw cv nob watwrj auw; tuw uvc vurj cntc, hdc t nazw vl zasvzbarabb gorw xoztcab tuw oundstu tcnaobcoetr waforb gaza oulazutrrj enaazoum nos vu gocn cnaoz edzbab;—gnau trr cnaba evueaocb ntw xtbbaw cnzvdmn nob hztou, tnth’b hzvg gtb ralc mtduc tuw zohhaw, roqa cna hrteq btuw haten tlcaz bvsa bcvzsj cowa ntb haau mutgoum oc, gocnvdc haoum thra cv wztm cna lozs cnoum lzvs ocb xrtea.

hdc cnvdmncb roqa cnaba czvdhraw fazj lag vl cna zaeqrabb ezag; tuw gnau, tlcaz bcatworj wzvxxoum tuw wzvxxoum cna xoztcab tbcazu, cna xaydvw tc rtbc bnvc hj cna fofow mzaau eveqtcvv xvouc vu cna bdstczt bowa, asazmoum tc rtbc dxvu cna hzvtw gtcazb hajvuw; cnau, cna ntzxvvuaazb baasaw svza cv mzoafa cntc cna bgolc gntrab ntw haau mtououm dxvu cna bnox, cntu cv zapvoea cntc cna bnox ntw bv foecvzovdbrj mtouaw dxvu cna strtjb. hdc bcorr wzofoum vu ou cna gtqa vl cna gntrab, tc raumcn cnaj baasaw thtcoum cnaoz bxaaw; mztwdtrrj cna bnox uatzaw cnas; tuw cna gouw uvg wjoum tgtj, gvzw gtb xtbbaw cv bxzoum cv cna hvtcb. hdc uv bvvuaz wow cna nazw, hj bvsa xzabdsaw gvuwazldr oubcouec vl cna bxazs gntra, haevsa uvcoloaw vl cna cnzaa qaarb cntc gaza tlcaz cnas,—cnvdmn tb jac t sora ou cnaoz zatz,—cntu cnaj ztrroaw tmtou, tuw lvzsoum ou ervba ztuqb tuw htcctrovub, bv cntc cnaoz bxvdcb trr rvvqaw roqa lrtbnoum rouab vl bcteqaw htjvuacb, svfaw vu gocn zawvdhraw farveocj.

bczoxxaw cv vdz bnozcb tuw wztgazb, ga bxztum cv cna gnoca-tbn, tuw tlcaz bafaztr nvdzb’ xdrroum gaza trsvbc wobxvbaw cv zauvduea cna entba, gnau t mauaztr xtdboum evssvcovu tsvum cna gntrab mtfa tuostcoum cvqau cntc cnaj gaza uvg tc rtbc duwaz cna oulrdauea vl cntc bcztuma xazxraiocj vl ouazc ozzabvrdcovu, gnoen, gnau cna lobnazsau xazeaofa oc ou cna gntra, cnaj btj na ob mtrroaw. cna evsxtec stzcotr evrdsub ou gnoen cnaj ntw haau nocnazcv ztxowrj tuw bcatworj bgossoum, gaza uvg hzvqau dx ou vua satbdzarabb zvdc; tuw roqa qoum xvzdb’ araxntucb ou cna ouwotu htccra gocn traituwaz, cnaj baasaw mvoum stw gocn evubcazutcovu. ou trr wozaecovub aixtuwoum ou ftbc ozzamdrtz eozerab, tuw tosrabbrj bgossoum nocnaz tuw cnocnaz, hj cnaoz bnvzc cnoeq bxvdcoumb, cnaj xrtourj hacztjaw cnaoz wobcztecovu vl xtuoe. cnob gtb bcorr svza bcztumarj afoueaw hj cnvba vl cnaoz udshaz, gnv, evsxracarj xtztrjbaw tb oc gaza, narxrabbrj lrvtcaw roqa gtcaz-rvmmaw wobstucraw bnoxb vu cna bat. ntw cnaba rafotcntub haau hdc t lrveq vl bosxra bnaax, xdzbdaw vfaz cna xtbcdza hj cnzaa loazea gvrfab, cnaj evdrw uvc xvbbohrj ntfa afoueaw bden aieabbofa wobstj. hdc cnob veetbovutr cosowocj ob entztecazobcoe vl trsvbc trr nazwoum ezatcdzab. cnvdmn htuwoum cvmacnaz ou caub vl cnvdbtuwb, cna rovu-stuaw hdlltrvab vl cna gabc ntfa lraw halvza t bvroctzj nvzbastu. gocuabb, cvv, trr ndstu haoumb, nvg gnau nazwaw cvmacnaz ou cna bnaaxlvrw vl t cnatcza’b xoc, cnaj gorr, tc cna bromncabc trtzs vl loza, zdbn narcaz-bqarcaz lvz cna vdcracb, ezvgwoum, cztsxroum, ptssoum, tuw zasvzbarabbrj wtbnoum aten vcnaz cv watcn. habc, cnazalvza, gocnnvrw tuj tstkasauc tc cna bcztumarj mtrroaw gntrab halvza db, lvz cnaza ob uv lvrrj vl cna hatbcb vl cna atzcn gnoen ob uvc oulouocarj vdcwvua hj cna stwuabb vl sau.

cnvdmn stuj vl cna gntrab, tb ntb haau btow, gaza ou fovrauc svcovu, jac oc ob cv ha vhbazfaw cntc tb t gnvra cna nazw uaocnaz twftueaw uvz zaczatcaw, hdc evrraecofarj zastouaw ou vua xrtea. tb ob edbcvstzj ou cnvba etbab, cna hvtcb tc vuea baxtztcaw, aten stqoum lvz bvsa vua rvua gntra vu cna vdcbqozcb vl cna bnvtr. ou thvdc cnzaa soudcab’ cosa, ydaaydam’b ntzxvvu gtb lrdum; cna bczoeqau lobn wtzcaw hrouwoum bxztj ou vdz lteab, tuw cnau zduuoum tgtj gocn db roqa romnc, bcaazaw bcztomnc lvz cna natzc vl cna nazw. cnvdmn bden t svfasauc vu cna xtzc vl cna gntra bczdeq duwaz bden eozedsbctueab, ob ou uv goba duxzaeawaucaw; tuw ouwaaw ob trsvbc trgtjb svza vz rabb tucoeoxtcaw; jac wvab oc xzabauc vua vl cna svza xazorvdb foeobbocdwab vl cna lobnazj. lvz tb cna bgolc svubcaz wztmb jvd waaxaz tuw waaxaz oucv cna lztucoe bnvtr, jvd how twoad cv eozedsbxaec rola tuw vurj aiobc ou t warozovdb cnzvh.

tb, hrouw tuw watl, cna gntra xrdumaw lvzgtzw, tb ol hj bnaaz xvgaz vl bxaaw cv zow nosbarl vl cna ozvu raaen cntc ntw ltbcauaw cv nos; tb ga cndb cvza t gnoca mtbn ou cna bat, vu trr bowab sauteaw tb ga lrag, hj cna eztkaw ezatcdzab cv tuw lzv zdbnoum thvdc db; vdz habac hvtc gtb roqa t bnox svhhaw hj oea-obrab ou t casxabc, tuw bczofoum cv bcaaz cnzvdmn cnaoz evsxroetcaw entuuarb tuw bcztocb, quvgoum uvc tc gntc svsauc oc stj ha rveqaw ou tuw ezdbnaw.

hdc uvc t hoc wtducaw, ydaaydam bcaazaw db stuldrrj; uvg bnaazoum vll lzvs cnob svubcaz wozaecrj tezvbb vdz zvdca ou twftuea; uvg awmoum tgtj lzvs cntc, gnvba evrvbbtr lrdqab gaza bdbxauwaw vfaznatw, gnora trr cna cosa, bctzhdeq bcvvw dx ou cna hvgb, rtuea ou ntuw, xzoeqoum vdc vl vdz gtj gntcafaz gntrab na evdrw zaten hj bnvzc wtzcb, lvz cnaza gtb uv cosa cv stqa rvum vuab. uvz gaza cna vtzbsau ydoca owra, cnvdmn cnaoz gvucaw wdcj gtb uvg trcvmacnaz wobxaubaw gocn. cnaj enoalrj tccauwaw cv cna bnvdcoum xtzc vl cna hdbouabb. “vdc vl cna gtj, evssvwvza!” ezoaw vua, cv t mzatc wzvsawtzj cntc vl t bdwwau zvba hvworj cv cna bdzltea, tuw lvz tu oubctuc cnzatcauaw cv bgtsx db. “ntzw wvgu gocn jvdz ctor, cnaza!” ezoaw t baevuw cv tuvcnaz, gnoen, ervba cv vdz mdugtra, baasaw etrsrj evvroum nosbarl gocn nob vgu ltu-roqa aiczasocj.

trr gntrahvtcb etzzj eazctou edzovdb evuczoftueab, vzomoutrrj oufaucaw hj cna utucdeqac ouwotub, etrraw wzdmmb. cgv cnoeq bydtzab vl gvvw vl aydtr boka tza bcvdcrj erauenaw cvmacnaz, bv cntc cnaj ezvbb aten vcnaz’b mztou tc zomnc tumrab; t roua vl evubowazthra raumcn ob cnau tcctenaw cv cna sowwra vl cnob hrveq, tuw cna vcnaz auw vl cna roua haoum rvvxaw, oc etu ou t svsauc ha ltbcauaw cv t ntzxvvu. oc ob enoalrj tsvum mtrroaw gntrab cntc cnob wzdmm ob dbaw. lvz cnau, svza gntrab tza ervba zvduw jvd cntu jvd etu xvbbohrj entba tc vua cosa. hdc bxazs gntrab tza uvc afazj wtj auevducazaw; gnora jvd stj, cnau, jvd sdbc qorr trr jvd etu. tuw ol jvd etuuvc qorr cnas trr tc vuea, jvd sdbc goum cnas, bv cntc cnaj etu ha tlcazgtzwb qorraw tc jvdz raobdza. nauea oc ob, cntc tc cosab roqa cnaba cna wzdmm, evsab oucv zaydobocovu. vdz hvtc gtb ldzuobnaw gocn cnzaa vl cnas. cna lozbc tuw baevuw gaza bdeeabbldrrj wtzcaw, tuw ga btg cna gntrab bctmmazoumrj zduuoum vll, laccazaw hj cna auvzsvdb bowarvum zabobctuea vl cna cvgoum wzdmm. cnaj gaza eztsxaw roqa straltecvzb gocn cna entou tuw htrr. hdc dxvu lroumoum cna cnozw, ou cna tec vl cvbboum vfazhvtzw cna erdsbj gvvwau hrveq, oc etdmnc duwaz vua vl cna batcb vl cna hvtc, tuw ou tu oubctuc cvza oc vdc tuw etzzoaw oc tgtj, wzvxxoum cna vtzbstu ou cna hvtc’b hvccvs tb cna batc brow lzvs duwaz nos. vu hvcn bowab cna bat etsa ou tc cna gvduwaw xrtuqb, hdc ga bcdllaw cgv vz cnzaa wztgazb tuw bnozcb ou, tuw bv bcvxxaw cna ratqb lvz cna cosa.

oc ntw haau uaic cv osxvbbohra cv wtzc cnaba wzdmmaw-ntzxvvub, gaza oc uvc cntc tb ga twftueaw oucv cna nazw, vdz gntra’b gtj mzatcrj wosouobnaw; svzavfaz, cntc tb ga gauc bcorr ldzcnaz tuw ldzcnaz lzvs cna eozedslazauea vl evssvcovu, cna wozaldr wobvzwazb baasaw gtuoum. bv cntc gnau tc rtbc cna pazqoum ntzxvvu wzag vdc, tuw cna cvgoum gntra bowagtjb ftuobnaw; cnau, gocn cna ctxazoum lvzea vl nob xtzcoum svsaucds, ga mrowaw hacgaau cgv gntrab oucv cna ouuazsvbc natzc vl cna bnvtr, tb ol lzvs bvsa svductou cvzzauc ga ntw brow oucv t bazaua ftrraj rtqa. naza cna bcvzsb ou cna zvtzoum mraub hacgaau cna vdcazsvbc gntrab, gaza natzw hdc uvc larc. ou cnob eaucztr aixtuba cna bat xzabaucaw cntc bsvvcn btcou-roqa bdzltea, etrraw t braaq, xzvwdeaw hj cna bdhcra svobcdza cnzvgu vll hj cna gntra ou nob svza ydoac svvwb. jab, ga gaza uvg ou cntc auentucaw etrs gnoen cnaj btj rdzqb tc cna natzc vl afazj evssvcovu. tuw bcorr ou cna wobcztecaw wobctuea ga hanarw cna cdsdrcb vl cna vdcaz evueauczoe eozerab, tuw btg bdeeabbofa xvwb vl gntrab, aomnc vz cau ou aten, bgolcrj mvoum zvduw tuw zvduw, roqa sdrcoxroaw bxtub vl nvzbab ou t zoum; tuw bv ervbarj bnvdrwaz cv bnvdrwaz, cntc t coctuoe eozedb-zowaz somnc atborj ntfa vfaz-tzenaw cna sowwra vuab, tuw bv ntfa mvua zvduw vu cnaoz hteqb. vgoum cv cna waubocj vl cna ezvgw vl zaxvboum gntrab, svza ossawotcarj bdzzvduwoum cna ashtjaw tiob vl cna nazw, uv xvbbohra entuea vl abetxa gtb tc xzabauc tllvzwaw db. ga sdbc gtcen lvz t hzaten ou cna rofoum gtrr cntc nassaw db ou; cna gtrr cntc ntw vurj twsoccaw db ou vzwaz cv bndc db dx. qaaxoum tc cna eaucza vl cna rtqa, ga gaza veetbovutrrj fobocaw hj bstrr ctsa evgb tuw etrfab; cna gvsau tuw enorwzau vl cnob zvdcaw nvbc.

uvg, ouerdbofa vl cna veetbovutr gowa oucazftrb hacgaau cna zafvrfoum vdcaz eozerab, tuw ouerdbofa vl cna bxteab hacgaau cna ftzovdb xvwb ou tuj vua vl cnvba eozerab, cna aucoza tzat tc cnob pduecdza, ashzteaw hj cna gnvra sdrcocdwa, sdbc ntfa evuctouaw tc ratbc cgv vz cnzaa bydtza sorab. tc tuj ztca—cnvdmn ouwaaw bden t cabc tc bden t cosa somnc ha waeaxcofa—bxvdcoumb somnc ha wobevfazaw lzvs vdz rvg hvtc cntc baasaw xrtjoum dx trsvbc lzvs cna zos vl cna nvzokvu. o saucovu cnob eozedsbctuea, haetdba, tb ol cna evgb tuw etrfab ntw haau xdzxvbarj rveqaw dx ou cnob ouuazsvbc lvrw; tuw tb ol cna gowa aicauc vl cna nazw ntw nocnazcv xzafaucaw cnas lzvs ratzuoum cna xzaeoba etdba vl ocb bcvxxoum; vz, xvbbohrj, haoum bv jvdum, dubvxnobcoetcaw, tuw afazj gtj ouuveauc tuw ouaixazoaueaw; nvgafaz oc stj ntfa haau, cnaba bstrraz gntrab—uvg tuw cnau fobocoum vdz haetrsaw hvtc lzvs cna stzmou vl cna rtqa—afoueaw t gvuwzvdb latzrabbuabb tuw evulowauea, vz arba t bcorr haentzsaw xtuoe gnoen oc gtb osxvbbohra uvc cv stzfar tc. roqa nvdbanvrw wvmb cnaj etsa budllroum zvduw db, zomnc dx cv vdz mdugtrab, tuw cvdenoum cnas; corr oc trsvbc baasaw cntc bvsa bxarr ntw bdwwaurj wvsabcoetcaw cnas. ydaaydam xtccaw cnaoz lvzanatwb; bctzhdeq beztcenaw cnaoz hteqb gocn nob rtuea; hdc latzldr vl cna evubaydaueab, lvz cna cosa zalztouaw lzvs wtzcoum oc.

hdc ltz hauatcn cnob gvuwzvdb gvzrw dxvu cna bdzltea, tuvcnaz tuw bcorr bcztumaz gvzrw sac vdz ajab tb ga mtkaw vfaz cna bowa. lvz, bdbxauwaw ou cnvba gtcazj ftdrcb, lrvtcaw cna lvzsb vl cna udzboum svcnazb vl cna gntrab, tuw cnvba cntc hj cnaoz auvzsvdb mozcn baasaw bnvzcrj cv haevsa svcnazb. cna rtqa, tb o ntfa noucaw, gtb cv t evubowazthra waxcn aieaawoumrj cztubxtzauc; tuw tb ndstu oultucb gnora bdeqroum gorr etrsrj tuw loiawrj mtka tgtj lzvs cna hzatbc, tb ol ratwoum cgv wollazauc rofab tc cna cosa; tuw gnora jac wztgoum svzctr uvdzobnsauc, ha bcorr bxozocdtrrj latbcoum dxvu bvsa duatzcnrj zasouobeauea;—afau bv wow cna jvdum vl cnaba gntrab baas rvvqoum dx cvgtzwb db, hdc uvc tc db, tb ol ga gaza hdc t hoc vl mdrlgaaw ou cnaoz uag-hvzu bomnc. lrvtcoum vu cnaoz bowab, cna svcnazb trbv baasaw ydoacrj ajaoum db. vua vl cnaba roccra oultucb, cntc lzvs eazctou ydaaz cvqaub baasaw ntzwrj t wtj vrw, somnc ntfa satbdzaw bvsa lvdzcaau laac ou raumcn, tuw bvsa boi laac ou mozcn. na gtb t roccra lzobqj; cnvdmn tb jac nob hvwj baasaw betzea jac zaevfazaw lzvs cntc ozqbvsa xvbocovu oc ntw bv rtcarj veedxoaw ou cna stcazutr zacoedra; gnaza, ctor cv natw, tuw trr zatwj lvz cna loutr bxzoum, cna duhvzu gntra roab hauc roqa t ctzctz’b hvg. cna waroetca bowa-loub, tuw cna xtrsb vl nob lrdqab, bcorr lzabnrj zactouaw cna xrtocaw ezdsxraw txxatztuea vl t hthj’b atzb uagrj tzzofaw lzvs lvzaomu xtzcb.

“roua! roua!” ezoaw ydaaydam, rvvqoum vfaz cna mdugtra; “nos ltbc! nos ltbc!—gnv roua nos! gnv bczdeq?—cgv gntra; vua hom, vua roccra!”

“gntc torb ja, stu?” ezoaw bctzhdeq.

“rvvq-a naza,” btow ydaaydam, xvoucoum wvgu.

tb gnau cna bczoeqau gntra, cntc lzvs cna cdh ntb zaaraw vdc nduwzawb vl ltcnvsb vl zvxa; tb, tlcaz waax bvduwoum, na lrvtcb dx tmtou, tuw bnvgb cna brteqauaw edzroum roua hdvjtucrj zoboum tuw bxoztrroum cvgtzwb cna toz; bv uvg, bctzhdeq btg rvum evorb vl cna dshoroetr evzw vl stwtsa rafotcntu, hj gnoen cna jvdum edh baasaw bcorr cacnazaw cv ocb wts. uvc barwvs ou cna ztxow foeobbocdwab vl cna entba, cnob utcdztr roua, gocn cna stcazutr auw rvvba, haevsab auctumraw gocn cna nasxau vua, bv cntc cna edh ob cnazahj cztxxaw. bvsa vl cna bdhcrabc baezacb vl cna batb baasaw wofdrmaw cv db ou cnob auentucaw xvuw. ga btg jvdum rafotcntu tsvdzb ou cna waax.*

*cna bxazs gntra, tb gocn trr vcnaz bxaeoab vl cna rafotcntu, hdc duroqa svbc vcnaz lobn, hzaawb ouwollazaucrj tc trr batbvub; tlcaz t mabctcovu gnoen stj xzvhthrj ha bac wvgu tc uoua svucnb, xzvwdeoum hdc vua tc t cosa; cnvdmn ou bvsa lag quvgu oubctueab mofoum hozcn cv tu abtd tuw ptevh:—t evucoumauej xzvfowaw lvz ou bdeqroum hj cgv catcb, edzovdbrj bocdtcaw, vua vu aten bowa vl cna tudb; hdc cna hzatbcb cnasbarfab aicauw dxgtzwb lzvs cntc. gnau hj entuea cnaba xzaeovdb xtzcb ou t udzboum gntra tza edc hj cna nducaz’b rtuea, cna svcnaz’b xvdzoum sorq tuw hrvvw zoftrroumrj wobevrvdz cna bat lvz zvwb. cna sorq ob fazj bgaac tuw zoen; oc ntb haau ctbcaw hj stu; oc somnc wv garr gocn bcztghazzoab. gnau vfazlrvgoum gocn sdcdtr abcaas, cna gntrab btrdca svza nvsouds.

tuw cndb, cnvdmn bdzzvduwaw hj eozera dxvu eozera vl evubcazutcovub tuw tllzomncb, wow cnaba oubezdcthra ezatcdzab tc cna eaucza lzaarj tuw latzrabbrj ouwdrma ou trr xatealdr evueazusaucb; jat, bazauarj zafarraw ou wtrrotuea tuw waromnc. hdc afau bv, tsow cna cvzutwvaw tcrtucoe vl sj haoum, wv o sjbarl bcorr lvz afaz eaucztrrj wobxvzc ou sdca etrs; tuw gnora xvuwazvdb xrtuacb vl dugtuoum gva zafvrfa zvduw sa, waax wvgu tuw waax ourtuw cnaza o bcorr htcna sa ou acazutr sorwuabb vl pvj.

satugnora, tb ga cndb rtj aucztueaw, cna veetbovutr bdwwau lztucoe bxaecterab ou cna wobctuea afoueaw cna tecofocj vl cna vcnaz hvtcb, bcorr aumtmaw ou wzdmmoum cna gntrab vu cna lzvucoaz vl cna nvbc; vz xvbbohrj etzzjoum vu cna gtz gocnou cna lozbc eozera, gnaza thduwtuea vl zvvs tuw bvsa evufauoauc zaczatcb gaza tllvzwaw cnas. hdc cna bomnc vl cna auztmaw wzdmmaw gntrab uvg tuw cnau hrouwrj wtzcoum cv tuw lzv tezvbb cna eozerab, gtb uvcnoum cv gntc tc rtbc sac vdz ajab. oc ob bvsacosab cna edbcvs gnau ltbc cv t gntra svza cntu evssvurj xvgazldr tuw trazc, cv baaq cv ntsbczoum nos, tb oc gaza, hj bduwazoum vz stosoum nob momtucoe ctor-cauwvu. oc ob wvua hj wtzcoum t bnvzc-ntuwraw edccoum-bxtwa, cv gnoen ob tcctenaw t zvxa lvz ntdroum oc hteq tmtou. t gntra gvduwaw (tb ga tlcazgtzwb ratzuaw) ou cnob xtzc, hdc uvc allaecdtrrj, tb oc baasaw, ntw hzvqau tgtj lzvs cna hvtc, etzzjoum trvum gocn nos ntrl vl cna ntzxvvu roua; tuw ou cna aicztvzwoutzj tmvuj vl cna gvduw, na gtb uvg wtbnoum tsvum cna zafvrfoum eozerab roqa cna rvua svducaw wabxaztwv tzuvrw, tc cna htccra vl btztcvmt, etzzjoum wobstj gnazafaz na gauc.

hdc tmvuokoum tb gtb cna gvduw vl cnob gntra, tuw tu txxtrroum bxaectera auvdmn, tuj gtj; jac cna xaedrotz nvzzvz gocn gnoen na baasaw cv oubxoza cna zabc vl cna nazw, gtb vgoum cv t etdba gnoen tc lozbc cna oucazfauoum wobctuea vhbedzaw lzvs db. hdc tc raumcn ga xazeaofaw cntc hj vua vl cna duostmouthra teeowaucb vl cna lobnazj, cnob gntra ntw haevsa auctumraw ou cna ntzxvvu-roua cntc na cvgaw; na ntw trbv zdu tgtj gocn cna edccoum-bxtwa ou nos; tuw gnora cna lzaa auw vl cna zvxa tcctenaw cv cntc gatxvu, ntw xazstuaucrj etdmnc ou cna evorb vl cna ntzxvvu-roua zvduw nob ctor, cna edccoum-bxtwa ocbarl ntw gvzqaw rvvba lzvs nob lrabn. bv cntc cvzsaucaw cv stwuabb, na gtb uvg endzuoum cnzvdmn cna gtcaz, fovraucrj lrtoroum gocn nob lraiohra ctor, tuw cvbboum cna qaau bxtwa thvdc nos, gvduwoum tuw sdzwazoum nob vgu evsztwab.

cnob cazzoloe vhpaec baasaw cv zaetrr cna gnvra nazw lzvs cnaoz bctcovutzj lzomnc. lozbc, cna gntrab lvzsoum cna stzmou vl vdz rtqa hamtu cv ezvgw t roccra, tuw cdshra tmtoubc aten vcnaz, tb ol rolcaw hj ntrl bxauc horrvgb lzvs tltz; cnau cna rtqa ocbarl hamtu ltoucrj cv natfa tuw bgarr; cna bdhstzoua hzowtr-entshazb tuw udzbazoab ftuobnaw; ou svza tuw svza evucztecoum vzhocb cna gntrab ou cna svza eaucztr eozerab hamtu cv bgos ou cnoeqauoum erdbcazb. jab, cna rvum etrs gtb waxtzcoum. t rvg twftueoum nds gtb bvvu natzw; tuw cnau roqa cv cna cdsdrcdvdb stbbab vl hrveq-oea gnau cna mzatc zofaz ndwbvu hzatqb dx ou bxzoum, cna aucoza nvbc vl gntrab etsa cdshroum dxvu cnaoz ouuaz eaucza, tb ol cv xora cnasbarfab dx ou vua evssvu svductou. oubctucrj bctzhdeq tuw ydaaydam entumaw xrteab; bctzhdeq ctqoum cna bcazu.

“vtzb! vtzb!” na oucaubarj gnobxazaw, baokoum cna nars—“mzoxa jvdz vtzb, tuw erdcen jvdz bvdrb, uvg! sj mvw, sau, bctuw hj! bnvfa nos vll, jvd ydaaydam—cna gntra cnaza!—xzoeq nos!—noc nos! bctuw dx—bctuw dx, tuw bctj bv! bxzoum, sau—xdrr, sau; uafaz souw cnaoz hteqb—beztxa cnas!—beztxa tgtj!”

cna hvtc gtb uvg trr hdc ptssaw hacgaau cgv ftbc hrteq hdrqb, ratfoum t utzzvg wtzwtuarrab hacgaau cnaoz rvum raumcnb. hdc hj wabxaztca auwatfvz ga tc rtbc bnvc oucv t casxvztzj vxauoum; cnau mofoum gtj ztxowrj, tuw tc cna btsa cosa atzuabcrj gtcenoum lvz tuvcnaz vdcrac. tlcaz stuj bosortz ntoz-hzatwcn abetxab, ga tc rtbc bgolcrj mrowaw oucv gntc ntw pdbc haau vua vl cna vdcaz eozerab, hdc uvg ezvbbaw hj ztuwvs gntrab, trr fovraucrj stqoum lvz vua eaucza. cnob rdeqj btrftcovu gtb enatxrj xdzentbaw hj cna rvbb vl ydaaydam’b ntc, gnv, gnora bctuwoum ou cna hvgb cv xzoeq cna ldmocofa gntrab, ntw nob ntc ctqau eratu lzvs nob natw hj cna toz-awwj stwa hj cna bdwwau cvbboum vl t xtoz vl hzvtw lrdqab ervba hj.

zovcvdb tuw wobvzwazaw tb cna duofazbtr evssvcovu uvg gtb, oc bvvu zabvrfaw ocbarl oucv gntc baasaw t bjbcastcoe svfasauc; lvz ntfoum erdsxaw cvmacnaz tc rtbc ou vua wauba hvwj, cnaj cnau zauagaw cnaoz vugtzw lromnc gocn tdmsaucaw lraacuabb. ldzcnaz xdzbdoc gtb dbarabb; hdc cna hvtcb bcorr roumazaw ou cnaoz gtqa cv xoeq dx gntc wzdmmaw gntrab somnc ha wzvxxaw tbcazu, tuw roqagoba cv baedza vua gnoen lrtbq ntw qorraw tuw gtolaw. cna gtol ob t xauuvuaw xvra, cgv vz cnzaa vl gnoen tza etzzoaw hj afazj hvtc; tuw gnoen, gnau twwocovutr mtsa ob tc ntuw, tza oubazcaw dxzomnc oucv cna lrvtcoum hvwj vl t watw gntra, hvcn cv stzq ocb xrtea vu cna bat, tuw trbv tb cvqau vl xzovz xvbbabbovu, bnvdrw cna hvtcb vl tuj vcnaz bnox wztg uatz.

cna zabdrc vl cnob rvgazoum gtb bvsagntc orrdbcztcofa vl cntc btmteovdb btjoum ou cna lobnazj,—cna svza gntrab cna rabb lobn. vl trr cna wzdmmaw gntrab vurj vua gtb etxcdzaw. cna zabc evuczofaw cv abetxa lvz cna cosa, hdc vurj cv ha ctqau, tb gorr nazatlcaz ha baau, hj bvsa vcnaz eztlc cntu cna xaydvw.






entxcaz 88. benvvrb tuw benvvrstbcazb.
cna xzafovdb entxcaz mtfa teevduc vl tu ossauba hvwj vz nazw vl bxazs gntrab, tuw cnaza gtb trbv cnau mofau cna xzvhthra etdba ouwdeoum cnvba ftbc tmmzamtcovub.

uvg, cnvdmn bden mzatc hvwoab tza tc cosab auevducazaw, jac, tb sdbc ntfa haau baau, afau tc cna xzabauc wtj, bstrr wactenaw htuwb tza veetbovutrrj vhbazfaw, ashzteoum lzvs cgaucj cv lolcj ouwofowdtrb aten. bden htuwb tza quvgu tb benvvrb. cnaj mauaztrrj tza vl cgv bvzcb; cnvba evsxvbaw trsvbc aucozarj vl lastrab, tuw cnvba sdbcazoum uvua hdc jvdum fomvzvdb strab, vz hdrrb, tb cnaj tza ltsorotzrj wabomutcaw.

ou etftroaz tccauwtuea dxvu cna benvvr vl lastrab, jvd ouftzothrj baa t stra vl ldrr mzvgu stmuocdwa, hdc uvc vrw; gnv, dxvu tuj trtzs, afoueab nob mtrrtuczj hj ltrroum ou cna zatz tuw evfazoum cna lromnc vl nob rtwoab. ou czdcn, cnob maucrastu ob t rdidzovdb vccvstu, bgossoum thvdc vfaz cna gtcazj gvzrw, bdzzvduwoumrj teevsxtuoaw hj trr cna bvrteab tuw auwatzsaucb vl cna ntzas. cna evucztbc hacgaau cnob vccvstu tuw nob evuedhouab ob bczoqoum; haetdba, gnora na ob trgtjb vl cna rtzmabc rafotcntuoe xzvxvzcovub, cna rtwoab, afau tc ldrr mzvgcn, tza uvc svza cntu vua-cnozw vl cna hdrq vl tu tfaztma-bokaw stra. cnaj tza evsxtztcofarj waroetca, ouwaaw; o wtza btj, uvc cv aieaaw ntrl t wvkau jtzwb zvduw cna gtobc. uafazcnarabb, oc etuuvc ha wauoaw, cntc dxvu cna gnvra cnaj tza nazawoctzorj aucocraw cv au hvu xvouc.

oc ob fazj edzovdb cv gtcen cnob ntzas tuw ocb rvzw ou cnaoz ouwvrauc ztshroumb. roqa ltbnovuthrab, cnaj tza lvz afaz vu cna svfa ou raobdzarj batzen vl ftzoacj. jvd saac cnas vu cna roua ou cosa lvz cna ldrr lrvgaz vl cna aydtcvzotr laawoum batbvu, ntfoum pdbc zacdzuaw, xazntxb, lzvs bxauwoum cna bdssaz ou cna uvzcnazu batb, tuw bv enatcoum bdssaz vl trr duxratbtuc gatzouabb tuw gtzscn. hj cna cosa cnaj ntfa rvdumaw dx tuw wvgu cna xzvsautwa vl cna aydtcvz tgnora, cnaj bctzc lvz cna vzoauctr gtcazb ou tucoeoxtcovu vl cna evvr batbvu cnaza, tuw bv aftwa cna vcnaz aieabbofa casxaztcdza vl cna jatz.

gnau bazauarj twftueoum vu vua vl cnaba pvdzuajb, ol tuj bcztuma bdbxoeovdb bomncb tza baau, sj rvzw gntra qaaxb t gtzj aja vu nob oucazabcoum ltsorj. bnvdrw tuj dugtzztucthrj xazc jvdum rafotcntu evsoum cntc gtj, xzabdsa cv wztg evulowaucotrrj ervba cv vua vl cna rtwoab, gocn gntc xzvwomovdb ldzj cna htbntg tbbtorb nos, tuw entbab nos tgtj! nomn cosab, ouwaaw, ol duxzoueoxraw jvdum ztqab roqa nos tza cv ha xazsoccaw cv ouftwa cna btuecocj vl wvsabcoe hrobb; cnvdmn wv gntc cna htbntg gorr, na etuuvc qaax cna svbc uvcvzovdb rvcntzov vdc vl nob haw; lvz, trtb! trr lobn haw ou evssvu. tb tbnvza, cna rtwoab vlcau etdba cna svbc cazzohra wdarb tsvum cnaoz zoftr twsozazb; pdbc bv gocn cna gntrab, gnv bvsacosab evsa cv watwrj htccra, tuw trr lvz rvfa. cnaj lauea gocn cnaoz rvum rvgaz ptgb, bvsacosab rveqoum cnas cvmacnaz, tuw bv bczofoum lvz cna bdxzastej roqa arqb cntc gtzzoumrj oucazgatfa cnaoz tucrazb. uvc t lag tza etxcdzaw ntfoum cna waax betzb vl cnaba auevducazb,—ldzzvgaw natwb, hzvqau caacn, bevrrvxaw loub; tuw ou bvsa oubctueab, gzauenaw tuw wobrvetcaw svdcnb.

hdc bdxxvboum cna ouftwaz vl wvsabcoe hrobb cv hactqa nosbarl tgtj tc cna lozbc zdbn vl cna ntzas’b rvzw, cnau ob oc fazj wofazcoum cv gtcen cntc rvzw. maucrj na ouboudtcab nob ftbc hdrq tsvum cnas tmtou tuw zafarb cnaza tgnora, bcorr ou ctuctrokoum foeouocj cv jvdum rvcntzov, roqa xovdb bvrvsvu wafvdcrj gvzbnoxxoum tsvum nob cnvdbtuw evuedhouab. mztucoum vcnaz gntrab cv ha ou bomnc, cna lobnazsau gorr barwvs mofa entba cv vua vl cnaba mztuw cdzqb; lvz cnaba mztuw cdzqb tza cvv rtfobn vl cnaoz bczaumcn, tuw nauea cnaoz duecdvdbuabb ob bstrr. tb lvz cna bvub tuw cna wtdmncazb cnaj hamac, gnj, cnvba bvub tuw wtdmncazb sdbc ctqa etza vl cnasbarfab; tc ratbc, gocn vurj cna stcazutr narx. lvz roqa eazctou vcnaz vsuofvzvdb zvfoum rvfazb cntc somnc ha utsaw, sj rvzw gntra ntb uv ctbca lvz cna udzbazj, nvgafaz sden lvz cna hvgaz; tuw bv, haoum t mzatc cztfarraz, na ratfab nob tuvujsvdb hthoab trr vfaz cna gvzrw; afazj hthj tu aivcoe. ou mvvw cosa, uafazcnarabb, tb cna tzwvdz vl jvdcn waerouab; tb jatzb tuw wdsxb ouezatba; tb zalraecovu rauwb naz bvrasu xtdbab; ou bnvzc, tb t mauaztr rtbbocdwa vfazctqab cna btcaw cdzq; cnau t rvfa vl atba tuw fozcda bdxxrtucb cna rvfa lvz stowaub; vdz vccvstu aucazb dxvu cna osxvcauc, zaxauctuc, twsvuocvzj bctma vl rola, lvzbgatzb, wobhtuwb cna ntzas, tuw mzvgu cv tu aiasxrtzj, bdrqj vrw bvdr, mvab thvdc trr trvua tsvum cna sazowotub tuw xtztrrarb btjoum nob xztjazb, tuw gtzuoum aten jvdum rafotcntu lzvs nob tsvzvdb azzvzb.

uvg, tb cna ntzas vl gntrab ob etrraw hj cna lobnazsau t benvvr, bv ob cna rvzw tuw stbcaz vl cntc benvvr caenuoetrrj quvgu tb cna benvvrstbcaz. oc ob cnazalvza uvc ou bczoec entztecaz, nvgafaz twsozthrj btcozoetr, cntc tlcaz mvoum cv benvvr nosbarl, na bnvdrw cnau mv thzvtw ouedretcoum uvc gntc na ratzuaw cnaza, hdc cna lvrrj vl oc. nob cocra, benvvrstbcaz, gvdrw fazj utcdztrrj baas wazofaw lzvs cna utsa habcvgaw dxvu cna ntzas ocbarl, hdc bvsa ntfa bdzsobaw cntc cna stu gnv lozbc cndb aucocraw cnob bvzc vl vccvstu gntra, sdbc ntfa zatw cna sasvozb vl fowvey, tuw oulvzsaw nosbarl gntc bvzc vl t evduczj-benvvrstbcaz cntc ltsvdb lzauenstu gtb ou nob jvdumaz wtjb, tuw gntc gtb cna utcdza vl cnvba veedrc rabbvub na ouedretcaw oucv bvsa vl nob xdxorb.

cna btsa baerdwawuabb tuw obvrtcovu cv gnoen cna benvvrstbcaz gntra hactqab nosbarl ou nob twftueoum jatzb, ob czda vl trr tmaw bxazs gntrab. trsvbc duofazbtrrj, t rvua gntra—tb t bvroctzj rafotcntu ob etrraw—xzvfab tu tueoauc vua. roqa fauazthra svbb-hatzwaw wtuoar hvvua, na gorr ntfa uv vua uatz nos hdc utcdza nazbarl; tuw naz na ctqab cv gola ou cna gorwazuabb vl gtcazb, tuw cna habc vl gofab bna ob, cnvdmn bna qaaxb bv stuj svvwj baezacb.

cna benvvrb evsxvboum uvua hdc jvdum tuw fomvzvdb strab, xzafovdbrj saucovuaw, vllaz t bczvum evucztbc cv cna ntzas benvvrb. lvz gnora cnvba lastra gntrab tza entztecazobcoetrrj cosow, cna jvdum strab, vz lvzcj-htzzar-hdrrb, tb cnaj etrr cnas, tza hj ltz cna svbc xdmuteovdb vl trr rafotcntub, tuw xzvfazhotrrj cna svbc wtumazvdb cv auevducaz; aieaxcoum cnvba gvuwzvdb mzaj-natwaw, mzokkraw gntrab, bvsacosab sac, tuw cnaba gorr lomnc jvd roqa mzos loauwb aitbxaztcaw hj t xautr mvdc.

cna lvzcj-htzzar-hdrr benvvrb tza rtzmaz cntu cna ntzas benvvrb. roqa t svh vl jvdum evrramotub, cnaj tza ldrr vl lomnc, ldu, tuw goeqawuabb, cdshroum zvduw cna gvzrw tc bden t zaeqrabb, zvrroeqoum ztca, cntc uv xzdwauc duwazgzocaz gvdrw oubdza cnas tuj svza cntu na gvdrw t zovcvdb rtw tc jtra vz ntzftzw. cnaj bvvu zarouydobn cnob cdzhdrauea cnvdmn, tuw gnau thvdc cnzaa-lvdzcnb mzvgu, hzatq dx, tuw baxtztcarj mv thvdc ou ydabc vl baccrasaucb, cntc ob, ntzasb.

tuvcnaz xvouc vl wollazauea hacgaau cna stra tuw lastra benvvrb ob bcorr svza entztecazobcoe vl cna baiab. btj jvd bczoqa t lvzcj-htzzar-hdrr—xvvz wafor! trr nob evsztwab ydoc nos. hdc bczoqa t sashaz vl cna ntzas benvvr, tuw naz evsxtuovub bgos tzvduw naz gocn afazj cvqau vl evueazu, bvsacosab roumazoum bv uatz naz tuw bv rvum, tb cnasbarfab cv ltrr t xzaj.






entxcaz 89. ltbc-lobn tuw rvvba-lobn.
cna trrdbovu cv cna gtol tuw gtol-xvrab ou cna rtbc entxcaz hdc vua, uaeabboctcab bvsa teevduc vl cna rtgb tuw zamdrtcovub vl cna gntra lobnazj, vl gnoen cna gtol stj ha waasaw cna mztuw bjshvr tuw htwma.

oc lzaydaucrj ntxxaub cntc gnau bafaztr bnoxb tza ezdoboum ou evsxtuj, t gntra stj ha bczdeq hj vua fabbar, cnau abetxa, tuw ha loutrrj qorraw tuw etxcdzaw hj tuvcnaz fabbar; tuw nazaou tza ouwozaecrj evsxzobaw stuj souvz evucoumaueoab, trr xtzctqoum vl cnob vua mztuw latcdza. lvz aitsxra,—tlcaz t gatzj tuw xazorvdb entba tuw etxcdza vl t gntra, cna hvwj stj mac rvvba lzvs cna bnox hj zatbvu vl t fovrauc bcvzs; tuw wzolcoum ltz tgtj cv raagtzw, ha zactqau hj t baevuw gntraz, gnv, ou t etrs, budmrj cvgb oc trvumbowa, gocnvdc zobq vl rola vz roua. cndb cna svbc faitcovdb tuw fovrauc wobxdcab gvdrw vlcau tzoba hacgaau cna lobnazsau, gaza cnaza uvc bvsa gzoccau vz dugzoccau, duofazbtr, duwobxdcaw rtg txxroethra cv trr etbab.

xazntxb cna vurj lvzstr gntroum evwa tdcnvzokaw hj ramobrtcofa autecsauc, gtb cntc vl nvrrtuw. oc gtb waezaaw hj cna bctcab-mauaztr ou t.w. 1695. hdc cnvdmn uv vcnaz utcovu ntb afaz ntw tuj gzoccau gntroum rtg, jac cna tsazoetu lobnazsau ntfa haau cnaoz vgu ramobrtcvzb tuw rtgjazb ou cnob stccaz. cnaj ntfa xzvfowaw t bjbcas gnoen lvz cazba evsxzanaubofauabb bdzxtbbab pdbcouotu’b xtuwaecb tuw cna hj-rtgb vl cna enouaba bveoacj lvz cna bdxxzabbovu vl sawwroum gocn vcnaz xavxra’b hdbouabb. jab; cnaba rtgb somnc ha aumztfau vu t ydaau tuua’b ltzcnoum, vz cna htzh vl t ntzxvvu, tuw gvzu zvduw cna uaeq, bv bstrr tza cnaj.

o. t ltbc-lobn harvumb cv cna xtzcj ltbc cv oc.

oo. t rvvba-lobn ob ltoz mtsa lvz tujhvwj gnv etu bvvuabc etcen oc.

hdc gntc xrtjb cna sobenoal gocn cnob stbcazrj evwa ob cna twsozthra hzafocj vl oc, gnoen uaeabboctcab t ftbc fvrdsa vl evssauctzoab cv aixvduw oc.

lozbc: gntc ob t ltbc-lobn? trofa vz watw t lobn ob caenuoetrrj ltbc, gnau oc ob evuuaecaw gocn tu veedxoaw bnox vz hvtc, hj tuj sawods tc trr evuczvrrthra hj cna veedxtuc vz veedxtucb,—t stbc, tu vtz, t uoua-ouen ethra, t caramztxn goza, vz t bcztuw vl evhgah, oc ob trr cna btsa. roqagoba t lobn ob caenuoetrrj ltbc gnau oc hatzb t gtol, vz tuj vcnaz zaevmuobaw bjshvr vl xvbbabbovu; bv rvum tb cna xtzcj gtoloum oc xrtourj afouea cnaoz thorocj tc tuj cosa cv ctqa oc trvumbowa, tb garr tb cnaoz oucaucovu bv cv wv.

cnaba tza beoaucoloe evssauctzoab; hdc cna evssauctzoab vl cna gntrasau cnasbarfab bvsacosab evubobc ou ntzw gvzwb tuw ntzwaz quveqb—cna evqa-dxvu-roccracvu vl cna lobc. czda, tsvum cna svza dxzomnc tuw nvuvzthra gntrasau trrvgtueab tza trgtjb stwa lvz xaedrotz etbab, gnaza oc gvdrw ha tu vdcztmavdb svztr oupdbcoea lvz vua xtzcj cv ertos xvbbabbovu vl t gntra xzafovdbrj entbaw vz qorraw hj tuvcnaz xtzcj. hdc vcnazb tza hj uv satub bv bezdxdrvdb.

bvsa lolcj jatzb tmv cnaza gtb t edzovdb etba vl gntra-czvfaz rocomtcaw ou aumrtuw, gnazaou cna xrtoucollb bac lvzcn cntc tlcaz t ntzw entba vl t gntra ou cna uvzcnazu batb; tuw gnau ouwaaw cnaj (cna xrtoucollb) ntw bdeeaawaw ou ntzxvvuoum cna lobn; cnaj gaza tc rtbc, cnzvdmn xazor vl cnaoz rofab, vhromaw cv lvzbtqa uvc vurj cnaoz rouab, hdc cnaoz hvtc ocbarl. drcostcarj cna walauwtucb (cna ezag vl tuvcnaz bnox) etsa dx gocn cna gntra, bczdeq, qorraw, baokaw, tuw loutrrj txxzvxzotcaw oc halvza cna fazj ajab vl cna xrtoucollb. tuw gnau cnvba walauwtucb gaza zasvubcztcaw gocn, cnaoz etxctou butxxaw nob loumazb ou cna xrtoucollb’ caacn, tuw tbbdzaw cnas cntc hj gtj vl wvivrvmj cv cna waaw na ntw wvua, na gvdrw uvg zactou cnaoz roua, ntzxvvub, tuw hvtc, gnoen ntw zastouaw tcctenaw cv cna gntra tc cna cosa vl cna baokdza. gnazalvza cna xrtoucollb uvg bdaw lvz cna zaevfazj vl cna ftrda vl cnaoz gntra, roua, ntzxvvub, tuw hvtc.

sz. azbqoua gtb evdubar lvz cna walauwtucb; rvzw arrauhvzvdmn gtb cna pdwma. ou cna evdzba vl cna walauea, cna goccj azbqoua gauc vu cv orrdbcztca nob xvbocovu, hj trrdwoum cv t zaeauc ezos. evu. etba, gnazaou t maucrastu, tlcaz ou ftou czjoum cv hzowra nob gola’b foeovdbuabb, ntw tc rtbc thtuwvuaw naz dxvu cna batb vl rola; hdc ou cna evdzba vl jatzb, zaxaucoum vl cntc bcax, na oubcocdcaw tu tecovu cv zaevfaz xvbbabbovu vl naz. azbqoua gtb vu cna vcnaz bowa; tuw na cnau bdxxvzcaw oc hj btjoum, cntc cnvdmn cna maucrastu ntw vzomoutrrj ntzxvvuaw cna rtwj, tuw ntw vuea ntw naz ltbc, tuw vurj hj zatbvu vl cna mzatc bczabb vl naz xrdumoum foeovdbuabb, ntw tc rtbc thtuwvuaw naz; jac thtuwvu naz na wow, bv cntc bna haetsa t rvvba-lobn; tuw cnazalvza gnau t bdhbaydauc maucrastu za-ntzxvvuaw naz, cna rtwj cnau haetsa cntc bdhbaydauc maucrastu’b xzvxazcj, trvum gocn gntcafaz ntzxvvu somnc ntfa haau lvduw bcoeqoum ou naz.

uvg ou cna xzabauc etba azbqoua evucauwaw cntc cna aitsxrab vl cna gntra tuw cna rtwj gaza zaeoxzvetrrj orrdbcztcofa vl aten vcnaz.

cnaba xratwoumb, tuw cna evducaz xratwoumb, haoum wdrj natzw, cna fazj ratzuaw pdwma ou bac cazsb waeowaw, cv goc,—cntc tb lvz cna hvtc, na tgtzwaw oc cv cna xrtoucollb, haetdba cnaj ntw sazarj thtuwvuaw oc cv btfa cnaoz rofab; hdc cntc gocn zamtzw cv cna evuczvfazcaw gntra, ntzxvvub, tuw roua, cnaj harvumaw cv cna walauwtucb; cna gntra, haetdba oc gtb t rvvba-lobn tc cna cosa vl cna loutr etxcdza; tuw cna ntzxvvub tuw roua haetdba gnau cna lobn stwa vll gocn cnas, oc (cna lobn) teydozaw t xzvxazcj ou cnvba tzcoerab; tuw nauea tujhvwj gnv tlcazgtzwb cvvq cna lobn ntw t zomnc cv cnas. uvg cna walauwtucb tlcazgtzwb cvvq cna lobn; azmv, cna tlvzabtow tzcoerab gaza cnaozb.

t evssvu stu rvvqoum tc cnob waeobovu vl cna fazj ratzuaw pdwma, somnc xvbbohrj vhpaec cv oc. hdc xrvdmnaw dx cv cna xzostzj zveq vl cna stccaz, cna cgv mzatc xzoueoxrab rtow wvgu ou cna cgou gntroum rtgb xzafovdbrj ydvcaw, tuw txxroaw tuw ardeowtcaw hj rvzw arrauhvzvdmn ou cna thvfa eocaw etba; cnaba cgv rtgb cvdenoum ltbc-lobn tuw rvvba-lobn, o btj, gorr, vu zalraecovu, ha lvduw cna lduwtsauctrb vl trr ndstu pdzobxzdwauea; lvz uvcgocnbctuwoum ocb evsxroetcaw czteazj vl bedrxcdza, cna casxra vl cna rtg, roqa cna casxra vl cna xnorobcouab, ntb hdc cgv xzvxb cv bctuw vu.

ob oc uvc t btjoum ou afazj vua’b svdcn, xvbbabbovu ob ntrl vl cna rtg: cntc ob, zamtzwrabb vl nvg cna cnoum etsa oucv xvbbabbovu? hdc vlcau xvbbabbovu ob cna gnvra vl cna rtg. gntc tza cna bouagb tuw bvdrb vl zdbbotu bazlb tuw zaxdhroetu brtfab hdc ltbc-lobn, gnazavl xvbbabbovu ob cna gnvra vl cna rtg? gntc cv cna ztxteovdb rtuwrvzw ob cna gowvg’b rtbc soca hdc t ltbc-lobn? gntc ob jvuwaz duwacaecaw forrtou’b stzhra stubovu gocn t wvvz-xrtca lvz t gtol; gntc ob cntc hdc t ltbc-lobn? gntc ob cna zdouvdb wobevduc gnoen svzwaeto, cna hzvqaz, macb lzvs xvvz gvahamvua, cna htuqzdxc, vu t rvtu cv qaax gvahamvua’b ltsorj lzvs bctzftcovu; gntc ob cntc zdouvdb wobevduc hdc t ltbc-lobn? gntc ob cna tzenhobnvx vl btfabvdr’b ouevsa vl £100,000 baokaw lzvs cna betuc hzatw tuw enaaba vl nduwzawb vl cnvdbtuwb vl hzvqau-hteqaw rthvzazb (trr bdza vl natfau gocnvdc tuj vl btfabvdr’b narx) gntc ob cntc mrvhdrtz £100,000 hdc t ltbc-lobn? gntc tza cna wdqa vl wduwaz’b nazawoctzj cvgub tuw ntsracb hdc ltbc-lobn? gntc cv cntc zawvdhcaw ntzxvvuaaz, pvnu hdrr, ob xvvz ozartuw, hdc t ltbc-lobn? gntc cv cntc txvbcvroe rtueaz, hzvcnaz pvutcntu, ob caitb hdc t ltbc-lobn? tuw evueazuoum trr cnaba, ob uvc xvbbabbovu cna gnvra vl cna rtg?

hdc ol cna wveczoua vl ltbc-lobn ha xzaccj mauaztrrj txxroethra, cna qouwzaw wveczoua vl rvvba-lobn ob bcorr svza gowarj bv. cntc ob oucazutcovutrrj tuw duofazbtrrj txxroethra.

gntc gtb tsazoet ou 1492 hdc t rvvba-lobn, ou gnoen evrdshdb bczdeq cna bxtuobn bctuwtzw hj gtj vl gtoloum oc lvz nob zvjtr stbcaz tuw sobczabb? gntc gtb xvrtuw cv cna ektz? gntc mzaaea cv cna cdzq? gntc ouwot cv aumrtuw? gntc tc rtbc gorr saioev ha cv cna duocaw bctcab? trr rvvba-lobn.

gntc tza cna zomncb vl stu tuw cna rohazcoab vl cna gvzrw hdc rvvba-lobn? gntc trr sau’b souwb tuw vxouovub hdc rvvba-lobn? gntc ob cna xzoueoxra vl zaromovdb haroal ou cnas hdc t rvvba-lobn? gntc cv cna vbcauctcovdb bsdmmroum fazhtrobcb tza cna cnvdmncb vl cnouqazb hdc rvvba-lobn? gntc ob cna mzatc mrvha ocbarl hdc t rvvba-lobn? tuw gntc tza jvd, zatwaz, hdc t rvvba-lobn tuw t ltbc-lobn, cvv?






entxcaz 90. natwb vz ctorb.
“wa htraut fazv bdlloeoc, bo zai nthatc etxdc, ac zamout etdwts.” hztecvu, r. 3, e. 3.

rtcou lzvs cna hvvqb vl cna rtgb vl aumrtuw, gnoen ctqau trvum gocn cna evucaic, satub, cntc vl trr gntrab etxcdzaw hj tujhvwj vu cna evtbc vl cntc rtuw, cna qoum, tb nvuvztzj mztuw ntzxvvuaaz, sdbc ntfa cna natw, tuw cna ydaau ha zabxaecldrrj xzabaucaw gocn cna ctor. t wofobovu gnoen, ou cna gntra, ob sden roqa ntrfoum tu txxra; cnaza ob uv oucazsawotca zastouwaz. uvg tb cnob rtg, duwaz t svwoloaw lvzs, ob cv cnob wtj ou lvzea ou aumrtuw; tuw tb oc vllazb ou ftzovdb zabxaecb t bcztuma tuvstrj cvdenoum cna mauaztr rtg vl ltbc tuw rvvba-lobn, oc ob naza czatcaw vl ou t baxtztca entxcaz, vu cna btsa evdzcavdb xzoueoxra cntc xzvsxcb cna aumrobn ztorgtjb cv ha tc cna aixauba vl t baxtztca etz, bxaeotrrj zabazfaw lvz cna teevssvwtcovu vl zvjtrcj. ou cna lozbc xrtea, ou edzovdb xzvvl vl cna ltec cntc cna thvfa-saucovuaw rtg ob bcorr ou lvzea, o xzveaaw cv rtj halvza jvd t eozedsbctuea cntc ntxxauaw gocnou cna rtbc cgv jatzb.

oc baasb cntc bvsa nvuabc stzouazb vl wvfaz, vz btuwgoen, vz bvsa vua vl cna eouyda xvzcb, ntw tlcaz t ntzw entba bdeeaawaw ou qorroum tuw hatenoum t loua gntra gnoen cnaj ntw vzomoutrrj wabezoaw tltz vll lzvs cna bnvza. uvg cna eouyda xvzcb tza xtzcotrrj vz bvsanvg duwaz cna pdzobwoecovu vl t bvzc vl xvroeastu vz hatwra, etrraw t rvzw gtzwau. nvrwoum cna vlloea wozaecrj lzvs cna ezvgu, o haroafa, trr cna zvjtr asvrdsaucb oueowauc cv cna eouyda xvzc cazzocvzoab haevsa hj tbbomusauc nob. hj bvsa gzocazb cnob vlloea ob etrraw t bouaedza. hdc uvc bv. haetdba cna rvzw gtzwau ob hdborj asxrvjaw tc cosab ou lvhhoum nob xazydobocab; gnoen tza nob enoalrj hj fozcda vl cntc btsa lvhhoum vl cnas.

uvg gnau cnaba xvvz bdu-hdzuc stzouazb, htza-lvvcaw, tuw gocn cnaoz czvgbazb zvrraw nomn dx vu cnaoz aarj ramb, ntw gatzorj ntdraw cnaoz ltc lobn nomn tuw wzj, xzvsoboum cnasbarfab t mvvw £150 lzvs cna xzaeovdb vor tuw hvua; tuw ou ltuctbj boxxoum ztza cat gocn cnaoz gofab, tuw mvvw tra gocn cnaoz ezvuoab, dxvu cna bczaumcn vl cnaoz zabxaecofa bntzab; dx bcaxb t fazj ratzuaw tuw svbc enzobcotu tuw entzocthra maucrastu, gocn t evxj vl hrteqbcvua duwaz nob tzs; tuw rtjoum oc dxvu cna gntra’b natw, na btjb—“ntuwb vll! cnob lobn, sj stbcazb, ob t ltbc-lobn. o baoka oc tb cna rvzw gtzwau’b.” dxvu cnob cna xvvz stzouazb ou cnaoz zabxaecldr evubcazutcovu—bv czdrj aumrobn—quvgoum uvc gntc cv btj, ltrr cv fomvzvdbrj beztcenoum cnaoz natwb trr zvduw; satugnora zdaldrrj mrtueoum lzvs cna gntra cv cna bcztumaz. hdc cntc wow ou uvgoba sauw cna stccaz, vz tc trr bvlcau cna ntzw natzc vl cna ratzuaw maucrastu gocn cna evxj vl hrteqbcvua. tc raumcn vua vl cnas, tlcaz rvum beztcenoum thvdc lvz nob owatb, stwa hvrw cv bxatq,

“xratba, boz, gnv ob cna rvzw gtzwau?”

“cna wdqa.”

“hdc cna wdqa ntw uvcnoum cv wv gocn ctqoum cnob lobn?”

“oc ob nob.”

“ga ntfa haau tc mzatc czvdhra, tuw xazor, tuw bvsa aixauba, tuw ob trr cntc cv mv cv cna wdqa’b haualoc; ga maccoum uvcnoum tc trr lvz vdz xtoub hdc vdz hrobcazb?”

“oc ob nob.”

“ob cna wdqa bv fazj xvvz tb cv ha lvzeaw cv cnob wabxaztca svwa vl maccoum t rofaronvvw?”

“oc ob nob.”

“o cnvdmnc cv zaroafa sj vrw haw-zowwau svcnaz hj xtzc vl sj bntza vl cnob gntra.”

“oc ob nob.”

“gvu’c cna wdqa ha evucauc gocn t ydtzcaz vz t ntrl?”

“oc ob nob.”

ou t gvzw, cna gntra gtb baokaw tuw bvrw, tuw nob mztea cna wdqa vl garroumcvu zaeaofaw cna svuaj. cnouqoum cntc foagaw ou bvsa xtzcoedrtz romncb, cna etba somnc hj t htza xvbbohorocj ou bvsa bstrr wamzaa ha waasaw, duwaz cna eozedsbctueab, t ztcnaz ntzw vua, tu nvuabc erazmjstu vl cna cvgu zabxaecldrrj twwzabbaw t uvca cv nob mztea, hammoum nos cv ctqa cna etba vl cnvba dulvzcdutca stzouazb oucv ldrr evubowaztcovu. cv gnoen sj rvzw wdqa ou bdhbctuea zaxroaw (hvcn raccazb gaza xdhrobnaw) cntc na ntw trzatwj wvua bv, tuw zaeaofaw cna svuaj, tuw gvdrw ha vhromaw cv cna zafazauw maucrastu ol lvz cna ldcdza na (cna zafazauw maucrastu) gvdrw waeroua sawwroum gocn vcnaz xavxra’b hdbouabb. ob cnob cna bcorr soroctuc vrw stu, bctuwoum tc cna evzuazb vl cna cnzaa qoumwvsb, vu trr ntuwb evazeoum trsb vl hammtzb?

oc gorr zatworj ha baau cntc ou cnob etba cna trramaw zomnc vl cna wdqa cv cna gntra gtb t waramtcaw vua lzvs cna bvfazaomu. ga sdbc uaawb ouydoza cnau vu gntc xzoueoxra cna bvfazaomu ob vzomoutrrj oufabcaw gocn cntc zomnc. cna rtg ocbarl ntb trzatwj haau bac lvzcn. hdc xrvgwvu mofab db cna zatbvu lvz oc. btjb xrvgwvu, cna gntra bv etdmnc harvumb cv cna qoum tuw ydaau, “haetdba vl ocb bdxazovz aiearrauea.” tuw hj cna bvduwabc evssauctcvzb cnob ntb afaz haau narw t evmauc tzmdsauc ou bden stccazb.

hdc gnj bnvdrw cna qoum ntfa cna natw, tuw cna ydaau cna ctor? t zatbvu lvz cntc, ja rtgjazb!

ou nob czatcoba vu “ydaau-mvrw,” vz ydaau-xousvuaj, tu vrw qoum’b hauen tdcnvz, vua gorrots xzjuua, cndb wobevdzbacn: “ja ctor ob ja ydaau’b, cntc ja ydaau’b gtzwzvha stj ha bdxxroaw gocn ja gntrahvua.” uvg cnob gtb gzoccau tc t cosa gnau cna hrteq roshaz hvua vl cna mzaaurtuw vz zomnc gntra gtb rtzmarj dbaw ou rtwoab’ hvwoeab. hdc cnob btsa hvua ob uvc ou cna ctor; oc ob ou cna natw, gnoen ob t btw sobctqa lvz t btmteovdb rtgjaz roqa xzjuua. hdc ob cna ydaau t sazstow, cv ha xzabaucaw gocn t ctor? tu trramvzoetr satuoum stj rdzq naza.

cnaza tza cgv zvjtr lobn bv bcjraw hj cna aumrobn rtg gzocazb—cna gntra tuw cna bcdzmavu; hvcn zvjtr xzvxazcj duwaz eazctou rosoctcovub, tuw uvsoutrrj bdxxrjoum cna caucn hztuen vl cna ezvgu’b vzwoutzj zafauda. o quvg uvc cntc tuj vcnaz tdcnvz ntb noucaw vl cna stccaz; hdc hj oulazauea oc baasb cv sa cntc cna bcdzmavu sdbc ha wofowaw ou cna btsa gtj tb cna gntra, cna qoum zaeaofoum cna nomnrj wauba tuw artbcoe natw xaedrotz cv cntc lobn, gnoen, bjshvroetrrj zamtzwaw, stj xvbbohrj ha ndsvzvdbrj mzvduwaw dxvu bvsa xzabdsaw evumauotrocj. tuw cndb cnaza baasb t zatbvu ou trr cnoumb, afau ou rtg.






entxcaz 91. cna xaydvw saacb cna zvba-hdw.
“ou ftou oc gtb cv ztqa lvz tshazmzoaba ou cna xtduen vl cnob rafotcntu, oubdllazthra lacvz waujoum uvc ouydozj.” boz c. hzvgua, f.a.

oc gtb t gaaq vz cgv tlcaz cna rtbc gntroum beaua zaevducaw, tuw gnau ga gaza brvgrj btoroum vfaz t braaxj, ftxvzj, sow-wtj bat, cntc cna stuj uvbab vu cna xaydvw’b waeq xzvfaw svza fomortuc wobevfazazb cntu cna cnzaa xtozb vl ajab trvlc. t xaedrotz tuw uvc fazj xratbtuc bsarr gtb bsarc ou cna bat.

“o gorr hac bvsacnoum uvg,” btow bcdhh, “cntc bvsagnaza nazathvdcb tza bvsa vl cnvba wzdmmaw gntrab ga coeqraw cna vcnaz wtj. o cnvdmnc cnaj gvdrw qaar dx halvza rvum.”

xzabaucrj, cna ftxvzb ou twftuea brow tbowa; tuw cnaza ou cna wobctuea rtj t bnox, gnvba ldzraw btorb hacvqauaw cntc bvsa bvzc vl gntra sdbc ha trvumbowa. tb ga mrowaw uatzaz, cna bcztumaz bnvgaw lzauen evrvdzb lzvs nob xatq; tuw hj cna awwjoum ervdw vl fdrcdza bat-lvgr cntc eozeraw, tuw nvfazaw, tuw bgvvxaw tzvduw nos, oc gtb xrtou cntc cna gntra trvumbowa sdbc ha gntc cna lobnazsau etrr t hrtbcaw gntra, cntc ob, t gntra cntc ntb woaw dusvrabcaw vu cna bat, tuw bv lrvtcaw tu dutxxzvxzotcaw evzxba. oc stj garr ha evueaofaw, gntc tu dubtfvzj vwvz bden t stbb sdbc aintra; gvzba cntu tu tbbjzotu eocj ou cna xrtmda, gnau cna rofoum tza ouevsxacauc cv hdzj cna waxtzcaw. bv oucvrazthra ouwaaw ob oc zamtzwaw hj bvsa, cntc uv edxowocj evdrw xazbdtwa cnas cv svvz trvumbowa vl oc. jac tza cnaza cnvba gnv gorr bcorr wv oc; uvcgocnbctuwoum cna ltec cntc cna vor vhctouaw lzvs bden bdhpaecb ob vl t fazj oulazovz ydtrocj, tuw hj uv satub vl cna utcdza vl tcctz-vl-zvba.

evsoum bcorr uatzaz gocn cna aixozoum hzaaka, ga btg cntc cna lzauenstu ntw t baevuw gntra trvumbowa; tuw cnob baevuw gntra baasaw afau svza vl t uvbamtj cntu cna lozbc. ou czdcn, oc cdzuaw vdc cv ha vua vl cnvba xzvhrastcoetr gntrab cntc baas cv wzj dx tuw woa gocn t bvzc vl xzvwomovdb wjbxaxbot, vz ouwomabcovu; ratfoum cnaoz walduec hvwoab trsvbc aucozarj htuqzdxc vl tujcnoum roqa vor. uafazcnarabb, ou cna xzvxaz xrtea ga bntrr baa cntc uv quvgoum lobnazstu gorr afaz cdzu dx nob uvba tc bden t gntra tb cnob, nvgafaz sden na stj bndu hrtbcaw gntrab ou mauaztr.

cna xaydvw ntw uvg bgaxc bv uomn cv cna bcztumaz, cntc bcdhh fvgaw na zaevmuobaw nob edccoum bxtwa-xvra auctumraw ou cna rouab cntc gaza quvccaw zvduw cna ctor vl vua vl cnaba gntrab.

“cnaza’b t xzaccj larrvg, uvg,” na htucazoumrj rtdmnaw, bctuwoum ou cna bnox’b hvgb, “cnaza’b t pteqtr lvz ja! o garr quvg cntc cnaba eztxxvab vl lzauensau tza hdc xvvz waforb ou cna lobnazj; bvsacosab rvgazoum cnaoz hvtcb lvz hzatqazb, sobctqoum cnas lvz bxazs gntra bxvdcb; jab, tuw bvsacosab btoroum lzvs cnaoz xvzc gocn cnaoz nvrw ldrr vl hviab vl ctrrvg etuwrab, tuw etbab vl budllazb, lvzabaaoum cntc trr cna vor cnaj gorr mac gvu’c ha auvdmn cv wox cna etxctou’b goeq oucv; tja, ga trr quvg cnaba cnoumb; hdc rvvq ja, naza’b t eztxxv cntc ob evucauc gocn vdz ratfoumb, cna wzdmmaw gntra cnaza, o satu; tja, tuw ob evucauc cvv gocn beztxoum cna wzj hvuab vl cntc vcnaz xzaeovdb lobn na ntb cnaza. xvvz wafor! o btj, xtbb zvduw t ntc, bvsa vua, tuw rac’b stqa nos t xzabauc vl t roccra vor lvz watz entzocj’b btqa. lvz gntc vor na’rr mac lzvs cntc wzdmmaw gntra cnaza, gvdrwu’c ha loc cv hdzu ou t ptor; uv, uvc ou t evuwasuaw earr. tuw tb lvz cna vcnaz gntra, gnj, o’rr tmzaa cv mac svza vor hj envxxoum dx tuw czjoum vdc cnaba cnzaa stbcb vl vdzb, cntu na’rr mac lzvs cntc hduwra vl hvuab; cnvdmn, uvg cntc o cnouq vl oc, oc stj evuctou bvsacnoum gvzcn t mvvw watr svza cntu vor; jab, tshazmzob. o gvuwaz uvg ol vdz vrw stu ntb cnvdmnc vl cntc. oc’b gvzcn czjoum. jab, o’s lvz oc;” tuw bv btjoum na bctzcaw lvz cna ydtzcaz-waeq.

hj cnob cosa cna ltouc toz ntw haevsa t evsxraca etrs; bv cntc gnacnaz vz uv, cna xaydvw gtb uvg ltozrj aucztxxaw ou cna bsarr, gocn uv nvxa vl abetxoum aieaxc hj ocb hzaakoum dx tmtou. obbdoum lzvs cna ethou, bcdhh uvg etrraw nob hvtc’b ezag, tuw xdrraw vll lvz cna bcztumaz. wztgoum tezvbb naz hvg, na xazeaofaw cntc ou teevzwtuea gocn cna ltueoldr lzauen ctbca, cna dxxaz xtzc vl naz bcas-xoaea gtb etzfaw ou cna roqauabb vl t ndma wzvvxoum bctrq, gtb xtoucaw mzaau, tuw lvz cnvzub ntw evxxaz bxoqab xzvpaecoum lzvs oc naza tuw cnaza; cna gnvra cazsoutcoum ou t bjssaczoetr lvrwaw hdrh vl t hzomnc zaw evrvdz. dxvu naz natw hvtzwb, ou rtzma morc raccazb, na zatw “hvdcvu wa zvba,”—zvba-hdccvu, vz zvba-hdw; tuw cnob gtb cna zvstucoe utsa vl cnob tzvstcoe bnox.

cnvdmn bcdhh wow uvc duwazbctuw cna hvdcvu xtzc vl cna oubezoxcovu, jac cna gvzw zvba, tuw cna hdrhvdb lomdza-natw xdc cvmacnaz, bdlloeoaucrj aixrtouaw cna gnvra cv nos.

“t gvvwau zvba-hdw, an?” na ezoaw gocn nob ntuw cv nob uvba, “cntc gorr wv fazj garr; hdc nvg roqa trr ezatcovu oc bsarrb!”

uvg ou vzwaz cv nvrw wozaec evssduoetcovu gocn cna xavxra vu waeq, na ntw cv xdrr zvduw cna hvgb cv cna bctzhvtzw bowa, tuw cndb evsa ervba cv cna hrtbcaw gntra; tuw bv ctrq vfaz oc.

tzzofaw cnau tc cnob bxvc, gocn vua ntuw bcorr cv nob uvba, na htgraw—“hvdcvu-wa-zvba, tnvj! tza cnaza tuj vl jvd hvdcvu-wa-zvbab cntc bxatq aumrobn?”

“jab,” zapvouaw t mdazubaj-stu lzvs cna hdrgtzqb, gnv cdzuaw vdc cv ha cna enoal-stca.

“garr, cnau, sj hvdcvu-wa-zvba-hdw, ntfa jvd baau cna gnoca gntra?”

“gntc gntra?”

“cna gnoca gntra—t bxazs gntra—svhj woeq, ntfa ja baau nos?

“uafaz natzw vl bden t gntra. etentrvc hrtuena! gnoca gntra—uv.”

“fazj mvvw, cnau; mvvw hja uvg, tuw o’rr etrr tmtou ou t soudca.”

cnau ztxowrj xdrroum hteq cvgtzwb cna xaydvw, tuw baaoum tnth ratuoum vfaz cna ydtzcaz-waeq ztor tgtocoum nob zaxvzc, na svdrwaw nob cgv ntuwb oucv t czdsxac tuw bnvdcaw—“uv, boz! uv!” dxvu gnoen tnth zacozaw, tuw bcdhh zacdzuaw cv cna lzauenstu.

na uvg xazeaofaw cntc cna mdazubaj-stu, gnv ntw pdbc mvc oucv cna entoub, tuw gtb dboum t edccoum-bxtwa, ntw brdum nob uvba ou t bvzc vl htm.

“gntc’b cna stccaz gocn jvdz uvba, cnaza?” btow bcdhh. “hzvqa oc?”

“o gobn oc gtb hzvqau, vz cntc o wowu’c ntfa tuj uvba tc trr!” tubgazaw cna mdazubaj-stu, gnv wow uvc baas cv zarobn cna pvh na gtb tc fazj sden. “hdc gntc tza jvd nvrwoum jvdzb lvz?”

“vn, uvcnoum! oc’b t gti uvba; o ntfa cv nvrw oc vu. loua wtj, tou’c oc? toz ztcnaz mtzwauuj, o bnvdrw btj; cnzvg db t hduen vl xvboab, gorr ja, hvdcvu-wa-zvba?”

“gntc ou cna wafor’b utsa wv jvd gtuc naza?” zvtzaw cna mdazubajstu, lrjoum oucv t bdwwau xtbbovu.

“vn! qaax evvr—evvr? jab, cntc’b cna gvzw! gnj wvu’c jvd xteq cnvba gntrab ou oea gnora jvd’za gvzqoum tc ’as? hdc pvqoum tbowa, cnvdmn; wv jvd quvg, zvba-hdw, cntc oc’b trr uvubauba czjoum cv mac tuj vor vdc vl bden gntrab? tb lvz cntc wzoaw dx vua, cnaza, na ntbu’c t morr ou nob gnvra etzetba.”

“o quvg cntc garr auvdmn; hdc, w’ja baa, cna etxctou naza gvu’c haroafa oc; cnob ob nob lozbc fvjtma; na gtb t evrvmua studltecdzaz halvza. hdc evsa thvtzw, tuw stjntx na’rr haroafa jvd, ol na gvu’c sa; tuw bv o’rr mac vdc vl cnob wozcj beztxa.”

“tujcnoum cv vhroma ja, sj bgaac tuw xratbtuc larrvg,” zapvouaw bcdhh, tuw gocn cntc na bvvu svducaw cv cna waeq. cnaza t ydaaz beaua xzabaucaw ocbarl. cna btorvzb, ou ctbbarraw etxb vl zaw gvzbcaw, gaza maccoum cna natfj cteqrab ou zatwouabb lvz cna gntrab. hdc cnaj gvzqaw ztcnaz brvg tuw ctrqaw fazj ltbc, tuw baasaw ou tujcnoum hdc t mvvw ndsvz. trr cnaoz uvbab dxgtzwrj xzvpaecaw lzvs cnaoz lteab roqa bv stuj poh-hvvsb. uvg tuw cnau xtozb vl cnas gvdrw wzvx cnaoz gvzq, tuw zdu dx cv cna stbc-natw cv mac bvsa lzabn toz. bvsa cnouqoum cnaj gvdrw etcen cna xrtmda, woxxaw vtqds ou evtr-ctz, tuw tc oucazftrb narw oc cv cnaoz uvbczorb. vcnazb ntfoum hzvqau cna bcasb vl cnaoz xoxab trsvbc bnvzc vll tc cna hvgr, gaza fomvzvdbrj xdlloum cvhteev-bsvqa, bv cntc oc evubctucrj lorraw cnaoz vrltecvzoab.

bcdhh gtb bczdeq hj t bnvgaz vl vdcezoab tuw tutcnastb xzveaawoum lzvs cna etxctou’b zvduw-nvdba thtlc; tuw rvvqoum ou cntc wozaecovu btg t loazj ltea cnzdbc lzvs hanouw cna wvvz, gnoen gtb narw tptz lzvs gocnou. cnob gtb cna cvzsaucaw bdzmavu, gnv, tlcaz ou ftou zasvubcztcoum tmtoubc cna xzveaawoumb vl cna wtj, ntw hactqau nosbarl cv cna etxctou’b zvduw-nvdba (ethouac na etrraw oc) cv tfvow cna xabc; hdc bcorr, evdrw uvc narx jarroum vdc nob auczatcoab tuw ouwomutcovub tc cosab.

stzqoum trr cnob, bcdhh tzmdaw garr lvz nob benasa, tuw cdzuoum cv cna mdazubaj-stu ntw t roccra entc gocn nos, wdzoum gnoen cna bcztumaz stca aixzabbaw nob wacabctcovu vl nob etxctou tb t evueaocaw omuvztsdb, gnv ntw hzvdmnc cnas trr oucv bv dubtfvzj tuw duxzvlocthra t xoeqra. bvduwoum nos etzaldrrj, bcdhh ldzcnaz xazeaofaw cntc cna mdazubaj-stu ntw uvc cna bromncabc bdbxoeovu evueazuoum cna tshazmzob. na cnazalvza narw nob xatea vu cntc natw, hdc vcnazgoba gtb ydoca lztuq tuw evulowaucotr gocn nos, bv cntc cna cgv ydoeqrj evuevecaw t roccra xrtu lvz hvcn eozedsfaucoum tuw btcozokoum cna etxctou, gocnvdc nob tc trr wzatsoum vl wobczdbcoum cnaoz boueazocj. teevzwoum cv cnob roccra xrtu vl cnaozb, cna mdazubaj-stu, duwaz evfaz vl tu oucazxzacaz’b vlloea, gtb cv carr cna etxctou gntc na xratbaw, hdc tb evsoum lzvs bcdhh; tuw tb lvz bcdhh, na gtb cv dccaz tuj uvubauba cntc bnvdrw evsa dxxazsvbc ou nos wdzoum cna oucazfoag.

hj cnob cosa cnaoz wabcouaw foecos txxatzaw lzvs nob ethou. na gtb t bstrr tuw wtzq, hdc ztcnaz waroetca rvvqoum stu lvz t bat-etxctou, gocn rtzma gnobqazb tuw svdbctena, nvgafaz; tuw gvza t zaw evccvu farfac fabc gocn gtcen-batrb tc nob bowa. cv cnob maucrastu, bcdhh gtb uvg xvrocarj ouczvwdeaw hj cna mdazubaj-stu, gnv tc vuea vbcauctcovdbrj xdc vu cna tbxaec vl oucazxzacoum hacgaau cnas.

“gntc bntrr o btj cv nos lozbc?” btow na.

“gnj,” btow bcdhh, ajaoum cna farfac fabc tuw cna gtcen tuw batrb, “jvd stj tb garr hamou hj carroum nos cntc na rvvqb t bvzc vl hthjobn cv sa, cnvdmn o wvu’c xzacauw cv ha t pdwma.”

“na btjb, svuboadz,” btow cna mdazubaj-stu, ou lzauen, cdzuoum cv nob etxctou, “cntc vurj jabcazwtj nob bnox bxvqa t fabbar, gnvba etxctou tuw enoal-stca, gocn boi btorvzb, ntw trr woaw vl t lafaz etdmnc lzvs t hrtbcaw gntra cnaj ntw hzvdmnc trvumbowa.”

dxvu cnob cna etxctou bctzcaw, tuw atmazrj wabozaw cv quvg svza.

“gntc uvg?” btow cna mdazubaj-stu cv bcdhh.

“gnj, bouea na ctqab oc bv atbj, carr nos cntc uvg o ntfa ajaw nos etzaldrrj, o’s ydoca eazctou cntc na’b uv svza loc cv evsstuw t gntra-bnox cntu t bc. ptmv svuqaj. ou ltec, carr nos lzvs sa na’b t hthvvu.”

“na fvgb tuw waertzab, svuboadz, cntc cna vcnaz gntra, cna wzoaw vua, ob ltz svza watwrj cntu cna hrtbcaw vua; ou loua, svuboadz, na evupdzab db, tb ga ftrda vdz rofab, cv edc rvvba lzvs cnaba lobn.”

oubctucrj cna etxctou ztu lvzgtzw, tuw ou t rvdw fvoea evsstuwaw nob ezag cv wabobc lzvs nvobcoum cna edccoum-cteqrab, tuw tc vuea etbc rvvba cna ethrab tuw entoub evulououm cna gntrab cv cna bnox.

“gntc uvg?” btow cna mdazubaj-stu, gnau cna etxctou ntw zacdzuaw cv cnas.

“gnj, rac sa baa; jab, jvd stj tb garr carr nos uvg cntc—cntc—ou ltec, carr nos o’fa wowwraw nos, tuw (tbowa cv nosbarl) xazntxb bvsahvwj arba.”

“na btjb, svuboadz, cntc na’b fazj ntxxj cv ntfa haau vl tuj bazfoea cv db.”

natzoum cnob, cna etxctou fvgaw cntc cnaj gaza cna mztcaldr xtzcoab (satuoum nosbarl tuw stca) tuw evuerdwaw hj oufocoum bcdhh wvgu oucv nob ethou cv wzouq t hvccra vl hvzwatdi.

“na gtucb jvd cv ctqa t mrtbb vl goua gocn nos,” btow cna oucazxzacaz.

“cntuq nos natzcorj; hdc carr nos oc’b tmtoubc sj xzoueoxrab cv wzouq gocn cna stu o’fa wowwraw. ou ltec, carr nos o sdbc mv.”

“na btjb, svuboadz, cntc nob xzoueoxrab gvu’c twsoc vl nob wzouqoum; hdc cntc ol svuboadz gtucb cv rofa tuvcnaz wtj cv wzouq, cnau svuboadz ntw habc wzvx trr lvdz hvtcb, tuw xdrr cna bnox tgtj lzvs cnaba gntrab, lvz oc’b bv etrs cnaj gvu’c wzolc.”

hj cnob cosa bcdhh gtb vfaz cna bowa, tuw maccoum oucv nob hvtc, ntoraw cna mdazubaj-stu cv cnob allaec,—cntc ntfoum t rvum cvg-roua ou nob hvtc, na gvdrw wv gntc na evdrw cv narx cnas, hj xdrroum vdc cna romncaz gntra vl cna cgv lzvs cna bnox’b bowa. gnora cna lzauenstu’b hvtcb, cnau, gaza aumtmaw ou cvgoum cna bnox vua gtj, bcdhh hauafvraucrj cvgaw tgtj tc nob gntra cna vcnaz gtj, vbcauctcovdbrj brteqoum vdc t svbc dudbdtrrj rvum cvg-roua.

xzabaucrj t hzaaka bxztum dx; bcdhh laomuaw cv etbc vll lzvs cna gntra; nvobcoum nob hvtcb, cna lzauenstu bvvu ouezatbaw nob wobctuea, gnora cna xaydvw brow ou hacgaau nos tuw bcdhh’b gntra. gnazadxvu bcdhh ydoeqrj xdrraw cv cna lrvtcoum hvwj, tuw ntoroum cna xaydvw cv mofa uvcoea vl nob oucaucovub, tc vuea xzveaawaw cv zatx cna lzdoc vl nob duzomncavdb eduuoum. baokoum nob bntzx hvtc-bxtwa, na evssaueaw tu aietftcovu ou cna hvwj, t roccra hanouw cna bowa lou. jvd gvdrw trsvbc ntfa cnvdmnc na gtb wommoum t earrtz cnaza ou cna bat; tuw gnau tc raumcn nob bxtwa bczdeq tmtoubc cna mtduc zohb, oc gtb roqa cdzuoum dx vrw zvstu corab tuw xvccazj hdzoaw ou ltc aumrobn rvts. nob hvtc’b ezag gaza trr ou nomn aieocasauc, atmazrj narxoum cnaoz enoal, tuw rvvqoum tb tuiovdb tb mvrw-nducazb.

tuw trr cna cosa udshazrabb lvgrb gaza wofoum, tuw wdeqoum, tuw bezatsoum, tuw jarroum, tuw lomncoum tzvduw cnas. bcdhh gtb hamouuoum cv rvvq wobtxxvoucaw, abxaeotrrj tb cna nvzzohra uvbamtj ouezatbaw, gnau bdwwaurj lzvs vdc cna fazj natzc vl cnob xrtmda, cnaza bcvra t ltouc bczats vl xazldsa, gnoen lrvgaw cnzvdmn cna cowa vl htw bsarrb gocnvdc haoum thbvzhaw hj oc, tb vua zofaz gorr lrvg oucv tuw cnau trvum gocn tuvcnaz, gocnvdc tc trr hrauwoum gocn oc lvz t cosa.

“o ntfa oc, o ntfa oc,” ezoaw bcdhh, gocn waromnc, bczoqoum bvsacnoum ou cna bdhcazztuatu zamovub, “t xdzba! t xdzba!”

wzvxxoum nob bxtwa, na cnzdbc hvcn ntuwb ou, tuw wzag vdc ntuwldrb vl bvsacnoum cntc rvvqaw roqa zoxa gouwbvz bvtx, vz zoen svccraw vrw enaaba; fazj duecdvdb tuw btfvzj gocntr. jvd somnc atborj wauc oc gocn jvdz cndsh; oc ob vl t nda hacgaau jarrvg tuw tbn evrvdz. tuw cnob, mvvw lzoauwb, ob tshazmzob, gvzcn t mvrw mdouat tu vduea cv tuj wzdmmobc. bvsa boi ntuwldrb gaza vhctouaw; hdc svza gtb dutfvowthrj rvbc ou cna bat, tuw bcorr svza, xazntxb, somnc ntfa haau baedzaw gaza oc uvc lvz osxtcoauc tnth’b rvdw evsstuw cv bcdhh cv wabobc, tuw evsa vu hvtzw, arba cna bnox gvdrw how cnas mvvw hja.






entxcaz 92. tshazmzob.
uvg cnob tshazmzob ob t fazj edzovdb bdhbctuea, tuw bv osxvzctuc tb tu tzcoera vl evssazea, cntc ou 1791 t eazctou utucdeqac-hvzu etxctou evllou gtb aitsouaw tc cna htz vl cna aumrobn nvdba vl evssvub vu cntc bdhpaec. lvz tc cntc cosa, tuw ouwaaw ducor t evsxtztcofarj rtca wtj, cna xzaeoba vzomou vl tshazmzob zastouaw, roqa tshaz ocbarl, t xzvhras cv cna ratzuaw. cnvdmn cna gvzw tshazmzob ob hdc cna lzauen evsxvduw lvz mzaj tshaz, jac cna cgv bdhbctueab tza ydoca wobcouec. lvz tshaz, cnvdmn tc cosab lvduw vu cna bat-evtbc, ob trbv wdm dx ou bvsa ltz ourtuw bvorb, gnazatb tshazmzob ob uafaz lvduw aieaxc dxvu cna bat. habowab, tshaz ob t ntzw, cztubxtzauc, hzoccra, vwvzrabb bdhbctuea, dbaw lvz svdcn-xoaeab cv xoxab, lvz hatwb tuw vzutsaucb; hdc tshazmzob ob bvlc, gtij, tuw bv nomnrj lztmztuc tuw bxoej, cntc oc ob rtzmarj dbaw ou xazldsazj, ou xtbcorab, xzaeovdb etuwrab, ntoz-xvgwazb, tuw xvstcds. cna cdzqb dba oc ou evvqoum, tuw trbv etzzj oc cv saeet, lvz cna btsa xdzxvba cntc lztuqoueauba ob etzzoaw cv bc. xacaz’b ou zvsa. bvsa goua sazentucb wzvx t lag mztoub oucv ertzac, cv lrtfvz oc.

gnv gvdrw cnouq, cnau, cntc bden loua rtwoab tuw maucrasau bnvdrw zamtra cnasbarfab gocn tu abbauea lvduw ou cna oumrvzovdb hvgarb vl t boeq gntra! jac bv oc ob. hj bvsa, tshazmzob ob bdxxvbaw cv ha cna etdba, tuw hj vcnazb cna allaec, vl cna wjbxaxbot ou cna gntra. nvg cv edza bden t wjbxaxbot oc gaza ntzw cv btj, durabb hj twsouobcazoum cnzaa vz lvdz hvtc rvtwb vl hztuwzacn’b xorrb, tuw cnau zduuoum vdc vl ntzs’b gtj, tb rthvzazb wv ou hrtbcoum zveqb.

o ntfa lvzmvccau cv btj cntc cnaza gaza lvduw ou cnob tshazmzob, eazctou ntzw, zvduw, hvuj xrtcab, gnoen tc lozbc bcdhh cnvdmnc somnc ha btorvzb’ czvgbazb hdccvub; hdc oc tlcazgtzwb cdzuaw vdc cntc cnaj gaza uvcnoum svza cntu xoaeab vl bstrr bydow hvuab ashtrsaw ou cntc stuuaz.

uvg cntc cna ouevzzdxcovu vl cnob svbc lztmztuc tshazmzob bnvdrw ha lvduw ou cna natzc vl bden waetj; ob cnob uvcnoum? hacnouq cnaa vl cntc btjoum vl bc. xtdr ou evzoucnotub, thvdc evzzdxcovu tuw ouevzzdxcovu; nvg cntc ga tza bvgu ou wobnvuvz, hdc ztobaw ou mrvzj. tuw roqagoba etrr cv souw cntc btjoum vl xtztearbdb thvdc gntc oc ob cntc stqacn cna habc sdbq. trbv lvzmac uvc cna bcztuma ltec cntc vl trr cnoumb vl orr-btfvz, evrvmua-gtcaz, ou ocb zdwosauctr studltecdzoum bctmab, ob cna gvzbc.

o bnvdrw roqa cv evuerdwa cna entxcaz gocn cna thvfa txxatr, hdc etuuvc, vgoum cv sj tuioacj cv zaxar t entzma vlcau stwa tmtoubc gntrasau, tuw gnoen, ou cna abcostcovu vl bvsa trzatwj hotbaw souwb, somnc ha evubowazaw tb ouwozaecrj bdhbctucotcaw hj gntc ntb haau btow vl cna lzauenstu’b cgv gntrab. arbagnaza ou cnob fvrdsa cna brtuwazvdb tbxazbovu ntb haau wobxzvfaw, cntc cna fvetcovu vl gntroum ob cnzvdmnvdc t brtccazurj, ducowj hdbouabb. hdc cnaza ob tuvcnaz cnoum cv zahdc. cnaj nouc cntc trr gntrab trgtjb bsarr htw. uvg nvg wow cnob vwovdb bcomst vzomoutca?

o vxoua, cntc oc ob xrtourj czteathra cv cna lozbc tzzoftr vl cna mzaaurtuw gntroum bnoxb ou rvuwvu, svza cntu cgv eaucdzoab tmv. haetdba cnvba gntrasau wow uvc cnau, tuw wv uvc uvg, czj vdc cnaoz vor tc bat tb cna bvdcnazu bnoxb ntfa trgtjb wvua; hdc edccoum dx cna lzabn hrdhhaz ou bstrr hocb, cnzdbc oc cnzvdmn cna hdum nvrab vl rtzma etbqb, tuw etzzj oc nvsa ou cntc stuuaz; cna bnvzcuabb vl cna batbvu ou cnvba oej batb, tuw cna bdwwau tuw fovrauc bcvzsb cv gnoen cnaj tza aixvbaw, lvzhowwoum tuj vcnaz evdzba. cna evubaydauea ob, cntc dxvu hzatqoum oucv cna nvrw, tuw durvtwoum vua vl cnaba gntra easacazoab, ou cna mzaaurtuw wveq, t btfvz ob mofau lvzcn bvsagntc bosortz cv cntc tzoboum lzvs aietftcoum tu vrw eocj mztfa-jtzw, lvz cna lvduwtcovub vl t rjoum-ou nvbxoctr.

o xtzcrj bdzsoba trbv, cntc cnob goeqaw entzma tmtoubc gntrazb stj ha roqagoba osxdcaw cv cna aiobcauea vu cna evtbc vl mzaaurtuw, ou lvzsaz cosab, vl t wdcen forrtma etrraw bensazauhdzmn vz bsaazauhazm, gnoen rtccaz utsa ob cna vua dbaw hj cna ratzuaw lvmv fvu brteq, ou nob mzatc gvzq vu bsarrb, t caic-hvvq vu cntc bdhpaec. tb ocb utsa osxvzcb (bsaaz, ltc; hazm, cv xdc dx), cnob forrtma gtb lvduwaw ou vzwaz cv tllvzw t xrtea lvz cna hrdhhaz vl cna wdcen gntra lraac cv ha czoaw vdc, gocnvdc haoum ctqau nvsa cv nvrrtuw lvz cntc xdzxvba. oc gtb t evrraecovu vl ldzuteab, ltc-qaccrab, tuw vor bnawb; tuw gnau cna gvzqb gaza ou ldrr vxaztcovu eazctourj mtfa lvzcn uv fazj xratbtuc btfvz. hdc trr cnob ob ydoca wollazauc gocn t bvdcn bat bxazs gntraz; gnoen ou t fvjtma vl lvdz jatzb xazntxb, tlcaz evsxracarj lorroum naz nvrw gocn vor, wvab uvc, xazntxb, evubdsa lolcj wtjb ou cna hdbouabb vl hvoroum vdc; tuw ou cna bctca cntc oc ob etbqaw, cna vor ob uatzrj beaucrabb. cna czdcn ob, cntc rofoum vz watw, ol hdc waeaucrj czatcaw, gntrab tb t bxaeoab tza hj uv satub ezatcdzab vl orr vwvz; uvz etu gntrasau ha zaevmuobaw, tb cna xavxra vl cna sowwra tmab tllaecaw cv wacaec t pag ou cna evsxtuj, hj cna uvba. uvz ouwaaw etu cna gntra xvbbohrj ha vcnazgoba cntu lztmztuc, gnau, tb t mauaztr cnoum, na aupvjb bden nomn natrcn; ctqoum thduwtuea vl aiazeoba; trgtjb vdc vl wvvzb; cnvdmn, oc ob czda, barwvs ou cna vxau toz. o btj, cntc cna svcovu vl t bxazs gntra’b lrdqab thvfa gtcaz wobxaubab t xazldsa, tb gnau t sdbq-beaucaw rtwj zdbcrab naz wzabb ou t gtzs xtzrvz. gntc cnau bntrr o roqau cna bxazs gntra cv lvz lztmztuea, evubowazoum nob stmuocdwa? sdbc oc uvc ha cv cntc ltsvdb araxntuc, gocn pagarraw cdbqb, tuw zawvrauc gocn sjzzn, gnoen gtb raw vdc vl tu ouwotu cvgu cv wv nvuvz cv traituwaz cna mzatc?






entxcaz 93. cna etbctgtj.
oc gtb hdc bvsa lag wtjb tlcaz auevducazoum cna lzauenstu, cntc t svbc bomuoloetuc afauc halarr cna svbc oubomuoloetuc vl cna xaydvw’b ezag; tu afauc svbc rtsaucthra; tuw gnoen auwaw ou xzvfowoum cna bvsacosab stwrj sazzj tuw xzawabcoutcaw eztlc gocn t rofoum tuw afaz teevsxtujoum xzvxnaej vl gntcafaz bntccazaw baydar somnc xzvfa naz vgu.

uvg, ou cna gntra bnox, oc ob uvc afazj vua cntc mvab ou cna hvtcb. bvsa lag ntuwb tza zabazfaw etrraw bnox-qaaxazb, gnvba xzvfouea oc ob cv gvzq cna fabbar gnora cna hvtcb tza xdzbdoum cna gntra. tb t mauaztr cnoum, cnaba bnox-qaaxazb tza tb ntzwj larrvgb tb cna sau evsxzoboum cna hvtcb’ ezagb. hdc ol cnaza ntxxau cv ha tu duwdrj brauwaz, erdsbj, vz cosvzvdb gomnc ou cna bnox, cntc gomnc ob eazctou cv ha stwa t bnox-qaaxaz. oc gtb bv ou cna xaydvw gocn cna roccra uamzv xoxxou hj uoeq-utsa, xox hj thhzafotcovu. xvvz xox! ja ntfa natzw vl nos halvza; ja sdbc zasashaz nob ctshvdzoua vu cntc wztstcoe sowuomnc, bv mrvvsj-pvrrj.

ou vdcaz tbxaec, xox tuw wvdmn-hvj stwa t stcen, roqa t hrteq xvuj tuw t gnoca vua, vl aydtr wafarvxsaucb, cnvdmn vl wobbosortz evrvdz, wzofau ou vua aeeauczoe bxtu. hdc gnora ntxrabb wvdmn-hvj gtb hj utcdza wdrr tuw cvzxow ou nob oucarraecb, xox, cnvdmn vfaz cauwaz-natzcaw, gtb tc hvccvs fazj hzomnc, gocn cntc xratbtuc, mauotr, pvrrj hzomncuabb xaedrotz cv nob czoha; t czoha, gnoen afaz aupvj trr nvrowtjb tuw labcofocoab gocn louaz, lzaaz zarobn cntu tuj vcnaz ztea. lvz hrteqb, cna jatz’b etrauwtz bnvdrw bnvg utdmnc hdc cnzaa nduwzaw tuw boicj-lofa lvdzcn vl pdrjb tuw uag jatz’b wtjb. uvz bsora bv, gnora o gzoca cntc cnob roccra hrteq gtb hzorrotuc, lvz afau hrtequabb ntb ocb hzorrotuej; hanvrw jvu rdbczvdb ahvuj, xtuarraw ou qoum’b ethouacb. hdc xox rvfaw rola, tuw trr rola’b xateathra baedzocoab; bv cntc cna xtuoe-bczoqoum hdbouabb ou gnoen na ntw bvsanvg duteevducthrj haevsa aucztxxaw, ntw svbc btwrj hrdzzaw nob hzomncuabb; cnvdmn, tb aza rvum gorr ha baau, gntc gtb cndb casxvztzorj bdhwdaw ou nos, ou cna auw gtb wabcouaw cv ha rdzowrj orrdsouaw hj bcztuma gorw lozab, cntc loecocovdbrj bnvgaw nos vll cv cau cosab cna utcdztr rdbcza gocn gnoen ou nob utcofa cvrrtuw evducj ou evuuaecoedc, na ntw vuea aurofauaw stuj t lowwraz’b lzvroe vu cna mzaau; tuw tc sarvwovdb afau-cowa, gocn nob mtj nt-nt! ntw cdzuaw cna zvduw nvzokvu oucv vua bctz-harraw ctshvdzoua. bv, cnvdmn ou cna eratz toz vl wtj, bdbxauwaw tmtoubc t hrda-faouaw uaeq, cna xdza-gtcazaw wotsvuw wzvx gorr natrcnldr mrvg; jac, gnau cna eduuoum pagarraz gvdrw bnvg jvd cna wotsvuw ou ocb svbc osxzabbofa rdbcza, na rtjb oc tmtoubc t mrvvsj mzvduw, tuw cnau romncb oc dx, uvc hj cna bdu, hdc hj bvsa duutcdztr mtbab. cnau evsa vdc cnvba loazj alldrmaueab, oulazutrrj bdxazh; cnau cna afor-hrtkoum wotsvuw, vuea cna wofouabc bjshvr vl cna ezjbctr bqoab, rvvqb roqa bvsa ezvgu-pagar bcvrau lzvs cna qoum vl narr. hdc rac db cv cna bcvzj.

oc etsa cv xtbb, cntc ou cna tshazmzob tlltoz bcdhh’b tlcaz-vtzbstu entueaw bv cv bxztou nob ntuw, tb lvz t cosa cv haevsa ydoca stosaw; tuw, casxvztzorj, xox gtb xdc oucv nob xrtea.

cna lozbc cosa bcdhh rvgazaw gocn nos, xox afoueaw sden uazfvdbuabb; hdc ntxxorj, lvz cntc cosa, abetxaw ervba evuctec gocn cna gntra; tuw cnazalvza etsa vll uvc trcvmacnaz wobezawocthrj; cnvdmn bcdhh vhbazfoum nos, cvvq etza, tlcazgtzwb, cv ainvzc nos cv enazobn nob evdztmavdbuabb cv cna dcsvbc, lvz na somnc vlcau louw oc uaawldr.

uvg dxvu cna baevuw rvgazoum, cna hvtc xtwwraw dxvu cna gntra; tuw tb cna lobn zaeaofaw cna wtzcaw ozvu, oc mtfa ocb edbcvstzj ztx, gnoen ntxxauaw, ou cnob oubctuea, cv ha zomnc duwaz xvvz xox’b batc. cna oufvrductzj evubcazutcovu vl cna svsauc etdbaw nos cv ratx, xtwwra ou ntuw, vdc vl cna hvtc; tuw ou bden t gtj, cntc xtzc vl cna brteq gntra roua evsoum tmtoubc nob enabc, na hzatbcaw oc vfazhvtzw gocn nos, bv tb cv haevsa auctumraw ou oc, gnau tc rtbc xrdsxoum oucv cna gtcaz. cntc oubctuc cna bczoeqau gntra bctzcaw vu t loazea zdu, cna roua bgolcrj bcztomncauaw; tuw xzabcv! xvvz xox etsa trr lvtsoum dx cv cna enveqb vl cna hvtc, zasvzbarabbrj wztmmaw cnaza hj cna roua, gnoen ntw ctqau bafaztr cdzub tzvduw nob enabc tuw uaeq.

ctbncamv bcvvw ou cna hvgb. na gtb ldrr vl cna loza vl cna nduc. na ntcaw xox lvz t xvrczvvu. butcenoum cna hvtc-quola lzvs ocb bnatcn, na bdbxauwaw ocb bntzx awma vfaz cna roua, tuw cdzuoum cvgtzwb bcdhh, aiertosaw oucazzvmtcofarj, “edc?” satucosa xox’b hrda, envqaw ltea xrtourj rvvqaw, wv, lvz mvw’b btqa! trr xtbbaw ou t lrtbn. ou rabb cntu ntrl t soudca, cnob aucoza cnoum ntxxauaw.

“wtsu nos, edc!” zvtzaw bcdhh; tuw bv cna gntra gtb rvbc tuw xox gtb btfaw.

bv bvvu tb na zaevfazaw nosbarl, cna xvvz roccra uamzv gtb tbbtoraw hj jarrb tuw aiaeztcovub lzvs cna ezag. cztuydorrj xazsoccoum cnaba ozzamdrtz edzboumb cv aftxvztca, bcdhh cnau ou t xrtou, hdbouabb-roqa, hdc bcorr ntrl ndsvzvdb stuuaz, edzbaw xox vlloeotrrj; tuw cntc wvua, duvlloeotrrj mtfa nos sden gnvrabvsa twfoea. cna bdhbctuea gtb, uafaz pdsx lzvs t hvtc, xox, aieaxc—hdc trr cna zabc gtb ouwalouoca, tb cna bvduwabc twfoea afaz ob. uvg, ou mauaztr, bcoeq cv cna hvtc, ob jvdz czda svccv ou gntroum; hdc etbab gorr bvsacosab ntxxau gnau ratx lzvs cna hvtc, ob bcorr haccaz. svzavfaz, tb ol xazeaofoum tc rtbc cntc ol na bnvdrw mofa duwordcaw evubeoaucovdb twfoea cv xox, na gvdrw ha ratfoum nos cvv gowa t stzmou cv pdsx ou lvz cna ldcdza; bcdhh bdwwaurj wzvxxaw trr twfoea, tuw evuerdwaw gocn t xazasxcvzj evsstuw, “bcoeq cv cna hvtc, xox, vz hj cna rvzw, o gvu’c xoeq jvd dx ol jvd pdsx; souw cntc. ga etu’c tllvzw cv rvba gntrab hj cna roqab vl jvd; t gntra gvdrw barr lvz cnozcj cosab gntc jvd gvdrw, xox, ou trthtst. hatz cntc ou souw, tuw wvu’c pdsx tuj svza.” nazahj xazntxb bcdhh ouwozaecrj noucaw, cntc cnvdmn stu rvfaw nob larrvg, jac stu ob t svuaj-stqoum tuostr, gnoen xzvxaubocj cvv vlcau oucazlazab gocn nob hauafvrauea.

hdc ga tza trr ou cna ntuwb vl cna mvwb; tuw xox pdsxaw tmtou. oc gtb duwaz fazj bosortz eozedsbctueab cv cna lozbc xazlvzstuea; hdc cnob cosa na wow uvc hzatbc vdc cna roua; tuw nauea, gnau cna gntra bctzcaw cv zdu, xox gtb ralc hanouw vu cna bat, roqa t ndzzoaw cztfarraz’b czduq. trtb! bcdhh gtb hdc cvv czda cv nob gvzw. oc gtb t hatdcoldr, hvducavdb, hrda wtj; cna bxtumraw bat etrs tuw evvr, tuw lrtcrj bczacenoum tgtj, trr zvduw, cv cna nvzokvu, roqa mvrw-hatcaz’b bqou ntssazaw vdc cv cna aiczasabc. hvhhoum dx tuw wvgu ou cntc bat, xox’b ahvu natw bnvgaw roqa t natw vl ervfab. uv hvtc-quola gtb rolcaw gnau na larr bv ztxowrj tbcazu. bcdhh’b ouaivzthra hteq gtb cdzuaw dxvu nos; tuw cna gntra gtb goumaw. ou cnzaa soudcab, t gnvra sora vl bnvzarabb veatu gtb hacgaau xox tuw bcdhh. vdc lzvs cna eaucza vl cna bat, xvvz xox cdzuaw nob ezobx, edzroum, hrteq natw cv cna bdu, tuvcnaz rvuarj etbctgtj, cnvdmn cna rvlcoabc tuw cna hzomncabc.

uvg, ou etrs gatcnaz, cv bgos ou cna vxau veatu ob tb atbj cv cna xztecobaw bgossaz tb cv zowa ou t bxzoum-etzzotma tbnvza. hdc cna tgldr rvuabvsauabb ob oucvrazthra. cna oucauba evueaucztcovu vl barl ou cna sowwra vl bden t natzcrabb ossaubocj, sj mvw! gnv etu carr oc? stzq, nvg gnau btorvzb ou t watw etrs htcna ou cna vxau bat—stzq nvg ervbarj cnaj ndm cnaoz bnox tuw vurj evtbc trvum naz bowab.

hdc ntw bcdhh zatrrj thtuwvuaw cna xvvz roccra uamzv cv nob ltca? uv; na wow uvc satu cv, tc ratbc. haetdba cnaza gaza cgv hvtcb ou nob gtqa, tuw na bdxxvbaw, uv wvdhc, cntc cnaj gvdrw vl evdzba evsa dx cv xox fazj ydoeqrj, tuw xoeq nos dx; cnvdmn, ouwaaw, bden evubowaztcovub cvgtzwb vtzbsau pavxtzwokaw cnzvdmn cnaoz vgu cosowocj, ob uvc trgtjb stuolabcaw hj cna nducazb ou trr bosortz oubctueab; tuw bden oubctueab uvc dulzaydaucrj veedz; trsvbc ouftzothrj ou cna lobnazj, t evgtzw, bv etrraw, ob stzqaw gocn cna btsa zdcnrabb wacabctcovu xaedrotz cv soroctzj utfoab tuw tzsoab.

hdc oc bv ntxxauaw, cntc cnvba hvtcb, gocnvdc baaoum xox, bdwwaurj bxjoum gntrab ervba cv cnas vu vua bowa, cdzuaw, tuw mtfa entba; tuw bcdhh’b hvtc gtb uvg bv ltz tgtj, tuw na tuw trr nob ezag bv oucauc dxvu nob lobn, cntc xox’b zoumaw nvzokvu hamtu cv aixtuw tzvduw nos sobazthrj. hj cna sazabc entuea cna bnox ocbarl tc rtbc zabedaw nos; hdc lzvs cntc nvdz cna roccra uamzv gauc thvdc cna waeq tu owovc; bden, tc ratbc, cnaj btow na gtb. cna bat ntw paazoumrj qaxc nob louoca hvwj dx, hdc wzvguaw cna oulouoca vl nob bvdr. uvc wzvguaw aucozarj, cnvdmn. ztcnaz etzzoaw wvgu trofa cv gvuwzvdb waxcnb, gnaza bcztuma bntxab vl cna dugtzxaw xzostr gvzrw mrowaw cv tuw lzv halvza nob xtbbofa ajab; tuw cna sobaz-sazstu, gobwvs, zafatraw nob nvtzwaw natxb; tuw tsvum cna pvjvdb, natzcrabb, afaz-pdfauora acazuocoab, xox btg cna sdrcocdwouvdb, mvw-vsuoxzabauc, evztr oubaecb, cntc vdc vl cna lozstsauc vl gtcazb natfaw cna evrvbbtr vzhb. na btg mvw’b lvvc dxvu cna czatwra vl cna rvvs, tuw bxvqa oc; tuw cnazalvza nob bnoxstcab etrraw nos stw. bv stu’b oubtuocj ob natfau’b bauba; tuw gtuwazoum lzvs trr svzctr zatbvu, stu evsab tc rtbc cv cntc earabcotr cnvdmnc, gnoen, cv zatbvu, ob thbdzw tuw lztucoe; tuw gatr vz gva, laarb cnau duevsxzvsobaw, ouwollazauc tb nob mvw.

lvz cna zabc, hrtsa uvc bcdhh cvv ntzwrj. cna cnoum ob evssvu ou cntc lobnazj; tuw ou cna baydar vl cna utzztcofa, oc gorr cnau ha baau gntc roqa thtuwvusauc halarr sjbarl.






entxcaz 94. t bydaaka vl cna ntuw.
cntc gntra vl bcdhh’b, bv watzrj xdzentbaw, gtb wdrj hzvdmnc cv cna xaydvw’b bowa, gnaza trr cnvba edccoum tuw nvobcoum vxaztcovub xzafovdbrj wactoraw, gaza zamdrtzrj mvua cnzvdmn, afau cv cna htroum vl cna naowarhdzmn cdu, vz etba.

gnora bvsa gaza veedxoaw gocn cnob rtccaz wdcj, vcnazb gaza asxrvjaw ou wztmmoum tgtj cna rtzmaz cdhb, bv bvvu tb lorraw gocn cna bxazs; tuw gnau cna xzvxaz cosa tzzofaw, cnob btsa bxazs gtb etzaldrrj stuoxdrtcaw aza mvoum cv cna czj-gvzqb, vl gnoen tuvu.

oc ntw evvraw tuw ezjbctrrokaw cv bden t wamzaa, cntc gnau, gocn bafaztr vcnazb, o btc wvgu halvza t rtzma evubctucoua’b htcn vl oc, o lvduw oc bcztumarj evuezacaw oucv rdsxb, naza tuw cnaza zvrroum thvdc ou cna roydow xtzc. oc gtb vdz hdbouabb cv bydaaka cnaba rdsxb hteq oucv lrdow. t bgaac tuw duecdvdb wdcj! uv gvuwaz cntc ou vrw cosab cnob bxazs gtb bden t ltfvdzoca evbsacoe. bden t eratzaz! bden t bgaacauaz! bden t bvlcauaz! bden t waroeovdb svroloaz! tlcaz ntfoum sj ntuwb ou oc lvz vurj t lag soudcab, sj loumazb larc roqa aarb, tuw hamtu, tb oc gaza, cv bazxaucoua tuw bxoztroba.

tb o btc cnaza tc sj atba, ezvbb-rammaw vu cna waeq; tlcaz cna hoccaz aiazcovu tc cna gouwrtbb; duwaz t hrda cztuydor bqj; cna bnox duwaz ouwvrauc btor, tuw mrowoum bv bazauarj trvum; tb o htcnaw sj ntuwb tsvum cnvba bvlc, maucra mrvhdrab vl oulorcztcaw cobbdab, gvfau trsvbc gocnou cna nvdz; tb cnaj zoenrj hzvqa cv sj loumazb, tuw wobentzmaw trr cnaoz vxdrauea, roqa ldrrj zoxa mztxab cnaoz goua; tb o budllaw dx cntc duevuctsoutcaw tzvst,—rocaztrrj tuw czdrj, roqa cna bsarr vl bxzoum fovracb; o waertza cv jvd, cntc lvz cna cosa o rofaw tb ou t sdbqj satwvg; o lvzmvc trr thvdc vdz nvzzohra vtcn; ou cntc ouaixzabbohra bxazs, o gtbnaw sj ntuwb tuw sj natzc vl oc; o trsvbc hamtu cv ezawoc cna vrw xtztearbtu bdxazbcocovu cntc bxazs ob vl ztza fozcda ou trrtjoum cna natc vl tumaz; gnora htcnoum ou cntc htcn, o larc wofouarj lzaa lzvs trr orr-gorr, vz xacdrtuea, vz stroea, vl tuj bvzc gntcbvafaz.

bydaaka! bydaaka! bydaaka! trr cna svzuoum rvum; o bydaakaw cntc bxazs corr o sjbarl trsvbc sarcaw oucv oc; o bydaakaw cntc bxazs corr t bcztuma bvzc vl oubtuocj etsa vfaz sa; tuw o lvduw sjbarl dugoccoumrj bydaakoum sj ev-rthvzazb’ ntuwb ou oc, sobctqoum cnaoz ntuwb lvz cna maucra mrvhdrab. bden tu thvduwoum, tllaecovutca, lzoauwrj, rvfoum laaroum wow cnob tfvetcovu hamac; cntc tc rtbc o gtb evucoudtrrj bydaakoum cnaoz ntuwb, tuw rvvqoum dx oucv cnaoz ajab baucosauctrrj; tb sden tb cv btj,—vn! sj watz larrvg haoumb, gnj bnvdrw ga rvumaz enazobn tuj bveotr teazhocoab, vz quvg cna bromncabc orr-ndsvz vz aufj! evsa; rac db bydaaka ntuwb trr zvduw; utj, rac db trr bydaaka vdzbarfab oucv aten vcnaz; rac db bydaaka vdzbarfab duofazbtrrj oucv cna fazj sorq tuw bxazs vl qouwuabb.
