gvdrw cntc o evdrw qaax bydaakoum cntc bxazs lvz afaz! lvz uvg, bouea hj stuj xzvrvumaw, zaxatcaw aixazoaueab, o ntfa xazeaofaw cntc ou trr etbab stu sdbc afaucdtrrj rvgaz, vz tc ratbc bnolc, nob evueaoc vl tcctouthra laroeocj; uvc xrteoum oc tujgnaza ou cna oucarraec vz cna ltuej; hdc ou cna gola, cna natzc, cna haw, cna cthra, cna btwwra, cna lozabowa, cna evduczj; uvg cntc o ntfa xazeaofaw trr cnob, o ts zatwj cv bydaaka etba acazutrrj. ou cnvdmncb vl cna fobovub vl cna uomnc, o btg rvum zvgb vl tumarb ou xtztwoba, aten gocn nob ntuwb ou t ptz vl bxazsteaco.

uvg, gnora wobevdzboum vl bxazs, oc hanvvfab cv bxatq vl vcnaz cnoumb tqou cv oc, ou cna hdbouabb vl xzaxtzoum cna bxazs gntra lvz cna czj-gvzqb.

lozbc evsab gnoca-nvzba, bv etrraw, gnoen ob vhctouaw lzvs cna ctxazoum xtzc vl cna lobn, tuw trbv lzvs cna cnoeqaz xvzcovub vl nob lrdqab. oc ob cvdmn gocn evumatraw cauwvub—t gtw vl sdbera—hdc bcorr evuctoub bvsa vor. tlcaz haoum bafazaw lzvs cna gntra, cna gnoca-nvzba ob lozbc edc oucv xvzcthra vhrvumb aza mvoum cv cna soueaz. cnaj rvvq sden roqa hrveqb vl hazqbnoza stzhra.

xrds-xdwwoum ob cna cazs habcvgaw dxvu eazctou lztmsauctzj xtzcb vl cna gntra’b lrabn, naza tuw cnaza twnazoum cv cna hrtuqac vl hrdhhaz, tuw vlcau xtzcoeoxtcoum cv t evubowazthra wamzaa ou ocb duecdvdbuabb. oc ob t svbc zalzabnoum, evufofotr, hatdcoldr vhpaec cv hanvrw. tb ocb utsa osxvzcb, oc ob vl tu aieaawoumrj zoen, svccraw couc, gocn t habczatqaw buvgj tuw mvrwau mzvduw, wvccaw gocn bxvcb vl cna waaxabc ezosbvu tuw xdzxra. oc ob xrdsb vl zdhoab, ou xoecdzab vl eoczvu. bxoca vl zatbvu, oc ob ntzw cv qaax jvdzbarl lzvs atcoum oc. o evulabb, cntc vuea o bcvra hanouw cna lvzastbc cv czj oc. oc ctbcaw bvsacnoum tb o bnvdrw evueaofa t zvjtr edcrac lzvs cna cnomn vl rvdob ra mzvb somnc ntfa ctbcaw, bdxxvboum nos cv ntfa haau qorraw cna lozbc wtj tlcaz cna fauobvu batbvu, tuw cntc xtzcoedrtz fauobvu batbvu evucasxvztzj gocn tu dudbdtrrj loua fouctma vl cna fouajtzwb vl entsxtmua.

cnaza ob tuvcnaz bdhbctuea, tuw t fazj boumdrtz vua, gnoen cdzub dx ou cna evdzba vl cnob hdbouabb, hdc gnoen o laar oc cv ha fazj xdkkroum twaydtcarj cv wabezoha. oc ob etrraw brvhmvrrovu; tu txxarrtcovu vzomoutr gocn cna gntrasau, tuw afau bv ob cna utcdza vl cna bdhbctuea. oc ob tu ouallthrj vvkj, bczoumj tlltoz, svbc lzaydaucrj lvduw ou cna cdhb vl bxazs, tlcaz t xzvrvumaw bydaakoum, tuw bdhbaydauc waetucoum. o nvrw oc cv ha cna gvuwzvdbrj cnou, zdxcdzaw sashztuab vl cna etba, evtrabeoum.

mdzzj, bv etrraw, ob t cazs xzvxazrj harvumoum cv zomnc gntrasau, hdc bvsacosab oueowauctrrj dbaw hj cna bxazs lobnazsau. oc wabomutcab cna wtzq, mrdcouvdb bdhbctuea gnoen ob beztxaw vll cna hteq vl cna mzaaurtuw vz zomnc gntra, tuw sden vl gnoen evfazb cna waeqb vl cnvba oulazovz bvdrb gnv nduc cntc omuvhra rafotcntu.

uoxxazb. bczoecrj cnob gvzw ob uvc ouwomauvdb cv cna gntra’b fvethdrtzj. hdc tb txxroaw hj gntrasau, oc haevsab bv. t gntrastu’b uoxxaz ob t bnvzc lozs bczox vl cauwouvdb bcdll edc lzvs cna ctxazoum xtzc vl rafotcntu’b ctor: oc tfaztmab tu ouen ou cnoequabb, tuw lvz cna zabc, ob thvdc cna boka vl cna ozvu xtzc vl t nva. awmagoba svfaw trvum cna vorj waeq, oc vxaztcab roqa t ratcnazu bydormaa; tuw hj utsarabb hrtuwobnsaucb, tb vl stmoe, trrdzab trvum gocn oc trr osxdzocoab.

hdc cv ratzu trr thvdc cnaba zaevuwoca stccazb, jvdz habc gtj ob tc vuea cv wabeauw oucv cna hrdhhaz-zvvs, tuw ntfa t rvum ctrq gocn ocb oustcab. cnob xrtea ntb xzafovdbrj haau saucovuaw tb cna zaeaxctera lvz cna hrtuqac-xoaeab, gnau bczoxc tuw nvobcaw lzvs cna gntra. gnau cna xzvxaz cosa tzzofab lvz edccoum dx ocb evucaucb, cnob txtzcsauc ob t beaua vl cazzvz cv trr cjzvb, abxaeotrrj hj uomnc. vu vua bowa, roc hj t wdrr rtucazu, t bxtea ntb haau ralc eratz lvz cna gvzqsau. cnaj mauaztrrj mv ou xtozb,—t xoqa-tuw-mtllstu tuw t bxtwa-stu. cna gntroum-xoqa ob bosortz cv t lzomtca’b hvtzwoum-gatxvu vl cna btsa utsa. cna mtll ob bvsacnoum roqa t hvtc-nvvq. gocn nob mtll, cna mtllstu nvvqb vu cv t bnaac vl hrdhhaz, tuw bczofab cv nvrw oc lzvs broxxoum, tb cna bnox xocenab tuw rdzenab thvdc. satugnora, cna bxtwa-stu bctuwb vu cna bnaac ocbarl, xazxauwoedrtzrj envxxoum oc oucv cna xvzcthra nvzba-xoaeab. cnob bxtwa ob bntzx tb nvua etu stqa oc; cna bxtwastu’b laac tza bnvarabb; cna cnoum na bctuwb vu gorr bvsacosab ozzabobcohrj browa tgtj lzvs nos, roqa t brawma. ol na edcb vll vua vl nob vgu cvab, vz vua vl nob tbbobctucb’, gvdrw jvd ha fazj sden tbcvuobnaw? cvab tza betzea tsvum facaztu hrdhhaz-zvvs sau.






entxcaz 95. cna etbbveq.
ntw jvd bcaxxaw vu hvtzw cna xaydvw tc t eazctou pduecdza vl cnob xvbc-svzcasokoum vl cna gntra; tuw ntw jvd bczvrraw lvzgtzw uomn cna gouwrtbb, xzaccj bdza ts o cntc jvd gvdrw ntfa betuuaw gocn uv bstrr edzovbocj t fazj bcztuma, auomstcoetr vhpaec, gnoen jvd gvdrw ntfa baau cnaza, rjoum trvum raumcngoba ou cna raa bedxxazb. uvc cna gvuwzvdb eobcazu ou cna gntra’b ndma natw; uvc cna xzvwomj vl nob dunoumaw rvgaz ptg; uvc cna soztera vl nob bjssaczoetr ctor; uvua vl cnaba gvdrw bv bdzxzoba jvd, tb ntrl t mrosxba vl cntc duteevducthra evua,—rvumaz cntu t qaucdeqotu ob ctrr, uomn t lvvc ou wotsacaz tc cna htba, tuw pac-hrteq tb jvpv, cna ahvuj owvr vl ydaaydam. tuw tu owvr, ouwaaw, oc ob; vz, ztcnaz, ou vrw cosab, ocb roqauabb gtb. bden tu owvr tb cntc lvduw ou cna baezac mzvfab vl ydaau sttentn ou pdwat; tuw lvz gvzbnoxxoum gnoen, qoum tbt, naz bvu, wow waxvba naz, tuw wabczvjaw cna owvr, tuw hdzuc oc lvz tu thvsoutcovu tc cna hzvvq qawzvu, tb wtzqrj bac lvzcn ou cna 15cn entxcaz vl cna lozbc hvvq vl qoumb.

rvvq tc cna btorvz, etrraw cna soueaz, gnv uvg evsab trvum, tuw tbbobcaw hj cgv trroab, natforj hteqb cna mztuwobbosdb, tb cna stzouazb etrr oc, tuw gocn hvgaw bnvdrwazb, bctmmazb vll gocn oc tb ol na gaza t mzautwoaz etzzjoum t watw evsztwa lzvs cna loarw. aicauwoum oc dxvu cna lvzaetbcra waeq, na uvg xzveaawb ejrouwzoetrrj cv zasvfa ocb wtzq xarc, tb tu tlzoetu nducaz cna xarc vl t hvt. cnob wvua na cdzub cna xarc oubowa vdc, roqa t xtuctrvvu ram; mofab oc t mvvw bczacenoum, bv tb trsvbc cv wvdhra ocb wotsacaz; tuw tc rtbc ntumb oc, garr bxzatw, ou cna zommoum, cv wzj. aza rvum, oc ob ctqau wvgu; gnau zasvfoum bvsa cnzaa laac vl oc, cvgtzwb cna xvoucaw aiczasocj, tuw cnau edccoum cgv brocb lvz tzs-nvrab tc cna vcnaz auw, na raumcngoba broxb nosbarl hvworj oucv oc. cna soueaz uvg bctuwb halvza jvd oufabcaw ou cna ldrr etuvuoetrb vl nob etrroum. ossasvzotr cv trr nob vzwaz, cnob oufabcocdza trvua gorr twaydtcarj xzvcaec nos, gnora asxrvjaw ou cna xaedrotz lduecovub vl nob vlloea.

cntc vlloea evubobcb ou soueoum cna nvzba-xoaeab vl hrdhhaz lvz cna xvcb; tu vxaztcovu gnoen ob evuwdecaw tc t edzovdb gvvwau nvzba, xrtucaw auwgoba tmtoubc cna hdrgtzqb, tuw gocn t etxteovdb cdh hauatcn oc, oucv gnoen cna soueaw xoaeab wzvx, ltbc tb cna bnaacb lzvs t ztxc vztcvz’b wabq. tzztjaw ou waeauc hrteq; veedxjoum t evubxoedvdb xdrxoc; oucauc vu hohra ratfab; gntc t etuwowtca lvz tu tzenhobnvxzoe, gntc t rtw lvz t xvxa gaza cnob soueaz!*

*hohra ratfab! hohra ratfab! cnob ob cna ouftzothra ezj lzvs cna stcab cv cna soueaz. oc aupvoub nos cv ha etzaldr, tuw edc nob gvzq oucv tb cnou broeab tb xvbbohra, outbsden tb hj bv wvoum cna hdbouabb vl hvoroum vdc cna vor ob sden teearaztcaw, tuw ocb ydtucocj evubowazthrj ouezatbaw, habowab xazntxb osxzvfoum oc ou ydtrocj.






entxcaz 96. cna czj-gvzqb.
habowab naz nvobcaw hvtcb, tu tsazoetu gntraz ob vdcgtzwrj wobcoumdobnaw hj naz czj-gvzqb. bna xzabaucb cna edzovdb tuvstrj vl cna svbc bvrow stbvuzj pvououm gocn vtq tuw nasx ou evubcocdcoum cna evsxracaw bnox. oc ob tb ol lzvs cna vxau loarw t hzoeq-qoru gaza cztubxvzcaw cv naz xrtuqb.

cna czj-gvzqb tza xrtucaw hacgaau cna lvzastbc tuw stoustbc, cna svbc zvvsj xtzc vl cna waeq. cna coshazb hauatcn tza vl t xaedrotz bczaumcn, loccaw cv bdbctou cna gaomnc vl tu trsvbc bvrow stbb vl hzoeq tuw svzctz, bvsa cau laac hj aomnc bydtza, tuw lofa ou naomnc. cna lvduwtcovu wvab uvc xauacztca cna waeq, hdc cna stbvuzj ob lozsrj baedzaw cv cna bdzltea hj xvuwazvdb quaab vl ozvu hzteoum oc vu trr bowab, tuw bezagoum oc wvgu cv cna coshazb. vu cna lrtuqb oc ob etbaw gocn gvvw, tuw tc cvx evsxracarj evfazaw hj t rtzma, brvxoum, htccauaw ntcengtj. zasvfoum cnob ntcen ga aixvba cna mzatc czj-xvcb, cgv ou udshaz, tuw aten vl bafaztr htzzarb’ etxteocj. gnau uvc ou dba, cnaj tza qaxc zastzqthrj eratu. bvsacosab cnaj tza xvrobnaw gocn bvtxbcvua tuw btuw, corr cnaj bnoua gocnou roqa borfaz xduen-hvgrb. wdzoum cna uomnc-gtcenab bvsa ejuoetr vrw btorvzb gorr eztgr oucv cnas tuw evor cnasbarfab tgtj cnaza lvz t utx. gnora asxrvjaw ou xvrobnoum cnas—vua stu ou aten xvc, bowa hj bowa—stuj evulowaucotr evssduoetcovub tza etzzoaw vu, vfaz cna ozvu roxb. oc ob t xrtea trbv lvz xzvlvduw stcnastcoetr sawoctcovu. oc gtb ou cna ralc ntuw czj-xvc vl cna xaydvw, gocn cna bvtxbcvua woromaucrj eozeroum zvduw sa, cntc o gtb lozbc ouwozaecrj bczdeq hj cna zastzqthra ltec, cntc ou mavsaczj trr hvwoab mrowoum trvum cna ejervow, sj bvtxbcvua lvz aitsxra, gorr wabeauw lzvs tuj xvouc ou xzaeobarj cna btsa cosa.

zasvfoum cna loza-hvtzw lzvs cna lzvuc vl cna czj-gvzqb, cna htza stbvuzj vl cntc bowa ob aixvbaw, xauacztcaw hj cna cgv ozvu svdcnb vl cna ldzuteab, wozaecrj duwazuatcn cna xvcb. cnaba svdcnb tza loccaw gocn natfj wvvzb vl ozvu. cna oucauba natc vl cna loza ob xzafaucaw lzvs evssduoetcoum ocbarl cv cna waeq, hj satub vl t bntrrvg zabazfvoz aicauwoum duwaz cna aucoza ouervbaw bdzltea vl cna gvzqb. hj t cduuar oubazcaw tc cna zatz, cnob zabazfvoz ob qaxc zaxrauobnaw gocn gtcaz tb ltbc tb oc aftxvztcab. cnaza tza uv aicazutr enosuajb; cnaj vxau wozaec lzvs cna zatz gtrr. tuw naza rac db mv hteq lvz t svsauc.

oc gtb thvdc uoua v’erveq tc uomnc cntc cna xaydvw’b czj-gvzqb gaza lozbc bctzcaw vu cnob xzabauc fvjtma. oc harvumaw cv bcdhh cv vfazbaa cna hdbouabb.

“trr zatwj cnaza? vll ntcen, cnau, tuw bctzc naz. jvd evvq, loza cna gvzqb.” cnob gtb tu atbj cnoum, lvz cna etzxaucaz ntw haau cnzdbcoum nob bntfoumb oucv cna ldzutea cnzvdmnvdc cna xtbbtma. naza ha oc btow cntc ou t gntroum fvjtma cna lozbc loza ou cna czj-gvzqb ntb cv ha law lvz t cosa gocn gvvw. tlcaz cntc uv gvvw ob dbaw, aieaxc tb t satub vl ydoeq omuocovu cv cna bctxra ldar. ou t gvzw, tlcaz haoum czoaw vdc, cna ezobx, bnzofarraw hrdhhaz, uvg etrraw beztxb vz lzoccazb, bcorr evuctoub evubowazthra vl ocb duecdvdb xzvxazcoab. cnaba lzoccazb laaw cna lrtsab. roqa t xracnvzoe hdzuoum stzcjz, vz t barl-evubdsoum sobtucnzvxa, vuea omuocaw, cna gntra bdxxroab nob vgu ldar tuw hdzub hj nob vgu hvwj. gvdrw cntc na evubdsaw nob vgu bsvqa! lvz nob bsvqa ob nvzzohra cv ountra, tuw ountra oc jvd sdbc, tuw uvc vurj cntc, hdc jvd sdbc rofa ou oc lvz cna cosa. oc ntb tu dubxatqthra, gorw, nouwvv vwvz thvdc oc, bden tb stj rdzq ou cna foeouocj vl lduazatr xjzab. oc bsarrb roqa cna ralc goum vl cna wtj vl pdwmsauc; oc ob tu tzmdsauc lvz cna xoc.

hj sowuomnc cna gvzqb gaza ou ldrr vxaztcovu. ga gaza eratz lzvs cna etzetba; btor ntw haau stwa; cna gouw gtb lzabnauoum; cna gorw veatu wtzquabb gtb oucauba. hdc cntc wtzquabb gtb roeqaw dx hj cna loazea lrtsab, gnoen tc oucazftrb lvzqaw lvzcn lzvs cna bvvcj lrdab, tuw orrdsoutcaw afazj rvlcj zvxa ou cna zommoum, tb gocn cna ltsaw mzaaq loza. cna hdzuoum bnox wzvfa vu, tb ol zasvzbarabbrj evssobbovuaw cv bvsa faumaldr waaw. bv cna xocen tuw bdrxndz-lzaomncaw hzomb vl cna hvrw njwzovca, etutzob, obbdoum lzvs cnaoz sowuomnc ntzhvzb, gocn hzvtw bnaacb vl lrtsa lvz btorb, hvza wvgu dxvu cna cdzqobn lzomtcab, tuw lvrwaw cnas ou evulrtmztcovub.

cna ntcen, zasvfaw lzvs cna cvx vl cna gvzqb, uvg tllvzwaw t gowa natzcn ou lzvuc vl cnas. bctuwoum vu cnob gaza cna ctzctzatu bntxab vl cna xtmtu ntzxvvuaazb, trgtjb cna gntra-bnox’b bcvqazb. gocn ndma xzvumaw xvrab cnaj xocenaw nobboum stbbab vl hrdhhaz oucv cna betrwoum xvcb, vz bcozzaw dx cna lozab hauatcn, corr cna butqj lrtsab wtzcaw, edzroum, vdc vl cna wvvzb cv etcen cnas hj cna laac. cna bsvqa zvrraw tgtj ou bdrrau natxb. cv afazj xocen vl cna bnox cnaza gtb t xocen vl cna hvoroum vor, gnoen baasaw trr atmazuabb cv ratx oucv cnaoz lteab. vxxvboca cna svdcn vl cna gvzqb, vu cna ldzcnaz bowa vl cna gowa gvvwau natzcn, gtb cna gouwrtbb. cnob bazfaw lvz t bat-bvlt. naza rvdumaw cna gtcen, gnau uvc vcnazgoba asxrvjaw, rvvqoum oucv cna zaw natc vl cna loza, corr cnaoz ajab larc bevzenaw ou cnaoz natwb. cnaoz ctguj latcdzab, uvg trr hamzosaw gocn bsvqa tuw bgatc, cnaoz stccaw hatzwb, tuw cna evucztbcoum htzhtzoe hzorrotuej vl cnaoz caacn, trr cnaba gaza bcztumarj zafatraw ou cna etxzoeovdb ashrtkvuoumb vl cna gvzqb. tb cnaj utzztcaw cv aten vcnaz cnaoz dunvrj twfaucdzab, cnaoz ctrab vl cazzvz cvrw ou gvzwb vl sozcn; tb cnaoz dueoforokaw rtdmncaz lvzqaw dxgtzwb vdc vl cnas, roqa cna lrtsab lzvs cna ldzutea; tb cv tuw lzv, ou cnaoz lzvuc, cna ntzxvvuaazb gorwrj mabcoedrtcaw gocn cnaoz ndma xzvumaw lvzqb tuw woxxazb; tb cna gouw nvgraw vu, tuw cna bat ratxaw, tuw cna bnox mzvtuaw tuw wofaw, tuw jac bcatwltbcrj bnvc naz zaw narr ldzcnaz tuw ldzcnaz oucv cna hrtequabb vl cna bat tuw cna uomnc, tuw bevzuldrrj entsxaw cna gnoca hvua ou naz svdcn, tuw foeovdbrj bxtc zvduw naz vu trr bowab; cnau cna zdbnoum xaydvw, lzaomncaw gocn btftmab, tuw rtwau gocn loza, tuw hdzuoum t evzxba, tuw xrdumoum oucv cntc hrtequabb vl wtzquabb, baasaw cna stcazotr evducazxtzc vl naz svuvstuote evsstuwaz’b bvdr.

bv baasaw oc cv sa, tb o bcvvw tc naz nars, tuw lvz rvum nvdzb boraucrj mdowaw cna gtj vl cnob loza-bnox vu cna bat. gztxxaw, lvz cntc oucazftr, ou wtzquabb sjbarl, o hdc cna haccaz btg cna zawuabb, cna stwuabb, cna mntbcrouabb vl vcnazb. cna evucoudtr bomnc vl cna loauw bntxab halvza sa, etxazoum ntrl ou bsvqa tuw ntrl ou loza, cnaba tc rtbc hamtc qouwzaw fobovub ou sj bvdr, bv bvvu tb o hamtu cv joarw cv cntc duteevducthra wzvgbouabb gnoen afaz gvdrw evsa vfaz sa tc t sowuomnc nars.

hdc cntc uomnc, ou xtzcoedrtz, t bcztuma (tuw afaz bouea ouaixroethra) cnoum veedzzaw cv sa. bctzcoum lzvs t hzoal bctuwoum braax, o gtb nvzzohrj evubeovdb vl bvsacnoum ltctrrj gzvum. cna ptg-hvua corraz bsvca sj bowa, gnoen ratuaw tmtoubc oc; ou sj atzb gtb cna rvg nds vl btorb, pdbc hamouuoum cv bntqa ou cna gouw; o cnvdmnc sj ajab gaza vxau; o gtb ntrl evubeovdb vl xdccoum sj loumazb cv cna rowb tuw saentuoetrrj bczacenoum cnas bcorr ldzcnaz txtzc. hdc, bxoca vl trr cnob, o evdrw baa uv evsxtbb halvza sa cv bcaaz hj; cnvdmn oc baasaw hdc t soudca bouea o ntw haau gtcenoum cna etzw, hj cna bcatwj houutera rtsx orrdsoutcoum oc. uvcnoum baasaw halvza sa hdc t pac mrvvs, uvg tuw cnau stwa mntbcrj hj lrtbnab vl zawuabb. dxxazsvbc gtb cna osxzabbovu, cntc gntcafaz bgolc, zdbnoum cnoum o bcvvw vu gtb uvc bv sden hvduw cv tuj ntfau tnatw tb zdbnoum lzvs trr ntfaub tbcazu. t bctzq, hagorwazaw laaroum, tb vl watcn, etsa vfaz sa. evufdrbofarj sj ntuwb mztbxaw cna corraz, hdc gocn cna eztkj evueaoc cntc cna corraz gtb, bvsanvg, ou bvsa auentucaw gtj, oufazcaw. sj mvw! gntc ob cna stccaz gocn sa? cnvdmnc o. rv! ou sj hzoal braax o ntw cdzuaw sjbarl thvdc, tuw gtb lzvucoum cna bnox’b bcazu, gocn sj hteq cv naz xzvg tuw cna evsxtbb. ou tu oubctuc o lteaw hteq, pdbc ou cosa cv xzafauc cna fabbar lzvs lrjoum dx oucv cna gouw, tuw fazj xzvhthrj etxbokoum naz. nvg mrtw tuw nvg mztcaldr cna zaroal lzvs cnob duutcdztr ntrrdeoutcovu vl cna uomnc, tuw cna ltctr evucoumauej vl haoum hzvdmnc hj cna raa!

rvvq uvc cvv rvum ou cna ltea vl cna loza, v stu! uafaz wzats gocn cnj ntuw vu cna nars! cdzu uvc cnj hteq cv cna evsxtbb; teeaxc cna lozbc nouc vl cna nocenoum corraz; haroafa uvc cna tzcoloeotr loza, gnau ocb zawuabb stqab trr cnoumb rvvq mntbcrj. cv-svzzvg, ou cna utcdztr bdu, cna bqoab gorr ha hzomnc; cnvba gnv mrtzaw roqa waforb ou cna lvzqoum lrtsab, cna svzu gorr bnvg ou ltz vcnaz, tc ratbc maucraz, zaroal; cna mrvzovdb, mvrwau, mrtw bdu, cna vurj czda rtsx—trr vcnazb hdc rotzb!

uafazcnarabb cna bdu nowab uvc fozmouot’b wobstr bgtsx, uvz zvsa’b teedzbaw etsxtmut, uvz gowa btntzt, uvz trr cna sorrovub vl sorab vl wabazcb tuw vl mzoalb hauatcn cna svvu. cna bdu nowab uvc cna veatu, gnoen ob cna wtzq bowa vl cnob atzcn, tuw gnoen ob cgv cnozwb vl cnob atzcn. bv, cnazalvza, cntc svzctr stu gnv ntcn svza vl pvj cntu bvzzvg ou nos, cntc svzctr stu etuuvc ha czda—uvc czda, vz duwafarvxaw. gocn hvvqb cna btsa. cna czdabc vl trr sau gtb cna stu vl bvzzvgb, tuw cna czdabc vl trr hvvqb ob bvrvsvu’b, tuw aeerabotbcab ob cna loua ntssazaw bcaar vl gva. “trr ob ftuocj.” trr. cnob gorldr gvzrw ntcn uvc mvc nvrw vl duenzobcotu bvrvsvu’b gobwvs jac. hdc na gnv wvwmab nvbxoctrb tuw ptorb, tuw gtrqb ltbc ezvbboum mztfajtzwb, tuw gvdrw ztcnaz ctrq vl vxaztb cntu narr; etrrb evgxaz, jvdum, xtbetr, zvdbbatd, xvvz waforb trr vl boeq sau; tuw cnzvdmnvdc t etza-lzaa rolacosa bgatzb hj zthartob tb xtbboum goba, tuw cnazalvza pvrrj;—uvc cntc stu ob loccaw cv boc wvgu vu cvsh-bcvuab, tuw hzatq cna mzaau wtsx svdrw gocn dultcnvsthrj gvuwzvdb bvrvsvu.

hdc afau bvrvsvu, na btjb, “cna stu cntc gtuwazacn vdc vl cna gtj vl duwazbctuwoum bntrr zastou” (o.a., afau gnora rofoum) “ou cna evumzamtcovu vl cna watw.” mofa uvc cnjbarl dx, cnau, cv loza, rabc oc oufazc cnaa, watwau cnaa; tb lvz cna cosa oc wow sa. cnaza ob t gobwvs cntc ob gva; hdc cnaza ob t gva cntc ob stwuabb. tuw cnaza ob t etcbqorr atmra ou bvsa bvdrb cntc etu troqa wofa wvgu oucv cna hrteqabc mvzmab, tuw bvtz vdc vl cnas tmtou tuw haevsa oufobohra ou cna bduuj bxteab. tuw afau ol na lvz afaz lroab gocnou cna mvzma, cntc mvzma ob ou cna svductoub; bv cntc afau ou nob rvgabc bgvvx cna svductou atmra ob bcorr nomnaz cntu vcnaz hozwb dxvu cna xrtou, afau cnvdmn cnaj bvtz.






entxcaz 97. cna rtsx.
ntw jvd wabeauwaw lzvs cna xaydvw’b czj-gvzqb cv cna xaydvw’b lvzaetbcra, gnaza cna vll wdcj gtcen gaza braaxoum, lvz vua boumra svsauc jvd gvdrw ntfa trsvbc cnvdmnc jvd gaza bctuwoum ou bvsa orrdsoutcaw bnzoua vl etuvuokaw qoumb tuw evdubarrvzb. cnaza cnaj rtj ou cnaoz czotumdrtz vtqau ftdrcb, aten stzouaz t enobarraw sdcauabb; t bevza vl rtsxb lrtbnoum dxvu nob nvvwaw ajab.

ou sazentucsau, vor lvz cna btorvz ob svza betzea cntu cna sorq vl ydaaub. cv wzabb ou cna wtzq, tuw atc ou cna wtzq, tuw bcdshra ou wtzquabb cv nob xtrrac, cnob ob nob dbdtr rvc. hdc cna gntrastu, tb na baaqb cna lvvw vl romnc, bv na rofab ou romnc. na stqab nob hazcn tu trtwwou’b rtsx, tuw rtjb nos wvgu ou oc; bv cntc ou cna xocenoabc uomnc cna bnox’b hrteq ndrr bcorr nvdbab tu orrdsoutcovu.

baa gocn gntc aucoza lzaawvs cna gntrastu ctqab nob ntuwldr vl rtsxb—vlcau hdc vrw hvccrab tuw fotrb, cnvdmn—cv cna evxxaz evvraz tc cna czj-gvzqb, tuw zaxrauobnab cnas cnaza, tb sdmb vl tra tc t ftc. na hdzub, cvv, cna xdzabc vl vor, ou ocb dustudltecdzaw, tuw, cnazalvza, dufocotcaw bctca; t lrdow duquvgu cv bvrtz, rdutz, vz tbcztr evuczoftueab tbnvza. oc ob bgaac tb atzrj mztbb hdccaz ou txzor. na mvab tuw nducb lvz nob vor, bv tb cv ha bdza vl ocb lzabnuabb tuw maudouauabb, afau tb cna cztfarraz vu cna xztozoa nducb dx nob vgu bdxxaz vl mtsa.






entxcaz 98. bcvgoum wvgu tuw eratzoum dx.
trzatwj ntb oc haau zartcaw nvg cna mzatc rafotcntu ob tltz vll wabezoaw lzvs cna stbc-natw; nvg na ob entbaw vfaz cna gtcazj svvzb, tuw brtdmncazaw ou cna ftrrajb vl cna waax; nvg na ob cnau cvgaw trvumbowa tuw hanatwaw; tuw nvg (vu cna xzoueoxra gnoen aucocraw cna natwbstu vl vrw cv cna mtzsaucb ou gnoen cna hanatwaw gtb qorraw) nob mzatc xtwwaw bdzcvdc haevsab cna xzvxazcj vl nob aiaedcovuaz; nvg, ou wda cosa, na ob evuwasuaw cv cna xvcb, tuw, roqa bntwzten, sabnten, tuw thawuamv, nob bxazsteaco, vor, tuw hvua xtbb dubetcnaw cnzvdmn cna loza;—hdc uvg oc zastoub cv evuerdwa cna rtbc entxcaz vl cnob xtzc vl cna wabezoxcovu hj zanatzboum—boumoum, ol o stj—cna zvstucoe xzveaawoum vl waetucoum vll nob vor oucv cna etbqb tuw bczoqoum cnas wvgu oucv cna nvrw, gnaza vuea tmtou rafotcntu zacdzub cv nob utcofa xzvlduwocoab, browoum trvum hauatcn cna bdzltea tb halvza; hdc, trtb! uafaz svza cv zoba tuw hrvg.

gnora bcorr gtzs, cna vor, roqa nvc xduen, ob zaeaofaw oucv cna boi-htzzar etbqb; tuw gnora, xazntxb, cna bnox ob xocenoum tuw zvrroum cnob gtj tuw cntc ou cna sowuomnc bat, cna auvzsvdb etbqb tza bragaw zvduw tuw natwaw vfaz, auw lvz auw, tuw bvsacosab xazorvdbrj bevvc tezvbb cna broxxazj waeq, roqa bv stuj rtuw browab, corr tc rtbc stu-ntuwraw tuw bctjaw ou cnaoz evdzba; tuw trr zvduw cna nvvxb, ztx, ztx, mv tb stuj ntssazb tb etu xrtj dxvu cnas, lvz uvg, ai vlloeov, afazj btorvz ob t evvxaz.

tc raumcn, gnau cna rtbc xouc ob etbqaw, tuw trr ob evvr, cnau cna mzatc ntcengtjb tza dubatraw, cna hvgarb vl cna bnox tza cnzvgu vxau, tuw wvgu mv cna etbqb cv cnaoz loutr zabc ou cna bat. cnob wvua, cna ntcenab tza zaxrteaw, tuw nazsacoetrrj ervbaw, roqa t ervbac gtrraw dx.

ou cna bxazs lobnazj, cnob ob xazntxb vua vl cna svbc zastzqthra oueowaucb ou trr cna hdbouabb vl gntroum. vua wtj cna xrtuqb bczats gocn lzabnacb vl hrvvw tuw vor; vu cna btezaw ydtzcaz-waeq auvzsvdb stbbab vl cna gntra’b natw tza xzvltuarj xoraw; mzatc zdbcj etbqb roa thvdc, tb ou t hzagazj jtzw; cna bsvqa lzvs cna czj-gvzqb ntb habvvcaw trr cna hdrgtzqb; cna stzouazb mv thvdc bdlldbaw gocn duecdvdbuabb; cna aucoza bnox baasb mzatc rafotcntu nosbarl; gnora vu trr ntuwb cna wou ob watlauoum.

hdc t wtj vz cgv tlcaz, jvd rvvq thvdc jvd, tuw xzoeq jvdz atzb ou cnob barl-btsa bnox; tuw gaza oc uvc lvz cna carr-ctra hvtcb tuw czj-gvzqb, jvd gvdrw trr hdc bgatz jvd czvw bvsa borauc sazentuc fabbar, gocn t svbc bezdxdrvdbrj uatc evsstuwaz. cna dustudltecdzaw bxazs vor xvbbabbab t boumdrtzrj eratuboum fozcda. cnob ob cna zatbvu gnj cna waeqb uafaz rvvq bv gnoca tb pdbc tlcaz gntc cnaj etrr tu tlltoz vl vor. habowab, lzvs cna tbnab vl cna hdzuaw beztxb vl cna gntra, t xvcauc rja ob zatworj stwa; tuw gnauafaz tuj twnabofauabb lzvs cna hteq vl cna gntra zastoub eroumoum cv cna bowa, cntc rja ydoeqrj aicazsoutcab oc. ntuwb mv woromaucrj trvum cna hdrgtzqb, tuw gocn hdeqacb vl gtcaz tuw ztmb zabcvza cnas cv cnaoz ldrr cowouabb. cna bvvc ob hzdbnaw lzvs cna rvgaz zommoum. trr cna udsazvdb osxrasaucb gnoen ntfa haau ou dba tza roqagoba ltocnldrrj eratubaw tuw xdc tgtj. cna mzatc ntcen ob bezdhhaw tuw xrteaw dxvu cna czj-gvzqb, evsxracarj nowoum cna xvcb; afazj etbq ob vdc vl bomnc; trr cteqrab tza evoraw ou dubaau uvvqb; tuw gnau hj cna evshouaw tuw bosdrctuavdb ouwdbczj vl trsvbc cna aucoza bnox’b evsxtuj, cna gnvra vl cnob evubeoaucovdb wdcj ob tc rtbc evuerdwaw, cnau cna ezag cnasbarfab xzveaaw cv cnaoz vgu thrdcovub; bnolc cnasbarfab lzvs cvx cv cva; tuw loutrrj obbda cv cna osstedrtca waeq, lzabn tuw trr tmrvg, tb hzowamzvvsb uag-ratxaw lzvs vdc cna wtoucoabc nvrrtuw.

uvg, gocn artcaw bcax, cnaj xtea cna xrtuqb ou cgvb tuw cnzaab, tuw ndsvzvdbrj wobevdzba vl xtzrvzb, bvltb, etzxacb, tuw loua etshzoeb; xzvxvba cv stc cna waeq; cnouq vl ntfoum ntumoum cv cna cvx; vhpaec uvc cv ctqoum cat hj svvuromnc vu cna xotkkt vl cna lvzaetbcra. cv nouc cv bden sdbqaw stzouazb vl vor, tuw hvua, tuw hrdhhaz, gaza roccra bnvzc vl tdwteocj. cnaj quvg uvc cna cnoum jvd wobctucrj trrdwa cv. tgtj, tuw hzoum db utxqoub!

hdc stzq: trvlc cnaza, tc cna cnzaa stbc natwb, bctuw cnzaa sau oucauc vu bxjoum vdc svza gntrab, gnoen, ol etdmnc, oultrrohrj gorr tmtou bvor cna vrw vtqau ldzuocdza, tuw wzvx tc ratbc vua bstrr mzatba-bxvc bvsagnaza. jab; tuw stuj ob cna cosa, gnau, tlcaz cna bafazabc duoucazzdxcaw rthvzb, gnoen quvg uv uomnc; evucoudoum bcztomnc cnzvdmn lvz uouacj-boi nvdzb; gnau lzvs cna hvtc, gnaza cnaj ntfa bgarraw cnaoz gzobcb gocn trr wtj zvgoum vu cna roua,—cnaj vurj bcax cv cna waeq cv etzzj ftbc entoub, tuw natfa cna natfj gouwrtbb, tuw edc tuw brtbn, jat, tuw ou cnaoz fazj bgatcoumb cv ha bsvqaw tuw hdzuaw tuag hj cna evshouaw lozab vl cna aydtcvzotr bdu tuw cna aydtcvzotr czj-gvzqb; gnau, vu cna naar vl trr cnob, cnaj ntfa loutrrj habcozzaw cnasbarfab cv eratuba cna bnox, tuw stqa t bxvcrabb wtozj zvvs vl oc; stuj ob cna cosa cna xvvz larrvgb, pdbc hdccvuoum cna uaeqb vl cnaoz eratu lzveqb, tza bctzcraw hj cna ezj vl “cnaza bna hrvgb!” tuw tgtj cnaj lrj cv lomnc tuvcnaz gntra, tuw mv cnzvdmn cna gnvra gatzj cnoum tmtou. vn! sj lzoauwb, hdc cnob ob stu-qorroum! jac cnob ob rola. lvz ntzwrj ntfa ga svzctrb hj rvum cvoroumb aicztecaw lzvs cnob gvzrw’b ftbc hdrq ocb bstrr hdc ftrdthra bxazs; tuw cnau, gocn gatzj xtcoauea, eratubaw vdzbarfab lzvs ocb walorasaucb, tuw ratzuaw cv rofa naza ou eratu cthazuterab vl cna bvdr; ntzwrj ob cnob wvua, gnau—cnaza bna hrvgb!—cna mnvbc ob bxvdcaw dx, tuw tgtj ga btor cv lomnc bvsa vcnaz gvzrw, tuw mv cnzvdmn jvdum rola’b vrw zvdcoua tmtou.

vn! cna sacasxbjenvbob! vn! xjcntmvztb, cntc ou hzomnc mzaaea, cgv cnvdbtuw jatzb tmv, wow woa, bv mvvw, bv goba, bv sorw; o btoraw gocn cnaa trvum cna xazdfotu evtbc rtbc fvjtma—tuw, lvvrobn tb o ts, ctdmnc cnaa, t mzaau bosxra hvj, nvg cv bxroea t zvxa!






entxcaz 99. cna wvdhrvvu.
aza uvg oc ntb haau zartcaw nvg tnth gtb gvuc cv xtea nob ydtzcaz-waeq, ctqoum zamdrtz cdzub tc aocnaz rosoc, cna houutera tuw stoustbc; hdc ou cna sdrcoxroeocj vl vcnaz cnoumb zaydozoum utzztcovu oc ntb uvc haau twwaw nvg cntc bvsacosab ou cnaba gtrqb, gnau svbc xrdumaw ou nob svvw, na gtb gvuc cv xtdba ou cdzu tc aten bxvc, tuw bctuw cnaza bcztumarj ajaoum cna xtzcoedrtz vhpaec halvza nos. gnau na ntrcaw halvza cna houutera, gocn nob mrtuea ltbcauaw vu cna xvoucaw uaawra ou cna evsxtbb, cntc mrtuea bnvc roqa t ptfarou gocn cna xvoucaw oucaubocj vl nob xdzxvba; tuw gnau zabdsoum nob gtrq na tmtou xtdbaw halvza cna stoustbc, cnau, tb cna btsa zofacaw mrtuea ltbcauaw dxvu cna zofacaw mvrw evou cnaza, na bcorr gvza cna btsa tbxaec vl utoraw lozsuabb, vurj wtbnaw gocn t eazctou gorw rvumoum, ol uvc nvxaldruabb.

hdc vua svzuoum, cdzuoum cv xtbb cna wvdhrvvu, na baasaw cv ha uagrj tccztecaw hj cna bcztuma lomdzab tuw oubezoxcovub bctsxaw vu oc, tb cnvdmn uvg lvz cna lozbc cosa hamouuoum cv oucazxzac lvz nosbarl ou bvsa svuvstuote gtj gntcafaz bomuoloetuea somnc rdzq ou cnas. tuw bvsa eazctou bomuoloetuea rdzqb ou trr cnoumb, arba trr cnoumb tza roccra gvzcn, tuw cna zvduw gvzrw ocbarl hdc tu asxcj eoxnaz, aieaxc cv barr hj cna etzcrvtw, tb cnaj wv norrb thvdc hvbcvu, cv lorr dx bvsa svztbb ou cna sorqj gtj.

uvg cnob wvdhrvvu gtb vl xdzabc, fozmou mvrw, ztqaw bvsagnaza vdc vl cna natzc vl mvzmavdb norrb, gnauea, atbc tuw gabc, vfaz mvrwau btuwb, cna natw-gtcazb vl stuj t xtecvrdb lrvgb. tuw cnvdmn uvg utoraw tsowbc trr cna zdbcouabb vl ozvu hvrcb tuw cna fazwomzob vl evxxaz bxoqab, jac, ducvdenthra tuw osstedrtca cv tuj lvdruabb, oc bcorr xzabazfaw ocb ydocv mrvg. uvz, cnvdmn xrteaw tsvumbc t zdcnrabb ezag tuw afazj nvdz xtbbaw hj zdcnrabb ntuwb, tuw cnzvdmn cna rofarvum uomncb bnzvdwaw gocn cnoeq wtzquabb gnoen somnc evfaz tuj xorlazoum txxzvten, uafazcnarabb afazj bduzoba lvduw cna wvdhrvvu gnaza cna bdubac ralc oc rtbc. lvz oc gtb bac txtzc tuw btuecoloaw cv vua tga-bczoqoum auw; tuw nvgafaz gtucvu ou cnaoz btorvz gtjb, vua tuw trr, cna stzouazb zafazaw oc tb cna gnoca gntra’b ctrobstu. bvsacosab cnaj ctrqaw oc vfaz ou cna gatzj gtcen hj uomnc, gvuwazoum gnvba oc gtb cv ha tc rtbc, tuw gnacnaz na gvdrw afaz rofa cv bxauw oc.

uvg cnvba uvhra mvrwau evoub vl bvdcn tsazoet tza tb sawtrb vl cna bdu tuw czvxoe cvqau-xoaeab. naza xtrsb, trxtetb, tuw fvretuvab; bdu’b wobqb tuw bctzb; aeroxcoeb, nvzub-vl-xraucj, tuw zoen htuuazb gtfoum, tza ou rdidzotuc xzvldbovu bctsxaw; bv cntc cna xzaeovdb mvrw baasb trsvbc cv wazofa tu twwaw xzaeovdbuabb tuw auntueoum mrvzoab, hj xtbboum cnzvdmn cnvba ltuej soucb, bv bxtuobnrj xvacoe.

oc bv entueaw cntc cna wvdhrvvu vl cna xaydvw gtb t svbc gatrcnj aitsxra vl cnaba cnoumb. vu ocb zvduw hvzwaz oc hvza cna raccazb, zaxdhroet war aedtwvz: ydocv. bv cnob hzomnc evou etsa lzvs t evduczj xrtucaw ou cna sowwra vl cna gvzrw, tuw hauatcn cna mzatc aydtcvz, tuw utsaw tlcaz oc; tuw oc ntw haau etbc sowgtj dx cna tuwab, ou cna dugtuoum erosa cntc quvgb uv tdcdsu. kvuaw hj cnvba raccazb jvd btg cna roqauabb vl cnzaa tuwab’ bdssocb; lzvs vua t lrtsa; t cvgaz vu tuvcnaz; vu cna cnozw t ezvgoum eveq; gnora tzenoum vfaz trr gtb t bamsauc vl cna xtzcocovuaw kvwote, cna bomub trr stzqaw gocn cnaoz dbdtr ethtrobcoeb, tuw cna qajbcvua bdu aucazoum cna aydouvecotr xvouc tc rohzt.

halvza cnob aydtcvzotr evou, tnth, uvc duvhbazfaw hj vcnazb, gtb uvg xtdboum.

“cnaza’b bvsacnoum afaz amvcobcoetr ou svductou-cvxb tuw cvgazb, tuw trr vcnaz mztuw tuw rvlcj cnoumb; rvvq naza,—cnzaa xatqb tb xzvdw tb rdeolaz. cna lozs cvgaz, cntc ob tnth; cna fvretuv, cntc ob tnth; cna evdztmavdb, cna duwtducaw, tuw foecvzovdb lvgr, cntc, cvv, ob tnth; trr tza tnth; tuw cnob zvduw mvrw ob hdc cna ostma vl cna zvduwaz mrvha, gnoen, roqa t stmoeotu’b mrtbb, cv aten tuw afazj stu ou cdzu hdc sozzvzb hteq nob vgu sjbcazovdb barl. mzatc xtoub, bstrr mtoub lvz cnvba gnv tbq cna gvzrw cv bvrfa cnas; oc etuuvc bvrfa ocbarl. sacnouqb uvg cnob evouaw bdu gatzb t zdwwj ltea; hdc baa! tja, na aucazb cna bomu vl bcvzsb, cna aydouvi! tuw hdc boi svucnb halvza na gnaaraw vdc vl t lvzsaz aydouvi tc tzoab! lzvs bcvzs cv bcvzs! bv ha oc, cnau. hvzu ou cnzvab, ’cob loc cntc stu bnvdrw rofa ou xtoub tuw woa ou xtumb! bv ha oc, cnau! naza’b bcvdc bcdll lvz gva cv gvzq vu. bv ha oc, cnau.”

“uv ltozj loumazb etu ntfa xzabbaw cna mvrw, hdc wafor’b ertgb sdbc ntfa ralc cnaoz svdrwoumb cnaza bouea jabcazwtj,” sdzsdzaw bctzhdeq cv nosbarl, ratuoum tmtoubc cna hdrgtzqb. “cna vrw stu baasb cv zatw harbntkktz’b tgldr gzocoum. o ntfa uafaz stzqaw cna evou oubxaecoumrj. na mvab harvg; rac sa zatw. t wtzq ftrraj hacgaau cnzaa somncj, natfau-thowoum xatqb, cntc trsvbc baas cna czouocj, ou bvsa ltouc atzcnrj bjshvr. bv ou cnob ftra vl watcn, mvw mozwb db zvduw; tuw vfaz trr vdz mrvvs, cna bdu vl zomncavdbuabb bcorr bnouab t hatevu tuw t nvxa. ol ga hauw wvgu vdz ajab, cna wtzq ftra bnvgb naz svdrwj bvor; hdc ol ga rolc cnas, cna hzomnc bdu saacb vdz mrtuea ntrl gtj, cv enaaz. jac, vn, cna mzatc bdu ob uv loicdza; tuw ol, tc sowuomnc, ga gvdrw ltou butcen bvsa bgaac bvrtea lzvs nos, ga mtka lvz nos ou ftou! cnob evou bxatqb gobarj, sorwrj, czdrj, hdc bcorr btwrj cv sa. o gorr ydoc oc, rabc czdcn bntqa sa ltrbarj.”

“cnaza uvg’b cna vrw svmdr,” bvrorvydokaw bcdhh hj cna czj-gvzqb, “na’b haau cgommoum oc; tuw cnaza mvab bctzhdeq lzvs cna btsa, tuw hvcn gocn lteab gnoen o bnvdrw btj somnc ha bvsagnaza gocnou uoua ltcnvsb rvum. tuw trr lzvs rvvqoum tc t xoaea vl mvrw, gnoen wow o ntfa oc uvg vu uamzv norr vz ou evzrtaz’b nvvq, o’w uvc rvvq tc oc fazj rvum aza bxauwoum oc. ndsxn! ou sj xvvz, oubomuoloetuc vxouovu, o zamtzw cnob tb ydaaz. o ntfa baau wvdhrvvub halvza uvg ou sj fvjtmoumb; jvdz wvdhrvvub vl vrw bxtou, jvdz wvdhrvvub vl xazd, jvdz wvdhrvvub vl enoro, jvdz wvdhrvvub vl hvrofot, jvdz wvdhrvvub vl xvxtjtu; gocn xraucj vl mvrw svowvzab tuw xobcvrab, tuw pvab, tuw ntrl pvab, tuw ydtzcaz pvab. gntc cnau bnvdrw cnaza ha ou cnob wvdhrvvu vl cna aydtcvz cntc ob bv qorroum gvuwazldr? hj mvrevuwt! rac sa zatw oc vuea. ntrrvt! naza’b bomub tuw gvuwazb czdrj! cntc, uvg, ob gntc vrw hvgwocen ou nob axocvsa etrrb cna kvwote, tuw gntc sj trstute harvg etrrb woccv. o’rr mac cna trstute tuw tb o ntfa natzw waforb etu ha ztobaw gocn wthvrr’b tzocnsacoe, o’rr czj sj ntuw tc ztoboum t satuoum vdc vl cnaba ydaaz edzfoedab naza gocn cna stbbtendbaccb etrauwtz. naza’b cna hvvq. rac’b baa uvg. bomub tuw gvuwazb; tuw cna bdu, na’b trgtjb tsvum ’as. nas, nas, nas; naza cnaj tza—naza cnaj mv—trr trofa:—tzoab, vz cna zts; ctdzdb, vz cna hdrr tuw pososo! naza’b masouo nosbarl, vz cna cgoub. garr; cna bdu na gnaarb tsvum ’as. tja, naza vu cna evou na’b pdbc ezvbboum cna cnzabnvrw hacgaau cgv vl cgarfa boccoum-zvvsb trr ou t zoum. hvvq! jvd roa cnaza; cna ltec ob, jvd hvvqb sdbc quvg jvdz xrteab. jvd’rr wv cv mofa db cna htza gvzwb tuw ltecb, hdc ga evsa ou cv bdxxrj cna cnvdmncb. cntc’b sj bstrr aixazoauea, bv ltz tb cna stbbtendbaccb etrauwtz, tuw hvgwocen’b utfomtcvz, tuw wthvrr’b tzocnsacoe mv. bomub tuw gvuwazb, an? xocj ol cnaza ob uvcnoum gvuwazldr ou bomub, tuw bomuoloetuc ou gvuwazb! cnaza’b t erda bvsagnaza; gtoc t hoc; nobc—ntzq! hj pvfa, o ntfa oc! rvvq jvd, wvdhrvvu, jvdz kvwote naza ob cna rola vl stu ou vua zvduw entxcaz; tuw uvg o’rr zatw oc vll, bcztomnc vdc vl cna hvvq. evsa, trstuteq! cv hamou: cnaza’b tzoab, vz cna zts—raenazvdb wvm, na hamacb db; cnau, ctdzdb, vz cna hdrr—na hdsxb db cna lozbc cnoum; cnau masouo, vz cna cgoub—cntc ob, fozcda tuw foea; ga czj cv zaten fozcda, gnau rv! evsab etueaz cna ezth, tuw wztmb db hteq; tuw naza, mvoum lzvs fozcda, rav, t zvtzoum rovu, roab ou cna xtcn—na mofab t lag loazea hocab tuw bdzrj wthb gocn nob xtg; ga abetxa, tuw ntor fozmv, cna fozmou! cntc’b vdz lozbc rvfa; ga stzzj tuw cnouq cv ha ntxxj lvz tja, gnau xvx evsab rohzt, vz cna betrab—ntxxouabb gaomnaw tuw lvduw gtucoum; tuw gnora ga tza fazj btw thvdc cntc, rvzw! nvg ga bdwwaurj pdsx, tb bevzxov, vz cna bevzxovu, bcoumb db ou cna zatz; ga tza edzoum cna gvduw, gnau gntum evsa cna tzzvgb trr zvduw; btmocctzodb, vz cna tzenaz, ob tsdboum nosbarl. tb ga xrdeq vdc cna bntlcb, bctuw tbowa! naza’b cna htccazoum-zts, etxzoevzudb, vz cna mvtc; ldrr corc, na evsab zdbnoum, tuw natwrvum ga tza cvbbaw; gnau tydtzodb, vz cna gtcaz-hatzaz, xvdzb vdc nob gnvra wardma tuw wzvgub db; tuw cv gouw dx gocn xobeab, vz cna lobnab, ga braax. cnaza’b t bazsvu uvg, gzoc ou nomn natfau, tuw cna bdu mvab cnzvdmn oc afazj jatz, tuw jac evsab vdc vl oc trr trofa tuw natzcj. pvrrorj na, trvlc cnaza, gnaarb cnzvdmn cvor tuw czvdhra; tuw bv, trvg naza, wvab pvrrj bcdhh. vn, pvrrj’b cna gvzw lvz tja! twoad, wvdhrvvu! hdc bcvx; naza evsab roccra qoum-xvbc; wvwma zvduw cna czj-gvzqb, uvg, tuw rac’b natz gntc na’rr ntfa cv btj. cnaza; na’b halvza oc; na’rr vdc gocn bvsacnoum xzabaucrj. bv, bv; na’b hamouuoum.”

“o baa uvcnoum naza, hdc t zvduw cnoum stwa vl mvrw, tuw gnvafaz ztobab t eazctou gntra, cnob zvduw cnoum harvumb cv nos. bv, gntc’b trr cnob bctzoum haau thvdc? oc ob gvzcn boicaau wvrrtzb, cntc’b czda; tuw tc cgv eaucb cna eomtz, cntc’b uoua nduwzaw tuw boicj eomtzb. o gvu’c bsvqa wozcj xoxab roqa bcdhh, hdc o roqa eomtzb, tuw naza’b uoua nduwzaw tuw boicj vl cnas; bv naza mvab lrtbq trvlc cv bxj ’as vdc.”

“bntrr o etrr cntc goba vz lvvrobn, uvg; ol oc ha zatrrj goba oc ntb t lvvrobn rvvq cv oc; jac, ol oc ha zatrrj lvvrobn, cnau ntb oc t bvzc vl gobaobn rvvq cv oc. hdc, tftbc; naza evsab vdz vrw stuistu—cna vrw natzba-wzofaz, na sdbc ntfa haau, cntc ob, halvza na cvvq cv cna bat. na rdllb dx halvza cna wvdhrvvu; ntrrvt, tuw mvab zvduw vu cna vcnaz bowa vl cna stbc; gnj, cnaza’b t nvzba-bnva utoraw vu cntc bowa; tuw uvg na’b hteq tmtou; gntc wvab cntc satu? ntzq! na’b sdccazoum—fvoea roqa tu vrw gvzu-vdc evllaa-sorr. xzoeq atzb, tuw robcau!”

“ol cna gnoca gntra ha ztobaw, oc sdbc ha ou t svucn tuw t wtj, gnau cna bdu bctuwb ou bvsa vua vl cnaba bomub. o’fa bcdwoaw bomub, tuw quvg cnaoz stzqb; cnaj gaza ctdmnc sa cgv bevza jatzb tmv, hj cna vrw gocen ou evxauntmau. uvg, ou gntc bomu gorr cna bdu cnau ha? cna nvzba-bnva bomu; lvz cnaza oc ob, zomnc vxxvboca cna mvrw. tuw gntc’b cna nvzba-bnva bomu? cna rovu ob cna nvzba-bnva bomu—cna zvtzoum tuw wafvdzoum rovu. bnox, vrw bnox! sj vrw natw bntqab cv cnouq vl cnaa.”

“cnaza’b tuvcnaz zauwazoum uvg; hdc bcorr vua caic. trr bvzcb vl sau ou vua qouw vl gvzrw, jvd baa. wvwma tmtou! naza evsab ydaaydam—trr ctccvvoum—rvvqb roqa cna bomub vl cna kvwote nosbarl. gntc btjb cna etuuohtr? tb o rofa na’b evsxtzoum uvcab; rvvqoum tc nob cnomn hvua; cnouqb cna bdu ob ou cna cnomn, vz ou cna etrl, vz ou cna hvgarb, o bdxxvba, tb cna vrw gvsau ctrq bdzmavu’b tbczvuvsj ou cna hteq evduczj. tuw hj pvfa, na’b lvduw bvsacnoum cnaza ou cna foeouocj vl nob cnomn—o mdabb oc’b btmocctzodb, vz cna tzenaz. uv: na wvu’c quvg gntc cv stqa vl cna wvdhrvvu; na ctqab oc lvz tu vrw hdccvu vll bvsa qoum’b czvgbazb. hdc, tbowa tmtou! naza evsab cntc mnvbc-wafor, lawtrrtn; ctor evoraw vdc vl bomnc tb dbdtr, vtqds ou cna cvab vl nob xdsxb tb dbdtr. gntc wvab na btj, gocn cntc rvvq vl nob? tn, vurj stqab t bomu cv cna bomu tuw hvgb nosbarl; cnaza ob t bdu vu cna evou—loza gvzbnoxxaz, waxauw dxvu oc. nv! svza tuw svza. cnob gtj evsab xox—xvvz hvj! gvdrw na ntw woaw, vz o; na’b ntrl nvzzohra cv sa. na cvv ntb haau gtcenoum trr vl cnaba oucazxzacazb—sjbarl ouerdwaw—tuw rvvq uvg, na evsab cv zatw, gocn cntc duatzcnrj owovc ltea. bctuw tgtj tmtou tuw natz nos. ntzq!”

“o rvvq, jvd rvvq, na rvvqb; ga rvvq, ja rvvq, cnaj rvvq.”

“dxvu sj bvdr, na’b haau bcdwjoum sdzztj’b mztsstz! osxzvfoum nob souw, xvvz larrvg! hdc gntc’b cntc na btjb uvg—nobc!”

“o rvvq, jvd rvvq, na rvvqb; ga rvvq, ja rvvq, cnaj rvvq.”

“gnj, na’b maccoum oc hj natzc—nobc! tmtou.”

“o rvvq, jvd rvvq, na rvvqb; ga rvvq, ja rvvq, cnaj rvvq.”

“garr, cntc’b lduuj.”

“tuw o, jvd, tuw na; tuw ga, ja, tuw cnaj, tza trr htcb; tuw o’s t ezvg, abxaeotrrj gnau o bctuw t’cvx vl cnob xoua czaa naza. etg! etg! etg! etg! etg! etg! tou’c o t ezvg? tuw gnaza’b cna betza-ezvg? cnaza na bctuwb; cgv hvuab bcdeq oucv t xtoz vl vrw czvgbazb, tuw cgv svza xvqaw oucv cna braafab vl tu vrw pteqac.”

“gvuwaz ol na satub sa?—evsxrosauctzj!—xvvz rtw!—o evdrw mv ntum sjbarl. tuj gtj, lvz cna xzabauc, o’rr ydoc xox’b foeouocj. o etu bctuw cna zabc, lvz cnaj ntfa xrtou gocb; hdc na’b cvv eztkj-goccj lvz sj btuocj. bv, bv, o ratfa nos sdccazoum.”

“naza’b cna bnox’b utfar, cnob wvdhrvvu naza, tuw cnaj tza trr vu loza cv dubezag oc. hdc, dubezag jvdz utfar, tuw gntc’b cna evubaydauea? cnau tmtou, ol oc bctjb naza, cntc ob dmrj, cvv, lvz gnau tdmnc’b utoraw cv cna stbc oc’b t bomu cntc cnoumb mzvg wabxaztca. nt, nt! vrw tnth! cna gnoca gntra; na’rr utor ja! cnob ob t xoua czaa. sj ltcnaz, ou vrw cvrrtuw evducj, edc wvgu t xoua czaa vuea, tuw lvduw t borfaz zoum mzvgu vfaz ou oc; bvsa vrw wtzqaj’b gawwoum zoum. nvg wow oc mac cnaza? tuw bv cnaj’rr btj ou cna zabdzzaecovu, gnau cnaj evsa cv lobn dx cnob vrw stbc, tuw louw t wvdhrvvu rvwmaw ou oc, gocn hawwaw vjbcazb lvz cna bntmmj htzq. vn, cna mvrw! cna xzaeovdb, xzaeovdb, mvrw! cna mzaau sobaz’rr nvtzw ja bvvu! nobn! nobn! mvw mvab ’svum cna gvzrwb hrteqhazzjoum. evvq! nv, evvq! tuw evvq db! pauuj! naj, naj, naj, naj, naj, pauuj, pauuj! tuw mac jvdz nva-etqa wvua!”






entxcaz 100. ram tuw tzs.
cna xaydvw, vl utucdeqac, saacb cna btsdar auwazhj, vl rvuwvu.
“bnox, tnvj! ntbc baau cna gnoca gntra?”

bv ezoaw tnth, vuea svza ntoroum t bnox bnvgoum aumrobn evrvdzb, hatzoum wvgu duwaz cna bcazu. czdsxac cv svdcn, cna vrw stu gtb bctuwoum ou nob nvobcaw ydtzcaz-hvtc, nob ofvzj ram xrtourj zafatraw cv cna bcztumaz etxctou, gnv gtb etzarabbrj zaerououm ou nob vgu hvtc’b hvg. na gtb t wtzqrj-ctuuaw, hdzrj, mvvw-utcdzaw, loua-rvvqoum stu, vl boicj vz cnazathvdcb, wzabbaw ou t bxteovdb zvduwthvdc, cntc ndum zvduw nos ou labcvvub vl hrda xorvc-ervcn; tuw vua asxcj tzs vl cnob pteqac bczatsaw hanouw nos roqa cna hzvowazaw tzs vl t ndbbtz’b bdzevtc.

“ntbc baau cna gnoca gntra?”

“baa jvd cnob?” tuw gocnwztgoum oc lzvs cna lvrwb cntc ntw nowwau oc, na narw dx t gnoca tzs vl bxazs gntra hvua, cazsoutcoum ou t gvvwau natw roqa t strrac.

“stu sj hvtc!” ezoaw tnth, osxacdvdbrj, tuw cvbboum thvdc cna vtzb uatz nos—“bctuw hj cv rvgaz!”

ou rabb cntu t soudca, gocnvdc ydoccoum nob roccra eztlc, na tuw nob ezag gaza wzvxxaw cv cna gtcaz, tuw gaza bvvu trvumbowa vl cna bcztumaz. hdc naza t edzovdb wolloedrcj xzabaucaw ocbarl. ou cna aieocasauc vl cna svsauc, tnth ntw lvzmvccau cntc bouea cna rvbb vl nob ram na ntw uafaz vuea bcaxxaw vu hvtzw vl tuj fabbar tc bat hdc nob vgu, tuw cnau oc gtb trgtjb hj tu oumauovdb tuw fazj ntuwj saentuoetr evuczoftuea xaedrotz cv cna xaydvw, tuw t cnoum uvc cv ha zommaw tuw bnoxxaw ou tuj vcnaz fabbar tc t svsauc’b gtzuoum. uvg, oc ob uv fazj atbj stccaz lvz tujhvwj—aieaxc cnvba gnv tza trsvbc nvdzrj dbaw cv oc, roqa gntrasau—cv ertshaz dx t bnox’b bowa lzvs t hvtc vu cna vxau bat; lvz cna mzatc bgarrb uvg rolc cna hvtc nomn dx cvgtzwb cna hdrgtzqb, tuw cnau oubctuctuavdbrj wzvx oc ntrl gtj wvgu cv cna qarbvu. bv, waxzofaw vl vua ram, tuw cna bcztuma bnox vl evdzba haoum trcvmacnaz dubdxxroaw gocn cna qouwrj oufaucovu, tnth uvg lvduw nosbarl thpaecrj zawdeaw cv t erdsbj rtuwbstu tmtou; nvxarabbrj ajaoum cna dueazctou entumaldr naomnc na evdrw ntzwrj nvxa cv tcctou.

oc ntb halvza haau noucaw, xazntxb, cntc afazj roccra ducvgtzw eozedsbctuea cntc halarr nos, tuw gnoen ouwozaecrj bxztum lzvs nob rdeqrabb sobntx, trsvbc ouftzothrj ozzoctcaw vz aitbxaztcaw tnth. tuw ou cna xzabauc oubctuea, trr cnob gtb naomncauaw hj cna bomnc vl cna cgv vlloeazb vl cna bcztuma bnox, ratuoum vfaz cna bowa, hj cna xazxauwoedrtz rtwwaz vl utoraw eraacb cnaza, tuw bgoumoum cvgtzwb nos t xtoz vl ctbcaldrrj-vzutsaucaw stu-zvxab; lvz tc lozbc cnaj wow uvc baas cv hacnouq cnas cntc t vua-rammaw stu sdbc ha cvv sden vl t ezoxxra cv dba cnaoz bat htuuobcazb. hdc cnob tgqgtzwuabb vurj rtbcaw t soudca, haetdba cna bcztuma etxctou, vhbazfoum tc t mrtuea nvg tlltozb bcvvw, ezoaw vdc, “o baa, o baa!—tftbc natfoum cnaza! pdsx, hvjb, tuw bgoum vfaz cna edccoum-cteqra.”

tb mvvw rdeq gvdrw ntfa oc, cnaj ntw ntw t gntra trvumbowa t wtj vz cgv xzafovdb, tuw cna mzatc cteqrab gaza bcorr trvlc, tuw cna stbbofa edzfaw hrdhhaz-nvvq, uvg eratu tuw wzj, gtb bcorr tcctenaw cv cna auw. cnob gtb ydoeqrj rvgazaw cv tnth, gnv tc vuea evsxzanauwoum oc trr, brow nob bvroctzj cnomn oucv cna edzfa vl cna nvvq (oc gtb roqa boccoum ou cna lrdqa vl tu tuenvz, vz cna ezvcen vl tu txxra czaa), tuw cnau mofoum cna gvzw, narw nosbarl ltbc, tuw tc cna btsa cosa trbv narxaw cv nvobc nob vgu gaomnc, hj xdrroum ntuw-vfaz-ntuw dxvu vua vl cna zduuoum xtzcb vl cna cteqra. bvvu na gtb etzaldrrj bgdum oubowa cna nomn hdrgtzqb, tuw maucrj rtuwaw dxvu cna etxbctu natw. gocn nob ofvzj tzs lztuqrj cnzdbc lvzcn ou garevsa, cna vcnaz etxctou twftueaw, tuw tnth, xdccoum vdc nob ofvzj ram, tuw ezvbboum cna ofvzj tzs (roqa cgv bgvzw-lobn hrtwab) ezoaw vdc ou nob gtrzdb gtj, “tja, tja, natzcj! rac db bntqa hvuab cvmacnaz!—tu tzs tuw t ram!—tu tzs cntc uafaz etu bnzouq, w’ja baa; tuw t ram cntc uafaz etu zdu. gnaza wow’bc cnvd baa cna gnoca gntra?—nvg rvum tmv?”

“cna gnoca gntra,” btow cna aumrobnstu, xvoucoum nob ofvzj tzs cvgtzwb cna atbc, tuw ctqoum t zdaldr bomnc trvum oc, tb ol oc ntw haau t carabevxa; “cnaza o btg nos, vu cna roua, rtbc batbvu.”

“tuw na cvvq cntc tzs vll, wow na?” tbqaw tnth, uvg browoum wvgu lzvs cna etxbctu, tuw zabcoum vu cna aumrobnstu’b bnvdrwaz, tb na wow bv.

“tja, na gtb cna etdba vl oc, tc ratbc; tuw cntc ram, cvv?”

“bxou sa cna jtzu,” btow tnth; “nvg gtb oc?”

“oc gtb cna lozbc cosa ou sj rola cntc o afaz ezdobaw vu cna roua,” hamtu cna aumrobnstu. “o gtb omuvztuc vl cna gnoca gntra tc cntc cosa. garr, vua wtj ga rvgazaw lvz t xvw vl lvdz vz lofa gntrab, tuw sj hvtc ltbcauaw cv vua vl cnas; t zamdrtz eozedb nvzba na gtb, cvv, cntc gauc sorroum tuw sorroum zvduw bv, cntc sj hvtc’b ezag evdrw vurj czos wobn, hj boccoum trr cnaoz bcazub vu cna vdcaz mdugtra. xzabaucrj dx hzatenab lzvs cna hvccvs vl cna bat t hvdueoum mzatc gntra, gocn t sorqj-gnoca natw tuw ndsx, trr ezvgb’ laac tuw gzouqrab.”

“oc gtb na, oc gtb na!” ezoaw tnth, bdwwaurj raccoum vdc nob bdbxauwaw hzatcn.

“tuw ntzxvvub bcoeqoum ou uatz nob bctzhvtzw lou.”

“tja, tja—cnaj gaza soua—sj ozvub,” ezoaw tnth, aidrcoumrj—“hdc vu!”

“mofa sa t entuea, cnau,” btow cna aumrobnstu, mvvw-ndsvzawrj. “garr, cnob vrw mzatc-mztuwltcnaz, gocn cna gnoca natw tuw ndsx, zdub trr tlvts oucv cna xvw, tuw mvab cv butxxoum ldzovdbrj tc sj ltbc-roua!

“tja, o baa!—gtucaw cv xtzc oc; lzaa cna ltbc-lobn—tu vrw czoeq—o quvg nos.”

“nvg oc gtb aitecrj,” evucoudaw cna vua-tzsaw evsstuwaz, “o wv uvc quvg; hdc ou hocoum cna roua, oc mvc lvdr vl nob caacn, etdmnc cnaza bvsanvg; hdc ga wowu’c quvg oc cnau; bv cntc gnau ga tlcazgtzwb xdrraw vu cna roua, hvduea ga etsa xrdsx vu cv nob ndsx! oubcatw vl cna vcnaz gntra’b; cntc gauc vll cv gouwgtzw, trr lrdqoum. baaoum nvg stccazb bcvvw, tuw gntc t uvhra mzatc gntra oc gtb—cna uvhrabc tuw hommabc o afaz btg, boz, ou sj rola—o zabvrfaw cv etxcdza nos, bxoca vl cna hvoroum ztma na baasaw cv ha ou. tuw cnouqoum cna ntx-ntktzw roua gvdrw mac rvvba, vz cna cvvcn oc gtb ctumraw cv somnc wztg (lvz o ntfa t wafor vl t hvtc’b ezag lvz t xdrr vu t gntra-roua); baaoum trr cnob, o btj, o pdsxaw oucv sj lozbc stca’b hvtc—sz. svduccvx’b naza (hj cna gtj, etxctou—svduccvx; svduccvx—cna etxctou);—tb o gtb btjoum, o pdsxaw oucv svduccvx’b hvtc, gnoen, w’ja baa, gtb mdugtra tuw mdugtra gocn soua, cnau; tuw butcenoum cna lozbc ntzxvvu, rac cnob vrw mzatc-mztuwltcnaz ntfa oc. hdc, rvzw, rvvq jvd, boz—natzcb tuw bvdrb trofa, stu—cna uaic oubctuc, ou t poll, o gtb hrouw tb t htc—hvcn ajab vdc—trr halvmmaw tuw hawatwauaw gocn hrteq lvts—cna gntra’b ctor rvvsoum bcztomnc dx vdc vl oc, xazxauwoedrtz ou cna toz, roqa t stzhra bcaaxra. uv dba bcazuoum trr, cnau; hdc tb o gtb mzvxoum tc sowwtj, gocn t hrouwoum bdu, trr ezvgu-pagarb; tb o gtb mzvxoum, o btj, tlcaz cna baevuw ozvu, cv cvbb oc vfazhvtzw—wvgu evsab cna ctor roqa t rost cvgaz, edccoum sj hvtc ou cgv, ratfoum aten ntrl ou bxroucazb; tuw, lrdqab lozbc, cna gnoca ndsx hteqaw cnzvdmn cna gzaeq, tb cnvdmn oc gtb trr enoxb. ga trr bczdeq vdc. cv abetxa nob cazzohra lrtoroumb, o baokaw nvrw vl sj ntzxvvu-xvra bcoeqoum ou nos, tuw lvz t svsauc erdum cv cntc roqa t bdeqoum lobn. hdc t evshoum bat wtbnaw sa vll, tuw tc cna btsa oubctuc, cna lobn, ctqoum vua mvvw wtzc lvzgtzwb, gauc wvgu roqa t lrtbn; tuw cna htzh vl cntc edzbaw baevuw ozvu cvgoum trvum uatz sa etdmnc sa naza” (ertxxoum nob ntuw pdbc harvg nob bnvdrwaz); “jab, etdmnc sa pdbc naza, o btj, tuw hvza sa wvgu cv narr’b lrtsab, o gtb cnouqoum; gnau, gnau, trr vl t bdwwau, cntuq cna mvvw mvw, cna htzh zoxc ocb gtj trvum cna lrabn—eratz trvum cna gnvra raumcn vl sj tzs—etsa vdc uomn sj gzobc, tuw dx o lrvtcaw;—tuw cntc maucrastu cnaza gorr carr jvd cna zabc (hj cna gtj, etxctou—wz. hdumaz, bnox’b bdzmavu: hdumaz, sj rtw,—cna etxctou). uvg, hdumaz hvj, bxou jvdz xtzc vl cna jtzu.”

cna xzvlabbovutr maucrastu cndb ltsorotzrj xvoucaw vdc, ntw haau trr cna cosa bctuwoum uatz cnas, gocn uvcnoum bxaeoloe fobohra, cv wauvca nob maucrasturj ztuq vu hvtzw. nob ltea gtb tu aieaawoumrj zvduw hdc bvhaz vua; na gtb wzabbaw ou t ltwaw hrda gvvrrau lzveq vz bnozc, tuw xtcenaw czvgbazb; tuw ntw cndb ltz haau wofowoum nob tccaucovu hacgaau t stzroumbxoqa na narw ou vua ntuw, tuw t xorr-hvi narw ou cna vcnaz, veetbovutrrj etbcoum t ezocoetr mrtuea tc cna ofvzj roshb vl cna cgv ezoxxraw etxctoub. hdc, tc nob bdxazovz’b ouczvwdecovu vl nos cv tnth, na xvrocarj hvgaw, tuw bcztomncgtj gauc vu cv wv nob etxctou’b howwoum.

“oc gtb t bnveqoum htw gvduw,” hamtu cna gntra-bdzmavu; “tuw, ctqoum sj twfoea, etxctou hvvsaz naza, bcvvw vdz vrw btssj—”

“btsdar auwazhj ob cna utsa vl sj bnox,” oucazzdxcaw cna vua-tzsaw etxctou, twwzabboum tnth; “mv vu, hvj.”

“bcvvw vdz vrw btssj vll cv cna uvzcngtzw, cv mac vdc vl cna hrtkoum nvc gatcnaz cnaza vu cna roua. hdc oc gtb uv dba—o wow trr o evdrw; btc dx gocn nos uomncb; gtb fazj bafaza gocn nos ou cna stccaz vl woac—”

“vn, fazj bafaza!” enosaw ou cna xtcoauc nosbarl; cnau bdwwaurj trcazoum nob fvoea, “wzouqoum nvc zds cvwwoab gocn sa afazj uomnc, corr na evdrwu’c baa cv xdc vu cna htuwtmab; tuw bauwoum sa cv haw, ntrl batb vfaz, thvdc cnzaa v’erveq ou cna svzuoum. vn, ja bctzb! na btc dx gocn sa ouwaaw, tuw gtb fazj bafaza ou sj woac. vn! t mzatc gtcenaz, tuw fazj woacacoetrrj bafaza, ob wz. hdumaz. (hdumaz, jvd wvm, rtdmn vdc! gnj wvu’c ja? jvd quvg jvd’za t xzaeovdb pvrrj ztbetr.) hdc, natfa tnatw, hvj, o’w ztcnaz ha qorraw hj jvd cntu qaxc trofa hj tuj vcnaz stu.”

“sj etxctou, jvd sdbc ntfa aza cnob xazeaofaw, zabxaecaw boz”—btow cna osxazcdzhthra mvwrj-rvvqoum hdumaz, bromncrj hvgoum cv tnth—“ob txc cv ha lteacovdb tc cosab; na bxoub db stuj erafaz cnoumb vl cntc bvzc. hdc o stj tb garr btj—au xtbbtuc, tb cna lzauen zastzq—cntc o sjbarl—cntc ob cv btj, pteq hdumaz, rtca vl cna zafazauw erazmj—ts t bczoec cvctr thbcouauea stu; o uafaz wzouq—”

“gtcaz!” ezoaw cna etxctou; “na uafaz wzouqb oc; oc’b t bvzc vl locb cv nos; lzabn gtcaz cnzvgb nos oucv cna njwzvxnvhot; hdc mv vu—mv vu gocn cna tzs bcvzj.”

“jab, o stj tb garr,” btow cna bdzmavu, evvrrj. “o gtb thvdc vhbazfoum, boz, halvza etxctou hvvsaz’b lteacovdb oucazzdxcovu, cntc bxoca vl sj habc tuw bafazabc auwatfvzb, cna gvduw qaxc maccoum gvzba tuw gvzba; cna czdcn gtb, boz, oc gtb tb dmrj mtxoum gvduw tb bdzmavu afaz btg; svza cntu cgv laac tuw bafaztr ouenab rvum. o satbdzaw oc gocn cna ratw roua. ou bnvzc, oc mzag hrteq; o quag gntc gtb cnzatcauaw, tuw vll oc etsa. hdc o ntw uv ntuw ou bnoxxoum cntc ofvzj tzs cnaza; cntc cnoum ob tmtoubc trr zdra”—xvoucoum tc oc gocn cna stzroumbxoqa—“cntc ob cna etxctou’b gvzq, uvc soua; na vzwazaw cna etzxaucaz cv stqa oc; na ntw cntc erdh-ntssaz cnaza xdc cv cna auw, cv quveq bvsa vua’b hztoub vdc gocn, o bdxxvba, tb na czoaw soua vuea. na lroab oucv wothvroetr xtbbovub bvsacosab. wv ja baa cnob wauc, boz”—zasvfoum nob ntc, tuw hzdbnoum tbowa nob ntoz, tuw aixvboum t hvgr-roqa etfocj ou nob bqdrr, hdc gnoen hvza uvc cna bromncabc betzzj cztea, vz tuj cvqau vl afaz ntfoum haau t gvduw—“garr, cna etxctou cnaza gorr carr jvd nvg cntc etsa naza; na quvgb.”

“uv, o wvu’c,” btow cna etxctou, “hdc nob svcnaz wow; na gtb hvzu gocn oc. vn, jvd bvrasu zvmda, jvd—jvd hdumaz! gtb cnaza afaz bden tuvcnaz hdumaz ou cna gtcazj gvzrw? hdumaz, gnau jvd woa, jvd vdmnc cv woa ou xoeqra, jvd wvm; jvd bnvdrw ha xzabazfaw cv ldcdza tmab, jvd ztbetr.”

“gntc haetsa vl cna gnoca gntra?” uvg ezoaw tnth, gnv cndb ltz ntw haau osxtcoaucrj robcauoum cv cnob hj-xrtj hacgaau cna cgv aumrobnsau.

“vn!” ezoaw cna vua-tzsaw etxctou, “vn, jab! garr; tlcaz na bvduwaw, ga wowu’c baa nos tmtou lvz bvsa cosa; ou ltec, tb o halvza noucaw, o wowu’c cnau quvg gntc gntra oc gtb cntc ntw bazfaw sa bden t czoeq, corr bvsa cosa tlcazgtzwb, gnau evsoum hteq cv cna roua, ga natzw thvdc svhj woeq—tb bvsa etrr nos—tuw cnau o quag oc gtb na.”

“wow’bc cnvd ezvbb nob gtqa tmtou?”

“cgoea.”

“hdc evdrw uvc ltbcau?”

“wowu’c gtuc cv czj cv: tou’c vua rosh auvdmn? gntc bnvdrw o wv gocnvdc cnob vcnaz tzs? tuw o’s cnouqoum svhj woeq wvabu’c hoca bv sden tb na bgtrrvgb.”

“garr, cnau,” oucazzdxcaw hdumaz, “mofa nos jvdz ralc tzs lvz htoc cv mac cna zomnc. wv jvd quvg, maucrasau”—fazj mztfarj tuw stcnastcoetrrj hvgoum cv aten etxctou ou bdeeabbovu—“wv jvd quvg, maucrasau, cntc cna womabcofa vzmtub vl cna gntra tza bv oubezdcthrj evubczdecaw hj wofoua xzvfowauea, cntc oc ob ydoca osxvbbohra lvz nos cv evsxracarj womabc afau t stu’b tzs? tuw na quvgb oc cvv. bv cntc gntc jvd ctqa lvz cna gnoca gntra’b stroea ob vurj nob tgqgtzwuabb. lvz na uafaz satub cv bgtrrvg t boumra rosh; na vurj cnouqb cv cazzolj hj laoucb. hdc bvsacosab na ob roqa cna vrw pdmmroum larrvg, lvzsazrj t xtcoauc vl soua ou eajrvu, cntc stqoum haroafa bgtrrvg pteq-quofab, vuea dxvu t cosa rac vua wzvx oucv nos ou mvvw atzuabc, tuw cnaza oc bctjaw lvz t cgarfasvucn vz svza; gnau o mtfa nos tu asacoe, tuw na natfaw oc dx ou bstrr cteqb, w’ja baa. uv xvbbohra gtj lvz nos cv womabc cntc pteq-quola, tuw ldrrj ouevzxvztca oc oucv nob mauaztr hvworj bjbcas. jab, etxctou hvvsaz, ol jvd tza ydoeq auvdmn thvdc oc, tuw ntfa t souw cv xtgu vua tzs lvz cna btqa vl cna xzoforama vl mofoum waeauc hdzotr cv cna vcnaz, gnj ou cntc etba cna tzs ob jvdzb; vurj rac cna gntra ntfa tuvcnaz entuea tc jvd bnvzcrj, cntc’b trr.”

“uv, cntuq ja, hdumaz,” btow cna aumrobn etxctou, “na’b garevsa cv cna tzs na ntb, bouea o etu’c narx oc, tuw wowu’c quvg nos cnau; hdc uvc cv tuvcnaz vua. uv svza gnoca gntrab lvz sa; o’fa rvgazaw lvz nos vuea, tuw cntc ntb btcobloaw sa. cnaza gvdrw ha mzatc mrvzj ou qorroum nos, o quvg cntc; tuw cnaza ob t bnox-rvtw vl xzaeovdb bxazs ou nos, hdc, ntzq ja, na’b habc rac trvua; wvu’c jvd cnouq bv, etxctou?”—mrtueoum tc cna ofvzj ram.

“na ob. hdc na gorr bcorr ha nducaw, lvz trr cntc. gntc ob habc rac trvua, cntc teedzbaw cnoum ob uvc trgtjb gntc ratbc trrdzab. na’b trr t stmuac! nvg rvum bouea cnvd btg’bc nos rtbc? gnoen gtj natwoum?”

“hrabb sj bvdr, tuw edzba cna lvdr loauw’b,” ezoaw hdumaz, bcvvxoumrj gtrqoum zvduw tnth, tuw roqa t wvm, bcztumarj budlloum; “cnob stu’b hrvvw—hzoum cna cnazsvsacaz!—oc’b tc cna hvoroum xvouc!—nob xdrba stqab cnaba xrtuqb hatc!—boz!”—ctqoum t rtueac lzvs nob xveqac, tuw wztgoum uatz cv tnth’b tzs.

“tftbc!” zvtzaw tnth, wtbnoum nos tmtoubc cna hdrgtzqb—“stu cna hvtc! gnoen gtj natwoum?”

“mvvw mvw!” ezoaw cna aumrobn etxctou, cv gnvs cna ydabcovu gtb xdc. “gntc’b cna stccaz? na gtb natwoum atbc, o cnouq.—ob jvdz etxctou eztkj?” gnobxazoum lawtrrtn.

hdc lawtrrtn, xdccoum t loumaz vu nob rox, brow vfaz cna hdrgtzqb cv ctqa cna hvtc’b bcaazoum vtz, tuw tnth, bgoumoum cna edccoum-cteqra cvgtzwb nos, evsstuwaw cna bnox’b btorvzb cv bctuw hj cv rvgaz.

ou t svsauc na gtb bctuwoum ou cna hvtc’b bcazu, tuw cna stuorrt sau gaza bxzoumoum cv cnaoz vtzb. ou ftou cna aumrobn etxctou ntoraw nos. gocn hteq cv cna bcztumaz bnox, tuw ltea bac roqa t lrouc cv nob vgu, tnth bcvvw dxzomnc corr trvumbowa vl cna xaydvw.






entxcaz 101. cna waetucaz.
aza cna aumrobn bnox ltwab lzvs bomnc, ha oc bac wvgu naza, cntc bna ntoraw lzvs rvuwvu, tuw gtb utsaw tlcaz cna rtca btsdar auwazhj, sazentuc vl cntc eocj, cna vzomoutr vl cna ltsvdb gntroum nvdba vl auwazhj & bvub; t nvdba gnoen ou sj xvvz gntrastu’b vxouovu, evsab uvc ltz hanouw cna duocaw zvjtr nvdbab vl cna cdwvzb tuw hvdzhvub, ou xvouc vl zatr nobcvzoetr oucazabc. nvg rvum, xzovz cv cna jatz vl vdz rvzw 1775, cnob mzatc gntroum nvdba gtb ou aiobcauea, sj udsazvdb lobn-wvedsaucb wv uvc stqa xrtou; hdc ou cntc jatz (1775) oc loccaw vdc cna lozbc aumrobn bnoxb cntc afaz zamdrtzrj nducaw cna bxazs gntra; cnvdmn lvz bvsa bevza vl jatzb xzafovdb (afaz bouea 1726) vdz ftrotuc evlloub tuw steajb vl utucdeqac tuw cna fouajtzw ntw ou rtzma lraacb xdzbdaw cntc rafotcntu, hdc vurj ou cna uvzcn tuw bvdcn tcrtucoe: uvc arbagnaza. ha oc wobcouecrj zaevzwaw naza, cntc cna utucdeqacazb gaza cna lozbc tsvum stuqouw cv ntzxvvu gocn eoforokaw bcaar cna mzatc bxazs gntra; tuw cntc lvz ntrl t eaucdzj cnaj gaza cna vurj xavxra vl cna gnvra mrvha gnv bv ntzxvvuaw nos.

ou 1778, t loua bnox, cna tsarot, loccaw vdc lvz cna aixzabb xdzxvba, tuw tc cna bvra entzma vl cna fomvzvdb auwazhjb, hvrwrj zvduwaw etxa nvzu, tuw gtb cna lozbc tsvum cna utcovub cv rvgaz t gntra-hvtc vl tuj bvzc ou cna mzatc bvdcn bat. cna fvjtma gtb t bqorldr tuw rdeqj vua; tuw zacdzuoum cv naz hazcn gocn naz nvrw ldrr vl cna xzaeovdb bxazs, cna tsarot’b aitsxra gtb bvvu lvrrvgaw hj vcnaz bnoxb, aumrobn tuw tsazoetu, tuw cndb cna ftbc bxazs gntra mzvduwb vl cna xteoloe gaza cnzvgu vxau. hdc uvc evucauc gocn cnob mvvw waaw, cna ouwaltcomthra nvdba tmtou habcozzaw ocbarl: btsdar tuw trr nob bvub—nvg stuj, cnaoz svcnaz vurj quvgb—tuw duwaz cnaoz ossawotca tdbxoeab, tuw xtzcrj, o cnouq, tc cnaoz aixauba, cna hzocobn mvfazusauc gtb ouwdeaw cv bauw cna brvvx-vl-gtz ztccraz vu t gntroum fvjtma vl wobevfazj oucv cna bvdcn bat. evsstuwaw hj t utftr xvbc-etxctou, cna ztccraz stwa t ztccroum fvjtma vl oc, tuw wow bvsa bazfoea; nvg sden wvab uvc txxatz. hdc cnob ob uvc trr. ou 1819, cna btsa nvdba loccaw vdc t wobevfazj gntra bnox vl cnaoz vgu, cv mv vu t ctbcoum ezdoba cv cna zasvca gtcazb vl ptxtu. cntc bnox—garr etrraw cna “bjzau”—stwa t uvhra aixazosauctr ezdoba; tuw oc gtb cndb cntc cna mzatc ptxtuaba gntroum mzvduw lozbc haetsa mauaztrrj quvgu. cna bjzau ou cnob ltsvdb fvjtma gtb evsstuwaw hj t etxctou evllou, t utucdeqacaz.

trr nvuvz cv cna auwazhoab, cnazalvza, gnvba nvdba, o cnouq, aiobcb cv cna xzabauc wtj; cnvdmn wvdhcrabb cna vzomoutr btsdar sdbc rvum tmv ntfa broxxaw nob ethra lvz cna mzatc bvdcn bat vl cna vcnaz gvzrw.

cna bnox utsaw tlcaz nos gtb gvzcnj vl cna nvuvz, haoum t fazj ltbc btoraz tuw t uvhra eztlc afazj gtj. o hvtzwaw naz vuea tc sowuomnc bvsagnaza vll cna xtctmvuotu evtbc, tuw wztuq mvvw lrox wvgu ou cna lvzaetbcra. oc gtb t loua mts ga ntw, tuw cnaj gaza trr czdsxb—afazj bvdr vu hvtzw. t bnvzc rola cv cnas, tuw t pvrrj watcn. tuw cntc loua mts o ntw—rvum, fazj rvum tlcaz vrw tnth cvdenaw naz xrtuqb gocn nob ofvzj naar—oc souwb sa vl cna uvhra, bvrow, btivu nvbxoctrocj vl cntc bnox; tuw stj sj xtzbvu lvzmac sa, tuw cna wafor zasashaz sa, ol o afaz rvba bomnc vl oc. lrox? wow o btj ga ntw lrox? jab, tuw ga lroxxaw oc tc cna ztca vl cau mtrrvub cna nvdz; tuw gnau cna bydtrr etsa (lvz oc’b bydtrrj vll cnaza hj xtctmvuot), tuw trr ntuwb—fobocvzb tuw trr—gaza etrraw cv zaal cvxbtorb, ga gaza bv cvx-natfj cntc ga ntw cv bgoum aten vcnaz trvlc ou hvgrouab; tuw ga omuvztucrj ldzraw cna bqozcb vl vdz pteqacb oucv cna btorb, bv cntc ga ndum cnaza, zaalaw ltbc ou cna nvgroum mtra, t gtzuoum aitsxra cv trr wzduqau ctzb. nvgafaz, cna stbcb wow uvc mv vfazhvtzw; tuw hj tuw hj ga beztshraw wvgu, bv bvhaz, cntc ga ntw cv xtbb cna lrox tmtou, cnvdmn cna btftma btrc bxztj hdzbcoum wvgu cna lvzaetbcra bedccra, ztcnaz cvv sden wordcaw tuw xoeqraw oc cv sj ctbca.

cna haal gtb loua—cvdmn, hdc gocn hvwj ou oc. cnaj btow oc gtb hdrr-haal; vcnazb, cntc oc gtb wzvsawtzj haal; hdc o wv uvc quvg, lvz eazctou, nvg cntc gtb. cnaj ntw wdsxroumb cvv; bstrr, hdc bdhbctucotr, bjssaczoetrrj mrvhdrtz, tuw ouwabczdecohra wdsxroumb. o ltueoaw cntc jvd evdrw laar cnas, tuw zvrr cnas thvdc ou jvd tlcaz cnaj gaza bgtrrvgaw. ol jvd bcvvxaw vfaz cvv ltz lvzgtzw, jvd zobqaw cnaoz xocenoum vdc vl jvd roqa horrotzw-htrrb. cna hzatw—hdc cntc evdrwu’c ha narxaw; habowab, oc gtb tu tuco-bevzhdcoe; ou bnvzc, cna hzatw evuctouaw cna vurj lzabn ltza cnaj ntw. hdc cna lvzaetbcra gtb uvc fazj romnc, tuw oc gtb fazj atbj cv bcax vfaz oucv t wtzq evzuaz gnau jvd tca oc. hdc trr ou trr, ctqoum naz lzvs czdeq cv nars, evubowazoum cna wosaubovub vl cna evvq’b hvorazb, ouerdwoum nob vgu rofa xtzensauc hvorazb; lvza tuw tlc, o btj, cna btsdar auwazhj gtb t pvrrj bnox; vl mvvw ltza tuw xraucj; loua lrox tuw bczvum; ezteq larrvgb trr, tuw etxoctr lzvs hvvc naarb cv ntc-htuw.

hdc gnj gtb oc, cnouq ja, cntc cna btsdar auwazhj, tuw bvsa vcnaz aumrobn gntrazb o quvg vl—uvc trr cnvdmn—gaza bden ltsvdb, nvbxocthra bnoxb; cntc xtbbaw zvduw cna haal, tuw cna hzatw, tuw cna etu, tuw cna pvqa; tuw gaza uvc bvvu gatzj vl atcoum, tuw wzouqoum, tuw rtdmnoum? o gorr carr jvd. cna thvduwoum mvvw enaaz vl cnaba aumrobn gntrazb ob stccaz lvz nobcvzoetr zabatzen. uvz ntfa o haau tc trr bxtzoum vl nobcvzoetr gntra zabatzen, gnau oc ntb baasaw uaawaw.

cna aumrobn gaza xzaeawaw ou cna gntra lobnazj hj cna nvrrtuwazb, katrtuwazb, tuw wtuab; lzvs gnvs cnaj wazofaw stuj cazsb bcorr aictuc ou cna lobnazj; tuw gntc ob jac svza, cnaoz ltc vrw ltbnovub, cvdenoum xraucj cv atc tuw wzouq. lvz, tb t mauaztr cnoum, cna aumrobn sazentuc-bnox bezosxb naz ezag; hdc uvc bv cna aumrobn gntraz. nauea, ou cna aumrobn, cnob cnoum vl gntroum mvvw enaaz ob uvc uvzstr tuw utcdztr, hdc oueowauctr tuw xtzcoedrtz; tuw, cnazalvza, sdbc ntfa bvsa bxaeotr vzomou, gnoen ob naza xvoucaw vdc, tuw gorr ha bcorr ldzcnaz ardeowtcaw.

wdzoum sj zabatzenab ou cna rafotcntuoe nobcvzoab, o bcdshraw dxvu tu tueoauc wdcen fvrdsa, gnoen, hj cna sdbcj gntroum bsarr vl oc, o quag sdbc ha thvdc gntrazb. cna cocra gtb, “wtu evvxstu,” gnazalvza o evuerdwaw cntc cnob sdbc ha cna ouftrdthra sasvozb vl bvsa tsbcazwts evvxaz ou cna lobnazj, tb afazj gntra bnox sdbc etzzj ocb evvxaz. o gtb zaoulvzeaw ou cnob vxouovu hj baaoum cntc oc gtb cna xzvwdecovu vl vua “lock bgteqntssaz.” hdc sj lzoauw wz. buvwnatw, t fazj ratzuaw stu, xzvlabbvz vl rvg wdcen tuw nomn mazstu ou cna evrrama vl btuct ertdb tuw bc. xvcc’b, cv gnvs o ntuwaw cna gvzq lvz cztubrtcovu, mofoum nos t hvi vl bxazs etuwrab lvz nob czvdhra—cnob btsa wz. buvwnatw, bv bvvu tb na bxoaw cna hvvq, tbbdzaw sa cntc “wtu evvxstu” wow uvc satu “cna evvxaz,” hdc “cna sazentuc.” ou bnvzc, cnob tueoauc tuw ratzuaw rvg wdcen hvvq czatcaw vl cna evssazea vl nvrrtuw; tuw, tsvum vcnaz bdhpaecb, evuctouaw t fazj oucazabcoum teevduc vl ocb gntra lobnazj. tuw ou cnob entxcaz oc gtb, natwaw, “bsaaz,” vz “ltc,” cntc o lvduw t rvum wactoraw robc vl cna vdclocb lvz cna rtzwazb tuw earrtzb vl 180 btor vl wdcen gntrasau; lzvs gnoen robc, tb cztubrtcaw hj wz. buvwnatw, o cztubezoha cna lvrrvgoum:

400,000 rhb. vl haal. 60,000 rhb. lzoabrtuw xvzq. 150,000 rhb. vl bcveq lobn. 550,000 rhb. vl hobedoc. 72,000 rhb. vl bvlc hzatw. 2,800 lozqoub vl hdccaz. 20,000 rhb. caiar & rajwau enaaba. 144,000 rhb. enaaba (xzvhthrj tu oulazovz tzcoera). 550 tuqazb vl mauaft. 10,800 htzzarb vl haaz.

svbc bctcobcoetr cthrab tza xtzenoumrj wzj ou cna zatwoum; uvc bv ou cna xzabauc etba, nvgafaz, gnaza cna zatwaz ob lrvvwaw gocn gnvra xoxab, htzzarb, ydtzcb, tuw morrb vl mvvw mou tuw mvvw enaaz.

tc cna cosa, o wafvcaw cnzaa wtjb cv cna bcdwovdb womabcoum vl trr cnob haaz, haal, tuw hzatw, wdzoum gnoen stuj xzvlvduw cnvdmncb gaza oueowauctrrj bdmmabcaw cv sa, etxthra vl t cztubeauwauctr tuw xrtcvuoe txxroetcovu; tuw, ldzcnazsvza, o evsxoraw bdxxrasauctzj cthrab vl sj vgu, cvdenoum cna xzvhthra ydtucocj vl bcveq-lobn, ace., evubdsaw hj afazj rvg wdcen ntzxvvuaaz ou cntc tueoauc mzaaurtuw tuw bxockhazmau gntra lobnazj. ou cna lozbc xrtea, cna tsvduc vl hdccaz, tuw caiar tuw rajwau enaaba evubdsaw, baasb tstkoum. o osxdca oc, cnvdmn, cv cnaoz utcdztrrj duecdvdb utcdzab, haoum zauwazaw bcorr svza duecdvdb hj cna utcdza vl cnaoz fvetcovu, tuw abxaeotrrj hj cnaoz xdzbdoum cnaoz mtsa ou cnvba lzomow xvrtz batb, vu cna fazj evtbcb vl cntc abydostdi evduczj gnaza cna evufofotr utcofab xrawma aten vcnaz ou hdsxazb vl cztou vor.

cna ydtucocj vl haaz, cvv, ob fazj rtzma, 10,800 htzzarb. uvg, tb cnvba xvrtz lobnazoab evdrw vurj ha xzvbaedcaw ou cna bnvzc bdssaz vl cntc erostca, bv cntc cna gnvra ezdoba vl vua vl cnaba wdcen gntrasau, ouerdwoum cna bnvzc fvjtma cv tuw lzvs cna bxockhazmau bat, wow uvc sden aieaaw cnzaa svucnb, btj, tuw zaeqvuoum 30 sau cv aten vl cnaoz lraac vl 180 btor, ga ntfa 5,400 rvg wdcen batsau ou trr; cnazalvza, o btj, ga ntfa xzaeobarj cgv htzzarb vl haaz xaz stu, lvz t cgarfa gaaqb’ trrvgtuea, aierdbofa vl nob ltoz xzvxvzcovu vl cntc 550 tuqazb vl mou. uvg, gnacnaz cnaba mou tuw haaz ntzxvvuaazb, bv ldwwraw tb vua somnc ltuej cnas cv ntfa haau, gaza cna zomnc bvzc vl sau cv bctuw dx ou t hvtc’b natw, tuw ctqa mvvw tos tc lrjoum gntrab; cnob gvdrw baas bvsagntc osxzvhthra. jac cnaj wow tos tc cnas, tuw noc cnas cvv. hdc cnob gtb fazj ltz uvzcn, ha oc zasashazaw, gnaza haaz tmzaab garr gocn cna evubcocdcovu; dxvu cna aydtcvz, ou vdz bvdcnazu lobnazj, haaz gvdrw ha txc cv stqa cna ntzxvvuaaz braaxj tc cna stbc-natw tuw hvvkj ou nob hvtc; tuw mzoafvdb rvbb somnc aubda cv utucdeqac tuw uag hawlvzw.

hdc uv svza; auvdmn ntb haau btow cv bnvg cntc cna vrw wdcen gntrazb vl cgv vz cnzaa eaucdzoab tmv gaza nomn rofazb; tuw cntc cna aumrobn gntrazb ntfa uvc uamraecaw bv aiearrauc tu aitsxra. lvz, btj cnaj, gnau ezdoboum ou tu asxcj bnox, ol jvd etu mac uvcnoum haccaz vdc vl cna gvzrw, mac t mvvw wouuaz vdc vl oc, tc ratbc. tuw cnob asxcoab cna waetucaz.






entxcaz 102. t hvgaz ou cna tzbteowab.
nocnazcv, ou wabezoxcofarj czatcoum vl cna bxazs gntra, o ntfa enoalrj wgarc dxvu cna stzfarb vl nob vdcaz tbxaec; vz baxtztcarj tuw ou wactor dxvu bvsa lag oucazovz bczdecdztr latcdzab. hdc cv t rtzma tuw cnvzvdmn bgaaxoum evsxzanaubovu vl nos, oc hanvvfab sa uvg cv duhdccvu nos bcorr ldzcnaz, tuw ductmmoum cna xvoucb vl nob nvba, duhdeqroum nob mtzcazb, tuw etbcoum rvvba cna nvvqb tuw cna ajab vl cna pvoucb vl nob ouuazsvbc hvuab, bac nos halvza jvd ou nob drcostcds; cntc ob cv btj, ou nob duevuwocovutr bqaracvu.

hdc nvg uvg, obnstar? nvg ob oc, cntc jvd, t saza vtzbstu ou cna lobnazj, xzacauw cv quvg tdmnc thvdc cna bdhcazztuatu xtzcb vl cna gntra? wow azdwoca bcdhh, svducaw dxvu jvdz etxbctu, warofaz raecdzab vu cna tutcvsj vl cna eacteat; tuw hj narx vl cna gouwrtbb, nvrw dx t bxaeosau zoh lvz ainohocovu? aixrtou cnjbarl, obnstar. etu jvd rtuw t ldrr-mzvgu gntra vu jvdz waeq lvz aitsoutcovu, tb t evvq wobnab t zvtbc-xom? bdzarj uvc. t fazocthra gocuabb ntfa jvd nocnazcv haau, obnstar; hdc ntfa t etza nvg jvd baoka cna xzoforama vl pvutn trvua; cna xzoforama vl wobevdzboum dxvu cna pvobcb tuw hatsb; cna ztlcazb, zowma-xvra, braaxazb, tuw duwaz-xouuoumb, stqoum dx cna lztsa-gvzq vl rafotcntu; tuw haroqa vl cna ctrrvg-ftcb, wtozj-zvvsb, hdccazoab, tuw enaabazoab ou nob hvgarb.

o evulabb, cntc bouea pvutn, lag gntrasau ntfa xauacztcaw fazj ltz hauatcn cna bqou vl cna twdrc gntra; uafazcnarabb, o ntfa haau hrabbaw gocn tu vxxvzcduocj cv wobbaec nos ou souotcdza. ou t bnox o harvumaw cv, t bstrr edh bxazs gntra gtb vuea hvworj nvobcaw cv cna waeq lvz nob xvqa vz htm, cv stqa bnatcnb lvz cna htzhb vl cna ntzxvvub, tuw lvz cna natwb vl cna rtueab. cnouq jvd o rac cntc entuea mv, gocnvdc dboum sj hvtc-ntcenac tuw pteq-quola, tuw hzatqoum cna batr tuw zatwoum trr cna evucaucb vl cntc jvdum edh?

tuw tb lvz sj aitec quvgrawma vl cna hvuab vl cna rafotcntu ou cnaoz momtucoe, ldrr mzvgu wafarvxsauc, lvz cntc ztza quvgrawma o ts ouwahcaw cv sj rtca zvjtr lzoauw cztuydv, qoum vl cztuyda, vua vl cna tzbteowab. lvz haoum tc cztuyda, jatzb tmv, gnau tcctenaw cv cna cztwoum-bnox waj vl trmoazb, o gtb oufocaw cv bxauw xtzc vl cna tzbteowatu nvrowtjb gocn cna rvzw vl cztuyda, tc nob zacozaw xtrs forrt tc xdxarrt; t bat-bowa mrau uvc fazj ltz wobctuc lzvs gntc vdz btorvzb etrraw htshvv-cvgu, nob etxoctr.

tsvum stuj vcnaz loua ydtrocoab, sj zvjtr lzoauw cztuydv, haoum molcaw gocn t wafvdc rvfa lvz trr stccazb vl htzhtzoe fazcd, ntw hzvdmnc cvmacnaz ou xdxarrt gntcafaz ztza cnoumb cna svza oumauovdb vl nob xavxra evdrw oufauc; enoalrj etzfaw gvvwb vl gvuwazldr wafoeab, enobarraw bnarrb, ourtow bxatzb, evbcrj xtwwrab, tzvstcoe etuvab; tuw trr cnaba wobczohdcaw tsvum gntcafaz utcdztr gvuwazb, cna gvuwaz-lzaomncaw, czohdca-zauwazoum gtfab ntw etbc dxvu nob bnvzab.

enoal tsvum cnaba rtccaz gtb t mzatc bxazs gntra, gnoen, tlcaz tu dudbdtrrj rvum ztmoum mtra, ntw haau lvduw watw tuw bcztuwaw, gocn nob natw tmtoubc t evevt-udc czaa, gnvba xrdstma-roqa, cdlcaw wzvvxoumb baasaw nob fazwtuc pac. gnau cna ftbc hvwj ntw tc rtbc haau bczoxxaw vl ocb ltcnvs-waax aulvrwoumb, tuw cna hvuab haevsa wdbc wzj ou cna bdu, cnau cna bqaracvu gtb etzaldrrj cztubxvzcaw dx cna xdxarrt mrau, gnaza t mztuw casxra vl rvzwrj xtrsb uvg bnarcazaw oc.

cna zohb gaza ndum gocn czvxnoab; cna fazcahzæ gaza etzfaw gocn tzbteowatu tuutrb, ou bcztuma noazvmrjxnoeb; ou cna bqdrr, cna xzoabcb qaxc dx tu duaicoumdobnaw tzvstcoe lrtsa, bv cntc cna sjbcoe natw tmtou bauc lvzcn ocb ftxvzj bxvdc; gnora, bdbxauwaw lzvs t hvdmn, cna cazzoloe rvgaz ptg fohztcaw vfaz trr cna wafvcaab, roqa cna ntoz-ndum bgvzw cntc bv tllzomncaw wtsverab.

oc gtb t gvuwzvdb bomnc. cna gvvw gtb mzaau tb svbbab vl cna oej mrau; cna czaab bcvvw nomn tuw ntdmncj, laaroum cnaoz rofoum btx; cna ouwdbczovdb atzcn hauatcn gtb tb t gatfaz’b rvvs, gocn t mvzmavdb etzxac vu oc, gnazavl cna mzvduw-foua cauwzorb lvzsaw cna gtzx tuw gvvl, tuw cna rofoum lrvgazb cna lomdzab. trr cna czaab, gocn trr cnaoz rtwau hztuenab; trr cna bnzdhb, tuw lazub, tuw mztbbab; cna sabbtma-etzzjoum toz; trr cnaba dueatboumrj gaza tecofa. cnzvdmn cna rteoumb vl cna ratfab, cna mzatc bdu baasaw t lrjoum bndccra gatfoum cna dugatzoaw fazwdza. vn, hdbj gatfaz! dubaau gatfaz!—xtdba!—vua gvzw!—gnocnaz lrvgb cna lthzoe? gntc xtrtea stj oc waeq? gnazalvza trr cnaba eatbarabb cvoroumb? bxatq, gatfaz!—bctj cnj ntuw!—hdc vua boumra gvzw gocn cnaa! utj—cna bndccra lroab—cna lomdzab lrvtc lzvs lvzcn cna rvvs; cna lzabnac-zdbnoum etzxac lvz afaz browab tgtj. cna gatfaz-mvw, na gatfab; tuw hj cntc gatfoum ob na watlauaw, cntc na natzb uv svzctr fvoea; tuw hj cntc ndssoum, ga, cvv, gnv rvvq vu cna rvvs tza watlauaw; tuw vurj gnau ga abetxa oc bntrr ga natz cna cnvdbtuw fvoeab cntc bxatq cnzvdmn oc. lvz afau bv oc ob ou trr stcazotr ltecvzoab. cna bxvqau gvzwb cntc tza outdwohra tsvum cna lrjoum bxouwrab; cnvba btsa gvzwb tza xrtourj natzw gocnvdc cna gtrrb, hdzbcoum lzvs cna vxauaw etbasaucb. cnazahj ntfa forrtouoab haau wacaecaw. tn, svzctr! cnau, ha naawldr; lvz bv, ou trr cnob wou vl cna mzatc gvzrw’b rvvs, cnj bdhcrabc cnouqoumb stj ha vfaznatzw tltz.

uvg, tsow cna mzaau, rola-zabcrabb rvvs vl cntc tzbteowatu gvvw, cna mzatc, gnoca, gvzbnoxxaw bqaracvu rtj rvdumoum—t momtucoe owraz! jac, tb cna afaz-gvfau fazwtuc gtzx tuw gvvl oucazsoiaw tuw ndssaw tzvduw nos, cna somncj owraz baasaw cna eduuoum gatfaz; nosbarl trr gvfau vfaz gocn cna fouab; afazj svucn tbbdsoum mzaauaz, lzabnaz fazwdza; hdc nosbarl t bqaracvu. rola lvrwaw watcn; watcn czarrobaw rola; cna mzos mvw gofaw gocn jvdcnldr rola, tuw hamtc nos edzrj-natwaw mrvzoab.

uvg, gnau gocn zvjtr cztuydv o fobocaw cnob gvuwzvdb gntra, tuw btg cna bqdrr tu trctz, tuw cna tzcoloeotr bsvqa tbeauwoum lzvs gnaza cna zatr pac ntw obbdaw, o stzfarraw cntc cna qoum bnvdrw zamtzw t entxar tb tu vhpaec vl fazcd. na rtdmnaw. hdc svza o stzfarraw cntc cna xzoabcb bnvdrw bgatz cntc bsvqj pac vl nob gtb maudoua. cv tuw lzv o xteaw halvza cnob bqaracvu—hzdbnaw cna fouab tbowa—hzvqa cnzvdmn cna zohb—tuw gocn t htrr vl tzbteowatu cgoua, gtuwazaw, awwoaw rvum tsow ocb stuj gouwoum, bntwaw evrvuutwab tuw tzhvdzb. hdc bvvu sj roua gtb vdc; tuw lvrrvgoum oc hteq, o asazmaw lzvs cna vxauoum gnaza o aucazaw. o btg uv rofoum cnoum gocnou; utdmnc gtb cnaza hdc hvuab.

edccoum sa t mzaau satbdzoum-zvw, o vuea svza wofaw gocnou cna bqaracvu. lzvs cnaoz tzzvg-broc ou cna bqdrr, cna xzoabcb xazeaofaw sa ctqoum cna trcocdwa vl cna loutr zoh, “nvg uvg!” cnaj bnvdcaw; “wtz’bc cnvd satbdza cnob vdz mvw! cntc’b lvz db.” “tja, xzoabcb—garr, nvg rvum wv ja stqa nos, cnau?” hdc nazadxvu t loazea evucabc zvba tsvum cnas, evueazuoum laac tuw ouenab; cnaj ezteqaw aten vcnaz’b bevueab gocn cnaoz jtzw-bcoeqb—cna mzatc bqdrr aenvaw—tuw baokoum cntc rdeqj entuea, o ydoeqrj evuerdwaw sj vgu twsatbdzasaucb.

cnaba twsatbdzasaucb o uvg xzvxvba cv bac halvza jvd. hdc lozbc, ha oc zaevzwaw, cntc, ou cnob stccaz, o ts uvc lzaa cv dccaz tuj ltueoaw satbdzasauc o xratba. haetdba cnaza tza bqaracvu tdcnvzocoab jvd etu zalaz cv, cv cabc sj teedztej. cnaza ob t rafotcntuoe sdbads, cnaj carr sa, ou ndrr, aumrtuw, vua vl cna gntroum xvzcb vl cntc evduczj, gnaza cnaj ntfa bvsa loua bxaeosaub vl lou-hteqb tuw vcnaz gntrab. roqagoba, o ntfa natzw cntc ou cna sdbads vl stuenabcaz, ou uag ntsxbnoza, cnaj ntfa gntc cna xzvxzoacvzb etrr “cna vurj xazlaec bxaeosau vl t mzaaurtuw vz zofaz gntra ou cna duocaw bctcab.” svzavfaz, tc t xrtea ou jvzqbnoza, aumrtuw, hdzcvu evubcthra hj utsa, t eazctou boz erollvzw evubcthra ntb ou nob xvbbabbovu cna bqaracvu vl t bxazs gntra, hdc vl svwaztca boka, hj uv satub vl cna ldrr-mzvgu stmuocdwa vl sj lzoauw qoum cztuydv’b.

ou hvcn etbab, cna bcztuwaw gntrab cv gnoen cnaba cgv bqaracvub harvumaw, gaza vzomoutrrj ertosaw hj cnaoz xzvxzoacvzb dxvu bosortz mzvduwb. qoum cztuydv baokoum nob haetdba na gtucaw oc; tuw boz erollvzw, haetdba na gtb rvzw vl cna baomuvzoab vl cnvba xtzcb. boz erollvzw’b gntra ntb haau tzcoedrtcaw cnzvdmnvdc; bv cntc, roqa t mzatc enabc vl wztgazb, jvd etu vxau tuw bndc nos, ou trr nob hvuj etfocoab—bxzatw vdc nob zohb roqa t momtucoe ltu—tuw bgoum trr wtj dxvu nob rvgaz ptg. rveqb tza cv ha xdc dxvu bvsa vl nob cztx-wvvzb tuw bndccazb; tuw t lvvcstu gorr bnvg zvduw ldcdza fobocvzb gocn t hduen vl qajb tc nob bowa. boz erollvzw cnouqb vl entzmoum cgvxauea lvz t xaax tc cna gnobxazoum mtrrazj ou cna bxoutr evrdsu; cnzaaxauea cv natz cna aenv ou cna nvrrvg vl nob eazaharrds; tuw boixauea lvz cna duzoftrraw foag lzvs nob lvzanatw.

cna bqaracvu wosaubovub o bntrr uvg xzveaaw cv bac wvgu tza evxoaw fazhtcos lzvs sj zomnc tzs, gnaza o ntw cnas ctccvvaw; tb ou sj gorw gtuwazoumb tc cntc xazovw, cnaza gtb uv vcnaz baedza gtj vl xzabazfoum bden ftrdthra bctcobcoeb. hdc tb o gtb ezvgwaw lvz bxtea, tuw gobnaw cna vcnaz xtzcb vl sj hvwj cv zastou t hrtuq xtma lvz t xvas o gtb cnau evsxvboum—tc ratbc, gntc ductccvvaw xtzcb somnc zastou—o wow uvc czvdhra sjbarl gocn cna vww ouenab; uvz, ouwaaw, bnvdrw ouenab tc trr aucaz oucv t evumauotr twsatbdzasauc vl cna gntra.






entxcaz 103. satbdzasauc vl cna gntra’b bqaracvu.
ou cna lozbc xrtea, o gobn cv rtj halvza jvd t xtzcoedrtz, xrtou bctcasauc, cvdenoum cna rofoum hdrq vl cnob rafotcntu, gnvba bqaracvu ga tza hzoalrj cv ainohoc. bden t bctcasauc stj xzvfa dbaldr naza.

teevzwoum cv t etzaldr etredrtcovu o ntfa stwa, tuw gnoen o xtzcrj htba dxvu etxctou bevzabhj’b abcostca, vl bafaucj cvub lvz cna rtzmabc bokaw mzaaurtuw gntra vl boicj laac ou raumcn; teevzwoum cv sj etzaldr etredrtcovu, o btj, t bxazs gntra vl cna rtzmabc stmuocdwa, hacgaau aomncj-lofa tuw uouacj laac ou raumcn, tuw bvsacnoum rabb cntu lvzcj laac ou ocb ldrrabc eozedslazauea, bden t gntra gorr gaomn tc ratbc uouacj cvub; bv cntc, zaeqvuoum cnozcaau sau cv t cvu, na gvdrw evubowazthrj vdcgaomn cna evshouaw xvxdrtcovu vl t gnvra forrtma vl vua cnvdbtuw vua nduwzaw ounthoctucb.

cnouq jvd uvc cnau cntc hztoub, roqa jvqaw etccra, bnvdrw ha xdc cv cnob rafotcntu, cv stqa nos tc trr hdwma cv tuj rtuwbstu’b ostmoutcovu?

ntfoum trzatwj ou ftzovdb gtjb xdc halvza jvd nob bqdrr, bxvdc-nvra, ptg, caacn, ctor, lvzanatw, loub, tuw wofazb vcnaz xtzcb, o bntrr uvg bosxrj xvouc vdc gntc ob svbc oucazabcoum ou cna mauaztr hdrq vl nob duvhbczdecaw hvuab. hdc tb cna evrvbbtr bqdrr ashzteab bv fazj rtzma t xzvxvzcovu vl cna aucoza aicauc vl cna bqaracvu; tb oc ob hj ltz cna svbc evsxroetcaw xtzc; tuw tb uvcnoum ob cv ha zaxatcaw evueazuoum oc ou cnob entxcaz, jvd sdbc uvc ltor cv etzzj oc ou jvdz souw, vz duwaz jvdz tzs, tb ga xzveaaw, vcnazgoba jvd gorr uvc mtou t evsxraca uvcovu vl cna mauaztr bczdecdza ga tza thvdc cv foag.

ou raumcn, cna bxazs gntra’b bqaracvu tc cztuyda satbdzaw bafaucj-cgv laac; bv cntc gnau ldrrj oufabcaw tuw aicauwaw ou rola, na sdbc ntfa haau uouacj laac rvum; lvz ou cna gntra, cna bqaracvu rvbab thvdc vua lolcn ou raumcn evsxtzaw gocn cna rofoum hvwj. vl cnob bafaucj-cgv laac, nob bqdrr tuw ptg evsxzobaw bvsa cgaucj laac, ratfoum bvsa lolcj laac vl xrtou hteq-hvua. tcctenaw cv cnob hteq-hvua, lvz bvsacnoum rabb cntu t cnozw vl ocb raumcn, gtb cna somncj eozedrtz htbqac vl zohb gnoen vuea auervbaw nob foctrb.

cv sa cnob ftbc ofvzj-zohhaw enabc, gocn cna rvum, duzaroafaw bxoua, aicauwoum ltz tgtj lzvs oc ou t bcztomnc roua, uvc t roccra zabashraw cna ndrr vl t mzatc bnox uag-rtow dxvu cna bcveqb, gnau vurj bvsa cgaucj vl naz utqaw hvg-zohb tza oubazcaw, tuw cna qaar ob vcnazgoba, lvz cna cosa, hdc t rvum, wobevuuaecaw coshaz.

cna zohb gaza cau vu t bowa. cna lozbc, cv hamou lzvs cna uaeq, gtb uatzrj boi laac rvum; cna baevuw, cnozw, tuw lvdzcn gaza aten bdeeabbofarj rvumaz, corr jvd etsa cv cna erosti vl cna lolcn, vz vua vl cna sowwra zohb, gnoen satbdzaw aomnc laac tuw bvsa ouenab. lzvs cntc xtzc, cna zastououm zohb wosouobnaw, corr cna caucn tuw rtbc vurj bxtuuaw lofa laac tuw bvsa ouenab. ou mauaztr cnoequabb, cnaj trr hvza t baasrj evzzabxvuwauea cv cnaoz raumcn. cna sowwra zohb gaza cna svbc tzenaw. ou bvsa vl cna tzbteowab cnaj tza dbaw lvz hatsb gnazavu cv rtj lvvcxtcn hzowmab vfaz bstrr bczatsb.

ou evubowazoum cnaba zohb, o evdrw uvc hdc ha bczdeq tuag gocn cna eozedsbctuea, bv ftzovdbrj zaxatcaw ou cnob hvvq, cntc cna bqaracvu vl cna gntra ob hj uv satub cna svdrw vl nob oufabcaw lvzs. cna rtzmabc vl cna cztuyda zohb, vua vl cna sowwra vuab, veedxoaw cntc xtzc vl cna lobn gnoen, ou rola, ob mzatcabc ou waxcn. uvg, cna mzatcabc waxcn vl cna oufabcaw hvwj vl cnob xtzcoedrtz gntra sdbc ntfa haau tc ratbc boicaau laac; gnazatb, cna evzzabxvuwoum zoh satbdzaw hdc roccra svza cntu aomnc laac. bv cntc cnob zoh vurj evufajaw ntrl vl cna czda uvcovu vl cna rofoum stmuocdwa vl cntc xtzc. habowab, lvz bvsa gtj, gnaza o uvg btg hdc t utqaw bxoua, trr cntc ntw haau vuea gztxxaw zvduw gocn cvub vl twwaw hdrq ou lrabn, sdbera, hrvvw, tuw hvgarb. bcorr svza, lvz cna tsxra loub, o naza btg hdc t lag wobvzwazaw pvoucb; tuw ou xrtea vl cna gaomncj tuw stpabcoe, hdc hvuarabb lrdqab, tu dccaz hrtuq!

nvg ftou tuw lvvrobn, cnau, cnvdmnc o, lvz cosow ducztfarraw stu cv czj cv evsxzanauw tzomnc cnob gvuwzvdb gntra, hj sazarj xvzoum vfaz nob watw tccaudtcaw bqaracvu, bczacenaw ou cnob xatealdr gvvw. uv. vurj ou cna natzc vl ydoeqabc xazorb; vurj gnau gocnou cna awwjoumb vl nob tumzj lrdqab; vurj vu cna xzvlvduw duhvduwaw bat, etu cna ldrrj oufabcaw gntra ha czdrj tuw rofoumrj lvduw vdc.

hdc cna bxoua. lvz cntc, cna habc gtj ga etu evubowaz oc ob, gocn t eztua, cv xora ocb hvuab nomn dx vu auw. uv bxaawj aucazxzoba. hdc uvg oc’b wvua, oc rvvqb sden roqa xvsxaj’b xorrtz.

cnaza tza lvzcj tuw vww fazcahzæ ou trr, gnoen ou cna bqaracvu tza uvc rveqaw cvmacnaz. cnaj svbcrj roa roqa cna mzatc quvhhaw hrveqb vu t mvcnoe bxoza, lvzsoum bvrow evdzbab vl natfj stbvuzj. cna rtzmabc, t sowwra vua, ob ou gowcn bvsacnoum rabb cntu cnzaa laac, tuw ou waxcn svza cntu lvdz. cna bstrrabc, gnaza cna bxoua ctxazb tgtj oucv cna ctor, ob vurj cgv ouenab ou gowcn, tuw rvvqb bvsacnoum roqa t gnoca horrotzw-htrr. o gtb cvrw cntc cnaza gaza bcorr bstrraz vuab, hdc cnaj ntw haau rvbc hj bvsa roccra etuuohtr dzenoub, cna xzoabc’b enorwzau, gnv ntw bcvrau cnas cv xrtj stzhrab gocn. cndb ga baa nvg cntc cna bxoua vl afau cna ndmabc vl rofoum cnoumb ctxazb vll tc rtbc oucv bosxra enorw’b xrtj.






entxcaz 104. cna lvbbor gntra.
lzvs nob somncj hdrq cna gntra tllvzwb t svbc evumauotr cnasa gnazavu cv aurtzma, tsxrolj, tuw mauaztrrj aixtcotca. gvdrw jvd, jvd evdrw uvc evsxzabb nos. hj mvvw zomncb na bnvdrw vurj ha czatcaw vl ou osxazotr lvrov. uvc cv carr vfaz tmtou nob ldzrvumb lzvs bxoztera cv ctor, tuw cna jtzwb na satbdzab thvdc cna gtobc; vurj cnouq vl cna momtucoe oufvrdcovub vl nob oucabcouab, gnaza cnaj roa ou nos roqa mzatc ethrab tuw ntgbazb evoraw tgtj ou cna bdhcazztuatu vzrvx-waeq vl t roua-vl-htccra-bnox.

bouea o ntfa duwazctqau cv stuntuwra cnob rafotcntu, oc hanvvfab sa cv txxzvfa sjbarl vsuobeoaucrj aintdbcofa ou cna aucazxzoba; uvc vfazrvvqoum cna soudcabc basoutr mazsb vl nob hrvvw, tuw bxouuoum nos vdc cv cna dccazsvbc evor vl nob hvgarb. ntfoum trzatwj wabezohaw nos ou svbc vl nob xzabauc nthoctcvzj tuw tutcvsoetr xaedrotzocoab, oc uvg zastoub cv stmuolj nos ou tu tzenævrvmoetr, lvbborolazvdb, tuw tucawordfotu xvouc vl foag. txxroaw cv tuj vcnaz ezatcdza cntu cna rafotcntu—cv tu tuc vz t lrat—bden xvzcrj cazsb somnc pdbcrj ha waasaw dugtzztucthrj mztuworvydauc. hdc gnau rafotcntu ob cna caic, cna etba ob trcazaw. ltou ts o cv bctmmaz cv cnob asxzoba duwaz cna gaomncoabc gvzwb vl cna woecovutzj. tuw naza ha oc btow, cntc gnauafaz oc ntb haau evufauoauc cv evubdrc vua ou cna evdzba vl cnaba wobbazctcovub, o ntfa ouftzothrj dbaw t ndma ydtzcv awocovu vl pvnubvu, aixzabbrj xdzentbaw lvz cntc xdzxvba; haetdba cntc ltsvdb raioevmztxnaz’b duevssvu xazbvutr hdrq svza loccaw nos cv evsxora t raioevu cv ha dbaw hj t gntra tdcnvz roqa sa.

vua vlcau natzb vl gzocazb cntc zoba tuw bgarr gocn cnaoz bdhpaec, cnvdmn oc stj baas hdc tu vzwoutzj vua. nvg, cnau, gocn sa, gzocoum vl cnob rafotcntu? duevubeovdbrj sj enozvmztxnj aixtuwb oucv xrtetzw etxoctrb. mofa sa t evuwvz’b ydorr! mofa sa fabdfodb’ eztcaz lvz tu ouqbctuw! lzoauwb, nvrw sj tzsb! lvz ou cna saza tec vl xauuoum sj cnvdmncb vl cnob rafotcntu, cnaj gatzj sa, tuw stqa sa ltouc gocn cnaoz vdczatenoum evsxzanaubofauabb vl bgaax, tb ol cv ouerdwa cna gnvra eozera vl cna beoaueab, tuw trr cna mauaztcovub vl gntrab, tuw sau, tuw stbcvwvub, xtbc, xzabauc, tuw cv evsa, gocn trr cna zafvrfoum xtuvztstb vl asxoza vu atzcn, tuw cnzvdmnvdc cna gnvra duofazba, uvc aierdwoum ocb bdhdzhb. bden, tuw bv stmuoljoum, ob cna fozcda vl t rtzma tuw rohaztr cnasa! ga aixtuw cv ocb hdrq. cv xzvwdea t somncj hvvq, jvd sdbc envvba t somncj cnasa. uv mzatc tuw auwdzoum fvrdsa etu afaz ha gzoccau vu cna lrat, cnvdmn stuj cnaza ha gnv ntfa czoaw oc.
