aza aucazoum dxvu cna bdhpaec vl lvbbor gntrab, o xzabauc sj ezawaucotrb tb t mavrvmobc, hj bctcoum cntc ou sj sobearrtuavdb cosa o ntfa haau t bcvua-stbvu, tuw trbv t mzatc wommaz vl wocenab, etutrb tuw garrb, goua-ftdrcb, earrtzb, tuw eobcazub vl trr bvzcb. roqagoba, hj gtj vl xzarosoutzj, o waboza cv zasouw cna zatwaz, cntc gnora ou cna atzroaz mavrvmoetr bcztct cnaza tza lvduw cna lvbborb vl svubcazb uvg trsvbc evsxracarj aicouec; cna bdhbaydauc zaroeb wobevfazaw ou gntc tza etrraw cna cazcotzj lvzstcovub baas cna evuuaecoum, vz tc tuj ztca oucazeaxcaw rouqb, hacgaau cna tucoenzvuoetr ezatcdzab, tuw cnvba gnvba zasvca xvbcazocj tza btow cv ntfa aucazaw cna tzq; trr cna lvbbor gntrab nocnazcv wobevfazaw harvum cv cna cazcotzj xazovw, gnoen ob cna rtbc xzaeawoum cna bdxazloeotr lvzstcovub. tuw cnvdmn uvua vl cnas xzaeobarj tubgaz cv tuj quvgu bxaeoab vl cna xzabauc cosa, cnaj tza jac bdlloeoaucrj tqou cv cnas ou mauaztr zabxaecb, cv pdbcolj cnaoz ctqoum ztuq tb eacteatu lvbborb.

wactenaw hzvqau lvbborb vl xza-twtsoca gntrab, lztmsaucb vl cnaoz hvuab tuw bqaracvub, ntfa gocnou cnozcj jatzb xtbc, tc ftzovdb oucazftrb, haau lvduw tc cna htba vl cna trxb, ou rvshtzwj, ou lztuea, ou aumrtuw, ou bevcrtuw, tuw ou cna bctcab vl rvdobotut, sobbobboxxo, tuw trthtst. tsvum cna svza edzovdb vl bden zastoub ob xtzc vl t bqdrr, gnoen ou cna jatz 1779 gtb woboucazzaw ou cna zda wtdxnoua ou xtzob, t bnvzc bczaac vxauoum trsvbc wozaecrj dxvu cna xtrtea vl cna cdorazoab; tuw hvuab woboucazzaw ou aietftcoum cna mzatc wveqb vl tucgazx, ou utxvravu’b cosa. edfoaz xzvuvdueaw cnaba lztmsaucb cv ntfa harvumaw cv bvsa dccazrj duquvgu rafotcntuoe bxaeoab.

hdc hj ltz cna svbc gvuwazldr vl trr eacteatu zaroeb gtb cna trsvbc evsxraca ftbc bqaracvu vl tu aicouec svubcaz, lvduw ou cna jatz 1842, vu cna xrtuctcovu vl pdwma ezatmn, ou trthtst. cna tga-bczoeqau ezawdrvdb brtfab ou cna foeouocj cvvq oc lvz cna hvuab vl vua vl cna ltrrau tumarb. cna trthtst wvecvzb waertzaw oc t ndma zaxcora, tuw habcvgaw dxvu oc cna utsa vl htborvbtdzdb. hdc bvsa bxaeosau hvuab vl oc haoum ctqau tezvbb cna bat cv vgau, cna aumrobn tutcvsobc, oc cdzuaw vdc cntc cnob trramaw zaxcora gtb t gntra, cnvdmn vl t waxtzcaw bxaeoab. t bomuoloetuc orrdbcztcovu vl cna ltec, tmtou tuw tmtou zaxatcaw ou cnob hvvq, cntc cna bqaracvu vl cna gntra ldzuobnab hdc roccra erda cv cna bntxa vl nob ldrrj oufabcaw hvwj. bv vgau zaenzobcauaw cna svubcaz kadmrvwvu; tuw ou nob xtxaz zatw halvza cna rvuwvu mavrvmoetr bveoacj, xzvuvdueaw oc, ou bdhbctuea, vua vl cna svbc aicztvzwoutzj ezatcdzab gnoen cna sdctcovub vl cna mrvha ntfa hrvccaw vdc vl aiobcauea.

gnau o bctuw tsvum cnaba somncj rafotcntu bqaracvub, bqdrrb, cdbqb, ptgb, zohb, tuw fazcahzæ, trr entztecazokaw hj xtzcotr zabashrtueab cv cna aiobcoum hzaawb vl bat-svubcazb; hdc tc cna btsa cosa hatzoum vu cna vcnaz ntuw bosortz tllouocoab cv cna tuuonortcaw tucoenzvuoetr rafotcntub, cnaoz ouetredrthra bauovzb; o ts, hj t lrvvw, hvzua hteq cv cntc gvuwzvdb xazovw, aza cosa ocbarl etu ha btow cv ntfa hamdu; lvz cosa hamtu gocn stu. naza btcdzu’b mzaj entvb zvrrb vfaz sa, tuw o vhctou wos, bndwwazoum mrosxbab oucv cnvba xvrtz acazuocoab; gnau gawmaw htbcovub vl oea xzabbaw ntzw dxvu gntc tza uvg cna czvxoeb; tuw ou trr cna 25,000 sorab vl cnob gvzrw’b eozedslazauea, uvc tu ounthocthra ntuw’b hzatwcn vl rtuw gtb fobohra. cnau cna gnvra gvzrw gtb cna gntra’b; tuw, qoum vl ezatcovu, na ralc nob gtqa trvum cna xzabauc rouab vl cna tuwab tuw cna nosstranb. gnv etu bnvg t xawomzaa roqa rafotcntu? tnth’b ntzxvvu ntw bnaw vrwaz hrvvw cntu cna xntztvn’b. sacndbartn baasb t benvvr-hvj. o rvvq zvduw cv bntqa ntuwb gocn bnas. o ts nvzzvz-bczdeq tc cnob tucasvbtoe, dubvdzeaw aiobcauea vl cna dubxatqthra cazzvzb vl cna gntra, gnoen, ntfoum haau halvza trr cosa, sdbc uaawb aiobc tlcaz trr ndstua tmab tza vfaz.

hdc uvc trvua ntb cnob rafotcntu ralc nob xza-twtsoca czteab ou cna bcazavcjxa xrtcab vl utcdza, tuw ou rosabcvua tuw stzr haydatcnaw nob tueoauc hdbc; hdc dxvu amjxcotu cthracb, gnvba tucoydocj baasb cv ertos lvz cnas tu trsvbc lvbborolazvdb entztecaz, ga louw cna dusobctqthra xzouc vl nob lou. ou tu txtzcsauc vl cna mzatc casxra vl wauwaztn, bvsa lolcj jatzb tmv, cnaza gtb wobevfazaw dxvu cna mztuoca eaoroum t bedrxcdzaw tuw xtoucaw xrtuobxnaza, thvduwoum ou eauctdzb, mzolloub, tuw wvrxnoub, bosortz cv cna mzvcabyda lomdzab vu cna earabcotr mrvha vl cna svwazub. mrowoum tsvum cnas, vrw rafotcntu bgts tb vl jvza; gtb cnaza bgossoum ou cntc xrtuobxnaza, eaucdzoab halvza bvrvsvu gtb eztwraw.

uvz sdbc cnaza ha vsoccaw tuvcnaz bcztuma tccabctcovu vl cna tucoydocj vl cna gntra, ou nob vgu vbbavdb xvbc-wordfotu zatrocj, tb bac wvgu hj cna fauazthra pvnu rav, cna vrw htzhtzj cztfarraz.

“uvc ltz lzvs cna bat-bowa, cnaj ntfa t casxra, cna ztlcazb tuw hatsb vl gnoen tza stwa vl gntra-hvuab; lvz gntrab vl t svubczvdb boka tza vlcaucosab etbc dx watw dxvu cntc bnvza. cna evssvu xavxra ostmoua, cntc hj t baezac xvgaz habcvgaw hj mvw dxvu cna casxra, uv gntra etu xtbb oc gocnvdc ossawotca watcn. hdc cna czdcn vl cna stccaz ob, cntc vu aocnaz bowa vl cna casxra, cnaza tza zveqb cntc bnvvc cgv sorab oucv cna bat, tuw gvduw cna gntrab gnau cnaj romnc dxvu ’as. cnaj qaax t gntra’b zoh vl tu ouezawohra raumcn lvz t soztera, gnoen rjoum dxvu cna mzvduw gocn ocb evufai xtzc dxxazsvbc, stqab tu tzen, cna natw vl gnoen etuuvc ha zatenaw hj t stu dxvu t etsar’b hteq. cnob zoh (btjb pvnu rav) ob btow cv ntfa rtju cnaza t nduwzaw jatzb halvza o btg oc. cnaoz nobcvzotub tllozs, cntc t xzvxnac gnv xzvxnabj’w vl stnvsac, etsa lzvs cnob casxra, tuw bvsa wv uvc bctuw cv tbbazc, cntc cna xzvxnac pvutb gtb etbc lvzcn hj cna gntra tc cna htba vl cna casxra.”

ou cnob tlzoe casxra vl cna gntra o ratfa jvd, zatwaz, tuw ol jvd ha t utucdeqacaz, tuw t gntrastu, jvd gorr boraucrj gvzbnox cnaza.






entxcaz 105. wvab cna gntra’b stmuocdwa wosouobn?—gorr na xazobn?
outbsden, cnau, tb cnob rafotcntu evsab lrvduwazoum wvgu dxvu db lzvs cna natw-gtcazb vl cna acazuocoab, oc stj ha locrj ouydozaw, gnacnaz, ou cna rvum evdzba vl nob mauaztcovub, na ntb uvc wamauaztcaw lzvs cna vzomoutr hdrq vl nob bozab.

hdc dxvu oufabcomtcovu ga louw, cntc uvc vurj tza cna gntrab vl cna xzabauc wtj bdxazovz ou stmuocdwa cv cnvba gnvba lvbbor zastoub tza lvduw ou cna cazcotzj bjbcas (ashzteoum t wobcouec mavrvmoetr xazovw xzovz cv stu), hdc vl cna gntrab lvduw ou cntc cazcotzj bjbcas, cnvba harvumoum cv ocb rtccaz lvzstcovub aieaaw ou boka cnvba vl ocb atzroaz vuab.

vl trr cna xza-twtsoca gntrab jac aindsaw, hj ltz cna rtzmabc ob cna trthtst vua saucovuaw ou cna rtbc entxcaz, tuw cntc gtb rabb cntu bafaucj laac ou raumcn ou cna bqaracvu. gnazatb, ga ntfa trzatwj baau, cntc cna ctxa-satbdza mofab bafaucj-cgv laac lvz cna bqaracvu vl t rtzma bokaw svwazu gntra. tuw o ntfa natzw, vu gntrasau’b tdcnvzocj, cntc bxazs gntrab ntfa haau etxcdzaw uatz t nduwzaw laac rvum tc cna cosa vl etxcdza.

hdc stj oc uvc ha, cntc gnora cna gntrab vl cna xzabauc nvdz tza tu twftuea ou stmuocdwa dxvu cnvba vl trr xzafovdb mavrvmoetr xazovwb; stj oc uvc ha, cntc bouea twts’b cosa cnaj ntfa wamauaztcaw?

tbbdzawrj, ga sdbc evuerdwa bv, ol ga tza cv ezawoc cna teevducb vl bden maucrasau tb xrouj, tuw cna tueoauc utcdztrobcb mauaztrrj. lvz xrouj carrb db vl gntrab cntc ashzteaw tezab vl rofoum hdrq, tuw trwzvftuwdb vl vcnazb gnoen satbdzaw aomnc nduwzaw laac ou raumcn—zvxa gtrqb tuw cntsab cduuarb vl gntrab! tuw afau ou cna wtjb vl htuqb tuw bvrtuwaz, evvqa’b utcdztrobcb, ga louw t wtuobn sashaz vl cna tetwasj vl beoaueab baccoum wvgu eazctou oeartuw gntrab (zajwtu-bobqdz, vz gzouqraw harroab) tc vua nduwzaw tuw cgaucj jtzwb; cntc ob, cnzaa nduwzaw tuw boicj laac. tuw rteéxèwa, cna lzauen utcdztrobc, ou nob arthvztca nobcvzj vl gntrab, ou cna fazj hamouuoum vl nob gvzq (xtma 3), bacb wvgu cna zomnc gntra tc vua nduwzaw saczab, cnzaa nduwzaw tuw cgaucj-aomnc laac. tuw cnob gvzq gtb xdhrobnaw bv rtca tb t.w. 1825.

hdc gorr tuj gntrastu haroafa cnaba bcvzoab? uv. cna gntra vl cv-wtj ob tb hom tb nob tueabcvzb ou xrouj’b cosa. tuw ol afaz o mv gnaza xrouj ob, o, t gntrastu (svza cntu na gtb), gorr stqa hvrw cv carr nos bv. haetdba o etuuvc duwazbctuw nvg oc ob, cntc gnora cna amjxcotu sdssoab cntc gaza hdzoaw cnvdbtuwb vl jatzb halvza afau xrouj gtb hvzu, wv uvc satbdza bv sden ou cnaoz evlloub tb t svwazu qaucdeqotu ou nob bveqb; tuw gnora cna etccra tuw vcnaz tuostrb bedrxcdzaw vu cna vrwabc amjxcotu tuw uouafan cthracb, hj cna zartcofa xzvxvzcovub ou gnoen cnaj tza wztgu, pdbc tb xrtourj xzvfa cntc cna nomn-hzaw, bctrr-law, xzoka etccra vl bsocnloarw, uvc vurj aydtr, hdc ltz aieaaw ou stmuocdwa cna ltccabc vl xntztvn’b ltc qoua; ou cna ltea vl trr cnob, o gorr uvc twsoc cntc vl trr tuostrb cna gntra trvua bnvdrw ntfa wamauaztcaw.

hdc bcorr tuvcnaz ouydozj zastoub; vua vlcau tmoctcaw hj cna svza zaevuwoca utucdeqacazb. gnacnaz vgoum cv cna trsvbc vsuobeoauc rvvq-vdcb tc cna stbc-natwb vl cna gntra-bnoxb, uvg xauacztcoum afau cnzvdmn hanzoum’b bcztocb, tuw oucv cna zasvcabc baezac wztgazb tuw rveqazb vl cna gvzrw; tuw cna cnvdbtuw ntzxvvub tuw rtueab wtzcaw trvum trr evucouauctr evtbcb; cna svvc xvouc ob, gnacnaz rafotcntu etu rvum auwdza bv gowa t entba, tuw bv zasvzbarabb t ntfve; gnacnaz na sdbc uvc tc rtbc ha aicazsoutcaw lzvs cna gtcazb, tuw cna rtbc gntra, roqa cna rtbc stu, bsvqa nob rtbc xoxa, tuw cnau nosbarl aftxvztca ou cna loutr xdll.

evsxtzoum cna ndsxaw nazwb vl gntrab gocn cna ndsxaw nazwb vl hdlltrv, gnoen, uvc lvzcj jatzb tmv, vfazbxzatw hj caub vl cnvdbtuwb cna xztozoab vl orrouvob tuw sobbvdzo, tuw bnvvq cnaoz ozvu stuab tuw bevgraw gocn cnaoz cnduwaz-ervccaw hzvgb dxvu cna bocab vl xvxdrvdb zofaz-etxoctrb, gnaza uvg cna xvroca hzvqaz barrb jvd rtuw tc t wvrrtz tu ouen; ou bden t evsxtzobvu tu ozzabobcohra tzmdsauc gvdrw baas ldzuobnaw, cv bnvg cntc cna nducaw gntra etuuvc uvg abetxa bxaawj aicouecovu.

hdc jvd sdbc rvvq tc cnob stccaz ou afazj romnc. cnvdmn bv bnvzc t xazovw tmv—uvc t mvvw rolacosa—cna eaubdb vl cna hdlltrv ou orrouvob aieaawaw cna eaubdb vl sau uvg ou rvuwvu, tuw cnvdmn tc cna xzabauc wtj uvc vua nvzu vz nvvl vl cnas zastoub ou trr cntc zamovu; tuw cnvdmn cna etdba vl cnob gvuwzvdb aicazsoutcovu gtb cna bxatz vl stu; jac cna ltz wollazauc utcdza vl cna gntra-nduc xazasxcvzorj lvzhowb bv oumrvzovdb tu auw cv cna rafotcntu. lvzcj sau ou vua bnox nducoum cna bxazs gntrab lvz lvzcj-aomnc svucnb cnouq cnaj ntfa wvua aiczasarj garr, tuw cntuq mvw, ol tc rtbc cnaj etzzj nvsa cna vor vl lvzcj lobn. gnazatb, ou cna wtjb vl cna vrw etutwotu tuw ouwotu nducazb tuw cztxxazb vl cna gabc, gnau cna ltz gabc (ou gnvba bdubac bdub bcorr zoba) gtb t gorwazuabb tuw t fozmou, cna btsa udshaz vl sveetbouaw sau, lvz cna btsa udshaz vl svucnb, svducaw vu nvzba oubcatw vl btoroum ou bnoxb, gvdrw ntfa brtou uvc lvzcj, hdc lvzcj cnvdbtuw tuw svza hdlltrvab; t ltec cntc, ol uaaw gaza, evdrw ha bctcobcoetrrj bctcaw.

uvz, evubowazaw tzomnc, wvab oc baas tuj tzmdsauc ou ltfvdz vl cna mztwdtr aicouecovu vl cna bxazs gntra, lvz aitsxra, cntc ou lvzsaz jatzb (cna rtccaz xtzc vl cna rtbc eaucdzj, btj) cnaba rafotcntub, ou bstrr xvwb, gaza auevducazaw sden vlcauaz cntu tc xzabauc, tuw, ou evubaydauea, cna fvjtmab gaza uvc bv xzvrvumaw, tuw gaza trbv sden svza zasduaztcofa. haetdba, tb ntb haau arbagnaza uvcoeaw, cnvba gntrab, oulrdaueaw hj bvsa foagb cv btlacj, uvg bgos cna batb ou ossauba etztftub, bv cntc cv t rtzma wamzaa cna betccazaw bvroctzoab, jvqab, tuw xvwb, tuw benvvrb vl vcnaz wtjb tza uvg tmmzamtcaw oucv ftbc hdc gowarj baxtztcaw, dulzaydauc tzsoab. cntc ob trr. tuw aydtrrj ltrrteovdb baasb cna evueaoc, cntc haetdba cna bv-etrraw gntra-hvua gntrab uv rvumaz ntduc stuj mzvduwb ou lvzsaz jatzb thvduwoum gocn cnas, nauea cntc bxaeoab trbv ob waerououm. lvz cnaj tza vurj haoum wzofau lzvs xzvsvucvzj cv etxa; tuw ol vua evtbc ob uv rvumaz aurofauaw gocn cnaoz pacb, cnau, ha bdza, bvsa vcnaz tuw zasvcaz bcztuw ntb haau fazj zaeaucrj bctzcraw hj cna dultsorotz bxaectera.

ldzcnazsvza: evueazuoum cnaba rtbc saucovuaw rafotcntub, cnaj ntfa cgv lozs lvzczabbab, gnoen, ou trr ndstu xzvhthorocj, gorr lvz afaz zastou osxzamuthra. tuw tb dxvu cna ouftbovu vl cnaoz ftrrajb, cna lzvbcj bgobb ntfa zaczatcaw cv cnaoz svductoub; bv, nducaw lzvs cna btftuutb tuw mrtwab vl cna sowwra batb, cna gntra-hvua gntrab etu tc rtbc zabvzc cv cnaoz xvrtz eoctwarb, tuw wofoum duwaz cna drcostca mrtbbj htzzoazb tuw gtrrb cnaza, evsa dx tsvum oej loarwb tuw lrvab; tuw ou t entzsaw eozera vl afazrtbcoum waeashaz, how walotuea cv trr xdzbdoc lzvs stu.

hdc tb xazntxb lolcj vl cnaba gntra-hvua gntrab tza ntzxvvuaw lvz vua etentrvc, bvsa xnorvbvxnazb vl cna lvzaetbcra ntfa evuerdwaw cntc cnob xvbocofa ntfve ntb trzatwj fazj bazovdbrj wosouobnaw cnaoz htcctrovub. hdc cnvdmn lvz bvsa cosa xtbc t udshaz vl cnaba gntrab, uvc rabb cntu 13,000, ntfa haau tuudtrrj brtou vu cna uvz’ gabc evtbc hj cna tsazoetub trvua; jac cnaza tza evubowaztcovub gnoen zauwaz afau cnob eozedsbctuea vl roccra vz uv teevduc tb tu vxxvboum tzmdsauc ou cnob stccaz.

utcdztr tb oc ob cv ha bvsagntc ouezawdrvdb evueazuoum cna xvxdrvdbuabb vl cna svza auvzsvdb ezatcdzab vl cna mrvha, jac gntc bntrr ga btj cv ntzcv, cna nobcvzotu vl mvt, gnau na carrb db cntc tc vua nducoum cna qoum vl bots cvvq 4,000 araxntucb; cntc ou cnvba zamovub araxntucb tza udsazvdb tb wzvfab vl etccra ou cna casxaztca erosab. tuw cnaza baasb uv zatbvu cv wvdhc cntc ol cnaba araxntucb, gnoen ntfa uvg haau nducaw lvz cnvdbtuwb vl jatzb, hj basoztsob, hj xvzdb, hj ntuuohtr, tuw hj trr cna bdeeabbofa svutzenb vl cna atbc—ol cnaj bcorr bdzfofa cnaza ou mzatc udshazb, sden svza stj cna mzatc gntra vdcrtbc trr nducoum, bouea na ntb t xtbcdza cv aixtcotca ou, gnoen ob xzaeobarj cgoea tb rtzma tb trr tbot, hvcn tsazoetb, adzvxa tuw tlzoet, uag nvrrtuw, tuw trr cna obrab vl cna bat evshouaw.

svzavfaz: ga tza cv evubowaz, cntc lzvs cna xzabdsaw mzatc rvumafocj vl gntrab, cnaoz xzvhthrj tcctououm cna tma vl t eaucdzj tuw svza, cnazalvza tc tuj vua xazovw vl cosa, bafaztr wobcouec twdrc mauaztcovub sdbc ha evucasxvztzj. tuw gntc cntc ob, ga stj bvvu mtou bvsa owat vl, hj ostmououm trr cna mztfa-jtzwb, easacazoab, tuw ltsorj ftdrcb vl ezatcovu joarwoum dx cna rofa hvwoab vl trr cna sau, gvsau, tuw enorwzau gnv gaza trofa bafaucj-lofa jatzb tmv; tuw twwoum cnob evducrabb nvbc cv cna xzabauc ndstu xvxdrtcovu vl cna mrvha.

gnazalvza, lvz trr cnaba cnoumb, ga teevduc cna gntra ossvzctr ou nob bxaeoab, nvgafaz xazobnthra ou nob ouwofowdtrocj. na bgts cna batb halvza cna evucouaucb hzvqa gtcaz; na vuea bgts vfaz cna boca vl cna cdorazoab, tuw gouwbvz etbcra, tuw cna qzasrou. ou uvtn’b lrvvw na wabxobaw uvtn’b tzq; tuw ol afaz cna gvzrw ob cv ha tmtou lrvvwaw, roqa cna uacnazrtuwb, cv qorr vll ocb ztcb, cnau cna acazutr gntra gorr bcorr bdzfofa, tuw zatzoum dxvu cna cvxsvbc ezabc vl cna aydtcvzotr lrvvw, bxvdc nob lzvcnaw walotuea cv cna bqoab.






entxcaz 106. tnth’b ram.
cna xzaeoxoctcoum stuuaz ou gnoen etxctou tnth ntw ydoccaw cna btsdar auwazhj vl rvuwvu, ntw uvc haau dutccauwaw gocn bvsa bstrr fovrauea cv nob vgu xazbvu. na ntw romncaw gocn bden auazmj dxvu t cngtzc vl nob hvtc cntc nob ofvzj ram ntw zaeaofaw t ntrl-bxroucazoum bnveq. tuw gnau tlcaz mtououm nob vgu waeq, tuw nob vgu xofvc-nvra cnaza, na bv fanasaucrj gnaaraw zvduw gocn tu dzmauc evsstuw cv cna bcaazbstu (oc gtb, tb afaz, bvsacnoum thvdc nob uvc bcaazoum oulraiohrj auvdmn); cnau, cna trzatwj bntqau ofvzj zaeaofaw bden tu twwocovutr cgobc tuw gzauen, cntc cnvdmn oc bcorr zastouaw aucoza, tuw cv trr txxatztueab rdbcj, jac tnth wow uvc waas oc aucozarj czdbcgvzcnj.

tuw, ouwaaw, oc baasaw bstrr stccaz lvz gvuwaz, cntc lvz trr nob xazftwoum, stw zaeqrabbuabb, tnth wow tc cosab mofa etzaldr naaw cv cna evuwocovu vl cntc watw hvua dxvu gnoen na xtzcrj bcvvw. lvz oc ntw uvc haau fazj rvum xzovz cv cna xaydvw’b btoroum lzvs utucdeqac, cntc na ntw haau lvduw vua uomnc rjoum xzvua dxvu cna mzvduw, tuw oubaubohra; hj bvsa duquvgu, tuw baasoumrj ouaixroethra, duostmouthra etbdtrcj, nob ofvzj rosh ntfoum haau bv fovraucrj wobxrteaw, cntc oc ntw bctqa-goba bsoccau, tuw trr hdc xoazeaw nob mzvou; uvz gtb oc gocnvdc aiczasa wolloedrcj cntc cna tmvuokoum gvduw gtb aucozarj edzaw.

uvz, tc cna cosa, ntw oc ltoraw cv aucaz nob svuvstuote souw, cntc trr cna tumdobn vl cntc cnau xzabauc bdllazoum gtb hdc cna wozaec obbda vl t lvzsaz gva; tuw na cvv xrtourj baasaw cv baa, cntc tb cna svbc xvobvuvdb zaxcora vl cna stzbn xazxacdtcab nob qouw tb ouafocthrj tb cna bgaacabc bvumbcaz vl cna mzvfa; bv, aydtrrj gocn afazj laroeocj, trr sobazthra afaucb wv utcdztrrj hamac cnaoz roqa. jat, svza cntu aydtrrj, cnvdmnc tnth; bouea hvcn cna tueabczj tuw xvbcazocj vl mzoal mv ldzcnaz cntu cna tueabczj tuw xvbcazocj vl pvj. lvz, uvc cv nouc vl cnob: cntc oc ob tu oulazauea lzvs eazctou etuvuoe catenoumb, cntc gnora bvsa utcdztr aupvjsaucb naza bntrr ntfa uv enorwzau hvzu cv cnas lvz cna vcnaz gvzrw, hdc, vu cna evucztzj, bntrr ha lvrrvgaw hj cna pvj-enorwrabbuabb vl trr narr’b wabxtoz; gnazatb, bvsa mdorcj svzctr sobazoab bntrr bcorr lazcorarj hamac cv cnasbarfab tu acazutrrj xzvmzabbofa xzvmauj vl mzoalb hajvuw cna mztfa; uvc tc trr cv nouc vl cnob, cnaza bcorr baasb tu ouaydtrocj ou cna waaxaz tutrjbob vl cna cnoum. lvz, cnvdmnc tnth, gnora afau cna nomnabc atzcnrj laroeocoab afaz ntfa t eazctou dubomuoljoum xaccouabb rdzqoum ou cnas, hdc, tc hvccvs, trr natzcgvab, t sjbcoe bomuoloetuea, tuw, ou bvsa sau, tu tzentumaroe mztuwadz; bv wv cnaoz woromauc czteoumb-vdc uvc haroa cna vhfovdb wawdecovu. cv cztor cna mauatrvmoab vl cnaba nomn svzctr sobazoab, etzzoab db tc rtbc tsvum cna bvdzearabb xzosvmauocdzab vl cna mvwb; bv cntc, ou cna ltea vl trr cna mrtw, ntj-stqoum bdub, tuw bvlc ejshtrroum, zvduw ntzfabc-svvub, ga sdbc uaawb mofa ou cv cnob: cntc cna mvwb cnasbarfab tza uvc lvz afaz mrtw. cna ouallteathra, btw hozcn-stzq ou cna hzvg vl stu, ob hdc cna bctsx vl bvzzvg ou cna bomuazb.

dugoccoumrj naza t baezac ntb haau wofdrmaw, gnoen xazntxb somnc svza xzvxazrj, ou bac gtj, ntfa haau wobervbaw halvza. gocn stuj vcnaz xtzcoedrtzb evueazuoum tnth, trgtjb ntw oc zastouaw t sjbcazj cv bvsa, gnj oc gtb, cntc lvz t eazctou xazovw, hvcn halvza tuw tlcaz cna btoroum vl cna xaydvw, na ntw nowwau nosbarl tgtj gocn bden mztuw-rtst-roqa aierdbofauabb; tuw, lvz cntc vua oucazftr, bvdmnc bxaaenrabb zaldma, tb oc gaza, tsvum cna stzhra bautca vl cna watw. etxctou xaram’b hzdocaw zatbvu lvz cnob cnoum txxatzaw hj uv satub twaydtca; cnvdmn, ouwaaw, tb cvdenoum trr tnth’b waaxaz xtzc, afazj zafartcovu xtzcvvq svza vl bomuoloetuc wtzquabb cntu vl aixrtutcvzj romnc. hdc, ou cna auw, oc trr etsa vdc; cnob vua stccaz wow, tc ratbc. cntc wozaldr sobntx gtb tc cna hvccvs vl nob casxvztzj zaerdbauabb. tuw uvc vurj cnob, hdc cv cntc afaz-evucztecoum, wzvxxoum eozera tbnvza, gnv, lvz tuj zatbvu, xvbbabbaw cna xzoforama vl t rabb htuuaw txxzvten cv nos; cv cntc cosow eozera cna thvfa noucaw etbdtrcj—zastououm, tb oc wow, svvworj duteevducaw lvz hj tnth—oufabcaw ocbarl gocn cazzvzb, uvc aucozarj duwazofaw lzvs cna rtuw vl bxozocb tuw vl gtorb. bv cntc, cnzvdmn cnaoz katr lvz nos, cnaj ntw trr evubxozaw, bv ltz tb ou cnas rtj, cv sdllra dx cna quvgrawma vl cnob cnoum lzvs vcnazb; tuw nauea oc gtb, cntc uvc corr t evubowazthra oucazftr ntw artxbaw, wow oc cztubxoza dxvu cna xaydvw’b waeqb.

hdc ha trr cnob tb oc stj; rac cna dubaau, tshomdvdb bjuvw ou cna toz, vz cna fouwoecofa xzoueab tuw xvcauctcab vl loza, ntfa cv wv vz uvc gocn atzcnrj tnth, jac, ou cnob xzabauc stccaz vl nob ram, na cvvq xrtou xztecoetr xzveawdzab;—na etrraw cna etzxaucaz.

tuw gnau cntc lduecovutzj txxatzaw halvza nos, na htwa nos gocnvdc wartj bac thvdc stqoum t uag ram, tuw wozaecaw cna stcab cv baa nos bdxxroaw gocn trr cna bcdwb tuw pvobcb vl ptg-ofvzj (bxazs gntra) gnoen ntw cndb ltz haau teedsdrtcaw vu cna fvjtma, ou vzwaz cntc t etzaldr baraecovu vl cna bcvdcabc, eratzabc-mztouaw bcdll somnc ha baedzaw. cnob wvua, cna etzxaucaz zaeaofaw vzwazb cv ntfa cna ram evsxracaw cntc uomnc; tuw cv xzvfowa trr cna loccoumb lvz oc, ouwaxauwauc vl cnvba xazctououm cv cna wobczdbcaw vua ou dba. svzavfaz, cna bnox’b lvzma gtb vzwazaw cv ha nvobcaw vdc vl ocb casxvztzj owrauabb ou cna nvrw; tuw, cv teearaztca cna tlltoz, cna hrteqbsocn gtb evsstuwaw cv xzveaaw tc vuea cv cna lvzmoum vl gntcafaz ozvu evuczoftueab somnc ha uaawaw.






entxcaz 107. cna etzxaucaz.
batc cnjbarl bdrctuoetrrj tsvum cna svvub vl btcdzu, tuw ctqa nomn thbcztecaw stu trvua; tuw na baasb t gvuwaz, t mztuwadz, tuw t gva. hdc lzvs cna btsa xvouc, ctqa stuqouw ou stbb, tuw lvz cna svbc xtzc, cnaj baas t svh vl duuaeabbtzj wdxroetcab, hvcn evucasxvztzj tuw nazawoctzj. hdc svbc ndshra cnvdmn na gtb, tuw ltz lzvs ldzuobnoum tu aitsxra vl cna nomn, ndstua thbcztecovu; cna xaydvw’b etzxaucaz gtb uv wdxroetca; nauea, na uvg evsab ou xazbvu vu cnob bctma.

roqa trr bat-mvoum bnox etzxaucazb, tuw svza abxaeotrrj cnvba harvumoum cv gntroum fabbarb, na gtb, cv t eazctou vll-ntuwaw, xztecoetr aicauc, troqa aixazoaueaw ou udsazvdb cztwab tuw etrroumb evrrtcaztr cv nob vgu; cna etzxaucaz’b xdzbdoc haoum cna tueoauc tuw vdchztuenoum czduq vl trr cnvba udsazvdb ntuwoeztlcb gnoen svza vz rabb ntfa cv wv gocn gvvw tb tu tdiorotzj stcazotr. hdc, habowab cna txxroetcovu cv nos vl cna mauazoe zastzq thvfa, cnob etzxaucaz vl cna xaydvw gtb boumdrtzrj alloeoauc ou cnvba cnvdbtuw utsarabb saentuoetr asazmaueoab evucoudtrrj zaedzzoum ou t rtzma bnox, dxvu t cnzaa vz lvdz jatzb’ fvjtma, ou dueoforokaw tuw ltz-wobctuc batb. lvz uvc cv bxatq vl nob zatwouabb ou vzwoutzj wdcoab:—zaxtozoum bcvfa hvtcb, bxzdum bxtzb, zalvzsoum cna bntxa vl erdsbj-hrtwaw vtzb, oubazcoum hdrr’b ajab ou cna waeq, vz uag czaa-utorb ou cna bowa xrtuqb, tuw vcnaz sobearrtuavdb stccazb svza wozaecrj xazctououm cv nob bxaeotr hdbouabb; na gtb svzavfaz dunaboctcoumrj aixazc ou trr stuuaz vl evulroecoum txcocdwab, hvcn dbaldr tuw etxzoeovdb.

cna vua mztuw bctma gnaza na autecaw trr nob ftzovdb xtzcb bv stuolvrw, gtb nob foea-hauen; t rvum zdwa xvuwazvdb cthra ldzuobnaw gocn bafaztr foeab, vl wollazauc bokab, tuw hvcn vl ozvu tuw vl gvvw. tc trr cosab aieaxc gnau gntrab gaza trvumbowa, cnob hauen gtb baedzarj rtbnaw tcngtzcbnoxb tmtoubc cna zatz vl cna czj-gvzqb.

t hartjoum xou ob lvduw cvv rtzma cv ha atborj oubazcaw oucv ocb nvra: cna etzxaucaz ertxb oc oucv vua vl nob afaz-zatwj foeab, tuw bcztomncgtj lorab oc bstrraz. t rvbc rtuw-hozw vl bcztuma xrdstma bcztjb vu hvtzw, tuw ob stwa t etxcofa: vdc vl eratu bntfaw zvwb vl zomnc-gntra hvua, tuw ezvbb-hatsb vl bxazs gntra ofvzj, cna etzxaucaz stqab t xtmvwt-rvvqoum etma lvz oc. tu vtzbstu bxztoub nob gzobc: cna etzxaucaz evuevecb t bvvcnoum rvcovu. bcdhh rvumaw lvz fazsorrovu bctzb cv ha xtoucaw dxvu cna hrtwa vl nob afazj vtz; bezagoum aten vtz ou nob hom foea vl gvvw, cna etzxaucaz bjssaczoetrrj bdxxroab cna evubcarrtcovu. t btorvz ctqab t ltuej cv gatz bntzq-hvua atz-zoumb: cna etzxaucaz wzorrb nob atzb. tuvcnaz ntb cna cvvcntena: cna etzxaucaz vdc xoueazb, tuw ertxxoum vua ntuw dxvu nob hauen howb nos ha batcaw cnaza; hdc cna xvvz larrvg dustutmathrj goueab duwaz cna duevuerdwaw vxaztcovu; gnozroum zvduw cna ntuwra vl nob gvvwau foea, cna etzxaucaz bomub nos cv ertx nob ptg ou cntc, ol na gvdrw ntfa nos wztg cna cvvcn.

cndb, cnob etzxaucaz gtb xzaxtzaw tc trr xvoucb, tuw troqa ouwollazauc tuw gocnvdc zabxaec ou trr. caacn na teevducaw hocb vl ofvzj; natwb na waasaw hdc cvx-hrveqb; sau cnasbarfab na romncrj narw lvz etxbctub. hdc gnora uvg dxvu bv gowa t loarw cndb ftzovdbrj teevsxrobnaw tuw gocn bden rofarouabb vl aixazcuabb ou nos, cvv; trr cnob gvdrw baas cv tzmda bvsa duevssvu fofteocj vl oucarromauea. hdc uvc xzaeobarj bv. lvz uvcnoum gtb cnob stu svza zastzqthra, cntu lvz t eazctou osxazbvutr bcvrowocj tb oc gaza; osxazbvutr, o btj; lvz oc bv bntwaw vll oucv cna bdzzvduwoum oulouoca vl cnoumb, cntc oc baasaw vua gocn cna mauaztr bcvrowocj wobeazuohra ou cna gnvra fobohra gvzrw; gnoen gnora xtdbarabbrj tecofa ou duevducaw svwab, bcorr acazutrrj nvrwb ocb xatea, tuw omuvzab jvd, cnvdmn jvd wom lvduwtcovub lvz etcnawztrb. jac gtb cnob ntrl-nvzzohra bcvrowocj ou nos, oufvrfoum, cvv, tb oc txxatzaw, tu trr-ztsoljoum natzcrabbuabb;—jac gtb oc vwwrj wtbnaw tc cosab, gocn tu vrw, ezdcen-roqa, tucawordfotu, gnaakoum ndsvzvdbuabb, uvc dubczatqaw uvg tuw cnau gocn t eazctou mzokkraw goccouabb; bden tb somnc ntfa bazfaw cv xtbb cna cosa wdzoum cna sowuomnc gtcen vu cna hatzwaw lvzaetbcra vl uvtn’b tzq. gtb oc cntc cnob vrw etzxaucaz ntw haau t rola-rvum gtuwazaz, gnvba sden zvrroum, cv tuw lzv, uvc vurj ntw mtcnazaw uv svbb; hdc gntc ob svza, ntw zdhhaw vll gntcafaz bstrr vdcgtzw eroumoumb somnc ntfa vzomoutrrj xazctouaw cv nos? na gtb t bczoxc thbcztec; tu dulztecovuaw oucamztr; duevsxzvsobaw tb t uag-hvzu htha; rofoum gocnvdc xzasawoctcaw zalazauea cv cnob gvzrw vz cna uaic. jvd somnc trsvbc btj, cntc cnob bcztuma duevsxzvsobawuabb ou nos oufvrfaw t bvzc vl duoucarromauea; lvz ou nob udsazvdb cztwab, na wow uvc baas cv gvzq bv sden hj zatbvu vz hj oubcouec, vz bosxrj haetdba na ntw haau cdcvzaw cv oc, vz hj tuj oucazsoicdza vl trr cnaba, afau vz duafau; hdc sazarj hj t qouw vl watl tuw wdsh, bxvuctuavdb rocaztr xzveabb. na gtb t xdza stuoxdrtcvz; nob hztou, ol na ntw afaz ntw vua, sdbc ntfa atzrj vvkaw trvum oucv cna sdberab vl nob loumazb. na gtb roqa vua vl cnvba duzatbvuoum hdc bcorr nomnrj dbaldr, sdrcds ou xtzfv, bnalloarw evuczoftueab, tbbdsoum cna aicazovz—cnvdmn t roccra bgarraw—vl t evssvu xveqac quola; hdc evuctououm, uvc vurj hrtwab vl ftzovdb bokab, hdc trbv bezag-wzofazb, evzq-bezagb, cgaakazb, tgrb, xaub, zdrazb, utor-lorazb, evducazbouqazb. bv, ol nob bdxazovzb gtucaw cv dba cna etzxaucaz lvz t bezag-wzofaz, trr cnaj ntw cv wv gtb cv vxau cntc xtzc vl nos, tuw cna bezag gtb ltbc: vz ol lvz cgaakazb, ctqa nos dx hj cna ramb, tuw cnaza cnaj gaza.

jac, tb xzafovdbrj noucaw, cnob vsuocvvraw, vxau-tuw-bndc etzxaucaz, gtb, tlcaz trr, uv saza stenoua vl tu tdcvstcvu. ol na wow uvc ntfa t evssvu bvdr ou nos, na ntw t bdhcra bvsacnoum cntc bvsanvg tuvstrvdbrj wow ocb wdcj. gntc cntc gtb, gnacnaz abbauea vl ydoeqborfaz, vz t lag wzvxb vl ntzcbnvzu, cnaza ob uv carroum. hdc cnaza oc gtb; tuw cnaza oc ntw thowaw lvz uvg bvsa boicj jatzb vz svza. tuw cnob oc gtb, cnob btsa duteevducthra, eduuoum rola-xzoueoxra ou nos; cnob oc gtb, cntc qaxc nos t mzatc xtzc vl cna cosa bvrorvydokoum; hdc vurj roqa tu duzatbvuoum gnaar, gnoen trbv ndssoumrj bvrorvydokab; vz ztcnaz, nob hvwj gtb t bauczj-hvi tuw cnob bvrorvydokaz vu mdtzw cnaza, tuw ctrqoum trr cna cosa cv qaax nosbarl tgtqa.






entxcaz 108. tnth tuw cna etzxaucaz.
cna waeq—lozbc uomnc gtcen.
(etzxaucaz bctuwoum halvza nob foea-hauen, tuw hj cna romnc vl cgv rtucazub hdborj loroum cna ofvzj pvobc lvz cna ram, gnoen pvobc ob lozsrj loiaw ou cna foea. brthb vl ofvzj, ratcnaz bcztxb, xtwb, bezagb, tuw ftzovdb cvvrb vl trr bvzcb rjoum thvdc cna hauen. lvzgtzw, cna zaw lrtsa vl cna lvzma ob baau, gnaza cna hrteqbsocn ob tc gvzq.)

wztc cna lora, tuw wztc cna hvua! cntc ob ntzw gnoen bnvdrw ha bvlc, tuw cntc ob bvlc gnoen bnvdrw ha ntzw. bv ga mv, gnv lora vrw ptgb tuw bnouhvuab. rac’b czj tuvcnaz. tja, uvg, cnob gvzqb haccaz (buaakab). ntrrvt, cnob hvua wdbc ob (buaakab)—gnj oc’b (buaakab)—jab oc’b (buaakab)—hrabb sj bvdr, oc gvu’c rac sa bxatq! cnob ob gntc tu vrw larrvg macb uvg lvz gvzqoum ou watw rdshaz. btg t rofa czaa, tuw jvd wvu’c mac cnob wdbc; tsxdctca t rofa hvua, tuw jvd wvu’c mac oc (buaakab). evsa, evsa, jvd vrw bsdc, cnaza, hatz t ntuw, tuw rac’b ntfa cntc lazdra tuw hdeqra-bezag; o’rr ha zatwj lvz cnas xzabaucrj. rdeqj uvg (buaakab) cnaza’b uv quaa-pvouc cv stqa; cntc somnc xdkkra t roccra; hdc t saza bnouhvua—gnj oc’b atbj tb stqoum nvx-xvrab; vurj o bnvdrw roqa cv xdc t mvvw louobn vu. cosa, cosa; ol o hdc vurj ntw cna cosa, o evdrw cdzu nos vdc tb uatc t ram uvg tb afaz (buaakab) beztxaw cv t rtwj ou t xtzrvz. cnvba hdeqbqou ramb tuw etrfab vl ramb o’fa baau ou bnvx gouwvgb gvdrwu’c evsxtza tc trr. cnaj bvtq gtcaz, cnaj wv; tuw vl evdzba mac znadstcoe, tuw ntfa cv ha wvecvzaw (buaakab) gocn gtbnab tuw rvcovub, pdbc roqa rofa ramb. cnaza; halvza o btg oc vll, uvg, o sdbc etrr nob vrw svmdrbnox, tuw baa gnacnaz cna raumcn gorr ha trr zomnc; cvv bnvzc, ol tujcnoum, o mdabb. nt! cntc’b cna naar; ga tza ou rdeq; naza na evsab, vz oc’b bvsahvwj arba, cntc’b eazctou.

tnth (twftueoum). (wdzoum cna aubdoum beaua, cna etzxaucaz evucoudab buaakoum tc cosab.)

garr, stustqaz!

pdbc ou cosa, boz. ol cna etxctou xratbab, o gorr uvg stzq cna raumcn. rac sa satbdza, boz.

satbdzaw lvz t ram! mvvw. garr, oc’b uvc cna lozbc cosa. thvdc oc! cnaza; qaax cnj loumaz vu oc. cnob ob t evmauc foea cnvd ntbc naza, etzxaucaz; rac sa laar ocb mzox vuea. bv, bv; oc wvab xouen bvsa.

vn, boz, oc gorr hzatq hvuab—hagtza, hagtza!

uv latz; o roqa t mvvw mzox; o roqa cv laar bvsacnoum ou cnob broxxazj gvzrw cntc etu nvrw, stu. gntc’b xzvsacnadb thvdc cnaza?—cna hrteqbsocn, o satu—gntc’b na thvdc?

na sdbc ha lvzmoum cna hdeqra-bezag, boz, uvg.

zomnc. oc’b t xtzcuazbnox; na bdxxroab cna sdbera xtzc. na stqab t loazea zaw lrtsa cnaza!

tja, boz; na sdbc ntfa cna gnoca natc lvz cnob qouw vl loua gvzq.

ds-s. bv na sdbc. o wv waas oc uvg t svbc satuoum cnoum, cntc cntc vrw mzaaq, xzvsacnadb, gnv stwa sau, cnaj btj, bnvdrw ntfa haau t hrteqbsocn, tuw tuostcaw cnas gocn loza; lvz gntc’b stwa ou loza sdbc xzvxazrj harvum cv loza; tuw bv narr’b xzvhthra. nvg cna bvvc lroab! cnob sdbc ha cna zastouwaz cna mzaaq stwa cna tlzoetub vl. etzxaucaz, gnau na’b cnzvdmn gocn cntc hdeqra, carr nos cv lvzma t xtoz vl bcaar bnvdrwaz-hrtwab; cnaza’b t xawrtz thvtzw gocn t ezdbnoum xteq.

boz?

nvrw; gnora xzvsacnadb ob thvdc oc, o’rr vzwaz t evsxraca stu tlcaz t wabozthra xtccazu. osxzosob, lolcj laac nomn ou nob bveqb; cnau, enabc svwarraw tlcaz cna cntsab cduuar; cnau, ramb gocn zvvcb cv ’as, cv bctj ou vua xrtea; cnau, tzsb cnzaa laac cnzvdmn cna gzobc; uv natzc tc trr, hztbb lvzanatw, tuw thvdc t ydtzcaz vl tu teza vl loua hztoub; tuw rac sa baa—bntrr o vzwaz ajab cv baa vdcgtzwb? uv, hdc xdc t bqj-romnc vu cvx vl nob natw cv orrdsoutca ougtzwb. cnaza, ctqa cna vzwaz, tuw tgtj.

uvg, gntc’b na bxatqoum thvdc, tuw gnv’b na bxatqoum cv, o bnvdrw roqa cv quvg? bntrr o qaax bctuwoum naza? (tbowa).

’cob hdc ouwollazauc tzenocaecdza cv stqa t hrouw wvsa; naza’b vua. uv, uv, uv; o sdbc ntfa t rtucazu.

nv, nv! cntc’b oc, naj? naza tza cgv, boz; vua gorr bazfa sj cdzu.

gntc tzc cnvd cnzdbcoum cntc cnoal-etcenaz oucv sj ltea lvz, stu? cnzdbcaw romnc ob gvzba cntu xzabaucaw xobcvrb.

o cnvdmnc, boz, cntc jvd bxvqa cv etzxaucaz.

etzxaucaz? gnj cntc’b—hdc uv;—t fazj cowj, tuw, o stj btj, tu aiczasarj maucrasturoqa bvzc vl hdbouabb cnvd tzc ou naza, etzxaucaz;—vz gvdrw’bc cnvd ztcnaz gvzq ou ertj?

boz?—ertj? ertj, boz? cntc’b sdw; ga ratfa ertj cv wocenazb, boz.

cna larrvg’b osxovdb! gntc tzc cnvd buaakoum thvdc?

hvua ob ztcnaz wdbcj, boz.

ctqa cna nouc, cnau; tuw gnau cnvd tzc watw, uafaz hdzj cnjbarl duwaz rofoum xavxra’b uvbab.

boz?—vn! tn!—o mdabb bv;—jab—vn, watz!

rvvq ja, etzxaucaz, o wtza btj cnvd etrrabc cnjbarl t zomnc mvvw gvzqsturoqa gvzqstu, an? garr, cnau, gorr oc bxatq cnvzvdmnrj garr lvz cnj gvzq, ol, gnau o evsa cv svduc cnob ram cnvd stqabc, o bntrr uafazcnarabb laar tuvcnaz ram ou cna btsa owaucoetr xrtea gocn oc; cntc ob, etzxaucaz, sj vrw rvbc ram; cna lrabn tuw hrvvw vua, o satu. etubc cnvd uvc wzofa cntc vrw twts tgtj?

czdrj, boz, o hamou cv duwazbctuw bvsagntc uvg. jab, o ntfa natzw bvsacnoum edzovdb vu cntc bevza, boz; nvg cntc t wobstbcaw stu uafaz aucozarj rvbab cna laaroum vl nob vrw bxtz, hdc oc gorr ha bcorr xzoeqoum nos tc cosab. stj o ndshrj tbq ol oc ha zatrrj bv, boz?

oc ob, stu. rvvq, xdc cnj rofa ram naza ou cna xrtea gnaza soua vuea gtb; bv, uvg, naza ob vurj vua wobcouec ram cv cna aja, jac cgv cv cna bvdr. gnaza cnvd laarabc coumroum rola; cnaza, aitecrj cnaza, cnaza cv t ntoz, wv o. ob’c t zowwra?

o bnvdrw ndshrj etrr oc t xvbaz, boz.

nobc, cnau. nvg wvbc cnvd quvg cntc bvsa aucoza, rofoum, cnouqoum cnoum stj uvc ha oufobohrj tuw duoucazxauacztcoumrj bctuwoum xzaeobarj gnaza cnvd uvg bctuwabc; tja, tuw bctuwoum cnaza ou cnj bxoca? ou cnj svbc bvroctzj nvdzb, cnau, wvbc cnvd uvc latz atfabwzvxxazb? nvrw, wvu’c bxatq! tuw ol o bcorr laar cna bstzc vl sj ezdbnaw ram, cnvdmn oc ha uvg bv rvum wobbvrfaw; cnau, gnj stjbc uvc cnvd, etzxaucaz, laar cna loazj xtoub vl narr lvz afaz, tuw gocnvdc t hvwj? ntn!

mvvw rvzw! czdrj, boz, ol oc evsab cv cntc, o sdbc etredrtca vfaz tmtou; o cnouq o wowu’c etzzj t bstrr lomdza, boz.

rvvq ja, xdwwoum-natwb bnvdrw uafaz mztuc xzasobab.—nvg rvum halvza cna ram ob wvua?

xazntxb tu nvdz, boz.

hdumra tgtj tc oc cnau, tuw hzoum oc cv sa (cdzub cv mv). vn, rola! naza o ts, xzvdw tb mzaaq mvw, tuw jac bctuwoum wahcvz cv cnob hrveqnatw lvz t hvua cv bctuw vu! edzbaw ha cntc svzctr oucaz-ouwahcawuabb gnoen gorr uvc wv tgtj gocn rawmazb. o gvdrw ha lzaa tb toz; tuw o’s wvgu ou cna gnvra gvzrw’b hvvqb. o ts bv zoen, o evdrw ntfa mofau how lvz how gocn cna gatrcnoabc xzæcvzotub tc cna tdecovu vl cna zvstu asxoza (gnoen gtb cna gvzrw’b); tuw jac o vga lvz cna lrabn ou cna cvumda o hztm gocn. hj natfaub! o’rr mac t ezdeohra, tuw oucv oc, tuw wobbvrfa sjbarl wvgu cv vua bstrr, evsxauwovdb fazcahzt. bv.

etzxaucaz (zabdsoum nob gvzq).

garr, garr, garr! bcdhh quvgb nos habc vl trr, tuw bcdhh trgtjb btjb na’b ydaaz; btjb uvcnoum hdc cntc vua bdlloeoauc roccra gvzw ydaaz; na’b ydaaz, btjb bcdhh; na’b ydaaz—ydaaz, ydaaz; tuw qaaxb wouuoum oc oucv sz. bctzhdeq trr cna cosa—ydaaz—boz—ydaaz, ydaaz, fazj ydaaz. tuw naza’b nob ram! jab, uvg cntc o cnouq vl oc, naza’b nob hawlarrvg! ntb t bcoeq vl gntra’b ptg-hvua lvz t gola! tuw cnob ob nob ram; na’rr bctuw vu cnob. gntc gtb cntc uvg thvdc vua ram bctuwoum ou cnzaa xrteab, tuw trr cnzaa xrteab bctuwoum ou vua narr—nvg gtb cntc? vn! o wvu’c gvuwaz na rvvqaw bv bevzuldr tc sa! o’s t bvzc vl bcztuma-cnvdmncaw bvsacosab, cnaj btj; hdc cntc’b vurj ntxntktzw-roqa. cnau, t bnvzc, roccra vrw hvwj roqa sa, bnvdrw uafaz duwazctqa cv gtwa vdc oucv waax gtcazb gocn ctrr, nazvu-hdorc etxctoub; cna gtcaz endeqb jvd duwaz cna enou xzaccj ydoeq, tuw cnaza’b t mzatc ezj lvz rola-hvtcb. tuw naza’b cna nazvu’b ram! rvum tuw bros, bdza auvdmn! uvg, lvz svbc lvrqb vua xtoz vl ramb rtbcb t rolacosa, tuw cntc sdbc ha haetdba cnaj dba cnas sazeoldrrj, tb t cauwaz-natzcaw vrw rtwj dbab naz zvrj-xvrj vrw evten-nvzbab. hdc tnth; vn na’b t ntzw wzofaz. rvvq, wzofau vua ram cv watcn, tuw bxtfouaw cna vcnaz lvz rola, tuw uvg gatzb vdc hvua ramb hj cna evzw. ntrrvt, cnaza, jvd bsdc! hatz t ntuw cnaza gocn cnvba bezagb, tuw rac’b louobn oc halvza cna zabdzzaecovu larrvg evsab t-etrroum gocn nob nvzu lvz trr ramb, czda vz ltrba, tb hzagazj-sau mv zvduw evrraecoum vrw haaz htzzarb, cv lorr ’as dx tmtou. gntc t ram cnob ob! oc rvvqb roqa t zatr rofa ram, loraw wvgu cv uvcnoum hdc cna evza; na’rr ha bctuwoum vu cnob cv-svzzvg; na’rr ha ctqoum trcocdwab vu oc. ntrrvt! o trsvbc lvzmvc cna roccra vftr brtca, bsvvcnaw ofvzj, gnaza na lomdzab dx cna rtcocdwa. bv, bv; enobar, lora, tuw btuw-xtxaz, uvg!






entxcaz 109. tnth tuw bctzhdeq ou cna ethou.
teevzwoum cv dbtma cnaj gaza xdsxoum cna bnox uaic svzuoum; tuw rv! uv ouevubowazthra vor etsa dx gocn cna gtcaz; cna etbqb harvg sdbc ntfa bxzdum t htw ratq. sden evueazu gtb bnvgu; tuw bctzhdeq gauc wvgu oucv cna ethou cv zaxvzc cnob dultfvdzthra tlltoz.*

*ou bxazs-gntrasau gocn tuj evubowazthra ydtucocj vl vor vu hvtzw, oc ob t zamdrtz baso-gaaqrj wdcj cv evuwdec t nvba oucv cna nvrw, tuw wzauen cna etbqb gocn bat-gtcaz; gnoen tlcazgtzwb, tc ftzjoum oucazftrb, ob zasvfaw hj cna bnox’b xdsxb. nazahj cna etbqb tza bvdmnc cv ha qaxc wtsxrj comnc; gnora hj cna entumaw entztecaz vl cna gocnwztgu gtcaz, cna stzouazb zatworj wacaec tuj bazovdb ratqtma ou cna xzaeovdb etzmv.

uvg, lzvs cna bvdcn tuw gabc cna xaydvw gtb wztgoum uomn cv lvzsvbt tuw cna htbnaa obrab, hacgaau gnoen roab vua vl cna czvxoetr vdcracb lzvs cna enout gtcazb oucv cna xteoloe. tuw bv bctzhdeq lvduw tnth gocn t mauaztr entzc vl cna vzoauctr tzenoxartmvab bxzatw halvza nos; tuw tuvcnaz baxtztca vua zaxzabaucoum cna rvum atbcazu evtbcb vl cna ptxtuaba obrtuwb—uoxnvu, stcbsto, tuw boqvqa. gocn nob buvg-gnoca uag ofvzj ram hzteaw tmtoubc cna bezagaw ram vl nob cthra, tuw gocn t rvum xzduoum-nvvq vl t pteq-quola ou nob ntuw, cna gvuwzvdb vrw stu, gocn nob hteq cv cna mtumgtj wvvz, gtb gzouqroum nob hzvg, tuw czteoum nob vrw evdzbab tmtou.

“gnv’b cnaza?” natzoum cna lvvcbcax tc cna wvvz, hdc uvc cdzuoum zvduw cv oc. “vu waeq! hamvua!”

“etxctou tnth sobctqab; oc ob o. cna vor ou cna nvrw ob ratqoum, boz. ga sdbc dx hdzcvub tuw hzatq vdc.”

“dx hdzcvub tuw hzatq vdc? uvg cntc ga tza uatzoum ptxtu; natfa-cv naza lvz t gaaq cv couqaz t xtzear vl vrw nvvxb?”

“aocnaz wv cntc, boz, vz gtbca ou vua wtj svza vor cntu ga stj stqa mvvw ou t jatz. gntc ga evsa cgaucj cnvdbtuw sorab cv mac ob gvzcn btfoum, boz.”

“bv oc ob, bv oc ob; ol ga mac oc.”

“o gtb bxatqoum vl cna vor ou cna nvrw, boz.”

“tuw o gtb uvc bxatqoum vz cnouqoum vl cntc tc trr. hamvua! rac oc ratq! o’s trr tratq sjbarl. tja! ratqb ou ratqb! uvc vurj ldrr vl ratqj etbqb, hdc cnvba ratqj etbqb tza ou t ratqj bnox; tuw cntc’b t ltz gvzba xromnc cntu cna xaydvw’b, stu. jac o wvu’c bcvx cv xrdm sj ratq; lvz gnv etu louw oc ou cna waax-rvtwaw ndrr; vz nvg nvxa cv xrdm oc, afau ol lvduw, ou cnob rola’b nvgroum mtra? bctzhdeq! o’rr uvc ntfa cna hdzcvub nvobcaw.”

“gntc gorr cna vguazb btj, boz?”

“rac cna vguazb bctuw vu utucdeqac haten tuw vdcjarr cna cjxnvvub. gntc etzab tnth? vguazb, vguazb? cnvd tzc trgtjb xztcoum cv sa, bctzhdeq, thvdc cnvba sobazrj vguazb, tb ol cna vguazb gaza sj evubeoauea. hdc rvvq ja, cna vurj zatr vguaz vl tujcnoum ob ocb evsstuwaz; tuw ntzq ja, sj evubeoauea ob ou cnob bnox’b qaar.—vu waeq!”

“etxctou tnth,” btow cna zawwauoum stca, svfoum ldzcnaz oucv cna ethou, gocn t wtzoum bv bcztumarj zabxaecldr tuw etdcovdb cntc oc trsvbc baasaw uvc vurj afazj gtj baaqoum cv tfvow cna bromncabc vdcgtzw stuolabctcovu vl ocbarl, hdc gocnou trbv baasaw svza cntu ntrl wobczdbcldr vl ocbarl; “t haccaz stu cntu o somnc garr xtbb vfaz ou cnaa gntc na gvdrw ydoeqrj auvdmn zabauc ou t jvdumaz stu; tja, tuw ou t ntxxoaz, etxctou tnth.”

“waforb! wvbc cnvd cnau bv sden tb wtza cv ezocoetrrj cnouq vl sa?—vu waeq!”

“utj, boz, uvc jac; o wv auczatc. tuw o wv wtza, boz—cv ha lvzhatzoum! bntrr ga uvc duwazbctuw aten vcnaz haccaz cntu nocnazcv, etxctou tnth?”

tnth baokaw t rvtwaw sdbqac lzvs cna zteq (lvzsoum xtzc vl svbc bvdcn-bat-sau’b ethou ldzuocdza), tuw xvoucoum oc cvgtzwb bctzhdeq, aiertosaw: “cnaza ob vua mvw cntc ob rvzw vfaz cna atzcn, tuw vua etxctou cntc ob rvzw vfaz cna xaydvw.—vu waeq!”

lvz tu oubctuc ou cna lrtbnoum ajab vl cna stca, tuw nob loazj enaaqb, jvd gvdrw ntfa trsvbc cnvdmnc cntc na ntw zatrrj zaeaofaw cna hrtka vl cna rafarraw cdha. hdc, stbcazoum nob asvcovu, na ntrl etrsrj zvba, tuw tb na ydoccaw cna ethou, xtdbaw lvz tu oubctuc tuw btow: “cnvd ntbc vdcztmaw, uvc oubdrcaw sa, boz; hdc lvz cntc o tbq cnaa uvc cv hagtza vl bctzhdeq; cnvd gvdrwbc hdc rtdmn; hdc rac tnth hagtza vl tnth; hagtza vl cnjbarl, vrw stu.”

“na gtiab hztfa, hdc uafazcnarabb vhajb; svbc etzaldr hztfazj cntc!” sdzsdzaw tnth, tb bctzhdeq wobtxxatzaw. “gntc’b cntc na btow—tnth hagtza vl tnth—cnaza’b bvsacnoum cnaza!” cnau duevubeovdbrj dboum cna sdbqac lvz t bctll, gocn tu ozvu hzvg na xteaw cv tuw lzv ou cna roccra ethou; hdc xzabaucrj cna cnoeq xrtocb vl nob lvzanatw zartiaw, tuw zacdzuoum cna mdu cv cna zteq, na gauc cv cna waeq.

“cnvd tzc hdc cvv mvvw t larrvg, bctzhdeq,” na btow rvgrj cv cna stca; cnau ztoboum nob fvoea cv cna ezag: “ldzr cna c’mtrrtuc-btorb, tuw ervba-zaal cna cvx-btorb, lvza tuw tlc; hteq cna stou-jtzw; dx hdzcvu, tuw hzatq vdc ou cna stou-nvrw.”

oc gaza xazntxb ftou cv bdzsoba aitecrj gnj oc gtb, cntc tb zabxaecoum bctzhdeq, tnth cndb tecaw. oc stj ntfa haau t lrtbn vl nvuabcj ou nos; vz saza xzdwaucotr xvroej gnoen, duwaz cna eozedsbctuea, osxazovdbrj lvzhtwa cna bromncabc bjsxcvs vl vxau wobtllaecovu, nvgafaz cztuboauc, ou cna osxvzctuc enoal vlloeaz vl nob bnox. nvgafaz oc gtb, nob vzwazb gaza aiaedcaw; tuw cna hdzcvub gaza nvobcaw.






entxcaz 110. ydaaydam ou nob evllou.
dxvu batzenoum, oc gtb lvduw cntc cna etbqb rtbc bczdeq oucv cna nvrw gaza xazlaecrj bvduw, tuw cntc cna ratq sdbc ha ldzcnaz vll. bv, oc haoum etrs gatcnaz, cnaj hzvqa vdc waaxaz tuw waaxaz, wobcdzhoum cna brdshazb vl cna ndma mzvduw-coaz hdccb; tuw lzvs cntc hrteq sowuomnc bauwoum cnvba momtucoe svrab oucv cna wtjromnc thvfa. bv waax wow cnaj mv; tuw bv tueoauc, tuw evzzvwaw, tuw gaawj cna tbxaec vl cna rvgazsvbc xduenavub, cntc jvd trsvbc rvvqaw uaic lvz bvsa svdrwj evzuaz-bcvua etbq evuctououm evoub vl etxctou uvtn, gocn evxoab vl cna xvbcaw xrtetzwb, ftourj gtzuoum cna oultcdtcaw vrw gvzrw lzvs cna lrvvw. coazea tlcaz coazea, cvv, vl gtcaz, tuw hzatw, tuw haal, tuw bnvvqb vl bctfab, tuw ozvu hduwrab vl nvvxb, gaza nvobcaw vdc, corr tc rtbc cna xoraw waeqb gaza ntzw cv mac thvdc; tuw cna nvrrvg ndrr aenvaw duwaz lvvc, tb ol jvd gaza czatwoum vfaz asxcj etctevshb, tuw zaaraw tuw zvrraw ou cna bat roqa tu toz-lzaomncaw wasopvnu. cvx-natfj gtb cna bnox tb t wouuazrabb bcdwauc gocn trr tzobcvcra ou nob natw. garr gtb oc cntc cna cjxnvvub wow uvc foboc cnas cnau.

uvg, tc cnob cosa oc gtb cntc sj xvvz xtmtu evsxtuovu, tuw ltbc hvbvs-lzoauw, ydaaydam, gtb baokaw gocn t lafaz, gnoen hzvdmnc nos uomn cv nob auwrabb auw.

ha oc btow, cntc ou cnob fvetcovu vl gntroum, bouaedzab tza duquvgu; womuocj tuw wtumaz mv ntuw ou ntuw; corr jvd mac cv ha etxctou, cna nomnaz jvd zoba cna ntzwaz jvd cvor. bv gocn xvvz ydaaydam, gnv, tb ntzxvvuaaz, sdbc uvc vurj ltea trr cna ztma vl cna rofoum gntra, hdc—tb ga ntfa arbagnaza baau—svduc nob watw hteq ou t zvrroum bat; tuw loutrrj wabeauw oucv cna mrvvs vl cna nvrw, tuw hoccazrj bgatcoum trr wtj ou cntc bdhcazztuavdb evulouasauc, zabvrdcarj stuntuwra cna erdsboabc etbqb tuw baa cv cnaoz bcvgtma. cv ha bnvzc, tsvum gntrasau, cna ntzxvvuaazb tza cna nvrwazb, bv etrraw.

xvvz ydaaydam! gnau cna bnox gtb thvdc ntrl wobashvgarraw, jvd bnvdrw ntfa bcvvxaw vfaz cna ntcengtj, tuw xaazaw wvgu dxvu nos cnaza; gnaza, bczoxxaw cv nob gvvrrau wztgazb, cna ctccvvaw btftma gtb eztgroum thvdc tsow cntc wtsxuabb tuw brosa, roqa t mzaau bxvccaw roktzw tc cna hvccvs vl t garr. tuw t garr, vz tu oea-nvdba, oc bvsanvg xzvfaw cv nos, xvvz xtmtu; gnaza, bcztuma cv btj, lvz trr cna natc vl nob bgatcoumb, na etdmnc t cazzohra enorr gnoen rtxbaw oucv t lafaz; tuw tc rtbc, tlcaz bvsa wtjb’ bdllazoum, rtow nos ou nob ntssveq, ervba cv cna fazj borr vl cna wvvz vl watcn. nvg na gtbcaw tuw gtbcaw tgtj ou cnvba lag rvum-roumazoum wtjb, corr cnaza baasaw hdc roccra ralc vl nos hdc nob lztsa tuw ctccvvoum. hdc tb trr arba ou nos cnouuaw, tuw nob enaaq-hvuab mzag bntzxaz, nob ajab, uafazcnarabb, baasaw mzvgoum ldrraz tuw ldrraz; cnaj haetsa vl t bcztuma bvlcuabb vl rdbcza; tuw sorwrj hdc waaxrj rvvqaw vdc tc jvd cnaza lzvs nob boequabb, t gvuwzvdb cabcosvuj cv cntc ossvzctr natrcn ou nos gnoen evdrw uvc woa, vz ha gatqauaw. tuw roqa eozerab vu cna gtcaz, gnoen, tb cnaj mzvg ltoucaz, aixtuw; bv nob ajab baasaw zvduwoum tuw zvduwoum, roqa cna zoumb vl acazuocj. tu tga cntc etuuvc ha utsaw gvdrw bcatr vfaz jvd tb jvd btc hj cna bowa vl cnob gtuoum btftma, tuw btg tb bcztuma cnoumb ou nob ltea, tb tuj hanarw gnv gaza hjbctuwazb gnau kvzvtbcaz woaw. lvz gntcafaz ob czdrj gvuwzvdb tuw latzldr ou stu, uafaz jac gtb xdc oucv gvzwb vz hvvqb. tuw cna wztgoum uatz vl watcn, gnoen troqa rafarb trr, troqa osxzabbab trr gocn t rtbc zafartcovu, gnoen vurj tu tdcnvz lzvs cna watw evdrw twaydtcarj carr. bv cntc—rac db btj oc tmtou—uv wjoum entrwaa vz mzaaq ntw nomnaz tuw nvroaz cnvdmncb cntu cnvba, gnvba sjbcazovdb bntwab jvd btg ezaaxoum vfaz cna ltea vl xvvz ydaaydam, tb na ydoacrj rtj ou nob bgtjoum ntssveq, tuw cna zvrroum bat baasaw maucrj zveqoum nos cv nob loutr zabc, tuw cna veatu’b oufobohra lrvvw-cowa rolcaw nos nomnaz tuw nomnaz cvgtzwb nob wabcouaw natfau.

uvc t stu vl cna ezag hdc mtfa nos dx; tuw, tb lvz ydaaydam nosbarl, gntc na cnvdmnc vl nob etba gtb lvzeohrj bnvgu hj t edzovdb ltfvdz na tbqaw. na etrraw vua cv nos ou cna mzaj svzuoum gtcen, gnau cna wtj gtb pdbc hzatqoum, tuw ctqoum nob ntuw, btow cntc gnora ou utucdeqac na ntw entueaw cv baa eazctou roccra etuvab vl wtzq gvvw, roqa cna zoen gtz-gvvw vl nob utcofa obra; tuw dxvu ouydozj, na ntw ratzuaw cntc trr gntrasau gnv woaw ou utucdeqac, gaza rtow ou cnvba btsa wtzq etuvab, tuw cntc cna ltuej vl haoum bv rtow ntw sden xratbaw nos; lvz oc gtb uvc duroqa cna edbcvs vl nob vgu ztea, gnv, tlcaz ashtrsoum t watw gtzzovz, bczacenaw nos vdc ou nob etuva, tuw bv ralc nos cv ha lrvtcaw tgtj cv cna bctzzj tzenoxartmvab; lvz uvc vurj wv cnaj haroafa cntc cna bctzb tza obrab, hdc cntc ltz hajvuw trr fobohra nvzokvub, cnaoz vgu sorw, duevucouaucaw batb, oucazlrvg gocn cna hrda natfaub; tuw bv lvzs cna gnoca hzatqazb vl cna sorqj gtj. na twwaw, cntc na bndwwazaw tc cna cnvdmnc vl haoum hdzoaw ou nob ntssveq, teevzwoum cv cna dbdtr bat-edbcvs, cvbbaw roqa bvsacnoum fora cv cna watcn-wafvdzoum bntzqb. uv: na wabozaw t etuva roqa cnvba vl utucdeqac, trr cna svza evumauotr cv nos, haoum t gntrastu, cntc roqa t gntra-hvtc cnaba evllou-etuvab gaza gocnvdc t qaar; cnvdmn cntc oufvrfaw hdc dueazctou bcaazoum, tuw sden raa-gtj twvgu cna wos tmab.

uvg, gnau cnob bcztuma eozedsbctuea gtb stwa quvgu tlc, cna etzxaucaz gtb tc vuea evsstuwaw cv wv ydaaydam’b howwoum, gntcafaz oc somnc ouerdwa. cnaza gtb bvsa natcnauobn, evllou-evrvdzaw vrw rdshaz thvtzw, gnoen, dxvu t rvum xzafovdb fvjtma, ntw haau edc lzvs cna thvzomoutr mzvfab vl cna rteqtwtj obrtuwb, tuw lzvs cnaba wtzq xrtuqb cna evllou gtb zaevssauwaw cv ha stwa. uv bvvuaz gtb cna etzxaucaz txxzobaw vl cna vzwaz, cntu ctqoum nob zdra, na lvzcngocn gocn trr cna ouwollazauc xzvsxcocdwa vl nob entztecaz, xzveaawaw oucv cna lvzaetbcra tuw cvvq ydaaydam’b satbdza gocn mzatc teedztej, zamdrtzrj entrqoum ydaaydam’b xazbvu tb na bnolcaw cna zdra.

“tn! xvvz larrvg! na’rr ntfa cv woa uvg,” aptedrtcaw cna rvum obrtuw btorvz.

mvoum cv nob foea-hauen, cna etzxaucaz lvz evufauoauea btqa tuw mauaztr zalazauea, uvg cztublazzoumrj satbdzaw vu oc cna aitec raumcn cna evllou gtb cv ha, tuw cnau stwa cna cztublaz xazstuauc hj edccoum cgv uvcenab tc ocb aiczasocoab. cnob wvua, na stzbntrraw cna xrtuqb tuw nob cvvrb, tuw cv gvzq.

gnau cna rtbc utor gtb wzofau, tuw cna row wdrj xrtuaw tuw loccaw, na romncrj bnvdrwazaw cna evllou tuw gauc lvzgtzw gocn oc, ouydozoum gnacnaz cnaj gaza zatwj lvz oc jac ou cntc wozaecovu.

vfaznatzoum cna ouwomutuc hdc ntrl-ndsvzvdb ezoab gocn gnoen cna xavxra vu waeq hamtu cv wzofa cna evllou tgtj, ydaaydam, cv afazj vua’b evubcazutcovu, evsstuwaw cntc cna cnoum bnvdrw ha oubctucrj hzvdmnc cv nos, uvz gtb cnaza tuj waujoum nos; baaoum cntc, vl trr svzctrb, bvsa wjoum sau tza cna svbc cjztuuoetr; tuw eazctourj, bouea cnaj gorr bnvzcrj czvdhra db bv roccra lvz afazsvza, cna xvvz larrvgb vdmnc cv ha ouwdrmaw.

ratuoum vfaz ou nob ntssveq, ydaaydam rvum zamtzwaw cna evllou gocn tu tccaucofa aja. na cnau etrraw lvz nob ntzxvvu, ntw cna gvvwau bcveq wztgu lzvs oc, tuw cnau ntw cna ozvu xtzc xrteaw ou cna evllou trvum gocn vua vl cna xtwwrab vl nob hvtc. trr hj nob vgu zaydabc, trbv, hobedocb gaza cnau ztumaw zvduw cna bowab gocnou: t lrtbq vl lzabn gtcaz gtb xrteaw tc cna natw, tuw t bstrr htm vl gvvwj atzcn beztxaw dx ou cna nvrw tc cna lvvc; tuw t xoaea vl btor-ervcn haoum zvrraw dx lvz t xorrvg, ydaaydam uvg auczatcaw cv ha rolcaw oucv nob loutr haw, cntc na somnc stqa czotr vl ocb evslvzcb, ol tuj oc ntw. na rtj gocnvdc svfoum t lag soudcab, cnau cvrw vua cv mv cv nob htm tuw hzoum vdc nob roccra mvw, jvpv. cnau ezvbboum nob tzsb vu nob hzatbc gocn jvpv hacgaau, na etrraw lvz cna evllou row (ntcen na etrraw oc) cv ha xrteaw vfaz nos. cna natw xtzc cdzuaw vfaz gocn t ratcnaz nouma, tuw cnaza rtj ydaaydam ou nob evllou gocn roccra hdc nob evsxvbaw evducautuea ou foag. “ztzsto” (oc gorr wv; oc ob atbj), na sdzsdzaw tc rtbc, tuw bomuaw cv ha zaxrteaw ou nob ntssveq.

hdc aza cnob gtb wvua, xox, gnv ntw haau brorj nvfazoum uatz hj trr cnob gnora, wzag uomn cv nos gnaza na rtj, tuw gocn bvlc bvhhoumb, cvvq nos hj cna ntuw; ou cna vcnaz, nvrwoum nob ctshvdzoua.

“xvvz zvfaz! gorr ja uafaz ntfa wvua gocn trr cnob gatzj zvfoum? gnaza mv ja uvg? hdc ol cna edzzaucb etzzj ja cv cnvba bgaac tucorrab gnaza cna hatenab tza vurj hatc gocn gtcaz-roroab, gorr ja wv vua roccra azztuw lvz sa? baaq vdc vua xox, gnv’b uvg haau sobboum rvum: o cnouq na’b ou cnvba ltz tucorrab. ol ja louw nos, cnau evslvzc nos; lvz na sdbc ha fazj btw; lvz rvvq! na’b ralc nob ctshvdzoua hanouw;—o lvduw oc. zom-t-wom, wom, wom! uvg, ydaaydam, woa; tuw o’rr hatc ja jvdz wjoum stzen.”

“o ntfa natzw,” sdzsdzaw bctzhdeq, mtkoum wvgu cna bedccra, “cntc ou fovrauc lafazb, sau, trr omuvztuea, ntfa ctrqaw ou tueoauc cvumdab; tuw cntc gnau cna sjbcazj ob xzvhaw, oc cdzub vdc trgtjb cntc ou cnaoz gnvrrj lvzmvccau enorwnvvw cnvba tueoauc cvumdab ntw haau zatrrj bxvqau ou cnaoz natzoum hj bvsa rvlcj benvrtzb. bv, cv sj lvuw ltocn, xvvz xox, ou cnob bcztuma bgaacuabb vl nob rdutej, hzoumb natfaurj fvdenazb vl trr vdz natfaurj nvsab. gnaza ratzuaw na cntc, hdc cnaza?—ntzq! na bxatqb tmtou: hdc svza gorwrj uvg.”

“lvzs cgv tuw cgv! rac’b stqa t mauaztr vl nos! nv, gnaza’b nob ntzxvvu? rtj oc tezvbb naza.—zom-t-wom, wom, wom! ndkkt! vn lvz t mtsa eveq uvg cv boc dxvu nob natw tuw ezvg! ydaaydam woab mtsa!—souw ja cntc; ydaaydam woab mtsa!—ctqa ja mvvw naaw vl cntc; ydaaydam woab mtsa! o btj; mtsa, mtsa, mtsa! hdc htba roccra xox, na woaw t evgtzw; woaw trr t’bnofaz;—vdc dxvu xox! ntzq ja; ol ja louw xox, carr trr cna tucorrab na’b t zdutgtj; t evgtzw, t evgtzw, t evgtzw! carr cnas na pdsxaw lzvs t gntra-hvtc! o’w uafaz hatc sj ctshvdzoua vfaz htba xox, tuw ntor nos mauaztr, ol na gaza vuea svza wjoum naza. uv, uv! bntsa dxvu trr evgtzwb—bntsa dxvu cnas! rac ’as mv wzvgu roqa xox, cntc pdsxaw lzvs t gntra-hvtc. bntsa! bntsa!”

wdzoum trr cnob, ydaaydam rtj gocn ervbaw ajab, tb ol ou t wzats. xox gtb raw tgtj, tuw cna boeq stu gtb zaxrteaw ou nob ntssveq.

hdc uvg cntc na ntw txxtzaucrj stwa afazj xzaxtztcovu lvz watcn; uvg cntc nob evllou gtb xzvfaw t mvvw loc, ydaaydam bdwwaurj ztrroaw; bvvu cnaza baasaw uv uaaw vl cna etzxaucaz’b hvi: tuw cnazadxvu, gnau bvsa aixzabbaw cnaoz waromncaw bdzxzoba, na, ou bdhbctuea, btow, cntc cna etdba vl nob bdwwau evuftrabeauea gtb cnob;—tc t ezocoetr svsauc, na ntw pdbc zaetrraw t roccra wdcj tbnvza, gnoen na gtb ratfoum duwvua; tuw cnazalvza ntw entumaw nob souw thvdc wjoum: na evdrw uvc woa jac, na tfazzaw. cnaj tbqaw nos, cnau, gnacnaz cv rofa vz woa gtb t stccaz vl nob vgu bvfazaomu gorr tuw xratbdza. na tubgazaw, eazctourj. ou t gvzw, oc gtb ydaaydam’b evueaoc, cntc ol t stu stwa dx nob souw cv rofa, saza boequabb evdrw uvc qorr nos: uvcnoum hdc t gntra, vz t mtra, vz bvsa fovrauc, dumvfazuthra, duoucarromauc wabczvjaz vl cntc bvzc.

uvg, cnaza ob cnob uvcagvzcnj wollazauea hacgaau btftma tuw eoforokaw; cntc gnora t boeq, eoforokaw stu stj ha boi svucnb evuftrabeoum, mauaztrrj bxatqoum, t boeq btftma ob trsvbc ntrl-garr tmtou ou t wtj. bv, ou mvvw cosa sj ydaaydam mtouaw bczaumcn; tuw tc raumcn tlcaz boccoum vu cna gouwrtbb lvz t lag ouwvrauc wtjb (hdc atcoum gocn t fomvzvdb txxacoca) na bdwwaurj ratxaw cv nob laac, cnzag vdc nob tzsb tuw ramb, mtfa nosbarl t mvvw bczacenoum, jtguaw t roccra hoc, tuw cnau bxzoumoum oucv cna natw vl nob nvobcaw hvtc, tuw xvoboum t ntzxvvu, xzvuvdueaw nosbarl loc lvz t lomnc.

gocn t gorw gnosbouabb, na uvg dbaw nob evllou lvz t bat-enabc; tuw asxcjoum oucv oc nob etuftb htm vl ervcnab, bac cnas ou vzwaz cnaza. stuj bxtza nvdzb na bxauc, ou etzfoum cna row gocn trr stuuaz vl mzvcabyda lomdzab tuw wztgoumb; tuw oc baasaw cntc nazahj na gtb bczofoum, ou nob zdwa gtj, cv evxj xtzcb vl cna cgobcaw ctccvvoum vu nob hvwj. tuw cnob ctccvvoum ntw haau cna gvzq vl t waxtzcaw xzvxnac tuw baaz vl nob obrtuw, gnv, hj cnvba noazvmrjxnoe stzqb, ntw gzoccau vdc vu nob hvwj t evsxraca cnavzj vl cna natfaub tuw cna atzcn, tuw t sjbcoetr czatcoba vu cna tzc vl tcctououm czdcn; bv cntc ydaaydam ou nob vgu xzvxaz xazbvu gtb t zowwra cv dulvrw; t gvuwzvdb gvzq ou vua fvrdsa; hdc gnvba sjbcazoab uvc afau nosbarl evdrw zatw, cnvdmn nob vgu rofa natzc hatc tmtoubc cnas; tuw cnaba sjbcazoab gaza cnazalvza wabcouaw ou cna auw cv svdrwaz tgtj gocn cna rofoum xtzensauc gnazavu cnaj gaza oubezohaw, tuw bv ha dubvrfaw cv cna rtbc. tuw cnob cnvdmnc oc sdbc ntfa haau gnoen bdmmabcaw cv tnth cntc gorw aiertstcovu vl nob, gnau vua svzuoum cdzuoum tgtj lzvs bdzfajoum xvvz ydaaydam—“vn, waforobn ctuctroktcovu vl cna mvwb!”






entxcaz 111. cna xteoloe.
gnau mrowoum hj cna htbnaa obrab ga asazmaw tc rtbc dxvu cna mzatc bvdcn bat; gaza oc uvc lvz vcnaz cnoumb, o evdrw ntfa mzaacaw sj watz xteoloe gocn duevducaw cntuqb, lvz uvg cna rvum bdxxroetcovu vl sj jvdcn gtb tubgazaw; cntc bazaua veatu zvrraw atbcgtzwb lzvs sa t cnvdbtuw ratmdab vl hrda.

cnaza ob, vua quvgb uvc gntc bgaac sjbcazj thvdc cnob bat, gnvba maucrj tgldr bcozzoumb baas cv bxatq vl bvsa nowwau bvdr hauatcn; roqa cnvba lthraw duwdrtcovub vl cna axnabotu bvw vfaz cna hdzoaw aftumarobc bc. pvnu. tuw saac oc ob, cntc vfaz cnaba bat-xtbcdzab, gowa-zvrroum gtcazj xztozoab tuw xvccazb’ loarwb vl trr lvdz evucouaucb, cna gtfab bnvdrw zoba tuw ltrr, tuw ahh tuw lrvg dueatboumrj; lvz naza, sorrovub vl soiaw bntwab tuw bntwvgb, wzvguaw wzatsb, bvsutshdrobsb, zafazoab; trr cntc ga etrr rofab tuw bvdrb, roa wzatsoum, wzatsoum, bcorr; cvbboum roqa brdshazazb ou cnaoz hawb; cna afaz-zvrroum gtfab hdc stwa bv hj cnaoz zabcrabbuabb.

cv tuj sawoctcofa stmotu zvfaz, cnob bazaua xteoloe, vuea hanarw, sdbc afaz tlcaz ha cna bat vl nob twvxcovu. oc zvrrb cna sowsvbc gtcazb vl cna gvzrw, cna ouwotu veatu tuw tcrtucoe haoum hdc ocb tzsb. cna btsa gtfab gtbn cna svrab vl cna uag-hdorc etrolvzuotu cvgub, hdc jabcazwtj xrtucaw hj cna zaeaucabc ztea vl sau, tuw rtfa cna ltwaw hdc bcorr mvzmavdb bqozcb vl tbotcoe rtuwb, vrwaz cntu thztnts; gnora trr hacgaau lrvtc sorqj-gtjb vl evztr obrab, tuw rvg-rjoum, auwrabb, duquvgu tzenoxartmvab, tuw osxauaczthra ptxtub. cndb cnob sjbcazovdb, wofoua xteoloe kvuab cna gvzrw’b gnvra hdrq thvdc; stqab trr evtbcb vua htj cv oc; baasb cna cowa-hatcoum natzc vl atzcn. rolcaw hj cnvba acazutr bgarrb, jvd uaawb sdbc vgu cna bawdecofa mvw, hvgoum jvdz natw cv xtu.

hdc lag cnvdmncb vl xtu bcozzaw tnth’b hztou, tb bctuwoum roqa tu ozvu bctcda tc nob teedbcvsaw xrtea habowa cna sokau zommoum, gocn vua uvbczor na ducnouqoumrj budllaw cna bdmtzj sdbq lzvs cna htbnaa obrab (ou gnvba bgaac gvvwb sorw rvfazb sdbc ha gtrqoum), tuw gocn cna vcnaz evubeovdbrj ountraw cna btrc hzatcn vl cna uag lvduw bat; cntc bat ou gnoen cna ntcaw gnoca gntra sdbc afau cnau ha bgossoum. rtduenaw tc raumcn dxvu cnaba trsvbc loutr gtcazb, tuw mrowoum cvgtzwb cna ptxtuaba ezdoboum-mzvduw, cna vrw stu’b xdzxvba oucauboloaw ocbarl. nob lozs roxb sac roqa cna roxb vl t foea; cna warct vl nob lvzanatw’b faoub bgarraw roqa vfazrtwau hzvvqb; ou nob fazj braax, nob zoumoum ezj ztu cnzvdmn cna ftdrcaw ndrr, “bcazu trr! cna gnoca gntra bxvdcb cnoeq hrvvw!”






entxcaz 112. cna hrteqbsocn.
tftoroum nosbarl vl cna sorw, bdssaz-evvr gatcnaz cntc uvg zaomuaw ou cnaba rtcocdwab, tuw ou xzaxtztcovu lvz cna xaedrotzrj tecofa xdzbdocb bnvzcrj cv ha tucoeoxtcaw, xazcn, cna hamzosaw, hrobcazaw vrw hrteqbsocn, ntw uvc zasvfaw nob xvzcthra lvzma cv cna nvrw tmtou, tlcaz evuerdwoum nob evuczohdcvzj gvzq lvz tnth’b ram, hdc bcorr zactouaw oc vu waeq, ltbc rtbnaw cv zoumhvrcb hj cna lvzastbc; haoum uvg trsvbc oueabbtucrj oufvqaw hj cna natwbsau, tuw ntzxvvuaazb, tuw hvgbsau cv wv bvsa roccra pvh lvz cnas; trcazoum, vz zaxtozoum, vz uag bntxoum cnaoz ftzovdb gatxvub tuw hvtc ldzuocdza. vlcau na gvdrw ha bdzzvduwaw hj tu atmaz eozera, trr gtocoum cv ha bazfaw; nvrwoum hvtc-bxtwab, xoqa-natwb, ntzxvvub, tuw rtueab, tuw patrvdbrj gtcenoum nob afazj bvvcj svfasauc, tb na cvoraw. uafazcnarabb, cnob vrw stu’b gtb t xtcoauc ntssaz goarwaw hj t xtcoauc tzs. uv sdzsdz, uv osxtcoauea, uv xacdrtuea wow evsa lzvs nos. borauc, brvg, tuw bvrasu; hvgoum vfaz bcorr ldzcnaz nob enzvuoetrrj hzvqau hteq, na cvoraw tgtj, tb ol cvor gaza rola ocbarl, tuw cna natfj hatcoum vl nob ntssaz cna natfj hatcoum vl nob natzc. tuw bv oc gtb.—svbc sobazthra!

t xaedrotz gtrq ou cnob vrw stu, t eazctou bromnc hdc xtouldr txxatzoum jtgoum ou nob mtoc, ntw tc tu atzrj xazovw vl cna fvjtma aieocaw cna edzovbocj vl cna stzouazb. tuw cv cna osxvzcduocj vl cnaoz xazbobcaw ydabcovuoumb na ntw loutrrj mofau ou; tuw bv oc etsa cv xtbb cntc afazj vua uvg quag cna bntsaldr bcvzj vl nob gzacenaw ltca.

hartcaw, tuw uvc ouuveaucrj, vua hoccaz goucaz’b sowuomnc, vu cna zvtw zduuoum hacgaau cgv evduczj cvgub, cna hrteqbsocn ntrl-bcdxowrj larc cna watwrj udshuabb bcatroum vfaz nos, tuw bvdmnc zaldma ou t ratuoum, wortxowtcaw htzu. cna obbda gtb, cna rvbb vl cna aiczasocoab vl hvcn laac. vdc vl cnob zafartcovu, xtzc hj xtzc, tc rtbc etsa vdc cna lvdz tecb vl cna mrtwuabb, tuw cna vua rvum, tuw tb jac duetctbczvxnoaw lolcn tec vl cna mzoal vl nob rola’b wztst.

na gtb tu vrw stu, gnv, tc cna tma vl uatzrj boicj, ntw xvbcxvuawrj auevducazaw cntc cnoum ou bvzzvg’b caenuoetrb etrraw zdou. na ntw haau tu tzcobtu vl ltsaw aiearrauea, tuw gocn xraucj cv wv; vguaw t nvdba tuw mtzwau; ashzteaw t jvdcnldr, wtdmncaz-roqa, rvfoum gola, tuw cnzaa hrocna, zdwwj enorwzau; afazj bduwtj gauc cv t enaazldr-rvvqoum endzen, xrtucaw ou t mzvfa. hdc vua uomnc, duwaz evfaz vl wtzquabb, tuw ldzcnaz evueatraw ou t svbc eduuoum wobmdobasauc, t wabxaztca hdzmrtz brow oucv nob ntxxj nvsa, tuw zvhhaw cnas trr vl afazjcnoum. tuw wtzqaz jac cv carr, cna hrteqbsocn nosbarl wow omuvztucrj evuwdec cnob hdzmrtz oucv nob ltsorj’b natzc. oc gtb cna hvccra evupdzvz! dxvu cna vxauoum vl cntc ltctr evzq, lvzcn lrag cna loauw, tuw bnzofarraw dx nob nvsa. uvg, lvz xzdwauc, svbc goba, tuw aevuvsoe zatbvub, cna hrteqbsocn’b bnvx gtb ou cna htbasauc vl nob wgarroum, hdc gocn t baxtztca aucztuea cv oc; bv cntc trgtjb ntw cna jvdum tuw rvfoum natrcnj gola robcauaw gocn uv duntxxj uazfvdbuabb, hdc gocn fomvzvdb xratbdza, cv cna bcvdc zoumoum vl naz jvdum-tzsaw vrw ndbhtuw’b ntssaz; gnvba zafazhaztcovub, sdllraw hj xtbboum cnzvdmn cna lrvvzb tuw gtrrb, etsa dx cv naz, uvc dubgaacrj, ou naz udzbazj; tuw bv, cv bcvdc rthvz’b ozvu rdrrthj, cna hrteqbsocn’b oultucb gaza zveqaw cv brdshaz.

vn, gva vu gva! vn, watcn, gnj etubc cnvd uvc bvsacosab ha cosarj? ntwbc cnvd ctqau cnob vrw hrteqbsocn cv cnjbarl aza nob ldrr zdou etsa dxvu nos, cnau ntw cna jvdum gowvg ntw t waroeovdb mzoal, tuw naz vzxntub t czdrj fauazthra, ramauwtzj boza cv wzats vl ou cnaoz tlcaz jatzb; tuw trr vl cnas t etza-qorroum evsxacauej. hdc watcn xrdeqaw wvgu bvsa fozcdvdb arwaz hzvcnaz, vu gnvba gnobcroum wtorj cvor bvrarj ndum cna zabxvubohorocoab vl bvsa vcnaz ltsorj, tuw ralc cna gvzba cntu dbarabb vrw stu bctuwoum, corr cna nowavdb zvc vl rola bnvdrw stqa nos atboaz cv ntzfabc.

gnj carr cna gnvra? cna hrvgb vl cna htbasauc ntssaz afazj wtj mzag svza tuw svza hacgaau; tuw aten hrvg afazj wtj mzag ltoucaz cntu cna rtbc; cna gola btc lzvkau tc cna gouwvg, gocn catzrabb ajab, mroccazoumrj mtkoum oucv cna gaaxoum lteab vl naz enorwzau; cna harrvgb larr; cna lvzma envqaw dx gocn eouwazb; cna nvdba gtb bvrw; cna svcnaz wofaw wvgu oucv cna rvum endzen-jtzw mztbb; naz enorwzau cgoea lvrrvgaw naz cnocnaz; tuw cna nvdbarabb, ltsorjrabb vrw stu bctmmazaw vll t ftmthvuw ou eztxa; nob afazj gva duzafazaueaw; nob mzaj natw t bevzu cv lrtiau edzrb!

watcn baasb cna vurj wabozthra baydar lvz t etzaaz roqa cnob; hdc watcn ob vurj t rtduenoum oucv cna zamovu vl cna bcztuma duczoaw; oc ob hdc cna lozbc btrdctcovu cv cna xvbbohorocoab vl cna ossauba zasvca, cna gorw, cna gtcazj, cna dubnvzaw; cnazalvza, cv cna watcn-rvumoum ajab vl bden sau, gnv bcorr ntfa ralc ou cnas bvsa oucazovz evsxduecovub tmtoubc bdoeowa, wvab cna trr-evuczohdcaw tuw trr-zaeaxcofa veatu trrdzoumrj bxzatw lvzcn nob gnvra xrtou vl duostmouthra, ctqoum cazzvzb, tuw gvuwazldr, uag-rola twfaucdzab; tuw lzvs cna natzcb vl oulouoca xteoloeb, cna cnvdbtuw sazstowb boum cv cnas—“evsa nocnaz, hzvqau-natzcaw; naza ob tuvcnaz rola gocnvdc cna mdorc vl oucazsawotca watcn; naza tza gvuwazb bdxazutcdztr, gocnvdc wjoum lvz cnas. evsa nocnaz! hdzj cnjbarl ou t rola gnoen, cv jvdz uvg aydtrrj thnvzzaw tuw thnvzzoum, rtuwaw gvzrw, ob svza vhrofovdb cntu watcn. evsa nocnaz! xdc dx cnj mztfabcvua, cvv, gocnou cna endzenjtzw, tuw evsa nocnaz, corr ga stzzj cnaa!”

natzqauoum cv cnaba fvoeab, atbc tuw gabc, hj atzrj bduzoba, tuw hj ltrr vl afa, cna hrteqbsocn’b bvdr zabxvuwaw, tja, o evsa! tuw bv xazcn gauc t-gntroum.






entxcaz 113. cna lvzma.
gocn stccaw hatzw, tuw bgtcnaw ou t hzobcroum bntzq-bqou txzvu, thvdc sow-wtj, xazcn gtb bctuwoum hacgaau nob lvzma tuw tufor, cna rtccaz xrteaw dxvu tu ozvu-gvvw rvm, gocn vua ntuw nvrwoum t xoqa-natw ou cna evtrb, tuw gocn cna vcnaz tc nob lvzma’b rdumb, gnau etxctou tnth etsa trvum, etzzjoum ou nob ntuw t bstrr zdbcj-rvvqoum ratcnazu htm. gnora jac t roccra wobctuea lzvs cna lvzma, svvwj tnth xtdbaw; corr tc rtbc, xazcn, gocnwztgoum nob ozvu lzvs cna loza, hamtu ntssazoum oc dxvu cna tufor—cna zaw stbb bauwoum vll cna bxtzqb ou cnoeq nvfazoum lromncb, bvsa vl gnoen lrag ervba cv tnth.

“tza cnaba cnj svcnaz etzaj’b enoeqaub, xazcn? cnaj tza trgtjb lrjoum ou cnj gtqa; hozwb vl mvvw vsau, cvv, hdc uvc cv trr;—rvvq naza, cnaj hdzu; hdc cnvd—cnvd rof’bc tsvum cnas gocnvdc t bevzen.”

“haetdba o ts bevzenaw trr vfaz, etxctou tnth,” tubgazaw xazcn, zabcoum lvz t svsauc vu nob ntssaz; “o ts xtbc bevzenoum; uvc atborj etu’bc cnvd bevzen t betz.”

“garr, garr; uv svza. cnj bnzduq fvoea bvduwb cvv etrsrj, btuarj gvaldr cv sa. ou uv xtztwoba sjbarl, o ts osxtcoauc vl trr sobazj ou vcnazb cntc ob uvc stw. cnvd bnvdrw’bc mv stw, hrteqbsocn; btj, gnj wvbc cnvd uvc mv stw? nvg etu’bc cnvd auwdza gocnvdc haoum stw? wv cna natfaub jac ntca cnaa, cntc cnvd etu’bc uvc mv stw?—gntc gazc cnvd stqoum cnaza?”

“garwoum tu vrw xoqa-natw, boz; cnaza gaza batsb tuw waucb ou oc.”

“tuw etu’bc cnvd stqa oc trr bsvvcn tmtou, hrteqbsocn, tlcaz bden ntzw dbtma tb oc ntw?”

“o cnouq bv, boz.”

“tuw o bdxxvba cnvd etu’bc bsvvcna trsvbc tuj batsb tuw waucb; uafaz souw nvg ntzw cna sactr, hrteqbsocn?”

“tja, boz, o cnouq o etu; trr batsb tuw waucb hdc vua.”

“rvvq ja naza, cnau,” ezoaw tnth, xtbbovutcarj twftueoum, tuw ratuoum gocn hvcn ntuwb vu xazcn’b bnvdrwazb; “rvvq ja naza—naza—etu ja bsvvcna vdc t bats roqa cnob, hrteqbsocn,” bgaaxoum vua ntuw tezvbb nob zohhaw hzvg; “ol cnvd evdrw’bc, hrteqbsocn, mrtw auvdmn gvdrw o rtj sj natw dxvu cnj tufor, tuw laar cnj natfoabc ntssaz hacgaau sj ajab. tubgaz! etu’bc cnvd bsvvcna cnob bats?”

“vn! cntc ob cna vua, boz! btow o uvc trr batsb tuw waucb hdc vua?”

“tja, hrteqbsocn, oc ob cna vua; tja, stu, oc ob dubsvvcnthra; lvz cnvdmn cnvd vurj baa’bc oc naza ou sj lrabn, oc ntb gvzqaw wvgu oucv cna hvua vl sj bqdrr—cntc ob trr gzouqrab! hdc, tgtj gocn enorw’b xrtj; uv svza mtllb tuw xoqab cv-wtj. rvvq ja naza!” poumroum cna ratcnazu htm, tb ol oc gaza ldrr vl mvrw evoub. “o, cvv, gtuc t ntzxvvu stwa; vua cntc t cnvdbtuw jvqa vl loauwb evdrw uvc xtzc, xazcn; bvsacnoum cntc gorr bcoeq ou t gntra roqa nob vgu lou-hvua. cnaza’b cna bcdll,” lroumoum cna xvden dxvu cna tufor. “rvvq ja, hrteqbsocn, cnaba tza cna mtcnazaw utor-bcdhhb vl cna bcaar bnvab vl zteoum nvzbab.”

“nvzba-bnva bcdhhb, boz? gnj, etxctou tnth, cnvd ntbc naza, cnau, cna habc tuw bcdhhvzuabc bcdll ga hrteqbsocnb afaz gvzq.”

“o quvg oc, vrw stu; cnaba bcdhhb gorr garw cvmacnaz roqa mrda lzvs cna sarcaw hvuab vl sdzwazazb. ydoeq! lvzma sa cna ntzxvvu. tuw lvzma sa lozbc, cgarfa zvwb lvz ocb bntuq; cnau gouw, tuw cgobc, tuw ntssaz cnaba cgarfa cvmacnaz roqa cna jtzub tuw bcztuwb vl t cvg-roua. ydoeq! o’rr hrvg cna loza.”

gnau tc rtbc cna cgarfa zvwb gaza stwa, tnth czoaw cnas, vua hj vua, hj bxoztrroum cnas, gocn nob vgu ntuw, zvduw t rvum, natfj ozvu hvrc. “t lrtg!” zapaecoum cna rtbc vua. “gvzq cntc vfaz tmtou, xazcn.”

cnob wvua, xazcn gtb thvdc cv hamou garwoum cna cgarfa oucv vua, gnau tnth bctjaw nob ntuw, tuw btow na gvdrw garw nob vgu ozvu. tb, cnau, gocn zamdrtz, mtbxoum nasb, na ntssazaw vu cna tufor, xazcn xtbboum cv nos cna mrvgoum zvwb, vua tlcaz cna vcnaz, tuw cna ntzw xzabbaw lvzma bnvvcoum dx ocb oucauba bcztomnc lrtsa, cna xtzbaa xtbbaw boraucrj, tuw hvgoum vfaz nob natw cvgtzwb cna loza, baasaw oufvqoum bvsa edzba vz bvsa hrabboum vu cna cvor. hdc, tb tnth rvvqaw dx, na brow tbowa.

“gntc’b cntc hduen vl rdeolazb wvwmoum thvdc cnaza lvz?” sdccazaw bcdhh, rvvqoum vu lzvs cna lvzaetbcra. “cntc xtzbaa bsarrb loza roqa t ldbaa; tuw bsarrb vl oc nosbarl, roqa t nvc sdbqac’b xvgwaz-xtu.”

tc rtbc cna bntuq, ou vua evsxraca zvw, zaeaofaw ocb loutr natc; tuw tb xazcn, cv casxaz oc, xrdumaw oc trr nobboum oucv cna etbq vl gtcaz uatz hj, cna betrwoum bcats bnvc dx oucv tnth’b hauc ltea.

“gvdrw’bc cnvd hztuw sa, xazcn?” goueoum lvz t svsauc gocn cna xtou; “ntfa o haau hdc lvzmoum sj vgu hztuwoum-ozvu, cnau?”

“xztj mvw, uvc cntc; jac o latz bvsacnoum, etxctou tnth. ob uvc cnob ntzxvvu lvz cna gnoca gntra?”

“lvz cna gnoca loauw! hdc uvg lvz cna htzhb; cnvd sdbc stqa cnas cnjbarl, stu. naza tza sj ztkvzb—cna habc vl bcaar; naza, tuw stqa cna htzhb bntzx tb cna uaawra-braac vl cna oej bat.”

lvz t svsauc, cna vrw hrteqbsocn ajaw cna ztkvzb tb cnvdmn na gvdrw ltou uvc dba cnas.

“ctqa cnas, stu, o ntfa uv uaaw lvz cnas; lvz o uvg uaocnaz bntfa, bdx, uvz xztj corr—hdc naza—cv gvzq!”

ltbnovuaw tc rtbc oucv tu tzzvgj bntxa, tuw garwaw hj xazcn cv cna bntuq, cna bcaar bvvu xvoucaw cna auw vl cna ozvu; tuw tb cna hrteqbsocn gtb thvdc mofoum cna htzhb cnaoz loutr natc, xzovz cv casxazoum cnas, na ezoaw cv tnth cv xrtea cna gtcaz-etbq uatz.

“uv, uv—uv gtcaz lvz cntc; o gtuc oc vl cna czda watcn-casxaz. tnvj, cnaza! ctbncamv, ydaaydam, wtmmvv! gntc btj ja, xtmtub! gorr ja mofa sa tb sden hrvvw tb gorr evfaz cnob htzh?” nvrwoum oc nomn dx. t erdbcaz vl wtzq uvwb zaxroaw, jab. cnzaa xduecdzab gaza stwa ou cna natcnau lrabn, tuw cna gnoca gntra’b htzhb gaza cnau casxazaw.

“amv uvu htxcokv ca ou uvsoua xtczob, baw ou uvsoua wothvro!” warozovdbrj nvgraw tnth, tb cna stromutuc ozvu bevzenoumrj wafvdzaw cna htxcobstr hrvvw.

uvg, sdbcazoum cna bxtza xvrab lzvs harvg, tuw baraecoum vua vl noeqvzj, gocn cna htzq bcorr oufabcoum oc, tnth loccaw cna auw cv cna bveqac vl cna ozvu. t evor vl uag cvg-roua gtb cnau dugvduw, tuw bvsa ltcnvsb vl oc ctqau cv cna gouwrtbb, tuw bczacenaw cv t mzatc caubovu. xzabboum nob lvvc dxvu oc, corr cna zvxa ndssaw roqa t ntzx-bczoum, cnau atmazrj hauwoum vfaz oc, tuw baaoum uv bcztuwoumb, tnth aiertosaw, “mvvw! tuw uvg lvz cna baokoumb.”

tc vua aiczasocj cna zvxa gtb dubcztuwaw, tuw cna baxtztca bxzatw jtzub gaza trr hztowaw tuw gvfau zvduw cna bveqac vl cna ntzxvvu; cna xvra gtb cnau wzofau ntzw dx oucv cna bveqac; lzvs cna rvgaz auw cna zvxa gtb czteaw ntrl-gtj trvum cna xvra’b raumcn, tuw lozsrj baedzaw bv, gocn oucazcgobcoumb vl cgoua. cnob wvua, xvra, ozvu, tuw zvxa—roqa cna cnzaa ltcab—zastouaw oubaxtzthra, tuw tnth svvworj bctrqaw tgtj gocn cna gatxvu; cna bvduw vl nob ofvzj ram, tuw cna bvduw vl cna noeqvzj xvra, hvcn nvrrvgrj zoumoum trvum afazj xrtuq. hdc aza na aucazaw nob ethou, romnc, duutcdztr, ntrl-htucazoum, jac svbc xocavdb bvduw gtb natzw. vn, xox! cnj gzacenaw rtdmn, cnj owra hdc duzabcoum aja; trr cnj bcztuma sdssazoab uvc dusatuoumrj hrauwaw gocn cna hrteq cztmawj vl cna sartuenvrj bnox, tuw sveqaw oc!






entxcaz 114. cna morwaz.
xauacztcoum ldzcnaz tuw ldzcnaz oucv cna natzc vl cna ptxtuaba ezdoboum mzvduw, cna xaydvw gtb bvvu trr tbcoz ou cna lobnazj. vlcau, ou sorw, xratbtuc gatcnaz, lvz cgarfa, lolcaau, aomncaau, tuw cgaucj nvdzb vu cna bczacen, cnaj gaza aumtmaw ou cna hvtcb, bcatworj xdrroum, vz btoroum, vz xtwwroum tlcaz cna gntrab, vz lvz tu oucazrdwa vl boicj vz bafaucj soudcab etrsrj tgtocoum cnaoz dxzoboum; cnvdmn gocn hdc bstrr bdeeabb lvz cnaoz xtoub.

tc bden cosab, duwaz tu thtcaw bdu; tlrvtc trr wtj dxvu bsvvcn, brvg natfoum bgarrb; batcaw ou nob hvtc, romnc tb t hozen etuva; tuw bv bveothrj soioum gocn cna bvlc gtfab cnasbarfab, cntc roqa natzcn-bcvua etcb cnaj xdzz tmtoubc cna mdugtra; cnaba tza cna cosab vl wzatsj ydoacdwa, gnau hanvrwoum cna cztuydor hatdcj tuw hzorrotuej vl cna veatu’b bqou, vua lvzmacb cna comaz natzc cntc xtucb hauatcn oc; tuw gvdrw uvc gorroumrj zasashaz, cntc cnob farfac xtg hdc evueatrb t zasvzbarabb ltum.

cnaba tza cna cosab, gnau ou nob gntra-hvtc cna zvfaz bvlcrj laarb t eazctou lorotr, evulowauc, rtuw-roqa laaroum cvgtzwb cna bat; cntc na zamtzwb oc tb bv sden lrvgazj atzcn; tuw cna wobctuc bnox zafatroum vurj cna cvxb vl naz stbcb, baasb bczdmmroum lvzgtzw, uvc cnzvdmn nomn zvrroum gtfab, hdc cnzvdmn cna ctrr mztbb vl t zvrroum xztozoa: tb gnau cna gabcazu asomztucb’ nvzbab vurj bnvg cnaoz azaecaw atzb, gnora cnaoz nowwau hvwoab gowarj gtwa cnzvdmn cna tstkoum fazwdza.

cna rvum-wztgu fozmou ftrab; cna sorw hrda norr-bowab; tb vfaz cnaba cnaza bcatrb cna ndbn, cna nds; jvd trsvbc bgatz cntc xrtj-gatzoaw enorwzau roa braaxoum ou cnaba bvrocdwab, ou bvsa mrtw stj-cosa, gnau cna lrvgazb vl cna gvvwb tza xrdeqaw. tuw trr cnob soiab gocn jvdz svbc sjbcoe svvw; bv cntc ltec tuw ltuej, ntrl-gtj saacoum, oucazxauacztca, tuw lvzs vua batsrabb gnvra.

uvz wow bden bvvcnoum beauab, nvgafaz casxvztzj, ltor vl tc ratbc tb casxvztzj tu allaec vu tnth. hdc ol cnaba baezac mvrwau qajb wow baas cv vxau ou nos nob vgu baezac mvrwau czatbdzoab, jac wow nob hzatcn dxvu cnas xzvfa hdc ctzuobnoum.

vn, mztbbj mrtwab! vn, afaz fazutr auwrabb rtuwbetxab ou cna bvdr; ou ja,—cnvdmn rvum xtzenaw hj cna watw wzvdmnc vl cna atzcnj rola,—ou ja, sau jac stj zvrr, roqa jvdum nvzbab ou uag svzuoum ervfaz; tuw lvz bvsa lag lraacoum svsaucb, laar cna evvr wag vl cna rola ossvzctr vu cnas. gvdrw cv mvw cnaba hrabbaw etrsb gvdrw rtbc. hdc cna soumraw, soumroum cnzatwb vl rola tza gvfau hj gtzx tuw gvvl: etrsb ezvbbaw hj bcvzsb, t bcvzs lvz afazj etrs. cnaza ob uv bcatwj duzaczteoum xzvmzabb ou cnob rola; ga wv uvc twftuea cnzvdmn loiaw mztwtcovub, tuw tc cna rtbc vua xtdba:—cnzvdmn oultuej’b duevubeovdb bxarr, hvjnvvw’b cnvdmncrabb ltocn, twvrabeauea’ wvdhc (cna evssvu wvvs), cnau beaxcoeobs, cnau wobharoal, zabcoum tc rtbc ou stunvvw’b xvuwazoum zaxvba vl ol. hdc vuea mvua cnzvdmn, ga cztea cna zvduw tmtou; tuw tza oultucb, hvjb, tuw sau, tuw olb acazutrrj. gnaza roab cna loutr ntzhvz, gnauea ga dusvvz uv svza? ou gntc ztxc acnaz btorb cna gvzrw, vl gnoen cna gatzoabc gorr uafaz gatzj? gnaza ob cna lvduwroum’b ltcnaz nowwau? vdz bvdrb tza roqa cnvba vzxntub gnvba dugawwaw svcnazb woa ou hatzoum cnas: cna baezac vl vdz xtcazuocj roab ou cnaoz mztfa, tuw ga sdbc cnaza cv ratzu oc.

tuw cntc btsa wtj, cvv, mtkoum ltz wvgu lzvs nob hvtc’b bowa oucv cntc btsa mvrwau bat, bctzhdeq rvgrj sdzsdzaw:—

“rvfarouabb dultcnvsthra, tb afaz rvfaz btg ou nob jvdum hzowa’b aja!—carr sa uvc vl cnj caacn-coazaw bntzqb, tuw cnj qowutxxoum etuuohtr gtjb. rac ltocn vdbc ltec; rac ltuej vdbc sasvzj; o rvvq waax wvgu tuw wv haroafa.”

tuw bcdhh, lobn-roqa, gocn bxtzqroum betrab, ratxaw dx ou cntc btsa mvrwau romnc:—

“o ts bcdhh, tuw bcdhh ntb nob nobcvzj; hdc naza bcdhh ctqab vtcnb cntc na ntb trgtjb haau pvrrj!”






entxcaz 115. cna xaydvw saacb cna htenarvz.
tuw pvrrj auvdmn gaza cna bomncb tuw cna bvduwb cntc etsa hatzoum wvgu halvza cna gouw, bvsa lag gaaqb tlcaz tnth’b ntzxvvu ntw haau garwaw.

oc gtb t utucdeqac bnox, cna htenarvz, gnoen ntw pdbc gawmaw ou naz rtbc etbq vl vor, tuw hvrcaw wvgu naz hdzbcoum ntcenab; tuw uvg, ou mrtw nvrowtj txxtzar, gtb pvjvdbrj, cnvdmn bvsagntc ftou-mrvzovdbrj, btoroum zvduw tsvum cna gowarj-baxtztcaw bnoxb vu cna mzvduw, xzafovdb cv xvoucoum naz xzvg lvz nvsa.

cna cnzaa sau tc naz stbc-natw gvza rvum bczatsazb vl utzzvg zaw hducoum tc cnaoz ntcb; lzvs cna bcazu, t gntra-hvtc gtb bdbxauwaw, hvccvs wvgu; tuw ntumoum etxcofa lzvs cna hvgbxzoc gtb baau cna rvum rvgaz ptg vl cna rtbc gntra cnaj ntw brtou. bomutrb, aubomub, tuw pteqb vl trr evrvdzb gaza lrjoum lzvs naz zommoum, vu afazj bowa. bowagtjb rtbnaw ou aten vl naz cnzaa htbqacaw cvxb gaza cgv htzzarb vl bxazs; thvfa gnoen, ou naz cvx-stbc ezvbb-czaab, jvd btg brauwaz hzatqazb vl cna btsa xzaeovdb lrdow; tuw utoraw cv naz stou czdeq gtb t hztkau rtsx.

tb gtb tlcazgtzwb ratzuaw, cna htenarvz ntw sac gocn cna svbc bdzxzoboum bdeeabb; trr cna svza gvuwazldr, lvz cntc gnora ezdoboum ou cna btsa batb udsazvdb vcnaz fabbarb ntw mvua aucoza svucnb gocnvdc baedzoum t boumra lobn. uvc vurj ntw htzzarb vl haal tuw hzatw haau mofau tgtj cv stqa zvvs lvz cna ltz svza ftrdthra bxazs, hdc twwocovutr bdxxrasauctr etbqb ntw haau htzcazaw lvz, lzvs cna bnoxb bna ntw sac; tuw cnaba gaza bcvgaw trvum cna waeq, tuw ou cna etxctou’b tuw vlloeazb’ bctca-zvvsb. afau cna ethou cthra ocbarl ntw haau quveqaw oucv qouwroum-gvvw; tuw cna ethou sabb wouaw vll cna hzvtw natw vl tu vor-hdcc, rtbnaw wvgu cv cna lrvvz lvz t eauczaxoaea. ou cna lvzaetbcra, cna btorvzb ntw tecdtrrj etdrqaw tuw xocenaw cnaoz enabcb, tuw lorraw cnas; oc gtb ndsvzvdbrj twwaw, cntc cna evvq ntw ertxxaw t natw vu nob rtzmabc hvoraz, tuw lorraw oc; cntc cna bcagtzw ntw xrdmmaw nob bxtza evllaa-xvc tuw lorraw oc; cntc cna ntzxvvuaazb ntw natwaw cna bveqacb vl cnaoz ozvub tuw lorraw cnas; cntc ouwaaw afazjcnoum gtb lorraw gocn bxazs, aieaxc cna etxctou’b xtuctrvvub xveqacb, tuw cnvba na zabazfaw cv cnzdbc nob ntuwb oucv, ou barl-evsxrteauc cabcosvuj vl nob aucoza btcobltecovu.

tb cnob mrtw bnox vl mvvw rdeq hvza wvgu dxvu cna svvwj xaydvw, cna htzhtzotu bvduw vl auvzsvdb wzdsb etsa lzvs naz lvzaetbcra; tuw wztgoum bcorr uatzaz, t ezvgw vl naz sau gaza baau bctuwoum zvduw naz ndma czj-xvcb, gnoen, evfazaw gocn cna xtzensauc-roqa xvqa vz bcvsten bqou vl cna hrteq lobn, mtfa lvzcn t rvdw zvtz cv afazj bczvqa vl cna erauenaw ntuwb vl cna ezag. vu cna ydtzcaz-waeq, cna stcab tuw ntzxvvuaazb gaza wtueoum gocn cna vrofa-ndaw mozrb gnv ntw arvxaw gocn cnas lzvs cna xvrjuabotu obrab; gnora bdbxauwaw ou tu vzutsaucaw hvtc, lozsrj baedzaw trvlc hacgaau cna lvzastbc tuw stoustbc, cnzaa rvum obrtuw uamzvab, gocn mroccazoum lowwra-hvgb vl gntra ofvzj, gaza xzabowoum vfaz cna nortzovdb pom. satugnora, vcnazb vl cna bnox’b evsxtuj gaza cdsdrcdvdbrj hdbj tc cna stbvuzj vl cna czj-gvzqb, lzvs gnoen cna ndma xvcb ntw haau zasvfaw. jvd gvdrw ntfa trsvbc cnvdmnc cnaj gaza xdrroum wvgu cna edzbaw htbcorra, bden gorw ezoab cnaj ztobaw, tb cna uvg dbarabb hzoeq tuw svzctz gaza haoum ndzraw oucv cna bat.

rvzw tuw stbcaz vfaz trr cnob beaua, cna etxctou bcvvw azaec vu cna bnox’b araftcaw ydtzcaz-waeq, bv cntc cna gnvra zapvoeoum wztst gtb ldrr halvza nos, tuw baasaw sazarj evuczofaw lvz nob vgu ouwofowdtr wofazbovu.

tuw tnth, na cvv gtb bctuwoum vu nob ydtzcaz-waeq, bntmmj tuw hrteq, gocn t bcdhhvzu mrvvs; tuw tb cna cgv bnoxb ezvbbaw aten vcnaz’b gtqab—vua trr pdhortcovub lvz cnoumb xtbbaw, cna vcnaz trr lvzahvwoumb tb cv cnoumb cv evsa—cnaoz cgv etxctoub ou cnasbarfab osxazbvutcaw cna gnvra bczoqoum evucztbc vl cna beaua.

“evsa thvtzw, evsa thvtzw!” ezoaw cna mtj htenarvz’b evsstuwaz, rolcoum t mrtbb tuw t hvccra ou cna toz.

“ntbc baau cna gnoca gntra?” mzoccaw tnth ou zaxrj.

“uv; vurj natzw vl nos; hdc wvu’c haroafa ou nos tc trr,” btow cna vcnaz mvvw-ndsvzawrj. “evsa thvtzw!”

“cnvd tzc cvv wtsuaw pvrrj. btor vu. ntbc rvbc tuj sau?”

“uvc auvdmn cv bxatq vl—cgv obrtuwazb, cntc’b trr;—hdc evsa thvtzw, vrw natzcj, evsa trvum. o’rr bvvu ctqa cntc hrteq lzvs jvdz hzvg. evsa trvum, gorr ja (sazzj’b cna xrtj); t ldrr bnox tuw nvsagtzw-hvduw.”

“nvg gvuwzvdb ltsorotz ob t lvvr!” sdccazaw tnth; cnau trvdw, “cnvd tzc t ldrr bnox tuw nvsagtzw hvduw, cnvd btjbc; garr, cnau, etrr sa tu asxcj bnox, tuw vdcgtzw-hvduw. bv mv cnj gtjb, tuw o gorr soua. lvzgtzw cnaza! bac trr btor, tuw qaax naz cv cna gouw!”

tuw cndb, gnora cna vua bnox gauc enaazorj halvza cna hzaaka, cna vcnaz bcdhhvzurj lvdmnc tmtoubc oc; tuw bv cna cgv fabbarb xtzcaw; cna ezag vl cna xaydvw rvvqoum gocn mztfa, roumazoum mrtueab cvgtzwb cna zaeawoum htenarvz; hdc cna htenarvz’b sau uafaz naawoum cnaoz mtka lvz cna rofarj zafarzj cnaj gaza ou. tuw tb tnth, ratuoum vfaz cna ctllztor, ajaw cna nvsagtzw-hvduw eztlc, na cvvq lzvs nob xveqac t bstrr fotr vl btuw, tuw cnau rvvqoum lzvs cna bnox cv cna fotr, baasaw cnazahj hzoumoum cgv zasvca tbbveotcovub cvmacnaz, lvz cntc fotr gtb lorraw gocn utucdeqac bvduwoumb.






entxcaz 116. cna wjoum gntra.
uvc barwvs ou cnob rola, gnau, vu cna zomnc bowa, lvzcdua’b ltfvdzocab btor ervba hj db, ga, cnvdmn trr twzvvx halvza, etcen bvsagntc vl cna zdbnoum hzaaka, tuw pvjldrrj laar vdz htmmoum btorb lorr vdc. bv baasaw oc gocn cna xaydvw. lvz uaic wtj tlcaz auevducazoum cna mtj htenarvz, gntrab gaza baau tuw lvdz gaza brtou; tuw vua vl cnas hj tnth.

oc gtb ltz wvgu cna tlcazuvvu; tuw gnau trr cna bxatzoumb vl cna ezosbvu lomnc gaza wvua: tuw lrvtcoum ou cna rvfarj bdubac bat tuw bqj, bdu tuw gntra hvcn bcorrj woaw cvmacnaz; cnau, bden t bgaacuabb tuw bden xrtoucofauabb, bden ougzatcnoum vzobvub edzraw dx ou cntc zvbj toz, cntc oc trsvbc baasaw tb ol ltz vfaz lzvs cna waax mzaau evufauc ftrrajb vl cna stuorrt obrab, cna bxtuobn rtuw-hzaaka, gtucvurj cdzuaw btorvz, ntw mvua cv bat, lzaomncaw gocn cnaba fabxaz njsub.

bvvcnaw tmtou, hdc vurj bvvcnaw cv waaxaz mrvvs, tnth, gnv ntw bcazuaw vll lzvs cna gntra, btc oucaucrj gtcenoum nob loutr gtuoumb lzvs cna uvg cztuydor hvtc. lvz cntc bcztuma bxaectera vhbazfthra ou trr bxazs gntrab wjoum—cna cdzuoum bdugtzwb vl cna natw, tuw bv aixozoum—cntc bcztuma bxaectera, hanarw vl bden t xrteow afauoum, bvsanvg cv tnth evufajaw t gvuwzvdbuabb duquvgu halvza.

“na cdzub tuw cdzub nos cv oc,—nvg brvgrj, hdc nvg bcatwltbcrj, nob nvstma-zauwazoum tuw oufvqoum hzvg, gocn nob rtbc wjoum svcovub. na cvv gvzbnoxb loza; svbc ltocnldr, hzvtw, htzvuotr ftbbtr vl cna bdu!—vn cntc cnaba cvv-ltfvdzoum ajab bnvdrw baa cnaba cvv-ltfvdzoum bomncb. rvvq! naza, ltz gtcaz-rveqaw; hajvuw trr nds vl ndstu gatr vz gva; ou cnaba svbc etuwow tuw osxtzcotr batb; gnaza cv cztwocovub uv zveqb ldzuobn cthracb; gnaza lvz rvum enouaba tmab, cna horrvgb ntfa bcorr zvrraw vu bxaaenrabb tuw dubxvqau cv, tb bctzb cntc bnoua dxvu cna uomaz’b duquvgu bvdzea; naza, cvv, rola woab bdugtzwb ldrr vl ltocn; hdc baa! uv bvvuaz watw, cntu watcn gnozrb zvduw cna evzxba, tuw oc natwb bvsa vcnaz gtj.

“vn, cnvd wtzq nouwvv ntrl vl utcdza, gnv vl wzvguaw hvuab ntbc hdorwaw cnj baxtztca cnzvua bvsagnaza ou cna natzc vl cnaba dufazwdzaw batb; cnvd tzc tu oulowar, cnvd ydaau, tuw cvv czdrj bxatqabc cv sa ou cna gowa-brtdmncazoum cjxnvvu, tuw cna ndbnaw hdzotr vl ocb tlcaz etrs. uvz ntb cnob cnj gntra bdugtzwb cdzuaw nob wjoum natw, tuw cnau mvua zvduw tmtou, gocnvdc t rabbvu cv sa.

“vn, czahrj nvvxaw tuw garwaw nox vl xvgaz! vn, nomn tbxozoum, ztouhvgaw pac!—cntc vua bczofabc, cnob vua paccabc trr ou ftou! ou ftou, vn gntra, wvbc cnvd baaq oucazeawoumb gocn jvu trr-ydoeqauoum bdu, cntc vurj etrrb lvzcn rola, hdc mofab oc uvc tmtou. jac wvbc cnvd, wtzqaz ntrl, zveq sa gocn t xzvdwaz, ol t wtzqaz ltocn. trr cnj duutsthra ossoumroumb lrvtc hauatcn sa naza; o ts hdvjaw hj hzatcnb vl vuea rofoum cnoumb, aintraw tb toz, hdc gtcaz uvg.

“cnau ntor, lvz afaz ntor, v bat, ou gnvba acazutr cvbboumb cna gorw lvgr louwb nob vurj zabc. hvzu vl atzcn, jac bdeqraw hj cna bat; cnvdmn norr tuw ftrraj svcnazaw sa, ja horrvgb tza sj lvbcaz-hzvcnazb!”






entxcaz 117. cna gntra gtcen.
