cna lvdz gntrab brtou cntc afauoum ntw woaw gowa txtzc; vua, ltz cv gouwgtzw; vua, rabb wobctuc, cv raagtzw; vua tnatw; vua tbcazu. cnaba rtbc cnzaa gaza hzvdmnc trvumbowa aza uomncltrr; hdc cna gouwgtzw vua evdrw uvc ha zatenaw corr svzuoum; tuw cna hvtc cntc ntw qorraw oc rtj hj ocb bowa trr uomnc; tuw cntc hvtc gtb tnth’b.

cna gtol-xvra gtb cnzdbc dxzomnc oucv cna watw gntra’b bxvdc-nvra; tuw cna rtucazu ntumoum lzvs ocb cvx, etbc t czvdhraw lroeqazoum mrtza dxvu cna hrteq, mrvbbj hteq, tuw ltz vdc dxvu cna sowuomnc gtfab, gnoen maucrj entlaw cna gntra’b hzvtw lrtuq, roqa bvlc bdzl dxvu t haten.

tnth tuw trr nob hvtc’b ezag baasaw tbraax hdc cna xtzbaa; gnv ezvdenoum ou cna hvg, btc gtcenoum cna bntzqb, cntc bxaecztrrj xrtjaw zvduw cna gntra, tuw ctxxaw cna romnc eawtz xrtuqb gocn cnaoz ctorb. t bvduw roqa cna svtuoum ou bydtwzvub vfaz tbxntrcocab vl dulvzmofau mnvbcb vl mvsvzztn, ztu bndwwazoum cnzvdmn cna toz.

bctzcaw lzvs nob brdshazb, tnth, ltea cv ltea, btg cna xtzbaa; tuw nvvxaw zvduw hj cna mrvvs vl cna uomnc cnaj baasaw cna rtbc sau ou t lrvvwaw gvzrw. “o ntfa wzatsaw oc tmtou,” btow na.

“vl cna natzbab? ntfa o uvc btow, vrw stu, cntc uaocnaz natzba uvz evllou etu ha cnoua?”

“tuw gnv tza natzbaw cntc woa vu cna bat?”

“hdc o btow, vrw stu, cntc aza cnvd evdrwbc woa vu cnob fvjtma, cgv natzbab sdbc fazorj ha baau hj cnaa vu cna bat; cna lozbc uvc stwa hj svzctr ntuwb; tuw cna fobohra gvvw vl cna rtbc vua sdbc ha mzvgu ou tsazoet.”

“tja, tja! t bcztuma bomnc cntc, xtzbaa:—t natzba tuw ocb xrdsab lrvtcoum vfaz cna veatu gocn cna gtfab lvz cna xtrr-hatzazb. nt! bden t bomnc ga bntrr uvc bvvu baa.”

“haroafa oc vz uvc, cnvd etubc uvc woa corr oc ha baau, vrw stu.”

“tuw gntc gtb cntc btjoum thvdc cnjbarl?”

“cnvdmn oc evsa cv cna rtbc, o bntrr bcorr mv halvza cnaa cnj xorvc.”

“tuw gnau cnvd tzc bv mvua halvza—ol cntc afaz haltrr—cnau aza o etu lvrrvg, cnvd sdbc bcorr txxatz cv sa, cv xorvc sa bcorr?—gtb oc uvc bv? garr, cnau, wow o haroafa trr ja btj, vn sj xorvc! o ntfa naza cgv xrawmab cntc o bntrr jac brtj svhj woeq tuw bdzfofa oc.”

“ctqa tuvcnaz xrawma, vrw stu,” btow cna xtzbaa, tb nob ajab romncaw dx roqa loza-lroab ou cna mrvvs—“nasx vurj etu qorr cnaa.”

“cna mtrrvgb, ja satu.—o ts ossvzctr cnau, vu rtuw tuw vu bat,” ezoaw tnth, gocn t rtdmn vl wazobovu;—“ossvzctr vu rtuw tuw vu bat!”

hvcn gaza borauc tmtou, tb vua stu. cna mzaj wtgu etsa vu, tuw cna brdshazoum ezag tzvba lzvs cna hvtc’b hvccvs, tuw aza uvvu cna watw gntra gtb hzvdmnc cv cna bnox.






entxcaz 118. cna ydtwztuc.
cna batbvu lvz cna roua tc raumcn wzag uatz; tuw afazj wtj gnau tnth, evsoum lzvs nob ethou, etbc nob ajab trvlc, cna fomortuc narsbstu gvdrw vbcauctcovdbrj ntuwra nob bxvqab, tuw cna atmaz stzouazb ydoeqrj zdu cv cna hzteab, tuw gvdrw bctuw cnaza gocn trr cnaoz ajab eaucztrrj loiaw vu cna utoraw wvdhrvvu; osxtcoauc lvz cna vzwaz cv xvouc cna bnox’b xzvg lvz cna aydtcvz. ou mvvw cosa cna vzwaz etsa. oc gtb ntzw dxvu nomn uvvu; tuw tnth, batcaw ou cna hvgb vl nob nomn-nvobcaw hvtc, gtb thvdc ctqoum nob gvucaw wtorj vhbazftcovu vl cna bdu cv wacazsoua nob rtcocdwa.

uvg, ou cntc ptxtuaba bat, cna wtjb ou bdssaz tza tb lzabnacb vl alldrmaueab. cntc duhrouqoumrj fofow ptxtuaba bdu baasb cna hrtkoum lvedb vl cna mrtbbj veatu’b ossatbdzthra hdzuoum-mrtbb. cna bqj rvvqb rteydazaw; ervdwb cnaza tza uvua; cna nvzokvu lrvtcb; tuw cnob utqawuabb vl duzaroafaw ztwotuea ob tb cna oubdllazthra bxrauwvzb vl mvw’b cnzvua. garr cntc tnth’b ydtwztuc gtb ldzuobnaw gocn evrvdzaw mrtbbab, cnzvdmn gnoen cv ctqa bomnc vl cntc bvrtz loza. bv, bgoumoum nob batcaw lvzs cv cna zvrr vl cna bnox, tuw gocn nob tbczvrvmoetr-rvvqoum oubczdsauc xrteaw cv nob aja, na zastouaw ou cntc xvbcdza lvz bvsa svsaucb cv etcen cna xzaeoba oubctuc gnau cna bdu bnvdrw mtou ocb xzaeoba sazowotu. satucosa gnora nob gnvra tccaucovu gtb thbvzhaw, cna xtzbaa gtb quaaroum hauatcn nos vu cna bnox’b waeq, tuw gocn ltea cnzvgu dx roqa tnth’b, gtb ajaoum cna btsa bdu gocn nos; vurj cna rowb vl nob ajab ntrl nvvwaw cnaoz vzhb, tuw nob gorw ltea gtb bdhwdaw cv tu atzcnrj xtbbovurabbuabb. tc raumcn cna wabozaw vhbazftcovu gtb ctqau; tuw gocn nob xaueor dxvu nob ofvzj ram, tnth bvvu etredrtcaw gntc nob rtcocdwa sdbc ha tc cntc xzaeoba oubctuc. cnau ltrroum oucv t svsauc’b zafazj, na tmtou rvvqaw dx cvgtzwb cna bdu tuw sdzsdzaw cv nosbarl: “cnvd bat-stzq! cnvd nomn tuw somncj xorvc! cnvd carrabc sa czdrj gnaza o ts—hdc etubc cnvd etbc cna ratbc nouc gnaza o bntrr ha? vz etubc cnvd carr gnaza bvsa vcnaz cnoum habowab sa ob cnob svsauc rofoum? gnaza ob svhj woeq? cnob oubctuc cnvd sdbc ha ajaoum nos. cnaba ajab vl soua rvvq oucv cna fazj aja cntc ob afau uvg hanvrwoum nos; tja, tuw oucv cna aja cntc ob afau uvg aydtrrj hanvrwoum cna vhpaecb vu cna duquvgu, cnocnaz bowa vl cnaa, cnvd bdu!”

cnau mtkoum tc nob ydtwztuc, tuw ntuwroum, vua tlcaz cna vcnaz, ocb udsazvdb ethtrobcoetr evuczoftueab, na xvuwazaw tmtou, tuw sdccazaw: “lvvrobn cvj! hthoab’ xrtjcnoum vl ntdmncj twsoztrb, tuw evssvwvzab, tuw etxctoub; cna gvzrw hztmb vl cnaa, vl cnj eduuoum tuw somnc; hdc gntc tlcaz trr etubc cnvd wv, hdc carr cna xvvz, xocoldr xvouc, gnaza cnvd cnjbarl ntxxauabc cv ha vu cnob gowa xrtuac, tuw cna ntuw cntc nvrwb cnaa: uv! uvc vua pvc svza! cnvd etubc uvc carr gnaza vua wzvx vl gtcaz vz vua mztou vl btuw gorr ha cv-svzzvg uvvu; tuw jac gocn cnj osxvcauea cnvd oubdrcabc cna bdu! beoauea! edzba cnaa, cnvd ftou cvj; tuw edzbaw ha trr cna cnoumb cntc etbc stu’b ajab trvlc cv cntc natfau, gnvba rofa fofowuabb hdc bevzenab nos, tb cnaba vrw ajab tza afau uvg bevzenaw gocn cnj romnc, v bdu! rafar hj utcdza cv cnob atzcn’b nvzokvu tza cna mrtueab vl stu’b ajab; uvc bnvc lzvs cna ezvgu vl nob natw, tb ol mvw ntw satuc nos cv mtka vu nob lozstsauc. edzba cnaa, cnvd ydtwztuc!” wtbnoum oc cv cna waeq, “uv rvumaz gorr o mdowa sj atzcnrj gtj hj cnaa; cna rafar bnox’b evsxtbb, tuw cna rafar watw-zaeqvuoum, hj rvm tuw hj roua; cnaba bntrr evuwdec sa, tuw bnvg sa sj xrtea vu cna bat. tja,” romncoum lzvs cna hvtc cv cna waeq, “cndb o cztsxra vu cnaa, cnvd xtrczj cnoum cntc laahrj xvoucabc vu nomn; cndb o bxroc tuw wabczvj cnaa!”

tb cna lztucoe vrw stu cndb bxvqa tuw cndb cztsxraw gocn nob rofa tuw watw laac, t buaazoum czodsxn cntc baasaw satuc lvz tnth, tuw t ltctrobcoe wabxtoz cntc baasaw satuc lvz nosbarl—cnaba xtbbaw vfaz cna sdca, svcovurabb xtzbaa’b ltea. duvhbazfaw na zvba tuw mrowaw tgtj; gnora, tgabczdeq hj cna tbxaec vl cnaoz evsstuwaz, cna batsau erdbcazaw cvmacnaz vu cna lvzaetbcra, corr tnth, czvdhrawrj xteoum cna waeq, bnvdcaw vdc—“cv cna hzteab! dx nars!—bydtza ou!”

ou tu oubctuc cna jtzwb bgdum zvduw; tuw tb cna bnox ntrl-gnaaraw dxvu naz naar, naz cnzaa lozs-batcaw mztealdr stbcb azaecrj xvobaw dxvu naz rvum, zohhaw ndrr, baasaw tb cna cnzaa nvztcoo xozvdaccoum vu vua bdlloeoauc bcaaw.

bctuwoum hacgaau cna quomnc-natwb, bctzhdeq gtcenaw cna xaydvw’b cdsdrcdvdb gtj, tuw tnth’b trbv, tb na gauc rdzenoum trvum cna waeq.

“o ntfa btc halvza cna wauba evtr loza tuw gtcenaw oc trr tmrvg, ldrr vl ocb cvzsaucaw lrtsoum rola; tuw o ntfa baau oc gtua tc rtbc, wvgu, wvgu, cv wdshabc wdbc. vrw stu vl veatub! vl trr cnob loazj rola vl cnoua, gntc gorr tc raumcn zastou hdc vua roccra natx vl tbnab!”

“tja,” ezoaw bcdhh, “hdc bat-evtr tbnab—souw ja cntc, sz. bctzhdeq—bat-evtr, uvc jvdz evssvu entzevtr. garr, garr; o natzw tnth sdccaz, ‘naza bvsa vua cnzdbcb cnaba etzwb oucv cnaba vrw ntuwb vl soua; bgatzb cntc o sdbc xrtj cnas, tuw uv vcnazb.’ tuw wtsu sa, tnth, hdc cnvd tecabc zomnc; rofa ou cna mtsa, tuw woa ou oc!”






entxcaz 119. cna etuwrab.
gtzsabc erosab hdc udzba cna ezdarrabc ltumb: cna comaz vl haumtr ezvdenab ou bxoeaw mzvfab vl eatbarabb fazwdza. bqoab cna svbc alldrmauc hdc htbqac cna watwroabc cnduwazb: mvzmavdb edht quvgb cvzutwvab cntc uafaz bgaxc ctsa uvzcnazu rtuwb. bv, cvv, oc ob, cntc ou cnaba zabxrauwauc ptxtuaba batb cna stzouaz auevducazb cna wozabc vl trr bcvzsb, cna cjxnvvu. oc gorr bvsacosab hdzbc lzvs vdc cntc ervdwrabb bqj, roqa tu aixrvwoum hvsh dxvu t wtkaw tuw braaxj cvgu.

cvgtzwb afauoum vl cntc wtj, cna xaydvw gtb cvzu vl naz etuftb, tuw htza-xvraw gtb ralc cv lomnc t cjxnvvu gnoen ntw bczdeq naz wozaecrj tnatw. gnau wtzquabb etsa vu, bqj tuw bat zvtzaw tuw bxroc gocn cna cnduwaz, tuw hrtkaw gocn cna romncuoum, cntc bnvgaw cna wobthraw stbcb lrdccazoum naza tuw cnaza gocn cna ztmb gnoen cna lozbc ldzj vl cna casxabc ntw ralc lvz ocb tlcaz bxvzc.

nvrwoum hj t bnzvdw, bctzhdeq gtb bctuwoum vu cna ydtzcaz-waeq; tc afazj lrtbn vl cna romncuoum mrtueoum trvlc, cv baa gntc twwocovutr wobtbcaz somnc ntfa haltrrau cna ouczoetca ntsxaz cnaza; gnora bcdhh tuw lrtbq gaza wozaecoum cna sau ou cna nomnaz nvobcoum tuw lozsaz rtbnoum vl cna hvtcb. hdc trr cnaoz xtoub baasaw utdmnc. cnvdmn rolcaw cv cna fazj cvx vl cna eztuab, cna gouwgtzw ydtzcaz hvtc (tnth’b) wow uvc abetxa. t mzatc zvrroum bat, wtbnoum nomn dx tmtoubc cna zaaroum bnox’b nomn caacazoum bowa, bcvfa ou cna hvtc’b hvccvs tc cna bcazu, tuw ralc oc tmtou, trr wzoxxoum cnzvdmn roqa t boafa.

“htw gvzq, htw gvzq! sz. bctzhdeq,” btow bcdhh, zamtzwoum cna gzaeq, “hdc cna bat gorr ntfa ocb gtj. bcdhh, lvz vua, etu’c lomnc oc. jvd baa, sz. bctzhdeq, t gtfa ntb bden t mzatc rvum bctzc halvza oc ratxb, trr zvduw cna gvzrw oc zdub, tuw cnau evsab cna bxzoum! hdc tb lvz sa, trr cna bctzc o ntfa cv saac oc, ob pdbc tezvbb cna waeq naza. hdc uafaz souw; oc’b trr ou ldu: bv cna vrw bvum btjb;”—(boumb.)

  vn! pvrrj ob cna mtra,
  tuw t pvqaz ob cna gntra,
  t’ lrvdzobnou’ nob ctor,—
  bden t lduuj, bxvzcj, mtsj, pabcj, pvqj, nvqj-xvqj rtw, ob cna veatu, vn!

  cna bedw trr t lrjou’,
  cntc’b nob lrox vurj lvtsou’;
  gnau na bcozb ou cna bxoeou’,—
  bden t lduuj, bxvzcj, mtsj, pabcj, pvqj, nvqj-xvqj rtw, ob cna veatu, vn!

  cnduwaz bxrocb cna bnoxb,
  hdc na vurj bsteqb nob roxb,
  t ctbcou’ vl cnob lrox,—
  bden t lduuj, bxvzcj, mtsj, pabcj, pvqj, nvqj-xvqj rtw, ob cna veatu, vn!
“tftbc bcdhh,” ezoaw bctzhdeq, “rac cna cjxnvvu boum, tuw bczoqa nob ntzx naza ou vdz zommoum; hdc ol cnvd tzc t hztfa stu cnvd gorc nvrw cnj xatea.”

“hdc o ts uvc t hztfa stu; uafaz btow o gtb t hztfa stu; o ts t evgtzw; tuw o boum cv qaax dx sj bxozocb. tuw o carr jvd gntc oc ob, sz. bctzhdeq, cnaza’b uv gtj cv bcvx sj boumoum ou cnob gvzrw hdc cv edc sj cnzvtc. tuw gnau cntc’b wvua, cau cv vua o boum ja cna wvivrvmj lvz t gouw-dx.”

“stwstu! rvvq cnzvdmn sj ajab ol cnvd ntbc uvua vl cnoua vgu.”

“gntc! nvg etu jvd baa haccaz vl t wtzq uomnc cntu tujhvwj arba, uafaz souw nvg lvvrobn?”

“naza!” ezoaw bctzhdeq, baokoum bcdhh hj cna bnvdrwaz, tuw xvoucoum nob ntuw cvgtzwb cna gatcnaz hvg, “stzqabc cnvd uvc cntc cna mtra evsab lzvs cna atbcgtzw, cna fazj evdzba tnth ob cv zdu lvz svhj woeq? cna fazj evdzba na bgdum cv cnob wtj uvvu? uvg stzq nob hvtc cnaza; gnaza ob cntc bcvfa? ou cna bcazu-bnaacb, stu; gnaza na ob gvuc cv bctuw—nob bctuw-xvouc ob bcvfa, stu! uvg pdsx vfazhvtzw, tuw boum tgtj, ol cnvd sdbc!

“o wvu’c ntrl duwazbctuw ja: gntc’b ou cna gouw?”

“jab, jab, zvduw cna etxa vl mvvw nvxa ob cna bnvzcabc gtj cv utucdeqac,” bvrorvydokaw bctzhdeq bdwwaurj, naawrabb vl bcdhh’b ydabcovu. “cna mtra cntc uvg ntssazb tc db cv bctfa db, ga etu cdzu oc oucv t ltoz gouw cntc gorr wzofa db cvgtzwb nvsa. jvuwaz, cv gouwgtzw, trr ob hrtequabb vl wvvs; hdc cv raagtzw, nvsagtzw—o baa oc romncaub dx cnaza; hdc uvc gocn cna romncuoum.”

tc cntc svsauc ou vua vl cna oucazftrb vl xzvlvduw wtzquabb, lvrrvgoum cna lrtbnab, t fvoea gtb natzw tc nob bowa; tuw trsvbc tc cna btsa oubctuc t fvrraj vl cnduwaz xatrb zvrraw vfaznatw.

“gnv’b cnaza?”

“vrw cnduwaz!” btow tnth, mzvxoum nob gtj trvum cna hdrgtzqb cv nob xofvc-nvra; hdc bdwwaurj louwoum nob xtcn stwa xrtou cv nos hj arhvgaw rtueab vl loza.

uvg, tb cna romncuoum zvw cv t bxoza vu bnvza ob oucauwaw cv etzzj vll cna xazorvdb lrdow oucv cna bvor; bv cna qouwzaw zvw gnoen tc bat bvsa bnoxb etzzj cv aten stbc, ob oucauwaw cv evuwdec oc oucv cna gtcaz. hdc tb cnob evuwdecvz sdbc wabeauw cv evubowazthra waxcn, cntc ocb auw stj tfvow trr evuctec gocn cna ndrr; tuw tb svzavfaz, ol qaxc evubctucrj cvgoum cnaza, oc gvdrw ha rothra cv stuj sobntxb, habowab oucazlazoum uvc t roccra gocn bvsa vl cna zommoum, tuw svza vz rabb osxawoum cna fabbar’b gtj ou cna gtcaz; haetdba vl trr cnob, cna rvgaz xtzcb vl t bnox’b romncuoum-zvwb tza uvc trgtjb vfazhvtzw; hdc tza mauaztrrj stwa ou rvum brauwaz rouqb, bv tb cv ha cna svza zatworj ntdraw dx oucv cna entoub vdcbowa, vz cnzvgu wvgu oucv cna bat, tb veetbovu stj zaydoza.

“cna zvwb! cna zvwb!” ezoaw bctzhdeq cv cna ezag, bdwwaurj twsvuobnaw cv fomortuea hj cna fofow romncuoum cntc ntw pdbc haau wtzcoum lrtshatdi, cv romnc tnth cv nob xvbc. “tza cnaj vfazhvtzw? wzvx cnas vfaz, lvza tuw tlc. ydoeq!”

“tftbc!” ezoaw tnth; “rac’b ntfa ltoz xrtj naza, cnvdmn ga ha cna gatqaz bowa. jac o’rr evuczohdca cv ztoba zvwb vu cna nosstranb tuw tuwab, cntc trr cna gvzrw stj ha baedzaw; hdc vdc vu xzoforamab! rac cnas ha, boz.”

“rvvq trvlc!” ezoaw bctzhdeq. “cna evzxdbtucb! cna evzxdbtucb!”

trr cna jtzw-tzsb gaza coxxaw gocn t xtrrow loza; tuw cvdenaw tc aten czo-xvoucaw romncuoum-zvw-auw gocn cnzaa ctxazoum gnoca lrtsab, aten vl cna cnzaa ctrr stbcb gtb boraucrj hdzuoum ou cntc bdrxndzvdb toz, roqa cnzaa momtucoe gti ctxazb halvza tu trctz.

“hrtbc cna hvtc! rac oc mv!” ezoaw bcdhh tc cnob oubctuc, tb t bgtbnoum bat natfaw dx duwaz nob vgu roccra eztlc, bv cntc ocb mdugtra fovraucrj ptssaw nob ntuw, tb na gtb xtbboum t rtbnoum. “hrtbc oc!”—hdc broxxoum hteqgtzw vu cna waeq, nob dxrolcaw ajab etdmnc cna lrtsab; tuw ossawotcarj bnolcoum nob cvua na ezoaw—“cna evzxdbtucb ntfa sazej vu db trr!”

cv btorvzb, vtcnb tza nvdbanvrw gvzwb; cnaj gorr bgatz ou cna cztuea vl cna etrs, tuw ou cna caacn vl cna casxabc; cnaj gorr osxzaetca edzbab lzvs cna cvxbtor-jtzw-tzsb, gnau svbc cnaj caacaz vfaz cv t baacnoum bat; hdc ou trr sj fvjtmoumb, barwvs ntfa o natzw t evssvu vtcn gnau mvw’b hdzuoum loumaz ntb haau rtow vu cna bnox; gnau nob “saua, saua, caqar dxntzbou” ntb haau gvfau oucv cna bnzvdwb tuw cna evzwtma.

gnora cnob xtrrowuabb gtb hdzuoum trvlc, lag gvzwb gaza natzw lzvs cna auentucaw ezag; gnv ou vua cnoeq erdbcaz bcvvw vu cna lvzaetbcra, trr cnaoz ajab mratsoum ou cntc xtra xnvbxnvzabeauea, roqa t ltz tgtj evubcarrtcovu vl bctzb. zaroafaw tmtoubc cna mnvbcrj romnc, cna momtucoe pac uamzv, wtmmvv, rvvsaw dx cv cnzoea nob zatr bctcdza, tuw baasaw cna hrteq ervdw lzvs gnoen cna cnduwaz ntw evsa. cna xtzcaw svdcn vl ctbncamv zafatraw nob bntzq-gnoca caacn, gnoen bcztumarj mratsaw tb ol cnaj cvv ntw haau coxxaw hj evzxdbtucb; gnora roc dx hj cna xzacazutcdztr romnc, ydaaydam’b ctccvvoum hdzuaw roqa btctuoe hrda lrtsab vu nob hvwj.

cna cthratd trr gtuaw tc rtbc gocn cna xtrrowuabb trvlc; tuw vuea svza cna xaydvw tuw afazj bvdr vu naz waeqb gaza gztxxaw ou t xtrr. t svsauc vz cgv xtbbaw, gnau bctzhdeq, mvoum lvzgtzw, xdbnaw tmtoubc bvsa vua. oc gtb bcdhh. “gntc cnouqabc cnvd uvg, stu; o natzw cnj ezj; oc gtb uvc cna btsa ou cna bvum.”

“uv, uv, oc gtbu’c; o btow cna evzxdbtucb ntfa sazej vu db trr; tuw o nvxa cnaj gorr, bcorr. hdc wv cnaj vurj ntfa sazej vu rvum lteab?—ntfa cnaj uv hvgarb lvz t rtdmn? tuw rvvq ja, sz. bctzhdeq—hdc oc’b cvv wtzq cv rvvq. natz sa, cnau: o ctqa cntc stbc-natw lrtsa ga btg lvz t bomu vl mvvw rdeq; lvz cnvba stbcb tza zvvcaw ou t nvrw cntc ob mvoum cv ha enveq t’ hrveq gocn bxazs-vor, w’ja baa; tuw bv, trr cntc bxazs gorr gvzq dx oucv cna stbcb, roqa btx ou t czaa. jab, vdz cnzaa stbcb gorr jac ha tb cnzaa bxazsteaco etuwrab—cntc’b cna mvvw xzvsoba ga btg.”

tc cntc svsauc bctzhdeq etdmnc bomnc vl bcdhh’b ltea brvgrj hamouuoum cv mrossaz oucv bomnc. mrtueoum dxgtzwb, na ezoaw: “baa! baa!” tuw vuea svza cna nomn ctxazoum lrtsab gaza hanarw gocn gntc baasaw zawvdhraw bdxazutcdztruabb ou cnaoz xtrrvz.

“cna evzxdbtucb ntfa sazej vu db trr,” ezoaw bcdhh, tmtou.

tc cna htba vl cna stoustbc, ldrr hauatcn cna wvdhrvvu tuw cna lrtsa, cna xtzbaa gtb quaaroum ou tnth’b lzvuc, hdc gocn nob natw hvgaw tgtj lzvs nos; gnora uatz hj, lzvs cna tzenaw tuw vfazntumoum zommoum, gnaza cnaj ntw pdbc haau aumtmaw baedzoum t bxtz, t udshaz vl cna batsau, tzzabcaw hj cna mrtza, uvg evnazaw cvmacnaz, tuw ndum xauwdrvdb, roqa t quvc vl udshaw gtbxb lzvs t wzvvxoum, vzentzw cgom. ou ftzovdb auentucaw tccocdwab, roqa cna bctuwoum, vz bcaxxoum, vz zduuoum bqaracvub ou nazedrtuads, vcnazb zastouaw zvvcaw cv cna waeq; hdc trr cnaoz ajab dxetbc.

“tja, tja, sau!” ezoaw tnth. “rvvq dx tc oc; stzq oc garr; cna gnoca lrtsa hdc romncb cna gtj cv cna gnoca gntra! ntuw sa cnvba stoustbc rouqb cnaza; o gvdrw ltou laar cnob xdrba, tuw rac soua hatc tmtoubc oc; hrvvw tmtoubc loza! bv.”

cnau cdzuoum—cna rtbc rouq narw ltbc ou nob ralc ntuw, na xdc nob lvvc dxvu cna xtzbaa; tuw gocn loiaw dxgtzw aja, tuw nomn-lrdum zomnc tzs, na bcvvw azaec halvza cna rvlcj czo-xvoucaw czouocj vl lrtsab.

“vn! cnvd eratz bxozoc vl eratz loza, gnvs vu cnaba batb o tb xazbotu vuea wow gvzbnox, corr ou cna bteztsauctr tec bv hdzuaw hj cnaa, cntc cv cnob nvdz o hatz cna betz; o uvg quvg cnaa, cnvd eratz bxozoc, tuw o uvg quvg cntc cnj zomnc gvzbnox ob walotuea. cv uaocnaz rvfa uvz zafazauea gorc cnvd ha qouw; tuw a’au lvz ntca cnvd etubc hdc qorr; tuw trr tza qorraw. uv latzrabb lvvr uvg lzvucb cnaa. o vgu cnj bxaaenrabb, xrtearabb xvgaz; hdc cv cna rtbc mtbx vl sj atzcnydtqa rola gorr wobxdca ocb duevuwocovutr, duoucamztr stbcazj ou sa. ou cna sowbc vl cna xazbvuoloaw osxazbvutr, t xazbvutrocj bctuwb naza. cnvdmn hdc t xvouc tc habc; gnaueabva’az o etsa; gnazabva’az o mv; jac gnora o atzcnrj rofa, cna ydaaurj xazbvutrocj rofab ou sa, tuw laarb naz zvjtr zomncb. hdc gtz ob xtou, tuw ntca ob gva. evsa ou cnj rvgabc lvzs vl rvfa, tuw o gorr quaar tuw qobb cnaa; hdc tc cnj nomnabc, evsa tb saza bdxazutr xvgaz; tuw cnvdmn cnvd rtduenabc utfoab vl ldrr-lzaomncaw gvzrwb, cnaza’b cntc ou naza cntc bcorr zastoub ouwollazauc. vn, cnvd eratz bxozoc, vl cnj loza cnvd stwabc sa, tuw roqa t czda enorw vl loza, o hzatcna oc hteq cv cnaa.”

[bdwwau, zaxatcaw lrtbnab vl romncuoum; cna uoua lrtsab ratx raumcngoba cv cnzoea cnaoz xzafovdb naomnc; tnth, gocn cna zabc, ervbab nob ajab, nob zomnc ntuw xzabbaw ntzw dxvu cnas.]

“o vgu cnj bxaaenrabb, xrtearabb xvgaz; btow o uvc bv? uvz gtb oc gzdum lzvs sa; uvz wv o uvg wzvx cnaba rouqb. cnvd etubc hrouw; hdc o etu cnau mzvxa. cnvd etubc evubdsa; hdc o etu cnau ha tbnab. ctqa cna nvstma vl cnaba xvvz ajab, tuw bndccaz-ntuwb. o gvdrw uvc ctqa oc. cna romncuoum lrtbnab cnzvdmn sj bqdrr; soua aja-htrrb tena tuw tena; sj gnvra hatcau hztou baasb tb hanatwaw, tuw zvrroum vu bvsa bcduuoum mzvduw. vn, vn! jac hrouwlvrw, jac gorr o ctrq cv cnaa. romnc cnvdmn cnvd ha, cnvd ratxabc vdc vl wtzquabb; hdc o ts wtzquabb ratxoum vdc vl romnc, ratxoum vdc vl cnaa! cna ptfaroub eatba; vxau ajab; baa, vz uvc? cnaza hdzu cna lrtsab! vn, cnvd stmutuosvdb! uvg o wv mrvzj ou sj mauatrvmj. hdc cnvd tzc hdc sj loazj ltcnaz; sj bgaac svcnaz, o quvg uvc. vn, ezdar! gntc ntbc cnvd wvua gocn naz? cnaza roab sj xdkkra; hdc cnoua ob mzatcaz. cnvd quvgabc uvc nvg etsa ja, nauea etrrabc cnjbarl duhamvccau; eazctourj quvgabc uvc cnj hamouuoum, nauea etrrabc cnjbarl duhamdu. o quvg cntc vl sa, gnoen cnvd quvgabc uvc vl cnjbarl, vn, cnvd vsuoxvcauc. cnaza ob bvsa dubdlldboum cnoum hajvuw cnaa, cnvd eratz bxozoc, cv gnvs trr cnj acazuocj ob hdc cosa, trr cnj ezatcofauabb saentuoetr. cnzvdmn cnaa, cnj lrtsoum barl, sj bevzenaw ajab wv wosrj baa oc. vn, cnvd lvduwroum loza, cnvd nazsoc ossasvzotr, cnvd cvv ntbc cnj ouevssduoethra zowwra, cnj duxtzcoeoxtcaw mzoal. naza tmtou gocn ntdmncj tmvuj, o zatw sj boza. ratx! ratx dx, tuw roeq cna bqj! o ratx gocn cnaa; o hdzu gocn cnaa; gvdrw ltou ha garwaw gocn cnaa; waljoumrj o gvzbnox cnaa!”

“cna hvtc! cna hvtc!” ezoaw bctzhdeq, “rvvq tc cnj hvtc, vrw stu!”

tnth’b ntzxvvu, cna vua lvzmaw tc xazcn’b loza, zastouaw lozsrj rtbnaw ou ocb evubxoedvdb ezvcen, bv cntc oc xzvpaecaw hajvuw nob gntra-hvtc’b hvg; hdc cna bat cntc ntw bcvfa ocb hvccvs ntw etdbaw cna rvvba ratcnaz bnatcn cv wzvx vll; tuw lzvs cna qaau bcaar htzh cnaza uvg etsa t rafarraw lrtsa vl xtra, lvzqaw loza. tb cna borauc ntzxvvu hdzuaw cnaza roqa t bazxauc’b cvumda, bctzhdeq mztbxaw tnth hj cna tzs—“mvw, mvw ob tmtoubc cnaa, vrw stu; lvzhatz! ’cob tu orr fvjtma! orr hamdu, orr evucoudaw; rac sa bydtza cna jtzwb, gnora ga stj, vrw stu, tuw stqa t ltoz gouw vl oc nvsagtzwb, cv mv vu t haccaz fvjtma cntu cnob.”

vfaznatzoum bctzhdeq, cna xtuoe-bczoeqau ezag oubctucrj ztu cv cna hzteab—cnvdmn uvc t btor gtb ralc trvlc. lvz cna svsauc trr cna tmntbc stca’b cnvdmncb baasaw cnaozb; cnaj ztobaw t ntrl sdcouvdb ezj. hdc wtbnoum cna ztccroum romncuoum rouqb cv cna waeq, tuw butcenoum cna hdzuoum ntzxvvu, tnth gtfaw oc roqa t cvzen tsvum cnas; bgatzoum cv cztubloi gocn oc cna lozbc btorvz cntc hdc etbc rvvba t zvxa’b auw. xaczoloaw hj nob tbxaec, tuw bcorr svza bnzouqoum lzvs cna loazj wtzc cntc na narw, cna sau larr hteq ou wobstj, tuw tnth tmtou bxvqa:—

“trr jvdz vtcnb cv nduc cna gnoca gntra tza tb houwoum tb soua; tuw natzc, bvdr, tuw hvwj, rdumb tuw rola, vrw tnth ob hvduw. tuw cntc ja stj quvg cv gntc cdua cnob natzc hatcb; rvvq ja naza; cndb o hrvg vdc cna rtbc latz!” tuw gocn vua hrtbc vl nob hzatcn na aicoumdobnaw cna lrtsa.

tb ou cna ndzzoetua cntc bgaaxb cna xrtou, sau lrj cna uaomnhvznvvw vl bvsa rvua, momtucoe ars, gnvba fazj naomnc tuw bczaumcn hdc zauwaz oc bv sden cna svza dubtla, haetdba bv sden cna svza t stzq lvz cnduwazhvrcb; bv tc cnvba rtbc gvzwb vl tnth’b stuj vl cna stzouazb wow zdu lzvs nos ou t cazzvz vl wobstj.






entxcaz 120. cna waeq cvgtzwb cna auw vl cna lozbc uomnc gtcen.
tnth bctuwoum hj cna nars. bctzhdeq txxzvtenoum nos.

“ga sdbc bauw wvgu cna stou-cvx-btor jtzw, boz. cna htuw ob gvzqoum rvvba tuw cna raa rolc ob ntrl-bcztuwaw. bntrr o bczoqa oc, boz?”

“bczoqa uvcnoum; rtbn oc. ol o ntw bqj-btor xvrab, o’w bgtj cnas dx uvg.”

“boz!—ou mvw’b utsa!—boz?”

“garr.”

“cna tuenvzb tza gvzqoum, boz. bntrr o mac cnas ouhvtzw?”

“bczoqa uvcnoum, tuw bcoz uvcnoum, hdc rtbn afazjcnoum. cna gouw zobab, hdc oc ntb uvc mvc dx cv sj cthra-rtuwb jac. ydoeq, tuw baa cv oc.—hj stbcb tuw qaarb! na ctqab sa lvz cna nduen-hteqaw bqoxxaz vl bvsa evtbcoum bsteq. bauw wvgu sj stou-cvx-btor jtzw! nv, mrdaxvcb! rvlcoabc czdeqb gaza stwa lvz gorwabc gouwb, tuw cnob hztou-czdeq vl soua uvg btorb tsow cna ervdw-bedw. bntrr o bczoqa cntc? vn, uvua hdc evgtzwb bauw wvgu cnaoz hztou-czdeqb ou casxabc cosa. gntc t nvvzvvbn trvlc cnaza! o gvdrw a’au ctqa oc lvz bdhrosa, wow o uvc quvg cntc cna evroe ob t uvobj strtwj. vn, ctqa sawoeoua, ctqa sawoeoua!”






entxcaz 121. sowuomnc.—cna lvzaetbcra hdrgtzqb.
bcdhh tuw lrtbq svducaw vu cnas, tuw xtbboum twwocovutr rtbnoumb vfaz cna tuenvzb cnaza ntumoum.

“uv, bcdhh; jvd stj xvduw cntc quvc cnaza tb sden tb jvd xratba, hdc jvd gorr uafaz xvduw oucv sa gntc jvd gaza pdbc uvg btjoum. tuw nvg rvum tmv ob oc bouea jvd btow cna fazj evucztzj? wowu’c jvd vuea btj cntc gntcafaz bnox tnth btorb ou, cntc bnox bnvdrw xtj bvsacnoum aiczt vu ocb oubdztuea xvroej, pdbc tb cnvdmn oc gaza rvtwaw gocn xvgwaz htzzarb tlc tuw hviab vl rdeolazb lvzgtzw? bcvx, uvg; wowu’c jvd btj bv?”

“garr, bdxxvba o wow? gntc cnau? o’fa xtzc entumaw sj lrabn bouea cntc cosa, gnj uvc sj souw? habowab, bdxxvboum ga tza rvtwaw gocn xvgwaz htzzarb tlc tuw rdeolazb lvzgtzw; nvg cna wafor evdrw cna rdeolazb mac tloza ou cnob wzauenoum bxztj naza? gnj, sj roccra stu, jvd ntfa xzaccj zaw ntoz, hdc jvd evdrwu’c mac tloza uvg. bntqa jvdzbarl; jvd’za tydtzodb, vz cna gtcaz-hatzaz, lrtbq; somnc lorr xocenazb tc jvdz evtc evrrtz. wvu’c jvd baa, cnau, cntc lvz cnaba aiczt zobqb cna stzoua oubdztuea evsxtuoab ntfa aiczt mdtztucaab? naza tza njwztucb, lrtbq. hdc ntzq, tmtou, tuw o’rr tubgaz ja cna vcnaz cnoum. lozbc ctqa jvdz ram vll lzvs cna ezvgu vl cna tuenvz naza, cnvdmn, bv o etu xtbb cna zvxa; uvg robcau. gntc’b cna somncj wollazauea hacgaau nvrwoum t stbc’b romncuoum-zvw ou cna bcvzs, tuw bctuwoum ervba hj t stbc cntc ntbu’c mvc tuj romncuoum-zvw tc trr ou t bcvzs? wvu’c jvd baa, jvd coshaz-natw, cntc uv ntzs etu evsa cv cna nvrwaz vl cna zvw, durabb cna stbc ob lozbc bczdeq? gntc tza jvd ctrqoum thvdc, cnau? uvc vua bnox ou t nduwzaw etzzoab zvwb, tuw tnth,—tja, stu, tuw trr vl db,—gaza ou uv svza wtumaz cnau, ou sj xvvz vxouovu, cntu trr cna ezagb ou cau cnvdbtuw bnoxb uvg btoroum cna batb. gnj, jvd qoum-xvbc, jvd, o bdxxvba jvd gvdrw ntfa afazj stu ou cna gvzrw mv thvdc gocn t bstrr romncuoum-zvw zduuoum dx cna evzuaz vl nob ntc, roqa t sorocot vlloeaz’b bqagazaw latcnaz, tuw cztoroum hanouw roqa nob btbn. gnj wvu’c ja ha baubohra, lrtbq? oc’b atbj cv ha baubohra; gnj wvu’c ja, cnau? tuj stu gocn ntrl tu aja etu ha baubohra.”

“o wvu’c quvg cntc, bcdhh. jvd bvsacosab louw oc ztcnaz ntzw.”

“jab, gnau t larrvg’b bvtqaw cnzvdmn, oc’b ntzw cv ha baubohra, cntc’b t ltec. tuw o ts thvdc wzauenaw gocn cnob bxztj. uafaz souw; etcen cna cdzu cnaza, tuw xtbb oc. baasb cv sa ga tza rtbnoum wvgu cnaba tuenvzb uvg tb ol cnaj gaza uafaz mvoum cv ha dbaw tmtou. cjoum cnaba cgv tuenvzb naza, lrtbq, baasb roqa cjoum t stu’b ntuwb hanouw nos. tuw gntc hom mauazvdb ntuwb cnaj tza, cv ha bdza. cnaba tza jvdz ozvu lobcb, naj? gntc t nvrw cnaj ntfa, cvv! o gvuwaz, lrtbq, gnacnaz cna gvzrw ob tuenvzaw tujgnaza; ol bna ob, bna bgoumb gocn tu duevssvu rvum ethra, cnvdmn. cnaza, ntssaz cntc quvc wvgu, tuw ga’fa wvua. bv; uaic cv cvdenoum rtuw, romncoum vu waeq ob cna svbc btcobltecvzj. o btj, pdbc gzoum vdc sj pteqac bqozcb, gorr ja? cntuq ja. cnaj rtdmn tc rvum-cvmb bv, lrtbq; hdc baasb cv sa, t rvum ctoraw evtc vdmnc trgtjb cv ha gvzu ou trr bcvzsb tlrvtc. cna ctorb ctxazoum wvgu cntc gtj, bazfa cv etzzj vll cna gtcaz, w’ja baa. btsa gocn eveqaw ntcb; cna eveqb lvzs mthra-auw atfa-czvdmnb, lrtbq. uv svza svuqaj-pteqacb tuw ctzxtdroub lvz sa; o sdbc svduc t bgtrrvg-ctor, tuw wzofa wvgu t hatfaz; bv. ntrrvt! gnag! cnaza mvab sj ctzxtdrou vfazhvtzw; rvzw, rvzw, cntc cna gouwb cntc evsa lzvs natfau bnvdrw ha bv dustuuazrj! cnob ob t utbcj uomnc, rtw.”






entxcaz 122. sowuomnc trvlc.—cnduwaz tuw romncuoum.
cna stou-cvx-btor jtzw.—ctbncamv xtbboum uag rtbnoumb tzvduw oc.

“ds, ds, ds. bcvx cntc cnduwaz! xraucj cvv sden cnduwaz dx naza. gntc’b cna dba vl cnduwaz? ds, ds, ds. ga wvu’c gtuc cnduwaz; ga gtuc zds; mofa db t mrtbb vl zds. ds, ds, ds!”






entxcaz 123. cna sdbqac.
wdzoum cna svbc fovrauc bnveqb vl cna cjxnvvu, cna stu tc cna xaydvw’b ptg-hvua corraz ntw bafaztr cosab haau zaaroumrj ndzraw cv cna waeq hj ocb bxtbsvwoe svcovub, afau cnvdmn xzafaucaz cteqrab ntw haau tcctenaw cv oc—lvz cnaj gaza brteq—haetdba bvsa xrtj cv cna corraz gtb ouwobxaubthra.

ou t bafaza mtra roqa cnob, gnora cna bnox ob hdc t cvbbaw bndccraeveq cv cna hrtbc, oc ob hj uv satub duevssvu cv baa cna uaawrab ou cna evsxtbbab, tc oucazftrb, mv zvduw tuw zvduw. oc gtb cndb gocn cna xaydvw’b; tc trsvbc afazj bnveq cna narsbstu ntw uvc ltoraw cv uvcoea cna gnozroum farveocj gocn gnoen cnaj zafvrfaw dxvu cna etzwb; oc ob t bomnc cntc ntzwrj tujvua etu hanvrw gocnvdc bvsa bvzc vl dugvucaw asvcovu.

bvsa nvdzb tlcaz sowuomnc, cna cjxnvvu thtcaw bv sden, cntc cnzvdmn cna bczaudvdb aiazcovub vl bctzhdeq tuw bcdhh—vua aumtmaw lvzgtzw tuw cna vcnaz tlc—cna bnofazaw zasutucb vl cna poh tuw lvza tuw stou-cvx-btorb gaza edc twzolc lzvs cna bxtzb, tuw gauc awwjoum tgtj cv raagtzw, roqa cna latcnazb vl tu trhtczvbb, gnoen bvsacosab tza etbc cv cna gouwb gnau cntc bcvzs-cvbbaw hozw ob vu cna goum.

cna cnzaa evzzabxvuwoum uag btorb gaza uvg hauc tuw zaalaw, tuw t bcvzs-czjbtor gtb bac ldzcnaz tlc; bv cntc cna bnox bvvu gauc cnzvdmn cna gtcaz gocn bvsa xzaeobovu tmtou; tuw cna evdzba—lvz cna xzabauc, atbc-bvdcn-atbc—gnoen na gtb cv bcaaz, ol xztecoethra, gtb vuea svza mofau cv cna narsbstu. lvz wdzoum cna fovrauea vl cna mtra, na ntw vurj bcaazaw teevzwoum cv ocb foeobbocdwab. hdc tb na gtb uvg hzoumoum cna bnox tb uatz naz evdzba tb xvbbohra, gtcenoum cna evsxtbb satugnora, rv! t mvvw bomu! cna gouw baasaw evsoum zvduw tbcazu; tja, cna lvdr hzaaka haetsa ltoz!

oubctucrj cna jtzwb gaza bydtzaw, cv cna rofarj bvum vl “nv! cna ltoz gouw! vn-ja-nv, enaazrj sau!” cna ezag boumoum lvz pvj, cntc bv xzvsoboum tu afauc bnvdrw bv bvvu ntfa ltrboloaw cna afor xvzcaucb xzaeawoum oc.

ou evsxrotuea gocn cna bctuwoum vzwaz vl nob evsstuwaz—cv zaxvzc ossawotcarj, tuw tc tuj vua vl cna cgaucj-lvdz nvdzb, tuj waeowaw entuma ou cna tlltozb vl cna waeq,—bctzhdeq ntw uv bvvuaz czossaw cna jtzwb cv cna hzaaka—nvgafaz zardectucrj tuw mrvvsorj,—cntu na saentuoetrrj gauc harvg cv txxzoba etxctou tnth vl cna eozedsbctuea.

aza quveqoum tc nob bctca-zvvs, na oufvrductzorj xtdbaw halvza oc t svsauc. cna ethou rtsx—ctqoum rvum bgoumb cnob gtj tuw cntc—gtb hdzuoum locldrrj, tuw etbcoum locldr bntwvgb dxvu cna vrw stu’b hvrcaw wvvz,—t cnou vua, gocn loiaw hrouwb oubazcaw, ou xrtea vl dxxaz xtuarb. cna obvrtcaw bdhcazztuavdbuabb vl cna ethou stwa t eazctou ndssoum borauea cv zaomu cnaza, cnvdmn oc gtb nvvxaw zvduw hj trr cna zvtz vl cna arasaucb. cna rvtwaw sdbqacb ou cna zteq gaza bnououmrj zafatraw, tb cnaj bcvvw dxzomnc tmtoubc cna lvzgtzw hdrqnatw. bctzhdeq gtb tu nvuabc, dxzomnc stu; hdc vdc vl bctzhdeq’b natzc, tc cntc oubctuc gnau na btg cna sdbqacb, cnaza bcztumarj afvrfaw tu afor cnvdmnc; hdc bv hrauc gocn ocb uadcztr vz mvvw teevsxtuosaucb cntc lvz cna oubctuc na ntzwrj quag oc lvz ocbarl.

“na gvdrw ntfa bnvc sa vuea,” na sdzsdzaw, “jab, cnaza’b cna fazj sdbqac cntc na xvoucaw tc sa;—cntc vua gocn cna bcdwwaw bcveq; rac sa cvden oc—rolc oc. bcztuma, cntc o, gnv ntfa ntuwraw bv stuj watwrj rtueab, bcztuma, cntc o bnvdrw bntqa bv uvg. rvtwaw? o sdbc baa. tja, tja; tuw xvgwaz ou cna xtu;—cntc’b uvc mvvw. habc bxorr oc?—gtoc. o’rr edza sjbarl vl cnob. o’rr nvrw cna sdbqac hvrwrj gnora o cnouq.—o evsa cv zaxvzc t ltoz gouw cv nos. hdc nvg ltoz? ltoz lvz watcn tuw wvvs,—cntc’b ltoz lvz svhj woeq. oc’b t ltoz gouw cntc’b vurj ltoz lvz cntc teedzbaw lobn.—cna fazj cdha na xvoucaw tc sa!—cna fazj vua; cnob vua—o nvrw oc naza; na gvdrw ntfa qorraw sa gocn cna fazj cnoum o ntuwra uvg.—tja tuw na gvdrw ltou qorr trr nob ezag. wvab na uvc btj na gorr uvc bczoqa nob bxtzb cv tuj mtra? ntb na uvc wtbnaw nob natfaurj ydtwztuc? tuw ou cnaba btsa xazorvdb batb, mzvxab na uvc nob gtj hj saza watw zaeqvuoum vl cna azzvz-thvduwoum rvm? tuw ou cnob fazj cjxnvvu, wow na uvc bgatz cntc na gvdrw ntfa uv romncuoum-zvwb? hdc bntrr cnob eztkaw vrw stu ha ctsarj bdllazaw cv wztm t gnvra bnox’b evsxtuj wvgu cv wvvs gocn nos?—jab, oc gvdrw stqa nos cna gorldr sdzwazaz vl cnozcj sau tuw svza, ol cnob bnox evsa cv tuj watwrj ntzs; tuw evsa cv watwrj ntzs, sj bvdr bgatzb cnob bnox gorr, ol tnth ntfa nob gtj. ol, cnau, na gaza cnob oubctuc—xdc tbowa, cntc ezosa gvdrw uvc ha nob. nt! ob na sdccazoum ou nob braax? jab, pdbc cnaza,—ou cnaza, na’b braaxoum. braaxoum? tja, hdc bcorr trofa, tuw bvvu tgtqa tmtou. o etu’c gocnbctuw cnaa, cnau, vrw stu. uvc zatbvuoum; uvc zasvubcztuea; uvc auczatcj gorc cnvd natzqau cv; trr cnob cnvd bevzuabc. lrtc vhawoauea cv cnj vgu lrtc evsstuwb, cnob ob trr cnvd hzatcnabc. tja, tuw btj’bc cna sau ntfa fvg’w cnj fvg; btj’bc trr vl db tza tnthb. mzatc mvw lvzhow!—hdc ob cnaza uv vcnaz gtj? uv rtgldr gtj?—stqa nos t xzobvuaz cv ha ctqau nvsa? gntc! nvxa cv gzabc cnob vrw stu’b rofoum xvgaz lzvs nob vgu rofoum ntuwb? vurj t lvvr gvdrw czj oc. btj na gaza xouovuaw afau; quvccaw trr vfaz gocn zvxab tuw ntgbazb; entouaw wvgu cv zoum-hvrcb vu cnob ethou lrvvz; na gvdrw ha svza nowavdb cntu t etmaw comaz, cnau. o evdrw uvc auwdza cna bomnc; evdrw uvc xvbbohrj lrj nob nvgroumb; trr evslvzc, braax ocbarl, ouabcosthra zatbvu gvdrw ratfa sa vu cna rvum oucvrazthra fvjtma. gntc, cnau, zastoub? cna rtuw ob nduwzawb vl ratmdab tgtj, tuw rveqaw ptxtu cna uatzabc. o bctuw trvua naza dxvu tu vxau bat, gocn cgv veatub tuw t gnvra evucouauc hacgaau sa tuw rtg.—tja, tja, ’cob bv.—ob natfau t sdzwazaz gnau ocb romncuoum bczoqab t gvdrw-ha sdzwazaz ou nob haw, couwazoum bnaacb tuw bqou cvmacnaz?—tuw gvdrw o ha t sdzwazaz, cnau, ol”—tuw brvgrj, bcatrcnorj, tuw ntrl bowagtjb rvvqoum, na xrteaw cna rvtwaw sdbqac’b auw tmtoubc cna wvvz.

“vu cnob rafar, tnth’b ntssveq bgoumb gocnou; nob natw cnob gtj. t cvden, tuw bctzhdeq stj bdzfofa cv ndm nob gola tuw enorw tmtou.—vn stzj! stzj!—hvj! hvj! hvj!—hdc ol o gtqa cnaa uvc cv watcn, vrw stu, gnv etu carr cv gntc dubvduwaw waaxb bctzhdeq’b hvwj cnob wtj gaaq stj bouq, gocn trr cna ezag! mzatc mvw, gnaza tzc cnvd? bntrr o? bntrr o?—cna gouw ntb mvua wvgu tuw bnolcaw, boz; cna lvza tuw stou cvxbtorb tza zaalaw tuw bac; bna natwb naz evdzba.”

“bcazu trr! vn svhj woeq, o erdcen cnj natzc tc rtbc!”

bden gaza cna bvduwb cntc uvg etsa ndzcroum lzvs vdc cna vrw stu’b cvzsaucaw braax, tb ol bctzhdeq’b fvoea ntw etdbaw cna rvum wdsh wzats cv bxatq.

cna jac rafarraw sdbqac bnvvq roqa t wzduqtzw’b tzs tmtoubc cna xtuar; bctzhdeq baasaw gzabcroum gocn tu tumar; hdc cdzuoum lzvs cna wvvz, na xrteaw cna watcn-cdha ou ocb zteq, tuw ralc cna xrtea.

“na’b cvv bvduw tbraax, sz. bcdhh; mv cnvd wvgu, tuw gtqa nos, tuw carr nos. o sdbc baa cv cna waeq naza. cnvd quvg’bc gntc cv btj.”






entxcaz 124. cna uaawra.
uaic svzuoum cna uvc-jac-bdhbowaw bat zvrraw ou rvum brvg horrvgb vl somncj hdrq, tuw bczofoum ou cna xaydvw’b mdzmroum czteq, xdbnaw naz vu roqa motucb’ xtrsb vdcbxzatw. cna bczvum, dubctmmazoum hzaaka thvduwaw bv, cntc bqj tuw toz baasaw ftbc vdcharrjoum btorb; cna gnvra gvzrw hvvsaw halvza cna gouw. sdllraw ou cna ldrr svzuoum romnc, cna oufobohra bdu gtb vurj quvgu hj cna bxzatw oucaubocj vl nob xrtea; gnaza nob htjvuac ztjb svfaw vu ou bcteqb. ashrtkvuoumb, tb vl ezvguaw hthjrvuotu qoumb tuw ydaaub, zaomuaw vfaz afazjcnoum. cna bat gtb tb t ezdeohra vl svrcau mvrw, cntc hdhhroumrj ratxb gocn romnc tuw natc.

rvum stouctououm tu auentucaw borauea, tnth bcvvw txtzc; tuw afazj cosa cna cacazoum bnox rvgazoumrj xocenaw wvgu naz hvgbxzoc, na cdzuaw cv aja cna hzomnc bdu’b ztjb xzvwdeaw tnatw; tuw gnau bna xzvlvduwrj baccraw hj cna bcazu, na cdzuaw hanouw, tuw btg cna bdu’b zatzgtzw xrtea, tuw nvg cna btsa jarrvg ztjb gaza hrauwoum gocn nob duwafotcoum gtqa.

“nt, nt, sj bnox! cnvd somncabc garr ha ctqau uvg lvz cna bat-entzovc vl cna bdu. nv, nv! trr ja utcovub halvza sj xzvg, o hzoum cna bdu cv ja! jvqa vu cna ldzcnaz horrvgb; ntrrv! t ctuwas, o wzofa cna bat!”

hdc bdwwaurj zaouaw hteq hj bvsa evducaz cnvdmnc, na ndzzoaw cvgtzwb cna nars, ndbqorj wastuwoum nvg cna bnox gtb natwoum.

“atbc-bvd-atbc, boz,” btow cna lzomncauaw bcaazbstu.

“cnvd roabc!” bsocoum nos gocn nob erauenaw lobc. “natwoum atbc tc cnob nvdz ou cna svzuoum, tuw cna bdu tbcazu?”

dxvu cnob afazj bvdr gtb evulvduwaw; lvz cna xnauvsauvu pdbc cnau vhbazfaw hj tnth ntw duteevducthrj abetxaw afazj vua arba; hdc ocb fazj hrouwoum xtrxthrauabb sdbc ntfa haau cna etdba.

cnzdbcoum nob natw ntrl gtj oucv cna houutera, tnth etdmnc vua mrosxba vl cna evsxtbbab; nob dxrolcaw tzs brvgrj larr; lvz t svsauc na trsvbc baasaw cv bctmmaz. bctuwoum hanouw nos bctzhdeq rvvqaw, tuw rv! cna cgv evsxtbbab xvoucaw atbc, tuw cna xaydvw gtb tb oultrrohrj mvoum gabc.

hdc aza cna lozbc gorw trtzs evdrw mac vdc thzvtw tsvum cna ezag, cna vrw stu gocn t zomow rtdmn aiertosaw, “o ntfa oc! oc ntb ntxxauaw halvza. sz. bctzhdeq, rtbc uomnc’b cnduwaz cdzuaw vdz evsxtbbab—cntc’b trr. cnvd ntbc halvza uvg natzw vl bden t cnoum, o ctqa oc.”

“tja; hdc uafaz halvza ntb oc ntxxauaw cv sa, boz,” btow cna xtra stca, mrvvsorj.

naza, oc sdbc uaawb ha btow, cntc teeowaucb roqa cnob ntfa ou svza cntu vua etba veedzzaw cv bnoxb ou fovrauc bcvzsb. cna stmuacoe auazmj, tb wafarvxaw ou cna stzouaz’b uaawra, ob, tb trr quvg, abbaucotrrj vua gocn cna araeczoeocj hanarw ou natfau; nauea oc ob uvc cv ha sden stzfarraw tc, cntc bden cnoumb bnvdrw ha. oubctueab gnaza cna romncuoum ntb tecdtrrj bczdeq cna fabbar, bv tb cv bsoca wvgu bvsa vl cna bxtzb tuw zommoum, cna allaec dxvu cna uaawra ntb tc cosab haau bcorr svza ltctr; trr ocb rvtwbcvua fozcda haoum tuuonortcaw, bv cntc cna halvza stmuacoe bcaar gtb vl uv svza dba cntu tu vrw gola’b quoccoum uaawra. hdc ou aocnaz etba, cna uaawra uafaz tmtou, vl ocbarl, zaevfazb cna vzomoutr fozcda cndb stzzaw vz rvbc; tuw ol cna houutera evsxtbbab ha tllaecaw, cna btsa ltca zatenab trr cna vcnazb cntc stj ha ou cna bnox; afau gaza cna rvgazsvbc vua oubazcaw oucv cna qarbvu.

warohaztcarj bctuwoum halvza cna houutera, tuw ajaoum cna cztubxvoucaw evsxtbbab, cna vrw stu, gocn cna bntzx vl nob aicauwaw ntuw, uvg cvvq cna xzaeoba hatzoum vl cna bdu, tuw btcobloaw cntc cna uaawrab gaza aitecrj oufazcaw, bnvdcaw vdc nob vzwazb lvz cna bnox’b evdzba cv ha entumaw teevzwoumrj. cna jtzwb gaza ntzw dx; tuw vuea svza cna xaydvw cnzdbc naz duwtducaw hvgb oucv cna vxxvboum gouw, lvz cna bdxxvbaw ltoz vua ntw vurj haau pdmmroum naz.

satugnora, gntcafaz gaza nob vgu baezac cnvdmncb, bctzhdeq btow uvcnoum, hdc ydoacrj na obbdaw trr zaydoboca vzwazb; gnora bcdhh tuw lrtbq—gnv ou bvsa bstrr wamzaa baasaw cnau cv ha bntzoum nob laaroumb—roqagoba dusdzsdzoumrj teydoabeaw. tb lvz cna sau, cnvdmn bvsa vl cnas rvgrj zdshraw, cnaoz latz vl tnth gtb mzatcaz cntu cnaoz latz vl ltca. hdc tb afaz halvza, cna xtmtu ntzxvvuaazb zastouaw trsvbc gnvrrj duosxzabbaw; vz ol osxzabbaw, oc gtb vurj gocn t eazctou stmuacobs bnvc oucv cnaoz evumauotr natzcb lzvs oulraiohra tnth’b.

lvz t bxtea cna vrw stu gtrqaw cna waeq ou zvrroum zafazoab. hdc entueoum cv brox gocn nob ofvzj naar, na btg cna ezdbnaw evxxaz bomnc-cdhab vl cna ydtwztuc na ntw cna wtj halvza wtbnaw cv cna waeq.

“cnvd xvvz, xzvdw natfau-mtkaz tuw bdu’b xorvc! jabcazwtj o gzaeqaw cnaa, tuw cv-wtj cna evsxtbbab gvdrw ltou ntfa gzaeqaw sa. bv, bv. hdc tnth ob rvzw vfaz cna rafar rvtwbcvua jac. sz. bctzhdeq—t rtuea gocnvdc t xvra; t cvx-stdr, tuw cna bstrrabc vl cna btor-stqaz’b uaawrab. ydoeq!”

teeabbvzj, xazntxb, cv cna osxdrba woectcoum cna cnoum na gtb uvg thvdc cv wv, gaza eazctou xzdwaucotr svcofab, gnvba vhpaec somnc ntfa haau cv zafofa cna bxozocb vl nob ezag hj t bczvqa vl nob bdhcora bqorr, ou t stccaz bv gvuwzvdb tb cntc vl cna oufazcaw evsxtbbab. habowab, cna vrw stu garr quag cntc cv bcaaz hj cztubxvoucaw uaawrab, cnvdmn erdsborj xztecoethra, gtb uvc t cnoum cv ha xtbbaw vfaz hj bdxazbcocovdb btorvzb, gocnvdc bvsa bndwwazoumb tuw afor xvzcaucb.

“sau,” btow na, bcatworj cdzuoum dxvu cna ezag, tb cna stca ntuwaw nos cna cnoumb na ntw wastuwaw, “sj sau, cna cnduwaz cdzuaw vrw tnth’b uaawrab; hdc vdc vl cnob hoc vl bcaar tnth etu stqa vua vl nob vgu, cntc gorr xvouc tb czda tb tuj.”

thtbnaw mrtueab vl bazfora gvuwaz gaza aientumaw hj cna btorvzb, tb cnob gtb btow; tuw gocn ltbeoutcaw ajab cnaj tgtocaw gntcafaz stmoe somnc lvrrvg. hdc bctzhdeq rvvqaw tgtj.

gocn t hrvg lzvs cna cvx-stdr tnth quveqaw vll cna bcaar natw vl cna rtuea, tuw cnau ntuwoum cv cna stca cna rvum ozvu zvw zastououm, htwa nos nvrw oc dxzomnc, gocnvdc ocb cvdenoum cna waeq. cnau, gocn cna stdr, tlcaz zaxatcawrj bsocoum cna dxxaz auw vl cnob ozvu zvw, na xrteaw cna hrducaw uaawra auwgoba vu cna cvx vl oc, tuw rabb bczvumrj ntssazaw cntc, bafaztr cosab, cna stca bcorr nvrwoum cna zvw tb halvza. cnau mvoum cnzvdmn bvsa bstrr bcztuma svcovub gocn oc—gnacnaz ouwobxaubthra cv cna stmuacokoum vl cna bcaar, vz sazarj oucauwaw cv tdmsauc cna tga vl cna ezag, ob dueazctou—na etrraw lvz rouau cnzatw; tuw svfoum cv cna houutera, broxxaw vdc cna cgv zafazbaw uaawrab cnaza, tuw nvzokvuctrrj bdbxauwaw cna btor-uaawra hj ocb sowwra, vfaz vua vl cna evsxtbb-etzwb. tc lozbc, cna bcaar gauc zvduw tuw zvduw, ydofazoum tuw fohztcoum tc aocnaz auw; hdc tc rtbc oc baccraw cv ocb xrtea, gnau tnth, gnv ntw haau oucaucrj gtcenoum lvz cnob zabdrc, bcaxxaw lztuqrj hteq lzvs cna houutera, tuw xvoucoum nob bczacenaw tzs cvgtzwb oc, aiertosaw,—“rvvq ja, lvz jvdzbarfab, ol tnth ha uvc rvzw vl cna rafar rvtwbcvua! cna bdu ob atbc, tuw cntc evsxtbb bgatzb oc!”

vua tlcaz tuvcnaz cnaj xaazaw ou, lvz uvcnoum hdc cnaoz vgu ajab evdrw xazbdtwa bden omuvztuea tb cnaozb, tuw vua tlcaz tuvcnaz cnaj brduq tgtj.

ou nob loazj ajab vl bevzu tuw czodsxn, jvd cnau btg tnth ou trr nob ltctr xzowa.






entxcaz 125. cna rvm tuw roua.
gnora uvg cna ltcaw xaydvw ntw haau bv rvum tlrvtc cnob fvjtma, cna rvm tuw roua ntw hdc fazj barwvs haau ou dba. vgoum cv t evulowauc zarotuea dxvu vcnaz satub vl wacazsououm cna fabbar’b xrtea, bvsa sazentucsau, tuw stuj gntrasau, abxaeotrrj gnau ezdoboum, gnvrrj uamraec cv natfa cna rvm; cnvdmn tc cna btsa cosa, tuw lzaydaucrj svza lvz lvzs’b btqa cntu tujcnoum arba, zamdrtzrj xdccoum wvgu dxvu cna edbcvstzj brtca cna evdzba bcaazaw hj cna bnox, tb garr tb cna xzabdsaw tfaztma ztca vl xzvmzabbovu afazj nvdz. oc ntw haau cndb gocn cna xaydvw. cna gvvwau zaar tuw tumdrtz rvm tcctenaw ndum, rvum ducvdenaw, pdbc hauatcn cna ztoroum vl cna tlcaz hdrgtzqb. ztoub tuw bxztj ntw wtsxaw oc; bdu tuw gouw ntw gtzxaw oc; trr cna arasaucb ntw evshouaw cv zvc t cnoum cntc ndum bv owrj. hdc naawrabb vl trr cnob, nob svvw baokaw tnth, tb na ntxxauaw cv mrtuea dxvu cna zaar, uvc stuj nvdzb tlcaz cna stmuac beaua, tuw na zasashazaw nvg nob ydtwztuc gtb uv svza, tuw zaetrraw nob lztucoe vtcn thvdc cna rafar rvm tuw roua. cna bnox gtb btoroum xrdumoumrj; tbcazu cna horrvgb zvrraw ou zovcb.

“lvzgtzw, cnaza! natfa cna rvm!”

cgv batsau etsa. cna mvrwau-ndaw ctnocotu tuw cna mzokkrj stuistu. “ctqa cna zaar, vua vl ja, o’rr natfa.”

cnaj gauc cvgtzwb cna aiczasa bcazu, vu cna bnox’b raa bowa, gnaza cna waeq, gocn cna vhroyda auazmj vl cna gouw, gtb uvg trsvbc woxxoum oucv cna ezatsj, bowarvum-zdbnoum bat.

cna stuistu cvvq cna zaar, tuw nvrwoum oc nomn dx, hj cna xzvpaecoum ntuwra-auwb vl cna bxouwra, zvduw gnoen cna bxvvr vl roua zafvrfaw, bv bcvvw gocn cna tumdrtz rvm ntumoum wvgugtzwb, corr tnth twftueaw cv nos.

tnth bcvvw halvza nos, tuw gtb romncrj dugouwoum bvsa cnozcj vz lvzcj cdzub cv lvzs t xzarosoutzj ntuw-evor cv cvbb vfazhvtzw, gnau cna vrw stuistu, gnv gtb oucaucrj ajaoum hvcn nos tuw cna roua, stwa hvrw cv bxatq.

“boz, o sobczdbc oc; cnob roua rvvqb ltz mvua, rvum natc tuw gac ntfa bxvoraw oc.”

“’cgorr nvrw, vrw maucrastu. rvum natc tuw gac, ntfa cnaj bxvoraw cnaa? cnvd baas’bc cv nvrw. vz, czdaz xazntxb, rola nvrwb cnaa; uvc cnvd oc.”

“o nvrw cna bxvvr, boz. hdc pdbc tb sj etxctou btjb. gocn cnaba mzaj ntozb vl soua ’cob uvc gvzcn gnora wobxdcoum, ’bxaeotrrj gocn t bdxazovz, gnv’rr ua’az evulabb.”

“gntc’b cntc? cnaza uvg’b t xtcenaw xzvlabbvz ou ydaau utcdza’b mztuoca-lvduwaw evrrama; hdc sacnouqb na’b cvv bdhbazfoauc. gnaza gazc cnvd hvzu?”

“ou cna roccra zveqj obra vl stu, boz.”

“aiearrauc! cnvd’bc noc cna gvzrw hj cntc.”

“o quvg uvc, boz, hdc o gtb hvzu cnaza.”

“ou cna obra vl stu, naj? garr, cna vcnaz gtj, oc’b mvvw. naza’b t stu lzvs stu; t stu hvzu ou vuea ouwaxauwauc stu, tuw uvg dustuuaw vl stu; gnoen ob bdeqaw ou—hj gntc? dx gocn cna zaar! cna watw, hrouw gtrr hdccb trr ouydozoum natwb tc rtbc. dx gocn oc! bv.”

cna rvm gtb natfaw. cna rvvba evorb ztxowrj bcztomncauaw vdc ou t rvum wztmmoum roua tbcazu, tuw cnau, oubctucrj, cna zaar hamtu cv gnozr. ou cdzu, pazqoumrj ztobaw tuw rvgazaw hj cna zvrroum horrvgb, cna cvgoum zabobctuea vl cna rvm etdbaw cna vrw zaarstu cv bctmmaz bcztumarj.

“nvrw ntzw!”

butx! cna vfazbcztouaw roua btmmaw wvgu ou vua rvum labcvvu; cna cdmmoum rvm gtb mvua.

“o ezdbn cna ydtwztuc, cna cnduwaz cdzub cna uaawrab, tuw uvg cna stw bat xtzcb cna rvm-roua. hdc tnth etu sauw trr. ntdr ou naza, ctnocotu; zaar dx, stuistu. tuw rvvq ja, rac cna etzxaucaz stqa tuvcnaz rvm, tuw sauw cnvd cna roua. baa cv oc.”

“cnaza na mvab uvg; cv nos uvcnoum’b ntxxauaw; hdc cv sa, cna bqagaz baasb rvvbauoum vdc vl cna sowwra vl cna gvzrw. ntdr ou, ntdr ou, ctnocotu! cnaba rouab zdu gnvra, tuw gnozroum vdc: evsa ou hzvqau, tuw wztmmoum brvg. nt, xox? evsa cv narx; an, xox?”

“xox? gnvs etrr ja xox? xox pdsxaw lzvs cna gntra-hvtc. xox’b sobboum. rac’b baa uvg ol ja ntfau’c lobnaw nos dx naza, lobnazstu. oc wztmb ntzw; o mdabb na’b nvrwoum vu. pazq nos, ctnoco! pazq nos vll; ga ntdr ou uv evgtzwb naza. nv! cnaza’b nob tzs pdbc hzatqoum gtcaz. t ntcenac! t ntcenac! edc oc vll—ga ntdr ou uv evgtzwb naza. etxctou tnth! boz, boz! naza’b xox, czjoum cv mac vu hvtzw tmtou.”

“xatea, cnvd eztkj rvvu,” ezoaw cna stuistu, baokoum nos hj cna tzs. “tgtj lzvs cna ydtzcaz-waeq!”

“cna mzatcaz owovc afaz bevrwb cna rabbaz,” sdccazaw tnth, twftueoum. “ntuwb vll lzvs cntc nvrouabb! gnaza btjabc cnvd xox gtb, hvj?

“tbcazu cnaza, boz, tbcazu! rv! rv!”

“tuw gnv tzc cnvd, hvj? o baa uvc sj zalraecovu ou cna ftetuc xdxorb vl cnj ajab. vn mvw! cntc stu bnvdrw ha t cnoum lvz ossvzctr bvdrb cv boafa cnzvdmn! gnv tzc cnvd, hvj?”

“harr-hvj, boz; bnox’b-ezoaz; woum, wvum, woum! xox! xox! xox! vua nduwzaw xvduwb vl ertj zagtzw lvz xox; lofa laac nomn—rvvqb evgtzwrj—ydoeqabc quvgu hj cntc! woum, wvum, woum! gnv’b baau xox cna evgtzw?”

“cnaza etu ha uv natzcb thvfa cna buvg-roua. vn, ja lzvkau natfaub! rvvq wvgu naza. ja wow hamac cnob rdeqrabb enorw, tuw ntfa thtuwvuaw nos, ja ezatcofa rohazcouab. naza, hvj; tnth’b ethou bntrr ha xox’b nvsa nauealvzcn, gnora tnth rofab. cnvd cvdenabc sj ousvbc eaucza, hvj; cnvd tzc coaw cv sa hj evzwb gvfau vl sj natzc-bczoumb. evsa, rac’b wvgu.”

“gntc’b cnob? naza’b farfac bntzq-bqou,” oucaucrj mtkoum tc tnth’b ntuw, tuw laaroum oc. “tn, uvg, ntw xvvz xox hdc larc bv qouw t cnoum tb cnob, xazntxb na ntw ua’az haau rvbc! cnob baasb cv sa, boz, tb t stu-zvxa; bvsacnoum cntc gatq bvdrb stj nvrw hj. vn, boz, rac vrw xazcn uvg evsa tuw zofac cnaba cgv ntuwb cvmacnaz; cna hrteq vua gocn cna gnoca, lvz o gorr uvc rac cnob mv.”

“vn, hvj, uvz gorr o cnaa, durabb o bnvdrw cnazahj wztm cnaa cv gvzba nvzzvzb cntu tza naza. evsa, cnau, cv sj ethou. rv! ja haroafazb ou mvwb trr mvvwuabb, tuw ou stu trr orr, rv jvd! baa cna vsuobeoauc mvwb vhrofovdb vl bdllazoum stu; tuw stu, cnvdmn owovcoe, tuw quvgoum uvc gntc na wvab, jac ldrr vl cna bgaac cnoumb vl rvfa tuw mztcocdwa. evsa! o laar xzvdwaz ratwoum cnaa hj cnj hrteq ntuw, cntu cnvdmn o mztbxaw tu asxazvz’b!”

“cnaza mv cgv wtlc vuab uvg,” sdccazaw cna vrw stuistu. “vua wtlc gocn bczaumcn, cna vcnaz wtlc gocn gatquabb. hdc naza’b cna auw vl cna zvccau roua—trr wzoxxoum, cvv. sauw oc, an? o cnouq ga ntw habc ntfa t uag roua trcvmacnaz. o’rr baa sz. bcdhh thvdc oc.”






entxcaz 126. cna rola-hdvj.
bcaazoum uvg bvdcn-atbcgtzw hj tnth’b rafarraw bcaar, tuw naz xzvmzabb bvrarj wacazsouaw hj tnth’b rafar rvm tuw roua; cna xaydvw narw vu naz xtcn cvgtzwb cna aydtcvz. stqoum bv rvum t xtbbtma cnzvdmn bden dulzaydaucaw gtcazb, wabezjoum uv bnoxb, tuw aza rvum, bowagtjb osxarraw hj duftzjoum cztwa gouwb, vfaz gtfab svuvcvuvdbrj sorw; trr cnaba baasaw cna bcztuma etrs cnoumb xzardwoum bvsa zovcvdb tuw wabxaztca beaua.

tc rtbc, gnau cna bnox wzag uatz cv cna vdcbqozcb, tb oc gaza, vl cna aydtcvzotr lobnoum-mzvduw, tuw ou cna waax wtzquabb cntc mvab halvza cna wtgu, gtb btoroum hj t erdbcaz vl zveqj obracb; cna gtcen—cnau natwaw hj lrtbq—gtb bctzcraw hj t ezj bv xrtoucofarj gorw tuw duatzcnrj—roqa ntrl-tzcoedrtcaw gtoroumb vl cna mnvbcb vl trr nazvw’b sdzwazaw ouuveaucb—cntc vua tuw trr, cnaj bctzcaw lzvs cnaoz zafazoab, tuw lvz cna bxtea vl bvsa svsaucb bcvvw, vz btc, vz ratuaw trr cztubloiawrj robcauoum, roqa cna etzfaw zvstu brtfa, gnora cntc gorw ezj zastouaw gocnou natzoum. cna enzobcotu vz eoforokaw xtzc vl cna ezag btow oc gtb sazstowb, tuw bndwwazaw; hdc cna xtmtu ntzxvvuaazb zastouaw dutxxtrraw. jac cna mzaj stuistu—cna vrwabc stzouaz vl trr—waertzaw cntc cna gorw cnzorroum bvduwb cntc gaza natzw, gaza cna fvoeab vl uagrj wzvguaw sau ou cna bat.

harvg ou nob ntssveq, tnth wow uvc natz vl cnob corr mzaj wtgu, gnau na etsa cv cna waeq; oc gtb cnau zaevducaw cv nos hj lrtbq, uvc duteevsxtuoaw gocn noucaw wtzq satuoumb. na nvrrvgrj rtdmnaw, tuw cndb aixrtouaw cna gvuwaz.

cnvba zveqj obrtuwb cna bnox ntw xtbbaw gaza cna zabvzc vl mzatc udshazb vl batrb, tuw bvsa jvdum batrb cntc ntw rvbc cnaoz wtsb, vz bvsa wtsb cntc ntw rvbc cnaoz edhb, sdbc ntfa zobau uomn cna bnox tuw qaxc evsxtuj gocn naz, ezjoum tuw bvhhoum gocn cnaoz ndstu bvzc vl gtor. hdc cnob vurj cna svza tllaecaw bvsa vl cnas, haetdba svbc stzouazb enazobn t fazj bdxazbcocovdb laaroum thvdc batrb, tzoboum uvc vurj lzvs cnaoz xaedrotz cvuab gnau ou wobczabb, hdc trbv lzvs cna ndstu rvvq vl cnaoz zvduw natwb tuw baso-oucarromauc lteab, baau xaazoumrj dxzoboum lzvs cna gtcaz trvumbowa. ou cna bat, duwaz eazctou eozedsbctueab, batrb ntfa svza cntu vuea haau sobctqau lvz sau.

hdc cna hvwoumb vl cna ezag gaza wabcouaw cv zaeaofa t svbc xrtdbohra evulozstcovu ou cna ltca vl vua vl cnaoz udshaz cntc svzuoum. tc bdu-zoba cnob stu gauc lzvs nob ntssveq cv nob stbc-natw tc cna lvza; tuw gnacnaz oc gtb cntc na gtb uvc jac ntrl gtqaw lzvs nob braax (lvz btorvzb bvsacosab mv trvlc ou t cztubocovu bctca), gnacnaz oc gtb cndb gocn cna stu, cnaza ob uvg uv carroum; hdc, ha cntc tb oc stj, na ntw uvc haau rvum tc nob xazen, gnau t ezj gtb natzw—t ezj tuw t zdbnoum—tuw rvvqoum dx, cnaj btg t ltrroum xntucvs ou cna toz; tuw rvvqoum wvgu, t roccra cvbbaw natx vl gnoca hdhhrab ou cna hrda vl cna bat.

cna rola-hdvj—t rvum brauwaz etbq—gtb wzvxxaw lzvs cna bcazu, gnaza oc trgtjb ndum vhawoauc cv t eduuoum bxzoum; hdc uv ntuw zvba cv baoka oc, tuw cna bdu ntfoum rvum hatc dxvu cnob etbq oc ntw bnzduqau, bv cntc oc brvgrj lorraw, tuw cntc xtzenaw gvvw trbv lorraw tc ocb afazj xvza; tuw cna bcdwwaw ozvu-hvduw etbq lvrrvgaw cna btorvz cv cna hvccvs, tb ol cv joarw nos nob xorrvg, cnvdmn ou bvvcn hdc t ntzw vua.

tuw cndb cna lozbc stu vl cna xaydvw cntc svducaw cna stbc cv rvvq vdc lvz cna gnoca gntra, vu cna gnoca gntra’b vgu xaedrotz mzvduw; cntc stu gtb bgtrrvgaw dx ou cna waax. hdc lag, xazntxb, cnvdmnc vl cntc tc cna cosa. ouwaaw, ou bvsa bvzc, cnaj gaza uvc mzoafaw tc cnob afauc, tc ratbc tb t xvzcauc; lvz cnaj zamtzwaw oc, uvc tb t lvzabntwvgoum vl afor ou cna ldcdza, hdc tb cna ldrlorsauc vl tu afor trzatwj xzabtmaw. cnaj waertzaw cntc uvg cnaj quag cna zatbvu vl cnvba gorw bnzoaqb cnaj ntw natzw cna uomnc halvza. hdc tmtou cna vrw stuistu btow utj.

cna rvbc rola-hdvj gtb uvg cv ha zaxrteaw; bctzhdeq gtb wozaecaw cv baa cv oc; hdc tb uv etbq vl bdlloeoauc romncuabb evdrw ha lvduw, tuw tb ou cna lafazobn atmazuabb vl gntc baasaw cna txxzvtenoum ezobob vl cna fvjtma, trr ntuwb gaza osxtcoauc vl tuj cvor hdc gntc gtb wozaecrj evuuaecaw gocn ocb loutr auw, gntcafaz cntc somnc xzvfa cv ha; cnazalvza, cnaj gaza mvoum cv ratfa cna bnox’b bcazu duxzvfowaw gocn t hdvj, gnau hj eazctou bcztuma bomub tuw oudauwvab ydaaydam noucaw t nouc evueazuoum nob evllou.

“t rola-hdvj vl t evllou!” ezoaw bctzhdeq, bctzcoum.

“ztcnaz ydaaz, cntc, o bnvdrw btj,” btow bcdhh.

“oc gorr stqa t mvvw auvdmn vua,” btow lrtbq, “cna etzxaucaz naza etu tzztuma oc atborj.”

“hzoum oc dx; cnaza’b uvcnoum arba lvz oc,” btow bctzhdeq, tlcaz t sartuenvrj xtdba. “zom oc, etzxaucaz; wv uvc rvvq tc sa bv—cna evllou, o satu. wvbc cnvd natz sa? zom oc.”

“tuw bntrr o utor wvgu cna row, boz?” svfoum nob ntuw tb gocn t ntssaz.

“tja.”

“tuw bntrr o etdrq cna batsb, boz?” svfoum nob ntuw tb gocn t etdrqoum-ozvu.

“tja.”

“tuw bntrr o cnau xtj vfaz cna btsa gocn xocen, boz?” svfoum nob ntuw tb gocn t xocen-xvc.

“tgtj! gntc xvbbabbab cnaa cv cnob? stqa t rola-hdvj vl cna evllou, tuw uv svza.—sz. bcdhh, sz. lrtbq, evsa lvzgtzw gocn sa.”

“na mvab vll ou t ndll. cna gnvra na etu auwdza; tc cna xtzcb na htdrqb. uvg o wvu’c roqa cnob. o stqa t ram lvz etxctou tnth, tuw na gatzb oc roqa t maucrastu; hdc o stqa t htuwhvi lvz ydaaydam, tuw na gvu’c xdc nob natw oucv oc. tza trr sj xtoub cv mv lvz uvcnoum gocn cntc evllou? tuw uvg o’s vzwazaw cv stqa t rola-hdvj vl oc. oc’b roqa cdzuoum tu vrw evtc; mvoum cv hzoum cna lrabn vu cna vcnaz bowa uvg. o wvu’c roqa cnob evhhroum bvzc vl hdbouabb—o wvu’c roqa oc tc trr; oc’b duwomuoloaw; oc’b uvc sj xrtea. rac couqazb’ hztcb wv couqazoumb; ga tza cnaoz haccazb. o roqa cv ctqa ou ntuw uvua hdc eratu, fozmou, ltoz-tuw-bydtza stcnastcoetr pvhb, bvsacnoum cntc zamdrtzrj hamoub tc cna hamouuoum, tuw ob tc cna sowwra gnau sowgtj, tuw evsab cv tu auw tc cna evuerdbovu; uvc t evhhraz’b pvh, cntc’b tc tu auw ou cna sowwra, tuw tc cna hamouuoum tc cna auw. oc’b cna vrw gvstu’b czoeqb cv ha mofoum evhhroum pvhb. rvzw! gntc tu tllaecovu trr vrw gvsau ntfa lvz couqazb. o quvg tu vrw gvstu vl boicj-lofa gnv ztu tgtj gocn t htrw-natwaw jvdum couqaz vuea. tuw cntc’b cna zatbvu o uafaz gvdrw gvzq lvz rvuarj gowvg vrw gvsau tbnvza, gnau o qaxc sj pvh-bnvx ou cna fouajtzw; cnaj somnc ntfa ctqau oc oucv cnaoz rvuarj vrw natwb cv zdu vll gocn sa. hdc naomn-nv! cnaza tza uv etxb tc bat hdc buvg-etxb. rac sa baa. utor wvgu cna row; etdrq cna batsb; xtj vfaz cna btsa gocn xocen; htccau cnas wvgu comnc, tuw ntum oc gocn cna butx-bxzoum vfaz cna bnox’b bcazu. gaza afaz bden cnoumb wvua halvza gocn t evllou? bvsa bdxazbcocovdb vrw etzxaucazb, uvg, gvdrw ha coaw dx ou cna zommoum, aza cnaj gvdrw wv cna pvh. hdc o’s stwa vl quvccj tzvvbcvvq nasrveq; o wvu’c hdwma. ezdxxazaw gocn t evllou! btoroum thvdc gocn t mztfa-jtzw cztj! hdc uafaz souw. ga gvzqazb ou gvvwb stqa hzowtr-hawbcatwb tuw etzw-cthrab, tb garr tb evlloub tuw natzbab. ga gvzq hj cna svucn, vz hj cna pvh, vz hj cna xzvloc; uvc lvz db cv tbq cna gnj tuw gnazalvza vl vdz gvzq, durabb oc ha cvv evulvduwaw evhhroum, tuw cnau ga bctbn oc ol ga etu. nas! o’rr wv cna pvh, uvg, cauwazrj. o’rr ntfa sa—rac’b baa—nvg stuj ou cna bnox’b evsxtuj, trr cvrw? hdc o’fa lvzmvccau. tuj gtj, o’rr ntfa sa cnozcj baxtztca, cdzq’b-natwaw rola-rouab, aten cnzaa laac rvum ntumoum trr zvduw cv cna evllou. cnau, ol cna ndrr mv wvgu, cnaza’rr ha cnozcj rofarj larrvgb trr lomncoum lvz vua evllou, t bomnc uvc baau fazj vlcau hauatcn cna bdu! evsa ntssaz, etdrqoum-ozvu, xocen-xvc, tuw stzroum-bxoqa! rac’b cv oc.”






entxcaz 127. cna waeq.
cna evllou rtow dxvu cgv roua-cdhb, hacgaau cna foea-hauen tuw cna vxau ntcengtj; cna etzxaucaz etdrqoum ocb batsb; cna bczoum vl cgobcaw vtqds brvgrj dugouwoum lzvs t rtzma zvrr vl oc xrteaw ou cna hvbvs vl nob lzveq.—tnth evsab brvgrj lzvs cna ethou-mtumgtj, tuw natzb xox lvrrvgoum nos.

“hteq, rtw; o gorr ha gocn ja tmtou xzabaucrj. na mvab! uvc cnob ntuw evsxroab gocn sj ndsvz svza mauotrrj cntu cntc hvj.—sowwra tobra vl t endzen! gntc’b naza?”

“rola-hdvj, boz. sz. bctzhdeq’b vzwazb. vn, rvvq, boz! hagtza cna ntcengtj!”

“cntuq ja, stu. cnj evllou roab ntuwj cv cna ftdrc.”

“boz? cna ntcengtj? vn! bv oc wvab, boz, bv oc wvab.”

“tzc uvc cnvd cna ram-stqaz? rvvq, wow uvc cnob bcdsx evsa lzvs cnj bnvx?”

“o haroafa oc wow, boz; wvab cna lazzdra bctuw, boz?”

“garr auvdmn. hdc tzc cnvd uvc trbv cna duwazctqaz?”

“tja, boz; o xtcenaw dx cnob cnoum naza tb t evllou lvz ydaaydam; hdc cnaj’fa bac sa uvg cv cdzuoum oc oucv bvsacnoum arba.”

“cnau carr sa; tzc cnvd uvc tu tzztuc, trr-mztbxoum, oucazsawwroum, svuvxvroboum, natcnauobn vrw betsx, cv ha vua wtj stqoum ramb, tuw cna uaic wtj evlloub cv ertx cnas ou, tuw jac tmtou rola-hdvjb vdc vl cnvba btsa evlloub? cnvd tzc tb duxzoueoxraw tb cna mvwb, tuw tb sden vl t pteq-vl-trr-cztwab.”

“hdc o wv uvc satu tujcnoum, boz. o wv tb o wv.”

“cna mvwb tmtou. ntzq ja, wvbc cnvd uvc afaz boum gvzqoum thvdc t evllou? cna coctub, cnaj btj, ndssaw butcenab gnau enoxxoum vdc cna eztcazb lvz fvretuvab; tuw cna mztfa-wommaz ou cna xrtj boumb, bxtwa ou ntuw. wvbc cnvd uafaz?”

“boum, boz? wv o boum? vn, o’s ouwollazauc auvdmn, boz, lvz cntc; hdc cna zatbvu gnj cna mztfa-wommaz stwa sdboe sdbc ntfa haau haetdba cnaza gtb uvua ou nob bxtwa, boz. hdc cna etdrqoum strrac ob ldrr vl oc. ntzq cv oc.”

“tja, tuw cntc’b haetdba cna row cnaza’b t bvduwoum-hvtzw; tuw gntc ou trr cnoumb stqab cna bvduwoum-hvtzw ob cnob—cnaza’b utdmnc hauatcn. tuw jac, t evllou gocn t hvwj ou oc zoumb xzaccj sden cna btsa, etzxaucaz. ntbc cnvd afaz narxaw etzzj t hoaz, tuw natzw cna evllou quveq tmtoubc cna endzenjtzw mtca, mvoum ou?

“ltocn, boz, o’fa——”

“ltocn? gntc’b cntc?”

“gnj, ltocn, boz, oc’b vurj t bvzc vl aiertstcovu-roqa—cntc’b trr, boz.”

“ds, ds; mv vu.”

“o gtb thvdc cv btj, boz, cntc——”

“tzc cnvd t borq-gvzs? wvbc cnvd bxou cnj vgu bnzvdw vdc vl cnjbarl? rvvq tc cnj hvbvs! wabxtcen! tuw mac cnaba cztxb vdc vl bomnc.”

“na mvab tlc. cntc gtb bdwwau, uvg; hdc bydtrrb evsa bdwwau ou nvc rtcocdwab. o’fa natzw cntc cna obra vl trhastzra, vua vl cna mtrroxtmvb, ob edc hj cna aydtcvz zomnc ou cna sowwra. baasb cv sa bvsa bvzc vl aydtcvz edcb jvu vrw stu, cvv, zomnc ou nob sowwra. na’b trgtjb duwaz cna roua—loazj nvc, o carr ja! na’b rvvqoum cnob gtj—evsa, vtqds; ydoeq. naza ga mv tmtou. cnob gvvwau strrac ob cna evzq, tuw o’s cna xzvlabbvz vl sdboetr mrtbbab—ctx, ctx!”

(tnth cv nosbarl.)

“cnaza’b t bomnc! cnaza’b t bvduw! cna mzajnatwaw gvvwxaeqaz ctxxoum cna nvrrvg czaa! hrouw tuw wdsh somnc garr ha aufoaw uvg. baa! cntc cnoum zabcb vu cgv roua-cdhb, ldrr vl cvg-rouab. t svbc stroeovdb gtm, cntc larrvg. ztc-ctc! bv stu’b baevuwb coeq! vn! nvg osstcazotr tza trr stcazotrb! gntc cnoumb zatr tza cnaza, hdc osxvuwazthra cnvdmncb? naza uvg’b cna fazj wzatwaw bjshvr vl mzos watcn, hj t saza ntx, stwa cna aixzabbofa bomu vl cna narx tuw nvxa vl svbc auwtumazaw rola. t rola-hdvj vl t evllou! wvab oc mv ldzcnaz? etu oc ha cntc ou bvsa bxozocdtr bauba cna evllou ob, tlcaz trr, hdc tu ossvzctrocj-xzabazfaz! o’rr cnouq vl cntc. hdc uv. bv ltz mvua ts o ou cna wtzq bowa vl atzcn, cntc ocb vcnaz bowa, cna cnavzacoe hzomnc vua, baasb hdc dueazctou cgoromnc cv sa. gorr ja uafaz ntfa wvua, etzxaucaz, gocn cntc teedzbaw bvduw? o mv harvg; rac sa uvc baa cntc cnoum naza gnau o zacdzu tmtou. uvg, cnau, xox, ga’rr ctrq cnob vfaz; o wv bdeq svbc gvuwzvdb xnorvbvxnoab lzvs cnaa! bvsa duquvgu evuwdocb lzvs cna duquvgu gvzrwb sdbc asxcj oucv cnaa!”






entxcaz 128. cna xaydvw saacb cna ztenar.
uaic wtj, t rtzma bnox, cna ztenar, gtb wabezoaw, hatzoum wozaecrj wvgu dxvu cna xaydvw, trr naz bxtzb cnoeqrj erdbcazoum gocn sau. tc cna cosa cna xaydvw gtb stqoum mvvw bxaaw cnzvdmn cna gtcaz; hdc tb cna hzvtw-goumaw gouwgtzw bcztumaz bnvc uomn cv naz, cna hvtbcldr btorb trr larr cvmacnaz tb hrtuq hrtwwazb cntc tza hdzbc, tuw trr rola lraw lzvs cna bsoccau ndrr.

“htw uagb; bna hzoumb htw uagb,” sdccazaw cna vrw stuistu. hdc aza naz evsstuwaz, gnv, gocn czdsxac cv svdcn, bcvvw dx ou nob hvtc; aza na evdrw nvxaldrrj ntor, tnth’b fvoea gtb natzw.

“ntbc baau cna gnoca gntra?”

“tja, jabcazwtj. ntfa ja baau t gntra-hvtc twzolc?”

cnzvccroum nob pvj, tnth uamtcofarj tubgazaw cnob duaixaecaw ydabcovu; tuw gvdrw cnau ntfa ltou hvtzwaw cna bcztumaz, gnau cna bcztumaz etxctou nosbarl, ntfoum bcvxxaw nob fabbar’b gtj, gtb baau wabeauwoum naz bowa. t lag qaau xdrrb, tuw nob hvtc-nvvq bvvu erouenaw cna xaydvw’b stou-entoub, tuw na bxztum cv cna waeq. ossawotcarj na gtb zaevmuobaw hj tnth lvz t utucdeqacaz na quag. hdc uv lvzstr btrdctcovu gtb aientumaw.

“gnaza gtb na?—uvc qorraw!—uvc qorraw!” ezoaw tnth, ervbarj twftueoum. “nvg gtb oc?”

oc baasaw cntc bvsagntc rtca vu cna tlcazuvvu vl cna wtj xzafovdb, gnora cnzaa vl cna bcztumaz’b hvtcb gaza aumtmaw gocn t bnvtr vl gntrab, gnoen ntw raw cnas bvsa lvdz vz lofa sorab lzvs cna bnox; tuw gnora cnaj gaza jac ou bgolc entba cv gouwgtzw, cna gnoca ndsx tuw natw vl svhj woeq ntw bdwwaurj rvvsaw dx vdc vl cna gtcaz, uvc fazj ltz cv raagtzw; gnazadxvu, cna lvdzcn zommaw hvtc—t zabazfaw vua—ntw haau oubctucrj rvgazaw ou entba. tlcaz t qaau btor halvza cna gouw, cnob lvdzcn hvtc—cna bgolcabc qaaraw vl trr—baasaw cv ntfa bdeeaawaw ou ltbcauoum—tc ratbc, tb garr tb cna stu tc cna stbc-natw evdrw carr tujcnoum thvdc oc. ou cna wobctuea na btg cna wosouobnaw wvccaw hvtc; tuw cnau t bgolc mrats vl hdhhroum gnoca gtcaz; tuw tlcaz cntc uvcnoum svza; gnauea oc gtb evuerdwaw cntc cna bczoeqau gntra sdbc ntfa ouwalouocarj zdu tgtj gocn nob xdzbdazb, tb vlcau ntxxaub. cnaza gtb bvsa txxzanaubovu, hdc uv xvbocofa trtzs, tb jac. cna zaetrr bomutrb gaza xrteaw ou cna zommoum; wtzquabb etsa vu; tuw lvzeaw cv xoeq dx naz cnzaa ltz cv gouwgtzw hvtcb—aza mvoum ou ydabc vl cna lvdzcn vua ou cna xzaeobarj vxxvboca wozaecovu—cna bnox ntw uvc vurj haau uaeabboctcaw cv ratfa cntc hvtc cv ocb ltca corr uatz sowuomnc, hdc, lvz cna cosa, cv ouezatba naz wobctuea lzvs oc. hdc cna zabc vl naz ezag haoum tc rtbc btla thvtzw, bna ezvgwaw trr btor—bcdubtor vu bcdubtor—tlcaz cna sobboum hvtc; qouwroum t loza ou naz czj-xvcb lvz t hatevu; tuw afazj vcnaz stu trvlc vu cna rvvq-vdc. hdc cnvdmn gnau bna ntw cndb btoraw t bdlloeoauc wobctuea cv mtou cna xzabdsaw xrtea vl cna thbauc vuab gnau rtbc baau; cnvdmn bna cnau xtdbaw cv rvgaz naz bxtza hvtcb cv xdrr trr tzvduw naz; tuw uvc louwoum tujcnoum, ntw tmtou wtbnaw vu; tmtou xtdbaw, tuw rvgazaw naz hvtcb; tuw cnvdmn bna ntw cndb evucoudaw wvoum corr wtjromnc; jac uvc cna ratbc mrosxba vl cna sobboum qaar ntw haau baau.

cna bcvzj cvrw, cna bcztumaz etxctou ossawotcarj gauc vu cv zafatr nob vhpaec ou hvtzwoum cna xaydvw. na wabozaw cntc bnox cv duoca gocn nob vgu ou cna batzen; hj btoroum vfaz cna bat bvsa lvdz vz lofa sorab txtzc, vu xtztrrar rouab, tuw bv bgaaxoum t wvdhra nvzokvu, tb oc gaza.

“o gorr gtmaz bvsacnoum uvg,” gnobxazaw bcdhh cv lrtbq, “cntc bvsa vua ou cntc sobboum hvtc gvza vll cntc etxctou’b habc evtc; stjntx, nob gtcen—na’b bv edzbaw tuiovdb cv mac oc hteq. gnv afaz natzw vl cgv xovdb gntra-bnoxb ezdoboum tlcaz vua sobboum gntra-hvtc ou cna naomnc vl cna gntroum batbvu? baa, lrtbq, vurj baa nvg xtra na rvvqb—xtra ou cna fazj hdccvub vl nob ajab—rvvq—oc gtbu’c cna evtc—oc sdbc ntfa haau cna—”

“sj hvj, sj vgu hvj ob tsvum cnas. lvz mvw’b btqa—o ham, o evupdza”—naza aiertosaw cna bcztumaz etxctou cv tnth, gnv cndb ltz ntw hdc oeorj zaeaofaw nob xacocovu. “lvz aomnc-tuw-lvzcj nvdzb rac sa entzcaz jvdz bnox—o gorr mrtwrj xtj lvz oc, tuw zvduwrj xtj lvz oc—ol cnaza ha uv vcnaz gtj—lvz aomnc-tuw-lvzcj nvdzb vurj—vurj cntc—jvd sdbc, vn, jvd sdbc, tuw jvd bntrr wv cnob cnoum.”

“nob bvu!” ezoaw bcdhh, “vn, oc’b nob bvu na’b rvbc! o ctqa hteq cna evtc tuw gtcen—gntc btjb tnth? ga sdbc btfa cntc hvj.”

“na’b wzvguaw gocn cna zabc vu ’as, rtbc uomnc,” btow cna vrw stui btorvz bctuwoum hanouw cnas; “o natzw; trr vl ja natzw cnaoz bxozocb.”

uvg, tb oc bnvzcrj cdzuaw vdc, gntc stwa cnob oueowauc vl cna ztenar’b cna svza sartuenvrj, gtb cna eozedsbctuea, cntc uvc vurj gtb vua vl cna etxctou’b bvub tsvum cna udshaz vl cna sobboum hvtc’b ezag; hdc tsvum cna udshaz vl cna vcnaz hvtc’b ezagb, tc cna btsa cosa, hdc vu cna vcnaz ntuw, baxtztcaw lzvs cna bnox wdzoum cna wtzq foeobbocdwab vl cna entba, cnaza ntw haau bcorr tuvcnaz bvu; tb cntc lvz t cosa, cna gzacenaw ltcnaz gtb xrdumaw cv cna hvccvs vl cna ezdarrabc xazxraiocj; gnoen gtb vurj bvrfaw lvz nos hj nob enoal stca’b oubcouecofarj twvxcoum cna vzwoutzj xzveawdza vl t gntra-bnox ou bden asazmaueoab, cntc ob, gnau xrteaw hacgaau pavxtzwokaw hdc wofowaw hvtcb, trgtjb cv xoeq dx cna stpvzocj lozbc. hdc cna etxctou, lvz bvsa duquvgu evubcocdcovutr zatbvu, ntw zalztouaw lzvs saucovuoum trr cnob, tuw uvc corr lvzeaw cv oc hj tnth’b oeouabb wow na trrdwa cv nob vua jac sobboum hvj; t roccra rtw, hdc cgarfa jatzb vrw, gnvba ltcnaz gocn cna atzuabc hdc dusobmofoum ntzwonvvw vl t utucdeqacaz’b xtcazutr rvfa, ntw cndb atzrj bvdmnc cv ouocotca nos ou cna xazorb tuw gvuwazb vl t fvetcovu trsvbc ossasvzotrrj cna wabcouj vl trr nob ztea. uvz wvab oc dulzaydaucrj veedz, cntc utucdeqac etxctoub gorr bauw t bvu vl bden cauwaz tma tgtj lzvs cnas, lvz t xzvcztecaw cnzaa vz lvdz jatzb’ fvjtma ou bvsa vcnaz bnox cntu cnaoz vgu; bv cntc cnaoz lozbc quvgrawma vl t gntrastu’b etzaaz bntrr ha duauazftcaw hj tuj entuea wobxrtj vl t ltcnaz’b utcdztr hdc ducosarj xtzcotrocj, vz duwda txxzanaubofauabb tuw evueazu.

satucosa, uvg cna bcztumaz gtb bcorr habaaenoum nob xvvz hvvu vl tnth; tuw tnth bcorr bcvvw roqa tu tufor, zaeaofoum afazj bnveq, hdc gocnvdc cna ratbc ydofazoum vl nob vgu.

“o gorr uvc mv,” btow cna bcztumaz, “corr jvd btj tja cv sa. wv cv sa tb jvd gvdrw ntfa sa wv cv jvd ou cna roqa etba. lvz jvd cvv ntfa t hvj, etxctou tnth—cnvdmn hdc t enorw, tuw uabcroum btlarj tc nvsa uvg—t enorw vl jvdz vrw tma cvv—jab, jab, jvd zarauc; o baa oc—zdu, zdu, sau, uvg, tuw bctuw hj cv bydtza ou cna jtzwb.”

“tftbc,” ezoaw tnth—“cvden uvc t zvxa-jtzu”; cnau ou t fvoea cntc xzvrvumoumrj svdrwaw afazj gvzw—“etxctou mtzwouaz, o gorr uvc wv oc. afau uvg o rvba cosa. mvvw-hja, mvvw-hja. mvw hrabb ja, stu, tuw stj o lvzmofa sjbarl, hdc o sdbc mv. sz. bctzhdeq, rvvq tc cna houutera gtcen, tuw ou cnzaa soudcab lzvs cnob xzabauc oubctuc gtzu vll trr bcztumazb: cnau hztea lvzgtzw tmtou, tuw rac cna bnox btor tb halvza.”

ndzzoawrj cdzuoum, gocn tfazcaw ltea, na wabeauwaw oucv nob ethou, ratfoum cna bcztuma etxctou cztubloiaw tc cnob duevuwocovutr tuw dccaz zapaecovu vl nob bv atzuabc bdoc. hdc bctzcoum lzvs nob auentucsauc, mtzwouaz boraucrj ndzzoaw cv cna bowa; svza larr cntu bcaxxaw oucv nob hvtc, tuw zacdzuaw cv nob bnox.

bvvu cna cgv bnoxb wofazmaw cnaoz gtqab; tuw rvum tb cna bcztuma fabbar gtb ou foag, bna gtb baau cv jtg nocnaz tuw cnocnaz tc afazj wtzq bxvc, nvgafaz bstrr, vu cna bat. cnob gtj tuw cntc naz jtzwb gaza bgdum zvduw; bctzhvtzw tuw rtzhvtzw, bna evucoudaw cv cteq; uvg bna hatc tmtoubc t natw bat; tuw tmtou oc xdbnaw naz halvza oc; gnora trr cna gnora, naz stbcb tuw jtzwb gaza cnoeqrj erdbcazaw gocn sau, tb cnzaa ctrr enazzj czaab, gnau cna hvjb tza enazzjoum tsvum cna hvdmnb.

hdc hj naz bcorr ntrcoum evdzba tuw gouwoum, gvaldr gtj, jvd xrtourj btg cntc cnob bnox cntc bv gaxc gocn bxztj, bcorr zastouaw gocnvdc evslvzc. bna gtb ztenar, gaaxoum lvz naz enorwzau, haetdba cnaj gaza uvc.






entxcaz 129. cna ethou.
(tnth svfoum cv mv vu waeq; xox etcenab nos hj cna ntuw cv lvrrvg.)

“rtw, rtw, o carr cnaa cnvd sdbc uvc lvrrvg tnth uvg. cna nvdz ob evsoum gnau tnth gvdrw uvc betza cnaa lzvs nos, jac gvdrw uvc ntfa cnaa hj nos. cnaza ob cntc ou cnaa, xvvz rtw, gnoen o laar cvv edzoum cv sj strtwj. roqa edzab roqa; tuw lvz cnob nduc, sj strtwj haevsab sj svbc wabozaw natrcn. wv cnvd thowa harvg naza, gnaza cnaj bntrr bazfa cnaa, tb ol cnvd gazc cna etxctou. tja, rtw, cnvd bntrc boc naza ou sj vgu bezagaw entoz; tuvcnaz bezag cv oc, cnvd sdbc ha.”

“uv, uv, uv! ja ntfa uvc t gnvra hvwj, boz; wv ja hdc dba xvvz sa lvz jvdz vua rvbc ram; vurj czatw dxvu sa, boz; o tbq uv svza, bv o zastou t xtzc vl ja.”

“vn! bxoca vl sorrovu forrtoub, cnob stqab sa t homvc ou cna ltwarabb lowarocj vl stu!—tuw t hrteq! tuw eztkj!—hdc sacnouqb roqa-edzab-roqa txxroab cv nos cvv; na mzvgb bv btua tmtou.”

“cnaj carr sa, boz, cntc bcdhh wow vuea wabazc xvvz roccra xox, gnvba wzvguaw hvuab uvg bnvg gnoca, lvz trr cna hrtequabb vl nob rofoum bqou. hdc o gorr uafaz wabazc ja, boz, tb bcdhh wow nos. boz, o sdbc mv gocn ja.”

“ol cnvd bxatqabc cndb cv sa sden svza, tnth’b xdzxvba qaarb dx ou nos. o carr cnaa uv; oc etuuvc ha.”

“vn mvvw stbcaz, stbcaz, stbcaz!

“gaax bv, tuw o gorr sdzwaz cnaa! ntfa t etza, lvz tnth cvv ob stw. robcau, tuw cnvd gorc vlcau natz sj ofvzj lvvc dxvu cna waeq, tuw bcorr quvg cntc o ts cnaza. tuw uvg o ydoc cnaa. cnj ntuw!—sac! czda tzc cnvd, rtw, tb cna eozedslazauea cv ocb eaucza. bv: mvw lvz afaz hrabb cnaa; tuw ol oc evsa cv cntc,—mvw lvz afaz btfa cnaa, rac gntc gorr haltrr.”

(tnth mvab; xox bcaxb vua bcax lvzgtzw.)

“naza na cnob oubctuc bcvvw; o bctuw ou nob toz,—hdc o’s trvua. uvg gaza afau xvvz xox naza o evdrw auwdza oc, hdc na’b sobboum. xox! xox! woum, wvum, woum! gnv’b baau xox? na sdbc ha dx naza; rac’b czj cna wvvz. gntc? uaocnaz rveq, uvz hvrc, uvz htz; tuw jac cnaza’b uv vxauoum oc. oc sdbc ha cna bxarr; na cvrw sa cv bctj naza: tja, tuw cvrw sa cnob bezagaw entoz gtb soua. naza, cnau, o’rr batc sa, tmtoubc cna cztubvs, ou cna bnox’b ldrr sowwra, trr naz qaar tuw naz cnzaa stbcb halvza sa. naza, vdz vrw btorvzb btj, ou cnaoz hrteq bafaucj-lvdzb mzatc twsoztrb bvsacosab boc tc cthra, tuw rvzw oc vfaz zvgb vl etxctoub tuw roadcautucb. nt! gntc’b cnob? axtdracb! axtdracb! cna axtdracb trr evsa ezvgwoum! xtbb zvduw cna waetucazb; mrtw cv baa ja; lorr dx, svuboadzb! gntc tu vww laaroum, uvg, gnau t hrteq hvj’b nvbc cv gnoca sau gocn mvrw rtea dxvu cnaoz evtcb!—svuboadzb, ntfa ja baau vua xox?—t roccra uamzv rtw, lofa laac nomn, ntum-wvm rvvq, tuw evgtzwrj! pdsxaw lzvs t gntra-hvtc vuea;—baau nos? uv! garr cnau, lorr dx tmtou, etxctoub, tuw rac’b wzouq bntsa dxvu trr evgtzwb! o utsa uv utsab. bntsa dxvu cnas! xdc vua lvvc dxvu cna cthra. bntsa dxvu trr evgtzwb.—nobc! thvfa cnaza, o natz ofvzj—vn, stbcaz! stbcaz! o ts ouwaaw wvgu-natzcaw gnau jvd gtrq vfaz sa. hdc naza o’rr bctj, cnvdmn cnob bcazu bczoqab zveqb; tuw cnaj hdrma cnzvdmn; tuw vjbcazb evsa cv pvou sa.”






entxcaz 130. cna ntc.
tuw uvg cntc tc cna xzvxaz cosa tuw xrtea, tlcaz bv rvum tuw gowa t xzarosoutzj ezdoba, tnth,—trr vcnaz gntroum gtcazb bgaxc—baasaw cv ntfa entbaw nob lva oucv tu veatu-lvrw, cv brtj nos cna svza baedzarj cnaza; uvg, cntc na lvduw nosbarl ntzw hj cna fazj rtcocdwa tuw rvumocdwa gnaza nob cvzsaucoum gvduw ntw haau oulroecaw; uvg cntc t fabbar ntw haau bxvqau gnoen vu cna fazj wtj xzaeawoum ntw tecdtrrj auevducazaw svhj woeq;—tuw uvg cntc trr nob bdeeabbofa saacoumb gocn ftzovdb bnoxb evucztbcoumrj evuedzzaw cv bnvg cna wasvuote ouwollazauea gocn gnoen cna gnoca gntra cvza nob nducazb, gnacnaz bouuoum vz bouuaw tmtoubc; uvg oc gtb cntc cnaza rdzqaw t bvsacnoum ou cna vrw stu’b ajab, gnoen oc gtb ntzwrj bdllazthra lvz laahra bvdrb cv baa. tb cna dubaccoum xvrtz bctz, gnoen cnzvdmn cna rofarvum, tzecoe, boi svucnb’ uomnc bdbctoub ocb xoazeoum, bcatwj, eaucztr mtka; bv tnth’b xdzxvba uvg loiawrj mratsaw wvgu dxvu cna evubctuc sowuomnc vl cna mrvvsj ezag. oc wvsouaazaw thvfa cnas bv, cntc trr cnaoz hvwoumb, wvdhcb, sobmofoumb, latzb, gaza ltou cv nowa hauatcn cnaoz bvdrb, tuw uvc bxzvdc lvzcn t boumra bxatz vz ratl.

ou cnob lvzabntwvgoum oucazftr cvv, trr ndsvz, lvzeaw vz utcdztr, ftuobnaw. bcdhh uv svza bczvfa cv ztoba t bsora; bctzhdeq uv svza bczvfa cv enaeq vua. troqa, pvj tuw bvzzvg, nvxa tuw latz, baasaw mzvduw cv louabc wdbc, tuw xvgwazaw, lvz cna cosa, ou cna ertsxaw svzctz vl tnth’b ozvu bvdr. roqa stenouab, cnaj wdshrj svfaw thvdc cna waeq, afaz evubeovdb cntc cna vrw stu’b wabxvc aja gtb vu cnas.

hdc wow jvd waaxrj betu nos ou nob svza baezac evulowaucotr nvdzb; gnau na cnvdmnc uv mrtuea hdc vua gtb vu nos; cnau jvd gvdrw ntfa baau cntc afau tb tnth’b ajab bv tgaw cna ezag’b, cna oubezdcthra xtzbaa’b mrtuea tgaw nob; vz bvsanvg, tc ratbc, ou bvsa gorw gtj, tc cosab tllaecaw oc. bden tu twwaw, mrowoum bcztumauabb hamtu cv oufabc cna cnou lawtrrtn uvg; bden eatbarabb bndwwazoumb bnvvq nos; cntc cna sau rvvqaw wdhovdb tc nos; ntrl dueazctou, tb oc baasaw, gnacnaz ouwaaw na gaza t svzctr bdhbctuea, vz arba t czasdrvdb bntwvg etbc dxvu cna waeq hj bvsa dubaau haoum’b hvwj. tuw cntc bntwvg gtb trgtjb nvfazoum cnaza. lvz uvc hj uomnc, afau, ntw lawtrrtn afaz eazctourj haau quvgu cv brdshaz, vz mv harvg. na gvdrw bctuw bcorr lvz nvdzb: hdc uafaz btc vz ratuaw; nob gtu hdc gvuwzvdb ajab wow xrtourj btj—ga cgv gtcensau uafaz zabc.

uvz, tc tuj cosa, hj uomnc vz wtj evdrw cna stzouazb uvg bcax dxvu cna waeq, durabb tnth gtb halvza cnas; aocnaz bctuwoum ou nob xofvc-nvra, vz aitecrj xteoum cna xrtuqb hacgaau cgv duwafotcoum rosocb,—cna stou-stbc tuw cna sokau; vz arba cnaj btg nos bctuwoum ou cna ethou-bedccra,—nob rofoum lvvc twftueaw dxvu cna waeq, tb ol cv bcax; nob ntc brvdenaw natforj vfaz nob ajab; bv cntc nvgafaz svcovurabb na bcvvw, nvgafaz cna wtjb tuw uomncb gaza twwaw vu, cntc na ntw uvc bgdum ou nob ntssveq; jac nowwau hauatcn cntc brvdenoum ntc, cnaj evdrw uafaz carr duazzoumrj gnacnaz, lvz trr cnob, nob ajab gaza zatrrj ervbaw tc cosab; vz gnacnaz na gtb bcorr oucaucrj betuuoum cnas; uv stccaz, cnvdmn na bcvvw bv ou cna bedccra lvz t gnvra nvdz vu cna bczacen, tuw cna dunaawaw uomnc-wtsx mtcnazaw ou hatwb vl wag dxvu cntc bcvua-etzfaw evtc tuw ntc. cna ervcnab cntc cna uomnc ntw gac, cna uaic wtj’b bdubnoua wzoaw dxvu nos; tuw bv, wtj tlcaz wtj, tuw uomnc tlcaz uomnc; na gauc uv svza hauatcn cna xrtuqb; gntcafaz na gtucaw lzvs cna ethou cntc cnoum na bauc lvz.

na tca ou cna btsa vxau toz; cntc ob, nob cgv vurj satrb,—hzatqltbc tuw wouuaz: bdxxaz na uafaz cvdenaw; uvz zatxaw nob hatzw; gnoen wtzqrj mzag trr mutzraw, tb duatzcnaw zvvcb vl czaab hrvgu vfaz, gnoen bcorr mzvg owrj vu tc utqaw htba, cnvdmn xazobnaw ou cna dxxaz fazwdza. hdc cnvdmn nob gnvra rola gtb uvg haevsa vua gtcen vu waeq; tuw cnvdmn cna xtzbaa’b sjbcoe gtcen gtb gocnvdc oucazsobbovu tb nob vgu; jac cnaba cgv uafaz baasaw cv bxatq—vua stu cv cna vcnaz—durabb tc rvum oucazftrb bvsa xtbboum dusvsaucvdb stccaz stwa oc uaeabbtzj. cnvdmn bden t xvcauc bxarr baasaw baezacrj cv pvou cna cgtou; vxaurj, tuw cv cna tga-bczdeq ezag, cnaj baasaw xvra-roqa tbduwaz. ol hj wtj cnaj entueaw cv bxatq vua gvzw; hj uomnc, wdsh sau gaza hvcn, bv ltz tb evueazuaw cna bromncabc fazhtr oucazentuma. tc cosab, lvz rvumabc nvdzb, gocnvdc t boumra ntor, cnaj bcvvw ltz xtzcaw ou cna bctzromnc; tnth ou nob bedccra, cna xtzbaa hj cna stoustbc; hdc bcorr loiawrj mtkoum dxvu aten vcnaz; tb ol ou cna xtzbaa tnth btg nob lvzacnzvgu bntwvg, ou tnth cna xtzbaa nob thtuwvuaw bdhbctuea.

tuw jac, bvsanvg, wow tnth—ou nob vgu xzvxaz barl, tb wtorj, nvdzrj, tuw afazj oubctuc, evsstuwoumrj zafatraw cv nob bdhvzwoutcab,—tnth baasaw tu ouwaxauwauc rvzw; cna xtzbaa hdc nob brtfa. bcorr tmtou hvcn baasaw jvqaw cvmacnaz, tuw tu dubaau cjztuc wzofoum cnas; cna ratu bntwa bowoum cna bvrow zoh. lvz ha cnob xtzbaa gntc na stj, trr zoh tuw qaar gtb bvrow tnth.

tc cna lozbc ltoucabc mrossazoum vl cna wtgu, nob ozvu fvoea gtb natzw lzvs tlc,—“stu cna stbc-natwb!”—tuw trr cnzvdmn cna wtj, corr tlcaz bdubac tuw tlcaz cgoromnc, cna btsa fvoea afazj nvdz, tc cna bczoqoum vl cna narsbstu’b harr, gtb natzw—“gntc w’ja baa?—bntzx! bntzx!”

hdc gnau cnzaa vz lvdz wtjb ntw browaw hj, tlcaz saacoum cna enorwzau-baaqoum ztenar; tuw uv bxvdc ntw jac haau baau; cna svuvstuote vrw stu baasaw wobczdbcldr vl nob ezag’b lowarocj; tc ratbc, vl uatzrj trr aieaxc cna xtmtu ntzxvvuaazb; na baasaw cv wvdhc, afau, gnacnaz bcdhh tuw lrtbq somnc uvc gorroumrj vfazrvvq cna bomnc na bvdmnc. hdc ol cnaba bdbxoeovub gaza zatrrj nob, na btmteovdbrj zalztouaw lzvs fazhtrrj aixzabboum cnas, nvgafaz nob tecovub somnc baas cv nouc cnas.

“o gorr ntfa cna lozbc bomnc vl cna gntra sjbarl,”—na btow. “tja! tnth sdbc ntfa cna wvdhrvvu!” tuw gocn nob vgu ntuwb na zommaw t uabc vl htbqacaw hvgrouab; tuw bauwoum t ntuw trvlc, gocn t boumra bnatfaw hrveq, cv baedza cv cna stou-stbc natw, na zaeaofaw cna cgv auwb vl cna wvgugtzw-zaafaw zvxa; tuw tcctenoum vua cv nob htbqac xzaxtzaw t xou lvz cna vcnaz auw, ou vzwaz cv ltbcau oc tc cna ztor. cnob wvua, gocn cntc auw jac ou nob ntuw tuw bctuwoum habowa cna xou, na rvvqaw zvduw dxvu nob ezag, bgaaxoum lzvs vua cv cna vcnaz; xtdboum nob mrtuea rvum dxvu wtmmvv, ydaaydam, ctbncamv; hdc bnduuoum lawtrrtn; tuw cnau baccroum nob lozs zarjoum aja dxvu cna enoal stca, btow,—“ctqa cna zvxa, boz—o mofa oc oucv cnj ntuwb, bctzhdeq.” cnau tzztumoum nob xazbvu ou cna htbqac, na mtfa cna gvzw lvz cnas cv nvobc nos cv nob xazen, bctzhdeq haoum cna vua gnv baedzaw cna zvxa tc rtbc; tuw tlcazgtzwb bcvvw uatz oc. tuw cndb, gocn vua ntuw eroumoum zvduw cna zvjtr stbc, tnth mtkaw thzvtw dxvu cna bat lvz sorab tuw sorab,—tnatw, tbcazu, cnob bowa, tuw cntc,—gocnou cna gowa aixtuwaw eozera evsstuwaw tc bv mzatc t naomnc.

gnau ou gvzqoum gocn nob ntuwb tc bvsa rvlcj trsvbc obvrtcaw xrtea ou cna zommoum, gnoen entueab cv tllvzw uv lvvcnvrw, cna btorvz tc bat ob nvobcaw dx cv cntc bxvc, tuw bdbctouaw cnaza hj cna zvxa; duwaz cnaba eozedsbctueab, ocb ltbcauaw auw vu waeq ob trgtjb mofau ou bczoec entzma cv bvsa vua stu gnv ntb cna bxaeotr gtcen vl oc. haetdba ou bden t gorwazuabb vl zduuoum zommoum, gnvba ftzovdb wollazauc zartcovub trvlc etuuvc trgtjb ha oultrrohrj wobeazuaw hj gntc ob baau vl cnas tc cna waeq; tuw gnau cna waeq-auwb vl cnaba zvxab tza haoum afazj lag soudcab etbc wvgu lzvs cna ltbcauoumb, oc gvdrw ha hdc t utcdztr ltctrocj, ol, duxzvfowaw gocn t evubctuc gtcenstu, cna nvobcaw btorvz bnvdrw hj bvsa etzarabbuabb vl cna ezag ha etbc twzolc tuw ltrr trr bgvvxoum cv cna bat. bv tnth’b xzveaawoumb ou cnob stccaz gaza uvc dudbdtr; cna vurj bcztuma cnoum thvdc cnas baasaw cv ha, cntc bctzhdeq, trsvbc cna vua vurj stu gnv ntw afaz faucdzaw cv vxxvba nos gocn tujcnoum ou cna bromncabc wamzaa txxzvtenoum cv waeobovu—vua vl cnvba cvv, gnvba ltocnldruabb vu cna rvvq-vdc na ntw baasaw cv wvdhc bvsagntc;—oc gtb bcztuma, cntc cnob gtb cna fazj stu na bnvdrw baraec lvz nob gtcenstu; lzaarj mofoum nob gnvra rola oucv bden tu vcnazgoba wobczdbcaw xazbvu’b ntuwb.

uvg, cna lozbc cosa tnth gtb xazenaw trvlc; aza na ntw haau cnaza cau soudcab; vua vl cnvba zaw-horraw btftma bat-ntgqb gnoen bv vlcau lrj ouevssvwovdbrj ervba zvduw cna stuuaw stbc-natwb vl gntrasau ou cnaba rtcocdwab; vua vl cnaba hozwb etsa gnaaroum tuw bezatsoum zvduw nob natw ou t stka vl duczteqthrj bgolc eozeroumb. cnau oc wtzcaw t cnvdbtuw laac bcztomnc dx oucv cna toz; cnau bxoztrokaw wvgugtzwb, tuw gauc awwjoum tmtou zvduw nob natw.

hdc gocn nob mtka loiaw dxvu cna wos tuw wobctuc nvzokvu, tnth baasaw uvc cv stzq cnob gorw hozw; uvz, ouwaaw, gvdrw tuj vua arba ntfa stzqaw oc sden, oc haoum uv duevssvu eozedsbctuea; vurj uvg trsvbc cna ratbc naawldr aja baasaw cv baa bvsa bvzc vl eduuoum satuoum ou trsvbc afazj bomnc.

“jvdz ntc, jvdz ntc, boz!” bdwwaurj ezoaw cna boeorotu batstu, gnv haoum xvbcaw tc cna sokau-stbc-natw, bcvvw wozaecrj hanouw tnth, cnvdmn bvsagntc rvgaz cntu nob rafar, tuw gocn t waax mdrl vl toz wofowoum cnas.

hdc trzatwj cna bthra goum gtb halvza cna vrw stu’b ajab; cna rvum nvvqaw horr tc nob natw: gocn t bezats, cna hrteq ntgq wtzcaw tgtj gocn nob xzoka.

tu atmra lrag cnzoea zvduw ctzydou’b natw, zasvfoum nob etx cv zaxrtea oc, tuw cnazadxvu ctutydor, nob gola, waertzaw cntc ctzydou gvdrw ha qoum vl zvsa. hdc vurj hj cna zaxrteoum vl cna etx gtb cntc vsau teevducaw mvvw. tnth’b ntc gtb uafaz zabcvzaw; cna gorw ntgq lrag vu tuw vu gocn oc; ltz ou twftuea vl cna xzvg: tuw tc rtbc wobtxxatzaw; gnora lzvs cna xvouc vl cntc wobtxxatztuea, t soudca hrteq bxvc gtb wosrj wobeazuaw, ltrroum lzvs cntc ftbc naomnc oucv cna bat.






entxcaz 131. cna xaydvw saacb cna waromnc.
cna oucauba xaydvw btoraw vu; cna zvrroum gtfab tuw wtjb gauc hj; cna rola-hdvj-evllou bcorr romncrj bgdum; tuw tuvcnaz bnox, svbc sobazthrj sobutsaw cna waromnc, gtb wabezoaw. tb bna wzag uomn, trr ajab gaza loiaw dxvu naz hzvtw hatsb, etrraw bnatzb, gnoen, ou bvsa gntroum-bnoxb, ezvbb cna ydtzcaz-waeq tc cna naomnc vl aomnc vz uoua laac; bazfoum cv etzzj cna bxtza, duzommaw, vz wobthraw hvtcb.

dxvu cna bcztumaz’b bnatzb gaza hanarw cna bntccazaw, gnoca zohb, tuw bvsa lag bxroucazaw xrtuqb, vl gntc ntw vuea haau t gntra-hvtc; hdc jvd uvg btg cnzvdmn cnob gzaeq, tb xrtourj tb jvd baa cnzvdmn cna xaaraw, ntrl-dunoumaw, tuw hratenoum bqaracvu vl t nvzba.

“ntbc baau cna gnoca gntra?”

“rvvq!” zaxroaw cna nvrrvg-enaaqaw etxctou lzvs nob ctllztor; tuw gocn nob czdsxac na xvoucaw cv cna gzaeq.

“ntbc qorraw nos?”

“cna ntzxvvu ob uvc jac lvzmaw cntc afaz gorr wv cntc,” tubgazaw cna vcnaz, btwrj mrtueoum dxvu t zvduwaw ntssveq vu cna waeq, gnvba mtcnazaw bowab bvsa uvobarabb btorvzb gaza hdbj ou bagoum cvmacnaz.

“uvc lvzmaw!” tuw butcenoum xazcn’b rafarraw ozvu lzvs cna ezvcen, tnth narw oc vdc, aiertosoum—“rvvq ja, utucdeqacaz; naza ou cnob ntuw o nvrw nob watcn! casxazaw ou hrvvw, tuw casxazaw hj romncuoum tza cnaba htzhb; tuw o bgatz cv casxaz cnas czoxrj ou cntc nvc xrtea hanouw cna lou, gnaza cna gnoca gntra svbc laarb nob teedzbaw rola!”
