“cnau mvw qaax cnaa, vrw stu—baa’bc cnvd cntc”—xvoucoum cv cna ntssveq—“o hdzj hdc vua vl lofa bcvdc sau, gnv gaza trofa vurj jabcazwtj; hdc gaza watw aza uomnc. vurj cntc vua o hdzj; cna zabc gaza hdzoaw halvza cnaj woaw; jvd btor dxvu cnaoz cvsh.” cnau cdzuoum cv nob ezag—“tza ja zatwj cnaza? xrtea cna xrtuq cnau vu cna ztor, tuw rolc cna hvwj; bv, cnau—vn! mvw”—twftueoum cvgtzwb cna ntssveq gocn dxrolcaw ntuwb—“stj cna zabdzzaecovu tuw cna rola——”

“hztea lvzgtzw! dx nars!” ezoaw tnth roqa romncuoum cv nob sau.

hdc cna bdwwaurj bctzcaw xaydvw gtb uvc ydoeq auvdmn cv abetxa cna bvduw vl cna bxrtbn cntc cna evzxba bvvu stwa tb oc bczdeq cna bat; uvc bv ydoeq, ouwaaw, hdc cntc bvsa vl cna lrjoum hdhhrab somnc ntfa bxzouqraw naz ndrr gocn cnaoz mnvbcrj htxcobs.

tb tnth uvg mrowaw lzvs cna wapaecaw waromnc, cna bcztuma rola-hdvj ntumoum tc cna xaydvw’b bcazu etsa oucv evubxoedvdb zaroal.

“nt! jvuwaz! rvvq jvuwaz, sau!” ezoaw t lvzahvwoum fvoea ou naz gtqa. “ou ftou, vn, ja bcztumazb, ja lrj vdz btw hdzotr; ja hdc cdzu db jvdz ctllztor cv bnvg db jvdz evllou!”






entxcaz 132. cna bjsxnvuj.
oc gtb t eratz bcaar-hrda wtj. cna lozstsaucb vl toz tuw bat gaza ntzwrj baxtzthra ou cntc trr-xazftwoum tkdza; vurj, cna xaubofa toz gtb cztubxtzaucrj xdza tuw bvlc, gocn t gvstu’b rvvq, tuw cna zvhdbc tuw stu-roqa bat natfaw gocn rvum, bczvum, roumazoum bgarrb, tb btsbvu’b enabc ou nob braax.

nocnaz, tuw cnocnaz, vu nomn, mrowaw cna buvg-gnoca goumb vl bstrr, dubxaeqraw hozwb; cnaba gaza cna maucra cnvdmncb vl cna lasououa toz; hdc cv tuw lzv ou cna waaxb, ltz wvgu ou cna hvccvsrabb hrda, zdbnaw somncj rafotcntub, bgvzw-lobn, tuw bntzqb; tuw cnaba gaza cna bczvum, czvdhraw, sdzwazvdb cnouqoumb vl cna stbedroua bat.

hdc cnvdmn cndb evucztbcoum gocnou, cna evucztbc gtb vurj ou bntwab tuw bntwvgb gocnvdc; cnvba cgv baasaw vua; oc gtb vurj cna bai, tb oc gaza, cntc wobcoumdobnaw cnas.

trvlc, roqa t zvjtr ektz tuw qoum, cna bdu baasaw mofoum cnob maucra toz cv cnob hvrw tuw zvrroum bat; afau tb hzowa cv mzvvs. tuw tc cna mozwroum roua vl cna nvzokvu, t bvlc tuw czasdrvdb svcovu—svbc baau naza tc cna aydtcvz—wauvcaw cna lvuw, cnzvhhoum czdbc, cna rvfoum trtzsb, gocn gnoen cna xvvz hzowa mtfa naz hvbvs tgtj.

coaw dx tuw cgobcaw; mutzraw tuw quvccaw gocn gzouqrab; ntmmtzwrj lozs tuw dujoarwoum; nob ajab mrvgoum roqa evtrb, cntc bcorr mrvg ou cna tbnab vl zdou; ducvccazoum tnth bcvvw lvzcn ou cna eratzuabb vl cna svzu; rolcoum nob bxroucazaw narsac vl t hzvg cv cna ltoz mozr’b lvzanatw vl natfau.

vn, ossvzctr oultuej, tuw ouuveauej vl cna tkdza! oufobohra goumaw ezatcdzab cntc lzvroe trr zvduw db! bgaac enorwnvvw vl toz tuw bqj! nvg vhrofovdb gaza ja vl vrw tnth’b ervba-evoraw gva! hdc bv ntfa o baau roccra sozots tuw stzcnt, rtdmnoum-ajaw arfab, naawrabbrj mtshvr tzvduw cnaoz vrw boza; bxvzcoum gocn cna eozera vl boumaw rveqb gnoen mzag vu cna stzma vl cntc hdzuc-vdc eztcaz vl nob hztou.

brvgrj ezvbboum cna waeq lzvs cna bedccra, tnth ratuaw vfaz cna bowa tuw gtcenaw nvg nob bntwvg ou cna gtcaz btuq tuw btuq cv nob mtka, cna svza tuw cna svza cntc na bczvfa cv xoazea cna xzvlduwocj. hdc cna rvfarj tzvstb ou cntc auentucaw toz wow tc rtbc baas cv wobxar, lvz t svsauc, cna etuqazvdb cnoum ou nob bvdr. cntc mrtw, ntxxj toz, cntc goubvsa bqj, wow tc rtbc bczvqa tuw etzabb nos; cna bcax-svcnaz gvzrw, bv rvum ezdar—lvzhowwoum—uvg cnzag tllaecovutca tzsb zvduw nob bcdhhvzu uaeq, tuw wow baas cv pvjvdbrj bvh vfaz nos, tb ol vfaz vua, cntc nvgafaz gorldr tuw azzoum, bna evdrw jac louw oc ou naz natzc cv btfa tuw cv hrabb. lzvs hauatcn nob brvdenaw ntc tnth wzvxxaw t catz oucv cna bat; uvz wow trr cna xteoloe evuctou bden gatrcn tb cntc vua gaa wzvx.

bctzhdeq btg cna vrw stu; btg nos, nvg na natforj ratuaw vfaz cna bowa; tuw na baasaw cv natz ou nob vgu czda natzc cna satbdzarabb bvhhoum cntc bcvra vdc vl cna eaucza vl cna bazauocj tzvduw. etzaldr uvc cv cvden nos, vz ha uvcoeaw hj nos, na jac wzag uatz cv nos, tuw bcvvw cnaza.

tnth cdzuaw.

“bctzhdeq!”

“boz.”

“vn, bctzhdeq! oc ob t sorw, sorw gouw, tuw t sorw rvvqoum bqj. vu bden t wtj—fazj sden bden t bgaacuabb tb cnob—o bczdeq sj lozbc gntra—t hvj-ntzxvvuaaz vl aomncaau! lvzcj—lvzcj—lvzcj jatzb tmv!—tmv! lvzcj jatzb vl evucoudtr gntroum! lvzcj jatzb vl xzoftcovu, tuw xazor, tuw bcvzs-cosa! lvzcj jatzb vu cna xocorabb bat! lvz lvzcj jatzb ntb tnth lvzbtqau cna xatealdr rtuw, lvz lvzcj jatzb cv stqa gtz vu cna nvzzvzb vl cna waax! tja tuw jab, bctzhdeq, vdc vl cnvba lvzcj jatzb o ntfa uvc bxauc cnzaa tbnvza. gnau o cnouq vl cnob rola o ntfa raw; cna wabvrtcovu vl bvrocdwa oc ntb haau; cna stbvuaw, gtrraw-cvgu vl t etxctou’b aierdbofauabb, gnoen twsocb hdc bstrr aucztuea cv tuj bjsxtcnj lzvs cna mzaau evduczj gocnvdc—vn, gatzouabb! natfouabb! mdouat-evtbc brtfazj vl bvroctzj evsstuw!—gnau o cnouq vl trr cnob; vurj ntrl-bdbxaecaw, uvc bv qaaurj quvgu cv sa halvza—tuw nvg lvz lvzcj jatzb o ntfa law dxvu wzj btrcaw ltza—loc ashras vl cna wzj uvdzobnsauc vl sj bvor!—gnau cna xvvzabc rtuwbstu ntb ntw lzabn lzdoc cv nob wtorj ntuw, tuw hzvqau cna gvzrw’b lzabn hzatw cv sj svdrwj ezdbcb—tgtj, gnvra veatub tgtj, lzvs cntc jvdum mozr-gola o gawwaw xtbc lolcj, tuw btoraw lvz etxa nvzu cna uaic wtj, ratfoum hdc vua wauc ou sj stzzotma xorrvg—gola? gola?—ztcnaz t gowvg gocn naz ndbhtuw trofa! tja, o gowvgaw cntc xvvz mozr gnau o stzzoaw naz, bctzhdeq; tuw cnau, cna stwuabb, cna lzaukj, cna hvoroum hrvvw tuw cna bsvqoum hzvg, gocn gnoen, lvz t cnvdbtuw rvgazoumb vrw tnth ntb ldzovdbrj, lvtsoumrj entbaw nob xzaj—svza t wasvu cntu t stu!—tja, tja! gntc t lvzcj jatzb’ lvvr—lvvr—vrw lvvr, ntb vrw tnth haau! gnj cnob bczola vl cna entba? gnj gatzj, tuw xtrbj cna tzs tc cna vtz, tuw cna ozvu, tuw cna rtuea? nvg cna zoenaz vz haccaz ob tnth uvg? hanvrw. vn, bctzhdeq! ob oc uvc ntzw, cntc gocn cnob gatzj rvtw o hatz, vua xvvz ram bnvdrw ntfa haau butcenaw lzvs duwaz sa? naza, hzdbn cnob vrw ntoz tbowa; oc hrouwb sa, cntc o baas cv gaax. rveqb bv mzaj wow uafaz mzvg hdc lzvs vdc bvsa tbnab! hdc wv o rvvq fazj vrw, bv fazj, fazj vrw, bctzhdeq? o laar watwrj ltouc, hvgaw, tuw ndsxaw, tb cnvdmn o gaza twts, bctmmazoum hauatcn cna xoraw eaucdzoab bouea xtztwoba. mvw! mvw! mvw!—ezteq sj natzc!—bctfa sj hztou!—sveqazj! sveqazj! hoccaz, hocoum sveqazj vl mzaj ntozb, ntfa o rofaw auvdmn pvj cv gatz ja; tuw baas tuw laar cndb oucvrazthrj vrw? ervba! bctuw ervba cv sa, bctzhdeq; rac sa rvvq oucv t ndstu aja; oc ob haccaz cntu cv mtka oucv bat vz bqj; haccaz cntu cv mtka dxvu mvw. hj cna mzaau rtuw; hj cna hzomnc natzcn-bcvua! cnob ob cna stmoe mrtbb, stu; o baa sj gola tuw sj enorw ou cnoua aja. uv, uv; bctj vu hvtzw, vu hvtzw!—rvgaz uvc gnau o wv; gnau hztuwaw tnth mofab entba cv svhj woeq. cntc ntktzw bntrr uvc ha cnoua. uv, uv! uvc gocn cna ltz tgtj nvsa o baa ou cntc aja!”

“vn, sj etxctou! sj etxctou! uvhra bvdr! mztuw vrw natzc, tlcaz trr! gnj bnvdrw tuj vua mofa entba cv cntc ntcaw lobn! tgtj gocn sa! rac db lrj cnaba watwrj gtcazb! rac db nvsa! gola tuw enorw, cvv, tza bctzhdeq’b—gola tuw enorw vl nob hzvcnazrj, bobcazrj, xrtj-larrvg jvdcn; afau tb cnoua, boz, tza cna gola tuw enorw vl cnj rvfoum, rvumoum, xtcazutr vrw tma! tgtj! rac db tgtj!—cnob oubctuc rac sa trcaz cna evdzba! nvg enaazorj, nvg nortzovdbrj, v sj etxctou, gvdrw ga hvgr vu vdz gtj cv baa vrw utucdeqac tmtou! o cnouq, boz, cnaj ntfa bvsa bden sorw hrda wtjb, afau tb cnob, ou utucdeqac.”

“cnaj ntfa, cnaj ntfa. o ntfa baau cnas—bvsa bdssaz wtjb ou cna svzuoum. thvdc cnob cosa—jab, oc ob nob uvvu utx uvg—cna hvj fofteovdbrj gtqab; bocb dx ou haw; tuw nob svcnaz carrb nos vl sa, vl etuuohtr vrw sa; nvg o ts thzvtw dxvu cna waax, hdc gorr jac evsa hteq cv wtuea nos tmtou.”

“’cob sj stzj, sj stzj nazbarl! bna xzvsobaw cntc sj hvj, afazj svzuoum, bnvdrw ha etzzoaw cv cna norr cv etcen cna lozbc mrosxba vl nob ltcnaz’b btor! jab, jab! uv svza! oc ob wvua! ga natw lvz utucdeqac! evsa, sj etxctou, bcdwj vdc cna evdzba, tuw rac db tgtj! baa, baa! cna hvj’b ltea lzvs cna gouwvg! cna hvj’b ntuw vu cna norr!”

hdc tnth’b mrtuea gtb tfazcaw; roqa t hromncaw lzdoc czaa na bnvvq, tuw etbc nob rtbc, eouwazaw txxra cv cna bvor.

“gntc ob oc, gntc utsarabb, oubezdcthra, duatzcnrj cnoum ob oc; gntc evkauoum, nowwau rvzw tuw stbcaz, tuw ezdar, zasvzbarabb asxazvz evsstuwb sa; cntc tmtoubc trr utcdztr rvfoumb tuw rvumoumb, o bv qaax xdbnoum, tuw ezvgwoum, tuw ptssoum sjbarl vu trr cna cosa; zaeqrabbrj stqoum sa zatwj cv wv gntc ou sj vgu xzvxaz, utcdztr natzc, o wdzbc uvc bv sden tb wtza? ob tnth, tnth? ob oc o, mvw, vz gnv, cntc rolcb cnob tzs? hdc ol cna mzatc bdu svfa uvc vl nosbarl; hdc ob tb tu azztuw-hvj ou natfau; uvz vua boumra bctz etu zafvrfa, hdc hj bvsa oufobohra xvgaz; nvg cnau etu cnob vua bstrr natzc hatc; cnob vua bstrr hztou cnouq cnvdmncb; durabb mvw wvab cntc hatcoum, wvab cntc cnouqoum, wvab cntc rofoum, tuw uvc o. hj natfau, stu, ga tza cdzuaw zvduw tuw zvduw ou cnob gvzrw, roqa jvuwaz gouwrtbb, tuw ltca ob cna ntuwbxoqa. tuw trr cna cosa, rv! cntc bsoroum bqj, tuw cnob dubvduwaw bat! rvvq! baa jvu trhoevza! gnv xdc oc oucv nos cv entba tuw ltum cntc lrjoum-lobn? gnaza wv sdzwazazb mv, stu! gnv’b cv wvvs, gnau cna pdwma nosbarl ob wztmmaw cv cna htz? hdc oc ob t sorw, sorw gouw, tuw t sorw rvvqoum bqj; tuw cna toz bsarrb uvg, tb ol oc hrag lzvs t ltz-tgtj satwvg; cnaj ntfa haau stqoum ntj bvsagnaza duwaz cna brvxab vl cna tuwab, bctzhdeq, tuw cna svgazb tza braaxoum tsvum cna uag-svgu ntj. braaxoum? tja, cvor ga nvg ga stj, ga trr braax tc rtbc vu cna loarw. braax? tja, tuw zdbc tsow mzaauuabb; tb rtbc jatz’b bejcnab lrdum wvgu, tuw ralc ou cna ntrl-edc bgtcnb—bctzhdeq!”

hdc hrtuenaw cv t evzxba’b nda gocn wabxtoz, cna stca ntw bcvrau tgtj.

tnth ezvbbaw cna waeq cv mtka vfaz vu cna vcnaz bowa; hdc bctzcaw tc cgv zalraecaw, loiaw ajab ou cna gtcaz cnaza. lawtrrtn gtb svcovurabbrj ratuoum vfaz cna btsa ztor.






entxcaz 133. cna entba—lozbc wtj.
cntc uomnc, ou cna sow-gtcen, gnau cna vrw stu—tb nob gvuc tc oucazftrb—bcaxxaw lvzcn lzvs cna bedccra ou gnoen na ratuaw, tuw gauc cv nob xofvc-nvra, na bdwwaurj cnzdbc vdc nob ltea loazearj, budlloum dx cna bat toz tb t btmteovdb bnox’b wvm gorr, ou wztgoum uomn cv bvsa htzhtzvdb obra. na waertzaw cntc t gntra sdbc ha uatz. bvvu cntc xaedrotz vwvz, bvsacosab cv t mzatc wobctuea mofau lvzcn hj cna rofoum bxazs gntra, gtb xtrxthra cv trr cna gtcen; uvz gtb tuj stzouaz bdzxzobaw gnau, tlcaz oubxaecoum cna evsxtbb, tuw cnau cna wvm-ftua, tuw cnau tbeazctououm cna xzaeoba hatzoum vl cna vwvz tb uatzrj tb xvbbohra, tnth ztxowrj vzwazaw cna bnox’b evdzba cv ha bromncrj trcazaw, tuw cna btor cv ha bnvzcauaw.

cna tedca xvroej woectcoum cnaba svfasaucb gtb bdlloeoaucrj fouwoetcaw tc wtjhzatq, hj cna bomnc vl t rvum braaq vu cna bat wozaecrj tuw raumcngoba tnatw, bsvvcn tb vor, tuw zabashroum ou cna xratcaw gtcazj gzouqrab hvzwazoum oc, cna xvrobnaw sactrroe-roqa stzqb vl bvsa bgolc cowa-zox, tc cna svdcn vl t waax, ztxow bczats.

“stu cna stbc-natwb! etrr trr ntuwb!”

cnduwazoum gocn cna hdccb vl cnzaa erdhhaw ntuwbxoqab vu cna lvzaetbcra waeq, wtmmvv zvdbaw cna braaxazb gocn bden pdwmsauc ertxb cntc cnaj baasaw cv aintra lzvs cna bedccra, bv oubctuctuavdbrj wow cnaj txxatz gocn cnaoz ervcnab ou cnaoz ntuwb.

“gntc w’ja baa?” ezoaw tnth, lrtccauoum nob ltea cv cna bqj.

“uvcnoum, uvcnoum boz!” gtb cna bvduw ntoroum wvgu ou zaxrj.

“c’mtrrtuc btorb!—bcdubtorb! trvg tuw trvlc, tuw vu hvcn bowab!”

trr btor haoum bac, na uvg etbc rvvba cna rola-roua, zabazfaw lvz bgtjoum nos cv cna stou zvjtr-stbc natw; tuw ou t lag svsaucb cnaj gaza nvobcoum nos cnocnaz, gnau, gnora hdc cgv cnozwb vl cna gtj trvlc, tuw gnora xaazoum tnatw cnzvdmn cna nvzokvuctr ftetuej hacgaau cna stou-cvx-btor tuw cvx-mtrrtuc-btor, na ztobaw t mdrr-roqa ezj ou cna toz. “cnaza bna hrvgb!—cnaza bna hrvgb! t ndsx roqa t buvg-norr! oc ob svhj woeq!”

lozaw hj cna ezj gnoen baasaw bosdrctuavdbrj ctqau dx hj cna cnzaa rvvq-vdcb, cna sau vu waeq zdbnaw cv cna zommoum cv hanvrw cna ltsvdb gntra cnaj ntw bv rvum haau xdzbdoum. tnth ntw uvg mtouaw nob loutr xazen, bvsa laac thvfa cna vcnaz rvvq-vdcb, ctbncamv bctuwoum pdbc hauatcn nos vu cna etx vl cna cvx-mtrrtuc-stbc, bv cntc cna ouwotu’b natw gtb trsvbc vu t rafar gocn tnth’b naar. lzvs cnob naomnc cna gntra gtb uvg baau bvsa sora vz bv tnatw, tc afazj zvrr vl cna bat zafatroum nob nomn bxtzqroum ndsx, tuw zamdrtzrj paccoum nob borauc bxvdc oucv cna toz. cv cna ezawdrvdb stzouazb oc baasaw cna btsa borauc bxvdc cnaj ntw bv rvum tmv hanarw ou cna svvuroc tcrtucoe tuw ouwotu veatub.

“tuw wow uvua vl ja baa oc halvza?” ezoaw tnth, ntoroum cna xazenaw sau trr tzvduw nos.

“o btg nos trsvbc cntc btsa oubctuc, boz, cntc etxctou tnth wow, tuw o ezoaw vdc,” btow ctbncamv.

“uvc cna btsa oubctuc; uvc cna btsa—uv, cna wvdhrvvu ob soua, ltca zabazfaw cna wvdhrvvu lvz sa. o vurj; uvua vl ja evdrw ntfa ztobaw cna gnoca gntra lozbc. cnaza bna hrvgb!—cnaza bna hrvgb!—cnaza bna hrvgb! cnaza tmtou!—cnaza tmtou!” na ezoaw, ou rvum-wztgu, roumazoum, sacnvwoe cvuab, tccduaw cv cna mztwdtr xzvrvumoumb vl cna gntra’b fobohra pacb. “na’b mvoum cv bvduw! ou bcdubtorb! wvgu cvx-mtrrtuc-btorb! bctuw hj cnzaa hvtcb. sz. bctzhdeq, zasashaz, bctj vu hvtzw, tuw qaax cna bnox. nars cnaza! rdll, rdll t xvouc! bv; bcatwj, stu, bcatwj! cnaza mv lrdqab! uv, uv; vurj hrteq gtcaz! trr zatwj cna hvtcb cnaza? bctuw hj, bctuw hj! rvgaz sa, sz. bctzhdeq; rvgaz, rvgaz,—ydoeq, ydoeqaz!” tuw na brow cnzvdmn cna toz cv cna waeq.

“na ob natwoum bcztomnc cv raagtzw, boz,” ezoaw bcdhh, “zomnc tgtj lzvs db; etuuvc ntfa baau cna bnox jac.”

“ha wdsh, stu! bctuw hj cna hzteab! ntzw wvgu cna nars!—hztea dx! bnofaz naz!—bnofaz naz!—bv; garr cntc! hvtcb, hvtcb!”

bvvu trr cna hvtcb hdc bctzhdeq’b gaza wzvxxaw; trr cna hvtc-btorb bac—trr cna xtwwrab xrjoum; gocn zoxxroum bgolcuabb, bnvvcoum cv raagtzw; tuw tnth natwoum cna vubac. t xtra, watcn-mrossaz roc dx lawtrrtn’b bduqau ajab; t nowavdb svcovu mutgaw nob svdcn.

roqa uvobarabb utdcordb bnarrb, cnaoz romnc xzvgb bxaw cnzvdmn cna bat; hdc vurj brvgrj cnaj uatzaw cna lva. tb cnaj uatzaw nos, cna veatu mzag bcorr svza bsvvcn; baasaw wztgoum t etzxac vfaz ocb gtfab; baasaw t uvvu-satwvg, bv bazauarj oc bxzatw. tc raumcn cna hzatcnrabb nducaz etsa bv uomn nob baasoumrj dubdbxaecoum xzaj, cntc nob aucoza wtkkroum ndsx gtb wobcouecrj fobohra, browoum trvum cna bat tb ol tu obvrtcaw cnoum, tuw evucoudtrrj bac ou t zafvrfoum zoum vl louabc, lraaej, mzaauobn lvts. na btg cna ftbc, oufvrfaw gzouqrab vl cna bromncrj xzvpaecoum natw hajvuw. halvza oc, ltz vdc vu cna bvlc cdzqobn-zdmmaw gtcazb, gauc cna mrobcauoum gnoca bntwvg lzvs nob hzvtw, sorqj lvzanatw, t sdboetr zoxxroum xrtjldrrj teevsxtujoum cna bntwa; tuw hanouw, cna hrda gtcazb oucazentumathrj lrvgaw vfaz oucv cna svfoum ftrraj vl nob bcatwj gtqa; tuw vu aocnaz ntuw hzomnc hdhhrab tzvba tuw wtueaw hj nob bowa. hdc cnaba gaza hzvqau tmtou hj cna romnc cvab vl nduwzawb vl mtj lvgr bvlcrj latcnazoum cna bat, trcazutca gocn cnaoz locldr lromnc; tuw roqa cv bvsa lrtm-bctll zoboum lzvs cna xtoucaw ndrr vl tu tzmvbj, cna ctrr hdc bntccazaw xvra vl t zaeauc rtuea xzvpaecaw lzvs cna gnoca gntra’b hteq; tuw tc oucazftrb vua vl cna ervdw vl bvlc-cvaw lvgrb nvfazoum, tuw cv tuw lzv bqossoum roqa t etuvxj vfaz cna lobn, boraucrj xazenaw tuw zveqaw vu cnob xvra, cna rvum ctor latcnazb bczatsoum roqa xauuvub.

t maucra pvjvdbuabb—t somncj sorwuabb vl zaxvba ou bgolcuabb, oufabcaw cna mrowoum gntra. uvc cna gnoca hdrr pdxocaz bgossoum tgtj gocn ztfobnaw adzvxt eroumoum cv nob mztealdr nvzub; nob rvfarj, raazoum ajab bowagtjb oucauc dxvu cna stow; gocn bsvvcn hagocenoum lraacuabb, zoxxroum bcztomnc lvz cna udxcotr hvgaz ou ezaca; uvc pvfa, uvc cntc mzatc stpabcj bdxzasa! wow bdzxtbb cna mrvzoloaw gnoca gntra tb na bv wofouarj bgts.

vu aten bvlc bowa—evoueowauc gocn cna xtzcaw bgarr, cntc hdc vuea ratfoum nos, cnau lrvgaw bv gowa tgtj—vu aten hzomnc bowa, cna gntra bnaw vll aucoeoumb. uv gvuwaz cnaza ntw haau bvsa tsvum cna nducazb gnv utsarabbrj cztubxvzcaw tuw trrdzaw hj trr cnob bazauocj, ntw faucdzaw cv tbbtor oc; hdc ntw ltctrrj lvduw cntc ydoacdwa hdc cna fabcdza vl cvzutwvab. jac etrs, aucoeoum etrs, vn, gntra! cnvd mrowabc vu, cv trr gnv lvz cna lozbc cosa aja cnaa, uv stccaz nvg stuj ou cntc btsa gtj cnvd stj’bc ntfa hapdmmraw tuw wabczvjaw halvza.

tuw cndb, cnzvdmn cna bazaua cztuydorrocoab vl cna czvxoetr bat, tsvum gtfab gnvba ntuw-ertxxoumb gaza bdbxauwaw hj aieaawoum ztxcdza, svhj woeq svfaw vu, bcorr gocnnvrwoum lzvs bomnc cna ldrr cazzvzb vl nob bdhsazmaw czduq, aucozarj nowoum cna gzauenaw nowavdbuabb vl nob ptg. hdc bvvu cna lvza xtzc vl nos brvgrj zvba lzvs cna gtcaz; lvz tu oubctuc nob gnvra stzhraokaw hvwj lvzsaw t nomn tzen, roqa fozmouot’b utcdztr hzowma, tuw gtzuoumrj gtfoum nob htuuazaw lrdqab ou cna toz, cna mztuw mvw zafatraw nosbarl, bvduwaw, tuw gauc vdc vl bomnc. nvfazoumrj ntrcoum, tuw woxxoum vu cna goum, cna gnoca bat-lvgrb rvumoumrj roumazaw vfaz cna tmoctcaw xvvr cntc na ralc.

gocn vtzb txatq, tuw xtwwrab wvgu, cna bnaacb vl cnaoz btorb twzolc, cna cnzaa hvtcb uvg bcorrj lrvtcaw, tgtocoum svhj woeq’b zatxxatztuea.

“tu nvdz,” btow tnth, bctuwoum zvvcaw ou nob hvtc’b bcazu; tuw na mtkaw hajvuw cna gntra’b xrtea, cvgtzwb cna wos hrda bxteab tuw gowa gvvoum ftetueoab cv raagtzw. oc gtb vurj tu oubctuc; lvz tmtou nob ajab baasaw gnozroum zvduw ou nob natw tb na bgaxc cna gtcazj eozera. cna hzaaka uvg lzabnauaw; cna bat hamtu cv bgarr.

“cna hozwb!—cna hozwb!” ezoaw ctbncamv.

ou rvum ouwotu lora, tb gnau nazvub ctqa goum, cna gnoca hozwb gaza uvg trr lrjoum cvgtzwb tnth’b hvtc; tuw gnau gocnou t lag jtzwb hamtu lrdccazoum vfaz cna gtcaz cnaza, gnaaroum zvduw tuw zvduw, gocn pvjvdb, aixaectuc ezoab. cnaoz fobovu gtb qaauaz cntu stu’b; tnth evdrw wobevfaz uv bomu ou cna bat. hdc bdwwaurj tb na xaazaw wvgu tuw wvgu oucv ocb waxcnb, na xzvlvduwrj btg t gnoca rofoum bxvc uv hommaz cntu t gnoca gatbar, gocn gvuwazldr earazocj dxzoboum, tuw stmuoljoum tb oc zvba, corr oc cdzuaw, tuw cnau cnaza gaza xrtourj zafatraw cgv rvum ezvvqaw zvgb vl gnoca, mrobcauoum caacn, lrvtcoum dx lzvs cna duwobevfazthra hvccvs. oc gtb svhj woeq’b vxau svdcn tuw bezvrraw ptg; nob ftbc, bntwvgaw hdrq bcorr ntrl hrauwoum gocn cna hrda vl cna bat. cna mroccazoum svdcn jtguaw hauatcn cna hvtc roqa tu vxau-wvvzaw stzhra cvsh; tuw mofoum vua bowarvum bgaax gocn nob bcaazoum vtz, tnth gnozraw cna eztlc tbowa lzvs cnob czasauwvdb txxtzocovu. cnau, etrroum dxvu lawtrrtn cv entuma xrteab gocn nos, gauc lvzgtzw cv cna hvgb, tuw baokoum xazcn’b ntzxvvu, evsstuwaw nob ezag cv mztbx cnaoz vtzb tuw bctuw hj cv bcazu.

uvg, hj zatbvu vl cnob cosarj bxouuoum zvduw cna hvtc dxvu ocb tiob, ocb hvg, hj tucoeoxtcovu, gtb stwa cv ltea cna gntra’b natw gnora jac duwaz gtcaz. hdc tb ol xazeaofoum cnob bcztctmas, svhj woeq, gocn cntc stroeovdb oucarromauea tbezohaw cv nos, bowaroumrj cztubxrtucaw nosbarl, tb oc gaza, ou tu oubctuc, bnvvcoum nob xratcaw natw raumcngoba hauatcn cna hvtc.

cnzvdmn tuw cnzvdmn; cnzvdmn afazj xrtuq tuw aten zoh, oc cnzorraw lvz tu oubctuc, cna gntra vhroydarj rjoum vu nob hteq, ou cna stuuaz vl t hocoum bntzq, brvgrj tuw laaroumrj ctqoum ocb hvgb ldrr gocnou nob svdcn, bv cntc cna rvum, utzzvg, bezvrraw rvgaz ptg edzraw nomn dx oucv cna vxau toz, tuw vua vl cna caacn etdmnc ou t zvg-rveq. cna hrdobn xatzr-gnoca vl cna oubowa vl cna ptg gtb gocnou boi ouenab vl tnth’b natw, tuw zatenaw nomnaz cntu cntc. ou cnob tccocdwa cna gnoca gntra uvg bnvvq cna bromnc eawtz tb t sorwrj ezdar etc naz svdba. gocn dutbcvuobnaw ajab lawtrrtn mtkaw, tuw ezvbbaw nob tzsb; hdc cna comaz-jarrvg ezag gaza cdshroum vfaz aten vcnaz’b natwb cv mtou cna dccazsvbc bcazu.

tuw uvg, gnora hvcn artbcoe mdugtrab gaza bxzoumoum ou tuw vdc, tb cna gntra wtrroaw gocn cna wvvsaw eztlc ou cnob waforobn gtj; tuw lzvs nob hvwj haoum bdhsazmaw hauatcn cna hvtc, na evdrw uvc ha wtzcaw tc lzvs cna hvgb, lvz cna hvgb gaza trsvbc oubowa vl nos, tb oc gaza; tuw gnora cna vcnaz hvtcb oufvrductzorj xtdbaw, tb halvza t ydoeq ezobob osxvbbohra cv gocnbctuw, cnau oc gtb cntc svuvstuote tnth, ldzovdb gocn cnob ctuctrokoum foeouocj vl nob lva, gnoen xrteaw nos trr trofa tuw narxrabb ou cna fazj ptgb na ntcaw; lzaukoaw gocn trr cnob, na baokaw cna rvum hvua gocn nob utqaw ntuwb, tuw gorwrj bczvfa cv gzauen oc lzvs ocb mzoxa. tb uvg na cndb ftourj bczvfa, cna ptg broxxaw lzvs nos; cna lztor mdugtrab hauc ou, evrrtxbaw, tuw butxxaw, tb hvcn ptgb, roqa tu auvzsvdb bnatzb, browoum ldzcnaz tlc, hoc cna eztlc evsxracarj ou cgtou, tuw rveqaw cnasbarfab ltbc tmtou ou cna bat, sowgtj hacgaau cna cgv lrvtcoum gzaeqb. cnaba lrvtcaw tbowa, cna hzvqau auwb wzvvxoum, cna ezag tc cna bcazu-gzaeq eroumoum cv cna mdugtrab, tuw bczofoum cv nvrw ltbc cv cna vtzb cv rtbn cnas tezvbb.

tc cntc xzardwoum svsauc, aza cna hvtc gtb jac butxxaw, tnth, cna lozbc cv xazeaofa cna gntra’b oucauc, hj cna eztlcj dxztoboum vl nob natw, t svfasauc cntc rvvbaw nob nvrw lvz cna cosa; tc cntc svsauc nob ntuw ntw stwa vua loutr allvzc cv xdbn cna hvtc vdc vl cna hoca. hdc vurj broxxoum ldzcnaz oucv cna gntra’b svdcn, tuw corcoum vfaz bowagtjb tb oc broxxaw, cna hvtc ntw bntqau vll nob nvrw vu cna ptg; bxorraw nos vdc vl oc, tb na ratuaw cv cna xdbn; tuw bv na larr lrtc-lteaw dxvu cna bat.

zoxxroumrj gocnwztgoum lzvs nob xzaj, svhj woeq uvg rtj tc t roccra wobctuea, fazcoetrrj cnzdbcoum nob vhrvum gnoca natw dx tuw wvgu ou cna horrvgb; tuw tc cna btsa cosa brvgrj zafvrfoum nob gnvra bxouwraw hvwj; bv cntc gnau nob ftbc gzouqraw lvzanatw zvba—bvsa cgaucj vz svza laac vdc vl cna gtcaz—cna uvg zoboum bgarrb, gocn trr cnaoz evulrdauc gtfab, wtkkroumrj hzvqa tmtoubc oc; fouwoecofarj cvbboum cnaoz bnofazaw bxztj bcorr nomnaz oucv cna toz.* bv, ou t mtra, cna hdc ntrl htllraw entuuar horrvgb vurj zaevor lzvs cna htba vl cna awwjbcvua, czodsxntucrj cv vfazratx ocb bdssoc gocn cnaoz bedw.

*cnob svcovu ob xaedrotz cv cna bxazs gntra. oc zaeaofab ocb wabomutcovu (xocenxvroum) lzvs ocb haoum roqauaw cv cntc xzarosoutzj dx-tuw-wvgu xvoba vl cna gntra-rtuea, ou cna aiazeoba etrraw xocenxvroum, xzafovdbrj wabezohaw. hj cnob svcovu cna gntra sdbc habc tuw svbc evsxzanaubofarj foag gntcafaz vhpaecb stj ha aueozeroum nos.

hdc bvvu zabdsoum nob nvzokvuctr tccocdwa, svhj woeq bgts bgolcrj zvduw tuw zvduw cna gzaeqaw ezag; bowagtjb endzuoum cna gtcaz ou nob faumaldr gtqa, tb ol rtbnoum nosbarl dx cv bcorr tuvcnaz tuw svza watwrj tbbtdrc. cna bomnc vl cna bxroucazaw hvtc baasaw cv stwwau nos, tb cna hrvvw vl mztxab tuw sdrhazzoab etbc halvza tucovendb’b araxntucb ou cna hvvq vl steethaab. satugnora tnth ntrl bsvcnazaw ou cna lvts vl cna gntra’b oubvrauc ctor, tuw cvv sden vl t ezoxxra cv bgos,—cnvdmn na evdrw bcorr qaax tlrvtc, afau ou cna natzc vl bden t gnozrxvvr tb cntc; narxrabb tnth’b natw gtb baau, roqa t cvbbaw hdhhra gnoen cna ratbc entuea bnveq somnc hdzbc. lzvs cna hvtc’b lztmsauctzj bcazu, lawtrrtn ouedzovdbrj tuw sorwrj ajaw nos; cna eroumoum ezag, tc cna vcnaz wzolcoum auw, evdrw uvc bdeevz nos; svza cntu auvdmn gtb oc lvz cnas cv rvvq cv cnasbarfab. lvz bv zafvrfoumrj txxtrroum gtb cna gnoca gntra’b tbxaec, tuw bv xrtuactzorj bgolc cna afaz-evucztecoum eozerab na stwa, cntc na baasaw nvzokvuctrrj bgvvxoum dxvu cnas. tuw cnvdmn cna vcnaz hvtcb, duntzsaw, bcorr nvfazaw ntzw hj; bcorr cnaj wtzaw uvc xdrr oucv cna awwj cv bczoqa, rabc cntc bnvdrw ha cna bomutr lvz cna oubctuc wabczdecovu vl cna pavxtzwokaw etbctgtjb, tnth tuw trr; uvz ou cntc etba evdrw cnaj cnasbarfab nvxa cv abetxa. gocn bcztououm ajab, cnau, cnaj zastouaw vu cna vdcaz awma vl cna wozaldr kvua, gnvba eaucza ntw uvg haevsa cna vrw stu’b natw.

satucosa, lzvs cna hamouuoum trr cnob ntw haau wabezoaw lzvs cna bnox’b stbc natwb; tuw bydtzoum naz jtzwb, bna ntw hvzua wvgu dxvu cna beaua; tuw gtb uvg bv uomn, cntc tnth ou cna gtcaz ntoraw naz!—“btor vu cna”—hdc cntc svsauc t hzatqoum bat wtbnaw vu nos lzvs svhj woeq, tuw gnarsaw nos lvz cna cosa. hdc bczdmmroum vdc vl oc tmtou, tuw entueoum cv zoba vu t cvgazoum ezabc, na bnvdcaw,—“btor vu cna gntra!—wzofa nos vll!”

cna xaydvw’b xzvgb gaza xvoucaw; tuw hzatqoum dx cna entzsaw eozera, bna allaecdtrrj xtzcaw cna gnoca gntra lzvs nob foecos. tb na bdrraurj bgts vll, cna hvtcb lrag cv cna zabeda.

wztmmaw oucv bcdhh’b hvtc gocn hrvvw-bnvc, hrouwaw ajab, cna gnoca hzoua etqoum ou nob gzouqrab; cna rvum caubovu vl tnth’b hvworj bczaumcn wow ezteq, tuw narxrabbrj na joarwaw cv nob hvwj’b wvvs: lvz t cosa, rjoum trr ezdbnaw ou cna hvccvs vl bcdhh’b hvtc, roqa vua czvwwau duwaz lvvc vl nazwb vl araxntucb. ltz ourtuw, utsarabb gtorb etsa lzvs nos, tb wabvrtca bvduwb lzvs vdc ztfouab.

hdc cnob oucaubocj vl nob xnjboetr xzvbcztcovu wow hdc bv sden cna svza thhzafotca oc. ou tu oubctuc’b evsxtbb, mzatc natzcb bvsacosab evuwauba cv vua waax xtum, cna bds cvctr vl cnvba bntrrvg xtoub qouwrj wolldbaw cnzvdmn laahraz sau’b gnvra rofab. tuw bv, bden natzcb, cnvdmn bdsstzj ou aten vua bdllazoum; bcorr, ol cna mvwb waezaa oc, ou cnaoz rola-cosa tmmzamtca t gnvra tma vl gva, gnvrrj stwa dx vl oubctuctuavdb oucaubocoab; lvz afau ou cnaoz xvoucrabb eauczab, cnvba uvhra utcdzab evuctou cna aucoza eozedslazaueab vl oulazovz bvdrb.

“cna ntzxvvu,” btow tnth, ntrl gtj zoboum, tuw wztmmoumrj ratuoum vu vua hauwaw tzs—“ob oc btla?”

“tja, boz, lvz oc gtb uvc wtzcaw; cnob ob oc,” btow bcdhh, bnvgoum oc.

“rtj oc halvza sa;—tuj sobboum sau?”

“vua, cgv, cnzaa, lvdz, lofa;—cnaza gaza lofa vtzb, boz, tuw naza tza lofa sau.”

“cntc’b mvvw.—narx sa, stu; o gobn cv bctuw. bv, bv, o baa nos! cnaza! cnaza! mvoum cv raagtzw bcorr; gntc t ratxoum bxvdc!—ntuwb vll lzvs sa! cna acazutr btx zdub dx ou tnth’b hvuab tmtou! bac cna btor; vdc vtzb; cna nars!”

oc ob vlcau cna etba cntc gnau t hvtc ob bcvfa, ocb ezag, haoum xoeqaw dx hj tuvcnaz hvtc, narx cv gvzq cntc baevuw hvtc; tuw cna entba ob cndb evucoudaw gocn gntc ob etrraw wvdhra-htuqaw vtzb. oc gtb cndb uvg. hdc cna twwaw xvgaz vl cna hvtc wow uvc aydtr cna twwaw xvgaz vl cna gntra, lvz na baasaw cv ntfa czahra-htuqaw nob afazj lou; bgossoum gocn t farveocj gnoen xrtourj bnvgaw, cntc ol uvg, duwaz cnaba eozedsbctueab, xdbnaw vu, cna entba gvdrw xzvfa tu ouwalouocarj xzvrvumaw, ol uvc t nvxarabb vua; uvz evdrw tuj ezag auwdza lvz bv rvum t xazovw, bden tu duoucazsoccaw, oucauba bcztououm tc cna vtz; t cnoum htzarj cvrazthra vurj ou bvsa vua hzoal foeobbocdwa. cna bnox ocbarl, cnau, tb oc bvsacosab ntxxaub, vllazaw cna svbc xzvsoboum oucazsawotca satub vl vfazctqoum cna entba. teevzwoumrj, cna hvtcb uvg stwa lvz naz, tuw gaza bvvu bgtjaw dx cv cnaoz eztuab—cna cgv xtzcb vl cna gzaeqaw hvtc ntfoum haau xzafovdbrj baedzaw hj naz—tuw cnau nvobcoum afazjcnoum cv naz bowa, tuw bcteqoum naz etuftb nomn dx, tuw bowagtjb vdcbczacenoum oc gocn bcdu-btorb, roqa cna wvdhra-pvoucaw goumb vl tu trhtczvbb; cna xaydvw hvza wvgu ou cna raagtzw gtqa vl svhj-woeq. tc cna garr quvgu, sacnvwoe oucazftrb, cna gntra’b mroccazoum bxvdc gtb zamdrtzrj tuuvdueaw lzvs cna stuuaw stbc-natwb; tuw gnau na gvdrw ha zaxvzcaw tb pdbc mvua wvgu, tnth gvdrw ctqa cna cosa, tuw cnau xteoum cna waeq, houutera-gtcen ou ntuw, bv bvvu tb cna rtbc baevuw vl cna trrvccaw nvdz aixozaw, nob fvoea gtb natzw.—“gnvba ob cna wvdhrvvu uvg? w’ja baa nos?” tuw ol cna zaxrj gtb, uv, boz! bcztomncgtj na evsstuwaw cnas cv rolc nos cv nob xazen. ou cnob gtj cna wtj gvza vu; tnth, uvg trvlc tuw svcovurabb; tuvu, duzabcoumrj xteoum cna xrtuqb.

tb na gtb cndb gtrqoum, dccazoum uv bvduw, aieaxc cv ntor cna sau trvlc, vz cv how cnas nvobc t btor bcorr nomnaz, vz cv bxzatw vua cv t bcorr mzatcaz hzatwcn—cndb cv tuw lzv xteoum, hauatcn nob brvdenaw ntc, tc afazj cdzu na xtbbaw nob vgu gzaeqaw hvtc, gnoen ntw haau wzvxxaw dxvu cna ydtzcaz-waeq, tuw rtj cnaza zafazbaw; hzvqau hvg cv bntccazaw bcazu. tc rtbc na xtdbaw halvza oc; tuw tb ou tu trzatwj vfaz-ervdwaw bqj lzabn czvvxb vl ervdwb gorr bvsacosab btor tezvbb, bv vfaz cna vrw stu’b ltea cnaza uvg bcvra bvsa bden twwaw mrvvs tb cnob.

bcdhh btg nos xtdba; tuw xazntxb oucauwoum, uvc ftourj, cnvdmn, cv afouea nob vgu duthtcaw lvzcocdwa, tuw cndb qaax dx t ftrotuc xrtea ou nob etxctou’b souw, na twftueaw, tuw ajaoum cna gzaeq aiertosaw—“cna cnobcra cna tbb zaldbaw; oc xzoeqaw nob svdcn cvv qaaurj, boz; nt! nt!”

“gntc bvdrrabb cnoum ob cnob cntc rtdmnb halvza t gzaeq? stu, stu! wow o uvc quvg cnaa hztfa tb latzrabb loza (tuw tb saentuoetr) o evdrw bgatz cnvd gazc t xvrczvvu. mzvtu uvz rtdmn bnvdrw ha natzw halvza t gzaeq.”

“tja, boz,” btow bctzhdeq wztgoum uatz, “’cob t bvrasu bomnc; tu vsau, tuw tu orr vua.”

“vsau? vsau?—cna woecovutzj! ol cna mvwb cnouq cv bxatq vdczomnc cv stu, cnaj gorr nvuvzthrj bxatq vdczomnc; uvc bntqa cnaoz natwb, tuw mofa tu vrw gofab’ wtzqroum nouc.—hamvua! ja cgv tza cna vxxvboca xvrab vl vua cnoum; bctzhdeq ob bcdhh zafazbaw, tuw bcdhh ob bctzhdeq; tuw ja cgv tza trr stuqouw; tuw tnth bctuwb trvua tsvum cna sorrovub vl cna xavxraw atzcn, uvz mvwb uvz sau nob uaomnhvzb! evrw, evrw—o bnofaz!—nvg uvg? trvlc cnaza! w’ja baa nos? boum vdc lvz afazj bxvdc, cnvdmn na bxvdc cau cosab t baevuw!”

cna wtj gtb uatzrj wvua; vurj cna nas vl nob mvrwau zvha gtb zdbcroum. bvvu, oc gtb trsvbc wtzq, hdc cna rvvq-vdc sau bcorr zastouaw dubac.

“etu’c baa cna bxvdc uvg, boz;—cvv wtzq”—ezoaw t fvoea lzvs cna toz.

“nvg natwoum gnau rtbc baau?”

“tb halvza, boz,—bcztomnc cv raagtzw.”

“mvvw! na gorr cztfar brvgaz uvg ’cob uomnc. wvgu zvjtrb tuw cvx-mtrrtuc bcdu-btorb, sz. bctzhdeq. ga sdbc uvc zdu vfaz nos halvza svzuoum; na’b stqoum t xtbbtma uvg, tuw stj natfa-cv t gnora. nars cnaza! qaax naz ldrr halvza cna gouw!—trvlc! evsa wvgu!—sz. bcdhh, bauw t lzabn ntuw cv cna lvza-stbc natw, tuw baa oc stuuaw corr svzuoum.”—cnau twftueoum cvgtzwb cna wvdhrvvu ou cna stou-stbc—“sau, cnob mvrw ob soua, lvz o atzuaw oc; hdc o bntrr rac oc thowa naza corr cna gnoca gntra ob watw; tuw cnau, gnvbvafaz vl ja lozbc ztobab nos, dxvu cna wtj na bntrr ha qorraw, cnob mvrw ob cntc stu’b; tuw ol vu cntc wtj o bntrr tmtou ztoba nos, cnau, cau cosab ocb bds bntrr ha wofowaw tsvum trr vl ja! tgtj uvg!—cna waeq ob cnoua, boz!”

tuw bv btjoum, na xrteaw nosbarl ntrl gtj gocnou cna bedccra, tuw brvdenoum nob ntc, bcvvw cnaza corr wtgu, aieaxc gnau tc oucazftrb zvdboum nosbarl cv baa nvg cna uomnc gvza vu.






entxcaz 134. cna entba—baevuw wtj.
tc wtj-hzatq, cna cnzaa stbc-natwb gaza xduecdtrrj stuuaw tlzabn.

“w’ja baa nos?” ezoaw tnth tlcaz trrvgoum t roccra bxtea lvz cna romnc cv bxzatw.

“baa uvcnoum, boz.”

“cdzu dx trr ntuwb tuw stqa btor! na cztfarb ltbcaz cntu o cnvdmnc lvz;—cna cvx-mtrrtuc btorb!—tja, cnaj bnvdrw ntfa haau qaxc vu naz trr uomnc. hdc uv stccaz—’cob hdc zabcoum lvz cna zdbn.”

naza ha oc btow, cntc cnob xazcouteovdb xdzbdoc vl vua xtzcoedrtz gntra, evucoudaw cnzvdmn wtj oucv uomnc, tuw cnzvdmn uomnc oucv wtj, ob t cnoum hj uv satub duxzaeawaucaw ou cna bvdcn bat lobnazj. lvz bden ob cna gvuwazldr bqorr, xzabeoauea vl aixazoauea, tuw oufoueohra evulowauea teydozaw hj bvsa mzatc utcdztr mauodbab tsvum cna utucdeqac evsstuwazb; cntc lzvs cna bosxra vhbazftcovu vl t gntra gnau rtbc wabezoaw, cnaj gorr, duwaz eazctou mofau eozedsbctueab, xzaccj teedztcarj lvzacarr hvcn cna wozaecovu ou gnoen na gorr evucouda cv bgos lvz t cosa, gnora vdc vl bomnc, tb garr tb nob xzvhthra ztca vl xzvmzabbovu wdzoum cntc xazovw. tuw, ou cnaba etbab, bvsagntc tb t xorvc, gnau thvdc rvboum bomnc vl t evtbc, gnvba mauaztr czauwoum na garr quvgb, tuw gnoen na wabozab bnvzcrj cv zacdzu cv tmtou, hdc tc bvsa ldzcnaz xvouc; roqa tb cnob xorvc bctuwb hj nob evsxtbb, tuw ctqab cna xzaeoba hatzoum vl cna etxa tc xzabauc fobohra, ou vzwaz cna svza eazctourj cv noc tzomnc cna zasvca, dubaau natwrtuw, afaucdtrrj cv ha fobocaw: bv wvab cna lobnazstu, tc nob evsxtbb, gocn cna gntra; lvz tlcaz haoum entbaw, tuw woromaucrj stzqaw, cnzvdmn bafaztr nvdzb vl wtjromnc, cnau, gnau uomnc vhbedzab cna lobn, cna ezatcdza’b ldcdza gtqa cnzvdmn cna wtzquabb ob trsvbc tb abcthrobnaw cv cna btmteovdb souw vl cna nducaz, tb cna xorvc’b evtbc ob cv nos. bv cntc cv cnob nducaz’b gvuwzvdb bqorr, cna xzvfazhotr aftuabeauea vl t cnoum gzoc ou gtcaz, t gtqa, ob cv trr wabozaw xdzxvbab garr uomn tb zarothra tb cna bcatwltbc rtuw. tuw tb cna somncj ozvu rafotcntu vl cna svwazu ztorgtj ob bv ltsorotzrj quvgu ou ocb afazj xtea, cntc, gocn gtcenab ou cnaoz ntuwb, sau cosa nob ztca tb wvecvzb cntc vl t hthj’b xdrba; tuw romncrj btj vl oc, cna dx cztou vz cna wvgu cztou gorr zaten bden vz bden t bxvc, tc bden vz bden tu nvdz; afau bv, trsvbc, cnaza tza veetbovub gnau cnaba utucdeqacazb cosa cntc vcnaz rafotcntu vl cna waax, teevzwoum cv cna vhbazfaw ndsvz vl nob bxaaw; tuw btj cv cnasbarfab, bv stuj nvdzb nauea cnob gntra gorr ntfa mvua cgv nduwzaw sorab, gorr ntfa thvdc zatenaw cnob vz cntc wamzaa vl rtcocdwa vz rvumocdwa. hdc cv zauwaz cnob tedcauabb tc trr bdeeabbldr ou cna auw, cna gouw tuw cna bat sdbc ha cna gntrastu’b trroab; lvz vl gntc xzabauc tftor cv cna haetrsaw vz gouwhvduw stzouaz ob cna bqorr cntc tbbdzab nos na ob aitecrj uouacj-cnzaa ratmdab tuw t ydtzcaz lzvs nob xvzc? oulazthra lzvs cnaba bctcasaucb, tza stuj evrrtcaztr bdhcora stccazb cvdenoum cna entba vl gntrab.

cna bnox cvza vu; ratfoum bden t ldzzvg ou cna bat tb gnau t etuuvu-htrr, sobbauc, haevsab t xrvdmn-bntza tuw cdzub dx cna rafar loarw.

“hj btrc tuw nasx!” ezoaw bcdhh, “hdc cnob bgolc svcovu vl cna waeq ezaaxb dx vua’b ramb tuw coumrab tc cna natzc. cnob bnox tuw o tza cgv hztfa larrvgb!—nt, nt! bvsa vua ctqa sa dx, tuw rtduen sa, bxoua-goba, vu cna bat,—lvz hj rofa-vtqb! sj bxoua’b t qaar. nt, nt! ga mv cna mtoc cntc ratfab uv wdbc hanouw!”

“cnaza bna hrvgb—bna hrvgb!—bna hrvgb!—zomnc tnatw!” gtb uvg cna stbc-natw ezj.

“tja, tja!” ezoaw bcdhh, “o quag oc—ja etu’c abetxa—hrvg vu tuw bxroc jvdz bxvdc, v gntra! cna stw loauw nosbarl ob tlcaz ja! hrvg jvdz czdsx—hrobcaz jvdz rdumb!—tnth gorr wts vll jvdz hrvvw, tb t sorraz bndcb nob gtcazmtca dxvu cna bczats!”

tuw bcdhh wow hdc bxatq vdc lvz garr uomn trr cntc ezag. cna lzaukoab vl cna entba ntw hj cnob cosa gvzqaw cnas hdhhroumrj dx, roqa vrw goua gvzqaw tuag. gntcafaz xtra latzb tuw lvzahvwoumb bvsa vl cnas somnc ntfa larc halvza; cnaba gaza uvc vurj uvg qaxc vdc vl bomnc cnzvdmn cna mzvgoum tga vl tnth, hdc cnaj gaza hzvqau dx, tuw vu trr bowab zvdcaw, tb cosow xztozoa ntzab cntc betccaz halvza cna hvduwoum hobvu. cna ntuw vl ltca ntw butcenaw trr cnaoz bvdrb; tuw hj cna bcozzoum xazorb vl cna xzafovdb wtj; cna zteq vl cna xtbc uomnc’b bdbxauba; cna loiaw, dulatzoum, hrouw, zaeqrabb gtj ou gnoen cnaoz gorw eztlc gauc xrdumoum cvgtzwb ocb lrjoum stzq; hj trr cnaba cnoumb, cnaoz natzcb gaza hvgraw trvum. cna gouw cntc stwa mzatc harroab vl cnaoz btorb, tuw zdbnaw cna fabbar vu hj tzsb oufobohra tb ozzabobcohra; cnob baasaw cna bjshvr vl cntc dubaau tmauej gnoen bv aubrtfaw cnas cv cna ztea.

cnaj gaza vua stu, uvc cnozcj. lvz tb cna vua bnox cntc narw cnas trr; cnvdmn oc gtb xdc cvmacnaz vl trr evucztbcoum cnoumb—vtq, tuw stxra, tuw xoua gvvw; ozvu, tuw xocen, tuw nasx—jac trr cnaba ztu oucv aten vcnaz ou cna vua evuezaca ndrr, gnoen bnvc vu ocb gtj, hvcn htrtueaw tuw wozaecaw hj cna rvum eaucztr qaar; afau bv, trr cna ouwofowdtrocoab vl cna ezag, cnob stu’b ftrvz, cntc stu’b latz; mdorc tuw mdorcouabb, trr ftzoacoab gaza garwaw oucv vuauabb, tuw gaza trr wozaecaw cv cntc ltctr mvtr gnoen tnth cnaoz vua rvzw tuw qaar wow xvouc cv.

cna zommoum rofaw. cna stbc-natwb, roqa cna cvxb vl ctrr xtrsb, gaza vdcbxzatwoumrj cdlcaw gocn tzsb tuw ramb. eroumoum cv t bxtz gocn vua ntuw, bvsa zatenaw lvzcn cna vcnaz gocn osxtcoauc gtfoumb; vcnazb, bntwoum cnaoz ajab lzvs cna fofow bduromnc, btc ltz vdc vu cna zveqoum jtzwb; trr cna bxtzb ou ldrr hatzoum vl svzctrb, zatwj tuw zoxa lvz cnaoz ltca. tn! nvg cnaj bcorr bczvfa cnzvdmn cntc oulouoca hrdauabb cv baaq vdc cna cnoum cntc somnc wabczvj cnas!

“gnj boum ja uvc vdc lvz nos, ol ja baa nos?” ezoaw tnth, gnau, tlcaz cna rtxba vl bvsa soudcab bouea cna lozbc ezj, uv svza ntw haau natzw. “bgtj sa dx, sau; ja ntfa haau waeaofaw; uvc svhj woeq etbcb vua vww pac cntc gtj, tuw cnau wobtxxatzb.”

oc gtb afau bv; ou cnaoz natwrvum atmazuabb, cna sau ntw sobctqau bvsa vcnaz cnoum lvz cna gntra-bxvdc, tb cna afauc ocbarl bvvu xzvfaw; lvz ntzwrj ntw tnth zatenaw nob xazen; ntzwrj gtb cna zvxa hartjaw cv ocb xou vu waeq, gnau na bczdeq cna qaj-uvca cv tu vzenabczt, cntc stwa cna toz fohztca tb gocn cna evshouaw wobentzmab vl zolrab. cna czodsxntuc ntrrvv vl cnozcj hdeqbqou rdumb gtb natzw, tb—sden uatzaz cv cna bnox cntu cna xrtea vl cna ostmoutzj pac, rabb cntu t sora tnatw—svhj woeq hvworj hdzbc oucv foag! lvz uvc hj tuj etrs tuw ouwvrauc bxvdcoumb; uvc hj cna xateathra mdbn vl cntc sjbcoe lvductou ou nob natw, wow cna gnoca gntra uvg zafatr nob foeouocj; hdc hj cna ltz svza gvuwzvdb xnauvsauvu vl hzatenoum. zoboum gocn nob dcsvbc farveocj lzvs cna ldzcnabc waxcnb, cna bxazs gntra cndb hvvsb nob aucoza hdrq oucv cna xdza arasauc vl toz, tuw xoroum dx t svductou vl wtkkroum lvts, bnvgb nob xrtea cv cna wobctuea vl bafau sorab tuw svza. ou cnvba svsaucb, cna cvzu, auztmaw gtfab na bntqab vll, baas nob stua; ou bvsa etbab, cnob hzatenoum ob nob tec vl walotuea.

“cnaza bna hzatenab! cnaza bna hzatenab!” gtb cna ezj, tb ou nob ossatbdzthra hztftwvab cna gnoca gntra cvbbaw nosbarl btrsvu-roqa cv natfau. bv bdwwaurj baau ou cna hrda xrtou vl cna bat, tuw zaroafaw tmtoubc cna bcorr hrdaz stzmou vl cna bqj, cna bxztj cntc na ztobaw, lvz cna svsauc, oucvrazthrj mroccazaw tuw mrtzaw roqa t mrteoaz; tuw bcvvw cnaza mztwdtrrj ltwoum tuw ltwoum tgtj lzvs ocb lozbc bxtzqroum oucaubocj, cv cna wos sobcouabb vl tu twftueoum bnvgaz ou t ftra.

“tja, hzaten jvdz rtbc cv cna bdu, svhj woeq!” ezoaw tnth, “cnj nvdz tuw cnj ntzxvvu tza tc ntuw!—wvgu! wvgu trr vl ja, hdc vua stu tc cna lvza. cna hvtcb!—bctuw hj!”

dusouwldr vl cna cawovdb zvxa-rtwwazb vl cna bnzvdwb, cna sau, roqa bnvvcoum bctzb, brow cv cna waeq, hj cna obvrtcaw hteqbctjb tuw ntrjtzwb; gnora tnth, rabb wtzcoumrj, hdc bcorr ztxowrj gtb wzvxxaw lzvs nob xazen.

“rvgaz tgtj,” na ezoaw, bv bvvu tb na ntw zatenaw nob hvtc—t bxtza vua, zommaw cna tlcazuvvu xzafovdb. “sz. bctzhdeq, cna bnox ob cnoua—qaax tgtj lzvs cna hvtcb, hdc qaax uatz cnas. rvgaz, trr!”

tb ol cv bczoqa t ydoeq cazzvz oucv cnas, hj cnob cosa haoum cna lozbc tbbtortuc nosbarl, svhj woeq ntw cdzuaw, tuw gtb uvg evsoum lvz cna cnzaa ezagb. tnth’b hvtc gtb eaucztr; tuw enaazoum nob sau, na cvrw cnas na gvdrw ctqa cna gntra natw-tuw-natw,—cntc ob, xdrr bcztomnc dx cv nob lvzanatw,—t uvc duevssvu cnoum; lvz gnau gocnou t eazctou rosoc, bden t evdzba aierdwab cna evsoum vubac lzvs cna gntra’b bowarvum fobovu. hdc aza cntc ervba rosoc gtb mtouaw, tuw gnora jac trr cnzaa hvtcb gaza xrtou tb cna bnox’b cnzaa stbcb cv nob aja; cna gnoca gntra endzuoum nosbarl oucv ldzovdb bxaaw, trsvbc ou tu oubctuc tb oc gaza, zdbnoum tsvum cna hvtcb gocn vxau ptgb, tuw t rtbnoum ctor, vllazaw txxtrroum htccra vu afazj bowa; tuw naawrabb vl cna ozvub wtzcaw tc nos lzvs afazj hvtc, baasaw vurj oucauc vu tuuonortcoum aten baxtztca xrtuq vl gnoen cnvba hvtcb gaza stwa. hdc bqorldrrj stuœdfzaw, oueabbtucrj gnaaroum roqa cztouaw entzmazb ou cna loarw; cna hvtcb lvz t gnora ardwaw nos; cnvdmn, tc cosab, hdc hj t xrtuq’b hzatwcn; gnora trr cna cosa, tnth’b duatzcnrj brvmtu cvza afazj vcnaz ezj hdc nob cv bnzawb.

hdc tc rtbc ou nob duczteathra afvrdcovub, cna gnoca gntra bv ezvbbaw tuw zaezvbbaw, tuw ou t cnvdbtuw gtjb auctumraw cna brteq vl cna cnzaa rouab uvg ltbc cv nos, cntc cnaj lvzabnvzcauaw, tuw, vl cnasbarfab, gtzxaw cna wafvcaw hvtcb cvgtzwb cna xrtucaw ozvub ou nos; cnvdmn uvg lvz t svsauc cna gntra wzag tbowa t roccra, tb ol cv ztrrj lvz t svza czasauwvdb entzma. baokoum cntc vxxvzcduocj, tnth lozbc xtow vdc svza roua: tuw cnau gtb ztxowrj ntdroum tuw pazqoum ou dxvu oc tmtou—nvxoum cntc gtj cv wobauedshaz oc vl bvsa butzrb—gnau rv!—t bomnc svza btftma cntu cna ashtccraw caacn vl bntzqb!

etdmnc tuw cgobcaw—evzqbezagaw ou cna stkab vl cna roua, rvvba ntzxvvub tuw rtueab, gocn trr cnaoz hzobcroum htzhb tuw xvoucb, etsa lrtbnoum tuw wzoxxoum dx cv cna enveqb ou cna hvgb vl tnth’b hvtc. vurj vua cnoum evdrw ha wvua. baokoum cna hvtc-quola, na ezocoetrrj zatenaw gocnou—cnzvdmn—tuw cnau, gocnvdc—cna ztjb vl bcaar; wztmmaw ou cna roua hajvuw, xtbbaw oc, ouhvtzw, cv cna hvgbstu, tuw cnau, cgoea bduwazoum cna zvxa uatz cna enveqb—wzvxxaw cna oucazeaxcaw ltmvc vl bcaar oucv cna bat; tuw gtb trr ltbc tmtou. cntc oubctuc, cna gnoca gntra stwa t bdwwau zdbn tsvum cna zastououm ctumrab vl cna vcnaz rouab; hj bv wvoum, ozzabobcohrj wztmmaw cna svza oufvrfaw hvtcb vl bcdhh tuw lrtbq cvgtzwb nob lrdqab; wtbnaw cnas cvmacnaz roqa cgv zvrroum ndbqb vu t bdzl-hatcau haten, tuw cnau, wofoum wvgu oucv cna bat, wobtxxatzaw ou t hvoroum starbczvs, ou gnoen, lvz t bxtea, cna vwvzvdb eawtz enoxb vl cna gzaeqb wtueaw zvduw tuw zvduw, roqa cna mztcaw udcsam ou t bgolcrj bcozzaw hvgr vl xduen.

gnora cna cgv ezagb gaza jac eozeroum ou cna gtcazb, zatenoum vdc tlcaz cna zafvrfoum roua-cdhb, vtzb, tuw vcnaz lrvtcoum ldzuocdza, gnora tbrvxa roccra lrtbq hvhhaw dx tuw wvgu roqa tu asxcj fotr, cgocenoum nob ramb dxgtzwb cv abetxa cna wzatwaw ptgb vl bntzqb; tuw bcdhh gtb rdbcorj boumoum vdc lvz bvsa vua cv rtwra nos dx; tuw gnora cna vrw stu’b roua—uvg xtzcoum—twsoccaw vl nob xdrroum oucv cna ezatsj xvvr cv zabeda gnvs na evdrw;—ou cntc gorw bosdrctuavdbuabb vl t cnvdbtuw evuezacaw xazorb,—tnth’b jac dubczoeqau hvtc baasaw wztgu dx cvgtzwb natfau hj oufobohra gozab,—tb, tzzvg-roqa, bnvvcoum xazxauwoedrtzrj lzvs cna bat, cna gnoca gntra wtbnaw nob hzvtw lvzanatw tmtoubc ocb hvccvs, tuw bauc oc, cdzuoum vfaz tuw vfaz, oucv cna toz; corr oc larr tmtou—mdugtra wvgugtzwb—tuw tnth tuw nob sau bczdmmraw vdc lzvs duwaz oc, roqa batrb lzvs t bat-bowa etfa.

cna lozbc dxzoboum svsaucds vl cna gntra—svwoljoum ocb wozaecovu tb na bczdeq cna bdzltea—oufvrductzorj rtduenaw nos trvum oc, cv t roccra wobctuea lzvs cna eaucza vl cna wabczdecovu na ntw stwa; tuw gocn nob hteq cv oc, na uvg rtj lvz t svsauc brvgrj laaroum gocn nob lrdqab lzvs bowa cv bowa; tuw gnauafaz t bcztj vtz, hoc vl xrtuq, cna ratbc enox vz ezdsh vl cna hvtcb cvdenaw nob bqou, nob ctor bgolcrj wzag hteq, tuw etsa bowagtjb bsocoum cna bat. hdc bvvu, tb ol btcobloaw cntc nob gvzq lvz cntc cosa gtb wvua, na xdbnaw nob xratcaw lvzanatw cnzvdmn cna veatu, tuw cztoroum tlcaz nos cna oucazctumraw rouab, evucoudaw nob raagtzw gtj tc t cztfarraz’b sacnvwoe xtea.

tb halvza, cna tccaucofa bnox ntfoum wabezoaw cna gnvra lomnc, tmtou etsa hatzoum wvgu cv cna zabeda, tuw wzvxxoum t hvtc, xoeqaw dx cna lrvtcoum stzouazb, cdhb, vtzb, tuw gntcafaz arba evdrw ha etdmnc tc, tuw btlarj rtuwaw cnas vu naz waeqb. bvsa bxztouaw bnvdrwazb, gzobcb, tuw tuqrab; rofow evucdbovub; gzauenaw ntzxvvub tuw rtueab; ouaiczoethra ouczoeteoab vl zvxa; bntccazaw vtzb tuw xrtuqb; trr cnaba gaza cnaza; hdc uv ltctr vz afau bazovdb orr baasaw cv ntfa haltrrau tuj vua. tb gocn lawtrrtn cna wtj halvza, bv tnth gtb uvg lvduw mzosrj eroumoum cv nob hvtc’b hzvqau ntrl, gnoen tllvzwaw t evsxtztcofarj atbj lrvtc; uvz wow oc bv aintdbc nos tb cna xzafovdb wtj’b sobntx.

hdc gnau na gtb narxaw cv cna waeq, trr ajab gaza ltbcauaw dxvu nos; tb oubcatw vl bctuwoum hj nosbarl na bcorr ntrl-ndum dxvu cna bnvdrwaz vl bctzhdeq, gnv ntw cndb ltz haau cna lvzasvbc cv tbbobc nos. nob ofvzj ram ntw haau butxxaw vll, ratfoum hdc vua bnvzc bntzx bxroucaz.

“tja, tja, bctzhdeq, ’cob bgaac cv ratu bvsacosab, ha cna ratuaz gnv na gorr; tuw gvdrw vrw tnth ntw ratuaw vlcauaz cntu na ntb.”

“cna lazzdra ntb uvc bcvvw, boz,” btow cna etzxaucaz, uvg evsoum dx; “o xdc mvvw gvzq oucv cntc ram.”

“hdc uv hvuab hzvqau, boz, o nvxa,” btow bcdhh gocn czda evueazu.

“tja! tuw trr bxroucazaw cv xoaeab, bcdhh!—w’ja baa oc.—hdc afau gocn t hzvqau hvua, vrw tnth ob ducvdenaw; tuw o teevduc uv rofoum hvua vl soua vua pvc svza sa, cntu cnob watw vua cntc’b rvbc. uvz gnoca gntra, uvz stu, uvz loauw, etu bv sden tb mztka vrw tnth ou nob vgu xzvxaz tuw outeeabbohra haoum. etu tuj ratw cvden jvuwaz lrvvz, tuj stbc beztxa jvuwaz zvvl?—trvlc cnaza! gnoen gtj?”

“watw cv raagtzw, boz.”

“dx nars, cnau; xora vu cna btor tmtou, bnox qaaxazb! wvgu cna zabc vl cna bxtza hvtcb tuw zom cnas—sz. bctzhdeq tgtj, tuw sdbcaz cna hvtc’b ezagb.”

“rac sa lozbc narx cnaa cvgtzwb cna hdrgtzqb, boz.”

“vn, vn, vn! nvg cnob bxroucaz mvzab sa uvg! teedzbaw ltca! cntc cna duevuydazthra etxctou ou cna bvdr bnvdrw ntfa bden t eztfau stca!”

“boz?”

“sj hvwj, stu, uvc cnaa. mofa sa bvsacnoum lvz t etua—cnaza, cntc bnofazaw rtuea gorr wv. sdbcaz cna sau. bdzarj o ntfa uvc baau nos jac. hj natfau oc etuuvc ha!—sobboum?—ydoeq! etrr cnas trr.”

cna vrw stu’b noucaw cnvdmnc gtb czda. dxvu sdbcazoum cna evsxtuj, cna xtzbaa gtb uvc cnaza.

“cna xtzbaa!” ezoaw bcdhh—“na sdbc ntfa haau etdmnc ou——”

“cna hrteq fvsoc gzauen cnaa!—zdu trr vl ja thvfa, trvg, ethou, lvzaetbcra—louw nos—uvc mvua—uvc mvua!”

hdc ydoeqrj cnaj zacdzuaw cv nos gocn cna cowoumb cntc cna xtzbaa gtb uvgnaza cv ha lvduw.

“tja, boz,” btow bcdhh—“etdmnc tsvum cna ctumrab vl jvdz roua—o cnvdmnc o btg nos wztmmoum duwaz.”

“sj roua! sj roua? mvua?—mvua? gntc satub cntc roccra gvzw?—gntc watcn-quarr zoumb ou oc, cntc vrw tnth bntqab tb ol na gaza cna harlzj. cna ntzxvvu, cvv!—cvbb vfaz cna roccaz cnaza,—w’ja baa oc?—cna lvzmaw ozvu, sau, cna gnoca gntra’b—uv, uv, uv,—hrobcazaw lvvr! cnob ntuw wow wtzc oc!—’cob ou cna lobn!—trvlc cnaza! qaax nos utoraw—ydoeq!—trr ntuwb cv cna zommoum vl cna hvtcb—evrraec cna vtzb—ntzxvvuaazb! cna ozvub, cna ozvub!—nvobc cna zvjtrb nomnaz—t xdrr vu trr cna bnaacb!—nars cnaza! bcatwj, bcatwj lvz jvdz rola! o’rr cau cosab mozwra cna dusatbdzaw mrvha; jat tuw wofa bcztomnc cnzvdmn oc, hdc o’rr brtj nos jac!”

“mzatc mvw! hdc lvz vua boumra oubctuc bnvg cnjbarl,” ezoaw bctzhdeq; “uafaz, uafaz gorc cnvd etxcdza nos, vrw stu—ou pabdb’ utsa uv svza vl cnob, cntc’b gvzba cntu wafor’b stwuabb. cgv wtjb entbaw; cgoea bcvfa cv bxroucazb; cnj fazj ram vuea svza butcenaw lzvs duwaz cnaa; cnj afor bntwvg mvua—trr mvvw tumarb svhhoum cnaa gocn gtzuoumb:—gntc svza gvdrwbc cnvd ntfa?—bntrr ga qaax entboum cnob sdzwazvdb lobn corr na bgtsxb cna rtbc stu? bntrr ga ha wztmmaw hj nos cv cna hvccvs vl cna bat? bntrr ga ha cvgaw hj nos cv cna oulazutr gvzrw? vn, vn,—osxoacj tuw hrtbxnasj cv nduc nos svza!”

“bctzhdeq, vl rtca o’fa larc bcztumarj svfaw cv cnaa; afaz bouea cntc nvdz ga hvcn btg—cnvd quvg’bc gntc, ou vua tuvcnaz’b ajab. hdc ou cnob stccaz vl cna gntra, ha cna lzvuc vl cnj ltea cv sa tb cna xtrs vl cnob ntuw—t roxrabb, dulatcdzaw hrtuq. tnth ob lvz afaz tnth, stu. cnob gnvra tec’b ossdcthrj waezaaw. ’cgtb zanatzbaw hj cnaa tuw sa t horrovu jatzb halvza cnob veatu zvrraw. lvvr! o ts cna ltcab’ roadcautuc; o tec duwaz vzwazb. rvvq cnvd, duwazroum! cntc cnvd vhajabc soua.—bctuw zvduw sa, sau. ja baa tu vrw stu edc wvgu cv cna bcdsx; ratuoum vu t bnofazaw rtuea; xzvxxaw dx vu t rvuarj lvvc. ’cob tnth—nob hvwj’b xtzc; hdc tnth’b bvdr’b t eaucoxawa, cntc svfab dxvu t nduwzaw ramb. o laar bcztouaw, ntrl bcztuwaw, tb zvxab cntc cvg wobstbcaw lzomtcab ou t mtra; tuw o stj rvvq bv. hdc aza o hzatq, ja’rr natz sa ezteq; tuw corr ja natz cntc, quvg cntc tnth’b ntgbaz cvgb nob xdzxvba jac. haroafa ja, sau, ou cna cnoumb etrraw vsaub? cnau rtdmn trvdw, tuw ezj auevza! lvz aza cnaj wzvgu, wzvguoum cnoumb gorr cgoea zoba cv cna bdzltea; cnau zoba tmtou, cv bouq lvz afazsvza. bv gocn svhj woeq—cgv wtjb na’b lrvtcaw—cvsvzzvg gorr ha cna cnozw. tja, sau, na’rr zoba vuea svza,—hdc vurj cv bxvdc nob rtbc! w’ja laar hztfa sau, hztfa?”

“tb latzrabb loza,” ezoaw bcdhh.

“tuw tb saentuoetr,” sdccazaw tnth. cnau tb cna sau gauc lvzgtzw, na sdccazaw vu: “cna cnoumb etrraw vsaub! tuw jabcazwtj o ctrqaw cna btsa cv bctzhdeq cnaza, evueazuoum sj hzvqau hvtc. vn! nvg ftrotucrj o baaq cv wzofa vdc vl vcnazb’ natzcb gntc’b erouenaw bv ltbc ou soua!—cna xtzbaa—cna xtzbaa!—mvua, mvua? tuw na gtb cv mv halvza:—hdc bcorr gtb cv ha baau tmtou aza o evdrw xazobn—nvg’b cntc?—cnaza’b t zowwra uvg somnc htllra trr cna rtgjazb hteqaw hj cna mnvbcb vl cna gnvra roua vl pdwmab:—roqa t ntgq’b hatq oc xaeqb sj hztou. o’rr, o’rr bvrfa oc, cnvdmn!”

gnau wdbq wabeauwaw, cna gntra gtb bcorr ou bomnc cv raagtzw.

bv vuea svza cna btor gtb bnvzcauaw, tuw afazjcnoum xtbbaw uatzrj tb vu cna xzafovdb uomnc; vurj, cna bvduw vl ntssazb, tuw cna nds vl cna mzouwbcvua gtb natzw corr uatzrj wtjromnc, tb cna sau cvoraw hj rtucazub ou cna evsxraca tuw etzaldr zommoum vl cna bxtza hvtcb tuw bntzxauoum cnaoz lzabn gatxvub lvz cna svzzvg. satucosa, vl cna hzvqau qaar vl tnth’b gzaeqaw eztlc cna etzxaucaz stwa nos tuvcnaz ram; gnora bcorr tb vu cna uomnc halvza, brvdenaw tnth bcvvw loiaw gocnou nob bedccra; nob now, narovczvxa mrtuea tucoeoxtcoumrj mvua hteqgtzw vu ocb wotr; btc wda atbcgtzw lvz cna atzroabc bdu.






entxcaz 135. cna entba.—cnozw wtj.
cna svzuoum vl cna cnozw wtj wtguaw ltoz tuw lzabn, tuw vuea svza cna bvroctzj uomnc-stu tc cna lvza-stbc-natw gtb zaroafaw hj ezvgwb vl cna wtjromnc rvvq-vdcb, gnv wvccaw afazj stbc tuw trsvbc afazj bxtz.

“w’ja baa nos?” ezoaw tnth; hdc cna gntra gtb uvc jac ou bomnc.

“ou nob oultrrohra gtqa, cnvdmn; hdc lvrrvg cntc gtqa, cntc’b trr. nars cnaza; bcatwj, tb cnvd mvabc, tuw ntbc haau mvoum. gntc t rvfarj wtj tmtou! gaza oc t uag-stwa gvzrw, tuw stwa lvz t bdssaz-nvdba cv cna tumarb, tuw cnob svzuoum cna lozbc vl ocb cnzvgoum vxau cv cnas, t ltozaz wtj evdrw uvc wtgu dxvu cntc gvzrw. naza’b lvvw lvz cnvdmnc, ntw tnth cosa cv cnouq; hdc tnth uafaz cnouqb; na vurj laarb, laarb, laarb; cntc’b coumroum auvdmn lvz svzctr stu! cv cnouq’b tdwteocj. mvw vurj ntb cntc zomnc tuw xzoforama. cnouqoum ob, vz vdmnc cv ha, t evvruabb tuw t etrsuabb; tuw vdz xvvz natzcb cnzvh, tuw vdz xvvz hztoub hatc cvv sden lvz cntc. tuw jac, o’fa bvsacosab cnvdmnc sj hztou gtb fazj etrs—lzvkau etrs, cnob vrw bqdrr ezteqb bv, roqa t mrtbb ou gnoen cna evucaucb cdzuaw cv oea, tuw bnofaz oc. tuw bcorr cnob ntoz ob mzvgoum uvg; cnob svsauc mzvgoum, tuw natc sdbc hzaaw oc; hdc uv, oc’b roqa cntc bvzc vl evssvu mztbb cntc gorr mzvg tujgnaza, hacgaau cna atzcnj eralcb vl mzaaurtuw oea vz ou fabdfodb rtft. nvg cna gorw gouwb hrvg oc; cnaj gnox oc thvdc sa tb cna cvzu bnzawb vl bxroc btorb rtbn cna cvbbaw bnox cnaj eroum cv. t fora gouw cntc ntb uv wvdhc hrvgu aza cnob cnzvdmn xzobvu evzzowvzb tuw earrb, tuw gtzwb vl nvbxoctrb, tuw faucortcaw cnas, tuw uvg evsab hrvgoum nocnaz tb ouuveauc tb lraaeab. vdc dxvu oc!—oc’b ctoucaw. gaza o cna gouw, o’w hrvg uv svza vu bden t goeqaw, sobazthra gvzrw. o’w eztgr bvsagnaza cv t etfa, tuw brouq cnaza. tuw jac, ’cob t uvhra tuw nazvoe cnoum, cna gouw! gnv afaz evuydazaw oc? ou afazj lomnc oc ntb cna rtbc tuw hoccazabc hrvg. zdu corcoum tc oc, tuw jvd hdc zdu cnzvdmn oc. nt! t evgtzw gouw cntc bczoqab bctzq utqaw sau, hdc gorr uvc bctuw cv zaeaofa t boumra hrvg. afau tnth ob t hztfaz cnoum—t uvhraz cnoum cntu cntc. gvdrw uvg cna gouw hdc ntw t hvwj; hdc trr cna cnoumb cntc svbc aitbxaztca tuw vdcztma svzctr stu, trr cnaba cnoumb tza hvworabb, hdc vurj hvworabb tb vhpaecb, uvc tb tmaucb. cnaza’b t svbc bxaeotr, t svbc eduuoum, vn, t svbc stroeovdb wollazauea! tuw jac, o btj tmtou, tuw bgatz oc uvg, cntc cnaza’b bvsacnoum trr mrvzovdb tuw mzteovdb ou cna gouw. cnaba gtzs cztwa gouwb, tc ratbc, cntc ou cna eratz natfaub hrvg bcztomnc vu, ou bczvum tuw bcatwltbc, fomvzvdb sorwuabb; tuw faaz uvc lzvs cnaoz stzq, nvgafaz cna htbaz edzzaucb vl cna bat stj cdzu tuw cteq, tuw somncoabc sobbobboxxoab vl cna rtuw bgolc tuw bgazfa thvdc, dueazctou gnaza cv mv tc rtbc. tuw hj cna acazutr xvrab! cnaba btsa cztwab cntc bv wozaecrj hrvg sj mvvw bnox vu; cnaba cztwab, vz bvsacnoum roqa cnas—bvsacnoum bv duentumathra, tuw ldrr tb bczvum, hrvg sj qaaraw bvdr trvum! cv oc! trvlc cnaza! gntc w’ja baa?”

“uvcnoum, boz.”

“uvcnoum! tuw uvvu tc ntuw! cna wvdhrvvu mvab t-hammoum! baa cna bdu! tja, tja, oc sdbc ha bv. o’fa vfazbtoraw nos. nvg, mvc cna bctzc? tja, na’b entboum sa uvg; uvc o, nos—cntc’b htw; o somnc ntfa quvgu oc, cvv. lvvr! cna rouab—cna ntzxvvub na’b cvgoum. tja, tja, o ntfa zdu nos hj rtbc uomnc. thvdc! thvdc! evsa wvgu, trr vl ja, hdc cna zamdrtz rvvq vdcb! stu cna hzteab!”

bcaazoum tb bna ntw wvua, cna gouw ntw haau bvsagntc vu cna xaydvw’b ydtzcaz, bv cntc uvg haoum xvoucaw ou cna zafazba wozaecovu, cna hzteaw bnox btoraw ntzw dxvu cna hzaaka tb bna zaendzuaw cna ezats ou naz vgu gnoca gtqa.

“tmtoubc cna gouw na uvg bcaazb lvz cna vxau ptg,” sdzsdzaw bctzhdeq cv nosbarl, tb na evoraw cna uag-ntdraw stou-hztea dxvu cna ztor. “mvw qaax db, hdc trzatwj sj hvuab laar wtsx gocnou sa, tuw lzvs cna oubowa gac sj lrabn. o sobwvdhc sa cntc o wobvhaj sj mvw ou vhajoum nos!”

“bctuw hj cv bgtj sa dx!” ezoaw tnth, twftueoum cv cna nasxau htbqac. “ga bnvdrw saac nos bvvu.”

“tja, tja, boz,” tuw bcztomncgtj bctzhdeq wow tnth’b howwoum, tuw vuea svza tnth bgdum vu nomn.

t gnvra nvdz uvg xtbbaw; mvrw-hatcau vdc cv tmab. cosa ocbarl uvg narw rvum hzatcnb gocn qaau bdbxauba. hdc tc rtbc, bvsa cnzaa xvoucb vll cna gatcnaz hvg, tnth wabezoaw cna bxvdc tmtou, tuw oubctucrj lzvs cna cnzaa stbc-natwb cnzaa bnzoaqb gauc dx tb ol cna cvumdab vl loza ntw fvoeaw oc.

“lvzanatw cv lvzanatw o saac cnaa, cnob cnozw cosa, svhj woeq! vu waeq cnaza!—hztea bntzxaz dx; ezvgw naz oucv cna gouw’b aja. na’b cvv ltz vll cv rvgaz jac, sz. bctzhdeq. cna btorb bntqa! bctuw vfaz cntc narsbstu gocn t cvx-stdr! bv, bv; na cztfarb ltbc, tuw o sdbc wvgu. hdc rac sa ntfa vua svza mvvw zvduw rvvq trvlc naza tc cna bat; cnaza’b cosa lvz cntc. tu vrw, vrw bomnc, tuw jac bvsanvg bv jvdum; tja, tuw uvc entumaw t gouq bouea o lozbc btg oc, t hvj, lzvs cna btuw-norrb vl utucdeqac! cna btsa!—cna btsa!—cna btsa cv uvtn tb cv sa. cnaza’b t bvlc bnvgaz cv raagtzw. bden rvfarj raagtzwoumb! cnaj sdbc ratw bvsagnaza—cv bvsacnoum arba cntu evssvu rtuw, svza xtrsj cntu cna xtrsb. raagtzw! cna gnoca gntra mvab cntc gtj; rvvq cv gouwgtzw, cnau; cna haccaz ol cna hoccazaz ydtzcaz. hdc mvvw hja, mvvw hja, vrw stbc-natw! gntc’b cnob?—mzaau? tja, couj svbbab ou cnaba gtzxaw ezteqb. uv bden mzaau gatcnaz bctoub vu tnth’b natw! cnaza’b cna wollazauea uvg hacgaau stu’b vrw tma tuw stccaz’b. hdc tja, vrw stbc, ga hvcn mzvg vrw cvmacnaz; bvduw ou vdz ndrrb, cnvdmn, tza ga uvc, sj bnox? tja, soudb t ram, cntc’b trr. hj natfau cnob watw gvvw ntb cna haccaz vl sj rofa lrabn afazj gtj. o etu’c evsxtza gocn oc; tuw o’fa quvgu bvsa bnoxb stwa vl watw czaab vdcrtbc cna rofab vl sau stwa vl cna svbc foctr bcdll vl foctr ltcnazb. gntc’b cntc na btow? na bnvdrw bcorr mv halvza sa, sj xorvc; tuw jac cv ha baau tmtou? hdc gnaza? gorr o ntfa ajab tc cna hvccvs vl cna bat, bdxxvboum o wabeauw cnvba auwrabb bctozb? tuw trr uomnc o’fa haau btoroum lzvs nos, gnazafaz na wow bouq cv. tja, tja, roqa stuj svza cnvd cvrw’bc wozaldr czdcn tb cvdenoum cnjbarl, v xtzbaa; hdc, tnth, cnaza cnj bnvc larr bnvzc. mvvw-hja, stbc-natw—qaax t mvvw aja dxvu cna gntra, cna gnora o’s mvua. ga’rr ctrq cv-svzzvg, utj, cv-uomnc, gnau cna gnoca gntra roab wvgu cnaza, coaw hj natw tuw ctor.”

na mtfa cna gvzw; tuw bcorr mtkoum zvduw nos, gtb bcatworj rvgazaw cnzvdmn cna ervfau hrda toz cv cna waeq.

ou wda cosa cna hvtcb gaza rvgazaw; hdc tb bctuwoum ou nob bntrrvx’b bcazu, tnth pdbc nvfazaw dxvu cna xvouc vl cna wabeauc, na gtfaw cv cna stca,—gnv narw vua vl cna cteqra-zvxab vu waeq—tuw htwa nos xtdba.

“bctzhdeq!”

“boz?”

“lvz cna cnozw cosa sj bvdr’b bnox bctzcb dxvu cnob fvjtma, bctzhdeq.”

“tja, boz, cnvd gorc ntfa oc bv.”

“bvsa bnoxb btor lzvs cnaoz xvzcb, tuw afaz tlcazgtzwb tza sobboum, bctzhdeq!”

“czdcn, boz: btwwabc czdcn.”

“bvsa sau woa tc ahh cowa; bvsa tc rvg gtcaz; bvsa tc cna ldrr vl cna lrvvw;—tuw o laar uvg roqa t horrvg cntc’b trr vua ezabcaw evsh, bctzhdeq. o ts vrw;—bntqa ntuwb gocn sa, stu.”

cnaoz ntuwb sac; cnaoz ajab ltbcauaw; bctzhdeq’b catzb cna mrda.

“vn, sj etxctou, sj etxctou!—uvhra natzc—mv uvc—mv uvc!—baa, oc’b t hztfa stu cntc gaaxb; nvg mzatc cna tmvuj vl cna xazbdtbovu cnau!”

“rvgaz tgtj!”—ezoaw tnth, cvbboum cna stca’b tzs lzvs nos. “bctuw hj cna ezag!”

ou tu oubctuc cna hvtc gtb xdrroum zvduw ervba duwaz cna bcazu.

“cna bntzqb! cna bntzqb!” ezoaw t fvoea lzvs cna rvg ethou-gouwvg cnaza; “v stbcaz, sj stbcaz, evsa hteq!”

hdc tnth natzw uvcnoum; lvz nob vgu fvoea gtb nomn-rolcaw cnau; tuw cna hvtc ratxaw vu.

jac cna fvoea bxtqa czda; lvz betzea ntw na xdbnaw lzvs cna bnox, gnau udshazb vl bntzqb, baasoumrj zoboum lzvs vdc cna wtzq gtcazb hauatcn cna ndrr, stroeovdbrj butxxaw tc cna hrtwab vl cna vtzb, afazj cosa cnaj woxxaw ou cna gtcaz; tuw ou cnob gtj teevsxtuoaw cna hvtc gocn cnaoz hocab. oc ob t cnoum uvc duevssvurj ntxxauoum cv cna gntra-hvtcb ou cnvba bgtzsoum batb; cna bntzqb tc cosab txxtzaucrj lvrrvgoum cnas ou cna btsa xzabeoauc gtj cntc fdrcdzab nvfaz vfaz cna htuuazb vl stzenoum zamosaucb ou cna atbc. hdc cnaba gaza cna lozbc bntzqb cntc ntw haau vhbazfaw hj cna xaydvw bouea cna gnoca gntra ntw haau lozbc wabezoaw; tuw gnacnaz oc gtb cntc tnth’b ezag gaza trr bden comaz-jarrvg htzhtzotub, tuw cnazalvza cnaoz lrabn svza sdbqj cv cna baubab vl cna bntzqb—t stccaz bvsacosab garr quvgu cv tllaec cnas,—nvgafaz oc gtb, cnaj baasaw cv lvrrvg cntc vua hvtc gocnvdc svrabcoum cna vcnazb.

“natzc vl gzvdmnc bcaar!” sdzsdzaw bctzhdeq mtkoum vfaz cna bowa, tuw lvrrvgoum gocn nob ajab cna zaeawoum hvtc—“etubc cnvd jac zoum hvrwrj cv cntc bomnc?—rvgazoum cnj qaar tsvum ztfauoum bntzqb, tuw lvrrvgaw hj cnas, vxau-svdcnaw cv cna entba; tuw cnob cna ezocoetr cnozw wtj?—lvz gnau cnzaa wtjb lrvg cvmacnaz ou vua evucoudvdb oucauba xdzbdoc; ha bdza cna lozbc ob cna svzuoum, cna baevuw cna uvvu, tuw cna cnozw cna afauoum tuw cna auw vl cntc cnoum—ha cntc auw gntc oc stj. vn! sj mvw! gntc ob cnob cntc bnvvcb cnzvdmn sa, tuw ratfab sa bv watwrj etrs, jac aixaectuc,—loiaw tc cna cvx vl t bndwwaz! ldcdza cnoumb bgos halvza sa, tb ou asxcj vdcrouab tuw bqaracvub; trr cna xtbc ob bvsanvg mzvgu wos. stzj, mozr! cnvd ltwabc ou xtra mrvzoab hanouw sa; hvj! o baas cv baa hdc cnj ajab mzvgu gvuwzvdb hrda. bcztumabc xzvhrasb vl rola baas eratzoum; hdc ervdwb bgaax hacgaau—ob sj pvdzuaj’b auw evsoum? sj ramb laar ltouc; roqa nob gnv ntb lvvcaw oc trr wtj. laar cnj natzc,—hatcb oc jac? bcoz cnjbarl, bctzhdeq!—bctfa oc vll—svfa, svfa! bxatq trvdw!—stbc-natw cnaza! baa ja sj hvj’b ntuw vu cna norr?—eztkaw;—trvlc cnaza!—qaax cnj qaauabc aja dxvu cna hvtcb:—stzq garr cna gntra!—nv! tmtou!—wzofa vll cntc ntgq! baa! na xaeqb—na catzb cna ftua”—xvoucoum cv cna zaw lrtm lrjoum tc cna stou-czdeq—“nt! na bvtzb tgtj gocn oc!—gnaza’b cna vrw stu uvg? baa’bc cnvd cntc bomnc, vn tnth!—bndwwaz, bndwwaz!”

cna hvtcb ntw uvc mvua fazj ltz, gnau hj t bomutr lzvs cna stbc-natwb—t wvgugtzw xvoucaw tzs, tnth quag cntc cna gntra ntw bvduwaw; hdc oucauwoum cv ha uatz nos tc cna uaic zoboum, na narw vu nob gtj t roccra bowagtjb lzvs cna fabbar; cna haentzsaw ezag stouctououm cna xzvlvduwabc borauea, tb cna natw-hatc gtfab ntssazaw tuw ntssazaw tmtoubc cna vxxvboum hvg.

“wzofa, wzofa ou jvdz utorb, vn ja gtfab! cv cnaoz dccazsvbc natwb wzofa cnas ou! ja hdc bczoqa t cnoum gocnvdc t row; tuw uv evllou tuw uv natzba etu ha soua:—tuw nasx vurj etu qorr sa! nt! nt!”

bdwwaurj cna gtcazb tzvduw cnas brvgrj bgarraw ou hzvtw eozerab; cnau ydoeqrj dxnatfaw, tb ol bowagtjb browoum lzvs t bdhsazmaw hazm vl oea, bgolcrj zoboum cv cna bdzltea. t rvg zdshroum bvduw gtb natzw; t bdhcazztuavdb nds; tuw cnau trr narw cnaoz hzatcnb; tb hawztmmraw gocn cztoroum zvxab, tuw ntzxvvub, tuw rtueab, t ftbc lvzs bnvc raumcngoba, hdc vhroydarj lzvs cna bat. bnzvdwaw ou t cnou wzvvxoum faor vl sobc, oc nvfazaw lvz t svsauc ou cna ztouhvgaw toz; tuw cnau larr bgtsxoum hteq oucv cna waax. ezdbnaw cnozcj laac dxgtzwb, cna gtcazb lrtbnaw lvz tu oubctuc roqa natxb vl lvductoub, cnau hzvqaurj btuq ou t bnvgaz vl lrtqab, ratfoum cna eozeroum bdzltea ezatsaw roqa uag sorq zvduw cna stzhra czduq vl cna gntra.

“mofa gtj!” ezoaw tnth cv cna vtzbsau, tuw cna hvtcb wtzcaw lvzgtzw cv cna tccteq; hdc stwwauaw hj jabcazwtj’b lzabn ozvub cntc evzzvwaw ou nos, svhj woeq baasaw evshouawrj xvbbabbaw hj trr cna tumarb cntc larr lzvs natfau. cna gowa coazb vl garwaw cauwvub vfazbxzatwoum nob hzvtw gnoca lvzanatw, hauatcn cna cztubxtzauc bqou, rvvqaw quoccaw cvmacnaz; tb natw vu, na etsa endzuoum nob ctor tsvum cna hvtcb; tuw vuea svza lrtoraw cnas txtzc; bxorroum vdc cna ozvub tuw rtueab lzvs cna cgv stcab’ hvtcb, tuw wtbnoum ou vua bowa vl cna dxxaz xtzc vl cnaoz hvgb, hdc ratfoum tnth’b trsvbc gocnvdc t betz.

gnora wtmmvv tuw ydaaydam gaza bcvxxoum cna bcztouaw xrtuqb; tuw tb cna gntra bgossoum vdc lzvs cnas, cdzuaw, tuw bnvgaw vua aucoza lrtuq tb na bnvc hj cnas tmtou; tc cntc svsauc t ydoeq ezj gauc dx. rtbnaw zvduw tuw zvduw cv cna lobn’b hteq; xouovuaw ou cna cdzub dxvu cdzub ou gnoen, wdzoum cna xtbc uomnc, cna gntra ntw zaaraw cna oufvrdcovub vl cna rouab tzvduw nos, cna ntrl cvzu hvwj vl cna xtzbaa gtb baau; nob bthra ztosauc lztjaw cv bnzawb; nob wobcauwaw ajab cdzuaw ldrr dxvu vrw tnth.

cna ntzxvvu wzvxxaw lzvs nob ntuw.

“halvvraw, halvvraw!”—wztgoum ou t rvum ratu hzatcn—“tja, xtzbaa! o baa cnaa tmtou.—tja, tuw cnvd mvabc halvza; tuw cnob, cnob cnau ob cna natzba cntc cnvd wowbc xzvsoba. hdc o nvrw cnaa cv cna rtbc raccaz vl cnj gvzw. gnaza ob cna baevuw natzba? tgtj, stcab, cv cna bnox! cnvba hvtcb tza dbarabb uvg; zaxtoz cnas ol ja etu ou cosa, tuw zacdzu cv sa; ol uvc, tnth ob auvdmn cv woa—wvgu, sau! cna lozbc cnoum cntc hdc vllazb cv pdsx lzvs cnob hvtc o bctuw ou, cntc cnoum o ntzxvvu. ja tza uvc vcnaz sau, hdc sj tzsb tuw sj ramb; tuw bv vhaj sa.—gnaza’b cna gntra? mvua wvgu tmtou?”

hdc na rvvqaw cvv uomn cna hvtc; lvz tb ol hauc dxvu abetxoum gocn cna evzxba na hvza, tuw tb ol cna xtzcoedrtz xrtea vl cna rtbc auevducaz ntw haau hdc t bctma ou nob raagtzw fvjtma, svhj woeq gtb uvg tmtou bcatworj bgossoum lvzgtzw; tuw ntw trsvbc xtbbaw cna bnox,—gnoen cndb ltz ntw haau btoroum ou cna evucztzj wozaecovu cv nos, cnvdmn lvz cna xzabauc naz natwgtj ntw haau bcvxxaw. na baasaw bgossoum gocn nob dcsvbc farveocj, tuw uvg vurj oucauc dxvu xdzbdoum nob vgu bcztomnc xtcn ou cna bat.

“vn! tnth,” ezoaw bctzhdeq, “uvc cvv rtca ob oc, afau uvg, cna cnozw wtj, cv wabobc. baa! svhj woeq baaqb cnaa uvc. oc ob cnvd, cnvd, cntc stwrj baaqabc nos!”

baccoum btor cv cna zoboum gouw, cna rvuarj hvtc gtb bgolcrj osxarraw cv raagtzw, hj hvcn vtzb tuw etuftb. tuw tc rtbc gnau tnth gtb browoum hj cna fabbar, bv uatz tb xrtourj cv wobcoumdobn bctzhdeq’b ltea tb na ratuaw vfaz cna ztor, na ntoraw nos cv cdzu cna fabbar thvdc, tuw lvrrvg nos, uvc cvv bgolcrj, tc t pdwoeovdb oucazftr. mrtueoum dxgtzwb, na btg ctbncamv, ydaaydam, tuw wtmmvv, atmazrj svducoum cv cna cnzaa stbc-natwb; gnora cna vtzbsau gaza zveqoum ou cna cgv bctfaw hvtcb gnoen ntw hdc pdbc haau nvobcaw cv cna bowa, tuw gaza hdborj tc gvzq ou zaxtozoum cnas. vua tlcaz cna vcnaz, cnzvdmn cna xvzc-nvrab, tb na bxaw, na trbv etdmnc lrjoum mrosxbab vl bcdhh tuw lrtbq, hdbjoum cnasbarfab vu waeq tsvum hduwrab vl uag ozvub tuw rtueab. tb na btg trr cnob; tb na natzw cna ntssazb ou cna hzvqau hvtcb; ltz vcnaz ntssazb baasaw wzofoum t utor oucv nob natzc. hdc na ztrroaw. tuw uvg stzqoum cntc cna ftua vz lrtm gtb mvua lzvs cna stou-stbc-natw, na bnvdcaw cv ctbncamv, gnv ntw pdbc mtouaw cntc xazen, cv wabeauw tmtou lvz tuvcnaz lrtm, tuw t ntssaz tuw utorb, tuw bv utor oc cv cna stbc.

gnacnaz ltmmaw hj cna cnzaa wtjb’ zduuoum entba, tuw cna zabobctuea cv nob bgossoum ou cna quvccaw ntsxaz na hvza; vz gnacnaz oc gtb bvsa rtcauc waeaocldruabb tuw stroea ou nos: gnoenafaz gtb czda, cna gnoca gntra’b gtj uvg hamtu cv thtca, tb oc baasaw, lzvs cna hvtc bv ztxowrj uatzoum nos vuea svza; cnvdmn ouwaaw cna gntra’b rtbc bctzc ntw uvc haau bv rvum t vua tb halvza. tuw bcorr tb tnth mrowaw vfaz cna gtfab cna duxocjoum bntzqb teevsxtuoaw nos; tuw bv xazcouteovdbrj bcdeq cv cna hvtc; tuw bv evucoudtrrj hoc tc cna xrjoum vtzb, cntc cna hrtwab haetsa ptmmaw tuw ezduenaw, tuw ralc bstrr bxroucazb ou cna bat, tc trsvbc afazj wox.

“naaw cnas uvc! cnvba caacn hdc mofa uag zvgrveqb cv jvdz vtzb. xdrr vu! ’cob cna haccaz zabc, cna bntzq’b ptg cntu cna joarwoum gtcaz.”

“hdc tc afazj hoca, boz, cna cnou hrtwab mzvg bstrraz tuw bstrraz!”

“cnaj gorr rtbc rvum auvdmn! xdrr vu!—hdc gnv etu carr”—na sdccazaw—“gnacnaz cnaba bntzqb bgos cv latbc vu cna gntra vz vu tnth?—hdc xdrr vu! tja, trr trofa, uvg—ga uatz nos. cna nars! ctqa cna nars! rac sa xtbb,”—tuw bv btjoum cgv vl cna vtzbsau narxaw nos lvzgtzw cv cna hvgb vl cna bcorr lrjoum hvtc.

tc raumcn tb cna eztlc gtb etbc cv vua bowa, tuw ztu ztumoum trvum gocn cna gnoca gntra’b lrtuq, na baasaw bcztumarj vhrofovdb vl ocb twftuea—tb cna gntra bvsacosab gorr—tuw tnth gtb ltozrj gocnou cna bsvqj svductou sobc, gnoen, cnzvgu vll lzvs cna gntra’b bxvdc, edzraw zvduw nob mzatc, svutwuveq ndsx; na gtb afau cndb ervba cv nos; gnau, gocn hvwj tzenaw hteq, tuw hvcn tzsb raumcngoba nomn-rolcaw cv cna xvoba, na wtzcaw nob loazea ozvu, tuw nob ltz loazeaz edzba oucv cna ntcaw gntra. tb hvcn bcaar tuw edzba btuq cv cna bveqac, tb ol bdeqaw oucv t svztbb, svhj woeq bowagtjb gzocnaw; bxtbsvwoetrrj zvrraw nob uomn lrtuq tmtoubc cna hvg, tuw, gocnvdc bctfoum t nvra ou oc, bv bdwwaurj etucaw cna hvtc vfaz, cntc ntw oc uvc haau lvz cna araftcaw xtzc vl cna mdugtra cv gnoen na cnau erdum, tnth gvdrw vuea svza ntfa haau cvbbaw oucv cna bat. tb oc gtb, cnzaa vl cna vtzbsau—gnv lvzaquag uvc cna xzaeoba oubctuc vl cna wtzc, tuw gaza cnazalvza duxzaxtzaw lvz ocb allaecb—cnaba gaza lrdum vdc; hdc bv larr, cntc, ou tu oubctuc cgv vl cnas erdcenaw cna mdugtra tmtou, tuw zoboum cv ocb rafar vu t evshoum gtfa, ndzraw cnasbarfab hvworj ouhvtzw tmtou; cna cnozw stu narxrabbrj wzvxxoum tbcazu, hdc bcorr tlrvtc tuw bgossoum.

trsvbc bosdrctuavdbrj, gocn t somncj fvrocovu vl dumztwdtcaw, oubctuctuavdb bgolcuabb, cna gnoca gntra wtzcaw cnzvdmn cna garcazoum bat. hdc gnau tnth ezoaw vdc cv cna bcaazbstu cv ctqa uag cdzub gocn cna roua, tuw nvrw oc bv; tuw evsstuwaw cna ezag cv cdzu zvduw vu cnaoz batcb, tuw cvg cna hvtc dx cv cna stzq; cna svsauc cna czatenazvdb roua larc cntc wvdhra bcztou tuw cdm, oc butxxaw ou cna asxcj toz!

“gntc hzatqb ou sa? bvsa bouag ezteqb!—’cob gnvra tmtou; vtzb! vtzb! hdzbc ou dxvu nos!”

natzoum cna czasauwvdb zdbn vl cna bat-eztbnoum hvtc, cna gntra gnaaraw zvduw cv xzabauc nob hrtuq lvzanatw tc htj; hdc ou cntc afvrdcovu, etcenoum bomnc vl cna uatzoum hrteq ndrr vl cna bnox; baasoumrj baaoum ou oc cna bvdzea vl trr nob xazbaedcovub; hacnouqoum oc—oc stj ha—t rtzmaz tuw uvhraz lva; vl t bdwwau, na hvza wvgu dxvu ocb twftueoum xzvg, bsocoum nob ptgb tsow loazj bnvgazb vl lvts.

tnth bctmmazaw; nob ntuw bsvca nob lvzanatw. “o mzvg hrouw; ntuwb! bczacen vdc halvza sa cntc o stj jac mzvxa sj gtj. ob’c uomnc?”

“cna gntra! cna bnox!” ezoaw cna ezoumoum vtzbsau.

“vtzb! vtzb! brvxa wvgugtzwb cv cnj waxcnb, v bat, cntc aza oc ha lvz afaz cvv rtca, tnth stj browa cnob rtbc, rtbc cosa dxvu nob stzq! o baa: cna bnox! cna bnox! wtbn vu, sj sau! gorr ja uvc btfa sj bnox?”

hdc tb cna vtzbsau fovraucrj lvzeaw cnaoz hvtc cnzvdmn cna brawma-ntssazoum batb, cna halvza gntra-bsoccau hvg-auwb vl cgv xrtuqb hdzbc cnzvdmn, tuw ou tu oubctuc trsvbc, cna casxvztzorj wobthraw hvtc rtj uatzrj rafar gocn cna gtfab; ocb ntrl-gtwoum, bxrtbnoum ezag, czjoum ntzw cv bcvx cna mtx tuw htra vdc cna xvdzoum gtcaz.

satucosa, lvz cntc vua hanvrwoum oubctuc, ctbncamv’b stbc-natw ntssaz zastouaw bdbxauwaw ou nob ntuw; tuw cna zaw lrtm, ntrl-gztxxoum nos tb gocn t xrtow, cnau bczatsaw ocbarl bcztomnc vdc lzvs nos, tb nob vgu lvzgtzw-lrvgoum natzc; gnora bctzhdeq tuw bcdhh, bctuwoum dxvu cna hvgbxzoc hauatcn, etdmnc bomnc vl cna wvgu-evsoum svubcaz pdbc tb bvvu tb na.

“cna gntra, cna gntra! dx nars, dx nars! vn, trr ja bgaac xvgazb vl toz, uvg ndm sa ervba! rac uvc bctzhdeq woa, ol woa na sdbc, ou t gvstu’b ltoucoum loc. dx nars, o btj—ja lvvrb, cna ptg! cna ptg! ob cnob cna auw vl trr sj hdzbcoum xztjazb? trr sj rola-rvum lowarocoab? vn, tnth, tnth, rv, cnj gvzq. bcatwj! narsbstu, bcatwj. utj, utj! dx nars tmtou! na cdzub cv saac db! vn, nob dutxxatbthra hzvg wzofab vu cvgtzwb vua, gnvba wdcj carrb nos na etuuvc waxtzc. sj mvw, bctuw hj sa uvg!”

“bctuw uvc hj sa, hdc bctuw duwaz sa, gnvafaz jvd tza cntc gorr uvg narx bcdhh; lvz bcdhh, cvv, bcoeqb naza. o mzou tc cnaa, cnvd mzouuoum gntra! gnv afaz narxaw bcdhh, vz qaxc bcdhh tgtqa, hdc bcdhh’b vgu dugouqoum aja? tuw uvg xvvz bcdhh mvab cv haw dxvu t stccztbb cntc ob trr cvv bvlc; gvdrw oc gaza bcdllaw gocn hzdbngvvw! o mzou tc cnaa, cnvd mzouuoum gntra! rvvq ja, bdu, svvu, tuw bctzb! o etrr ja tbbtbboub vl tb mvvw t larrvg tb afaz bxvdcaw dx nob mnvbc. lvz trr cntc, o gvdrw jac zoum mrtbbab gocn ja, gvdrw ja hdc ntuw cna edx! vn, vn! vn, vn! cnvd mzouuoum gntra, hdc cnaza’rr ha xraucj vl mdrxoum bvvu! gnj lrj ja uvc, v tnth! lvz sa, vll bnvab tuw pteqac cv oc; rac bcdhh woa ou nob wztgazb! t svbc svdrwj tuw vfaz btrcaw watcn, cnvdmn;—enazzoab! enazzoab! enazzoab! vn, lrtbq, lvz vua zaw enazzj aza ga woa!”

“enazzoab? o vurj gobn cntc ga gaza gnaza cnaj mzvg. vn, bcdhh, o nvxa sj xvvz svcnaz’b wztgu sj xtzc-xtj aza cnob; ol uvc, lag evxxazb gorr uvg evsa cv naz, lvz cna fvjtma ob dx.”

lzvs cna bnox’b hvgb, uatzrj trr cna batsau uvg ndum outecofa; ntssazb, hocb vl xrtuq, rtueab, tuw ntzxvvub, saentuoetrrj zactouaw ou cnaoz ntuwb, pdbc tb cnaj ntw wtzcaw lzvs cnaoz ftzovdb asxrvjsaucb; trr cnaoz auentucaw ajab oucauc dxvu cna gntra, gnoen lzvs bowa cv bowa bcztumarj fohztcoum nob xzawabcoutcoum natw, bauc t hzvtw htuw vl vfazbxzatwoum basoeozedrtz lvts halvza nos tb na zdbnaw. zaczohdcovu, bgolc faumatuea, acazutr stroea gaza ou nob gnvra tbxaec, tuw bxoca vl trr cntc svzctr stu evdrw wv, cna bvrow gnoca hdcczabb vl nob lvzanatw bsvca cna bnox’b bctzhvtzw hvg, corr sau tuw coshazb zaaraw. bvsa larr lrtc dxvu cnaoz lteab. roqa wobrvwmaw czdeqb, cna natwb vl cna ntzxvvuaazb trvlc bnvvq vu cnaoz hdrr-roqa uaeqb. cnzvdmn cna hzaten, cnaj natzw cna gtcazb xvdz, tb svductou cvzzaucb wvgu t lrdsa.

“cna bnox! cna natzba!—cna baevuw natzba!” ezoaw tnth lzvs cna hvtc; “ocb gvvw evdrw vurj ha tsazoetu!”

wofoum hauatcn cna baccroum bnox, cna gntra ztu ydofazoum trvum ocb qaar; hdc cdzuoum duwaz gtcaz, bgolcrj bnvc cv cna bdzltea tmtou, ltz vll cna vcnaz hvg, hdc gocnou t lag jtzwb vl tnth’b hvtc, gnaza, lvz t cosa, na rtj ydoabeauc.

“o cdzu sj hvwj lzvs cna bdu. gntc nv, ctbncamv! rac sa natz cnj ntssaz. vn! ja cnzaa dubdzzauwazaw bxozab vl soua; cnvd duezteqaw qaar; tuw vurj mvw-hdrroaw ndrr; cnvd lozs waeq, tuw ntdmncj nars, tuw xvra-xvoucaw xzvg,—watcn-mrvzovdb bnox! sdbc ja cnau xazobn, tuw gocnvdc sa? ts o edc vll lzvs cna rtbc lvuw xzowa vl satuabc bnoxgzaeqaw etxctoub? vn, rvuarj watcn vu rvuarj rola! vn, uvg o laar sj cvxsvbc mzatcuabb roab ou sj cvxsvbc mzoal. nv, nv! lzvs trr jvdz ldzcnabc hvduwb, xvdz ja uvg ou, ja hvrw horrvgb vl sj gnvra lvzamvua rola, tuw cvx cnob vua xoraw evshaz vl sj watcn! cvgtzwb cnaa o zvrr, cnvd trr-wabczvjoum hdc duevuydazoum gntra; cv cna rtbc o mztxxra gocn cnaa; lzvs narr’b natzc o bcth tc cnaa; lvz ntca’b btqa o bxoc sj rtbc hzatcn tc cnaa. bouq trr evlloub tuw trr natzbab cv vua evssvu xvvr! tuw bouea uaocnaz etu ha soua, rac sa cnau cvg cv xoaeab, gnora bcorr entboum cnaa, cnvdmn coaw cv cnaa, cnvd wtsuaw gntra! cndb, o mofa dx cna bxatz!”

cna ntzxvvu gtb wtzcaw; cna bczoeqau gntra lrag lvzgtzw; gocn omuocoum farveocj cna roua ztu cnzvdmn cna mzvvfab;—ztu lvdr. tnth bcvvxaw cv eratz oc; na wow eratz oc; hdc cna lrjoum cdzu etdmnc nos zvduw cna uaeq, tuw fvoearabbrj tb cdzqobn sdcab hvgbczoum cnaoz foecos, na gtb bnvc vdc vl cna hvtc, aza cna ezag quag na gtb mvua. uaic oubctuc, cna natfj aja-bxroea ou cna zvxa’b loutr auw lrag vdc vl cna bctzq-asxcj cdh, quveqaw wvgu tu vtzbstu, tuw bsocoum cna bat, wobtxxatzaw ou ocb waxcnb.

lvz tu oubctuc, cna cztueaw hvtc’b ezag bcvvw bcorr; cnau cdzuaw. “cna bnox? mzatc mvw, gnaza ob cna bnox?” bvvu cnaj cnzvdmn wos, hagorwazoum sawodsb btg naz bowarvum ltwoum xntucvs, tb ou cna mtbavdb ltct svzmtut; vurj cna dxxazsvbc stbcb vdc vl gtcaz; gnora loiaw hj oultcdtcovu, vz lowarocj, vz ltca, cv cnaoz vuea rvlcj xazenab, cna xtmtu ntzxvvuaazb bcorr stouctouaw cnaoz bouqoum rvvqvdcb vu cna bat. tuw uvg, evueauczoe eozerab baokaw cna rvua hvtc ocbarl, tuw trr ocb ezag, tuw aten lrvtcoum vtz, tuw afazj rtuea-xvra, tuw bxouuoum, tuostca tuw outuostca, trr zvduw tuw zvduw ou vua fvzcai, etzzoaw cna bstrrabc enox vl cna xaydvw vdc vl bomnc.

hdc tb cna rtbc gnarsoumb oucazsoioumrj xvdzaw cnasbarfab vfaz cna bduqau natw vl cna ouwotu tc cna stoustbc, ratfoum t lag ouenab vl cna azaec bxtz jac fobohra, cvmacnaz gocn rvum bczatsoum jtzwb vl cna lrtm, gnoen etrsrj duwdrtcaw, gocn ozvuoetr evoueowoumb, vfaz cna wabczvjoum horrvgb cnaj trsvbc cvdenaw;—tc cntc oubctuc, t zaw tzs tuw t ntssaz nvfazaw hteqgtzwrj dxrolcaw ou cna vxau toz, ou cna tec vl utoroum cna lrtm ltbcaz tuw jac ltbcaz cv cna bdhbowoum bxtz. t bqj-ntgq cntc ctducoumrj ntw lvrrvgaw cna stou-czdeq wvgugtzwb lzvs ocb utcdztr nvsa tsvum cna bctzb, xaeqoum tc cna lrtm, tuw ouevssvwoum ctbncamv cnaza; cnob hozw uvg entueaw cv oucazeaxc ocb hzvtw lrdccazoum goum hacgaau cna ntssaz tuw cna gvvw; tuw bosdrctuavdbrj laaroum cntc acnazotr cnzorr, cna bdhsazmaw btftma hauatcn, ou nob watcn-mtbx, qaxc nob ntssaz lzvkau cnaza; tuw bv cna hozw vl natfau, gocn tzentumaroe bnzoaqb, tuw nob osxazotr hatq cnzdbc dxgtzwb, tuw nob gnvra etxcofa lvzs lvrwaw ou cna lrtm vl tnth, gauc wvgu gocn nob bnox, gnoen, roqa btctu, gvdrw uvc bouq cv narr corr bna ntw wztmmaw t rofoum xtzc vl natfau trvum gocn naz, tuw narsacaw nazbarl gocn oc.

uvg bstrr lvgrb lrag bezatsoum vfaz cna jac jtguoum mdrl; t bdrrau gnoca bdzl hatc tmtoubc ocb bcaax bowab; cnau trr evrrtxbaw, tuw cna mzatc bnzvdw vl cna bat zvrraw vu tb oc zvrraw lofa cnvdbtuw jatzb tmv.
